40001001	At Yesus Kristus Abraham nen, Daud nen, ina'but etnogo opa lak erlo baga nen itaklarik wagoukha meke inetaga yi o.
40001002	At Abraham nen Ishak itakhik, Ishak nen Yakub itakhik, Yakub nen Yehuda agarumi inom itaginakhik,
40001003	at Yehuda nen he Tamar waganhikhesik nen, Peres inom, Zerah inom, ipisak itaginakhik, nen, at Peres nen Hezron itakhik, Hezron nen Ram itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001004	Nen, Ram nen Aminadab itakhik, Aminadab nen Nahason itakhik, Nahason nen Salmon itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001005	Nen, Salmon nen he Rahab waganhikhesik nen, Boas itakhik, Boas nen he Rut waganhikhesik nen, Obed itakhik, Obed nen Isai itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001006	Nen, Isai nen, ap Daud etagapogot etnogo itakhik, at Daud nen Uria age tilogo wolok dukhisikhesiknen, Salomo itakhik, itithogon itaklarik wagoukha.
40001007	Nen, Salomo nen, Rehabeam itakhik, Rehabeam nen Abia itakhik, Abia nen Asa itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001008	Nen, Asa nen Yosafat itakhik, Yosafat nen Yoram itakhik, Yoram nen Uzia itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001009	Nen, Uzia nen Yotam itakhik, Yotam nen Ahas itakhik, Ahas nen Hizkia itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001010	Nen, Hizkia nen Manasye itakhik, Manasye nen Amon itakhik, Amon nen Yosia itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001011	Nen, Yosia ap Yahudi meke o Babel wogosiklagoukha eta higit, at Yekhonya agarlak lak inom itaginakhik, itithogon itaklarik wagoukha.
40001012	Nen, akhuni Yahudi meke o Babel wogosiklagoukhama dogolik, yabokane at Yekhonya nen Sealtiel itakhik, Sealtiel nen Zerubabel itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001013	Nen, Zerubabel nen Abihud itakhik, Abihud nen Elyakim itakhik, Elyakim nen Azur itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001014	Nen, Azur nen Zadok itakhik, Zadok nen Akhim itakhik, Akhim nen Eliud itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001015	Nen, Eliud nen Eleazar itakhik, Eleazar nen Matan itakhik, Matan nen Yakub itakhik, hagakhikhe.
40001016	Nen, Yakub nen Yusuf, he Maria agun etnogoitakhik, he Maria nen Yesus, nit nen Kristus ekhe Iago etnogo itakhik, erloma nenat itaklarik wagoukha.
40001017	Itithogon itaklarik wagoukha iti, ap Abraham itaklageikhe hurli nen, ap Daud itaklageikhe iti hurli baga inopa lak inebe 14 hurli nen itaklarik wagoukha. Nen, Daud itaklageikhe hurli nen, akhuni Yahudi meke wogosik o Babel lagoukha iti hurli baga inopa lak 14 hurli nen yabokane itaklarik wagoukhaat. Nen, ap Yahudi meke o Babel wogosik lagoukha hurli nen, Kristus itaklageikhe iti baga, inebe 14 hurli nen yabokane itaklarik wagoukhaat iti.
40001018	At Yesus Kristus itaklageikhe iti ebe yigithogonat itaklageikhe. Agosa Maria iti, ap Yusuf ebe waganhidek, inom huto warek werekma, Allah Agoreke nen eak akmatdisikhe.
40001019	Akmatdisikhemo at Yusuf obabut hano etnogo nen, at akla nen, “An he iti akhuni inil oba here'isaumo ekarli asinogo nen, limago here'isagein, ” iluk, akla apekhe lageikhe.
40001020	Itithogon apasi werekma, hibako noge isinem at malaikat Allah nen pogot oba nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke ageikhe oba wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Yusuf Daud a'but yi. Hat horlak Maria iti waganu na'it, iluk hakla apugun o. Eak iti Allah Agoreke nenat akmatdekhemo. Halok he, waganino.
40001021	Eak iti ebe abat itasigin o. Itasumo re, at nen oe agot weak hagariogei meke korogo waganiluk tilinabigin o, iluk etaga Yesus thalino, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40001022	Itithogon hagasugun iluk, ninopase Allah Etagapogot nen, ap ageikhe haganeat ayoko 'bisikhemo wene yogeisekhe dogolik, holal waganogo 'bisikhe meke tak-tagat hagatlasuagaluk isikhe iti.
40001023	At iti nen, “Horlak ageikhe eak akma atluk, eak abat itasigin o. Itaklaga halok, nit ninane baga, Allah ninom welago, u hak, etaga Imanuel ekhe dogogun, ”\rq (Yesaya 7:14)\rq*
40001024	iluk holal waganogo 'bisikhe meke tak-tagat hagatlageikhe iti. Iti re, at Yusuf iluk ageikhesik, malaikat Allah nen la'i ageikhemo yogokhikhe meke etnogo tak-tagat, age etnogo waganhikhesik
40001025	ipisak noge igidek welagoukhasik nen, eak abat itakhikhemo, etaga Yesus thalhikhe.
40002001	At Yesus iti, o propinsi Yudea etoma o ukul etagaBetlehem itaklageikhe. Itaklageikhe eta higit o etoma ap kok etagapogot Herodes iti welageikhe. Werekma, it ap inobagasiak husagal penakhe lagoukha meke aperek o mulikin dagei agarekma eloma mot-mot nen o Yerusalem wagoukha.
40002002	Wagoukhasik, it nen, men isukha, “Akhuni Yahudi meke inoe kok Etagapogot itaklagasik werek etnaga, o koma itaklagasik werek. Nit o mulikin dagei agarekma eloma werekma, ap kok iti itaklagama iluk, husagal ageikhe winam agama nen, at iti ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk hogorasuogoluk husagal iti ninileken nen wolok hinok wagani ago, ” iluk isukha.
40002003	Isukhama, at kok Herodes etnogo asuk holhikhesik, at men, akhuni o Yerusalem welagoukha meke emenogo men, inakmaken motok lageikhe.
40002004	Inakmaken motok lageikhesik nen, at ap kok Herodes etnogo nen, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek emenogo inom, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, opakimo natogorlogo ’bisasikhesik nen, “At Kristus iti, hit nen, o koma itaklasigin iluk apekhe lagap, ” iluk hinok waganhikhe.
40002005	Hinok waganhikhemo, it nen, “O Betlehem propinsi Yudea elomaat o. Eloma itaklasigin, iluk, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke ageikhe nen ekhe dogolik,
40002006	Hit akhuni o Yudea etoma o ukul Betlehem welagathep meke yirani! O ukul ebelake yoma etaga kok werek korlegat he, o Betlehem yi anek etaga dek, hemurlugatnegen, iluk usak dek. An na'buri Israel meke ap kok meke apma dogogun iti, o ukul hit werekma yoma hinakerlekla nenat itaklasigin o,\rq (Mikha 5:2)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek o, ” isukha.
40002007	Isukhama, at Herodes etnogo nen, it ap inobagasiak husagal penakhe lagoukha meke inileken wolok wagoukha meke emenogo nen waisasikhesik nen limago yogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Meranem husagal iti dukhi aga? Hutukhogon yoknitni, ” iluk hinok inoba yabokane waganhikhe.
40002008	Hinok waganhikhemo it nen, “Itithogon, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at nen he, “Halok he, hit nen o Betlehem etoma lani o. Lalok nen, elege itaklagasik werek iti hanorogon heratno. Nen, arat herakhep halok he, yabokane an netaiken at oba hakotdiluk hogorasi lak nen yoknisitno, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40002009	Yogeisasikhemo inasuk holiluk nen, husagal o mo dagei agarekma etoma winam ageikhemo inileken hasukha meke etnogo alep laga korlek, oporlik inileken nen wolok lagoukha. Inileken nen wolok wolok lagoukha, husagal etnogo elege itaklageikhesik werekma upu baga mot-mot lageikhesik nen, arat huk asi lageikhe.
40002010	Itithogon huk ageikhemo it emenogo husagal etnogo inileken hasukhasik, inakla arleken motok agoukha.
40002011	Inakla arleken motok agoukhasik uma ukisukha meke, elege etnogo agosa Maria agamo werekma inileken halok, initibagal yukukhogon hogorakhukha. Hogorakhe dogolik, oko kok hano meke emas inom, kemenyan kami obasi hakene iti inom, o mur apusu inom, hiselogo wogokhukha.
40002012	Wogokhukhasik noge isinem at Allah nen, “Hit yabokane hinapuke Herodes oba lagup o, ” iluk husupi negen yogeisasikhemo ina'bi halok, holak nekalokmake nen inaila lagoukha.
40002013	It ap husagal inileken nen wolok wagoukha meke emenogo arat lagoukhama, hibako Yusuf noge isinem malaikat Allah nen pogot oba la'i ageikhesik, a'bi baga men yogokhikhe, “Yusuf. Hat he, elege itago iti agosa ipisagat wogosik, o Mesir etoma lo lan o. Lalok nen, etomaat dogono. Etoma werekma an nen yokhikhi halogat wetno. At ap kok Herodes etnogo nen elege itago iti wasigiluk hagariogo o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo a'bi hasikhe.
40002014	A'bi halok iluk ageikhesik nen, hibakoneat elege itago etnogo agosa ipisak wogosik o Mesir lageikhe.
40002015	Lageikhesik, o etoma motok welageikhe. Werek korlek, at ap kok Herodes etnogo ebe watlageikhemo nen wageikhe. Iti hagakhikhe iti, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke ageikhe nen, “An na'but o Mesir etoma nen wisuagaluk waisigin o, ”\rq (Hosea 11:1)\rq* iluk Allah nen isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisikhe iti tak-tagat hagatlasuagaluk hagakhikhe iti o.
40002016	Ap kok Herodes etnogo nen it ap wene warisasikhe meke etnogo, “Wisugun a? Dek a, ” iluk, therisik welageikhe welageikhe, inebe degat nen, “Nukhetdanha higi, ” iluk akla aga apik dageisikhe. Akla aga apik dageisikhesik nen, “Yekerugi 'bugurlagat meke o Betlehem etoma meke inom, o yoarlemake etoma meke inom, hurli ap husagal inileken nen wolok wageikhasik, Iti hurli baga hogo, iluk hutukhogon yoknekha hurli nen, umur 2 tahun meke inom, yabokane itaklarik wageikha meke inom, elege tha'bokhogonat motok inatno, ” iluk, agarumi la'isasikhe.
40002017	Itithogon hagatlageikhe iti, at Yeremia Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke nen ekhe dogolik,
40002018	“O Rama nen deku makhunem ninasuk holhik, inane naik-waik isinem ninasuk holhik, hagakho. At he Rahel eagei inebe dek nen inuak de kogat aga dogolik, Netaiken thebelusak dek. Na'it. De ago motok dogogin, ”\rq (Yeremia 31:15)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisikhe meke iti tak-tagat hagatlasuagaluk hagakhukha iti.
40002019	At ap kok Herodes etnogo arat watlageikhemo, malaikat Allah nen la'i ageikhemo wageikhesik, Yusuf o Mesir etoma dogolik noge isinem hibako a'bi baga men yogokhikhe,
40002020	“Yusuf. Hiluk asin o. Melatluk, elege itago iti agosa ipisak wogosik o akhuni Israel meke werekma lan o. Elege itago iti wasuogoluk hagakhe lageikha etnogo, ebe arat watlaga o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40002021	Yogokhikhemo, Yusuf nen elege itago etnogo agosa ipisak wogosik, akhuni Israel meke werekma wageikhe.
40002022	Wageikhemo it akhuni nen, “O Yudea etoma yabokane ap kok etaga Arkelaus iti opase Herodes obolukmo meldegama werek o, ” iluk isukhama, Yusuf asuk holhikhesik nen, o etoma lausak ayuk ageikhesik werekma, at Allah nen, “O propinsi Yudea etoma lagun o, ” iluk, a'bi baga husupi yogokhikhemo, o Galilea etomaat wageikhe.
40002023	Wageikhesik nen, o ukul etaga Nazaret iti uki ageikhesik, etomaat huk ageikhe. Itithogon hagakhikhe iti, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen ekhe dogolik, “At ap etnogo ai Nazaret meke ugun o, ” iluk isukha tak-tagat hagatlageikhe iti o.
40003001	Itithogon hagakhukhasik oba nen, at Yohanes ima usa'isekhe lageikhe meke etnogo, o Yudea limo akhuni dekma etoma wageikhesik wene yakulisekhe dogolik, yigithogon ekhe lageikhe,
40003002	“At kok pogot oba meke apma ’bisagein etnogo yogotak arat 'binanigin. Halok he, yi weak ti weak hagakhe lagap meke here;isalok hinobabut hebelatni o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhe.
40003003	Iti ekhe lageikhe iti, at Yesaya Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen yogeisekhe dogolik, “Ap ageikhe o limo akhuni dekma etoma ane wai ekhe dogolik, Eiya! Ninoe Etagapogot wisiginke, holakhanorogo yakhik, korlo meke mothogon yakhik, yakhe dogoni o, iluk waisiliogo, ”\rq (Yesaya 40:3)\rq* iluk Yesaya nen ekhe lageikhe etnogo, at Yohanes ebeat wageikhe iti.
40003004	Wageikhesik, limo akhuni dekma etoma dogolik, warn unta isi meke karogo, asu ikhigik, oado meke karogo, therlok hagarogo ikhigik, ikhe dogolik hipiri nau hak, yibirla nikik, themuk apusu okama meke nikik, hagakhe lageikhe.
40003005	Itithogon werekma, it akhuni o kota Yerusalem nen, o propinsi Yudea nen, i Yordan aik obake etoma tha'bokhogonat nen, at oba natogosi agoukha.
40003006	Wagoukhasik nen, yi weak ti weak hagakhe lagoukha meke 'bualogo thogotdisugunem, i Yordan ima usa'isekhe lageikhe.
40003007	Itithogon hagakho werekma, it ap Farisi meke aperek inom, ap Saduki meke aperek inom, inebe doalegat nen, “Nit ninomat ima usahnanuak, ” iluk oba wagunem yigithogon yogeisekhe lageikhe, “Hit warlo pelal nen itago meke yomarani! Hit nen Allah akla aga apik dageigin etnogo hinoba 'bisinem lo erlok lugun iluk tha nen husupi yokhisekhemo? Erlok dek o.
40003008	Halok he, hinakla ebetdiluk, weak hagakhe lagap meke here'isalok, hinobabut eberogonat hebelaga iluk ekagat asuak nen mothogon hagakhe dogono o.
40003009	Nen, hinakla nen, Abraham iti nit ninopase, iluk apugup o. At Allah nen Abraham a’buri negen helekit yi meke erlok hagasusak o.
40003010	O erlo dopok eken hano meke ikhidek halok, mukhogo hetumo la'isagaluk pisue o omaken oba pakpakthek motok werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40003011	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit weak hagakhe lagap meke here'isalok hinobabut eberogonat hebelaga iluk, an nebe yekerek nobatne dek meke nen ima usahnagakhe lagei. Meke re, at kok obatneak meke yabokane wisigin o. At ebe kok obatneak iti nen, an nebe yekerek meke nen isok agot ugu meke wolok lausak erlok dek o. At nen ima usahnagu hak, Allah Agoreke inom, hetu inom, hinoba usahsigin o.
40003012	Gandum eken abubuleke hulusak hasik than oba huphogon la’igin meke, at iteerek meke ikimo werek iti. Karelusak oba tak-tak asi aga halok, hano meke halok, karelogo 'bekherekma hanoma ’bigik, abubuleke halok hetu nagulusak dekma etnogo baga lahsigik, hagasigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40003013	Yohanes nen wene etnogo yogeisekho werekma, at Yesus ima usa'uagaluk o Galilea nen Yohanes i Yordan aik oba werekma oba waga lageikhemo,
40003014	at Yohanes nen, “An nen ima usa'agousak erlok dek o. Hat nen an ima usa'anusak meke re, an noba wagan yoma re! ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40003015	Yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “An usa'anusagat o. At Allah nenat yi hasik ti hasik itithogon hagasuagaluk apekherek tak-tagat hagatnabusak o, ” iluk isikhemo, “I o, ” iluk
40003016	ima usa'isikhemo 'buakhogon dageisigin hak, pogot kagoukhogon Allah Agoreke thue merpati yogeik negen, at oba labi usa'agunem ileken hasikhe.
40003017	Oba duk i ageikhemo, Allah ane pogot oba nen, “An na'but netaiken hunik dogolik noba hotok egerek ebe ithiat o, ” iluk ane usa'i ageikhe.
40004001	Ima usa'isikhemo, Yesus Iblis nen akla kagaluagaluk, Allah Agoreke nen wolok o limo akhuni dekma etoma lageikhe.
40004002	Etoma 'bi lageikhemo dogolik, o hi ageik, wi ageik, hagakhe korlek iki 40 hari hipiri nikidek welageikhe iti nen hipiri abu motok ageikhe.
40004003	Itithogon hipiri abu motok werekma, at Iblis inakla kagalik nekherek meke etnogo oba wageikhesik nen, “Hat Allah a'but eberogonat halok he, helekit ethoma hipiri roti meke hakene hagatlasuak nen yogosin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40004004	at Yesus nen, “Allah nen, Akhuni hipiri anek neke dogolik iniluk motok welageikharek dek o. An nane egerek meke iti tha'bokhogonat waganho halok, iniluk motok dogogun o,\rq (Ulangan 8:3)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40004005	Yogokhikhemo, yabokane at Iblis nen Yesus wolok, o Allah ekaerek ai ukul kokma lageikhesik nen, Yesus ebe o Allah ai halekma uanat upu warleke thalek isiken obaat wolok dageisikhesik nen,
40004006	men yogokhikhe, “At Allah nen, Hat hisok helekit oba tamukhogon waraunogo iluk, an nagarumi malaikat emenogo nen iniki talek oba wokhabuak nen yogeisagein,\rq (Mazmur 91:11-12)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek iti, hat eberogonat Allah a'but halok he, pok wema ethoma usan ta, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40004007	Yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Allah nen ekhe dogolik, Hit nen, an hinopase Allah Netagapogot nanini werek a? Dek a, iluk, nobabut palusak motok dek o,\rq (Ulangan 6:16)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukhama weregat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40004008	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, yabokane at Iblis nen Yesus wolok torn kok uanat meke ukul oba dageiluk, o agat oba yi ai ti ai ap koktek inetagapogot nen hagasik welageikharek obake dopok tha'bokhogonat, yi meke ti meke doalegat werekma ileken lakhoagaluk yakulekhe dogolik,
40004009	“Yesus. Hat hitibagal yukukhogon napma ukitluk hogotnabigin halok, hileken lakhegen meke ethoma tha'bokhogonat hat wokhesigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40004010	at Yesus nen, “Hat Iblis yi horla lan o. Allah nen ekhe dogolik, Hit nen, hinopase Allah Netagapogot anathinitibagal yukukhogon napma ukitluk hogotnakhe dogolik, an nobasik anek hagakhe dogono o,\rq (Ulangan 6:13)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40004011	Itithogon yogokhikhemo Iblis etnogo Yesus here'isalok horla lageikhemo, malaikat pogot oba nen Yesus oba usa'agoukhasik therogo welagoukha.
40004012	“At Yohanes etnogo iki herle wakhama, ” iluk isukhama, at Yesus asuk holhikhesik nen, o Galilea eloke dagei ageikhe.
40004013	Dagei ageikhesik, o ukul Nazaret etnogo thogotdiluk nen, o ukul Kapemaum i Galilea yekelek aik obake etoma, it ap inukuloak etaga Zebulon meke inom, Naftali meke inom, inaila etoma dogeigiluk dagei ageikhe.
40004014	Dagei ageikhe iti, at Yesaya Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen holal waganhe dogolik,
40004015	“Hit ap hinukuloak etaga Zebulon meke inom, Naftali meke inom, hinaila i Yordan aik ilibaganke halek meke inom, i laut kok yekelekma usegarekma halek meke inom, hinaila o Galilea eloke ethoma, it ap itikmanke meke nen thebelek werek yomarani.
40004016	O mummo welagathep meke iti, o liathinabiginmeke kok meke ageikhe hegep o. Hit o etoma watlasuogoluk hinoba mumat agasikmo, liathinabigin meke ageikhe waga iti o, ”\rq (Yesaya 9:1-2)\rq* isikhe etnogo tak-tagat hagatlasuagaluk Yesus etoma dagei ageikhe iti.
40004017	Dagei ageikhesik dogolik, hurli iti hurli nen, akhuni etoma yogeisekhe dogolik, “At kok pogot oba meke nen apma 'bisagein etnogo yogotak arat apma 'bisagein o. Halok he, weak hagakhe lagap meke here’isalok hinobabut hebelatni o, ” iluk yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe.
40004018	At Yesus i Galilea yekelekma aik obake laga dogolik, ap inebe pere, Simon etaga ageikhe Petrus ekhe lago etnogo agot Andreas ipisak hibiku-yogoku ikanat waganharethekma nogo nen, itinem ikan waganuogoluk, su yoge meke ima usakhunem ileken lageisasikhe.
40004019	Lageisasikhesik nen, “Ikan waganhe lagap iti hak, akhuni itithogonat woginabik nekhe dogobageik nen he, yakulhisak nen noporlik witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40004020	inasu yoge meke etnogo here'salok eranogoat at oporlik lagoukha.
40004021	Lagoukhama, at Yesus ileken lageisasikhe meke, ap inebe pere Zebedeus a’buri Yakobus agot Yohanes ipisak inopase inom, ku akla dogolik, su yoge ikan waganhe lagoukha meke etnogo ’bugukakhunem lageisalok nen, waisasikhe.
40004022	Waisasikhemo, ku etnogo inom, inopase Zebedeus etnogo inom, eranogoat here'isalok, it Yesus oporligat lagoukha.
40004023	Lagoukhama, at Yesus o Galilea eloke o tomok etoma nekhe dogolik, akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukisikhesik, wene hano wene yabokane ninopase Etagapogot apma 'binanigin etnogo wene yogeisigik, yi u ti u hano hagarinakhik, hagakhe lageikhe.
40004024	Itithogon hano hagarinabik lagunem, o Siria etoma abok motok thak-pak isikhemo, yi u ti u, yi hinet ti hinet wakhe lagoukha meke inom, mokat obabut weak meke inakla ukiluk inobabut dugurlugi palharek meke inom, watlageik iniluk ageik hagakharek meke inom, iniki inisok ut warek meke inom, inebe doalegat wogosik at oba wagunem tha'bokhogonat hano hagarinakhe lageikhe.
40004025	Itithogon hano hagarinakhe korlek, akhuni tha'bokhogonat o Galilea nen, o kota 10 etoma nen, o Yerusalem nen, Yudea nen, i Yordan aik ilibaganke etoma nen, inebe motok doalegat wagoukhasik Yesus oporlik nekhe lagoukha.
40005001	Akhuni doalegat wagunem, at Yesus ileken 'birisalok nen, tom oba dageisikhesik hurek lageikhemo, it at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukha.
40005002	Wagoukhama, wene yakulisekhe dogolik,
40005003	“Akhuni inakla nen, An he, Allah il oba, ebe meke hasik nerlageik welagei, iluk apegarek meke iti, kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma iteerek irat iti nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o.
40005004	Nen, akhuni inakla wiik-weakhogonwelageikharek meke iti, Allah nen inetaiken thebeligin iti nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o.
40005005	Nen, akhuni inobabut enago welageikharek mekeiti, o Allah nen o abok yoknisasikhe iti, irat ite asugun iti nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o.
40005006	Nen, akhuni hipiri inom, i inom, abu ageikharekhak, Allah akla apekherek meke kogotdiluk mot motok hagasu warlok apegarek meke iti, hipiri ina'ithogon nekarek hak, yabokane Allah nen inakla warlok apiliogei tak-tagat wogeisagein iti nen he, inakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o.
40005007	Nen, akhuni inebe inakmurogon welageikharek mekeiti, ninopase nen it akmurinabigin iti nen he, inakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o.
40005008	Nen, akhuni inetaiken opakiat karelek motokwelageikharek meke iti, yabokane Allah ebe inileken hugun iti nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o.
40005009	Nen, akhuni inom weak werekma, it aperek nendapulogo 'bisegarek meke iti, at Allah nen he, Yi an na’buriat o, iluk yogeisagein iti nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o.
40005010	Nen, akhuni nen Allah akla apekherek meke kogotdisegarek meke hasik, it aperek nen weagarinakhunem, kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma iteerek irat asugun iti nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o.
40005011	-
40005012	Hit aban werek korlek, haganeat it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke weagarinakhe lagoukha hagat, hit an nebe hasik, it akhuni aperek nen wenakhisigik, weagathinakhik, inekalat nenat hinabok palhe dogolik, yi weak ti weak hinoba 'bigik, hagakho halok he, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogosagat o. Yabokane ninopase pogot oba meke nen oko kok meke woknisagein iluk, hinakla hano ageik, hinakla arleken akhigik, kokhogon hagakhe dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40005013	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, “Akhuni yoma tha'bokhogonat inobasik, mayu hakene hirat welagap o. Meke re, mayu iti aik dek aga halok he, nena meke baga aik weregerasusak apegep? Dek o. Aik weregerasusak motok dek nen, pulelogo la'isegarekma akhuni o.
40005014	Nen, akhuni agat oba yoma tha'bokhogonat liarinakhe lagap meke hirat welagap o. O kota ageikhe tom ukul ebe baga halek meke limaklasusak erlok dek o.
40005015	Nen, akhuni nen isagal yibarlogo isoak abura thebelogo 'begarek degat. Isok tilik oba dukhogon 'bisinem akhuni uma welageikharek meke inebe tha'bokhogonat liarinakherek.
40005016	Iti hak, hit hano hagakhunem, it aperek nen, It hano hagariogei, iluk hinopase pogot oba meke etnogo hogorasuak nen, hit akhuni iniloba iti hakeneat liarogo dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40005017	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An wagagi iti, Allah ane ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo inom, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inane iti inom, inane thagaligiluk wagagi dek o. Eberogonat hagatlasuagaluk kogotdigiluk wagagi o.
40005018	An nane eberogonat yokhisak. Pogot inom, agat inom, aban dek ageidek werek korlek ya, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke iti, holal herlekha'bugat murluban al hakene inom, inisiken opakiat hakene inom, dek ageidek motok tha'bokhogon eberogonat hagatlasigin o.
40005019	Halok he, tha nen Allah nen isikhe meke herlekha'bugat meke opakiat thebelogo 'biluk, it aperek nen itithogon hagakhe dogoagaluk yakulisekhe halok, kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma, at iti etaga yekerugi negen inakla meanetdekhe dogogun o. Meke re, tha nen Allah ane iti mothogon hagakhe dogolik, it akhuni aperek nen itithogonat hagakhe dogoagaluk yakulisekhe dogogin halok, kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma, at etaga pogorat werekma kogotdekhe dogogin o.
40005020	Allah akla apekherek meke mothogon hagasuogoluk, it akhuni nen Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo inom, ap Farisi meke inom, inohabut hagariogei iti hagat, hagakhe dogogun halok, kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma ukugun dek o. At he, it 'bugurlagat negen hagakharek meke, hit ebenageik kokhogon hagakhe dogogun halok anek ukugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40005021	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene Allah nen nit ninopa lak yogeisekhe dogolik, Akhuni inakhup o,\rq (Keluaran 20:13)\rq* iluk isikhemo, Inakhep halok he, wene hinoba 'bigin werek o, iluk isukha etnogo hinasuk holhe lagabat o.
40005022	Meke re, an nen wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Hat tha nen hagarlak hasik hakla aga dageikhe halok he, wene ageikhe hoba 'bigin werek o. Nen, hat tha nen hagarlak ageikhe yogokhe dogolik, Hat he, hebe kepu yi re! iluk isi halok he, it ap wene erlo pilinekharekma etoma wokharek lalok, ukum hoba 'bugunat o. Nen, hat tha nen, Hat he, hebe uo motok yi re! iluk isi halok he, wene hoba 'biluk weakma hetu aikmo la'agagin o.
40005023	Halok he, hat tha nen hinameke hano meke wolok Allah ake 'bi laga dogolik, hakla nen, Nagarlak etnogo nen, At weak hagakhemo, iluk wene noba 'biliogo, iluk hinekaerek nen hinetaiken ebetlasi aga halok he,
40005024	wolok ligin meke etnogo Allah ake 'begarekma etoma werlegat 'biluk, yabokane suguluk hapuke hagarlak etnogo oba witluk, wene thagalogo degetdusak o. Nen, wene etnogo arat thagalhep halok he, yabokane lalok Allah ake etnogo 'busak o.
40005025	Nen, ap ageikhe hipisak agorek meke nen hat wokharik ap wene erlo pilinekharekma lagunem, ap etoma nen yabokane wokharik polisi inoba laumo, it polisi lak nen yabokane wokharik, iniki herle warogo 'bisegarekma launogo iluk, hipisak agorek meke iti holagarlem aban laga dogolik etaat ibathogon wene iti thagalogo heanerasusak o.
40005026	Itithogon heanerakhidek halok, hiki herle warogo 'bagoumo, ap iti ameke palegeke hat hoba werek meke iti oko 'bogokhogon aban wogokhidek werek korlek, ula'agousak motok dek o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40005027	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “At Allah nen ekhe dogolik, Humi param ha'isausak dek o,\rq (Keluaran 20:14; Ulangan 5:18)\rq* iluk isikhe iti, hinasuk holhe lagabat o.
40005028	Mekeat he, an nen wene yi yokhisak. Ap tha nen, he ageikhe ileken lakhalok akla nen, Eiye. An he iti param hagatle, iluk apekhe halok, akla nen param eberogonat arat ha'ekhe o.
40005029	Halok he, hileken ebeke nen weagathabusak hagatlaga halok he, hemelogo la'isano. Hebe abisake hetu aikmo po la'ageinogo nen, hemelogo la'isalok ebelake anek werekma hano.
40005030	Nen, hiki ebeke nen weagathabusak hagatlaga halok he, hiki ebeke iti tekhogon la'isano. Hebe abisake hetu aikmo la'ageinogo nen, thekhogon la'isalok ebelake anek werekma hano, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40005031	Itithogonat yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nen, wene ageikhe haganeat yogeisekhe dogolik, Ap ageikhe age lologo here'isagaluk halok he, An he yi here'isigi o, iluk holal waganogo, he itiwogosusagat o,\rq (Ulangan 24:1-4)\rq* iluk isukhaat.
40005032	Itithogon meke re, an nen wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Ap ageikhe age waganek meke, it ap ninat meke param ha'igidekmaat, lologo thogotdisekhe halok, he iti param hagasuagaluk thogotdisekhe o. Nen, at ap ageikhe nen, he lologo here'igin meke iti waganhe halok, at ap iti paramat hagasigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40005033	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nen, wene ageikhe yi, Allah nen ninopa lak emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, Hit hinekalat an Allah netaga hupuk palhup o. An yigithogon hagasigin o, iluk an netaga hupuk palhep halok he, hinopase Netagapogot nil oba egen hagat, hagatno,\rq (Imamat 19:12)\rq* iluk isikhe wene hinasuk holhe lagabat o.
40005034	Meke re, an nen ageikhe yi yokhisak. Hit nen, at ageikhe yogokhe dogolik, Yi meke ti meke etaga hupuk palogo yokhikhi o, iluk yogosusak motok dek o. Allah ebe pogot iti baga hurek dogolik wene morerakherek. Halok he, pogot iti etaga hupuk palusak motok dek o.
40005035	Nen, agat iti ninopase Allah isok yago welagarek. Halok he, agat yi etaga hupuk palogo yogeisausak motok erlok dek o. Nen, o Yerusalem ukul kok iti an hinopase Netagapogot meke etoma welagarek. Halok he, o iti etaga hupuk palusak degat o.
40005036	Nen, yogotak he, nisi opakiat morla asusak igik, nen, yogotak nisi opakiat mirli asusak igik, isinem hinane hologo morla ageik, mirli ageik, hagakherek motok dek o. Halok he, hinukuloak iti etaga palogo hupuk palusak degat o.
40005037	Hit nen, I o, uogoluk halok he, I oat usak. Nen, Dek o, uogoluk halok he, Degat usak o. Wene ninat meke ageikhe lapeli lagap halok he, Iblis obabut weak meke etnogo nen hinakla kagalhe korlek ugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40005038	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Haganeat wene ageikhe men isukha, Hinileken hemelho halok he, oko inilekenathemelusak. Nen, hinaik dakulho halok he, oko inaigat dakulusak,\rq (Keluaran 21:24)\rq* iluk isukha meke iti hinasuk holhe lagap o.
40005039	Itithogon mekeat he, an nen wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Weagathinakha halok oko 'bugup o. Hinelokhoken ebeke dapukhogon hinakho halok he, paike inomat hasuagaluk wogosusagat o.
40005040	Nen, it akhuni aperek nen, it ap wene erlo pilinekharek meke emenogo inoba wokhisik lalok, Hasu akmanke ugu meke woknom, iluk isi halok he, iti inom, hasu thogei meke itikmanke ugu meke iti inomat thabakhogon wogeisausak o.
40005041	Nen, at ap ageikhe nen ane obatnerogonat ekhe dogolik, Suke yi horok eta 'bani lausak o, isi halok he, hit nen walekhogon negenat 'bisa lausak o.
40005042	Nen, at ap ageikhe nen, Hameke iti an woknom, iluk kino isi halok he, hina'it hisigidegat wogosusak o. Nen, at ageikhe nen, Hat meke iti yabokane wokhesik nen, elanma hasik woknom, iluk isi halok he, Na'it, igidek wogosusagat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40005043	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Haganeat it aperek nen wene men yogeisasukha, Hit he, akhuni aperek hinom welagathep meke hinakmurinakhe dogolik,\rq (Imamat 19:18)\rq* it aperek hinom agorek meke halok he, hina’it inabusak o, iluk isukha meke iti hinasuk holhe lagap o.
40005044	-
40005045	Itithogon meke re, an nen wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. At ninopase Allah pogot oba meke mo iteerek dogolik agat oba liarogo akhuni inobabut weak meke dek, hano meke dek, tha'bokhogonat inobasik yarisigik, nen, miso usa’i agarek iti, it mothogon hagariogei meke dek, korlo hagariogei meke dek, tha’bokhogonat inobasik usa’i ageik, hagakherek iti hak, hit hinopase Allah pogot oba meke a’buriat asubageik iluk, akhuni hinom agorek meke iti hinakmurinakhe dogolik, it weagathinabiogei meke iti, Allah nen hanorinabuagaluk, it inobasik sembayan ekhe dogono.
40005046	Nen, it akhuni aperek nen, hit inakmuthinakharek meke iti anek hit nen hinakmurinakhe lagap halok he, Allah nen oko wokhisagein nogo? Dek o. Iti hak he, it ap pemerintah meke hasik uang kino iluk natogokharek meke nen inobabut itithogonat hagakharek o.
40005047	Nen, hinerugi hinagarlak lak halok anek heagei warinakhe lagap halok he, hinobabut itithogon hit anek hagakhe lagap ’buk. It ap itikmanke meke inobabut itithogonat hagakharek dek a? Itithogon hagakharek o.
40005048	Halok he, ninopase Allah pogot oba meke obabut hano motok karelek dogolik akmurinakherek hak, hit itithogonat hinakmurinakhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40006001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen, Itithogon hagakhe dogono, iluk isikhemo, hit nen mothogon hagakhe lagap meke iti, akhuni nen inileken hisekhe dogoagaluk thelekma hagakhe dogogup o. Inileken hisekhe dogoagaluk hagakhep halok he, hinopase pogot oba meke nen oko wokhisagein motok dek o. Hinakla ebetni!
40006002	Nen, hit aperek hinameke werek meke nen, it dek meke yomageisauwogoluk halok, An itithogon hagakhe lagei, iluk hinaneak walogo hagakhe dogogup. It inetaiken pere dogolik inoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukiluk inom, holagarlemke laga dogolik inom, it aperek nen, It hano, iluk hogorinabuagaluk hagariogei iti, hit itithogon hagakhe dogogup. It iti oko horlau hak, hogorinabiogei itiat o.
40006003	Halok he, hit nen hinameke akhuni inameke dek meke wogeisauwogoluk halok he, An itithogonat wogeisagein, iluk, hinane degat wogeisano. It hinerugi hinagarlak lak inilu asusak motok dek o.
40006004	Limago wogeisaumo, hinopase Allah pogot oba meke akhuni limago hagakharek meke ileken hisekherek iti nen oko wokhisageinat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40006005	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Halok he, hit nen sembayan ekhe dogolik, akhuni aperek inoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik, inetaiken pere meke nen Sembayan ekhe lagei iti akhuni nen neoak, iluk akhuni Yahudi meke o sembayan egarekma ukegarethek nen, inebe melatluk sembayan igik, holak atoalma melatluk sembayan igik, egarek iti hak, ekhe dogogup o. It iti oko horlau hak, hogorinabiogei itiat o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o.
40006006	Meke re, hit he, sembayan uogoluk halok he, hinaila thu larogo ukiluk, hinopase Allah pogot oba meke ebe inileken hegarek dek meke etnogo nen wokhisoagaluk kino yogokhe dogono. Hit nen limago kino yogosugun meke iti, at nen ileken limago meke 'bikhekherethekma nogo nen, wokhisagein o.
40006007	Halok he, hit nen sembayan ekhe dogolik, it akhuni itikmanke meke nen egarek hak ekhe dogogup o. It iti sembayan ekhe dogolik, inakla nen, Uan-nagan ekhe lagei iti nen, ninopase pogot oba meke asuk holigin o, iluk, likhalok-kukhalok egarek iti.
40006008	Hit nen, it inobabut waganhup o. Hinopase pogot oba meke iti aban kino yogokhidek werek korlek, hit warlok meke iti, at Allah haganeat ilu welagarek o.
40006009	-
40006010	Halok he, sembayan ekhe dogolik, yigithogon ekhe dogono, Ninopase pogot oba mekehekaerek hetaga kogotdekhe dogoagaluk, hagatninabi me o. Ninebe hapma dogoagaluk 'binani me o. It pogot oba hat hakla apegetek meke hagakharekhak, nit agat oba itithogonat hagakhe dogoagaluk, hagatninabi me o.
40006011	Nit ninapiri yogotak nausak meke erlokhogonatwoknisa me o.
40006012	Akhuni nen nit weagatninakha meke, nit nenthagalogo degetdisogo iti hak, nit weak hagakho meke hat nen thagalogodegetdisano o.
40006013	Weak hagasuagaluk ninakla kagaliginmo etomathogotdinanhidek piokthegat woknisik laga dogono. Obabut weak meke iti nen iki hakninakhunem, hat nen tilninakhe dogono. [Ninopase Hetagapogot harat dogolik, yi meke ti meke hagasusak anekma, harat hogothakho motok dogogun o. Ebeat asuak u hak, Amin, ]iluk sembayan itithogon ekhe dogono.
40006014	Nen, akhuni nen hit weagathinakha meke, hit nen thagalogo degetdisegep halok he, hinopase Allah pogot oba meke nen hit weak hagakhep meke iti thagalogo degetdisageinat o.
40006015	Meke re, it aperek nen hit weak hagathinakha meke, hit nen thagalogo degetdisigidek halok he, hinopase pogot oba meke nen hit weak hagakhep meke thagalogo degetdisagein degat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40006016	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hipiri nikidek sembayan isi motok dogouogolukhalok he, it akhuni inoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik, inetaiken pere meke nen, Akhuni nen ekagat hutdinanuak, iluk inelokhoken damutdiluk welageikharek iti hak, dogosak dek o. It iti oko horlau hak, akhuni nen ekagat 'birisegarek itiat iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi o.
40006017	-
40006018	Meke re, hit anek, hipiri nikidek sembayan ekhe dogouogoluk halok, akhuni nen ekagat hutdinaginogo. Hinopase Allah akhuni nen inileken hegarek dek meke etnogo arligat nen ekagat hutdinagakhe dogoagaluk hinoado thobalogo, hinisi hisalogo dogolik, sembayan ekhe dogosak o. Itithogon limago hagakhep halok he, hinopase Allah akhuni inileken hegarek dek meke iti ileken 'bithisalok oko wokhisagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40006019	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, at Yesus nen ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen agat oba yoma yi meke ti meke natogorlogo 'bakhugunem, warlo nen palhik, ikuru hakhigik, akhuni inobabut weak meke nen o talogo wagani ukigik, hagakharekma yoma, yi meke ti meke iti natogorlogo 'bakhausak dek o.
40006020	Meke re, pogot oba meke anek he, warlo nen palhik, ikuru nen hakhigik, ap inil agasabu weak meke nen o talogo iniki abusak wagani ukigik, hagakharek motok dek o. Halok he, pogot oba etomaat hano meke natogorlogo la'bakhausak o.
40006021	Hit hinameke hinetaiken hunik meke natogorlek werekma, hinetaiken etomaat dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40006022	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hinebe liarogo isagal yibarlek hakene, hinileken itiat werek o. Halok he, hinileken hano halok, hinebe abisake motok liaat dogogun o.
40006023	Meke re, hinileken weak halok he, hinebe abisakeat o mum hakeneat dogogun o. Meke re, hinakla o lia hakene meke iti mum aga halok he, eiye! Motok ebenageik mumat welagap o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40006024	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Iti hak he, ap opakiat meke ap koktek inebe pere meke inatuaneke dogolik, inayabu hagakhe dogosak motok erlok dek o. Itithogon dogogin halok he, at inatuaneke iti nen, Nopase ageikhe yi hano nakmu. Nen, ageikhe iti weak, na'it, iluk, ekhe dogolik, akmu meke iti ipisak dopokhogon dogolik, ageikhe a'it meke iti a'it motok hekhe dogosak o. Iti hakene, hit Allah atuaneke dogolik, uang atuaneke dogosak erlok dek o.
40006025	An nen itithogon yokhisigi iti nen, hit hinakla nen, Niniluk dogouogoluk hipiri men, i men, ki meke nugun. Nen, ninebe su ki meke isugun, iluk hinelabut hisikhogon wene munini uan 'bero ebekhe dogunogo iluk yokhisigi. Nekarek meke iti kogat nogo? Hiniluk welagap iti kogat apigi. Su ikharek meke iti kogat nogo? Hinebe iti kogat apigi.
40006026	Thue pogot obake nekherek meke iti hinileken lakhekhe dogolik hinakla ebetni o. It thue iti yi meke ti meke ai yakhik, eken ikhunem palogo obolukmo 'begarekma 'bigik, hagakharek dek mekeat he, hinopase pogot oba meke nen inapiri wogeisekherek o. Meke re, Allah nen it thue iti alon halinakherek nogo a? Dek o. Hit hinebeat alon halhinakhe dogolik, hinapiri wokhisagein dek nogo? Wokhisageinat o.
40006027	Nen, hit aperek hinakla nen, An nebe watlasigin itinem, 'bogokhogon watlageidek, yabokane herlekha'bugat ageikhe inom niluk dogole e, iluk, wene munini uan 'bero ebesigin iti baga, hiluk ageikhe inom dogosak nogo? Erlok dek o.
40006028	Hit nen, su hinoado baga isusak iti hasigat nenaluk hinelabut hikhe lagap. O eken mirliken morlaken okake ikherek etnogo hutdini. O eken iti aban isigiluk, yabu dikhak yugulogo waganhik, yo dalogo su negen ikhik, hagakherek motok dek o.
40006029	Meke re, at ap Salomo ebe kok dogolik obake waganekma hogorakhe lagoukha iti erlok dek apigi. O eken iti anek, elokhoken motok hano iti lakhani!
40006030	Oka herleka o limoke welagarek iti, yogotak hak hano welagarethek nen, hubuluk hak hetumo hundisegarek mekeat he, Allah nen inasu isu hak hano meke hagarogo 'bisekherek iti hak, hinebe hasik, hanorogo ikhinabigin dek nogo? Ikhinabiginat o. Hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdu'buk yi re!
40006031	Halok he, hit hinelabut hisogo wene munini uan 'bero ebekhe dogolik, Ninapiri ninagei koma meke nugun? Nen, ninasu nena meke ikhagun, ekhe lagap iti usak motok dek o.
40006032	Itithogon hagakharek iti tha'bokhogonat, it akhuni itikmanke meke nen iti meke kogotdiluk herarik nekharek mekeat he, hit yi anek he, yi meke ti meke dek nen hinerlageik negen welagap iti, at hinopase Allah pogot oba meke ilu welagarek o.
40006033	Halok he, hinopase Allah nen apma dogolik hagakhe dogosak iti hasik men, nen, at nen, Yigithogon tigithogon hagatno, iluk yokhisugunem hagakhe dogosak iti hasik men, kogotdekhe dogogun halok, yi meke ti meke iti oba dukhogon wokhisageinat o.
40006034	Halok he, hit nen, hubuluke hasik hinelabut hisogo wene munini uan 'bero ebekhup o. Yogotak weak ariogo meke werek korlegat he, hubuluke weak asigin meke ebesusak dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40007001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “At Allah nen wene hinoba 'biluk weagathinabinogo iluk, hit nen akhuni ageikhe wene inoba 'biluk weagarinakhup o.
40007002	Hit nen wene it aperek inoba 'begethep iti hak, at Allah nen itithogonat wene hinoba 'bigin o. Nen, hit nen walegeke walhalok it aperek wogeisegethep iti hak, at Allah nen walegeke iti bagaat walhalok wokhisageinat o.
40007003	Hit hinekaerek hinilekenma o kok obakha palek meke werek iti 'bikhakhigidegat, it hinagarlak lak hinerugi aperek inilekenma amumuleke 'bugurlagat meke ukiluk werekma wokhauwogoluk kolageisekhe lagap iti nenaluk.
40007004	Hinekaerek hinilekenma o kok meke palek harokthek dogoligat, hinagarlak lak hinerugi iti yogeisekhe dogolik, Hilekenma amumuleke ukekhe meke iti wokheak, iluk usak nogo?
40007005	Hinoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik hinetaiken pere yi re! Hinekaerek hinilekenma o palek kok meke iti tak wokhakhalok nen, hinileken arat lia aga halok he, yabokane hinagarlak lak hinerugi inilekenma amumuleke werek meke iti erlok wokhausak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40007006	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Allah hasik 'bisegarek meke etnogo yeke wogokhunem, yabokane dagakhogon aik nen li'bilhinabinogo iluk, wogokhup o. Nen, hinobake ile hano meke mutiara iti, wam wogokhunem isok nen wulel warogo la'inogo iluk, wogokhubat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40007007	-
40007008	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, ‘Tt akhuni inebe tomok nen Allah kino yogokhunem, at nen inebe tomok wogeisekherek anek iti. Nen, it aperek inebe tomok nen yi meke ti meke at oba herakhunem inebe tomok herakhegarek anek iti. Nen, it aperek inebe tomok nen thu puputhasinem, at nen inebe tomok thu hualisekherek anek iti. Iti nen he, hit Allah kino yogokhe dogono. Yogokhe dogoumo, wokhisageinat o. Hano meke at oba herakhe dogono. Herakhe dogoumo herasugunat o. Nen, thu puputhekhe dogono. Puputhekhe dogoumo, at nen thu hualhisageinat o.
40007009	Hit ageikhe hina'buri nen, Hipiri roti meke abu o, isinem, inopase lak nen, helekit meke wogeisegethep nogo a?
40007010	E a, at he, Ikan abu, isinem, warlo pelal meke wogeisegethep nogo a? Dek o.
40007011	Hit hinobabut weak hagakhethep mekeat he, hina'buri hano meke wogeisegethep iti hinilumo, hano meke wogeisegethep o. Iti hak, hinopase Allah pogot oba meke iti, kino yogosugun meke motok hano meke wogosigin dek nogo a? Wogosiginat o.
40007012	Hit hinakla nen, It aperek nen itithogon hano hagatninabilep e, iluk apegethep iti hagat, hit nen it iti itithogonat hagarinakhe dogono o. Wene Allah nen Musa ayoko 'biluk ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti men, it Allah nen inayoko 'bisinem ane yogeisekhe lagoukha wene iti men, dapukhogon kok he, itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40007013	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Weakma nuk aga lageikharek iti, holagape palek iti kogatma. Nen, holak ebe yago baga lageikharek iti kogat akhuni inebe doalegat ukiliogei. Iti nen he, hit holagape palek 'bugurlagat kirli-kerlorekma iti baga uki lani.
40007014	Mekeat he, holak hanoma lageikharek holak iti, ape palek iti herlekha'bugurlagat. Nen, holak ebe lageikharek iti motok kirli-kerlorekma nogo iluk, akhuni doalegat uki lausak dek nen, inebe pererlagat anek ukiliogei, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40007015	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, ‘Tt aperek inekalat Allah ane yogeisegarek meke thalekhinoba witluk nen, hinakla kagalinogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o. It iti inelokhoken domba ena meke hakene hagarogo nen wisugun mekeat he, inetaiken akla re, yeke helo yeke anini weak meke hakene wisugun o.
40007016	Yi o ti o eken ikherek iti baga, erlo ekagat hagatlagarek iti hakene, it nen hagathinabugun iti baga, inobabut ekagat hagatlasigin iti. O pati hakene arlok weak mekeat, eken anggur hano meke eken hakene itlukmo palharek nogo? E a, at he, herle mul arlok weak mekeat he, eken o ara hano meke eken hakene itlukmo palharek nogo? Dek o.
40007017	O hano meke halok he, eken hano mekeat ikherek o. Nen, o weak meke halok he, eken itithogonat weak meke ikherek o.
40007018	O hano mekeat he, eken o weak meke eken isu hak aperek isusak dek. Iti hak he, o weak mekeat he, eken, o hano meke eken isu hak aperek isusak degat.
40007019	Yi o ti o eken hano ikherek dek meke iti re, erlo mukhogo, hetumo motok la'isegarek o.
40007020	Itithogon hakene, it akhuni itithogon hagathinabugun iti baga, inobabut ekagat hinilu asugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40007021	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit akhuni nen, an yoknekhe dogolik, Ninoe, ninoe, iluk ekhe lagap iti baga hinebetha'bokhogonat, an nopase pogot oba meke apma'bisekherekma etoma ukilugun dek. Pogot oba ukilugun iti re it an nopase pogot oba meke akla apekherek meke mothogon hagariogei meke anegat ukilugun o.
40007022	O ilugun hurli baga hagatlasigin itinem, akhuni doalegat noba witluk nen, yigithogon yoknesugun, Ninoe. Nit nen, hat hetaga bagaat wene hano wene yakulisigik, mokat obabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukisukhasik werekma mukhogo ula'isigik, hagasusak dek meke elalinat doalegat hagakhik, hagarik nekhe lago emenogo dek a? iluk ugun mekeat he,
40007023	an nen pakhogonat yigithogon yogeisagein o, Hit hinebe an nokodek o. Weak motok hagarik nekhe lagap meke iti nalilu ya dogogup o. Kikil warani, iluk yogeisagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40007024	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Halok he, tha nen, an nane iti asuk holiluk mothogon hagakhe halok, at nen yi hakene hagasigin o. Ap ageikhe etaiken werek meke nen o helekit oba dukhogon halhikhemo,
40007025	miso kogat usa'ageik, i itluk kogat wageik, hisakne kogat hubetha ageik, hagakhikhe mekeat he, o etnogo helekit oba dukhogon halhikhesikmo nogo nen, thagoukhogon lageidek huk ageikhe iti hakeneat hagasigin o.
40007026	Meke re, tha nen an nane yi asuk holhe dogolik mothogon hagariogo dek halok, yi hakeneat hagasigin. Ap ageikhe etaiken dek meke nen o lelagama dukhogon haldilukmo,
40007027	miso kogat usa'ageik, i itluk kogat wageik, hisakne kogat hubetha ageik, hagakhe dogolik, o etnogo wakhikhemo, thatnakhogon wolok laga dogolik motok misak-dapukhogonweagatdisikhe iti hagat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40007028	-
40007029	Yesus nen wene itithogon ilik waga lageikhesik wene arat ilokon warogo isikhemo, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, “Eiya! Wene ekhe iti, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke nen yoknisegarek hakene iliogo dek o. At nen wene ebe iteerek meke nen u hak ekhe iti, nayuk e! ” iluk hogorakhukha.
40008001	At Yesus tom oba nen usa'ageikhemo, akhuni doalegat natogokhukhasik at oporlik lagoukha.
40008002	Lagunem, ap ageikhe u henako hakene inayuk meke oba welageikhe meke oba wageikhesik, itibagal yukukhogon usasikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Yesus noe o. Hat nen hano hagatnabigin apegen halok he, erlok hano hagatnabusagat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40008003	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, Yesus nen ap etnogo iki ha'iluk nen, “Nakla nen hano hagathabigin apigirikmoat o. Halok he, hoba hano asin o, ” iluk yogokhe korlek eranogoat u henako hakene inayuk meke etnogo motok dek atluk ebe hano ageikhe.
40008004	Hano ageikhemo, at Yesus nen he, men yogokhikhe. “Hat nen, Yesus nen itithogon hagatnakhe o, iluk, akhuni aperek motok yogeisugun o. Ap Allah iteerek meke nen ileken heoak nen oba lalok men hagatno o. At Musa nen ekhe dogolik, Akhuni inoba hano atluk, Allah hasik itithogon ’bisausak o, iluk isikhe tak-tagat ’bisasinem hutdaguak nen, ageikhe 'bisa lano, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40008005	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, o Kapernaum ukisinem, ap tentara meke inoe kok ageikhe Yesus oba wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe,
40008006	“Noe! An natuaneke ageikhe iki isok aborlok dek motok uma witik dogolik, hinet weak wariogo, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
40008007	at Yesus nen, “An nen hano hagasisigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo nen, it ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo nen,
40008008	“Eiye! Noe! An ap yekeregatma, hat an naila ukilausak erlok dek o. Halok he, hebe ya nen hane anek umo an natuaneke iti hano asigin o.
40008009	An meneke, nougi koktek inapma dogolik inane holhik, nen, an nagarumi tentara meke napma dogolik nane holhik, hagakhorethekma, an nen, at ageikhe, Lan o, iluk yogokhi halok he, lagaregat. Nen ageikhe, Hat erne o, iluk yogokhi halok he, wagaregat o. Nen, natuaneke ageikhe, Yi hagatno, yogokhi halok he, hagakheregat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
40008010	at Yesus asuk holhikhesik nen, akhuni at oporlik lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Eiye! Ap yi etaiken noba eberogonat hakotdekhe iti hakene, it akhuni Israel meke ageikhe inetaiken itithogon hakotdisinem hisegerek dek meke nayuk e, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o.
40008011	Nen, ageikhe yi yokhisak. Akhuni inebe doalegat upu eloma nen, wema eloma nen, nopase pogot oba meke apma ukiluk nen, Abraham inom, Ishak inom, Yakub inom, inom isago nuogoluk natogosisugun o.
40008012	Meke re, it akhuni Israel meke iti, o etoma irat iteerek asusak mekeat he, itikmanke o mum holikmo etoma la'isaumo re, inaik kirlidik mak-mak hagakhe dogolik, di ago de ago motok dogogun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40008013	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, at Yesus nen ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hebe lan o. Hat hetaiken an noba hakotdiluk, hakla nen, Itithogon hano hagatnisusak iluk apegen iti hagat, hagatlasuak o, ” iluk isi korlek eranogoat, atuaneke etnogo oba hano ageikhe.
40008014	Itithogon hagakhikhesik nen, at Yesus Petrus aila lageikhe meke, he Petrus akhoan oba agaken weak nen, witik werekma ileken hasikhe.
40008015	Ileken hasikhesik, Yesus nen iki baga hakhasikhemo, oba agaken motok kogat welageikhe etnogo dek ageikhe. Dek ageikhemo, he etnogo melageikhesik at Yesus yomakhekhe lageikhe.
40008016	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, o arat hiam ageikhemo, akhuni mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukiluk welagoukha meke wogosik Yesus oba wagoukhama, at ane opaki hasigat mokat inobabut weak meke inakla mukhogo ula'isigik, u weak meke tha'bokhogonat hano hagarinakhik, hagakhikhe.
40008017	Itithogon hagakhikhe iti, at Yesaya Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen holal waganhe dogolik, “Nit yi u ti u waganhorek meke iti at nenwaganiluk degetdisigik, ninobatne dik-dek atluk erlok dek agorek meke iti hano hagatninakhik, hagakhikhe o, ”\rq (Yesaya 53:4)\rq* iluk isikhe iti tak-tagat asuagaluk hagakhikhe iti.
40008018	Akhuni doalegat Yesus il oba wagoukhama ileken 'birisalok nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Nit ku warogo i aik ilibaganke ita luok o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40008019	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke ageikhe Yesus oba wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. An he, hat komake ligin halok he, hoporlik motok nekhe dogogin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40008020	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Helo yeke iti, ai halek akolakla welagarek. Nen, thue hitluk nekharek meke iti, ai halek welagaregat. Meke re, an abat itaklasi agagi iti anek, noge ekhe dogosakma nai halek motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40008021	Itithogon yogokhikhemo ap at ane waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe nen, men yogokhikhe, “Yesus noe. An nopase watlasusakma iti tak agatma thali lak nen, hat nen, Lan o, iluk yoknetnogoluk yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40008022	Itithogon yogokhikhemo at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Here'isalok nen, noporlik erne. Warek meke halok, it akhuni inebe warek meke hakene werek etoma nenat thalinakhe dogoak o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40008023	Itithogon iluk nen, at Yesus ebe ku akla ukisikhemo, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inomat ukisukha.
40008024	Ukisukhasik ku akla lagunem, hisakne aninirogo hubetha ageikhemo, i hoklabu nen ku wakhe dogolik akla i apem hethokhogon yekeli ukisi korlek, at Yesus noge ekhe lageikhe.
40008025	Noge isinem, agarumi alilu wagoukhasik iluguthekhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Yesus. Nit i lugun yoma, tilninabumo re, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40008026	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen he, “Nenaluk hinayuk aga lagap? Hinetaiken an noba hakotdu'buk yoma re! ” iluk ane ilik ilik melageikhesik hisakne etnogo inom, i hoklabu etnogo inom, “Haborlok, ” iluk wenagakhikhemo, aborlok motok dek ageikhe.
40008027	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen hogorakhe dogolik, men isukha, “Eiye! Ap yi tha apegep? Hisakne inom, i hoklabu inom, at ane hologo dek aga iti nayuk e! ” iluk hogorakhukha.
40008028	Yabokane, ap Gadara meke inaila i yekelek aik ilibaganke italhukha hak, it ap inebe pere mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukisikhemo welagoukha meke eranogo warek 'bisegarekma etoma nen Yesus oba wagoukha. It ap iti inanini motok weak nen, akhuni it inayuk nen holak itike motok laga lagoukha dek mekeat he, Yesus wageikhemo oba dukhi agoukhasik,
40008029	inane kokhogonat, men yogokhukha, “Hat Allah a'but yi. Hat nen, nit nikithogon hagatninabigiluk wagan. Nit ninasusak oba aban werek korlegat, hat tak ninasigiluk wagan yoma re! ” iluk yogokhukha.
40008030	Etanem higit o etoma aliluke horogot warn motok doalegat konak neke lagoukha.
40008031	Konak nasi werekma, it mokat inobabut weak meke it ap inebe pere eranogo inakla dogolik men yogokhukha, “Yesus. Hat he, ninebe ula'inanigiluk halok he, warn doalegat konak niliogei eloma inakla ukhatlasi luok nen, la'inanin o, ” iluk inane ina'buarek ina'buarek yogokhukha.
40008032	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Halok he, lani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Yogeisasikhemo, it mokat inobabut weak meke ap eranogo inaklake nen dukhi lagoukhasik warn doalegat konak neke lagoukha emenogo inakla ukhatlasi lagoukhama, warn emenogo motok tha'bokhogonat lumhogon i katma i yekelekma motok usasukhasik i lagoukha.
40008033	Itithogon i lagoukhama nen, it akhuni warn therisik welagoukha meke inayuk atluk, “Yigithogon hagatlaga o, ” iluk yoko o ukul kokma pirlikha lagoukhasik nen, it ap inebe pere eranogo inabok inomat pilinogo yogeisasukha.
40008034	Itithogon yogeisa lagoukhama it akhuni o etoma welagoukha meke Yesus 'bikha agoukhasik nen, “Hat hebe o yoma dogosak dek o. Lausak o, ” iluk inane obatnerogonat yogokhukha.
40009001	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus ku akla ukiluk, ku warogo, i aik ilibaganke italhikhesik o ukul at aila lageikhe hak,
40009002	ap ageikhe iki isok aborlok dek welageikhe meke thabuleka dit talogo noge ekherekma witik werek korlek yerogo wolok oba wagoukhama, at Yesus nen he, “It iti inetaiken an noba hakotdegasik nen wolok wageikha higi, ” iluk, ileken ekagat hisalok nen, ap iki isok aborlok dek meke etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Na'but o. Hakla arleken akhan. Hat weak hagakhe lagan meke re, an nen thagalogo degetdigi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40009003	Itithogon yogokhikhemo it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke aperek inakla nen he, “Eiye! Ap yi Allah akla meanetdiluk etaga weagatdiliogo, ” iluk apasukha.
40009004	Itithogon apasukhama, at Yesus nen inobabut ekagat palhikhesik nen, men isikhe, “Hit hinakla nen wene korlo meke ebekhe lagap iti nenaluk?
40009005	An nen ap yi wene yogosusak alhe hakene ki apegep. Hat weak hagakhe lagan meke iti arat thagalogo degetdigi, iluk yogokhi iti alhe hakene meke yogokhi apegep a? E a, at he, Hebe melatluk lan o, iluk yogosusak alhe hakene apegep a. Dek o. Hebe melatluk lan, iluk yogosumo akinat o.
40009006	Akin mekeat he, an abat itaklasi agagi iti, agat oba yoma dogolik, akhuni yi weak ti weak hagakharek meke an nenat thagalogo degetdekhe dogoagaluk Allah nen iteerek danhikhe iti hutdanubageik nen, yogosik, ” iluk nen, ap iki isok aborlok dek meke etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hebe melatluk, direka talek noge ekhe lagan meke ithi horlalok haila lan o, ” iluk la'isikhe.
40009007	La'isikhemo, ap etnogo melatluk aila lageikhe.
40009008	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it akhuni emenogo inileken hasukhasik inayuk agoukhasik nen, “Allah nenat yigithogon hagakhe dogoagaluk akhuni meke meldekhemo iti nayuk o, ” iluk, Allah hogorakhukha.
40009009	At Yesus o etoma thogotdiluk laga dogolik, ap ageikhe etaga Matius, kantor uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganhe lagoukhama hurek werekma, ileken halok, “Noporlik eme o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, melageikhesik oporligat lageikhe.
40009010	Lageikhesik, at Yesus Matius ipisak at aila ukisikhesik hipiri nuogoluk hurek werekma, it ap uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganhe lagoukha meke aperek men, it aperek weak hagarik nekhe lagoukha meke men, inebe doalegat uki agoukhasik, at Yesus ebe inom, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inomat opakimo hurek latluk hipiri neke lagoukha.
40009011	Itithogon nasi werekma, it ap Farisi meke nen inileken kola'isalok, it ap Yesus ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasukha, “Hit hinoe wene yakulhisiliogo meke ithi, it ap uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganharek meke inom, it aperek weak hagarik nekharek meke inom, opakimo hurek latluk hipiri niliogei yi nenaluk, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
40009012	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, at Yesus asuk holhikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni aperek inoba hano meke, dokter nen u hagarinabuagaluk inayoko 'busak nogo? Dek o. Inoba u werek halogat dokter lak inayoko 'busak o.
40009013	Allah ane ageikhe men isikhe, An Allah nakla nen, akhuni nen inako watnekharek iti na'it o. It akhuni inakmurinakhe dogosak itiat warlok o,\rq (Hosea 6:6)\rq* iluk isikhe wene iti hutdi lani o. An wagagi iti re, akhuni inobabut hano hagakharek meke inayoko 'bigiluk wagagi 'buk. Dek o. Akhuni inobabut weak hagakharek meke iti inayoko 'bigiluk wagagi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40009014	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik oba nen, it Yohanes agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Nit men, it ap Farisi meke men, sembayan uogoluk, hipiri nikidek hibiku-yogoku welagorek mekeat he, it ap hat hane waganiogei meke yoma anek he, itithogon hagariogei dek iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40009015	Yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe age waganhe dogolik, at agarlak lak erugi inomat dogolik, it inakla wiik-weakhogo dogosak nogo? Dek o. Itithogon mekeat he, agarlak lak erugi 'bisalok, ap iti wolok lugun oba weregat o. Itithogon wolok laumo anek, it iti iniki ageikhe hipiri nikidek sembayanat isi dogogunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40009016	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen, su alep iriogei meke li'bilaga halok, kain ket meke baga 'bugukasumo, yabokane kain ket meke iti dikilik dogolik, su iti kogat li'bilarik lausak o.
40009017	Iti hakene, akhuni nen anggur eken apusu herelogo apusu ket meke isoak domba oado meke haganeat hagarek meke akla ukhakharek dek. Itithogon ukhasugun halok he, isoak domba oado meke hagarek etnogo sup ekhe dogolik, anggur eken apusu iti tialogo hagatlageik, isoak iti suphogon alomatlageik, hagasinogo. Itithogon hagasinogo iluk anggur eken apusu ket meke halok he, isoak ket hano hagarek meke halogat akla henasusak o. Itithogonat hagasumo nen, pereat hano dogosak, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40009018	Itithogon yogeisugunem, ap ageikhe o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ite dogolik kok welageikhe meke iti Yesus oba wageikhesik, itibagal yukukhogo hurek dogolik, men yogokhikhe. “An na’but horlak ket yogotak yaat watlagama meke re, hat nen hiki hakha laumo re, iluk atluk oba the asigin o, iluk hayoko wagei, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40009019	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus ebe inom, ap etnogo inom, it ap Yesus ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, inom tha'bokhogonat lagoukha.
40009020	Lagunem, he ageikhe amep lago motok werek korlek 12 tahun welageikhe meke, inoporlik laga dogolik, Yesus asu ilugun iki hakhasike.
40009021	Itithogon hakhasikhe iti re, at he iti akla nen, “Yesus iti asu niki hakhaumo, namep palasigin o, ” iluk akla apalok itithogon hagakhikhe.
40009022	Iki hakhasikhemo, at Yesus nen ileken dagakhogon 'bikhasikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Neru o! Hakla arleken akhan o. Hetaiken noba hakotdegen iti nen hano agan o, ” iluk, isi korlek eranogoat, he etnogo arat hano ageikhe.
40009023	Itithogon hagarik hagarik nen, at ap kok Yesus ayoko wageikhe meke etnogo aila lagoukha hak, akhuni de aga dogolik pikon wakharek meke wakhik, de naik-waik ageik, ugunem ileken 'birisalok,
40009024	men yogeisasikhe, “Horlak yi watlageidek, noge iliogo. Halok he, kikil warani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe meke re, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, obato kogat agoukha.
40009025	Obato kogat agoukhama, inebeula’isalok at horlak etnogo welageikhemo ukiluk iki hago meldisikhemo iluk ageikhe.
40009026	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, “Yesus nen hagakhe o, ” iluk, o yi ai ti ai etoma abok motok thak-pak isikhe.
40009027	At Yesus o etoma nen lagunem ap inebe pere inileken puk meke inane kokhogon ilik oporlik laga dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Ap Daud nen itago meke noe a! Hakmu nisan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40009028	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus ebe uma ukiluk werekma, it ap inebe pere inileken weak meke eranogo oba ukisukha. Ukisukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla, At nen erlok hano hagatninabusak, iluk apekhe lagap a? ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “I o. Ninoe. Erlogat hano hagatninabusak apekhe lago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40009029	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen inileken etnogo iki hageisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Hagathinabigin o. Hinetaiken noba hakotdegep iti baga hano atni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40009030	Itithogon yogeisekhe korlek eranogoat inileken etnogo hano agoukha. Hano agoukhama nen, at Yesus ane obatnerogonat yogeisekhe dogolik, “An hano hagathinakhi meke yi, akhuni aperek motok yogeisugup o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40009031	Itithogon yogeisasikhe mekeat he, it akhuni emenogo nen o etoma at abok motok yogeisilik nekhe lagoukha.
40009032	O etoma nen dukhisinem, it akhuni aperek nen ap ageikhe mokat obabut weak meke akla ukisikhemo ane dek motok welageikhe meke Yesus oba wolok wagoukha.
40009033	Wolok wagoukhama, at Yesus nen mokat obabut weak meke ap etnogo akla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isikhemo, ap etnogo ane huak iluk nen, wenekak isikhe. Itithogon hano hagakhikhemo, it akhuni inebe doalegat welagoukha meke nen Yesus hogorakhe dogolik, men isukha, “Yigithogon hagakhunem nit akhuni Israel meke nen ageikhe ninileken hogorek dek meke nayuk, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
40009034	Itithogon hogorakhukhama mekeat he, it ap Farisi meke emenogo nen, men isukha, “At Yesus nen Iblis agarumi inoe kok etnogo obatne baga mokat obabut weak meke iti akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isiliogo, ” iluk isukha.
40009035	At Yesus o ukul kokmake, herlekha'bukmoke, ya ukigik, ta ukigik, nekhe dogolik, o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukiluk, hano wene ninopase Allah nen apma 'binanherek wene etnogo yakulisigik, yi u ti u inoba werek meke inom, inobatne dek erlok dek meke inom, hano hagarinakhik, hagarik nekhe lageikhe.
40009036	Itithogon hano hagarinabik nekhe dogolik, akhuni doalegat ileken lageisalok nen, “Ap domba therisek welageikharek hak, it yoma ap therisek dogou meke inebe dek nen yugunat thirlik-pirlikhogon thet yagalek liliogei yoma nakmu lak o, ” iluk akmurinakhikhe.
40009037	Akmurinakhikhesik, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Eken ugu doalegat werek mekeat he, akhuni eken ebe palusak meke inebe pererlagat o.
40009038	Iti nen he, ap ayabu Iteerek meke etnaga nen akhuni eken palusak meke aperek la'isoak nen, at ayoko 'bekhe dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40010001	Iniki ageikhe baga, at Yesus nen at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe 12 oba emenogo natogosi isuagaluk waisasikhesikmo wagoukhama, it nen akhuni aperek mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukisukhasik werekma mukhogo ula'isigik, yi u ti u inoba werek meke hano hagarinakhik, inobatne dek erlok dek meke inobatnerinakhik, hagarik loagaluk, inobatne wogeisasikhe.
40010002	Ap inebe 12 oba iti, inetaga yi: ebekeram, Simon etaga ageikhe Petrus ekhe lagoukha etnogo agot Andreas ipisak inom, Zebedeus a'but Yakobus etnogo agot Yohanes ipisak inom,
40010003	Filipus Bartolomeus ipisak inom, Tomas Matius pemerintah hasik uang kino ilik waganhe lageikhe meke etnogo ipisak inom, Alfeus a'but Yakub Tadeus ipisak inom,
40010004	Simon, “O Kanaan yoma ninaierek meke anek dogouok, ” iluk ekhe lageikhe etnogo inom, Yudas Iskariot Yesus wasuagaluk yabokane yoko lageikhe meke etnogo inom, inetaga eta.
40010005	At Yesus nen it ap inebe 12 oba iti supusogo la'isagaluk, inasuk wakhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni itikmanke meke inailake lagup o. Nen, it akhuni o Samaria meke inaila lalok ukugubat o.
40010006	Hit nen, akhuni Israel meke domba nalagarek hak nalageikhasik werek iti inobake 'birisilik lano o.
40010007	'Birisa laga dogolik, men yogeisilik lano o, Ninopase Allah pogot oba meke apma 'binanigin etnogo yogotak arat 'binanigin o, iluk, yogeisilik lano o.
40010008	It akhuni u warek halok hanorinakhik, watlageikha halok inilugurinakhik, u henako hakene inayuk meke inoba werek halok hanorinakhik, mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukiluk werek meke mukhogo ula'isigik, hano hagarinabik nekhe dogono. An nen oko dek wokhisigi iti hagat, hit nen itithogonat oko dek wogeisilik lano.
40010009	-
40010010	Akhuni aperek wen waganhunem, inapiri wogeisegarek iti hak, hit nen hagarinabik lagunem, it nen wokhisekhe dogogun hakma, uang emas men, perak men, tembaga men, hinuakma ukharlogo waganhidegat, nen, su holak oba wokhisagun meke ukharlogo wolok lausak meke men, hinasu ugu meke peretek men, hinisok agot isugun meke men, thegerluk men, wolok lageidek hinebe anek lani o.
40010011	Nen, hit o ukul kokma, 'bugurlagatma, uki lagep halok he, tha nen heagei warogo hinebe wokhinakhe halok, at obabut paldiluk, at itiat hinom dogoluk o ninmo luogoluk halok he, dukhitluk lano.
40010012	Nen, it aperek inaila ukugun halok he, it inaierek meke iti heagei warinabino.
40010013	Nen, it akhuni etoma inobabut hano nen wokhinakho halok, heagei hinane hanorogo warinabugun iti baga, Allah nen hanorinabiginat o. Itithogon mekeat he, inobabut weak halok he, heagei warinabugun meke iti hinane ukut apuke waganhe dogono.
40010014	Nen, it etoma nen hinebe wokhinakhidek dogolik hinane waganhidek thogotdisega halok he, o etoma here'isalok hinapuke dukhi aga dogolik, hinisok hola negen horogo 'biluk dukhitno.
40010015	Yogotak an nane eberogonat yokhisak. Yabokane ninopase Allah pogot oba meke nen ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem, it akhuni o Sodom Gomora meke etoma, ukum inoba 'biluk weagarinabigin mekeat he, alhe negenat o. Meke re, it akhuni o ukul hit wokhinakhidek thogotdinagagun meke iti anek he, ukum akin meke inoba 'biluk motok weagarinabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40010016	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An nen he, hit yi re, hinobabut domba obabut hakene meke, it akhuni inobabut yeke helo yeke obabut weak meke hakene meke inakerlekla hiakhogo la'inagaginmo iti, hit hinobabut warlo obabut hagakharek iti hak hinobabut hinomarlik-hinomarlokhogon hagakhik, thue yogeik hagakherek hakene, hinobabut enago welageik, hagakhe dogono.
40010017	Akhuni nen it ap wene erlo pilinekharekma inoba wokhisik lageik, akhuni Yahudi meke o sembayan egarekma etoma nen tugi hinakhik, hagasugun etnaga re, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
40010018	Itithogon hagathinabugun iti, erlo an nebe hasigat, ap inetagapogot meke inom, ap koktek meke inom, inoba wokhisik lagunem, hit nen it ap iti inil oba an hagakhunem hinileken neekhe lagap meke etnogo pakhogon it yogeisigik, akhuni itikmanke meke yogeisigik, yogeisoagaluk hano iluk iti bagaat hinitema waganugun etnaga o.
40010019	Itithogon hinitema waganuagaluk wokhisik lageikha halok he, hit nen oko yogeisagun meke itinem Allah Agoreke nenat hinakla kagalhe dogogin. Halok he, oko nikithogon yogeisagun iluk hinelabut hikhup o.
40010020	Wene oko yogeisagun iti, hit nen hinakla kagalogo ugun dek meke re, hinopase Allah Agoreke nen hinakla dogolik, Yigithogon ini o, iluk yokhisekhe korlek ugun o.
40010021	Agarlak ageikhe nen he, at ekaerek agarlak ageikhe wasuagaluk wolok lageik, opase nen he, a'but wasuagaluk wolok lageik, ina'buri nen, inagosa inopase ina'it atluk inasuagaluk inabok palhik, hagasugunat o.
40010022	Nen, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen an netaga ilik, Hit at agarumi, iluk ina'it motok hisagun o. Mekeat he, tha nen etaiken thebekhogon obakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogin halok he, o ilugun hurli baga, Allah nen tiligin o.
40010023	O ukul ageikhe nen weagathinabuogoluk hagakho halok he, lo o ukul ageikhe lano. It akhuni Israel meke inai ukul ebetlake aban wene yogeisigidek werek korlegat, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane wisigin o, iluk, nane eberogonat yokhisigi.
40010024	It guru lak wene yakulisegarek meke thebekthek negen werek korlegat, it ina'buri yakulisegarek meke iti siakthek negen upu ya welageikharek motok dek o. Iti hagat, it ap koktek negen thebekthek werek korlek, inatuaneke meke iti re, siakthek negen welageikharek motok degat o.
40010025	Meke re, it yekerugi iti inopase guru iti inom tak-tak hagatlageik, nen, it inatuaneke meke iti inopase lak inom tak-tak hagatlageik, hagatlasumo, erlogat o. It akhuni inoe o iteerek meke iti weak iluk etaga Beelzebul isi halok, it at agarumi inom opakimo meke iti, itithogonat inetaga weak kogat ekhe dogogun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40010026	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Yabokane Allah nen, yi meke ti meke thebelek meke iti winametdigik, limago meke iti inilurogon thelekmatdigik, hagasigin anek iti nen, hit nen, it akhuni meke iti hinayukhogo dogogup o.
40010027	Nen, an nen hit o mummo yokhisigi meke, hit nen o lia baga ekhe dogono. Nen, hinasukmo nane la'bi-la'bo yokhisigi meke iti, hit nen o warleke isiken oba dageiluk hinane pakhogon yogeisekhe dogono o.
40010028	Akhuni nen hinagoreke hinasusak erlok dek. Hinoado itikmanke anek hinasugun iti nen, hinayukhogon dogogup o. Meke re, at Allah anek, hinagoreke inom, hinoado itikmanke inom, erlok motok warogo hetu aikmo la'inagusak werek iti nen, at Allah at hinayukhogo dogono.
40010029	Uang opakiat herlekha'bugat meke baga thue wurle pere meke oko palhethep etnogo hinokodek nogo a? Itithogon meke re, hinopase Allah pogot oba meke nen, Thue iti tunhogo usanek o, iluk, aban igidek werek korlek, ageikhe agat oba tunhogo usekherek dek o.
40010030	Hit he, hinisi hinukuloakma tha'bokhogonat Allah nen iki motok wenago 'bekhemo werek o.
40010031	Allah nen thue wurle iti ebe doalegat meke re, kok hakene apekherek 'buk. Akhuni hinebeat kok motok apekherek o. Iti nen hinayuk dekhogon dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40010032	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Tha nen, Yesus iti an noe o, akhuni inil oba ane pakhogon isi halok he, an meneke, At iti an nagot o, iluk nopase pogot oba meke il oba, nane pakhogon iginat o.
40010033	Itithogon mekeat he, tha nen, Yesus iti an nokodek o, iluk akhuni inil oba la'belho halok he, an meneke, At iti an nokodek o, iluk nopase pogot oba meke il oba pakhogonat igin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40010034	-
40010035	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla nen, At wageikhe iti, agat oba yoma wim dapuligiluk wageikhe, iluk apugup o. An wagagi iti, opase a'but ipisak weak ageik, agosa eak ipisak weak ageik, akhoan agalho ipisak weakageik, it-it inom weak atluk dogoagaluk wagagi o.
40010036	Akhuni inathili meke negen he, inekaerek inai opakimo mekeat agotlasugun o.\rq (Mikha 7:6)\rq*
40010037	Nen, an he, hina’it negen apekhe dogolik, hinagosa hinopase lak hinakmu welagap halok he, an nagarumi asusak motok dek o. Nen, an hina'it negen dogolik hina’buri elege inom, hina’buri homagarlugi inom, hinakmu welagap halok he, an nagarumi asusak motok degat o.
40010038	O baga meldisalok inakharek meke etnogo, hinago tomok hinomorlo baga waganiluk an noporlik wolok wageidek halok, an nagarumi asusak degat o.
40010039	Tha nen ekaerek ebe irlirli horlagein halok he, ebe watlatluk nuk akhagein o. Meke re, tha nen an nobasik watlasigin halok he, ebe irlirli horlagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40010040	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “At tha nen hinebe wokhinabigin halok he, at nebeat woknabigin o. Nen, an nebe woknabigin iti, an nopase la’ani ageikhe meke etnogo ebeat waganigin o.
40010041	Nen, tha nen, Ap yi Allah ane yogeisekherek meke, iluk ebe waganigin halok he, it ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke oko horlegarek tak-tagat horlagein o. Nen, Ap yi mothogonat hagakherek meke, iluk ebe waganigin halok he, it mothogon hagakharek meke oko horlegarek tak-tagat horlageinat o.
40010042	Nen, tha nen, Yekerek ’bugurlagat meke yi Yesus ane waganherek meke, iluk i aigekeak meke anek ageikhe wogokhe halok he, Allah nen oko wogosusak meke horligidek nuk asigin degat, oko horlageinat o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40011001	It ap Yesus ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe 12 emenogo inasuk itithogon warogo 'bisalok nen, akhuni inai ukul dopok horogat meke wene hano wene etnogo yakulisigik, inasuk wakhik, hagasigiluk, o ukul etoma nenat nekhe lageikhe.
40011002	At Yohanes ima usa'isekhe lageikhe meke etnogo iki herle warek werekma, akhuni nen, “Kristus itithogon hagariogo, ” iluk ugunem asuk holhikhesik nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke Yesus oba hinok waganuagaluk la'isa ageikhe.
40011003	La'isa ageikhemo wagoukhasik nen, “Ap ageikhe wisigin iluk ekhe lagoukha etnogo, harat a? E a, at he, ninat meke ageikhe therogo dogogun a? ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40011004	at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, an yigithogon itithogon hagakhunem hinileken neegik, wene isinem hinasuk holhik, hagakhep meke iti, at Yohanes hutukhogon yogosi lano o.
40011005	Inileken puk meke 'bekelogo hano ageik, inae la'belek meke holak lageik, inoba u henako hakene inayuk meke werekma hagarinakhunem hano ageik, inasuk dogou meke inasuk huakhogon holhik, akhuni warek meke inilugurinakhik, it aperek inameke dek meke hano wene yakulisigik, hagakhunem hinileken neegep etnogo hutukhogon yogosi lano.
40011006	Yogotluk tha nen etaiken pere atluk here'anhidek dogogin halok he, akla arleken akhekhe dogogin o, iluk yogosi lano, ” iluk la'isasikhe.
40011007	Itithogon isikhemo, it Yohanes agarumi emenogo lagoukhama, at Yesus nen akhuni doalegat emenogo Yohanes abok men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, o limo akhuni dekma etoma nena meke hinileken huogoluk laga lagasip nogo? Hiteka yagareka hisakne nen huphogon lageik-wageik hagakho werekma 'bikha luogoluk laga lagasip a?
40011008	E a, at he, nena meke ha luogoluk laga lagasip. Ap ageikhe asu hano motok meke ugu werekma ha luogoluk laga lagasip a? Lakhani! Inasu hano meke ikhegarek iti, koktek inetagapogot meke inaila dogolik halogat ikharek.
40011009	Halok he, nena meke 'bikha luogoluk laga lagasip? E a, at he, ap Allah ane yogeisekherek meke ageikhe werekma hinileken 'bikha luogoluk laga lagasip a? Eberogonat, itiat o. An nen yokhisak. It ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke aperek welagoukha mekeat he, it iti erlok dek negen. Mekeat he, at Yohanes iti anek he, etagapogot isiken negenat o.
40011010	At Allah nen men isikhe, Hat yabokane lanogoluk ap ageikhe hat hagolak ya'agekhe dogoagaluk, ayoko 'biluk alebageik la'igima o,\rq (Maleakhi 3:1)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti ebe at Yohanes hasigat isikhe.
40011011	Halok he, an nane eberogonat yokhisak. Akhuni tha'bokhogonat inagosa lak nen itaginabik wagoukha mekeat he, inetaga dek anek o. Mekeat he, at Yohanes ima usa'isekherek meke iti anek, etaga werek o. Itithogon mekeat he, nopase pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma, at Yohanes etnogo etaga dek negen mekeat he, it akhuni aperek inetaga dek meke iti, inetaga werek negenat o.
40011012	At Yohanes ima usa'isekhe laga iti hurli nen yogotak ya hurli, it inobabut weak inakla aga weak meke nen, nopase pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherek etnogo ina'it nen erlok degetduogoluk inobatnerogo walhiliogei.
40011013	At Yohanes ebe aban wageidek werek korlek, wene Allah nen inasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga inom, Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke etnogo baga inom, yabokane hagatlasigin iti meke pakhogon yogeisekhe lagoukha etnogo
40011014	hinetaikenma hutukhogon waganhep halok, at Elia ebe wisigin, iluk abok isukha etnogo, ebeYohanes waga itiat o.
40011015	Hit hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogon holini o.
40011016	Akhuni o yogotak werek ya baga re, nena meke oba lisogo yokhisak. Yi meke oba lisogo ik. It iti yekerugi pasar oba oko waganharekma etoma hurek dogolik, inagarlak lak inom wene la'igik-wa'igik ekhe dogolik,
40011017	Nit etai watdinaguogoluk isa ula'ogo mekeat he, hit nen ekaka igidegat. Nen, de asuogoluk, de wene erlo ula'ogo mekeat he, hit nen de ageidegat, iluk egarek etnogo hagat, hagariogei o.
40011018	At Yohanes iti hipiri inom, anggur eken apusu inom, nikidek here'isalok welaga iti hasik, it akhuni nen he, At iti mokat obabut weak meke akla ukekhesik werek o, iluk iliogei.
40011019	Meke re, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, hipiri inom, anggur eken apusu inom, nilik wagagisikmo, akhuni nen nabok ekhe dogolik, Hipiri inom, anggur eken apusu inom, oba la'buk niliogo yi! It ap pemerintah hasik uang kino iluk waganharek meke inom, weak hagarik nekharek meke inom, inom hunetdakhalok werek yi 'bikhani! iluk iliogei iti, Allah akla motok kagalek dogolik hagakherek iti nen, hanorakhunem inileken halok, Morat, iluk hutdugunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40011020	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, akhuni inai ukul dopok at nen hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagakhunem inileken hekhe lagoukha mekeat he, inakla hutdigidek dogolik, yi weak ti weak hagakhe lagoukha meke here'isigidek welagoukha meke wenageisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe,
40011021	“Hit akhuni o Korasim meke men, o Betsaida meke men, eiye! Nakmu lak o. Akhuni nen hagasusak dek meke an nenelalinat hit ninom dogolik hagakhe lagei etnogo, o Tirus Sidon etoma hagakhe dogolema, it akhuni o etoma meke hean 'biluk hagakharek hak, inasu pelabi ikhigik, ’bisi yugulharek hakene wul dabulhik, hagakhe dogolik, weak hagakhe lagoukha meke iti thogotdisalok inobabut haganeat hebelatlep mekeat, hit he, itithogon hagasusak hina’it iti nen weagathinabigin o!
40011022	Mekeat he, an nane eberogonat yokhisak. Yabokane o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen ukum hinoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem he, it akhuni o Tirus Sidon etoma inom, ukum inoba ’biluk alhe negen inasigin mekeat he, hit anek he, motok akinhogo negen hinasigin o, iluk yokhisigi.
40011023	Nen, hit akhuni o Kapernaum meke yi hinakla nen, Allah nen pogot oba lia’inaniluk kogotdinanigin, iluk hogorakeke lagap a? Motok dek o. Akhuni watlatluk lageikharekma etoma motok usa’inagagin o. Akhuni nen hagasusak dek meke an nen elalinat hit ninom dogolik hagakhe lagei etnogo, o Sodom etoma hagakhe dogolema, it etoma inebe dek ageidek yogotak ya motok hunigat dogolep o.
40011024	Yabokane Allah nen ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem he, it akhuni o Sodom welagoukha meke ukum inoba ’bisalok alhe negen inasigin mekeat he, hit anek he, ukum motok akinhogo negen hinasigin o, iluk yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40011025	-
40011026	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, o itinem, at Yesus nen Allah ebe yogokhe dogolik, “Allah nopase! Pogot agat iteerek harat o! Wene tha’bokhogonat iti, it akhuni inakla kagalek meke men, yi wene ti wene inilu meke men, inilu asunogo iluk lima’iluk nen, it inobabut yekerugi ket itago meke hakene anek, pakhogon yogeisegen iti hakla warlok apegetik nenat yogeisegen iti nen heagei wathakhe lagei, nopase, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40011027	Itithogon yogokhikhesik, it akhuni emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An nopase nen yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat iteerek dogoagaluk woknikhikhe. Nen, an Allah a'but yi, akhuni tha'bokhogonat motok inokodek mekeat he, nopase Allah arligat anek ilu welagarek. Iti hagat, an nopase Allah iti akhuni tha'bokhogonat motok inokodek mekeat he, a'but an narligat anek nilu welagarek o. Nen, Allah a'but an nenat nakla apalok nen nopase ebe akhuni aperek inilu asuagaluk pakhogon yogeisegerek meke itiat inilu ageikharek.
40011028	Hit hinoba akin-pakinhogo thet weak hagakhe lagap meke iti, an nen hinoba thet korogo 'binagumo thet walubageik nen, noba witni o.
40011029	-
40011030	An nasuke ukharlek su ade al warek hano ukharlogo wokhisaumo alheat hugun iti nen, hinomorlo baga waganiluk, an nobabut enago dogolik inapma negen welagarek etnogo hutukhogon yakulilik nekhe dogono o. Itithogon nekhe dogogun halok, hinetaiken hapuk igin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40012001	O itinem, it akhuni Yahudi meke iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat werek korlek, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom gandum yagomake laga dogolik, agarumi hipiri abu nen, gandum eken palogo nilik nilik lagoukha.
40012002	Palogo nilik lagunem, it ap Farisi meke nen inileken hisalok nen, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Lakhan! Niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, Itithogon hagasusak dek, iluk wene palek werek mekeat he, hat hagarumi gandum eken palogo nilik wageikha yi re! ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40012003	at Yesus nen, “At Daud agarumi oporlik lagoukha meke inom hipiri nonaik 'bisasikhemo, at nen hagakhikhe meke Allah ane baga holal waganek etnogo hit nen etaga thalhidek welagap a? Etaga thalhethebat o.
40012004	At Daud nen Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik nen, hipiri roti meke Allah hasik 'bekhe lagoukha meke it ap Allah iteerek meke inarligat anek nausak. Mekeat he, at Daud ebe men, it ap at oporlik lagoukha meke men, inom, it nausak dek meke waganhukhasik nasukha iluk holal waganek etnogo hit etaga thalhidek welagap nogo?
