40012005	Nen, niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik yi meke ti meke hagakhidek werlegat dogosak mekeat he, it ap Allah iteerek meke anek, Allah ai halekma ukiluk, it hagasusak meke hagakhunem wene inoba 'begarek dek, iluk Allah ane holal waganek werek etnogo etaga thalhidek nogo?
40012006	Halok he, an nen wene yi yokhisak. Allah ai halek iti erlok dek negen. Meke re, an yoma welagei yi anek he, motok kogat o.
40012007	Allah ane holal waganek etnogo baga, wene men iluk werek, An Allah nakla nen, akhuni nen inakowatnekharek iti na'it o. It akhuni aperek inebe inakmurinakhe dogosak itiat warlok o,\rq (Hosea 6:6)\rq* iluk isikhe meke iti, hit hutdilepma, it yoma weakhagakhidekma wene inoba 'bilep dek o.
40012008	Niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat welagorek iti, iteerek an abat itaklasi agagi nebe yiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40012009	-
40012010	At Yesus o etoma nen lageikhesik, o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukisikhesik nen, ap ageikhe iki ebelak lapelek werekma ileken hasikhemo, it ap aperek nen wene Yesus oba 'buogoluk itema waganhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Allah hasik werlegat dogolik u hagarinabu erlok a? Dek a, ” iluk yogokhukhama
40012011	at Yesus nen, “Ap hit meke ageikhe akorlak domba opakiatma Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, ebe kilinla usaumo, hapokhogon lia'isusak nogo a? Lia'isusagat o.
40012012	Meke re, domba iti meke erlok dek negen o. Akhuni inebe iti oko kogat o. Halok he, Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, hano hagarinabumo erlogat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40012013	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ap etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hiki walokhan, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, iki etnogo walothasinem iki ebelake hano hagat, hano motok ageikhe.
40012014	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it ap Farisi meke emenogo o silimo dukhisukhasik nen, Yesus wasuogoluk abok palhe lagoukha.
40012015	Abok itithogon palhunem, at Yesus nen inobabut ekagat hutdisikhesik nen, o etoma nen lagunem akhuni inebe doalegat, at oporlik lagoukha. Lagoukhama re, u warek meke tha'bokhogonat hano hagarinakhikhesik nen,
40012016	“An nen hagathinakhi yi, nabok akhuni aperek motok yogeisugup o, ” iluk inasuk warogo yogeisasikhe.
40012017	Itithogon hagakhikhe iti, at Yesaya Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen isikhe tak-tagat hagatlasuagaluk hagakhikhe iti.
40012018	At Allah nen, “'Bikhani! At iti re, an natuaneke dogoagaluk nekaerek nen witaberogo meldigi. Netaiken hunik noba hotokthek meke, at itiat o. An Nagoreke at oba 'bumo, an nen akhuni wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, mothogon 'bigin iti hasik, at nen it akhuni itikmanke meke wene pakhogon yogeisekhe dogoginat o.
40012019	At nen akhuni inom wene tauk ageik, ane pukweak wenageisigik, akhuni holagarlemke lagunem ane holuagaluk kokhogon yogeisigik, hagakhe dogogin dek o.
40012020	O ilugun hurli baga at nen wene akhuni inoba'bigik, kokhik, mothogonat hagakhe dogolik, at obatne asigin iti aban werek korlek, hite oak sigilik meke, at nen hukaligin dek o. Nen, isagal amulok dageigidek thode anek dageikhe halok he, at nen naguldisagein degat o.
40012021	Nen, it akhuni itikmanke meke nen at etagabagaat, At nen hanotninabigin o, iluk ugun, ”\rq (Yesaya 42:1-4)\rq* iluk isikhe meke werek iti tak-tagat hagatlasuagaluk hagakhikhe iti.
40012022	Itithogon hagakhikhesik oba nen, yabokane ap ageikhe mokat obabut weak meke akla ukisikhemo nen ileken puk ageik, ane ako dek ageik, hagakhikhe meke Yesus oba wolok wagoukhama, at nen hanotdisikhemo ileken puk meke etnogo hano ageik, ane dek meke huak igik, hagakhikhe.
40012023	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it akhuni alilu natogorlek welagoukha meke nen, “Eiye! Daud a'but wisigin iluk ekhe lagoukha etnogo ebe yi a? ” isukha.
40012024	Itithogon isinem, it ap Farisi meke emenogo inasuk holhukhasik, men isukha, “A! Ap yi mokat obabut weak meke inoe kok etaga Beelzebul etnogo at oba dukthek werekma nogo nen, mokat at agarumi negen inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isiliogo, ” iluk isinem,
40012025	at Yesus nen it inakla apasukha meke ekagat hutdisalok, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap koktek inetagapogot inagarumi inapma hagasik welageikharek obake dopok, it-it inom hurlitdakhalok, inom weak dogogun halok he, erlok dek asugun o. Nen, akhuni inai ukul dopok opakiat meke men, ap inebe dopok ina'buri men, inom hurlitdakhalok inom weak dogogun halok, weak asugunat o.
40012026	Iti hak, at Iblis ekaerek agarumi mokat inobabut weak meke inom hurlitdakhalok, ebetlake nen ebetlake mukhogo ula'iselepma, at agarumi hagasik welagarek meke nikithogon obatne dogolep? Erlok degat o.
40012027	An nen Beelzebul iti obatne baga, at agarumi inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula’isekhe lagei halok he, hit hinagarumi nen mokat inobabut weak meke it aperek inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isiliogei iti, tha obatne baga mukhogo ula'isiliogei apegep. Hinagarumi nen itithogon hagariogei iti baga, it nen, Wene at Yesus hasik egep iti, korlo egep o, iluk wene hinoba 'bu hak hagariogei o.
40012028	Mekeat he, an nen mokat inobabut weak meke iti akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma an nopase Agoreke obatne baga ula'isekhe lagei halok he, Allah nen at apma 'bisagein etnogo arat hit hinoba horok asi aga o.
40012029	Ap ageikhe obatneak meke iki herle warogo 'bigidegat, aila at ameke iniki abusak wagani ukusak, erlok apegep? Erlok dek. Iki herle warogo 'biluk anek he, ameke iti iniki abusak erlok wagani ukusak o.
40012030	Nen, tha nen ebe an werekmake welageidek halok he, at iti an nipisak wim kagalek negenat o. Nen, tha nen an nipisak akhuni natogorinakhe lago dek meke halok he, at iti nenat thirlik-pirlikhogon ula'isiliogo o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40012031	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene itithogon egep iti nen, an wene yi yokhisak. Akhuni nen yi weak ti weak hagariogei meke inom, inakla nen it aperek meanetdisalok inane baga nen inetaga weagatdiliogei meke inom, at Allah nen erlok thagalogo degetdisausak meke re, Allah Agoreke iti anek inakla nen meanetdiluk etaga weagatdisi halok he, erlok thagalogo degetdisausak motok dek o.
40012032	Tha nen an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo akla meanetdaniluk netaga weagatdisi halok he, weak hagasigin meke iti Allah nen erlok thagalogo degetdisausak mekeat he, Allah Agoreke iti akla meanetdiluk etaga weagatdisi halok he, weak hagasigin meke iti, Allah nen yogotak men, o ilugun hurli baga arat hagatlatluk dogogun oba men, thagalogo degetdisausak motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40012033	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “O eken hano meke erlo hano meke nenat ikherek. Nen, oeken weak meke iti, erlo weak meke nenat ikherek. Itithogon ikherek iti baga, o eken yi hano meke eken igik, yi weak meke eken igik, ekagat hutdegethep o.
40012034	Hit hinebe warlo nen itago meke yomarani! Akhuni nen yi wene ti wene inapema nen egarek iti, inakla kerlek dogolik kagalogo dagei agunem egarek iti nen, hit he, hinobabut weagat dogolik, wene hano meke ekhe dogosak a? Erlok dek o.
40012035	Akhuni inobabut hano meke re, inakla hano meke kerlekhogon dogolik, kagalogo dagei agunem, wene hano mekeat dukhi agarek o. Meke re, akhuni inobabut weak meke, inakla weak meke kerlekhogon dogolik, kagalogo dagei agunem, wene weak mekeat dukhi agarek o.
40012036	Halok he, an wene yi yokhisak. Yabokane Allah nen initema waganogo wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem, akhuni inane we yugunat egarek meke iti hasik wene inoba 'bisageinat o.
40012037	Hit hinekaerek hinane egethep meke mothogonat Allah nen wene hinoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasiginat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40012038	Itithogon isikhemo nen, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke aperek inom, it ap Farisi meke aperek inom, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Noe. Nit nen hutdaguok nen, hat nen elalin meke ageikhe hagakhunem ninileken hau warlok iluk yokhekho, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40012039	at Yesus nen, “Hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yoma re, hinobabut weak anek hagarik nekhe dogolik, Allah hinom dopokhogon dogou'buk yoma re! Itithogon dogolik, hit nen, Nit nen hutdaguok nen, hat nen elalin meke ageikhe hagasin he, iluk yoknekhe lagap mekeat he, an nen elalin ninat meke ageikhe hagasigin motok dek o. At Yunus Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke nen akhuni aperek hutduagaluk elalinat hagakhikhe iti hak anek, an nen yabokane ageikhe hagakhunem hinileken neagun o.
40012040	At Yunus iti ikan kok elabut akla werek korlek, o hi ageik, wi ageik, hagakhe korlek iki henagan welageikhe o. Iti hakeneat, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, agat akla o hi ageik, wi ageik, hagakhe korlek, niki henaganat dogogin o.
40012041	At Yunus iti nen it akhuni o Niniwe meke etoma Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhemo, inobabut hebelatluk, yi weak ti weak hagakhe lagoukha meke here'isasukha o. Meke re, at Yunus iti etaga dek negen. At ageikhe yoma werek yi anek, kogat etnogo nen, o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen akhuni ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem, akhuni o Niniwe meke etoma inebe melatluk, hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yi men yokhisagun, Hit weak, hinekarli, iluk yokhisagun o.
40012042	Haganeat at he kok etagapogot ai o i aputmo wema eloma walegat etoma nen at ap Salomo iti akla kagalek motok dogolik hagakhe lageikhe meke asuk holigiluk wageikhe. Meke re, at Salomo iti erlok dek negen. Meke re, ageikhe yoma werek yi anek he, motok kogatma, yabokane o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen akhuni ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem at he kok iti ebe melatluk nen, hit o yogotak welagap meke yi nen yokhisagein, Hit weak, hinekarli, iluk yokhisagein, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40012043	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Mokat obabut weak meke iti akhuni inakla nen dukhekherethek nen, An nai komake dogeik nen lak he, iluk thet walogo dogosak oba obolukmo herarik, i motok dekma etoma nekherek nekherek, herakherek motok dek o.
40012044	Motok dek nen he, at nen men ekherek, An naila alebageik welagagimo meke etnogo napuke lalok uki ligin o, iluk wagarek. Wagarethek ukekherek, o etnogo inebe dek, o 'bon mekeat he, amumul ula'iluk motok karelek werekma 'bikha agarethek nen,
40012045	yabokane apuke dukhi lagarethek nen, mokat aperek inobabut at obabut hakene dek. At he, inobabut motok weak meke inebe 7 nen, inayoko 'bi lagarethek nen, wogosik o etnogo uki agarethek nen, ap iti akla ukegarethek nen welageikharek o. Itithogon ukiluk werekma, ap iti alebageik, obabut hano negen welageikhe mekeat he, yabokane obabut motok weagat hagatlagarek. Iti hak, hit akhuni o yogotak ya hinobabut motok weak hagakhe lagap meke yi, itithogonat hagasugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40012046	At Yesus akhuni doalegat inom dogolik wene yogeisekho werekma, at agosa inom, agarumi inom, wene yogosuogoluk oba wagoukhasik nen, okutlu welagoukha.
40012047	Werekma, ap ageikhe nen, “Yesus, lakhan! Hat hagosa men, hagarumi men, wene yokhisuogoluk herakhabik wageikhasik okutlu werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40012048	at Yesus nen he, “An nagosa nagarumi iti thani nogo? ” iluk yogokhikhesik,
40012049	it ap agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo iki sisik inoba ’bisikhesik nen, “An nagosa nagarumi, it yiat o.
40012050	Tha nen an nopase pogot oba meke akla apekherek meke mothogon hagakherek halok, at iti an nagot, neru, nagosa werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40013001	O itinem he, at Yesus aila nen dukhi ageikhesik, i Galilea yekelek etnogo aik oba hurek werekma,
40013002	akhuni motok doalegat Yesus oba wagoukhama, it inebe i aik oba metek werek korlek ’bisalok, at ebe ku baga hureklasi ukisikhe.
40013003	Hureklasi ukisikhesik, yi meke ti meke baga likhigik wene doalegat yogeisekhe lageikhe. Ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe ai hilogo la’ekherek meke ai hilogo la’igiluk dukhisikhe.
40013004	Dukhisikhesik ai hilogo la’ilik lagunem, ai aperek holagarlem usa’iluk lageikhe. Usa’isinem thue wageikhesik tha'bokhogonat haumhogo nasikhe.
40013005	Nen, ai aperek helekit oba usa’isikhe meke, agat apum dekma nogo nen, aku ibat hurlelhikhe.
40013006	Mekeat he, o mo wageikhemo, omaken yakhidek nen, tha’bet ageikhesik puk ageikhe.
40013007	Nen ai aperek, oka arlok weakma usa’isikhe meke re, oka arlok iti meke kok aga dogolik, ai hano meke yago etnogo akurladap ageikhesik nen, keken ageikhe.
40013008	Nen, ai aperek he, agat mirlimo usa’isikhe meke, hanoat aku hurlelhikhesik nen, erlo kok ageikhesik eken doalegat ikhikhe. Erlo ageikhe eken 100 oba ikhikhe. Erlo ageikhe eken 60 baga ikhikhe. Nen, erlo ageikhe eken 30 baga ikhikhe.
40013009	Hit hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogon holini o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013010	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhemo at agarumi at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Hat nen akhuni yoma wene yi baga likhik, ti baga likhik, yogeisegen iti nenaluk, ” ilukyogokhukhama,
40013011	at Yesus nen, “Nopase pogot oba apma 'bisekherek wene iti, at akla limago welageikhe meke, hit anek hinilu asubageik nen iluk, akla pakhogon yokhisausak apasikhe mekeat he, it akhuni aperek iti anekpakhogon yogeisausak dek Gandum eken meke tamelogo roti akla nen apasikhe.
40013012	Tha nen ikimo hago werekmeke iti, Allah nen yabokane oba lapelogo wogosumo, at ikimo doalegat hago dogogin o. Nen, tha nen ikimo hago dek halok he, pererlagat anek dogogin meke iti, Allah nen apuke tilogo horlaumo, motok dek asigin o.
40013013	Itithogon hagasigin iti nen, an wene oba lisogon it iti yogeisigi o. It akhuni iti, inileken hiliogei mekeat he, hutukhogon higidek o. Nen, inasuk holiogei mekeat he, hutukhogon hutdiliogei degat.
40013014	It akhuni inobabut itigirlik meke iti inobasik he, at Yesaya nen men isikhe, Inasuk holek dogogun meke re, hutukhogon hutdekhe dogogun degat o. Nen, inileken 'birogo dogogun mekeat he, hutukhogon hekhe dogogun degat o.
40013015	It akhuni yi inileken higik, inasuk holhik, inakla ebekhik, hagatluk nen, inobabut hebelasumo yabokane an nen hanorinabunogo iluk, it nen inakla puk ageik, inasuk dogou-dogou hagakhik, inileken puk uagaluk, ineram nenat puk-puk hagakhik, hagakhukha o,\rq (Yesaya 6:9-10)\rq* iluk Allah nen isikhemo Yesaya nen holal waganogo ’bisikhe iti tak-tagat asuagaluk yogeisekhe lagei o.
40013016	Mekeat he, hit anek he, hinileken higik, hinasuk holhik, hagakherethepma iti nen, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogoni o.
40013017	Hit hinileken hekhe lagap meke iti, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inom, inobabut mot meke inom, inebe doalegat nen, Eiye! Ninileken helo e, ekhe lagoukha mekeat he, inileken higidegat welagoukha. Nen, hinasuk holhe lagap meke iti, it iti nen, Ninasuk holilo e, ekhe lagoukha mekeat he, inasuk holhidegat welagoukha, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013018	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene ap ageikhe ai hilik lageikhe, iluk oba lisogon yokhisigi etnogo, ebe erlo yokhisagein yi hutdini o.
40013019	Ai hilik aperek holagarlem usa'isikhe iti ebe it akhuni aperek Allah apma 'bisekherek wene iti inasuk holharethegat, ebe hutukhogo hutdigidek halok, at obabut weak meke etnogo wagarethek nen, wene inetaikenma ai yago meke iti henogo horlalok lagarek itiat o.
40013020	Nen, ai hilik ageikhe helekit oba usa'isikhe iti ebe, it akhuni aperek Allah ane iti inasuk holharethek nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogolik ibat waganharethek nenat,
40013021	wene iti inetaikenma omaken yakhidek nenat, iniki pererlagat welageikharethek nen, akhuni aperek nen Allah ane iti hasik yi aik ti aik inoba ’bigik, weagarinakhik, hagakhunem, inakla ibat puk ageikharethek nen, wene iti here’isalok dukhegarek itiat o.
40013022	Nen, ai hilik ageikhe okama arlok weakma usa’isikhe meke iti ebe, it akhuni aperek Allah ane iti inasuk holharethek nenat he, inakla nen, Yogotak ya hasik nikithogon hagasigin he, iluk, wene munini ebekhik, Nameke doalegat negen dogolep e, iluk inakla ebekhe dogolik, inekaerek nen nukhetdakhigik, hagakharek iti nen, wene iti erlo keken atluk nen, eken ikherek dek itiat o.
40013023	Nen, ai agat hanoma hilogo la’isikhe meke iti ebe, it akhuni aperek Allah ane iti inasuk hanorogon holharethek nen, ebe hutukhogon hutdakhugunem, wene iti eken ikheregat o. Erlo ageikhe nen eken 100 ikhik, erlo ageikhe nen eken 60 ikhik, erlo ageikhe nen eken 30 ikhik, ikherek itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013024	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke nen apma 'bisekherekma iti ebe ap ageikhe ayabula ai hano meke yakhikhe iti hakeneat o.
40013025	Ai yakhikhe mekeat, it akhuni noge ekhe korlek, at ap ageikhe ap ai yakhikhe meke iti ipisak weak meke wageikhesik nen, gandum ai hano meke yakhikhe etnogo aklake ai weak meke ya'iluk lageikhe.
40013026	Itithogon ya'iluk lageikhemo, gandum ai yago etnogo aku hurlelogo dukhisikhesik nen, eken ikhe korlek, weak meke ai yago etnogo aku hurlelogo eka winamat ageikhe.
40013027	Winam ageikhemo, at atuaneke meke emenogo nen, at ayabu iteerek meke etnogo oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, Nopase! Hat hayabula etoma ai hano meke yakhen apigi. E a? Oka weak meke etoma koma nen wagasik aku dukhekhe? iluk yogokhukhama,
40013028	at nen he, Dek o. Iti, at ap nipisak weak meke etnogo nen yakhemo higi o, iluk yogeisasikhemo, it atuaneke meke emenogo nen, Halok he, henogo opakimo 'biluk ula'isa lausak apegen a? iluk yogokhukhama
40013029	at nen he, Dek o. Oka weak meke iti henukhunem nen, gandum hano meke ai etoma inomat henesunogo nen, henesi lagup o.
40013030	Gandum eken aban palhidekma inom itithogon thabakhogon dageikhe dogoak o. Nen, eken horle aga halok he, an nen it ap eken palharek meke yogeisekhe dogolik, Eka weak meke iti hetu hundisauwok nen he, iti meke tak henogo herle wakhik, nen, gandum eken hano meke iti natogorlogo 'bekherekma etoma 'bigik, 'bini o, iluk yogeisagein, iluk atuaneke meke emenogo yogeisasikhe, ” iluk Yesus nen yogeisasikhe.
40013031	-
40013032	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik yabokane wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “At kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherek iti ebe re, ki'bi-ki'bi ai hakene o. Ap ageikhe nen ki'bi-ki'bi ayabumo hilik la'isikhe. Yi meke ti meke ai iti herlekha'bugat mekeat he, ki'bi-ki'bi ai iti anek motok herlekha'bugat o. Meke re, ki'bi, witat men, ageikhe meke men, aku dukhekherethek nen, oak herlekha'bugat negen dageikharek. Mekeat he, ki'bi-ki'bi ai iti anek motok kogat dageikherethek, o hakene hagatlagunem, thue hitluk nekherek meke witluk nen, ki'bi-ki'bi iti ikilo'bak obake ai hali agarek iti hakeneat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013033	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke nen apma 'bisekherek ebe re, eken roti akla usa'isinem hikherek iti hakeneat o. He ageikhe nen gandum tamelek tepung wul hakene meke 40 kilo walhalok waganhikhesik, eken roti hisuagaluk akla usa'iluk abel dagalogo hagakhikhemo ebe tha'bokhogonat motok hikhikhe iti hakeneat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013034	At Yesus nen akhuni doalegat emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, wene ageikhe pakhogon yogeisekhe lageikhe dek. Oba lisogon anek yogeisekhe lageikhe.
40013035	Itithogon hagakhe lageikhe iti ap ageikhe Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke nen ekhe dogolik, “An wene yogeisekhe dogolik, oba lisogon anek yogeisekhe dogogin o. Allah nen agat yi walhasikhe hurli baga nen wene limago motok welageikhe meke pakhogon yogeisagein o, ”\rq (Mazmur 78:2)\rq* iluk isikhe iti tak-tak asuagaluk, Yesus nen itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhe iti.
40013036	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, akhuni doalegat emenogo etoma werek korlek, at Yesus ebe uma ukisikhemo, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba ukisukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Wene, oka weak meke wen oba nen dukhisikhe meke oba lisogon yakulnisegen etnogo ebe pilinerogo yoknisan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40013037	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Ap ageikhe nen ai hano meke yakhikhe igi etnogo ebe re, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nebe yiat o.
40013038	Nen, wen iti ebe re, o agat oba yoma yi ai ti ai tha'bokhogonat o. Nen, ai hano meke ebe re, akhuni Allah apma welageikharek inebe itiat o. Nen, ai weak meke iti ebe re, at obabut motok weak meke a'buri itiat o.
40013039	At ap wen iteerek ipisak motok weak dogolik, ai weak meke yakhikhe iti ebe re, at Iblis itiat o. Eken palusak tak-tak iti ebe re, o ilugun oba hasigat o. Nen, it ap eken palharek meke ebe re, it malaikat Allah pogot oba nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke itiat o.
40013040	Nen, it akhuni nen oka weak meke natogorlogo 'biluk hetu hunharek iti hak, o ilugun oba itithogonat hagasigin o.
40013041	An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nen nagarumi malaikat yoko la'isa agunem, it nen Allah apma 'bisekherekma etoma nen, yi meke ti meke akhuni nen weak hagasuagaluk inakla kagalharek meke inom, yi akhuni ti akhuni weak hagakharek meke inom, natogorlogo 'bisalok
40013042	tha'bokhogonat hetumo la'isaumo inaik kirlidik mak-mak hagakhe dogolik, di ago de ago motok dogogun o.
40013043	Nen, it Allah akla apekherek meke mothogon hagakharek meke iti anek he, inebe o mo liarogo yakherek hak, inopase Allah apma dogogun o, iluk hinasuk holusak halok, hanorogo holini o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013044	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke apma ’bisekherek iti ebe re, men hakene. Hano meke oko kogat meke wen oba agat akla thalek limago werekma, ap ageikhe nen herakhasikhesik akla arleken akhalok apuke agat thalogo lima’iluk aila lalok, ameke yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat it aperek inoba oko waganiluk nen, hano meke iti horlagaluk apuke wageikhesik wen iti oko ’bisikhe iti hakeneat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013045	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke nen apma ’bisekherek itiebe re, men hakene. Ap ageikhe yi meke ti meke oko palherek meke nen yerageken hakene mutiara hano meke herarik nekhe dogolik
40013046	ebe oko kogat meke ageikhe hea’iluk nen, aila lageikhesik ameke yi meke ti meke oko it aperek inoba waganhikhesik, yabokane mutiara hano meke iti waganhikhe iti hakeneat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013047	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke nen apma ’bisekherek itiebe men hakene. Ikan waganuogoluk su yoge su baga i kok laut iti yekelekma akla usa’isinem yi ikan ti ikan ukuloak etaga tomok akla ukhat laga halok,
40013048	su yoge su iti akla apem hethokhogon agunem, i aik oba dukhitluk hurek dogolik, ikan hano meke halok hulogo isoakla ukharlekhe dogolik, weak meke halok po la’isegarek iti hak,
40013049	o ilugun hurli baga itithogonat hagatlasigin o. It malaikat Allah nen pogot oba nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo witluk nen, akhuni inobabut weak meke emenogo it akhuni Allah akla apekherek meke mothogon anek hagakharek meke inom opakimo werekma, inaklake nen lisogo ula'isalok,
40013050	hetu aikmo la'isaumo inaik kirlidik mak-mak hagakhe dogolik di ago de ago motok dogogun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013051	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene iti arat hutdegep a? Dek a, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen he, “I o. Hutdogoat o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40013052	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Halok he, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo nen, nopase kok pogot oba meke nen apma 'bisekherek etnogo wene yakulho halok he, iti men hakene usak. Ap kok meke ameke etaiken hunik meke 'bakhekherekma nen, ket meke inom, haganeat meke inom, eran-alep waganiluk ula'i agarek hagat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013053	At Yesus nen wene oba lisogon arat yogeisalok nen, o etoma here'iluk dukhi ageikhesik
40013054	at ekaerek aila erloma lageikhesik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukiluk wene yakulisugunem, it akhuni inasuk holhukha meke nen, men isukha, “Eiye! Nayuk e. Ap yi akla motok kagalek iti, wene ka nen yakulhesik waga. Nen, yi meke ti meke elalinat hagarik liliogo iti, koma nen yakulhesik hagarik liliogo.
40013055	Ap yi, ap o halherek meke etnogo a'but dek? Nen, agosa etaga Maria etnogo dek? Nen, agarumi oporlik meke, Yakobus inom, Yusuf inom, Simon inom, Yudas inom, emenogo dek?
40013056	Nen, at erugi, nit ninom tha'bokhogonat welago yoma dek? Wene iti ka nen wolok wagasik iliogo, ” iluk inakla nenmeanetdisukha.
40013057	Meanetdiluk kolelogo thogotdisukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “It ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke iti, o yi ai ti ai lagunem, akhuni aperek nen motok inalon halinakharek mekeat he, inekaerek inaila erloma lagunem inougi inagarumi inom opakimo welageikharek meke nen anek inalon halinakharek dek yoma re! ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40013058	Itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, it akhuni Nazaret meke etoma nen, inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdigidek, inakla meanetdiluk welagoukha iti nen, at o etoma dogolik hagasusak dek meke elalinat kokhogon hagakhidek herlekha'bugat anek hagakhikhe iti.
40014001	O eta baga, at Herodes o Galilea eloke kok etagapogot welageikhe meke iti, Yesus nen hagakhe lageikhe meke asuk holhikhesik nen,
40014002	at agarumi men yogeisasikhe, “Yohanes ima usa'isekhe lageikhe meke ebe wakhima watlaga etnogo yabokane iluk agasik iti nen, hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagarik liliogo iti higi, ” iluk ebe Yesus hagakhe lageikhe mekeat isikhe iti.
40014003	At kok Herodes nen agot Filipus age he Herodias iti tilogo waganhikhe iti baga Yohanes iki herle warogo iniki herle warogo 'bisegarekma kola'isikhe.
40014004	Kola'isikhe iti, alebageik at Yohanes nen Herodes etnogo yogokhe dogolik, “He waganusak dekmaat waganhetikmo iti, hipisak dogosak erlok dek o, ”
40014005	iluk yogokhikhemo, at Herodes nenYohanes iti wasigin iluk akla apasikhemo it akhuni aperek nen, “Yohanes iti Allah ane yogeisekherek meke, ” iluk ekhe lagoukhama, wasusak ayuk ageikhe.
40014006	Mekeat he, o at kok Herodes iti ebe itaklageikhe baga tak-tak asi ageikhemo nen, pesta hagakhe dogolik, at he Herodias eak tharlisik meke iti, akhuni doalegat inelokhoma nen etai uak sa'bik sa'bok wakhunem, at kok Herodes iti akla arleken akhasikhe.
40014007	Akla arleken akhasikhesik Allah etaga hupuk palogo, horlak etnogo yogokhe dogolik, “Hat nen nena meke kino yoknekhen halok he, wokhesiginat o. Halok he, ageikhe kino yoknom o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40014008	Itithogon yogokhikhemo horlak iti agosa nen asuk arat wakhikhesikmo nogo nen he, men yogokhikhe, “Nopase, at Yohanes ima usa'inakherek meke etnogo ukuloak palogo, piring thabia oba temerogo woknetnok o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40014009	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at kok Herodes etnogo akla weak ageikhe meke re, Allah etaga hupuk palhunem akhuni doalegat pesta isago nuogoluk natogorli agoukha meke emenogo arat inasuk holhukhasikmo iluk, agarumi nen horlak etnogo nen isikhe tak-tagat hagarogo wogosi loagaluk yogeisasikhe.
40014010	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo lagoukhasik nen, Yohanes etnogo akhuni iniki herle warogo 'bisegarekma werekma ukisikhesik nen, arlokop ade 'bogokhogon wakhukha.
40014011	Arlokop ade 'bogokhogon warogo, ukuloak palek piring thabia baga temerogo wolok wageikhemo horlak tharlisik etnogo wogokhikhe. Wogokhikhemo, horlak etnogo nen, agosa wogosi lageikhe.
40014012	Itithogon hagakhukhama, at Yohanes agarumi wagoukhasik nen, ebe warek etnogo agatma thaldiluk nen, Yesus yogosi lagoukha. Itithogon hagakhukhasik dogolik, at Herodes nen Yesus abok holhikhesik, “Yohanes iluk agasik hagariogo higi, ” iluk isikhe iti.
40014013	Akhuni aperek nen, “Herodes nen Yohanes wakhe, ” iluk isukhama, Yesus asuk holhikhesik nen, o etoma thogotdiluk, imake ku warogo arligat tekhogon o akhuni inaren dekma etoma lageikhemo, akhuni inebe motok doalegat inasuk holiluk, inaila ukul dopok nen i aik obake nen oporlik lagoukha.
40014014	It alebageik lagoukhasik werekma, at Yesus imake ku warogo laga lageikhesik, ku akla nen inoba dukhisikhesik, akhuni doalegat emenogo ileken lageisalok akmurinabiluk nen, it u warek meke emenogo hano hagarinakhikhe.
40014015	Itithogon u hano hagarinakhe korlek, o arat liok isikhemo nen, at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo Yesus oba wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Nit o yoma akhuni inaren dekma werekma, o arat liok ekhe yoma, akhuni doalegat yoma inapiri inekaerek oko paloak nen he, o yoma aliluke o ukul 'bugurlagatmake la’isan o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40014016	at Yesus nen, “It yoma nen lausak dek o. Inapiri nausak meke hit nenat melageisani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40014017	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Nit he, hipiri roti meke 5. Nen, ikan he, pere. Eta anek hago welago o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40014018	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen he, “Etaat woknisitni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40014019	Yogeisasikhemo, wogosi agoukhama, at Yesus nen akhuni doalegat emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Pipuk ekamake ethoma hureklarik lani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo hureklarik lagoukhama nen, roti 5 eranogo inom, ikan pere eranogo inom, ikimo waganhikhesik nen, ileken pogot oba liakhasikhesik, Allah heagei warogo nen, roti kusogo agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen supurisoagalukwogeisasikhemo it nen supurisasukha.
40014020	Supurisasukhama, it inebe tha'bokhogonat hipiri ina'ithogon nasukhasik titurogon, mul yago 12 oba apem hethokhogon ukharlogo 'bisukha.
40014021	Akhuni inebe tha'bokhogonat nasukha meke iti, yekerugi inom, humi inom, iniki wenageinakhidek. Ap inarluetek anek he, inebe 5. 000 meke wenageinakhukha.
40014022	Itithogon arat nasukhama nen, at Yesus nen at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An akhuni doalegat yoma la'isak nen, hit tak ku akla ukiluk i aik ilibaganke italhe dogoni o, ” iluk ane obatnerogon yogeisasikhe.
40014023	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo nen, itali aga korlek, at Yesus nen akhuni emenogo inailake tomok la'isasikhesik nen, at arligat anek tom oba sembayan igiluk dageisikhesik werekma o hi ageikhemo, arligat etoma welageikhe.
40014024	Werek korlek, agarumi emenogo imake ku warogo walegat i tumo heisogon asi wagoukhasikmo, hisakne obatnerogon inelokhomake nen hubetha ageikhemo, i hoklabu apigat hulalogo-dekalogo waga dogolik, ku etnogo abel dekak-hekakhogon hagakhe lageikhe.
40014025	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, o wik-wik jam 3 hakene a, jam 6 hakene a, at Yesus inoba wisigiluk, i agoum obake isok 'bilik wageikhe.
40014026	Itithogon isok i agoum obake 'bilik wagunem, it agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inileken lakhasukhasik nen, inakmaken lagoukhasik, inayuk nen, “Eiye! Mokat waga ithi, ” iluk, inane naik-waik isukha.
40014027	Itithogon isukhama, at Yesus nen he, “Hinagot akma. Nagarumi. An nebeat waga lagei. Halok he, hinayuk agup o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40014028	At Petrus nen he, “Noe. Hat hebeat halok he, an hoba i agoum obake wisik nen he, Eme o, iluk yoknom, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
40014029	at Yesus nen, “Eme o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Petrus etnogo ku akla nen dukhisikhesik nen, i agoum obake Yesus oba lageikhe.
40014030	Lagunem nen, hisakne obatnerogon hubetha ageikhemo, ileken halok ayuk ageikhesik, ima na'bukhogon usagein thalekma, ane naik ekhe dogolik, “Eiye! Noe! Tilnabi me o, ” isinem eranogoat,
40014031	Yesus nen iki hago meldekhe dogolik, “Hat hetaiken noba hakotdigidek, hetaiken pere welaganma iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogokhikhesik,
40014032	it ipisak ku akla ukisukha hak, hisakne etnogo dek ageikhe.
40014033	Dek ageikhemo, it ku akla welagoukha meke emenogo nen Yesus hogorakhe dogolik, “Hat eberogonat Allah a'but heogo o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40014034	Itithogon hagatluk, etoma nen ku warogo itali aga lagoukhasik nen, o Genesaret eta mot-mot asi agoukha.
40014035	Wagunem nen, it akhuni etoma meke nen Yesus ebe arat hutdisukhasik nen, at abok o ukul dopok yogeisilik lagoukha. Yogeisilik lagoukhama, akhuni u warek meke tha'bokhogonat wogosik Yesus oba wagoukhma,
40014036	it nen Yesus asu ilugun anek iniki hakhauwogoluk kino iluk asu etnogo iniki hakhasukha meke inoba hano agoukha.
40015001	Itithogon hagakho werekma, it ap Farisi meke aperek inom, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke aperek inom, o Yerusalem nen Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, wene yigithogon yogokhukha,
40015002	“It ap hat hagarumi hane waganiogei meke yoma nen, ninopa lak hagakhe lagoukha tak-tagat hagakhidek thagalogo thogotdisalok iniki bagake hokhidek hipiri niliogei iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40015003	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen he, “Halok he, hit meneke, Allah nen, Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk ninasuk wakhikhe wene thagalogo thogotdiluk, hinopa lak hagakhe lagoukha tak-tagat hagakhe lagap iti nenaluk.
40015004	At Allah nen ekhe dogolik, Hinagosa hinopase inalon halinakhe dogono o,\rq (Keluaran 20:12; 21:17; Ulangan 5:16)\rq* iluk isikhesik, ageikhe men isikhe, Tha nen agosa opase abok weak palhe halok he, at iti ebe motok wasusak o,\rq (Keluaran 21:17; Imamat 20:9)\rq*
40015005	iluk ninasuk wakhikhe mekeat he, hit nen, men yogeisekhe lagap, Tha nen opase he a, agosa he a, yogokhe dogolik, An meke yi meke ti meke hat wokhesusak mekeat he, Allah hasik 'bisigirikmo o, iluk yogeisekhe dogoagaluk yakulisekhe lagap iti.
40015006	Itithogon yakulisekhe lagap iti nen, it itithogon hagakhunem, it inopase inagosa lak inalon halinabiogei dek iti o. Itithogon hagakhe lagap iti baga, hit hinopa lak hagakhe lagoukha wene iti hago dogolik, Allah ane thagalogo thogotdekhe lagap iti.
40015007	Hit hinoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik hinetaiken pere yi re! At Yesaya nen Allah ane yogeisekhe dogolik wene men isikhe iti, hit hinobasik mothogon isikhe higi,
40015008	Allah nen, It akhuni yoma, inape baga nen an hogotnakhe dogolik, inetaiken noba ebekhidek werlekma ebesi liliogei.
40015009	Wene akhuni inane mekeat he, an nen isigi meke negen yakulisiliogei iti nen he, we yugunat hogotnabiogei o,\rq (Yesaya 29:13)\rq* iluk isikhemo, Yesaya nen holal waganogo 'bisikhemo werek iti, hit hinobasigat isikhe o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40015010	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane at Yesus nen akhuni doalegat emenogo waisasikhemo wagoukhama, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
40015011	“Wene igin yi hit hutdubageik nen, hinasuk hanorogo holini o. Yi meke ti meke inapema kola'egarek iti nen inebe weagarinakherek dek o. Meke re, inape baga nen wene egarek iti bagaat weagarinakherek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40015012	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Wene yoknisegen etnogo, it ap Farisi meke nen inasuk holhasik nen, ua palha iluk, hat nen ekagat hutdisegen a? Dek a, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40015013	Itithogon yogokhukhama at Yesus nen, “Yi oka ti oka an nopase pogot oba meke nen ai yakhidek meke halok he, motok henogo la'isageinat o.
40015014	Inileken puk dogoligat he, holak lirisiliogei iti thogotdisani o. At ageikhe ileken puk meke nen, at ageikhe itithogon ileken puk meke yogokhe dogolik, Holak yike lu! iluk iki hago wolok ligin halok he, ipisagat hurlugu karluk waganekma usagun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40015015	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at Petrus nen he, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Wene oba lisogon yoknisegen iti ebe pakhogon yoknisan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40015016	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Hit meneke re, it hinom tak-tagat wene iti aban hutdigidek welagap a?
40015017	Yi meke ti meke nasinem nen, inapemake nen, piokthek inelabutla usalok nen, yabokane inamiso usi lageikharek etnogo hinokodek a?
40015018	Meke re, wene inape baga nen dukhekherek iti re, inetaikenma nen kagalogo dagei agarek iti nenat inebe weagarinakherek o.
40015019	Inetaikenma nen weak meke ebekhik, akhuni inakhik, humi ap inagugi meke param ha'isigik, homagarlugi yugunat hagarinakhik, iniki abusak waganhik, it akhuni aperek inoba inekalat wene 'bisigik, inabok wiik-weak palhik, hagakharek iti inetaikenma nenat kagalogo dagei agunem dukhi agarek o.
40015020	Wene inetaikenma nen kagalogo dagei agarek iti nen inebe weagarinakherek. Meke re, iniki baga hokhidek hipiri nekarek iti baga weagarinakherek dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40015021	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, o etoma thogotdiluk o Tirus Sidon etoma dagei ageikhe.
40015022	Dagei agunem, he ageikhe o Kanaan etoma aierek meke Yesus oba wageikhesik ane kokhogon men yogokhikhe, “Daud nen itago meke noe. An neak horlak meke mokat obabut weak meke akla ukekhesik weak werek. Halok he, hakmu nean o, ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he,
40015023	at Yesus nen oko motok yogokhidek huk ageikhemo, it ap at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo wagoukhasik nen, “He yi ninoporlik waga dogolik ane motok apik ninoba wiriogo yi re, werlekma horla loak nen la'isan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40015024	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen, It ap Israel meke inebe re, domba nalageikharek iti hak werek iti nen, it anek 'birisa lan, iluk la'ani agama o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40015025	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo werek korlek, at he etnogo Yesus oba wageikhesik nen, itibagal yukukhogon heagei wakhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Eiye! Noe. Hano hagatnetnok o, ” iluk ane a'buarek ane yogokhikhemo,
40015026	at Yesus nen he, “Yekerugi inapiri tilogo, yeke noagaluk po lagasumo erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40015027	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at he etnogo nen, “I, noe. Eberogonat egen mekeat he, at ayeke iteerek iti hipiri o meja perlago baga nukunem, eken pilikhogon agat oba usekhe halok he, yeke iti nen nekeregat o, ” yogokhikhe.
40015028	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “He yi neru o. Hat nen, At nen hagasigin, iluk hetaiken noba motok hakotdegen iti nen, hakla apegen iti tak-tagat hagathisigin o, ” iluk isi korlek eranogoat, eak etnogo hano ageikhe.
40015029	Yesus nen itithogon hagatluk, o etoma nen usasikhesik, i Galilea yekelek etnogo aik obake laga lageikhesik nen, tom oba dageisikhesik etoma hurek lageikhe.
40015030	Hurek lageikhesik werekma, it akhuni initibagal weak meke inom, inileken puk meke inom, iniki inisok ut warek meke inom, inane dek meke inom, inebe motok doalegat inom, wogosik Yesus oba 'bi agoukhama, at nen motok hano hagarinakhikhe.
40015031	Itithogon hagarinakhikhemo, it akhuni emenogo inane dek meke inane huak igik, iniki inisok lapelek meke hano ageik, inisok ut warek meke hano atluk holak lageik, inileken puk meke hano atluk lageisigik, hagakhunem inileken hasukhasik nen, “Eiye! Nit akhuni Israel meke ninopase Allah nayuk e, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
40015032	Itithogon hogorakhukhama, at Yesus nen at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo waisasikhe. Waisasikhemo wagoukhama nen, at nen he, “Nagarumi. It akhuni doalegat yoma ninom motok dogolik niniki henagan oba noge ogosikmo nogo nen, inapiri motok dek agama, nena meke nugun heat werek iti nen, nakmu lak nen nakla weak aga. Hipiri motok nikidekma iti nen he, holagarlem lagunem ya kuak ta kuak launogo iluk, an nen la'isausak na'it hakene, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40015033	at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “O limo akhuni inai ukul motok dekma yoma akhuni doalegat natogorlek yoma hipiri ina'ithogon noagaluk, ebe koma meke erlok nausak? ” iluk yogokhukha.
40015034	Itithogon yogokhukhama at Yesus nen he, “Hit hipiri roti werago meke meren hago welagap, ” iluk hinok waganhikhemo, it nen, “Ebe 7 werek. Nen ikan herlekha'buktek pere anek werek o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40015035	Itithogon yogokhukhama at nen, akhuni doalegat natogorlek welagoukha meke emenogo agat oba hurek lasuagaluk yogeisasikhe.
40015036	Yogeisasikhesik nen, hipiri roti meke 7 baga eranogo inom, ikan eranogo inom, ikimo waganhikhesik nen, Allah heagei warogo, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen supurisoagaluk, kusogo wogeisasikhemo, it nen supurisasukha.
40015037	Supurisasukhama hipiri ina'ithogon nasukhasik nen, titurogon 'bisukhama, mul yago 7 baga apem hethokhogon ukharlogo 'bisukha.
40015038	Nen, it hipiri nasukha iti, humi yekerugi inom iniki wenageinakhidek. It ap inarluetek anek he, inebe 4. 000 wenageinakhukha.
40015039	Nen, hipiri nasukhasik nen, at Yesus etnogo akhuni doalegat natogorlek emenogo inailake tomok la'isalok nen, at ebe ku akla ukiluk warogo imake o Magadan itali lageikhe.
40016001	Dukhi ageikhesik werekma, it ap Farisi meke inom, it ap Saduki meke inom, Yesus obabut paluogoluk oba wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Hat hebe hopase Allah pogot oba meke nen usa'agei agama wagan halok he, nit nen hutdaguok nen ninil oba elalin meke ageikhe hagasin ta, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40016002	Itithogon yogokhukhama at Yesus nen, [“O mo korok i lagunem, pogot oba mep thabuk ekhe halok, hit nen, O hibi asigin, egethep iti.
40016003	Nen hubenke hinileken lakhalok nen, pogot oba erlamuk werek halok, hit nen, Miso wisigin, iluk egethep apigi. Pogot elokhoken hinileken penakherethep nen, Itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk hinetaiken ekerlek dogolik, obabut ekagat palu hinilu mekeat he, yi meke ti meke o yogotak hagatlariogo iti, hit hinilu asuagaluk hagatlariogo mekeat he, hutdigidek welagap yoma re! ]
40016004	Hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yoma re, hinobabut motok weak hagarik nekhe dogolik, Allah hinom dopokhogon dogou'buk yoma re! Itithogon dogolik, hit nen, Nit nen hutdaguok nen, hat nen elalin meke ageikhe hagasin he, iluk yoknekhe lagap mekeat he, an nebe hutdanubageik iluk an nen elalin ninat meke ageikhe hagasigin motok dek o. At Yunus nen akhuni hutduagaluk elalinat hagakhikhe iti hak anek an nen yabokane ageikhe hagakhunem hinileken neagun o, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhesik, it ap emenogo etoma thogotdisalok, o werlekma lageikhe.
40016005	At Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom i yekelek etnogo aik ilibaganke arat italhukhasik nen, agarumi inileken 'bikhasukha meke, roti obarlikmatdiluk lagoukhama nen,
40016006	at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “It ap Farisi meke inom, ap Saduki meke inom, eken hipiri roti meke hisuagaluk aklake usakharek iti hakene meke hago werek iti baga weagathinabinogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40016007	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it-it wene ekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Roti etnogo ageikhe wolok wageidek iti nen ekhe higi, ” iluk isinem
40016008	at Yesus nen ekagat hutdisasikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinetaiken an noba aban hakotdigidek dogolik, Roti dek, iluk ekhe lagap iti nenaluk.
40016009	Hinetaiken hutukhogon hutdigidek yoma re! Roti ebe 5 mekeat he, ap inebe 5. 000 meke neka etnogo obarlikma aga? Itithogon nekasik titurogon 'begama, mul yago meke meren akla ukharlogo 'begep nogo.
40016010	Nen, ageikhe roti ebe 7 mekeat he, ap inebe 4. 000 meke supusogo wogeisegep etnogo nen, titurogon mul yago meren akla ukharlogo 'begep nogo? Hinakla hutdigidek welagap?
40016011	An nen roti hasik yokhisigidek mekeat he, iti nenaluk hutdigidek welagap? Eken roti hisuagaluk akla usakharek meke iti hakene, it ap Farisi meke inom, Saduki meke inom, hago werek iti nen hinobabut hebelogo dogobageik iluk yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40016012	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo hutdisukhasik nen, men isukha, “I. Wene ekhe iti, eken roti hikherek meke hasik yoknisekhe dek o. Iti re, it ap Farisi meke men, ap Saduki meke men, inawene yakulisegarek meke etnogo ninetaikenma ukisinogo iluk ninobabut hebelogo dogoagaluk yoknisekhe higi, ” iluk hutdisukha.
40016013	O etoma nen, at Yesus o ukul kok Kaisarea ap Filipi nen kogotdisikhe baga etoma dagei ageikhesik nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni nen, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo an nebe hasik ekhe dogolik, tha iluk iliogei nogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40016014	it nen he, men isukha, “It aperek nen, At ebe re, Yohanes ima usa'isekhe lageikhe meke etnogo igik, it aperek nen, At ebe Elia igik, it aperek nen he, At ebe Yeremia igik, it aperek nen he, at ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo ageikhe igik, iliogei, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40016015	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, ‘Tt nen itithogon iliogei mekeat he, hit anek he, an nebe hasik tha apekhe lagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
40016016	at Simon Petrus etnogo nen, “Hat hebe, Kristus Allah iluk motok welagarek meke a'but, nit tilninabuagaluk at nen la'isigin iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogoat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40016017	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen he, “Simon Yona a'but nagot o. Akhuni nen yokhekhama egen dek o. An nopase pogot oba meke nen yokhekhemo egen higi o. Halok he, hakla arleken akhekhe dogono o.
40016018	Nen, ageikhe inom yokhesik. Hat hetaga helekit u hak, Petrus o. Nen, helekit isa yi baga hipikhogon, an nagarumi natogorlogo 'bisalok o negen halogo 'bisigi halok he, at wema baga iteerek etnogo nen obatnerogo erlok degetdisagein dek o.
40016019	Nopase kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma ukegarek oba, kunci thu hualharek meke hat wokhesigin o. Hat nen, agat oba yoma meke hasik hagasusak dek iluk wene palhen halok he, pogot oba meke nen wene palhe hagat, igin o. Nen, hat nen agat oba yoma hagasusak hano iluk egen halok he, pogot oba meke nen hano ekhe hagat, igin o, ” iluk Petrus yogokhikhe.
40016020	Itithogon yogokhikhesik, at agarumi emenogo tha'bokhogonat men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen an nebe hasik he, At iti Kristus, Allah nen tilninabuagaluk la'isigin iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogoat o, iluk akhuni aperek motok yogeisugup o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe.
40016021	Hurli iti hurli nen, at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo at yabokane hagasigin meke pakhogon men yogeisasikhe, “An o Yerusalem eloma lausak welagei o. Laumo it ap inarluetek emenogo men, Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, inom nen, yi aik ti aik doalegat hagatnabiluk nebe nasugun o. Nasumo nen, niki pere nebe warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi nen, Allah nen nilugutnabigin o, ” iluk pakhogon yogeisasikhe.
40016022	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo at Petrus nen, Yesus wolok asokneat lageikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Hat wene egen iti hagathabinogo nen, Allah nen tilhabuak o, ” iluk asuk wakhikhe.
40016023	Asuk wakhikhemo, at Yesus elokhe dagakhogon Petrus men yogokhikhe, “Hat Iblis higi. Allah akla apekherek tak-tak ebekhidek, akhuni nen apegarek tak-tagat ebetdiluk nelokhe palhe lagan yi, nelokhoma yoma dogogun. Horla lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40016024	Itithogon yogokhikhesik, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “At tha nen an noporlik nekhe dogeigiluk halok he, obabut ekaerek hasik etaiken hunik dogolik hagakherek meke iti, Na'it, iluk thogotdiluk, o baga meldisalok inakharek meke iti ago mekeat wolok noporlik nekhe dogeigiluk wisuak o.
40016025	Nen, tha nen ekaerek nen, An nebe niluk dogosak warlok, iluk ebe irlirli horlagein halok he, watlatluk nuk akhagein o. Meke re, tha nen ebe irlirli horligidek an nobasik watlaga halok he, ebe irlirli horlagein o.
40016026	Tha nen yi meke ti meke agat oba meke tha'bokhogonat iteerek asigin mekeat he, yabokane ebe nuk asigin halok, at nen, An ageikhe erlok thaburogo 'bakhigi, usak nogo? Motok dek o. Ebe nuk asigin iti obolukmo, nena meke ipisak oko 'busak nogo. Erlok dek o.
40016027	An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo re, yabokane nopase hogorakho motok welageikharek iti hagat, hagatlatluk, it malaikat Allah nen pogot oba nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo ninom witluk nen, itinem, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobabut dopok hagakharek meke tak-tagat oko wogeisasigin o.
40016028	Nen, hit metek welagap yoma meke hinebe aperek watlageidek dogolik, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo kok Netagapogot dogeigiluk akhunitha'bokhogonat napma 'bisa agunem hinileken neagunat o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40017001	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, noge iniki 6 iluk nen, Petrus men, Yakobus men, agot Yohanes ipisak men, inarligat wogosik tom uan ageikhe baga dageisikhe.
40017002	Dageisikhesik werekma at ebe it iniloba, ninat hagatlaga dogolik, elokhoken o mulikin hakene hagatlageik, asu ugu meke kut motok a’bi'baleak hagatlageik, hagatlageikhe.
40017003	Itithogon hagatlagunem, at agarumi eranogo nen inileken lakhasukha meke, Musa men, Elia men, winam agoukhasik Yesus inom wenekak isinem inileken hisasukha.
40017004	Itithogon hisasukhasik, at Petrus nen Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Nit o yoma hano welago higi. Hat nen erlok apegen halok he, yoma orlisa henagan, hat hobasik ageikhe, Musa obasik ageikhe, Elia obasik ageikhe, halhisagein o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40017005	Itithogon yogokhunem eranogoat, oisa kut meke thebelinabi ageikhesik, Allah ane oisa etnogo akla nen men yogeisasikhe, “An na'but netaiken hunik meke noba hotok egerek ebe ithiat o. Halok he, at ane holek dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40017006	Yesus agarumi inom dageisukha meke emenogo inasuk holhukhasik, inayuk nen, initibagal yukukhogon inelokhe agatma thogoum iluk werekma
40017007	at Yesus inoba wageikhesik, inebe iki hageinakhe dogolik, “Hinayuk dekhogon melatni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40017008	inut oak leklarik inileken 'bikhasukha meke, it aperek inom dek. At Yesus arligat anek werekma hasukha.
40017009	Itithogon hagatluk, tom ukul oba etnogo nen usa'aga dogolik, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, nebe nakhunem watlatluk werekma, Allah nen nilugutnakhidek werek korlek, an hagatlagunem hinileken neegep etnogo akhuni aperek motok yogeisugup o. Yabokane Allah nen nilugutnakhe halok nen, yogeisausak o, ” iluk inasuk warik warik usageikhe.
40017010	Inasuk wakhikhemo, it agarumi emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Halok he, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo nen, Elia tak wisigin, iluk iliogei iti nikithogon nen, ” iluk hinok waganhukhama,
40017011	at nen men yogeisasikhe, “Elia tak witluk, at nen yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, karelisigin, iliogei iti, eberogonat mekeat,
40017012	an wene eberogonat yokhisak. At Elia ebe arat wageikhe mekeat he, it akhuni nen motok hutdigidek naldekhe dogolik, itithogon hagasu warlok nen, at ebe weagatdisukha hagat, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, nebe itithogon weagatnabugunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40017013	it agarumi emenogo nen men isukha, “Iti, at Yohanes ima usa'isekhe lageikhe meke etnogo hasik yoknisekhe o, ” iluk inakla hutdisukha.
40017014	Itithogon hutdiluk nen, akhuni doalegat emenogo inoba usa'agoukhama, ap ageikhe Yesus oba wageikhesik, at apma itibagal yukukhogon heagei wakhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe,
40017015	“Noe. An na'but yi hakmurasin o. Ilhurluk 'bekhe dogolik, ebe watlageik, iluk ageik, hagakhe dogolik, hibiku-yogokuat hetumo ukigik, ima lageik, hagakhe dogolik weak motok welagarek iti nen,
40017016	hat hagarumi hane waganiogei meke inoba wolok wagei mekeat he, it nen hagasusak erlok dek aga, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40017017	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yi, hinetaiken noba hakotdigidek dogolik nuk akhekhe lagap yoma re! An hit ninom niki meren oba dogogun nogo. Hit nen nakla pugurakhe korlek nobakhanini hapugutdiluk niki meren dogogin, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen, “Yekerek ithi an noba wolok witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
40017018	yekerek etnogo wolok wagoukhama mokat obabut weak meke akla ukiluk werekma Yesus nen wenagakhikhemo, dukhi lageikhemo eranogoat hano ageikhe.
40017019	Hano ageikhemo re, it Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukhasik inom inarligat dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Nit nen, at mokat obabut weak meke iti mukhogo ula'usak erlok dek iti nikithogon nen, ” iluk oba hinok waganhukhama,
40017020	-
40017021	at Yesus nen, “Hit hinetaiken hutukhogon noba hakotdekhe lagap dek iti nen o. Ki'bi-ki'bi ai motok 'bugurlaktek meke iti hak, hinetaiken an noba 'bugurlaktek anek hakotdiluk nen, torn ithi yogokhe dogolik, Ethoma nen higilogo werlekma etoma asi lan o, iluk yogosugun halok he, etoma nen werlekma etoma asi lausagat o. Hit nen yi meke ti meke hagasumo, ageikhe erlok dek ageidek hano anek asigin, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi. [Meke re, mokat obabut weak meke yi hakene inakla ukiluk werekma hipiri nikidek sembayan umo anek he, erlok mukhogo ula'usak o, ”] iluk yogeisasikhe.
40017022	Yabokane, at Yesus agarumi inom o Galilea etoma natogokhukhasik dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, ap nen yoko lalok it akhuni aperek iniki baga 'banumo,
40017023	nasugun o. Nasumo, nebe niki pere warek dogoluk, ageikhe baga nen he, Allah nen nilugutnabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, inakla motok weak arik lagoukha.
40017024	Itithogon hagatluk, o Kapernaum wagoukhama, it Allah ai halek hasik oko uang kino iluk waganhe lagoukha meke nen, at Petrus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Hinoe Allah ane yakulhisekherek meke iti nen Allah ai halek hasik oko uang ’begarek etnogo meke ageikhe ’bekherek a? Dek a, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40017025	at Petrus nen, “’Bekheregat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Yogeisalok uma ukisikhesik, at nen igidek werek korlek, Yesus nen tak men yogokhikhe, “Simon. Hat he, nikithogon apegen. It ap agat oba meke inetagapogot iti inobasik, akhuni thani nen uang ’biliogei. Inekaerek inagarumi nen 'biliogei apegen a? E a, at he, it ninat meke nen ’biliogei apegen a, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
40017026	at Petrus nen, “It ap ninat meke nen ’biliogei o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Halok he, it inekaerek inagarumi iti nen, ’busak dek higi.
40017027	Meke re, it nen ina’it nisaunogo nen, i yekelekma lalok ikan wakharek meke herle etnogo ima usa’isinem alebageik wasigin meke etnaga hikimo waganiluk ape lanethasinem, uang apema werekma higin o. Halok he, itiat waganogo hat hasik inom, an hasik inom, it ap iti wogeisano, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40018001	Itinem at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo at oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke apma ’bisekherekma etoma, kok etagapogot he, tha dogogin, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40018002	Itithogon yogokhukhama at nen yekerek 'bugurlagat meke ageikhe waikhikhemo oba wageikhemo nen, it emenogo inelokhoma meldekhe dogolik,
40018003	men yogeisasikhe, “Hit akhuni yi, hinobabut hebelatluk hinobabut yekerugi yi inobabut hakene hagatlasugun dek halok he, nopase kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma ukugun motok dek o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
40018004	At tha nen, An erlok dek meke, iluk obabut yekerek yi obabut hakene etaiken ekaerek nen thebetdakhalok thebekhogon dogogin halok he, at iti nopase pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma kok etaga werek dogogin o.
40018005	Nen, tha nen yekerek yi hakene an nobasik waganhe halok he, an nebeat woknabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40018006	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Tha nen yekerugi 'bugurlaktek yi hakene ageikhe etaiken an noba hakotdiluk werekma kolelogo here'anuagaluk akla kagaligin oba an kolelogo here'anhe halok, at akla kagalhe werek iti helekit kok meke arlokopma herle kilogo, i laut yekelekma turlem etoma po la'isaumo i lelepma re, hano o.
40018007	It akhuni agat oba meke yoma, it ageikhe nen an kolelogo here'anuagaluk inakla kagalumo motok weak asugun iti nen, eiye, nakmu lak o. An kolelogo here'anuagaluk inakla kagalhe dogogun mekeat he, it inakla kagalugun werek iti Allah nen motok weagarinabigin werek o.
40018008	Hiniki nen a? Hinisok nen a, weagathinabusak hagatlaga halok he, ebelake palogo la'isalok, ebelake anek dogolik, iniluk motok dogogunmo etoma ukumo hano o. Meke re, hiniki hinisok iti pereat werekma hetu nagulasusak dekma etoma la'inagoumo weak o. Halok he, ebelake palogo la'isano.
40018009	Nen, hinileken nen weagathinabusak hagatlaga halok he, ebelake hemelogo la’isalok, hinileken ebelake anek dogolik iniluk motok dogogunmo etoma ukumo hano. Hinileken pere werekma hetumo la'isaumo weak o. Halok he, ebelake hemelogo la'isano, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40018010	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “It malaikat Allah nen pogot oba nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke nen yekerugi yi hakene therisik dogolik nopase il oba motok welageikharek iti nen, yekerugi iti hinakla meanetdisugup o. [
40018011	An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo akhuni nuk ariogei meke iti herago tilinabigiluk wagagi o. ]
40018012	Hinakla nikithogon apegep. Ap ageikhe ako domba ebe 100 oba werekma, 99 anek torn oba dageiluk hano werek korlek, opakiat ageikhe nuk atluk nalasi laga halok yabokane herasi lausak dek nogo? Herasi lausagat o.
40018013	Ap iti ako arat hera'iluk nen, 99 welageikha meke iti inobasik akla arleken erlok dek negen akhausak mekeat he, opakiat nalasi laga meke iti ebe heratluk anek he, akla arleken motok kogat akhausak o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
40018014	Iti hakene hinopase pogot oba meke etnogo nen, Yekerugi ’bugurlaktek iti hakene opakiat ageikhe nalasi lausak motok a’it o, iluk akla apekherek, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40018015	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hat ageikhe hagarlak heru ageikhe nen weak hagathakhe halok he, hat at oba lalok hipisak hinarligat dogolik, Itithogon hagasusak dek o, iluk pakhogonat asuk watno. Itithogon asuk wakhunem, asuk holhe halok he, thagalogo hipisak hano asusak.
40018016	Mekeat, asuk holhidek halok he, men hagasusak. Allah ane baga holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, Akhuni nen it aperek wene inoba 'buogolukhalok, akhuni aperek inebe pere a? Henagan a, weak hagakhunem inileken hega meke nen, Eberogonat ninileken hogo, iluk isi halok eberogonat apausak,\rq (Ulangan 19:15)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti nen, akhuni inebe pere a? Henagan a, inayoko 'biluk hinom oba lano.
40018017	Laumo nen, it iti inane asuk holhidegat halok he, Allah a'buri inebe natogorlek werekma yogeisa lano. Yogeisa laumo it Allah a'buri inebe tha'bokhogonat emenogo inane asuk holhidegat halok he, at iti hinagarlak hineru mekeat he, it uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganharek meke ina'it meke hakene itikmanke meke arat hagatlaga o, iluk apano, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40018018	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Hit nen, agat oba yoma meke hasik, Itithogon hagasusak dek, iluk wene palhep halok he, Allah pogot oba meke nen wene palhe hagat, ugun o. Nen, hit nen agat oba yoma meke hasik, Itithogon hagasusak hano, iluk egep halok he, iti Allah pogot oba meke nen hano ekhe hagat, ugun o. ”
40018019	-
40018020	“Nen, wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Hit hinebe pere a? Henagan a, an netaga baga natogosugun halok he, an nebe hinakerlekla etoma dogogin iti nen he, hit hinebe pere nen agat oba yoma dogolik, hinetaiken opakiat atluk, hit nen, Ageikhe hagatnisan, iluk, nena meke, Allah ayoko ’bugun meke iti an nopase pogot oba meke nen hinane asuk holiluk hagasiginat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40018021	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at Petrus oba wageikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. An nagarlak ageikhe nen weagatnakhe halok he, wene iti niki meren oba thagalogo degetdisausak nogo. Hurli niki 7 baga nen thagalogo degetdisausagat a? Erlok dek a, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40018022	at Yesus nen, “Hiki 7 baga anek thagalogo degetdisaumo motok erlok dek o. Akhuni inebe 70 meke iniki 7 baga dopok asi aga halok he, thagalogo degetdisekhe dogosagat o.
40018023	Itithogon hakene nopase kok pogot oba meke ’bisekherekma etoma ipisak higit, ap kok etagapogot ageikhe ameke agarumi nen hago welagoukha meke waisasikhe. An anek thaburogo ’banhama a? It ageikhe inoba palegeke werek a, iluk iki wenasigiluk waisasikhemo wagoukhama
40018024	ameke emenogo iki wenakhunem, agarumi emenogo ageikhe uang juta motok doalegat oba palegeke welageikhe meke oba wolok wagoukha.
40018025	Wolok wagunem, ’bikhasikhe meke, at nen oko wogosusak he, erlok dek ageikhemo, at ap kok etnogo nen agarumi aperek men yogeisasikhe, Ap yi ebe men, age men, a’buri men, ameke yi meke ti meke men, motok tha'bokhogonat oko paliluk nen, oko waganugun meke iti an woknesitno, iluk yogeisasikhe.
40018026	Itithogon yogeisugunem, at atuaneke etnogo nen itibagal yukukhogon heagei wakhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, Nopase. Hetaiken hakmu nen, il opakiat huk dogono. Yabokane wokhesiginat o, iluk yogokhikhemo
40018027	at kok etnogo nen, at atuaneke etnogo akmu ageikhesik, Halok he, an nameke hat hoba palegeke meke iti werlegat atno. Thogotdisigi, iluk wene thagalogo degetdisalok la'isikhe.
40018028	Itithogon la'isikhemo, at atuaneke etnogo olilu dukhisikhe hak, at agarlak ap kok etnogo atuaneke ageikhe, at ap dukhisikhe etnogo auang 1. 000 meke herlekha'bugat wogokhikhe meke oba palegeke werekma ipisak abuk agoukha. Abuk agoukhasik ebe hakhasikhesik arlokop ade pethelogo hago dogolik, Nameke hoba palegeke werek etnogo oko woknom, iluk yogokhikhemo
40018029	at agarlak etnogo apma thebe iluk heagei wakhe dogolik, Nagarlak e. Hakmutnealok il opakiat huk dogono. Wokhesiginat o, iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he,
40018030	agarlak etnogo nen, Na'it o, iluk ap iti oba palegeke meke oko aban wogokhidek werek korlek, ap iniki herle warogo 'bisegarekma kola'iluk dogoagaluk wogeisasikhe.
40018031	Itithogon hagakhunem, ap kola'isikhe meke iti agarlak lak aperek nen inileken hasukhasik inakla motok weak ageikhesik, it nen yabokane yoko ap kok etnogo wene tha'bokhogonat yogosi agoukha.
40018032	Yogosi agoukhama ap kok etnogo nen ap iti wisuagaluk isikhemo, wageikhemo men yogokhikhe, Yak yi! Hat hobabut motok weak yi re! An nameke hat hoba palegeke welaga meke re, hat hane ha'buarek negen yoknekhe laganma, Werlegat atno, iluk yokhikhi apigi.
40018033	Mekeat, an hat nakmuthakhi iti hak, hat itithogonat hagarlak iti hakmuratlen he! iluk yogokhikhesik,
40018034	akla aga nen, ap etnogo oba palegeke meke tha'bokhogonat wogokhidek werek korlek, it ap iniki herle warek hagasik welageikharek meke emenogo nen tugi wakhe dogolik, hago dogoagaluk wogeisasikhe.
40018035	Iti hagat, hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi nen weagathinabiogei meke iti hinetaiken nenat thagalogo degetdisigidek halok he, an nopase pogot oba meke nen itithogon hagathinabiginat o, ” ilukyogeisasikhe.
40019001	At Yesus nen wene iti arat yogeisasikhesik nen, o Galilea thogotdiluk, i Yordan aik ilibaganke o Yudea etoma usasikhe.
40019002	Usasinem akhuni doalegat oporlik usekhe lagoukhama at nen o etoma u hano hagarinakhikhe.
40019003	U hano hagarinakhe korlek, it ap Farisi meke aperek wagoukhasik nen, Yesus obabut paluogoluk men yogokhukha, “Ap nen he, he waganek meke iti, wene kok meke, ’bugurlagat meke, oba ’bekhe dogolik, Na’it, iluk lologo here’isausak erlok a? Erlok dek a, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40019004	at Yesus nen he, “Erlo baga Allah nen winametdisekhe dogolik, Ap walhigik, he walhigik, winametdisasikhe,\rq (Kejadian 1:27; 5:2)\rq* iluk wene holal waganek etnogo etaga thalhidek welagap nogo?
40019005	Itithogon winametdisasikhesikmo wene men yogeisasikhe, Ap nen agosa opase here’isalok age ipisak hano dapulik dogolik inebe pere mekeat he, opakiat meke asugun o,\rq (Kejadian 2:24)\rq*
40019006	iluk yogeisasikhe iti nen, inebe pere ’buk, opakiat ageikhesik werek o. At Allah nenat itithogon ipisak dapulogo ’bisasikhemo akhuni nen, hethelasusak motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40019007	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it nen he, “Halok he, at Musa nen, Ap ageikhe nen he waganek meke here’isagaluk halok he, He yi hebe na’it. Here’agagi o, iluk, holal waganogo ikimowogotluk, erlok here’isausagat o, iluk isikhe iti nikithogonnen isikhe, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40019008	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Dek o. Wene itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, hit hinakla motok puk dogolik yokhisugunem hinasuk holusak motok erlok dek iti nen, Hinagugi waganek meke lologo here'isausagat o, iluk yogeisasikhe iti. Itithogon mekeat he, erlo baga Allah nen walinakhe dogolik itithogon motok isikhe dek o.
40019009	Halok he, wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Ap tha nen age waganek meke ap ageikhe nen param ha'isigidekmaat he, lologo here'isalok he ninat meke ageikhe waganhe halok he, paramat hagasugun o, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhemo,
40019010	at Yesus ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, “Halok he, ap nen humi woginakhidek, humi nen ap woginakhidek, dogoumo hano higi, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40019011	at nen, “Itithogon meke re, wene igin yi, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobasik erlok dek o. It Allah nen inobabut itithogon wogeisasikhe meke anek he, hutdugun o.
40019012	It ap aperek, inagosa lak inakla nen inoarliken dek itaklatluk, humi woginakhidek motok welageikharek o. Nen, aperek akhuni nen inoarliken woginakhunem inagugiwoginakhidek welageikharegat o. Nen, aperek nopase kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma, at hasik hagakhe dogouogoluk ineram nenat inagugi woginakhidek welageikharek o. Wene igi iti erlok waganusak halok he, waganini o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40019013	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, it akhuni aperek nen ina'buri at nen iki inukuloak thebelogo sembayan inoba 'buagaluk oba wogosik wagoukhama, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen wenageisasukha.
40019014	Wenageisasukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen, “Akhuni yekerugi yi hakene hagatlasugun halok, nopase kok pogot oba meke nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma iteerek asugun iti nen, it yekerugi ’bugurlaktek ethoma an noba wetnek. Wene palhe ’buk o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40019015	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, iki inukuloak thebeldiluk etoma nen o werlekma lageikhe.
40019016	At Yesus itithogon lageikhesik werekma, ap ageikhe oba wageikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Guru, noe. An naburlal-haburlal hagatnabuak nen, an nobabut hagakhe dogosak he, hano ki hakene hagakhe dogosak apegen, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40019017	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hano ki hakene hagakhe dogosak iluk an yoknekhen iti, nikithogon nen. Hano hagakherek iti, at opakiat anek werek o. Hat iniluk motok dogogunmo etoma ukusak warlok halok he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hasuk holiluk mothogon hagakhe dogono o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40019018	at ap etnogo nen, “Wene iti ebe nikithogon meke hasik egen, ” iluk hinok waganhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Wene iti Allah nen men isikhe, Akhuni inebe inasusak dek o. Param ha’isausak dek o. Hiniki abusak waganusak dek o. Hinekalatinabok palusak dek o.\rq (Keluaran 20:13-16; Ulangan 5:17-20)\rq*
40019019	Hinopase hinagosa inalon halinakhe dogosak o. Hinekaerek hinebe hinetaiken hunikwelagathep iti hak, it akhuni aperek hinom welagathep meke iti, hinetaiken hunik dogono o,\rq (Keluaran 20:12; Imamat 19:18; Ulangan 5:16)\rq* iluk ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hasik igi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40019020	at elege thue etnogo nen, “Wene tha'bokhogonat yoknekhen iti, nasuk holek dogolik mothogon hagakherek mekeat o. Meke re, ki meke hagakhidek welagei apegen, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
40019021	at Yesus nen, “Hat hebe hano motok asigiluk halok, yoma nen lalok hameke yi meke ti meke etoma tha'bokhogonat it aperek inoba oko pali lano. Oko palogo wokhesugun meke iti, it akhuni aperek inameke dek inerlageik meke iti supusogo wogeisano. Itithogon wogeisegen halok he, hat pogot oba meke kogat iteerek asigin o. Halok he, itithogon arat supusogo wogeisalok, an noporlik nekhe dogonok nen, wetno, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40019022	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at elege thue etnogo asuk holhikhesik ameke motok doalegatma nogo nen he, akla weak atluk lageikhe.
40019023	Lageikhemo at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni inameke doalegat meke iti nopase kok pogot oba meke nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma nikithogon uku heat o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40019024	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, at nen, “Wene iti mekeat yabokane dagakhogon yokhisak. Wam unta kok muluk iti meke, disu elo horlelekma kola'umo erlok lelokhogon ukusak mekeat he, it akhuni inameke doalegat meke iti Allah nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma ukusak motok erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40019025	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inasuk holhukhasik nen, inayuk weak agoukhasik men yogokhukha, “Halok he, Allah nen akhuni thani hak erlok tilinabusak he, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40019026	at Yesus nen ileken it inoba 'biluk nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen hagasusak motok erlok dek mekeat he, at Allah nen yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok anek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40019027	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at Petrus nen, “Meke re, nit he, hat hoporlik nekhe dogouogoluk yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat here’isalok wagosik nekhe lago meke yi anek, nena meke woknisagein, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40019028	at Yesus nen, “An nen eberogonat yokhisak. Hit an noporlik nekhe lagap meke yi, yi meke ti meke Allah nen yabokane ket ninat hagatlatlukmo nen, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane witluk, hogotnakhe korlek, nobolukmo etoma nebe kok hurek werekma, hit nalilu etoma hinoboluk 12 perlago baga hinebe kogat hurek dogolik, akhuni Israel meke inukuloak etaga 12 oba emenogo hit nen ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe dogogun o.
40019029	Halok he, an netaga kok asuagaluk tha nen ai halek men, oe agot men, erugi men, agosa opase men, a’buri men, wen waganek men, here’isalok waga halok he, oko obolukmo Allah nen iniki 100 oba hakene motok doalegat wogokhik, naburlal-haburlal wogokhik, hagasigin o.
40019030	Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni o yogotakne inetaga werek meke doalegat, yabokane inetaga dek asigin. Nen, it aperek yogotak inetaga dek werek meke yabokane inetaga werek asigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40020001	At Yesus nen yabokane men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke nen apma ’bisekherekmaetoma ipisak tak-tak men hakene. Ap yabu iteerek meke ageikhe yabu anggur yabumo waganuagaluk ap herageinabik hubenat yoko dukhisikhe.
40020002	Dukhisikhesik, ap inayoko ’bisikhe meke inom wene men yogeisasikhe, Hiniki opaki hasik hagakhep halok he, oko uang iniki opaki hasik hagakhunem wogeisegarek hagat, hinebe dopok opakitek wokhisagein o, iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, Erlok, iluk yogokhukhama at yabumo la’isasikhe.
40020003	La'isalok nen, o mo wageikhemo dukhisikhe jam 9 hak, it ap aperek ninat meke pasar etoma werlegat werekma ileken hisasikhe.
40020004	Hisasikhesik, Warligi yi. Hit he, an nayabu anggur yabumo etoma hinomat wagani lani o. Waganumo an nen oko tak-tagat wokhisagein o, iluk yogeisasikhe.
40020005	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it etnogo lagoukhama, ap yabu iteerek etnogo alebageik hagakhikhe hagat, yabokane itithogonat dikene jam 12 hakene it aperek inayoko 'bigik, hiamaganekeke jam 3 hakene it aperek inayoko 'bigik, hagakhe lageikhe.
40020006	Yabokane o hi asigiluk hagakhe korlek jam 5 dukhisikhesik, it aperek werlegat metek werekma ileken hisalok nen, Hit huben nenat yogotak werlegat metek welagap yi nenaluk, iluk yogeisasikhemo
40020007	it ap emenogo nen, Yabu ageikhe waganuagaluk ninayoko 'bigidek iti nen welago o, iluk yogokhukha. Itithogon yogokhukhama, at ap ayabu iteerek etnogo nen, Halok he, hit hinomat an nayabumo anggur yabumo etoma wagani lani o, iluk inayoko 'bisikhe.
40020008	Itithogon inayoko 'bisikhemo lagoukhama, o arat hi ageikhesikmo, ap ayabu iteerek etnogo nen, it ap emenogo yabu waganho korlek therisik welageikhe meke ageikhe men yogokhikhe, Ap yabu waganiogei meke emenogo waisa lan o. Wageikha halok he, it yabokane ukega meke iti tak oko wogeisalok nen, it alebageik ukega meke iti oko yabokane wogeisanok o, iluk yogokhikhe.
40020009	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, it yabokane jam 5 baga wagani lagoukha meke emenogo tak wagoukhama, oko uang yabu iniki opakiat hasik hagakhunem wogeisegarek etnogo tak-tagat opakitek opakitek wogeisasikhe.
40020010	Nen, yabokane, it alebageik wagani lagoukha meke emenogo inakla nen, Nit kok negen oba dukhogon aperek woknisagein o, apalok wagoukhama mekeat he, oko uang etnogo mekeat opakitek opakitek it alebageik wogeisasikhe hagat, wogeisasikhe.
40020011	Itithogon wogeisekhe korlek, it emenogo uang waganhe dogolik inobabut ua palek hagakhe dogolik, ap kok ayabu iteerek meke etnogo men yogokhukha,
40020012	It yabokane wageikha meke yi, satu jam hakene herlekha'bugat hagakhe lageikha mekeat he, nit alebageik lagosik, mo aik weakma ninoba u weak higik waganho meke ninom tak-tagat woknisegen iti nenaluk, iluk yogokhukhama,
40020013	ap ayabu iteerek meke etnogo nen, ap it meke ageikhe men yogokhikhe, Nagarlak o. An korlo wokhikhi dek o. Oko uang opakitek wokhisagein igima, I o, iluk egep etnogoat wokhikhi.
40020014	Wokhikhi meke itiat horlalok lan o. An netaiken nenat it yabokane wagani lageikha meke yi, hat wokhikhi hagat, wogeisagein o, iluk
40020015	an nekaerek nameke mekeat halok he, an netaiken nenat usak. Itithogon erlok dek apegen a? An niki kogat wogeisigi iti nen hat ua palhe lagan a? iluk yogokhikhe.
40020016	Itithogon yogokhikhe hak he, it yabokane meke iti alebageik asugun o. Nen, alebageik meke iti yabokane asugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40020017	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, at ebe o Yerusalem usagaluk, at ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe 12 emenogo waisasikhesik wogosik inarligat holagarlem usa'aga dogolik men yogeisasikhe,
40020018	“Nagarumi. Nit yogotak, o Yerusalem usa lago. Arat usa lago halok he, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, ap nen yoko lalok an nebe it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek men, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, inikimo 'banumo, it nen ap aperek nen nasuagaluk ukum noba 'bugun o.
40020019	Ukum noba 'biluk nen, it ap itikmanke meke nen inane aik dagok yoknikhik, tugi la'bisoko tugi nakhik, hagatluk nen nebe o baga meldaniluk nasuagaluk wogeisagun o. Nen, arat nakhunem, niki pere warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi Allah nen nilugutnabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40020020	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, at Zebedeus age nen eagei wogosik Yesus oba wageikhesik itibagal yukukhogon heagei wakhe dogolik, “Nit ageikhe kino yokhisuogoluk hoba wago, ” iluk yogokhukhama
40020021	at Yesus nen he, “Hat hakla nikithogon apalok nen egen, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at he etnogo nen, “An neagei pere ya, akhuni tha'bokhogonat hat hapma 'bisageinmo etoma halilu, at ageikhe hiki ebeke, nen ageikhe hiki paike, kok dogoagaluk meldisanogoluk yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40020022	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Hit kino yoknekhep iti, wene ebe hinokodegat dogolik yoknekhep o. An yi aik ti aik hagatnabugun iti hit itithogon hagathinabusak erlok apegep? ” iluk u hak, “An nagei henago nigin iti, hit erlok nausak apegep? ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Erlok nausagat o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40020023	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “An yi aik ti aik hagatnabugun iti hak, hit itithogonat hagathinabugun mekeat he, hat ageikhe an niki ebeke, nen ageikhe niki paike ninom kok dogouogoluk iti anek he, an nen meldinagusak, erlok dek o. An nopase nen haganeat nen dogoagaluk witaberogo 'bisasikhe mekeat 'bisagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40020024	Itithogon yogeisugunem, it at agarumi aperek inebe 10 nen inasuk holhukhasik nen, inakla aga it ap inebe pere oe agot ipisak eranogo inoba 'bisukha.
40020025	Inakla aga itithogon inoba 'bisukhama, at Yesus nen inebe tha'bokhogonat natogosuagaluk waisasikhemonatogokhukhama men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni itikmanke meke inougi pemerintah meke nen mep dageik-dagokhogon hagarinakhik, nen it ap koktek iti nen, inagarumi hagakhe dogoagaluk, inane hin motok han motok yogeisigik, hagakharek iti hinilu.
40020026	-
40020028	Meke re, hit nen it hagakharek iti hak, itithogon hagakhe dogosak motok dek o. An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, hit akhuni an natuaneke dogolik yi meke ti meke hagatnekhe dogobageik iluk wagagi dek o. At he, an nen hit hinatuaneke dogolik, hit hinebe herle warek negen welagap meke iti, hinebe doalegat hisalhinabigiluk, anat nasuagaluk wagagi iti. Iti hakene, hit ageikhe tha nen, An inoe kok asigin, apasi halok he, hinagorat asuak. Nen, hit ageikhe tha nen, An netaga kok asigin, iluk, apasi halok he, hinatuanekeat asuak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40020029	Yesus inom itithogon hagarik lagoukhasik o Yeriko nen dukhisukha hak, akhuni motok doalegat inoporlik lagoukha.
40020030	Lagunem ap inebe pere inileken puk meke holagarlem hurek werekma, akhuni nen, “Yesus wiriogo, ” iluk isukhama inasuk holhukhasik, inane kokhogonat, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Daud nen itago meke ninoe a! Hakmutnisan o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40020031	it akhuni inebe doalegat emenogo nen, “Hinane o, ” iluk wenageisasukha. Itithogon wenageisasukha mekeat he, it emenogo nen inane yabokane ebenageik kokhogon yogokhe dogolik, “Daud nen itago meke ninoe a! Hakmutnisan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40020032	Yogokhukhama, at Yesus ebe melatluk waisasikhemo wagoukhama, men yogeisasikhe, “Warligi yi! An nen nikithogon hagathinabuagaluk yoknekhep, ” iluk hinok waganhikhemo,
40020033	it nen, “Ninoe. Nit ninileken puk yi hano hagatninabinogoluk yokhekho o, ” yogokhukha.
40020034	Itithogon yogokhukhama at Yesus nen akmurinakhikhesik nen, iki inileken oba thebekhogon hageisasikhemo eranogoat hano agoukhasik nen, Yesus oporlik lagoukha.
40021001	At Yesus akhuni inom lagoukha meke emenogo inom kota Yerusalem ukuogoluk horokhogon asi lagoukhasik, tom Zaitun apma o ukul Betfage mot-mot asi dageisukhasik, Yesus nen it at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inebe pere alebageik la'isasikhe.
40021002	La'isekhe dogolik, “O ukul hinelokhoma ili lani o. Arat lagap halok, aban ukisi dogolik hinileken lakhagun he, warn keledai eak ipisak kupi irlelek werekma hinileken hugun etnaga o. Nen, arat hinileken hegep halok he, kupi irlelek iti hisalogo nen, noba wolok wetno.
40021003	Itithogon herle hisalhunem, it akhuni etoma meke ageikhe nen, Nenaluk kupi hisalhe lagap, iluk wene palhe halok, men yogeisano, Ninoe Etagapogot etnogo nen warn keledai yi meke dek nen, wolok luogoluk kupi hisalhe lago, iluk yogokhunem at nen, ibat la'isigin etnaga, ” iluk, wene warogo la'isasikhe.
40021004	Itithogon la'isasikhe iti, at ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke ageikhe nen,
40021005	“Akhuni o Sion meke yogeisekhe dogolik, Hinoe Etagapogot hinoba wiriogo o. Obabutenago dogolik, warn keledai apot oba yasukhogo dogolik wageik, warn keledai eak meke apot oba yasukhogo dogolik wageik, wiriogo, iluk yogeisan o, ”\rq (Zakharia 9:9)\rq* iluk isikhe iti tak-tagat hagatlasuagaluk, at Yesus nen itithogon la'isasikhe iti.
40021006	Lahsasikhemo it etnogo lagoukhasik, at Yesus nen yogeisasikhe tak-tagat hagakhe dogolik
40021007	warn keledai etnogo eak ipisak wolok wagoukhasik inasu itikmanke ugu meke nokorlogo wam keledai etnogo inapot oba talogo 'bisukhama, at Yesus ebe apot oba yasuk lageikhe.
40021008	Apot oba yasuk lageikhesik lagunem, it akhuni doalegat emenogo inebe kokmake inasu itikmanke ugu meke nokorlogo holagarlem talogo 'bilik lageik, it ebetlake oka ikilo'bak meke kiselogo holagarlem talogo 'bilik lageik, hagakhukha.
40021009	Itithogon 'bilik laga dogolik, at Yesus ebe turlumotdiluk, it aperek alebageik lageik, it aperek oporlik lageik, laga dogolik, inane kokhogon men ilik lagoukha, “Daud nen itago meke, noe wa! Wa! Wa! ” iluk u hak, “Hosanal Ninopase Etagapogot Allah nen la'ageiagama wagan yi, at nenat hanothabuak o. Allah kok pogot oba welagarek meke nopase wa! ”\rq (Mazmur 118:26)\rq* u hak, “Hosanal” iluk amitmit luk-luk ilik ilik, o Yerusalem ukisukha.
40021010	Ukisukhama it akhuni etoma meke tha'bokhogonat arlik halhe dogolik, “Eiye! Ap yi tha apegep, ” iluk isukhama
40021011	it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, “Yi Yesus Allah ane yogeisekherek meke, ai o Galilea eloke o Nazaret meke etnogo waga yi o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
40021012	Itithogon isukhama, at Yesus Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik, it akhuni Allah ai halekma ukiluk dogolik, yi meke ti meke oko waganhik, palhik, hagakhe lagoukha meke tha'bokhogonat sikhogo-mukhogo itikmanke ula'isigik, it aperek uang meja perlago baga 'biluk okokhe lagoukha meke men, it aperek o perlago baga inebe hurek dogolik thue merpati yogeik hakene meke oko waganhe lagoukha meke men, inago iti abel dagak-pagakhogon podisigik, hagarik lageikhesik,
40021013	men yogeisasikhe, “Holal waganek oba, at Allah nen ekhe dogolik, An nai halek yi hasik akhuni nen ekhe dogolik, O sembayan ekhe dogogun oba, iluk ekhe dogogun,\rq (Yesaya 56:7)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek o. Mekeat he, hit nen, it ap akhuni inameke iniki abusak tilogo horlegarek meke inai negen halogo 'bisekhe lagap yi re! ” iluk wenageisasikhe.
40021014	Itithogon wenageisasikhesik akhuni inileken puk meke men, inisok ut warek meke men, Yesus oba Allah ai halekma etoma wagoukhama re, at nen hano hagarinakhikhe.
40021015	Itithogon hagarinakhikhemo, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo men, Yesus nen hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagakhunem inileken higik, nen, yekerugi 'bugurlaktek meke nen, “Noe wa! ” iluk u hak, “Hosana! Daud nen itago meke noe, ” iluk Allah ai halekma inane kokhogon Yesus elokhe waganhunem inasuk holhik, hagakhukhasik inakla aga nen,
40021016	Yesus men yogokhukha, “It yekerugi iliogei iti hasuk holhe lagan a? ” iluk yogokhukhama, at nen, “I o. Holhe lagei o. Nen, wene men iluk holal waganek werek etnogo hit nen etaga thalhidek welagap nogo?
