It nen Allah hogorakhe dogolik, Hat hebe hanorogon hogothakhe dogoagaluk, yekerugi ket itago meke men, irlak aban niliogei meke men, motok yakulisegenma higi,\rq (Mazmur 8:3)\rq* iluk isukhama, holal waganek iti hit nen etaga thalhidek welagap nogo? ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
40021017	it akhuni emenogo here'isalok, o kota etoma nen dukhi ageikhesik, o Betania noge i ageikhe.
40021018	Noge iluk huben siakhogon at Yesus o kota etoma apuke ukekhe dogolik, holagarlem hipiri abu ageikhe.
40021019	Hipiri abu ageikhemo, o ara erlo ageikhe holagarlem abelma werekma ileken lakhalok erloma lageikhesik ileken penakhikhe meke re, eken ageikhe ikhidek, eka anek werek nen, o ara etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hat o ara yi, hurli yogotak nen logat yabokane heken motok ikhidek dogono, ” iluk homan 'bekhe korlek eranogoat, o ara etnogo motok puk ageikhe.
40021020	Itithogon hagakhunem, it at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inileken hasukhasik nen, “Eiye! ” iluk ekhe dogolik, “O ara yi opaki hasigat puk aga yi nikithogon nen? ” iluk isukhama,
40021021	at Yesus nen he, “Wene eberogonat yokhisak. An nen o ara yi hagakhi hak, hit nen itithogon hagasusagat meke re, iti anek hagasusak 'buk. Hinetaiken pere ageidek opakiat dogolik, Allah oba hakotdiluk hit nen, Torn yi yoma nen henokhogon i laut yekelekma eloma lan o, iluk yogokhep halok he, hagatlasiginat o.
40021022	Nen, hit yi meke ti meke Allah kino yogokhe dogolik, hinetaiken at oba hakotdegep halok he, wokhisageinat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40021023	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik, at ebe Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik dogolik wene yakulisugunem, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inom, it ap inarluetek inom, Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Hat he, yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakhe lagan yoma nena meke iteerek agatik hagakhe lagan? Nen, ap tha nen iteerek dogoagaluk, meldageikhemo hagakhe lagan, ” iluk yogokhukhama
40021024	at Yesus nen, “An meneke, hinok opakiat ageikhe wokhisagat. Hinok waganhunem, hit nen hutukhogon yoknekhep halok he, an meneke, iti meke iteerek agarik hagakhe lagei, iluk, nane pakhogonat yokhisageinat o.
40021025	At Yohanes nen akhuni ima usa'isekhe lageikhe etnogo, Allah pogot oba meke nen yogokhikhemo ima usa’isekhe lageikhe a? E a, at he, akhuni agat oba meke nen yogokhukhama hagakhe lageikhe a. Yoknitni ta! ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it-it ekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Pogot oba meke nen yakulikhikhemo usa’isekhe lageikhe, iluk yogosumo, at nen he, Halok he, hit nen Yohanes ane eberogonat iluk hutdigidek welagagip iti nenaluk, iluk, yoknisaunogo.
40021026	Nen, Akhuni nen yakulikhukhama usa’isekhe lageikhe, iluk yogosumo, it akhuni yoma tha’bokhogonat nen, Yohanes iti Allah aneat yoknisekhe lageikhe, iluk egarethekma iti nen, nit ninayuk, ” iluk isukhasik,
40021027	yabokane Yesus yogokhe dogolik, “Wene iti nit ninokodek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Halok he, an meneke, Iti meke iteerek agarik hagakhe lagei, iluk, hit yokhisagein degat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40021028	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhesikyabokane men yogeisasikhe, “Wene igin yi, hit nen nikithogon apekhe lagap. Ap ageikhe a’buri inebe pere welagoukha. Werekma, a’but makusa meke iti oba lageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, Na'but, yogotakne, anggur ekama etoma yabu ageikhe wagani lan, iluk yogokhikhe.
40021029	Yogokhikhemo, at a'but etnogo nen, I o, nopase, isikhe mekeat he, yabu ebe wagani lageidek huk ageikhe.
40021030	Huk ageikhemo, at opase etnogo yabokane a'but magea meke iti oba lageikhesik nen itithogonat yogokhikhe meke re, at nen, Na'it o, iluk yogokhikhe. Mekeat he, yabokane akla ebekhikhesik yabu etnogo wagani lageikhe.
40021031	Halok he, hit hinakla nen he, it ap inebe pere eta tha hak nen inopase akla apasikhe tak-tagat hagakhikhe apegep, ” iluk, yogeisasikhemo it nen he, “Iti a'but magea meke iti nen hagakhikhe, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Halok he, an nen wene ageikhe eberogonat yokhisak. Hit aban werek korlek, it ap uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk natogokharek meke inom, humi yugunat hagarik nekharek meke inom, it iti tak Allah apma 'bisekherekma etoma ukugun o.
40021032	At Yohanes etnogo Allah akla apekherek meke mothogonat hagakhe dogoagaluk yakulhisa ageikhe mekeat he, hit hinakla nen, At ane iti eberogonat iluk, hutdigidek welagagip. Meke re, it ap pemerintah hasik uang kino iluk natogokharek meke iti inom, humi yugunat hagarik nekharek meke iti inom, At ane iti eberogonat iliogo, iluk inakla hutdisukha. It nen itithogon hutdisinem hinileken hisasigip mekeat he, hit anek yabokane hinobabut hebelatluk hutdigidek welagap yi re, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40021033	At Yesus nen wene itithogon oba lisogon arat yogeisasikhesik, “Yabokane wene ageikhe yi oba lisogon yokhisak. Ap ageikhe aagat iteerek meke nen wen waganekma anggur ai ya’isikhesik nen, leget halhik, eken thagalogo apusu kelelhe dogogun oba agat hulelhik, inileken dogogun oba kayo perlakhik, hagakhikhesik nen ap aperek elanma hasik it inaen therogo dogoagaluk ’bisalok o werlekma etoma lageikhe.
40021034	Etoma lageikhesik werek korlek, eken ikhunem palharek oba hagatlasi ageikhemo ap aen iteerek meke etnogo nen, atuaneke meke aperek it ap therogo dogoagaluk 'bisasikhemo emenogo nen anggur eken ageikhe wogeisoagaluk, inoba la’isa ageikhe.
40021035	Meke re, it ap therogo welagoukha meke emenogo nen, it ap aagat iteerek meke atuaneke eken waganisuagaluk la’isa ageikhe meke emenogo inebe ha’isalok nen, ageikhe tugi wakhik, ageikhe ebe motok pikeat wakhik, ageikhe helekit oba motok wakhik, hagakhukha.
40021036	Itithogon hagakhukhama at ap aagat iteerek meke etnogo nen, alebageik, inebe wenago negen la’isa ageikhe yabokane motok doalegat la’isa ageikhe mekeat he, alebageik hagakhukha hagat, hagarinakhukha.
40021037	Itithogon hagarinakhukhama at ap kok etnogo nen men isikhe, Halok he, yogotak an nekaerek na’but yi anek he, alon halogo heagei warogo waganugun o, iluk akla apasikhesik, a’but etnogoat la’i ageikhe.
40021038	La’i ageikhemo wagunem, it ap wen therogo welagoukha meke emenogo nen, inileken lakhasukhasik, it-it ekhe dogolik, Ap ili opase obolukmo wen iteerek asigin meke etnogo ebe waga ili. Halok he, wen yi nirat iteerek asuok nen, ebe wasuok o, iluk,
40021039	ebe hakhalok yabumo nen leget thikmanke ula’isukhasik, ebe motok pikeat wakhukha.
40021040	Itithogon hagakhukha iti nen, yabokane ap aagat iteerek iti witluk, it ap therogo welagoukha meke iti nikithogon hagarinabigin apegep, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40021041	it nen, “Ap aagat iteerek meke iti witluk, it inobabut weak meke etoma motok tha'bokhogonat inatluk, anggur ai yagoma iti therogo dogolik, eken arat horle agunem palogo wogosi laga dogoagaluk, ap ninat meke ageikhe inayoko 'busagat o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40021042	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Hit nen Allah ane yigithogon holal waganogo 'bisukhama etaga thalhidek welagap nogo? It nen, It ap tukang o helekit meke halharek meke nen, o ebe halhe dogolik, Helekit yi weak, iluk thogotdisukha meke iti ebe herlagaat hagatlagama o. Itithogon hagatlaga iti, ninopase Allah Etagapogot nenat hagakhe o, iluk, ninileken hogosik nen, Eiye! iluk hogorakhe lago,\rq (Mazmur 118:22-23)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisukha meke iti etaga thalhe lagap dek nogo? Etaga thalhe lagabat o.
40021043	Hit he, Allah nen apma 'binagousak welagagip mekeat he, apma 'binagagin dek o. Hit hinobolukmo, o eken hano meke isu hak, it akhuni inukuloak etaga ninat meke nen, Allah akla apekherek meke mothogon hagakhe dogogun meke halok 'bisagein o. [
40021044	Ap tha nen helekit iti baga kat usa'aga halok, ebe motok wuleleken tiologo 'bigin o. Nen, helekit iti tha oba thebeli aga halok he, ebe motok al debelogo wasigin o, ”]
40021045	iluk yogeisasikhemo, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek meke men, it ap Farisi meke men, “Wene oba lisogon ekhe iti, nit ninobasigat yoknisekhe higi, ” iluk hutdisukhasik,
40021046	Yesus ebe hakhauwogoluk hagakhukha mekeat, akhuni inebe doalegat nen, “At Yesus iti Allah ane yoknisekherek meke o, ” iluk, ekhe lagoukhama nogo nen, it inayuk nen he, thogotdisukha.
40022001	Yesus ebe hakhigidek thogotdisukhama, yabokane at nen wene ageikhe oba lisogon akhuni emenogo menyogeisasikhe,
40022002	“Nopase kok pogot oba meke apma ’bisekherekma etoma ipisak higit, ap kok etagapogot ageikhe a’but age waganhe dogolik pesta isakhukha hagat o.
40022003	Isakhe dogolik akhuni inayoko 'bisikhe meke nasuagaluk, at atuaneke meke aperek men yogeisasikhe, Akhuni inayoko ’bigi emenogo wisuak nen woginabi lani o, iluk, la’isasikhe meke re, it inayoko ’bisikhe meke iti ina’it nen wageidek huk agoukha.
40022004	Wageidek huk agoukhama, yabokane atuaneke ninat meke men yogeisasikhe, Akhuni inayoko ’bigi meke emenogo wisuak nen he, woginabi lani o. Lalok nen, Ninoe nen men ekhe ino, Sapi kulok kok meke men, sapi eagei aperek koktek meke men, motok tha’bokhogon warogo arat isago ’biluk, yi meke ti meke arat tha’bokhogon karelogo ’bigirik arat nausak hagatlaga o. Halok he, wisuak nen yogeisa lani o, ekhemo wago, iluk la’isasikhemo lagoukha.
40022005	Yoko yogeisa lagoukha mekeat he, it inayoko ’bisikhe meke iti inakla puk-pakhogon hagakhe dogolik, it aperek inayabulake lageik, it aperek yi meke ti meke oko paluogoluk lageik,
40022006	it aperek nen, at kok atuaneke la’isasikhe meke emenogo inebe ha’isalok tugi inakhik, inebe motok ka’bukhogon inakhik, hagakhukha.
40022007	Itithogon hagakhukhama, at ap kok etagapogot etnogo asuk holhikhesik, akla aga dageiluk agarumi tentara meke la’isasikhemo lagoukhasik, at ap kok atuaneke inakhukha meke emenogo inebe motok warogo, podisalok, inai halek kota etoma motok hali ’bisukha.
40022008	Itithogon arat hagakhukhama, at ap kok etagapogot etnogo nen atuaneke meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, Pesta arat isakhi mekeat he, it akhuni inayoko 'bigi meke iti nako isago nasusak dek aga. Na'it.
40022009	Halok he, hit holak kok atoalma eloma lalok werekma, akhuni aperek Iago halok, Pesta isagoma na luok o, iluk, inayoko 'bino, iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40022010	it atuaneke meke emenogo yabokane holak kok atoalma etoma lagoukhasik werekma, akhuni inobabut weak meke, hano meke, lagunem inom abuk agoukha meke tha'bokhogonat inayoko 'bisukhama wagoukhama, o etnogola inebe motok kerlek ageikhe.
40022011	Arat kerlekhogon ukisukhama, at ap kok etagapogot etnogo ileken hisagaluk uma ukisikhe meke, ap opakiat ageikhe su humi iginakhe dogolik pesta isago nuogoluk ikharek meke ugu dek werekma ileken lakhasikhesik men yogokhikhe,
40022012	Yak yi. Hat he, su humi iginakhe dogolik pesta isago nuogoluk ikharek meke iti ikhidek uki agan yi, nikithogon uki agan, iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he, ap etnogo ane motok igidek huk ageikhe.
40022013	Ane motok igidek huk ageikhemo, at ap kok etagapogot etnogo atuaneke meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, Ap iti iki isok motok herle warogo, itikmanke inaik kirlidik mak-mak hagakhe dogolik di ago de ago hagakharekma o motok mummo etoma ula'isani o, iluk yogeisasikhe.
40022014	Iti hakene, Allah nen akhuni inebe motok doalegat inayoko 'bekherek mekeat he, inebe pererlagat anek witaberogo 'bisagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40022015	Yabokane, it ap Farisi meke nen, “Nit Yesus ileken waganogo oba hinok waganhunem, ane igin oba wene oba 'buok, ” iluk abok palhe lagoukha.
40022016	Abok palhe lagoukhasik nen, ap it inagarumi inane waganhe lagoukha meke inom, it ap Herodes werekmake meke inom, Yesus oba wene hinok waganuagaluk la'isa agoukhama it wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Yesus noe. Hat hobabut wene eberogonat anek ekhe dogolik, Allah akla nen, Akhuni yigithogon hagakhedogoak, iluk apekherek meke eberogonat yakulnisekhe lagan iti nit ninilu o. Akhuni inebe hayuk degat dogolik inelokhoken oba anek hisalok, ageikhe helokhoma 'bisigik, ageikhe hoporlike 'bisigik, hagakhetek dek heekhe lago.
40022017	Halok he, hat haklanikithogon apegen? Nit Yahudimeke hagakhorek tak-tagat uang pemerintah hasik kok etagapogot Kaisar wogosusak a? Dek a, ” iluk yogokhukhama
40022018	at Yesus nen it ap iti inobabut weak ekagat palhikhesik nen, “Hit hinoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik, hinetaikenpere meke yi re! Nenaluk nobabut paluogoluk hagakhe lagap.
40022019	Uang pemerintah hasik 'busak meke etnogo nileken hak nen inugutneani, ” iluk isikhemo uang etnogo ageikhe wogokhukhama,
40022020	at nen he, “Yi tha elokhoken hagarek oba etaga holal waganek werek? ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40022021	it nen he, “Ithi Kaisar at o, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Kaisar ameke halok he, Kaisar wogokhik, Allah amekehalok he, Allah at wogokhik, hagasusak o, ” ilukyogeisasikhemo,
40022022	it emenogo inasuk holhukhasik nen, “Eiye! Nayuk e, ” iluk, hogoratluk Yesus thogotdiluk owerlekma lagoukha.
40022023	It emenogo arat lagoukhama nen, o iti bagaat, it ap Saduki meke nen, “Akhuni watlatluk iniluk asugun motok dek, ” iluk egarek meke aperek Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha,
40022024	“Noe. At Musa nen men iluk yakulnisasikhe, Ap ageikhe a'but aban itakhidek werekma ebe watlaga halok he, obolukmo a'but ageikhe itasuagaluk, he thoge iti ap iti agorat waganusak o,\rq (Ulangan 25:5-6)\rq* iluk yakulnisasikhe.
40022025	Itithogon isikhe meke werekma nit werekma yoma ap inebe 7 nen inopase opakiat nen itago welagoukha. Dogolik, inoe makusa meke iti age waganhikhesik a'buri itaginakhidekma watlageikhemo agot oporlik meke iti nen, He yi noe age thoge an 'baniluk laga meke, iluk waganhikhe.
40022026	Waganhikhe mekeat he, at iti a'buri itaginakhidekma watlageikheat. Yabokane he thoge meke etnogo inagot inoporlik meke iti nen waganhikhe meke re, itithogonat a'buri itaginakhidekma watlageikhe. Inebe 7 nen emenogo ina'buri itaginakhidekma watlaga lagoukha anek.
40022027	Itithogon watlagoukhasikmo yabokane ebe yabokane, he etnogo ebe watlageikheat.
40022028	Halok he, it ap inebe 7 meke iti, he opakiat meke iti waganhukhasikmo, yabokane Allah nen akhuni warek meke inilugurinabigin itinem, he iti tha hak age asigin apegen, ” iluk hinok waganhukhama,
40022029	at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, Allah ane holal waganek iti inom, Allah obatne iti inom, hinokodek dogolik, hinane korlo egep higi.
40022030	Akhuni warek meke Allah nen inilugurinabigin itinem, humi woginakhik, iginakhik, hagakhe dogogun motok dek o. Mekeat he, it malaikat pogot oba meke welageikharek iti hakeneat dogogun o.
40022031	-
40022032	Nen, akhuni watlasugun meke Allah nen inilugurinabigin iti anek he, at nen, Abraham inom, Ishak inom, Yakub inom, inopase Allah anat o,\rq (Keluaran 3:6)\rq* iluk isikhemo, at ane holal waganek werek etnogo etaga thalhidek welagap nogo? Etaga thalhethebat o. At Allah akhuni warek meke inopase 'buk. At he, akhuni iniluk meke inopase o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40022033	it akhuni doalegat emenogo inasuk holhukhasik nen, “Eiye! Nayuk e, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
40022034	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhemo, akhuni nen he, “Yesus nen it ap Saduki meke wene yogeisekhemo, it nen oko usak erlok dek aga, ” iluk isukhama, it ap Farisi meke inasuk holhukhasik inebe natogotdiluk,
40022035	ap ageikhe Allah ane holal waganek yakulisekhe lageikhe meke nen, Yesus obabut paligiluk oba hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe,
40022036	“Yesus noe. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo, wene ebe kok motok hakene ki isikhe apegen? ” iluk yogokhikhemo
40022037	at Yesus nen he, “Wene kok he, at Musa nen, Hinetaiken men, hinobabut men, hinakla men, opakiat atluk, ninopase Allah Etagapogot ebe itiat hinetaiken hunik dogono o,\rq (Ulangan 6:5)\rq* iluk isikhe iti,
40022038	wene ebe kok hakene itiat o.
40022039	Nen, wene iti ipisak tak-tak he, ageikhe yi, Hit hinekaerek hinebe hinetaiken hunik welagathep iti hakene, it akhuni aperek hinom welagathep meke iti hinetaiken hunik dogono o,\rq (Imamat 19:18)\rq* iluk isikhe meke kok ageikhe iti.
40022040	Wene at Allah nen, Yigithogon hagatno, itigithogon hagatno, iluk ninasuk wakhikhe wene tha'bokhogonat inom, wene it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen isukha wene tha'bokhogonat inom, wene kok pere eta baga irlelek werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40022041	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, it ap Farisi meke emenogo natogorlek werekma, at nen hinok inoba waganhe dogolik,
40022042	men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla nen, Kristus Allah nen ayoko 'biluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo, ebe tha apekhe lagap? Nen, opa tha nen itago meke apekhe lagap? ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen he, “At iti Daud nen itago mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40022043	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen he, “Halok he, Allah Agoreke nen Daud akla kagalhikhemo, at nen he,
40022044	Allah Etagapogot nen an noe Etagapogot yogokhe dogolik, Akhuni hat thili meke emenogo hisok nen al debelogo 'bisanok nen, an nen hoba 'bisa'ageidek werek korlek, hat an nalilu niki ebeke hurek dogolik hebe kokdogono,\rq (Mazmur 110:1)\rq* iluk Allah nen Kristus yogokhikhe, iluk Daud nen isikhe iti, nenaluk isikhe apegep.
40022045	At Daud ekaerek nen Kristus ebe hasik, An noe Etagapogot, isikhe halok he, hit nen, Kristus iti Daud nen itago meke o, iluk, nikithogon usakapegep. Itithogon usak erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
40022046	it nen wene oko nikithogon yogosu heat hagatlageikhemo, hurli iti hurli nen, yabokane akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen wene ageikhe hinok waganu inayuk ageikhe.
40023001	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik yabokaneakhuni doalegat natogorlek welagoukha meke emenogo inom, at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, men yogeisasikhe,
40023002	“It ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, it ap Farisi meke inom, at Musa nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo yogeisekhe lageikhe iti hak, obolukmo it nen pilinerogo yakulisiliogei iti nen,
40023003	it nen yi meke ti meke hagasuagaluk yokhisekhe halok he, itiat hago dogolik hagakhe dogono o. Mekeat he, it hagakhidek dogolik, it nen, Hit anek hagatni, iluk yokhisiliogei iti, it hagariogei iti hak inobabut waganogo hagakhe dogogup o.
40023004	Suke akin meke herle yilogo inekaerek iniki hakhigidek dogolik akhuni aperek inomorlo baga waganuagaluk yogeisegarek iti hak, it iti nen inekaerek hagakhidek dogoligat, it aperek nen hagasuagaluk wene akin meke inoba ’biliogei iti.
40023005	It nen yi meke ti meke hagariogei iti tha’bokhogonat, Akhuni nen ’bitnisik dogoak, iluk, inakla apekhe dogolik hagariogei o. It nen, Sembayan ekhe lagei, iluk, Allah ane thuesika baga holal waganogo inilhaoak oba herle wakharek etnogo, it nen kokhogon wakhik, su itikmanke meke ninat ikharek etnogo, it nen su erageik uanhogon ikhik,
40023006	nen, akhuni pesta kok isago nukunem, it ap koktek hurek lageikharekma thelekmarogon hurek lageik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma etoma ap koktek meke inobolukmo hureklasi ukigik,
40023007	akhuni nen, Guru nopase, iluk heagei warinakhik, pasar oko waganharekma etoma akhuni nen inane agugurogo yogeisigik, hagakhe dogoagaluk etoma lageik, hagakhe dogou warlok nen welageikharek iti.
40023008	Meke re, hit hinopase guru wene yakulhisekherek meke opakiat anek werek iti nen, hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinom tak-tak halok he, it aperek nen, Guru nopase, iluk yokhisausak motok dek o.
40023009	Nen, hinopase pogot oba meke opakiat welagarek iti nen he, ap agat oba meke ageikhe yogokhe dogolik, Nopase, iluk yogosusak motok dek o.
40023010	Nen, hinoe wene hinasuk wakherek he, an Kristus narligat halok he, it akhuni aperek nen, Ninoe, iluk, hit yokhisausak motok degat o.
40023011	Halok he, hit ya re, at tha nen ageikhe kok werek halok, at iti hinatuanekeat asuak o.
40023012	Ap tha nen ekaerek nen, An kok, iluk melasigin halok he, Allah nen ebe thebekhogon inapma 'bigin o. Nen, at tha ekaerek nen inapma negen dogogin halok he, Allah nen ebe siakhogon negen 'bigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40023013	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, it Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, Farisi meke men, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke yi men, hit Farisi meke yi men, hinoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik hinetaiken pere meke yi re! Hit iti akhuni nopase pogot oba apma ukunogo iluk, hit nenat thu lakhe lagap yoma re! Hit hinekaerek ukigidek dogolik, it aperek ukuogoluk hagakhunem, hit nen, Ukusak dek o, iluk wene palhe lagap yoma re!
40023014	Hit ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, ap Farisi meke inom, hinoado baga anek hano thalek hinetaiken pere yoma re! Eiye! Allah nen weagathinabigin. Hit he, humi thoge meke inai halek inom, inameke inom, inai thebelekhe dogoligat, akhuni nen, inasuk holiluk, It hano, iluk apoagaluk sembayan uan-nagan likhalok egethep itithogon hagakhidek dogolepma, Allah nen wene 'bugurlagat hinoba 'biluk dogolep. Meke re, itithogon hagakhethep iti nen, wene akin meke hinoba 'biluk weagathinabigin o.
40023015	Hit ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke yi men, hit Farisi meke yi men, hinoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik hinetaiken pere meke yi re! Hit hinane waganhe dogoagaluk akhuni herageinabik, i laut kok yekelek aik ilibagan italhik, o yi ai ti ai walegat lageik, nekhe lagap meke iti, Allah nen wene hit hinoba 'biluk weakma hetu aikmo etoma la'inagagin iti hakene, it hinane holiogei meke iti Allah nen wene itithogonat iki pere baga dagakhogon inoba 'buagaluk hagakhe lagap iti nen, eiye! Weagathinabigin o.
40023016	Akhuni inileken puk meke nen it aperek yogeisekhe dogolik, Holak yike luok! iluk u hak, hit nen, Allah ai halek etaga hupuk palhep halok, iti alhe negen. Meke re, emas Allah ai halekma welagarek meke iti anek, etaga hupuk palumo re, eberogonat munenusak dek o, iluk yogeisekhe lagap iti korlo o! Eiye, weagathinabigin o.
40023017	Hinetaiken motok dek dogolik hinileken puk yoma re! Ki meke kok apegep? Emas iti meke kok apegep a? Allah ai halek iti nen, emas iti meke Allah hasik 'bisukha meke, iluk, ai halek itiat kok apegep a.
40023018	Hit nen he, wene ageikhe yi egethep, Allah ai halekma yi meke ti meke o perlago baga Allah hasik 'bisegarekma obolukmo etaga hupuk palho halok he, alhe negen o. Meke re, Allah ebe 'bisegarek iti meke etaga hupuk palhe halok, munenusak dek o, iluk yogeisegethep iti korlo o!
40023019	Hinileken motok puk yoma re! Yi meke ti mekeAllah hasik 'bisegarek iti kok apegep a? E a, at he, yi meke ti meke o perlago iti baga 'bisegarek iti nen, Allah mekeat o, iluk egarek iti nen, o iti kok hakene apegep a.
40023020	Tha nen o perlago yi meke ti meke Allah hasik 'bisegarekma iti etaga hupuk palho halok he, o perlago ebe iti inom, yi meke ti meke oba 'bisegarek meke iti inom, dapukhogon etaga hupuk paliogo.
40023021	Nen, tha nen Allah ai halek iti etaga hupuk palho halok he, o halek iti inom, Allah ebe o halek iteerek welagarek iti inom, etaga hupuk paliogo o.
40023022	Nen, tha nen pogot etaga hupuk palho halok he, o perlago Allah kok hurek welagarekma oboluk iti men, at ebe men, inom at etaga hupuk paliogo o. Eiye! Hit korlo hagakhe lagap iti nen Allah nen weagathinabigin o!
40023023	Hit ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, ap Farisi meke inom, hinoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik hinetaiken pere meke yi re! Allah hasik hagakhe dogosak kok hakene re, mothogon hagakharek iti inom, akhuni aperek inetaiken hunik welageikharek iti inom, inobabut hupukhogon welageikharek iti inom, werek korlegat he, itithogon hagakhidek dogolik, hit nen podi hakene inom, diboka hakene inom, hite hakene inom, hiniki wenago 10 baga asi agunem, opakiat ageikhe Allah hasik 'bisekhe lagap iti 'bisausak mekeat, wene ebe abelma negen meke iti hano hagakhe lagap mekeat he, wene kok meke hagakhidek kamotdekhe lagap iti korlo o!
40023024	Akhuni inileken puk meke nen, it aperek yogeisekhe dogolik, Holak yike luok, iluk u hak, hit nen, halagase 'bugurlagat meke i henago 'bakhegethepma akla ukilukmo ekagat halok ula'isegethep mekeat he, warn unta kok meke hinaik thagalhidek haumhogon neke lagap iti nen, eiye! Allah nen weagathinabigin o.
40023025	Hit ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke yi men, ap Farisi meke men, hinoado baga anek hano thalek hinetaiken pere meke yoma re! Hinageisoak iti inom, hinapiring iti inom, itikmanke anek he, hanorogon thobalhe lagap mekeat he, aklake, akhuni inameke hiniki abusak horlegethep meke iti inom, An anek woknetlep, iluk apegethep meke iti inom, motok kerlek werek iti korlo o!
40023026	Hit ap Farisi meke hinileken motok puk yi re! Hinageisoak iti akmanke tak hanorogo hotni o. Itithogon hagakhep halok he, itikmanke erlok hotlasiginat o. Hit korlo hagakhe lagap iti nen, eiye! Allah nen weagathinabigin o.
40023027	Hit ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, ap Farisi meke men, hinoado baga anek hano thalek hinetaiken pere meke yi re! Hit he, hinebe men hakene. Akhuni watlageikharek meke agatma thalinakharekma etoma itikmanke anek he, apusu kut hano motok warek elokhoken hano werek korlegat, akla akhuni inoak obasi apenhogo welagarek iti hakene welagap o.
40023028	Iti hakene, akhuni nen hit hinoado itikmanke yi 'bithisugunem hano apiliogei mekeat he, hinetaiken pere dogolik, hinakla yi weak ti weak hagakhethep iti meke motok kerlek welagap iti nen, eiye! Allah weagathinabigin o!
40023029	Hit ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, ap Farisi meke men, hinoado baga anek hano thalek hinetaiken pere meke yoma re! Hit nen, ap alep Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inebe warek thalinakhukhama apot oba o halogo 'bisigik, it ap alep inobabut mot hagakhe lagoukha meke warek thaldisalok itikmanke sileka waganhik, hagakhe dogolik, hit nen,
40023030	Nit ninebe yi it ninopa lak alebageik welagoukha eta ninom dogoloma, nit ninom nen it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke iti inatlo dek o, iluk
40023031	hinekaerek nen ekhe lagap iti, Nit ninebe, it ap haganeat Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nit ninopa lak nenat inakhukha iti nen itago meke welago, iluk u hagat, ekhe lagap o.
40023032	Halok he, hinopa lak nen erloma nen hagakhe lagoukha iti hak, hit ilugun oba arat itithogonat hagarekhe dogoni!
40023033	Hit warlo nen itago meke hinebe warloat welagap yoma re! Akhuni Allah nen ukum inoba 'biluk hetu aik weakma la'isugunem, hit lo dukhugun nogo? Erlok dek o.
40023034	Halok he, hinasuk hanorogo holini. An nen ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke inom, inakla kagalek meke inom, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, la'isasigin meke iti, hit nen ebetlake o baga meldisalok inakhik, ebetlake o hit sembayan egethepma ukiluk tugi wiik-weakhogon inakhik, ebetlake sikhogo-mukhogo o kota ageikhe nen o kota ageikhe la'isigik, hagarinabugun o.
40023035	Iti halok he, it ap inobabut mot hagakhe lagoukha meke, inamep ulabogo inarik wagoukha meke iti, hurli erlo Habel obabut mothogon anek hagakhe lageikhe meke oe nen wakhikhe iti baga nen lok-logat, hurli ilugun oba, at Berekia a'but Zakharia iti Allah ai halekma, o at Allah ako warogo hunekhe lagoukhama turlem heisogon etoma wakhigip iti hurli, inamep iti tha'bokhogonat hit hinoba dopok hiniki baga werek o.
40023036	Hit yogotak welagap meke yi, ukum yi tha'bokhogonat hit hinoba akin dogogin o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40023037	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Eiye! Hit akhuni o Yerusalem meke yi nakmu lak e! Hit nenat ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke inebe inakhik, ap Allah nen inayoko 'biluk la'isa agarek meke helekit oba tamuk-hamukhogon inakhik, hagakhep iti nakmu lak e. Thue ayam isa ilu a'bikha akla natogorlogo 'bisekherek hak, an nen hibiku-yogokuat hit o yoma welagathep meke tha'bokhogonat itithogonat natogorlogo 'binageiluk iluk nakla apegerek mekeat he, hit nen, Nina'it, egethep iti, nakmu lak e.
40023038	Iti nen, Allah nen hit hinebe here'inagumo, hinai halek iti tho'bon wumat dogogin o.
40023039	Hurli yogotak nen he, an nebe hinileken niigidek dogoluk nen, Ninopase Etagapogot Allah nen la'agei agama wagan yi, at nenat hanothabuak o,\rq (Mazmur 118:26)\rq* iluk yabokane yoknesugun iti hurli hinileken neagun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40024001	At Yesus Allah ai halekma nen dukhisikhesik lagunem, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha mekeemenogo oba wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Allah ai halek iti hileken lakhan, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40024002	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at nen he, “Hit o halek ethoma tha'bokhogonat hegep a? Helekit oba thapapal halek ethoma ageikhe thogotdigidek, motok tha'bokhogon misak-dapukhogon la'isagun o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40024003	Itithogon yogeisalok, tom Zaitun ukul oba dageisikhesik hurek werekma, at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukhasik inarligat dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Hat nen yoknisegen etnogo, mera nen hagatlasigin? Hat hebe wageik, o ilugun oba hagatlageik, arat hagatlasigiluk hagakhe korlek, nena meke tak hagatlagunem nit ninetaiken eketlasugun. Wene hutukhogon yoknisan, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40024004	at Yesus nen he, “Akhuni nen nukhetdinageinogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
40024005	Akhuni inebe doalegat nen inetaga an netaga meke thalogo nen men ilik wisugun, Kristus etnogo nebe wagei yiat o, iluk, inane eberogonat thalek akhuni doalegat nukherinabisugun o.
40024006	Itithogon hagatlaga korlek, wim kagaldiluk horogat yakhunem inane hinasuk holhik, walegat yakhunem inabok holhik, hagakhe dogolik, hinetaiken aborlok ugup o. Itithogon hagatlasigin mekeat he, o ilugun hurli baga hagatlasigin meke iti abanat o.
40024007	Yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok wim kagalhik, ap inetagapogot inagarumi inapma meke tomok wim kagalhik, o yi ai ti ai hipiri no ageik, dugul aborlok luk-lagathigik, hagasigin o.
40024008	Meke re, iti humi elege itaginabuogoluk hinet wakharek iti hak, alebageik hugun itiat o.
40024009	Itinem he, it akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok nen, an netaga ilik, Hit he, at agarumi, iluk hinebe ina’it motok hagathinakhik hinebe hakhinabiluk, it aperek nen tugi hinakhik, hinebe motok hinakhik, hagasuagaluk inoba wokhisik laga dogogun o.
40024010	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, it akhuni aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdisukha mekeat he, inebe doalegat inakla puk atluk, thogotdisalok dukhiluk, at ageikhe nen at ageikhe wasuagaluk wolok lageik, ageikhe nen ageikhe a’it nen anini oba ’bigik, hagasugun o.
40024011	Nen, it aperek inekalat Allah ane yogeisiliogei meke thalek hagatlatluk hinoba witluk nen, akhuni motok doalegat nukherinabugun o.
40024012	Itithogon motok hagatlarik waga dogoumo, it akhuni inobabut motok korlo hagatlatluk, it-it inakmurogo dogogun meke iti yabokane inetaiken ko’bot arik wisugun o.
40024013	Mekeat he, tha nen etaiken thebekhogon obakhanini hapugutdiluk motok dogogin halok he, o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen tiligin o.
40024014	Nen, Allah nen apma ’bisagein meke hano wene yi, yi akhuni ti akhuni motok inilu asuagaluk o yi ai ti ai yogeisilik lagap halok he, o ilugun hurli baga arat hagatlasigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40024015	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen holal waganek yi etaga thalhe dogolik, hanorogon hutdekhe dogono o. Ap Daniel Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen ekhe dogolik, Akhuni nen inalilo meke hagakhunemagorlerogon lo lugun meke o Allah ekaerek ai melaga halok,\rq (Daniel 9:27; 11:31; 12:11)\rq*
40024016	akhuni o Yudea eloke meke etoma lo tom obake dagouak o.
40024017	Lo dagouogoluk halok, akhuni aperek o warleke baga dageiluk werekma, inapuke usatluk nen inameke yi meke timeke uma wagani ukusak dek o. Lo piokthegat dagouak o.
40024018	Nen, it akhuni aperek wen atomke nen, hipirikamake nen, inapuke uma inasu wagani ukigidek etoma nenat lo piokthegat dagouak o.
40024019	Itithogon dageikhe dogolik, it humi ineak akla meke iti men, ineagei ket itago irlak aban niliogei meke iti men, weak hugun iti, eiye! Nakmu lak e!
40024020	Hit lo lugun iti, o weak oba a? Hiniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat werek korlek a, launogo iluk, sembayan isi dogono o.
40024021	O itinem weagat asigin iti, ebekeram Allah nen yi meke ti meke walhasikhe iti hurli nen logat, o yogotak ya hurli, iti hakene itithogon ageikhe hagatlageidek. Nen, yabokane ageikhe motok hagatlasigin dek mekeat he, opaki hasik itiat weak kok hagatlagunem hugun o.
40024022	Weak hagatlagunem hugun iti, at Allah nen, Hurli yi hurli arat o, iluk igidek kamotdilepma, akhuni tha'bokhogonat tilinakhidek weagat atlep o. Meke re, at a'buri wenageinakhikhe meke inobasik anek, Yogo. Weak arat hegep o, iluk, hurli wasigin werek o.
40024023	-
40024024	Itinem, it akhuni aperek inekalat ekhe dogolik, Kristus etnogo nebe anat o, igik, nen, it aperek nen, Allah ane yokhisegerek meke etnogo nebe anat o, igik, i wisugun o. Witluk nen, Akhuni Allah nen wenageinakhikhe meke emenogo nukhetdisausak a? iluk nukhetdisauwogoluk inane eberogonat thalek apoagaluk hagasusak dek meke elalin meke hagarik wisugun o. It aperek nen, Kristus etnogo yi waga yi 'bikhani, igik, it aperek nen, Kristus etnogo ili waga ili lakhani, igik, ugunem hit hinakla nen eberogonat iluk apugup o.
40024025	Wene iti aban hagatlageidek werek korlek husupi tak yokhisigi iti hanorogon hutdekhe dogono o.
40024026	It akhuni aperek nen yokhisekhe dogolik, Lakhani! At etnogo o limo eloma werek o, isi halok he, hinileken lakha lagup. Nen, it aperek nen, Lakhani! At etnogo uma aburarekma limago werek o, isi halok he, hinakla nen eberogonat iluk apugup o.
40024027	Iti re, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo wisigin he, o yabok o mo dagei agarekma eloma nen opaki hasigat yegethasinem, o mo ukekherekma yibakha lagarek iti hak wisigin o, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhesik,
40024028	“Warek meke werekma, thue warek nekarek meke iti etoma natogosi lagarek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40024029	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Weak kok itithogon halok oba nen iniki doalegat welageidek nen, O mulikin mum ageik, thut yakhidek huk ageik, husagal pogot oba nen kilelogo usa'ageik, pogot oba inobatneak welageikharek meke iti Allah nen inaborlogotdigik, hagasigin o.\rq (Yesaya 13:10; 34:4)\rq*
40024030	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo arat wisigin iluk, akhuni inetaiken ekerlogo hutduagaluk pogot oba ageikhe hagatlatluk oba nen, akhuni inukuloak etaga dopok deku makhe korlek nobatnerogonat oisa akla usa'agunem, inileken nealok kokhogonat hogotnabugun o.
40024031	Itithogon waga dogolik, an nen it malaikat Allah nen pogot oba nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo yoko la'isa aga dogolik, napikon ane kogat pakhogon isinem, it nen akhuni an nen wenageinakhigi meke emenogo, o wema elomake, upu elomake, ilike, yike, o pogot erlomake erlomake eloma nen motok natogorinabugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40024032	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene yi o ara oba lisogon yokhisagein yi hutdisano o. O eka dabeligiluk hagakherek etnogo meke oba lisogon yokhisak. O ara iti eka lologo usekherethek yabokane asi'bat dageigik, eka dabelhik, hagakhunem, hinileken halok hinakla nen, Yogo. O arat hibi asigin higi, iluk hinakla hutdegethep iti hak, an nen,
40024033	Itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk yokhisigi etnogo, ebe tha'bokhogonat hagatlagunem hinileken halok nen, Yogo. O ilugun oba hagatlasigin etnogo horok asi aga higi, iluk, hinakla apano o.
40024034	Yigithogon hagatlasigin, itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk yokhisigi iti, akhuni o yogotak werek meke inebe aperek dek ageidek aban werek korlegat ebe tha'bokhogonat hagatlasigin o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi.
40024035	Pogot inom, agat inom, iti dek asigin mekeat he, an nane iti dek asigin motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40024036	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An wisigin he, o itinem, jam iti baga wisigin iluk, akhuni motok inokodek. Nen, malaikat Allah nen pogot oba nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo inokodegat. Nen, an nebe Allah a'burat meke re, nokodegat. An nopase Allah arligat ilu o.
40024037	It akhuni ap Nuh werek oba eta hagakhe lagoukha tak-tagat, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane itithogonat hagakhunem wisigin o.
40024038	I thaluk-paluk isikhe iti, aban ikhidek werek korlek, it akhuni etoma nen hipiri nikik, eken apusu nikik, ap nen humi woginakhik, it aperek nen igisigik, hagakhe korlek, at Nuh etnogo ku akla ukisikhe.
40024039	Ku akla ukiluk werek korlek, it akhuni emenogo inokodegat werekma, i arat thaluk-paluk dageikhe dogolik motok hotnokhogon inakhikhe. Iti hak he, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane wisigin tak-tagat he, itithogonat hagatlasigin o.
40024040	Itinem ap inebe pere wen waganhunem ageikhe waganhe dogolik, ageikhe thogotdigin o.
40024041	Nen, humi inebe pere inapiri gandum meke werasuogoluk thagalhunem, ageikhe waganhe dogolik, ageikhe thogotdigin o.
40024042	Itithogon hagatlasigin iti nen hit nen, Ninoe Etagapogot mera wisigin, hinokodek iti nen, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
40024043	Nen, ap aila iteerek meke ageikhe akla nen, O yogotak hibako, jam iti baga naila yoma ap ageikhe iki abusak waganigiluk ukisigin, iluk, ilu dogolepma re, at ebe aila iti thuam motok werekma, aila o pin talogo iki abusak wagani ukilep dek, iluk, hiniluat apigi.
40024044	Iti hak he, hit hinakla nen, At itinem wisigin, iluk apigidek akhirak werek korlek, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, arat wisigin iti, hit hinebe karelogo dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40024045	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Ap kok meke ageikhe atuaneke therisik dogolik inapiri wogeisausak tak-tagat wogeisekhe dogoagaluk, at atuaneke meke ageikhe ayoko 'bisinem, at akla kagalek dogolik obabut oe ane igin meke tak-tagat hagakherek iti tha apegep. At iti oe iti nen meldiluk lagarek o.
40024046	Meldiluk lagunem, atuaneke etnogo itithogon mothogon hagakhunem ileken 'bikha aga halok, atuaneke meke etnogo akla arleken motok akhagein o.
40024047	Itithogon hano hagakhunem, 'bikhatluk, oe etnogo nen, An nameke yoma tha'bokhogonat hat hiki baga dogoak o, iluk meldigin o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi.
40024048	Mekeat he, at atuaneke meke iti, obabut weak halok he, akla nen, Noe etnogo ibat wiriogo dek. Dogoluk nen wisigin higi, iluk,
40024049	agarlak lak inoe kok etnogo atuaneke meke aperek tugi inakhik, it ap anggur apusu hunu-hunu paluogoluk nekarek meke inom dapukhogon dogolik, hipiri men, anggur apusu iti meke men, nikik,
40024050	hagakhe dogolik, at nen, Noe etnogo itinem, jam iti baga wisigin, iluk, okodek motok akhiragat werekma oe kok etnogo wisigin o.
40024051	Itithogon werekma oe etnogo witluk nen, at atuaneke etnogo karok oba ebe motok obakha 'bogokhogon warogo, it akhuni inoado baga anek hano thalek inetaiken pere dogolik hagakharek meke la'isekherekma etoma la'isaumo, etoma dogolik, aik kirlidik mak-mak hagakhe dogolik, di ago de ago hagakhe dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40025001	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma ipisak tak-tak he, homagarlugi inebe 10 meke nen lampu yibarlogo wolok ap age ikhekhe meke etnogo wagunem elokhoma lagoukha iti hakeneat o.
40025002	Elokhoma lagoukha meke re, inebe 5 ebetlake nen, inetaiken werek. Nen, inebe 5 ebetlake nen, inetaiken dek meke welagoukha.
40025003	It inetaiken dek meke emenogo lampu wolok lagoukha mekeat he, minyak dek agunem hasik aperek henago wolok lageidek.
40025004	Nen, it inetaiken werek meke eranogo anek nen, lampu inom, isoak ageikhe minyak henago inom, wolok lagoukha.
40025005	Meke re, ap age ikhekhe meke iti ebe wageidek motok erapigat werek nen, it emenogo inebe tha'bokhogonat arat noge inil ageikhemo etoma noge motok isukha.
40025006	Itithogon noge isi korlek, hibako eketurlemat, it akhuni nen, Ap age ikhekhe meke etnogo ebe waga ili. Elokhoma witni o, iluk, inane amitmit kokhogon isukhama,
40025007	it homagarlugi emenogo iniluk agoukhasik nen, lampu herle hagarogo yibarlik lagoukha.
40025008	It inetaiken dek meke emenogo nen, it inetaiken werek meke emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, Lampu nit meke nagulariogo. Halok he, minyak hit meke ageikhe woknisani o, iluk, kino yogeisasukhama,
40025009	it homagarlugi inetaiken werek meke emenogo nen he, Dek o. Ato kelelogo hit wokhisigik, aperek nit horligik, hagasumo, dek asigin o. Halok he, oko paliogeima etoma hit nen aperek oko pala lani o, iluk yogeisasukhama,
40025010	oko pala lagoukhama, at ap age ikhekhe meke etnogo arat wageikhesik, it inetaiken werek meke karelogo 'bakhalok welagoukha meke emenogo inom pesta isago nuogoluk wogosik uma ukisikhesik thu lakhikhe.
40025011	Thu larogo ukiluk werekma, it homagarlugi ebetlake emenogo wagoukhasik nen, Nopase, thu hualnisan o, iluk yogokhukhama,
40025012	at nen, Hit iti thani. Hinebe an nokodek o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40025013	Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, “Iti hak, an wisigin iti, hit nen, O itinem jam iti baga wisigin iluk, hinokodek iti nen thetnarik dogolik hinobabut hebelogo dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40025014	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase kok pogot oba meke apma 'bisekherekma etoma, ipisak tak-tak, ap ageikhe o walegat nekalokma lagaluk hagakhe dogolik, at atuaneke meke waisasikhemo wagoukhama, at ameke yi meke ti meke it therogo dogoagaluk inikimo 'biluk lageikhe iti hakeneat o.
40025015	It inobabut palogo inebe dopok wogeisausak tak-tagat wogeisilik lageikhe. Uang kok emas meke ap ageikhe 5. 000 wogokhik, nen, ap ageikhe 2. 000 wogokhik, nen, ap ageikhe 1. 000 wogokhik, hagakhikhe. Itithogon wogeisalok nen, o walegat nekalokma lageikhe.
40025016	Lageikhemo ap 5. 000 waganhikhe meke etnogo uang iti baga yi meke ti meke oko palogo waganhe dogolik, yabokane 5. 000 ageikhe inom lapelogo 'bisikhe.
40025017	Nen, at ageikhe 2. 000 waganhikhe meke etnogo itithogonat yabokane 2. 000 ageikhe inom lapelogo 'bisikhe.
40025018	Mekeat he, ap ageikhe 1. 000 waganhikhe meke etnogo wolok lageikhesik nen, uang oe kok wogokhikhe meke iti agat hulelogo thalogo lima'i lageikhe.
40025019	Itithogon agatma thaldisikhesikmo inoe etnogo welageikhesik nen yabokane wageikhesik, Uang wogeisasigi emenogo it nen yabokane meren thabukha iluk, waisasikhemo wagoukhama,
40025020	ap uang 5. 000 waganhikhe meke etnogo yabokane 5. 000 lapelogo 'bisikhe meke wolok wageikhesik nen, Noe. Hat nen 5. 000 woknikhigin etnogo lakhan. An nen yabokane 5. 000 ageikhe inomat oba lapelogo 'bigima yi o, iluk yogokhikhemo,
40025021	at oe etnogo nen, Nagot wa! Hat hano motok. Hobabut hupulik hano motok hagakhe laganma higi o. Pererlagat meke re, wokhikhi meke hobabut hupulik hago welagan iti nen, yabokane motok doalegat hago dogonok iluk, meldageiluk wokhesigin o. An hoe nakla arleken akhekhe lagei hak, nipisagat ninakla arleken akhauwok nen, uki me o, iluk yogokhikhe.
40025022	Itithogon yogokhikhesik werekma, yabokane at uang 2. 000 waganhikhe meke etnogo oba wageikhesik nen, Noe. Hat nen 2. 000 woknikhigin etnogo lakhan. An nen yabokane 2. 000 ageikhe inomat lapelogo 'bigima yi o, iluk yogokhikhemo,
40025023	at oe etnogo nen he, Nagot wa! Hano motok. Hat hobabut hupulik hano hagakhe laganma higi o. Pererlagat wokhikhi meke, hobabut hupulik hago welagan iti nen he, yabokane motok doalegat hago dogonok nen iluk, meldageiluk wokhesigin o. An hoe nakla arleken akhekhe lagei iti hak, nipisagat ninakla arleken akhauwok nen, uki me o, iluk yogokhikhe.
40025024	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, at ageikhe uang 1. 000 nen waganhikhe meke etnogo oba wageikhesik nen, Noe. Hat he, hobabut motok weak etnogo nen, it aperek nen ai hilogo la'egarek mekeat he, hiki abusagat eken palhigik, it aperek ai yakharek mekeat, hiki abusagat eken palhigik, hagakhetek etnogo re, hobabut an nilu o.
40025025	Itithogon hagakhetek iti nen, an nayuk nen uang hat meke 1. 000 etnogo agat hulelogo lima'i lagei o. Woknikhigin meke etnogo ebe yi! Horlan o, iluk yogokhikhemo,
40025026	at oe etnogo nen, Hat hobabut motok weak hiki waganu weak meke yi! An nen it aperek ai hilogo la'egarek meke eken paligik, it aperek yakharek meke eken horligik, hagakherek nobabut iti hat hilu dogoligat ekhe lagan?
40025027	Itithogon hilu halok he, an nauang iti it akhuni aperek uang hago dogolik, ageikhe inom oba lapelogo 'biliogei meke wogeiselenma, an napuke witluk, nauang ebe meke men, oba lapelogo 'biliogei meke men, horla isuagaluk wogeisauem hagakhen, iluk yogokhikhesik,
40025028	-
40025029	at agarumi ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, It akhuni aperek inikimo hago werek meke iti, yabokane aperek inom oba lapelogo wogeisugunem it meke doalegat hagatlasigin o. Nen, it aperek inikimo dek meke pererlagat dogogin meke iti inikimo nen tilogo horlagein iti nen, ap ithi itithogon hagakhesikmo iti, uang 1. 000 iti ikimo nen tilogo ap ageikhe 10. 000 waganhe meke ithi wogotni o.
40025030	Halok he, at ebe an natuaneke dogosak dek meke yi re, itikmanke o motok mummo inaik kirlidik mak-mak hagakhe dogolik di ago de ago hagakharekma etoma ula’isani o, iluk yogeisasikhe, ” iluk Yesus nen yogeisasikhe.
40025031	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, akhuni nen hogotnakhe korlek, it malaikat Allah nen pogot oba nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo tha’bokhogonat ninom witluk nen, an hogotnakhe korlek kok Netagapogot welagarekma dogolik,
40025032	ap ageikhe ako iteerek meke nen, domba halok asokneat hulogo ’bisigik, kambing halok asokneat hulogo ’bisigik, hulogo ’bisekherek iti hak, it malaikat iti nen akhuni inukuloak etaga dopok an nil oba natogorlogo 'bisa agunem, an nen itithogonat hulogo ’bisagein.
40025033	Hulogo ’bisekhe dogolik, it akhuni domba hakene meke halok, niki ebeke ’bisigik, nen, kambing hakene meke halok, niki paike ’bisigik, hagasigin o.
40025034	-
40025036	Itithogon hulogo ’bisalok nen, an nebe Netagapogot etnogo nen, it niki ebeke ’bisagein meke iti, wene men yogeisagein, An nopase nen hanothinakhemo welagap. Halok he, witni o. An hipiri abu werekma hit nen melaknikhik, i abu werekma hit nen woknikhik, an ap husoat werekma hit nen woknakhik, nasu ugu dek werekma hit nen i’banhik, u warek werekma hit nen ’bitnea ageik, niki herle warek werekma 'bitnea ageik, hagakhigip iti nen, an nopase nen pogot agat aban walhigidek dogolik, hit kok hinetagapogot dogobageik iluk, wenago 'binageisikhe meke yi horlatni o, iluk yogokhunem,
40025037	it Allah ane hologo hagakhe dogogun meke iti nen, Eiye! Noe! Nit nen hat hipiri abu werekma melakhikhik, i abu werekma wokhikhik, hagakhugu iti re, meranem nen hagakhugu nogo?
40025038	Nen, hat ap husoat werekma wokhakhik, hasu ugu dekma i'bagagik, hagakhugu iti, meranem nen hagakhugu nogo?
40025039	Nen, hat u warek werekma, 'bikhea lageik, hiki herle warek werekma, 'bikhea lageik hagakhugu iti meranem nen hagakhugu nogo? iluk yogokhunem,
40025040	an ap kok Netagapogot nogo nen, it akhuni emenogo men yogeisagein, Hit nen an nagarumi inetaga dek meke ageikhe werekma itithogon hagarinakhe lagagip iti, anat hagatnakhe lagagip o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi, iluk yogeisagein.
40025041	-
40025043	Nen, it niki paike 'bisagein meke iti men yogeisagein, An nopase nen hit Jioman 'binagakhe meke yirani! An hipiri abu werekma, hit nen melaknikhidek, i abu werekma, hit nen woknikhidek, ap huso werekma hit nen woknakhidek, su ugu dek werekma hit nen ageikhe i'banhidek, u warek werekma men, niki herle warek werekma men, 'bitnea lageidek hagakhe lagagip o. Halok he, an nopase nen, at Iblis agarumi inebe doalegat inom, hetu nagulasusak dekma dogoagaluk inoboluk 'bisasikhemo etoma horla lani o, iluk yogeisagein.
40025044	Itithogon yogeisugunem, it nen, Eiye! Noe! Hat hipiri abu werekma, i abu werekma, ap huso werekma, hasu ugu dek werekma, u warek werekma, hiki herle warek werekma, o meranem yomakhiigidek kamotdagasugu nogo, iluk yoknisugunem,
40025045	an nen, Dek o. Hit nen akhuni ageikhe inetaga dek meke werekma hinobakhanini thogotdisekhe lagagip iti re, anat thogotdanhe lagagip o, iluk yogeisalok nen,
40025046	it akhuni iti yi aik ti aik hekhedogogun oba motok dogoagaluk la’isagein o. Mekeat he, it Allah ane hologo hagakhe dogogun meke iti iniluk motok dogogunmo etoma ’bisagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40026001	At Yesus nen wene iti tha'bokhogonat arat yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe,
40026002	“Niniki pere dogoluk nen pesta Paskah hagasugun iti hit hiniluat o. Itithogon hagakhe korlek, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, ap nen yoko lalok, it aperek nen o baga meldaniluk nasuagaluk inikimo ’banugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40026003	Itinem, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek meke inom, it ap inarluetek emenogo inom, at ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etaga Kayafas etnogo aila natogotdiluk nen,
40026004	Yesus inileken wolok limago ha’iluk wasuogoluk abok palhe lagoukha.
40026005	Abok palhe dogolik, men isukha, “Pesta kok isago nukunem iti, inaneak kogat walunogo nen, ilugun oba weak asinogo hakhigidek dogoluk, o werlekma halok hakhauwok o, ” iluk abok isukha.
40026006	Itithogon isukhasik werek korlek, at Yesus o Betania ap Simon u henako hakene inayuk meke haganeat ebemake welageikhe meke iti aila etoma ukisikhesik werekma,
40026007	he ageikhe apusu obasi hano oko kogat meke oko palogo isoak helekit meke etaga pualam meke hagarek oba akla ukharlogo wolok Yesus hipiri nasinem oba ukisikhesik nen, ukuloak oba tialogo usakhikhe.
40026008	Itithogon usakhikhemo, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lageukha meke emenogo inileken hasukhasik nen, “Apusu we yugunat alomarogo tialhe yi, nenaluk, ” iluk, inakla aga dageiluk, he etnogo wenagakhe dogolik,
40026009	“Apusu iti oko motok kogat meke palogo nen, it inameke dek meke supurisauem, ” iluk isukha.
40026010	Itithogon isukhama, at Yesus nen inobabut ekagat hutdisasikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “He yi nen hano hagatnakhe mekeat he, nenaluk wenagakhe lagap.
40026011	It akhuni inameke dek meke iti hit hinom motok dogogun mekeat he, an anek he, hit ninom motok dogogun dek o.
40026012	At he yi nen apusu tialdanhe iti, an yabokane nakhunem nebe watlasumo, warek thalnabuogoluk watdanu hagat arat watdani aga o.
40026013	Nane eberogonat yokhisak. He yi eberek dogoagaluk, akhuni wene hano wene etnogo, o yi ai ti ai yogeisilik nekhe dogolik, He iti itithogon hagakhikhe, iluk abok hano ekhe dogogun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40026014	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe 12 emenogo meke, ageikhe etaga Yudas Iskariot etnogo, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo inoba lageikhesik nen,
40026015	“An nen Yesus iti wokhisigi halok he, hit nen oko nena meke woknesugun apegep, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it ap emenogo nen he, “Oko uang perak meke 30 wokhesugun o, ” iluk yogokhukhasik nen, wogokhukha.
40026016	Oko arat wogokhukhama, at Yudas Iskariot etnogo nen, meranem Yesus iti wogeisausak hano iluk akla munini ebekhe lageikhe.
40026017	Yudas itithogon akla ebekhe korlek, it akhuni Yahudi meke eken roti hikherek meke akla usakhidekwerago nekarek etnogo meke nuogoluk dirlu alebageik nekarek meke nuogoluk hagakhe dogolik, it Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Noe, Hat domba pesta Paskah hasik nanok nen, nit nen yi meke ti meke o koma karelogo 'bi lausak warlok apegen, ” iluk oba hinok waganhukhama,
40026018	at Yesus nen, “O kota etnogo lalok nen, ap ageikhe etnaga wene menyogotno. At ninoe wene yakulnisiliogo meke nen he, An hagasigin meke arat horok asi agama nen, an nagarumi nane waganiogei meke ninom, at aila etoma pesta Paskah werago nuok nen yogosi lani o, iluk yoknisekhemo yokhesi ago, iluk yogotno, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
40026019	it emenogo, at nen isikhe hagat, lagoukhasik nen, yi meke ti meke pesta Paskah etnogo hasik motok nimik-nomokhogon 'bisukha.
40026020	O arat hi ageikhemo, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke aperek inom lagoukhasik nen, inebe 12 emenogo inom hurek latluk
40026021	pesta neke dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit ap ya meke ageikhe nen, an nebe nasuagaluk yoko ligin o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40026022	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo inakla motok weak ageikhesik men yogokhukha, “Noe! An a? An dek apigi, ” iluk, inebe dopok nen ilik lagoukha.
40026023	Itithogon ilik lagoukhama, at Yesus nen he, “Hat ageikhe an nipisak niniki opakimo piring akla usageik apusu mago noko meke iti nenat nasuagaluk yoko ligin o.
40026024	An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, hagasigin meke holal waganek werek tak-tagat hagasigin mekeat he, at ap nebe nasuagaluk yoko ligin meke iti anek he, eiye. Motok weagat asigin o. At ap iti itaklatlep dekma, hanoat dogolep meke, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40026025	at Yudas, Yesus wasuagaluk yoko lageikhe etnogo nen he, “Halok he, noe. An a? An dek apigi, ” isikhemo at Yesus nen, “Hat mekeat ekhe lagan, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
40026026	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogokhikhesik, hipiri neke dogolik, roti ikimo waganhikhesik nen, Allah heagei warogo, ebe kusogo it agarumi emenogo supurisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Yi an nebeat o. Waganiluk nen nani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40026027	-
40026028	Yogeisasikhesik yabokane isoak anggur eken apusu henago meke ikimo waganhikhesik nen, Allah heagei warogo it emenogo wogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Yi an namebat o. Allah nen wene warogo wokhinabigin isikhe etnogo, an namep ulabogo nasugun iti baga akhuni doalegat yi weak ti weak hagariogei meke thagalogo degetdisagein iti baga ebeat asigin o. Halok he, hinebe tha'bokhogonat nani o.
40026029	Wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Anggur eken apusu yi nalok, an yabokane ageikhe nikidek dogoluk nen, hurli nopase nen at apma ’bisagein iti hurli hit ninom apusu ket meke nugun o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40026030	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, etai Allah etai ageikhe watluk dukhisukhasik nen, torn Zaitun oba dageisukha.
40026031	Tom Zaitun oba dageisukhasik, at Yesus nen, “At Allah nen, At ap domba therisik welagarek meke iti ebe an nen wakhunem, domba opakimo natogorlek welagarek meke iti, lo lugun o,\rq (Zakharia 13:7)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek iti nen, yogotak hibako yi, hit tha'bokhogonat an thogotdaniluk lo lugun o.
40026032	Mekeat he, an nakhunem Allah nen yabokane nilugutnakhunem, an tak o Galilea dageiluk hinelokhoma dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40026033	at Petrus nen he, “It tha'bokhogonat thogotdageiluk lo lugun halok he, an anek thogotdageiluk lo dukhigin motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40026034	at Yesus nen he, “Yogotak hibako thue ayam motok ane igidek werek korlek, hat nen he, Yesus iti nokodek o, iluk, hiki henagan oba la'beligin etnaga o, iluk eberogonat yokhikhi, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40026035	at Petrus nen he, “Dek o. An nipisagat ninasumo ninasusagat o. Meke re, an nen, Hat nokodek o, iluk, la'beligin dek o, ” iluk isinem, it Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo ebetlake tha'bokhogonat nen, itithogonat ilik lagoukha.
40026036	Itithogon isukhasik nen, at Yesus ebe men, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men, inom Getsemani yabumo lagoukhasik agarumi men yogeisasikhe, “An horok ya lalok sembayan ekhe korlek, hit yoma hurek dogoni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40026037	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, Petrus men, Zebedeus a'buri inebe pere eranogo men, wogosik lageikhesik nen, akla weak atluk etaiken thebelu'buk ageikhemo men yogeisasikhe,
40026038	“An netaiken motok weak agasik watlasusagat hakene hagatnabiogo. Halok he, hit ya dogolik, ninomat ninobabut hebelogo therogo dogouok, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
40026039	at asokneat negen horogat lageikhesik elokhe thogoumhogon wi lageikhesik nen, Allah ayoko 'bekhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Nopase o. An weagatnabugun iti tilnabusak halok he, tilnabin o, ” iluk u hak, “Apusu henago noagaluk woknesugun iti, wokhausak halok he, wokhano. Nen, dek halok he, an nakla apigi meke iti dek o. Hat hakla apegen meke itiat hagatnabino o, ” iluk sembayan isikhe.
40026040	Sembayan itithogon arat iluk nen agarumi henagan emenogo inoba wageikhe meke, it noge motok isinem, at Petrus men yogokhikhe, “Hit he, hibako yi satu jam opaki hasigat an ninom thuam wasusak erlok dek a?
40026041	Weak hagasuagaluk hinakla kagalisinogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogolik, sembayanat ekhe dogoni o. Hinakla nen erlok hagasusak iluk apekhe lagap mekeat, hinebe nen itithogon hagasusak erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
40026042	sembayan alebat isikhe hagat, yabokane dagakhogon lageikhesik nen, men isikhe, “Nopase. An weagatnabugun yi re, tilnabusak erlok dek halok he, hat hakla apegen iti tak-tagat hagatlasuak o, ” iluk, sembayan isikhe.
40026043	Sembayan iluk yabokane wageikhe meke re, it agarumi emenogo noge inil ageikhemo nen he, noge isinem 'birisa wageikhesik nen
40026044	sembayan alep iki pere baga isikhesik, yabokane ageikhe inom igiluk lageikhesik nen, alebageik isikhe hagat, isikhe.
40026045	Arat iluk nen agarumi inoba wageikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit thet walogo noge isi motok dogogun a? Lakhani! Ap ageikhe nen ap weak hagakharek meke nen an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nasuagaluk inikimo 'banigin iti o arat asi aga.
40026046	Halok he, nit luok nen he, hit melatni o. Lakhani! Ap an nasuagaluk yoko laga meke etnogo arat horogat waga ithi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40026047	Yesus nen, “Horogat waga ithi, ” iluk ekhe korlek eranogoat, at Yudas, ebe Yesus agarumi inebe 12 emenogo meke yoko lageikhemo, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo inom, it ap inarluetek emenogo inom nen, it ap inebe doalegat inayoko 'biluk la'isa agoukhama, karok men, payuk men, wolok inebe motok doaldiluk inom wagoukha.
40026048	At Yudas nen Yesus wasuagaluk yoko lageikhe meke etnogo nen, wene men warisasikhesik nen wagoukha, “Ebe hutdubageik nen he, an tak lalok heagei nape tharluk wakhi halok he, hit nen, I, ebe itiat higi, iluk, hakha lano, ” iluk wene arat warisasikhesikmo nogo nen, iniluat werekma
40026049	at tak Yesus oba wageikhesik nen, “Noe o, ” iluk, ape tharluk heagei wakhunem,
40026050	at Yesus nen, “Nagot yi! Hat nenaluk wagan, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, it ap emenogo Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, ebe motok hakhasukha.
40026051	Hakhasinem ap ageikhe Yesus inom welagoukha meke etnogo nen karok aika akla uakma nen kigikhogon, ap Allah iteerek inoe kok atuaneke ageikhe asuk motok 'bogokhogon la'isikhe.
40026052	Itithogon la'isikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Hakarok iti huakma obolukmo ukhasin o. It ap karok oba inakharek oko karok obaat inakharek anek iti o.
40026053	Yogotak an nebe nirlirli woknabuagaluk, nopase kino yogosumo, at nen it malaikat Allah nen pogot oba yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo inebe agot dopok 12 oba doaldiluk pererlagat mekeat he, agot dopok motok doaldiluk inayoko 'bumo, tilnabi wisusak erlok dek apegen a?
40026054	Tilnabi wisusak erlok mekeat he, tilnabilepma Allah nen, Itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek etnogo re, nikithogon tak-tagat atlep apegen. Dek o. Tak-tagat asuagaluk itithogon yogokhidek thogotdigi iti, ” iluk yogokhikhesik,
40026055	it ap doalegat wagoukha emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Ap iki abusak waganhunem hageinakharek iti hak, hit nen itithogonat an haknabuogoluk, karok men, payuk men, motok wolok wagap yi re! An hibiku-yogoku Allah ai halekma hurek dogolik wene yakulisugunem, hit nen yigithogon haknakhidek welagasibat he,
40026056	it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen holal waganhukha etnogo tak-tagat asuagaluk hagatnakhep o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it ap at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo, at ebe thogotdiluk lo motok lagoukha.
40026057	Lo itithogon lagoukhama nen, at Yesus ebe hakhasukhasik, ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etaga Kayafas oba wolok lagoukha. Lagoukhama, etoma it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, it ap inarluetek inom, natogorlek werekma lagoukha.
40026058	Yesus itithogon wolok laga korlek, at Petrus etnogo yabokane inoporlik huyo'bo laga lageikhesik nen, ap kok Kayafas etnogo agokutlu ukisikhesik, “Yesus nikithogon hagasugun, ” iluk ileken hisagaluk, at ap kok etnogo agarumi Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek meke inom thabakhogon hurek lageikhe.
40026059	Hurek werek korlek, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek men, wene Allah hasik erlo pilinekharek meke tha'bokhogonat men, at Yesus wasuogoluk, men isukha, “Akhuni at weak hagakhunem inileken hega meke uak nen herageinabini, ” iluk inekalat wene oba 'buagaluk herageinakhukha meke re,
40026060	inebe doalegat inekalat nen wene oba 'buogoluk wagoukha mekeat he, dek ageikhemo, yabokane ap inebe pere meke wagoukhasik nen,
40026061	“At yi nenat, Allah ai iti misalogo la'iluk nen, obolukmo, yabokane niki pere baga halhe dogoluk nen niki ageikhe baga yi arat ilugun haligin o, iluk isikhe meke, ” isukhama,
40026062	at ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo melageikhesik nen, ‘Tt ap yoma wene doalegat hoba 'biliogei yoma, hat nen oko ageikhe yogeisagein dek a? Oko yogeisaumo re, ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he,
40026063	at Yesus ane igidek thogotdisikhemo, at ap kok Allah iteerek meke etnogo nen he, “Allah a'but Kristus la'isigin isukha etnogo, ebe hat halok he, yoknisanok iluk, at Allah iluk motok welagarek meke etaga hupuk palogo yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40026064	at Yesus nen, “Hat nen egen itiat o. Meke re, an ageikhe yokhisak. Hurli yogotak nen, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, at Allah obatne horleak yi meke ti meke hagasusak anek etnogo nipisak alilu iki ebeke kogat hurek dogoluk nen, yabokane pogot oba etoma nen oisa aklake usa'agunem hinileken neagun o, iluk yokhisigi, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
40026065	it ap Allah iteerek inoe kok etnogo asu li'bilogo la'ekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Allah akla meanetdiluk etaga weagatdekhe iti hegep a? Akhuni nen at weak hagakhunem inileken hega meke wene pakhogon uagaluk nenaluk therisik dogogun. At nen Allah akla meanetdiluk etaga weagatdekhe iti arat hinasuk holhep.
40026066	Halok he, hit nikithogon apekhe lagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen he, “Weak ekhesikmo ebe motogat wasusak o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40026067	Itithogon yogokhukhasik nen, wosi obasuphogon 'bigik, tugi wakhik, iniki agot tugitamuk-hamukhogon wakhik, hagakhe dogolik,
40026068	“Kristus! Tha nen hakhe nogo. Yoknisan ta, ” iluk yogokhe lagoukha.
40026069	Itithogon yogokhe korlek, at Petrus etnogo okutlu holkerlekma hurek werekma, horlak inatuaneke meke ageikhe oba wageikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Hat meneke, Yesus Galilea meke iti hinom nekhe lagap meke apigi, ” iluk yogokhikhemo nen,
40026070	at Petrus nen akhuni doalegat emenogo inil obaat, men yogokhikhe, “Hat egen iti an nokodek o, ” iluk nen,
40026071	holagape palek dukhegarekma eranogo dukhisigiluk hagakhunem, at horlak atuaneke meke ageikhe ninat meke nen ileken lakhalok, akhuni doalegat emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yi Yesus Nazaret meke etnogo inom nekhe lageikha mekeat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40026072	at Petrus nen alep isikhe hagat, yabokane Allah etaga hupuk palhe dogolik, “Ap iti an nokodek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
40026073	eranogoat werekma, it ap doalegat emenogo Petrus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Hane ekagat hutdagakhe lago. Hat hebe eberogonat it mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhukhama
40026074	at Petrus nen he, “Ap iti ebe an nokodek o. Nopase Allah oak! Nekalat igi halok, at nen nasuak o, ” iluk, hupuk palhe korlek eranogoat thue ayam ane arat isikhe.
40026075	Thue ayam ane arat isikhemo, at Petrus nen, “I. Yesus nen yoknekhe dogolik, Thue ayam ane igidek werek korlek, hat nen, Yesus nokodek o, iluk hiki henagan oba la'beligin, iluk yoknekhe etnogo ebe arat la'belhi yi higi, ” iluk, akla ebetdiluk dukhisikhesik nen, etaiken hisogo de ageikhe.
40027001	Itithogon hagakhukhasik werekma, o arat wi ageikhemo hubenke it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek meke emenogo inom, it ap inarluetek emenogo inom, tha'bokhogonat nen, Yesus wasuogoluk abok paldisukhasik,
40027002	iki herle warogo at Pilatus ebe gubernur kok werekma oba wolok wagoukhasik nen, wogokhukha.
40027003	Yesus itithogon wene oba 'biluk eberogonat wasuogoluk hagakhe korlek, at Yudas nen wasuagaluk yoko lageikhe meke etnogo ileken hisasikhesik akla nen, “An weak hagakhi o, ” iluk obabut hebelageikhe. Obabut hebelageikhesik nen, oko uang perak meke 30 wogokhukha etnogo yabokane apuke wogeisagaluk, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek meke emenogo inom, it ap inarluetek emenogo inom, werekma wogeisa ageikhesik wogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe,
40027004	“Eiye! Ap iti weak hagakhidekmaat wasubageik iluk yoko wageima o. Halok he, weagat hagakhima higi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo nen he, “Wene iti nit ninoba agama apegen? Dek o. Iti hat hoba dopogat o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
40027005	at Yudas nen uang perak meke 30 wogokhukhama etnogo Allah ai halekma po wukhogon kola'isalok nen, arlokop herle ekaerek nen irlelogo 'bu'ba negen ebe motok wara lageikhe.
40027006	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it ap Allah iteerek meke koktek emenogo nen uang perak meke 30 etnogo waganhukhasik nen, “Uang yi ap amep oko palagasikmo iti, Allah hasik uang 'begarekma etoma ’busak motok dek o, ” iluk isukhasik nen,
40027007	akhuni huso meke witlukmo watlagunem agatma thalinakhe dogoumo, at ap ageikhe isoak agat meke hagakhe lageikhe meke aagatma, at oba oko palhukha.
40027008	Itithogon hagakhukha iti nen, agat iti etaga “Ap amep usasikhe baga, ” etaga thalageikhesikmo hurli yogotak nen iliogeiat.
40027009	-
40027010	Itithogon hagakhukha iti, ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke Yeremia etnogo nen ekhe dogolik, “Ninopase Etagapogot nen yoknikhikhe tak-tagat, it akhuni Israel meke nen, Ap etnogo ebe oko yi o, iluk isukhasik nen, uang perak meke 30 waganiluk, ap isoak agatmeke hagakherek meke etnogo aagat oko wogokhukha, ”\rq (Zakharia 11:12-13)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisikhe etnogo ebe itinem tak-tagat ageikhe.
40027011	At Yesus ap Pilatus gubernur kok meke etnogo oba wolok wagoukhama elokhoma metek werekma, at gubernur etnogo nen itema waganhe dogolik, “Akhuni Yahudi meke inoe etagapogot etnogo harat a? ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Hat egen itiat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat,
40027012	it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo inom, it ap inarluetek emenogo inom, wene doalegat Yesus oba ’bisukha meke at nen yabokane wene ageikhe oko yogeisigidek huk ageikhe.
40027013	Oko yogeisigidek huk ageikhemo, at Pilatus nen, “Yi wene ti wene doalegat hoba 'biliogei yoma hasuk holhe lagan dek? ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he,
40027014	oko ageikhe motok igidek huk ageikhemo, at gubernur etnogo nen, “Nayuk o! ” iluk hogorakhikhe.
40027015	It akhuni Yahudi meke pesta Paskah kok isago neke dogolik, it nen, “Akhuni doalegat iniki herle warek werekma, at itiathisalogo ulaknisa me o, ” kino isinem he, at gubernur nenhisalogo wogeisekhe lageikhe.
40027016	Itithogonwogeisekherethekma nogo nen itinem, ap ageikhe etaga Yesus Barabas, “Weak hagakherek, ” iluk abok motok thak-pak isikhe inilu meke iki herle warek etoma werekma,
40027017	-
40027018	akhuni doalegat natogokhe korlek, at Pilatus etnogo ileken halok nen, “It yoma Yesus oba ua palogo nenat wolok wageikha apigi, ” iluk, hutdisikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla nen, ap etaga tha herle hisalogo woknisoak apekhe lagap. Yesus Barabas a? E a, at he, Yesus etaga ageikhe Kristus egarek etnogo a, ” iluk, yogeisasikhesik nen,
40027019	wene erlo penakharekma eranogo hurek werekma, at Pilatus age nen ap ageikhe wene warogo la’i ageikhe. La’i aga dogolik, men isikhe, “An hibako noge isinem ap iti hasigat na’bi motok weak higirik o. Halok he, at obabut hano meke iti hat hinom nen wene oba ’bugup o, ” iluk isikhemo yogosi agoukha mekeat he,
40027020	it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo inom, it ap inarluetek emenogo inom nenat, akhuni doalegat emenogo inakla kagalhe dogolik, “Barabas iti iki herle hisalnisekhe dogolik, Yesus iti anek, watno o, iluk yogosubageik, ” iluk yogeisasukhama,
40027021	at gubernur etnogo nen, “Ap inebe pere ya, at tha hak herle hisainisoak iluk apekhe lagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo it nen, “Barabas iti herle hisalnisan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40027022	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Pilatus etnogo nen, “Halok he, Yesus etaga ageikhe Kristus yi nikithogon hagasik, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo it emenogo nen, “O baga meldiluk watno, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40027023	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at nen he, “At weak nena meke hagakhemo nen wasuogoluk ekhe lagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen inane motok obatnerogonat, “O baga meldiluk watno o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40027024	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Pilatus nen, “It akhuni yoma nen, Wasugunat, iluk inane kogat ekhe dogolik ilugun oba weak asusakma, an nane yugunat alomarogon ekhe lagei higi, ” iluk, i henago ageikhe waganhikhesik nen, akhuni emenogo inileken werek korlek iki baga horekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Ap yi amep, an noba asigin dek o. Hirat hinoba asigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
40027025	it doalegat emenogo tha'bokhogonat inane obatnerogonat ekhe dogolik, “At amep iti nit nina’buri ninomat ninoba dopogat dogoak o, ” isukhama,
40027026	at Barabas etnogo iki herle hisalogo wogeisekhe dogolik, at Yesus anek, la’bisoko tugi warogo, o baga meldiluk wasuagaluk wogeisasikhe.
40027027	Pilatus nen Yesus ebe wogeisasikhemo, it agarumi tentara meke emenogo nen gubernur ai kok halekma wolok ukisukhasik nen, at ebe tumo eranogo ’biluk, inagarlak lak opaki doalek inom doalhe lagoukha meke inebe tha'bokhogonat alilu dagakhogon natogokhukhasik nen,
40027028	at asu nokorlogo ’biluk su elokhoken ki’bi-ki’bi warek hakene meke i’bigik,
40027029	ap koktek meke inakare-kare ikhegarek iti hak, arlok weak meke makona warogo ukuloak oba i’bigik, wim oak palogo iki ebeke wogokhik, hagakhe dogolik inebe initibagal yukukhogon, obato motok doalegat aga dogolik, “Noe wa! Noe wa! Ap Yahudi meke inoe etagapogot etnogo harat higi o, ” iluk inane sagun yogokhe dogolik nen,
40027030	wosi elokhoken oba suphogon 'bigik, wim oak etnogo tilogo, ukuloak pakhogon wakhik, hagakhukha.
40027031	Itithogon arat dalhe lagoukhasik nen, su elokhoken ki'bi-ki'bi warek meke etnogo nokorlogo, at ekaerek asu meke i'bigik, hagakhukhasik nen, o baga meldiluk wasuogoluk wolok dukhi agoukha.
40027032	Yesus ebe wasuogoluk wolok, o kota nen arat dukhi agoukhasik wagunem, ap ageikhe etaga Simon, ai o Kirene meke inom abuk agoukhasik inane obatnerogonat men yogokhukha, “Yesus o baga meldiluk wasugun meke o yi hat waganin o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
40027033	Itithogon yogokhukhama, waganhikhemo, o etaga nit ninane baga Inukuloak Palegem werekma u hak, it inane baga Golgota etoma wagoukha.
40027034	Wagoukhasik nen, anggur eken apusu inom, warn a’busal hakene arle weak meke apusu inom, opakimo dabulogo, at noagaluk wogokhukhama walhasikhe meke re, nausak dek iluk, thogotdisikhe.
40027035	Itithogon thogotdisikhesik at ebe arat o baga meldiluk asu nokorlek emenogo, “Tha hak horlagein, ” iluk, omatok thekerlogo walhegarek hak, helekit hupurlekentek meke walhasukhasik nen, asu emenogo arat supusogo horlasukha.
40027036	Arat supusogohorlasukhasik nen, inebe hurek dogolik Yesus ebe therogo welagoukha.
40027037	Dogolik, “Ap yi wene erlo yi baga wakho o, ” iluk u hak, “YESUS YAHUDI MEKE INOE KOK ETAGA POGOT YI, ” iluk holal waganogo o baga ukuloakma tak-tak upu baga tetnokhogon 'bisukha.
40027038	Yesus ebe o baga turlem itithogon meldisukhasik, it ap inebe pere akhuni inameke iniki abusak waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe iki ebeke, ageikhe iki paike, meldisalok inom inakhukhaat.
40027039	Itithogon arat o baga meldisasukhama werekma, akhuni inapmake lageik, wageik, inut kinik inut konok hagakhe dogolik Yesus men yogokhe lagoukha,
40027040	“Wi! Hat nen, men isigin apigi, Allah ai halek iti misalogo ’biluk niki pere baga halhe dogoluk niki ageikhe baga yi nen arat tirliphogo haligin, iluk isigin etnogo re, hebe Allah a’but halok he, o ithi baga nen hekaerek nen tilogo usa me ta! ” iluk yogokhukha.
40027041	Itithogon isi korlek it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo inom, it Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo inom, it ap inarluetek emenogo inom, inane sagun yogokhe dogolik,
40027042	“At nen akhuni aperek tilinakhe laga etnogo mekeat he, at ekaerek nen, tilausak erlok dek yoma re! At o ithi baga nen tilogo usa’aga halok he, ninileken halok at iti nit akhuni Israel meke ninoe etagapogot eberogonat o, iluk, hutduok nen usatnek he!
40027043	Etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik, An Allah a'but o, iluk ekhe laga etnogo re, at Allah nenat tiligin apekhe halok he, tilinegat o, ” iluk isukha.
40027044	Nen, it ap iniki abusak waganhe lagoukha meke inakhukha eranogo nen it Yesus inane sagun itithogon yogokhukhaat.
40027045	Itithogon yogokho werekma, o dikene eketurlem jam 12 oba o hi ageikhesik eta nen logat jam 3 baga, o etoma tha’bokhogonat hiat motok welageikhe.
40027046	Hi werek korlek, jam 3 arat asi lageikhemo, at Yesus nen, nit ninane baga, “Nopase Allah. Nopase Allah. Nenaluk thogotdanhen o, ” iluk u hak, “Eli, Eli, lama sabakhtani”\rq (Mazmur 22:1)\rq* iluk ane kokhogonat yogokhikhe.
40027047	Itithogon yogokhunem, it ap ebetlake etoma welagoukha meke inasuk holhukhasik nen, “At yi Elia wairiogo, ” iluk isukhama,
40027048	ap it meke ageikhe pirlirli lageikhesik nen, haki isiken hakene meke anggur eken apusu arle weak meke mago nen noagaluk thukat oba hunogo wogokhikhemo,
40027049	it aperek emenogo nen, “Huk dogon. At Elia nen tilisigin a? Mei a. Ninileken dogouok o, ” iluk isukha.
40027050	Itithogon isukhama at Yesus ane opaki hasik kokhogon isikhesik nen, arat debekhogon watlageikhe.
40027051	Watlagunem Allah ai halekma su kain meke itikmoke hurli palek welageikhe meke upu eloma nen turlem heisogonat kagoukhogon usa’ageik, dugul aborlok luk-lagathigik, helekit pak igik, hagatlageikhemo nen,
40027052	akhuni warek meke agatma thalinakharek meke emenogo abusagat thu hualarik laga dogolik, Allah a'buri watlagoukha meke inebe doalegat thalinakhukhama nen iniluk agoukhasik melarik lagoukha.
40027053	It iti agat thalinakhukhama emenogo nen melagoukhasik yabokane at Yesus ebe iluk ageikhemo, it iniluk agoukha meke iti, o Yerusalem kota Allah ekaerek ai egarek etnogo ukisukhama, akhuni inebe doalegat nen inileken hisasukha.
40027054	Nen, ap tentara meke inoe kok inom, agarumi aperek Yesus thuam welagoukha meke emenogo inom, dugul luk-lagathigik, yi meke ti meke hagatlageik, hagakhikhe emenogo inileken hasukhasik nen, inayuk motok ageikhesik, “Ap yi re, Allah a'but eberogonat higi o, ” iluk isukha.
40027055	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, it humi Yesus yomakhekhe lagoukha meke o Galilea nen usasukhasik Yesus ebe o baga meldisukhama inileken walegat nen lageik welagoukha.
40027056	It humi eta ageikhe Maria ai Magdala meke. Nen, ageikhe, Yakobus Yusuf ipisak inagosa Maria etnogo. Nen ageikhe, Zebedeus a'buri inagosa etnogo inom, humi aperek inomat welagoukha.
40027057	O arat hi ageikhemo, ap ikierek ai Arimatea meke etaga Yusuf, at Yesus apma ukisikhesik ane waganhe lageikhe meke nen,
40027058	Pilatus oba lageikhesik nen, “Yesus warek iti woknom, ” iluk, kino yogokhikhemo, at Pilatus etnogo agarumi nen wogeisuagaluk, yogeisasikhe.
40027059	Nen, arat wogokhukhama nen, su kain ket etaga lenan meke baga yilogo nen,
40027060	oila at meke ekaerek nen kerat elo herlelogo 'bisikhe baga iti 'biluk nen, thu helekit thabia kok meke dipilogo 'bi ageikhesik tetnokhogon latdiluk lageikhe.
40027061	Meke re, at he Maria ai Magdala meke etnogo inom, he Maria ageikhe etnogo inom, hurek dogolik Yesus ebe warek 'bisinem inileken 'birogo welagoukha.
40027062	It akhuni Yahudi meke hubuluke iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogouogoluk, yogotakne hak yi meke ti meke tik-tuk 'biluk, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo inom, it ap Farisi meke inom, inebe natogorlogo Pilatus oba lagoukhasik nen,
40027063	“Ninopase. Akhuni nukhetdisilik nekhe laga meke etnogo, iluk dogolik nen ane yogeisekhe dogolik, Niki pere warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi nen, niluk asigin o, iluk isikhe etnogo nen,
40027064	at agarumi emenogo nenat warek iti limasi lalok akhuni yogeisekhe dogolik, At Yesus iti watlagasikmo nen Allah nen ilugutdekhemo o, iluk ekhe dogunogo. At alebageik akhuni nukhetdisilik nekhe laga iti herlekha'bugat negen. Meke re, yabokane itithogon hagasumo, kogat nukhetdisaunogo iluk, niniki henagan ya hasik, hanorogo thuam dogoak nen, ap aperek inayoko 'bin o, ” iluk yogokhukhama
40027065	at Pilatus nen, “Thuam dogogun meke inebe yi. Halok he, warek 'begama etoma hanorogon thuam dogoagaluk, 'bisa lani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40027066	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo wogosik lagoukhasik, akhuni nen thu hualunogo iluk, warek thalekma thu helekit tetnokhogon 'bisukha etnogo baga sirlo 'begarek iti hak apusu warogo 'bisukhasik, it ap thuam dogogun meke emenogo thuam 'bisalok lagoukha.
40028001	Itithogon hagakhukhasik iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat welagoukhasik nen, hubuluke hari Minggubaga, mo yegelogo dagei aga korlek, at he Maria ai Magdala meke etnogo inom, he Maria ageikhe etnogo inom, Yesus ebe warek 'bisukhama inileken 'bikhauwogoluk wagoukha.
40028002	Waga korlek eranogoat, dugul kogat luk-lagathasi korlek, malaikat Allah nen pogot oba yoko usa'isa agarek meke ageikhe usa'ageikhesik, thu helekit meke tetnokhogon lakhukha etnogo dipikhogon la'iluk nen, oba hurek lageikhe.
40028003	At malaikat etnogo elokhoken o yabok hakene hagakhe dogolik, asu ugu meke elokhoken kut motok yibarlabethasikhe.
40028004	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it ap thuam welagoukha meke emenogo inayuk nen inoageleke dik-dik hagakhe dogolik, akhuni warek meke hakene motok hagatlagoukha.
40028005	Nen, at malaikat etnogo nen it humi emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hinayuk agup o. Hit nen, Yesus o baga meldiluk wakha etnogo hinileken 'bikhauwogoluk wagap iti an nilu o.
40028006	Meke re, ebe yoma dek. At nen yokhisasikhe hagat, Allah nen ilugutdekhemo werek o. At welagama yoma oboluk anek yi hinileken 'bikhatni.
40028007	'Bikhalok nen, Yesus etnogo watlagasikmo nen Allah nen ilugutdekhemo o, iluk, at agarumi ane waganhe lageikha meke emenogo ibat yogeisa lano o. Hit o Galilea etoma aban lageidek werek korlek, at tak hinelokhoma lalok werekma hinileken 'bikha lugun o. Nane yokhisigi iti eberek dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
40028008	it humi emenogo oila etoma nen ibat laga dogolik inayuk agoukha mekeat he, yabokane inakla arleken motok akhilik akhilik, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inoba pirlirliat yogeisa lagoukha.
40028009	Yogeisa luogoluk lagunem holagarlem at Yesus inom abuk agoukhasik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nerugi o! ” iluk yogeisasikhemo it humi emenogo horok-horok lagoukhasik nen, isok iniki hakhekhe dogolik, heagei warogo initibagal yukukhogon hogorakhukha.
40028010	Hogorakhukhama, at Yesus nen he, “Hinayuk agup o. An nagarumi emenogo o Galilea dagouak nen, yogeisa lani o. Etoma dageiluk inileken 'bitneagun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
40028011	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it humi eranogo aban laga korlek, it ap thuam welagoukha meke emenogo aperek o kota ukisukhasik nen, wene tha'bokhogonat hagatlageikhe meke emenogo, “Itithogon hagatlaga, ” iluk, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo motok pilin-palinhogo yogeisasukha.
40028012	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, it men, it ap inarluetek emenogo men, inom natogotdiluk wene paldiluk nen, it ap tentara meke emenogo uang perak meke doalegat wogeisekhe dogolik
40028013	men isukha, “Hit nen, Hibako nit noge isi korlek, at Yesus ane waganhe lageikha meke emenogo wageikhasik nen Yesus ebe warek lima’iluk dukhegama, iluk yogeisekhe dogono o.
40028014	Wene hagatlaga meke iti hasik, at Gubernur asuk holigin halok, hit wene ninoba ’bigin iluk, hinelabut hisunogo iluk, nit nen akla kagalugun o, ” iluk isukhama,
40028015	it ap tentara meke uang emenogo horlasukhasik nen, it ap emenogo nen isukha tak-tagat hagakhukha. Wene iti wikhatdisukhama nen, it akhuni Yahudi meke nen, yogotak hurli isi motogat werek o.
40028016	At Yesus nen at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe 11 emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “O Galilea lalok torn iti baga dageiluk dogono, ” iluk wene warisasikhe tak-tagat lagoukhasik dageisukha.
40028017	Dageisukhasik werekma at Yesus ebe inileken hasukhasiknen, heagei warogo initibagal yukukhogon hogorakhe korlek mekeat he, it aperek emenogo anek he, “At ebeat a? Men a, ” iluk apasukha.
40028018	Itithogon apekhe korlek, at Yesus ebe inalilu wageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen he, pogot oba meke inom, agat oba meke inom, tha’bokhogonat an iteerek ’banhemo o.
40028019	-
