40028020	Halok he, yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga dopok tha'bokhogonat an nagarumi hagatlasuagaluk, nopase Allah etaga baga, an a’but netaga baga, Agoreke etaga baga, ninetaga palogo ima usa’isigik, an nen wene hinasuk wakhi meke iti tha’bokhogonat it akhuni nen mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk yakulisigik, hagarik laga dogono. Lakhani! Hit itithogon hagarinabik lagunem, an nebe ninom motok-motogat werekma, hurli o ilugun hurli baga hagatlasigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41001001	At Yesus Kristus Allah a'but wene hano wene hagakhe lageikhe wene yokhisak.
41001002	Wene iti, erlo baga, at Yesaya Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen holal waganogo 'bisikhe hagat hagatlageikhe. Itithogon holal waganhe dogolik men isikhe, “At Allah nen he, Hat yabokane lanogoluk, ap ageikhe hat hagolak ya'agekhe dogoagaluk ayoko 'biluk alep la'igima o.\rq (Maleakhi 3:1)\rq*
41001003	At ebe o limo akhuni dekma etoma ane wai ekhe dogolik, Eiya! Ninoe Etagapogot wisiginke, holakhanorogon yakhik, korlo meke mothogon yakhik, yakhe dogoni o, iluk waisiliogo, ”\rq (Yesaya 40:3)\rq* iluk isikhemo, at Yesaya nen holal waganogo 'bisikhe iti.
41001004	Wene holal waganek werek iti tak-tagat, at Yohanes ebe o limo akhuni dekma wageikhe iti. Wageikhesik nen, akhuni ima usa'isigik, wene yogeisigik, hagakhe dogolik, men ekhe lageikhe, “Wene hinoba meke Allah nen thagalogodegetdisoagaluk hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti here'isalok hinobabut hebelatni. Hinobabut hebelasumo, an nen ima usa’inagagin o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhe.
41001005	Itithogon yogeisugunem he, it akhuni o propinsi Yudea meke inom, o kota Yerusalem meke inom, inebe tha’bokhogonat, at oba natogosi aga lagoukha. Natogosi wagoukhasik, yi weak ti weak hagakhe lagoukha meke ’bualogo here’isugunem, at nen i Yordan ima usa’isekhe lageikhe.
41001006	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik warn unta isi meke karogo asu ikhigik, oado meke karogo therlok hagarogo ikhigik, ikhe lageikhe. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hipiri yibirla meke nikik, themuk apusu okama meke nikik, hagakhe lageikhe.
41001007	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, men yogeisekhe lageikhe, “An nebe yekerek nobatne dek meke wagei yi, ap kok obatneak meke yabokane wisigin o. At ebe kok obatneak iti nen, at isok agot herle warek iti, an nen nitibagal yukukhogon hisalusak erlok dek o.
41001008	Nen, an weat, ima usa’inageikhe lagei mekeat he, at ebe witluk nen ima usa’inagu hak, Allah Agoreke hinoba usa’inageisigin o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhe.
41001009	At Yohanes nen wene itithogon yogeisugunem, at Yesus Galilea eloke o etaga Nazaret etoma nen oba usasikhemo, i Yordan ima usa’isikhe.
41001010	Ima usa’isikhemo i aik oba dukhisigin thalekma, Allah Agoreke pogot kagoukhogon thue merpati yogeik hakene oba duk i usa’agunem ileken hasikhe.
41001011	Ileken hasinem, Allah ane pogot oba nen men isikhe, “Hat hebe an na’but netaiken hunik meke o. Hat hobasik noba hotok ekhe o, ” iluk ane usa’i ageikhe.
41001012	Allah ane usa'i aga korlek eranogoat, Agoreke nen, Yesus o limo akhuni dekma wolok lageikhe.
41001013	Wolok lageikhemo nen, o limo akhuni dekma etoma, iki 40 hari werek korlek, Iblis nen akla kagaligiluk oba waga lageikhe. O etoma 'bagei aila werekma malaikat Allah nen pogot oba yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo aperek usa'isa agoukhasik therogo welagoukha.
41001014	Yabokane Yohanes etnogo iki herle wakhukhasikmo, at Yesus o Galilea eloke dagei ageikhesik nen, Allah ane hano wene etnogo yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe.
41001015	Yogeisilik nekhe dogolik, men ekhe lageikhe, “O Allah apma 'binagagin etnogo arat 'binagagin o. Halok he, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke here’isalok hinobabut hebelogo hano wene yi eberogonat iluk hutdini o, ” iluk yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe.
41001016	Yogeisilik nekhe dogolik, i Galilea yekelekma aik obake laga dogolik, Simon agot Andreas ipisak hibiku-yogoku ikanat waganharethekma nogo nen ikan waganuogoluk, su yoge su ima usakhunem ileken lageisasikhe.
41001017	Ileken lageisasikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ikan waganhe lagap iti hak, akhuni itithogonat woginakhe dogobageik nen, yakulhisak nen noporlik witni o, ” iluk inayoko 'bisasikhe.
41001018	Inayoko 'bisugunem eranogoat inasu yoge su etoma here’isalok, Yesus oporlik lagoukha.
41001019	Oporlik lagoukhama horogat lagoukhasik nen, Zebedeus a'buri Yakobus agot Yohanes ipisak, ku baga inasu yoge su 'bugukakhunem ileken lageisasikhe.
41001020	Ileken lageisalok nen, eranogoat waisasikhe. Waisasikhemo, inopase inom, ap oko wogeisagaluk inayoko 'bisikhe meke inom, ku baga 'bisalok Yesus oporligat lagoukha.
41001021	it emenogo Yesus oporlik laga dogolik, o Kapernaum ukisukha. Ukisukhasik nen he, iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukisikhesik nen, Yesus nen wene yakulisasikhe.
41001022	Yakulisugunem, it akhuni emenogo nen men isukha, “Ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke nen yakulnisegarek hak iliogo dek o. At he, wene ebe iteerek dogolik yakulisegarek hak yakulnisiliogo iti nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
41001023	Itithogon hogorakhe lagoukha itinemat, ap ageikhe mokat obabut weak meke akla ukisikhesik welageikhe meke, o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma inoba ukisikhesik ane kokhogon men yogokhikhe,
41001024	“Yesus ai Nazaret meke yi! Hat nen nikithogon hagatninabigiluk wagan. Nit weagatninabigiluk wagan a? Hat hebe Allah ekaerek hasik meldageikhesik la’agei agama wagan iti, an nen hutdagagi o, ” iluk ane kokhogonat yogokhikhe.
41001025	Itithogon yogokhikhe mekeat he, at Yesus nen wenagakhe dogolik, “Hane. Ap yi akla nen dukhi lan o! ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41001026	mokat obabut weak meke etnogo ap etnogo akla nen dukhigiluk hagakhe dogolik, ap etnogo oageleke dik-dik igik, ane naik igik, hagakhe dogolik dukhisikhe.
41001027	Dukhisikhemo, it akhuni emenogo it-it men isukha, “Eiye! Yi nikithogon hagakhe. Wene iti, ket ninat wene iteerek nen yakulnisiliogo higi. At nen ane hakhugunem, mokat inobabut weak meke inasuk holiogei iti nayuk! ” iluk hogorakhukha.
41001028	Itithogon hogorakhukhama, at Yesus abok o Galilea eloke o ya ta etoma ibat thak-pakhogon hagatlageikhe.
41001029	At Yesus inom, Yakobus Yohanes ipisak inom, agarumi aperek inom, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma nen dukhi agoukhasik piokhogon Simon dok, Andreas dok, inaila lagoukha.
41001030	Inaila lagoukhasik nen, uma ukisukhama, Simon akhoan oba u agaken weak nen witik werekma ukisinem eranogoat, it nen, “He yi oba u nen werek o, ” iluk Yesus yogokhukha.
41001031	Yogokhukhama he etnogo alilu lageikhesik nen, iki hago meldisikhe. Meldisinem he, oba u agaken etnogo dek ageikhe. U dek ageikhemo nen, at nenat yomageisekhe lageikhe.
41001032	Itithogon yomageisekho werekma, hiamaganekeke mo kobokhogon lageikhesikmo nen, it akhuni nen he, it aperek u warek meke inom, mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukisukhasik welagoukha meke inom, wogosik Yesus oba wagoukha.
41001033	Waga korlek akhuni aperek o etoma meke tha'bokhogonat silimo natogosi agoukha.
41001034	Natogosi agoukhama, it yi u ti u warek welagoukha meke inebe doalegat hano hagarinakhik, mokat inobabut weak meke inebe doalegat akhuni inakla ukisukhasik werekma mukhogo ula'isigik, hagakhikhe. Hagakhunem, it mokat inobabut weak meke nen, “Ap yi ebe Yesus o, ” iluk hutdisukha iti nen, “Hinane usak dek o, ” iluk wene palhikhe.
41001035	Itithogon hagarinakhe lageikhesik nen, noge isikhesik o wik-wik at iluk atluk dukhisikhe. Dukhisikhesik nen, o limo akhuni dekma lageikhesik sembayan ekhe lageikhe.
41001036	Itithogon sembayan isi korlek, it Simon lak nen yabokane Yesus hearik lagoukha.
41001037	Hearik lagoukha meke, Yesus ebe werekma lagoukhasik, it nen, men isukha, “Akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen herakhabiogei o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41001038	Yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men isikhe, “Ninaliluke o ukul tha'bokhogonat upuke wemake yoma wene hano wene yogeisilik lagalugat wagei iti nen, yogeisilik luok nen witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41001039	Yogeisasikhesik nen, o Galilea eloke akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekmake ukisikhesik nen, wene hano wene etnogo yogeisigik, mokat inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukisukhasik werekma mukhogo ula'isigik, hiagarik laga lageikhe.
41001040	Itithogon hagarinabik lagunem he, ap ageikhe u henako hakene inayuk meke oba welageikhe meke Yesus oba wageikhesik nen, itibagal yukukhogon heagei wakhe dogolik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe nakmu o. Hat hakla nen hano hagatnabigin apegen halok he, erlok hano hagatnabusagat o, ” iluk ane a'buarek negen yogokhikhe.
41001041	Yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, at ebe akmu ageikhesik nen, iki hakhasikhesik nen, men isikhe, “Nakla nen hano hagathabigin apigirikmoat o. Halok he, hoba hano asin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41001042	Yogokhe korlek, eranogoat oba u henako hakene etnogo dek ageikhesik hano ageikhe.
41001043	Hano ageikhemo, at Yesus nen ebe la'igiluk ane obatnerogon asuk wakhe dogolik,
41001044	men yogokhikhe, “Yesus itithogon hagatnakhe iluk, akhuni aperek motok yogeisugun o. Ap Allah iteerek meke ileken heoak nen oba lalok men hagatno. At Musa nen ekhe dogolik, Akhuni inoba hano atluk, Allah hasik ageikhe 'bisano, iluk isikhe tak-tagat, Oba hano agama, iluk hutdaguak nen, Allah hasik ageikhe 'bisa lano, ” iluk asuk warogo la'isikhe.
41001045	Itithogon yogeisugun iluk asuk warogo la'isikhe mekeat he, at etnogo nen akhuni yugunat yogeisekhe dogolik he, “Yigithogon hano hagatnakhe o, ” iluk abok ya ta yogeisilik lageikhe iti nen, at Yesus nen o ukul kokmake etoma thelekma lausak erlok dek nen, itikmanke o limo akhuni dekma lageikhesik welageikhe. Itithogon welageikhe mekeat he, akhuni o yi ai ti ai etoma nen oba natogosi aga lagoukha.
41002001	At Yesus iki pere negen o etoma welageikhesik nen, yabokane o Kapernaum uki ageikhe. Uki ageikhesik nen, uma ukisikhemo, akhuni nen he, “At ebe uma werek o, ” iluk isinem inasuk holhukha.
41002002	Inasuk holiluk nen, akhuni inebe doalegat natogosi agoukha. Wagoukhama uma kerlekhogonat, nen, miso hulakma inom kerlekhogonat natogosi agoukhama, wene hano wene etnogo yogeisasikhe.
41002003	Yogeisugunem he, ap inebe 4 oba nen, ap ageikhe iki isok aborlok dek motok welageikhe meke o perlago wolok Yesus oba wagoukha.
41002004	Wolok wagoukhasik, Yesus oba wolok ukuogoluk hagakhukha meke re, akhuni kerlek nen, nikithogon wolok uku heat ageikhemo, o warleke baga dageisukhasik, Yesus ebe welageikhe mot-morat warleke supuk talogo nen, ap iki isok aborlok dek meke etnogo arlit eka noge ekhe lageikhe meke baga earogo usa'isukha.
41002005	Itithogon usa'isukhama, at Yesus ileken halok nen, men isikhe, “Ap yi inetaiken an noba hakotdegasik nen wolok wageikha higi, ” iluk ileken ekagat hisasikhesik nen, ap iki isok aborlok dek meke etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Na'but o. Hat weak hagakhe lagan meke an nen thagalogo degetdigi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41002006	Itithogon yogokhunem, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke aperek etoma hurek dogolik, it-it inakla nen he,
41002007	“Ap yi wene ekhe iti, nenaluk ekhe. Nit akhuni weak hagakhe lago meke iti, it akhuni aperek nen erlok thagalogo degetdisausak nogo? At Allah arligat nen erlok thagalogo degetdisekherek mekeat he, at yi nen Allah akla meanetdiluk etaga weagatdiliogo, ” iluk inakla apasukha.
41002008	Itithogon inakla apasinem, at Yesus akla nen, “It inakla itithogon apiliogei, ” iluk eranogoat hutdisasikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla itithogon apekhe lagap iti, nenaluk apekhe lagap.
41002009	An nen ap iki isok aborlok dek meke yi, wene yogosusak he, alhe hakene ki apegep. Hat weak hagakhe lagan meke iti arat thagalogo degetdigi, iluk yogokhi iti alhe hakene meke yogokhi apegep a? E a, at he, Hebe melatluk nen, harlit eka talogo noge ekhe lagan meke yi horlalok lan o, iluk yogosusak alhe hakene apegep a? Dek o. Hebe melatluk lan, iluk yogosumo akinat o.
41002010	Akin mekeat he, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo agat oba yoma dogolik, akhuni yi weak ti weak hagakharek meke an nenat thagalogo degetdekhe dogoagaluk, Allah nen iteerek danhikhe meke itihutdanubageik nen, yogosik, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik, ap iki isok aborlok dek meke etnogo men yogokhikhe,
41002011	“Hebe melatluk nen, harlit eka talek yi horlalok haila lan o, ” iluk la'isikhemo
41002012	ap etnogo melatluk, eranogoat direka talek etnogo it ap emenogo tha'bokhogonat iniloba horlalok dukhisikhe. Itithogon dukhisi korlek, it akhuni emenogo tha'bokhogonat nen, men isukha, “Eiya! Nayuk o. Nit yoma alebat akhuni aperek nen yigithogon ageikhe hagakhunem hogorek dek meke hagakhe yi nayuk o, ” iluk Allah hogorakhukha.
41002013	Itithogon hagatdiluk yabokane, at Yesus i yekelek etnogo aik obake lageikhe. Lagunem he, akhuni doalegat at oba natogosi agoukhama, wene yakulisasikhesik lageikhe.
41002014	Wene yakulisalok laga dogolik nen, ap Lewi, Alfeus a'but, kantor uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganhe lagoukhama hurek werekma ileken hasikhe. Ileken halok nen, “An noporlik eme o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, melatluk oporlik lageikhe.
41002015	Lageikhesik nen, at Lewi aila Yesus ipisak ukisukhasik akhuni doalegat, it ap uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganhe lagoukha meke inebe doalegat inom, it aperek weak hagakhe lagoukha meke inom, Yesus oporlik lagoukhasikmo nogo nen, at Yesus ebe inom, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, hipiri nuogoluk hurek lagunem, it inom nuogoluk hurek lagoukhaat.
41002016	Itithogon nasi werekma, it ap Farisi meke Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke aperek nen inileken kolageisasukha. It aperek weak hagakhe lagoukha meke inom, it ap uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganhe lagoukha meke inom, Yesus inom hipiri nukunem inileken kolageisalok, it ap Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasukha, “At Yesus ap uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganharek meke inom, it akhuni weak hagariogei meke inom, hipiri opakimo dapukhogon niliogei yoma nenaluk, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
41002017	Itithogon yogeisugunem, at Yesus asuk holhikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni inoba hano meke dokter lak nen u hagarinabuagaluk inayoko 'busak a? Dek o. Inoba u werek halogat it dokter lak inayoko 'busak o. Iti hak, an akhuni hano hagariogei meke inayoko 'bigiluk wagagi 'buk. Akhuni weak hagariogei meke iti inayoko 'bigiluk wagagi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41002018	Yabokane, iniki ageikhe baga, at Yohanes agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke men, it ap Farisi meke inagarumi inane waganhe lagoukha meke men, sembayan uogoluk, hipiri nikidek werlegat welagoukha. Itithogon werek korlek, it akhuni aperek Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Yesus. It Yohanes agarumi ane waganiogei meke inom, it ap Farisi meke inagarumi inane waganiogei meke inom, sembayan uogoluk hipiri nikidek werek korlegat he, hat hagarumi hane waganiogei meke ethoma anek he, itithogon hagakhidek hipiri niliogei iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41002019	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe age waganhe dogolik, at agarlak lak erugi inayoko 'bigin meke inom dogolik warn inom, hipiri inom, nikidek werlegat dogosak nogo? Dek o. Ap iti inom dogolik, itithogon nikidek werlegat dogosak dek.
41002020	Mekeat he, ap iti agarlak lak erugi ’bisalok ebe wolok lugun oba weregat o. Itithogon wolok laumo itinem anek he, it iti iniki ageikhe hipiri nikidek werlegat dogogunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41002021	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen, su alep iriogei meke li’bilaga halok, kain ket meke baga ’bugukakharek dek. Itithogon ’bugukakho halok he, kain ket meke dikikhogon hagatlaga dogolik, su iti kogat li’bilarik lausak o.
41002022	Iti hak, akhuni nen anggur eken apusu kerat herelogo isoak domba oado meke haganeat hagarek meke akla baga henakharek dek. Itithogon henasumo nen, isoak iti suphogo apusu tialogo alomatlageik, isoak weak hagatlageik, hagatlasunogo iluk, anggur eken apusu ket meke herelogo isoak ket meke baga henakharek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41002023	Akhuni Yahudi meke iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat welageikharek etnogo baga ageikhe at Yesus ebe inom, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, gandum ai yagomake laga dogolik, agarumi nen gandum eken palik palik lagoukha.
41002024	Palik lagoukhama, it ap Farisi meke nen, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Lakhan! It yi niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, Itithogon hagasusak dek, iluk wene palek werek mekeat paliogei yi nenaluk, ” iluk wene palhukha.
41002025	Itithogon wene palhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap Daud agarumi oporlik lagoukha meke inom hipiri dek nen nonaik 'bisasikhemo, at nen hagakhikhe meke Allah ane baga holal waganek werek etnogo hit nen etaga thalhidek welagap a? Etaga thalhethebat o.
41002026	At Daud nen, ap Abyatar it ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok dogolik Allah ai halekma Allah hasik hagakhunem oba ukiluk, roti Allah hasik ’bisegarek meke yugunat nausak motok dek. It Allah iteerek meke anek nausak, iluk wene palek mekeat he, at Daud nen nasikhesik, agarumi oporlik lagoukha meke emenogo wogeisasikhemo nasukhaat, iluk holal waganek werek etnogo etaga thalhidek welagap nogo? ” ilukyogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
41002027	“Allah nen he, Hiniki 7 baga an nobasik werlegat dogono o,\rq (Keluaran 20:10)\rq* isikhe iti, wene iti kogotdigiluk inebe winametdisasikhe ’buk. Akhuni inebe kogotdisalok nen, Hiniki 7 baga an nobasik werlegat dogono o, iluk inebe hasigat isikhe iti o.
41002028	Itithogon isikhe iti nen, niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat welagorek iti, iteerek an abat itaklasi agagi nebe yiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41003001	Yabokane, at Yesus o it akhuni Yahudi mekesembayan egarekma ukisikhe. Ukisikhe hak, o etoma ap ageikhe iki ebelake lapelek meke welageikhe.
41003002	Itithogon werekma ukisikhemo nen, it ap aperek inakla nen men apasukha, “Yogotak he, niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, at nen ap ithi hano hagasigin a? Dek a. Hagakhe halok he, Hat weak hagakhen, iluk, wene oba 'buok o, ” iluk inileken waganhe lagoukha.
41003003	Itithogon inileken waganhe korlek, at Yesus nen ap iki lapelek meke etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hebe, melatluk, tumo ya eme o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
41003004	melasi lageikhemo nen, it akhuni emenogo menyogeisasikhe, “Niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik hano hagarinabusak a? Weak hagarinabusak a. Tilinabusak a? Inasusak a, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, inane dek huk agoukha.
41003005	Inane dek agoukhama, at Yesus ileken hisilik lageikhesik akla nen, “Inobabut pirla-parlarek yi re! ” iluk akla korlo atluk akla aga dageisikhe. Itithogon it inobasik akla aga dageikhe meke re, akla weak ageikhesik nen, ap etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hiki walokhan, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, iki walokhogon la'isikhemo nen arat hano ageikhe.
41003006	Iki itithogon hano hagakhikhemo, it ap Farisi meke emenogo dukhisukhasik ibat Herodes agarumi inoba lagoukhasik nen, “Yesus nikithogon wasuok, ” iluk inom abok palhukha.
41003007	-
41003008	Itithogon hagatluk, yabokane, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inomat he, i Galilea yekelekma etnogo aik oba lagoukha. Lagoukhama, akhuni nen, “Yesus yigithogon hagariogo, tigithogon hagariogo, ” iluk abok ugunem, it akhuni o Galilea eloke meke doalegat inasuk holiluk inoporlik inoporlik lagunem, it akhuni o Yudea eloke meke men, o Yerusalem meke men, o Idumea eloke meke men, o i Yordan aik ilibagan meke men, o Tirus Sidon meke men, Yesus oba natogosi agoukha.
41003009	-
41003010	Itithogon natogosi agoukhama, inebe doalegat u hano hagarinakhunem, it u inoba werek meke tha’bokhogonat nen, akhuni aperek higirisigik-hearisigik Yesus iniki hakhauwogoluk oba ukekhe lagoukha iti nen, at Yesus nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni doalegatma an nalilu kirlik-kerlek asisunogo nen, ku ’bugurlagat meke ageikhe an nobasik 'baniluk dogoni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41003011	U itithogon hano hagarinakhe korlek, it mokat inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk welagoukha meke nen Yesus ebe inileken halok nen, inelokhe thogoum isukhasik nen, inane kokhogon yogokhe dogolik, men ekhe lagoukha, “Allah a'but he, harat o, ” iluk yogokhe lagoukha.
41003012	Itithogon yogokhukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “An Allah a'but, iluk nabok yogeisausak motok dek o, ” iluk ane obatnerogon wenageisasikhe.
41003013	Itithogon wenageisalok yabokane, at Yesus ebe tom oba dageisikhe. Dageiluk nen, “Ap inebe eta noba wisuak, ” iluk akla apasikhe meke anek waisasikhemo, oba dageisukhama,
41003014	-
41003015	inebe 12 nen meldisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit an ninom motok dogoluk nen, hano wene yogeisigik, mokat inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma, an nobatne wokhisaumo mukhogo ula'isigik, hano hagarinabik nekhe dogobageik nen la'inagagin o, ” iluk meldisasikhe.
41003016	Inebe 12 nen meldisasikhe meke emenogo, inetaga yi: Simon etaga ageikhe Petrus thalhikhe meke etnogo men,
41003017	Zebedeus a'buri Yakobus agot Yohanes ipisak inetaga nit ninane baga pogot ane ekherek hakene u hak, it inane baga Boanerges thalinakhikhe meke men,
41003018	Andreas men, Filipus men, Bartolomeus men, Matius men, Tomas men, Alfeus a'but Yakobus men, Tadeus men, Simon, “O yoma ninaierek meke anek dogouok, ” iluk ekhe lageikhe meke etnogo men,
41003019	Yudas Iskariot Yesus wasuagaluk yabokane yoko lageikhe meke etnogo men, inebe eta meldisasikhe.
41003020	Itithogon meldisalok apuke aila usageikhemo, akhuni doalegat yabokane oba natogosi agoukhama, Yesus agarumi inom inapiri nikithogon nau heat hagatlageikhe.
41003021	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, akhuni aperek nen, “At etaiken hunu-hunu agasik werek iti, ” ugunem, it Yesus agarumi inasuk holhukhasik, at ebe waganuogoluk wagoukha.
41003022	It waga korlek, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke o Yerusalem nen dagei agoukhasik nen, men isukha, “Beelzebul mokat inobabut weak meke inoe kok etnogo Yesus oba dukthek werek o. Itithogon werekma nogo nen, at obatne baga mokat at agarumi negen inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isiliogo o, ” iluk isukha.
41003023	Itithogon isukhama, at Yesus nen akhuni doalegat emenogo waisasikhesik nen, wene oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Iblis akhuni inakla ukiluk, ekaerek nen mukhogo erlok ula'akhausak nogo? Motok erlok dek o.
41003024	Nen, ap kok etagapogot opakiat meke agarumi apma hagasik welagarek inom it-it hurlitdakhalok inom weak dogogun halok, opakiat dogolik inobatne welagoukha hak dogogun dek. Erlok dek asugun o.
41003025	Nen, ap ageikhe a'buri inom hurlitdakhalok inom weak dogogun halok he, ap opakiat a’buri inom dogolik hano welagoukha hak dogogun dek. Weak asugunat o.
41003026	Iti hak, at Iblis ekaerek agarumi mokat inobabut weak meke inom hurlitdakhalok inom weak atlepma, welageikharek hak inobatne dogolep dek. Arat dek atlep o.
41003027	Nen, ap ageikhe obatne horleak meke iki herle warogo 'bigidek, aila ameke yi meke ti meke iniki abusak wagani ukusak erlok dek o. At he, iki herle warogo 'biluk anek, erlok wagani ukusak o, ” iluk yogeisalok wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
41003028	“Nane eberogonat yokhisak. Akhuni nen yi weak ti weak hagariogei meke men, inakla nen akhuni aperek meanetdisalok, inane baga nen inetaga weagatdisiliogei meke men, at Allah nen erlok thagalogo degetdisausak mekeat he,
41003029	Allah Agoreke iti inakla meanetdisalok etaga weagatdisi halok he, thagalogo degetdisausak dek o. Weak hagasugun iti hasik ukum inoba motok-motok dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41003030	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, it nen, “Yesus mokat obabut weak meke akla ukekhesik werek, ” iluk isukhama nen, yogeisasikhe iti.
41003031	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, at Yesus agosa men, agarumi men, wagoukhasik okutlu metek dogolik, Yesus dukhisuagaluk akhuni inoba wene yoko kola'isasukha.
41003032	Kola'isasukhama it akhuni doalegat Yesus alilu hurek welagoukha meke nen men yogokhukha, “Yesus, lakhan! Hat hagosa men, hagarumi men, herakhabik wageikhasik okutlu werek o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41003033	Yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “An nagosa nagarumi iti thani nogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
41003034	akhuni at alilu hurek welagoukha meke emenogo ileken 'birisilik lageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nagosa, nagarumi hit yiat o.
41003035	Tha nen, at Allah akla apekherek meke mothogon hagakherek halok he, at iti an nagot, neru, nagosa, werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41004001	Yabokane, at Yesus i Galilea yekelek etnogo aik oba dogolik wene yakulisekhe lageikhe. Yakulisugunem akhuni inebe doalegat at oba natogosi agoukhama, it inebe i aik oba 'bisalok, at ebe ima ku baga hureklasi ukisikhe.
41004002	Hureklasi ukisikhesik, wene yi meke oba likhik, ti meke oba likhik, wene doalegat yakulisasikhe. Yakulisekhe dogolik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
41004003	“Hinasuk holini. Ap ageikhe ai hilogo la'ekherek meke ai hilogo la'igiluk dukhisikhe.
41004004	Dukhisikhesik, ai hilogo la'ilik lagunem, ai aperek holagarlem usa'isikhe. Usa'isinem, thue wageikhesik tha'bokhogonat haumhogo nasikhe.
41004005	Nen, ai ageikhe, helekit oba agat apum dekma usa'isikhe meke re, agat apum dekma nogo nen, aku ibat hurlelhikhe.
41004006	Hurlelhikhe mekeat he, o mo wageikhemo, omaken yakhidek nen, tha'bet ageikhesik puk ageikhe.
41004007	Nen, ai ageikhe, oka arlok weakma usa'isikhe meke re, oka arlok iti meke kok aga dogolik, ai hano meke yago etnogo akurladap ageikhesik, eken ikidek welageikhe.
41004008	Nen, ai ageikhe, agat mirlimo usa'isikhe meke iti, aku hurlelhikhe. Hurlelhikhesik ebe kok ageikhesik eken ikhikhe. Erlo ageikhe eken 30 ikhikhe. Erlo ageikhe eken 60 ikhikhe. Erlo ageikhe eken 100 ikhikhe, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
41004009	ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogo holini o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41004010	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, at Yesus arligat werekma, yabokane it inebe 12 emenogo men, it aperek Yesus wene yogeisugunem inasuk holhukha meke men, oba wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Hat nen wene oba lisogon yoknisegen etnogo, ebe nikithogon meke hasik yoknisegen, ” iluk oba hinok waganhukha.
41004011	-
41004012	Hinok waganhunem at nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen apma 'bisekherek wene iti, at akla limago welageikhe meke, wene hit anek he, hinilu asubageik iluk pakhogon yokhisausak akla apasikhe mekeat he, it akhuni itikmanke meke iti anek he, at Allah nen, It iti weak hagariogei meke iti here'isalok inobabut hebelasumo an nen thagalogo degetdisaunogo iluk, it inileken hekhe dogogun mekeat he, hutukhogon hekhe dogogun dek o. Nen, inasuk holhe dogogun mekeat he, hutukhogon hutdekhe dogogun degat o,\rq (Yesaya 6:9-10)\rq* iluk isikhe iti tak-tak asuagaluk, wene yi meke ti meke baga likhik, yogeisekhe lagei iti o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41004013	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, wene oba lisogon yokhisigi etnogo hutdigidek hinokodek welagap halok he, yabokane wene yi baga likhik, ti baga likhik, yokhisugunem, nikithogon hutdiluk hinilu asigin.
41004014	Ap ageikhe ai hilogo la’igiluk nekherek meke iluk yokhisigi iti ebe, Allah aneat yogeisilik nekharek itiat o.
41004015	Nen, ai ageikhe holagarlem usa’isikhe iti ebe, it akhuni aperek nen Allah ane inasuk holharethek nen, Iblis ibat wagarethek nen, wene inetaikenma yago meke iti henogo wolok lagarek o.
41004016	Nen, ai ageikhe helekit oba usa’isikhe iti ebe re, it akhuni aperek nen Allah ane iti inasuk holharethek nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, ibat waganharek.
41004017	Itithogon ibat waganharek mekeat he, wene itiinetaikenma omaken yakhidek nen, iniki pererlagat welageikharethek nen, akhuni aperek nen Allah ane iti hasik, yi aik ti aik inoba ’bigik, weagarinakhik, hagakhunem, inakla ibat puk ageikharethek nen, wene iti here’isalok dukhegarek itiat o.
41004018	Nen, ai ageikhe okama arlok weakma usa’isikhe iti ebe, it akhuni aperek Allah ane iti inasuk holharethek nenat,
41004019	inakla nen, Yogotak ya hasik nikithogon hagasigin he, iluk, wene munini ebekhik, Nameke doalegat dogolep e, iluk inakla ebekhe dogolik, inekaerek nen nukhetdakhigik, inakla nen yi meke ti meke aperek warlok apigik, hagakharek iti nen, wene iti inakla keken atluk nen, eken ikherek dek itiat o.
41004020	Nen, ai ageikhe agat hanoma usa'isikhe iti ebe, it akhuni aperek Allah ane iti inasuk holiluk waganharethek nen, wene iti inakla eken ikherek o. Erlo ageikhe nen eken 30 ikhik, erlo ageikhe nen eken 60 ikhik, erlo ageikhe nen eken 100 ikhik, ikherek itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41004021	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane men isikhe, “Akhuni nen isagal yibarlogo isoak thebelogo ’bigik, noge egarekma abura thebelogo ’bigik, ’buogoluk yibakharek nogo? Dek o. Yibarlogo isok tilik oba ’buogolugat wolok uki ageikharek.
41004022	Yi meke ti meke limago werek iti, thelekma asuagaluk limago werek o. Nen, yi meke ti meke thebelek werek iti, ’bukalogo thelekmatduagaluk thebelek werek o.
41004023	Iti nenat, tha nen asuk holusak halok he, hanorogon holuak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
41004024	-
41004025	wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene yokhisekhe lagei iti, hanorogon hutdekhe dogono o. Tha nen waganhesik hago werek halok, yabokane Allah nen ageikhe inom wogokhik, nen, tha nen waganhidek, herlekha’bugat hago dogogin halok, tilogo horligik, hagasigin iti nen, hit nen akhuni aperek waganuagaluk walegeke walhalok wogeisegethep iti hak, hit nen wogeisagun tak-tagat, Allah nen walegeke walhalok wokhisalok nen, ageikhe inom lapelogo wokhisageinat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41004026	Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Allah apma ’bisekherek iti, ap ageikhe nen ayabumo ai hilogo la’ekherek hakene o.
41004027	Ayabumo hilogo la’iluk neti, o hi isinem noge igik, wi isinem iluk ageik, hagakhe korlek, ai etnogo aku dukhekherethek nen, kok agarek. Itithogon kok ariogo mekeat he, nikithogon kok ariogo he, okodegat welagarek.
41004028	Ai iti yabumo yakhunem nen, alebageik abusagat aku tak dukhiluk nen, yabokane eken i’biluk nen, horle agarek iti.
41004029	Horle agunem, Eken palusak oba arat asi aga, iluk, karok korlo meke wolok ebe ibat palharek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41004030	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe men isikhe, "Allah apma ’bisekherek iti nena meke hakene ugun. Nen, nena meke oba lisogon ugun.
41004031	Iti ebe re, ki’bi-ki’bi eken hakene o. Ap ageikhe nen ki’bi-ki’bi ai hilogo la’isikhe. Yi meke ti meke ai iti, ’bugurlaktegat mekeat he, ki’bi-ki’bi ai iti anek motok ’bugurlaktegat o.
41004032	Itithogon mekeat he, ki’bi witat men, ageikhe ninat meke men, yakhunem, aku dukhekherethek nen, oak ’bugurlagat negen dageikherek. Mekeat he, ki’bi-ki’bi iti anek he, hilogo la’isinem oak motok kogat dageikherethek nen, ikilo’bak tualogo eka doalegat agunem, thue hitluk-witluk nekherek meke witluk nen, kunakma etoma ai erlok hali agarek iti hakeneat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41004033	It akhuni nen wene hutdusak tak-tagat hutduagaluk, yi meke ti meke doalegat oba likhik yogeisekhe lageikhe.
41004034	It akhuni aperek yakulisagaluk halok he, wene oba likhik anek yakulisekhe lageikhe mekeat he, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo anek he, inom inasokneat dogolik, wene ebe thelekmaat pakhogon yogeisekhe lageikhe.
41004035	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhesik, o hiamaganeke at Yesus nen agarumi emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Nit i yekelekma aik ilibaganke italuok o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
41004036	it nen, ku Yesus welageikhe meke baga etnogo werekma oba ukisukhasik nen, akhuni doalegat emenogo etoma 'bisalok, at ebe wolok italhukha. It italhe korlek, akhuni aperek ku aperek oba inom tak-tagat italhukhaat.
41004037	Itithogon italhunem, hisakne kogat hubetha ageikhemo, i hoklabu thabulogo liakhe dogolik, ku akla ukisikhemo apem hethokhogon yekeligiluk hagakhikhe.
41004038	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, Yesus ebe ku agamake ukuloak lekhogon su inukuloak lekhogon noge egarek meke baga noge isinem agarumi emenogo nen iluguthasukha. Iluguthekhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Noe. Nit i lugun yoma ninebe hakmu dek? ” iluk yogokhukha.
41004039	Yogokhukhama, at iluk ageikhesik, hisakne etnogo wenagakhe dogolik, “Haborlok dek asin, ” isikhesik, i etnogo yogokhe dogolik, “Haborlok hapuk in, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, hisakne etnogo dek ageik, i hoklabu etnogo aborlok motok hapuk igik, hagatlageikhe.
41004040	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nenaluk hinayuk nen hagakhe lagap. Hinetaiken an noba aban hakotdigidek welagap a, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
41004041	inayuk motok agoukha. Inayuk motok agoukhasik, it-it ekhe dogolik men isukha, “Eiye! Ap yi tha apegep. Hisakne men, i hoklabu men, at ane isinem hologo dek aga iti, nayuk o! ” iluk hogorakhukha.
41005001	Itithogon hogorakhukhama, at Yesus agarumi inom i yekelekma etnogo aik ilibaganke akhuni o Gerasa meke inaila italhukha.
41005002	Italhukhasik, at Yesus ku akla nen i aik oba dukhisinem etaat, ap ageikhe oila akhuni warek 'bisegarekma nen dukhi ageikhesik, Yesus oba wageikhe. Ap iti mokat obabut weak meke akla ukiluk,
41005003	-
41005004	akhuni warek ’bisegarekma motok werekma, akhuni aperek nen hibiku-yogoku herle pisuemaken herle baga iki herle wakhik, isok herle wakhik, wakhe lagoukha mekeat he, iki herle ’bogokhogon la’igik, isok herle obakha sikiphogon la’igik, hagakhunem, yabokane yi herle ti herle pisuemaken herle inomat walhasukhasik nen, nena meke herle baga wasu heat hagatlageikhemo, ebe hakhalok obabut tha nen hebelu heat erlok dek ageikhe.
41005005	Itithogon dogolik, dikene hunik, hibako hunik, akhuni warek ’bisegarekma ukigik, tom obake dageiluk nikhik, hagakhe dogolik, ane naik-waik ekhe dogolik, ekaerek nen helekit oba amep wuluk-walakhogon motok warekhe lageikhe.
41005006	Itithogon hagakhe lageikhe meke, Yesus lageikhe itinem, ebe walegat etoma dogolik, ileken Yesus lakhasikhe. Ileken lakhalok, at oba pirlikha ageikhesik, itibagal yukukhogon,
41005007	-
41005008	“Yesus Allah Etagapogot a’but yi, nikithogon hagatnabigiluk wagan, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Mokat hobabut weak meke yi, ap yi akla nen dukhi lan o, ” iluk yogokhunem, at etnogo ane kokhogon ekhe dogolik, “Eiye. Na’it o. Nopase Allah oak o. Weagatnakhun, ” iluk ane kokhogon isikhe.
41005009	Ane kokhogon isikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Hat hetaga tha, ” iluk hinok oba waganhikhemo, at nen men yogokhikhe, “Ninebe doalegat welago iti nen, netaga opaki doalek u hak, netaga Legiun, ” yogokhikhe.
41005010	Itithogon yogokhikhesik, Yesus nen it mokat inobabut weak meke iti o etoma nen walegat la'isaunogo iluk, ane a’buarek a'buarek Yesus yogokhikhe.
41005011	Itinem o etoma tom arlobaga warn doalegat konak nasi lagoukha.
41005012	Konak nasi werekma, it mokat inobabut weak meke emenogo nen, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Nit warn akla ukhatlasi luok nen, etoma la’inanin o, ” iluk inane ina'buarek ina’buarek yogokhukha.
41005013	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at nen, “I o. Lani, ” yogeisasikhemo, it mokat inobabut weak meke emenogo dukhi lagoukhasik, warn akla ukhatlasi lagoukhama, warn doalegat emenogo lumhogon katma i yekelekma usasukhasik nen i lagoukha. Warn i lagoukha iti, ebe 2. 000 hakene motok doalegat i lagoukha.
41005014	I lagoukhama, it warn therogo welagoukha meke inayuk atluk pirlirli yoko lagoukhasik, akhuni o ukul kokma yogeisigik, o ’bugurlagatma yogeisigik, yogeisasukha. Yogeisasukhama it akhuni nen, “Nikithogon hagatlagama nen ega, ” iluk, inileken ’bikhauwogoluk Yesus oba wagoukha.
41005015	Wagoukhama, ap alebat mokat inobabut weak meke opaki doalek akla ukiluk welageikhe meke etnogo, obabut hebelageikhesik, asu ugu hurek werekma inileken hasukhasik, inayuk agoukha.
41005016	Inayuk agoukhama, it akhuni aperek wene itithogon hagatlagunem inileken hasukha meke nen, men yogeisasukha, “Ap yi mokat obabut weak meke akla ukiluk welaga etnogo yigithogon hagakhe. Nen, warn emenogo itithogon hagakhe, ” iluk wene pilinerogo yogeisasukha.
41005017	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, it nen men yogokhukha, “Yesus. Hat hebe nit werekma yoma dogosak dek. Werlekmake lan o! ” iluk inane obatnerogon yogokhukha.
41005018	Yogokhukhama at Yesus ku akla ukigin thalekma, at ap mokat inobabut weak meke akla ukiluk welageikhe meke etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nipisak nekhe dogouok nen, luok o, ” iluk ane a'buarek negen yogokhikhemo,
41005019	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Dek o. Haila lano o. Lalok nen, ninoe Etagapogot etnogo nen akmu nealok nen, yigithogon hano hagatnakhe, iluk hougi hagarumi yogeisa lano, ” iluk asuk warogo la'isikhe.
41005020	La'isikhemo, o kota 10 baga halek werekma lageikhesik men yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe, “Yesus nen itithogon hano hagatnakhe, yigithogon hano hagatnakhe, ” iluk yogeisilik lageikhemo, it inebe tha'bokhogonat nen, “Nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
41005021	Itithogon hagakhukhasik, Yesus i yekelek etnogo aik yi bagake ku warogo itali ageikhe. Itali agunem, akhuni inebe doalegat at oba i aik oba natogosi agoukha.
41005022	Natogosi agoukhasik werekma, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma inougi kain welagoukha meke ageikhe etaga Yairus wageikhesik, Yesus ileken lakhalok, apma itibagal yukukhogon heagei wakhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe,
41005023	“Yesus noe. An na'but horlak ebe aban meke oba u nen watlasigiluk hagakhe korlek wagei. Hat nen hiki hakhaumo ebe hano atluk iluk dogoak nen, nipisak luogoluk hayoko wagei o, ” iluk ane a'buarekhogon yogokhikhe.
41005024	Itithogon yogokhikhemo ipisak lagoukha. Lagunem akhuni motok doalegat Yesus oporlik laga dogolik kerlek-kerlek Yesus oba ageikhe nen hokokhogon la'igik hagarik lagoukha.
41005025	Lagoukha etoma meke, he ageikhe amep wago motok werek korlek 12 tahun hagatlageikhe.
41005026	Amep wago motok dogolik, dokter lak nen hano hagasuagaluk yi dokter ti dokter inayoko 'biluk, u oko wogeisekhe dogolik, ameke motok degetdisikhe mekeat he, amep etnogo dek ageidek yabokane ebenageigat waga lageikhe.
41005027	-
41005028	Amep itithogon wago motok dogolik, Yesus abok asuk holiluk, akla nen, men apasikhe, “An at asu niki hakhaumo, namep yi dek asigin o, ” akla apalok lageikhesik, Yesus oporlik horokhogon laga dogolik, asu iki hakhasikhe.
41005029	Iki hakhekhe korlek eranogoat, amep etnogo 'bogokhogon dek ageikhemo, akla nen he, “I. An u weagat welagei etnogo, hano hagatnakhe higi, ” iluk akla hutdisikhe.
41005030	Itithogon hutdekhe korlek, at Yesus akla nen, “Eiye! An nobatnerogon elalin hano hagarinakherek etnogo meke nakla nen akhuni aperek inoba laga ekagat higi, ” iluk eranogoat hutdisikhe. Hutdisikhesik nen akhuni doalegat emenogo ileken dagakhogon 'birisasikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nasu tha nen iki hakhekhe, ” iluk inoba hinok waganhikhe.
41005031	Waganhikhemo, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Eiye! Noe. Nit ninebe doalegat haliluke kerlek-kerlek waga Iago yoma hileken nisekhe dogoligat, Tha nen hakneekhe, iluk ekhe lagan? ” iluk yogokhukha.
41005032	Itithogon yogokhukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen, “Tha nen hakneekhe, ” iluk ebe hutdigiluk ileken dagakhogon 'birisilik lageikhe.
41005033	'Birisilik lagunem at he etnogo akla nen, “An nen hakhigima hano hagatnakhe etnogo meke iliogo higi, ” iluk hutdisikhesik ayuk atluk, oageleke dik-dik hagakhe dogolik, Yesus apma itibagal yukukhogon hureklasi lageikhesik, “An itithogon welagarik nen, yigithogon hagakhi o, ” iluk tha'bokhogonat pilinerogo yogokhikhe.
41005034	Yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Neru. Hetaiken noba hakotdegen iti nen hano agan o. Halok he, hakla hanorogon lan o, ” iluk la’isikhe.
41005035	Itithogon yogokhe korlek eranogoat, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma inoe kain etnogo aila nen agarumi yoko wagoukhasik men yogokhukha, “Noe. Ha’but horlak etnogo arat watlagama nen wago. Halok he, ninoe kain wene yakulnisekherek meke ithi, isok alomarogo hipisak luogoluk oba tiolusak nogo? Dek o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41005036	Yogokhukhama at Yesus nen, it inane asuk holhikhesigat, inane thogotdisalok kain etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hakla wene munini ebekhun o. Hetaiken an noba hakotdiluk nipisak luok o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik lagoukha.
41005037	Lagoukhasik, akhuni inebe doalegat yogeisekhe dogolik, “Ninoporlik wisusak dek. It Petrus men, Yohanes agot Yakobus ipisak men anek ninom lugun o, ” iluk inom lagoukha.
41005038	Lagoukha hak, kain etnogo aila akhuni doalegat warekma dogolik, inane apik naik-waik de agunem lagoukha.
41005039	Lagoukhasik, at Yesus ebe uma ukisikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, de naik-waik de aga lagap iti nenaluk. Horlak iti watlageidek, noge iliogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41005040	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it akhuni emenogo nen obato kogat agoukha. Obato kogat agoukhama, at nen inebe tha’bokhogonat thikmanke ula’isasikhe. Ula’isalok nen, it horlak etnogo agosa opase men, Yesus agarumi inom lagoukha meke emenogo men, it anek wogosik o kakok palek horlak etnogo welageikhemo ukisukha.
41005041	Ukisukhasik, iki hakhalok, nit ninane baga, “Horlak yi, na’but. Melasin, iluk yokhekhe lagei o, ” iluk u hak, it inane baga, “Talita kum, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41005042	Itithogon yogokhe korlek eranogoat, horlak etnogo ebe itaklageikhesik oba nen, umur 12 tahun hagatlageikhesikmo nogo nen, ebe melatluk, umake lageik, wageik, hagakhikhe. Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it akhuni emenogo inileken hasukhasik, “Eiye! Nayuk e, ” iluk apik hogorakhukha.
41005043	Itithogon hogorakhukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An hagakhunem hinileken neegep meke iti, akhuni aperek motok yogeisugup o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhesik nen, “Horlak ithi apiri ageikhe noak nen wogotni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41006001	Yabokane, at Yesus o etoma nen dukhisikhesik, ekaerek ai erloma lageikhe. Lagunem, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oporlik lagoukha.
41006002	Lagoukhasik, iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma inebe doalegat werekma inoba ukisikhesik, wene yakulisasikhe. Yakulisugunem, it inebe doalegat emenogo nen, men isukha, “Eiye! Nayuk o. Ap yi itithogon hagarik liliogo iti, koma nen yakulhesik hagariogo. Akla kagalek motok iti, wene nena wene akla dogolik yoknisiliogo. Iki hageisugunem elalinat hagarinabiogo iti, nikithogon hagarinabiogo.
41006003	At ebe he Maria eak o halherek meke etnogo dek? Agarumi oporlik meke, Yakobus men, Yoses men, Yudas men, Simon men, apigi. Nen, erugi nit ninom welago yoma dek? ” iluk inakla meanetdisukhasik kolelogo thogotdisukha.
41006004	Inakla meanetdisukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “It ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke iti, o yi ai ti ai lagunem, akhuni aperek nen inalon halinakharek mekeat he, o inekaerek inai erloma lagunem it inougi inageikhugi men, inai opakimo welageikharek meke men, it nen anek he, inalon halinakharek dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41006005	Itithogon hagakhukha iti nen, at Yesus o etoma dogolik elalin meke ageikhe hagakhidek thogotdisikhe. It akhuni u inoba meke inebe pererlagat anek iki hageisalok hano hagarinakhikhe.
41006006	Hagarinakhikhesik, it akhuni etoma meke nen at ebe inakla meanetdisukha iti hasik, at akla nen, “Eiye! Nayuk o, ” iluk apasikhesik yabokane o etoma aliluke o halekmake wene yakulisilik nekhe lageikhe.
41006007	Itithogon yakulisilik nekhe dogolik, ap inebe 12 nen emenogo waisasikhemo wagoukhama, inebe peretek dopokhigik la'isagaluk inayoko 'biluk, mokat inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukisukhasik werekma mukhogo ula'isilik loagaluk, at obatne wogeisasikhe.
41006008	Wogeisasikhesik inasuk wakhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, holagarlem meke hasik yi meke ti meke ageikhe motok wolok lagup o. Thegerluk anek wolok lano. Wolok laga dogolik, hipiri men, holagarlemke kino ilik su ukhasusak meke men, uang men, ageikhe motok waganhup o.
41006009	Hinisok agot anek ikhogo laga dogolik, hinoado baga su peretek ikhidek opakiat anek ikhogo lano, ” iluk yogeisilik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
41006010	“Akhuni inoba lalok, o ya ukigik, ta ukigik, ukekhe dogogup o. Ukugun oba etomaat dogoluk o ninmo luogoluk halok etoma nenat dukhitluk lano o.
41006011	It akhuni o ageikhe nen hinebe wokhinakhik, hinane holhik, hagakhidek halok he, o iti nen dukhi aga dogolik, it o etoma meke inakla hutduagaluk, hinisok hola negen horogo 'biluk dukhitno, ” iluk inasuk warogo la'isasikhe.
41006012	It emenogo itithogon la'isasikhemo laga dogolik, akhuni men yogeisilik lagoukha, “Hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti here’isalok hinobabut hebelatni o, ” iluk yogeisilik nekhe dogolik,
41006013	mokat inobabut weak meke doalegat akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isigik, u inoba welagoukha meke inebe doalegat minyak eken apusu inukuloak oba usabogo hano hagarinakhik, hagarik lagoukha.
41006014	Yesus agarumi nen itithogon hagarinabik lagunem, at Yesus etaga akhuni o ya ta etoma inilu agoukhasik abok ugunem, at kok etagapogot Herodes asuk holhikheat. Itithogon hagakhunem it akhuni aperek nen men ekhe lagoukha, “Yohanes ima usa'inakhe lageikhe meke ebe wakhama watlaga etnogo iluk agasik waga higi. Itithogon iluk agasik iti nen hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagariogo iti, ” igik,
41006015	nen, it aperek nen, “Dek o. Iti at Elia ebeat o, ” igik, it aperek nen, “Dek o. It ap haganeat Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen yogeisekhe lagoukha hagat, yogeisilik liliogo iti, at ebe it iti meke ageikhe thelekma agasik liliogo, ” igik, ebe Yesus mekeat itithogon ekhe lagoukha iti.
41006016	Itithogon ugunem abok at Herodes asuk holhikhesik men isikhe, “Dek o. At Yohanes arlokop ade palogo wakhima watlaga etnogo yabokane iluk agasik hagariogo itiat o, ” iluk isikhe.
41006017	-
41006018	Itithogon isikhe iti, haganeat at Herodes nen agot Filipus age etaga Herodias iti waganhikhemo at Yohanes nen men yogokhe lageikhe, “Hat nen hagot age waganusak dekma waganhen iti waganek dogosak erlok dek o, ” iluk eran-alep ekarli warogo yogokhe lageikhe iti nen, at nen ap inayoko 'bisikhemo Yohanes ebe hakha lagoukhasik wolok wagoukhasik iki herle warogo o iniki herle warogo 'bisegarekma kola'isukha.
41006019	-
41006020	Kola’isukhama werekma, at he Herodias nen, at akla ua iluk dogolik, “Yohanes iti motok na’it, ” iluk at Herodes nen wasuagaluk akla kagalhe lageikhe mekeat he, at Herodes akla nen men apekhe lageikhe, “At Yohanes ebe Allah nen la’i ageikhemo dogolik obabut morat hagariogo, ” iluk obabut palogo ebe alon halhe dogolik wasusak erlok dek ageikhemo, ebe irlirli waganogo hago welageikhe. Hago dogolik, ane holhe dogou warlok nen holhe lageikhe mekeat he, holhe dogolik, wene munini doalegat ebekhe lageikhe.
41006021	Itithogon ebekho werekma, at Herodes ebe itaklageikhe baga hurli arat asi ageikhemo, pesta kok isago nuogoluk, agarumi pemerintah meke kaintek men, ap tentara inougi men, ap inetaga werek o Galilea eloke meke men, inom isago nuogoluk inayoko ’bisikhemo natogokhukha itinem, at he Herodias akla nen, “An nen Yohanes motok na’it wasuak apekhe lagei etnogo yogotak erlok yi baga wasuak, ” iluk apasikhe.
41006022	Itithogon apasikhesik, pesta isago nukunem, at eak horlak tharlisik meke kola’isikhemo ukisikhesik etai uak sa’bik sa’bok wakhe dogolik, hano motok wakhikhemo, at Herodes ebe men, ap ukisukha meke emenogo men, inakla arleken agoukha. Inakla arleken agoukhama, at kok etagapogot Herodes iti nen men yogokhikhe, “Hat nen nena meke kino yoknekhen halok wokhesiginat o.
41006023	O yoma an kok dogolik hagasik welagarethekma hat nen, Iti meke warlok, egen halok he, heisogon mikirlogo ebelake wokhesiginat o, ” iluk Allah etaga hupuk palogo yogokhikhe.
41006024	Yogokhikhemo at horlak tharlisik etnogo dukhisikhesik agosa oba lageikhesik men yogokhikhe, “An nen nena meke kino ik, ” iluk yogokhikhemo at nen, men yogokhikhe, “At Yohanes ima usa’inakherek meke etnogo ukuloak palogo wokhesuak nen, kino yogotno, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41006025	Itithogon yogokhikhemo eranogoat, at kok etagapogot etnogo ’bikha lageikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Nopase, at Yohanes ima usa’inakherek meke etnogo ukuloak palogo piring kok thabia baga temerogo yogotak yaat woknetnok o. An itiat warlok, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41006026	at kok Herodes etnogo akla motok weak ageikhe. Itithogon weak ageikhe mekeat he, “An nen nagarumi ninom pesta isago neke dogolik inilhanem, Allah etaga hupuk palogo eberogonat wokhesigin o, iluk abok yogokhirikmo, kamotdusak na’it o. Wogosiginat o, ” iluk akla apasikhe.
41006027	Itithogon akla apasikhesik, ap tentara meke akhuni iniki herle warek hagasik welagoukha meke ageikhe men yogokhikhe, “Yohanes etnogo arlokop ade tekhogon ukuloak palogo wolok wetno, ” iluk la’isikhe. La’isikhemo o iniki herle warogo ’bisegarekma lageikhesik, Yohanes ebe arlokop ade tekhogon wakhikhesik ukuloak palhikhe.
41006028	Palhikhesik, ukuloak palek piring kok thabia meke baga temerogo horlak tharlisik etnogo wogosi ageikhe. Wogokhikhemo at nen, agosa wogosi lageikhe.
41006029	Itithogon hagakhukhama, akhuni nen he, “Yohanes itithogon wakhama warek werek, ” iluk isukhama, it Yohanes agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inasuk holhukhasik ebe warek etnogo wagani agoukhasik, oila warek ’bisegarekma ’bi lagoukhasik werekma nen, at Herodes nen Yesus abok holhikhesik, “Yohanes iluk agasik hagariogo higi, ” iluk isikhe iti.
41006030	It ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inapuke at oba natogosi agoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Nit nen yigithogon hagakho, tigithogon hagakho. Wene yigithogon yakulisogo, tigithogon yakulisogo, ” iluk motok pilinogo yogokhukha.
41006031	Itithogon yogokhunem, akhuni doalegat etoma lageik, wageik, hagakhunem hipiri nikithogon nau heat hagatlageikhemo, at Yesus nen agarumi men yogeisasikhe, “Thet herlekha'bugat walubageik nen, o akhuni inaren dekma ninasokneat ponhogo luok o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41006032	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik at ebe inom it inasokneat ku warogo, o akhuni inaren dekma italhukha.
41006033	Italhunem, it akhuni doalegat inileken lageisalok nen, “It etnogo iti higi, ” iluk hutdisasukha. Hutdisalok, it o yi ai ti ai dopok tha’bokhogonat nen i arlo bagake pirlirli alebageik inelokhoma natogosi lagoukhasik werekma, it Yesus lak emenogo yabokane italhukha.
41006034	Italhukhasik, at Yesus ku akla nen dukhekhe dogolik, akhuni doalegat emenogo ileken lageisalok nen akmurinakhikhesik men isikhe, “Domba hagasik welageikharek hak, it yoma hagasik dogou meke inebe dek nen werek yi. Nakmu lak o, ” iluk yi wene ti wene doalegat yakulisekhe lageikhe.
41006035	Yakulisekhekorlek, o liok isikhemo, Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Nit o yoma akhuni inaren dekma werekma, o arat liok ekhe yi.
41006036	Halok he, akhuni yoma, aliluke o ukul kokmake 'bugurlagatmake inapiri inekaerek hasik oko pali loak nen, la'isan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41006037	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Hit nenat melageisani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen men yogokhukha, “Eiye! Akhuni nen yabu iniki opaki hasik hagakhunem, iniki oko uang wogeisegarek iti hakene meke, nit nen 200 wolok, roti oko palogo akhuni yigirlikmo erlok melageisoagaluk ekhe lagan? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41006038	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hipiri roti meke meren werek. Hinileken 'bikha lanio, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it inileken 'bikha lalok nen wagoukhasik, “Hipiri roti meke 5. Nen, ikan pere, ” iluk yogosi agoukha.
41006039	Yogosi agoukhama, at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni yoma inebe pipuk ekama thabuleka talekmotokma ethoma amun waganhigik hureklarik loak nen yogeisani o, ” iluk agarumi yogeisasikhemo
41006040	it nen akhuni doalegat emenogo yogeisasukhama inebe thelalik thelalik hureklarik lagoukhama inebe aperek 100, aperek 50, amun waganhigik hureklarik lagoukha iti.
41006041	Itithogon arat hureklasi lagoukhama, at Yesus nen hipiri roti meke 5 eranogo inom, ikan pere eranogo inom, ikimo waganhikhesik nen ileken pogot oba liakhasikhesik nen, Allah heagei warogo roti eranogo kusogo, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke nen akhuni doalegat emenogo supurisoagaluk wogeisasikhe. Nen, ikan pere eranogo itithogonat it tha'bokhogonat supurisoagaluk palogo wogeisasikheat.
41006042	Supurisasukhama, it inebe tha'bokhogonat ina'ithogonat nasukha.
41006043	Itithogon nasukhasik nen, roti kusik ato inom, ikan palek ato inom, titurogo 'bisukhama Yesus agarumi nen natogorlogo mul yago meke 12 oba apem hethokhigik ukharlogo 'bisukha.
41006044	Hipiri roti meke nasukha iti, ap anek inebe 5. 000 nasukha.
41006045	Itithogon arat nasukhama eranogo nen, at Yesus nen, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo menyogeisasikhe, “An akhuni doalegat yoma la'isak nen, hit tak ku akla ukiluk, o Betsaida aik ilibaganke etoma itali lani o, ” iluk ane obatnerogonat yogeisasikhe.
41006046	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo itali aga korlek, at Yesus nen it akhuni emenogo arat la'isalok, at sembayan igiluk tom oba dageisikhe.
41006047	Dageisikhesik at agarumi emenogo i yekelekma ku warogo turlem heisogo werek korlek, Yesus arligat tom oba werekma o arat hi ageikhe.
41006048	O hi ageikhemo nen, hisakne inelokhomake nen hubetha agunem, it ku aninirogon warik wagunem, Yesus ileken lageisasikhe. Ileken lageisalok nen, o wi igiluk jam 3 jam 4 negen, at isok i agoum obake 'bilik inoba wageikhesik nen, inaliluke piokhogon lagaluk negen hagakhikhe.
41006049	-
41006050	Itithogon hagakhunem, it tha'bokhogonat nen at isok i agoum obake 'bilik wagunem inileken lakhalok ebe mokat thalek inakmaken lalok inayuk nen inane naik isukha. Itithogon ugunem eranogoat, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi, hinagorakma. An nebeat waga lagei. Halok he, hinayuk agup o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41006051	Itithogon ane hageinabiluk nen ku baga inoba ukisikhemo, hisakne etnogo dek ageikhe. Dek ageikhemo, it nen, “Eiye. Nayuk o, ” iluk motok hogorakhukha.
41006052	Itithogon hogorakhukha iti, alebat roti titurogon wogeisasikhe etnogo hutdigidek inakla pugat dogolik, yabokane hisakne dek ageikhemo hogorakhukha iti.
41006053	Itithogon hagakhukhama, at Yesus lak o Genesaret, i yekelek etnogo aik ilibaganke itali agoukhasik nen, ku etnogo hoi o tilogo 'bisukha.
41006054	Ku hoi o tilogo ’biluk dukhi agunem, it akhuni etoma meke nen eranogoat, “Yesus lak ithi, ” iluk hutdisasukha.
41006055	Hutdisukhasik nen, pirlirli o ya ta etoma lagoukhasik it aperek nen, "Yesus o etoma werek, ” iluk, ugunem inasuk holhukhasik, akhuni inoba u warek meke o perlago Yesus oba wogosik waga lagoukha.
41006056	At Yesus ebe o ukul kokma ukigik, o ’bugurlagatma ukigik, o asokneat ponhogo halekma ukigik, hagakhunem, it akhuni nen it aperek inoba u warek meke wogosik o silimo ’bisa aga lagoukha. ’Bisa aga lagoukhama it nen, "Yesus, hasu ilugun anek niniki hakhauwok a? ” iluk inane ina’buarek inane yogokhukhasik, it at asu iniki hakhasukha meke tha’bokhogonat inoba hano agoukha.
41007001	Yabokane, it ap Farisi meke men, it Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke aperek men, o Yerusalem nen Yesus oba natogosi dagei agoukha.
41007002	Dagei agoukhasik dogolik, it Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo aperek, akhuni iniki bagake thuesi kokharek iti hak iniki horigidek hipiri yugunat nasinem, inileken hisasukha.
41007003	Inileken itithogon hisasukha iti, akhuni Farisi meke inomat, Yahudi meke inomat, inebe tha’bokhogonat, inopa lak inawene herogo dogolik, iniki bagake horigidek hipiri nausak motok dek iluk ekhe dogolik inileken hisasukha iti.
41007004	Wene itithogon herogo dogolik, yi meke ti meke pasar nen oko palogo wolokwageikharethek nen, inoba horigidek, hipiri nekarek motok dek. Ageikhe re, wene haganeat meke iti hago dogolik, isoak herlekha'bugat meke oba hokhik, kok meke oba hokhik, isoak tembaga meke hokhik, hagakharek iti.
41007005	Itithogon hagakharek iti nen, it Farisi meke inom, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Yesus. It ap hat hagarumi hane waganiogei meke yoma nen, ninopa lak hagakhe lagoukha tak-tagat hagakhidek yugunat hagakhe dogolik iniki bagake horigidek hipiri yugunat niliogei iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41007006	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinoado baga anek hano thalek, hinetaiken pere dogolik hagakhethep iti hasik, at Yesaya nen Allah ane yogeisekhe dogolik, wene men isikhe iti, hit hinobasik mothogon isikhe higi, Allah nen he, It akhuni yoma inape baga nen an hogotnakhe dogolik, inetaiken an noba ebekhidek werlekma ebesi liliogei.
41007007	Wene akhuni inane mekeat he, an nen isigi meke negen yakulisiliogei iti nen, we yugunat an hogotnabiogei o,\rq (Yesaya 29:13)\rq* iluk isikhemo Yesaya nen holal waganogo 'bisikhemo werek iti, hit hinobasigat isikhe o.
41007008	Wene itithogon isikhe hagat, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti thagalogo thogotdisalok akhuni inawene hinobatnerogon herogo welagap o, ” iluk isikhe.
41007009	Itithogon yogeisalok, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla motok kagalek yi nayuk o! Hinopa lak hagakhe lagoukha meke iti hinobatnerogon herogo dogouogoluk, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti thagalogo here'isekhe lagap iti hano higi, ” iluk inekarli wakhikhe.
41007010	Inekarli wakhikhesik wene ageikhe yogeisekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “At Musa nen, Hinagosa hinopase lak inalon halinakhe dogono o,\rq (Keluaran 20:12; Ulangan 5:16)\rq* iluk isikhesik, ageikhe men isikhe, Tha nen agosa opase abok weak palhe halok he, at iti ebe motogat wasusak o,\rq (Keluaran 21:17; Imamat 20:9)\rq* iluk ninasuk wakhikhe mekeat he,
41007011	hit nen men yogeisekhe lagap, At ageikhe nen opase a, agosa a, yogokhe dogolik, An meke yi meke ti meke hat wokhesusak mekeat he, Allah hasik 'bisigirikmo iluk u hak, Ibrani ninane baga, korban iluk yogeisekhe dogoagaluk yakulisekhe lagap iti,
41007012	yabokane inagosa inopase lak wogeisausak meke wogeisausak dek iluk wene palu hagat ekhe lagap o.
41007013	Itithogon ekhe lagap iti baga, hinopa lak hagakhe lagoukha wene waganhigisip, Allah ane thagalogo here'isekhe lagap iti. Iti hak, wene ageikhe doalegat hagakhe lagap meke weregat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41007014	At Yesus nen, wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane akhuni doalegat emenogo waisasikhemo wagoukhama, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An wene igin yi, hit tha'bokhogonat hutdubageik nen, hinasuk hanorogo holini o.
41007015	Akhuni yi meke ti meke inapema nen inakla usakharek meke iti nen, weagarinabusak dek anek o. Weagarinakherek iti wene inakla nen kagalogo dagei agunem egarek iti anek he, weagarinakherek o.
41007016	Hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogo holhe dogoni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
41007017	akhuni doalegat emenogo itikmanke 'bisalok, at Yesus uma ukisikhemo at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen men isukha, “Wene oba lisogon yoknisegen iti, ebe ki meke hasik yoknisegen, ” iluk oba hinok waganhukha.
41007018	Hinok waganhukhama, at nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit meneke, it hinom tak-tagat wene iti hutdigidek welagap a? Yi meke ti meke inapemake kola’iluk inakla usakhunem weagarinabusak dek o, iluk hutdigidegat welagap higi.
41007019	Nekarek meke iti, inetaikenma ukekherek dek. Piokthek inelabutla usalok inamiso piokthegat usi lageikharek o, ” iluk isikhe iti, “Yi meke ti meke yugunat neke dogosak. Usa dek o, ” iluk isikhe iti.
41007020	-
41007022	Wene itithogon yogeisekhe dogolik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene inakla nen kagalogo dagei agunem ulakharek iti nenat inebe weagarinakherek o. Itithogon inakla nen weak meke ebekhe dogolik hagakharek yi: homagarlugi yugunat ha’isigik, iniki abusak waganhik, akhuni inakhik, ap inagugi meke param ha’isigik, inakla nen, Akhuni aperek inameke an meke anek dogolep, iluk apigik, yi weak ti weak ageikhe hagakhik, inekalat nukhetdisigik, inekarli dek hagakhik, ua palhik, inabok wiik-weak palhik, inekaerek nen hogorakhigik, inetaiken dek hagakhik, hagakharek iti.
41007023	Yi weak ti weak iti, tha’bokhogonat inakla nen kagalogo dagei agunem ulakharek iti nenat inebe weagarinakherek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41007024	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik o etoma nen, o Tirus dagei ageikhesik uma ukisikhesik, akhuni men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni inokodek dogoak nen, At wagasik, ebe o etoma werek, iluk yogeisugup o. An na'it, ” iluk isikhe meke re, ebe nikithogon limago dogou heat hagatlageikhe.
41007025	-
41007026	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo werekma, at he ageikhe eak mokat obabut weak meke akla ukiluk werekma, Yesus abok eranogoat asuk holiluk, oba wageikhe. He iti ebe Yunani meke ai erlo Siria Fenisia etoma meke, Yesus apma itibagal yukukhogon hureklasi ageikhesik men yogokhikhe, “An neak mokat obabut weak meke akla ukiluk werek nen, hat nen mukhogo ula’inogoluk hayoko wagei o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41007027	Ayoko ’bisikhemo at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hipiri yekerugi tak ina’ithogon nausak. Yekerugi inapiri meke tilogo yeke noagaluk po lagasusak erlok dek, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41007028	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at he etnogo nen men yogokhikhe, “I noe. Eberogonat egen. Meke re, yekerugi nen hipiri meja perlago baga neke dogolik eken pilikhogon usa’isinem, yeke meja wema baga dogolik nekeregat o, ” iluk isikhemo,
41007029	at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Hane mot egen iti baga nen, mokat obabut weak meke heak akla nen arat mukhogo dukhekhemo werek iti. Halok he, haila lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41007030	Itithogonyogokhikhemo, at he etnogo aila lageikhesik ukisikhe re, mokat obabut weak meke eak akla nen mukhogo dukhisikhesikmo, noge ekherekma witik hano werekma ’bikha lageikhe.
41007031	Itithogon hagakhikhesik nen, yabokane at Yesus o Tirus etoma nen dagakhogon o Sidon ke wageikhesik o etoma nen o etaga 10 kota halek ilike lakhigik, yike lakhigik, turlem horlokhogon i Galilea yekelekma usasikhe.
41007032	Usasikhemo it akhuni etoma nen he, ap ageikhe asuk dogou ane kut dek meke oba wolok wagoukhasik iki hakhoagaluk inane ina'buarek inane Yesus yogokhukha.
41007033	Yogokhukhama, akhuni doalegat eta 'bisalok ap asuk dogou etnogo asokneat wolok lageikhe. Wolok lageikhesik, at Yesus iki sisik ap etnogo asuk elola tetnotdiluk wosi iki baga dabulogo 'biluk nen, ap etnogo a'bi baga 'bisikhe.
41007034	Itithogon 'biluk ileken pogot oba liakhalok nen, etaiken ane isikhesik nit ninane baga, “Huak in, ” u hak, it inane baga, “Efata” iluk yogokhikhe.
41007035	Itithogon yogokhe korlek eranogoat, asuk etnogo huak igik, ane kut dek etnogo ane igik, hagakhikhesik, ane hano isikhe.
41007036	Ane hano ageikhemo at Yesus nen akhuni emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit nen akhuni motok yogeisugup o, ” iluk inasuk eran-alep wakhe korlegat, it nen yabokane inane ebenageik kokhogon yogeisekhe lagoukha.
41007037	Itithogon yogeisugunem it nen kokhogon hogorakhe dogolik, men ekhe lagoukha, “At nen, yi meke ti meke hano anek hagakhe dogolik, akhuni hagarinakhunem inasuk dogou meke huak iluk inasuk holhik, inane dek meke inane hano igik, hagariogo iti nayuk o! ” iluk motok hogorakhukha.
41008001	Itithogon hagakhukhama nen iniki pererlagatwelagoukhasik nen, akhuni doalegat yabokane Yesus oba natogosi agoukha. Itithogon wagoukhasik hipiri motok dek ageikhemo, nena meke nau heat hagatlageikhe. Itithogon hagatlageikhemo at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo waisasikhemo wagoukhama men yogeisasikhe,
41008002	“Nagarumi. It akhuni doalegat yoma ninom niniki henagan oba noge ogosikmo nogo nen, inapiri motok dek agama, nena meke nugun heat hagatlagama werek iti nen, nakmu lak nen nakla weak aga.
41008003	It hipiri nikidek werlegat inaila la'isaumo, it ebetlake inaila walegat nen wageikhasikmo, holagarlem lagunem ya kuak ta kuak launogo iluk, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41008004	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen men yogokhukha, “O limo akhuni inai halek motok dekma yoma, it inebe doalegat yoma hipiri roti meke ina'ithogon noagaluk, ebe koma meke waganogo melageisausak. Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama
41008005	at nen, “Hit hipiri roti meke ageikhe meren hago welagap, ” iluk hinok waganhikhemo it nen, “Dek o. Ebe 7 meke hago welago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41008006	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at nen akhuni doalegat natogorlek welagoukha meke emenogo agat oba hureklasuagaluk yogeisasikhe. Yogeisasikhesik hipiri roti meke 7 nen eranogo ikimo waganhikhesik, Allah heagei warogo, iki nen hipiri roti meke eranogo kusogo akhuni doalegat emenogo supurisoagaluk, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo wogeisasikhemo supurisasukha.
41008007	Supurisasukhasik, ikan 'bugurlaktek meke pererlagat aperek welageikhemo, Yesus wogokhukhama, Allah heagei warogo itithogon supurisoagaluk yogeisasikhe.
41008008	-
41008009	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it nen supurisasukhama nen, ina'ithogon nasukha. Akhuni inebe doalegat iniki wenago 4. 000 hakene nasukhasik, ato titurogo 'bisukhama Yesus agarumi nen mul yago 7 nen ukharlogo 'bisukha. Itithogon hagakhukhama nen, Yesus nen akhuni emenogo inailake la'isasikhe.
41008010	La’isalok eranogoat, Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inomat ku baga ukisukhasik ku warogo o Dalmanuta itali agoukha.
41008011	At Yesus lak o Dalmanuta itali agoukhama ap Farisi meke aperek Yesus inom wenekak ekhe dogolik obabut paluogoluk, oba wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Hat hebe Allah nen la'agei agama wagan halok he, nit nen hutdaguok nen, hat nen elalin meke ageikhe hagasin ta, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41008012	Yogokhukhama at akla nen thet lugusogo nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit akhuni o yogotak welagap yoma nen ekhe dogolik, Nit nen hutdaguok nen hat nen elalin meke ageikhe hagasin ta, iluk yoknekhe lagap yoma, nenaluk. An nane eberogonat yokhisak, Hutdanubageik iluk an nen elalin meke ageikhe hagasigin motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41008013	Itithogon yogeisalok nen, it akhuni emenogo o etoma herehsalok ku baga ukiluk ku warogo yabokane i aik ilibaganke italhukha.
41008014	I yekelek etnogo aik ilibaganke italuogoluk, Yesus agarumi emenogo hipiri roti meke obarlikmatdiluk opakiat anek ku akla wolok italhukha.
41008015	Italhukhasik Yesus nen inasuk warogo men yogeisasikhe, “It ap Farisi meke men, at Herodes men, eken hipiri roti meke hisuagaluk akla usakharek etnogo meke hakene werek iti baga weagathinabinogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe.
41008016	Inasuk itithogon wakhikhemo it-it ekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Nit hipiri roti meke dek iti nen ekhe higi, ” iluk ekhe lagoukhama,
41008017	at Yesus nen ekagat hutdisasikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit-hit ekhe dogolik, Nit hipiri roti meke ageikhe dek iti nen ekhe, iluk wene ekhe lagap iti nenaluk. Hit aban hinilu ageidegat hutdigidegat dogolik, hinetaiken kagalek dek a'birat welagap yoma re!
41008018	-
41008019	Hit he, hinileken werek mekeat he, higidegat, hinasuk werek mekeat he, holhidegat dogolik hagakhe lagap yoma re! An nen hipiri roti meke ebe 5 nen kusogo akhuni doalegat 5. 000 nen wogeisigi etnogo hinakla obarlikmatdegep a? It nen nekasik titurogo 'begama mul yago meke meren apem hethokhogon ukharlogo 'begep nogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Dua belas nen ukharlogo 'bogo apigi, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
41008020	at nen ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nen, an nen hipiri roti meke ebe 7 nen kusogo akhuni doalegat 4. 000 nen wogeisigima nekasik titurogo 'bega meke mul yago meke meren apem hethokhigik ukharlogo 'begep nogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Tujuh nen ukharlogo 'bogo apigi, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
41008021	at nen, “Meke re, hit wene aban hutdigidek welagap yoma re! ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41008022	Yesus agarumi inom wene itithogon ilik ilik o Betsaida italhukha. Italhukhama it akhuni o etoma meke nen, ap ageikhe ileken puk meke Yesus nen iki hakhoagaluk oba wolok wagoukhasik nen, inane ina’buarek inane yogokhukha.
41008023	Yogokhukhama nen, at nen ap iti iki hago wolok o silimo nen leget itikmanke dukhisikhe. Wolok dukhisikhesik wosi ileken oba 'biluk, iki hakhekhe dogolik men yogokhikhe, “Yogotak hileken yi meke ti meke ageikhe lakhekhe lagan a? Dek a, ” iluk hinok waganhikhemo
41008024	at ileken lakhalok nen, men yogokhikhe, “Akhuni lagunem hisigi mekeat he, inebe o hakene apigi, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41008025	at Yesus nen yabokane iki ileken oba hakhasikhemo ileken tek-tek halok hano ageikhesik nen, yi meke ti meke hanorogo hasikhe.
41008026	Ileken hanorogon hasikhemo, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “O ukul yabokane ukigidek piokthegat lan o, ” iluk aila la'isikhe.
41008027	Itithogon hagatluk, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, o etoma nen o kota Kaisarea ap Filipi nen kogotdisikhemo etoma aliluke o ukul 'bugurlagat meke aperek ebe dopok haklarik luogoluk dagei agoukha. Dagei aga dogolik agarumi emenogo inoba hinok waganhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni yoma nen, an nebe hasik ekhe dogolik, tha iliogei nogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
41008028	it nen men yogokhukha, “Akhuni aperek nen, At ebe Yohanes ima usa'inakhe lageikhe meke etnogo, igik, it aperek nen, At ebe Elia igik, it aperek nen, At ebe ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo ageikhe igik, iliogei, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41008029	Itithogon yogokhukhama at nen, “It nen itithogon iliogei mekeat he, hit anek he, an nebe hasik, tha ekhe lagap nogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, at Petrus etnogo nen, “Hat hebe Kristus nit tilninabuagaluk Allah nen la'isigin iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogoat o, ” iluk isikhemo,
41008030	at nen agarumi tha'bokhogonat yogeisekhe dogolik, “An nebe hasik ekhe iti, hit nen akhuni ageikhe motok yogeisugup o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe.
41008031	At Yesus nen itithogon inasuk wakhikhesik wene yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, it ap inarluetek men, Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, inom nen an nebe ina'it atluk yi aik ti aik doalegat hagatnabiluk, nebe nasugun o. Nasumo nebe niki pere warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi, niluk asigin o, ” iluk
41008032	agarumi emenogo pakhogon yogeisasikhemo at Petrus nen, Yesus ebe asokneat wolok lageikhesik men yogokhikhe, “A! Hat egen itithogon ugun o! ” iluk asuk wakhikhemo
41008033	at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke aperek emenogo ileken hebenokhogon lageisalok nen, Petrus men iluk wenagakhikhe, “Hat Iblis higi. Allah akla apekherek meke tak-tak ebekhidek, akhuni nen apegarek hak ebekhe lagan yi re! Hat hebe nelokhoma yoma dogogun. Horla lan o, ” iluk wenagakhikhe.
41008034	Wenagakhikhesik, akhuni doalegat emenogo inom, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, waisasikhemo wagoukhama men yogeisasikhe, “At tha nen an noporlik nekhe dogeigiluk halok he, obabut ekaerek etaiken hunik hasik hagakherek meke iti, Na'it, iluk here’isalok, o baga meldisalok inakharek meke iti ago mekeat wolok an noporlik nekhe dogeigiluk wisuak o.
41008035	Tha nen, An nebe niluk dogosak warlok, iluk ebe irlirli horlageinhalok he, watlatluk nuk akhagein o. Mekeat he, tha nen, an nebe hasik men, hano wene yi hasik men, watlasigin halok he, ebe tilagein o.
41008036	Itithogon mekeat he, tha nen, yi meke ti meke agat oba meke tha'bokhogonat iteerek asigin mekeat he, ebe nuk asigin halok, at nen, An ageikhe erlok thaburogo ’bakhigi, usak nogo? Motok dek o.
41008037	Ebe nuk asigin iti, obolukmo nena meke ipisak okosusak nogo. Erlok dek o.
41008038	Akhuni yoma inobabut weak dogolik Allah ebe inom dopokhogon welageidek, yi weak ti weak hagariogei meke iti hinomat dogolik, it inilhanem tha nen, An Yesus agot, igik, an nane iti yogeisigik, u re, ape ekarli halok, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane nopase hogorakho motok welageikharek hak hagatlatluk, it malaikat Allah ekaerek hasik yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ninom witluk, At yi an nagot, iluk nane pakhogon u re, nekarliat asigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41009001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit ninom metek welagap yoma meke aperek watlageidek dogolik, Allah obatnerogo apma ’bisugunem hinileken arat hugun o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41009002	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik noge iniki 6 iluk nen, Petrus men, Yakobus men, Yohanes men, inarligat wogosik tom uan ageikhe baga dageisikhe. Dageisikhesik werekma, at ebe it inilhanem ninat hagatlageik,
41009003	asu elokhoken ninat kut a’bi’baleak hagatlageik, hagakhikhe. Itithogon hagatlageikhe iti, akhuni agat oba yoma su thobalu inilu meke nen thobalhunem a'bi'bal hagatlagarek hak dek. Ninat a'bi'bal kureak hagatlageikhe iti.
41009004	Itithogon hagatlagunem inileken lakhasukha re, at Elia Musa ipisak winam agoukhasik Yesus inom wenekak ugunem hisasukha.
41009005	Itithogon hisasukhasik, at Petrus nen Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Nit o yoma hano welago higi. Halok he, nit nen orlisa henagan, hat hobasik ageikhe, Musa obasik ageikhe, Elia obasik ageikhe, haldinagagin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41009006	Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, Petrus agarlak lak inom inayuk agoukhasik at nen wene nikithogon u heat, hutdigidek dogolik yogokhikhe iti.
41009007	Itithogon isinem oisa thebelinabi ageikhesik, at Allah ane oisa etnogo akla nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An na'but netaiken hunik meke ebe ithiat o. Halok he, at ane holek dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
41009008	it Petrus lak inileken ibat mirlokhogon lakhasukha meke re, it aperek inom dekma. Yesus arligat anek werekma lakhasukha.
41009009	Itithogon hagatlatluk tom oba nen usa'aga dogolik, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nebe nakhunem watlatluk nen, yabokane niluk ageidek werek korlek, an nebe ninat hagatlagunem hinileken neegep etnogo, akhuni aperek motok yogeisugup o. Yabokane niluk agei halok nen, yogeisausak o, ” iluk inasuk warik warik, wogosik usageikhe.
41009010	Inasuk wakhikhemo wene inakla waganhukha mekeat he, it-it ekhe dogolik men isukha, “Nakhunem yabokane niluk asigin iluk ekhe iti nikithogon hagasigin meke hasik ekhe, ” iluk wene erlo herarik herarik usa'agoukha.
41009011	Itithogon ilik usa'aga dogolik, Yesus oba hinok men waganhukha, “It ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo nen, Elia tak wisigin o, iluk iliogei iti nikithogon nen, ” iluk hinok waganhukha.
41009012	Hinok waganhukhama, at nen men yogeisasikhe, “At Elia tak witluk yi hagakhik ti hagakhik karelisigin, iliogei iti eberogonat mekeat he, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo hasik wene holal yigithogon waganogo 'bisukhama werek, At ebe nina'it, iluk, here'isalok, yi aik ti aik motok weak hagarogo 'bugun o, iluk holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek iti nena hasik isukha apegep.
41009013	Itithogon isukhama werek mekeat he, an nen ageikhe yokhisak. At Elia ebe arat wageikhe mekeat he, at obasik, Itithogon hagasugun, iluk holal waganogo 'bisukha tak-tagat, it akhuni nen itithogon hagasu warlok nenat weagatdisukha, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41009014	Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke ebetlake emenogo inoba usa'agoukha meke, akhuni doalegat inalilu ebelak ebelak natogorlek dogolik, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo inom wene palhunem inileken hisasukha.
41009015	Inileken hisugunem, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen inileken eranogoat hisalok nen, Yesus hogorarik pirlirliat heagei wasi agoukha.
41009016	Heagei wasi agoukhama, at Yesus nen agarumi men yogeisasikhe, “Hit it hinom wene palhe lagap iti nena hasik palhe lagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
41009017	it akhuni doalegat natogokhukha meke emenogo ap ageikhe nen men yogokhikhe, “Noe. An na'but yi mokat obabut weak meke akla ukekhesik werekma ane kut dek ageikhemo nen hoba wolok wagei o.
41009018	Mokat obabut weak meke iti akla ukekherethek nen, ebe agat oba tunhogo usa'isinem apemake wosirlagap kirlik-kerlekhogon waga korlek aik kirlidik mak-mak, iki isok motok lapik-lapokhogon watlagarek o. Iti nen, hat hagarumi hane waganharek meke yoma nen mukhogo ula'uagaluk inayoko 'bigi meke re, it nen nikithogon mukhogo ula'u heat hagatlaga, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41009019	Yogokhikhemo at nen it akhuni emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yi, hinetaiken noba hakotdigidek welagap yi re! Hit nen nakla pugurakhe korlek an nobakhanini hapugutdiluk niki meren oba ninom dogogun nogo. Yekerek ithi an noba wolok witni o, ” ilukyogeisasikhemo oba wolok wagoukha.
41009020	Wolok wagoukhama mokat obabut weak meke etnogo ileken Yesus hasikhesik eranogoat yekerek etnogo iki isok dik-dik hagarogo tunhogo agat oba usa'isikhemo apemake wosirlagapkirlik-kerlekhogon waga korlek, ebe dipik-dapik hagakhe lageikhe.
41009021	Itithogon hagakhe lageikhemo at Yesus nen yekerek etnogo opase oba hinok waganhe dogolik men yogokhikhe, “Yekerek yi yigithogon hurli ki hurli nen hagakhe, ” iluk isikhemo, at nen he, men yogokhikhe, “Hurli ebe yekerek oba nen hagakherek mekeat o.
41009022	At mokat obabut weak meke iti nen, yekerek yi ebe wasigiluk hetumo kola'igik, ima usa'igik, hibiku-yogokuat walhekho motok welagarek o. Meke re, hat nen erlok hagasusak halok he, hakmu atluk u ithi hagatnisan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41009023	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Hat nen, Erlok hagasusak halok he, hagasin, iluk yoknekhen iti nenaluk. Akhuni inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk yi meke ti meke erlok hagasusak anek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41009024	eranogoat, yekerek etnogo opase nen, “I noe. Netaiken ebelake Allah oba hakotdiluk welagei mekeat he, netaiken ebelake oba hakotdigidek iti re, hat nen hagatnabin o, ” iluk ane kokhogon yogokhikhe.
41009025	Yogokhunem, akhuni aperek pirlirliat oba natogosi agunem, at Yesus iieken lageisalok, mokat obabut weak meke etnogo wenagakhikhe. Wenagakhe dogolik, “Hat mokat hobabut weak meke yi nen, yekerek yi ane kut degetdigik, asuk dogourogo 'bigik, hagakhe lagan iti, akla nen dukhi lan o. Dukhi lalok yabokane akla ukisusak motok dek o, iluk yokhikhi itiat o, ” iluk wenagakhikhemo
41009026	mokat obabut weak meke etnogo ane kogat ilik ilik yekerek etnogo akla ukiluk welageikhe meke oageleke dik-digithekhe dogolik dukhi agunem, yekerek etnogo warek meke hakene hagatlageikhemo, it akhuni doalegat emenogo inakla nen watlaga thalek, men isukha, “Ebe watlaga yi, ” isukha.
41009027	Itithogon isukha mekeat he, at Yesus yekerek etnogo iki hago meldisikhemo melageikhe.
41009028	Melageikhemo at Yesus uma ukiluk werekma, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba ukiluk, inom inarligat dogolik men yogokhukha, “Nit nen at mokat obabut weak meke iti mukhogo ula’usak erlok dek iti nikithogon nen, ” iluk oba hinok waganhukha.
41009029	Hinok waganhukhama, at nen men yogeisasikhe, “Mokat obabut weak iti meke, yi baga walhigik, iti baga walhigik, hagasumo mukhogo ula’usak erlok dek o. Sembayanat umo anek he, erlok mukhogo ula’usak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41009030	-
41009031	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, at Yesus nen wene agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo anek, holak oGalilea eloke laga dogolik yakulisilik lagaluk, men yogeisasikhe, “Yesus etnogo yi waga o, iluk, akhuni aperek inilu asunogo nen yogeisugup. Na'it, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik, wene men yakulisilik lageikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, ap nen yoko lalok it ap aperek iniki baga 'banumo nasugun o. Itithogon nakhunem niki pere warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi niluk asigin o, ” iluk yakulisilik lageikhe mekeat he,
41009032	it nen wene iti naldisukhasik hinok waganu inayuk nen thogotdisukha.
41009033	At Yesus nen agarumi wene itithogon yakulisilik laga lageikhesik o Kapernaum lalok uma ukisikhe. Ukisikhesik agarumi emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen holagarlem waga dogolik, wene nena wene palik wagap, ” iluk hinok waganhikhe. Itithogon hinok waganhikhe meke re,
41009034	it holagarlem laga dogolik, “Kain hetagapogot hat nogo? An o, ” igik, wene palhe lagoukhasikmo nogo nen, inane igidek huk agoukha.
41009035	Huk agoukhama at hurek lageikhesik, agarumi inebe 12 emenogo, “Horokhogon ya witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo wagoukhama men yogeisasikhe, “Hat ageikhe it ap yoma inoe hetagapogot asusak warlok halok he, inebe tha'bokhogonat inagot atluk inatuaneke asusak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41009036	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yekerek 'bugurlagat meke ageikhe 'bi ageikhesik, inelokhoma meldisikhesik agamo waganhikhesik it emenogo men yogeisasikhe,
41009037	“Tha nen yekerek yi hakene meke opakiat ageikhe an nobasik waganhe halok he, an nebeat woknabigin o. Nen, tha nen an nebe woknabigin halok he, an nebe woknabigin 'buk. Nopase la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo ebeat waganigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41009038	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo nen, at Yohanes nen men yogokhikhe, “Yesus noe. Ap ageikhe nit ukiluk ninom nekhe lago dek meke nen mokat obabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma hat hetaga palogo mukhogo ula'isugunem ninileken hogosik nen, at ebe nit ninom nekhe lago dek meke iti nen, Hat itithogon hagakhe 'buk o, iluk wenagakho, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41009039	-
41009040	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at nen men yogokhikhe, “Tha nen nit wenaknisiliogo dek halok he, at iti nit werekmake mekeat o. Halok he, wenagasusak dek o.
