Tha nen an netaga palogo hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagatluk, dagakhogon an nabok weak palusak dek o, ” ilukyogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
41009041	“An nane eberogonat yokhisak. At tha nen, It Kristus agarumi meke, iluk, i henago wokhisagein halok he, Allah nen oko wogosusak meke iti, horligidek nuk asigin degat, oko horlageinat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41009042	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Tha nen yekerugi 'bugurlagat yi hakene opakiat ageikheetaiken an noba hakotdiluk werekma kolelogo here'anuagaluk akla kagaligin oba an kolelogo here'anhe halok, at akla kagalhe werek iti helekit kok meke arlokopma herle kilogo i lout yekelekma po la’iselepma hano o.
41009043	-
41009044	Hiniki nenweagathinabusak hagatlaga halok, hiniki ebelake tekhogo la'isalok, hiniki ebelake anek dogolik akhuni iniluk motok welageikharekma etoma ukumo hano o. Meke re, hiniki pere werekma, hinebe weakma, [hetu nagulageidek ineken watlageidek inoba ’bisi motok welagarekma] etoma laumo weak iluk, hiniki ebelake palogo la’isano.
41009045	-
41009046	Hinisok nen weagathinabusak hagatlaga halok, ebelake palogo la’isalok, hinisok ebelake anek dogolik akhuni iniluk motok welageikharekma etoma ukumo hano o. Meke re, hinisok pere werekma hinebe hetu nagulageidek ineken watlageidek inoba ’bisi motok welagarekma etoma po la’inagumo weak o, iluk, hinisok ebelake palogo la’isano.
41009047	-
41009048	Hinileken nen weagathinabusak hagatlaga halok, hinileken ebelake hemelogo la’isalok ebelake anek dogolik Allah apma ukumo hano. Meke re, hinileken pere dogogun halok, weakma hetu nagulageidek ineken watlageidek inoba ’bisi motok welagarekma\rq (Yesaya 66:24)\rq* etoma po la’inagumo weak iluk, hinileken ebelake hemelogo la’isano o.
41009049	Wam Allah waretluk, mayu hilharek iti hak, akhuni inebe dopok Allah hasik hano dogoagaluk hetu inoba ’bigin werek o.
41009050	Mayu iti hano mekeat he, aik dek aga halok, nena meke baga aik weregerasusak apegep. Dek o. Mayu iti hinakla hago dogolik, akhuni aperek hinom dapukhogon dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010001	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisalok nen, o etoma thogotdiluk, o Yudea etoma usasikhesik nen, i Yordan aik ilibaganke italhikhe. Italhikhemo nen, akhuni doalegat yabokane at oba natogosi agoukhama, wene hibiku-yogoku yakulisekhe lageikhe hagat, yakulisasikhe.
41010002	Yakulisugunem, ap Farisi meke aperek Yesus oba wagoukhaat. Wagoukhasik men yogokhukha, “Yesus. Ap nen, he waganek meke lologo here'isausak erlok a? Erlok dek a, ” iluk obabut paluogoluk hinok waganhukha.
41010003	Hinok itithogon waganhukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “At Musa nen wene nikithogon hinasuk wakhikhe nogo, ” iluk isikhemo,
41010004	it nen men yogokhukha, “At Musa nen, wene ninasuk wakhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, Ap ageikhe nen he waganek meke here'isagaluk halok he, He yi hebe na'it. Arat here'agagi o, iluk holal waganogo wogotluk erlok here'isausagat o,\rq (Ulangan 24:1-4)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe, ” iluk Yesus yogokhukha.
41010005	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “At Musa nen, Itithogon erlok hagakhe dogosak, iluk, inasuk warogo holal waganhikhe iti hit hinakla motok puk dogolik yokhisugunem hinasuk holusak motok erlok dek iti nen, iti nenat yogeisasikhe.
41010006	Itithogon yogeisasikhe mekeat he, erlo baga Allah nen winametdinanhikhe iti hasik, holal men iluk waganek werek, Ap winametdigik, he winametdigik, winametdisasikhe.\rq (Kejadian 1:27; 5:2)\rq*
41010007	Iti nen, ap nen, agosa opase thogotdisalok ageipisak hano dapulik dogolik,
41010008	it iti, inebe pere mekeat he, opakiat asugun o,\rq (Kejadian 2:24)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek iti nen, yabokane it iti inebe pere 'buk. Opakiat ageikhasik werek o.
41010009	At Allah nenat itithogon ipisak dapukhogon 'bisasikhesikmo, it akhuni inekaerek nen hethelasusak motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010010	Itithogon yogeisalok nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom uma ukiluk, Yesus oba hinok waganhe dogolik men yogokhukha, “Wene yogeisegen iti ebe nikithogon. Hanorogon yoknisan, ” iluk oba hinok waganhukha.
41010011	Hinok waganhukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Ap tha nen, age waganek meke lologo here'isalok, he ninat meke ageikhe waganhe halok he, age alep meke iti il damelogo, age yabokane meke ipisak paramat hagasugun o.
41010012	Nen, it humi tha nen inaguni waganek meke here'isalok ap ninat meke ageikhe woginabi laga halok he, paramat hagakhesik werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010013	At Yesus nen, wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, it akhuni aperek nen yekerugi 'bugurlaktek meke Yesus nen iki hageinabuagaluk oba wogosik wagoukha. Wagoukhama re, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen wenageisasukha.
41010014	Itithogon wenageisugunem, at Yesus ileken hisalok akla aga dageiluk men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni inobabut it yekerugi ithi inobabut iti hakene hagatlasugun halok he, Allah nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma iteerek asugun iti nen, yekerugi 'bugurlaktek ethoma an noba wetnek. Wene palhe 'buk o.
41010015	Tha nen, yekerugi 'bugurlaktek meke Allah nen apma 'bisekherek wene iti waganiluk ukegarek iti hak ukigidek halok he, ukigin motok dek o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010016	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik yekerugi 'bugurlaktek emenogo inebe dopok agamo woginabiluk iki inukuloak thebelogo, at nen, “Allah nen hanothinakhe dogoak, ” iluk woginabiluk yogeisilik lageikhe.
41010017	Wene itithogon yogeisalok at Yesus o etoma nen holak piokthek lagaluk lagunem, ap ageikhe pirlirli oba wageikhe. Wageikhesik itibagal yukukhogon apma hureklasi ageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Guru noe. Wene yakulnisekhe lagan iti, hat hano o. An naburlal-haburlal hagatnabuak nen, an nobabut nikithogon hagakhe dogosak, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41010018	at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Hat hano o, iluk yoknekhen iti nikithogon nen yoknekhen. At ageikhe hano dek o. Allah arligat hano o.
41010019	Wene at nen, Yigithogon hagatno, itithogon hagatno, iluk ninasuk wakhe dogolik, men isikhemo werek, Akhuni inebe inasusak dek o. Param ha'isausak dek o. Hiniki abusak waganusak dek o. Hinekalat inabok palusak dek o. Nukherinabusak dek o. Hinagosa hinopase inalon halinakhe dogosak o,\rq (Keluaran 20:12-16)\rq* iluk ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hat hiluat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41010020	at nen men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Wene yoknekhen iti, tha’bokhogonat an nebe yekerek oba nenat nasuk hologo mothogon hagakherek mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41010021	at Yesus ileken oba halok akmu atluk nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat he, wene opakiat anek ageikhe hagakhidek welagan o. Hat yoma nen lalok hameke yi meke ti meke etoma tha'bokhogonat it aperek inoba oko pali lan o. Oko paliluk oko wokhesugun meke iti, it akhuni aperek inameke dek inerlageik meke iti supusogo wogeisano. Itithogon wogeisegen halok he, hat pogot oba meke kogat iteerek asigin o. Halok he, itithogon arat supusogo wogeisalok an noporlik nekhe dogonok nen wetno, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41010022	wene iti asuk holhikhesik nen, ameke motok doalegatma nogo nen, elokhoken aga dageiluk nen, akla weak atluk lageikhe.
41010023	Lageikhemo, at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo ileken hisilik lageikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni inameke doalegat meke Allah nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma nikithogon uku heat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
41010024	wene yogeisasikhe iti baga inayuk agoukha. Inayuk agoukhama, at Yesus nen yabokane men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Allah nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma nikithogon uku heat o.
41010025	Warn unta kok muluk meke iti, disu elo horlelekma kola'umo erlok lelokhogon ukusak mekeat he, it akhuni inameke doalegat meke iti Allah nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma nikithogon ukusak motok erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010026	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it inayuk motok agoukhasik, it-it men isukha, “Halok he, Allah nen akhuni thani hak erlok tilinabusak he, ” iluk isukha.
41010027	Itithogon ugunem, at Yesus ileken it inoba halok he, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen hagasusak motok erlok dek mekeat he, Allah nen hagasusak erlok dek 'buk. At nen yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok anek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010028	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo at Petrus nen men yogokhikhe, “Meke re, nit hat hoporlik nekhe dogouogoluk yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat here’isalok wagosik nekhe lago meke yi anek he, nikirlik, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41010029	at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Nane eberogonat yokhisak. Tha nen, an akmu nen, wene hano wene yi warlok nen, ai halek men, oe agot men, erugi men, agosa opase men, a'buri men, aen waganek men, here’isalok waga halok he,
41010030	iti ebe dopok obolukmo, yogotak ya ai halek men, agarlak lak men, erugi men, agosa men, a'buri men, aen waganek men, doalegat 100 hakene wogokhe korlek, akhuni nen weagatdekhe dogogunat o. Weagatdekho werekma, yabokane o ilugun hurli baga hagatlasigin iti hagatlaga halok he, naburlal-haburlal wogeisiginat o.
41010031	Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni o yogotak inetaga werek meke doalegat yabokane inetaga dek asigin. Nen, it aperek yogotak inetaga dek werek meke inetaga werek asigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010032	Yabokane at Yesus itithogon yogeisalok, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inom o Yerusalem usauwogoluk, holagarlem usekhe dogolik, at Yesus holak waganhikhemo it agarumi emenogo inayuk atluk hogorakhukha. Nen, it akhuni aperek inoporlik usekhe dogolik inayuk agoukhaat. Itithogon inayuk atluk, usasukha usasukha it ap inebe 12 nen emenogo inasokneat ponhogo wogosik usekhe dogolik, at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An yabokane yigithogon hagatnabugun, itithogon hagatnabugun, ” iluk yogeisilik usasikhe.
41010033	Itithogon yogeisekhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Nit yogotak o Yerusalem usekhe lago. Arat usalokma nen, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, ap nen yoko lalok, an nebe it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, iniki baga 'banumo ap aperek nen nasuagaluk ukum noba 'biluk nen, it nen it ap itikmanke meke iniki baga 'banugun o.
41010034	Itithogon 'banumo it nen inane aik dagok yoknikhik, wosi la'banhik, tugi la'bisoko tugi nakhik, hagatluk nen, nebe arat nasugun o. Nakhunem, niki pere warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi nen niluk asigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010035	Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, ap Zebedeus a'buri Yakobus Yohanes ipisak Yesus oba wagoukhasik men yogokhukha, “Noe. Nit nen ageikhe kino yokhugunem, hat nen hagatnisanogoluk hoba wago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41010036	Yogokhukhama, at nen men yogeisasikhe, “An nen nikithogon hagathinabuagaluk warlok nen wagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
41010037	it nen men yogokhukha, “Hat yabokane Hetagapogot atluk hagakhunem, akhuni nen hogothakhe dogogun itinem, ninom kogat dogouok nen, nit ageikhe hiki ebeke, nen ageikhe hiki paike, dogoagaluk meldinaninogoluk wago, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
41010038	at nen men yogeisasikhe, “Kino yoknekhep iti, wene ebe hinokodegat dogolik yoknekhep o. An yi aik ti aik hagatnabugun iti, hit itithogon hagathinabusak erlok apegep? ” u hak, “An nagei henago nugun iti, hit erlok nausak apegep? Nen, ima usa'isegarek hak usa'anugun iti, hit erlok usa'inagusak apegep? ” iluk oba lisogon yogeisasikhemo,
41010039	it nen, “Erlok nausagat o, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at nen men yogeisasikhe, “An yi aik ti aik hagatnabugun iti hak, hit itithogonat hagathinabugun o. Nen, ima usa'isegarek hak, an usa'anugun iti, hit itithogonat usa'inagagunat o.
41010040	Mekeat he, hat ageikhe an niki ebeke, nen, hat ageikhe niki paike ninom kok dogouogoluk, an nen meldinagusak erlok dek o. Haganeat Allah akla nen, It meldisagein, iluk apasikhe meke werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010041	Itithogon yogeisugunem at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke ebetlake inebe 10 nen inasuk holhukhasik inakla aga Yakobus Yohanes ipisak inoba 'bisukha.
41010042	Inakla aga itithogon inoba 'bisukhama at Yesus nen inebe tha'bokhogonat natogosuagaluk waisasikhemo natogokhukhama men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. It akhuni itikmanke meke inougi pemerintah meke nen, Hinougi koktek nirat o, iluk, mep dageik-dagokhogon hagarinakhik, nen, it ap koktek iti nen, hin motok han motok yogeisigik, hagakharek iti hinilu.
41010043	-
41010045	Meke re, hit nen it hagakharek iti hak, itithogon hagakhe dogosak motok dek o. An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo hit natuaneke dogolik yi meke ti meke hagatnekhe dogobageik iluk wagagi dek o. At he, an nen hit hinatuaneke dogeigiluk wagagi o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik hinebe herle warek negen welagap meke iti, hinebe doalegat herle hisalhinabigiluk anat nasuagaluk wagagi iti. Iti hakene, hit ageikhe tha nen, An inoe kok asigin, iluk apasi halok he, hinagorat asuak. Nen, hit ageikhe tha nen, An netaga kok asigin, iluk apasi halok he, at ebe hit tha'bokhogonat hinatuaneke asuak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41010046	At Yesus ebe men, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men, wene itithogon ilik usasukha usasukha, o Yeriko silimoke turlem usasukhasik, thogotdiluk dukhugunem, akhuni aperek inebe doalegat inoporlik dukhisukha. Dukhugunem ap Timeus a'but etaga Bartimeus ileken puk meke yi meke ti meke ape kino weak ekhe lageikhe meke iti holagarlem hurek werekma dukhisukha.
41010047	Dukhugunem akhuni nen, “Yesus ai o Nazaret meke etnogo wiriogo o, ” iluk isukhama, at ap etnogo asuk holhikhesik ane kokhogon Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Yesus Daud nen itago meke noe a! Hakmu nean o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41010048	it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, “Hane o, ” iluk wenagakhukha mekeat he, yabokane ebenageik ane kokhogon men yogokhikhe, “Daud nen itago meke noe a! Hakmu nean o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41010049	at Yesus ebe huk ageikhesik akhuni emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Wisuak nen watni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen waekhe dogolik men isukha, “Yesus nen wahiriogo iti hakla arleken akhilik melasin o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
41010050	Itithogon yogokhukhama asu itikmanke ugu meke nokorlogo po la'isalok, ibat melatluk Yesus oba wageikhe.
41010051	Wageikhemo, at nen men yogokhikhe, “An nen nikithogon hagathabuagaluk yoknekhen, ” iluk hinok waganhikhemo ap ileken puk meke etnogo nen men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Nileken hano hagatnabinogoluk yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41010052	at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Hetaiken noba hakotdegen iti bagaat hano agan o. Halok he, lan o, ” iluk yogokhe korlek eranogoat ileken puk meke etnogo hano ageikhesik Yesus holagarlem lagunem oporlik inomat lagoukha.
41011001	Itithogon lagoukhasik, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, o kota Yerusalem ukuogoluk horokhogon asi dageisukhasik, tom Zaitun apma o ukul ageikhe etaga Betfage, ageikhe etagaBetania etoma mot-mot asi dageisukhasik, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inebe pere wene warogo alebageik la'isasikhe.
41011002	Itithogon la’isekhe dogolik, “O ukul hinelokhoma ili lani o. Arat lagap halok he, aban ukekhe dogolik warn keledai eak meke akhuni apot oba yasukhogon wogosik lageidek meke kupi irlelek werekma hinileken hugun etnaga. Nen, arat hinileken hegep halok he, kupi irlelek iti hisalogo wolok wetno.
41011003	Itithogon kupi hisalhunem, it akhuni etoma meke ageikhe nen, Keledai kupi hisalhe lagap iti, nenaluk, iluk wene palhe halok he, men yogeisano, Ninoe Etagapogot etnogo nen keledai yi meke dek nen wolok luogoluk hisalhe lago. At nen keledai yi apuke ibat-ibat la’isigin o, iluk yogeisano, ” iluk wene warogo la’isasikhe.
41011004	La’isasikhemo lagoukha keledai isikhe etnogo eak meke ageikhe o ageikhe holagarlem halekma thu uma ukegarekma, holak abelma, ape kupi irlelek werekma ’bikha lagoukhasik kupi hisalhukha.
41011005	Hisalhunem it akhuni etoma metek welagoukha meke nen, men yogeisasukha, “Warn keledai eak meke yi nenaluk kupi hisalhe lagap, ” iluk wene palhunem,
41011006	it nen he, at Yesus nen, “Wene itithogon yogeisano, ” iluk isikhe hagat, yogeisasukhama, it nen, “I o, ” iluk here’isasukha.
41011007	Here’isasukhama, warn keledai eak meke etnogo Yesus oba wolok wagoukhasik inasu itikmanke ugu meke nokorlogo keledai apot oba talogo ’bisukhama Yesus ebe keledai apot oba yasuk lageikhe.
41011008	Apot oba yasuk lageikhesik lagunem it akhuni doalegat emenogo ebetlake inasu itikmanke ugu meke nokorlogo holagarlemke talogo ’bilik lageik, it ebetlake nen oka yabumoke meke palogo holagarlemke talogo ’bilik lageik, hagakhukha.
41011009	Itithogon ’bilik laga dogolik, at Yesus ebe turlumotdiluk, it aperek alebageik, it aperek oporlik yabokane ageik, laga dogolik inane kokhogon men ilik lagoukha, “Noe wa! Wa! Wa! ” iluk u hak, “Hosana! ” ilik laga dogolik, “Ninopase Etagapogot Allah nen la’agei agamawagan yi, at nenat hanothabuak o.\rq (Mazmur 118:25-26)\rq*
41011010	Haganeat ninopa Daud apma welagoukha hak, Allah nen ninoe yi apma ’binaniluk hanotninabuak o. Allah kok pogot oba welagarek meke, nopase wa! ” u hak, “Hosana! ” iluk amitmit luk-luk ilik ilik,
41011011	o Yerusalem ukisukha. Ukisukhasik, at Yesus ebe Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat ileken penakhe korlek, o arat hi ageikhemo, agarumi inebe 12 nen emenogo inom o Betania dukhi agoukha. Yesus nen o ara erlo ageikhe homan ’bisikhe wene
41011012	O Betania dukhi ageikhesik noge iluk, hubuluk ukekhe dogolik, Yesus hipiri abu ageikhe.
41011013	Hipiri abu ageikhemo, o ara erlo ageikhe eka mirli werekma ileken walegat nen lakhasikhe. Ileken lakhalok, “Eken ugu a? Dek a, ” iluk, ’bikha lageikhe meke, o eta baga, o ara eken ikhidekma nogo nen, eka anek mirli werekma ’bikha lageikhe meke, eken ageikhe ikhidek. Eka anek mirli werekma ’bikha lageikhesik,
41011014	men yogokhikhe, “Hat o yi re, hurli yogotak nen lok-logat yabokane heken akhuni aperek nen neke dogogun motok dek. Ikhun, ” iluk yogokhunem it agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inasuk holhukha.
41011015	At Yesus lak o etoma nen o Yerusalem ukisukha. Ukisukhasik at Allah ai halekma ukisikhe hak, it akhuni etoma ukiluk dogolik oko waganhik, palhik, hagakhe lagoukha meke tha'bokhogonat sikhogo-mukhogo itikmanke ula'isigik, it aperek uang meja perlago baga 'biluk okokhe lagoukha meke men, it aperek o perlago baga inebe hurek dogolik thue merpati yogeik hakene meke oko waganhe lagoukha meke men, inago iti abel dagak-pagakhogon podisigik, hagarik lageikhe.
41011016	Itithogon hagakhikhesik akhuni aperek nen yi meke ti meke wolok Allah ai halekma o sili obakha thekekhogon lausak dek iluk wene palhikhe.
41011017	Wene palhikhesik, it akhuni emenogo inasuk wakhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “At Allah nen ekhe dogolik, An nai halek yi hasik akhuni nen ekhe dogolik, Yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga dopoksembayan ekhe dogogun oba o, iluk ekhe dogogun,\rq (Yesaya 56:7)\rq* isikhe meke holal waganek werek etnogo dek? Itithogon iluk holal waganek werek mekeat he, hit nen, it ap akhuni inameke iniki abusak tilogo horlegarek meke inai negenhalogo 'bisekhe lagap yi re! ” iluk inekarli warogo inasuk wakhikhe.
41011018	Inasuk wakhunem, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek inom, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom nen wene iti inasuk holhukhasik nen, Yesus wasuogoluk abok palhukha. Abok palhukha iti, Yesus nen wene yakulisugunem akhuni doalegat at ane holhukhasik hogorakhe lagoukha iti nen, at ebe inayuk atluk, wasuogoluk hagakhukha iti.
41011019	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, o arat hi ageikhemo, Yesus agarumi inom o Yerusalem nen dukhi agoukha.
41011020	Yesus lak itithogon dukhi agoukhasik noge iluk hubuluke hubenat inapuke o ara etnogo erloma mot-mot ukekhe dogolik, inileken 'bikhasukha re, omaken inom motok puk ageikhemo hasukha.
41011021	Hasukhasik, Yesus nen o ara yogokhikhe meke etnogo, at Petrus akla ebekhikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Noe. O ara homan 'begen etnogo arat puk agama yi hileken 'bikhan o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41011022	at Yesus nen it men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogono.
41011023	Tha nen etaiken pere ageidek opakiat dogolik, An igin yi tak-tagat hagatlasigin, iluk etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, Tom yi henokhogon i laut yekelekma ponhogo lan o, iluk igin halok he, at igin meke tak-tagat Allah nen hagasigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
41011024	Itithogon hagakherek iti nen, hit nen yi meke ti meke Allah kino yogokhe dogolik, hinakla nen, Arat woknisekhemo, iluk apegep halok wokhisageinat o, iluk yokhisigi.
41011025	-
41011026	Hit ageikhe melatluk sembayan ekhe dogolik, weak hagakhep meke ninopase Allah pogot oba meke nen thagalogo degetduagaluk, akhuni nen hit weagathinakha meke hit nen eken inoba 'biluk welagap halok he, iti thagalogo here’isano. [Itithogon mekeat he, hit nen eken inoba ’biluk welagap meke iti thagalogo degetdisigidek hinakla weak welagap halok he, hit weak hagakhep meke iti ninopase Allah pogot oba meke nen thagalogo degetdisigin degat o, ] iluk yogeisasikhe.
41011027	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane o Yerusalem ukisukha. Ukisukhasik at Yesus Allah ai halekma etnogo o silimoke lageik, wageik, hagakhunem, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo men, inarluetek emenogo men, inom oba wagoukha.
41011028	Wagoukhasik men yogokhukha, “Hat nena meke iteerek agatik, yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakhe lagan. Nen, ap tha nen, Yigithogon hagakhe dogono, iluk iteerek dogoagaluk meldageikhemo hagakhe lagan, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
41011029	at Yesus nen, “An meneke hinok opakiat ageikhe waganiginat. Hinok waganhunem hit nen hutukhogon yoknekhep halok he, an nen meneke, iti meke iteerek atluk hagakhe lagei o, iluk, pakhogon yokhisageinat o.
41011030	At Yohanes nen akhuni ima usa’isekhe lageikhe etnogo, Allah pogot oba meke nen yakulikhikhemo usa’isekhe lageikhe a? E a, at he, akhuni agat oba meke nen yakulikhukhama usa’isekhe lageikhe a. Yoknitni ta! ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
41011031	it-it ekhe dogolik men isukha, “Nit nen, Allah pogot oba meke nen yakulikhikhemo usa’isekhe lageikhe, iluk yogosumo, at nen, Halok he, hit nen Yohanes ane eberogonat iluk hutdigidek welagagip iti nenaluk, iluk nit yoknisaunogo, ” isukhasik,
41011032	it akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen, “Yohanes iti Allah aneat yoknisekhe lageikhe, ” iluk ebe hutdekhe lagoukhasikmo nogo nen, akhuni inayuk nen men isukha, “Nit nen, Akhuni nen yakulikhukhama usa'isekhe lageikhe, iluk yogosumo, erlok degat o, ” iluk isukhasik,
41011033	yabokane Yesus men yogokhukha, “Wene iti nit ninokodek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Halok he, an nen meneke, Iti meke iteerek agarik hagakhe lagei, iluk hit yokhisagein degat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41012001	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesikyabokane wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe ayabumo anggur ai yakhikhe. Yakhikhesikleget halhik, eken thagalogo apusu kelelhe dogogun oba agat hulelhik, inileken dogogunmo kayo perlakhik, hagakhikhe. Hagakhikhesik it ap aperek elanma hasik it inaen negen dogoagaluk 'bisalok ebe o werlekma etoma lageikhe.
41012002	Lageikhesik werek korlek, eken ikhunem palharek oba hagatlasi ageikhemo, at ayabu iteerek meke etnogo nen it ap therogo dogoagaluk 'bisasikhe meke emenogo nen anggur eken ageikhe palogo wogosuagaluk, atuaneke ageikhe inoba la'i ageikhe.
41012003	La'i ageikhemo, it ap emenogo inoba wageikhe meke re, ebe tugi warogo eken palikhidek werlegat apuke la'isukha.
41012004	La'isukhama lageikhemo, yabokane atuaneke ageikhe inoba la'i ageikhemo wageikhe meke re, it nen ekarli warogo tugi ukuloak kageik-kagoukhogon wakhukha.
41012005	Itithogon hagakhukhama, yabokane atuaneke ageikhe la'i ageikheat. Wageikhemo ebe motogat wakhukha. Wakhukhama yabokane at atuaneke aperek inebe doalegat it ap emenogo inoba la'isa ageikhemo wagoukhama it nen, ebetlake tugi warogo 'bisigik, ebetlake inebe motok inakhik, hagakhukha.
41012006	Itithogon tha'bokhogonat inakhukhama at ayabu iteerek meke etnogo a'but etaiken hunik meke opakiat iti anek ageikhemo, at nen, An na'but yiat inoba la'umo, it nen alon halogo heagei warogo waganugun o, iluk apasikhesik, ebe yabokane inoba la'i ageikheat.
41012007	La'i ageikhemo wagunem, it ap yabu therogo welagoukha meke emenogo nen, it-it ekhe dogolik men isukha, Ap ithi opase obolukmo yabu iteerek asigin meke etnogo ebe waga ili. Halok he, yabu yi nirat iteerek asuok nen, ebe wasuok o, iluk isukhasik,
41012008	ebe hakhalok wakhukhasik warek anggur yabumo nen leget itikmanke ula'isasukha.
41012009	Itithogon hagakhukha iti nen, ap kok ayabu iteerek meke iti nikithogon hagasigin apegep. At ebe witluk men hagasigin. It ap iti inebe motogat warogo podisalok inobolukmo yabu anggur yabu etnogo therogo dogoagaluk ap ninat meke meldisageinat o.
41012010	Hit nen Allah ane holal yigithogon waganogo 'bisukhama etaga thalhidek welagap nogo? It nen, It ap tukang o helekit meke halharek meke nen, o ebe halhe dogolik, Helekit yi weak, iluk here'isukha meke iti ebe herlagaat hagatlagama o.
41012011	Itithogon hagatlaga iti, ninopase Allah Etagapogot nenat hagakhe o, iluk ninileken hogosik nen, Eiye! iluk hogorakhe lago,\rq (Mazmur 118:22-23)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisukha meke iti etaga thalhe lagap dek nogo? Thalhe lagabat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41012012	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen men isukha, “Wene oba lisogon ekhe iti, nit ninobasigat yoknisekhe higi, ” iluk hutdisukha. Hutdisukhasik Yesus ebe hakhauwogoluk hagakhukha mekeat he, akhuni doalegat emenogo inayuk nen thogotdisalok kikil wakhukha.
41012013	Yabokane it ap koktek emenogo nen, Yesus ileken waganogo ane igin oba wene oba 'buogoluk, it nen it ap Farisi meke aperek men, it ap Herodes werekmake meke aperek men, inom nen Yesus itema waganuagaluk oba la'isa agoukha.
41012014	La'isa agoukhama wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Noe. Hat hobabut wene eberogonat anek ekhe dogolik, akhuni inelokhoken oba anek 'birisalok, aperek helokhoma 'bisigik, aperek hoporlike 'bisigik, hagakhetek dek. Inebe hayuk degat dogolik, Allah akla nen, Akhuni itithogon hagakhe dogoak, iluk apekherek meke eberogonat anek yakulnisekhe lagan iti nit ninilu o. Halok he, nit Yahudi meke hagakhorek mothogonat, uang pemerintah hasik, kok etagapogot Kaisar wogosusak erlok a? Erlok dek a. Wogokhe dogouok a? Thogotdekhe dogouok a, ” iluk hinok waganhukhama,
41012015	at Yesus nen, “It ap yi an nukhetdanuogoluk inane 'bitokhogon yoknekha, ” iluk inobabut ekagat palhikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nobabut paluogoluk egep iti nenaluk. Uang perak yabu iniki opaki hasik hagakhunem iniki oko wogeisegarek etnogo meke ageikhe nileken hak nen, wagani lani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
41012016	wolok wagoukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Yi tha ebe hagarek oba etaga holal waganek werek apegep, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo it nen, “Ithi Kaisar at o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
41012017	at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Kaisar meke halok he, Kaisar at wogokhik, Allah meke halok he, Allah at wogokhik, hagakhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo it nen, “Eiye! Nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
41012018	Yabokane, it ap Saduki meke nen, “Akhuni watlatluk iniluk asugun dek, ” iluk egarek meke aperek Yesus oba wagoukha. Wagoukhasik at oba hinok waganhe dogolik men yogokhukha,
41012019	“Noe. At Musa nen men yakulnisasikhe, Ap ageikhe a'buri itaginakhidekma age thoge 'biluk ebe watlaga halok he, obolukmo a'but ageikhe itasuagaluk he thoge iti ap iti agorat waganusak o,\rq (Ulangan 25:5-6)\rq* iluk, yakulnisasikhesik, holal waganogo 'bisikhemo werek o.
41012020	Itithogon isikhe meke werekma, ap inebe 7 nen inopase opakiat nen itago welagoukha. Dogolik, inoe makusa meke iti age waganhikhesik, a'buri itaginakhidekma watlageikheat.
41012021	Watlageikhemo agot oporlik meke iti nen he thoge iti waganhikhesik a'buri itaginakhidekma watlageikheat. Watlageikhemo yabokane inagot inoporlik meke iti nen itithogonat hagakhikhe.
41012022	Itithogon it ap inebe 7 nen ina'buri itaginakhidekma watlarik anek wagoukhama, yabokane ebe yabokane, he iti ebe watlageikheat.
41012023	Halok he, it ap inebe 7 nen iti, he opakiat meke iti waganik wagoukhasikmo, yabokane Allah nen akhuni warek meke inilugurinakhunem it iti iniluk aga dogolik, he iti tha hak age asigin apegen, ” iluk Yesus oba hinok waganhukhama,
41012024	at nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, Allah ane holal waganek iti men, Allah obatne iti men, hinokodek dogolik, hinane korlo egep iti.
41012025	Akhuni warek meke Allah nen inilugurinabilukmo nen, humi waganhik, it aperek igisigik, hagakhe dogogun motok dek o. It malaikat pogot oba meke welageikharek iti hakeneat dogogun o.
41012026	Akhuni watlatlukmo Allah nen inilugurinabigin, iluk wene Musa nen holal waganhikhe meke etnogo etaga thalhidek welagap nogo? At Musa o 'beroat erloma lageikhesikmo, Allah nen men yogokhikhe, Abraham inom, Ishak inom, Yakub inom, inopase Allah anat o,\rq (Keluaran 3:6)\rq* iluk yogokhikhemo holal waganhikhe meke etnogo etaga thalhidek welagap nogo? Etaga thalhethebat o.
41012027	At Allah re, akhuni warek meke inopase 'buk. Iniluk meke inopase o. Itithogon mekeat he, hit hinane korlo motok egep iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41012028	Wene itithogon inom isi korlek, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo opakiat ageikhe wageikhesik asuk holek welageikhesik, akla nen men apasikhe, “It ap yi Yesus oba hinok waganhama at nen wene oko mothogon yogeisekhe higi, ” iluk akla apasikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo wene ebe kok he, ki isikhe apegen, ” iluk hinok Yesus oba waganhikhe.
41012029	Hinok oba waganhikhemo, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Wene iti kok he, Musa nen men isikhe, Hit ap Yahudi meke yi hinasuk holini! Ninopase Etagapogot Allah arligat o.
41012030	Halok he, hinetaiken men, hinobabut men, hinakla men, hinobatne men, opakiat atluk ninopase Allah Etagapogot ebe itiat hinetaikenhunik dogono o,\rq (Ulangan 6:4-5)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe meke, wene kok he, itiat o.
41012031	Nen, wene iti wema baga negen, men isikhe apigi, Hinekaerek hinebe hinetaiken hunik welagathep iti hak, it akhuni aperek hinom welagathep meke iti hinetaiken hunik dogono o,\rq (Imamat 19:18)\rq* iluk wene pere isikhe etaat kok o. Wene ninasuk wakhikhe meke aperek weregat mekeat he, abelma negen anek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41012032	Yogokhikhemo, at Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke etnogo nen men yogokhikhe, “I noe. Wene hanorogo egen higi. At Allah ebe opakiat, ageikhe dek,\rq (Ulangan 4:35)\rq* iluk eberogonat egen.
41012033	Halok he, at Allah ako warogo ebe abisake hetumo hunekhik, yi meke ti meke at obasik 'bisigik, hagakhe dogosak erlok dek negen meke re, ninetaiken men, ninakla men, ninobatne men, opakiat atluk, at Allah ebe ninetaiken hunik dogolik, it akhuni aperek ninom welagorek meke ninekaerek ninebe hakene ninetaiken hunik dogosak iti kogat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41012034	at Yesus akla nen, “Ap yi etaiken werek meke nen ekhe higi, ” iluk apasikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Hat he, Allah apma horogat ukusak welagan higi, ” iluk yogokhikhemo it akhuni emenogo nen yabokane Yesus oba wene hinok waganu inayuk ageikhe.
41012035	Itithogon hagakhukhama, yabokane at Yesus nen Allah ai halekma wene yakulisekhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “It ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo nen, Kristus Allah nen ayoko 'biluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo, ebe Daud nen itago meke o, iluk iliogei iti, nikithogon halok iliogei apegep.
41012036	At Daud Allah Agoreke akla dogolik, ekaerek nen men isikhe, Allah Etagapogot nen an noe Etagapogot yogokhe dogolik, Akhuni hat hathili meke emenogo hisok nen al debelogo 'bisanok nen, an nen aban hoba 'bisa'ageidek werek korlek, hat an nalilu niki ebeke hurek dogolik hebe kok dogonok,\rq (Mazmur 110:1)\rq* iluk Allah nen Kristus yogokhikhe, iluk Daud nen isikhe.
41012037	At Daud ekaerek nen Kristus ebe hasik, An noe Etagapogot, iluk isikhe mekeat he, hit nen, Kristus iti Daud nen itago meke o, iluk nikithogon nen usak apegep. Itithogon usak erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Wene itithogon yakulisugunem it akhuni doalegat emenogo, at ane holhe dogolik, inakla arleken akhekhe lagoukha.
41012038	Akhuni doalegat emenogo inakla arleken akhekhe korlek, at Yesus nen wene men yogeisasikhe, “It Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke iti nen weagathinabunogo iluk, hit hinobabut hebelogo dogono o. It inakla warlok nen hagakharek yi. Inasu uanat meke ikhalok pasar oko waganharekma etoma akhuni nen inane agugurogo heagei warinabuagaluk lageik,
41012039	o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ap koktek meke inobolukmo thelekmarogon hureklasi ukigik, akhuni pesta kok isago nukunem it ap koktek hurek lageikharekma thelekmarogon hurek lageik, hagakhe dogou warlok welageikharek iti.
41012040	Itithogon dogolik, humi thoge meke inai halek men, inameke men, thebelekhe dogoligat, akhuni nen inasuk holiluk, It hano, apoagaluk sembayan uan-nagan likhalok lageikharek itithogon hagakhidek dogolepma, Allah nen ukum herlekha'bugat inoba ’biluk dogolep. Meke re, itithogon hagakharek iti nen, ukum akin meke inoba 'biluk weagarinabigin, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41012041	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik at Yesus ebe hurek lageikhesik dogolik, peti uang Allah hasik akla 'bisegarek meke itik ebelake werekma, akhuni doalegat nen uang 'bilik lagunem 'birisik welageikhe. Akhuni inikierek meke doalegat nen uang doalegat 'bilik lagoukha.
41012042	Itithogon 'bilik lagoukha mekeat he, at he thoge ameke dek meke ageikhe wageikhesik uang sen meke opakiat 'bu hak motok 'bugurlaktek meke pere 'biluk lageikhe.
41012043	-
41012044	Itithogon 'biluk lagunem at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo waisasikhemo wagoukhama men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni tha'bokhogonat iti inameke doalegatma oba hiakhogon 'bisega iti, herlekha'bugat negenat o. Mekeat he, at he thoge ameke dek meke iti anek he, apiri oko palogo nausak meke tha'bokhogonat 'bisekhe iti anek he, motok doalegat negen 'bisekhe o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41013001	Wene itithogon yogeisalok, at Yesus Allah aihalekma nen dukhisikhemo, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo ageikhe nen men yogokhikhe, “Eiye! Noe, nayuk o. O helekit hano meke baga o hano motok halek ethoma lakhan! ” iluk hogorakhikhe.
41013002	Hogorakhunem, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “O yiluk-muluk halek ethoma lakhekhe lagan a? Helekit oba thapapal halek ethoma ageikhe thogotdigidek motogat misak-dapukhogon la'isagun o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41013003	Wene itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhesik nen, at Yesus lak Allah ai halek i aik yi bagake thogotdiluk i aik ilibaganke italhukhasik, tom Zaitun ukul oba dageiluk inebe hurek lagoukha. Hurek lagoukhasik, Petrus men, Yakobus men, Yohanes men, Andreas men, Yesus inom inarligat dogolik, at oba wene ageikhe hinok waganhukha.
41013004	Hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Noe. Wene yoknisegen etnogo, mera nen hagatlasigin. Ebe hagatlasigiluk hagakhe korlek, ki meke tak hagatlagunem nit ninetaiken eketlasugun. Wene hutukhogon yoknisan o, ” iluk hinok waganhukha.
41013005	Hinok waganhukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen nukhetdinageinogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
41013006	Akhuni inebe doalegat nen inetaga an netaga meke thalogo nen men ilik wisugun, At wisigin isukha etnogo an nebe wagei yiat o, iluk inane eberogonat thalek akhuni doalegat nukherinabisugun.
41013007	Itithogon hagatlaga korlek, wim kagaldiluk horogat yakhunem inane hinasuk holhik, walegat yakhunem inabok holhik, hagakhe dogolik, hinetaiken aborlok ugup o. Itithogon hagatlasigin mekeat he, o ilugun hurli baga hagatlasigin meke iti abanat o.
41013008	Yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga dopok wim kagalhik, ap inetagapogot inagarumi inapma meke dopok wim kagalhik, hagasugun. Wim kagalhunem, yi ai ti ai dugul luk-lagathigik, hipiri no ageik, hagatlasigin mekeat he, iti, humi ineagei itaginabuogoluk hinet wakharek iti hak, alebageik hugun itiat o.
41013009	Itithogon hekhe dogolik, hit he, hinobabut hebelogo dogono. Akhuni aperek nen, hiniki herle warogo ap koktek nen hinitema waganuagaluk inobawokhisik lageik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma nen tugi hinakhik, hagasugun o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, It yi Yesus agarumi, iluk, it ap pemerintah meke koktek inom, inetagapogot inom, ukum hinoba 'buagaluk inelokhoma meldinagumo, itinem hano iluk, an hagakhunem hinileken neekhe lagap meke pakhogon yogeisagun.
41013010	Meke re, wene hano wene yi, yi ap ti ap inukuloak etaga dopok yogeisilik lagap halok he, ilugun hurli baga arat hagatlasigin o.
41013011	Hit hiniki herle warogo wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakharekma wokhisik lagunem hit nen, An nen wene oko nikithogon igin, iluk hinelabut hikhup o. Wene oko hit nen hinakla kagalogo ugun 'buk. Allah Agoreke nen, Yigithogon ini o, iluk itinem yokhisagein mekeat yogeisano o.
41013012	Nen, agarlak ageikhe nen, ekaerek agarlak wasuagaluk wolok lageik, opase nen, a'but wasuagaluk wolok lageik, ina'buri nen, inagosa inopase inasuagaluk inabok palhik, hagasugunat o.
41013013	Nen, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen an netaga ilik, Hit he, at agarumi, iluk hinebe ina'it motok hisagun o. Mekeat he, tha nen etaiken thebekhogon obakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogin halok he, o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen tiligin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41013014	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen holal waganek yi, etaga thalhe dogolik, hanorogo hutdekhe dogono o. Akhuni nen inalilo meke hagakhunem agorlerogon lo lugun meke o dogosak dekma melaga halok he, akhuni o Yudea eloke meke etoma lo tom obake dagouak o.
41013015	Lo dagouogoluk halok, akhuni aperek o warleke baga dageiluk werekma, inapuke usatluk nen, inameke yi meke ti meke uma werek meke wagani ukigidek piokthegat dagouak o.
41013016	Nen, it aperek wen atomke nen, hipirikamake nen, inapuke uma inasu wagani ageidek lo piokthegat dagouak o.
41013017	Itithogon dageikhe dogolik, it humi ineagei inakla meke men, ineagei ket itago meke inirlak aban niliogei meke iti men, weak hugun iti, eiye! Nakmu lak e.
41013018	Hit lo dagagun iti, o weak oba launogo iluk, sembayan ekhe dogono.
41013019	O iti dikene weagat asigin iti ebekeram Allah nen yi meke ti meke winametdisikhe iti hurli nen logat, o yogotak ya hurli, weak kok iti hakene ageikhe hagatlageidek meke, opaki hasik itiat hagatlatluk yabokane ageikhe hagatlasigin motok dek o.
41013020	Weak hagatlasigin iti, ninopase Allah Etagapogot nen, Hurli yi hurli arat o, iluk igidek kamotdilepma re, akhuni tha'bokhogonat tilinakhidek weagat atlep. Meke re, akhuni Allah nen wenageinakhikhe meke, it inobasik anek he, Yogo. Weak arat hegep o, iluk hurli wasigin werek o.
41013021	Nen, weak itithogon hagatlaga korlek, it aperek nen, Kristus etnogo yi waga yi 'bikhani, igik, it aperek nen, Kristus etnogo ili waga ili lakhani, igik, ugunem hit hinakla nen eberogonat iluk apugup o.
41013022	It akhuni aperek inekalat ekhe dogolik, Kristus etnogo nebe anat o, igik, nen, it aperek nen, Allah ane yokhisegerek meke anat o, igik, i wisugun o. Witluk nen, Akhuni Allah nen wenageinakhikhe meke emenogo nukhetdisausak a? Dek a, iluk nukhetdisauwogoluk, inane eberogonat apoagaluk hagasusak dek meke elalin meke hagarik wisugun o.
41013023	Wene iti aban hagatlageidek werek korlek husupi tak yokhisigi iti hinobabut hebelogo dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41013024	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Weak kok hugun iti halok oba nenyabokane o mulikin mum ageik, thut yakhidekhuk ageik,
41013025	husagal pogot oba nen kilelogo usa'ageik, it pogot oba inobatneak welageikharek meke itiAllah nen inaborlogotdisigik, hagasigin o.\rq (Yesaya 13:10; 34:4; Yoel 2:10,31; 3:15)\rq*
41013026	Itinem an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nobatnerogonat oisa akla usa’agunem, akhuni inileken nealok, motok hogotnabugun o.
41013027	Usa’aga dogolik, it malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo, akhuni Allah nen wenageinakhikhe meke o wema elomake, upu elomake, ilike, yike, welageikharek meke natogorinabuagaluk, yoko pogot erlomake erlomake o yi ai ti ai eloma la’isagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41013028	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene yi o ara oba lisogon yokhisagein yi hutdini o. O ara iti eka lologo usekherethek, yabokane asi’bat dageigik, eka dabelhik, hagakhunem hinileken halok hinakla nen, Yogo. O arat hibi asigin higi, iluk hinakla hutdegethep itihak,
41013029	Itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk yokhisigi etnogo ebe hagatlagunem, hinileken halok nen, Yogo. O ilugun hurli baga hagatlasigin etnogo horok asi aga higi, iluk hinakla apano o.
41013030	Yigithogon hagatlasigin, itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk yokhisigi iti, akhuni o yogotak ya werek meke inebe dek ageidek aban werek korlegat ebe tha'bokhogonat hagatlasigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
41013031	Pogot men, agat men, iti dek asigin mekeat he, an nane iti dek asigin motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41013032	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hagatlasigin iti, o itinem, jam iti baga hagatlasigin iluk, nit tha’bokhogonat ninokodek anek. It malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo inokodegat. Nen, an nebe at Allah a’but mekeat he, nokodegat o. An nopase arligat ilu o.
41013033	Mera hagatlasigin hit hinokodegat iti nen, hinobabut hebelogo thuam hanorogon dogono o.
41013034	Wene yi ipisak tak-tak, ap ageikhe aila nen o walegat lagaluk, atuaneke aila therogo dogoagaluk ’bisalok lagarek. Lagaluk, atuaneke emenogo inayabu dopok supusogo wogeisekhe dogolik, Hat ageikhe yi hagakhe dogono. Hat ageikhe yi hagakhe dogono. Hat ageikhe nai holagapema thuam welagatek meke yi, hileken hanorogo dogono, iluk supusogo wogeisalok lagarek hakeneat o.
41013035	Iti hak, hit hinileken hanorogo dogono, iluk yokhisigi iti, hinoe Etagapogot ai iteerek meke etnogo apuke wisigin iti mera wisigin. O hiamaganekeke wisigin a? Hibako eketurlem wisigin a? Thue ane isi korlek wisigin a? O wik-wik wisigin a. Hit hinokodek.
41013036	O itinem wisigin hinokodek iti, akhirak noge isi korlek ’bithisasunogo nen,
41013037	hinobabut hebelogo dogono o, iluk hit yokhisigi yi akhuni inebe tha’bokhogonat hinomat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014001	Itinem it Yahudi meke domba pesta Paskah etnogo meke men, eken roti hisuagaluk akla usakharek meke akla usakhidek werago nekarek etnogo meke men, iniki pere dogoluk, ageikhe nen nuogoluk werek korlek, it ap Allah iteerek meke emenogo inougi koktek men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo men, Yesus inileken wolok limago ha'iluk wasuogoluk abok palhe lagoukha.
41014002	Abok palhe dogolik, men isukha, “Pesta kok isago nukunem wene woklatluk ilugun oba weak asunogo nen hakhigidek dogoluk, o we dikene halok hakhauwok o, ” iluk abok palhukha.
41014003	Abok itithogon palhe korlek, at Yesus lak o Betania lagoukhasik, ap Simon u henako hakene inayuk meke haganeat ebemake welageikhe meke iti aila ukisikhesik dogolik, hipiri nuogoluk hurek lageikhe. Hurek lageikhesik werekma, he ageikhe nen isoak helekit etaga pualam meke hagarek meke baga apusu narwastu apusu obasi hano meke oko kogat palogo akla henago wolok Yesus oba ukisikhe. Oba ukisikhesik, isoak etnogo ape obakha thekekhogon, apusu Yesus ukuloak oba tialogo usa’isikhe.
41014004	Usakhunem it akhuni aperek etoma dogolik, men isukha, “He yi apusu obasi hano meke we yugunat alomarogo usakhe yi nenaluk.
41014005	Apusu yi baga, uang perak akhuni yabu iniki opaki hasik hagakhunem iniki oko opakitek wogeisegarek etnogo meke 300 nen waganiluk nen, akhuniinameke dek meke supurisausak meke, ” iluk, he etnogo wenagakhukha.
41014006	Itithogon wenagakhukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “He yi wenagakhe 'buk o. Thogotdini o. At nen hano hagatnakhe o.
41014007	It akhuni inameke dek meke iti, hit hinom motok dogogun o. Itithogon dogolik, itithogon yomageisagun, iluk hinakla apalok nenat yomageisaumo hano. Itithogon mekeat he, at anek he, hit ninom motok dogogun dek o.
41014008	At nen an hagatnabu hagat, erlok hagatnakhe o. Akhuni warek oba apusu warisegarek iti hak, an yabokane nakhunem nebe watlasumo warek thalnabuogoluk noba watdanu hagat, arat watdani aga o.
41014009	Nane eberogonat yokhisak. He yi oba eberek dogoagaluk akhuni nen wene hano wene etnogo, o yi ai ti ai yogeisilik nekhe dogolik, He iti nen itithogon hagakhikhe, iluk abok hano iluk ekhe dogogun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014010	At Yesus wene itithogon yogeisasikhemo nen, at agarumi inebe 12 emenogo meke, ageikhe at Yudas Iskariot etnogo, Yesus wasuagaluk yoko it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek emenogo inoba lageikhe.
41014011	Yoko lageikhesik yogeisasikhemo inasuk holhukhasik nen, inakla arleken agoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Halok he, oko uang ageikhe wokhesugun o, ” iluk abok yogokhukha. Yogokhukhama, at Yudas akla nen, “Yesus ebe o hano iluk ka baga nen it iniki baga 'bigin he, ” iluk abok palhe dogolik wene munini ebekhe lageikhe.
41014012	Yudas itithogon akla ebekhe korlek, it akhuni Yahudi meke eken roti hisuagaluk akla usakharek meke akla usakhidek werago nekarek etnogo meke nuogoluk dirlu alebageik nekarek meke nuogoluk hagakhe dogolik, pesta Paskah hasik domba warogo nausak tak-tagat ageikhe. Tak-tagat ageikhemo, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukhasik men yogokhukha, “Noe. Hat domba pesta Paskah hasik nanok nen, nit nen yi meke ti meke o koma tugurogo 'bi lausak warlok apegen, ” iluk oba hinok waganhukha.
41014013	Hinok waganhukhama, at nen, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo aperek inebe pere la'isasikhe. La'isekhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “O kota etnogo lani. Lugun hak, ap ageikhe isoak agat meke hagarek i henatluk wagunem hinom abuk asugun etnaga. Hinom abuk atluk oporligat lano.
41014014	At oporlik lagunem, at ebe uma ukekhe halok he, ap ai iteerek meke iti oba hinok men iluk waganino, At ninoe wene yakulnisekherek meke etnogo nen, men ekhe, An nagarumi nane waganiogei meke ninom pesta Paskah hasik domba warogo noagaluk, o kakok palek ki hak 'banhen, iluk hinok wagani lani, iluk la'inani agama wago.
41014015	Itithogon yogokhunem, at nen, o henaipu hurli kogat palekma werago nausak oba oboluk hagarek karelek werekma yakulhisagein etnaga. Yakulhisekhe halok he, etomaat nuok nen, yi meke ti meke tugurogo 'biluk dogono, ” iluk la'isasikhe.
41014016	At agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe pere la'isekhe dogolik, “O kota lani, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo it etomaat lagoukhasik, at Yesus nen isikhe hagat, werekma 'bikha lagoukha. 'Bikha lagoukhasik, pesta Paskah hasik domba werago tugurogo 'bisukha.
41014017	Yi meke ti meke tugurogo 'bisukhasik werekma, hiamaganekeke at Yesus agarumi inebe 12 ebetlake emenogo inom inoba lagoukha.
41014018	Lagoukhasik uma ukiluk hureklatluk, pesta neke dogolik at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit meke ageikhe hipiri an nipisak opakimo neke lago meke iti nen, an nebe nasuagaluk yoko ligin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014019	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it inakla weak atluk men yogokhukha, “An a? An dek apigi, ” iluk inebe dopok nen itithogon anek ilik lagoukha.
41014020	Itithogon ilik lagoukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinebe 12 welagap yoma, hat ageikhe an nipisak niniki tak-takhogon piring akla usa'iluk apusu mago noko meke iti nen.
41014021	An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, watlasigin meke holal waganek werek tak-tagat watlasigin mekeat he, at ap nebe nasuagaluk yoko ligin meke iti anek he, eiye! Ebe motok weagat asigin o. At ap iti itaklatlep dekma, hanoat dogolep meke, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014022	At Yesus agarumi inom hipiri itithogon neke dogolik, at nen hipiri roti meke ikimo waganhikhesik Allah heagei warogo ebe kusogo supurisekhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “Te. Yi an nebeat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014023	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik isoak anggur eken apusu henago meke ikimo waganhikhesik, Allah heagei warogo, supurisasikhemo inebe tha'bokhogonat nasukha.
41014024	Noagaluk supurisekhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “Yi re, an namebat o. Allah nen wene warogo wokhinabigin isikhe etnogo, akhuni doalegat inobasik namep ulabogo nasugun iti baga, ebeat asigin o.
41014025	An nane eberogonat yokhisak. Anggur eken apusu yi nalok nen, an yabokane ageikhe nikidek dogoluk nen, hurli, at Allah nen apma 'bisagein iti hurli apusu ket meke nigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik
41014026	etai Allah aetai ageikhe watluk dukhisukhasik tom Zaitun ukul oba dageisukha.
41014027	Itithogon tom Zaitun ukul oba dageisukhasik, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “At Allah nen, At ap domba therogo welagarek meke iti ebe an nen wakhunemdomba emenogo lo thirlik-pirlikhogon lugun o,\rq (Zakharia 13:7)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek iti nen, hit tha'bokhogonat an here'aniluk lo thirlik-pirlikhogon lugun o.
41014028	Lo thirlik-pirlikhogon lugun mekeat he, an nakhunem, yabokane Allah nen nilugutnakhunem, an tak o Galilea dageiluk hinelokhoma dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014029	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo at Petrus nen men yogokhikhe, “It hetlake yoma inebe tha'bokhogonat here'ageiluk lo thirlik-pirlikhogon lugun halok he, an itithogon lo dukhigin dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41014030	at Yesus nen, “Yogotak hibako yiat, thue ayam ane alebageik iluk nen, yabokane igidek werek korlek, hat nen, Yesus iti an nokodek o, iluk hiki henagan oba la'beligin etnaga, iluk eberogonat yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
41014031	at Petrus nen men yogokhikhe, “Itithogon egenat meke re, an nipisak nasumo hano. Yesus nokodek, iluk an nen la'beligin dek o, ” iluk ane obatnerogon isikhemo, it agarlak lak aperek inebe dopok inane itithogon anek ilik lagoukha.
41014032	Wene itithogon ilik ilik nen, yabula ageikhe etaga Getsemani lagoukha. Lagoukhasik, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “An horok ya lalok sembayan isi korlek, hit ya hurek dogoni, ” iluk agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo yogeisasikhe.
41014033	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik Petrus men, Yakobus men, Yohanes men, wogosik lagunem, at Yesus etaiken motok weak ageikhe.
41014034	Itithogon hagakhikhemo men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. An netaiken motok weak agasik watlasusak hakene hagatnabiogo. Halok he, hit ya dogolik hinobabut hebelogo therogo dogoni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014035	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, at sembayan igiluk horogat eta agat oba elokhe thogoumhogo wilageikhesik sembayan men isikhe, “Nopase! An yogotak yaat weagatnabugun iti, weagatnakhidek thogotdanusak halok, thogotdanuak o, ” iluk isikhesik,
41014036	yabokane ageikhe men isikhe, “Nopase. Nopase o! Hat he, yi meke ti meke hagasumo hagasusak anek iti nen, an weagatnabugun iti, hat nen tilnabino, iluk u hak, eken apusu henago noagaluk woknesugun iti hat nen wokhano igi. Meke re, an nakla apigi iti dek o. Hat hakla apegen meke itiat hagatnabino o, ” iluk sembayan isikhe.
41014037	Sembayan itithogon iluk, agarumi emenogo inoba wageikhe meke, it noge isi werekma nen, at Petrus men yogokhikhe, “Simon. Hat nogeat ekhe lagan? Yogotak ya elanma jam opaki hasigat hobabut hebelogo dogosak erlok dek a? ” iluk yogokhikhesik
41014038	it ebetlake emenogo inomat men yogeisasikhe, “Weak hagasuagaluk hinakla kagalisunogo, hinobabut hebelogo dogolik, sembayanat ekhe dogoni o. Hinakla nen erlok hagasusak iluk apekhe lagap mekeat he, hinebe nen itithogon hagasusak erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014039	Itithogon yogeisalok sembayan alep isikhe hagat, yabokane i lageikhe.
41014040	Itithogon i lageikhesik yabokane wageikhe meke, it emenogo noge inil ageikhemo noge isi werekma 'birisa ageikhemo nogo nen, inane nikithogon yogosu heat kamotdisukha.
41014041	Kamotdisukhama, at iki pere baga ileken 'birisa ageikhesik nen yabokane lalok 'birisa ageikhesik, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit thet walogo noge isi motok dogogun a? Noge arat egep o. An hagatnabugun etnogo yogotak yiat o. Ap ageikhe nen it ap weak hagariogei meke nen an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nasuagaluk iniki baga 'banigin iti arat 'banigin yi lakhani!
41014042	Halok he, luok nen, melatni o. Ap an nasuagaluk yoko laga meke etnogo horogat waga ithi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41014043	“Horok ithi waga ithi, ” iluk isi korlek eranogoat it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo men, inarluetek emenogo men, inom nenat, ap opaki doalek la'isa agoukhama, karok wolok, payuk wolok, Yesus agarumi inebe 12 emenogo meke ageikhe at Yudas etnogo nen oporlik wogosik wageikhe.
41014044	Waga dogolik, at Yudas yoko lageikhe meke etnogo nen wene men warisasikhesik nen wageikhe, “An lalok nape tharluk heagei wakhe halok he, hit nen, I, ebe itiat higi, iluk hakhalok hiniki hinobatnerogon wolok wetno, ” iluk wene hutukhogon yogeisasikhesik, at inomat wagoukha.
41014045	Wagoukhasik at Yudas etnogo Yesus oba horokhogon wageikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe, ” iluk ape tharluk heagei wakhikhe.
41014046	Ape tharluk heagei wakhunem, it ap emenogo nen Yesus ebe hakhasukhasik iki herle warogo hago welagoukha.
41014047	Itithogon hakhasukhama it ap etoma metek welagoukha meke ageikhe nen karok aika akla uakma nen kigikhogon waganhikhesik, ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok atuaneke ageikhe wasigiluk yigilabethasikhe meke re, asuk anek 'bogokhogon la'isikhe.
41014048	Itithogon la'isikhemo at Yesus nen it ap emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An niki abusak ageikhe waganhima nen, hit karok wolok, payuk wolok, niki herle wasuogoluk wagap a?
41014049	Hibiku-yogokuat an hinakerlekla Allah ai halekma dogolik wene yakulisekho werekma haknakhidek welagasip nen, Itithogon hagasugun, iluk Allah ane holal waganogo 'bisukha meke tak-tagat, haknabi agap o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
41014050	at Yesus agarumi emenogo inebe tha’bokhogonat ebe here'isalok lo thirlik-pirlikhogon lagoukha.
41014051	Lo laga korlek elege ageikhe asu lenan meke itikmanke meke anek ugu dogolik Yesus oporlik lagaluk hagakhunem, it ap emenogo nen hakhasukha.
41014052	Itithogon ha'isinem su etnogo nokorlogo thogotdisalok, aloak 'buguligat lo lageikhe.
41014053	At Yesus ebe hakhasukhasik ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok oba wolok lagoukha. Etoma it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inebe tha'bokhogonat men, inarluetek emenogo men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo mel, natogokhukha.
41014054	Yesus itithogon wolok laga korlek, at Petrus etnogo yabokane inoporlik huyo'bo laga lageikhesik, ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo agokutlu agarumi Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek meke werekma inoba ukisikhesik, inom hetu mokalekma hurek dogolik thogei isakhekhe lagoukha.
41014055	It itithogon thogei isakhekhe korlek, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo men, wene Allah ane hasik erlo pilinekharek meke inebe tha'bokhogonat men, inom dogolik, ukum Yesus oba 'biluk wasuogoluk men isukha, “Akhuni at weak hagakhunem inileken hega meke uak nen herageinabini o, ” iluk isukhama herageinakhukha mekeat he, dek ageikhe.
41014056	Dek ageikhemo, it aperek inebe doalegat nen, men isukha, “Weak itithogon hagakhunem ninileken hogo, ” iluk wene inekalat isukha mekeat he, inane opakiat mothogon isukha dek.
41014057	Itithogon isukhama, yabokane it ap aperek melatluk, inekalat nen men yogeisasukha,
41014058	“At yi nen, Allah ai akhuni iniki nen halhukha meke yi, an nen misalogo la'igin o. Misalogo la'iluk obolukmo akhuni iniki nen halusak dek. Ninat meke niki pere baga halhe dogoluk, niki ageikhe yi baga, arat haligin o, iluk ninilhanem isinem ninasuk holhugu o, ” iluk isukha mekeat he,
41014059	inane iti opakiat mothogon igidegat.
41014060	Itithogon isukhama nen, it ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo melageikhesik nen turlem inakla ukisikhesik, Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Yesus. It ap yoma wene hat hoba 'biliogei yoma, hat oko ageikhe yogeisagein dek a? Oko yogeisaumo re, ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he,
41014061	ane igidegat huk ageikhe. Huk ageikhemo yabokane it ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo nen, wene ageikhe men yogokhikhe, “Allah hogorakhe lago meke nen a'but Kristus la'isigin isukha etnogo ebe harat a? ” iluk hinok waganhikheat.
41014062	Hinok itithogon waganhikhemo, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Iti, an nebe yiat o. An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, at Allah obatneak yi meke ti meke hagasusak anek etnogo alilu iki ebeke kogat hurek dogoluk, pogot oba etoma nen oisa akla usa'agunem hinileken neagun o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41014063	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, it ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo ekaerek asu ugu meke li'bilogo la'isikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen at weak hagakhunem inileken hega meke wene pakhogon uagaluk nenaluk therisik dogogun.
41014064	Allah akla meanetdiluk etaga weagatdisinem arat hinasuk holhep iti, hinakla nen nikithogon apekhe lagap, ” ilukyogeisasikhemo, it emenogo tha'bokhogonat nen, “Ukum oba 'biluk ebe motok wasuok o! ” iluk yogokhukha.
41014065	Itithogon yogokhukhasik it ap emenogo aperek nen wosi suphogon Yesus oba 'biluk iniki nen ileken labetdiluk, iniki dikilik wakhe dogolik, “Tha nen hake nogo. Yoknisan ta, ” iluk yogokhe lagoukhama, it ap koktek emenogo inagarumi Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek meke nen ebe hakhasukhasik tugi iniki agot tugi tamuk-hamukhogon wakhukhaat.
41014066	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, at Petrus okutlu holkerlekma werekma, ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo atuaneke horlak meke ageikhe wageikhe.
41014067	Wageikhesik, Petrus etnogo hetumo thogei isakhasinem lakhasikhesik, ileken oba durlu ageikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Hat meneke Yesus ai o Nazaret meke etnogo hinom nekhe lagap meke apigi, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41014068	Yogokhikhemo, at nen men yogokhikhe, “An nokodek o. Hat egen iti an hutdigidek o, ” iluk la’belhikhe. La'belhikhesik, holagape kok palekma dukhegarekma dukhi ageikhesik werek korlek, thue ayam ane isikhe.
41014069	Itithogon ane isikhemo, at Petrus holagape palekma eranogoat werekma, at horlak etnogo yabokane ileken hasikheat. Hasikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “At yi it inom nekhe lageikha mekeat o, ” iluk it akhuni etoma welagoukha meke emenogo yogeisasikhe.
41014070	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo at nen yabokane la'belhikheat. La'belhikhesik weat eranogo werekma nen, it akhuni etoma welagoukha meke emenogo nen men yogokhukha, “Hat hebe o Galilea meke heogo yi hebe eberogonat it mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
41014071	at nen, la'belhe dogolik men isikhe, “Hit nen ap abok ekhe lagap iti, ebe an nokodek o. Nopase Allah oak! Nekalat igi halok, at nen nasuak o, ” iluk etaga hupuk palhikhe.
41014072	Etaga hupuk palhe korlek eranogoat, thue ayam etnogo ane yabokane isikhe. Ane yabokane isinem, at Petrus nen, “I. At Yesus nen an yoknekhe dogolik, Thue ayam ane alebageik iluk nen, yabokane igidek werek korlek, hat nen, Yesus nokodek o, iluk hiki henagan oba la'beligin, iluk yoknekhe etnogo, arat la'belhi yi o, ” iluk akla ebekhikhesik, de etaiken hisogo de ageikhe.
41015001	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukhasik, o wi ageikhemo nen, ap wene Allah hasik erlo pilinekharek meke inebe tha'bokhogonat, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo men, inarluetek emenogo men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo men, hetnake inomat nen, “Itithogon hagasuok, ” iluk isukhasik nen, Yesus iki herle warogo Pilatus wogosi agoukha.
41015002	Wogosi agoukhama, at nen hinok Yesus oba waganhe dogolik men yogokhikhe, “Akhuni Yahudi meke inoe etagapogot etnogo, hat mekeat ega? ” iluk yogokhikhemo at nen, “Hat egen itiat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41015003	Itithogon yogokhikhemo it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo nen, yi wene ti wene oba 'bisukha.
41015004	Wene itithogon oba 'bisukhama, at Pilatus nen Yesus oba yabokane hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Yi wene ti wene doalegat hoba 'biliogei yoma, hat nen wene oko yogeisagein dek? ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41015005	Itithogon yogokhikhemo at Yesus ane oko dagakhogon igidek huk ageikhemo, at Pilatus nen, “Nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhikhe.
41015006	It akhuni Yahudi meke pesta Paskah kok isago neke dogolik, it nen, “Akhuni iniki herle warek meke iti, opakiat hisalogo woknisano o, ” iluk kino ugunem, at Pilatus nen opakiat ageikhe hisalogo wogeisekhe lageikhe.
41015007	Itithogonwogeisekherethekma nogo nen, itinem ap ageikhe etaga Barabas, ap aperek inom nen, “Ninougi koktek pemerintah meke, nina'it, ” iluk horlim kagalogo inasuogoluk, inom yakhe dogolik, ap aperek inakhukhama, iniki herle warogo 'bisasukhama,
41015008	werekma, it akhuni doalegat emenogo Pilatus oba wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Pilatus noe. Hat nen akhuni iniki herle warek meke hisalogo woknisegetek etnogo itithogon, yogotak ageikhe hisalogo woknisanogoluk wago o, ” iluk kino yogokhukha.
41015009	-
41015010	Yogokhukhama, at Pilatus akla nen, “It ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek yi Yesus oba ua palogo ebe woknesi ageikha apigi, ” iluk hutdisikhesigat men yogeisasikhe, “Hit Yahudi meke hinoe kok etagapogot yi iki herle hisalogo wokhisoagalukwagapa? ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41015011	Itithogon yogeisasikhe mekeat he, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo nen, akhuni doalegat emenogo inakla kagalhe dogolik, “Barabas itiat iki herle hisalogo woknisanok. Yesus iti dek o, iluk yogosubageik, ” iluk inakla kagalhukha.
41015012	Inakla itithogon kagalhukhama, it nen itithogonat yogokhukhama, at Pilatus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Halok he, hit akhuni Yahudi meke nen, Ninoe kok etagapogot, iluk ekhe lagap meke yi, nikithogon hagasik, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
41015013	it nen men yogokhukha, “O baga meldiluk watno o! ” iluk inane obatnerogonat yogokhukha.
41015014	Itithogon yogokhukha mekeat he, at Pilatus nen men yogeisasikhe, “At weak nena meke hagakhemo nen, ” iluk yogeisasikhe mekeat he, it nen, “O baga meldiluk watno o! ” iluk yabokane inane ebenageik kokhogonat yogokhukha.
41015015	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Pilatus nen akla men apasikhe, “Halok he, akhuni doalegat yoma inakla hanorogo yigithogon hagasik, ” iluk isikhesik Barabas etnogo iki herle hisalogo wogeisekhe dogolik, at agarumi tentara nen Yesus tugi la’bisoko tugi warogo o baga meldiluk wasuagaluk wogeisasikhe.
41015016	At Pilatus nen itithogon wogeisasikhemo re, it ap tentara meke emenogo nen Yesus wolok ap kokgubernur ai silimo ukisukhasik it inagar lak lak inom opakiat doalek doalhe lagoukha meke tha’bokhogonat waisasukha.
41015017	Waisasukhama wagoukhasik Yesus su elokhoken ki’bi-ki’bi warek hakene ap koktek ugu welageikharekmeke hakene i’bigik, ap koktek meke inakare-kare i’bisegarek iti hak, arlok weak meke makona warogo ukuloak oba i’bigik, hagakhukha.
41015018	Itithogon hagakhukhasik men yogokhukha, “Wi! Akhuni Yahudi meke inoe hetagapogot etnogo harat higi o, wi! ” iluk heagei wakhe Iago thalek inane sagun kerotdigik yogokhukha.
41015019	Itithogon yogokhukhasik, tugi payuk yekelek oba ukuloak pakhogon wakhik, wosi oba suphogon la’igik, inane dagakhogon heagei wasuogoluk initibagal yukukhogon apma hureklasi ukigik, hagakhukha.
41015020	Itithogon arat hagakhukhasik, su uanat elokhoken ki'bi-ki’bi warek hakene meke nokorlogo ’biluk, ekaerek asu meke apuke i’bisukhasik, o baga meldiluk wasuogoluk leget itikmanke wolok dukhi agoukha.
41015021	Itithogon wolok holagarlem wagunem, ap ageikhe etaga Simon, ai o Kirene meke, ap Aleksander men, Rufus men inopase iti, o etoma itikmanke nen o kota ukigiluk wagunem inom abuk agoukha. Inom abuk agoukhasik men yogokhukha, “Yesus ebe o baga meldiluk wasugun meke o yi, hat nen waganin o! ” iluk inane obatnerogon yogokhukhama waganhikhe.
41015022	Waganhikhemo Yesus wolok o etaga nit ninane baga, Inukuloak Palegem werekma u hak, it inane baga Golgota wolok dagei agoukha.
41015023	Dagei agoukhasik anggur eken apusu men, hotali al hakene arle weak meke etaga mur men, inom dapukhogon hagarogo wogokhukha meke here’isikhe.
41015024	Yesus ebe arat o baga meldisukhasik asu nokorlek emenogo inebe dopok, Tha hak horlagein, iluk omatok thekerlogo walhegarek hak, helekit hupurlekentek meke walhasukhasik nen mikirlogo horlasukha.
41015025	Yesus ebe wakhukha iti, huben jam 9 o baga meldisukha.
41015026	Itithogon ’bisukhasik, “Ap yi wene erlo yi baga ’bogosik nen wakho, ” iluk u hak, “AKHUNI YAHUDI MEKE INOE KOK ETAGAPOGOT, ” iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha.
41015027	Yesus ebe o baga turlem itithogon meldisukhasik nen, it ap inebe pere akhuni inameke iniki abusak waganhe lagoukha meke, ageikhe iki ebeke, ageikhe iki paike, inom meldisalok inakhukhaat. [
41015028	Itithogon hagakhukha iti haganeat Allah ane holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik men isukha, “Akhuni nen, at iti ebe re, akhuni inobabut weak hagakharek meke thalek inom opakiat iniki wenageinabugun o, ”\rq (Yesaya 53:12)\rq* iluk isukha meke iti, at Yesus it ap iti inom itithogon meldisasukha iti baga ebeat ageikhe iti. ]
41015029	-
41015030	Itithogon meldisasukhama werekma, akhuni holagarlem itike lageik, wageik, hagakhe dogolik Yesus men yogokhe lagoukha, “Aha! Hat nen men isigin apigi, Allah ai halek yi misalogo 'biluk, niki pere baga halhe dogoluk nen niki ageikhe baga yi arat tirliphogon haligin, iluk isigin etnogo, hekaerek hebe o ithi baga nen tilogo usa me ta! ” iluk inut kinik inut konok hagakhe dogolik inane sagun yogokhe lagoukha.
41015031	Itithogon isi korlek, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo men, inom it-it inane sagun yogokhe dogolik, “At nen, it akhuni aperek meke erlok tilinakhe laga etnogo mekeat he, ekaerek nen tilausak erlok dek higi.
41015032	Kristus nit akhuni Yahudi meke ninoe etagapogot yi nit eberogonat apauwok nen ninilhanem o ithi baga nen usatnek he, ” iluk inane sagun yogokhe lagoukha. Nen, it ap pere o baga Yesus inom meldisasukha meke eranogo nen, Yesus inane sagun itithogon yogokhukhaat.
41015033	O dikene eketurlem jam 12 oba o hi ageikhesik, o etoma tha’bokhogonat hurli jam 3 hiat welageikhe.
41015034	Hiat werek korlek, jam 3 arat asi lageikhemo, at Yesus nen Allah men yogokhikhe. Nit ninane baga, “Nopase Allah! Nopase Allah! An nenaluk here’anhen, ”\rq (Mazmur 22:1)\rq* iluk u hak, it inane baga, “Eloi! Eloi! Lama sabakhtani! ” iluk ane kokhogonat yogokhikhe.
41015035	Itithogon yogokhunem, it akhuni hetnake etoma welagoukha meke inasuk holhukhasik, “Elia waeriogo higi, ” iluk isukhama,
41015036	ap ageikhe pirlirli lageikhesik haki isiken hakene meke anggur eken apusu arle weak meke mago nen, noagaluk thukat oba hunogo wogokhe dogolik, it aperek men yogeisasikhe, “A! Elia nen at yi tilogo usa'isigin a? Dek a. Ninileken dogouok, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41015037	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at Yesus ane opaki hasik kokhogon isikhesik, arat debekhogon watlageikhe.
41015038	At ebe watlagunem Allah ai halekma su kain meke o itikmoke hurli palek welageikhe meke, upu eloma nen turlem heisogonat kagalarik kagalarik ilugun oba kagoukhogon kagalageikhe.
41015039	Yesus itithogon watlagunem it ap tentara meke inoe kok meke Yesus elokhoma mot-mot dogolik, itithogon watlagunem ileken hasikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yi eberogonat Allah a'but higi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41015040	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, it humi aperek he Maria ai Magdala meke, ageikhe, he Maria at ap Yakobus elege meke men, Yoses men, inagosa, ageikhe he Salome, humi aperek inomat inebe walegat nen inileken lageik welagoukha.
41015041	It humi iti alebat Yesus oporlik o Galilea eloke nekhe dogolik, yomakhekhe lagoukha meke. Nen, humi aperek doalegat Yesus inom o Yerusalem usasukhasik inom etoma dogolik inileken welagoukhaat.
41015042	-
41015043	At Yesus watlageikhe iti, it akhuni Yahudi meke hubuluke iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogouogoluk, yi meke ti meke tugurogo 'bisi korlek watlageikhe. Watlageikhemo, o arat hi ageikhemo ap ageikhe Yahudi inougi koktek wene pilinisuogoluk inom natogokhe lagoukha meke etaga Yusuf. Ai o Arimatea meke. Obabut hano nen, akhuni nen, “At hano, ” iluk abok ekhe lagoukha. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik akla nen, “Allah nen apma 'binanigin iti an therogo welagei, ” iluk therogo welageikhe meke iti, Pilatus ayuk degat lageikhesik Yesus ebe warek kino ukisikhe.
41015044	Warek kino ukisikhemo, at Pilatus nen, “Merake watlaga heat. Ibat watlaga yi nayuk o, ” iluk hogoratluk ap tentara meke inoe kok meke etnogo wisuagaluk ayoko la’isa ageikhemo lageikhemo men yogokhikhe, “Ebe haganeat watlaga a? Yogotagat watlaga a, ” iluk hinok waganhikhe.
41015045	Hinok waganhikhemo, at nen, “Haganeat watlaga o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Pilatus nen Yusuf men yogokhikhe, “Halok he, ebe warek iti wagani lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
41015046	Itithogon yogokhikhemo wageikhesik, su kain etaga lenan hano meke oko palogo Yesus warek etnogo o baga nen usa’i ageikhesik su etnogo baga yilogo oila akhuni warek ’bisauwogoluk akhuni ineram nen elo herlelhukhama meke baga ’bikisikhe. ’Biluk nen helekit kok meke dipilogo wolok wageikhesik nen tetnokhogon latdisikhe.
41015047	Tetnokhogon latdisinem, it he Maria ai o Magdala meke etnogo men, he Maria Yoses agosa etnogo men, wagoukhasik, “Etha ’bekhe, ” iluk inileken ’birogo welagoukha.
41016001	Itithogon hasukhasik, iniki 7 baga Allah hasikwerlegat welagoukhasik nen, it he Maria ai Magdala meke etnogo men, he Maria Yakobus agosa etnogo men, he Salome men, apusu obasi hano meke Yesus warek oba wasi luogoluk oko pali lagoukha.
41016002	Oko palogo ’biluk noge ilukhubuluke hari Minggu baga huben siakhogon mo yegelogo dagei aga korlek, oila etnogo wagoukha.
41016003	-
41016004	Waga dogolik helekit motok kok meke tetnokhogon 'bisukhasikmo nogo nen, it-it ekhe dogolik men isukha, “Warek helekit tetnokhogon 'bega etnogo, tha nen dipilogo thu hualnisagein, ” iluk ilik wagoukha. Itithogon ilik inut thomarek waga lagoukhasik nen, inileken liakhasukha re, helekit etnogo dipilogo la'isukhama thu hualek werekma hasukha.
41016005	Hasukhasik horokhogon witluk inebe ukisukha re, ap elege meke ageikhe asu kut uanat meke ugu iniki ebeke mot-mot hurek werekma inileken halok nen, inakmaken lageikhe.
41016006	Inakmaken lageikhemo, at ap elege meke etnogo nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hinakmaken lagup o. Yesus ai o Nazaret meke o baga meldiluk wakha etnogo herarik wagap meke re, ebe yoma dek. Allah nen ilugutdekhemo werek o. Warek 'begama etnogo oboluk anek yi hinileken 'bikhani o.
41016007	'Bikhalok hit nen at agarumi ane waganhe lageikha meke Petrus lak emenogo yogeisa lano o. At Yesus nen, An o Galilea dageiluk hinelokhoma dogogin o, iluk yokhisasikhe hagat dageigin etnaga o. Hit dageiluk at ebe hinileken hugun o, iluk yogeisa lano o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41016008	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo inobakha palagoukhasik inoageleke dik-dik lo dukhisukhasik inayuk nen wene akhuni aperek yogeisigidek piokthek lagoukha.
41016009	At Yesus ebe hari Minggu baga melageikhe itinem huben siakhogon melageikhesik, at he Maria ai o Magdala meke mokat inobabut weak meke inebe 7 nen akla ukisukhasik werekma haganeat mukhogo ula'isasikhe meke etnogo nen tak, “Alebageik ileken neoak, ” iluk elokhoma winam ageikhe.
41016010	Elokhoma winam ageikhemo ileken halok, yoko it akhuni at Yesus inom welagoukha meke de agunem inoba lageikhe.
41016011	Lageikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “At Yesus iluk agasik werek o. Ebe arat nileken higi, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, inasuk holhukha mekeat he, eberogonat iluk apasukha dek.
41016012	Itithogon apasukhasik werek korlek, yabokane ap inebe pere o ukul 'bugurlagatma ageikhe wisuogoluk wagunem at Yesus ebe ninat hagatlatluk, “An nebe inileken neoak, ” iluk inoporlik wageikhe.
41016013	Inoporlik wageikhemo inileken halok inapuke inagarlak lak hetnake emenogo yogeisa lagoukha mekeat he, it inakla nen eberogonat iluk apasukha degat.
41016014	Itithogon hagarik waga lageikhesik, ebe yabokane, it at Yesus agarumi inebe 11 nen emenogo hurek hipiri nasi werekma, “Inileken neoak, ” iluk inoba ukisikhesik inelokhoma winam ageikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit yoma hinakla nen eberogonat iluk apigidek hinakla pugat yoma re! Allah nen an nebe arat nilugutnakhemo werekma, it aperek nen inileken neegasik yokhisa ageikha mekeat he, hinakla nen eberogonat iluk apigidegat yoma re! ” iluk wenageisasikhe.
41016015	Itithogon wenageisasikhesik, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, akhuni inukuloak etaga dopok o yi ai ti ai eloma tha'bokhogonat wene hano wene yi yogeisilik laga dogono o.
41016016	Yogeisilik lagunem it akhuni aperek nen wene iti eberogonat iluk apagun meke ima usa'inabugun meke, Allah nen tilinabigin mekeat he, it aperek wene iti eberogonat iluk waganugun dek meke Allah nen wene inoba 'biluk weagarinabigin o.
41016017	It akhuni aperek nen wene iti eberogonat iluk apoagaluk, it wene eberogonat iluk waganugun meke nen, yigithogon hagakhe dogogun. Mokat obabut weak meke it aperek inakla ukiluk werekma an netaga palogo mukhogo ula'isigik, inane it akhuni ninat meke inane inokodek meke elalinat igik, hagakhe dogogun.
41016018	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, warlo akhuni inakherek meke inikimo waganhik, it inebe watlasuagaluk akhuni watlageikharek meke isoak akla kolabogo wogeisugunem nikik, hagasugun mekeat he, iti nen weagarinakhe dogogin dek o. Nen, akhuni ageikhe u waganhunem, it nen iniki thebelinabumo, hano aga dogogunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
41016019	Wene itithogon arat yogeisasikhemo, at Allah nen Yesus ebe pogot oba wolok dageisikhe. Itithogon wolok dageisikhemo alilu iki ebeke kok hurek welagarek.
41016020	Itithogon wolok dageisikhemo at Yesus agarumi emenogo o yi ai ti ai tha'bokhogonat wene yogeisilik lagoukha. Wene yogeisilik lagunem akhuni nen, “It wene yoknisilik wageikha iti eberogonat, ” iluk wene hutduagaluk, ninoe Etagapogot inom motok dogolik, it nen elalinat hagakhunem, at nen wene iti obatnetdisikhe. ]
42001001	-
42001002	Teofilus noe. Wene nit ninakerlekla nen hagatlageikhe etnogo, it wene ebe erlo baga nen hagatlarik wagunem inileken hasukhasik yakulisilik nekhe lagoukha meke nen yoknisasukha mothogon, it akhuni aperek inebe motok doalegat wene ebe holal waganuogoluk walhilik wagoukha.
42001003	-
42001004	Itithogon walhilik wagoukha mekeat, an meneke, wene iti erlo baga nen hutukhogon yakulhe lagagisik nogo nen, hat wene yakulhikhukha meke iti eberogonat iluk apanok nen, wene ebe pilinerogo holal waganogo hoba la’isigiluk apekhe lagarik waganhe lagei yi o. Noe.
42001005	Ap kok Herodes iti o Yudea eloke etagapogot werek oba, ap ageikhe etaga Zakharia, ebe ap Abia nen itago meke inom inebe Allah iteerek dogolik, at hasik hagakhe lagoukha meke welageikhe. Nen, at age ap Harun nen itago meke etaga Elisabet iti welageikhe.
42001006	It age ipisak iti ninopase Etagapogot nen, “Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, ” iluk, yakulnisigik, ninasuk wakhik, isikhe meke etnogo, motok mothogonat hagakhe lagoukhama, at Allah nen, “It iti inobabut hano motok, ” iluk, ekagat ileken isekhe lageikhe.
42001007	Mekeat he, at he Elisabet iti, ebe abirli nen eak ageikhe itakhigidek dogolik, agun ipisagat arat inarloka agoukhasik welagoukha.
42001008	-
42001009	Itithogon inarloka atluk dogolik, iniki ageikhe baga, at Zakharia ebe inom, ap aperek inebe opakiat meke inom, Allah iteerek dogolik, it nen at Allah ai halekma ukiluk hagasusak erlok ageikhe. Erlok ageikhemo ukisukhasik, obasi hano meke Allah il oba tha hak nen hetu huni ukigin, iluk omatok thekerlogo walhasukha meke, at Zakharia oba mot ageikhemo hetu hunigiluk Allah ai halekma ukisikhe.
42001010	Itithogon ukiluk hetu hunhe korlek, it akhuni inebe doalegat o silimo natogorlogo sembayan isi lagoukha.
42001011	Obasi hano etnogo meke hetu hunhunem, ninopase Etagapogot agot, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke ageikhe usa' ageikhesik obasi hano meke hetu hunhe lagoukha baga etnogo iniki ebeke Zakharia elokhoma melageikhemo ileken hasikhe.
42001012	Ileken halok nen, akmaken lageikhesik nen ayuk ageikhemo,
42001013	at malaikat etnogo nen, “Zakharia! Hayuk agun o. Hat sembayan ekhe lagan etnogo, Allah arat asuk holhe o. Hage Elisabet iti eak abat itasigin o. Itasumo nen etaga Yohanes thalino.
42001014	-
42001016	At iti agosa akla nenat, Allah Agoreke akla motok kerlekhogon itaklatluk, ninopase Etagapogot il oba ebe kok dogolik, anggur eken apusu inom, i hunu hunu palharek meke ageikhe inom, nikidek motok dogolik, akhuni Israel meke inebe doalegat inetaiken ninopase Etagapogot Allah oba hakotdiluk dogoagaluk, at nen inobabut hebelinabigin o. At itaklagunem akhuni inebe doalegat inakla arleken akhekhe korlek, hat meneke, hakla arleken akhigik, ebe hoba hotok igik, hagasigin o.
42001017	Allah Agoreke ap Elia iti akla dogolik obatnerogo hagarik nekhe lageikhe meke iti, at Yohanes iti oba duk itluk, yekerugi inopase lak inom, dapukhogon 'bisigik, wene inasuk holu'buk meke it aperek wene holiluk mothogon hagakharek meke inobabut waganuagaluk hagarinakhik, inebe ninopase Etagapogot hasigat dogoagaluk karelogo 'bisigik, hagasigiluk, at tak itaklatluk itithogon hagarik nekhe dogogin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42001018	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Zakharia nen, malaikat men yogokhikhe, “An nage nipisak arat ninarloka agosikmo, wene egen iti nikithogon hagatlasigin. Eberogonat hagatlasigin iluk nikithogon nilu asigin, ” iluk isikhemo
42001019	at malaikat etnogo nen, “An Allah il oba metek welagarek meke netaga Gabriel, iti nebe anat o. Hano wene yi yokhesuagaluk, at Allah nen yoko la'ani agama wagei o.
42001020	Itithogon wagarik wene yokhikhi mekeat he, eberogonat apigidek iti nen, hagatlasusak mot-mot oba hagatlasigin iti aban hagatlageidek werek korlek, hane motok palogo usalok hane igidek tetnokhogon dogoluk nen, yabokane wene iti tha'bokhogonat hagatlagunem nen, hane huak igin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42001021	Itithogon yogokhe korlek, it akhuni okutlu sembayan isi welagoukha emenogo nen, “Zakharia etnogo okutlu motok dukhi ageidek Allah ai halekma motok huk werek iti nayuk e! ” iluk itithogon ugunem,
42001022	Zakharia ebe dukhi ageikhesik nen, wenekak ageikhe motok yogeisigidek huk ageikhemo, it emenogo nen, “Ap yi Allah ai halekma nen a'bikaka ageikhe hekhemo higi, ” iluk hutdisukha. Itithogon isinem, at etnogo ageikhe ane motok igidek, we iki pilin anek isi lageikhe.
42001023	Allah hasik hagasuagaluk it emenogo nen Zakharia yogokhukha etnogo, arat hagakhikhesik nen, uma lageikhe.
42001024	-
42001025	Aila lageikhesik iniki pererlagat welagoukhasik nen, age Elisabet etnogo elege akma ageikhe. Akma ageikhemo, “Nopase Etagapogot iti, an akmu nen akhuni ninom nekarli negen hekhe lagei etnogo dek asuagaluk hagatnakhe higi o, ” iluk, uma dukhigidek uma limago motok werek korlek, thut 5 baga holelhikhe.
42001026	-
42001027	He Elisabet etnogo eak akma werek korlek, thut 6 oba holelhikhemo, Allah nen malaikat pogot oba yoko la'isa agarek meke ageikhe Gabriel etnogo Galilea eloke, o ukul etaga Nazaret, etoma horlak etaga Maria, ap Yusuf Daud opa meke iti ipisak wene warek werekma oba la'i ageikhe.
42001028	La'i ageikhemo, at malaikat horlak etnogo baga wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Maria neru o! Allah nen hano motok meke wokhesigiluk hipisak welagap o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
42001029	at horlak Maria etnogo asuk holiluk, ayuk nen oageleke dik-dik hagakhe dogolik, “Heagei warogo yoknekhe iti nikithogon nen yoknekhe, ” iluk akla nen ebekhikhe.
42001030	Itithogon ebekhe lageikhemo, at malaikat etnogo nen, “Maria, neru o. Hayuk agun o. At Allah nen hebe akmu hagathakhesik oba hotok ekhe o.
42001031	Lakhan, hat heak hakma atluk abat itasigin. Itatluk nen, etaga Yesus thalino.
42001032	Nen, elege iti arlue atluk kok agunem, akhuni nen, Allah Etagapogot kok welagarek etnogo a'but higi o, iluk ekhe dogogun. At opa Daud iti etagapogot dogolik, akhuni at nen hagasik welageikhe etnogo obolukmo, ninopase Etagapogot nen, at itiat meldigin o.
42001033	Yakub nen itago meke emenogo inoe Etagapogot at itiat apma ane holek motok dogogun o. Itithogon hagasik dogolik ebe huk ageidek Etagapogot motok dogogin o, ” iluk itithogon isikhemo,
42001034	at horlak Maria nen, “An ap ninom noge igidekma, hat yoknekhen iti nikithogon hagatlasigin, ” iluk itithogon isikhemo,
42001035	at malaikat etnogo nen, “Allah Agoreke hoba duk i witluk nen, kunakma ukegarek hak, ninopase Allah Etagapogot obatneak iti apma 'bagagin o. 'Bagoumo, heak Allah arligat a'but itasumo nen, akhuni nen, At iti Allah a'but, iluk ekhe dogogun o.
42001036	Nen, lakhan, hat hoe Elisabet etnogo ebe arloka aga mekeat he, eak abat akma agama o. It akhuni aperek nen, He iti ebe abirli o, iluk, abok egarek etnogo eak akma agasik thut 6 oba holelhemo yokhikhi o.
42001037	At Allah nen yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok dek, dek o. Erlok hagasusak anek, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
42001038	at Maria nen, “I o. An ninopase Etagapogot atuanekeat o. Hat nen egen iti tak-tagat hagatnabuak o, ” iluk isikhemo, at malaikat yoko wageikhe meke etnogo Maria thogotdiluk lageikhe.
42001039	Malaikat etnogo lageikhemo, at horlak Maria iki pererlagat welageikhesik nen, o Yudea usasikhesik etoma tom oba dageisikhesik,
