42001040	ap Zakharia etnogo aila uki lageikhesik, he Elisabet etnogo heagei wakhikhe.
42001041	Maria nen heagei wakhunem Elisabet asuk holhe korlek eranogoat, eak akla welageikhe meke etnogo aborlok luguthasikhe. Itithogon luguthekhe korlek, Allah Agoreke, he Elisabet akla kerlekhogon ukisikhe o.
42001042	Ukisikhemo, at he Elisabet etnogo ane kokhogonat, men isikhe, “Humi inebe doalegat werek korlegat he, Allah nen, Hano meke harat wokhigik, heak hakla iti hanotdigik hagakhemo.
42001043	Nen, hat hebe an noe Etagapogot agosa nen 'bitnea wagan yi nayuk o!
42001044	Hat nen heagei watnakhunem nasuk holhe korlegat, elege nakla meke nen akla arleken akhekhe dogolik luguthekhe o.
42001045	Nopase Etagapogot nen abok yokhikhikhe meke, ebeat asigin o, iluk, hetaiken Allah oba hakotdegen iti, hakla arleken kogat asigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42001046	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at horlak Maria nen, “Nopase Etagapogot iti an nakla nen hogorakhelagei o.
42001047	Allah nen tilnakhe meke etnogo nen yigithogon hagatnakhemo nakla arleken kogat akhekhe lagei o.
42001048	An at atuaneke meke iti, inapma negen werekmaileken neekhe o. Hurli yogotak nen, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen, Allah nen he, hano meke wogokhemo, iluk ekhe dogogun o.
42001049	At obatneak meke nenat, kok meke hagatnakhe o. At ekaerek arligat etaga werek dogoak o.
42001050	Akhuni tha'bokhogonat, haganeat nenitaklagoukha meke inom, ket itaklageikha meke inom, yabokane itaklasugun meke inom, at ebe inayuk werekma akmu nen hano hagarinakhe dogogin o.
42001051	At iki obatneak iti baga, akhuni inakla neninekaerek inakeke 'bakhiliogei meke iti motok mukhogo thirlik-pirlikhogon ula'isekhe o.
42001052	Akhuni koktek inetagapogot welageikharek mekeiti thebelogo 'bisekhe dogolik, it inetaga dek meke iti meldisigik,
42001053	akhuni inakla abu welageikharek meke iti hanomeke ina'ithogon wogeisekhe dogolik, it inikierek inameke doalegat hago mekeiti, ageikhe wogeisigidek werlegat la’isasikhe.
42001054	-
42001055	Haganeat ninopase Abraham inom, at nen itago meke tha'bokhogonat inom, motogat hanorinabigiluk abok yogeisasikhe etnogo tak-tak, at agarumi ap Israel meke inoba ebetluk akmu nen yomageisa aga yi o, ”iluk isikhe.
42001056	Itithogon isikhesik nen, at horlak Maria etnogo thut henagan negen, he Elisabet ipisak welageikhesik nen, yabokane aila apuke wageikhe.
42001057	At horlak Maria wageikhemo nen, he Elisabet etnogo eak itasusak horogat ageikhemo, eak abat itakhasikhe.
42001058	Itakhasikhemo, it akhuni inom welagoukha meke men, at oe agot emenogo men, “Ninopase Etagapogot iti nen motok akmu hekhesik nen hagakhe higi o, ” iluk isukhasik nen, at ekaerek inom inakla arleken akhasukha.
42001059	Inakla arleken akhasukhasik, elege iti itaklageikhesik oba nen iniki 7 baga welagoukhasik nen hubuluke, elege etnogo oado aperlagap paluagaluk wolok wagoukha. Wagoukhasik nen, Elege yi opase etaga tak-tagat etaga Zakharia thaluok, iluk isukha meke,
42001060	agosa nen, “Dek o. Etaga Yohanes thalugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42001061	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo nen, “Hoe hagot inetaga itithogon dekmaat, etaga Yohanes thalhen iti nenaluk thalhen” iluk, itithogon isukhasik
42001062	elege etnogo opase Zakharia etnogo iniki pilin yogokhe dogolik, “Etaga ki thalusak? ” iluk,
42001063	itithogon itema waganhukhama, at Zakharia nen, “Helekit meke holal waganharek iti meke ageikhe woknetni, ” iluk iki pilin isikhemo wogokhukhama, “At etaga Yohanes o, ” iluk, holal waganhikhe. Holal waganhikhemo akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, “Nayuk o! ” iluk hogorakhukha.
42001064	Hogorakhe korlek eranogoat, Zakharia etnogo ane motok huak iluk nen, ane ekhe dogolik, Allah heagei wakhe lageikhe.
42001065	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it akhuni inom welagoukha meke emenogo inayuk motok agoukha. Inayuk atluk, wene hagatlageikhe meke etnogo abok o Yudea tom oba meke etoma motok pilin-palinhogon yogeisilik lagoukhama wene iti kok arik lageikhe.
42001066	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo inasuk holhukhasik, “Allah nen obatnerogon kogotdekhemo higi, ” inileken halok, inakla ebekhe dogolik, “Yekerek werek yi arlue atluk, nikithogon hagatlasigin, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
42001067	At Yohanes opase Zakharia etnogo Allah Agoreke akla kerlekhogon ukisikhemo Allah wene ekhe dogolik, men isikhe,
42001068	“Nit akhuni Israel meke iti ninopase EtagapogotAllah nen ileken nisa agasik tilninakhemo iti nen, arat hogorakhe dogouok o.
42001069	Tilninabuagaluk at atuaneke Daud nen itago mekeobatne werek meke meldekhemo werek yi o.
42001070	Itithogon hagakhe iti, it ap muk haganeat mekeAllah nenat ekaerek hasik wenago 'bisasikhemo wene yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen yogeisekhe dogolik,
42001071	It akhuni aperek ninom wim palek meke inikimonen tilninakhik, it akhuni tha'bokhogonat ninebe motok ina'it nisiliogei meke inikimo nen tilogo 'binanhik, hagasigin o, iluk, ekhe lagoukha etnogo tak-tagat hagatlageikhe.
42001072	-
42001073	At nen ninopa lak iti akmu nen hanorinabigin iluk abok isikhe etnogo ebe hagarinakhik, Itithogon hagathinabigin iluk, wene ekaerek nen abok yogeisasikhe etnogo ebe hagakhik, hagasigin o, iluk, nakla eberek dogogin o, iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon hagasigin o, iluk ninopase Abraham hupuk palogo yogokhikhe hak hagasi aga yi.
42001074	-
42001075	It akhuni ninom wim palek meke inikimo nen tilogo, ninayuk ageidek niniluk dogolik, Allah ileken werek korlek nit weak hagakhidek, at hasik anek mothogon hagakhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk hagasi aga yi.
42001076	-
42001077	Nen, hat na'but yi nen, ninoe Etagapogotwisiginmoke holak yakhe dogoagaluk, hat alebageik yoko laga dogolik, akhuni yi weak ti weak hagariogei meke Allah nen he, wene inoba meke thagalogo degetdisalok tilinabigin itiwene hat nen yakulisaumo inilu asigin iti baga, hat habok ekhe dogolik, Kok upu baga welagarek meke ane yogeisilik liliogo etnogo ebe yi o, iluk, ekhe dogogun.
42001078	Ninopase Allah iti ninebe akmutdinaniluk nen, omo huben yago wagarek hak, mo upu eloma nen ninoba la'i aga dogolik,
42001079	O mummo dogolik watlasusak iti ninayuk, ilukapiliogei etnogo o lia hagarogo 'bisigik, ninobakhe palek ninayuk werekma, Holak yi baga hinetaiken hapukhogon lani iluk, yoknisigik, igin o, ”iluk Zakharia nen isikhe.
42001080	Nen, at a'but etnogo ebe arlue atluk etaiken motok horle ageikhesik, akhuni Israel meke aban inoba lageidek dogolik, o limo akhuni motok dekma etoma welageikhe.
42002001	Eta mot-mot, ap kok Kaisar Agustus iti nen akhuni o yi ai ti ai tha'bokhogonat inetaga holal waganuagaluk wene ula'isikhe.
42002002	Inetaga alebageik holal waganhukha iti, ap etaga Kirenius iti, o propinsi Siria etoma gubernur werek korlek waganhukha.
42002003	Itithogon inetaga holal waganuagaluk, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inekaerek inaila tomogat uki lagoukha.
42002004	-
42002005	Nen, at Yusuf meneke, Daud opa meke nogo nen, o Galilea eloke ukul etaga Nazaret iti nen, o Yudea ap Daud itaklageikhemo, o ukul etaga Betlehem usagaluk, at Maria ipisak wene warek welagoukha etnogo eak akma werekma, ipisagat inetaga holal waganuagaluk usasukha.
42002006	Usasukhasik etoma werekma eak etnogo itakhausak horogat ageikhemo,
42002007	eak makusa abat itakhasikhe. Itakhasikhesik, o akhuni huso meke noge egarekma motok kerlek ageikhemo, su kain meke baga yilogo, o sapi inapiri nekerekma ebe 'bisikhe.
42002008	Eta mot-mot, o Betlehem aliluke etoma, it ap domba hagasik welageikharek meke aperek hibako inadomba hagasik welagoukha.
42002009	Itithogon werekma eranogo, ninopase Etagapogot agot malaikat pogot oba nen yoko la'isa agarek meke ageikhe ka nen heat wageikhesik inaliluke melagunem, ninopase Etagapogot hogorakharek meke a'bi'bal inoba yago 'bisasikhemo, it inayuk motok weak agoukha.
42002010	Inayuk agoukhama, at malaikat etnogo nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hinayuk agup o. Lakhani, hano wene akhuni tha'bokhogonat inakla arleken akhagun meke, yokhisa wagei o.
42002011	Yogotak tilhinabigin meke kok Etagapogot Kristus etnogo o ap Daud ai welageikhemo etnogo itaklagasik werek o.
42002012	Ebe ekagat hinileken halok, hutdubageik nen, elege ket itago meke su kain meke baga yilogo o sapi inapiri nekarekma 'begasik werek etnaga 'bikha lani o, ”yogeisasikhe,
42002013	Itithogon yogeisasi korlek eranogoat, malaikat pogot oba meke inebe motok doalegat ka nen heat winam agoukhasik, at malaikat ageikhe etnogo inomat Allah hogorakhe dogolik men isukha,
42002014	“It pogot oba upuke welageikharek meke nen, ninopase Allah itiat hogorakhe dogoak o. Nen, it akhuni agat oba yoma inebe Allah oba hotok ekherek meke inetaiken hapukhogon dogoak o, ”iluk isukha.
42002015	Itithogon yogeisalok nen, it emenogo thogotdisalok inapuke pogot oba dageikhe korlek it ap domba hagasik welagoukha meke emenogo it-it ekhe dogolik, “Itithogon hagatlagama o, iluk ninopase Etagapogot nen yoknisekhe iti, o Betlehem 'bikha luok o, ” iluk isukhasik,
42002016	ibat lagoukha meke, Maria Yusuf ipisak elege ket itago etnogo o sapi inapiri nekarekma wildiluk werekma 'bikha lagoukha.
42002017	'Bikha lagoukhasik inileken hekhe dogolik, wene elege etnogo hasik malaikat nen yogeisasukha meke emenogo pilinogo yogeisasukha.
42002018	Itithogonyogeisasukhama, it akhuni etoma inasuk holhukha meke tha'bokhogonat nen, men isukha, “Eiya! Nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
42002019	Meke re, at he Maria etnogo anek, wene isukha meke etnogo etaikenma waganhikhesik ebekho motok welageikhe.
42002020	Nen, it ap domba hagasik welagoukha meke emenogo inileken halok yabokane inapuke waga dogolik, “Wene malaikat nen yoknisega etnogo tak-tagat hagatlagama ninileken higik, ninasuk holhik, hagakho o, ” iluk, Allah hogorakhik, heagei wakhik, hagarik wagoukha.
42002021	Itithogon wagoukhama welagoukhasik nen, iniki 7 baga noge iluk hubuluke, elege etnogo oado aperlagap palusak obaat palhukhasik nen, ebe aban agosa akla ageidek werek korlek malaikat nen isukha tak-tagat, etaga Yesus thalhukha.
42002022	Etaga arat thalhukhasik, Allah nen haganeat Musa yogokhikhemo, at nen ekhe dogolik, “Humi ineagei itaginabiluk nen, noge iniki itithogon iluk nen holak dukhusak, ” iluk isikhe etnogo tak-tagat, noge itithogon isukhasik, elege ket itago etnogo ninopase Etagapogot wogosuogoluk wolok o Yerusalem wagoukha.
42002023	Itithogon wolok wagoukha iti, ninopase Etagapogot nen alebat ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga ekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Elege makusa meke ap halok he, an hinopase Allah hasik 'banusak o”\rq (Keluaran 13:2,12)\rq* iluk isikhe.
42002024	Nen, “Thue merpati hakene iti meke kulok ageikhe a? Horli ageikhe a. E a, at he, thue yogeik hakene iti pere halok a, an hinopase Netagapogot hasik woknesusak o, ”\rq (Imamat 12:8)\rq* iluk isikhe etnogo tak-tagat wogosuogoluk wolok wagoukha.
42002025	Etanem ap o Yerusalem meke ageikhe etaga Simeon welageikhe. At obabut hano, Allah ayukhogon dogolik, motok mothogon hagakhe lageikhe. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, akhuniIsrael meke inakla hanorinabi wisigin meke iti therogo werekma, Allah Agoreke oba duk isikhemo welageikhe.
42002026	Itithogon oba duk i ageikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Hat hebe watlageidek werek korlek, ap kok ageikhe ninopase Etagapogot nen meldiluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo wagunem hileken halok nen watlasigin o, ” iluk, abok yogokhikhesik nen,
42002027	at Simeon etnogo Allah Agoreke oba motok dogolik, Allah ai halekma ukiluk werekma, Yesus agosa opase ipisak Allah nen isikhe meke holal waganek welageikhe meke etnogo tak-tagat hagasuogoluk, Yesus itago etnogo wolok ukisukha.
42002028	Ukisukhama, Yesus itago etnogo Simeon agamo waganhikhesik nen, Allah etaga hogorakhe dogolik men isikhe,
42002029	-
42002032	“Nopase o. Akhuni yi ai ti ai inebetha’bokhogonat inileken hoagaluk, tilinabigin meke arat la'i aganma higi. At nen, it itikmanke meke hoba wisuagalukliarinakhik, hat ha'buri Israel meke hogorinabuagaluk liarogon welageik, hagasigin meke nileken arat higi. Halok he, hat nen yoknekhen tak-tagat, yogotak an hatuaneke netaiken hapukhogonyoma here'isalok hoba wisik nen woknabumo hano o, ”iluk, Allah hogorakhikhe.
42002033	Elege iti abok itithogon isikhemo, agosa men, opase men, inasuk holhukhasik nen, “Eiya! ” iluk hogorakhukha.
42002034	Nen, at Simeon etnogo nen “Allah nen hanothinabuak o, ” iluk, ane hanorogonyogeisalok, elege etnogo agosa Maria oba men yogokhikhe, “Allah nen he, elege yi baga, it ap Israel meke inebedoalegat, aperek usa'isigik, aperek meldisigik, hagasuagaluk meldisikhe o. At yi akhuni tha’bokhogonat hutduagaluk meldisikhe mekeat he, it akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen, Nina'it o, iluk iliogei etnogo,
42002035	inakla apiliogei meke iti ekagat asigin o. Nen, hat meneke, karok elak mago nen hetaikenma taukhogon hasu hagat, hakla motok weak asigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42002036	Nen, o etoma he ageikhe Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etaga Hana ap Fanuel a'but, ukuloak etaga Asyer meke welageikhe. He iti agun waganhikhesik oba nen, 7 tahun ipisak welagoukhasik,
42002037	yabokane thoge ageikhesik nen, at ebe umur 84 tahun motok yaman ageikhesik welageikhe. Dogolik iki ageikhe hipiri nikidek hean negen 'bakhalok Allah ai halekma etoma dikene hibako a'it ageidek sembayan isi motok welageikhe.
42002038	Itithogon isi werekma, at Yesus agosa opase inom ukiluk welagoukha etanem inoba wageikhesik, men isikhe, “Allah nopase o! ” iluk heagei wakhikhesik, it akhuni o Yerusalem meke inakla nen, Allah nen yabokane tilninabigin iluk therogo welagoukha meke tha'bokhogonat yogeisekhe dogolik, “Ebe waga yi, ” iluk yekerek etnogo abok yogeisekhe lageikhe.
42002039	Ninopase Etagapogot nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke holal waganhukha etnogo tak-tagat Yesus agosa opase itithogonat arat hagakhukhasik nen, inaila i Galilea ima o ukul etaga Nazaret etnogo dagei agoukha.
42002040	Dagei agoukhasik werekma, elege etnogo arlue aga dogolik, ebe obatne ageik, etaiken motok kagalek hagatlageik, aga lageikhemo, Allah obabut hano nen, hanorakhe lageikhe.
42002041	Tahun ebe tomok mo dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek, Yesus agosa opase ipisak, domba warogo pesta Paskah isago nuogoluk o Yerusalem usa lagoukha.
42002042	Itithogonusegarethekma nogo nen, it etoma elege itaklageikharekma 12 tahun arat hagatdiluk thini kok isago nuogoluk natogosi ukegarethekma nogo nen, at Yesus etnogo 12 tahun arat asi ageikhemo, isago nuogoluk wolok usasukha.
42002043	Usasukhasik pesta etnogo arat hagakhukhasik Yesus agosa opase ipisagat Yesus o Yerusalem etoma huk ageikhemo it inokodegat inapuke inaila dagei agoukha.
42002044	It agosa opase inakla nen, Yesus etnogo akhuni ebetlake inom wagoukha meke emenogo inom wiriogei, apalok waga lagoukhasik nen, noge uogoluk nen inileken 'bikhasukha meke, ebe dek nen, “Oe agot inom werek a? E a, at he, agarlak lak inom werek a, ” iluk inoba hinok waganhukha.
42002045	Hinok waganhukha meke ebe dek nen he, yabokane o Yerusalem inapuke at herasi usasukha.
42002046	Usasukhasik herarik nekhe lagoukhasik, noge iniki pere iluk nen, yabokane iniki ageikhe nen 'bikhasukha meke, at ebe Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik, it ap Allah ane yakulisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom inakla hurek dogolik, it emenogo inane isinem asuk holhik, it nen isinem at nen hinok waganhik, hagakhunem herakhukha.
42002047	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, it nen hinok waganhunem, at wene motok ilu dogolik oko yogeisasikhemo iti nen, it ap natogorlek welagoukha meke emenogo tha'bokhogonat ane inasuk holhukhasik, “Nayuk e! ” iluk hogorakhukha.
42002048	Itithogon hogorakhunem, it at agosa opase ipisak nen ebe arat herakhukhasik nen, “Nayuk o! ” iluk hogorakhukhasik, at agosa nen, “Neak, hat yigithogon hagatninakhen nenaluk. Hopase nipisak ninobakha palatluk herakhabik nekhe Iago yi hileken nisan o, ” iluk itithogon yogokhikhemo
42002049	at Yesus nen, “Hit an heraknabik nekhe lagap nenaluk. An nopase ai halekma dogosak iluk hinokodek a? ” iluk yogeisasikhe meke re,
42002050	it ipisak hutdigidek welagoukha.
42002051	Itithogon iluk, at Yesus agosa opase inom o Nazaret dagei agoukhasik dogolik, at agosa opase inane hanorogon hologo hagakhe lageikhe. Nen, agosa nen, wene emenogo tha'bokhogon etaikenma waganhikhesik eberek motok welageikhe.
42002052	Nen, at Yesus itithogon dogolik, ebe arlue ageik, etaiken kagalek motok hagatlageik, hagakhe korlek, opase Allah men, akhuni men, at hasik inoba hotok ekhe lagoukha.
42003001	Ap kok etagapogot Kaisar Tiberius iti akhuni Roma meke tha'bokhogonat at iki baga hagasik 15 tahun werek korlek iti hurliat, ap Pontius Pilatus iti o propinsi Yudea ebe gubernur welageikhe. Nen, ap Herodes iti ebe kok dogolik, o Galilea eloke etoma hagasik welageikhe. Nen, ap kok Herodes agot Filipus iti ebe kok dogolik, o Ituria etoma inom, o Trakhonitis etoma inom, hagasik welageikhe. Nen, ap Lisanias iti ebe kok dogolik, o Abilene etomaat hagasik welageikhe.
42003002	Inougi koktek pemerintah hasik it eta werek korlek, Allah hasik, ap Hanas Kayafas ipisak Allah iteerek meke inougi kok welagoukha. Itithogon werek korlek, ap Zakharia a'but Yohanes etnogo o limo akhuni dekma etoma werekma, Allah nen wene ageikhe yogokhikhe.
42003003	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yohanes etnogo o Yordan eloke etoma ya ta nekhe dogolik, akhuni yogeisekhe dogolik, men ekhe lageikhe, “Wene hinoba meke Allah nen thagalogo degetduagaluk, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti thogotdisalok, hinobabut hebelatni. Hinobabut hebelasumo, an nen ima usa'inagakhe dogogin o, ” iluk, yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe.
42003004	Itithogon yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe iti, ap Yesaya, Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen ekhe dogolik, “Ap ageikhe o limo akhuni dekma etoma ane naik ekhe dogolik, Eiya. Ninoe Etagapogot wisiginmoke holakhanorogo yakhik, korlo meke mothogon yakhik, yakhe dogoni o, iluk waisiliogo.
42003005	Hutla halok, punhogo tak-tagat digik, tom halok, ukuleken halok, tamelogo tak-tagat digik, holak korlo-arlo werek halok, moretdigik, hut arlo halok, enago 'bigik, hagakhe dogoni o.
42003006	Itithogon hagakhep halok, Allah nen akhunitilninabigin meke ageikhe la'i agunem hinileken hugun o, ”\rq (Yesaya 40:3-5)\rq* iluk, Yesaya nen holal waganogo 'bisikhe meke tak-tagat, at Yohanes nen itithogon yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe iti.
42003007	Itithogon yogeisilik nekhe lageikhemo, it akhuni emenogo motok doalegat ima usa'inabuagaluk Yohanes oba natogosi aga lagoukha meke men yogeisekhe lageikhe, “Hit warlo pelal nen itago meke yomarani! Hit he, Allah akla aga apik dageigin etnogo hinoba 'bisinem lo erlok lugun iluk, tha nen husupi yokhisekhe. Erlok dek o.
42003008	Halok he, hinakla ebetdiluk, weak hagakhe lagap meke here’isalok hinobabut eberogonat hebelaga iluk ekagat asuak nen mothogon hagakhe dogono o. Nen, hinakla nen, Abraham iti nit ninopase, iluk apugup o. At Allah nen Abraham a'buri negen hagatlasuagaluk helekit yi meke erlok hagasusagat o, iluk yokhisigi iti.
42003009	O erlo dopok eken hano meke ikidek halok, mukhogo hetumo la'isagaluk pisue o omaken oba pakpakthek motok werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. ,
42003010	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Halok he, nit ninobabut nikithogon hagasusak? ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42003011	at Yohanes nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap tha nen, inasu upu baga meke peretek werek halok he, at ageikhe asu dek meke ageikhe wogosusak o. Nen, hinapiri werek halok he, itithogonat yomageisausak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42003012	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo nen, it ap pemerintah hasik uang kino iluk waganharek meke Yohanes oba wagoukhasik, men isukha, “Nit meneke, ima usa'inanok nen iluk wago, noe. Nit ninobabut nikithogon hagakhe dogogun, ” iluk, itithogon yogokhukhama,
42003013	at Yohanes nen, men isikhe, “Hit nen oko waganhe dogolik, hinakla nen kagalogo ageikhe oba dukhogon waganhidek, weat, Yigithogon waganhe dogono, iluk yokhisega meke itiat mothogon waganhe dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42003014	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it ap tentara meke wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Nit meneke, ninobabut nikithogon hagakhe dogogun, ” yogokhukhama, at Yohanes nen, “Akhuni inameke wokhisoagaluk hinane obatnerogon yogeisigik, hinekalat wene inoba 'biluk inauang horlageik, hagasusak motok dek o. At he, yabu hagakhe lagap tak-tagat, oko gaji wokhisiliogei iti, Erlok woknisega, iluk hinetaiken yamukhogonat waganhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42003015	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it akhuni emenogo nen inakla ebekhe dogolik, “Allah nen ap ageikhe tilninabuagaluk meldiluk la'isigin iluk, therogo welago etnogo, at Yohanes yiat a? ” iluk inakla apekho werekma,
42003016	at Yohanes nen men yogeisasikhe, “An nebe yekerek nobatne dek meke nen, we, ima anek usa'inagakhe lagei o. Meke re, at ageikhe kok obatneak meke yabokane wisigin o. At ebe witluk, at nen ima usa'inagu hak, Allah Agoreke inom, hetu inom, hinoba usa'inagei wisigin o. Ap ebe kok obatneak iti nen, at isok agot herle warek meke, an nebe yekerek meke nen hisalusak erlok dek o.
42003017	Gandum eken abubuleke hulusak hasik, than oba huphogon la'igin meke, at iteerek meke ikimo werek iti. Karelusak oba tak-tak asi aga halok, hano meke halok, karelogo 'bekherekma hanoma ’bigik, abubuleke halok, karelogo hetu nagulasusak dekma etnogo baga la’isigik, hagasigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42003018	Hano wene etnogo akhuni doalegat yogeisekhe dogolik, inasuk itithogon warik nekhe lageikhe.
42003019	Inasuk itithogon warik nekhe dogolik, at kok etagapogot Herodes iti nen agot age etaga Herodias iti iki abusak waganhik, yi weak ti weak doalegat hagakhik, hagarik nekhe lageikhe meke hasik, at inomat asuk wakhikhemo,
42003020	at Herodes etnogo weak hagarik waga lageikhesik, yabokane oba dukhogon, Yohanes ebe iki herle warogo nen, o akhuni iniki herle warogo ’bisegarekma kola’isikhe.
42003021	At Yohanes nen akhuni tha’bokhogonat ima usaginakhe dogolik, at Yesus ima usa’isikheat. Ima usa’isikhemo, at Yesus ebe nen sembayan isi korlek, pogot kagoukhogon
42003022	Allah Agoreke thue merpati yogeik negen hitluk oba duk i usa’ageikhe. Itithogon hagakhikhemo, pogot oba nen ane men isikhe, “Hat hebe an na’but netaiken hunik meke. Hat hobasik noba hotok ekhe o, ” iluk isikhe.
42003023	At Yesus ebe umur 30 tahun ageikhesik nen, yi meke ti meke hagarik nekhe dogeigiluk iki arat hakhasikhe. Nen, at ebe it akhuni nen, Yusuf a’but iluk apasukha. Nen, Yusuf iti, Eli a’but.
42003024	Nen, Eli iti, Matat a’but. Matat iti, Lewi a’but. Nen, Lewi iti, Malkhi a’but. Malkhi iti, Yanai a'but. Yanai iti, Yusuf a'but.
42003025	Yusuf iti, Matica a'but. Matica iti, Amos a'but. Amos iti, Nahum a'but. Nahum iti, Hesli a'but. Hesli iti, Nagai a'but.
42003026	Nagai iti, Maat a'but. Maat iti, Matica a'but. Matica iti, Simei a'but, Simei iti, Yosekh a'but. Yosekh iti, Yoda a'but.
42003027	Yoda iti, Yohanan a'but. Yohanan iti, Resa a'but. Resa iti, Zerubabel a'but. Zerubabel iti, Sealtiel a'but. Sealtiel iti, Neri a'but.
42003028	Neri iti, Malkhi a'but. Malkhi iti, Adi a'but. Adi iti, Kosam a'but. Kosam iti, Elmadam a'but. Elmadam iti, Er a'but.
42003029	Er iti, Yesua a'but. Yesua iti, Eliezer a'but. Eliezer iti, Yorim a'but. Yorim iti, Matat a'but. Matat iti, Lewi a'but.
42003030	Lewi iti, Simeon a'but. Simeon iti, Yehuda a'but. Yehuda iti, Yusuf a'but. Yusuf iti, Yonam a'but. Yonam iti, Elyakim a'but. Elyakim iti, Melea a'but.
42003031	Melea iti, Mina a'but. Mina iti, Matata a'but. Matata iti, Natan a'but.
42003032	Natan iti, Daud a'but. Daud iti, Isai a'but. Isai iti, Obed a'but. Obed iti, Boas a'but. Boas iti, Salmon a'but. Salmon iti, Nahason a'but.
42003033	Nahason iti, Aminadab a'but. Aminadab iti, Admin a'but. Admin iti, Ami a'but. Arni iti, Hezron a'but. Hezron iti, Peres a'but. Peres iti, Yehuda a'but.
42003034	Yehuda iti, Yakub a'but. Yakub iti, Ishak a'but. Ishak iti, Abraham a'but. Abraham iti, Terah a'but. Terah iti, Nahor a'but.
42003035	Nahor iti, Serug a'but. Serug iti, Rehu a'but. Rehu iti, Peleg a'but. Peleg iti, Eber a'but. Eber iti, Salmon a'but.
42003036	Salmon iti, Kenan a'but. Kenan iti, Arpakhsad a'but. Arpakhsad iti, Sem a'but. Sem iti, Nuh a'but. Nuh iti, Lamekh a'but.
42003037	Lamekh iti, Metusalah a'but. Metusalah iti, Henokh a'but. Henokh iti, Yared a'but. Yared iti, Mahalaleel a'but. Mahalaleel iti, Kenan a'but.
42003038	Kenan iti, Enos a'but. Enos iti, Set a'but. Set iti, Adam a'but. Adam iti, Allah a'but.
42004001	At Yesus i Yordan ima usasinem, Allah Agoreke akla kerlekhogon ukisikhemo dukhi ageikhesik lagunem, at Allah Agoreke nen ebe wolok, o limo akhuni dekma etoma lageikhe.
42004002	Lageikhesik etoma werekma iki 40 hari Iblis nen akla kagaligiluk oba waga lageikhe. Wago werek korlek, iki 40 hari eta hipiri motok nikidek welageikhesikmo nogo nen, hipiri motok abu ageikhe.
42004003	Abu ageikhemo, at Iblis oba wageikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Hat Allah a'but eberogonat halok he, helekit ethoma hipiri roti meke hagatlasuak nen yogosin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42004004	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Allah nen, Akhuni hipiri anek neke dogolik, iniluk motok welageikharek dek o,\rq (Ulangan 8:3)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42004005	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, yabokane Iblis nen Yesus wolok, tom upu baga 'bi dageisikhesik etoma nen o agat oba yi ai ti ai koktek inetagapogot welageikharek obake tha’bokhogonat yegekhogon winametdiluk opaki hasik ileken lakhoagaluk yakulikhikhe.
42004006	Yakulekhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Koktek inetagapogot welageikharekma inane holek dogolik hogorinakharek iti tha’bokhogonat an ite dogoagaluk woknikhukhama an nakla nen ebetdiluk nen, Ap iti wogosigin, iluk wogeisegerethekma,
42004007	hat hitibagal yukukhogon napma ukitluk hogotnabigin halok he, tha'bokhogonat hat ite dogonogoluk wokhesigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42004008	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Allah nen ekhe dogolik, Hit nen, hinopase Allah Netagapogot anathinitibagal yukukhogon napma ukitluk hogotnakhe dogolik, an nobasik anek hagakhe dogono o,\rq (Ulangan 6:13)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek o, ” iluk, itithogon yogokhikhemo,
42004009	-
42004011	yabokane Iblis nen Yesus wolok, o Yerusalem lageikhesik nen, Yesus ebe o Allah ai halekma uanat upu warleke thalek isiken obaat wolok dageisikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “At Allah nen, An nagarumi malaikat emenogo nen thekharek dogoagaluk inayoko ’bigin o, iluk isikhemo werek. Nen, ageikhe men isikhemo werek, Hat hisok helekit oba waraunogo iluk, it malaikatiti iniki talek werekma wokhabugun o,\rq (Mazmur 91:11-12)\rq* iluk holal waganek weregat apigi. Halok he, hateberogonat Allah a’but halok he, ya nen pok wema eloma usan o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42004012	at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Allah nen ekhe dogolik, Hit nen, an nobasik, Ninopase Allah Etagapogot anini werek a? Dek a, iluk, nobabut palusak motok dek o,\rq (Ulangan 6:16)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42004013	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Iblis nen Yesus obabut paligiluk yi walhigik, ti walhigik, walhalok erlok dek ageikhemo nen, yabokane walhugunem erlok asigin he a, iluk, elanma thogotdiluk horla lageikhe.
42004014	At Iblis etnogo arat lageikhemo nen, at Yesus Allah Agoreke obatnerogon akla werek korlek, apuke o Galilea eloke dagei ageikhe. Dagei ageikhemo, at abok aliluke o etoma motok thak-pak isikhe.
42004015	Itithogon thak-pak isi korlek, at ebe etoma dogolik, it akhuni Yahudi meke o sembayan egarekma ukiluk wene yakulisugunem akhuni etoma meke tha'bokhogonat nen hogorakhe lagoukha.
42004016	Itithogon hogorakhe korlek, at Yesus o Nazaret ebe arlue ageikhe baga lageikhe. Lageikhesik, at hagakhe lageikhe hagat, iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, sembayan uogoluk o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukisikhesik, Allah ane holal waganek meke etaga thalhe dogolik yakulisagaluk melageikhe.
42004017	Melageikhemo nen, ap ageikhe nen Allah ane yakulisekhe lageikhe meke Yesaya etnogo nen holal waganhikhe meke dikilik meke etnogo Yesus wogokhukhama 'bukalogo ileken 'bikhasikhe meke, wene men isikhe meke holalAllah ane holal waganek dikilik waganek werekma etaga meke ebe yi. thalogo yakulisasikhe,
42004018	“It akhuni inameke motok dek inerlageik meke itihano wene yi yakulisekhe dogoagaluk meldanhikhemo nogo nen, nopase Etagapogot Agoreke usa'i agama an noba dukthek werek o. Nen, nayoko 'bekhe dogolik men yoknikhikhe, It akhuni iniki herle warek werek meke herle hisalinabigin wene inom, inileken puk meke inileken ’bekelasuagaluk hanorinabigin wene inom, yogeisigik, it akhuni inapma negen thebelogo ’bisiliogei meke tilogo inasokneat ’bisigik,
42004019	ninopase Etagapogot nen hanotninabigin mekearat horok asi aga o, iluk yogeisigik, hagakhe dogono, iluk la’ani agama wagei yi o,\rq (Yesaya 61:1-2)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganek meke etnogo etaga thalhe dogolik yakulisasikhe.
42004020	Arat yakulisalok nen, buku holal waganek meke etnogo dikilogo ap iteerek meke etnogo wogokhikhesik nen, ebe hurek lageikhe. Hurek lageikhemo, it akhuni tha'bokhogonat sembayan uogoluk inom ukisukha meke emenogo inileken at oba 'birogo motok welagoukha.
42004021	Itithogon inileken 'birogo werekma, at Yesus nen, “Allah ane holal waganek meke yi baga, Itithogon hagasugun, iluk isukha meke etnogo yogotak yakulhisugunem hinasuk holhe korlek yaat ipisak higit aga o, ” iluk isikhemo
42004022	it akhuni emenogo nen men isukha, “At yi ap Yusuf a'but etnogo dek a? Arat o. Mekeat he, at nen wene hano motok yakulnisekhe iti nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
42004023	Itithogon hogorakhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen hibiku-yogokuat ekhe dogolik, Hat hebe ap dokter hakene ethoma re, hoba u iti hekaerek nen hagaran o, iluk egarek meke, hit nen dagakhogon an yoknesugun higi. Itithogon yoknetluk, O Kapernaum hagakhe lagan meke holhe lago iti hak, yogotak hekaerek hai yoma itithogonat ageikhe hagasin o, iluk, yoknesuogoluk ekhe lagap higi, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
42004024	“It ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke iti inekaerek inaila etoma inougi, inagarumi nen inalon halogo woginakharek dek o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi.
42004025	Nen, ap Elia welageikhe eta mot-mot he, miso usa'ageidek 3 tahun ageikhesik, yabokane dagakhogon thut 6 bulan holelhikhemo o etoma yi ai ti ai hipiri motok no ageikhe. Eta mot-mot, akhuni Israel meke werekma humi thoge doalegat welagoukha meke re,
42004026	humi thoge meke etoma ageikhe 'birisa loagaluk Allah nen Elia la'isikhe 'buk. Dek o. At he, he thoge meke opakiat ageikhe o werlekma Sidon ukul etaga Sarfat etoma werekma oba la'isikhe.
42004027	Nen, ap Elisa nen Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe eta mot-mot, o akhuni Israel meke werekma etoma u henako hakene etnogo meke doalegat welagoukha mekeat he, ageikhe hagarinakhe lageikhe motok dek o. Ap Naaman ai Siria meke iti anek hagakhikhe o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhemo,
42004028	it Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma welagoukha meke inasuk holhukhasik nen, inakla aga apik dageisukha.
42004029	Itithogon inakla aga apik dageiluk, inebe melagoukhasik at ebe iki korlo hago itikmanke ula'iluk, o Nazaret alilu etoma tom oba halekma emenogo wolok lagoukhasik hokokhogon usa'i luogoluk hagakhukha.
42004030	Itithogon hagakhukha mekeat he, at Yesus it emenogo here'isalok inakerlekla nen lelokhogon dukhisikhe.
42004031	Inakerleklake nen lelokhogon dukhisikhesik o Galilea eloke ukul etaga Kapernaum lageikhe. Lageikhesik, iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, wene yakulisekhe lageikhe.
42004032	Yakulisekhe dogolik wene ebe iteerek meke nen egarek hak isinem, it emenogo nen, “Nayuk o! ” iluk hogorakhe lagoukha.
42004033	O sembayan egarekma emenogo werekma, ap ageikhe mokat obabut weak meke akla ukisikhemo dogolik, ane kokhogon men yogokhikhe,
42004034	“Yesus Nazaret meke yi ra! Hat nen nikithogon hagatninabigiluk wagan! Nit weagatninabigiluk wagan a? Hat hebe, Allah ekaerek hasik meldageikhesik la'agei agama wagan iti, an nen hutdagagi o, ” iluk ane kokhogon yogokhikhemo,
42004035	at Yesus nen wenagakhe dogolik, “Hane. Ap yi akla nen dukhi lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo mokat obabut weak meke etnogo nen ap etnogo ebe tunhogo akhuni doalek etnogo inakerlekla la'isalok nen, ap ebe weagatdigidek dukhisikhe.
42004036	Itithogon dukhisinem akhuni doalegat emenogo inayuk agoukhasik, it-it ekhe dogolik, men isukha, “At ane ekhe iti nikithogon. At nen mokat inobabut weak meke, Dukhi lani, iluk usagat iti iteerek dogolik, ane obatnerogon wenageisugunem dukhegarek iti nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
42004037	Itithogon hogorakhukhasik, at Yesus abok o ya ta etoma motok thak-pakhogon hagatlageikhe.
42004038	Abok itithogon wolok dukhisukhama, at Yesus o sembayan egarekma etnogo thogotdiluk nen, ap Simon ailalageikhe. Lageikhemo, ap Simon iti akhoan oba u agaken weak werekma, Yesus nen hano hagasuagaluk ayoko 'bisukhama,
42004039	at nen, he etnogo alilu lageikhesik metek dogolik, “U yi dek asin o, ” iluk, yogokhe korlek eranogoat, u etnogo dek ageikhe. Dek ageikhemo, he etnogo melageikhesik nen, it yomageisekhe lageikhe.
42004040	Yomageisekho werekma, o arat hiamaganekeke mo kobokhogon lageikhesikmo, akhuni nen it aperek inoba yi u ti u werek meke tha'bokhogonat wogosik Yesus oba wagoukhama, at nen inebe tomok iki hageisalok hano hagarinakhikhe.
42004041	Itithogon hano hagarinakhikhemo, it aperek inebe doalegat, mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukiluk welagoukha meke nen men yogokhukha, “Allah a'but harat o, ” iluk inane naik ilik ilik dukhisukha mekeat, it inakla nen, “Kristus Allah nen, tilninabuagaluk meldiluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo ebe yiat o, ” iluk, inilu werekma, Yesus nen inane degat dogoagaluk'wenageisasikhe.
42004042	Itithogon wenageikhikhesik, noge iluk huben o arat wi ageikhemo, at Yesus o akhuni motok dekma etoma lageikhe. Lageikhemo, akhuni motok doalegat, at herarik lagoukhasik nen, ebe arat herakhukhasik, werlekmake launogo iluk, iniki hakhasukha.
42004043	Hakhasukhama, at Yesus nen, “Hano wene Allah apma 'bisekherek wene etnogo o ukul aperek etoma inomat yakulisilik nekhe dogoagaluk la'ani ageikhemo wagagisikmo nen, an o etomaat yakulisilik nekhe dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42004044	Itithogon yogeisalok nen, o Yudea eloke akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukiluk, wene iti yakulisilik nekhe lageikhe.
42005001	Iniki ageikhe baga, at Yesus i Genesaret yekelekma etoma metek werekma, akhuni motok doalegat Allah ane inasuk holuogoluk oba dapuk kirlik-kerlekhogon natogosi lagoukha.
42005002	Natogosi laga korlek, it ap ikan waganhe lagoukha meke aperek ku pere eranogo i aik oba 'biluk, su yoge su ikan waganhe lagoukha meke etnogo thobalhunem ileken isasikhe.
42005003	Ileken hisasikhesik nen, Yesus ebe ku Simon meke akla ukiluk, “Ku yi higilogo ima tumo negen horogat thiokhogon la'in o, ” iluk, Simon yogokhikhe. Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, at ebe ku akla hurek lageikhesik, akhuni doalegat emenogo i aik obake werekma wene yakulisasikhe.
42005004	Arat yakulisalok nen, at Yesus nen Simon men yogokhikhe, “Ikan doalegat waganubageik nen, hinebe i agoukmo negen eta lalok su yoge su iti usa'i lani o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
42005005	at Simon nen, “Noe! Hiamaganekeke nen lok-logat hibako usakho motok welago meke re, ageikhe motok waganhidek o. Meke re, hat nen yoknekhenma nogo nen, an nen su yoge su usabigin o, ” iluk
42005006	itithogon yogokhikhesikmo usa'isukha hak, ikan motok doalegat akla ukhatlageikhemo inasu etnogo li'bilasigin hakene hagatlageikhe.
42005007	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, it inagarlak lak ku ninat meke akla welagoukha meke nen yomageisasuagaluk, iniki damok waisasukha. Itithogon waisasukhama, it emenogo wagoukhasik nen, ikan emenogo kilelogo ku ageikhe akla ukhakhik, ageikhe akla ukhakhik, ku pereat apem hethokhigik ukharlik lagoukha mekeat, ikan akin nen, ku mak-makhogon i akla ukigiluk hagakhikhe.
42005008	Itithogon hagasigin apasikhe, at Simon etnogo Yesus elokhoma itibagal yukukhogon usasikhesik nen, “Noe! An weak hagakherek meke yi, yoma thogotdaniluk lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42005009	Ikan doalegat waganhukha iti nen, at Simon agarlak lak inom inayuk atluk itithogon yogokhikhe.
42005010	Iti hak, at Simon agarlak lak inom hunik meke Zebedeus a’buri Yakobus Yohanes ipisak, itithogonat inayuk ageikhemo, at Yesus nen Simon men yogokhikhe, “Hayuk agun o. Ikan waganhe lagan iti hak, hurli yogotak nen, akhuni woginabik nekhe dogogin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42005011	Itithogon yogokhikhemo ku etnogo i aik oba 'bi agoukhasik nen, yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat here’isalok Yesus oporlik lagoukha.
42005012	Itithogon lagoukhasik oba nen, iniki ageikhe baga, Yesus o ukul ageikhe lageikhesik werekma, ap ageikhe oba henako hakene inayuk meke oba weak ageikhesik dogolik, at nen Yesus ileken halok nen, itibagal yukukhogon heagei wakhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe a! Hat nen hano hagatnabigin apegen halok he, hat erlok hano hagatnabusagat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42005013	Yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen ap etnogo iki hakhekhe dogolik, “Nakla nen hano hagathabigin apigirikmoat o. Halok he, hoba hano asin o, ” iluk, yogokhe korlek eranogoat, henako hakene etnogo motok dek ageikhe.
42005014	Dek ageikhemo, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Hat nen, Yesus nen itithogon hagatnakhe, iluk akhuni aperek motok yogeisugun o. Ap Allah iteerek meke nen ileken heoak nen, oba lalok, men hagatno. At Musa nen ekhe dogolik, Akhuni inoba hano atluk, Allah hasik itithogon 'bisausak, iluk isikhe etnogo tak-tagat, Noba henako hakene etnogo dek atluk hano agei, iluk, Allah hasik ageikhe 'bisasinem hutdaguak nen, ageikhe 'bisa lano, ” iluk asuk warogo la'isikhe.
42005015	Asuk warogo la'isikhe mekeat, at etnogo lageikhesik, Yesus nen hagakhikhe meke emenogo abok thak-pakhogon hagatlageikhemo, akhuni doalegat ane holhukhasik, it yi u ti u inoba werek meke hano hagarinabuagaluk, Yesus oba motok doalegat natogosi aga lagoukha.
42005016	Itithogon hagakho motok mekeat he, at Yesus sembayan igiluk ebe akhuni dekma o limo etoma laga lageikhe.
42005017	Iniki ageikhe baga, at Yesus wene yakulisekho werekma, it ap Farisi meke inom, ap Allah ane holal waganek meke yakulisekhe lagoukha meke inom, inai o Galilea eloke nen, Yudea nen, kota Yerusalem nen, oba wagoukhasik inasuk holek hurek werekma, ninopase Etagapogot nen akhuni u weak meke Yesus nen hagarinakhe dogoagaluk obatne wogokhe korlek hano hagarinakhe lageikhe.
42005018	Itithogon hagarinakho werekma, ap ageikhe iki isok aborlok dek motok welageikhe meke thabuleka dit talogo noge ekherekma witik werek korlek, yerogo wolok wagoukhasik, Yesus ebe uma werekma elokhoma 'bi kuogoluk hagakhukha.
42005019	Itithogon hagasuogoluk hagakhukha meke re, akhuni motok kerlekhogonat nen, nikithogon wolok uku heat hagatlageikhemo, ap etnogo o warleke baga wolok dageisukhasik nen, supuk talogo dit talek noge ekhe lageikhe meke etnogo ebe talek motogat akhuni doalegat emenogo inakerlekla turlem, at Yesus werekma mot-mot elokhoma earogo usa'isukha.
42005020	Usa'isukhama, at Yesus nen, “It iti inetaiken an noba hakotdegasik nen wolok wageikha higi o, ” iluk, ileken ekagat hisasikhesik nen, “Na'but o! Hat weak hagakhe lagan meke an nen thagalogo degetdisigi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42005021	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, it ap Farisi meke inom, inakla nen, “Nit akhuni weak hagakhe lago meke iti, it akhuni aperek nen thagalogo degetdisausak nogo? At Allah arligat nen erlok thagalogo degetdisekherek mekeat he, at yi nen Allah akla meanetdiluk etaga weagatdiliogo yi tha apegep, ” iluk inakla apasukha.
42005022	Itithogon apasukhama, at Yesus nen, it inakla apasukha meke ekagat hutdisikhesik nen, “Hit hinakla itithogon apekhe lagap iti nenaluk.
42005023	An nen ap yi wene yogosusak alhe hakene ki apegep. Hat weak hagakhe lagan meke iti, arat thagalogo degetdigi, iluk yogokhi iti alhe hakene meke yogokhi apegep a? E a, at he, Hebe melatluk lan o, iluk yogosusak alhe hakene apekhe lagap a. Dek o. Hebe melatluk lan, iluk yogosumo akinat o.
42005024	Akin mekeat he, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo re, agat oba yoma dogolik, akhuni yi weak ti weak hagakharek meke an nenat thagalogo degetdekhe dogoagaluk, Allah nen iteerek danhikhe meke iti hinilu asubageik nen yogosik, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik, ap iki isok aborlok dek meke etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hebe melatluk harlit eka talek noge ekhe lagan meke ithi horlalok, haila lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42005025	Itithogon yogokhe korlek eranogoat, ap etnogo akhuni emenogo inil oba melageikhesik, arlit eka talek noge ekhe lageikhe meke etnogo horlalok Allah hogorarik hogorarik aila lageikhe.
42005026	Itithogon hagakhikhemo akhuni emenogo inebe tha'bokhogonat inobakha palatluk, inayuk motok agoukhasik nen, men isukha, “Ninileken yogotak hogo iti, motok ninat meke hogo. Nayuk e, ” iluk Allah hogorakhukha.
42005027	Itithogon hagatluk, at Yesus o etoma nen dukhiluk holak laga dogolik ileken lakhasikhe meke, ap ageikhe uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganherek meke ageikhe etaga Lewi iti, kantor uang pemerintah hasik waganharekma hurek werekma ileken hasikhe. Etoma werekma ileken halok nen, “Noporlik eme o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42005028	Yogokhikhemo melatluk, yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat here’isalok, oporligat lageikhe.
42005029	Lageikhesik nen, at aila Yesus elokhoma thini kogat isakhikhe. Itithogon isakhikhesikmo, akhuni uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganhe lagoukha meke doalegat men, akhuni aperek men, at inom hureklatluk opakimo dapukhogon hipiri nasi lagoukha.
42005030	Itithogon nasinem, it ap Farisi meke men, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasukha, “Hit he, ap uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk waganharek meke inom, it aperek weak hagariogei meke inom, hinom hipiri opakimo neke lagap ethoma nenaluk? ” iluk yogeisasukha.
42005031	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, at Yesus nen he, “It akhuni aperek inoba hano meke, dokter lak nen u hagarinabuagaluk inayoko 'busak nogo? Dek o. Inoba u werek halogat, dokter lak inayoko 'busak o.
42005032	An wagagi iti, akhuni hano hagakharek meke inayoko 'bigiluk wagagi 'buk. Dek o. Akhuni weak hagakharek meke iti thogotdisalok inobabut hebelasuagaluk, inayoko 'bigiluk wagagi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42005033	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo nen, it akhuni aperek nen Yesus men yogokhukha, “It ap Yohanes agarumi ane waganiogei meke iti, iniki doalegat welageidek, sembayan uogoluk halok he, hipiri nikidek dogolik sembayanat isi motok welageikharek. Nen, it ap Farisi meke inagarumi inane waganiogei meke iti, itithogonat hagakharek. Mekeat he, it ap hat hane waganiogei meke iti re, we yugunat hipiri nikik, eken apusu nikik, niliogei iti, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42005034	Itithogon yogokhukhama at Yesus nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe age waganhe dogolik, agarlak lak erugi doalegat inayoko 'bigin meke inom dogolik, Hit hipiri nikidek dogoni o, iluk yogeisausak apegep a? Erlok dek o.
42005035	Itithogon mekeat he, ap iti agarlak lak erugi 'bisalok ebe wolok lugun oba weregat o. Itithogon wolok laumo etaat anek he, it iti iniki aperek hipiri nikidek dogogunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42005036	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen, su alep iriogei meke li’bilaga halok, su ket meke li'bilogo haganeat meke iti baga 'bugukakharek dek. Itithogon 'bugukasugun halok, ket meke li'bilugun iti nen weak ageik, haganeat meke iti baga ’bugukasumo ipisak higit dek iti nen weak ageik, hagasigin o.
42005037	Iti hak, akhuni nen anggur eken herelogo apusu ket meke isoak domba oado meke haganeat hagarek meke akla henakharek dek. Itithogon henasugun halok, apusu ket meke iti nen, suphogon eken apusu ebe tialaga dogolik, isoak iti inomat weak asigin o.
42005038	Halok he, anggur eken apusu ket meke halok he, isoak ket mekeat akla henasusak o.
42005039	Nen, it akhuni nen, Anggur eken apusu haganeat meke ituk hano nekarek, iluk egarethek nen, yabokane ket meke nau ina’it o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42006001	It akhuni Yahudi meke iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat welageikharek etnogo ageikhe baga, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, gandum ai yagomake laga dogolik, agarumi nen gandum eken palogo iniki nen wule tagalogo nilik nilik lagoukha.
42006002	Itithogon hagarik lagunem, it ap Farisi meke aperek nen, “Hit yi niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, Itithogon hagasusak dek, iluk wene palek werek mekeat he, nenaluk palhe lagap? ” iluk yogokhukha.
42006003	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “At Daud agarumi oporlik lagoukha meke inom hipiri nonaik ’bisasikhemo nen, at nen hagakhikhe meke Allah ane baga holal waganek etnogo hit nen etaga thalhidek welagap a? Etaga thalhethebat o.
42006004	Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik hipiri roti meke Allah hasik ’bekhe lagoukha meke yugunat nausak motok dek meke welageikhe. It Allah iteerek meke halok anek nausak iluk, wene palek mekeat he, at Daud nen waganhikhesik, at ageikhe neke dogolik, ageikhe agarumi oporlik lagoukha meke emenogo wogeisasikhe, iluk holal waganek etnogo hit etaga thalhidek welagap nogo? ” iluk yogeisasikhesik wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
42006005	“Allah hasik niniki 7 baga werlegat welagorek iti, iteerek an abat itaklasi agagi nebe yiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42006006	Nen, iniki 7 baga ageikhe, it Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, at Yesus o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ageikhe ukisikhesik nen, wene yakulisasikhe. Yakulisugunem, ap ageikhe iki ebeke lapelek meke etoma welageikhe.
42006007	Werekma, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, it ap Farisi meke men, inakla nen, “Yogotak niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat werek korlek, at nen ap ithi u hano hagasigin a? Dek a. Itithogon hagakhe halok, wene at oba ’buok o, ” iluk inileken waganhe lagoukha.
42006008	Itithogon inileken waganho werekma, at Yesus nen inakla apasukha meke ekagat hisalok nen, ap iki lapelek meke etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hebe melatluk nen, tumo ya erne o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, ap etnogo melatluk nen, tumo eranogo melasi lageikhemo,
42006009	at Yesus nen akhuni emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An nen wene ageikhe hinok wokhisak. Niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, hano hagarinabusak a? Weak hagarinabusak a. Tilinabusak a? Inasusak a. Hit nen ini ta? ” iluk
42006010	itithogon yogeisasikhesik, it tha'bokhogonat ileken hisilik lageikhesik nen, ap etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hiki walokhan, ” iluk yogokhikhemo iki walothasinem, arat hano ageikhe.
42006011	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo men, it Farisi meke emenogo men, inakla aga apik dageiluk nen, “At Yesus nikithogon hagasuok he, ” iluk, it-it abok palhe lagoukha.
42006012	Itinem, at Yesus sembayan igiluk tom oba dageisikhe. Dageisikhesik yibako-hibako Allah ayoko ’bisi motok werekma o arat wi ageikhe.
42006013	O wi ageikhemo nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo waisasikhemo wagoukhama nen, it meke inebe 12 wenago ’bisasikhesik nen, “Hinebe la’inagagin, ” iluk meldisasikhe.
42006014	Ap inayoko 'bisasikhe eta inetaga Simon etaga ageikhe Petrus thalhikhe meke etnogo men, agot etaga Andreas men, Yakobus men, Yohanes men, Filipus men, Bartolomeus men,
42006015	Matius men, Tomas men, Alfeus a’but Yakobus men, Simon, “O yoma ninaierek meke anek dogogun, ” iluk ekhe lageikhe etnogo men,
42006016	Yakobus a’but Yudas men, Yudas Iskariot Yesus wasuagaluk yabokane yoko lageikhe meke etnogo men, inebe eta inayoko ’bisasikhe.
42006017	At Yesus itithogon agarumi inayoko ’bisalok, inom tom oba nen usa’agoukhasik nen, agat enagoma etoma huk agoukhasik werekma, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo aperek inebe doalegat men, akhuni motok doalegat o Yudea ya ta meke men, o kota Yerusalem meke men, o Tirus Sidon i laut aik oba welageikharek meke men,
42006018	it nen at Yesus ane holhik, at nen it u weak meke hano hagarinakhik, hagasuogoluk at oba natogosi agoukha. Itithogon natogosi agoukhama, mokat obabut weak meke inakla ukiluk werekma inomat hagarinakhikhe.
42006019	Atobatneak akla welageikhe meke dukhi agunem, it akhuni mebe doalegat itithogon hano hagarinabuagaluk, inebe tha'bokhogonat iniki hakhauwogoluk walhasukha.
42006020	Itithogon hagakhunem, at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo ileken inoba 'biluk nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinerlageik meke, Allah apma 'binagagin iti nen he, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o.
42006021	Nen, hit yogotak hinakla abu negen welagapmeke, yabokane wokhisugunem hina'ithogon nugun iti nen, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o. Nen, hit de aga lagap meke yabokane eto asuguniti nen, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o.
42006022	-
42006023	Nen, it ap yoma inopa lak nen, it ap alep Allahane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke hagarinakhe lagoukha hagat, hit yogotak an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nane waganhep iti nen ina'it motok hisekhe dogolik, hit anek kolelogo 'binagagik, inane puk weak wenageisigik, Ap yi weak, iluk hinetaga ekhe dogolik hinabok weak palhik, itithogon hagathinakho halok, okowokhisagein meke pogot oba doalegat werek iti nen, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogolik hologot hilik hilik etai warekhe dogono.
42006024	Itithogon mekeat he, hit ap kok hinameke werekmeke anek, eiye! Hinameke doalegat iti baga nen, hinakla arleken akhekhe lagap meke re, yabokane weagathinabigin o.
42006025	Nen, hit aperek yogotak elanma hasik anekhinelabut hina'ithogon neke lagap meke yi. Eiye! Yabokane hipiri no hugun o. Nen, hit yogotak elanma hasik anek eto agalagap meke iti. Eiye! Hinetaiken warekhe dogolik de asugunat o.
42006026	It ap yoma inopa lak nen, it ap aperek Allah aneyogeisegarek meke thalek nukhetdisasi korlegat, hogorinakhe lagoukha hak, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen hogothinakho halok, eiye! Weagathinabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42006027	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik yabokane men isikhe, “Itithogon mekeat he, hit an nane holhe lagap meke yi, an wene ageikhe yokhisak. It akhuni hinom weak meke hinakmurogon dogono o. It nen ina'it hisasi korlegat, hit nen oko hano meke anek hagarinakhe dogono o.
42006028	It nen hit homan 'binagasi korlegat, hit nen, hinakla arleken inoba 'bisekhe dogono o. Nen, it weagathinabiogei meke iti, Allah nen hanorinabuagaluk, it inobasik sembayan ekhe dogono o.
42006029	It aperek nen hinelokhoken ebelake dapukhogon hinakho halok he, ebelake inom hinasuagaluk wogeisani o. Nen, it aperek nen hinasu thogei su itikmanke meke iti horlekhe halok he, hinasu akmanke meke iti inomat horloak nen, irlirli waganhup o.
42006030	It akhuni nen kino yokhisekho halok, inebe dopok wogeisekhe dogono. Nen, it nen hinameke waganho halok, yabokane, Woknisani, iluk kino yogeisugup o.
42006031	Hit hinakla nen, It aperek nen itithogon hagatninabilep e! iluk apegethep iti hagat, hit nen it iti itithogonat hagarinakhe dogono o.
42006032	Nen, it ap inakmuthinakharek meke anek hit nen hinakmurinakhep halok he, Hano, iluk yokhisagun a? It akhuni weak hagakharek meke nen itithogon inakmurinakharek meke, it nen meneke, inakmurinakharegat.
42006033	It akhuni hano hagathinabiogei meke iti anek, hit nen hano hagarinakhe lagap halok he, Hano, iluk yokhisagun a? It akhuni weak hagakharek meke inobabut itithogonat hagakharek.
42006034	Hit nen it akhuni oko woknisoak, iluk apekhe dogolik wogeisekhe lagap halok, Hano, iluk yokhisagun a? It akhuni weak hagakharek meke iti, Yabokane oko tak-tagat woknisoak, iluk inagarlak lak weak hagakharek meke aperek wogeisugunem, it nen meneke, wogeisegaregat.
42006035	It itithogon hagakharek mekeat he, hit nen hinom weak meke hinakmurinakhik, hanorogon yomageisigik, Oko it nen ageikhe woknisoak, iluk apigidegat hinobakha palek yugunat wogeisigik, hagakhe dogogun halok he, hinebe Allah Etagapogot a'buriat werekma, oko kok meke wokhisagein o. At nen itithogonat, it inobabut weak at ebe heagei wakhidek weak hagakhe korlek, at akmurinakherek iti.
42006036	Halok he, ninopase akmurinakherek hak, hit nen akhuni hinakmurinakhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42006037	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen wene hinoba 'binogo iluk, hit nen akhuni aperek wene inoba 'bugup o. Allah nen wene hinoba 'biluk nen, weagathinabinogo iluk, hit nen akhuni aperek wene inoba 'biluk nen, weagarinakhup o. Halok he, hit nen weak hagakhe lagap meke Allah nen thagalogo degetduagaluk, akhuni nen weagathinabiogei meke hit nen thagalogo degetdekhe dogono o.
42006038	Hit nen yi meke ti meke yugunat wogeisegep halok he, Allah nen itithogonat yugunat wokhisageinat o. Nen, isoak walegeke oba walhalok, apem hethok ukhakhunem, yamukhogon usa'iluk yabokane oba dukhogon kerlekhogo aperek pilik pilik usekhe korlek wogeisegethep hak, itithogonat Allah nen kokhogon wokhisagein o. Hit nen hurli walhalok nen wogeisegethep iti hak, Allah nen hurli iti bagaat walhalok wokhisagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42006039	Itithogon yogeisalok nen, wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe ileken puk meke nen, at agarlak ageikhe itithogon ileken puk meke yogokhe dogolik, Holak yike lu, iluk iki hago wolok lausak apegep? Itithogon lugun halok he, ipisagat hurlugu karluk waganekma usagun dek nogo? Usagunat o.
42006040	It guru lak wene yakulisegarek meke thebekthek negen werek korlegat, it ina'buri yakulisegarek meke iti siakthek negen upu ya welageikharek dek o. Itithogon meke re, tha nen wene arat yakuliluk hutukhogon ilu atluk halok he, opase yakulisekherek meke iti ipisak tak-tagat o.
42006041	Hit hinekaerek hinilekenma o kok obakha palek meke harokthek werek iti 'bikhakhigidegat dogolik, it hinagarlak lak hinerugi aperek inilekenma amumuleke 'bugurlagat ukiluk werekma wokhauwogoluk hinileken kolageisekhe lagap iti nenaluk.
42006042	Hinekaerek hinilekenma o kok meke palek harokthek werek iti higidek dogoligat, hinagarlak lak hinerugi iti yogeisekhe dogolik, Amumuleke hilekenma ukekhe meke iti wokheak o, iluk usak apegep? Hinoado baga anek hano thalek hinetaiken pere welagap yi re! Hinekaerek hinilekenma o palek kok meke harokthek werek iti tak wokhakhalok nen, hinileken arat ’bekelaga halok he, yabokane hinagarlak lak hinerugi inilekenma amumuleke werek meke iti, erlok wokhageinat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42006043	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “O erlo hano meke ageikhe eken weak meke ikherek dek. Iti hak, o erlo weak meke eken hano meke ageikhe ikherek degat.
42006044	Yi o ti o iti, eken ikherek iti baga erlo ekagat hutdegarek. O pati arlok weak mekeat he, eken o ara hano meke eken hakene ageikhe itlukmo palharek motok dek. Iti hak, o mun mekeat he, eken anggur eken hano meke itlukmo palharek motok degat.
42006045	Akhuni nen yi wene ti wene inapema nen egarek iti, inakla kerlekhogon dogolik, kagalogo dagei agunem egarek o. Inobabut hano meke inakla hano meke kerlekhogon dogolik, wene hano mekeat dukhi ageikharegat. Mekeat he, akhuni inobabut weak meke inakla weagat dogolik, wene weak mekeat dukhi ageikharek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42006046	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit an nen yokhisekhe lagei meke hagakhidek dogoligat, Noe, noe, iluk nenaluk yoknekhe lagap.
42006047	-
42006048	Tha nenan noba witluk nane holherethek mothogon hagariogei meke iti, o halharek meke oba lisogon yokhisak. At iti, ap nen o halharek iti hakeneat o. Ap ageikhe o haligiluk agat wemarogon hulelogo nen, helekit 'biluk o tik oak helekit oba dukhogon 'biluk nen, o ebe halhikhe. Itithogon halhikhemo, yabokane i itluk waga dogolik, o etnogo warabethasikhe meke re, motok a'bethogon halhikhemo nogo nen he, aborlok ageikhe igidek motok huk ageikhe.
42006049	Itithogon mekeat, at tha nen an nane holhe dogoligat, mothogon hagariogo dek halok he, ap ageikhe o haligiluk herlaga baga 'bigidek halhikhemo, i itluk waga dogolik, o etnogo wakhikhemo, thatnakhogon wolok laga dogolik motok misak-dapukhogon weagatdisikhe iti hagat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42007001	At Yesus nen akhuni doalegat emenogo wene itithogon tha’bokhogonat arat yogeisalok nen, o Kapernaum uki ageikhe.
42007002	At uki ageikhemo, etoma ap tentara meke inoe kok ageikhe atuaneke etaiken hunik meke oba u motok weak nen, watlasusak negen welageikhe.
42007003	Itithogon werekma, ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo Yesus abok asuk holhikhesik nen, atuaneke etnogo hagasisuagaluk, ap inarluetek Yahudi meke aperek yogeisalok nen, “Yesus ayoko lani o, ” iluk la'isikhe.
42007004	-
42007005	Itithogon la'isasikhemo, it emenogo Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, inane obatnerogonat men yogokhukha, “At ap tentara meke inoe kok iti akhuni nit meke akmutnisigik, at nenat o nit sembayan ogorekma haldinanhik, hagakhikhesikmo iti, at atuaneke iti u hagasi lausak o, ” iluk itithogon yogokhukhama,
42007006	Yesus ebe inom lagoukha. Uma lagoukhasik ukuogoluk horokhogon asi lagoukha hak, ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo nen agarumi aperek wene Yesus yogosi loagaluk la'isa ageikhe. La'isa ageikhemo, it emenogo anek Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Noe. Nit ninoe nen, At isok alomarogo wisunogo. An ap yekeregatma, at an naila ukisusak erlok dek o.
42007007	Nen, an nen, at oba lausak iluk apigidegat o. Erlok dek o. We, at ane anek umo nen, an natuaneke yi hano asigin o.
42007008	An meneke, nougi koktek meke inapma dogolik, inane holhik, nen an nagarumi tentara meke iti an napma dogolik, an nane holhik, hagakhorethekma nogo nen, an nen, at ageikhe, Lan o, iluk yogokhe halok lagarek. Nen ageikhe, Erne, iluk yogokhe halok he, wagaregat o. Nen, natuaneke ageikhe, Yi hagasin, iluk yogokhe halok he, hagakheregat o, iluk yokhesuagaluk la'inani agama wago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42007009	Yogokhukhama at Yesus nen, men isikhe, “Ap iti nayuk e, ” iluk, hogoratluk nen, elokhe dagakhogon akhuni doalegat oporlik lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Ap iti etaiken an noba hakotdekhe iti hakene, it akhuni Israel meke ageikhe inetaiken itithogon hakotdisinem hisegerek dek meke nayuk e, ” iluk isikhe.
42007010	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it yoko wagoukha meke emenogo inaila lagoukha hak, ap it inoe tentara mekeatuaneke meke etnogo arat hano ageikhesik werekma inileken ha lagoukha.
42007011	Itithogon hagatluk nen, yabokane at Yesus o ukul etaga Nain lagaluk lagunem, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men, akhuni hetlake inebe motok doalegat men, oporlik lagoukha.
42007012	Laga lagoukhasik, leget ’bakleget holagape palek oba asi lagoukha hak, elege ageikhe ebe arligat itago meke agosa thoge werekma watlageikhemo akhuni o ukul etnogo meke inebe doalegat elege warek o yerogo wolok agosa inom dukhi agunem
42007013	ileken lageisasikhe. Lageisasikhesik ninoe Etagapogot nen, agosa etnogo ileken halok akmu ageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Neru. De aga ’buk o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik nen,
42007014	elege warek o yerogo wolok wagoukha etnogo alilu lageikhesik nen iki hakhasikhe. Iki itithogon hakhasikhemo akhuni nen warek o yerogo wolok wagoukha meke emenogo huk agoukha. Huk agoukhama at Yesus nen elege warek etnogo yogokhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Na’but yi! Hiluk asin, iluk yokhekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo nen
42007015	elege watlageikhe meke etnogo iluk ageikhesik hurek dogolik ane isikhe. Ane isikhemo Yesus nen elege etnogo agosa wogokhikhe.
42007016	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, akhuni doalegat emenogo inayuk agoukhasik nen, Allah hogorakhe dogolik, men isukha, “Ap kok Allah ane yoknisekhe dogogin meke ageikhe ninakla winam aga o! ” iluk igik, nen, it aperek nen, “Allah nen a’buri tilninabigiluk waga yi, ” iluk igik, isukha.
42007017	Itithogon isukhasik, wene hagatlageikhe meke iti, o Yudea yi ai ti ai etoma nen piokthek, o aliluke etoma Yesus abok motok wolok dukhisukhama wiagisikhe.
42007018	Abok wolok dukhisukhama nen, it at Yohanes agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, wene hagatlageikhe meke etnogo at Yohanes yogokhukhama asuk holhikhesik, at nen agarumi inebe pere waisasikhemo wagoukhama
42007019	men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe wisigin ekhe lagoukha etnogo harat a? E a, at he, ap ninat meke ageikhe therogo dogogun a, iluk oba hinok wagani lani o, ” iluk ninoe Etagapogot oba la’isa ageikhe.
42007020	La’isa ageikhemo, Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Ninoe. At Yohanes ima usa'isekherek meke etnogo nen, Ap ageikhe wisigin iluk ekhe lagoukha etnogo harat a? E a, at he, ninat meke ageikhe therogo dogogun a, iluk, oba hinok wagani lani, iluk la'inani agama wago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42007021	Itithogon yogosi agoukhasik werek korlek itinem, at Yesus nen akhuni u warek meke inom, hinet wakhe lagoukha meke inom, hano hagarinakhik, mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukisikhesik werekma mukhogo ula'isigik, inileken puk meke hano asuagaluk 'bekelogo hano hagarinakhik, hagakhe lageikhesik
42007022	Yohanes agarumi wagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen, an yigithogon tigithogon hagakhunem hinileken niigik, wene isinem hinasuk holhik, hagakhep meke iti, at Yohanes hutukhogon yogosi lani o. Inileken puk meke 'bekelogo hano ageik, inae la'belek meke holak lageik, inoba u henako hakene inayuk werekma meke hagarinakhunem hano ageik, inasuk dogou meke huakhogon holhik, akhuni warek meke inilugurinakhik, it akhuni inameke dek meke hano wene yakulisigik, hagakhunem hinileken neegep etnogo hutukhogon yogosi lani o.
42007023	Yogotluk he, Tha nen etaiken pere dek here'anhidek dogogin halok, akla arleken akhekhe dogogin o, iluk yogosi lano o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42007024	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it Yohanes nen yoko la'isa ageikhe meke emenogo arat lagoukhama nen, yabokane at Yesus nen akhuni doalegat emenogo Yohanes hasik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, o limo akhuni dekma etoma nena meke hinileken 'bikhauwogoluk laga lagasip nogo. Hiteka yagareka hisakne nen hubethasinem lageik-wageik hagakho werekma 'bikha luogoluk laga lagasip a?
42007025	E a, at he, nena meke hinileken huogoluk laga lagasip. Ap ageikhe asu hano motok meke ugu werekma 'bikhauwogoluk laga lagasip a? Lakhani! Ap koktek inaila dogolik halogat inasu hano meke ikhigik, inameke yi meke ti meke doalegat hago welageik, hagakharek apigi!
42007026	Halok he, etoma nena meke 'bikhauwogoluk laga lagasip. E a, at he, ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke ageikhe werekma 'bikhauwogoluk laga lagasip a? Eberogonat itiat o. An nen yokhisak. It ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke aperek welagoukha mekeat he, it iti inetaga erlok dek negen. Mekeat he, at Yohanes iti anek he, etagapogot isiken negenat o.
42007027	Wene at Allah nen men isikhe, “Hat yabokane lanogoluk, hat holak ya'agekhe dogoagaluk, ap ageikhe ayoko 'biluk alebageik la'igima o,\rq (Maleakhi 3:1)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti ebe re, at Yohanes hasigat isikhe o.
42007028	Halok he, an nen wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Akhuni tha'bokhogonat inagosa lak nen itaginabik wagoukha mekeat he, inetaga dek anek. Mekeat he, Yohanes iti anek etaga werek o. Meke re, Allah apma 'bisekherekma etoma, at Yohanes etaga dek negen werek mekeat he, it akhuni aperek inetaga dek meke iti inetaga werek negenat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42007029	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it akhuni doalegat emenogo men, pemerintah hasik uang kino iluk natogorlogo 'begarek meke emenogo men, at Yohanes nen haganeat ima usa'isasikhemo nogo nen, wene Yesus nen yogeisasikhe meke iti inasuk holhukhasik, “Allah akla nen apekherek meke iti mot motogat o, ” iluk isukha.
42007030	Itithogon isukha meke re, it ap Farisi meke men, it ap Allah ane holal waganek yakulisekhe lagoukha meke men, anek, Yohanes nen ima usa'isoagaluk lageidek dogolik, Allah nen itithogon hagakhe dogoagaluk akla apasikhe meke etnogo ina'it nen thogotdisalok welagoukha.
42007031	At Yesus nen wene ageikhe yogeisekhe dogolik, “It akhuni o yogotak ya baga werek, nena meke oba lisogon yokhisak. Ki hakene werek.
42007032	It inebe yi inom tak-tak. Yekerugi pasar oba oko waganharekma hurek dogolik, inagarlak lak inom inane la'igik-wa'igik ekhe dogolik, Nit nen etai hit wasuogoluk isa ula'ogo mekeat he, hit ekaka igidegat. Nen, de asuogoluk de wene erlo ula'ogo meke re, hit nen de ageidegat, iluk egarek iti hakene hagariogei o.
42007033	At Yohanes ima usa'isekherek meke wageikhe iti, hipiri men, o anggur eken apusu men, nikidek wageikhesikmo nogo nen, hit nen, Mokat obabut weak meke akla ukekhesik werek o, iluk ekhe lagagip.
42007034	Meke re, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo anek, hipiri men, anggur eken apusu men, yugunat nilik wagagisikmo nogo nen, hit nen, Lakhani! Ap yi re, hipiri men, anggur eken apusu men, oba la'buk nilik nekhe dogolik, ap pemerintah meke hasik uang kino iluk waganharek meke men, ap weak hagakharek meke men, hunetdakhalok niliogo yi 'bikhani? iluk yoknekhe lagap.
42007035	Itithogon mekeat he, at Allah akla kagalek dogolik hagakherek etnogo, it aperek nen hano apalok, itithogon mothogon hagakhe dogogun halok, iti morat iluk hutdugunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42007036	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, ap Farisi meke ageikhe etaga Simon, Yesus ipisak hipiri at aila nuogoluk ayoko 'bisikhe. Ayoko 'bisikhemo aila ukiluk ipisak hipiri nuogoluk, hurek lageikhe.
42007037	Hurek lageikhesik hipiri nasi werekma, he o ukul etoma meke ageikhe weak hagakherethekma abok akhuni inilu meke akhuni nen, “Yesus o ili dogolik hipiri niliogo, ” iluk isukhama asuk holhikhesik nen, apusu obasi hano meke oko kogat palogo isoak helekit etaga pualam meke hagarek oba akla ukharlogo wolok wageikhe.
42007038	Wolok wageikhesik uma ukisikhesik nen, Yesus isok ukutmo oporlik horok-horok wageikhesik nen, etoma metek dogolik de aga lageikhe. De agunem il apusu Yesus isok oba usa'isikhemo nen, isi baga yabokane hokhikhe. Hokhikhesik isok oba heagei ape tharluk wakhikhesik nen, apusu obasi hano meke wolok wageikhe etnogo Yesus isok oba watdisikhe.
42007039	Itithogon hagakhunem, ap Farisi meke nen, Yesus ipisak hipiri nuogoluk ayoko 'bisikhe meke etnogo akla nen men apasikhe, “Ap yi Allah ane yogeisekherek meke dogolepma re, He yi weak hagakherek meke nen iki hakneekhe, iluk ekagat hutdilep o, ” iluk itithogon akla apasinem,
42007040	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Simon. An wene ageikhe yokhesigin, ” iluk yogokhikhemo at nen, “Noe. Yoknom o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42007041	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Ap inebe pere meke, ap ageikhe auang elanma hasik wogeisekhe lageikhe meke nen wogeisasikhemo inoba palegeke welageikhe. Ageikhe uang kok meke 500 ribu rupiah hakene. Nen, ageikhe 50 ribu rupiah hakene inoba palegeke welageikhe.
42007042	Itithogon werekma, it nen okowogosusak erlok dek ageikhemo nen, uang waganhukha meke holal waganek iti, at kok etnogo nen therlelogo here'isalok nen, Werlegat horlegep o, iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon hagakhikhemo, ap inebe pere eranogo tha hak nen inoe kok etnogo akmurakhikhe apegep? ” iluk yogokhikhemo
42007043	at Simon nen, “At ap ageikhe uang doalegat negen oba palegeke welageikhe mekeat, Werlegat horlegen o, iluk yogokhikhe iti nen, akmurakhikhe, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Egen itiat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42007044	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, at Yesus nen elokhe hebenokhogo he etnogo wogokhikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Simon. He yi hileken hegen a? Dek a. An hat haila uki agei mekeat he, hat nen, Hisok oba hosin, iluk, i ageikhe woknekhen dek. Meke re, he yi anek, il apusu nisok oba usakhesik nen, isi baga hotnakhe o.
42007045	Nen, hat nen heagei hape tharluk watnakhen degat o. Meke re, he yi anek, an uki agei hurli nen, nisok oba heagei ape tharluk watnakho motok werek o.
42007046	Nen, hat nen an nukuloak oba apusu ageikhe watdanhen dek mekeat he, he yi anek apusu obasi hano meke nisok oba watdanhe o.
42007047	Itithogon hagakhe iti nen, an nen hat ageikhe yokhesik o. At he yi nen weak doalegat hagakhe laga mekeat he, at akla nen, Yesus nen thagalogo degetdekhemo, iluk kokhogon akmutnakhe iti baga ekagat hagatlaga o. It akhuni weak herlekha'bugat hagariogei meke, Allah nen thagalogo degetdisinem, herlekha'bugat negen inakmurinakharek o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik
42007048	at he etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Weak hagakhe lagan meke iti, arat thagalogo degetdigi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42007049	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, it akhuni Yesus inom hurek dogolik hipiri nasukha meke emenogo, it-it yogeisekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Akhuni weak hagariogei meke thagalogo degetdisiliogo yi, ebe tha hak nen degetdisiliogo apegep, ” iluk isi korlek
42007050	at Yesus nen, he etnogo yogokhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Hat hetaiken noba hakotdegen iti nen tilhakhi o. Halok he, hakla hanorogon haila lan o, ” iluk la’isikhe.
42008001	At Yesus itithogon hagakhikhesik nen, welageidegat, yabokane hano wene Allah apma ’bisekherek wene etnogo, o ukul kok inom, o ’bugurlagat meke inom, yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe. Yogeisilik nekhe dogolik, at agarumi inebe 12 emenogo inom,
42008002	it humi aperek mokat obabut weak meke inakla ukilukmo mukhogo ula’isigik, inoba u meke hano hagarinakhik, haganeat hagarinakhikhe meke aperek men, inom nekhe lagoukha. Humi eta ageikhe, he Maria ai Magdala ekhe lagoukha meke, alebat mokat inobabut weak meke inebe 7 nen akla ukiluk werekma, at Yesus nen mukhogo ula’isasikhe meke iti men,
42008003	nen, ageikhe he Yohana ap kok Herodes ameke yi meke ti meke iki baga dogolik hagakhe lageikhe meke etaga Khusa iti age men, he Susana men, nen ageikhe, it humi ebetlake doalegat men, inameke hago welagoukha baga Yesus agarumi inomat yomageisilik nekhe lagoukha.
42008004	At Yesus o etoma werekma, akhuni motok doalegat o yi ai ti ai nen, at oba natogosi agoukhama, at nen wene oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe,
42008005	“Ap ageikhe ai hilogo la’ekherek meke ai hilogo la’igiluk dukhisikhe. Dukhisikhesik la’ilik lagunem, ai aperek holagarlem usa'isikhe. Itithogon usa'isikhemo akhuni laga dogolik, inisok nen al debelogo 'bilik lagoukhama, thue hitluk nekherek meke wageikhesik tha'bokhogon haumhogo nasikhe.
42008006	Nen, ai aperek helekit oba usa'isikhe meke re, ibat aku hurlelhikhesik nen, agat apusu dek nen puk ageikhe.
42008007	Nen, ai aperek oka arlok weakma usa'isikhe. Usa'isikhemo oka arlok meke iti inom opakimo aku hurlelhikhesik, oka arlok weak meke iti kok aga dogolik, aku hano meke iti akurladap ageikhesik keken ageikhe.
42008008	Nen, ebetlake agat mirlimo usa'isikhe meke re, hurlelhikhesik kok atluk, erlo tomok eken 100 oba nen irik lageikhe, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon yogeisalok ane kokhogonat ekhe dogolik, “Hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogon holini o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42008009	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, at Yesus men yogokhukha, “Hat nen wene oba lisogon yoknisegen iti, ebe nikithogon meke hasik egen, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42008010	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen apma 'bisekherek wene iti, at akla limago welageikhe meke iti, hit anek wene iti hinilu asubageik iluk pakhogon yokhisausak iluk, akla apasikhe mekeat he, it akhuni ebetlake iti, at Allah nen, Inileken hekhe dogogun meke re, hutukhogon hekhe dogogun dek o. Nen, inasuk holhe dogogun mekeat he, hutukhogon hutdekhe dogogun degat o,\rq (Yesaya 6:9-10)\rq* iluk isikhe iti tak-tak asuagaluk wene iti oba lisogonat yogeisekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42008011	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene oba lisogon yokhisigi etnogo ebe yi. Ai hilogo la'ilik lageikhe igi etnogo, ebe Allah ane itiat o.
42008012	Holagarlem usa'isikhe iti ebe, it akhuni aperek Allah ane inasuk holharethekma nen, eberogonat iluk waganhunem, Allah nen inebe tilinabinogo iluk, Iblis wagarethek nen, wene inakla nen henogo wolok lagarek itiat o.
42008013	Nen, helekitoba usa'isikhe iti ebe, it akhuni aperek Allah ane iti inasuk holharethek nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogolik waganharethek nen, inetaikenma omaken yakhidek nen eberogonat iluk iniki pererlagat anek inakla apalok werekma, weak hagasuagaluk inakla kagali agunem, arat kobokhogon thogotdisalok dukhegarek itiat o.
42008014	Nen, okama arlok weakma usa'isikhe iti ebe, it akhuni aperek Allah ane iti inasuk holharethek nenat, inakla nen, Eiye. Nikithogon hagasigin he, iluk, wene munini ebekhik, Ninameke doalegat dogolep e, iluk inakla ebekhik, agat oba inakla arleken akhausak meke oba ebekhik, hagakharek iti nen, inakla Allah ane iti eken horle ageidek lologo dek agarek itiat o.
42008015	Nen, agat hanoma usa'isikhe iti ebe re, it akhuni aperek hano wene iti inasuk holharethek nen, inetaikenma motok hutukhogon horlegarethek here'isigidek hago motok dogolik, eken motok doalegat ikherek itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42008016	Itithogon yogeisalok nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen isagal yibarlogo isoak abura thebelogo 'bigik, noge egarekma wema baga 'bigik, hagakharek dek. Akhuni uma ukekhe dogolik lia werekma ekagat hoagaluk, isagal yibarlogo isok tilik oba dukhogon 'begarek o.
42008017	Itithogon 'bisinem, yi meke ti meke limago welagarek meke iti, winam ageik, wene inakla limago welagarek meke iti, thelekma 'bualogo 'bigik, hagasigin
42008018	iti nen he, wene hinasuk holhe lagap meke iti, hanorogon hutdekhe dogono o. It akhuni inikimo hago werek meke iti, ageikhe oba lapelogo wogeisagein. Meke re, it aperek dek meke iti, inakla nen, Herlekha'bugat ya erlok werek, apiliogei meke iti tilogo horlagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42008019	Itithogon yogeisekho werekma, at Yesus agosa men, agarumi men, at oba wagoukha meke, akhuni doalegat inom werek nen, at Yesus oba ukusak dek hagatlageikhe.
42008020	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo it akhuni aperek nen men yogokhukha, “Yesus! Hat hagosa men, hagarumi men, hat hoba wageikha meke okutlu werek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42008021	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nagosa nagarumi iti, akhuni Allah ane inasuk holharethek nen, mothogon hagakharek meke itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42008022	Iniki ageikhe baga, at Yesus ebe inom, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom, ku akla ukisukhasik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “I aik ilibaganke ita luok, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik italhukha.
42008023	Italhe dogolik nen, at Yesus noge isikhe. Noge isi korlek, hisakne kogat hubetha ageikhemo, i hoklabu doalegat waga dogolik, i tiakhogon ku akla ukisikhemo, ku etnogo wurladakhogon usagaluk hagakhikhe.
42008024	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it emenogo nen, at Yesus noge isinem lagoukhasik nen iluguthekhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Ninoe! Ninoe! Nit arat i lugun yoma, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus iluk atluk melageikhesik nen, i hoklabu men, hisakne men, wenagakhikhemo palageikhesik motok hapuk isikhe.
42008025	Hapuk isikhemo, at Yesus nen agarumi emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Hinetaiken noba hakotdiluk welagap meke etnogo, ka lagama nen ekhe lagap, ” iluk, itithogon yogeisasikhemo it inayuk agoukhasik nen, it-it ekhe dogolik, “Eiye! Ap yi ebe tha apegep. Hisakne men, i hoklabu men, at ane baga, Dek asin, isinem, ane hologo dek aga iti nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
42008026	Itithogon iluk, yabokane at Yesus agarumi inom i Galilea yekelek aik ilibaganke o Gerasa etoma ku warogo itali agoukha.
42008027	-
42008029	Itali agoukhasik, arlo baga itali lagoukha hak, ap ageikhe ai ukul iti meke mokat obabut weak meke akla ukisikhemo welageikhe meke, at Yesus oba wageikhe. Ap iti haganeat nen mokat obabut weak meke hibiku-yogoku akla ukisinem, it akhuni aperek nen iki isok pisue omaken oba herle warogo ’bekhe lagoukha mekeat he, herle tirlip-tarlaphogon la'isalok, mokat etnogo nen wolok o limo akhuni dekma etoma laga lageikhesik, yabokane su ugurlek alwurlugat, at aila hanorogo welageidek oila warek meke 'bisegarekma etoma motok dogolik Yesus ebe wagunem ileken lakhasikhesik nen apma hureklasi ukiluk ane kokhogonat men yogokhikhe, “Yesus. Hat Allah Etagapogot a'but yi, an nikithogon hagatnabigiluk wagan, ” iluk yogokhunem, at Yesus nen mokat etnogo dukhuagaluk yogokhikhemo, at etnogo nen, “Noe. Weagatnakhun o, ” iluk ane a'buarek yogokhikhe.
42008030	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen ap etnogo oba hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Hat hetaga tha, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, ap etnogo mokat inobabut weak meke doalegat akla ukiluk welagoukha iti nen he, “Netaga opaki doalek u hak, Legiun, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42008031	Itithogon yogotluk nen, it mokat inobabut weak meke emenogo mukhogo kilinmo herle warogo usa'isegarekma usa'isaunogo iluk inane ina'buarek inane Yesus yogokhukha.
42008032	Etanem, o etoma tom obake wam motok doalegat konak nasi werekma, it mokat inobabut weak meke emenogo Yesus men yogokhukha, “Wam eloma inakla ukhatlasi luok nen, la'inanin o, ” iluk, inane ina'buarek yogokhukha. Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “I o. Laniat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42008033	it mokat inobabut weak meke emenogo, ap etnogo akla nen dukhi lagoukhasik, wam emenogo inakla ukhatlasi lagoukhama, motogat i kat oba lumhogo, i kok yekelekma usa lagoukha.
42008034	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, it ap wam therogo welagoukha meke emenogo inileken hasukhasik nen, pirlirli, umake yoko lagoukhasik nen, o ukul kokma inom, 'bugurlagatma inom, wene hagatlageikhe meke etnogo motok pilin-palinhogo yogeisa lagoukha.
42008035	Itithogon yogeisa lagoukhama nen, it akhuni nen, “Nikithogon hagatlagunem nen ega, ” iluk, inileken huogoluk Yesus oba wagoukha meke, ap mokat inobabut weak meke akla nen dukhisikhe meke etnogo obabut hebelageikhesik asu ugu Yesus apma hurek werekma inileken hasukhasik, inayuk agoukha.
42008036	Inayuk agoukhama, it akhuni aperek Yesus nen hagakhunem inileken hasukha meke nen, men yogeisasukha, “Ap mokat obabut weak meke ukisikhesik welaga etnogo itithogon hano hagakhe, ” iluk motok pilin-palinhogon yogeisasukha.
42008037	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, it akhuni o ukul Gerasa meke men, o aliluke meke men, inebe tha'bokhogonat inayuk weak agoukhasik nen, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Yesus. Hat hebe ninom yoma dogosak dek. Lan o, ” iluk yogokhukha. Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus ku akla ukiluk ku warogo apuke wageikhe.
42008038	Wisigiluk hagakhunem, ap mokat inobabut weak meke akla ukisikhesikmo mukhogo ula’isikhe meke etnogo nen, men isikhe, “Noe. Nipisagat nekhe dogouok nen, luok o, ” iluk, ane a’buarek ane Yesus yogokhikhe meke re, at Yesus nen, “Dek o, ” iluk aila la’ekhe dogolik,
42008039	“Haila lan o. Lalok nen, Allah nen hagathakhe meke iti pilinerogo yogeisilik nekhe dogono o, ” iluk, itithogon asuk warogo la’isikhemo ap etnogo aila lageikhesik nen, “Yesus nen itithogon hagatnakhe o, ” iluk, pilinerogo it akhuni o ukul kokma etoma meke wene tha’bokhogonat yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe.
42008040	At Yesus ebe apuke i aik ilibaganke nen itali ageikhemo it akhuni inebe doalegat nen, at ebe therogo werekma heagei warogo waganhukha.
42008041	-
42008042	Itithogon waganhukhama, ap ageikhe etaga Yairus, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma inoe kok meke, a’but horlak opakiat itago meke ebe itaklageikhesik oba umur 12 tahun hagatlageikhe hak, u nen horogat watlasigiluk hagakhe lageikhemo, Yesus oba wageikhesik apma itibagal yukukhogon heagei wakhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. An naila luok o, ” iluk, ane a'buarek ane yogokhikhe. Itithogon yogokhikhemo, Yesus at ipisak luogoluk lagunem, akhuni motok doalegat oporlik kerlek-kerlek lagoukha.
42008043	Lagunem, he ageikhe amep wago motok werek korlek 12 tahun hagatlageikhe meke, it dokter lak nen hano hagasuagaluk ameke tha'bokhogonat wogeisekhe lageikhe mekeat, it nen hano hagakhidek werek korlek, amep etnogo palageidek wago motok welageikhesik,
42008044	akhuni doalegat emenogo lagunem, Yesus oporlik lageikhesik, asu ilugun iki hakhekhe korlek amep eranogoat dek ageikhe.
42008045	Iki itithogon hakhasikhemo, at Yesus nen, men isikhe, “Tha nen iki hakneekhe, ” iluk isikhemo it akhuni doalegat emenogo inebe tha'bokhogonat nen, “An dek o, ” iluk isukhama, at Petrus nen, “Noe! Akhuni motok doalegat ageikhe nen herlekhogon la'igik, ageikhe nen herlekhogon la'igik, waga dogolik nogo nen, hat hoba dikhogonat wageikha o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42008046	Itithogon yogokhikhemo at Yesus nen, men isikhe, “Dek o. At ageikhe nen iki hakneekhemo, an nobatneelalin hagarinakherek etnogo meke nakla nen akhuni inoba kigikhogon dukhekhe higi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42008047	Yogokhikhemo, at he etnogo akla nen, “Arat hutdanhe higi o, ” iluk, ayuk ageikhesik nen, oageleke dik-dik Yesus oba wageikhesik nen, apma itibagal yukukhogon men yogokhikhe, “An yigithogon nen hasu niki hakhigi o. Itithogon niki hakhugunem eranogoat hano agei yi, ” iluk, akhuni emenogo inil oba motok pilinogo yogokhikhe.
42008048	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Neru e! Hetaiken noba hakotdegen iti nen hano agan o. Halok he, hakla hanorogonat lan o, ” iluk la'isikhe.
42008049	Itithogon yogokhe korlek eranogoat, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma inoe kok etnogo aila nen agot ageikhe yoko wageikhesik nen, Yairus men yogokhikhe, “Noe.
