Ha’but horlak etnogo arat watlagama nen wagei o. Halok he, ninoe kok wene yakulnisekherek meke ithi isok alomarogo hipisak luogoluk oba tiolusak dek, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42008050	Itithogon yogokhikhemo at Yesus asuk holhikhesik nen, Yairus etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Yak e. Hayuk agun o. Hetaiken noba hakotdegen halok he, ha’but horlak iti hano asigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik nen,
42008051	Yairus aila lagoukha. Lagoukhasik nen, akhuni aperek emenogo okutlu dogoagaluk yogeisalok nen, Petrus men, Yohanes men, Yakobus men, horlak etnogo agosa opase men inebe eta anek wogosik uma ukisikhe.
42008052	Ukisukha hak, akhuni motok doalegat horlak etnogo warekma dogolik, uak de ageik, inetaiken warigik, hagakhunem ukisikhesik at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “De agup o. Horlak yi watlageidek noge iliogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42008053	it nen, Horlak iti arat watlaga, iluk inilumo nen Yesus obato kogat agoukha.
42008054	Obato kogat agoukhama, at Yesus nen horlak etnogo iki hago meldekhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Neru. Hiluk asin o! ” iluk yogokhe korlek eranogoat
42008055	agurlagun dukhisikhe meke yabokane ukisikhemo, ebe arat iluk ageikhesik melageikhe. Melageikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Apiri ageikhe noak nen wogotni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42008056	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at horlak etnogo agosa opase nen, “Nayuk o! ” iluk, hogorakhukha mekeat, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hagakhunem hinileken neegep meke iti, akhuni motok yogeisugup o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe.
42009001	Itithogon yogeisalok, at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe 12 emenogo natogosisuagaluk waisasikhemo wagoukhama, it nen yi mokat ti mokat inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula’isigik, yi u ti u inoba werek halok hagarinakhik, hagarik loagaluk obatne wogeisasikhesik iteerek hagarinakhikhe.
42009002	Itithogon hagarinakhikhesik, it nen Allah apma ’bisagein wene etnogo yogeisigik, u warek meke hano hagarinakhik, hagarinabik loagaluk la’isasikhe.
42009003	La’isekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, yi meke ti meke holak lausak meke ageikhe motok wolok lagup o. Hinathegerluk men, hinasu yi meke ti meke wokhisugunem ukhasugun meke men, hipiri men, uang men, nen hinasu ikhasak meke peretek men, ageikhe motok wolok lagup o.
42009004	Nen, hit o ageikhe lagunem, hanorogo wokhinakho halok he, etomaat dogoluk, o ninmo luogoluk halok, etoma nenat dukhitluk lano.
42009005	Nen, it akhuni o ageikhe nen hinebe wokhinakhidek halok he, o ukul iti here’isalok dukhi aga dogolik, it o etoma meke inakla hutduagaluk hinisok hola negen horogo ’biluk dukhitno o, ” iluk, inasuk warogo la’isasikhemo,
42009006	it agarumi emenogo lagoukha. Laga dogolik nen, o etoma o ukul dopok hano wene etnogo yogeisigik, o ya ta u hano hagarinakhik, hagarik lagoukha.
42009007	Itithogon hagarik nekhe lagoukhama, ap Herodes oGalilea eloke kok etagapogot welageikhe meke iti, wene iti tha’bokhogonat asuk holhikhe. It akhuni aperek nen, “Yohanes wakhama watlaga etnogo iluk agasik werek iti, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
42009008	Nen, it aperek nen, “Ap Elia etnogo winam agama o, ” igik, it aperek nen, “It ap haganeat Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo ageikhe iluk agama o, ” igik, ekhe lagoukhama re, ap kok Herodes etnogo obakha palageikhe.
42009009	Obakha palageikhesik dogolik, men isikhe, “Yohanes etnogo, an nenat arlokop ade tekhogo wakhi mekeat he, at ageikhe nen itithogon hagariogo iluk, abok nasuk holhi iti, tha nen hagariogo? ” iluk, Yesus ebe ileken hagaluk walhekhe lageikhe.
42009010	It ap Yesus nen inayoko 'biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo lagoukhasik inapuke wagoukhasik, hagarik nekhe lagoukha meke emenogo pilin-palinhogo Yesus yogosi agoukha. Itithogon yogosi agoukhama re, at nen it wogosik inasokneat tekhogon o ukul etaga Betsaida etoma lageikhe.
42009011	Etoma inasokneat tekhogon lagoukha mekeat he, akhuni nen, “At Yesus etnogo o etoma laga o, ” iluk isinem, akhuni doalegat inasuk holhukhasik nen, inebe doalegat oporlik lagoukha. Lagoukhama, at Yesus nen heagei warogo woginakhikhesik, Allah apma ’bisekherek wene etnogo yogeisigik, inebe u warek meke hano hagarinakhik, hagakhikhe.
42009012	Itithogon hagarinakhe korlek, o mo arat hiam ageikhemo nen, at agarumi inebe 12 emenogo oba wagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Nit yoma limo akhuni inaren dekma welago yi, akhuni yoma inapiri nikik, noge igik, hagasuak nen, o yoma aliluke o ukul kok meke inom, ’bugurlagat meke inom, la’isan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42009013	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Inapiri nausak meke, hit nenat melageisani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen, men yogokhukha. “Nit nen, hipiri roti meke 5, nen, ikan pere anek werek yoma, nit nen akhuni yoma inobasik ageikhe oko palisa loagaluk ekhe lagan a? ” iluk yogokhukha iti,
42009014	akhuni inebe ap anek, 5. 000 hakene werekma isukha. Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen agarumi emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “It ethoma inebe 50 amun waganogo hureklarik loak nen, yogeisani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42009015	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at nen isikhe hagat, “Hureklatni, ” iluk yogeisasukhama, inebe tha'bokhogonat hureklarik lagoukha.
42009016	Arat hureklarik lagoukhama nen, at Yesus nen hipiri roti meke 5 eranogo men, ikan pere eranogo men, ikimo waganhikhesik nen, ileken pogot oba liakhalok, Allah heagei warogo roti inom, ikan inom, eranogo kusogo, at agarumi emenogo nen akhuni doalegat emenogosupurisoagaluk wogeisasikhe.
42009017	Arat supurisasukhama inebe tha'bokhogonat hipiri ina'ithogon nasukhama titu ageikhe meke mul yago 12 oba ukharlogo 'bisukha.
42009018	Iniki ageikhe baga, Yesus arligat sembayan isinem, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oba wagoukha. Wagoukhama, at nen hinok inoba waganhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni doalegat nen an nebe hasik nabok ekhe dogolik tha iliogei nogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, men yogokhukha,
42009019	“It aperek nen, Yohanes ima usa'isekhe lageikhe meke etnogo igik, it aperek nen, Elia at o, igik, it aperek nen, It ap haganeat Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo meke ageikhe iluk agasik werek o, igik, iliogei o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42009020	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “It nen itithogon iliogei meke re, hit yi anek, an nebe hasik tha ekhe lagap nogo, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo at Petrus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat hebe Kristus, nit tilninabuagaluk Allah nen la'isigin iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogoat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42009021	at Yesus nen, it agarumi emenogo tha'bokhogonat men yogeisasikhe, “An nebe hasik ekhe iti, akhuni motok yogosugup o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe.
42009022	Inasuk itithogon wakhikhesik nen, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, it ap inarluetek inom, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inom, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, an nebe ina'it atluk, yi aik ti aik doalegat hagatnabiluk, nebe nasugun o. Nasumo nen, nebe niki pere warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi Allah nen nilugutnabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42009023	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe it akhuni tha'bokhogonat men yogeisasikhe, “Tha nen an noporlik nekhe dogeigiluk halok, ekaerek hasik etaiken hunik dogolik hagakherek meke, Na'it, iluk here'isalok nen, o baga meldiluk inakharek meke iti, inago mekeat hibiku-yogoku wolok, an noporlik nekhe dogeigiluk wisuak o.
42009024	Nen, tha nen, An nebe niluk dogosak warlok, iluk, ebe irlirli horlagein halok he, watlatluk nuk akhagein o. Meke re, an nobasik watlasigin halok he, ebe tiligin o.
42009025	Nen, tha nen, yi meke ti meke agat oba meke tha'bokhogonat ite asigin mekeat, ekaerek ebe hasik weak akhalok nuk asigin halok he, ageikhe thabusogo hano horlekhe usak a? Motok dek o.
42009026	At tha nen, An Yesus agot, igik, an nane iti yogeisigik, akhuni inil oba pakhogon u ekarli halok he, an abat itaklasi agagi meke yi nen meneke, yabokane an nebe hogotnakhik, nopase hogorakhik, malaikat Allah ekaerek hasik yoko la'isa agarek meke emenogo hogorinakhik, hagakhe korlek waga dogolik nen, At yi an nagot, iluk nane pakhogonat u nekarliat asigin o.
42009027	Nen, hit metek welagap yoma meke aperek he, watlageidek dogolik, Allah apma 'bisagein meke etnogo 'bisinem hinileken hugun o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42009028	At Yesus nen wene iti arat yogeisasikhesik nen, noge iniki 8 negen iluk nen, Petrus men, Yohanes men, Yakobus men, wogosik sembayan igiluk tom oba dageisikhe.
42009029	Dageisikhesik sembayan isinem, at Yesus elokhoken ninat hagatlaga dogolik asu elokhoken kut motok atluk nen, a'bi'baleak hagatlageikhe.
42009030	Itithogon hagatlaga korlek, eranogoat ap inebe pere, Musa men, Elia men, Yesus inom wenekak isinem
42009031	inebe hogorinabusak hakene winam agoukhasik werekma, inileken hisasukha. Nen, wenekak isukha iti, at Yesus iki welageidegat Allah nen isikhe tak-tagat, o Yerusalem watlasigin wene ekhe lagoukha.
42009032	Itithogon isi korlek, at Petrus agarlak lak emenogo inom noge inil ageikhemo noge isukhasik nenat, iniluk agoukhasik Yesus ebe a'bi'bal weak yibathasinem, ap inebe pere eranogo Yesus inom metek werekma inileken hisasukha.
42009033	Itithogon hisasukhama, ap inebe pere emenogo Yesus etoma thogotdiluk luogoluk hagakhunem, Petrus nen Yesus yogokhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe! Nit o yoma hano welago higi. Halok he, nit nen yoma orlisa henagan, hat hobasik ageikhe, Musa obasik ageikhe, Elia obasik ageikhe halhisagein o, ” iluk itithogon isikhe iti, wene nikithogon meke ekhe lagei iluk, hutdigidegat yogokhikhe iti.
42009034	Itithogon isi korlek eranogoat, oisa motok doalegat thebelinabi ageikhemo, inebe oisa akla dogolik inayuk weak agoukha.
42009035	Itithogon inayuk weak agoukhama oisa etnogo akla nen Allah ane men yogeisasikhe, “An na'but wenago meldisigi meke ebe ithiat o. Halok he, at ane holhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42009036	Itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, ane 'bogokhogon, inileken 'bikhasukha meke re, at Yesus arligat werekma hasukha. Itithogon hagatlageikhemo inileken hasukhasik nen, wene hagatlageikhe meke iti, itinem akhuni aperek yogeisigidek inaklaat welagoukha.
42009037	Hubenke, Yesus agarumi inom tom oba nen usa'agunem, akhuni motok doalegat Yesus oba wagoukha.
42009038	Wagoukhasik, ap ageikhe it inakerleklake nen, ane kokhogon Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Noe! An na'but opakiat itago meke yinaga hileken 'bikhanogoluk hayoko wagei o.
42009039	At iti mokat obabut weak meke akla ukekherethek nen, iki isok dik-dik hagakhe dogolik, apemake wosirlagap palek-dapalek hagakhik, naik ilik ilik agat oba tunhogo usa'igik, hagakhe dogolik, yekerek iti akla nen mokat obabut weak meke iti horla dukhu'bugat dogolik ebe weagatdiliogo.
42009040	Itithogon hagakherek iti nen, hat hagarumi hane waganiogei meke nen mukhogo ula'uagaluk yogeisigi mekeat, it nen itithogon hagasusak erlok dek hagatlaga, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42009041	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen it akhuni doalegat emenogo menyogeisasikhe, “Ap yirani! Hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yi, hinetaiken noba hakotdigidek dogolik, nuk akhekhe lagap yoma re! Nakla pugurakhe lagap yoma niki meren oba nobakhanini hapugutdiluk ninom dogogun nogo! ” iluk yogeisalok nen, ap etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Ha'but ithi wolok erne o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42009042	Yogokhikhemo, yekerek etnogo Yesus oba aban wolok waga korlek eranogoat mokat obabut weak meke etnogo nen yekerek etnogo agat oba tunhogo usa'isinem, iki isok dik-dik hagakhikhe. Itithogon hagakhikhemo, at Yesus nen mokat obabut weak meke etnogo wenageikhikhesik, yekerek etnogo hano hagarogo opase wogokhikhe.
42009043	Itithogon wogokhikhemo akhuni emenogo tha'bokhogonat inileken hasukhasik nen, “Allah obatneak iti nayuk e, ” iluk hogorakhukha. It akhuni emenogo tha'bokhogonat, at Yesus nen yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakhe lageikhe meke emenogo hasik, “Eiye! ” iluk, hogorakhe korlek, at nen at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe,
42009044	“An wene yokhisagein yi hanorogon hutdekhe dogoni o. An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo ap nen yoko lalok it aperek nen nasuagaluk iniki baga 'banugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe meke re,
42009045	wene limago meke pakhogon yogeisigidek oba lisogon negen yogeisasikhemo, at agarumi meke emenogo hutdigidek dogolik, men isukha, “Wene iti nikithogon meke hasik yoknisegen, ” iluk hinok waganu inayuk nen, inane igidek huk agoukha.
42009046	Itithogon werek korlek, it Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen ekhe dogolik, at ageikhe nen, “Kok hetagapogot hat nogo? An o, ” igik, wene la’igik wa’igik wene palhe lagoukha.
42009047	Inane itithogon palhukhama Yesus nen inakla apasukhasik isukha meke ekagat hutdisikhesik nen, yekerek ’bugurlagat meke ageikhe waganogo alilu ’bi ageikhesik nen,
42009048	it emenogo wene men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakerlekla yoma at etaga dek erlok dek meke itiat ebe kok etagapogot asigin iti nen, tha nen yekerek yi an nobasik waganhe halok he, an nebe woknabigin o. Nen, tha nen an woknakho halok he, at la’ani ageikhe meke etnogoat waganigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42009049	Itithogon yogeisugunem, at Yohanes nen, men isikhe, “Noe! Ap ageikhe mokat obabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukilukmo hat hetaga palogo mukhogo ula’isugunem ninileken hogosik nen, at iti nit ninom nekhe lago dek meke iti nen, Hat itithogon hagakhun, iluk wenagakho, ” iluk itithogon yogokhikhemo
42009050	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hit nen itithogon wenagasusak dek o. Tha nen hit wenakhisiliogo dek halok he, at iti hit werekmake mekeat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42009051	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, at Yesus ebe Allah nen pogot oba lia'usak arat horok asi ageikhemo, at akla nenat wene munini la'iluk, “O Yerusalem usagein o, ” iluk holak waganhikhe.
42009052	At aban usigidek dogolik, ap aperek yoko alebageik la'isasikhe. La'isasikhemo it emenogo usasukhasik nen, “At ebe wisigin iti, at ameke yi meke ti meke karelogo 'buok o, ” iluk o Samaria ukul 'bugurlaktek meke ageikhe ukisukha.
42009053	Itithogon ukisukhama at Yesus o Yerusalem lagaluk hagakhunem obabut ekagat palhukhasik nen, akhuni o Samaria meke etoma nen, “At Yesus ninom dogosak nina'it, ” iluk ebe waganhidek thogotdisukha.
42009054	Itithogon thogotdisukhama at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke Yakobus inom, Yohanes inom, inileken hisalok nen, men yogokhukha, “Ninoe! Hat nen hano apegen halok he, inebe inasuagaluk pogot oba nen hetu usa'isuak nen, kino yogosuok a? ” isukha.
42009055	Itithogon isukhama at Yesus elokhe hebenokhogon wogeisalok nen, “Itithogon hagasusak dek o, ” iluk wenageisasikhe.
42009056	Itithogon wenageisalok nen, o nekalokma ageikhe lagoukha.
42009057	At Yesus agarumi inom holak oba lagunem, at ap ageikhe nen Yesus yogokhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe! Hat komake lagan halok he, an hoporlik motok nekhe dogogin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42009058	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Helo yeke iti, ai halek akolakla welagarek o. Nen, thue hitluk nekharek meke iti, itithogonat ai halek welagaregat. Itithogon meke re, an abat itaklasi agagi meke iti anek he, noge ekhe dogosakma nai halek motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42009059	Itithogon yogokhikhesik ap ninat meke ageikhe men yogokhikhe, “Nipisak nekhe dogouok nen noporlik erne o, ” iluk, yogokhikhe mekeat he, ap etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Eiye, noe! An nopase watlasusakma iti tak agatma thali lak nen, hat nen, I o. Lan o, iluk yoknetnogoluk yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42009060	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “It akhuni warek meke halok, it akhuni inebe warek meke hakene werek iti nenat thalinakhe dogoak nen, hat Allah apma 'bisekherek wene iti, o yi ai ti ai yogeisilik nekhe dogono o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42009061	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, ap ninat meke ageikhe nen, at Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Noe! Hat hoporlik nekhe dogogin nakla apigirikmo luok nen, noe nagot tak heagei warinabi lak nen, la'aninok nen iluk yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42009062	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “It akhuni, inebe tomok wen waganuogoluk wen thege wolok lalok, wen ebe hakhegarethegat he, yabokane inelokhe hebenokhogon inoporlike laklasiriogei halok he, Allah apma 'bisekherekma etoma ukusak motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42010001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ninoe Etagapogot nen ap inebe 70 baga witaberogo 'bisalok nen, at ekaerek yi ai ti ai o ukul tomok lagaluk akla apasikhe oba dopok, it iti tak alebageik inebe peretek dopokhigik la’isasikhe.
42010002	Itithogon la'isekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Eken ugu ebe doalegat arat horle agasik werek mekeat he, akhuni eken ebe palusak meke inebe pererlagat o. Iti nen he, ap ayabu Iteerek meke etnaga nen, akhuni eken palusak meke aperek la'isoak nen, at ayoko 'bekhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42010003	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, “Hit lani o. An nen hit hinobabut domba obabut hakene meke it akh’ini inobabut yeke helo yeke obabut weak meke hakene meke inakerlekla hiakhogon la'inagekhe lagei o.
42010004	Nen, hit he, uang su akla ukharlek meke inom, yi meke ti meke wokhisugunem su ukharlogo wolok lausak meke inom, sepatu ageikhe su ukharlogo inom, ageikhe motok wolok lagup o. Nen, holagarlem laga dogolik, akhuni aperek hinane abirogon heagei warinabik lagup o.
42010005	Nen, akhuni inaila ukiluk dogolik, Hinebe yoma Allah nen hanothinabuak o, iluk heagei warinabiluk ukino.
42010006	Heagei warinabiluk ukumo, inobabut hanorinabusak meke werekma ukegep halok he, Allah nen hanorinabiginat o. Itithogon meke re, it aperek inobabut itithogon dek halok he, heagei warinakhep meke hinane ukut apuke waganhe dogono.
42010007	It akhuni hit wokhinabusak meke werekma ukegep halok he, etomaat hinom dogono. Dogolik, it akhuni yabu waganhunem iniki oko yi meke ti meke wogeisegaregat o, iluk, it nen yi meke ti meke noagaluk wokhisekho halok, itiat neke dogono. O ya hotnokhogon lageik, ta hotnokhogon lageik, nekhe dogogup o.
42010008	O ukul ageikhe ukisinem, heagei warogo wokhinabugun obaat, it nen hipiri wokhisagun meke itiat neke dogono.
42010009	O ukul etoma dogolik, it aperek inoba u warek halok, hit nen hano hagarinakhe dogolik, Allah nen apma 'binanigin etnogo yogotak arat 'binanigin o, iluk yogeisekhe dogono.
42010010	Meke re, o ukul ageikhe hit ukugun oba etoma nen heagei warogo wokhinakho dek halok, hinebe dukhitluk holagarlem asi lalok nen, men ino,
42010011	Nit hit hinaila dogolik agat abubuleke ninisok oba dekelogo meke yi, hit weak iluk hiniloba horogo podisogo yi. Hinakla nen, Allah apma 'binanigin etnogo yogotak arat 'binanigin, iluk, hanorogon hutdekhe dogono, iluk yogeisano.
42010012	Yabokane o ilugun hurli baga, it akhuni o Sodom meke etoma Allah nen ukum inoba 'biluk weagarinabigin mekeat he, alhe negenat o. Mekeat he, it akhuni o ukul hit wokhinakhidek thogotdinagagin meke iti, Allah nen ukum akin meke inoba 'biluk motok weagarinabigin o, iluk yokhisekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42010013	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik yabokane akhuni tha'bokhogonat men yogeisasikhe, “Hit akhuni o Khorasim meke men, o Betsaida meke men, akhuni nen hagasusak dek meke an nen elalinat, hit ninom dogolik hagakhe lagei etnogo, o Tirus Sidon etoma hagakhe dogolema re, it akhuni o etoma meke inobabut hebelatluk nen, hean 'biluk hagakharek hak, inasu pelabi ikhigik, 'bisi yugulharek hakene wul dabulhik, hagakhe dogolik nen, weak hagakhe lagoukha meke iti here'isalok, inobabut haganeat hebelatlep mekeat he, hit itithogon hagasusak hina'it iti nen, eiye, weagathinabigin o!
42010014	Yabokane o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem, it akhuni o Tirus Sidon etoma meke ukum inoba 'biluk alhe negen inasigin mekeat, hit anek, motok akinhogo negen hinasiginat o.
42010015	Nen, hit akhuni o Kapemaum meke yi hinakla nen, Allah nen pogot oba lia'inaniluk kogotninabigin, iluk hinekaerek hogorakeke lagap a? Motok dek o. Akhuni watlatluk lageikharekma etoma motok usa'inagagin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42010016	Itithogon yogeisalok nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni nen hit hinane holiogei halok he, an naneat holiogei o. Nen, Nina'it, iluk here'inagega halok he, anat here'anha o. Nen, an here'anha halok he, an la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo ebeat here'isega o, ” iluk itithogon yogeisalok nen, la'isasikhe.
42010017	Yabokane it ap inebe 70 la'isasikhe meke emenogo inakla arleken akhalok, inapuke wagoukhasik, men isukha, “Ninoe! Nit nen mokat obabut weak meke iti, hat hetaga palogo yogokhunem ninane inasuk holhe lagaikha o, ” iluk yogokhukhama
42010018	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Iblis iti o yabok yibarlogo la'i agarek hak, pogot oba nen usagunem nileken hasigi o.
42010019	Halok he, lakhani! Pelal anini weak meke men, warlo aik palinakharek meke men, hinisok nen al debelogo 'bisigik, Iblis ninom wim palek meke etnogo obatne degetdisigik, hagakhe dogobageik iluk, an nobatne wokhisigirik iteerek hagathinakhi o. Iteerekhagathinakhirikmo, yi meke ti meke aperek nen weagathinabigin motok dek o.
42010020	Itithogon meke re, it mokat inobabut weak meke nen hit hinane holharek iti baga, hinakla arleken akhugup o. At he, hinetaga pogot oba holal waganek werek iti hasik anek, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogoni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42010021	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik itinemat, Allah Agoreke Yesus akla werekma nogo nen, akla arleken akhekhe dogolik, opase Allah men yogokhikhe, “Allah nopase. Pogot agat iteerek harat o. Wene tha'bokhogonat iti, it akhuni inakla kagalek meke men, yi wene ti wene inilu meke men, inilu asunogo iluk lima'iluk nen, it inobabut yekerugi ket itago meke hakene anek, pakhogon yogeisegen iti, hat hakla warlok apegen mekeat yogeisegen iti nen heagei wathakhe lagei, nopase! ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42010022	Itithogon yogokhikhesik, it akhuni emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An nopase nen yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat an ite dogoagaluk woknikhikhe. Allah a'but iti tha iluk akhuni tha'bokhogonat inokodek mekeat, an nopase arligat anek ilu welagarek. Iti hak, an nopase Allah iti tha, iluk akhuni tha'bokhogonat inokodek mekeat, at a'but an narligat anek nilu welagarek o. Nen, Allah a'but an nenat nakla apalok nen, nopase ebe akhuni aperek inilu asuagaluk nane pakhogon yogeisagein meke itiat inilu ageikharek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42010023	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inasokneat tekhogon wogosik lalok at elokhe hebenokhogon wogeisasikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinileken hausak mekeat arat hekhe lagap meke yi, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogoni.
42010024	It ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inom, koktek inetagapogot meke inom, inebe doalegat hit hinileken hekhe lagap meke iti, Ninileken helo e, inakla apekhe lagoukha mekeat he, inileken higidek welagoukha. Nen, wene hinasuk holhe lagap meke iti, Ninasuk holilo e, iluk, inakla apekhe lagoukha mekeat, inasuk holhidek welagoukha, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42010025	Wene itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo nen, yabokane ap Allah ane holal waganek yakulisekhe lageikhe meke ageikhe Yesus obabut paligiluk oba wageikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. An niluk motok dogeik nen, nobabut nikithogon hagakhe dogeik, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42010026	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo holal nikithogon waganek werekma etaga thalhe lagan, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
42010027	ap etnogo nen he, men yogokhikhe, “At Musa nen, Hinetaiken men, hinobabut men, hinobatne men, hinakla men, opakiat atluk, ninopase Allah Etagapogot ebe itiat hinetaiken hunik dogono o.\rq (Imamat 19:18)\rq* Nen, ageikhe, Hit hinekaerek hinebe hinetaiken hunik welagathep iti hagat, it akhuni aperek hinom welagathep meke iti hinetaiken hunik dogono o,\rq (Ulangan 6:5)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42010028	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Iti wene morat egen o. Hat hobabut wene egen iti mothogon hagakhe dogogin halok he, hiluk motok dogogin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42010029	at ap etnogo akla nen, “Yesus nen, Ap iti hano hagakherek meke, iluk apoak, ” iluk men yogokhikhe, “Akhuni ninom welagorek meke netaiken hunik dogosak iti, inebe thani? ” iluk itithogon yogokhikhemo,
42010030	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Ap ageikhe o Yerusalem nen o Yeriko usasikhe. Holagarlem usasinem, ap iniki abusak waganik nekharek meke nen, ap etnogo ha'iluk, tugi motok tamuk-hamukhogon watlasusak negen warogo etomaat podisalok, ameke yi meke ti meke emenogo horlalok lagoukha.
42010031	Horlalok lagoukhasikmo nen, ap ageikhe Allah iteerek meke ageikhe holak itike usagaluk usasikhe hak, ap etnogo warek werekma ileken hasikhe mekeat, ebe thogotdiluk holak oalogo piokthegat usasikhe.
42010032	At usasikhe tak-tagat, ap ukul etaga Lewi meke ageikhe holak itike usa'aga dogolik, ap etnogo warek werekma ileken hasikhe meke re, ebe thogotdiluk holak oalogo piokthegat usasikhe.
42010033	It itithogon hagakhukha mekeat he, ap o Samaria meke ageikhe holak itike usagaluk usasikhe hak, ap warek etnogo werekma ileken halok akmu ageikhe.
42010034	Akmu ageikhesik, ebe horokhogon alilu lageikhesik nen, oado li'bik-la'bakhogon wakhukha meke emenogo o anggur eken apusu inom, minyak apusu ageikhe inom, agalumo obake watdiluk, erereka yilogo, at akeledai apot oba yasukhogo lia'iluk nen, o akhuni oko palogo noge egarekma 'bi lageikhesik nen, therogo noge isikhe.
42010035	Therogo noge iluk, hubenke ap etnogo nen, ap o iti iteerek meke uang perak meke pere wogokhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, Ap yi therogo dogono. Therogo dogolik, hat meke yi meke ti meke wogokhe dogogin meke, oko wokhikhi yi dek aga halok, an yabokane witluk nen oko wokhesigin o, iluk yogokhikhe, ” iluk, Yesus nen ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke etnogo yogokhikhe.
42010036	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogokhikhe, “It ap iniki abusak waganharek meke nen ap wakhukha meke iti, Allah nen, Akhuni hinom welagathep meke hinakmurogon dogosak, iluk isikhe etnogo tak-tak, ap inebe henagan iti, tha hak nen akmurakhikhe apegen, ” iluk itithogon isikhemo,
42010037	at ap etnogo nen, men isikhe, “Ap iti warek werekma ap ageikhe wageikhesik akmu nen yomakhasikhe itiat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Halok he, hat itithogon hagarik lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42010038	Itithogon yogotluk nen, yabokane at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom lagoukhasik, o ukul ageikhe ukisukha. O etoma he ageikhe etaga Marta welageikhe. At nen, “Yesus an naila ukisuak, ” iluk ayoko 'bisikhesik waganhikhe.
42010039	At Yesus, he Marta iti agot etaga Maria ipisak werekma ukisikhemo, he Maria etnogo Yesus apma dogolik ane asuk holek welageikhe.
42010040	Meke re, at Marta nen, “Ap huso wagasikmo, ” iluk arini thet weak isakhik, werakhik, hagakhe lageikhesik wageikhesik nen, Yesus yogokhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. An narligat yabu hagakhe dogoagaluk, an nagot yi yomakniigidek thogotdanhe yi hano apegen a? Yomakneasuak nen, yogosin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42010041	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Marta, Marta. Hat nen, yi meke ti meke hasik helabut hisogo thet weak hagakhe lagan higi.
42010042	Meke re, wene opakiat meke anek hagasusak werek korlegat, hat nen yi meke ti meke hagakhe lagan. Hagot Maria yi, wene opakiat hano meke itiat wenago 'bakhekhesikmo, it akhuni aperek nen ikimo tilogo waganusak dek meke 'bakhekhesik werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42011001	Iniki ageikhe baga, at Yesus o ninmoat dogolik, sembayan ekhe lageikhe. Sembayan arat isikhemo nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo opakiat ageikhe nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. At Yohanes nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lageikha meke sembayan ekhe dogoagaluk yakulisekhe laga iti hak, nit meneke itithogonat sembayan ekhe dogoagaluk ageikhe yakulnisan o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42011002	at Yesus nen, “Hit sembayan uogoluk halok he, yigithogon ekhe dogono, Ninopase. Hat hekaerek hetaga kogotdekhe dogoagaluk hagatninabi me o. Nit ninebe hat hapma dogoagaluk 'binani me o.
42011003	Nit ninapiri hibiku-yogoku neke dogosak meke, erlokhogonat woknisekhe dogono o.
42011004	It akhuni nen nit weak hagatninabiogei mekeinebe dopok nit nen thagalogo degetdogo iti nen, nit nen weak hagakhe lago meke hat nen thagalogo degetdisano. Weak hagasuagaluk ninakla kagaliginmo etomahere'inanhidek piokthegat woknisik laga dogono, iluk sembayan ekhe dogono, ” iluk yakulisasikhe.
42011005	-
42011006	Itithogon yakulisasikhesik nen, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Ap hit meke ageikhe hibakone eketurlem agarlak oba lalok yogokhe dogolik, Nagarlak e! An nagarlak ageikhe werlekma lagaluk nen, noba 'bitniilik lagaluk wagasik werek meke re, hipiri melageisusak meke dek agama nen, hat nen hipiri roti werago meke henagan halok ageikhe woknom o, iluk, yogokhe halok he,
42011007	at agarlak etnogo uma nen ane ulageik, An na'buri ninom thu latdiluk noge arat ogosikmo niniluk-ninalakhogon hagakhe 'buk. Na'it o. Nit noge isinem an niluk atluk wokhesusak, erlok dek o, iluk itithogon yogosusak apegen?
42011008	Dek o. At iti akla nen, Nagarlak meke nen kino iliogo, iluk melageidek kamotdusak mekeat, at kino isi dogolik ekarli ageidek ane obatnerogon yogokhe dogoumo, at melatluk nen, at nen kino igin meke tak-tagat wogosiginat apigi.
42011009	-
42011010	Iti hak, an wene ageikhe yokhisak. It akhuni inebe tomok nen Allah kino yogokhunem, at nen inebe dopok wogeisekherek anek iti. Nen, it aperek inebe dopok nen yi meke ti meke at oba herakhunem inebe dopok herakhegarek anek iti. Nen, it aperek inebe dopok nen thu ane puputhasinem, at nen inebe dopok thu hualisekherek anek iti. Iti nen, hit nen Allah kino yogokhe dogono o. Yogokhe dogoumo wokhisageinat o. Hano meke at oba herakhe dogono. Herakhe dogoumo, herasugunat o. Thu ane puputhekhe dogono. Puputhekhe dogoumo, at nen thu hualhisageinat o.
42011011	Hit aperek hina'buri nen, Ikan abu, isi halok, inopase lak nen ikan wogeisigidek obolukmo warlo pelal meke wogeisegethep nogo?
42011012	E a, at he, Thueken abu, isi halok, warlo aik weak meke wogeisegethep nogo a? Degat o.
42011013	Hit hinobabut weak hagakhethep mekeat he, ina'buri iti hano meke wogeisegarek hinilumo, hano meke wogeisegethep iti hakene, hinopase Allah pogot oba meke yogokhe dogolik, Hagoreke iti woknisan o, iluk, kino yogokhep halok, wokhisagein dek apegep? At nen wokhisageinat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42011014	Iniki ageikhe baga, at Yesus nen ap ageikhe mokat obabut weak meke akla ukisikhesik werekma, ane motok dek ageikhesik welageikhe meke ap iti akla nen mukhogo ula'isikhemo, ane huak isikhe. Itithogon ane huak isikhemo akhuni doalegat nen, “Eiye! Nayuk e, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
42011015	Itithogon hogorakhukha mekeat he, it aperek nen, men isukha, “At Yesus iti mokat inobabut weak meke inoe kok etaga Beelzebul etnogo obatne baga mokat at agarumi negen inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isiliogo, ” iluk isinem,
42011016	it aperek nen, at Yesus obabut paluogoluk, men yogokhukha, “Hat hebe Allah nen la'agei agama wagan halok he, nit nen hutdaguok nen, hat nen elalin meke ageikhe hagasin ta, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42011017	Itithogon ekhe lagoukhama, at Yesus nen it inakla apasukha meke ekagat hutdisalok, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap koktek inetagapogot inagarumi inapma hagasik welageikharek obake dopok, it-it inom mikirlogo hurlitdakhalok, inom weak dogogun halok he, erlok dek asugun o. Nen, ap inebe dopok ina'buri inom hurlitdakhalok inom weak dogogun halok, itithogonat weak asugunat o.
42011018	Meke re, hit nen an yoknekhe dogolik, Mokat inobabut weak meke inoe etaga Beelzebul iti hoba dukthek werekma at obatne baga mokat obabut weak meke ageikhe akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isekhe lagan, iluk yoknekhe lagap iti, at Iblis iti ekaerek agarumi inom mikirlogo hurlitdakhalok inom weak dogolepma, at agarumi hagasik welagarek meke nikithogon obatne dogolep. Erlok dek o.
42011019	Iti hak, an nen mokat inobabut weak meke inoe etaga Beelzebul iti obatne baga mokat inobabut weak meke ageikhe akhuni aperek inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isekhe lagei halok he, hit hinagarumi nen tha obatne baga mokat mukhogo ula'isiliogei apegep. Hinagarumi nen itithogon hagariogei iti baga, it nen, Wene at Yesus hasik egep iti, korlo egep o, iluk wene hinoba 'bu hak hagariogei o.
42011020	Meke re, an nen Allah obatne iti baga mokat obabut weak meke iti mukhogo ula'isikhe lagei halok he, Allah apma 'bisagein iti arat hinoba hakok asi agama o.
42011021	Ap ageikhe obatne werek meke nen asikhe arege nomologo 'bakhalok aila thuam dogogin halok he, ameke yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat hano karelek dogogin o.
42011022	Mekeat he, ap ageikhe at obatne hakene dek. At he, obatne motok weak meke ap etnogo aila ukitluk, ebe obatne degetdigik, asikhe arege oba dukthek dogogin meke etnogo tilhe dogolik, ameke yi meke ti meke emenogo waganogo motok it aperek supusogo wogeisagein o.
42011023	Nen, tha nen ebe an werekmake ageidek halok he, at iti an nipisak wim palek mekeat o. Nen, tha nen an nipisak natogorinakhe Iago dek meke halok he, at iti nenat mukhogo ula'isiliogo o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42011024	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Mokat obabut weak meke iti akhuni inakla nen dukhekherethek nen, An naila komake dogeik nen lak he, iluk, thet walogo dogosak oba oboluk herarik, o limo werlelekma i motokdekma etoma nekherek nekherek herakherek motok dek nen men ekherek, An naila alebageik welageimo etnogo napuke lalok nen ukigin o, iluk wagarek.
42011025	Wagarethek ukhekherek, o etnogo motok amumul ulabogo karelek werekma 'bikhagarethek nen
42011026	yabokane apuke dukhi lagarethek, mokat aperek at obabut hakene dek. At he, inobabut motok weak meke inebe 7 inayoko lagarethek wogosik witluk nen, ap iti akla ukegarethek welageikharek o. Itithogon ukiluk werekma, ap iti alebageik nen, obabut hano negen welageikhe mekeat he, yabokane obabut motok weagat hagatlagarek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42011027	Wene itithogon arat yogeisasikhemo nen, it akhuni doalegat emenogo meke, he ageikhe nen ane kokhogon Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Hat hagosa hebe itakhakhikhesik irlak hunethakhikhe meke etnogo akla arleken akhekhe dogoak o, ” iluk itithogon yogokhikhemo,
42011028	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “At iti anek dek o. It aperek Allah ane iti inasuk holiluk mothogon hagakhe dogogun halok he, inakla arleken motok akhekhe dogoagat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42011029	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, akhuni motok doalegat Yesus oba natogosi agoukhama, at nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yoma hinobabut weak anek hagakhe lagap o. Hit nen, Nit hutdaguok nen, hat nen elalin meke ageikhe hagasin he, iluk, yoknekhe lagap meke re, an nebe hutdanubageik iluk, an nen elalin ninat meke ageikhe hagasigin motok dek o. At Yunus nen akhuni hutduagaluk elalinat hagakhikhe iti hak anek an nen yabokane ageikhe hagakhunem hinileken neagun o.
42011030	At Yunus iti akhuni o Niniwe meke etoma wene hutduagaluk ebe welageikhe iti hak, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yoma nen nebe hutdanuagaluk welagei o.
42011031	Haganeat at he kok etagapogot ai o i aputmo wema eloma walegat etoma nen at ap kok Salomo iti akla kagalek motok dogolik hagakhe lageikhe meke asuk holigiluk wageikhe. Meke re, ap kok Salomo iti ebe erlok dek negen. Meke re, at yogotak werek yi anek he, kogat o, iluk, o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen akhuni ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem, at he kok iti melatluk nen, hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yi men yokhisagein, Hit weak, hinekarli, iluk yokhisagein o.
42011032	Nen, at Yunus iti nen it akhuni o Niniwe meke etoma Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhemo, inobabut hebelatluk, yi weak ti weak hagakhe lagoukha meke thogotdisasukha o. Meke re, at Yunus iti etaga dek negenat o. Nen, at yoma werek yi anek he, motok kogat o, iluk, o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen akhuni ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem, akhuni o Niniwe meke etoma inebe melatluk, hit akhuni o yogotak welagap meke yi men yokhisagun, Hit weak, hinekarli, iluk yokhisagunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42011033	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, “Akhuni aperek nen, isagal yibarlogo nen, aburarekma wema baga limago 'bigik, isoak abura thebelogo 'bigik, 'begarek motok dek. At he, yibarlogo akhuni uma ukekhe dogolik o lia werekma inileken ekagat hoagaluk, o isok tilik oba 'begarek.
42011034	Ninebe hasik isagal yibarlek hakene, ninileken itiat werek o. Hinileken iti hano halok he, hinebe abisakeat motok liaat dogogun o. Mekeat he, hinileken iti weak werek halok he, hinebe iti o mum hikhakthekma hakene dogogun o.
42011035	Iti halok he, hinakla o lia hakene meke werek iti mum asinogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono.
42011036	Nen, hit hinebe abisakeat, o mum hakene ageikhe dek, lia motok anek welagap halok he, isagal yibarlek dogolik hinoba yago lagarek hak, hinebe abisakeat lia dogogun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42011037	Yesus nen wene iti arat yakulisekho werekma, ap Farisi meke ageikhe nen Yesus men yogokhikhe, “An werekma hipiri nipisak na luok nen eme o, ” iluk ayoko 'bisikhe. Ayoko 'bisikhemo, lageikhesik aila ukisukhasik nen, hipiri nuogoluk hurek lagoukha.
42011038	At Yesus iki bagake horakhidegat hipiri nagaluk hurek lageikhemo nen, ap Farisi meke etnogo nen ileken halok, “Eiya! Nayuk e! ” iluk akla nen wene palhikhe.
42011039	Itithogon apasikhemo at ninoe Etagapogot Yesus nen men yogokhikhe, “Hit ap Farisi meke hinageisoak iti men, hinapiring iti men, itikmanke anek hanorogo thobalhe lagap mekeat he, aklake akhuni inameke hiniki abusak horlegethep meke iti men, yi weak ti weak hagakhethep meke iti men, hinakla motok doalegat kerlekhogon werek iti korlo o!
42011040	Eiye! Hit iti hinebe kepu hagakhe lagap. Ninoado itikmanke hagarogo 'binanhikhe meke nenat, ninakla hagarogo 'binanhikhe dek nogo? At Allah nenat hagarogo 'binanhikhe apigi.
42011041	Halok he, hit meke yi meke ti meke piring akla temerogo 'bekhe lagap meke iti, akhuni inameke dek meke supusogo wogeisegep halok he, hit hinobasik yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat thobalek dogou hak hano dogogin o.
42011042	Eiye! Hit ap Farisi meke Allah nen weagathinabigin o. Hit nen, Allah ebe inetaiken hunik welageikharek iti men, akhuni aperek inobasik mothogon hagakharek iti men, hagakhe dogosak werek korlegat, itithogon hagakhidek dogolik, dibo eka hakene men, hite hakene men, wulebeka hakene men, hiniki wenago 10 asi agunem, opakiat ageikhe Allah hasik 'bisekhe lagap iti, wene ebe abelma meke iti hano hagakhe lagap meke re, wene kok meke hagakhe dogosak meke hagakhidek here'isekhe lagap iti korlo o!
42011043	Eiye! Hit ap Farisi meke Allah nen weagathinabigin o. O akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ap koktek meke inobolukmo hit thelekmarogon hureklasi ukigik, nen, o pasar oba yi meke ti meke oko waganharekma etoma akhuni nen heagei hanorogon wathinabuagaluk ukigik, hagakhe dogosak iti anek warlok welagathep iti.
42011044	Hit hinebe re, men hakene welagap. Akhuni watlagunem agatma thalinakharethek, inetai ekerlogo hurli 'bigidek here'isegarekma, akhuni inokodek dogolik inisok nen thebelogo 'bilik lageikharek hak, hit itithogon weak werek korlegat, akhuni inokodek dogolik hinom welagathep iti nen, eiye! Allah nen weagathinabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42011045	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, ap Allah ane yakulisekhe lageikhe meke ageikhe nen, Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Hat egen iti nit ninomat ninekarli watdinanhen higi! ” iluk isikhemo,
42011046	at Yesus nen, “Hit ap Allah ane holal waganek yakulisegethep meke yi re, eiye! Allah nen weagathinabiginat o. Hit nen wene akin weak iti apigidegat, akhuni inoba 'bekhe dogolik, akin meke iti hiniki opaki hasik yomageisa'buk dogolik, inoba 'bekhe lagap yoma re!
42011047	Hinopa lak nen ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inakhe lagoukha. Nen, hit hinebe it nen itago meke dogolik, it iti inoak thalinakhukhama o halogo ’bisekhe lagap iti. Eiye! Allah nen weagathinabigin o.
42011048	Hinopa lak nen ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inakhukha etnogo, hit nen inoak thalinakhukhama o halogo ’bisekhe lagap iti, Ninopa lak hagakhukha iti morat hagakhukha, iluk u hagat hagakhe lagap iti.
42011049	Itithogon hagakhethep iti nen, at Allah akla kagalek motok etnogo nen ekhe dogolik, An nen it ap an nane yogeisegarek meke men, inayoko ’biluk la’isa agarek meke men, it akhuni aperek inoba la’isa agunem, it nen inebe ebetlake inakhik, ebetlake yi aik ti aik hagarinakhik, hagasugun o, iluk isikhe tak-tagat,
42011050	-
42011051	pogot agat walhasikhe hurli nen ebekeram Habel oe nen amep ulabogo wakhikhe nen, logat it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inarik inarik, hurli ap Zakharia Allah ai halekma, o at ako warogo hetu hunekhe lagoukhama turlem heisogon amep ulabogo wakhukha iti hurli, inamep usakhikhe iti tha’bokhogonat hit akhuni yogotak welagap meke yi hinoba ’bigin o.
42011052	Halok he, hit ap Allah ane holal waganek yakulisegethep meke yi, uma thu hualogo ukuogoluk walhegarek hak, it akhuni aperek yi wene ti wene inilu asuogoluk walhugunem, hit nen kunci tilogo hago dogolik hinekaerek hinilu asuogoluk yakulhidek dogolik, it aperek yakuluogoluk hagakhunem, hit nen, Yakulusak dek o, iluk wenageisegethep iti nen, eiye! Allah nen weagathinabigin o, ” iluk itithogon yogeisalok nen
42011053	-
42011054	o etnogo here’isalok itikman dukhi lageikhemo, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, ap Farisi meke men, inakla aga at oba ’bekhe dogolik, “At Yesus iti ane igin oba wene ’biluk ebe wasuok, ” iluk itema kogat waganhik, herlekha’bugat waganhik, hagakhe dogolik inileken waganhe lagoukha.
42012001	Wene itithogon isi korlek, akhuni motokdoalek-harluadek natogosi agoukhama, inebe motok kirlik-kerlekhogon nen, it aperek nen it aperek inisok ukut nen al debelogo 'bilik lagoukha. Itithogon hagakhe lagoukhama, at Yesus nen at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo wene men tak yogeisasikhe, “Ap Farisi meke inobabut he, eken roti hisuagaluk, akla usakharek meke iti hakene dogolik, inoado baga anek hano thalek, inetaiken pere iti nen, weagathinabinogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono.
42012002	Meke re, yi meke ti meke thebelek meke iti thelekmatdigik, himago werek meke iti inilurogon thelekmatdigik, hagasigin anek o.
42012003	Itithogon hagasigin iti nen, hit o mummo dogolik ekhe lagap meke iti, o lia baga isinem tha'bokhogonat inasuk holugun o. Nen, uma dogolik hinane hok-hok inasukmo ekhe lagap meke iti, o warleke isiken oba dageiluk inane kokhogon yogeisugunem holugunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012004	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarlak lak o! An wene yi hit hinobasik yokhisak o. Akhuni nen hinebe hinasugun iti hinayuk agup o. Hinoado itikmanke meke anek hinatluk nen, it nen yabokane ageikhe weagathinabusak erlok dek iti nen, hinayuk agup o.
42012005	Meke re, hit tha hinayukhogon dogosak nogo. An nen yokhisak. At Allah nen hinebe hinatluk, yabokane hetu aikmo erlok la'inagusak werek itiat hinayukhogon dogono, iluk yokhisekhe lagei iti.
42012006	Meke re, thue wurle iti oko meren palharek nogo. Ebe 5 meke oko uang sen motok 'bugurlagat pere meke baga waganharek apigi. Itithogon hagakharek mekeat he, at Allah nen thue iti opakiat halok ageikhe obarlikmatdigidek eberek motok welagarek o.
42012007	Nen, hit hinisi hinukuloakma tha'bokhogonat, at Allah nen iki motok wenago welagarek o. At Allah nen thue wurle doalegat iti kok hakene apekherek 'buk. Hinebeat kok motok apekherek o. Iti nen hinayuk dekhogon dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012008	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Tha nen akhuni inil oba, Yesus iti an noe o, iluk pakhogon isi halok he, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nen meneke, it malaikat Allah nen yoko la'isa agarek meke emenogo inil oba, At yi an nagot o, iluk, it inobasik nane pakhogonat yogeisagein o.
42012009	Meke re, tha nen, akhuni inil oba, Yesus iti an nokodek o, iluk la'belho halok he, an meneke, malaikat Allah nen yoko la'isa agarek meke emenogo inilhanem, At iti an nokodegat o, iluk, nane pakhogon yogeisageinat o.
42012010	An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nabok weak palho halok, weak hagasugun meke iti inebe tomok Allah nen thagalogo degetdisagein mekeat he, Allah Agoreke iti inakla meanetdiluk etaga weagatdugun meke iti Allah nen thagalogo degetdisagein motok dek o.
42012011	Hit hinitema waganuagaluk akhuni nen it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma etoma men, it ap pemerintah meke inelokhoma etoma men, it ap inetagapogot inelokhoma men, wokhisik 'binagei lugun halok he, hinakla nen, Nit ninoado tilogo wene oko ki meke ugun, iluk hinelabut hikhup o.
42012012	Itinem he, hit nen wene oko uagaluk Allah Agoreke nen, Yigithogon ini o, iluk, hinakla kagaligin meke werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012013	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisugunem, it akhuni doalegat natogorlek welagoukha meke emenogo opakiat ageikhe nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. An noe nen nit ninopase watlaga dogolik, at iki 'biluk nit nipisak ninobasik 'biluk laga mekeat, nagarlak arligat horlekhesik werek iti, ageikhe mikirlogo woknisuak nen he, yogotno o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42012014	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hinebe hulogo 'binageiluk hinameke dopok suputhisausak iti, an meldanhemo apegen a? ” iluk itithogon yogokhikhesik
42012015	akhuni doalegat emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni inameke doalegat welagarek iti baga iniluk welageikharek dek o. Yi meke ti meke an meke anek dogolep, iluk inakla apekhe dogunogo iluk hinobabut hebelogo dogono o, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhesik
42012016	wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Ap kok meke ageikhe nen wen agat mirlimo hanoma ai yakhikhemo nen, ebe eken doalegat ikhikhemo,
42012017	at ap etnogo akla nen, Ai yakhi meke ebe eken doalegat ikhe iti, ebe palogo 'biginmo oboluk dekma, nikithogon hagasigin, iluk akla ebekhe lageikhe.
42012018	Akla ebekhe lageikhesik nen, Yigithogon hagasigin, iluk, men akla apasikhe, O halekma alep 'bekhe lageima yi misalogo nen, yabokane kok meke ageikhe haldiluk nen, an nameke men, yi meke ti meke ai yakhi meke eken palogo men, o etoma motok 'bekhe dogogin.
42012019	Itithogon 'bakhalok werek korlek, nekaerek nen nasuk warekhe dogolik, Yogo. Mo dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek yi tahun ti tahun hasik nameke doalegat erlogat 'bakhigirikmo hano. Yogotak thet walogo dogolik, hipiri nikik, oken apusu nikik, neke dogolik nen, nakla arleken akhekhe dogogin o, iluk, nekaerek nasuk warekhe dogogin, iluk apekhe lageikhemo,
42012020	at Allah nen, Ap yi, hetaiken motok dek yi re! Yogotak hibako yi arat hagurlagun kigikhogon ulahsasigin o. Ula'isa agunem, hameke motok doalegat natogorlogo 'bakhegen etoma tha ite asigin apegen, iluk itithogon yogokhikhe.
42012021	Iti hak he, it akhuni Allah il oba ebeat meke waganhidek dogolik, it inekaerek meke anek natogorlogo 'bakhiliogei iti, iti ipisak tak-tak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012022	Itithogon yogeisalok, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An nen itithogon yokhisigi iti nen, hit hinakla nen, Niniluk dogouogoluk he, ninapiri ki meke nugun. Ninasu ki meke ikhe dogogun, iluk, hinelabut hisikhogon wene munini uan 'bero ebekhe dogunogo iluk yokhisigi o.
42012023	Nekarek meke iti ’bugurlagat mekeat he, kok he, hinebe hiniluk dogosak itiat o. Nen, su ikhegarek meke iti ’bugurlagat mekeat he, kok he, hinebe itiat o.
42012024	At thue kin obabut hagakherek meke hutdini o. At nen yi meke ti meke ai yakhik, eken palhik, hagakherek motok dek. Nen, yabokane nausak meke eken palogo o halekma ’bakhekherekma motok dek mekeat he, at Allah nen apiri wogokherek. Meke re, at Allah thue iti alon halinakherek nogo? Dek o. Hit hinebeat alon halhinakhe dogolik hinapiri wokhisagein dek nogo? Wokhisageinat o.
42012025	Nen, hit aperek nen, An watlasusak arat itinem, 'bogokhogon watlageidek, herlekha'bugat ageikhe inom niluk dogole e, iluk wene munini uan 'bero ebesigin iti baga hiluk ageikhe inom dogogin nogo? Erlok dek o.
42012026	Halok he, hit nen yi meke ti meke wene herlekha'bugat meke hagasusak erlok dek nen dogoligat, kok meke iti hinelabut hisikhogon wene munini uan 'bero ebekhe lagap iti nenaluk.
42012027	O eken mirliken morlaken okake ikherek iti hutdini. Eken iti aban isigiluk, yabu dikhak yugulogo waganhik, yo negen dalogo su ikhik, hagakherek motok dek mekeat he, ap kok Salomo etnogo obake waganekma hogorakhe lagoukha iti elokhoken erlok dek o. Eken iti anek he, eken motok hano iti 'bikhani o!
42012028	Halok he, oka herleka o limo welagarek meke iti, yogotak hak, hano welagarethek nen, hubuluke hakene, hetumo hundisegarek mekeat, Allah nen inasu ikhasu hak eken motok hano hagarogo 'bisekherek iti hak, hit meneke hinasu i'binagagin dek nogo? Hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogou'buk yi re!
42012029	Hinakla nen he, Ninapiri men, ninagei men, ki meke nugun iluk, iti mekeat kogotdiluk hinelabut hisik dogogup o.
42012030	Itithogon hagakharek iti tha'bokhogonat, it akhuni itikmanke meke nen iti meke kogotdiluk herarik nekharek mekeat, hit yi anek he, yi meke ti meke dek nen hinerlageik negen welagathep iti, hinopase Allah iluat welagarek o.
42012031	At Allah apma ukiluk dogogun iti meke kogotdugun halok, hit yi meke ti meke iti oba dukhogon wokhisageinat o. ”
42012032	“Halok he, hit Allah a'buri domba hakene opakimo hulogo ukiluk welageikharek meke hinebe herlekha'bugat meke yi, nagarlak lak nerugi o! Allah nen hit at apma 'binageigiluk akla apekhesik werek iti, hinayuk agup o.
42012033	Hit hinameke iti oko palogo uang waganigin meke emenogo it akhuni inameke dek meke iti supurisani o. Supurisalok nen, uang ai motok weak agarek dek meke waganogo 'biluk, ukharlogo 'bekhe dogou hak, hinameke hano motok dek asigin dek meke, it ap inil agasabu weak meke nen iniki abusak himasi ukigik, warlo nen palhik, hagakherek motok dekma pogot oba etoma ukharlogo 'binaguagaluk la'akhekhe dogono o.
42012034	Hinameke hinetaiken hunik meke etoma natogorlek werekma, hinetaiken etomaat dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012035	-
42012036	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane yogeisekhe dogolik, “Ap kok meke humi iginakhunem lalok isago nalok wagunem, agarumi atuaneke meke therogo inobabut hebelogo werekma, at apuke witluk thu puputhasinem ibat hualhegarek hak, hit meneke, hinasu hanorogon ikhogo nen hinageisagal yibarlogo 'biluk dogono o.
42012037	At kok etnogo atuaneke meke emenogo inoe therogo werekma ebe waga dogoumo nen, inakla arleken motok akhagun o. Itithogon therogo werekma witluk nen, at inoe etnogo asu it inasu hakene ikhogo, at agarumi emenogo isago etnogo noagaluk inebe opakimo dapukhogon huretdisalok nen, at nen melageisagein, iluk yokhisigi.
42012038	Itithogon hagasigin iti re, at ebe o hibako eketurlem wisigin a? O wi asigiluk hagakhe korlek wisigin a. It therogo werekma inoba wagunem, inakla arleken kogat akhagun o.
42012039	Wene yi hinakla eberek dogono. Ap ai iteerek meke ageikhe akla apekhe dogolik, O yogotak hibako jam. iti baga an naila yoma ap ageikhe iki abusak waganigiluk ukisigin, iluk ilu dogolik ai thuamdogolepma re, o pin talogo iki abusak wagani ukilep dek o.
42012040	Iti hak, hit hinakla nen, At itinem wisigin, iluk apigidek akhirak werek korlek, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, arat wisigin iti, hit hinebe karelogo dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012041	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhemo at Petrus nen men yogokhikhe, “Noe! Wene oba lisogonat egen iti re, nit ninobasik anek egen a? At he, akhuni tha'bokhogonat ninom hasik egen a, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42012042	at ninoe Etagapogot Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Ap kok meke ageikhe atuaneke therisik dogolik, inapiri nausak meke wogeisausak tak-tagat wogeisekhe dogoagaluk, at atuaneke meke ageikhe ayoko 'bisinem, at akla kagalek dogolik obabut oe ane igin meke tak-tagat hagakherek iti tha apegep. At iti oe iti nen, meldiluk lagarek o.
42012043	Meldiluk lagunem, atuaneke etnogo itithogon mothogon hagakhunem, at oe etnogo apuke ileken 'bikha aga halok, atuaneke etnogo akla arleken motok akhagein o.
42012044	Itithogon hano hagakhunem, 'bikha witluk, oe etnogo nen, An nameke yoma tha'bokhogonat hat hiki baga dogoak, iluk meldigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
42012045	Mekeat he, at atuaneke meke iti akla nen ebekhe dogolik, Noe etnogo ibat wiriogo dek iti, dogoluk nen wisigin higi, iluk, at oe atuaneke aperek ap dek, humi dek, tugi inakhik, hipiri men, anggur eken apusu men, oba la'buk nalok ilugun oba, anggur eken apusu iti nen ebe hunu-hunu palhik, hagakhe dogolik, at nen,
42012046	Noe etnogo o itinem, jam iti baga wisigin, iluk motok okodek akhiragat werekma, oe kok etnogo 'bikhatluk nen, atuaneke etnogo karok oba ebe motok warogo nen, it akhuni aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke 'bisekherekma etoma obolukmo la'igin o.
42012047	Ap atuaneke meke ageikhe akla nen, An noe nen, Itithogon hagarogo 'banilep, iluk akla apekherek meke ilu dogoligat, hagarogo 'bisigidek dogogin halok he, ap iti tugi u werek wasi isigin o.
42012048	Mekeat he, atuaneke meke ageikhe akla nen, An noe nen, Itithogon hagarogo 'banilep, iluk akla apekherek meke okodek dogolik itithogon hagarogo 'bisigidek tugi u weak wasusak morat weak hagakhe halok, tugi 'bugurlagat negen wasi isigin o. Akhuni inebe tomok doalegat wogeisagein meke iti, ekaerek waga dogolik doalegat kino igin o. Nen, yi meke ti meke kokhogon iniki baga dogoagaluk meldisagein meke iti, yabokane, Kokhogon woknitni, iluk igin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012049	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane men yogeisasikhe, “An he, o agat oba yoma hetu kola'isagaluk wagagisikmo iluk, hetu iti ibat amulok yibatlatnek, iluk apekhe lagei.
42012050	Akhuni yoma ima usa'isiliogei hak, an yi aik ti aik hagatnabugun meke re, aban werek korlek, nakla weak motok welagei.
42012051	Hit hinakla nen, At agat oba yoma wageikhe iti, akhuni agat oba meke yoma dapulhinabigiluk wageikhe, iluk apegep a? Dek o. An he, hurli palogo 'bisagaluk wagagi, iluk yokhisekhe lagei o.
42012052	O yogotak hurli nen, ap ageikhe a'buri inom inebe 5 inai opakimo meke dogolik, it-it inom agorogo atluk, inebe henagan nen, inebe pere inabok palhik, nen, inebe pere nen, dagakhogon inebe henagan eranogo inabok palhik, hagasugun o.
42012053	Inom itithogon agorek dogolik, opase nen a'but ipisak weak ageik, a'but nen opase ipisak weak ageik, agosa nen eak ipisak weak ageik, eak nen agosa ipisak weak ageik, akhoan nen, agalho ipisak weak ageik, agalho nen akhoan ipisak weak ageik, itithogon inom weak arik lugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012054	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, akhuni inebe doalegat emenogo wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “O mo korok i lagarekma eloma nen oisa ageikhe dagei ago halok, Ihi! Miso wisigin, iluk egethep hak, miso arat wagarek.
42012055	Nen, o hisakne i aputmo mot-mot eloma nen wago halok, Ihi! O hibi dageigin, iluk egethep hak, arat hibi agarek o.
42012056	Hit hinoado baga anek hano thalek hinetaiken pere yi re! Pogot agat elokhoken hutdiluk nen, Itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk, hinetaiken ekerlekhogon dogolik, obabut ekagat palhethep mekeat he, o yogotak welago ya baga yigithogon hagatlasigin, iluk hutdigidek welagap iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42012057	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe men isikhe, “Wene hinekaerek nen ilokon warogo moretdekhe lagap dek nenaluk.
42012058	Ap ageikhe hipisak agorek meke nen wene erlo pilinekharek meke inoba wokharik lalok, it ap iti nen hebe polisi wogeisaumo, it nen he, iniki herle warogo 'bisegarekma etoma kola'agei launogo nen, aban holagarlemke laga dogolik, etaat hipisak wene thagalogo degetdino.
42012059	Nen, thagalogo degetdigidek halok he, hiki herle warogo kola'agoumo oko 'bogokhogon motogat wogokhidek halok he, etoma nen herle hisalogo ula'agousak motok degat o, iluk yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42013001	Itinem, it akhuni aperek nen Yesus yogokhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Akhuni Galilea meke Allah ako warogo hetu hunhunem eranogoat, ap kok Pilatus nen it inamep inom, Allah ako warekha meke amep inom, opakimo ulabogo inakhe o, ” iluk yogosi agoukha.
42013002	Itithogon yogosi agoukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla nen, It ap o Galilea meke ebetlake tha’bokhogonat, weak herlekha'bugat negen hagakhe korlek, it itithogon inakhe iti anek weak kokhogon hagakhe lageikhama, inobabut nen inakhe, iluk apekhe lagap a?
42013003	Dek o. An nen hit yokhisak. Hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti thogotdisalok hinobabut hebelageidek halok he, it watlageikha hagat, hit itithogonat watlatluk nuk asugun o.
42013004	Nen, hit hinakla nen, O Yerusalem i yekelekma Siloam etoma o helekit meke uanat perlarik dageisukhasikmo, misalogo usa'aga dogolik, inebe 18 oba al debelogo thebelinakhikhe etnogo re, it akhuni ebetlake tha’bokhogonat o Yerusalem welageikharek meke iti, weak herlekha'bugat negen hagakhe korlek, it al debelogo thebelinakhikhe iti anek, weak kogat hagakhe lagoukhama inobabut nen thebelinakhikhe apegep a?
42013005	Dek o. An nen hit yokhisak. Hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti, thogotdisalok hinobabut hebelageidek halok he, it watlageikha hagat, hit itithogonat watlatluk nuk asugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42013006	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe ayabumo o ara ai yago welageikhe. Ai yago werekma, Eken ikhemo a? Dek a, iluk ileken 'bikha lageikhe meke re, ebe ikhidekma.
42013007	Ikhidekma 'bikha lageikhesik nen, atuaneke ayabu therogo welageikhe meke ageikhe men yogokhikhe, O ara yi eken ageikhe ikhemo a? Dek a, iluk 3 tahun oba waga lagei meke re, eken motok ikhidek. Halok he, agat alomarogon yago dogosak iti, mukhogo la'isan o, iluk yogokhikhemo,
42013008	at atuaneke meke etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, Noe! An nen yorla yebelhik, mogot palhik, dogeik nen, tahun yi baga mukhidek thogotduok o.
42013009	Itithogon thogotdekhe dogoumo, tahun yabokane meke baga eken ikhe halok he, hano. Nen, eken ikhidek halok he, hat nen, Mukhogo la'isan o, iluk yoknetnok o, iluk yogokhikhe, ” iluk Yesus nen yogeisasikhe.
42013010	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, iniki 7 baga ageikhe Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, at Yesus o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ageikhe ukisikhesik wene yakulisugunem,
42013011	he ageikhe mokat obabut weak meke akla ukiluk dogolik, apot oak motok naguk iluk, mothogon melasusak motok erlok dek werek korlek, 18 tahun hagatlageikhe meke ageikhe etoma welageikhe.
42013012	Etoma werekma at Yesus nen, he etnogo ileken lakhalok nen, ane hakhasikhemo wageikhemo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Neru e! Hat hoba u nen arat hano asigin. Herle hakene warogo welagan etnogo, arat hisalaga o, ” iluk itithogon yogokhikhesik nen,
42013013	iki thebelhe korlek eranogoat, he etnogo apot oak mot ageikhemo, melageikhesik, Allah hogorakhikhe.
42013014	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, ap ageikhe o sembayan egarekma etoma inoe kok welageikhe meke iti nen, men isikhe, “Yesus iti niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat werek korlek, he iti u hano hagakhe iti nenaluk hagakhe, ” iluk akla aga nen akhuni doalegat emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakhe dogosak iti, iniki 6 oba iti bagaat hagakhe dogosak o. Halok he, hiniki iti bagaat u hinoba meke hagathinabuagaluk waga dogono. Meke re, Allah hasik werlegat dogolik wisusak dek o, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhemo,
42013015	at ninoe Etagapogot nen, ap etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hit hinoado baga anek hano thalek dogolik, hinetaiken pere meke yi re! Hit hinebe tha'bokhogonat niniki Allah hasik werlegat dogolik meke re, hinako sapi a, keledai a, ai halekma nen, thu hualogo herle hisalogo ula’isalok nen, i noagaluk wogosik lagathep dek nogo? Wogosik lagathebat o.
42013016	Iti hakene, he Abraham nen itago meke yi Iblis nen herle warogo hago werek korlek, 18 tahun hagatlaga meke yi, niniki Allah hasik werlegat dogolik herle hisalogo ’busak dek nogo? Hisalogo ’busagat o, ” iluk wene itithogon yogokhikhemo,
42013017	it ebetlake Yesus ina’it welagoukha meke emenogo tha’bokhogonat inekarli agoukha. Meke re, it akhuni aperek inebe doalegat emenogo tha’bokhogonat nen, at Yesus hagakhe lageikhe iti tha’bokhogonat hasik, inakla arleken motok akhekhe lagoukha.
42013018	Itithogon inakla arleken akhasukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen apma ’bisekherekma iti, nena meke hakene. An nen nena meke oba lisogo yokhisak, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
42013019	“Allah nen apma ’bisekherek iti ebe ki’bi-ki’bi ai hakene o. Ap ageikhe nen ki’bi-ki’bi ai ageikhe waganogo wen waganekma hilogo la’isikhemo re, aku dukhisikhesik nen, erlo o hakene kogat hagatlageikhemo, ikilo’bak obake thue hitluk nekharek meke nen inai hali ageikhe iti hagat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42013020	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe menyogeisasikhe, “Allah apma ’bisekherek iti ebe re, nena meke oba lisogon yokhisak.
42013021	Iti re, eken roti hisuagaluk akla usakharek meke iti hakeneat o. He ageikhe nen gandum eken tamelek tepung wul hakene etnogo meke 40 kilo walhalok ’biluk, eken roti hisuagaluk akla usakharek meke iti akla usa’iluk abel dagalogo hagakhikhemo, ebe motok hikhikhe iti hagat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42013022	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane at Yesus o Yerusalem usekhe dogolik, o ukul kokma ukigik, ’bugurlagatma ukigik, wene yakulisilik usasikhe.
42013023	Itithogon yakulisilik usasinem, ap ageikhe nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe! Allah nen tilinabigin iti inebe doalegat a? Pererlagat a, ” iluk yogokhikhemo at Yesus nen it akhuni etoma welagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe,
42013024	“It akhuni doalegat, holagape herlekha’bugat ukuogoluk walhagun mekeat he, erlok dek asigin iti nen, hit holagape herlekha’bugat iti baga ukubageik nen, hinobatnerogo hagakhe dogono, iluk yokhisekhe lagei.
42013025	Nen, o etoma ap ai iteerek meke iti melatluk, thu tetnokhogon lakhe dogoumo nen, hit itikman metek dogolik, thu puputhekhe dogolik, Noe! Thu hualnisan, iluk yogosugun meke re, at nen, Hit hinebe an nokodek o. Koma nen wagap, iluk yokhisugunem,
42013026	hit nen yogokhe dogolik, Ninai ukul dopok nekhe dogolik, hipiri ninom isago nikik, i nikik, wene yakulnisigik, hagakhe lagagin meke etnogo, iluk yogosugun mekeat,
42013027	at nen, Hit o koma nen wagap. Hinebe an nokodek o. Hit weak hagakhe lagap meke noba uki agup o. Hit ya nenat piokthegat lani o, iluk yokhisagein werek o.
42013028	Itithogon yokhisaumo, hit itikmanke dogolik, ap Abraham men, Yakub men, Ishak men, ap ebetlake Allah ane yakulisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo men, Allah apma hanoma etoma werekma, hinileken kolageisagun o. Nen, hit anek, thu larogo ula'inagoumo thikmanke etoma dogolik, hinaik kirlidik makhik, di ago de ago hagakho motok dogogun o.
42013029	Nen, it akhuni upu elomake nen, wema elomake nen, ima elomake nen, upu elomake nen, Allah apma 'bisekherekma etoma isago nuogoluk natogosisugun o.
42013030	Meke re, lakhani! It akhuni o yogotak inetaga werek meke iti, yabokane inetaga dek asigin o. Nen, it aperek yogotak inetaga dek werek meke iti yabokane inetaga werek asigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42013031	Wene itithogon aban yogeisekhe korlek, it ap Farisi meke aperek Yesus oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Ap Herodes nen hasigiluk habok paliogo iti, o yoma dogosak dek. Lo o werlekma lan o, ” iluk yogokhukhama
42013032	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yeke helo yeke obabut hakene iti, wene yi ibat yogosi lani o. An he, o yogotak men, hubuluk men, mokat obabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula'isigik, u warek meke halok, hano hagarinakhik, hagakhe dogoluk nen, aheke halok, an yabu hagasigiluk wagagi meke ilugun arat tirliphogonat hagasigin o.
42013033	Itithogon hagasigin meke re, ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke iti, werlekma inasusak dek o. Yerusalem etomaat inasusak iti nen, an yogotak men, hubuluk men, aheke men, etoma laga dogosak tak-tagat higi o.
42013034	Eiye! Hit akhuni o Yerusalem meke yi nakmu lak e! Hit nen ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke inebe inakhik, ap Allah nen inayoko 'biluk hinoba la'isa agarek meke helekit oba tamuk-hamukhogon inakhik, hagakhethep iti nakmu lak e! Thue ayam eagei a'bikha akla natogorlogo 'bisekherek iti hak, an hibiku-yogokuat hit o yoma welagathep meke tha'bokhogonat itithogonat natogorlogo 'bisagaluk nakla apegerek mekeat, hit nen, Nina'it, egethepiti nakmu lak e!
42013035	Iti nen, Allah nen hinebe here'inagumo, hinai halek iti o tho'bon wumat hagatlasigin o. Hurli yogotak nen, hit nen, an nebe hinileken niigidek dogoluk nen, hit nen yabokane, Ninopase Etagapogot Allah nen la'agei agama wagan yi, at nenat hanothabuak o,\rq (Mazmur 118:26)\rq* iluk yoknesugun iti hurli hinileken neagun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42014001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane iniki 7 baga ageikhe, Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, Yesus ap Farisi meke inougi koktek meke opakiat ageikhe aila hipiri ipisak nuogoluk lageikhesik werekma, akhuni nen, at Yesus inilekenhanorogon waganhe lagoukha.
42014002	Itithogon inileken waganho werek korlek, ap ageikhe iki isok u ya hisik ta hisik welageikhe meke Yesus elokhoma eranogo mot-mot wageikhesik welageikhe.
42014003	Werekma, at Yesus nen ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, ap Farisi meke men, emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke iti baga, at nen ekhe dogolik, Iniki 7 baga an hasik werlegat dogolik akhuni u warek meke erlok hano hagarinabusak isikhe a? Dek a, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhemo,
42014004	it emenogo nen wene oko igidek inane degat huk agoukhama, at Yesus nen ap etnogo iki hakhalok u hano hagakhikhesik nen, “Lan o, ” iluk la’isikhe.
42014005	La'isikhemo, ap etnogo laga korlek, at Yesus nen it emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Allah hasik werlegat dogolik mekeat he, hit ageikhe hina’but a? Hinako sapi a, i agat hulelekma tun usekhe halok, ibat-ibat hiniki hago lia'busak dek nogo? Lia’busagat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo nen,
42014006	it ap emenogo nen wene oko yogosusak he, erlok dek ageikhemo inane motok igidek huk agoukha.
42014007	Ap kok meke ageikhe nen akhuni inom hipiri opakimo nuogoluk inayoko ’bisikhe meke, ap koktek meke hurek lageikharekma anek hurek lagoukhasik werekma nen, at Yesus ileken ’birisalok, wene oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe,
42014008	-
42014009	“Ap ageikhe age waganhe dogolik, pesta isago nuogoluk, hat ageikhe hayoko ’bekhe halok he, hat hebe yekerek hakene mekeat he, ap ageikhe kok meke hipisagat hinayoko ’bigin iti nen, ap koktek meke hurek lageikharekma hureklasi lagun o. Itithogonat hureklasi lalok werekma, ap kok meke hipisak hinayoko ’bigin meke etnogo wago halok he, at ap hinayoko ’bigin meke etnogo nen yokhekhe dogolik, Nagot yi re. Ap yi hat hobolukmo hureklasuak nen, hat hebe, iluk yokhekhe halok he, hat hekarli atluk ap werlek meke hurek lageikharekma hureklasi launogo nen, ap koktek meke hurek lageikharekma iti piokthek hureklasi lagun o.
42014010	-
42014011	Ap tha nen ekaerek etaiken siatdakhagein halok he, Allah nen thebelogo 'bigin o. Nen, tha nen ekaerek etaiken thebetdakhagein halok he, yabokane Allah nen siatdigin iti nen, hat itithogon hayoko 'bisi halok he, ap werlek meke hurek lageikharekma hureklasi lausak o. Etoma hureklasi lalok werekma, ap hayoko 'bigin meke etnogo witluk nen, Nagarlak. Hat ap koktek meke hurek lageikharekma yoma hureklasi me o, iluk isi halok he, it akhuni tha’bokhogonat pesta isago hinom nuogoluk natogorlogo wisugun meke emenogo inilhanemat yokhugunem, it nen, Ap yi kok meke higi, iluk inileken ekagat 'bikheagun o. Halok he, ap werlek meke hurek lageikharekma etomaat hurek lasusak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42014012	Itithogon yogeisalok nen, at Yesus nen ap ai iteerek inayoko 'bisikhe meke etnogo yogokhe dogolik, “Dikene a? Hiamaganekeke a, hat nen akhuni hinom hipiri opakimo isago nuogoluk halok he, hinom hunik meke inom, hagarlak lak meke inom, hougi hageikhugi meke inom, ap koktek inikierek hinom welagathep meke etoma inom, inayoko 'bugun o. Itithogon hagakhen halok he, oko yabokane it ageikhe isakhe dogolik hat hayoko 'bumo, oko wokhesunogo.
42014013	Meke re, hat itithogon isakhe dogolik halok he, it inameke dek inerlageik meke iti inom, inuak thagalek meke inom, initibagal weak meke inom, inileken puk meke inom, it itigirlik meke inayoko 'bekhe dogono.
42014014	Itithogon inayoko 'bekhe dogoumo, it nen hat hayoko 'busak dek iti nenat, hat hakla arleken kogat akhagein o. It iti nen oko wokhesusak dekma iti, akhuni inetaiken mot meke watlatlukmo, Allah nen inilugurinabigin itinem, hat hagakhe dogogin meke oko, at Allah nenat wokhesigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42014015	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhemo, akhuni hipiri nuogoluk hurek welagoukha meke emenogo, ap ageikhe nen asuk holhikhesik, Yesus men yogokhikhe, “It akhuni Allah apma 'bisekherekma dogolik hipiri nugun meke iti, inakla arleken akhekhe dogogun o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42014016	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Ap ageikhe thini kok isasigin iluk abok paliluk nen, akhuni motok doalegat inayoko 'bisikhe.
42014017	Inayoko 'bisikhesik, ebe arat isa'iluk nen, atuaneke ageikhe yogokhe dogolik, Thini isago yi arat nausak aga o. Halok he, akhuni inayoko 'bigi meke emenogo wisuak nen, woginabi lan o, iluk la'isikhe.
42014018	La'isikhemo, yogeisilik lagunem, it akhuni emenogo tha'bokhogonat ina'it nen inane 'bitokhogon ekhe dogolik, at ageikhe nen, An wen ageikhe oko palhirikmo nen, nileken 'bikha lagaluk. Halok he, isago nugun iti, an wisigin dek o. Nagarlak e, iluk yogokhikhe.
42014019	Nen, at ageikhe nen, An sapi oarliken waganek meke 10 oba peretek dopokhigik oko palhi meke nileken 'bikha lagaluk. Halok he, isago nugun iti, an wisigin dek o. Nagarlak e, iluk yogokhikhe.
42014020	Nen, at ageikhe nen, An nage ket waganhirikmo etnogo nen, isago nugun iti, an nasusak erlok dek o. Nagarlak e, iluk yogokhikhe.
42014021	Inane itithogon anek ilik lagoukhama, at atuaneke etnogo nen oe etnogo yogosi ageikhe. Yogosi ageikhemo, at oe iteerek etnogo akla aga kogat dageiluk, men yogokhikhe, O kota yi, holak kokmake, 'bugurlagatmake laga dogolik, akhuni inerlageik meke men, inuak thagalek meke men, inileken puk meke men, initibagal weak meke men, wogosik wetno o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42014022	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at ap etnogo lalok wageikhesik nen, oe etnogo men yogokhikhe, Noe o. Yoknekhen etnogo wogosik wagei mekeat he, o ebelake motok thelek werek o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42014023	-
42014024	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, oe etnogo nen atuaneke etnogo yogokhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, Halok he, thini isakhigi meke yi, it akhuni alebageik inayoko 'bigi meke iti nasusak motok dek o, iluk yokhikhi o. Halok he, akhuni o kota yi itikmanke, holak kokmake, 'bugurlagatmake, yugunat liliogei iti an naila yoma o kerlekhogon ukisuak nen, hane obatnerogonat woginabi lalok 'bisa ukitno o, iluk yogokhikhe, ” iluk Yesus nen yogokhikhe.
42014025	Akhuni motok doalegat, at Yesus oporlik laga lagoukhama nen, at Yesus elokhe hebenokhogon it akhuni wogeisalok nen,
42014026	“Hit hinagosa hinopase lak men, hinagugi hina'buri men, hinougi hinagarumi men, hit hinekaerek hinebe iti men, tha'bokhogonat, Motok na'it o, iluk, apigidek dogolik, an nagarumi asuogoluk napma ukisusak erlok dek o.
42014027	O meldiluk inakharek meke etnogo hinago tomok wolok nen, an noporlik wisugun dek halok he, an nagarumi asuogoluk napma ukisusak erlok degat o.
42014028	Hit aperek nen o uanat helekit meke obarluk halusak hinakla apekhe lagap halok, o ebe tirliphogo halusak meke uang erlok werek a? Dek a, iluk hiniki wenakhidek, we yugunat halhethep apegep? Dek o.
42014029	-
42014030	Oko hasik iti hiniki wenakhidek halhe halok he, o herlaga la'iluk mekeat, o ebe tirliphogon halusak erlok dek aga halok, it akhuni nen inileken hekhe dogolik, Ap iti o herlaga la'ekhe mekeat he, tirliphogo halusak erlok dek agama thogotdekhe o, iluk hinobato asunogo.
42014031	Nen, iti hakene ageikhe, ap kok etagapogot ageikhe nen wim abok ula'iluk ap kok ageikhe inom yabi luogoluk nen, ebe tak yamukhogon hurek latluk nen, An nagarumi inebe 10 ribu ya re, at ap kok ili agarumi inebe 20 ribu iti inom erlok yabusak a? Erlok dek a, iluk akla ebekhidek, we, piokhogonat yabi lageikharek nogo?
42014032	Dek o. Inakla ebekhe dogolik, Yabusak erlok dek, iluk apekhe halok, it thili meke emenogo aban walegat nen waga korlek, Wim yabusak dek o, iluk, Ninom dapuluok nen, oko nena meke wokhisausak, iluk yoko la'isegarek apigi.
42014033	Iti hak, hit aperek hinameke yi meke ti meke thogotdisigidek dogolik an nagarumi asuogoluk napma ukusak erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42014034	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Mayu iti hano o. Meke re, aik dek aga halok he, nena meke baga aik weregerasusak?
42014035	Dek o. Mayu aik dek meke iti re, ai yagoma 'bigik, agat mirli asuagaluk wen isap wakhik, hagasusak motok dek nen, po la'isegarek o, iluk yokhisigi meke iti hinasuk holusak halok, hanorogon holini o, ” ilukyogeisasikhe.
42015001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane iniki ageikhe baga, it ap pemerintah hasik uang kino iluk natogokharek meke men, weak hagakharek meke emenogo men, inebe doalegat Yesus ane inasuk holuogoluk, obawagoukha.
42015002	Itithogon wagoukha meke re, it ap Farisi meke men, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, inileken 'birisalok inane kurlu-kurlu ekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Ap yi nen akhuni weak hagariogei meke woginakherethek hipiri inom opakimo nekharek iti, nayuk e! ” iluk isukhama nen,
42015003	at Yesus nen wene oba lisogonat men yogeisasikhe,
42015004	“Ap hit meke ageikhe adomba 100 oba werekma nen, opakiat ageikhe nalaga halok he, 99 eranogo o limo 'bisalok nen, opakiat nalasigin meke iti here'isigidek motok herarik-pugurik nekhe lagarethek nen arat herakhekherek etnogo dek a?
42015005	Itithogon arat heratluk akla arleken akhalok ut oba holanhogo wolok,
42015006	oe agot men, akhuni aperek inai ukul opakimo meke men, tha'bokhogonat waisalok nen, An nako nalaga meke etnogo arat herakhalok wagei iti nen, ninakla arleken akhauwok o, iluk yogeisekherek etnogo dek a?
42015007	Iti hak, akhuni inebe 99 meke iti nen, An weak ageikhe hagakhi etnogo nen, nobabut hebelasigin nogo? Dek o, iluk, inobabut hebelasusak dek nen, it pogot oba welageikharek meke iti inakla arleken akhagun dek o. Meke re, it akhuni weak hagakharek meke opakiat ageikhe nen obabut hebelhe halok, it pogot obawelageikharek meke iti inakla arleken kogat akhagun o, iluk yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42015008	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe. “He ageikhe uang sen meke ebe 10 hago werekma opakiat ageikhe nalaga halok he, here'isigidek isagal yibatdiluk, umake amumuleke motok ula’iluk karelhe dogolik, arat herakhekherek etnogo dek?
42015009	Itithogon arat herakhalok nen, humi, at aksumi men, inai sili opakimo welageikharek meke men, waisugunem natogorlogo wagunem nen, Nauang sen meke nalaga meke arat herakhigi iti nen, nit tha’bokhogonat ninakla arleken akhauwok o, iluk yogeisekherek etnogo dek?
42015010	Iti hak, akhuni weak hagakharek meke opakiat ageikhe obabut hebelhe halok he, it malaikat Allah nen yoko la’isa agarek meke emenogo inakla arleken kogat akhagun o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42015011	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe a’buri ap inebe pere welagoukha.
42015012	Meke re, ap elabo meke nen opase yogokhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, Nopase! Hat watlasumo hiki ’biluk woknesusak meke yogotak woknom o, iluk yogokhikhemo, at inopase etnogo nen, at ameke yabokane supurogo wogeisausak meke tak-takhogon tha'bokhogonat a'buri ipisak supurogo wogeisasikhe.
42015013	Itithogon supurisasikhemo, a'but elabo meke etnogo iki ageikhe inom welageidek, yi meke ti meke, at ageikhe meke motok tha'bokhogon oko waganhe lageikhesik auang horlalok nen, o walegat etoma lageikhe. Lageikhesik etoma dogolik, akla ebekhidegat, we yugunat hagarik nekhe dogolik, auang emenogo motok thirlik-pirlikhogon hagakhikhe.
42015014	Motok thirlik-pirlikhogon hagarogo 'biluk werekma, o emenogola hipiri motok no kok ageikhemo nen, ap etnogo hipiri abu weak ageikhe.
42015015	Hipiri abu weak ageikhemo nen, ap etnogo akla nen, Ap aierek meke ageikhe ayabu hagakhunem napiri melaknekhe dogoak nen iluk, oba ligin, iluk lageikhe. Lageikhemo, ap aierek etnogo nen o limo ako therogo dogoagaluk la'isikhe.
42015016	La'isikhemo etoma dogolik at akla nen, Nelabut asuak nen iluk, hipiri asin yibilik wam nekerek meke iti neke dogole e, iluk apasikhe mekeat, akhuni aperek nen wogokhe lagoukha motok dek nen
42015017	itithogon werlegat dogolik obabut hebelatluk, Eiye! An nopase etnogo aila atuaneke ayabu hagakharek meke emenogo inebe doalegat hipiri doalegat titurogon 'bigik nasi korlegat, an yi anek he, hipiri abu nen watlasigin higi!
42015018	Halok he, an yabokane yoma nen nopase oba lalok nen, men yogosigin, Nopase! At Allah pogot oba meke iti men, hat men, hinil damelogo weak motok hagakhi o.
42015019	Itithogon weak hagakhirikmo iti nen, hat nen, Yi an na'but, iluk yabokane yoknesusak motok erlok dek o. At he, hat hatuaneke mekeat 'banusak o, iluk yogosi ligin, iluk akla apasikhe.
42015020	Itithogon akla apalok, o welageikhemo etnogo here'isalok nen, opase etnogo oba wisigiluk aban uki ageidek werek korlek, at opase etnogo nen walegat ileken lakhalok etaiken aborlok iluk, pirlirli lageikhesik nen, obakha hurlukhogon ape tharluk heagei wakhikhe.
42015021	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, at a'but etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, Nopase! An he, at Allah pogot oba meke etnogo men, hat men, hinil damelogo weak hagakhi o. Itithogon hagakhirikmo nen, Yi an na'but, iluk yabokane yoknesusak motok erlok dek o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42015022	Itithogon yogokhikhe mekeat he, at opase etnogo nen atuaneke meke emenogo waisasikhesik men yogeisasikhe, Lalok su hano meke etnogo wolok ibat i'bi ageik, thekan hano meke ikimo i'bigik, sepatu isokma i'bigik, ibat hagatni o.
42015023	Itithogon hagatdiluk nen, sapi eak utholik hano meke etnogo waganogo, at hasik ninakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, arini warogo isasuok o.
42015024	An na'but yi watlaga apogo meke iluk atluk waga yi! Motok nalaga mekeat, yabokane herakhogo yi, iluk, inakla arleken motok akhasukha.
42015025	Itithogon hagakhe korlek eranogoat, at oe etnogo yabumo welageikhesik wageikhe hak, gitar wakhe dogolik etai wakhunem inane asuk holhikhe.
42015026	Holhikhesik nen, opase atuaneke meke emenogo opakiat ageikhe waikhikhemo wageikhesik men yogokhikhe, Inane uma etoma nikithogon hagariogei, iluk, hinok waganhikhemo,
42015027	at atuaneke meke etnogo nen, Dek o! Hagot etnogo wagama o. At ebe oba u dek hano motok wagama nen, hopase ako sapi eak utholik hano meke etnogo wakhesik hagariogei o, iluk itithogon isikhemo,
42015028	at ap makusa meke etnogo akla aga dageiluk nen, aila ukusak akla motok puk ageikhesik werekma, opase etnogo oba dukhi ageikhesik nen, ane erogat, Uki lu o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42015029	Yogokhikhemo a'but etnogo nen opase yogokhe dogolik, men isikhe, Hasuk holin. An he, yi tahun ti tahun hat hobasik hayabu motok kogat hagakherek o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hat nen, Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk yoknekhetek meke etnogo ageikhe na'it igidegat hagakherek meke re, sapi eak opakiat ageikhe an nagarlak lak ninom ninakla arleken akhekhe dogolik isago noagaluk woknikhidegat.
42015030	Meke re, hat ha'but ithi humi yugunat ha'isilik nekhe dogolik hat watlasumo hiki 'biluk iteerek meke asusak meke wogokhen meke etnogo motok thirlik-pirlikhogon here'isalok waga meke anek he, sapi eak utholik hano meke etnogo warogo arini isakhen yi re! iluk yogokhikhemo
42015031	at opase etnogo nen, Na'but e! Hat nipisak welagorek meke yi re, an nameke yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat hat mekeat o.
42015032	Meke re, hat hagot yi watlaga apogo meke iluk atluk waga o. Nalaga meke herakhogo o, iti nen, ninakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, hagasusak mekeat hagakhe Iago, iluk yogokhikhe, ” iluk Yesus nen yogeisasikhe.
42016001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Ap kok ageikhe atuaneke nen oe ameke yi meke ti meke hago werekma nen, it akhuni aperek nen, at oe etnogo yogokhe dogolik, Hat hatuaneke iti nen, hameke emenogo motok yugunat supuk-thapakhogon hagariogo, iluk yogokhukha.
42016002	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at kok etnogo nen atuaneke etnogo waikhikhemo wageikhemo nen, men yogokhikhe, Hat hagakhe lagan meke nasuk holhi iti, nikithogon hagakhe lagan. Yogotak hat an naila yoma dogolik, an nameke hago dogogin degatma re, hago dogolik hagakhe lagan meke holal waganek meke iti pilinogo yoknetluk nen, woknom o, iluk yogokhikhe.
