42016003	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at atuaneke etnogo akla nen he, Noe nen, An naila dogolik nameke hago dogosak dek. Ula'agagin, ekhe iti, an nikithogon hagasigin. Ula'anhe halok, an wen waganhe dogosak iti re, an niki obatne erlok dek. Nen, nape kino weak yogeisilik nekhe dogosak iti, an nekarli.
42016004	Itithogon itikmanke ula'anhe halok he, akhuni nen an it inaila etoma woknabuagaluk, an hagasusak nakla ebekhi o, iluk akla apalok,
42016005	it akhuni, at oe etnogo ameke nomat inoba palek welageikhe meke emenogo inebe tomok waisasikhemo ageikhe alebageik wageikhe meke yogokhe dogolik, An noe ameke meren nomat hat hoba palek werek nogo, iluk isikhemo,
42016006	at ap etnogo nen, Minyak goreng apusu isoak kok meke ebe 100 oba henago nomat noba palek werek o, iluk yogokhikhemo at nen men yogokhikhe, Nomat hoba palek iti hasik he, holal waganek yi waganiluk nen, yabokane holal ket meke ageikhe waganhe dogolik, 50 oba henago meke nomat noba palek werek, iluk holal ibat waganin o, iluk itithogon yogotluk nen,
42016007	ap ageikhe at oporlik wagunem yogokhe dogolik, Hat he, nomat meren hoba palek werek, iluk yogokhikhemo at ap etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, Gandum eken palek su kok meke ebe 1. 000 oba ukharlek meke nomat noba palek werek o, iluk yogokhikhemo at nen, Nomat hoba palek iti hasik, holal waganek yi waganiluk, yabokane holal ket meke ageikhe waganhe dogolik, 800 oba nomat noba palek werek, iluk holal waganin o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42016008	Itithogon hagakhikhe meke iti, at oe etnogo abok asuk holhikhesik nen, men isikhe, Eiye! Akla motok kagalek iti nayuk e, iluk atuaneke korlo hagakhe lageikhe meke etnogo hogorakhikhe. Itithogon hogorakhikhemo iti, it akhuni agat oba yoma meke inobabut, it meke hagasuogoluk inakla motok kagalek mekeat he, it Allah a'buri inakla lia hagarogo 'bisasikhe meke iti, inobabut it hakene dek iti nen, itithogon isikhe iti.
42016009	Iti halok he, an wene ageikhe yokhisak. Hinameke yi meke ti meke agat oba meke, inil damelogo korlo hagakharek meke iti dek aga halok, hinai hano motok dogosak oba wokhinabuagaluk, yogotak ya hinameke iti baga hinagarlak lak hinom ekayorakhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42016010	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik men isikhe, “Tha nen herlekha'bugat meke hago dogoagaluk wogokhunem mothogon hagakhe halok, kok meke wogosumo, hanorogonat hagakhe dogogin o. Nen, tha nenherlekha'bugat meke hago dogoagaluk wogokhunem, mothogon hagakhidek halok he, kok meke wogosumo mothogon hagasigin degat o.
42016011	Iti hak, hit hinameke yi meke ti meke agat oba meke inil damelogo hagakharek meke iti wokhisaumo hago dogolik, hanorogo welageidek halok he, ebe hano meke iti ite dogobageik iluk tha nen wokhisagein.
42016012	Hit nen ap ageikhe ameke mothogon hago welageidek halok he, hit meneke, hinekaerek hinameke meke iti ite dogobageik iluk tha nen wokhisagein apegep.
42016013	Ap opakiat meke ap koktek inebe pere meke inatuaneke dogolik inayabu hagakhe dogosak motok erlok dek o. Itithogon dogogin halok he, atuaneke iti nen, Nopase ageikhe yi hano, nakmu. Nen, ageikhe iti weak, na'it, iluk ekhe dogolik, akmu meke iti ipisak dopokhogon dogolik, ageikhe a'it meke iti, a'it motok hekhe dogosak o. Iti hakene, hit he, Allah atuaneke dogolik, uang atuaneke dogosak erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe,
42016014	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it ap Farisi meke emenogo uang motok inetaiken hunik welagoukhasikmo etnogo nen, Yesus nen wene itithogon isinem inasuk holhukhasik nen, atobato agoukha.
42016015	Itithogon at obato agoukhama, at Yesus nen it yogeisekhe dogolik, “An mot hagakhe lagei, iluk akhuni inil oba hinobabut mot meke hakene hagakhe lagap. Mekeat he, Allah nen hinetaiken motok ilu o. Yi meke ti meke it akhuni nen hano iluk kogotdegarek meke iti nen, at Allah motok a'it o.
42016016	At Yohanes ima usa'isekhe lageikhe meke etnogo aban wageidek werek korlek, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo men, it Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha wene etnogo men, wene itiat kok welageikhe. Meke re, at Yohanes wageikhe iti hurli nen, hano wene Allah nen apma 'bisekherek wene etnogo yogeisilik lagunem, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen wene waganuogoluk inobatnerogon hathani motok ukiriogei.
42016017	Itithogon ukiriogei meke re, pogot inom, agat inom, dek asigin mekeat he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke iti opakiat ilugun hemurlugat ageikhe dek asigin motok dek o.
42016018	Ap tha nen age waganek meke lologo here’isalok nen, yabokane he ninat meke ageikhe waganhe halok he, paramat hagasigin o. Nen, ap tha nen, he agun nen lologo here'isagein meke waganhe halok he, paramat waganigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42016019	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane at Yesus nen wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe kok ameke motok doalegat dogolik nen, asu oko kok hano meke anek ikhigik, yi meke ti meke hanoma akla hiakhogon dogolik, hibiku-yogoku akla motok arleken akhekhe lageikhe.
42016020	Meke re, ap ageikhe ameke dek meke etaga Lazarus. Ebenake agalumo motok doalegat welageikhe meke, ap kok ameke motok doalegat meke etnogo ai holagapema etoma 'bi aga lagoukha.
42016021	'Bi agunem etoma witik dogolik, akla nen, Ap kok meke etnogo apiri nukunem nen eken pilikhogon o sirlapon oba usasinem natogorlogo nelabut hethokhogon neke dogole e, iluk apasi werekma, yeke witluk nen, agalumo oba emenogo a'bi nen melanethigik neke lageikhe.
42016022	Itithogon nasi werekma, at Lazarus ameke dek meke etnogo watlageikhe. Watlageikhemo, it malaikat pogot oba Allah nen yoko la'i agarek meke emenogo ageikhe wagoukhasik, ebe wolok nen, ap Abraham alilu 'bi lagoukha. 'Bi lagoukhama nen he, yabokane ap kok ameke doalegat meke etnogo watlageikhe. Watlageikhemo nen, agatma thalhukha.
42016023	Nen, ebe watlatluk lageikharekma eloma lageikhesik motok weagat dogolik he, elokhoken hebenokhogon liakhasikhe meke, Lazarus Abraham alilu werekma ileken liagisasikhe.
42016024	Ileken liagisalok nen, ane kokhogon men yogokhikhe, Abraham nopase a! An hetu aik weakma hinet motok weak wakhe lagei yoma hakmu nean o. Lazarus nen iki sisik ima usa'iluk nen, i mago na'bi baga hotok uagaluk, 'bi isuak nen yogosin o, iluk yogokhikhemo
42016025	at Abraham nen, men yogokhikhe, Na'but e! Hat hiluk dogolik nen, hano meke anek nikik, waganhik, hagakhe korlek, Lazarus yi anek he, weagat welageikhe meke etnogo hakla ebesin! Nen, yogotak, at Lazarus yi yoma wagasik akla hano agasik werek korlegat, hat anek he, hinet weak warekhe lagan iti.
42016026	Nen, ageikhe, akhuni nit werekma yoma nen hat werekma ethoma hoba wageik, nen, hit ethoma nen nit ninoba wageik, hagasinogo iluk turlem ethoma kat weakma waganogo 'bisikhemo werek o, iluk isikhe.
42016027	-
42016028	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at ap kok ameke doalegat meke etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, Halok he, nopase! An naila eloma noe nagot inebe 5 baga werek iti, hinet wakharekma yoma wisunogo nen he, atLazarus ithi husupi yogeisa loagaluk yokhekhe lagei o, nopase, iluk yogokhikhemo nen,
42016029	at Abraham nen, men yogokhikhe, It iti Musa wene iti inom, ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo inane iti inom, hago weregat o. Halok he, wene itiat holhe dogosak o, iluk yogokhikhemo,
42016030	ap etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, Itithogon egen iti erlok dek o, nopase! Ap ageikhe watlatluk lageikharekma nen iluk atluk 'birisa laumo anek he, it weak hagariogei etnogo thogotdiluk inobabut hebelasusak o, nopase o, iluk yogokhikhemo,
42016031	at Abraham nen, men isikhe, It hoe hagot etoma Musa wene inom, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inane iti inom, inasuk holhidek halok he, ap ageikhe watlatluk lageikharekma nen iluk atluk yogeisa laumo, it iti inakla nen, eberogonat apalok inasuk holusak erlok degat o, iluk yogokhikhe, ” iluk Yesus nen yogeisasikhe.
42017001	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, atagarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen an kolelogo here'anuagaluk it aperek nen inakla kagalugun meke weregat o. Meke re, at tha nen inakla kagalhe werek iti at Allah nen ebe weagatdigin o.
42017002	At iti nen it inebe 'bugurlaktek meke yi opakiat ageikhe an kolelogo here'anuagaluk akla kagalumo, an kolelogo hera'anhe halok, at akla kagalhe werek iti helekit kok meke arlokopma herle kilogo nen, i laut yekelekma po la’iselepma hano o.
42017003	Halok he, hinebe irlirli waganogo, hinomarlok werekhogon dogono. Hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi ageikhe weak hagakho halok he, asuk watno. Asuk wakhe dogoumo, at obabut hebelaga halok he, weak hagakhe meke iti thagalogo degetdisano.
42017004	Ap iti nen iniki opaki hasik, iki 7 baga eran-alep weak hagathabiluk nen, hibiku-yogoku iki 7 baga nen hoba witluk, Weagathakhi meke iti thogotdiluk nobabut hebelaga o, iluk yokhisi aga halok he, thagalogo degetdisekhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42017005	Itithogon isikhemo, it agarumi inayoko 'biluk la'isasikhe meke emenogo nen, “Ninoe a! Ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdogo meke etnogo horle asuagaluk ageikhe inom ninobatnetninabin o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42017006	at ninoe Etagapogot nen, “Ki’bi-ki'bi ai motok 'bugurlagat meke iti hak, hinetaiken an noba 'bugurlaktek anek hakotdiluk nen, O kok murbei yi yoma nen henokhogon i laut kok yekelekma eloma yaklasi lan o, iluk yogosugun halok he, hinane asuk holiginat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42017007	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane wene ageikhe inom men yogeisasikhe, “Hit aperek hinatuaneke meke hinayabu waganhe dogoluk a? Hinadomba hago dogoluk a, aban uki aga korlegat, Hapiri ibat na me o, iluk yogosusak apegep? Dek o.
42017008	Yigithogon egethep apigi, An napiri tak isago 'biluk, hipiri melageisekhe dogolik su ikharek meke etnogo ikhogo nen, an tak noagaluk woknikhunem nen, an arat niki halok he, hat nausak o, iluk egethep etnogo dek?
42017009	Oe etnogo nen atuaneke etnogo, Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk yogosigin meke etnogo anek hagakhe halok he, oe nen heagei wasigin nogo? Dek o.
42017010	Hit iti hakeneat o. Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk yokhisaumo iti arat hagatdiluk nen, men ekhe dogono. Dek o. Nit nen, hatuaneke dogolik hagasusak meke anek hagakho o. Oba dukhogon hagasumo heagei watninabusak meke hagakhidek o, iluk ekhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42017011	Yabokane iniki ageikhe baga, at Yesus o Yerusalem usekhe dogolik, o Samaria usakhigik, o Galilea liakhigik, turlemke usasikhe.
42017012	Usekhe dogolik, o ukul ageikhe uki lagunem, ap inebe 10 baga henako hakene inayuk meke inebema welageikhe meke nen inileken Yesus lakhasukhasik, inebe walegat eta melasi agoukhasik dogolik, men yogokhukha,
42017013	“Yesus noe e! Hakmu nisan o, ” iluk inane kokhogon isukha.
42017014	Itithogon isukhama, at Yesus nen ileken lageisalok nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit he, ap Allah iteerek meke emenogo nen hinebemake inileken 'bikhisoak nen inugurisa lani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo holagarlem laga korlegat, henako hakene inayuk meke emenogo dek ageikhe.
42017015	Itithogon dek ageikhemo nen, ap emenogo meke ageikhe opakiat anek ileken oado baga usakhasikhe hak, henako hakene etnogo arat dek ageikhemo nen, apuke sugulogo waga dogolik, ane kokhogonat, Allah hogorarik wageikhe.
42017016	Wageikhesik, Yesus apma elokhe thogoumhogo wilasi ageikhesik nen, heagei wakhikhe. Ap iti ai o Samaria meke.
42017017	Itithogon heagei wakhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Ap inebe 10 baga emenogo inoba hano ageikha mekeat he, inebe 9 oba nen koma lageikha.
42017018	It ap inebe Yahudi meke inapuke wageidek huk aga korlegat, ap huso meke yi anek Allah hogorasigiluk apuke suguluk waga yoma re! ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
42017019	at ap wageikhe etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Eberogonat hagatnabigin, iluk hetaiken noba hakotdegen iti baga arat hano agan o. Halok he, hebe melatluk haila lano, ” iluk la'isikhe.
42017020	Itithogon la'isikhemo yabokane, it ap Farisi meke nen, men isukha, “At Allah nen, o meranem at apma 'binani isigin, ” iluk hinok waganhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “At Allah apma 'binageiluk wisigin iti re, akhuni nen ageikhe hutduagaluk elalin meke ageikhe inil oba hagakhidek werek korlegat wisigin o.
42017021	At Allah nen apma 'bisagein iti, arat hinakerlekla asi aga iti nen, it akhuni nen, Yoma werek yi 'bikhatni! igik, Etoma werek ili 'bikha lani! igik, aban igidek werek korlegat wisigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42017022	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo hibiku-yogoku yabokane ninom motok dogogun meke re, aban werek korlek, hit hinakla nen, Niniki opaki hasik ninileken helo e, iluk itithogon apagun mekeat he, hinileken niigidek dogogun oba weregat o.
42017023	It akhuni nen, At etnogo ebe yoma werek. 'Bikhatni, igik, Ebe etoma werek etnaga 'bikha lani, igik, isi halok, hinakla nen, Eberogonat apalok hinileken 'bikha lageik, inoporlik lageik, hagakhup o.
42017024	An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo wisigin he, o yabok yibathekhe dogolik pogot erloke erloke eloma motok lia arik lagarek iti hak, wisigin o.
42017025	Nen, itithogon hagatlasigin mekeat he, iti aban hagatlageidek werek korlek, akhuni yogotak werek meke yoma nen woknakhidek here'aniluk nen, yi aik ti aik hagatnabugun o.
42017026	It akhuni haganeat ap Nuh werek oba eta hagakhe lagoukha tak-tagat, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane itithogon hagakhunem wisigin o.
42017027	Nuh werek korlek, it akhuni etoma inapiri nikik, eken apusu nikik, ap nen humi woginakhik, it aperek igisigik, hagakho werekma, ap Nuh etnogo ku akla ukisikhemo, i thaluk-thaluk waga dogolik, it akhuni emenogo tha'bokhogonat i nen hotnokhogon inakhikhe.
42017028	Iti hak, ap Lot werek korlek hagakhe lagoukha iti hak hagasugun o. Eta tak-tak, it akhuni etoma inapiri nikik, eken apusu nikik, yi meke ti meke oko palhik, waganhik, inayabu horligik, inai haligik, hagakhe korlek,
42017029	ap Lot etnogo o Sodom here’isalok dukhi lageikhemo, Allah pogot oba nen miso hetu meke men, belerang hotali hakene obasi weak meke men, usa'i ageikhemo, it akhuni emenogo inebe tha'bokhogonat inakhikhe.
42017030	Iti hakene re, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane thelekmaat wisigin itinem he, itithogonat hagatlasigin o.
42017031	Eta tak-tak, an wagunem, tha nen inameke uma 'biluk nen, ebe o warleke baga dageiluk werekma, ebe usatluk ameke uma werek meke iti wagani ukusak erlok dek o. Piokhogon loak. Nen, tha nen ebe wen atom werekma yabokane apuke uma wisusak erlok degat o. Piokhogon loak.
42017032	Ap Lot age hagatlageikhe iti hinakla ebetni o.
42017033	Tha nen ekaerek ebe irlirli horlagein halok he, yabokane ebe nuk akhagein o. Meke re, tha nen ebe irlirli horligidek nuk akhagein halok he, ebe tiligin o.
42017034	Itinem he, ap inebe pere hibako ipisak henaipu noge isinem, ageikhe waganhik, ageikhe kamotdigik, hagasigin o.
42017035	-
42017036	Nen, humi inebe pere gandum eken werasugoluk thagalhunem ageikhe waganhik, ageikhe thogotdigik, hagasiginat o. [Nen, ap inebe pere wen atom werekma, ageikhe waganhik, ageikhe thogotdigik, hagasiginat o, iluk yokhisigi, ]” iluk ekhe lageikhemo,
42017037	at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Noe! Hat egen iti o koma hagasugun meke egen, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “O ageikhema warek werek halok he, thue warek nekarek meke iti etoma natogosi lagarek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42018001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo sembayan ekhe dogoluk nen inakla puk atluk here'igidek, hunik-hunigat ekhe dogoagaluk, wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe,
42018002	“O ukul ageikhe, ap kok meke wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakherek meke ageikhe Allah ayuk degat dogolik akhuni agugurogo akmurinakhidegat welageikhe.
42018003	Itithogon werekma, he thoge meke ageikhe o ukul itila welageikheat. Dogolik, at he iti hibiku-yogoku ap etnogo oba motok waga dogolik nen, men yogokhe lageikhe, Ap ageikhe an nipisak weak meke hat nen nirlirli woknabinok nen wagei o, iluk yogosi aga lageikhe.
42018004	Itithogon yogosi agunem, ap kok etnogo nen alebageik ane holhidek a'it hekhe lageikhe mekeat, yabokane akla ebekhe dogolik, An nobabut, Allah nayuk degat dogolik, akhuni agugurogo nakmurinakhidek mekeat,
42018005	at he thoge meke yi, ane noba tiologo yoknesiriogo yi, awene palikhidek thogotdisaumo re, noba wago motok dogolik nakla mep dageik-dagokhogo hagakhe dogunogo iluk, awene iti palisigin, iluk akla apasikhe o, ” iluk Yesus nen yogeisasikhe.
42018006	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, at Yesus ninoe Etagapogot nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Ap obabut korlo dogolik wene akhuni inoba 'bigik, kokhik, ekherek meke ekhe iti hutdini o.
42018007	Iti hakene, atAllah nen a'buri wenago 'bisasikhe meke nen dikene hibako inane obatnerogon ayoko 'bisi halok, inirlirli woginabigin dek nogo? Inane konhe dogoluk nen, yabokane halok inirlirli woginabigin nogo?
42018008	Dek o. Ibarat inirlirli woginabigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi. Itithogon hagarinabigin mekeat he, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane witluk nen, akhuni agat oba meke yoma aperek inetaiken noba hakotdiluk werekma hisa isigin a? Dek a, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42018009	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it akhuni aperek emenogo inakla nen, men apekhe lagoukha, “It akhuni tha'bokhogonat yoma erlok dek negen mekeat he, nit yi anek he, ninebe kok dogolik mothogon hagakhe lago, ” iluk apekhe lagoukhama re, at Yesus nen wene oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe,
42018010	“Ap inebe pere meke sembayan uogoluk, Allah ai halekma uki lagoukha. Ap ageikhe, Farisi meke. Nen, ap ageikhe, pemerintah hasik uang kino iluk natogokherek meke.
42018011	Ipisak uki lagoukhasik nen, ap Farisi meke etnogo asokne hekhogon melasi lageikhesik sembayan ekhe dogolik, men isikhe, Allah nopase o! An nobabut akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobabut hakene dek o. It akhuni yugunat iniki abusak waganharek meke men, korlo hagakharek meke men, humi param hagarinabiogei meke men, ap pemerintah hasik uang kino iluk natogokharek meke yi men, inobabut iti hakene, an itithogon motok dek nogo nen he, heagei wathakhe lagei o.
42018012	An he, minggu opakiat oba niki pere baga hipiri nikidek hean negen 'biluk welageik, nameke yi meke ti meke hago welagarek meke, tha'bokhogonat niki wenago, 10 asi agunem, ageikhe hat hobasik 'bagagik, hagakherek o. Nopase, iluk isikhe meke re,
42018013	at ap pemerintah hasik uang kino iluk natogokherek meke etnogo anek he, ebe walegat metek dogolik uroak usageik ileken pogot oba liakhigidek ayukhogon dogolik, iki nen etaiken huselekhe dogolik, men isikhe, Allah nopase o! An weak hagakherek meke yi, hakmu nean o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42018014	It sembayan itithogon isukha iti hasik, an wene ageikhe yokhisak. Ap tha nen etaiken siatdakhalok hogorakhekhe halok he, Allah nenthebeldekherek o. Nen ap tha nen etaiken thebeldakhalok, An erlok dek, akla apekhe halok he, Allah nen siatdekherek iti nen, at ap sembayan alebageik ekhe meke iti, Allah nen wene oba meke thagalogo degetdigidek thogotdisikhe. Mekeat he, at ap sembayan yabokane isikhe meke iti anek he, Allah nen wene oba meke thagalogo degetdisikhemo aila lageikhe, iluk yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42018015	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, yabokane akhuni nen ina'buri yekerugi ’bugurlaktek meke Yesus nen iki hageinabuagaluk, oba wogosik wagoukha. Itithogon wogosik wagunem, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen inileken hisalok nen wenageisasukha.
42018016	Itithogon wenageisasukha mekeat, at Yesus nen yekerugi ’bugurlaktek emenogo wisuagaluk waisasikhemo waga korlek, at ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni inobabut it yekerugi ithi inobabut iti hakene hagatlasugun halok he, Allah nen apma ’bisekherekma etoma iteerek asugun iti nen, yekerugi ’bugurlaktek ethoma an noba wetnek. Wene palhe ’buk o.
42018017	Tha nen, yekerugi ’bugurlaktek meke Allah nen apma ’bisekherek wenewaganiluk ukegarek iti hak ukigidek halok he, ukigin motok dek o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42018018	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it akhuni Yahudi meke inoe kok ageikhe nen Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Wene yakulnisekhe lagan iti, hat hano o. An naburlal-haburlal ite asik nen, an nobabut nikithogon hagakhe dogosak, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42018019	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat hano, iluk yoknekhen iti nikithogon nen yoknekhen. At ageikhe hano dek o. At Allah arligat hano o.
42018020	Wene Allah nen, Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk ninasuk wakhe dogolik, men isikhemo werek, Param hagasusak dek o. Akhuni inasusak dek o. Hiniki abusak waganusak dek o. Hinekalat inabok palusak dek o. Hinagosa hinopase inalon halinakhe dogosak o,\rq (Keluaran 20:12-16; Ulangan 5:16-20)\rq* iluk ninasuk wakhikhe etnogo hat hiluat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42018021	at ap etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Wene yoknekhen iti tha'bokhogonat, an nebe yekerek oba nenat nasuk hologo mothogon hagakherek mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42018022	at Yesus asuk holhikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Wene opakiat anek ageikhe hagasusak meke re, hagakhidek welagan o. Hat hameke etoma tha’bokhogon it ageikhe inoba oko pali lano. Paliluk oko wokhesugun meke uang iti it akhuni inameke dek inerlageik meke iti motok supurisa lan o. Itithogon arat hagakhen halok he, hat pogot oba meke kogat iteerek asigin o. Halok he, itithogon aratsupurogo wogeisalok nen, an noporlik nekhe dogonok nen wetno, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42018023	at ap etnogo asuk holhikhesik nen, ameke motok doalegat etnogo nen he, akla motok weak ageikhe.
42018024	Akla itithogon motok weak ageikhemo, at Yesus nen ileken ekagat hutdiluk nen, agarumi men yogeisasikhe, “Eiye. Nayuk e. Akhuni inameke doalegat meke Allah nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma nikithogon uku heat o.
42018025	Warn unta kok muluk meke iti disu elo horlelekma kola'umo erlok lelokhogon ukusak mekeat he, it akhuni inameke doalegat meke Allah nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma ukusak motok erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42018026	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo inasuk holhukhasik at Yesus men yogokhukha, “Halok he, Allah nen akhuni thani hak erlok tilinabusak he, ” iluk yogokhukhama
42018027	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen hagasusak motok erlok dek mekeat, at Allah hagasusak erlok o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42018028	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at Petrus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Meke re, nit hat hoporlik nekhe dogouogoluk ninameke yi meke ti meke here'isalok wagosik nekhe Iago meke yi anek, nikirlik, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42018029	-
42018030	at Yesus nen, men isikhe, “At tha nen Allah apma dogeigiluk ai halek men, age men, oe agot men, agosa opase men, a'buri men, here'isalok waga halok he, o yogotak ya dogolik obolukmo motok doalegat oba dukhogon wogosigin o. Nen, o yabokane hagatlasigin etnogo dogolik, naburlal-haburlal wogosiginat o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42018031	At Yesus wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, agarumi inebe 12 oba emenogo wogosik, inasokne ponhogo lageikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Nit yogotak o Yerusalem usa Iago. Nen, arat usa lalokma nen, it ap alep Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo yabokane hagatnabugun meke holal waganogo 'bisukha meke tak-tagat hagatnabugun o.
42018032	Nebe nasuagaluk, yoko lalok it akhuni itikmanke meke iniki baga 'banugun o. 'Banumo, inane aik dagok yoknikhik, wosi 'banhik,
42018033	la'bisoko tugi nakhik, hagatluk nebe motok nasugun o. Nasugun mekeat he, niki pere warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi nen, niluk asigin o, ” iluk,
42018034	itithogon pakhogon yogeisasikhe mekeat, limago meke ekhe thalek, at agarumi emenogo nikithogon meke hasik ekhe heat inokodek welagoukha.
42018035	At Yesus o Yeriko ukuagaluk horokhogon asi lageikhe hak, ap ageikhe ileken puk dogolik ape kino weak ekhe lageikhe meke holagarlem eranogo hurek werekma,
42018036	akhuni inane doalegat ilik lagunem asuk holhikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Inane ethoma, nikithogon halok ilik wiriogei, ” iluk hinok waganhikhe.
42018037	Hinok waganhikhemo, it akhuni nen, men yogokhukha, “Dek o. Yesus ai Nazaret meke etnogo holak yike wiriogo nen iliogei o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42018038	ap etnogo nen ane kokhogon ekhe dogolik, Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Yesus Daud nen itago meke noe a! Hakmu nean o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42018039	it akhuni alebageik lagoukha meke emenogo nen, “Hane! ” iluk wenagakhukha mekeat he, yabokane ebenageik ane kokhogon men yogokhikhe, “Daud nen itago meke noe a! Hakmu nean o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
42018040	at Yesus huk ageikhesik nen, akhuni emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Ap iti wolok witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, ebe Yesus alilu 'bi agoukhama nen, at nen hinok wokhekhe dogolik,
42018041	“An nen nikithogon hagathabuagaluk yoknekhen, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at ap etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe. “Noe o. Nileken weak yi hano hagatnabinogoluk yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42018042	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hileken puk ithi hano asin o. Hat hetaiken noba hakotdegen iti bagaat hano agan o, ”
42018043	iluk yogokhe korlek eranogoat, ileken puk meke etnogo hano ageikhesik, Yesus oporlik laga dogolik, Allah hogorarik lageikhe. Nen, it akhuni tha'bokhogonat emenogo Yesus nen hagakhikhe meke iti inileken hasukhasik nen, Allah hogorakhukhaat.
42019001	Itithogon hagatdiluk, at Yesus o Yeriko ukilageikhesik, o ukul etoma thogotdiluk piokthegat lagunem,
42019002	ap ageikhe etaga Zakeus uang pemerintah hasik kino iluk natogokhe lagoukha meke inoe kok dogolik ameke doalegat welageikhe.
42019003	Werekma, “Yesus iti ebe nikirlik he, ” iluk ileken lakhagaluk hagakhikhe meke re, akhuni inebe motok doalegatma, nen, at ebe 'berorlagatma, nikithogon lakhau heat hagatlageikhe.
42019004	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo nen, at akla nen, “Yesus holagarlem yi baga wagunem nileken lakhagein, ” iluk, it akhuni emenogo yabokanetdisalok, at ebe alebageik pirlirli lageikhesik, o baga dageisikhe.
42019005	Dageisikhesik werekma, at Yesus eranogo lageikhesik ileken liakhalok nen, etaga pakhogo men yogokhikhe, “Zakeus. Yogotak hat haila nipisak noge i luok nen, ibat usa me o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42019006	at Zakeus etnogo ibat usa'ageikhesik nen, Yesus ebe heagei warogo waganhikhesik, akla arleken akhalok, at aila ipisak lagoukha.
42019007	Yesus ipisak lagunem, it akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen inileken lageisalok, ua palogo inane kurlu-kurlu inabok palhe dogolik, men isukha, “Yesus nen, ap weak hagariogo meke etnogo aila ipisak noge i luogoluk liliogei iti nayuk o! ” iluk isukhama mekeat,
42019008	at Zakeus etnogo melageikhesik nen, at ninoe Etagapogot men yogokhikhe, “Noe! An nameke yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat tumo heisogon mikirlogo it akhuni inameke dek inerlageik meke iti wogeisagein o. Nen, an nen akhuni nekalat nen nukhetdisigi meke halok he, oko niki 4 oba nen yabokane oba dukhogon wogeisagein o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42019009	Itithogon yogokhikhemo at Yesus nen, “Hat hebe Abraham nen itago meke nogo nen, yogotak yiat hat ha'buri hinomat Allah nen tilhinakhemo o!
42019010	Tilhinakhemo meke iti, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, it akhuni nuk ariogei meke heago tilinabigiluk wagagiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42019011	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, inasuk holek werek korlegat, o Yerusalem arat horokhogon asi lagoukhasik nen, it akhuni emenogo inakla nen men apasukha, “Allah nen apma 'bisagein iti yogotak yaat 'binanhunem ninileken hugun o, ” iluk inakla apasukha iti nen, at Yesus nen wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe,
42019012	“Ap kok meke a'but ageikhe akla nen, O ap kok inetagapogot meldisegarekma etoma lagunem an kok netagapogot meldanumo napuke wisigin, iluk akla apasikhe.
42019013	Itithogon akla apasikhesik dogolik at atuaneke meke inebe 10 oba waisasikhemo wagoukhama, uang emas kok meke ebe 10 baga inebe tomok opakitek supurogo wogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, An aban wageidek werek korlek, nauang yi baga thabusogo doalek-harluadekhogon hagakhe dogono, iluk yogeisasikhesik nen, at etnogo lageikhe.
42019014	Laga korlek, it oe agot emenogo ap iti motok ina'it nen, wene palhukhasik, At ap iti ninoe kok etagapogot dogosak nina'it, iluk yogeisa lano, iluk, yoko oporlik la'isasukha.
42019015	Itithogon wene warogo la'isasukha mekeat, at etnogo kok etagapogot dogoagaluk meldisukhama aila apuke wageikhe. Wageikhesik nen, Uang an meke emenogo it nen nikithogon doalek-harluadekhogon hagakha, iluk, ilu asigiluk, atuaneke meke emenogo waisasikhe.
42019016	Waisasikhemo, at ageikhe alebageik wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, Noe. Uang emas kok meke opakiat woknikhigin etnogo baga yabokane 10 oba lapelogo thabusogo 'bagagima yi o, iluk yogokhikhemo
42019017	at oe etnogo nen, Nagot wa! Hat hobabut hano hagakhe laganma higi o. Herlekha'bugat meke hobabut hupukhogon hagakhe laganma iti nen, yogotak, o kota 10 nen yoma yabokane hat ite dogolik hagasik dogonogoluk arat meldagagi o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42019018	Itithogon yogokhikhesikmo, yabokane at ageikhe oporlik wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, Noe! An uang emas kok meke opakiat woknikhigin etnogo baga, an nen yabokane 5 oba lapelogo thabusogo 'bagagima yi o, iluk yogokhikhemo
42019019	at oe etnogo nen, Nagot wa! Halok he, o kota 5 nen yoma yabokane hat ite dogolik hagasik dogonogoluk meldagagi o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42019020	It itithogon yogeisasikhemo nen, yabokane at ageikhe wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, Noe. Uang emas kok meke opakiat woknikhigin etnogo an su dikhak hokherek meke akla yilogo hago welagarik nen, wokhesi agei yi o.
42019021	Hat hobabut motok a'bet weak dogolik, hat meke dekmaat, it aperek meke horligik, nen, hat nen ai hilogo la'igidek, it aperek nen ai hilogo la'egarek meke hiki abusak eken palhigik, hagakhethek etnogo nen, hobabut palhirik, nayuk nen hagakhi o, iluk yogokhikhe.
42019022	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at ap kok etnogo nen, Nagot. Hat hobabut weak motogat hagakhen o. Hat hane egen iti bagaat wene hoba 'biluk weagathabigin o. An nobabut a'bet weak dogolik, an nen 'bigidek meke horligik, ai an nen yakhidek mekeat, eken palhigik, hagakherekma, nobabut hat hilu halok he,
42019023	an napuke witluk nauang ebe meke men, oba lapelogo 'biliogei meke men, an horlasuagaluk, it akhuni aperek uang hago dogolik, thabusogo ageikhe inom oba lapelogo 'biliogei meke emenogo wogeisauemat he, nenaluk wogeisigidek welagan, iluk yogokhikhe.
42019024	Itithogon yogokhikhesik it akhuni alilu metek welagoukha meke men yogeisasikhe, Uang emas kok opakiat meke ap ithi herogo werek ithi waganogo, ap ageikhe 10 oba thabusogo kogorakhe meke ithi wogotni o, iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42019025	it akhuni emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, Noe! At yi auang emas kok meke 10 oba arat werek yoma, iluk yogokhukhama,
42019026	at ap kok etnogo nen, men yogeisasikhe, It akhuni aperek inikimo hago werek meke iti, inebe tomok yabokane aperek inom oba lapelogo wogeisagein o. Nen, it aperek inikimo dek meke iti, pererlagat hago werek meke itiat, inikimo nen tilogo horlagein iti nen, at ap ithiat wogeisubageik iluk yokhisigi o.
42019027	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, It ap an ninom inathili meke hakene hagatnakhasik ekhe dogolik, At iti nit ninoe kok etagapogot dogosak nina'it, iluk ega meke iti inebe wogosik witluk nen, an nil oba yaat inasubageik o, iluk yogeisasikhe, ” iluk at Yesus nen akhuni emenogo yogeisasikhe.
42019028	Wene itithogon arat yogeisasikhesik nen, akhuni emenogo aban werek korlek, at Yesus ebe alebageik o Yerusalem dageisikhe.
42019029	Dageikhe lageikhesik, tom Zaitun apma o ukul ageikhe etaga Betfage, ageikhe etaga Betania etoma mot-mot asi dageisikhesik nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe pere wene warogo alebageik la'isekhe dogolik,
42019030	men yogeisasikhe, “O ukul hinelokhoma ili uki lani o. Nen, etoma uki lugun hak, wam keledai eak aban akhuni apot oba yasukhogo wogosik lageidek meke kupi irlelek werekma hinileken hugun atnaga. Nen, arat hinileken hegep halok he, kupi hisalogo wolok wetno o.
42019031	Itithogon kupi hisalhunem, it akhuni stoma meke ageikhe nen, Keledai kupi hisalhe lagap iti nenaluk, iluk hinok waganhe halok, hit nen, men yogeisan o, Dek o. Nit ninoe Etagapogot etnogo nen keledai yi meke dek nen, wolok luogoluk kupi hisalhe Iago, iluk yogeisano, ” iluk wene warogo la'isasikhe.
42019032	Itithogon la'isasikhemo, it etnogo lagoukha hak, at nen isikhe hagat werekma hasukha.
42019033	Hasukhasik nen, keledai etnogo kupi hisalhunem, it ap inako iteerek meke nen, “Keledai iti nenaluk kupi hisalhe lagap, ” iluk yogeisasukhama,
42019034	it nen, “Dek o. Nit ninoe Etagapogot etnogo keledai yi meke dek nen, wagani ago, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
42019035	keledai etnogo wolok Yesus oba wagoukha. Wagoukhasik nen, inasu itikmanke ugu meke nokorlogo keledai etnogo apot oba taldiluk nen, Yesus ebe keledai etnogo apot oba yasutdisukha.
42019036	Itithogon yasutdisukhama, keledai apot oba yasuk lageikhesik lagunem, it emenogo inasu ugu meke nokorlogo nen, holagarlemke talik lagoukha.
42019037	Talik lagoukhasik nen, o Yerusalem horokhogon asi lagoukhasik, holak tom Zaitun oba nen usegarekma etoma usauwogoluk at agarumi oporlik nekhe lagoukha meke inebe doalegat emenogo, at Yesus hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagakhe lageikhe emenogo inileken hekhe lagoukhasikmo iti nen, inakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, inane kokhogon amitmit suphogon Allah hogorarik usasukha.
42019038	Amitmit suphogon usekhe dogolik men isukha, “Allah nen ninoe kok Etagapogot la'agei agama wagan yi, at nenat hanothabuak o!\rq (Mazmur 118:26)\rq* It pogot oba welageikharek meke etoma inetaiken hapukhogon dogoak o. Nen, Allah kok pogot abel upuke welagarek meke itiat hogorakhe dogouok o, ”iluk itithogon ilik-ilik usasukha.
42019039	Itithogon ilik usasinem, it ap Farisi meke ebetlake akhuni doalegat emenogo inakla usekhe dogolik, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Noe! Hagarumi inane dek asuagaluk inasuk wasumo re, ” iluk isukhama
42019040	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nane eberogonat yokhisak. It akhuni yi inane igidek kamotdilepma re, helekit yoma inane amitmit suphogon ilebat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42019041	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisilik horokhogonat asi usasukhasik, at ileken o kota Yerusalem etnogo lakhalok nen, uak de ageikhe.
42019042	Uak de aga dogolik, men isikhe, “Hit akhuni o Yerusalem meke iti, hinakla nen, Nit hano dapukhogon dogouok nen itithogon hagasuok, iluk yogotak yaat hinakla ebesuem ebekhidek welagap iti, eiye! Nakmu lak e! Meke re, yogotak wene iti hit hinil oba himago werek nen hutdigidek welagap.
42019043	-
42019044	Allah nen hanothinabigiluk hinoba waga mekeat, hit hutdigidek welagap iti nen, hit yabokane hinaila nen lo dukhi launogo iluk, hit hinathili meke nen leget dagakhogon halogo 'binagaluk nen, ebelak ebelak nen hobothisalok, hop-hop ukisugun o. Ukitluk nen, hinai helekit meke thapapal halek ethoma ageikhe obolukmo halek thogotdigidek misalhe dogolik hinebe motok tha'bokhogonat hina'buri hinom wuleleken tagalogo hinasugun o, ” iluk uak de ageikhe.
42019045	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik, it akhuni oko palhe lagoukha meke sikhogo-mukhogo ula'isekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe,
42019046	“Allah nen, An nai halek yi, o sembayan ekhe dogogun obaat o,\rq (Yesaya 56:7)\rq* iluk, holal waganek werek mekeat, hit nen, it ap akhuni inameke iniki abusak tilogo horlegarek meke inai negen halogo 'bisekhe lagap yi re! ” iluk wenageisasikhe.
42019047	Itithogon wenageisasikhesik nen, at Yesus nen hibiku-yogoku Allah ai halekma wene yakulisasi motok welageikhe. Itithogon yakulisugunem, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek inom, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, it Yahudi meke koktek inetaga werek meke inomat, “At Yesus ebe nikithogon wasuok, ” iluk abok palhe lagoukha.
42019048	Itithogon abok palhe lagoukha mekeat, it akhuni doalegatmake nen, at Yesus ane isinem inasuk holek motok welagoukha iti nen, at ebe nikithogon wasu heat hagatlageikhe.
42020001	Yabokane iniki ageikhe baga nen, at Yesus Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik dogolik, akhuni wene hano wene yakulisigik, inasuk wakhik, hagakhunem, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek inom, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, ap inarluetek emenogo inom, at Yesus oba wagoukha.
42020002	Wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Hat nen yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakhe lagan iti, nena meke ite agatik hagakhe lagan. Nen, ap tha nen iteerek dogoagaluk meldageikhemo welagan. Yoknisan ta, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42020003	at Yesus nen, “An meneke, hit nen yoknisubageik nen iluk, hinok opakiat wokhisagat o.
42020004	At Yohanes nen ima usa'isekhe lageikhe etnogo re, Allah pogot oba meke nen yogokhikhemo usa'isekhe lageikhe a? At he, akhuni agat oba meke nen yogokhukhama usa'isekhe lageikhe a. Yoknitni ta, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42020005	it-it ekhe dogolik, “Allah pogot oba meke nen yogokhikhemo usa'isekhe lageikhe, iluk yogosumo, at nen, Halok he, hit nen Yohanes ane eberogonat iluk hutdigidek welagagip iti nenaluk, iluk yoknisaunogo.
42020006	Nen, Akhuni nen yakulikhukha usa'isekhe lageikhe, iluk umo re, eiye! It akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen, Yohanes iti Allah aneat yoknisekhe lageikhe, iluk ipegarethekma iti nen, helekit oba ninebe motok ninasinogo, ” luk isukhasik nen,
42020007	yabokane Yesus men yogokhukha, “Wene iti erlo nit ninokodek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42020008	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Halok he, iti hak an meneke, Iti meke ite agarik hagakhe lagei iluk hit yokhisagein degat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42020009	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane akhuni emenogo wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ageikhe wen waganekma anggur ai yakhikhe. Ya'iluk nen it aperek elanma hasik it inaen negen therogo dogoagaluk 'bisalok nen, o werlekma lalok iki ageikhe inomat dogoluk nen wisigiluk lageikhe.
42020010	O etoma lageikhesik werekma, anggur eken palharek oba o arat ageikhemo, ap ayabu iteerek meke etnogo nen it ap emenogo nen eken aperek palogo wogosuagaluk, atuaneke meke ageikhe ap emenogo inoba la'i ageikhe. La'i ageikhemo, it ap wen therogo welagoukha meke emenogo inoba wageikhe meke re, ebe tugi watdiluk nen, eken palikhidek werlegat apuke la'isukha.
42020011	La'isukhama lageikhemo, yabokane atuaneke meke ageikhe la'i ageikheat. La'i ageikhemo nen wageikhe meke re, it nen ekarli warogo tugi watdiluk nen, eken palikhidek werlegat apuke la'isukhaat.
42020012	Iki pere baga la'isa ageikhe meke itithogon hagakhukha iti nen, yabokane atuaneke meke ageikhe la'i ageikheat. Meke re, at yabokane la'i ageikhe meke iti wageikhemo it nen itithogonat tugi mebulukhogon warogo nen, anggur yagoma nen po ula'isukha.
42020013	Itithogon motok hagarinakhukhama nen, at kok wen iteerek meke etnogo akla nen, Yabokane nikithogon hagasik he. An nekaerek na’but netaiken hunik meke yiat inoba la'umo re, ebe alon halogo heagei warogo waganugun apigi, iluk akla apasikhesik la'i ageikhe.
42020014	La'i ageikhemo wagunem, it ap wen therogo welagoukha meke emenogo inileken lakhasukhasik it-it ekhe dogolik, men isukha, Opase obolukmo wen iteerek asigin meke etnogo ebe waga ili. Halok he, wen yi nirat ite asuok nen, ebe wasuok o, iluk,
42020015	a'but etnogo anggur ai yagoma nen po leget akhane ula'iluk nen, ebe motok wakhukha. It itithogon hagakhukha iti nen, at kok wen iteerek etnogo nen, it ap iti nikithogon hagarinabigin apegep.
42020016	At ebe ayabu witluk nen, it inebe motogat warogo podisalok inobolukmo anggur ai yagoma etnogo therogo dogoagaluk, ap ninat meke wogeisageinat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo nen, “Eiya! Itithogon hagasusak dek o! ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42020017	at Yesus nen it emenogo ileken 'birisik dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “It ap aperek nen holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, It ap tukang o helekit meke halharek meke nen, oebe halhe dogolik, Helekit yi weak, iluk here'isukha meke iti o herlagaat hagatlagama o,\rq (Mazmur 118:22)\rq* iluk Allah ane holal waganogo 'bisukha iti nena hasik isukha apegep.
42020018	Ap tha nen helekit iti baga kat usa'aga halok ebe motok wuleleken tiologo 'bigin o. Nen, helekit iti tha oba thebeli aga halok he, ebe motok al debelogo wasigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42020019	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhemo nen, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek emenogo men, inasuk holhukhasik nen, “Wene iti nit ninobasik oba lisogon yoknisekhe higi, ” iluk hutdisukhasik itinem, at Yesus ebe hakhauwogoluk hagakhukha mekeat he, akhuni emenogo inayuk nen huk agoukha.
42020020	Huk agoukhasik yabokane, at nen ane igin oba wene 'biluk, at gubernur akhuni hagasik dogolik ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakherek iteerek meke nen wene oba buagaluk, ap aperek inobabut hano thalek Yesus inileken waganhe dogoagaluk la'isa agoukha.
42020021	La'isa agoukhamaYesus oba wagoukhasik nen, hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Noe! Hat wene igik, yakulisigik, hagakhe lagan iti, eberogonat anek ekhe dogolik, akhuni aperek helokhoma 'bisigik, aperek hoporlike 'bisigik, hagakhethek dek. Hane mothogon ekhe dogolik, Allah akla nen, Akhuni nen yigithogon tigithogon hagakhe dogoak, iluk akla apekherek meke eberogonat yakulnisekhe lagan iti, nit ninilu o.
42020022	Halok he, nit akhuni Yahudi meke hagakhorek tak-tagat, uang pemerintah hasik, kok etagapogot Kaisar wogosusak erlok a? Erlok dek a, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42020023	at Yesus nen, “It ap yi an nukhetdanuogoluk inane 'bitokhogon yoknekha, ” iluk, ekagat hutdisalok nen, men yogeisasikhe,
42020024	“Uang perak yabu iniki opaki hasik hagakhunem iniki oko wogeisegarek etnogo meke ageikhe inugutneani, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo inuguthasukhama nen, “Yi tha ebe elokhoken hagarek inom, etaga holal waganek inom, werek apegep, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Ithi Kaisar hagarek werek o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42020025	Itithogon yogokhukhama at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Halok he, Kaisar meke halok Kaisar at wogokhik, Allah meke halok he, Allah at wogokhik, hagakhe dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42020026	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, akhuni inil oba ane ekhe hasik, ileken waganogo wene oba 'busak dek ageikhemo, it nen, “Wene oko mothogonat ekhe iti nayuk e! ” iluk, inane dek huk agoukha.
42020027	Itithogon werek korlek, yabokane it ap Saduki meke nen, “Akhuni watlatluk nen, yabokane iniluk asugun motok dek, ” iluk egarek meke ebetlake Yesus oba wagoukhasik oba hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhukha,
42020028	“Noe! At Musa nen men yakulnisasikhe, Ap ageikhe age horlalok a'buri itaginakhidekma, ebe watlaga halok he, obolukmo a'but ageikhe itasuagaluk, he thoge iti ap iti agorat waganusak o,\rq (Ulangan 25:5-6)\rq* iluk yoknisasikhesik holal waganogo 'bisikhemo werek o.
42020029	Itithogon isikhe meke werekma, ap inebe 7 baga inopase opakiat nen itago welagoukha. Dogolik, inoe makusa meke iti age waganhikhesik, a'buri itaginakhidekma watlageikhe.
42020030	Watlageikhemo nen, agot oporlik meke iti nen, he thoge iti waganhikhesik watlageikheat.
42020031	Watlageikhemo, yabokane inagot inoporlik meke iti nen waganhikhe meke re, itithogonat a'buri itaginakhidek watlageikheat. Itithogonat, it ap inebe 7 baga iti nen, he opakiat itiat waganhukhasik, ina'buri itaginakhidekma watlarik anek wagoukha.
42020032	Nen, yabokane, ebe yabokane he iti ebe watlageikheat.
42020033	Halok he, it ap inebe 7 baga iti, he opakiat itiat waganik wagoukhasikmo, yabokane Allah nen akhuni warek meke inilugurinabigin itinem, he iti tha hak age asigin apegen, ” iluk hinok waganhukha.
42020034	Itithogon hinok waganhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “O yogotak ya agat oba ya dogolik, ap nen humi ikhigik, it aperek igisigik, hagariogei mekeat he,
42020035	it akhuni watlatlukmo nen, Allah nen inilugurinabigin oba nen, o yabokane dogogun oba iti, erlok dogoak, iluk apekherek meke etoma dogolik, humi waganhik, it aperek igisigik, hagakhe dogogun motok dek o.
42020036	Akhuni watlatlukmo Allah nen inilugurinabigin iti nen, inebe Allah a'buriat, it malaikat pogot oba yoko nekharek meke inom tak-tak dogolik, yabokane watlaga dogogun motok dek o.
42020037	It akhuni watlatlukmo Allah nen inilugurinakherek iti hasik, at Musa nen, o 'beroat erloma Allah ebe ileken hasikhe wene iti baga men isikhe, Abraham men, Ishak men, Yakub men, inopase Allah at,\rq (Keluaran 3:6)\rq* iluk isikhesik holal waganogo 'bisikhe iti.
42020038	At Allah ilhanem it inebe tha'bokhogonat iniluk werek iti nen, Allah ebe re, akhuni warek meke inopase 'buk. Iniluk meke inopase o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42020039	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke ebetlake nen men yogokhukha, “Noe. Hat hane oko hano yogeisegen o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42020040	it aperek nen, hinok waganu inayuk ageikhemo, hinok waganhidek huk agoukha.
42020041	Itithogon huk agoukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen it men yogeisasikhe, “Kristus Allah nen ayoko 'biluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo, ebe Daud nen itago meke o, iluk iliogei iti, nikithogon halok iliogei apegep?
42020042	-
42020043	At Daud ekaerek nen Mazmur wene baga men isikhe, Allah Etagapogot nen an noe Etagapogot yogokhe dogolik, Akhuni hat hathili meke emenogo hisok nen al debelogo 'bisanok nen, an nen aban hoba 'bisa'ageidek werek korlek, an nalilu niki ebeke hurek dogolik hebe kokdogono,\rq (Mazmur 110:1)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisikhe iti re,
42020044	at Daud nen Kristus ebe hasik, Noe Etagapogot, iluk isikhe mekeat, it akhuni nen, Kristus iti Daud nen itago meke, iluk nikithogon nenusak apegep. Itithogon usak erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42020045	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisugunem, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inasuk holek werek korlek, it at ane agarumi waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe,
42020046	“It ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inobabut hagariogei iti nen nukhetdeinaginogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o. It iti inobabut he, inasu uatek-puatek meke ikhalok pasar oko waganharekma etoma akhuni nen inane agugurogo heagei warinabuak nen iluk lageik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ap koktek hurek lageikharekma hureklasi ukigik, akhuni pesta kogat isago nukunem ap koktek hurek lageikharekma hurek lageik, hagakhe dogou anek warlok welageikharek iti.
42020047	Itithogon dogolik, humi thoge meke inai halek men, inameke men, thebelekhe dogoligat he, akhuni nen, inasuk holiluk, It hano, inakla apoagaluk sembayan uan-nagan likhalok egarek itithogon hagakhidek dogolepma, Allah nen wene alhe meke anek inoba 'biluk dogolep. Meke re, itithogon hagakharek iti nen, wene akin meke inoba 'bilukweagarinabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42021001	A Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, elokhe hebenokhogon ileken lageisasikhe meke, Allah ai nalekma ap inikierek werek meke aperek uang Allah hasik oeti akla 'begarekma kolakhunem ileken lageisekhe lageikhe.
42021002	Lageisik werekma, at he thoge ameke dek meke ageikhe wageikhesik nen, uang motok 'bugurlagat sen meke pere anek kolakhunem ileken hasikheat.
42021003	-
42021004	Itithogon kolakhunem ileken lageisasikhesik nen, akhuni men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni raauang doalegatma oba hiakhogon 'biliogei meke iti, pererlagat negen o. Meke re, at he thoge meke ameke dek meke iti herlekha'bugat apiri oko palogo nausak meke tha'bokhogon motok 'bisekhe iti anek he, motok kok negenat 'bisekhe o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42021005	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, Allah ai helekit elokhoken hano halhukha meke inom, o elokhoken hanorogon obake waganogo yi meke ti meke Allah hasik 'bisasukha meke inom, inileken 'birogo dogolik hogorakhunem, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe,
42021006	“Hit o hinileken lakhekhe lagap ethoma, yabokane helekit ageikhe thogotdigidek motok misak-dapukhogon la'isugun oba werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42021007	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen, at Yesus oba hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Noe! Wene yoknisegen iti mera nen hagatlasigin. Ebe hagatlasigiluk hagakhe korlek, ki meke hagatlagunem ninetai ekerlogo dogogun, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42021008	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni nen nukhetdinageinogo nen, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o. It akhuni inebe doalegat nen, inetaga an netaga meke thalogo nen men ilik wisugun, At wisigin isukha etnogo an nebe wagei yiat o, igik, Hagatlasigin etnogo arat hakok i aga, igik, ilik wisugun etnaga, it iti inane hinasuk holiluk inoporlik lagup o.
42021009	It aperek nen, Wim yabiogei, igik, Inebe opakiat meke nen horlim kagalogo mukhogo ula'isiliogei, igik, iluk isi halok he, hinakmaken lalok hinetaiken aborlok ugup o. Alebageik itithogon hagatlasigin mekeat he, o ilugun hurli baga hagatlasigin meke iti ibat hagatlasigin dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42021010	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok wim kagalhik, ap inetagapogot inagarumi inapma meke tomok wim kagalhik, kagaldiluk yakhe korlek,
42021011	dugul kok inayuk meke luk-lagathigik, o yi ai ti ai hipiri motok no ageik, u obabut weak meke inoba ageik, yi meke ti meke inayuk meke hagatlageik, pogot oba nen hagasusak dek meke elalageik, hagasigin o.
42021012	Meke re, iti tha’bokhogonat aban hagatlageidek werek korlek, alebageik akhuni nen hinebe ha'inageiluk, yi aik ti aik hagathinakhik, o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma wokhisik lageik, herle warogo 'bisegarekma kola'inagagik, ap inetagapogot men, ap koktek gubernur lak men, inoba wokhisik lageik, hagasugun iti, it nen, an netaga ekhe dogolik, Hit at agarumi, iluk itithogon hagathinabugun o.
42021013	Itithogon hagathinabugun iti baga, an hagakhunem linileken neekhe lagap meke yi abok pakhogon yogosoagalugat, hano iti bagaat hagatlasigin o.
42021014	-
42021015	Itinem, lit nen wene oko yogeisagun meke, an nen hinakla kagalogo yokhisaumo, it ukum hinoba 'bugun meke iti nen, Hit hinane iti dek o, iluk oko 'busak dek asigin. Iti nen aban hagathinakhidek werek korlek, hit hinakla nen, Wene itithogon meke noba 'bisi halok, nebe nirlirli norlagaluk oko ki meke yogeisagein, iluk hinelabut hikhidegat dogono.
42021016	Nen, hinagosa hinopase lak nen, hinougi hinagarumi nen, hinagarlak lak nen, hit wokhisik, o ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, 'begarekma 'binagei lageik, hinebe aperek motok hinakhik, hagasugun o.
42021017	Nen, it akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen, an netaga ilik, Hit at agarumi, iluk hinebe ina'it motok hisagun.
42021018	Meke re, hinebe nuk asugun dek u hak, hinisi hinukuloakma etoma opakiat halok ageikhe nalasigin motok dek o.
42021019	Halok he, hinetaiken hapugutdakhalok nen, hinakla pukhogonat dogogun iti baga hinoado tilhinabigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42021020	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “It ap tentara meke nen o kota Yerusalem ithi motokyukha warogo 'biluk nen, O larogo wuleleken tagalogo ninasugun etnogo arat horok asi aga higi o, iluk, hinakla apano.
42021021	-
42021022	Itinem he, yigithogon hagatlasigin, tigithogon hagatlasigin, iluk, it ap Allah ane holal waganogo 'bisukha meke emenogo nen isukha iti ipisak tak-tak asuagaluk, akhuni weak hagariogei meke ukum yogotak ya baga wogeisagein iti nen, hit o Yudea ya ta dogogun meke halok he, tom oba lo dageigik, o Yerusalem dogogun meke halok, o kota here’isalok lo dukhigik, hagatni o. Nen, o itikmanke dogogun meke halok, o kota ukugup o.
42021023	Itinem he, o yoma motok wiik-weakhogon hagarinakhik, Allah akla aga akhuni yoma inoba 'bigik, hagatlasigin iti nen, it humi ineagei inakla meke inom, ineagei ket itago inirlak aban niliogei meke inom, weak hugun iti, eiye! Nakmu lak e!
42021024	Akhuni aperek karok oba inakhik, aperek herle warogo o yi ai ti ai 'bisa lageik, hagasugun o. Nen, o kota Yerusalem ithi, akhuni itikmanke meke inisok nen al debelogo 'biluk, o thebeli ukitluk dogogun mekeat, motok thebelek dogogun dek o. At Allah nen, It akhuni itikmanke meke, o Yerusalem hurli iti hurli bagaat thebelek dogogun, iluk akla apasikhe tak-tagat dogogun o, ” iluk Yesus nen yogeisasikhe.
42021025	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hinetaiken ekerlogo, mo inom, tugi inom, husagal inom, iti ninat meke elalagunem hugun o. Nen, agat oba yoma i laut kok yekelek welagarek etnogo hoklabu obatnerogon waga dogolik, i isok ane kokhogon ekhe dogoumo nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok inayuk atluk inelabut hisugun o.
42021026	Nen, pogot oba inobatneak meke inaborlogothekhe dogoumo, akhuni nen, Yi hagatlageik, ti hagatlageik, hagasigin etnogo arat hagatlasigin higi, iluk inayuk nen inetaiken motok dek asigin o.
42021027	Itinem an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nobatnerogon oisa akla usa'agunem, inileken nealok motok hogotnabugun o.
42021028	Wene tha'bokhogonat hagatlasigin igi iti, erlo baga marelaga halok, hit hinakla nen, Tilninabigin etnogo arat horok asi aga o, iluk, hinebe melatluk hinut oak lekhogo dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42021029	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe oba lisogon men yogeisasikhe, “Yi o ti o men, o ara men, hagakherek etnogo hutdini o!
42021030	O iti eka lologo usekherethek yabokane eka dabelho halok, Yogo. O yogotak hibi asigin higi, iluk hinabusagat hinakla nen hutdegethep apigi.
42021031	Iti hak, an nen, Yigithogon hagatlasigin, tigithogon hagatlasigin, iluk yokhisigi etnogo ebe hagatlagunem hinileken halok hinakla nen, Allah nen apma 'binanigin etnogo arat hakok i aga higi, iluk hinakla apano.
42021032	Yigithogon hagatlasigin, tigithogon hagatlasigin, iluk yokhisigi iti, akhuni o yogotak werek meke inebe dek ageidek aban werek korlegat, tha'bokhogonat hagatlasigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
42021033	Pogot inom, agat inom, dek asigin meke re, an nane iti dek asigin motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42021034	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Yi meke ti meke isago werago hinelabut urogo nikik, apusu hunu-hunu asuogoluk nekarek meke nikik, yi meke ti meke agat oba meke hasik wene munini uan 'bero ebekhik, itithogon hagarik nekhe dogolik hinobabut hebelek dek akhirak werekma,
42021035	'bagei herle nen al debelogo wakherek hak, an wene igi iti opaki hasik hagakhe dogolik, akhuni agat oba meke tha'bokhogonat motogat weagarinakhe dogolik, hit hinom weagathinabinogo nen, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
42021036	Yigithogon tigithogon tha'bokhogonat hagatlasigin igi etnogo hagatlaga korlek, hinobatnerogon hinakla puk dogoluk, hinekarli degat nelokhoma metek werekma, an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo 'bithisasik nen hibiku-yogoku sembayanat ekhe dogolik, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42021037	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane, at Yesus o wi agunem Allah ai halekma, wene yakulisigik, o hi isinem tom Zaitun ukul oba dageigik, hagakhe lageikhe.
42021038	Itithogon isinem, akhuni tha'bokhogonat emenogo at ane holuogoluk, Allah ai halekma huben siakhogon natogosi aga lagoukha.
42022001	It akhuni Yahudi meke pesta etaga Paskah neke dogolik, eken roti hikherek meke akla usakharek meke akla usa'igidek meke werago nekarek oba horogat asi ageikhemo dogolik,
42022002	it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inom, it Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inayuk nen, Yesus wene nikithogon oba 'biluk wasuok he, iluk abok palhe lagoukha.
42022003	Itithogon abok palhe korlek, it Yesus agarumi inebe 12 oba emenogo meke, ageikhe etaga Yudas Iskariot etnogo akla Iblis ukisikhe.
42022004	Ukisikhemo nen, at Yudas, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi inom, Allah ai halek therogo welagoukha meke inom, inoba lageikhesik, “Yesus iti wasubageik nen, hinikimo nikithogon 'bigin he, ” iluk inom abok palhe lagoukha.
42022005	Abok palhe lagoukhasik, it ap emenogo inakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, “Oko uang hurli iti baga wokhesugun, ” iluk abok yogokhukha.
42022006	Abok yogokhukhama, at Yudas nen, “I o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen, “Akhuni inokodek werek korlek, Yesus asokneat hano iluk werekma, mera nen inikimo 'bigin he, ” iluk abok akla dogolik wene munini ebekhe lageikhe.
42022007	Yudas itithogon hagakho werekma, eken roti hisuagaluk akla usakharek meke akla usa'igidek meke werago neke dogolik, pesta Paskah hasik domba warogo nausak arat asi ageikhe.
42022008	Arat asi ageikhemo, at Yesus nen Petrus Yohanes ipisak la’isekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Nit pesta Paskah hasik domba ninom nuok nen, lalok werago tugurogo ’biluk dogono, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhemo,
42022009	it nen, “Nit nen yi meke ti meke o ki tugurogo 'biluk dogosak warlok nen egen, ” iluk isukhama
42022010	at Yesus nen, “Hit o kota etnogo uki lalok, ap ageikhe isoak agat meke hagarek meke baga i henatluk wagunem hinom abuk asugun etnaga. Abuk atluk oporligat lano. Lagunem at aila ukekhe halok
42022011	ap ai iteerek meke iti baga hinok men iluk waganino, At ninoe wene yakulnisiliogo meke etnogo nen men ekhe, An nagarumi nane waganiogei meke ninom pesta Paskah hasik domba warogo noagaluk, o kakok palek ki hak ’banhen, iluk hinok wagani lani, iluk la’inani agama wago, iluk itithogon yogokhunem,
42022012	at nen o henaipu o hurli kogat palekma meke werago nausak oba oboluk motok hagarekma yakulhisagein etnaga re, etomaat yi meke ti meke tugurogo ’biluk dogono, ” iluk nen la’isasikhe.
42022013	La’isasikhemo, it ipisak lagoukha hak, at nen isikhe hagat, itithogon werekma ’bikha lagoukhasik nen, pesta Paskah hasik domba wakhukhasik nen werago tugurogo ’bisukha.
42022014	Nausak oba arat asi ageikhemo nen, at Yesus nen agarumi la’isagaluk inayoko ’bisikhe meke ebetlake aperek inom lagoukhasik, inom nuogoluk hurek lagoukha.
42022015	Hurek lagoukhasik, at nen men yogeisasikhe, “An yi aik ti aik hasi korlek nasugun iti, aban hagatnakhidek werek korlek, domba Paskah hasik yogotak nugun yi, nagarumi ninom nelo e, iluk, nakla warlok apekhe lagarik.
42022016	Ninom yiat nalok yabokane, at Allah nen at apma 'bisalok ebe meke nugun iti aban werek korlek, yi meke ageikhe ninom nikidek dogogin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
42022017	-
42022018	yabokane isoak eken apusu henago ikimo waganhikhesik, Allah heagei warogo, agarumi wogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Anggur eken apusu yi nalok an yabokane ageikhe nikidek dogoluk nen, hurli, at Allah nen apma 'bisagein iti hurli, yabokane nigin. Halok he, yi waganogo hinekaerek nen supurogo nilik lobageik nen iluk wokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42022019	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, yabokane hipiri roti meke ikimo waganhikhesik nen, Allah heagei warogo nen ebe kusogo, agarumi supurisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Yi an nebeat o. [An nebe hit hinobasik nakhunem watlasigin iti, an noba eberek dogobageik nen, yigithogon neke dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42022020	arat nasukhama nen, isoak eken apusu henago itithogonat wogeisekhe dogolik, “Yi re, an namebat o. Allah nen wene ket meke warogo wokhinabigin, isikhe etnogo hit hinobasik namep ulabogo nasugun iti baga, ebeat asigin o, ” iluk supurogo wogeisasikhe. ] Wogeisasikhesik men yogeisasikhe,
42022021	“Nagarumi! Lakhani! An nasuagaluk yoko ligin meke ninom yoma hipiri o perlago baga opakimo neke lago.
42022022	Yoko laumo an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo at Allah nen, At wasuak, iluk akla apasikhe tak-tagat nasugun meke re, at an nasuagaluk yoko ligin meke iti anek he, nakmu e. Weak asigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42022023	it-it men isukha, “Iti tha hak nen yoko ligin meke ekhe, ” iluk nen, hinok-hinok ilik lagoukha.
42022024	Itithogon it-it hinok-hinok waganhe lagoukhasik nen, kok tha, iluk inane thagalhe dogolik, men isukha, “Hetagawerek hat a? An apigi, ” iluk, at ageikhe nen igik, at ageikhe nen igik, inane thagalhukha.
42022025	Itithogon isinem, at Yesus nen it men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni itikmanke meke iti inougi inetagapogot nen inagarumi hagasik dogolik inane obatnerogonat, Yi meke hagatno, ti meke hagatno, iluk yogeisigik, nen, it inagarumi nen, Ninoe iti hano haknisik werek, igik, egarek iti hak,
42022026	hit nen, itithogon hagasusak motok dek o. Halok he, hit meke ageikhe nen, An netagawerek dogole, akla apasi halok, at iti hinagorat asuak o. Nen, An nen hagasik dogole, iluk apasi halok he, hinatuanekeat asuak o.
42022027	Hit hinakla nen ap tha hak kok werek apegep. At ap hurek dogolik hipiri niliogo meke iti a? At he, atuaneke meke nen, at oe noagaluk wogosiriogo meke iti a. Dek o. Kok he, at hurek dogolik hipiri niliogo meke, itiat o. Itithogon meke re, an hit ninom dogolik hinatuaneke negen hagakhe lagei o.
42022028	Weak kogat hagatnakhe korlegat, hit yi anek, an here'anhidek ninom motok welago iti nen,
42022029	-
42022030	an nopase nen akhuni an napma hagasik dogoagaluk meldanhikhe iti hak, hit meneke akhuni an napma 'bisageinmo etoma hipiri nikik, i nikik, hagakhe dogolik, hinoboluk o perlago baga kogat hurek dogolik, akhuni Israel meke inukuloak etaga 12 oba emenogo ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasubageik nen, iluk, hirat meldinagagi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42022031	Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe Petrus men yogokhikhe, “Simon! Simon! Hasuk holin! Gandum abubuleke hulogo thogotdisegarek iti hak, hit tha'bokhogonat itithogon, at Iblis nen hinebe hulhinabigiluk Allah kino yogokhemo at nen erlok iluk yogokhe mekeat,
42022032	hat hetaiken noba hakotdiluk welagan meke iti obatne dek asinogo iluk, hat hobasik an Allah ayoko arat 'bigima. Hobabut hebelagan halok he, hagarlak lak yoma hat nen inetaiken ago watdisekhe dogono o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42022033	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Petrus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe o! O akhuni iniki herle warogo 'bisegarekma kola'agagik, hebe motok hakhik, hagathakho halok he, an nipisagat ninasuagaluk welagei o, ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he,
42022034	at Yesus nen, “Petrus! Yogotak ayarn ane aban igidek werek korlek, hat nen, Yesus iti nokodek o, iluk, hiki henagan oba la'beligin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42022035	At Yesus nen itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, at Petrus agarlak lak ebetlake inom dapukhogon men yogeisasikhe, “An nen, hit hinauang eret inom, hinasuke inom, hinasepatu inom, wolok lagup o, iluk la'inagagi etnogo nen, hit yi meke ti meke erlok degat welagagip a? ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, men yogokhukha, “Dek o. Erlogat welagagu o, ” iluk yogokhukhama
42022036	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Meke re, yogotak anek hinauong eret men, hinasuke men, werek halok he, horlalok laniat o. Nen, hit aperek karok wim yakharek meke etnogo dek halok he, hinasu itikmanke ikherek meke oko palogo karok oko palino.
42022037	An hagatnabugun meke hasik holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, At iti akhuni inobabut weak hagakharek meke inom thabakhogon iniki wenageinakha o,\rq (Yesaya 53:12)\rq* iluk isukha iti, an noba tak-tak hagatlasusak mekeat yogotak hagatlarik wiriogo iti nen yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42022038	it nen, men yogokhukha, “Noe. Nit meke karok wim yakharek meke etnogo pere werek yi 'bikhan? ” iluk inuguthasukhama, at Yesus nen, “Iti erlok werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42022039	Itithogon yogeisalok inom dukhisukhasik nen, o kota etnogo thogotdiluk nen, at Yesus tom Zaitun ukul oba dageikhe lageikhe etnogo hagat, dageisinem, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo oporlik dageisukha.
42022040	Arat dageisukhasik nen, men yogeisasikhe, "Weak hagasuagaluk hinakla kagalisinogo iluk, sembayanat ekhe dogoni o, ” iluk yogeisalok nen,
42022041	at ebe asokneat ’bogokhogon horogat helekit po la’usak tak-tagat lageikhesik nen, itibagal yukukhogon sembayan ekhe dogolik,
42022042	men isikhe, "Nopase o! Hat nen hano apegen halok he, an weagatnabugun meke iti tilnabino, ” iluk u hak, "Eken apusu henago noagaluk woknesugun iti, hat nen an noba nen wokhano. Meke re, an nakla apekhe lagei meke iti dek o. Hat hakla apegen meke itiat hagatnabino o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, [
42022043	it malaikat Allah nen yoko la’isekherek meke ageikhe pogot oba nen oba usa’ageikhesik nen, etaiken ago wakhikhe.
42022044	Etaiken ago wakhikhe meke re, akla motok weak dogolik yabokane sembayan ane akinhogon ekhe dogolik, dikhak mep hakene tik-tik agat oba usageikhe. ]
42022045	Sembayan iluk melageikhesik, agarumi emenogo inoba wageikhe meke, it emenogo inakla motok weak ageikhemo nogo nen, noge isi werekma hisa ageikhe.
42022046	’Birisa ageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nenaluk noge ekhe lagap. Weak hagasuagaluk hinakla kagalisinogo nen, hinebe melatluk sembayan ekhe dogoni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42022047	At Yesus nen itithogon isi korlek eranogoat, at agarumi inebe 12 emenogo meke ageikhe etaga Yudas etnogo, yoko lageikhesik nen ap doalegat wogosik wageikhesik nen, at tak Yesus ape tharluk heagei wasigiluk, oba wageikhe.
42022048	Wageikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Yudas! An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, akhuni nen hutdaniluk nasuagaluk, hat nen heagei hape tharluk warogo nebe iniki baga 'bigiluk wagan a? ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42022049	it ap Yesus inom welagoukha meke emenogo nen, it wagoukha meke emenogo inileken hisalok inakla nen, Itithogon hagasugun higi, apasukhasik, Yesus men yogokhukha, “Noe! Nit karok oba inasuok a? Dek a, ” iluk, hinok waganhe dogolik eranogoat,
42022050	Yesus agot ageikhe nen ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok atuaneke ageikhe wasigiluk yigilabethasikhe meke re, asuk ebeke anek motok karok oba tha'bokhogon la'isikhe.
42022051	Itithogon tha'bokhogon la'isikhe mekeat he, at Yesus nen, “Huk huk! Arat o, ” iluk, ap etnogo asuk iki hakhalok nen, hunetdisikhe.
42022052	Itithogon hunetdisikhesik at Yesus nen, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek inom, it Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek meke inom, it ap inarluetek inom, at ebe hakhauwogoluk wagoukha meke tha'bokhogonat men yogeisasikhe, “Ap iki abusak waganhunem hageinabi ageikharek hak, hit nen an itithogonat haknabuogoluk karok inom, payuk inom, wolok wagap yi re!
42022053	Hibiku-yogokuat Allah ai halekma an hit ninom dogolik haknakhidek welagasip mekere, yogotak yi anek, o mum ite welagarek meke etnogo obatne agama nen, hit nen haknabusak tak-tak oba arat wagap yi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42022054	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen at ebe hakhasukhasik nen, ap Allah iteerek inoe kok meke etnogo aila wolok lagunem, at Petrus etnogo yabokane inoporlik huyo'bo walegat lageikhe.
42022055	Itithogon laga lageikhesik, ap kok etnogo agokutlu akhuni hetu mokaldiluk thogei isakhekho hurek werekma, inakla hurek lageikhe.
42022056	Hurek werekma hetu amulok yago dageisinem, at horlak inatuaneke ageikhe ileken Petrus lakhasikhesik nen, ileken oba durlu dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yi meneke, at Yesus inom welageikha mekeat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
42022057	at Petrus nen la'belhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Dek o. Horlak yi! Ap iti ebe an nokodek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42022058	Itithogon yogokhikhesik oba nen, welageidegat, ap ageikhe nen Petrus ileken halok nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat yi, it mekeat apigi, ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat, at nen, “Noe. An dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42022059	Itithogon yogokhikhemo yabokane satu jam hakene welagoukhasik nen, ap ageikhe nen ane obatnerogon it akhuni emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yi ebe Galilea mekeatma, eberogonat Yesus inom nekhe lageikha mekeat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42022060	at Petrus nen, “Noe! Hat egen iti, nikithogon meke egen. An nokodek o, ” iluk isi korlek eranogoat ayam ane isikhe.
42022061	Isikhemo nen, Yesus elokhe hebenokhogon ileken Petrus lakhugunem, at Petrus akla nen, men apasikhe, “Eiye! Yesus nen an yoknekhe dogolik, O yogotak thue ayam ane aban igidek werek korlek, hat nen, Yesus nokodek o, iluk, hiki henagan oba la’belnabigin, iluk yoknekhe meke etnogo ebe arat la’belhi yi, ” iluk akla ebekhikhe.
42022062	Akla ebetdiluk itikman dukhisikhesik nen, de motok kogat etaiken hisogo de ageikhe.
42022063	At Petrus itithogon de aga korlek, it ap Yesus ebe hago welagoukha meke emenogo nen inane sagun yogokhik, tugi wakhik, hagakhukha. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik,
42022064	ileken labetdiluk nen, “Tha nen hakhe nogo. Yoknisan ta! ” iluk yogokhik,
42022065	inane doalegat sagun ekarli wakhik, ekhe lagoukha.
42022066	Itithogon yogokho werekma, o wi isikhemo nen, ap Yahudi inarluetek emenogo men, Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek meke men, ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke men, natogokhukha. Natogokhukhasik nen, wene Allah ane hasik erlo pilinekharekma etoma werekma, Yesus wolok inoba ukisukhama
42022067	it nen men yogokhukha, “Allah nen Kristus ayoko ’biluk la’isigin isikhe etnogo harat a? Hat halok he, yoknisan o, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nen yokhisugunem he, eberogonat iluk hinakla hutdugun a?
42022068	Nen, an nen hinok wokhisugunem, oko yoknisugun a? Dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
42022069	“Hurli yogotak yi nen, yabokane an nopase Allah obatneak yi meke ti meke hagasusak anek etnogo iki ebeke kogat hurek dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42022070	it tha'bokhogonat nen, men yogokhukha, “Halok he, hat Allah a'but a? ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Hit hinekaerek nen egep itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42022071	it nen, men yogokhukha, “Akhuni nen at weak hagakhunem inileken hega meke nen wene pakhogon uagaluk nenaluk therisik dogogun nogo. Wene at ekaerek nen ekhe meke arat ninasuk holho ha yoma re! ” iluk isukha.
42023001	Wene itithogon isukhasik, inebe welagoukha meke emenogo tha'bokhogonat melagoukhasik nen, Yesus Pilatus oba wolok wagoukha.
42023002	Wagoukhasik wene oba 'bekhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Ap yi nen akhuni nit meke nukhetdisigik, uang pemerintah meke hasik ap kok Kaisar etnogo wogosusak dek o, igik, Hinoe netagapogot Kristus etnogo anat o, igik, iluk nit ninil oba ekhe laga iti nen wolok wago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42023003	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Pilatus nen Yesus oba hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Ap Yahudi meke inoe etagapogot etnogo hat mekeat ega a? ” iluk yogokhikhemo at Yesus nen, “Hat egen itiat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42023004	at Pilatus nen ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inom, akhuni doalegat natogorlek welagoukha meke emenogo inom, yogeisekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “An nen, at yi itema waganhi meke, at weak ageikhe hagakhemo higi motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42023005	it emenogo yabokane inane motok obatnerogon men yogokhukha, “Dek o. Ap yi wene yakulisilik nekhe dogolik, akhuni o Yudea yi ai ti ai tha'bokhogonat inakla kagalik liliogo. Keram o Galilea etoma nen inakla kagalik kagalik, o yoma waga yi, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42023006	Itithogon yogokhukhama at Pilatus etnogo asuk holhikhesik nen, “Ap yi o Galilea meke a? ” iluk, akhuni emenogo yogeisasikhemo,
42023007	it nen, “At iti, o at kok Herodes nen hagasik welagarekma emenogo meke o, ” iluk yogokhukhama asuk holhikhesik nen, itinem he, ap kok Herodes ebe o Yerusalem etoma usalok werekma nogo nen, oba la'i ageikhe iti.
42023008	La'i ageikhemo nen, at Herodes etnogo Yesus hagakhe lageikhe meke alebat asuk holhikhesik, akla nen, “Ebe nileken hele e. Elalinat hagarinabik liliogo iti, ageikhe hagakhunem an nileken hele e, ” iluk akla apalok werekma nen, at Yesus ebe oba wolok wagoukhama, ileken halok akla arleken akhasikhe.
42023009	Akla arleken akhalok, yi wene ti wene doalegat Yesus oba hinok waganhikhe meke re, at nen oko ageikhe yogokhidegat huk ageikhe.
42023010	Oko yogokhidek huk ageikhemo nen, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inom, it ap Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke inom, emenogo horokhogo hobotha ukiluk, inane inobatnerogon wene oba 'bekhe lagoukha.
42023011	'Bekhe lagoukhama, at Herodes agarumi tentara meke inom nen, Yesus ebe inakla nen meanetdiluk, inane sagun doalegat yogokhe lagoukhasik nen, su motok hano ap koktek ikharek meke ageikhe i'biluk, apuke Pilatus oba la'isikhe.
42023012	Alebageik, at Herodes Pilatus ipisak wim palek hakene welagoukha mekeat he, itithogon la'isikhe itinem ipisak hano agoukha.
42023013	Nen, at Yesus wolok lagoukhama nen, at Pilatus nen, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inom, it ap Yahudi meke koktek inom, inagarumi tha’bokhogonat inom, “Natogositni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo wagoukhama nen,
42023014	wene men yogeisasikhe, “At yi nen akhuni nukhetdisilik liliogo yi, iluk, an noba wolok wagasip wene oba 'begepma, an nen hit hinilobaat wene erlo penakhi meke re, hit nen wene oba 'begep hak, higi dek o.
42023015	Nen, at ap kok Herodes itithogon ageikhe higidek nen, nit ninoba yoma la'i aga iti. Weak hagakhunem wene inoba 'biluk nen inakharek iti hakene, ap yi nen itithogon weak ageikhe hagakhemo higi motok dek o.
42023016	Halok he, la'bisoko tugi anek warogo herle hisaligin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. [
42023017	Itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, pesta kok etaga Paskah etnogo meke neke korlek, at Pilatus nen ap iniki herle warek meke opakiat halok ageikhe hisalogo wogeisekhe lageikhe etnogo nen, itithogon yogeisasikhe iti. ]
42023018	Itithogon yogeisasikhe meke re, it ap tha’bokhogonat emenogo nen, inaneak kokhogon walhe dogolik, “Ap Barabas itiat hisalnisalok nen, ap ithi watno o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42023019	At Barabas iti alebat ap aperek inomat nen, akhuni o kota kok etnogo meke horlim kagalogo, “Ninougi koktek pemerintah meke nina'it, ” iluk wim yakhe dogolik, aperek ageikhe inakhe lageikhemo iki herle warogo 'bisukha meke werekma itithogon yogokhukha.
42023020	Yogokhukhama, at Pilatus akla nen, “Yesus iti iki herle hisalogo thogotdigin, ” akla apekhe dogolik nogo nen, ane yabokane dagakhogon yogeisasikhe meke re,
42023021	it meneke inane oko kokhogon palek ekhe dogolik, “O baga meldiluk watno o! O baga meldiluk watno o! ” iluk yogokhukhama,
42023022	at Pilatus nen iki pere baga yogeisasikhesik nen yabokane ageikhe inom dagakhogon yogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “At yi nena meke weak hagakhemo nen. Weak hagakhunem inakharek iti hakene, an wene erlo penakhi mekeat, at yi nen weak ageikhe hagakhemo higi dek o. Halok he, tugi anek warogo iki herle hisalogo thogotdigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe meke re,
42023023	o baga meldiluk wasuagaluk inane inobatnerogon nen kino yogokhukhama it inane obatne ageikhe.
42023024	It inane obatne ageikhemo, at Pilatus nen it nen kino isukha tak-tagat wene 'bogokhogon isikhesik,
42023025	at Barabas nen akhuni horlim kagalogo wim yakhe dogolik akhuni inakhe lageikhemo iki herle warogo 'bisukha meke etnogo, “Herle hisalogo woknisausak, ” isukha etnogo wogosigik, nen, at Yesus etnogo anek, it inakla apasukha meke tak-tagat hagasuagaluk agarumi iniki baga 'bigik, hagakhikhe.
42023026	Itithogon wogeisasikhemo wolok wagoukha hak, ap etaga Simon, ai o Kirene meke ageikhe o thikmanke nen o kota ukigiluk lagunem, ebe hakhasukhasik o Yesus meldiluk wasugun meke etnogo wolok, Yesus oporlik loagaluk a'it werek korlek yogokhukha.
42023027	Yesus ebe wolok wagunem akhuni doalegat inoporlik waga dogolik, humi aperek at uak de aga dogolik, inetaiken iniki nen huselilik wagoukha.
42023028	Itithogon hagarik wagunem, at Yesus elokhehebenokhogon lageisalok nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit humi o Yerusalem meke yi, an nuak de agup o. Hit nen hineagei hinom hinekaerek hinuak de akhani o.
42023029	Yabokane weak asigin werek. Itinem, it akhuni nen ekhe dogolik, Humi abirli meke, ineagei itaginakhidek meke, inirlak ukul elege inape apusu nikidek meke, iti anek he, inakla arleken akhausak hakene o, ugun.
42023030	Itinem, akhuni nen, Ninebe al debelninabin, iluk tom koktek meke yogokhik, Ninebe thebelogo 'binanin, iluk tom 'bugurlaktek meke yogokhik, ugun o.\rq (Hosea 10:8)\rq*
42023031	Iti hak, yogotak ya o ket oba negen dogolik hagatnabiogei yi, yabokane o puk oba negen asi laga dogolik nikithogon hagasugun apegep, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42023032	Nen, at wolok waga dogolik, it ap inobabut motok weak hagakhe lagoukha meke inebe pere inom inasuogoluk wogosik wagoukhaat.
42023033	Wogosik o etaga Inukuloak Palegem oba wagoukhasik nen, at Yesus ebe o baga meldekhe dogolik, ap inebe pere inobabut weak hagakhe lagoukha meke eranogo inomat, ageikhe iki ebeke, nen ageikhe iki paike, o baga meldisalok inom inakhukhaat.
42023034	Itithogon o baga meldisasukhama dogolik, at Yesus nen Allah men yogokhikhe, “Nopase o! It yi inokodek dogolik hagatnabiogei yi, wene inoba 'bigidek thagalogo here'isan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe. Nen, it ap tentara meke emenogo nen, itithogon meldisalok. , “At Yesus asu nokorlek etnogo tha hak horlagein, ” iluk omatok thekerlogo walhegarek hak, helekit hupurlekentek meke walhasukhasik nen mikirlogo horlasukha.
42023035	It akhuni emenogo eta metek dogolik inileken 'birogo werek korlek, it ap Yahudi meke inougi koktek emenogo inagouak sikin ilik, Yesus inane sagun yogokhe dogolik, men isukha, “At yi Allah nen Kristus meldiluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo ebe arat halok he, it akhuni erlok tilinakhe laga etnogo hak, ekaerek nen itithogon tilanek he, ” iluk isukha.
42023036	-
42023037	Nen, it ap tentara meke emenogo oba horokhogon wagoukhasik, anggur eken apusu arle weak meke sisigithasukhasik nen, inane sagun men yogokhukha, “Hat akhuni Yahudi meke inoe kok hetagapogot eberogonat halok, hekaerek nen tilan he, ” iluk yogokhukha.
42023038	Nen, it nen, “AKHUNI YAHUDI MEKE INOE KOK ETAGA POGOT EBE YIAT O, ” iluk holal waganogo o Yesus meldisukha etnogo baga upu ilugun oba tetnokhogon 'bisukha.
42023039	At Yesus itithogon warogo meldekhe dogolik, ap weak hagakhe lagoukha meke inom warogo meldisasukha eranogo, at ageikhe nen Yesus ane sagun wenagakhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Hat Kristus at apigi. Halok he, hekaerek nen tiligik, nit tilninakhik, hagasin ta, ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he,
42023040	at agarlak ageikhe etnogo nen, at wenagakhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Hat ap yi warogo 'bega hak ninom tak-tagat warogo 'binanha yoma, Allah hayuk dek a?
42023041	Nit weak hagakhe lagoma ninobabut oba ninasusak tak-tagat ninakha mekeat he, at yi anek itithogon weak ageikhe hagakhidek o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik
42023042	yabokane, at Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Yesus noe! Hat kok hetagapogot dogeigiluk waga dogolik, an noba ebetno, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
42023043	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “O yogotak yiat nipisak o hanoma etoma lalok dogogun o, iluk eberogonat yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
42023044	-
42023045	Itithogon 'bisasukhama welagoukha, o mulikin jam 12 o dikene welageikhe meke re, o etomala tha'bokhogonat hi ageikhesik, mo yakhidek hiat werek korlek, hurlihiamaganekeke jam 3 hiat welageikhe. Jam 3 hagatlageikhemo nen, Allah ai halekma su kain meke o kakok palekma itikmoke welageikhe meke etnogo turlem heisogo kagoukhogon hagatlageikhe.
42023046	Itithogon kagoukhogon hagatlageikhemo, at Yesus ane kokhogon Allah yogokhe dogolik, “Nopase o! An nagurlagun kigikhogon hat hikimo waganinok nen, iluk yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik nen, arat debekhogon watlageikhe.
42023047	Itithogon hagakhikhemo ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo ileken hasikhesik Allah hogorakhe dogolik, “Ap yi eberogonat mothogon anek hagakhe laga meke higi o, ” iluk isikhe.
42023048	Nen, it akhuni doalegat inileken huogoluk wagoukha meke emenogo itithogon hagakhunem inileken halok yabokane inapuke inaila laga dogolik, inebe tha'bokhogonat inetaiken iniki nen huseligik warilik lagoukha.
42023049	Nen, it Yesus ebe inilu meke tha'bokhogonat, it humi o Galilea nen Yesus oporlik usasukha meke men, it aperek men, inebe walegat metek dogolik, itithogon hagatlagunem inileken lageik welagoukhaat.
42023050	-
42023051	Itithogon hagakhukhama ap ageikhe etaga Yusuf, it akhuni Yahudi meke inaila o ukul ageikhe etaga Arimatea iti meke. Allah apma 'bisagein etnogo therogo dogolik, obabut hano mot hagakhe lageikhe meke, at ebe Yahudi inougi koktek wene pilinisuogoluk inom natogokhe lagoukha meke. Itithogon mekeat he, it agarlak lak nen, Yesus abok palogo wakhukha iti, at nen, “I o, wasuok o, ” iluk igidek huk welageikhesik nen,
42023052	at Yesus ebe warek Pilatus oba kino lageikhe.
42023053	Kino lageikhemo, at Pilatus nen, “I o, hano, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, wageikhesik Yesus warek etnogo o baga nen usa'i ageikhesik nen, su kain etaga lenan meke baga dikilogo, oila akhuni inebe warek 'bisekhe dogouogoluk helekit elo kerat herlelhukhasik nen, ebe warek aban 'bigidekma 'bi lageikhe.
42023054	'Bi lageikhe itinem, it akhuni Yahudi meke Allah hasik iniki 7 baga werlegat dogogun oba horogat hagasuogoluk dogolik, yi meke ti meke tugurogo 'begarek oba tak-tagat hari Jumat 'bisikhe.
42023055	Nen, it humi o Galilea nen Yesus oporlik usasukha meke emenogo Yusuf oporlik wagoukhasik, oila etnogo men, Yesus ebe warek 'bisikhe meke etnogo men, inileken hutukhogon hasukha.
42023056	Inileken halok uma lagoukhasik nen, o yi eken ti eken obasi hano meke inom, apusu obasi hano meke inom, Yesus ebe warek oba ebemake wasi luogoluk, tugurogo ’bisukha. Itithogon ’bisukhasik, it akhuni Yahudi meke Allah nen inasuk wakhikhe tak-tagat iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat welagoukha.
