42024001	Iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat welagoukhasik, hubuluke hari Minggu baga huben siakhogonat ithumi emenogo nen apusu tugurogo ’bisukha meke emenogo wolok nen, oila warek ’bisukhama etnogo wagoukha.
42024002	Wagoukhasik inileken ’bikhasukha meke, oila thu helekit meke tetnokhogon larogo ’bisukha etnogo dipilogola’isukhama thu hualek werekma inileken hasukha.
42024003	Hasukhasik inebe oila ukisukha meke re, at ninoe Etagapogot Yesus warek ebe dekma inileken hasukha.
42024004	Warek ebe dekma hasukhasik nen, “Yi nikithogon hagatlagama, ” iluk inobakha palatluk inakla munini ebekhunem, ap inebe pere inasu a’bi’bal weak meke ugu, it humi inil oba eranogo ka nen heat inalilu melasi agoukha.
42024005	Wagoukhama nen, it humi emenogo inayuk nen inut thomarek werekma, it ap pere eranogo nen humi emenogo men yogeisasukha, “Hit he, at iluk welagarek meke etnogo akhuni warek meke welageikharekma nenaluk herakhe lagap.
42024006	At ebe yoma dek o. Allah nen ilugutdekhemo o.
42024007	At alep hit hinom o Galilea dogolik, men yokhisekhe meke etnogo hinakla ebetni. At nen, An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nasuagaluk nebe ap weak meke iniki baga ’banumo, o baga meldaniluk nasumo, niki pere warek dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe yi baga nen niluk asigin o, iluk yokhisasikhe etnogo hinakla ebetni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42024008	it humi emenogo yabokane wene Yesus nen yogeisasikhe meke etnogo inakla ebekhukha.
42024009	Inakla ebetdiluk, oila etoma nen inapuke uma lagoukhasik nen, it ap inebe 11 oba emenogo men, it inagarlak lak ebetlake emenogo men, pilinogo yogeisa agoukha.
42024010	It humi emenogo inebe Maria ai Magdala meke etnogo men, Yohana men, Maria Yakobus agosa men, humi ebetlake emenogo inomat inebe tha'bokhogonat nen pilinogo Yesus agarumi la'isagaluk inayoko 'bisikhe meke emenogo yogeisa agoukha.
42024011	Itithogon yogeisa agoukha mekeat he, it emenogo eberogonat iluk inakla ebekhidek. Inekalat iliogei, iluk apasukha meke re,
42024012	at Petrus etnogo anek, metokhogon melageikhesik dukhiluk, pirlirli oila warek 'bisukhama etnogo ileken 'bikha lageikhe. Lageikhesik ut thoma iluk ileken kolakhasikhe meke re, su kain lenan meke ebe warek yilogo 'bisukha meke etnogo anek nokorlek werekma hasikhe. Werekma ileken halok nen, “Yi nikithogon hagatlaga. Nayuk o, ” iluk akla eberik uma wageikhe.
42024013	O iti dikeneat Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inebe pere o Yerusalem nen o etaga Emaus etoma, 3 jam hakene wageikharek oba wisuogoluk wagoukha.
42024014	Waga dogolik, yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonathagatlageikhe meke emenogo abok pilinirik wagoukha.
42024015	Wene abok pilinirik waga dogolik, at ageikhe nen, at ageikhe yogokhik, at ageikhe nen, at ageikhe yogokhik, ilik wagunem at Yesus inoado hakha ageikhesik inomat wagoukha.
42024016	Inom wagoukha meke re, it ap eranogo nen ekagat hutdinogo iluk inileken agot ageikhemo, ebe ekagat hutdigidek.
42024017	Hutdigidek wagunem, at Yesus nen, it eranogo men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hipisak holagarlemke laga dogolik, wene nena wene ilik waga lagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo inelokhoken damutdiluk huk agoukha.
42024018	Huk agoukhasik nen, it eranogo, at ageikhe etaga Kleopas nen, men yogokhikhe, “Wene ahe yiat hagatlaga iti, it ap huso meke o Yerusalem witluk elanma hasik werek meke aperek tha’bokhogonat inilu mekeat he, hat yi anek hokodek welaganma higi, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
42024019	at Yesus nen, “Wene iti nikithogon hagatlaga meke egen, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, it eranogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Ap etaga Yesus, ai Nazaret meke iti, ebe Allah ane yogeisekherek mekeat dogolik, Allah il oba, nit akhuni tha’bokhogonat ninil oba, wene yogeisigik, yi meke ti meke hagakhik, obatnerogo hagakhe laga mekeat he,
42024020	it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inom, nit ninougi koktek inom, wene oba 'biluk o baga meldiluk wasuagaluk iniki baga 'begama wakha o.
42024021	Nit akhuni Israel meke, at nen tilninabigin iluk ninakla apekhe Iago mekeat he, eiye! Itithogon arat hagatlagasikmo nen, niniki pere noge ogo yi o.
42024022	Nen, it humi nit meke aperek nen ninakmaken lagabi ageikhaat o. It iti huben siakhogonat oila warek 'begama wageikha meke re,
42024023	ebe warek etnogo dekma hega o. Ebe dek nen inileken halok lageikhasik wene yoknisekhe dogolik, Malaikat pogot oba meke nen, Dek o. At ebe iluk agama, iluk yoknisegama wago, iluk, itithogon egama ninakmaken laga o.
42024024	Nen, nit ninagarlak lak aperek oila warek 'begama iti 'bikha wageikha meke re, ebe dekma nen, Humi yoknisa lageikha etnogo eberogonat higi, iluk, Yesus ebe inileken higidek lageikhaat o, ” iluk Yesus yogokhukha.
42024025	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Eiye! Hinebe kepu a? Ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen wene tha'bokhogonat yogeisekhe lagoukha etnogo eberogonat iluk hit ibat hutdu'buk welagap yi re!
42024026	At Kristus Allah nen ayoko 'bisikhe etnogo, yi aik ti aik higidek hogorasusak a? Dek o. Hugunem nen hogorasusak o. Hit nen egep iti hagasusak tak-tagat hagakha o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
42024027	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, at ekaerek hasik Musa nen holal waganhikhe emenogo hurli nen logat, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen holal waganhukha emenogo, tha'bokhogonat hutukhogon pilinerogon yogeisasikhe.
42024028	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, o Emaus wisuogoluk wagoukha etnogo arat asi agoukhasik nen, at Yesus holak piokthegat wisigiluk negen hagakhikhe.
42024029	Itithogon hagakhikhemo it ap emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “A! O hi asigiluk, mo arat korokhogon laga yoma re, ninom yoma noge uok o, ” iluk, hakhasukhama inom noge uogoluk uma ukisukha.
42024030	Ukisukhasik inom hipiri nuogoluk nen hurek lageikhesik hipiri roti meke ikimo waganhikhesik nen, Allah heagei warogo kusogo it emenogo wogeisasikhe.
42024031	Itithogon hagakhunem, it emenogo alep inileken amukhak thalageikhe meke 'buka lageikhesik meke nen, ekagat hutdisukha. Ekagat hutdisukha meke re, at ebe it inakla nen ka laga heat nalageikhe.
42024032	Itithogon nalageikhemo, it-it men isukha, “Eiye! Holagarlem waga dogolik nen, wene Allah ane holal waganek meke pilinogo yoknisekhe korlek, ninakla arleken atluk ninakla kagouk ekhe etnogo dek? ” iluk isukha.
42024033	Itithogon isukhasik nen, huk welageidegat, it etnogo ipisagat metokhogon melatluk inapuke o Yerusalem lagoukha. Lagoukha meke, at Yesus agarumi inebe 11 emenogo men, inagarlak lak hetnake men, inom natogotdiluk men ugunem hisa lagoukha,
42024034	“Yesus Simon elokhoma winam atluk ileken hekhe iti, Allah nen eberogonat ilugutdekhemo werek, ” iluk wene pilinekhunem lagoukha.
42024035	Lagoukhasik, it inebe pere eranogo nen holagarlem waga dogolik Yesus inom hagakhukha meke inom, hipiri kusogo melageisugunem ebe hutdisukha meke etnogo inom, motok pilinerogon yogeisasukha.
42024036	Wene etnogo aban pilinogo isinem, at Yesus ebe ka nen heat inakla melageikhesik nen, “Nagarumi. Hinagot akma, ” iluk heagei warinakhunem,
42024037	it emenogo inakmaken lagoukhasik nen, “Yi mokat a? ” iluk inayuk agoukha.
42024038	Inayuk motok agoukhama, at Yesus nen it agarumi men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen, nenaluk hinayuk atluk eberogonat apigidek hinetaiken pere welagap.
42024039	An nebeat o. Niki nisok yoma hinileken 'bikhani! An he, nino men, noak men, werek iti hak, it mokat iti itithogon motok dek. Halok he, hiniki hakniigik, hinileken niigik, hagakhe dogolik, Yesus ebeat, iluk hinakla apani o, ” iluk,
42024040	itithogon yogeisekhe dogolik, at iki isok emenogo inugurisasikhe.
42024041	Itithogon inugurisugunem, it emenogo nen, “Eiye! ” iluk hogorakhe dogolik, inakla arleken nen, eberogonat iluk aban hutdigidek werekma, at nen it emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit hipiri ageikhe yoma 'begepma a? Dek a, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
42024042	it nen ikan werago palek meke ageikhe wogokhukhama,
42024043	at nen waganhikhesik, it emenogo inil obaat nasikhe.
42024044	Nalok nen, it emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An hit ninom dogolik yokhisekhe dogolik, An hagatnabugun meke holal Musa nen waganhik, ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen waganhik, it aperek nen buku Mazmur oba waganhik, holal waganogo 'bisukha iti tak-tagat, an arat hagatnabugun, iluk yokhisekhe lagei etnogo ebe arat hagatlaga yi o, ” iluk,
42024045	Allah ane holal waganek hutduagaluk, it emenogo wene inetaiken kagalogo yogeisasikhemo hutdisukha.
42024046	Itithogon inetaiken kagalogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “Allah nen Kristus ayoko 'biluk la'isigin isikhe meke holal men iluk waganek werek, Yi aik ti aik hilik-hilik watlatluk nen, iki pere warek dogoluk iki ageikhe baga yi nen, watlatluk lageikharekma nen iluk asigin o, iluk holal waganek werek.
42024047	Nen, ageikhe men iluk holal waganek weregat, Hit akhuni weak hagakhe lagap meke iti, here'isalok hinobabut hebelagap halok he, Allah nen thagalogo degetdigin o, iluk, at etaga palogo wene ekhe dogolik, erlo o Yerusalem hurli nen yogeisilik, logat hurli o yi ai ti ai akhuni inukuloak etaga dopok motok yogeisilik laga dogono, iluk Allah ane holal waganek weregat o.
42024048	Wene holal waganek werek iti hak, ebe hagatlaga meke hit hinileken hegep meke nenat, it akhuni yogeisilik laga dogono.
42024049	Nen, an nopase nen hit wokhisagein, iluk abok yokhisasikhe etnogo, yogo. An nenat hinoba usa'isasigin o. Meke re, Allah obatne pogot oba nen hinoba aban usa'i ageidek werek korlek ya re, hinebe o kota yomaat dogono, ” iluk wene warisasikhe.
42024050	At Yesus nen wene itithogon warisasikhesik, it agarumi emenogo o kota kokma nen wogosik dukhisikhesik, o Baitania etoma lageikhe. Lageikhesik, iki lia'iluk nen, “Allah nen thethisik dogolik hanothinakhe dogoak o, ” iluk heagei warinakhikhe.
42024051	Itithogon heagei warinakhe korlek eranogoat, it eta werek korlek, Allah nen, at ebe lekhogon pogot oba wolok dageisikhe.
42024052	Itithogon dageisinem, it agarumi emenogo initibagal yukukhogon hogoratluk nen, inakla arleken kokhogon akhilik, o Yerusalem inapuke wagoukha.
42024053	Wagoukhasik, o Allah ai halekma anek dogolik, Allah hogorakho motok welagoukha.
43001001	Ebekeram erlo baga nen, wene Ebe Wene welageikhe. Ebe Wene iti, Allah ipisagat dogolik, ebe Allah at.
43001002	At iti ebekeram erlo baga nenat Allah ipisagat dogolik,
43001003	yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat Allah nen walhasikhe iti, at Ebe Wene nenat walhasikhe. At ebe dek dogolepma, opakiat ageikhe walhelep degat o.
43001004	Ninilugutninakherek meke erlo arat welagarek iti nen, nit akhuni liatninabi ageikhe.
43001005	Nit o mummo werekma liatninabi ageikhe meke yibarlek werekma, o mum iti nen, o lia etnogo damutdusak erlok dek nen yibarlegat welagarek.
43001006	-
43001007	O liatninakherek meke iti ilu meke nen abok yoknisoagaluk, ap etaga Yohanes iti Allah nen ayoko ’biluk la’i ageikhe. La’i ageikhemo wageikhe iti, o liatninakherek meke iti, abok yogeisugunem, akhuni tha’bokhogonat inetaiken at oba hakotduagaluk wageikhe iti.
43001008	At ebe liatninakherek meke iti ’buk. At liatninakherek meke iti abok yogeisa ageikhe.
43001009	At lia ebe meke iti, agat oba yoma waga dogolik, nit akhuni tha’bokhogonat ninebe dopok liatninabi ageikhe.
43001010	At nenat pogot agat walhasikhe meke re, at ebe agat oba yoma wageikhesik werekma, it akhuni agat oba meke yoma nen, at ebe hutdigidek welagoukha.
43001011	At ekaerek ailaat wageikhe meke re, at oe agot nen ebe waganhidek thogotdisukha.
43001012	Itithogon thogotdisukha meke re, it akhuni aperek nen, at ebe waganiluk nen, inetaiken at oba hakotdisukhama, Allah a'buri ebeat meke asuagaluk iterinakhikhe.
43001013	Iterinakhikhemo, at a’buri agoukha iti, akhuni ina’buri itaginabu warlok nen inamep meke dogum walogo itaginakharek iti hakene ’buk. At Allah nenat itaginakhikhe o.
43001014	Ebe Wene etnogo abat ageikhesik ninomat welagagu. Ninomat dogolik, at ebe iti Allah a’but irlagapi itago etnogo, hogorakharek meke ninileken hasugu o. At obabut hano nen, hanorogo hagatninakhik, wene ebe wene yoknisigik, hagakho motok werekma ninileken hasugu.
43001015	Wene at ebe hasik Yohanes nen men yogeisasikhe, “An noporlik yabokane ap ageikhe wisigin, iluk abokyokhisekhe lagei etnogo, ebe yiat o. At yi yabokane an noporlik waga meke re, ebe an aban itaklagidek werek korlek, at alebat welageikhe iti nen, an nebe erlok dek o. Kok he, arat o, ” iluk, ane kokhogon yogeisasikhe.
43001016	Nen, at obabut hano motok nen ninebe tha’bokhogonat eran-alep hanotninakho motok werek o.
43001017	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo yakulnisoagaluk, alebat Musa la’i ageikhemo, yakulnisasikhe meke re, Allah obabut hano nen hanotninakhik, ebe wene yakulnisigik, hagasuagaluk, Yesus Kristus la’i ageikhemo yakulnisa ageikhe iti o.
43001018	Akhuni nen Allah ebe inileken motok higidek meke re, at a’but irlagapi itago opase alilu ipisak welageikharek meke iti nenat Allah ebe hutukhogo yakulnisa ageikhe iti.
43001019	At Yohanes nen wene itithogon yogeisekho werekma, it ap Allah iteerek meke men, inukuloak etaga Lewi meke men, inom nen, “Yohanes. Hat hebe tha hak nogo, ” iluk oba hinok waganuagaluk, ap Yahudi meke o Yerusalem nen la'isa agoukhama Yohanes oba wagoukha.
43001020	Wagoukhasik, at oba hinok waganhukhama, at Yohanes nen ekaerek abok la’belogo yogeisigidek, pakhogonat yogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “An nebe re, akhuni tilninabuagaluk Allah nen ayoko ’biluk la’isigin isikhe etnogo ’buk. Dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43001021	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it nen, men yogokhukha, “Halok he, hat hebe tha nogo? Hebe Elia a? ” iluk yogokhukhama, at nen, “An nebe at iti ’buk, ninat o, ” iluk, yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it nen, men yogokhukha, “Halok he, ap ageikhe Allah ane yoknisekhe dogoagaluk ayoko ’biluk la’isigin isikhe etnogo a? ” iluk yogokhukhama, at nen, “Iti an degat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43001022	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it nen, men yogokhukha, “Halok he, hat hebe tha nogo. Nit wene hutukhogon yoknisaumo, it ap nit la’inani ageikha meke, nit nen wene ageikhe yogeisa luok nen, hat hekaerek habok hasik nikithogon egetek. Ninilu asuak nen, yoknisan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43001023	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yohanes nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap Yesaya Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen, men isikhe, Ap ageikhe o limo akhuni dekma etoma ane kokhogon ekhe dogolik, Ninoe Etagapogot wisiginke holak mothogon yakhe dogoni o, iluk ekhe dogogin,\rq (Yesaya 40:3)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek etnogo re, nebe anat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43001024	Yogeisasikhemo, it ap wagoukha iti, it ap Farisi meke nenat la’isa agoukhama wagoukhasik nen, ageikhe men yogokhukha,
43001025	“Hat nen, An nebe, Allah nen akhuni tilninabuagaluk ayoko 'biluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo dek o. Nen, Elia degat o. Nen, Allah ane yoknisekhe dogoagaluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo degat o, egen meke re, nenaluk akhuni ima usa'isekhe lagan? ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43001026	at Yohanes nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nen akhuni ima usa'isekhe lagei anek meke re, ap ageikhe hit nen ebe hutdigidek meke hinaklake metek werek o.
43001027	Ap iti ebe an noporlik yabokane wisigin meke re, at ebe motok kok. An nebe yekerek iti nen, at isok agot herle warek meke iti, an nen hisalusak erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43001028	Wene itithogon isukha iti, i Yordan aik ilibaganke, Yohanes nen akhuni ima usa'isasi lageikhe baga, o etaga Betania dogolik nen isukha.
43001029	Wene itithogon isukhasik nen, noge iluk, hubuluke, at Yesus Yohanes oba wagunem ileken lakhalok nen, wene men yogeisasikhe, “Allah adomba eak meke nit akhuni agat oba yoma weak hagakhorek meke korogo thogotdisagein meke etnogo waga ili hinileken lakhani o.
43001030	Alebat wene an nen yokhisekhe dogolik, Ap ageikhe noporlik wisigin mekeat he, an aban itaklageidek werek korlegat welageikhe iti nen, an nebe yekerek meke re, at anek motok kogat o, iluk, abok yokhisekhe lagei etnogo, ebe waga ithiat o.
43001031	Alebat, at ebe an nokodekma, at ebe tha heat, hutdigidek welagei meke re, akhuni Israel meke at ebe inilu asuagaluk ima usa'isekhe dogeigiluk wagei iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43001032	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane at ileken hasikhe meke pakhogon men yogeisasikhe, “Allah Agoreke thue merpati yogeik negen pogot oba nen usa'agasik Yesus oba labek werekma an nileken higi o.
43001033	Itinem, at ebe tha heat an nokodek welagei meke re, Allah nen an akhuni imaat usa'isekhe dogoagaluk la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo nen yoknekhe dogolik, men yoknikhikhe, An Nagoreke ap ageikhe oba labi usatluk werekma hileken hegen halok he, at iti nen akhuni ima usahnabu hak, Nagoreke inoba usa'aga dogogin o, iluk, yoknikhikhemo nogo nen,
43001034	at ebe an nileken hutukhogo higirik nen hutdigi o. Itithogon hutdigirik, at iti Allah a’but eberogonat o, iluk, abok hit pakhogo yokhisekhe lagei yi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43001035	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik noge iluk hubuluke, at Yohanes ebe men, agarumi at ane waganhe lagoukha meke inebe pere men, inomat etoma metek welagoukha.
43001036	Itithogon metek werekma, at Yesus holak iti baga lagaluk wagunem Yohanes ileken lakhalok nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Allah adomba eak meke etnogo waga ili hinileken lakhani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43001037	at agarumi inebe pere eranogo at ane yogeisasikhe meke inasuk holhukhasik nen, Yesus oporlik lagoukha.
43001038	Itithogon oporlik lagunem, Yesus nen ileken dagakhogon 'birisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Hit nena meke herarik wagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, nit ninane baga, “Wene yakulnisegetek meke noe, ” iluk u hak, inane baga, “Rabi noe. Hat hai o koma welagatek meke, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43001039	at nen, “Hit nen hinileken tomok hobageik nen witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it ipisagat inom lagoukhasik, o hiamaganeke jam 4 hakene at welageikhemo inileken hasukhasik, inom welagoukha.
43001040	Nen, it ap inebe pere Yohanes ane isinem inasuk holhukhasik, Yesus oporlik lagoukha meke eta ap ageikhe etaga Andreas, Simon Petrus etnogo agot.
43001041	Yesus oporlik lagoukhasik inom welagoukhasik nen, at Andreas iti tak oeSimon etnogo herarik lageikhesik, ipisak abuk agoukhasik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Mesias etnogo nit arat ninom abuk ago, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43001042	Itithogon yogokhikhesik Yesus oba wolok wageikhemo, at Yesus ileken at oba lakhasikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Simon Yohanes a'but yi, nagot. Hat hetaga Kepas ekhe dogoagaluk thalhakhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe. Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, nit yoma ninane baga etaga helekit u hak, it Yunani inane baga Petrus egarek hak, Ibrani inane baga etaga Kepas iluk thalhikhe iti.
43001043	Itithogon isikhesik noge iluk hubuluke, at Yesus o Galilea dageisigiluk akla apasikhesik nen dagei ageikhe hak, ap etaga Filipus ipisak abuk agoukhasik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Nagot. An noporlik eme o, ” iluk ayoko 'bisikhemo oporlik lageikhe.
43001044	At Filipus iti, Andreas Petrus ipisak inom inai ukul o Betsaida opakimo meke.
43001045	Oporlik laga dogolik, at Filipus etnogo nen yabokane Natanael herakhikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Natanael. At Musa nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga, ap ageikhe abok ekhe dogolik, holal waganhik, nen, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen abok ekhe dogolik, holal waganhik, hagakhukha meke etnogo, nit arat herakho. At ebe re, Yusuf a'but o Nazaret meke Yesus at o, ” iluk yogokhikhe meke re,
43001046	at Natanael nen, men yogokhikhe, “A! O Nazaret eloma nen hano meke ageikhe erlok wisusak a? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Filipus nen, “Hat hileken tomok 'bikhanok nen eme o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43001047	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Natanael Yesus oba wisigiluk wagunem, at Yesus ileken lakhalok nen, at abok men yogeisasikhe, “Ap ithi ebe Israel meke eberogonat meke. Ane pere ekherek motok dek meke ithi lakhani o! ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43001048	at Natanael nen, “Eiye! Noe. An hagakherek meke nobabut nikithogon nen hilu agama o? ” iluk oba hinok waganhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Nagot. Filipus nen hat aban wahikhidek werek korlek, hat hebe o ara erloma hurek welagan etnaga, an tak nileken hiigi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43001049	at Natanael nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Allah a'but nit Israel meke ninoe kok Hetagapogot harat hiigi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43001050	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nen, Hat o ara erloma hurek welagan etnaga an tak nileken hiigi o, iluk, yokhikhi iti baga nen hetaiken an noba ebekhen a? Iti we herlekha'bugat negen hagakhunem neegen meke re, yabokane kokhogon hagakhunem hileken neegein o, ” iluk isikhesik,
43001051	yabokane wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Yabokane pogot kagoukhogon it malaikat Allah nen yoko la'isa agarek meke emenogo an abat itaklasi agagi etnogo noba dageigik usigik hagakhunem hinileken neekhe dogogun o, iluk nane eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43002001	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukhasik, noge iniki pere iluk nen, iniki ageikhe baga nen he, o Galilea o ukul ageikhe etaga Kana iti, ap ageikhe age igikhunem Yesus agosa ayoko 'bisukhama etoma inom welagoukha.
43002002	Etoma werekma, atYesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inom meneke, inayoko 'bisukhama lagoukhasik welagoukhaat.
43002003	Lagoukhasik werekma, anggur eken apusu herelek meke tha'bokhogonat dek ageikhemo, Yesus agosa nen men yogokhikhe, “It anggur eken apusu herelek meke dek agama werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43002004	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Nagosa o. An nen hagasusak oba aban horok asi ageidek werek korlek, hat nen an nenaluk yoknekhen, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43002005	Itithogon yogokhikhe meke re, at agosa nen, at iteerek inatuaneke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “At nen, Yigithogon hagatni, ekhe halok he, at igin meke itiat hagatno, nerugi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43002006	It akhuni Yahudi meke nen haganeat etoma nenat hagakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke men, inoba men, thobalogo anek hagakharek meke hasik isoak helekit meke herlelek koktek meke ebe 6 oba etoma 'bisukhama welageikhe. Isoak koktek dorom hakene iti ebe dopok akla i 100 liter hakene henasusak erlok welageikhe.
43002007	Itithogon werekma, at Yesus nen it inatuaneke emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Isoak koktek dorom hakene ethoma baga i henatni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, apem hethokhigik henakhukha.
43002008	Itithogon apem hethokhigik henakhukhama, at Yesus nen it men yogeisasikhe, “Yogo. Henakhep meke iti ageikhe kelelogo ap kok pesta iteerek meke wogosi lani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo wogosi lagoukha.
43002009	It nen i kelelogo wogosi lagoukhasikmo nogo nen, i ebe itithogon meke, iluk inilu welagoukha mekeat he, ap kok meke etnogo anek he, “Koma nen wolok wageikha, ” iluk okodek dogolik, i etnogo anggur eken apusuat hagatlageikhemo, ituk walhasikhe hak, hano motok nen ap he igikhukha werek etnogo ane hakhasikhe.
43002010	Ane hakhasikhemo wageikhemo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Werlak! Akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen anggur eken apusu ituk hano meke alebageik wogeisugunem, ina’ithogon nasi halok, yabokane anggur apusu ituk erlok dek negen wogeisegarek meke re, hat anek he, anggur apusu ituk hano meke henago ’biluk welagatik nen yabokane winametdegen yi, nayuk! ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43002011	At Yesus ebe hutduagaluk elalin meke ageikhe hagakhidekma alebageik hagakhikhe iti, o Galilea o ukul Kana dogolik hagakhikhe iti baga, at hogorakharek meke inilurogo yakulisasikhemo, it at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo Yesus ebe hutdiluk, inetaiken at oba hakotdisukha.
43002012	Itithogon arat hagatluk nen, at Yesus ebe men, agosa men, agarlai men, agarumi at ane waganhe lagoukha meke men, inom o Kapernaum lagoukha. Lagoukhasik nen, iniki pere negen anek welagoukha.
43002013	Etoma werekma, it akhuni Yahudi meke nen, “Alebat at Allah nen tilninakhikhe, ” iluk, inakla eberogodogolik domba warogo pesta etaga Paskah hasik nausak oba arat hakok i ageikhemo, Yesus o Yerusalem usasikhe.
43002014	Usasikhesik nen, Allah ai halekma ukisikhe hak, it akhuni oko palharek meke, sapi inom, domba inom, thue merpati yogeik hakene inom, oko palhik, it aperek etoma hurek dogolik uang okokhik, hagakhunem at ileken hisasikhe.
43002015	Itithogon hagakhunem ileken hisekhe lageikhesik, herle kupi meke tugi hagarogo nen sapi inom, domba inom, la’bisoko tugi warogo Allah ai halekma nen mukhogo ula’isigik, meja o perlago baga uang okokhe lagoukha meke emenogo abel dagak-pagakhogon la’isigik, inauang emenogo agat oba thirlik-pirlikhogon hagatdigik, hagakhikhe.
43002016	Hagakhe dogolik, it ap thue merpati yogeik hakene oko waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo wenageisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Thue yoma horlalok dukhi lani o. An nopase ai halekma yoma, yi meke ti meke oko palharekma hakene palhe lagap yi, itithogon hagasusak motok dek o, ” iluk wenageisasikhe.
43002017	Itithogon wenageisasikhemo, it at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inakla nen, “Alebat it ap aperek nen Allah ane baga holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, men isukhama werek etnogo, Allah nopase, hat hai halek netaiken hunik motok nen, nakla aga motok dageiliogo,\rq (Mazmur 69:9-10)\rq* iluk holal waganhukhama werek apigi, ” iluk inakla ebekhukha.
43002018	Yesus nen it ap emenogo itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it ap koktek Yahudi meke nen Yesus ebe wenagakhe dogolik men yogokhukha, “Hat nen hagakhen yi re, iteerek dogolik hagasusak oba hagakhenma iluk, hutdaguok nen, elalin meke ageikhe hagasin ta, ” iluk wenageikhukha.
43002019	Itithogon wenageikhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Dek o. Allah ai halek yi misalini o. Arat misalumo, an nen yabokane niki pere baga halhe dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe baga yi nen arat haligin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43002020	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it ap koktek Yahudi meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “A! Allah ai yi aban halhe korlek 46 tahun welago mekeat he, hat nen, Niki pere baga halhe dogoluk nen, niki ageikhe yi baga arat haligin, iluk egen iti erlogat halusak iluk egen a? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43002021	Itithogon yogokhukha meke re, Yesus nen wene Allah ai halek hasik isikhe iti, o halek meke hasik isikhe 'buk. At ekaerek ebe hasigat isikhe o.
43002022	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik yabokane watlageikhesik nen iluk ageikhemo, it ap at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, “Wene yi alebat yoknisugunem ninasuk holhugu meke, ” iluk inakla ebekhukhasik nen, Allah ane holal waganek meke inom, wene Yesus nen yogeisasikhe meke etnogo inom, hutdisukhasik inakla nen eberogonat apasukha.
43002023	Itithogon isukhasik werek korlek, o Yerusalem it akhuni Yahudi meke domba warogo pesta Paskah nasi korlek, at Yesus etoma inom dogolik ebe hutduagaluk, elalin meke hagarik lageikhe iti nen, akhuni doalegat inileken hasukhasik nen inetaiken at oba hakotdisukha.
43002024	Itithogon inetaiken at oba hakotdisukha meke re, at Yesus ekaerek anek nen, it inebe tha’bokhogonat inobabut ilu iti nen, “Eberogonat woknabugun” iluk etaiken it inoba hakotdigidek welageikhe.
43002025	Akhuni inakla at ilu motok welagarek iti nen, akhuni aperek nen, “It aperek inobabut yigirlik, ” iluk, at yogosusak motok erlok dek o.
43003001	It akhuni Yahudi meke inoe kok ap Farisi mekeinawene hago welageikhe meke ageikhe etaga Nikodemus welageikhe.
43003002	Nen, ap iti o hibako iniki ageikhe baga Yesus oba wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Ap ageikhe Allah ipisak hunik dek halok he, hat nen elalin meke hagarik nekhe lagan iti hak, hagasusak motok erlok dek. Iti nen, hat nen wene yakulnisoagaluk Allah nen la’agei agama wagan iluk ninilu aga, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43003003	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Akhuni Allah nen inebe yabokane inapuke ket itaginakhidek halok, at apma 'bisekherekma etoma inileken hugun motok dek o, iluk, nane eberogonat yokhekhe lagei, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43003004	at Nikodemus nen, men yogokhikhe, “A! Akhuni inarlue baga nen yabokane nikithogon itaginabusak apegen? Inagosa lak inakla ukiluk nen yabokane erlok itaginabusak a? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43003005	at Yesus nen, men isikhe, “Akhuni i baga men, Allah Agoreke baga men, itaginakhidek halok, Allah nen apma 'bisekherekma etoma ukugun motok dek o, iluk, nane eberogonat yokhekhe lagei o.
43003006	Nen, akhuni nen itaginakharek iti, akhuniatitaklageikharek o. Nen, Allah Agoreke nen itaginakherek iti, Allah Agoreke mekeat ket itaklageikharek o.
43003007	Hit hinebe tomok yabokane hinapuke ket itaklasusak, iluk yokhikhi iti nen, Eiye! Nayuk o, iluk; hogorakhun o.
43003008	Hisakne iti, abusagat yugunat hubethugunem, ane anek hasuk holhetek meke re, ebe wiriogo holak koma nen heat wiriogo. Nen, liliogo holak komake heat. Hat hokodek iti. Iti hak, akhuni Allah Agoreke nen itaginakherek iti, inebe dopok itithogonat itaginakherek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43003009	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Nikodemus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Wene egen iti nikithogon hagarinabusak nen egen, ” iluk hinok waganhikhemo,
43003010	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Hat hebe, akhuni Yahudi meke wene yakulisegetek mekeat, an nen wene yokhikhi iti hutdigidek welagan a? E a.
43003011	Nit nen wene ninilu mekeat yokhisigik, ninileken hogo mekeat eberogonat iluk, pakhogo yokhisigik, ekhe lago mekeat he, ninane iti holhidek hinobakhanini hagakhe lagap iluk, nane eberogonat yokhekhe lagei.
43003012	An nen wene agat oba meke hasik yokhisugunem, hit nen eberogonat iluk hutdekhe lagap dek halok, an nen wene pogot oba meke hasik yokhisaumo yabokane nikithogon nen wene iti eberogonat iluk hutdugun apegep. Hutdugun motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43003013	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Ap ageikhe agat oba nen pogot oba motok dageigidek. At he, an pogot oba nen abat itaklasi usa'agagi etnogoat o.
43003014	-
43003015	Nen, ap Musa o limo akhuni dekma etoma dogolik, warlo hakene hagarogo o baga lia'isikhe iti hak, it akhuni yoma inetaiken an abat itaklasi agagi meke yi noba hakotdugun meke, inebe tomogat iniluk motok dogoagaluk, an itithogonat lia'anusak obaat lia'anugunat o.
43003016	Yi akhuni ti akhuni Allah akmu motok nen, inebe inetaiken an noba hakotdugun meke inebe tomok watlatluk nen, nuk ageidek iniluk motok dogoagaluk, a'but an nebe irlagapi itago meke wogeisasikhe.
43003017	Nen, an Allah a'but agat oba yoma la'ani ageikhe iti, yi akhuni ti akhuni wene inoba 'biluk weagarinabuagaluk la'ani ageikhe 'buk. Meke re, inebe tilinabuagaluk la'ani ageikhe o.
43003018	Halok he, tha nen etaiken an noba hakotdekhe halok, Allah nen wene oba 'biluk weagatdigin dek mekeat he, tha nen etaiken an Allah a'but irlagapi itago meke yi noba hakotdigidek iti nenat, weagatdigin meke wene arat oba 'bekhemo werek o.
43003019	Nen, Allah nen wene inoba 'bekherek iti ebe yigithogon. An nen lia hagarinakherek meke nebe arat agat oba usa'agagi meke re, akhuni inobabut weak hagakharek iti nen, At lia iti nina'it o. At he, o mum itiat warlok, iluk inakla apegarek.
43003020	Nen, it akhuni weak hagariogei meke inebe tomogat inakla nen apekhe dogolik, Nit lia iti baga lugun halok, nit weak hagakhorek meke 'bualatluk winam asunogo, iluk apegarethek, an lia meke yi motok ina'it nen, noba wageidek huk ageikharek.
43003021	Itithogon inakla apegarek meke re, it aperek inobabut mothogon hagariogei meke inebe tomogat, inakla apekhe dogolik, Allah ninom hunik dogolik yigithogon hano hagakhe lagoma, iluk, winam asuagaluk, an lia meke noba wageikharek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43003022	Itithogon arat yogeisalok nen, yabokane at Yesus ebe men, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke men, inom o Yudea usasukhasik, akhuni ima usaginakhe dogolik iniki weat negen inom welagoukha.
43003023	-
43003024	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukha etanem, Yohanes iki herle warogo o herle warek 'bisegarekma aban kola'igidekma dogolik, o etaga Ainon o Salim alilu etoma i doalegat iti nen akhuni ima usageinabuagaluk, Yohanes oba wagunem, ima usa’isekhe lageikheat.
43003025	Itithogon ima usa'isasi werekma, at Yohanes agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke inom, it ap Yahudi meke aperek inom, it akhuni Yahudi meke nen yi meke ti meke thobalogo anek hagakharethekma nogo nen, wene iti hasik wene doalegat palhe lagoukha.
43003026	Wene palhe lagoukhasik nen, Yohanes oba lagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Noe. Ap ageikhe hat hipisak i Yordan aik ilibaganke dogolik, at hasik abok pakhogon yoknisegen meke etnogo nen ima usa'isugunem akhuni inebe tha'bokhogonat at oba wiriogei o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43003027	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Warligi yi. Nagarumi. Ap ageikhe Allah nen yogokhidekma, at ekaerek akla nen kagalogo erlok hagasusak erlok dek o.
43003028	Ap iti nen akhuni tilinabuagaluk Allah nen ayoko 'biluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo, an nebe dek meke re, at yabokane wisigiluk an alebageik la'ani agama wagei o, iluk, yokhisugunem hit arat hinasuk holhe lagagip apigi o.
43003029	Nen, ap ageikhe age ikhekhe halok, he iti ebe agun, ap itiat o. Nen, ap age ikhagein meke iti agarlak ageikhe alilu metek dogolik, at ane isinem asuk holek dogolik akla nen arleken akhekherek iti hak, an yogotak itithogonat nakla arleken kogat akhekhe lagei o.
43003030	Ap iti etaga kok asusak obaat etaga kogat ageik, an netaga dek asusak obaat, netaga dek ageik, hagasigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43003031	Nen, akhuni tha'bokhogonat, inetaga dek anek. Meke re, at upu eloma nen usa’ageikhe meke itiat kok etagapogot o. Ap ageikhe ebe agat oba nen itago meke halok, ebe agat oba mekeatma, wene agat oba mekeat ekherek o. It akhuni tha'bokhogonat inetaga dek negen werek korlek, ap ageikhe pogot oba nen usa’ageikhe meke itiat kok etagapogorat werek o.
43003032	At ileken hasikhe meke inom, asuk holhikhe meke inom, pakhogon yogeisekhe korlek mekeat, it akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen, at nen wene pakhogon yogeisekherek meke iti, inobakhanini thogotdiliogei o.
43003033	Itithogon thogotdisegarek meke re, it akhuni aperek nen, At nen wene pakhogon yoknisekherek meke iti eberogonat iluk waganiogei meke nen, Allah ane iti eberogonat iluk waganharek o.
43003034	At Allah nen la'i ageikhe meke iti, Allah Agoreke hurli yi baga anek waganin o, igidek motogat wogokhikhe iti nen, Allah aneat yoknisekherek o.
43003035	At opase nen a'but ebe etaiken hunik dogolik, yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat at iteerek dogoagaluk wogokhikhe.
43003036	Halok he, tha nen etaiken Allah a'but oba hakotdiliogo halok, iniluk dogogun meke iti ite agasik werek o. Meke re, tha nen, at a'but iti ane holhidek kolelogo here'isiliogo halok, iniluk motok dogogun meke iti ite asigin dek o. At he, Allah akla aga at oba motok 'biluk dogogin o.
43004001	Itithogon yogeisekhe lagoukhama, it nen, men isukha, “It akhuni inebe pererlagat negen Yohanes agarumi asuogoluk apma wagunem ima usa'isiliogo mekeat, it inebe doalegat Yesus agarumi asuogoluk apma wagunem ima usa'isiliogo, ” iluk isinem, at Yesus nen, “Wene iti, it ap Farisi meke inasuk holha higi, ” iluk ilu ageikhe.
43004002	Itithogon isukha iti, at Yesus ebe nen, ima usa'isekhe lageikhe dek. At agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen ima usa'isekhe lagoukha mekeat isukha.
43004003	Itithogon isinem, “Inasuk holha o, ” iluk Yesus ilu ageikhesik nen, at o Yudea thogotdiluk o Galilea apuke dageigiluk dagei ageikhe.
43004004	Itithogon dagei aga dogolik, holak ninat obake dek. Holak o Samaria obakeat dagei isusak mot ageikhemo dagei ageikhe.
43004005	Dagei aga dogolik, o Samaria o ukul ageikhe etaga Sikhar horok horok ukuogoluk, agat ageikhe ap Yakub nen alebat a'but Yusuf wogokhikhemo etoma dagei ageikhe.
43004006	O dikagane jam 12 oba dagei ageikhesik, at Yesus holak nen warek nogo nen, i ap Yakub agei hulelekma henakhe lagoukhama etoma hurek lageikhesik welageikhe.
43004007	-
43004008	At etoma hurek werek korlek, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo hipiri oko paluogoluk o ukul kokma etoma ukisukhama, at he Samaria meke ageikhe i henasigiluk dukhi ageikhe. Dukhi ageikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Neru la'uk. An i ageikhe henago woknom o, ” iluk, kino yogokhikhemo,
43004009	it akhuni Yahudi meke akhuni o Samaria meke inom weak welagoukha iti nen, at he Samaria meke etnogo nen at Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Hat ap Yahudi meke. Nen, an he Samaria mekeat he, nenaluk, I henaknom, iluk kino yoknekhen? ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43004010	Yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen at he etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Allah obabut hano nen werlegat okorlek wogeisekherek meke iti men, nen an nen, I ageikhe henago woknom, iluk kino yokhikhi iti, nebe men hutdanilenma, hat nen i ageikhe kino yoknekhunem, an nen i inilugurinakherek meke eberogonat wokhetle o, ” ilukyogokhikhe.
43004011	Itithogon yogosigin apasikhe, at he etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, La'uk. Hat hageisoak dek. Nen, i hulelek yi wema elomaat meke re, hat nen i inilugurinakherek meke iti, koma meke henago woknisigiluk nen egen.
43004012	I yi nit ninopa kok Yakub nen hulelhikhesik, at ebe men, a'buri men, ako men, neke lagoukhasik nen, nit yabokane meke neke dogoagaluk woknisasikhe meke iti, hat hakla nen, At ebe erlok dek negen. Nen, an anek nebe kogat, iluk hakla apalok nen egen a? ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43004013	Itithogon yogosigin apasikhe, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “It akhuni i yi meke nasi halok, yabokane i abu asigin meke re
43004014	i an nen wogeisaumo nasi halok he, it inakla nen i elesi hakene hnnak-hunak dukhisi motok dogogin iti nen, iniluk motok dogolik, it yabokane i abu aga dogogun motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43004015	Itithogen yogosigin apasikhe at he etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “La'uk. An i abu nen i yi henasi ageidek dogeik nen, i hat nen egeniti wokno, o, ” iluk kino yogokhikhe
43004016	Itithogon yogosigin apasikhe atYesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat hagun hipisak yoma wisubageik nen, waesi lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43004017	Itithogon ekhe lageikhemo, at he etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nagun dek u, ” yogokhikhemo at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nagun dek egen iti eberogonat egen o.
43004018	Hat hagun ageikhe waganhik, thogotdiluk ageikhe waganhik, inebe 5 woginakhigitik nen, yogotak ap ageikhe hipisak welagap iti, hat hagun 'buk. Hat egen iti wene eberogonat egen, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43004019	Itithogon pakhogon yogokhe lageikhemo, at he etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Eiye. La'uk. Hat hebe, eberogonat Allah ane yogeisegetek meke higi, iluk arat hutdagagi o.
43004020	Nen, nit ninopa lak nen, torn yi baga dogolik Allah hogorakhe lagoukha mekeat he, hit Yahudi meke nen he, Allah o werlekmake hogorasusak dek o. O Yerusalem etoma anegat hogorasusak o, iluk egethep iti, ” iluk itithogon yogokhikhemo,
43004021	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “He yi neru e. Wene yokhesigin yi eberogonat apano. O tom yi baga men, o Yerusalem men, etoma anek Allah hogorakhe dogosak 'buk. Hit Allah hogorasusak tak-tak oba, o yabokane ageikhe wi igin meke weregat o.
43004022	Allah nen akhuni tha'bokhogonat tilinabigiluk, nit akhuni Yahudi meke nen wene yakulisoagaluk ninayoko 'bisikhe iti nen he, nit Yahudi meke nen Allah ebe ninilu meke hogorakhe lago mekeat he, hit anek ebe hinokodek mekeat hogorakhethep iti o.
43004023	Itithogon Allah ebe hogorakharek mekeat he, it akhuni nen yabokane Allah hogorakhe dogolik ninat negen hogorasugun meke weregat o. At Allah akla nen, An Nagoreke nen, Allah ebe iti hakene, iluk yakulisugunem mothogon eberogonat hogotnakhe dogoak, iluk, akla apekherek iti nen, yogotak ya nen itithogon hogorakhe dogosak o.
43004024	Allah ebe Agoreke meke iti nen, at hogorasuogoluk Agoreke inomhunik dogolik eberogonat hogorasusak mekeat hogorasusak o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43004025	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at he etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Mesias akhuni tilninabuagaluk Allah nen kok etaga Kristus iti la’isigin. La’i agunem ebe witluk yi wene ti wene tha’bokhogonat nit yakulnisekhe dogogin iluk an nilu o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43004026	Itithogon yogosigin apasikhe, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Ap egen iti ebe, an nipisak wenekak ekhe lago nebe yiat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43004027	Wene itithogon isinem, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inapuke dukhi agoukha hak, Yesus he meke ipisak wenekak isinem, inileken hisalok nen, “Nayuk e, ” iluk, hogorakhukha mekeat, it emenogo aperek nen hinok wogeisekhe dogolik, “He yi. Hat nena meke warlok nen wagan, ” iluk igik, “Yesus. Hat he yi hipisak wenekak nenaluk ekhe lagap, ” igik, yogeisigidek thogotdisukha.
43004028	Itithogon yogeisigidek werek korlek, at he etnogo ageisoak etoma here’isalok, pirlirli o ukul kokma ukisikhesik akhuni etoma meke wene men iluk yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe,
43004029	“Ap ageikhe nen an yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakhe lagei meke tha’bokhogonat pakhogon motok yoknekhe meke ebe eta werek o. At ebe Kristus Allah nen tilninabuagaluk la’isigin meke etnogoat a? Ninat a? Hinileken hobageik nen witni o, ” iluk yogeisilik lageikhe.
43004030	Itithogon yogeisilik lageikhemo, it akhuni emenogo o ukul kokma etoma nen dukhi agoukhasik Yesus ebe ’bikha isuogoluk oba wagoukha.
43004031	’Bikha isuogoluk aban waga korlek, Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen men yogokhukha, “Noe. Hat hipiri tak nan o, ” iluk inane hathigik yogokhukha.
43004032	Itithogon yogosugun apasukha at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Napiri an meke werek mekeat he, ebe ki meke, hit hinokodek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43004033	at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen it-it hinok waganhe dogolik, men isukha, “Akhuni nen yi meke ti meke ageikhe at noagaluk wogosi ageikhama nen ekhe he a? ” iluk isukha.
43004034	Itithogon isukhama at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “At an la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo akla apekherek meke tak-tagat hagakhe lagei iti inom, an hagasuagaluk nayoko 'bisikhe meke iti yabu ilugun thirliphogon hagasigiluk hagakhe lagei iti inom, an napiri itiat o.
43004035	Nen, hit nen ekhe dogolik, Thut henagan dogoluk nen ageikhe baga halok eken ugu arat palugun o, iluk egethep mekeat he, an nen wene ageikhe yokhisak. Ai yago meke hinileken lakhani o! Eken ugu horle agasik palusak tak-tagat werek o.
43004036	Ebe arat palho halok he, ap ageikhe ai yakherek meke inom, nen, ageikhe eken palherek meke inom, ipisak inakla arleken akhoagaluk, yogotak at ageikhe eken paliogo meke iti oko horliliogoat o. Oko horliliogo iti ebe re, eken palogo natogorlogo 'begarek iti hak, akhuni iniluk motok dogoagaluk natogorlogo 'bisiliogo itiat o.
43004037	Wene yi, inane dagakhogon ekhe dogolik, At ageikhe nen ai yakhik, at ageikhe nen eken palhik, hagakharek iluk iliogei iti eberogonat o.
43004038	It aperek nen yabu thet weakhogon waganha meke, hit nen thet degat eken palubageik iluk hinayoko 'biluk la'inagagi iti. It nen yabu thet weak halok, ebe winametdega meke, hit nen eken palhe dogobageik iluk la'inagagi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43004039	Nen, at he etnogo uma ukisikhesik, wene men yogeisasikhe, “At ap iti nen, an yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakhe lagei meke tha’bokhogonat pakhogon motok yoknekhe, ” iluk yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe iti baga, akhuni o Samaria meke etoma inebe doalegat inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha.
43004040	Itithogon hakotdisukhasik nen, yabokane Yesus oba dukhi agoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Hat ninom yoma dogouok o, ” iluk hakhasukhama, inom etoma iniki pere welagoukha.
43004041	Yesus inom etoma dogolik, alep inebe pererlagat negen inetaiken at oba hakotdisukha mekeat, yabokane wene at ebe nen yakulisugunem, inasuk holhukhasik nen, inebe motok doalegat inetaiken at oba hakotdisukhasik,
43004042	he etnogo men yogokhukha, “Yogotak nit ninetaiken at oba hakotdogo yi, wene hat nen yoknisegen iti baga anek ninetaiken at oba hakotdogo ’buk. Dek o. At he, at ebe nen wene yoknisugunem ninekaerek nen ninasuk tomok holhik, Akhuni agat oba meke tha'bokhogonat tilinakherek meke ebe yiat o, iluk hutdiluk ninilu ageik, hagakho iti baga nen ninetaiken at oba hakotdogoat o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43004043	At Yesus iki pere etoma inom welagoukhasik nen, o Galilea arat dagei ageikhe.
43004044	Dagei ageikhe iti, at Yesus ekaerek nen ekhe dogolik, “Ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke iti, inekaerek inaila meke inoe inagot nen inalon halinakharek motok dek o, ” iluk, alebat yogeisasikhe mekeat,
43004045	it akhuni o Galilea meke o Yerusalem pesta Paskah hagakhunem usasukhasik werekma, Yesus nen yi meke ti meke hagakhunem inileken hasukhasikmo nogo nen, at ebe dagei agunem heagei warogo waganhukha.
43004046	At Yesus ebe itithogon heagei warogo waganhukhama, alebat i meke anggur eken apusu hagakhikhe baga o Galilea ukul etaga Kana etnogo wageikhe. Wageikhesik werekma, ap kok pemerintah meke ageikhe, aila o Kapernaum meke, a’but oba u warek welageikhe.
43004047	Werekma akhuni nen, “Yesus etnogo o Yudea nen Galilea dagei agasik werek o, ” iluk isukhama asuk holhikhesik oba wageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. An na'but oba u watlasusak motok werekma, hat lalok nen hagasi lanogoluk hayoko wagei o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43004048	at Yesus nen, ap kok etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hit akhuni yoma hinobabut, an nen hit hinilu asuagaluk elalin meke ageikhe hagakhunem hinileken nealok anek, hinetaiken noba hakotdusak hisekhe lagei. Elalin meke hagakhidek halok hinetaiken noba hakotdusak dek hisekhe lagei yi re! ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43004049	ap kok etnogo nen yogokhe dogolik, “Noe o. An na'but ebe aban watlageidek werek korlek etaat hagatnok nen luok o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
43004050	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hapuke lan o. Ha'but iti oba u arat dek atluk iluk asigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, ap etnogo akla nen apekhe dogolik, “Wene yoknekhe iti eberogonat yoknekhe higi, ” iluk, etaiken Yesus oba hakotdiluk lageikhe.
43004051	Itithogon akla ebetdiluk holagarlem aban lagunem, at atuaneke aperek wene wolok wagoukha hak inom abuk agoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Hat ha'but etnogo u arat dek agama nen wago” iluk yogokhukhama,
43004052	at nen it inoba hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “O mo ka baga nen u dek aga, ” yogeisasikhemo, it nen men yogokhukha, “Hiamagane dikene jam satu tak-tak oba agaken etnogo arat dek aga o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43004053	at elege opase etnogo nen akla ebekhe dogolik, “Hiamagane dikene o mo eta tak-tagat, at Yesus nen, Ha'but u dek asigin o, iluk, yoknekhe tak-tagat u dek agama, ” iluk, akla ebetdiluk lageikhesik nen, at ebe men, a'buri men, inebe tha'bokhogonat inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha.
43004054	At Yesus ebe o Yudea nen Galilea alep dagei ageikhesik akhuni nen ebe hutduagaluk elalin meke alep ageikhe hagakhikhesik oba nen, yabokane dagei ageikhesik, ageikhe hagakhikhe iti.
43005001	Itithogon hagatluk nen, it Yahudi meke pesta ageikhe hagakhe lagoukha meke hagakhunem Yesus yabokane o Yerusalem usasikhe.
43005002	O Yerusalem etoma, leget horlako leget ape palekma ageikhe etaga Domba Agolak egarek meke horok horok etoma i yekelek kolam ineramen hulelogo 'bisukhama ageikhe, it Ibrani meke inane baga etaga Betesda egarek meke yekelek welageikhe. I yekelek kolam iti aik obake etoma dagak-dagak, orlisa 5 oba hano halek werekma,
43005003	-
43005004	akhuni doalegat inoba u warek meke inom, inileken puk meke inom, initibagal weak meke inom, inae ut warek meke inom, etoma witita dogolik, [i yekelek etnogo hibiku-yogoku aborlok isinem therogo welagoukha. Itithogon therogo werekma, malaikat Allah meke usatluk, i etnogo aborlogothugunem, it akhuni inoba u warek meke emenogo ageikhe tak alebageik i yekelekma etnogo usekhe halok, yi u ti u inoba akin meke alhe meke tha'bokhogonat dek aga lagoukha iti nen, therogo welagoukha iti. ]
43005005	Itithogon therogo welagoukha meke ap ageikhe oba u warek werek korlek 38 tahun hagatlageikhe meke inom inebe etoma witik werekma,
43005006	Yesus ileken hasikhesik nen, “Ap yi haganeat nen yigithogon welagarekma higi, ” iluk ileken ekagat hasikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Nopase. Hat hano hagathabusak warlok a? Ha'it a, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43005007	ap etnogo nen men yogokhikhe, “Nagot o. I yekelek yi aborlok isinem, an nebe hapokhogon ima kola'anusak meke, an nagarumi yoma dek nogo nen, nabusagat nen erogat usagaluk walhasi korlek, it aperek tak alebageik usiliogei o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43005008	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Nopase. Hebe melatluk nen, harlit thabuleka talek meke ithi horlalok lan o, ”
43005009	iluk, yogokhe korlek eranogoat ap etnogo oba u dek ageikhesik nen, arlit talek meke etnogo yukulogo horlalok lageikhe. At Yesus nen ap u hano hagakhikhe iti, it akhuni Yahudi meke iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat welageikharek etnogo baga hagakhikhe.
43005010	Itithogon werlegat werek korlek hagakhikhemo lagunem, it ap koktek Yahudi meke nen inileken hasukhasik nen, ap u kerat dek ageikhe meke etnogo men yogokhukha, “Yak yi. O yogotak nen, niniki 7 baga nit Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, hat harlit eka wolok lausak dek meke wolok laga lagan, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43005011	at ap etnogo nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Dek o. An ap u hagatnakhe meke iti nen, Harlit eka horlalok lan, iluk yoknekhemo nen horlalok waga lagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43005012	it nen hinok oba wokhekhe dogolik, “Ap iti, tha nen, Harlit eka talek horlalok lan, iluk yokhekhe, ” iluk oba hinok wokhasukha mekeat he,
43005013	at Yesus akhuni inebe doalegat welagoukha meke emenogo inakla nalageikhemo, at ap oba u hano hagakhikhe meke etnogo nen, “Tha nen hagatnakhesik yoknekhe heat, ” iluk obakha palageikhesik welageikhe.
43005014	Itithogon hagakhukhasikmo nen, yabokane at Yesus ap etnogo ipisak Allah ai halekma abuk agoukhasik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Nopase. Yogotak hat hoba u arat dek aga iti yabokane weak kok meke ageikhe hoba asunogo, weak meke ageikhe hagakhun o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43005015	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at ap etnogo it ap koktek Yahudi meke inoba lageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap an u hagatnakhe igi etnogo, Yesus nenat hagatnakhemo o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43005016	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it akhuni Yahudi meke Allah hasik iniki 7 baga werlegat werek korlek, Yesus nen ap etnogo u hano hagakhikhe iti nen, at Yesus ebe weagatduogoluk hagakhukha.
43005017	Itithogon hagakhukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen wene men yogeisasikhe, “An nopase iki ageikhe thogotdigidek, o yogotak yi inomat hagarinakho motok welagarek iti hak, an itithogonat hagarinakho welagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43005018	it ap koktek Yahudi meke emenogo nen iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, Yesus nen u hano hagasusak dek meke hagakhikhe iti baga anek ebe wasuogoluk isukha 'buk. At he, at nen, “An nebe Allah ninom tak-tak, ” u hak he, “An nopase ebe Allah at o, ” iluk isikhe iti nen, ebe wasuogoluk ebenageik abok palhe lagoukha.
43005019	Itithogon abok palhe lagoukhama, at Yesus nen, ap emenogo wene yigithogon yogeisasikhe, “Yi meke ti meke an nopase nen hagakhunem nileken higidek, an nakla nen kagalogo hagasusak erlok dek iti nen he, an nopase hagakherek meke tak-tagat hagakhe lagei o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o.
43005020	An nopase nen, a'but an etaiken hunik motok dogolik, at ebe nenat yi meke ti meke hagakherek meke tha'bokhogonat yakulnukhunem yogotak ya hagakhunem hinileken neegep iti re, herlekha'bugat negen meke re, yabokane hit nen hogorasuagaluk yakulnukhunem kok meke hagakhunem hit hinileken neagun meke weregat o.
43005021	Nen, an nopase nen akhuni warek meke inilugurinakherek iti hak, a'but an nen itithogonat inilugurinabigin, iluk nakla apegerek meke inebe tomok inilugurinakherek.
43005022	-
43005023	Akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen an nopase hogorakharek iti hak, an a’but itithogonat hogotnakhe dogoagaluk, at nen akhuni oak denogo wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakherek dek o. A’but an nenat, akhuni oak denogo wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasuagaluk, niki baga ’bisikhe o. Halok he, it akhuni aperek nen an hogotnabiogei dek halok he, an nopase la’ani ageikhe meke iti, hogorariogei degat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik wene yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
43005024	“It akhuni tha nen, an nane waganhe dogolik, inetaiken an la’ani ageikhe meke etnogo oba hakotdugun halok, akhuni watlatluk lageikharek erlo thogotdisalok iniluk motok dogogun meke erlo baga arat wageikhasik werek o. Iniluk motok dogogun meke iteerek ageikhasik werek iti nen, yabokane wene inoba ’bigin dek o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
43005025	Nen, akhuni warek meke nen, an Allah a’but nane inasuk holugun oba aban werek mekeat he, arat asi agasik werek o. It nane inasuk holugun meke halok, iniluk atluk iniluk motok dogogun o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi o.
43005026	Iniluk motok welageikharek meke erlo an nopase ekaerek ite welagarek iti hak, a’but an niki baga ’banhikhemo iteerek welagei o.
43005027	An nebe abat itaklasi agagi iti nen, akhuni oak denogo wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasuagaluk, nopase nen anat niki baga ’banhikhe o.
43005028	-
43005029	Nen, yabokane akhuni tha’bokhogonat inoak obake tomok nen, an nane inasuk holiluk, iniluk asugun hurli itinem werek o. It akhuni nen inobabut hano hagakhe lagoukha meke halok, iniluk motok dogoagaluk meldisigik, nen, it aperek inobabut weak hagakhe lagoukha meke halok, wene inoba ’bigiluk meldisigik, hagasigin iluk yokhisigi iti nen, Wene iti nayuk e, iluk, hogorakhup o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43005030	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An narligat nakla nen kagalogo yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok dek iti nen, an nen nakla apalok hagakhe lagei dek o. At an la'ani ageikhe meke akla apekherek meke hagasigiluk hagakhe lagei iti nen, nopase ane mutlugat, akhuni oak denogo wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakhe lagei iti, mothogonat hagakhe lagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43005031	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe yogeisekhe dogolik, “An nebe hutdanuagaluk nekaerek nabok pilinogo yokhiselema, eberogonat iluk hinakla apelep dek o.
43005032	Itithogon mekeat he, an nebe hutdanuagaluk, at ageikhe nen nabok pilinogo yokhisiliogo iti, eberogonat yokhisiliogo iluk, an nilu o.
43005033	Nen, hit nen, Yohanes oba an nobasik hinok waganuagaluk hinagarumi yoko la'isasigipmo at nen, ebe wene hasik nabok pakhogon yokhisasikhe apigi.
43005034	An nebe hutdanuagaluk akhuni nen nabok pilinogo yogeisegarek iti warlok nen yokhisekhe lagei 'buk. Allah nen hit tilhinabuagaluk yokhisekhe lagei o.
43005035	At Yohanes iti ebe re, isagal yibarlogo 'bisinem yakherek hak werekma, hit nen, Isagal yago ninoba 'bekhe dogoak iluk, elanma hasigat hinakla arleken akhekhe lagagip iti,
43005036	an nebe hutdanuagaluk, at nen nabok pilinogo yokhisekhe lageikhe mekeat he, erlok dek negen. At he, an nopase nen, Nayabu ato 'bigidek tha'bokhogon hagatno, iluk, nayoko 'bisikhemo hagakhe lagei iti baga anek he, akhuni nen, At ebe opase nen la'i ageikhemo, iluk nabok isinem inasuk holiluk nebe hutdanu hagat, hutdanusak o.
43005037	An nebe hutdanuagaluk, nopase nen la'ani ageikhe meke iti nen, nabok pakhogonat yokhisasikhe mekeat he, hit nen nopase ane hinasuk holhidegat, elokhoken hinileken higidegat dogolik
43005038	at nen nayoko 'biluk la'ani ageikhe mekeat he, hinetaiken noba hakotdekhe lagap dek iti nen, at ane hinakla werek motok dek o.
43005039	Hit nen apekhe dogolik, Niniluk motok dogogun he, Allah ane holal waganek hago welago yi bagaat dogogun o, iluk, holal waganek iti hanorogon 'bikhegethep mekeat he, holal waganek iti, an nebe hutdanuagaluk holal waganhukhama werek korlegat,
43005040	hinebe hinilugutdinaguagaluk an noba wisusak, hina'it o.
43005041	Itithogon hagakhethep mekeat he, an anek he, akhuni nen hogotnabuagaluk hagakherek dek o.
43005042	Hit anek he, Allah hinakmurogo welagathep motok dek iti, an hinobabut nilu o.
43005043	An nopase nen la'ani ageikhemo wagagi mekeat he, hit nen an nebe woknakhe lagap dek o. Itithogon mekeat he, at ageikhe ekaerek akla apalok nen waga halok anek, ebe waganugun hinobabut hisekhe lagei o.
43005044	Allah arligat ikhok motok welagarek iti nen hogothinabuagaluk hagakhidek dogolik, hit-hirat hat ageikhe nen hogorakhik, hat ageikhe nen hogorakhik, hogorakhekhe lagap iti nen, hinetaiken an noba nikithogon hakotdusak apegep. Erlok dek o.
43005045	Meke re, an nen Allah il oba wene hinoba 'bigin iluk hinakla apugup o. At he, Musa ane iti bagaat hanotninabigin iluk hinakla arleken akhegethep mekeat he, at nenat, wene hinoba 'bigin o.
43005046	An nabok hinilu asuagaluk, at Musa nen holal waganogo 'bisikhe iti nen, at nen holal waganhikhe meke iti eberogonat iluk hutdekhe dogolepma, Yesus eberogonat, iluk hutdanilebat o.
43005047	Meke re, wene Musa nen holal waganogo 'bisikhe meke iti, hit nen eberogonat iluk hutdigidek dogolik, an nane iti nikithogon hutdiluk eberogonat iluk apagun. Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006001	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhesik yabokane, at Yesus i yekelek Galilea, etaga ageikhe Tiberias egarek iti, aik ilibaganke italhikhe.
43006002	I aik ilibaganke italhunem, alebat akhuni inoba u warek meke elalinathagarinakhunem inileken hasukhasikmo nogo nen he, akhuni inebe doalegat doaldiluk, at oporlik lagoukha.
43006003	Oporlik laga korlek, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inomat dukhisukhasik, tom ukul oba dageisukhasik hurek lagoukha.
43006004	Nen, eta mot-mot, it akhuni Yahudi meke nen, “Allah nen tilninakhikhe, ” iluk inakla eberogo pesta etagaPaskah nekarek etnogo nausak oba arat hakok i ageikhe.
43006005	Itithogon hurek lagoukhasik, at Yesus ileken aliluke lageisasikhe hak, akhuni doalegat natogosi agunem ileken lageisalok, Filipus men yogokhikhe, “Filipus. Akhuni doalegat ethoma hipiri noak nen, o koma meke oko palisa luok o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43006006	Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, at Yesus nen hagasigin meke ilu dogoligat, at Filipus obabut paligiluk yogokhikhe iti.
43006007	Itithogon yogosigin apasikhe, at Filipus nen, men yogokhikhe. “Akhuni nen yabu iniki opakiat hasik hagakhunem iniki oko uang perak wogeisegarek iti meke nit nen 200 oba hipiri roti meke oko palisa laumo, akhuni yoma, 'bugurlak 'bugurlak eken waganhigik erlok nausak a? Erlok dek o, ” iluk isikhemo
43006008	at Yesus nen agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe etaga Andreas, Simon Petrus etnogo agot nen, men yogokhikhe,
43006009	“Noe. Yoma elege ageikhe hipiri roti jelai werago meke 5 oba, nen ikan pere meke inom hago werek mekeat he, akhuni motok doalegat yigirlikmo erlok nausak a? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
43006010	at Yesus nen agarumi emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Akhuni ethoma hurek lasuak nen, yogeisani o, ” iluk isikhemo, pipuk erlo hunik doalegat talek werekma hureklarik lagoukhama, akhuni inebe doalegat meke re, ap anek inebe 5. 000 oba iniki wenageinakhukha.
43006011	Itithogon hureklarik lagoukhama, at Yesus nen hipiri roti meke eranogo ikimo waganhikhesik nen, “Allah nopase, ” iluk heagei warogo, akhuni doalegat hurek lagoukha meke emenogo supurisalok, ikan eranogo itithogonat supurisasikhe. Supurisasikhemo, it inakla nen, nelo apasukha meke re, hipiri ina'ithogon nasukha.
43006012	Hipiri ina’ithogon nasukhama, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Hipiri nekasik ilugun titurogon 'bega meke ethoma alomatlasunogo iluk, natogorlogo opakimo 'bini o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43006013	hipiri roti jelai meke werago 5 baga emenogo nasukhasik nen, titurogon 'bisukha meke mul yago 12 meke apem hetokhigik ukharlogo 'bisukha.
43006014	Itithogon ukharlogo 'bisukhama, at Yesus nen ebe hutduagaluk elalinat hagakhikhe meke iti, it akhuni inileken hasukhasikmo nogo nen, men isukha, “Ap ageikhe nen Allah ane agat oba yoma yoknisasigin isukha etnogo eberogonat, ebe yiat o, ” iluk isukha.
43006015	Itithogon isukhama, at Yesus akla nen, “It iti witluk, an it inoe kok dogoagaluk inane inobatnerogon meldanugun higi, ” iluk inobabut ekagat palhikhesik nan, o etoma here'isalok tom oba arligat dageisikhe.
43006016	-
43006017	At Yesus ebe arligat dageisikhesik, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inoba wageidek aban werek korlek, o arat hi isikhemo, it anek i yekelek etnogo aik oba usa'agoukhasik nen, ku akla ukisukhasik, warogo o Kapemaum italuogoluk wagoukha.
43006018	Itali agunem, hisakne aninirogon hubetha ageikhe iti nen, i hoklabu kok ageikhe.
43006019	I hoklabu kogat hagakhe korlek, it emenogo ku warik turlem heisogo 5 kilometer a, 6 kilometer a, walegat asi agoukha hak, at Yesus etnogo i agoum obake holak isok 'bilik inoba mot-mot horogat wagunem, inileken lakhalok nen inayuk motok agoukha.
43006020	Inayuk motok agoukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Hinagorakma. An nebeat waga lagei. Halok he, hinayuk agup o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43006021	it inakla arlekenhogon Yesus ebe ku akla kola'uogoluk hagakhe korlek eranogoat, ku etnogo it nen i aik oba elaat italugun o, iluk inakla apasukhama eranogoat arat itali agoukha.
43006022	Itali agoukhasik oba nen, noge iluk hubuluke, it akhuni doalegat i aik ilibaganke 'bisalok wagoukha meke emenogo inakla nen, “Eiya. Hiam ku opakiat anek welaga meke re, at Yesus ebe inom dek. At agarumi ane waganiogei meke anek ku warogo italhunem ninileken hisogo, ” iluk inakla apasukha. Itithogon ku ebe dek halogat isukha meke re,
43006023	yabokane ku ninat meke aperek akhuni o etaga Tiberias meke nen warik, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus nen sembayan Allah heagei warogo nen hipiri roti meke supurisasikhemo nasukha baga etnogo alilu itali agoukhasik werekma, inileken hasukha.
43006024	Inileken hasukhasik inakla nen apekhe dogolik, “Yesus ebe men, agarumi at ane waganiogei meke men, inebe dek yoma, ” iluk, ku akla ukiluk, Yesus ebe herarik o Kapemaum itali agoukha.
43006025	It akhuni emenogo itali agoukhasik, at Yesus o Kapernaum werekma oba wagoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Noe, Hat o yoma mera wagan, ” iluk oba hinok wokhasukhama
43006026	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An wene ageikhe yokhisak. An nebe hutdanubageik iluk elalinat hagakhunem hinileken neegep etnogo nen heraknabik wagap 'buk. Dek o. Hipiri roti meke supusogon wokhisigima hina'ithogon nekep etnogo nenat heraknabik wagap hisigi o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi.
43006027	Hipiri hirli atluk dek asusak meke hasik yabu hagakhup o. At he, hipiri motok dogogin meke neke dogolik, iniluk motok dogosak meke iti, an nenat wokhisekhe dogoagaluk, nopase nen nayoko 'biluk la'ani ageikhemo, abat itaklasi agagi iti hasik yabu hagakhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006028	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it nen at men yogokhukha, “Noe. Allah akla apekherek meke hagakhe dogouok nen, nit ninobabut nikithogon hagakhe dogogun? ” iluk, oba hinok waganhukhama,
43006029	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Allah akla apekherek meke hit nen hagasusak iti ebe yiat o. An Allah nen la'ani ageikhemo wagagi meke yi, hinetaiken noba hakotdusak itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43006030	it nen men yogokhukha, “Hebe hutdaguagaluk, elalin meke ageikhe hagakhunem ninileken 'bikhealok, ninetaiken hoba hakotduok nen, ebe ki meke hagasigin. Ageikhe nikithogon hagasigin.
43006031	Nit ninopa lak o limo akhuni dekma dogolik, hipiri nau hak, etaga manna meke neke lagoukha iluk, Allah ane holal men iluk waganek werek, It inapiri neke dogoagaluk, at nen pogot oba meke usabi aga lageikhe,\rq (Keluaran 16:4,15; Nehemia 9:15; Mazmur 78:24)\rq* iluk holal waganek werek hagat, neke lagoukha, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43006032	-
43006033	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nen wene eberogonat meke ageikhe yokhisak. Hipiri pogot oba nen usakhisa aga lageikhe iti re, at Musa nen 'buk. Dek o. At he, hipiri ebe meke iti, nopase nen an nebe akhuni agat oba meke inilugurinakherek meke pogot oba nen usa'agagi itiat wokhisekherek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006034	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen, men yogokhukha, “Noe. Hipiri iti meke woknisekho motok dogono o, ” iluk yokhukhama,
43006035	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hipiri inilugurinakherek meke iti, an nebeat o. Ap tha nen noba wageik, etaiken noba hakotdigik, hagasigin halok he, hipiri abu ageik, i abu ageik, hagakhe dogogin dek o.
43006036	Meke re, an nen wene alebat yokhisigi hagat, hinileken neekhe lagap mekeat he, hinetaiken noba hakotdusak hina'it o.
43006037	-
43006038	Meke re, an pogot oba nen usa'agagi iti, an nekaerek nakla nen kagalogo hagasigiluk usa'agagi 'buk. At la'ani ageikhe meke akla apekherek meke itiat mothogon hagasigiluk usa'agagi iti nen he, akhuni an nopase nen woknekherek meke inebe tomok noba wagunem, an nen, Hit an noba wisusak dek, iluk, wenageisagein motok dek o.
43006039	Nen, at akla apekherek meke an nen hagasuagaluk la'ani ageikhe iti, ebe yi, At nen akhuni an woknekherek meke tha'bokhogonat ageikhe naldigidegat, o ilugun hurli baga, an nenat inilugurinabuagaluk
43006040	nopase akla apekherek o. Nen, nopase itithogon akla apekhe dogolik, akhuni nen Allah a'but nebe yi inileken niigik, inetaiken noba hakotdigik, hagakhe halok, inebe dopok iniluk motok dogoagaluk, o ilugun hurli baga, an nen inilugurinabuagaluk akla apekherek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006041	Nen, at Yesus nen itithogon yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hipiri roti pogot oba meke iti, an nebeat usa'agagi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe iti nen, it ap Yahudi meke nen, at abok kurlu-kurlu palhe dogolik,
43006042	“At yi etaga Yesus, ap Yusuf a'but. Nen, at opase agosa ninilu mekeat, at nen ekhe dogolik, An nebe pogot oba nen usa'agagi, iluk ekhe iti nikithogon nen ekhe apegep, ” iluk isukhama,
43006043	at Yesus nen, “Hit-hit nabok kurlu-kurlu nabok palhe lagap iti, palhe 'buk o.
43006044	An nopase la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo nen, akhuni lit-lit an noba wogosik wageidek halok, noba wisusak erlok dek o. At nen, it aperek lit-lit wogosik wagunem noba wisugun halok, o ilugun hurli baga, an nen inilugurinabiginat o.
43006045	Wene iti hasik it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik men isukha, It akhuni tha'bokhogonat Allah nenat wene yakulisagein o,\rq (Yesaya 54:13)\rq* iluk, holal waganogo 'bisukha iti hagat, akhuni an nopase ane inasuk holiluk, at nen yakulisugunem yakulha halok, inebe tomok an noba wageikharegat o.
43006046	Wene yokhisigi yi re, it akhuni opakiat ageikhe nen, an nopase iti inileken hasukha iluk yokhisigi 'buk. Dek o. At he, an narligat Allah werekma nen wagagi meke yi anek, nopase nileken hasigi o.
43006047	Ap tha nen etaiken an noba hakotdekhe halok he, iniluk motok welageikharek meke iteerek agasik werek o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
43006048	wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hipiri inilugurinakherek meke iti, an nebeat o.
43006049	Hit hinopa lak o limo akhuni dekma dogolik hipiri nau hak, manna iti meke neke lagoukha meke re, inebe watlarik wagoukhaat.
43006050	Itithogon watlarik wagoukha meke re, hipiri ebe meke pogot oba nen usa'ageikhe iti. Itithogon usa'ageikhesikmo, tha nen hipiri iti meke nasi halok, at ebe watlageidek iluk motok dogogin o.
43006051	Hipiri inilugurinakherek meke pogot oba nen usa’ageikhe iti re, an nebeat o. Hipiri an nen wogeisagein meke iti, tha nen nasi halok, at ebe iluk motok dogogin o. Akhuni agat oba meke iniluk dogoagaluk an nebe it inobasik watlasigin iti, an nebeat wogeisagein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006052	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it ap Yahudi meke emenogo nen, it-it wene palhe dogolik, wene men isukha, “Warligi yi. Ap yi ebe meke nit noagaluk nikithogon woknisagaluk nen yoknisekhe apegep, ” iluk isukhama,
43006053	at Yesus nen, “An nen wene ageikhe yokhisak o. An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo nebe nikik, namep nikik, hagakhe lagap dek halok, iniluk motok welageikharek meke, hit iteerek ageidek welagap o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
43006054	Meke re, tha nen an nebe nikik, namep nikik, hagariogo halok, iniluk motok dogogun meke iteerek atluk werekma, o ilugun hurli baga an nen ilugutdigin o
43006055	An nebe inom, namep inom, iti re, hinapiri hinagei ebe mekeat o.
43006056	Tha nen an nebe nikik, namep nikik, hagariogo halok he, at nen an nipisak hunigat, nen, an nen, at nipisak hunigat, dogogun o.
43006057	An nopase iluk motok welagarek meke nen la'ani ageikhemo wagagi etnogo, at iluk welagarek iti nen an niluk welagarek hak, tha nen, an nebe neke halok, an niluk welagarek iti nen, at ilugat dogogin o.
43006058	Nen, hipiri pogot oba nen usa’ageikhe meke yi, hit hinopa lak neke lagoukha meke inebe watlaga lagoukha iti hakene dek mekeat he, ap tha nen hipiri ebe meke yi nasi halok, iluk motok dogogin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006059	Wene Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, at ebe o Kapernaum o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma wene yakulisekhe dogolik yogeisasikhe.
43006060	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo aperek inebe doalegat wene iti inasuk holhukhasik nen, men isukha, “Wene ekhe iti re, akin werekma, tha hak nen waganigin apegep? Erlok dek o, ” iluk isukha.
43006061	Itithogon at ebe yogokhidek isukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen, “Wene igi etnogo hasik nagarumi nen ua palogo wene paliogei higi” iluk inobabut ekagat palhikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Wene yokhisigi meke yi nen, At nina'it, iluk kolelogo thogotdanuogoluk hagakhe lagap a?
43006062	An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo alebat welagagimo yabokane napuke dageisinem hinileken nealok nen, hinakla nikithogon apagun.
43006063	Allah Agoreke nen akhuni inilugurinakherek o. Nen, akhuni agat oba meke inobatne baga ageikhe hagasusak erlok dek o. Meke re, wene an nen yokhisekhe lagei iti, Allah Agoreke nenat ekherek meke nogo nen he, akhuni inilugurinakherek wene yokhisekhe lagei o.
43006064	Wene iti baga inilugurinakherek mekeat he, hit hetnake yoma eberogonat iluk hinetaiken an noba hakotdigidek welagap higi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, it aperek inetaiken at oba hakotdigidek meke inom, at ageikhe nen Yesus ebe wasuagaluk yoko ligin meke inom, it ap iti itithogon hagasugun, iluk at keram nenat ilu welageikhesikmo nogo nen, wene itithogon yogeisasikhe iti.
43006065	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Itithogon iluk, an nen, Akhuni Allah nen inakla kagalhidek halok, an noba wisusak erlok dek iti nen, wene itithogon yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006066	Wene itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it akhuni at ane holek welagoukha meke emenogo inebe doalegat Yesus ebe thogotdisalok dukhisukhasik nen, yabokane oporlik nekhe dogouogoluk, oba wageidek huk asi agoukha.
43006067	Akhuni aperek itithogon oporlik lageidek huk agoukhama, at Yesus nen agarumi 12 emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “Hit meneke, itithogonat here'aniluk dukhuogoluk apekhe lagap a? ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006068	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, at Simon Petrus etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Eiye. Noe. Ninebe niniluk motok dogosak hasik meke wene re, hat nen yoknisekhe lagan ha yoma re. Hat here’agaluk ap tha baga lausak apegen. Dek o.
43006069	Nit nen, ninoe hat Allah ekaerek hasik meldageiluk, eberogonat at nen la’agei ageikhemo iluk, hutdagagosik ninetaiken hat hoba hakotdiluk welago, ” iluk itithogon yogokhikhemo,
43006070	at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “An nen hit hinebe 12 oba yi wenakhinakhigi dek nogo? An nenat wenakhinakhigi mekeat, hat opakiat ageikhe Iblis mekeat welagan o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43006071	Wene itithogon isikhe iti, ap Yudas, Simon Iskariot a’but hasigat isikhe. At ap iti ebe Yesus agarumi inebe 12 emenogo mekeat he, yabokane Yesus ebe wasuagaluk yoko lageikhe iti meke hasik isikhe iti.
43007001	Wene itithogon arat yogeisasikhesik nen, it ap koktekYahudi meke nen, Yesus ebe wasuogoluk abok palhe lagoukha iti nen he, at ebe o Yudea usalok nekhe dogou a’it nen, o Galilea eloke etoma nekhe lageikhe.
43007002	Itithogon nekhe lageikhe etanemat, it akhuni Yahudi meke haganeat orlisa haldiluk welagoukha meke inakla eberogo, pesta isago nausak oba arat hakok i ageikhe.
43007003	-
43007005	Itithogon hakok i ageikhemo dogolik, at Yesus ekaerek agarlak lak meke meneke, inetaiken at oba hakotdigidek welagoukha iti nen he, men yogokhukha, “Hat hagarumi hane waganiogei meke emenogo nen, hat hagakhetek meke hagakhunem inileken heoak nen, o yoma thogotdiluk o Yudea usan ta. Ap inetaga werek asuogoluk inakla apekhe dogolik halok he, limago hagakharek dek o. Halok he, hat hagakhe lagan iti, akhuni agat oba meke inebe tha'bokhogonat inilu asuagaluk winamhogon hagasi usan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43007006	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “O hibiku-yogoku hit nen hagasusak meke, erlok werek meke re, an nen hagasusak oba hakok i ageidek aban werek o.
43007007	It akhuni agat oba meke nen hit halok he, ina'it motok, hagathinabiogei dek mekeat he, an nen, It hagakharek iti weak motok, iluk egerek iti nen, anat ina'it motok hagatnabiogei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
43007008	ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An hagasusak oba aban werek iti nen, pesta hagasugun iti hagakhunem yogotak yaat usagein dek o. Hit anek usekhe dogoni o, ”
43007009	iluk yogeisasikhesik, at o Galilea etoma huk ageikhe.
43007010	Itithogon huk ageikhemo, at agarlak lak emenogo anek pesta etnogo hagakhunem arat usasukhasikmo nen, at Yesus yabokane akhuni inokodek werek korlek limago usasikhe.
43007011	Etoma usasikhesik werek korlek, it ap koktek Yahudi meke pesta hagakhunem dogolik Yesus ebe herasuogoluk hinok waganhe dogolik, “At ebe koma werek? ” iluk isukhama,
43007012	it akhuni doalegat emenogo inasuk holhukhasik nen, inane hok-hok ekhe dogolik, it aperek nen, “At hano, ” ugunem, nen, it aperek nen, “Dek o. At weak. Akhuni nukhetdisiliogo, ” iluk isukha.
43007013	Itithogon isukha mekeat he, it ap koktek Yahudi meke inayuk nen, Yesus abok inane thelekmarogon palhidek. La'bokhogon anek isukha.
43007014	Pesta etnogo nilik laga korlek heisogo Yesus Allah ai halekma ukisikhesik, wene yakulisekhe lageikhe.
43007015	Yakulisugunem, it ap koktek Yahudi meke nen hogorakhe dogolik men isukha, “Eiye! Nayuk o. Ap yi sekolah hagakhidek mekeat, yi wene ti wene yoma nikithogon nen ilu aga apegep? ” iluk isukhama,
43007016	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nen wene yakulhisekhe lagei iti, an nakla nen kagalogo yakulhisekhe lagei dek mekeat he, at an la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo nen yoknekhe korlek yakulhisekhe lagei o.
43007017	Tha nen Allah akla apekherek meke mothogon hagasusak warlok halok, an nen wene yakulisekhe lagei iti, Allah nen yakulekhe korlek iliogo, igik, Ekaerek akla nen kagalogo iliogo, igik, ekagat halok ilu asiginat o.
43007018	Halok he, tha nen wene ekaerek akla nen kagalogo ekherek iti, akhuni nen hogorasuagaluk ekherek o. Meke re, tha nen, at la'i ageikhe meke hogorasuagaluk ekherek halok he, ekalat ekherek motok dek o. At he, eberogonat ekherek o.
43007019	Nen, Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti, Musa nen holal waganogo wokhisasikhe dek nogo? Wokhisasikheat apigi. Meke re, ap hit meke ageikhe nen wene iti mothogon hagakhidek dogolik an nasuogoluk abok palhe lagap iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43007020	it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “A! Hat mokat obabut weak meke hakla ukekhesik thinuknuk agatik ekhe lagan a? Tha nen hasigiluk iliogo nen ekhe lagan? ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43007021	at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “An nen opaki hasik elalinat hagakhi meke re, hit tha'bokhogonat nen, Eiye! iluk hinayuk aga iti.
43007022	Meke re, hit hina'buri inoado aperlagap palinakhethep iti, erlo at Musa 'buk. Dek o. Erlo Musa ebe aban itaklageidek werek korlek ninopa lak nen palinakhe lagoukha mekeat o. Iti nen, Musa nen itithogon palinabusak iluk yokhisasikhemo, hiniki 7 bagaAllah hasik werlegat dogolik palinakhethep iti.
43007023	Nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke at Musa nen woknisasikhe meke iti thagalinogo iluk, iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik inoado palinakhethep mekeat he, an nen niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, ap ageikhe ebe motok hano hagakhi meke re, hit nenaluk wenaknekhe lagap?
43007024	Wene ebe thekekhogon hinokodek mekeat he, we wene thelekma meke anek hinilu dogolik, akhuni aperek wene inoba 'busak dek o. Wene thekekhogon hinilu atluk nen, weak hagakharek tak-tagat wene inoba 'bekhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43007025	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisekho werekma, it akhuni o Yerusalem meke inebe hetlake nen men ekhe lagoukha, “Ap wasuogoluk herariogei etnogo ebe ithi dek a? Ebe ithiat o.
43007026	Meke re, ebe lakhani! Nayuk o. Ayuk degat dogolik, wene yoknisugunem, it nen wene oko yogokhidegat kamotdiliogei yi. It ap ninougi koktek yoma inakla nen, Ap yi nit akhuni tilninabuagaluk Allah nen la'isigin, iluk isikhe etnogo ebe ithiat, iluk inakla apegasik nen iliogei a?
43007027	Itithogon meke re, nit akhuni tilninabuagaluk Allah nen la'isigin isikhe etnogo ebe waga halok, erlo ka nen waga he, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inokodek dogogun mekeat he, ap yi anek he, Ebe ap erlo etoma meke, iluk niniluat o, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
43007028	Itithogon ekhe lagoukhama, at Yesus Allah ai halekma ane kokhogon wene yogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “An nebe inom, nebe o etoma nen wagagi inom, hit hinilu nogo? An wagagi iti, an nabusagat nakla nen kagalogo wagagi dek o. At ane eberogonat anek ekherek meke etnogo nenat la'ani ageikhe mekeat he, at ebe hit hinokodek o.
43007029	Itithogon mekeat, an anek he, at nenat la'ani ageikhemo, o at werekma etoma nenat wagagi iti nen, an at ebe nilu o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43007030	it akhuni nen Yesus ebe hakhauwogoluk hagakhukha mekeat he, at ebe hakhausak oba arat mot asi ageidek iti nen, ebe iniki hakhigidek kamotdisukha.
43007031	It aperek nen hakhauwogoluk hagakhe lagoukha mekeat he, it akhuni doalegat emenogo inebe hetlake doalegat inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukhasik men isukha, “Ap ithi elalin meke hagakhe re, erlok dek apegep? Nen, akhuni tilninabuagaluk Allah nen la'isigin isikhe etnogo witluk nen, ebe hutduagaluk elalin meke kogat hagasigin nogo? Dek o, ” iluk isukha.
43007032	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, it akhuni doalegat emenogo inane hok-hok Yesus abok isinem, it ap Farisi meke inasuk holhukhasik nen, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek inom nen, ap Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek meke aperek nen, Yesus ebe hakhoagaluk wene warisasukha.
43007033	Itithogon isi korlek, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “An we, elanma hasik niki pererlagat ninom dogoluk nen. at la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo oba napuke arat ligin o.
43007034	An o etoma lalok werek korlek, hit nen an heraknabik nekhe dogogun mekeat he, hit o an dogoginmo etoma wisusak motok erlok dek iti nen, an ninom abuk asugun dek o, ” iluk, yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43007035	it ap Yahudi meke inougi koktek emenogo nen, it-it ekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Ap yi o koma lalok werekma, nit at herarik lalok ninom abuk asugun dek nen yoknisekhe apegep. Ap nit meke olirok akhuni Yunani meke werekma inoba lagoukhasik werekma inoba lalok nen, akhuni Yunani meke wene yakulisekhe dogeigiluk ekhe apegep a?
43007036	At nen yoknisekhe dogolik, “Hit an nebe heraknabik nekhe dogogun mekeat he, an ninom abuk asugun dek o. Nen, hit o an dogoginmo etoma wisusak motok erlok dek o, iluk yoknisekhe iti, at akla nikithogon apekhesik nen yoknisekhe apegep, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
43007037	Wene itithogon isukhasik oba nen, pesta etnogo ilugun kobokhogon arat agunem, hari kok iti baga Yesus ebe melageikhesik nen, ane kokhogonat men yogeisasikhe, “Tha nen i abu halok, an noba nasusak o.
43007038	Nen, tha nen etaiken an noba hakotdekhe halok, i inilugurinakherek meke at akla nen elesi hunak-hunak palogo dukhekhe dogogin o, iluk Allah ane holal waganek oba isukha hagat, hagatlasigin o, ” iluk
43007039	wene itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, akhuni inetaiken at oba hakotdegarek meke inebe dopok Allah Agoreke wogeisagein, iluk abok isikhe mekeat he, itinem, at Yesus ebe hogorakho korlek dageisikhe etnogo aban dageigidek nogo nen, Allah Agoreke aban usa'i ageidek werek korlek isikhe.
43007040	Wene itithogon yogeisugunem, akhuni doalegat emenogo inasuk holhukhasik, it aperek nen, men isukha, “Ap yi, ap ageikhe Allah ane yoknisasigin iluk, therogo welagorek etnogoat o, ” iluk ugunem
43007041	it aperek nen, “Dek o. Akhuni tilninabuagaluk Allah nen la'isigin isikhe etnogoat o, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha mekeat, it aperek nen, men isukha, “Akhuni tilninabuagaluk Allah nen, la'isigin isikhe etnogo, o Galilea nen erlok wisusak nogo? Erlok dek o.
43007042	Akhuni tilninabigin meke Allah nen la'isigin isikhe meke iti, ap Daud nen itago meke, at Daud ekaerek aila erloma welageikhe baga, o Betlehem etoma itaklasigin, iluk Allah ane baga holal waganogo 'bisukha werek etnogo dek? ”
43007043	iluk itithogon ilik laga lagoukhasik, ilugun oba, akhuni doalegat emenogo Yesus hasik inane thagalogo inebe mikikhukha.
43007044	Itithogon mikikhukhasik, it aperek nen Yesus ebe hakhauwogoluk hagakhukha mekeat he, iniki hakhigidek kamotdisukha.
43007045	Itithogon kamotdisukhasik werekma, it ap Allah ai halek therogo welagoukha meke nen Yesus ebe hakhoagaluk wene warisasukha meke emenogo inapuke it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek inom, ap Farisi meke inom, inoba wagoukhama, wene men yogeisasukha, “Ap etnogo ebe ha’iluk ninoba wolok wageidek iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogeisasukhama,
