43007046	it nen men yogeisasukha, “Eiye! Wene at nen iliogo iti hak, it ap aperek nen wene itithogon isinem hisogorek dek mekeat he, at nen wene ninat iliogo iti nen ebe thogotdogo, ” iluk yogeisasukhama
43007047	it ap Farisi meke emenogo nen, men yogeisasukha, “Hit meneke, at nen nukhetdinagakhemo nen ekhe lagap a?
43007048	Nit ap Yahudi meke ninougi koktek inom, ap Farisi meke inom, aperek nen inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk hagakhunem ageikhe hisekhe lagap a? Motok dek o.
43007049	Motok dek mekeat he, it akhuni doalegat yoma wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo inokodek dogolik iliogei iti, Allah nen inoba homan ’bisekhemo werek o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
43007050	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, ap it meke ageikhe etaga Nikodemus, alebat hibako Yesus oba wageikhe meke etnogo nen, it men yogokhukha,
43007051	“Nagarlak lak. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke iti baga, ap ageikhe ane inasuk holhidegat, nen, at hagakhe meke wene erlo hutukhogon inokodegat dogolik, wene tak piokhogon oba ’busak, iluk isikhe nogo? Itithogon igidek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43007052	it nen at men yogokhukha, “Hat meneke, haila o Galilea meke nogo? Ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke ageikhe o Galilea nen wisigin iluk Allah ane baga holal waganek ageikhe werekma hileken higin motok dek etnaga, hileken hanorogon 'bikhekhe dogono, ” iluk yogokhukha. [
43007053	Itithogon yogokhe lagoukhasik, akhuni emenogo inailake dopok kikil warogo lagoukha.
43008001	It akhuni emenogo laga korlek, at Yesus tom Zaitun oba dageisikhe.
43008002	Dageisikhesik, hubuluke hubenat siakhogon usa’ageikhesik, Allah ai halekma ukisikhemo, akhuni doalegat at oba wagoukhama, at ebe hurek lageikhesik nen, wene yakulisasikhe.
43008003	Wene yakulisugunem, it ap Allah ane iteerek meke men, Farisi meke men, he ageikhe param hagakhunem inileken hasukhasik, Yesus oba wolok wagoukhasik, he etnogo ebe turlem meldiluk nen,
43008004	Yesus men yogokhukha, “Noe. He yi param hagakhunem hakhogosik nen hoba wolok wago o.
43008005	Nen, Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga, Musa nen holal waganhe dogolik, it humi nen, at he yi hagakhe iti hak hagakho halok, helekit oba inebe motok inasusak o, iluk yoknisasikhemo wene palek werek iti, hat nen nikithogon yoknisagein, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43008006	Wene itithogon yogokhukha meke, Yesus ape baga wene oko isinem ekarli warogo wene oba 'buogoluk isukha mekeat, at ut thoma iluk iki sisik nen agat oba holal waganhikhe.
43008007	Itithogonat inane thogotdisalok holal waganhe korlek it nen, “Yoknisan o, iluk yogokho motok hagakhe lagoukhama, at iroak lek isikhesik, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit welagap ya meke, ap ageikhe weak hagakhidek velagarek meke halok, at nen tak he yi helekit oba tunhogo vasuak o, ” iluk
43008008	yogeisasikhesik yabokane apuke ut thoma iluk iki sisik nenat, agat oba holal waganhe lageikheat.
43008009	Itithogon holal waganhe korlek, it emenogo wene yogeisasikhe meke etnogo inasuk holhukhasik, it inarluetek tak dukhisukhama, yabokane inebe tha’bokhogonat opakitek dukhisukhama, at Yesus he etnogo ipisak inarligat dogolik,
43008010	at Yesus etnogo uroak lek isikhesik, at he etnogo men yogokhikhe, “He yira. Neru o. Ap emenogo re? It nen wene hoba ’bega etnogo, ap ageikhe nen hakhe a? Dek a, ” iluk yogosigin apasikhe,
43008011	at he etnogo nen, “Noe. Motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An meneke wene hoba 'biluk hasigin degat o. Haila lan o. Lalok nen he, hurli yogotak oba nen yabokane weak ageikhe hagakhe dogogun o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik aila la’isikhe. ]
43008012	Yabokane, at Yesus nen it akhuni emenogo wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni agat oba meke liarinakherek iti, anat o. Tha nen an noporlik nekhe dogogin halok he, an nebe lia dogolik inilugurinakherek meke etnogoat woknabigin iti nen, at iti o mummo nekhe dogogin dek o, ” iluk ekhe lageikhemo,
43008013	it ap Farisi meke emenogo nen, “Hat he, habok inilu asuagaluk, hekaerek nenat yogeisekhe lagan iti hekalat ekhe lagan o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43008014	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An wagagi meke inom, ligin meke inom, hit hinokodek meke re, an anek nebe o etoma nen wagagi, nen yabokane o etoma ligin, iluk nilu iti nen, an nabok inilu asuagaluk nekaerek nenat yokhisekhe lagei iti re, wene iti eberogonat yokhisekhe lagei o.
43008015	Hit nen wene noba ’bekhe lagap iti, hit akhuni-akhuni wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, 'begethep hagat, wene noba 'bekhe lagap mekeat, an anek wene akhuni inoba 'bekhe lagei motok dek o.
43008016	Meke re, an nen wene inoba 'bilema re, iti an narligat nen dek o. Nopase nen la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo nipisagat dogolik hagakhe lagei iti nen, wene mothogon akhuni inoba 'bile o.
43008017	Wene, Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke iti baga men isikhe, Akhuni wene inoba 'bekhe dogosak halok he, ap wene erlo hagakha inilu meke inebe pere nen inane ipisak tak-tak anek isi halok, wene iti eberogonat usak o,\rq (Ulangan 17:6; 19:15)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha.
43008018	Iti hakene, an nabok, nekaerek nen igik, nopase la'ani ageikhe meke nen igik, yokhisekhe lago iti, ” iluk ekhe lageikhemo,
43008019	it nen he, “Hat hopase iti koma werek o? ” iluk yogokhukhama, atYesus nen he, “An nebe yi men, nopase men, hinokodegat o. An nebe hinilu dogolepma re, nopase iti hinilu dogolebat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43008020	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, at ebe Allah ai halekma peti uang Allah hasik 'bisegarekma alilu dogolik isikhe. Itithogon isinem, at ebe hakhausak oba aban asi ageidek werek korlek nogo nen, it akhuni emenogo ageikhe nen hakhigidek tha'bokhogonat kamotdisukha.
43008021	Itithogon kamotdisukhama, at Yesus wene yabokane ageikhe it emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “An nebe yabokane liginat o. Lalok etoma werekma, hit an heraknabugun meke re, o an liginmo etoma hit lausak erlok dek iti nen, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke wene hinoba verek korlegat hinebe watlasugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43008022	it ap koktek Yahudi meke nen he, men isukha, “Ap yi nen yoknisekhe dogolik, O an liginmo etoma hit lausak erlok dek o, iluk yoknisekhe iti, at ekaerek nen waragaluk iliogo a? ” iluk isukhama,
43008023	at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “An nebe re, pogot abel upuke meke wagagisik welagei o. Meke re, hit anek he, abel wemake yoma meke. Hinai erlo agat oba yomaat o. Meke re, an nai erlo agat oba yoma dek o.
43008024	Iti nen he, an nen wene alep yokhisekhe dogolik, Weak hagakhe lagap meke wene hinoba werek korlek watlasugun o, iluk yokhisigi etnogo, men hasik igi. Hit nen an nobasik he, At ebe ikhok motok welagarek mekeat o, iluk hinetaiken noba hakotdugun dek halok, wene hinoba werek korlegat watlasugun iti nen igi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43008025	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen he, “Hat hebe tha nogo? ” iluk oba hinok wokhasukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Yabokane iti, wirlidikhogonat nenaluk yokhisagein.
43008026	An nen yi wene ti wene doalegat yokhisigik, wene hinoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasusak erlok mekeat he, at la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo ane eberogonat anek ekherek iti nen, at nen isinem nasuk holhe lagei meke itiat hit akhuni agat oba meke yoma yokhisekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43008027	Itithogon yogeisasikhe mekeat, it nen he, “At opase Allah hasik abok yoknisiliogo o, ” iluk wene iti hutdigidek welagoukha.
43008028	Itithogon hutdigidek werek korlek, at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, hit nen an nebe o baga meldanugun itinem, hit nen, Ikhok motok welagarek meke etnogo ebe yiat o. At nen wene yoknisekhe dogolik, akla nen kagalogo igidek. At opase nen yakulekherek meke anek yoknisekhe lagama, iluk, hinilu asugun o.
43008029	At la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo, oba hotokhogon ekherek meke anek an nen hagakherek iti nen, at nen an nebe kolelogo thogotdanhidek nipisak hunik motok welagorek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43008030	Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, akhuni inebe doalegat inetaiken at oba hakotdisukha.
43008031	Inetaiken itithogon hakotdisukhama, at Yesus nen he, it ap Yahudi meke inetaiken at oba hakotdisukha meke men yogeisasikhe, “Hit an nane hologo hagakhe dogogun halok he, hinebe an nagarumi ebe meke napma dogolik,
43008032	wene ebe wene hinilu asigin o. Hinilu asumo, wene ebe wene iti bagaat hinebe herle hisalogo hinasokneat 'binagagin o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43008033	it nen he, men yogokhukha, “Nit he, ap Abraham nen itago meke yoma, ninebe akhuni aperek nen thebelogo 'binaniluk inatuaneke ageidek meke anek welago mekeat he, hat nen ekhe dogolik, Hinebe herle hisalogo hinasokne 'binagagin o, iluk egen iti hakla nikithogon apegetik nen egen? ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43008034	at Yesus nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni weak hagakharek meke iti inebe dopok weak hagakharek iti atuanekeat, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o.
43008035	Nen, it inatuaneke meke iti, inougi inom motogat welageikharek dek mekeat, ina'buri eberogonat meke anek, inom motogat welageikharek o.
43008036	Iti hak, an Allah ebe a'but nen, hit herle hisalogo hinasokne 'binagagi halok, eberogonat herle hisalek hinasokneat dogogun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43008037	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Meke re, hit he, ap Abraham nen itago meke welagap iluk, iti an nilu o. Mekeat he, hit hinakla nen an nane waganusak hina'it motok iti nen, hit nenat an nebenasuogoluk nabok palhe lagap iti.
43008038	An he, nopase nipisak dogolik nileken hekhe lagagi mekeat yokhisekhe korlek, hit anek he, hinopase etnogo nen ekherek meke ane hologohagakhe lagap o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43008039	Itithogon yogeisekhelageikhemo, it nen, “A! Nit ninopase Abraham at ha yoma re, ” iluk isukhama, at Yesus nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinebe Abraham nen itago meke eberogonat dogolepma, Abraham hagakhe lageikhe mekeat hagakhe dogolep o.
43008040	Meke re, an wene ebe wene Allah nen isinem nasuk holhigi meke yokhisekhe lagei mekeat, hit nen an nebe nasuogoluk nabok palhe lagap iti hak, at Abraham nen itithogon hagakhe lageikhe dek mekeat hagakhe lagap o.
43008041	Hit he, hinopase etnogo hagakherek meke hagakhe lagap o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it nen he, men yogokhukha, “A! Nit param yugunisake hagakhe dogolik itakninakha meke dek o. Nit ninopase Allah arligat o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43008042	at Yesus nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinopase Allah eberogonat dogolepma re, an nebe erlo Allah mekeat wagagisik welagei iti, an hinakmurogon dogolep o. An nabusagat nakla apalok wagagi 'buk. At nenat la’ani ageikhemo wagagi o.
43008043	Itithogon wagagisik wene yokhisekhe lagei meke hit hutdigidek welagap iti nenaluk. Itithogon welagap iti, an nane holek dogosak hina’it iti nen, hutdigidek welagap o.
43008044	Itithogon hina’it iti, hit hinopase Iblis atma, hit nen at warlok apekherek meke itiat warlok nen hagakhe lagap iti. At Iblis iti erlo baga nenat akhuni inakherek mekeat o. At wene ebe wene akla dek iti nen, wene ebeat wene isinem inane legekherek dek iti. Iblis ekalat ekherek iti, at obabut ikhogatma ekalat ekherek iti o. Inekalat egarek iti, erlo arat o.
43008045	Mekeat he, an nen wene ebe wene yokhisekhe lagei iti nenat, hit nen, Eberogonat, iluk hutdekhe lagap dek.
43008046	An nen weak hagakhunem, hit aperek nen hinileken neegep halok he, yoknitni ta. Dek o. An nen wene ebe weneat yakulhisekhe korlek, hutdekhe lagap dek iti nenaluk.
43008047	Tha nen ebe Allah meke halok, Allah ane iti asuk holherek mekeat, hit he, hinebe Allah meke 'buk. Ninat meke iti nen he, at ane hinasuk holusak hina’it iti o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43008048	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it ap Yahudi meke emenogo nen he, men isukha, “Hat hebe ap Samaria meke yi re! Mokat obabut weak meke hakla ukekhesik werek o, iluk ekhe lago etnogo eberogonat yokhekhe lago higi, ” iluk yogokhe lagoukhama,
43008049	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An mokat obabut weak meke nakla ukigidek o. An nen nopase hogorakho korlek mekeat, hit nen an netaga weak hagarogo ’bekhe lagap o.
43008050	Meke re, an nekaerek hasik hogotnabuagaluk hagakherek ’buk. Dek o. At he, an hogotnabuagaluk, at ageikhe nen wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasigin meke werek o.
43008051	Nen, tha nen an nane hologo hagakhe dogogin halok he, watlageidek iluk motok dogogin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43008052	it ap Yahudi meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Ap Abraham men, ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo men, arat watlarik lagoukha mekeat, hat nen ekhe dogolik, Tha nen an nane hologo hagakhe dogogin halok, watlageidek iluk motok dogogin o, iluk egen iti nen, mokat obabut weak meke eberogonat hakla ukekhesik werek, iluk, hutdagago o.
43008053	Nit ninopa Abraham ebe watlageikhe meke iti, ebe yekerek hakene. Meke re, hat anek he, hebe kok a? It ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo watlarik lagoukha mekeat he, hat hebe tha hak nen ekhe lagan nogo? ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43008054	-
43008055	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nekaerek nen hogorakeke dogolema, we yugunat hogorakeke dogole. At he, an nopase ebe nilu meke iti, at ebe hit nen hutdigidek dogolik, Nit ninopase Allah, iluk egethep etnogo, at ebe nenat, hogotnabiogo. An nen, At ebe nokodek, iluk ilema, hit hinekalat egethep hagat, nekalat ile o. Meke re, at ebe nilu nogo nen, at ane hologo hagakhe lagei o.
43008056	Nen, hit hinopa Abraham etnogo nen, an wisigin hasik ekhe dogolik, At wagunem nileken higin, iluk an narlik halhe lageikhesikmo nogo nen, ileken arat neasikhesik akla arleken akhekhe, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43008057	it ap Yahudi meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Hat hebe itaklagagitik oba nen 50 tahun aban hagatlageidek mekeat, Abraham erlok hileken hasigitik nen ekhe lagan a? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43008058	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nane eberogonat yokhisak o. Ap Abraham iti ebe aban itaklageidek werek korlek, an nikhok motogat welagarek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43008059	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it ap emenogo nen, at Yesus ebe helekit oba wasuogoluk inikimo waganhukha mekeat, Yesus ebe limak lageikhesik nen, o Allah ai halekma thogotdiluk werlekmake lageikhe.
43009001	At Yesus ebe o etoma thogotdiluk laga dogolik, ileken'bikhasikhe meke, ap ageikhe agosa akla nen ileken motok puk itaklageikhe meke hasikhe.
43009002	Itithogon ileken hasikhemo nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen Yesus itema waganhukha, “Noe. Ap ileken puk ithi, erlo at ekaerek nen weak hagakhikhemo nen a? At he, erlo agosa opase nen weakhagakhukhama nen itithogon itaklageikhe a, ” iluk yogokhe lagoukhama,
43009003	at Yesus nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “Erlo ap yi men, agosa opase men, weak hagakhukha baga ileken puk itaklageikhe 'buk. Meke re, Allah nen ap yi hano hagakhunem akhuni nen inileken halok, at Allah nen hagakherek meke inilu asuagaluk itaklageikhemo o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
43009004	ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Yabokane o mum asigin o. Itithogon mum agunem, akhuni nen yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok dek asigin iti nen, at la'ani ageikhe meke hagakherek meke iti, o yogotak o lia werek korlek ya bagaat hagakhe dogouok o.
43009005	An agat oba yoma dogolik, nebe o lia hak etnogo nen he, akhuni lia hagarinakherek o, ”
43009006	iluk itithogon arat yogeisasikhesik nen, wosi suphogon agat oba 'bisikhesik nen, iki nen agat inom 'bisi negen hagarogo nen ap etnogo ileken oba dabuldisikhe.
43009007	Itithogon dabuldisikhesik nen, ap etnogo men yogokhikhe, “I Siloam yekelekma ili baga helokhoken thobali lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe. I iti nit ninane baga la'isikhe u hak etaga Siloam werekma yogokhikhe. Ititnogon yogokhikhemo at etnogo lageikhesik, elokhoken thobalhikhemo ileken hano ageikhemo apuke wageikhe.
43009008	Itithogon ileken hano atluk wagunem, it akhuni at agarlak lak meke men, it aperek ap etnogo alep ape kino weak isinem inileken hekhe lagoukha meke men, inileken hasukhasik nen, men isukha, “Eiye! Nayuk o. Ap yi, ebe hurek anek dogolik, ape kino weak ekherek meke etnogo dek a? Ap etnogoat o, ” iluk isukhama,
43009009	it akhuni emenogo aperek nen men isukha, “Ebe arat o, ” igik, it aperek nen he, “At 'buk. Ninat mekeat he, at elokhoken hakene, ” igik, isukhama at ekaerek nen he, “Eberogonat an nebeat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43009010	it nen at oba hinok waganhe dogolik, “Nikithogon nen hileken hano aga, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43009011	at ap etnogo nen men yogeisasikhe, “Ap etaga Yesus egarek etnogo nen agat meke iki nen 'bisi negen hagarogo nileken oba dabuldanhesik men yoknekhe, I Siloam yekelekma ili baga helokhoken thobali lan o, iluk yoknekhemo, at nen yoknekhe hagat, lagarik arat thobalhima, nileken hano aga o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43009012	it nen at yogokhe dogolik, “Ap iti ebe koma werek? ” iluk isukhama at nen, “An nokodek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43009013	Itithogon isikhemo, it nen, ap ileken puk meke etnogo ap Farisi meke inoba wolok lagoukha.
43009014	Itinem, iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat werek korlek, at Yesus nen agat meke 'bisi negen hagarogo ap ileken puk meke hano hagakhikhe.
43009015	Itithogon hano hagakhikhe iti nen, it ap Farisi meke nen ap ileken puk meke etnogo oba itema waganhe dogolik, “Nikithogon nen hileken hano aga, ” iluk isukhama, at nen he, “At etnogo nen agat meke ’bisi negen hagarogo nileken oba dabuldanhemo, thobali lageima, hano aga o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43009016	it ap Farisi meke aperek nen he, men isukha, “Niniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogosak iluk, wene palek meke iti thagalogo 'bekhesik hagakhe iti nen, at ebe Allah werekma nen wageikhe meke re, dek o, ” iluk isukha mekeat he, it ap aperek nen, “At ebe weak hagakherek meke dogolepma, wene hutduagaluk elalin meke yigithogon hagasusak a? Dek o, ” iluk it inakla itithogon inasokhotek tomok apasukhasik inaneak thagalogo inebe mikikhukha iti.
43009017	Itithogon mikikhukhasik ap ileken puk meke hano hagakhikhe etnogo oba itema yabokane waganhe dogolik, “Hat nen, At nen nileken hano hagatnakhe iluk egen apigi. Halok he, hat nen ap iti abok nikithogon apekhe lagan, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at nen he, “At ebe ap Allah ane yogeisegarek etnogo mekeat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43009018	Itithogon yogeisasikhe meke re, it ap koktek Yahudi meke nen ap yi alebat ileken puk welageikhe mekeat he, yogotak ileken arat hano agama, iluk hutdusak ina’it nen, ap etnogo agosa opase waisasukhama it wagoukhama nen, initema waganhe dogolik,
43009019	“Hit nen, elege ileken puk itaklagama isigip etnogo, ebe yiat a? Halok he, yogotak ileken nikithogon nen hano aga? ” iluk yogeisasukhama,
43009020	it nen yogeisekhe dogolik, “Ap yi re, ebe nit nen 'bogo meke ileken puk itaklageikhe, ekhe lago etnogo mekeat
43009021	nikithogon nen hano aga nit ninokodek o. Nen, tha nen hano hagakhe, nit ninokodegat o. Halok he, at ebe ap. Yekerek 'buk. Ebe arlueat ha yoma re. At ekaerek hasik yokhisoak nen oba itema waganini o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
43009022	Itithogon yogeisasukha iti, it ap koktek Yahudi meke nen, ekhe dogolik, “It akhuni inebe tomok nen, Ap yi re, Allah nen nit akhuni tilninabuagaluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo Kristus ebe yiat o, iluk pakhogon isi halok, o sembayan egarekma nen lisogo ula'uok o, ” iluk wene palhukha meke werek iti nen he, ap iti agosa opase it ap koktek Yahudi meke inayuk nen,
43009023	men isukha iti, “At ebe re, ap. Yekerek 'buk. Ebe arlueat ha yoma re. At ekaerek yokhisoak nen oba itema waganini o, ” iluk yogeisasukha iti.
43009024	Itithogon isukhama it nen ap alebat ileken puk itaklageikhesik welageikhe meke etnogo yabokane waekhukhama wageikhemo, men yogokhukha, “Ap iti ebe weak hagakherek meke nit ninilumo, hat hekaerek nen hane eberogonat Allah etaga hupuk palogo yoknisan o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43009025	at nen men yogeisasikhe, “At ap iti ebe weak hagakherek meke a? Dek a. An nokodek mekeat he, an alebat nen nileken puk welagei meke re, yogotak ya hano agarik welagei iti anek an nilu o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43009026	it nen, men yogokhukha, “At nen nikithogon hagathakhe? Hileken nikithogon hano hagathakhe, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43009027	at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Wene haganeat arat yokhisigi mekeat, hinasuk holusak hina'it hagakhe dogolik nen, yabokane hinasuk holuogoluk ekhe lagap iti nenaluk. Hit at agarumi asusak warlok nen ekhe lagap a? E a, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43009028	it nen inane sagun yogokhe dogolik, “Hat at agot agatik ekhe lagan higi. Nit he, ap Musa agarumi welago o.
43009029	Nen, ap Musa hasik anek, wene Allah nenat yogokhikhe, iluk, nit ninilu mekeat he, ap iti hasik anek, ebe o koma nen waga meke, nit ninokodek o, ” iluk ekhe lagoukhama
43009030	at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Eiye! Nayuk o. Ap iti nen, an nileken hano hagatnakhe mekeat, hit nen, At ebe o koma nen waga meke nit ninokodek, iluk ekhe lagap iti, nayukhogonat ekhe lagap o.
43009031	Akhuni weak hagakharek meke Allah nen inane asuk holherek motok dek iti, nit ninilu o. Akhuni Allah inayukhogon dogolik, at akla apekherek meke mothogon hagakharek meke halok, inane Allah asuk holherek o.
43009032	Nen, akhuni haganeat ebekeram erlo baga nen yogotak hurli, akhuni aperek inileken puk itaklatlukmo nen yabokane hano hagarinakhukha, iluk ninasuk holhorek motok dek o.
43009033	Ap iti Allah nen la'i ageidek dogolepma re, at nen yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakherek itithogon hagakhe dogolep dek o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43009034	it nen he, men yogokhukha, “Hat hobabut weagat itaklagagitik, weak motok hagakhetek mekeat, hat nen wene nit yakulnisausak a? Motok erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhukhasik nen, o sembayan egarekma nen iki korlo lisogo leget itikmanke ula'isukha.
43009035	Akhuni nen, “It nen ap etnogo leget abel itikmanke ula'ega, ” iluk isukhama, at Yesus asuk holhikhesik oba nen, yabokane ap etnogo ipisak abuk agoukhasik, men yogokhikhe, “Ap ageikhe ebe abat itaklasi isigin, isukha etnogo, ebe hutdiluk nen hetaiken at oba hakotdegen a? ” iluk yogokhikhemo
43009036	at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap iti ebe tha o, noe. An nen ap iti ebe hutdiluk nen netaiken at oba hakotdik nen, yakulnom o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43009037	at Yesus nen, “Hat hileken arat neegen etnogo yogotak nipisak wenekak ekhe lago nebe yiat o, ” iluk yogosigin apasikhe,
43009038	at nen, men yogokhikhe, “Yogotak arat hutdagagirik netaiken hoba hakotdigi o, noe, ” iluk itibagal yukukhogon Yesus hogorakhikhe.
43009039	Itithogon hogorakhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nen akhuni aperek inileken puk meke hanorinakhik, it aperek inileken hano meke pugutdisigik, hagakhe dogeigiluk nebe agat oba yoma usa'agagi o, ” iluk isinem,
43009040	it ap Farisi meke aperek etoma dogolik inasuk holhukhasik nen, men isukha, “Hat hakla nen, It inileken puk, iluk apekhe dogolik yoknisegen a? Dek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43009041	at Yesus nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinileken puk dogolepma, hit weak iluk wene hinoba 'bilep dek o. Meke re, hit nen, Nit ninileken hano hekhe lago, iluk ekhe lagap iti nen Allah nen, Hit weak, iluk, wene hinoba 'bekhemo werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43010001	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane men yogeisasikhe, “An nen wene ageikhe eberogonat yokhisak o. Tha nen domba waganigiluk ebe lanma ukigiluk, holagape palekmake ukigidek, leget isiade talogo ukekhe halok, ap iti inilarlurlu waganherek meke iki abusak waganigilugat o.
43010002	Nen, tha nen, holagapemake ukekhe halok he, at iti domba iteerek dogolik therogo welagarek mekeat o.
43010003	At domba iteerek dogolik therogo welagarek meke iti, ebe waga halok, at ageikhe domba aila holagape palekma thuam welagarek meke nen thu hualdisinem, at domba iteerek etnogo nen ane hageisasinem, it domba nen, at ane inasuk holharethekma nogo nen, inetaga dopok waisalok, wogosik itikmanke dukhekherek o.
43010004	Wogosik dukhekherethek nen, at ebe alebageik laga korlek, ako domba emenogo, at ane inilumo nogo nen, at oporligat lageikharek o.
43010005	Itithogon hano lageikharek mekeat, it ap ninat meke inane ugunem, it domba nen, it inane inokodekma nen, inoporlik lageidek lo lageikharek o, ” iluk,
43010006	at Yesus nen, wene iti oba lisogon it yogeisasikhe mekeat he, wene ki meke hasik ekhe heat, hutdigidegat welagoukha.
43010007	Itithogon hutdigidek werek korlek, yabokane at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Wene eberogonat ageikhe yokhisak o. Domba iti inaholagape palekma, an nebeat o.
43010008	An wageidek aban werek korlek, it akhuni aperek alebageik wagoukha iti, it inebe tha'bokhogonat domba inilarlurlu waganhik, himakhik, hagakharek meke wagoukhasikmo nogo nen he, it domba nen, it inane inasuk holhidek welagoukha.
43010009	Holagape palek, an nebeat o. Tha nen an nebe baga ukekhe halok, irlirli horlageinmo motok hano dogolik, dukhigik-ukigik hagakhe dogolik, oka hano meke anek neke dogogin o.
43010010	Nen, it ap inilarlurlu waganharek meke wageikharek iti, domba inilarlurlu waganhik, inakhik, inebe motok degetdisigik, hagasuogoluk wageikharek mekeat he, an wagagi iti anek, it akhuni yi meke ti meke doalegat oba hiakhogon welageikharek iti hak, inebe iniluk motok dogoagaluk inilugurinabilukmo nen ebe meke oba hiakhogon dogoagaluk wagagi o.
43010011	Domba ite werek dogolik therisik welagarek meke, nobabut hano, nebe anat o. Domba iteerek dogolik therisik welageikharek meke, obabut hano meke nen, domba irlirli waganogo watlasigin iluk akla apekherek.
43010012	At itithogon apekherek meke re, at ap ageikhe domba iteerek meke dek. At ako degat. At oko wogosuagaluk therisik werekma helo yeke wagunem ileken lakhalok, domba here'isalok lo lagarekma, helo yeke etnogo nen domba emenogo aik nen yarlukhigik woginabigiluk sikhogo-mukhogothirlik-pirlikhogon ula'isekherek.
43010013	At iti oko wogosuagaluk domba therisik welagarek iti nen, domba emenogo akmu dek thogotdisalok lo lagarek iti o.
43010014	-
43010015	Domba therisik welagarek meke nobabut hano re, nebe anat o. Nopase nen an ilu, nen, an nen at nilu, welagorek iti hak, an nen nako domba nilu, nen, it nen an inilu, welagorek o. Itithogon dogolik, an nako domba inirlirli waganogo watlasigiluk welagei.
43010016	Nen, an nako domba ebe lanma yoma anek werek 'buk. O werlekmake aperek weregat o. Nadomba etoma meke nane inasuk holuagaluk wogosik wisigilugat welagei o. 'Bisasumo, it an nako domba yoko palek opakimoke nekhe dogogun. Itithogon nekhe korlek, an narligat nen therisik dogogin o.
43010017	An watlatluk nen napuke niluk asigiluk nebe watlasigin apegerek iti nen, nopase nen an etaiken hunik welagarek o.
43010018	An nen watlasigin apigidekmaat, it akhuni aperek nen obakha baga nasusak erlok dek o. An nekaerek nakla nenat, nebe watlasigin apagein obaat watlasigin o. Watlatluk yabokane napuke niluk asigin iti nekaerek nakla nen apagein obaat o. Itithogon hagasuagaluk nopase nen la'ani ageikhe mekeat hagasigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43010019	Wene itithogon yogeisasikhe iti nen, it ap Yahudi meke inaneak motok thagalhukhasik inebe mikikhukha.
43010020	Itithogon mikikhukhasik it inebe doalekmake nen he, menisukha, “At yi mokat obabut weak meke akla ukekhesik ebe thinuknuk agasik wene isi korlegat, hit at ane holhe lagap iti nenaluk, ” iluk isukha.
43010021	Itithogon isukha meke re, it hetnake nen, men isukha, “Dek o. Akhuni mokat obabut weak meke inakla ukiluk, wene itithogon egarek dek o! Mokat obabut weak meke nen inileken puk meke erlok hano hagarinabusak apegep? Motok erlok dek o, ” iluk isukha.
43010022	Itithogon isukhasik oba nen, it akhuni Yahudi meke inakla nen, “O Yerusalem Allah ai halek meke yabokane hanorogon karelhugu etnogo, ” iluk inakla eberek dogolik pesta isakharek oba arat horok asi ageikhe. Itinem, o weak welageikhe.
43010023	Itithogon werek korlek, at Yesus Allah ai halekma, misohulakma etaga Salomo misohulakmake nukhunem
43010024	it ap koktek Yahudi meke alilu natogosi agoukhasik nen, men yogokhukha, “Allah nen Kristus ayoko ’biluk la’isigin isikhe etnogo, harat a? Ninat a, iluk arlik halhe lago yi re, ninakla thiokhogon hurli niniki ki baga nen yoknisagein. Allah nenKristus ayoko 'biluk la'isigin isikhe etnogo, hebe harat halok he, pakhogonat yoknisan o, ” iluk yogokhe lagoukhama,
43010025	at Yesus nen he, men yogeisasikhe, “An arat yokhisekhe lagei mekeat he, hit nen eberogonat iluk apekhe lagap dek o. An nopase nen nayoko 'bisikhemo hagakhe lagei iti, an nabok pakhogon yokhisau hagat, hagakhe lagei mekeat he,
43010026	hit hinebe domba an meke 'buk, ninat iti nen, nebe hutdanhe lagap dek iti o.
43010027	Hit hinakla itithogon apegethep mekeat he, it aperek an nadomba meke halok, nane inasuk holharethek, it nen an nebe it inilu nogo nen, noporlik wageikharek o.
43010028	Noporlik nekhe korlek, it iniluk motok dogoagaluk inilugurinakhe dogogin iti nen, it inebe watlatluk nuk asugun dek o. It an niki baga werek korlek, it ap aperek nen tilogo woginabusak erlok dek o.
43010029	Ap aperek erlok dek mekeat he, an nopase nen nadomba woknikhikhe meke iti anek he, ebe obatne werek o. It an nopase nen woknikhikhe meke iti, at iki baga werekma, it ap aperek nen tilogo woginabusak erlok dek o.
43010030	Nopase nipisak ninebe opakiat o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43010031	it ap koktek Yahudi meke nen, helekit inikimo waganhukhasik, Yesus ebe motok wasuogoluk hagakhukha.
43010032	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nopase nen hano meke doalegat hagasuagaluk nayoko 'bisikhe meke hagakhunem, hinileken neekhe lagap etoma tha'bokhogonat, ageikhe ki hak korlo hagakhi baga nen nebe nasuogoluk hagakhe lagap, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43010033	it nen, men yogokhukha, “Hat hano hagakhe lagan iti baga helekit oba hasuogoluk hagakhe lago 'buk. Hat hebe akhuni mekeat he, Allah etaga weagarogo, men ekhe lagan, An Allah nipisak tak-tak, iluk ekhe lagan iti nenat hasuogoluk hagakhe lago o, ” iluk yogokhe lagoukhama,
43010034	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo baga, at nen men isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek, Hit hinebe allahat o,\rq (Mazmur 82:6)\rq* iluk holal waganek werek etnogo dek a?
43010035	Wene Allah ane holal waganek welagarek iti tha'bokhogonat, ageikhe munenagarek dek apigi. Iti nen he, it at ane yogeisasikhe meke hasik, Hinebe allahat, iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek korlegat,
43010036	an nen, Nebe Allah a'but, igi iti nen, Allah etaga weagakhe, iluk nenaluk ekhe lagap. Allah nenat nayoko 'biluk eberogonat nebe wenago agat oba yoma la'ani ageikhe mekeat, itithogon nenaluk ekhe lagap.
43010037	An nopase nen, Itithogon hagakhe dogono, iluk, nayoko 'biluk la'ani ageikhe meke, ebe hagakhidek dogolema, hit nen nebe hutdaniluk hinetaiken noba hakotdusak erlok dek o.
43010038	Meke re, an nen hagakhe korlegat, hit eberogonat iluk hinetaiken an noba hakotdusak hina'it iti o. Itithogon hagakhethep iti an nen nopase nipisak hunik, nen, at nen an nipisak hunik, welagorek iti, hinilu atluk nen eberogonat iluk hutdubageik nen, an hagakhe lagei meke iti eberogonat iluk hutdini o! ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43010039	it nen, at Yesus ebe hakhauwogoluk hagakhukha mekeat, at it iniki agap warek polokhogon dukhisikhe.
43010040	Yesus itithogon dukhisikhesik nen, yabokane apuke i Yordan aik ilibaganke at Yohanes nen alebat akhuni ima usa’isekhe lageikhemo etoma itali lageikhesik welageikhe.
43010041	Etoma werekma, akhuni doalegat at oba wagoukhasik nen, men isukha, “At Yohanes nen elalin meke ageikhe hagakhe lageikhe motok dek mekeat he, at nen ap yi abok ekhe lageikhe etnogo ane ebeat ageikhe, ” iluk isukhasik
43010042	it akhuni etoma welagoukha meke inebe doalegat inetaiken Yesus obahakotdisukha.
43011001	Ap ageikhe etaga Lazarus, erugi Maria agot Marta ipisak inom inai o Betania opakimo welagoukha.
43011002	He Maria iti ebe, yabokane apusu obasi hano meke ninoe Etagapogot Yesus isok oba wakhikhesik nen isi baga hokhikhe meke etnogo. Itithogon inaila werekma itinem, at Lazarus oba u warogo 'bekhemo
43011003	it humi inebe pere oe agot ipisak ineru oba u iti nen he, akhuni inoba wene warogo Yesus oba la'isekhe dogolik men isukha, “Noe. Lazarus hetaiken hunik meke etnogo oba u warek werek o, ” iluk la'isasukhama,
43011004	at Yesus yogosi lagoukha. Yogosi lagoukhama, asuk holhikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “U warek iti nen, at ebe motok watlasigin 'buk. An nen hagakhunem, akhuni nen Allah ebe hogorakhik, a'but an hogotnakhik, hagasuagaluk, u warogo 'bekhemo werek iti o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43011005	At Yesus nen, he Marta oe ipisak men, Lazarus men, etaiken hunik welageikhe mekeat,
43011006	“At Lazarus oba u warek, ” iluk yogokhukhama, asuk holhikhe mekeat, eram nen o welageikhemo etomaat huk ageikhesik, iki pere welageikhe.
43011007	Itithogon welageikhesik nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “Nit ninapuke o Yudea usauwok o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43011008	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen men yogokhukha, “Noe. Ap koktek Yahudi meke nen ket yiat helekit oba hasuogoluk hagakhe lageikhama dagei agan etnogo meke, hat yabokane hapuke o etomaat usasigiluk ekhe lagan a? ” iluk isukhama,
43011009	at Yesus nen, men yogokhukha, “O iniki opakiat hasik wi isinem, huben jam 6 logat hiamaganekeke jam 6 agunem dapukhogon 12 jam iniki wenakharek etnogo dek? Tha nen o mo akhuni agat oba liarinakherek meke iti ileken hekhe dogolik, ebe lia baga laga halok, isok a'bit dikhogon waragein motok dek o.
43011010	Meke re, tha nen o hibako laga halok he, at akla lia meke dekma iti nen, isok a'bit dikhogon waragein o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
43011011	yabokane ageikhe yogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Nit ninagarlak Lazarus etnogo arat noge ekhemo meke re, an nen, at noge isinem ilugutha ligin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43011012	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Noe. At iti noge iliogo halok he, oba hano asigin o, ” iluk yogokhukha iti ebe re,
43011013	at Yesus nen Lazarus ebe arat watlageikhemo nen isikhe mekeat, it inakla nen, “Eberogonat noge iliogo nen ekhe, ” iluk inakla apasukha.
43011014	Inakla itithogon apasukha iti nen, at Yesus nen wene pakhogon men yogeisasikhe, “Lazarus ebe arat watlagama o.
43011015	Itithogon watlaga mekeat, hit hinetaiken noba hakotdubageik nen iluk, an etoma usageidek huk welagei iti, hit hinobasigat nakla arleken akhekhe lagei o. Halok he, yogotak nit Lazarus oba usauwok nen witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43011016	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, ap etaga Tomas igik, Hulupmio Meke igik, ekhe lagoukha iti nen, agarlak lak Yesus agarumi ebetlake emenogo men yogeisasikhe, “At Yesus ninomat watlasuok nen, usauwok nen witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43011017	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, at Yesus lak arat lagoukha hak, Lazarus agatma thaldegasik oba nen iniki henagan welagoukhasik ageikhe werekma usasukha.
43011018	O Betania iti, o Yerusalem alilu horogat holak lageikharek hurli, 3 kilometer negen iti nen,
43011019	he Maria men, Marta men, ineru Lazarus warekma inakla hanorogon iluk, it akhuni Yahudi meke doalegat inoba wagoukhasikwelagoukha.
43011020	Itithogon wagoukhasik werekma, “At Yesus ebe wiriogo, ” iluk akhuni nen isukhama Marta asuk holhikhesik nen, Maria uma werek korlek Yesus oba 'bikha lageikhe.
43011021	Lageikhesik Yesus yogokhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Noe. Hat yoma witluk dogolenma re, an neru watlaga iti watlatlep dek apigi o.
43011022	Itithogon watlatlep dek mekeat he, noe. Yogotak hat nen Allah nena meke kino yogosumo, at nen wokhesigin anek etnogo, an niluat o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43011023	at Yesus nen, “Hat heru apuke iluk asiginat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43011024	at Marta nen, men yogokhikhe, “O ilugun hurli baga akhuni watlagoukha meke inilugurinabigin itinem, at Lazarus iti yabokane apuke iluk asigin iluk, an niluat o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43011025	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Akhuni iniluk motok dogoagaluk, an nenat inilugurinakherek o. At tha nen etaiken an noba hakotdilukmo nen watlasigin halok, at ebe watlasigin mekeat he, yabokane iluk atluk iluk motok dogogin o.
43011026	Nen, akhuni iniluk dogolik inetaiken an noba hakotdegarek meke, inebe dopok watlageidek iniluk motok dogogun o. Wene iti eberogonat iluk hutdegen a? ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43011027	at Marta nen he, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Hat hebe Allah a'but Kristus, Allah nen wenago meldiluk la'isigin isukha etnogo, harat iluk, hutdagagi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43011028	Itithogon yogotluk, Marta nen oe Maria wasi lageikhemo asokneat wageikhemo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Ninoe wene yakulnisiliogo meke etnogo ebe wagasik horok yoma dogolik wahiriogo, ” iluk ane hok-hokhogon yogokhikhe.
43011029	Itithogon yogokhikhemo Maria asuk holhikhesik nen, ibat siakhogon melatluk, Yesus oba wageikhe.
43011030	Wageikhesik, at Yesus o silimo aban ukigidek, he Marta nen Yesus 'bikha lageikhesik ipisak abuk agoukhama eranogo at werekma wageikhe.
43011031	He Maria nen itithogon ibat siakhogon melatluk dukhi ageikhemo it akhuni Yahudi meke he Maria akla hanorogon iluk uma welagoukha meke emenogo inileken hasukhasik nen, “He Maria Lazarus oak oba de asi laga higi, ” iluk oporlik wagoukha.
43011032	Waga korlek, he Maria etnogo ileken Yesus ebe lakhasikhesik nen, oba lageikhesik itibagal yukukhogon at apma thoma isikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Hat yoma witluk dogolenma re, an neru watlaga iti, watlatlep dek apigi o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik de agunem,
43011033	it akhuni Yahudi meke Maria oporlik wagoukha meke emenogo inomat de agunem, at Yesus nen ileken hisalok nen, it akmu lak nen akla murlelabethasikhemo inoba hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe,
43011034	“Lazarus ebe warek kakerogon thaldegama werek, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Noe. Hileken hanok nen eme o, ” iluk yogokhukhama
43011035	at Yesus de ageikheat.
43011036	Itithogon de aga lageikhemo, it ap Yahudi meke emenogo nen, “Eiye! Lakhani! At Yesus Lazarus etaiken hunik motok welagama yi, nayuk e! ” iluk hogorakhukha.
43011037	Itithogon isukha mekeat, it akhuni emenogo meke ebetlake nen men isukha, “At nen ap ageikhe ileken puk meke hano hagakhe iti hak, Lazarus iluk dogoagaluk hagatlepma re, watlatlep apegep? Watlatlep degat o, ” iluk isukha.
43011038	Itithogon isukhama, at Yesus etaiken murlelabethasikhemo warek ebe oila elo herlelekma titnok-tetnokhogon 'bisukhama etoma ’bikha lageikhe.
43011039	’Bikha lageikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Helekit ithi dekalogo la’ini, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo ap watlageikhe meke etnogo eru Marta nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. At ebe thalhosik oba nen niniki henaganat welagosik ageikhe welago yi. Halok he, arat hirli agasik obasi agama o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
43011040	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nen wene yokhekhe dogolik, Hetaiken an noba hakotdegen halok he, Allah hogorakharek meke etnogo ageikhe hagakhunem hileken higinat o, iluk, arat yokhikhidegat? Yokhikhiat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43011041	it nen helekit etnogo dekalogo la’isukhama, Yesus ileken pogot oba liakhalok nen, men isikhe, “Allah nopase. An nane hasuk holhen iti nen, heagei wathakhe lagei o.
43011042	An nen hat kino yokhugunem, nane hasuk holhetek etnogo, an nilu mekeat, it akhuni yoma nen, hat nen an la’ani agagin iti nebe hutdanuagaluk yokhikhi o, nopase, ” iluk isikhesik nen,
43011043	yabokane ane kokhogon men isikhe, “Lazarus. Itithogon dukhi me o! ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43011044	at Lazarus ebe watlageikhe meke etnogo iluk atluk, iki isok herle su meke yiligat, elokhoken su yiligat, dukhi ageikhe. Itithogon dukhi ageikhemo, at Yesus nen it akhuni etoma welagoukha meke emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “Ebe loak nen, oba herle su meke yilik ethoma hialdini o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43011045	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it akhuni Yahudi meke inebe doalegat he Maria lak inoba wagoukhasik welagoukha meke emenogo, at Yesus nen hagakhikhe meke iti inilekenhasukhasik nen, it aperek doalegat inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha.
43011046	Itithogon hakotdisukha mekeat he, it aperek ap Farisi meke inoba lagoukhasik nen, menyogeisasukha, “At Yesus nen yigithogonat hagakhe, itithogon hagakhe, ” iluk yogeisa lagoukha.
43011047	Itithogon yogeisa lagoukhama nen, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek men, it ap Farisi meke men, it ap wene Allah hasik erlo pilinekharek meke waisasukhama wagoukhama nen, men yogeisasukha, “At ap iti ebe hutduagaluk elalin meke doalegat hagariogo iti re, nit nen nikithogon hagasuok apegep?
43011048	Nit nen, at itithogon hagarik nekhe korlek wenagakhidek here’isagun halok, akhuni doalegat inetaiken at oba hakotdilik lagunem, yabokane ilugun oba, it ap Roma meke witluk nen ninebe wuleleken warogo ’binanhe dogolik, Allah ai halek misalisugun o! ” iluk yogeisasukhama,
43011049	ap it meke ageikhe etaga Kayafas, it ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok tahun iti baga welageikhe meke iti nen men yogeisasikhe, “Hit wene motok hinokodek nen ekhe lagap.
43011050	Nit tha’bokhogonat wuleleken tagalninakhidek, nit ninobasik ap opakiat anek watlasumo hano, iluk hutdekhe lagap dek a? ” iluk wene itithogon isikhe iti
43011051	at akla nen kagalogo isikhe ’buk. At he, at ebe ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok tahun iti baga werekma, Allah nen akla kagalhikhemo, men isikhe, “Nit akhuni Yahudi meke hasik Yesus ebe watlasigin, ” iti meke hasigat isikhe iti.
43011052	Meke re, it akhuni Yahudi meke inobasik anek isikhe ’buk. Akhuni tha’bokhogonat Allah a’buri meke o yi ai ti ai lo lagoukhasik welageikharek meke inom dapukhogon ’bisagaluk, Yesus watlasigin meke hasik isikhe.
43011053	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, hurli iti hurli nen, it ap koktek Yahudi meke nen Yesus ebe motok wasuogoluk abok palhe lagoukha.
43011054	Itithogon isukha iti nen, at Yesus o Yudea etoma ap Yahudi meke inil oba ebe thelekma negen nekhe lageidek. Limak-Iimak nekhe lageikhesik nen, o etoma here'isalok, o limo akhuni dekma aliluke o ukul etaga Efraim lageikhesik, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inom etoma welagoukha.
43011055	Welagoukha etanemat, it akhuni Yahudi meke pesta etaga Paskah nekarek etnogo meke nausak oba arat hakok i ageikhemo nuogoluk aban dogolik, it inoba horogo iluk, Yahudi meke hagakharek hak hagasuogoluk, inaila tomok nen o Yerusalem natogosi lagoukha.
43011056	-
43011057	Natogokhukhasik werek korlek, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek meke men, it ap Farisi meke men, wene palhe dogolik, men isukha, “It akhuni aperek Yesus ebe werek inilu halok, nit nen at ebe hakhoagaluk yoknisasuak o, ” iluk yoko ula'isukhasikmo nogo nen, it akhuni emenogo Allah ai halekma dogolik, Yesus herarik it-it hinok waganhe dogolik, “At he, pesta hagakhunem yi wisigin apekhe lagap a? Dek a, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
43012001	Wene itithogon isukhasik werek korlek, iniki 5 oba dogoluk nen, ageikhe baga pesta Paskah etnogo nuogoluk aban werek korlek, at Yesus o Betania ap Lazarus watlageikhesikmo nen ilugutdisikhe meke etnogo aila wageikhe.
43012002	Wageikhemo, it akhuni etoma nen arini isakhukhama, he Marta nen hipiri wogeisekhe korlek, Lazarus men, akhuni inayoko 'bisukha meke men, Yesus inom nasukha.
43012003	Itithogon nasi korlek, at he Maria nen apusu etaga narwastu obasi hano meke oko kogat palharek meke, setengah liter waganogo Yesus isok oba watdisikhesik nen, at Maria ekaerek isi baga hokhikhe. Itithogon hagakhikhemo, uma etnogo obasi motok yik-mikhogon hagatlageikhe.
43012004	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe etaga Yudas Iskariot, yabokane Yesus wasuagaluk yoko lageikhe mekeetnogo nen, men isikhe,
43012005	“Apusu narwastu iti baga akhuni yabu iniki opaki hasik hagakhunem iniki oko opakitek wogeisegarek etnogo meke 300 waganiluk nen, it akhuni inameke dek meke supurisausak mekeat, apusu alomakhe iti nenaluk, ” iluk, wene palhikhe.
43012006	Itithogon wene palhikhe iti, akhuni inameke dek meke iti akmu nen isikhe ’buk. At agarlak lak inom tha'bokhogonat inauang ai heisogon meke hago dogolik, at ekaerek hasik limago horlekhe lageikhe iti nen wene itithogon isikhe.
43012007	Itithogon isikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “He yi apusu watdanhe iti hasik, wenagakhe ’buk o. An yabokane nakhunem watlasumo nebe warek agatma thaldanuogoluk apusu watdanusak tak-tagat hago welagasik watdanhe o.
43012008	Nen, it akhuni inameke dek meke iti, hit hinom motogat dogogun meke re, an anek he, hit ninom motok dogogun dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43012009	At Yesus nen itithogon yogeisasikhesik werekma, akhuni nen, “At Yesus o Betania werek o, ” iluk isukhama, it akhuni Yahudi meke inebe doalegat inasuk holhukhasik lagoukha. Itithogon lagoukha iti, at Yesus anek inileken huogoluk lagoukha ’buk. Mekeat he, Lazarus warek meke Yesus nen ilugutdisikhe etnogo ipisagat inileken hisauwogoluk lagoukha.
43012010	-
43012011	Lagoukhama, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek meke emenogo nen, men isukha, “Lazarus warek meke Yesus nen ilugutdekhe iti nen, akhuni Yahudi meke inebe doalegat nit ninane here’isalok inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdiliogei, ” iluk, Lazarus meneke wasuogoluk abok palhukhaat.
43012012	Itithogon isukhasik werek korlek, hubunke, it akhuni nen, “At Yesus o Yerusalem wisigiluk wiriogo, ” iluk isukhama, it akhuni doalegat pesta Paskah nukunem natogokhukha meke emenogo inasuk holhukhasik nen,
43012013	tukhe eka hakene meke palhigik wolok, Yesus elokhoma amitmit luk-luk dukhekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Wa! Wa! Wa! ” iluk u hak, “Hosana! Ninopase Allah Etagapogot nen nit akhuni Israel meke ninoe kok etagapogot la'agei agama wagan yi, at nenat hanothabuak o, ”\rq (Mazmur 118:26)\rq* iluk etai warik warik dukhi agoukha.
43012014	Dukhi agunem, at Yesus wam keledai eak ket aban meke ageikhe waganhikhesik, apot oba yasuk lageikhesik ukisikhe. Ukisikhe iti, Allah nen haganeat men isikhemo holal yigithogon waganek werek,
43012015	“Hit akhuni o kota Sion welagathep meke hinayuk agup o! Hinoe kok etagapogot wam keledai eak ket aban meke apot oba yasuk latluk wiriogo ilihinileken lakhani o! ”\rq (Zakharia 9:9)\rq* iluk isikhe tak-tagat hagakhikhe iti.
43012016	Itithogon ukisikhe mekeat he, itinem, it at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, wene hagatlageikhe meke iti hutdigidek. Meke re, at Yesus watlageikhesikmo nen yabokane Allah nen ilugutdisikhesik kogotdisikhesikmo nen, inakla ebekhukhasik men isukha, “At hasik Allah ane holal waganek weregat o. Nen, wene iti holal waganek werek tak-tagat, it akhuni nen at obasik hagakhunem ninileken hogo, ” iluk inakla ebekhukha.
43012017	Nen, at Lazarus warek thalhukhasikmo nen, at Yesus nen waikhikhemo ebe iluk ageikhesik dukhi agunem, it akhuni inileken hasukha meke emenogo nen, it aperek yogeisekhe dogolik,
43012018	“At Yesus ebe hutduagaluk elalin meke itithogon hagakhe, ” iluk isukhama akhuni inebe doalegat inasuk holhukhasikmo nogo nen, Yesus elokhoma dukhi agoukha iti.
43012019	Itithogon dukhi agoukha iti nen, it apFarisi meke it-it wene ekhe dogolik, “Warligi yi. Yi akhuni ti akhuni tha'bokhogonat, at oporlik motok liliogei iti nen, nit nen hagakhe lago etnogo hagakhunem, ninane kok asigin apekhe lagap a? Motok dek o, ” iluk isukha.
43012020	It akhuni pesta neke dogolik Allah hogorasuogoluk wagoukha iti, it ap Yunani meke aperek inom wagoukha.
43012021	It ap iti wagoukhasik nen, ap Filipus ai o Galilea eloke ukul etaga Betsaida meke usa’ageikhesik werekma, oba wagoukhasik men yogeisasikhe, “Noe. Nit Yesus oba wisusak warlok nen wago o, ” iluk isukhama,
43012022	at Filipus nen wene isukha meke iti, at Andreas yogosi lageikhesik ipisak nen yabokane Yesus yogosi lagoukha.
43012023	Itithogon yogosi lagoukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo, nebe hogotnabugun oba arat asi aga o.
43012024	Nen, akhuni nen, gandum eken ai agatma yakhidekma, akhuni watlageikharek iti hak, oado alep meke hirli atluk ket meke hurlelhidek halok he, eken opakiat ai yasugun meke itiat dogogin o. Mekeat, eken iti agatma yatlukmo, akhuni watlageikharek hak, oado alep meke iti hirli atluk anek, yabokane ket meke hurleldiluk eken doalegat ikherek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43012025	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “At tha nen akla nen he, An nen agat oba yoma nebe niluk dogosak warlok, iluk apekherek halok he, yabokane ebe iluk motok dogosak meke hasik nuk asigin o. Mekeat he, ap tha nen akla nen, Agat oba yoma niluk dogosak na'it, iluk apekherek halok he, at iti yabokane ebe nuk asigin dek iluk motok dogogin o.
43012026	Nen, at tha nen an natuaneke dogolik, akla nen, An Yesus hasik hagakhe dogogin, iluk apekhe halok he, an dogoginmo etoma nipisagat motok dogouogoluk noporlik waga dogosak o. Nen, at tha nen an nobasik hagakhe dogogin meke iti, nopase nen at ebe alon haligin o, iluk nane eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43012027	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik sembayan ageikhe men isikhe, “Nopase. Yogotakne netaiken weak motok murleliogo welagei yi nikithogon ik he? An nen yigithogon ik. Nopase. An yi aik ti aik higin iti, hat nen nebe tilnabin o, ilukyokhesusak meke re, itithogon hagatnabuagalugat wagagisikmo nogo nen, itithogon igin dek o, nopase.
43012028	Halok he, nopase, hat hetaga hekaerek nen kogotdakhan o, ” iluk isinem pogot oba nen ane ekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Arat kogotdakhigirik, yabokane kogotdakhageinat o, ” iluk ane isinem,
43012029	it akhuni inebe doalegat etoma metek welagoukha meke nen, inasuk holhukhasik, it aperek nen, men isukha, “Pogot ane luk-luk iliogo, ” igik, nen it aperek nen, “Dek o. It malaikat pogot oba yoko nekharek meke ageikhe nen ane hakhekhe o, ” igik, isukha.
43012030	Itithogon ugun apasukhaat, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ane isinem hinasuk holhep iti, an hasik 'buk. Hit hinobasigat ekhe o.
43012031	Yogotak Allah nen, akhuni agat oba meke wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakhe dogolik, ap etagapogot agat oba meke etnogo mukhogo ula'isigik, hagasigin oba arat asi aga o.
43012032	An nebe agat oba yoma meldanumo, an nen akhuni tha'bokhogonat lit-lit wogosik nekaerek noba 'bisasigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43012033	Itithogon yogeisasikhe iti ebe re, “An yabokane akhuni nen itithogon meldaniluk nasugun, ” iluk u hak isikhe.
43012034	Itithogon isikhemo, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga nen, nit akhuni tilninabuagaluk Allah nen Kristus la'isigin iti ebe witluk nen, iluk motok dogogin. Iluk isikhemo ninasuk holhorek mekeat he, hat nen ekhe dogolik, An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo akhuni nen agat oba yoma meldanugun, iluk ekhe lagan iti, ap ageikhe ebe abat itaklasi isigin isikhe iti ebe tha hasik isikhemo nen egen, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43012035	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nebe o liarinakherek meke etnogo we niki herlekha'bugat ninom dogogun o. Halok he, at tha nen o hibako mummo laga halok he, O koma laga lagei heat, iluk okodegat liliogo iti nen, hit lagunem o mum asinogo, iluk, an o liarinakherek meke ninom werek korlek yaat ha baga laga dogoni o.
43012036	Hit hinebe an o liarinakherek meke na'buri asubageik nen, an ninom werek korlek yaat, nebe hutdaniluk hinetaiken noba hakotdekhe dogoni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Wene itithogon arat yogeisalok nen, at Yesus it here'isalok, ebe werlekmake limaklasi lageikhe.
43012037	At Yesus ebe it nen hutduagaluk elalin doalegat inil oba hagakhe lageikhe mekeat he, it nen, “At eberogonat, ” iluk, ebe hutdekhe lagoukha motok dek o.
43012038	It itithogon hagakhe lagoukha iti, ap Yesaya Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke nen ekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Allah Hetagapogot meke, nopase. Nit nen hat hane yogeisugunem, tha nen wene iti eberogonat iluk hutdisikhe nogo. Hat hiki obatne inileken hoagaluk elalin meke hagakhetek etnogo ebe hagakhunem, tha nen ileken halok hutdisikhe nogo. Dek o, ”\rq (Yesaya 53:1)\rq* iluk isikhe meke holal waganek werek iti, ebeat asuagaluk, itithogon hagakhe lagoukha iti.
43012039	At Allah nen itithogon hagarinakhikhe iti nen, it itithogon eberogonat iluk hutdigidek hagakhe lagoukha, iluk Yesaya nen ageikhe menisikhe,
43012040	“At Allah nen, it inileken nen hutukhogon halok, inakla ebetdiluk inobabut hebelatluk, an napma wagunem, an nen it hano hagarinabinogo iluk, an nenat it inileken pugutdisigik, inakla pugutdisigik, hagatdisigi o, ”\rq (Yesaya 6:10)\rq* iluk isikhemo, Yesaya nen holal waganogo 'bisikhemo werek iti.
43012041	At Yesaya nen wene itithogon isikhe iti, at Yesus yabokane hagakhunem ebe hogorasugun meke hasik ileken hasikhesik nen, at abok isikhe iti.
43012042	Wene itithogon isikhemo holal waganek werek mekeat he, it ap koktek Yahudi meke aperek inebe doalegat, inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha mekeat, it nen yigithogon hagakhe lagoukha, “It ap Farisi meke nen o sembayan egarekma nen niniki korlo lisogo ula’inaninogo, ” iluk, “Ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotdogo, ” iluk akhuni inil oba pakhogon ekhe lagoukha dek.
43012043	It iti Allah nen hogorinabuagaluk hagakhe lagoukha dek o. Akhuni nen hogorinakhe dogou warlok nen hagakhe lagoukha iti.
43012044	It itithogon hagakhe lagoukha mekeat he, at Yesus nen ane kokhogon men yogeisasikhe, “At tha nen etaiken an noba hakotdigin halok he, an noba hakotdigin 'buk. Dek o. At he, an la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo oba etaiken hakotdigin o.
43012045	Nen, at tha nen, ileken an neekhe halok he, an la'ani ageikhe meke etnogoat ileken hekhe o.
43012046	Nen, it akhuni inetaiken an noba hakotdugun meke tha'bokhogonat, o mum oba dogunogo iluk, liarinabigiluk an nebe liarinakherek meke agat oba yoma usa'agagi o.
43012047	An agat oba yoma usa'agagi iti, akhuni wene inoba 'bigiluk usa'agagi 'buk. At he, inebe tilinabigiluk usa'agagi iti nen, at tha nen an nane asuk holiluk nen, nane hologo hagakhidek halok he, an nenat wene oba 'bigin 'buk. Dek o.
43012048	At he, at iti an nebe woknabu a'irat, nen nane hanorogon waganusak a'irat, iti nen, at iti wene oba 'bigin meke werek o. Wene oba 'bigin iti, o ilugun hurli baga karelinabigin iti nen, an nen wene yokhisekhe lagei iti bagaat wene oba asigin o, iluk itithogon yokhisekhe lagei iti,
43012049	an nakla nen kagalogo yokhisekhe lagei 'buk. Dek o. An nen yokhisoagaluk an nopase la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo nenat nasuk warogo, Yigithogon in, tigithogon in, iluk yoknekhe korlegat yokhisekhe lagei o.
43012050	Nen, at nen wene ninasuk warogo, Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk ninasuk warogo yoknisekherek iti nit niniluk motok dogoagaluk yoknisekherek, iluk an nilu o. At nopase nen wene yokniriogo mekeat yokhisekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43013001	Nen, hubenke pesta Paskah etnogo nuogoluk dogolik, at Yesus nen, o agat oba yoma thogotdiluk opase baga apuke dageigin etnogo arat horok asi ageikhemo ilu welageikhe. Nen, at ekaerek agarumi agat oba meke etaiken hunik motok welageikhesik nen, yabokane inebe a'it ageidegat ilugun hurli baga etaiken hunik motogat welageikhe.
43013002	Dogolik, at agarumi emenogo inom o hibako hipiri opakimo nukunem, Yudas Simon Iskariot a'but etnogo, akla Iblis ukisikhesik nen, Yesus ebe wasuak nen, “Yoko lan o, ” iluk akla kagalhikhe.
43013003	Itithogon akla kagalhikhemo, at Yesus akla nen, “Nopase nen yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat an niki baga 'bisikhemo werek apigi. Nen, an nebe Allah werekma nen usa'agagisik, yabokane napuke at obaat dageigin apigi, ” iluk ilu welageikheat.
43013004	Itithogon ilu dogolik, hipiri neke lageikhesik ebe melageikhesik nen, asu ebe ugu meke nokorlogo 'bisikhesik nen, su inoba i apusu hokharek meke waganhikhesik obakha baga pogukhogon ikhikhe.
43013005	Itithogon ikhikhesik, i loyang oba kelelogo kola'isikhesik nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inisok oba thobalinakhikhesik nen, su obakha baga pogukhogon ikhikhe etnogo baga i apusu horinabik lageikhe.
43013006	Itithogon horinabik laga lageikhesik, hurli at Simon Petrus etnogo oba asi agunem, at nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Hat Hetagapogot nen an nisok oba erlok thobaligiluk? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43013007	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Nagot o. An hagakhi yi, ebe nikithogon meke, hat hokodek mekeat he, yabokane nen hilu asigin o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43013008	at Petrus nen, men isikhe, “Noe. Hat nen an nisok oba thobalnabusak motok dek o! ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nen hat thobalhabusak dek halok, hat hebe an iteerek dogogin dek o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43013009	at Simon Petrus nen, men yogokhikhe, “A! Iti halok he, noe. Nisok oba anek thobalnakhun o. Niki men, nukuloak men, tha'bokhogonat thobalnabin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43013010	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “At tha nen, ebe kume arat warek werek halok, at ebe thobalek motok werek iti nen, yabokane thobalusak dek o. Isok anek thobalusak erlok o. Hit itithogon thobalek motok welagap meke re, hinebe tha'bokhogonat thobalek welagap 'buk. Ageikhe thobalek dek werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Wene itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, at Yesus akla nen,
43013011	“At iti nen an nebe nasuagaluk yoko ligin, ” iluk ilu dogolik nogo nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit thobalek motok welagap meke re, hinebe tha'bokhogonat thobalek welagap 'buk. Dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe iti.
43013012	Itithogon inisok obake arat thobalinakhikhesik nen, asu nokorlogo 'bisikhe meke etnogo ikhikhesik, apuke hurek welageikhemo hurek lageikhesik nen, mel yogeisasikhe, “An nen hit hagathinakhi iti hutdegep a? Dek a.
43013013	Nen, hit nen an yoknekhe dogolik, Ninoe Etagapogot wene yakulnisekherek meke, iluk yoknekhe lagap iti, an nebe hinoe Netagapogot wene yakulhisegerek meke eberogonat halogat ekhe lagap o.
43013014	Itithogon, an nebe hinoe Netagapogot wene yakulhisegerek meke nen hit hinisok obake thobalhinakhi halok, hit nen itithogonat hit-hit hinisok obake thobal-thobal hagakhe dogosak o.
43013015	Nen, an nen hit hagathinakhi iti hak, hit nen an nobabut waganogo itithogonat hagakhe dogobageik nen iluk yakulhisigi o.
43013016	Wene ageikhe yi yokhisak, Ap kok ageikhe inapma negen werek korlek, at atuaneke meke kok negen welagarek dek o. Iti hak, ap yoko la'ekherek meke inapma negen werek korlegat, at yoko lagarek meke iti kok negen welagarek motok dek o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o.
43013017	An nen wene yokhisigi iti hinilu atluk hagakhe dogogun halok he, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogogun o.
43013018	An nen wene iti hit hinebe tha'bokhogonat hasik yokhisigi 'buk. Dek o. Hit yi an nenat hinebe wenakhinakhigi meke nilu mekeat he, wene iti hasik Allah ane baga men iluk holal waganogo 'bisukha, Ap ageikhe hipiri nipisak opakimo neke lago meke yi nen weagatnabigiluk melaga o,\rq (Mazmur 41:9-10)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek iti sugun asigin dek o. Ebeat asigin o.
43013019	Wene iti yabokane arat eberogonat hagatlaga halok, At ikhok motok welagarek meke etnogo arat o, iluk hutdanubageik nen iluk, yogotak wene iti aban hagatlageidek werek korlek abok yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe,
43013020	“At tha nen, akhuni an nen la'isagein meke woginakhe halok, anat woknabigin o. Nen, at tha nen an woknakhe halok he, at an la'ani ageikhe meke etnogoat waganigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43013021	At Yesus nen, wene itithogon arat yogeisasikhesik oba nen, at akla weak ageikhemo, ane pakhogonat men yogeisasikhe, “Hit ap hinebe ya meke ageikhe nen an nebe nasuagaluk yoko ligin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43013022	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it nen, “Iti tha nen hagasigin meke ekhe, ” iluk inobakha palagoukhasik nen, inileken ageikhe nen ageikhe lakhigik hagakhukha.
43013023	Itithogon inileken lak-lak hagakhe korlek, it at Yesus ane waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe at etaiken hunik meke alilu horok-horok hurek welageikhe.
43013024	Itithogon hurek werekma, at Simon Petrus etnogo nen iki pilin ap etnogo yogokhe dogolik men yogokhikhe, “Ap tha hasik ekhe lagan, iluk, oba hinok waganin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43013025	ap etnogo yabokane at Yesus alilu horokhogon higilha lageikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe, iti tha hasik egen nogo? ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43013026	at Yesus nen, “Ebe re, an nen hipiri roti meke i mago nen wogosigin itiat o, ” iluk isikhesik nen, hipiri roti etnogo i mago waganhikhesik nen, Yudas, Simon Iskariot a'but etnogo wogokhikhe.
43013027	Itithogon wogokhikhemo, at Yudas roti etnogo ikimo waganhe korlek eranogoat akla Iblis ukisikhe. Itithogon ukisikhemo, at Yesus nen yogokhe dogolik, “Hat nen hagasigiluk apegen meke iti ibat hagasin o, ” iluk yogokhunem,
43013028	it hurek dogolik hipiri neke lagoukha meke emenogo nen, “Iti nikithogon meke hasigat at Yudas yogokhe he, ” iluk hutdigidek hagakhukha.
43013029	Itithogon hutdigidegat dogolik, at Yudas iti agarlak lak inom uang aika it mekeat hago welagarekma nogo nen, men inakla apasukha, “Yesus nen nit pesta hagasusak hasik yi meke ti meke oko pali loagaluk yogokhe a? At he, akhuni inameke dek meke uang ageikhe opakitek supurisa loagaluk yogokhe a, ” iluk inakla apasukha.
43013030	Itithogon inakla apekhe korlek, at Yudas roti ikimo waganhikhesik nen, o motok hibako ageikhemo itikmanke piokthek dukhisikhe.
43013031	At Yudas etnogo itithogon arat dukhisikhemo dogolik, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. An abat itaklasi agagi etnogo Allah nen hogotnakhunem, akhuni nen Allah hogorasugun oba yogotak arat asi aga o.
43013032	Nen, an nen hagasigin iti baga Allah hogorakho halok, at ekaerek ebe hogorakharek iti hak, an nipisagat hogotninakhe dogoagaluk, at nen ibat hogotnabigin o.
43013033	Na'buri. An niki pererlagat anek ninom dogoluk nen ligin o. Lamo, hit nen an nebe heraknakhe dogogun mekeat he, alebat an nen ap Yahudi meke yogeisasigi hak, o an liginmo etoma hit nen heraknabik lugun dek o, iluk, yogotak hit yokhisigiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43013034	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen hagakhe dogosak meke wene ket meke ageikhe yokhisak, An nen hit nakmurogon welagarek hak, hit itithogonat, hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhe dogono o.
43013035	Hit-hit itithogon nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhe dogogun halok, it akhuni tha'bokhogonat inileken 'bithisalok, It yi Yesus agarumi eberogonat higi, iluk inilu asugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43013036	Yesus nen itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, at SimonPetrus nen, “Noe. Hat o koma lagaluk nen egen, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An o liginmo etoma, hat noporlik dopokhogon ligin dek o. Yabokane anek noporlik wisigin o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43013037	at Petrus nen at oba hinok waganhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Yogotak hoporlik wisusak erlok dek egen iti nenaluk. An hat hasigat watlasusak welagei o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43013038	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat an nobasik eberogonat watlasusak welagan a? Dek o. Thue ayam ane igidek werek korlek, hat nen, An Yesus nokodek, iluk hiki henagan oba la'beldilukmo nen, ayam ane igin o, iluk eberogonat yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43014001	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Hit hinakla nen, Eiye, iluk hinelabut hisik dogogup o. Hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdigik, an noba hakotdigik, hagakhe dogono o.
43014002	An nopase aila etoma, o hit dogoumo oboluk doalegat thelek werek o. Itithogon dek dogolepma, an o hit dogoumo kareli ligin, iluk yokhisele dek o.
43014003	An o etoma arat lalok hit hinaila arat karelogo 'biluk nen, an dogoginmo etoma ninom dogouok nen iluk, napuke wokhinabi isigin o.
43014004	Nen, o an liginmo iti, holak ebe hit hiniluat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43014005	at Tomas nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. O hat liginmo iti ninokodekma, holak iti nikithogon nen ninilu asusak o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
43014006	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Holak inom, ebe wene inom, inilugurinakherek inom, iti an nebeat o. At tha nen an noba wageidek halok, nopase werekma ukusak motok erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik,
43014007	it tha'bokhogonat yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit an nebe hinilu agap iti, an nopase hinilu asiginat o. Hinilu asigin iti, hurli yogotak hurli nen, at ebe hinilu ageik, hinileken higik, arat hekhe lagap o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhemo,
43014008	at Filipus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Ninileken halok ninetaiken hapukhogon dogoagaluk, hat hopase iti ebe yakulnisan o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43014009	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Filipus nagot o. An o haganeat eloma nenat ninom welago mekeat he, hat nen an nebe hutdanhidek welaganma higi, e a? At tha nen an ileken neekhe iti, an nopaseat ileken hekhe o. Itithogon mekeat he, hat nen, Hopase iti yakulnisan o, iluk egen iti nikithogon nen egen.
43014010	An nen nopase nipisak hunik, nen, nopase nen an nipisak hunik, welagorek iti, hat hutdekhe lagan dek a? ” iluk yogokhikhesik it tha’bokhogonat yogeisekhe dogolik, “An nen wene yokhisegerek iti, an nakla nen kagalogo yokhisegerek ’buk. Dek o. An nopase nipisak hunik dogolik, an nane baga nen igik, niki baga nen hagakhik, hagakherek meke iti, at ekaerek nenat hagariogo o.
43014011	An nenat nopase nipisak hunik, nen, nopase nen an nipisak hunik, welagorek igi iti, eberogonat iluk, hit nen hutdini o. Iti hutdusak erlok dek halok he, an hagakhe lagei meke iti hinileken halok, hutdanini o.
43014012	Tha nen etaiken an noba hakotdekhe halok, an hagakhe lagei meke iti, at nen hagakhe dogoginat o. An hagakhe lagei iti, herlekha’bugat negen meke re, an nopase oba ligin iti nen, at tha nen etaiken an noba hakotdiluk welagarek meke iti nen ebenageigat kokhogonat hagakhe dogogin o, iluk nane eberogonat yokhisigi o.
43014013	Nen, at tha nen, yi meke ti meke an netaga palogo Allah kino yogokhe halok, an a'but nen hagakhunem, it akhuni nen nopase hogorasuagaluk, an nenat hagasigin o.
43014014	Itithogon hagasigin iti nen, hit nen yi meke ti meke an netaga palogo kino yoknekhe dogono. Itithogon kino yoknekhep halok he, an nen hagasigin o, ” iluk wene warisasikhe.
43014015	At Yesus nen wene itithogon warisasikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit an hinetaiken hunik halok he, an nen hit yigithogon hagakhe dogono, tigithogon hagakhe dogono, iluk yokhisekhe lagei meke iti hagakhe dogogun o.
43014016	-
43014017	Itithogon hagakhunem, hit yomakhisekhe dogolik, hinom motok dogobageik nen iluk, an nen nopase kino yogosumo, at nen at ageikhe usakhisasigin o. At iti ebe Allah Agoreke ebe wene yokhisekhe dogogin meke. Itithogon hinoba usakhisasumo, it akhuni agat oba meke nen, at iti ebe inokodegat. Nen, ebe inileken hugun degat, iti nen ebe waganusak erlok degat o. Itithogon mekeat he, hit anek he, at ebe hinom dogolik, hinakla motok dogogin iti nen, at ebe hinilu dogogun o.
43014018	An meneke, hit hinebe yekerugi irlagakot meke negen thogotdinageiluk ligin dek o. Yabokane napuke 'bithisasiginat o.
43014019	Niniki herlekha'bugat dogoluk nen, akhuni agat oba meke inileken neagun motok dek mekeat he, hit anek he, an nilugat dogogin, nen hit yabokane hinilugat dogogun iti nen, hinileken neagun o.
43014020	Itithogon hinileken neagun itinem, an nopase nipisak hunik welago, nen, hit an ninom hunik, nen, an hit ninom hunik welago meke iti, hinilu asigin o.
43014021	At tha nen, an nen, yigithogon hagakhe dogono, tigithogon hagakhe dogono, iluk yokhisigi meke iti, nane hologo hagakherek halok he, an nebe etaiken hunik meke at itiat o. Nen, nopase nen at iti etaiken hunigat o. Nen, an nen at iti netaiken hunik dogolik, nebe hutdanuagaluk yakulisigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43014022	ap Yudas Iskariot etnogo 'buk. At he, Yudas ninat meke ageikhe nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Hat hebe hutdaguagaluk, akhuni tha'bokhogonat yakulisigidek, nit anek yakulnisagein iti nenaluk nen, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43014023	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “At tha nen, an nebe etaiken hunik halok he, nane hologo hagakhe dogogin o. Nane hologo hagakhe dogoumo, nopase nen at iti etaiken hunik dogogin o. Itithogon dogolik, an nopase nipisak ap iti oba witluk, at ninom motok dogogun o.
43014024	Nen, at tha nen, an etaiken hunik dek halok he, an nane hologo hagakherek dek itiat o. An nane hit holhe lagap iti re, an nane meke 'buk. An nopase la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo aneat o.
43014025	-
43014026	Wene iti an nebe hit ninom dogolik, yokhisekhe lagei. Meke re, an nopase nen at Agoreke hit yomakhisekhe dogoagaluk, an netaga baga usakhisasumo, at nen yi wene ti wene tha'bokhogonat yakulhisigik, an nen yokhisekhe lagei meke iti tha'bokhogonat hinakla ebethisigik, hagakhe dogogin o.
43014027	Halok he, hit hinetaiken hapukhogon dogoagaluk an netaiken hapukhogon welagarek meke wokhisalok ligin o. Iti akhuni agat oba meke nen wogeisegarek iti hak wokhisagein dek iti nen, hinelabut hisik dogolik hinayuk agup o.
43014028	An ligin mekeat he, yabokane napuke hinoba wisigin o, iluk yokhisigi etnogo arat hinasuk holhep apigi. An nebe hinetaiken hunik dogolepma, an nopase ebe kogat, nen, an nebe erlok dek iti nen he, an nopase oba ligin iti hasik hinakla arleken akhelep o.
43014029	Wene tha'bokhogonat yokhisigi iti ebe hagatlasigin halok, hit nen, Wene yoknisasikhe etnogo arat hagatlaga yi, iluk hutdiluk, hinetaiken an noba hakotdubageik iluk, wene iti ebe aban hagatlageidek werek korlek, abok tak yokhisigi o.
43014030	Akhuni agat oba meke inoe kok etnogo ebe wiriogo iti nen he, an wene doalegat yokhisagein dek o. At iti wisigin mekeat he, an at iki baga welageidek o.
43014031	Itithogon mekeat he, an nopase netaiken hunik welagarek iti akhuni agat oba meke inilu asuagaluk, an nopase nen nasuk warogo yoknekherek mekeat hagakhe lagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen, “Nagarumi. Luok nen melatni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43015001	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane wene ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “O anggur erlo an nebeat o. Nen, ebe iteerek ebeat meke an nopaseat o.
43015002	O ikilo’bak ebe tomok, an noba hunik dogolik eken ikhidek halok, 'bogokhogon la’igin mekeat he, ikilo’bak ebe tomok eken ikhe halok, aperek inom doalegat ikhe dogoagaluk oboseka palogo yorla yebeligin o.
43015003	Nen, hit he, an nen wene yokhisegerek iti nen he, hinoboseka hakene palogo yorla yebelogo ’binageisikhemo welagap o.
43015004	Itithogon hinoboseka hakene palek welagap iti, hit an ninom hunik, nen, an hit ninom hunik, dogouok o. O ikilo’bak iti, o erlo baga hunik dek halok, eken isusak motok erlok dek o. O ebe baga hunik halok, eken ikherek iti hak, hit an ninom hunik dogogun dek halok he, hano meke hagasusak erlok dek o. An nebe baga hunik halogat, hano hagasusak o.
43015005	O ebe anat o. Nen, nikilo’bak hirat o. Hit an ninom hunik dek, we dekekthek dogolik, yi meke ti meke ageikhe hagasusak motok erlok dek iti nen, at tha nen an nipisak hunik, nen, an at nipisak hunik, dogogun halok he, at iti eken doalegat isu hak, hano meke kokhogon hagasigin o.
43015006	Nen, o ikilo’bak palogo la’isegarek meke puk agunem, akhuni nen nomologo ’biluk hetumo po la’isugunem hetu nekerek iti hak, ap tha nen an nipisak hunik dek, dekekthek werek halok, itithogonat palogo la’umo hetu nigin o.
43015007	Hit an ninom hunik dogolik nane hinakla werek halok, nena meke hit warlok meke an kinoyoknisumo wokhisaumo horlagunat o.
43015008	Hit hineken doalegat isu hak hano meke kokhogon hagasugun halok, akhuni nen an nopase hogorasugun o. Hit hinebe ebe nagarumi nane waganhe lagap meke dogolik, itithogonat hagakhe dogogun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43015009	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase nen an etaiken hunik welagarek iti hak, an nen hit netaiken hunik welagei o. Itithogon hit netaiken hunik dogeik nen, an ninom hunigat dogono o.
43015010	Nen, an nopase nen, Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk nasuk warogo yoknikhikhe meke iti, an nen at ane hologo hagakhunem, at nen an etaiken hunik welagarek iti hak, hit itithogonat, an nen hit hinasuk warogo, Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk yokhisekhe lagei meke iti, hit nen an nane hologo hagakhe dogogun halok, an nen hit netaiken hunik dogogin o.
43015011	Nen, an nakla arleken akhegerek iti hak, hit hinakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, yabokane hinakla arleken motok kogat akhekhe dogobageik nen iluk, wene iti tha'bokhogonat yokhisigi o.
43015012	Hit nen hagakhe dogobageik nen iluk, wene ebe yiat hinasuk warogo yokhisak, An nen hit netaiken hunik welagei iti hak, hit nen itithogonat hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon dogobageik nen iluk yokhisigi o.
43015013	It aperek inagarlak lak inetaiken hunik, erlok dek negen mekeat, ap ageikhe agarlak lak etaiken hunik nen, it inobasik watlasigin iti anek he, motok kogat o.
43015014	Nen, an nen, hinasuk warogo, Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, iluk yokhisekhe lagei meke iti, nane hologo hagakhe dogogun halok he, hit an nagarlak lagat o.
43015015	It akhuni inatuaneke meke iti, inougi hagakharek meke inokodek iti nen, an nen hurli yogotak yi baga nen, Hit an natuaneke, iluk yokhisagein dek o. Yi wene tiwene nopase nen yoknikhikhe meke tha'bokhogonat yokhisekhe lagei iti nen, Nagarlak lak, iluk yokhisekhe lagei iti o.
43015016	Hit nen an wenaknakhigip 'buk. Dek o. An nen hit wenakhinakhigi iti, o eken ikherek iti hak, motok dogogin meke hagasi lobageik nen iluk, hinebe wenakhinakhigisik meldinagagi. Iti baga, nena meke, hit warlok meke an netaga palogo nopase kino yogosugun halok he, at nen wokhisageinat o.
43015017	Nen, an nen wene hinasuk warogo yokhisigi iti, Hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon dogono o, iluk yokhisigi itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43015018	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “It akhuni agat oba meke nen ina'it motogat hagathinakha halok he, alebageik an tak ina'it motok hagatnakhukha etnogo hinakla ebetno o.
43015019	Hit hinebe akhuni agat oba meke dogolepma re, it akhuni agat oba meke nen he, It nit ninagarumi, iluk inetaiken hunik hagathinabilep mekeat he, hit hinebe it akhuni agat oba meke werekma wenakhinakhigisik nen wokhinakhigisikmo hinebe it meke welagap 'buk. Iti nen, ina'it motok hagathinabiogei o.
43015020	Nen, ap kok ageikhe inapma negen werek korlek, at atuaneke meke kok negen welagarek dek o, iluk yokhisasigi etnogo hinakla ebetni o. It nen an weagatnakha halok he, hit itithogonat weagathinabugunat o. Nen, it nen an nane hologo hagakha halok, hit hinane hologo hagasugunat o.
43015021	Itithogon mekeat he, it nen, at an la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo ebe inokodek iti nen, It yi at agarumi, iluk, wene yokhisigi iti tha'bokhogonat hagathinabugun o.
43015022	An wagagisik, wene tha'bokhogonat iti it yogeisigidek dogolema re, it weak iluk wene inoba 'biluk dogolep dek apigi o. Mekeat he, yogotak, wene yogeisa agei iti nen, it nen, An weak hagakhidek, iluk, wene inoba meke nokorlusak erlok degat aga o.
43015023	At tha nen an motok a'iretdanhe halok, an nopaseat motok a'iretdekheat o.
43015024	It akhuni aperek nen hagakharek motok dek meke, yi wene ti wene inil oba hagakhe lagagi etnogo hagakhe dogole dekma re, It weak, iluk ile dek o. Itithogon mekeat he, an nen wene iti tha'bokhogonat hagakhunem inileken neasukhasik nen, an nopase nipisak ina'it motok hagatninabiogei o.
43015025	Itithogonat meke re, Allah nen, Yigithogon hagatno, itithogon hagatno, iluk inasuk wakhikhe meke iti baga, ane yigithogon holal waganek werek, Wene erlo dekmaat, it nen an motok ina'iretdanhukha,\rq (Mazmur 35:19; 69:4-5)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo 'bisukha meke iti ebeat asuagaluk itithogonat hagariogei o.
43015026	Hit yomakhisekhe dogoagaluk Allah Agoreke ebe wene yogeisoagaluk wagarek meke iti, an nen nopase werekma nen hit hinoba la’i agunem, at nen an nabok pakhogon yokhisekhe dogogin o.
43015027	At nen an nabok itithogon isi korlek, hit meneke, an hit ninom ebekeramat nen welagagusikmo iti nen, hit nen an nabok pakhogon yogeisekhe dogogunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43016001	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla puk atluk, an nebe kolelogo here’aninogo iluk, wene iti tha’bokhogonat yokhisigi o.
43016002	Akhuni nen o sembayan egarekma nen hit hiniki korlo lisogo ula’inagagunat o. Nen, yabokane it akhuni hit hinasugun meke inebe dopok inakla nen he, Allah hasik hano inakho, iluk, ugun meke weregat o.
43016003	It nen itithogon hagathinabugun iti, an nopase nipisak ninebe inokodek iti nenat hagathinabugun o.
43016004	Itithogon hagathinakha halok, hinakla nen, Wene yi, at nen alebat yoknisasikhe etnogo, arat hagatninabiogei yi, iluk hinakla ebesubageik nen iluk, wene iti tha’bokhogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “An hit ninom yoma welago iti nen, wene yi tha’bokhogonat hit hinayoko ’bekhe dogolik yokhisigidek welagagi mekeat he,
43016005	yabokane, at an nebe la’ani ageikhe meke etnogo oba ligin meke re, hit aperek nen, Noe. Hat o koma ligin, iluk noba hinok wokneekhe lagap motok dek o.
43016006	An nen wene yokhisigi iti nen, hit hinakla motok weak aga mekeat he,
43016007	an nen wene ebe pakhogon yokhisak o. An ligin dek dogolepma, at hit yomakhisekhe dogogin meke iti hinoba wetlep dek mekeat he, an ligin iti nen, at iti an nen hinoba la'isigin o. Halok he, an ligin iti nen, hit hinobasik hano motok asigin, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o.
43016008	At iti ebe witluk nen, it akhuni agat oba meke nen hagakharek meke hasik thelekmarogo yogeisekhe dogolik, Hit hinakla ebekhe lagap iti, weak hagakharek meke hasik inom, mot hagakhe dogosak meke hasik inom, Allah nen wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakherek meke hasik inom, hinakla korlo ebekhe lagap o, iluk wene thelekmarogo yogeisasigin o.
43016009	At witluk, Hit nen hinetaiken at Yesus oba hakotdigidek welagathep iti korlo, iluk thelekmarogo yogeisasigin o.
43016010	Nen, ageikhe, an nopase werekma lagunem, hit hinileken neagun motok dek iti nen, at yomakhisekhe dogogin meke iti witluk, wene mothogo hagakhe dogosak meke hasik thelekmarogo yokhisasiginat.
43016011	Nen, ageikhe, Allah nen akhuni agat oba meke inoe kok etnogo wene oba ’biluk obatne degetdisikhemo werek iti nen, at yomakhisekhe dogogin meke iti witluk nen, Allah nen wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakherek iti hasik thelekmarogo yogeisasiginat o.
43016012	An nen wene doalegat yokhisausak meke re, hit waganusak erlok dek aga o.
43016013	Itithogon mekeat he, Allah Agoreke, ebe wene ekherek meke iti witluk nen, holak inokodekma inilu meke nen yakulisegarek iti hak, ebe wene tha’bokhogonat hutdubageik nen iluk yakulhisekhe dogogin o. Itithogon yakulhisekhe dogogin iti wene at akla nen kagalogo ekhe dogogin dek o. At he, at asuk holherek meke anek ekhe dogolik, yabokane hagatlasigin meke yokhisekhe dogoginat o.
43016014	An nane yakulhisegerek meke iti, at nen waganiluk, hit yakulhisekhe dogogin iti, an hogotnakhe dogogin o.
43016015	Yi meke ti meke nopase meke tha’bokhogonat, an meke iti nen he, Allah Agoreke iti an nane hologo waganiluk, hit yakulhisekhe dogogin iluk yokhisigi iti o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43016016	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Niniki herlekha'bugat negen dogoluk nen, an nebe hinileken neagun dek o. Itithogon hinileken niigidek hiniki herlekha'bugat ageikhe dogoluk nen, yabokane hinileken neagun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo inasuk holhukhasik nen,
43016017	at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo aperek nen, it-it wene ekhe dogolik men isukha, “At nen, Niniki herlekha'bugat dogoluk nen he, an nebe hinileken neagun dek o. Itithogon hinileken niigidek hiniki herlekha'bugat ageikhe dogoluk nen, yabokane hinileken neagun o, igik, An nopase oba ligin, igik, ekhe iti, wene ebe nikithogon meke hasik ekhe apegep?
43016018	An niki herlekha'bugat anek dogogin, iluk ekhe iti, ebe nena hasik yoknisekhe apegep? Nit hutdogo motok dek o, ” iluk isukha.
43016019	Itithogon isukhama, at Yesus nen, “It yi wene an noba hinok wokneauwogoluk iliogei higi, ” iluk ekagat hutdisasikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarlak lak. Niniki herlekha'bugat dogoluk nen, an nebe hinileken niigidek dogogun o. Nen, hiniki herlekha'bugat ageikhe dogoluk nen yabokane an nebe hinileken neagun o, iluk yokhisigi iti hasik hit-hit ekhe lagap a?
43016020	Yabokane hit hinakla nen di ago, de ago, ugun mekeat, it akhuni agat oba meke inakla arleken akhagun o. Itithogon meke re, hit hinakla weak dogogun meke iti, yabokane hano agunem hinakla arleken motok akhagun o, iluk, eberogonat yokhisigi o.
43016021	He ageikhe eak itasigin tak-takma hinet weak wasusak oba hinet weak wakharek mekeat he, eak etnogo arat itakhekherethek nen, Neak arat itakhigi, iluk akla arleken motok akhekhe dogolik, hinet weak wakherek etnogo obarlikma agarek o.
43016022	Hit itithogonat. Yogotak hinakla weak welagap meke re, yabokane an ninom abuk asugun itinem, hinakla arleken kogat akhagun o. Nen, hit hinakla arleken iti, it akhuni aperek nen degetdugun motok dek o.
