43016023	Hurli iti hurli arat asi lalok nen, hit nen wene ageikhe an noba hinok wokneagun motok dek o. Halok he, an nen wene ageikhe yokhisak, Hit nen yi meke ti meke an netaga palogo nopase kino yogosugun halok he, at nen wokhisageinat o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
43016024	O alebat nen hurli yogotak hurli, an netaga palogo yi meke ti meke ageikhe kino igidek welagapma o. Halok he, hinakla arleken kogat akhobageik nen, at kino yogokhe dogono. Itithogon yogokhe dogoumo, wokhisekhe dogoginat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43016025	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Wene tha'bokhogonat iti, wene oba lisogon anek yokhisekhe lagei mekeat he, yabokane nopase abok ekhe dogolik, oba lisogon yokhisagein dek o. Pakhogon anek yokhisagein oba weregat o.
43016026	-
43016027	Hit nen, Yesus ebe Allah werekma nen wageikhe meke, iluk, hutdanhe dogolik, hinakmutdanhigip iti nen, nopase nen hit akmuthinakheregat o. Hit hinobasik an nen nopase kino yogosigin iluk yokhisekhe lagei dek o. O itinem he, hit hinekaerek nen an netaga palogo nopase kino yogosugun o.
43016028	An nebe Allah werekma nen akhuni agat oba meke inoba usa'agagi mekeat, yogotak it agat oba yoma 'bisalok nopase oba napuke dageigin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43016029	at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “Noe. Yogotak hat nen wene oba lisogon yoknisigidek. Pakhogon anek yoknisegen o.
43016030	Hat nen, akhuni aperek nen wene ageikhe hinok wokhiigidek halok he, wene ebe hokodek 'buk o. Hat yi wene ti wene tha'bokhogonat hilu anek heogo o. Hat hebe eberogonat Allah nen la'agei ageikhemo wagagin, iluk yogotakne hutdagago o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43016031	Itithogon yogosugun apasukha, at Yesus nen, “Yogotakne arat hutdanhep a? ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43016032	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit tha'bokhogonat thirlik-pirlikhogon mukhisaumo, an narligat here'aniluk hinailake tomok lo lugun oba aban welago meke re, yogotak arat asi aga o. Hit itithogon thirlik-pirlikhogon lamo, an nopase nipisak dogogun iti nen, narligat dogogin dek o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
43016033	ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Hit an ninom hunik dogolik, hinakla hapukhogon dogobageik nen iluk, wene iti tha'bokhogonat yokhisigi o. Hit akhuni agat oba meke nen yi aik ti aik hagathinakhe dogogun o. Meke re, akhuni agat oba meke arat obatne degetdisigima iti, hinayuk dekhogon dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43017001	-
43017002	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogeisasikhesik, at uroak lekhogon ileken pogot oba liakhasikhesik nen, men isikhe, “Nopase. An hagatnabugun etnogo arat asi aga o. Hat nen haganeat akhuni aperek woknikhigin meke inebe tomok an ha'but nen hagarinabumo iniluk motok dogoagaluk akhuni tha'bokhogonat niki baga 'bisigin iti nen, hat hebe kogotdageik nen, an ha'but kogotdani me o, nopase.
43017003	It akhuni nen, Allah hogorasusak ebe meke arlik-arlegat motok welagarek, iluk, hebe inilu ageik, nen an Yesus Kristus la'ani agaginmo wagagi meke yi nebe inilu ageik, hagariogei iti re, iniluk motok welageikharek erlo itiat o.
43017004	An nen agat oba yi meke ti meke hagasuagaluk meldanhigin etnogo yabu ebe arat hagakhe lagarik tirliphogonat hagakhi iti baga nen kogotdagagi o.
43017005	Nopase. Agat aban walhigidek dogolik, nipisagat kok welagagu etnogo meke, yogotak hat werekma etoma kogotdanino.
43017006	Akhuni agat oba meke hat nen haganeat woknikhigin meke tha'bokhogonat, hat hebe inilu asuagaluk yakulisigi o. It inebe hat meke an woknikhiginmo nogo nen, hat hane hologo hagakharek o.
43017007	Yogotak yi wene ti wene tha'bokhogonat hat nen woknikhigin meke iti, it nen, Allah nenat wogokhikhemo, iluk arat hutdega o.
43017008	Wene hat nen yoknikhigin meke emenogo, it arat yogeisigima, arat waganhasik an nobasik ekhe dogolik, Allah nen la'i ageikhemo, at werekma nen eberogonat wageikhe, iluk inilu ageikhasik nen, nebe hutdanha o.
43017009	An nen it inobasik sembayan ekhe lagei o. An sembayan ekhe lagei yi, it akhuni agat oba yoma meke tha'bokhogonat inobasik ekhe lagei 'buk. It hat ha'buri meke hat nen an woknikhigin iti nen, it inobasigat sembayan ekhe lagei o.
43017010	An meke tha'bokhogonat, hat mekeat o. Nen, hat meke tha'bokhogonat, an mekeat o. It hagariogei iti baga, an kogotdaniogei o.
43017011	Yogotak an nen, agat oba yoma erapik dogogin dek o. Hat 'bikheasigin mekeat he, it anek, agat oba yoma dogogun o. Hat weak hagakhidek karelek motok welagatek meke, nopase. Nit nipisak ninebe opakiat welagorek etnogo hak, it itithogonat inebe opakiat dogoak nen, hat hetaga kok meke an thalnakhigin iti baga, it hagasik dogono o, nopase.
43017012	An it ninom yoma dogolik, hat hetaga meke an thalnakhigin etnogo baga, it inebe nalasinogo iluk, hagasik werekma, it aperek nalageidek o. At iti nalasigin, iluk, hat hane isigin meke holal waganogo 'bisukha meke etnogo ebe asuagaluk, nalasusak obaat nalaga o.
43017013	An nebe hoba wisigin mekeat, yogotak an agat oba ya dogolik, an nakla arleken akhegerek iti hak, it inakla arleken motok akhoagaluk, wene tha’bokhogonat iti yokhikhi o.
43017014	Hat hane etnogo it arat yogeisigi o. Nen, an nebe akhuni agat oba meke yoma inagot dek iti hak, it itithogonat inebe akhuni agat oba meke inagarumi dek iti nen, it akhuni agat oba meke nen ina’it motok hagarinabiogei o.
43017015	Hat nen, it akhuni agat oba meke inakla nen it anek kigilogo woginabinok nen iluk kino yokhekhe lagei 'buk. At weak meke etnogo nen weagarinabigiluk inoba wagunem, hat nen therisik dogonok nen iluk yokhekhe lagei o.
43017016	An nebe it akhuni agat oba meke inagot dek iti hak, it itithogonat it akhuni agat oba meke inagarumi 'buk. Degat o.
43017017	Hat hane egetek iti, ebe weneat. Nen, hane ebe wene iti baga, it inebe hat hekarek hasigat dogoak nen wenago 'bisan o.
43017018	Hat nen an nebe akhuni agat oba meke inoba la'ani agagin iti hak, an nen it itithogonat akhuni agat oba meke inoba la'isigi o.
43017019	It inebe hat hekaerek hasik ebe wene baga wenago dogoagaluk, an it inobasik nebe hat 'bagagirik wenago welagei o.
43017020	Nopase. It iti inarligat hasik anek sembayan ekhe lagei 'buk. Dek o. It aperek ninat meke, it nen wene yakulisa lugun oba inetaiken an noba hakotdugun meke inomat inobasik sembayan ekhe lagei o.
43017021	Nopase. An nen kino yokhekhe lagei yi, men iluk. An nen nopase hat nipisak hunik, nen, nopase hat nen an nipisak hunik, welagorek iti hak, it itithogonat inebe tha’bokhogonat opakiat dogoagaluk kino yokhekhe lagei o. Itithogon werekma, it akhuni agat oba meke nen, ekhe dogolik, At he, opase nenat la'i ageikhe iti eberogonat, iluk hutduagaluk, it inebe nit ninom hunigat dogouok o.
43017022	Nit ninebe opakiat welagorek iti hak, it itithogonat inebe opakiat dogoagaluk, an nebe hat nen kogotdanhigin hak, an nen it arat kogotdisigi o.
43017023	It eberogonat inebe opakiat dogoak nen, it nen an ninom hunik, nen hat nen an nipisak dogouok o. Itithogon dogogun halok, it akhuni agat oba meke nen ekhe dogolik, At he, opase nen la'i ageikhesik ebe etaiken hunik welagarek iti hak, it inebe at wogokhikhe meke etaiken hunik welagarek o, iluk inilu atluk hutdugun.
43017024	Allah nopase. Hat nen agat aban walhigidek dogolik, an nebe hetaiken hunik welagagin iti nen, hogotnakhe dogoagaluk kogotdanhigin etnogo, it hat nen haganeat woknikhigin meke emenogo inileken neoagaluk, o an dogoginmo etoma, it ninomat dogosak warlok o.
43017025	Allah mothogon anek hagakhetek meke, nopase. It akhuni agat oba meke hat hebe inokodek mekeat, an anek, hat nilu o. Nen, it hat nen woknikhigin meke anek, At nen la'i ageikhe iluk, iniluat o.
43017026	Nopase. Hat nen an hakmutnakhigin etnogo, it-it itithogonat nakmu-hakmurogon dogolik, an nebe it ninom hunik dogouogoluk, hat hetaga ilik hawene yogeisekhe lagarik ageikhe inomat yogeisekhe dogoginat o, ” iluk sembayan isikhe.
43018001	At Yesus nen sembayan itithogon arat iluk nen, at agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo at ebe inom dukhi lagoukhasik, i etaga Kidron aik ilibaganke yabu ai yagoma werekma italhukhasik agarumi inomat etoma ukisukha.
43018002	At Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo iniki nekalok oba lageik, iniki nekalok oba lageik, etoma natogorlogo lageigat hagakhe lagoukhasikmo nen, at Yudas Yesus wasuagaluk yoko lageikhe meke etnogo yabula iti ilu welageikhe.
43018003	Itithogon ilumo nogo nen, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek men, it Farisi meke men, inagarumi Allah ai therogo welageikharek meke inayoko 'biluk la'isasukhama, at Yudas nen tentara meke opaki doalek ageikhe inom wogosik, sikhe thege men, yi isagal ti isagal yibarlek men, wolok etoma lagoukha.
43018004	Lagoukhama, at Yesus nen, “An nebe yabokane yigithogon hagatnabugun, ” iluk tha'bokhogonat ilu welageikhe iti nen, inoba wageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit tha hearik wagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43018005	it nen, “Yesus ai Nazaret meke etnaga herarik wago o, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen, “Iti nebe anat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon isi korlek, at Yudas Yesus wasuagaluk yoko lageikhe meke etnogo inalilu metek welageikhe.
43018006	Werek korlek, at Yesus nen he, “Iti nebe anat o, ” iluk yogeisugunem, it emenogo mogukhogon inaloke higilha laga dogolik, inagaku dekak agat oba wilarik lagoukha.
43018007	Itithogon laga korlek, at Yesus nen yabokane ageikhe inom men yogeisasikhe, “Hit tha herarik wagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Yesus ai Nazaret meke etnaga herarik wago o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43018008	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Iti nebe anat o, iluk arat yokhisigi apigi. Hit nen, anat heraknabik wagap halok he, an nagarumi yoma loak nen here'isani o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43018009	Itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, aban hagatlageidek werek korlek alebat, at Yesus nen Allah yogokhe dogolik, “Nopase Allah. Akhuni hat nen woknikhigin meke emenogo ageikhe nalageidek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe meke etnogo ane ebeat asuagaluk itithogon yogeisasikhe iti.
43018010	Itithogon yogeisekhe korlek, at Simon Petrus etnogo akarok wim yakharek meke itinem hago werekma kigikhogonwaganhikhesik nen, ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok atuaneke meke etaga Malkus iti wasigiluk yigilabethasikhesik asuk ebeke meke 'bogokhogon la'isikhe.
43018011	Itithogon 'bogokhogon la'isikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Petrus. Hakarok obolukmo huakma kola'in o. Akhuni nen i henago wogeisugunem nekarek iti hak, an nopase nen, Hat yi aik ti aik hagathabugun o, iluk yoknikhikhe meke iti tak-tagat an hagatnabusak erlok dek apegen a? Dek o. Hagatnabusagat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43018012	Wene itithogon iluk isikhemo, it ap tentara meke opaki doalek emenogo inoe kok ageikhe inom, nen, it ap Yahudi meke Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek meke inom, at Yesus ebe ha'iluk, iki herle wakhukha.
43018013	Iki herle warogo alebageik ap Hanas oba wolok wagoukha. Ap Hanas iti ebe, ap Kayafas tahun iti baga ebe Allah iteerek meke inoe kogat welageikhe meke iti ago'bak.
43018014	At Kayafas iti ebe, alebat it ap Yahudi meke yogeisekhe dogolik, “Nit tha'bokhogonat hasik ap opakiat ageikhe watlasusak iti hano o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo.
43018015	-
43018016	Itithogon wolok wagoukhama, at Simon Petrus etnogo nen, at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe ipisak Yesus oporlik wagoukha. Itithogon wagoukhasik, at Petrus anek, leget holagapema abel itikmanke holak oba werek korlek, at Yesus agot ageikhe iti, ap Allah iteerek inoe kok etnogo nen ebe ilu meke nogo nen, at Yesus ipisak ap kok iti agokutlu ukisukha. It ukisukhasik nen, at Yesus agot ageikhe, ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok nen ebe ilu meke etnogo, yabokane apuke dukhi ageikhe. Dukhi aga dogolik, horlak holagapema akhuni dukhugunem thuam welagarek meke iti ipisak wenekak isukhasik nen, Petrus wolok ukisikhe.
43018017	Itithogon wolok ukisinem, at horlak holagapema dukhugunem thuam welagarek meke etnogo nen Petrus yogokhe dogolik, “Hat he, at yi agarumi ane waganiogei meke emenogo meke dek a? At agarumi mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Petrus nen, “An he, dek o, ” isikhe.
43018018	Itithogon isikhesik werek korlek, o itinem, thogei weak nen, it inatuaneke meke men, it ap Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek meke men, hetu mokaldisukhasik nen, hetuken oba metek dogolik thogei isakhasi werekma, at Petrus inoba lageikhesik inomat thogei isakhasi metek welagoukha.
43018019	Itithogon thogei isakhasi korlek, ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo nen, at Yesus oba itema waganhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Hat hagarumi hane waganiogei meke iti thani. Nen, hat hane yakulisekhe lagan iti, nikithogon, ” iluk hinok at oba waganhikhemo,
43018020	at Yesus nen he, men yogokhikhe, “An nen akhuni agat oba meke wene yakulisekhe dogolik pakhogon anek yakulisegerek o. O it akhuni Yahudi meke tha'bokhogonat doalogo sembayan egarekma men, Allah ai halekma men, etoma anek yakulisegerek o. Wene an limago ageikhe yogeisegerek motok dek mekeat he,
43018021	an noba hinok wokneekhe lagan iti nenaluk. An nen wene yogeisugunem it arat inasuk holharethek nen, an nen wene yogeisekhe lagei meke iti, it iniluat werek o. Halok he, it inoba hinok wogeisan o, ” iluk isikhe. Wene itithogon isinem,
43018022	ap Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek emenogo meke ageikhe ebe eta metek dogolik, at Yesus iki agot tugi wakhe dogolik men yogokhikhe, “Ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok yi nen yokhugunem, hat nen wene itithogon yogosusak a? Erlok dek o. ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43018023	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nane korlo igi halok, wene korlo igi meke pakhogon yoknom he! Nen, nane mot igi meke hasigat, hiki agot tugi nakhen iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43018024	yabokane at Hanas nen, at Yesus iki herle warogoat, ap Kayafas ebe ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok meke etnogo oba wolok loagaluk la’isikhe.
43018025	Itithogon wolok lagoukhama, at Simon Petrus etnogo hetu mokalekma eranogoat metek dogolik thogei isakhasi werekma, it akhuni nen, men yogokhukha, “Hat he, at agarumi ane waganiogei meke emenogo meke dek a? Hat at agarumi mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at nen, “An dek o, ” iluk la’belhikhe.
43018026	La'belhe lageikhemo, ap Allah iteerek inoe kok meke etnogo atuaneke meke ageikhe, at Petrus nen asuk 'bogokhogon la'isikhe etnogo agarlak ageikhe nen, “Hat he, hebe at hinom yabu ai yagoma werekma nileken hiigi apigi, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43018027	at Petrus nen he, “Dek o, ” iluk la'belhikheat. Itithogon la'belhe korlek eranogoat thue ayam ane isikhe.
43018028	Itithogon hagatluk, thue ane isikhemo, huben siakhogonat at Yesus ap Kayafas werekma nen, gubernur ai o kok halekma wolok wagoukha. Wolok wagoukhasik, Yesus anek uma kola'isukhasik, “Nit pesta Paskah etnogo meke neke dogosakma, nit nen ninabusagat ukumo, nit weagarogo 'binanunogo, ” iluk, o kok halek gubernur aila etoma ukigidek, o silimo huk agoukha.
43018029	O silimo huk agoukhama nen, at Pilatus inoba dukhi ageikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Warligi yi. Ap yi wene nikithogon meke oba ’begesip nen wolok wagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43018030	it nen, men yogokhukha, “At weak hagakhidek dogolepma re, hat hoba wolok wetlo degat o, ” iluk yogokhukha,
43018031	at Pilatus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yi wolok lalok nen, hit nen hagakhethep tak-tagat hinekaerek nen wene oba 'bigik, kokhik, hagatni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it ap Yahudi meke nen he, men yogokhukha, “Nit ninabusagat nen wene oba ’biluk inasusak erlok dek apigi o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43018032	Inane itithogon yogokhukha iti, at Yesus nen wene haganeat yogeisekhe dogolik, “An itithogon hagatnabiluk nasugun o, ” iluk ekhe lageikhe meke etnogo, it itithogon hagakhukhama, at ane tak-tagat ageikhe iti.
43018033	It Yahudi meke nen itithogon yogokhukhama, at Pilatus o kok halek gubernur aila etnogo apuke ukisikhesik, at Yesus ane hakhasikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Akhuni Yahudi meke inoe kok etagapogot etnogo hat a? ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43018034	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat nen wene an nabok egen iti, hat hakla nen kagalogo egen a? At he, it akhuni aperek nen an nabok yokhekhama nen egen a? ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43018035	at Pilatus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Nikithogon. An nebe ap Yahudi meke nen yoknekhen a? It ap hekaerek hougi hagarumi men, ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek men, inom nen, hat hebe an woknekha iti hat nikithogon hagakhenma, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43018036	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nen akhuni napma ’bisegerek iti, akhuni agat oba meke nen inapma ’bisegarek iti hak ’buk. Dek o. An napma 'bisegerek iti, agat oba meke dogolepma re, nagarumi nen an nebe it ap Yahudi meke wogeisausak dek iluk, nebe nirlirli woknabuogoluk inom yabilep meke re, an napma 'bisegerek iti agat oba meke dek iti nen, nirlirli woknabugun dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43018037	at Pilatus nen, “Halok he, hat eberogonat kok hetagapogorat a? ” iluk ekhe lageikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nebe kok netagapogot hat egen itiat o. Iti hasigat an nen ebe wene abok pakhogon yogeisekhe dogeigiluk nebe agat oba yoma itaklasi usa'agagi o. Akhuni wene ebe wene iti werekmake asi lageikha meke inebe dopok an nane inasuk holiogei o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43018038	at Pilatus nen, “Wene ebe wene iti nena wene nogo, ” iluk yogokhikhe. Wene itithogon yogokhikhesik, at Pilatus yabokane ap Yahudi meke inoba dukhi ageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nen at wene oba 'begep meke pilinekhi meke re, at weak ageikhe hagakhemo higi motok dek o.
43018039	Itithogonat meke re, hit nen pesta Paskah neke dogolik, ap herle warek meke ageikhe herle hisalhisoagaluk kino yoknikhunem, hisalhisegerek etnogo nen, hit ap Yahudi meke hinoe kok etagapogot yi herle hisalhisausak warlok a? Hina'it a, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43018040	it nen inaneak kogat walhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Dek o. At iti herle hisalnisausak dek o! At Barabas itiat herle hisalnisan o! ” iluk yogokhukha. At Barabas iti, obabut weak ikiabusak waganhe lageikhe mekeat isukha iti.
43019001	“Barabas hisalnisan o, ” iluk isukhama, at Pilatus yabokane ukisikhesik nen, Yesus tugi wasuagaluk wogeisasikhe.
43019002	Itithogon wogeisasikhemo, it ap tentara meke nen ap koktek meke inakare-kare ikhegarek iti hak, arlok weak meke makona warogo Yesus ukuloak oba i'bigik, su elokhoken ki’bi-ki’bi warek hakene, ap koktek ikhegarek meke hakene meke i’bigik, hagakhukha.
43019003	Itithogon i'bisukhasik inebe hobotha ukisi dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Akhuni Yahudi meke inoe kok etagapogot ninoe wa, ” iluk yogokhe dogolik iniki agot tugi elokhoken dapuk wakhe lagoukha.
43019004	Itithogon wasugun apasukha, at Pilatus etnogo yabokane it akhuni Yahudi meke 'birisa dukhi ageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Warligi yi. Lakhani! At wene oba 'begepma pilinekhi meke re, at weak ageikhe hagakhemo higi motok dek iti hinilu asubageik nen iluk ulakhisa agei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43019005	at Yesus arlok meke kare-kare negen etnogo ukuloak oba uguat, nen, su elokhoken ki'bi-ki'bi warek hakene etnogo uguat, dukhi ageikhemo, at Pilatus nen, “Ap yi hinileken 'bikhani! ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43019006	it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek men, it ap Allah ai halek therogo welageikharek meke men, Yesus inileken hasukhasik inaneak kogat walhe dogolik, “At ebe o baga meldiluk watno o! O baga meldiluk watno o” iluk inane obatnerogonat yogokhukhama, at Pilatus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nen, at weak hagakhe meke ageikhe higi motok dek iti nen, hit hinekaerek hinoba dopok at ebe waganogo o baga meldiluk watno o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
43019007	it ap Yahudi meke emenogo nen, men yogokhukha, “At nen ekhe dogolik, An nebe Allah a'but, isikhe iti nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene, nit nen hagakhorek iti tak-tagat, nit nen ebe wasusak erlogat o. Halok he, wasusak apekhe lago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
43019008	Wene itithogon ugun apasukha, at Pilatus asuk holhikhesik nen, ebenageik ayuk motok ageikhe.
43019009	Itithogon ayuk ageikhesik, Yesus wolok apuke o kok halekma etnogo ukisikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Hat hai erlo o koma, ” iluk yogokhikhe mekeat, at Yesusnen oko igidek huk ageikhe.
43019010	Ane igidek huk ageikhemo, at Pilatus nen yabokane men yogokhikhe, “Hat an nipisak wenekak usak ha'it a? An nen hat herle hisalogo here'agousak inom, nen, o baga meldageiluk hasusak inom, anat ite welagei iti, hat hokodek a? ” ilukyogokhikhemo,
43019011	at Yesus nen he, men yogokhikhe, “At Allah nen, Hat nen wene akhuni inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakhe iogono, iluk hat iteerek 'bageilep dekma, hat nen wene noba banusak erlok degat o. Iti nen he, Hat weak hagakhen, iluk wene hoba herlekha'bugat negen werek mekeat, at ageikhe nen an nebe waganogo hat liki baga 'bani aga meke iti anek he, weak hagakhe, iluk wene kok negen oba werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43019012	atPilatus asuk holhikhesik nen, Yesus herle hisalogo 'bigiluk walhasikhe mekeat, it ap Yahudi meke emenogo inaneak kogat walhe dogolik, men yogokhukha, “Ap tha nen, An nebe kok netagapogot, iluk ekaerek nen ekhe halok, ap kok Kaisar, Na'it, iluk apiliogo. Halok he, hat nen at ithi herle hisalogo ula'egen halok, hat ap Kaisar hipisak ekayo meke dek o. At inom weak meke apogo, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43019013	at Pilatus asuk holhikhesik nen, Yesus ebe wolok dukhi ageikhesik nen, o sili etaga Helekit Talekma. It akhuni Ibrani meke inane baga, etaga Gabata ekhe lagoukhama etoma o perlago baga hurek dogolik, wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, egarek oba hurek lageikhe.
43019014	Hurek lageikhe etanem, hubuluke pesta Paskah na luogoluk, yi meke ti meke tugurogo 'bisi korlek, jam 12 hakene dikene eketurlemat hurek lageikhe. Hurek lageikhesik, akhuni Yahudi meke men yogeisasikhe, “Warligi yi. Ap yi hit hinoe kok etagapogot yi hinileken 'bikhani! ” iluk yogeisasikhemo
43019015	it nen inaneak kokhogon walhe dogolik, “Ebe watno! Ebe watno! O baga meldiluk watno o! ” iluk yogokhukhama, at Pilatus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nen hit hinoe kok etagapogot yi, o baga meldiluk wasusak hano apekhe lagap a? ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek nen, men yogokhukha, “Nit ninoe kok etagapogot Kaisar arligat o. Ageikhe dek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43019016	at Pilatus nen Yesus ebe o baga meldiluk wasuagaluk wogeisasikhe. Itithogonwogeisasikhemo, Yesus ebe wolok dukhi agoukha.
43019017	Wolok dukhisuogoluk nen, o Yesus ebe meldiluk wasugun meke etnogo ekaerek nen wolok loagaluk omorlo baga 'bisukhasik, o nit ninane baga, etaga Inukuloak Palegem werekma u hak, it akhuni Ibrani meke inane baga, etaga Golgota etoma wolok dukhi agoukha.
43019018	Dukhi agoukhasik etoma nen Yesus ebe o baga turlem meldiluk nen, it ap pere ninat meke inom abel ebelak-ebelak meldisasukha.
43019019	Itithogon meldisasukhama, at Pilatus nen, holal men iluk waganhikhe, “YESUS AI O NAZARET MEKE AKHUNI ZAHUDI MEKE INOE KOK ETAGAPOGOT, ” iluk holal waganogo wogeisasikhemo, o Yesus meldisukha etnogo ilugunmo upu baga tetnokhogon 'bisukha.
43019020	Holal iti, akhuni Ibrani meke men, Roma meke men, Yunani meke men, inane baga waganogo 'bisikhemo werekma, o kota nen Yesus o baga meldiluk wakhukha baga etoma walegat 'buk. Horogat iti nen, akhuni Yahudi meke doalegat holal waganek etnogo etaga thalhe lagoukha.
43019021	Holal itithogon waganogo 'bisikhemo, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek nen Pilatus men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni Yahudi meke inoe kok etagapogot iluk, holal waganhun o. At he, yigithogon waganin o. Ap yi nen ekhe dogolik, An akhuni Yahudi meke inoe kok netagapogot, ekhe, iluk waganino, ” iluk yogokhukha mekeat he,
43019022	at Pilatus nen, nen yogeisasikhe, “An holal waganhi meke itiat waganek dogoak o! ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43019023	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it ap tentara meke nen, Yesus ebe o baga meldisukhasik nen, asu nokorlek inebe tomok opakitek-opakitek horlauwogoluk, su ebe 4 oba nen nikirlogo 'bisukha. Nen, asu karek dek uanat, thalukhogon tikmanke ugu meke horlauwogoluk nen,
43019024	it ap tentara neke nen it-it ageikhe nen ageikhe yogokhe dogolik, “Su yi paluok dek o. At he, tha hak horlagein iluk omatok hekerlogo walhegarek hak, helekit hupurlekentek meke valhauwok o, ” iluk isukha. Itithogon isukha iti, Allah ane nolal waganogo 'bisukhama, men werek, “An nasu nokorlek supuregasik nen, nasu itikmanke meke horlauwogoluk helekithupurlekentek meke walhasukha o, ”\rq (Mazmur 22:18-19)\rq* iluk isukha meke holal waganogo 'bisukha meke werek tak-tagat, it ap tentara meke nen itithogonat hagakhukhama eberogonat ageikhe iti o.
43019025	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, Yesus agosa men, agosa agot men, he Maria ap Klopas age men, he Maria ai o Magdala meke etnogo men, o Yesus ebe meldisukhama alilu metek welagoukha.
43019026	Nen, at agosa men, agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe etaiken hunik motok welageikhe meke etnogo men, alilu itithogon metek werekma ileken hisasikhesik nen, at agosa yogokhe dogolik, “Nagosa. Hat heak ithiat o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik,
43019027	at agot ane waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe etnogo itithogon yogokhe dogolik, “Nagot. Hat hagosa ithiat o, ” iluk isi korlek eranogoat Yesus agosa etnogo, at agot iti nen hago dogoagaluk aila wolok lageikhe.
43019028	Itithogon arat hagakhukhasikmo nen, at Yesus akla nen, “Yi wene ti wene tha’bokhogonat ilugun kobokhogon arat hagakhi, ” iluk ilu nogo nen, Allah ane holal waganogo ’bisukha meke tak-tak asuagaluk, “An i abu, ” isikhe.
43019029	Itithogon isikhemo, etoma isoak anggur eken apusu arle weak meke henago werekma, haki isiken hakene meke mago thukat oba hunogo nen Yesus apema lia’isukha.
43019030	Itithogon wogokhukhama, ituk walhasikhesik nen, men isikhe, “Arat hagakhi o! ” iluk isikhesik nen, uroak konokhogon ebe arat watlageikhe.
43019031	Itinem, hubuluke iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogouogoluk hagakhukha. Meke re, Allah hasik werlegat libiku-yogoku welageikharek hakene 'buk. Ninat kok meke logouogoluk nogo nen, men isukha, “Niniki Allah hasik werlegat werek korlek it inebe o baga neldisega meke iti warek o bagaat dogosak nina'it, ” iluk, ap varek iti inoak tamelogo 'biluk, kobologo usa'isa isuogoluk, it ap Yahudi meke nen, at Pilatus kino yogosi lagoukha.
43019032	Itithogon kino yogosi lagoukhama nen, it ap tentara meke emenogo wagoukhasik nen, it ap Yesus inom o baga neldisasukha meke emenogo ageikhe isok tamelogo 'bigik, tgeikhe isok tamelogo 'bigik, hagakhukha.
43019033	Itithogon nagakhukhasik nen, Yesus inileken 'bikha lagoukha meke, arat watlageikhemo nen, isok tamelhidek kamotdisukha.
43019034	Itithogon tamelhidek kamotdisukha mekeat he, ap tentara menogo meke ageikhe nen, thege baga Yesus abelekenma karlukhogon waknikhemo, thege elolake amep inom, i inom, lukhi ageikhe.
43019035	Itithogon hagatlagunem, ap ageikhe ileken welageikhe meke nen, hit hutdubageik nen iluk, at ileken masikhe meke nen abok pakhogon iliogo iti. Nen, at nen meneke, “Eberogonat nileken hutukhogonat higirik abok pakhogon okhisigi” iluk, at iluat o.
43019036	Wene itithogon hagatlageikhe ti, Allah ane baga holal men iluk waganogo 'bisukhama werek, “At oak tameldugun motok dek o, ”\rq (Keluaran 12:46; Bilangan 9:12; Mazmur 34:20-21)\rq* uk isukha.
43019037	Nen ageikhe, “At ebe thege baga karlukhogon watdiluk inileken hugun o, ”\rq (Zakharia 12:10)\rq* uk isukhama Allah ane holal waganogo 'bisukha meke yerekma ebeat asuagaluk itithogon hagakhukha iti.
43019038	Itithogon hagakhukhama, ap Yusuf, ai o Arimatea meke, Yesus apma ukisikhesik, ap Yahudi meke ayuk nen, ane limago waganhe lageikhe meke iti nen, Yesus warek waganigiluk ap Pilatus kino yogosi lageikhe. Itithogon kino yogokhikhemo, at Pilatus nen, “I o. Hano, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Yusuf nen Yesus warek etnogo wagani ageikhe.
43019039	Itithogon wagani ageikhemo, at Nikodemus, alebat hibako Yesus oba wageikhe meke etnogo nen, o mur eken apusu inom, o ageikhe apusu obasi hano meke inom, dapuk-hapukhogon hagarogo akin 30 kilo hakene wolok Yusuf ipisak wagoukha.
43019040	Ipisak itithogon wagoukhasik nen, it akhuni Yahudi meke nen warek thalinakharek hagat, apusu warogo su kain etaga lenan meke baga yilogo 'bisukha.
43019041	At Yesus o baga meldiluk wakhukhama alilu etoma yabu oken yabu ageikhe welageikhe. Yabula etoma oila kerat elo herlelogo 'bisukhasik warek 'bisigidek meke welageikhe.
43019042	Itithogon werekma, hubuluke it akhuni Yahudi meke iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogouogoluk, oila etnogo horogat nogo nen, warek etnogo oila iti 'bi lagoukha.
43020001	Warek itithogon 'bisukhasikmo nen, o hari Minggu baga, at he Maria ai o Magdala meke etnogo o hi werek korlek huben siakhogon oila warek 'bisukhama etnogo wageikhesik ileken 'bikhasikhe meke, thu helekit meke larogo 'bisukha meke etnogo, arat dipilogo la'isukhama thu hualek werekma hasikhe.
43020002	Itithogon werekma ileken halok nen, pirlirli motok ap Simon Petrus etnogo inom, Yesusagarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke ageikhe at etaiken nunik meke etnogo inom, inoba lageikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Ninoe Etagapogot ebe warek akhuni oila nen wolok dukhegasik koma 'bi lageikha heat, nit ninobakha palaga o, nerugi, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43020003	at Petrus men, Yesus agot ageikhe etnogo men, ipisak oila warek 'bisukhama etnogo agoukha.
43020004	Itithogon ipisak tak-tak pirlikha lagoukha meke re, at Yesus agot ageikhe etnogo nen, at Petrus yabokane liluk, at tak ibat oila warek 'bisukhama etnogo wageikhe.
43020005	Itithogon arat wageikhesik, oila warek 'bisukhama etnogo aroak thoma iluk ileken thok-thok kolakhasikhe meke, kain etaga lenan meke yilogo 'bisukha meke etnogo anek nokorlek agat oba werekma ileken hasikhesik nen, ebe oila akla ikigidek huk ageikhe.
43020006	Itithogon ukigidek werekma, at Simon Petrus etnogo yabokaneat at oporlik waga lageikhesik diokthegat warek 'bisukhama akla ukisikhesik nen ileken pikhasikhe meke re, kain etaga lenan meke etnogo anek nokorlek agat oba werekma hasikhe.
43020007	Itithogon mekeat, ain Yesus ukuloak yilik welageikhe meke nokorlek anek he, u kain meke nokorlek welageikhemo eranogo inom opakimo ek. Asokneat ponhogo negen dikilik werekma ileken dasikhe.
43020008	Itithogon hasikhesikmo nen, at Yesus ane waganhe agoukha meke ageikhe alebageik warek 'bisukhama yageikhe meke etnogo yabokane akla ukisikhesik nen ileken pikhasikhe meke, tha'bokhogonat itithogon werekma ileken asikhesik nen, eberogonat iluk hutdisikhe.
43020009	At itithogon eken higidekma, alebat it aperek nen Allah ane holal yaganogo 'bekhe dogolik, “At ebe watlatluk nen yabokane iluk asiginat o, ” iluk sukhama holal waganek werek meke iti it hutdigidek yelagoukhasik nen, itinem at ileken hasikhesik nen utdisikhe iti.
43020010	Itithogon hutdisikhesik nen, it Yesus garumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke ipisak etnogo inapuke ma lagoukha.
43020011	It itithogon lagoukha mekeat he, at he Maria anek, yabokane wageikhesik warek 'bisukhama etnogo alilu metek dogolik ileken kolageik de ago welageikhe.
43020012	Itithogon de aga dogolik, ileken kolakhasikhe meke, at Yesus warek 'bisukhama etnogo malaikat inebe pere inasu kut meke ugu, at ageikhe Yesus warek 'bisukhama ukuloakmake mot-mot, nen, at ageikhe alokoke mot-mot, hurek werekma ileken hisasikhe.
43020013	Itithogon hisasikhemo, it nen men yogokhukha, “He yi neru o. Hat nenaluk de aga lagan, ” iluk ugun apasukha, at Maria nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An noe Etagapogot warek akhuni nen wolok o koma 'bi lageikhama heat, an nokodek nen de aga lagei o, nerugi, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
43020014	ileken apuke dagakhogon lak lageikhe meke re, at Yesus ebe metek werekma ileken hasikhe mekeat, “Iti Yesus ebeat, ” iluk hutdigidek.
43020015	Hutdigidek werekma, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “He yi neru o. Hat nenaluk de aga lagan. Nen, hat tha herakhe lagan, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, he Maria akla nen, “Ap yi yabu therogo welagarek meke higi, ” iluk akla apasikhe. Itithogon akla apasikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Noe. At ebe warek hat nen waganhetik wolok werlekmake 'bi laganma halok he, ebe o koma 'bi laganma. An wagani lak nen, yoknom o, ” iluk yogosigin apasikhe,
43020016	at Yesus nen yogokhe dogolik, “He Maria, ” iluk yogokhunem, Maria elokhoken dagakhogon Yesus wogotluk, nit ninane baga, “Guru noe, ” u hak, it Ibrani meke inane baga, “Rabuni, ” iluk heagei wakhikhe.
43020017	Itithogon heagei wakhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “An nebe nopase oba aban dageigidek welagei iti re, hiki abiak haknarik dogogun o. An men, hit men, ninopase Allah oba hakotdiluk welagorek meke etnogo oba dageigiluk hagakhe lagei, ekhe iluk nagarumi yogeisa lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
43020018	at he Maria ai o Magdala meke etnogo Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo inoba lageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nerugi! Ninoe Etagapogot an nileken arat halok nen wagei o, ” iluk, yogeisekhe dogolik wene yogokhikhe meke etnogo pilinerogo yogeisa lageikhe.
43020019	Itithogon yogeisa ageikhesikmo nen, o hari Minggu tinem hibako at Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo, it ap Yahudi meke inayuk nen o ageikhela opakimo hu tha’bokhogonat kunci larogo ukisukhasik werekma, at Yesus lageikhesik inalilu wisam ageikhesik nen, men wogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Hinagorakma, ” iluk itithogon yogeisasikhesik len,
43020020	iki inom, abelekenma inom, wakhukha meke etnogo o'ban emenogo inugurisasikhe. Itithogon inugurisugunem nileken hasukhasik nen, “Ninoe ebeat o, ” iluk inakla arleken motok akhasukha.
43020021	Itithogon inakla arleken akhasukhama, at Yesus nen wene igeikhe inom yabokane men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Hinagorakma. An nopase nen la'ani ageikhe ti hak, an nen hit itithogonat la'inagagin o, ” iluk ogeisasikhe.
43020022	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, apelaga inoba nuphogon la'ekhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “Allah Agoreke horlani o.
43020023	Nen, hit nen akhuni weak nagakharek meke thagalogo degetdisegep halok, at Allah nen thagalogo degetdisageinat o. Nen, it akhuni aperek weak hagakharek meke, hit nen thagalogo degetdisegep dek halok he, at Allah nen thagalogo degetdisagein degat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43020024	At Yesus ebe agarumi inelokhoma wisam ageikhe itinem, inebe 12 emenogo meke it ebetlake anek werekma. Nen, at Tomas etaga ageikhe Hulupmio Meke ekhe lagoukha etnogo ebe it inom dekma wageikhe.
43020025	Itithogon ebe dekma nogo nen, it Yesus agarumi ebetlake nen, men yogokhukha, “Tomas nagarlak. Nit ninoe Etagapogot etnogo arat ninileken hogo, ” iluk yogokhukha mekeat, at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An nen at iki baga pisuemaken wakha meke elo nileken hutukhogon higidek, nen o'ban niki hakhigidek, abelekenma thege elo niki kolakhigidek halok, eberogonat iluk apagein motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
43020026	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik oba nen, iniki 7 baga welagoukhasik nen ageikhe baga it Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo Tomas inomat, o etnogolaat natogokhukhasik, thu tha'bokhogonat kunci latdiluk welagoukha mekeat he, at Yesus wageikhesik inakla wisam ageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Hinagorakma, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
43020027	yabokane at Tomas men yogokhikhe, “Hat hakla nen eberogonat iluk hetaiken noba hakotdigidek welagan itithogon dogogun o. Eberogonat iluk hakla apanok nen he, hiki haknealok, niki baga hileken niigik, nabelekenma thege elo hiki kola'igik, hagatluk nen, hetaiken noba hakotdino o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43020028	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Tomas nen, “Eiye! Noe, hebe Hetagapogot Allah at hiigi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo.
43020029	at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat he, hileken arat neegetik nen eberogonat iluk hetaiken noba hakotdegen. Itithogon meke re, it akhuni aperek inileken niigidek mekeat he, inetaiken noba hakotdugun halok he, inakla arleken akhagun o, iluk eberogonat yokhikhi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe. Buku yi ebe yigithogon hasik iluk holal waganhikhe wene
43020030	At Yesus nen it agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke nen at ebe hutduagaluk inil oba elalin hagakhe lageikhe meke aperek doalegat hagakhikhe meke re, buku yi baga holal waganhidek.
43020031	Itithogon meke re, holal waganek werek yi tha'bokhogonat, hit nen, Yesus iti Allah a’but, nit akhuni tilninabuagaluk wenago la’i ageikhe etnogo eberogonat, iluk hutdiluk hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk, at etaga palhunem hiniluk dogobageik iluk, holal waganogo ’bigi o.
43021001	At Yesus nen itithogon hagakhikhesik oba nen, i Tiberias yekelekma, at agarumi ane waganhe dagoukha meke emenogo yabokane inelokhoma wisam ageikheat. Inelokhoma wisam ageikhe iti, wene ebe yigithogon.
43021002	Iniki ageikhe itinem, at Simon Petrus etnogo men, Tomas etaga ageikhe Hulupmio Meke etnogo men, Natanael ai o Galilea eloke o ukul etaga Kana meke men, Zebedeus a’buri men, Yesus agarumi inebe pere meke men, natogokhukha.
43021003	Itithogon natogokhukhasik nen, Simon Petrus etnogo nen, it ebetlake men yogeisasikhe, “An yogotak ikan wagani lagaluk, ” iluk isikhemo, it ebetlake emenogo nen, “Nit ninomat luok o, ” iluk isukhasik nen, inom agoukhasik ku baga ukisukhasik lagoukha meke re, o yibako-hibako ikan opakiat halok ageikhe motok waganhidek.
43021004	Itithogon waganhidegat werekma, o wi aga korlek, at Yesus lageikhesik, i aik oba metek welageikhe meke re, it agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, “Ithi Yesus ebeat o, ” iluk hutdigidek.
43021005	Itithogon hutdigidek werekma, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Warligi yi. Nagarumi. Ikan ageikhe waganhep a? ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Motok dek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama,
43021006	at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hinayoge su ithi, ku abeleken hiniki ebeke mot-mot usa'ini. Itithogon usa'umo ikan waganugunat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo inayoge su etnogo ima usa' isukhama ikan motok doalegat ukhat lageikhemo, lisogo lia'busak erlok dek ageikhe.
43021007	Itithogon erlok dek ageikhemo dogolik, at Yesus agarumi meke ageikhe, at etaiken hunik meke etnogo nen, Petrus men yogokhikhe, “Petrus, ap ithi ninoe Etagapogot etnogoat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe. At Yesus agot etnogo nen, “Ap ithi ninoe Etagapogot etnogoat o, ” iluk Petrus yogokhunem asuk holhikhesik nen, asu itikmanke meke nokorlogo ’bisikhesik su nokorlek welageikhe meke ibat ikhasikhesik nen, ima pok usasikhe.
43021008	Itithogon pok usasikorlek, Yesus agarumi ebetlake emenogo it welagoukhama nen hurli i yipitla walegat dek. Horogat 100 meter hakene iti nen, ikan doalegat yoge su apem hethokhogon etnogo lisogo wolok ku warogo i yipitla uki agoukha.
43021009	Arat uki agoukhasik ku akla nen dukhi agoukha hak, ikan men, roti men, werago hetu eken oba dukthek werekma inileken hasukha.
43021010	Itithogon inileken hasukhama, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Ikan ket waganhep emenogo aperek wolok witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
43021011	at Simon Petrus etnogo ku akla ukisikhesik nen, ikan koktek motok ebe 153 nen yoge su apem hethokhogon etnogo lisogon wolok, i yipitla uki ageikhe. Ikan motok doalegat meke re, yoge su etnogo herlekha'bugat halok ageikhe li'bilageidek, hanoat welageikhe.
43021012	Su itithogon wolok dukhi ageikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarumi. Hipiri nuok nen witni o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it at agarumi emenogo nen, “Yi ninoe Etagapogot ebeat o, ” iluk ekagat hasukhasik nen, at ageikhe nen, “Hat tha, ” iluk hinok wokhausak inayuk ageikhemo thogotdisukha.
43021013	Itithogon thogotdisukhasik werekma, at Yesus nen yabokane inoba horokhogon lageikhesik nen, roti etnogo waganhikhesik, it supurisalok, ikan etnogo itithogonat supurisasikhe.
43021014	At Yesus itithogon hagakhikhe iti, at ebe watlageikhesik nen apuke iluk ageikhesik oba nen, iki pere baga agarumi inelokhoma wisam ageikhesik nen ageikhe yabokane wisam ageikhe itiat o.
43021015	Hipiri itithogon arat nasukhama, at Yesus nen, Simon Petrus etnogo itema waganhe dogolik, “Simon Yohanes a'but nagot o. It hagarlai ebetlake yoma, an inetaiken hunik, erlok dek negen mekeat he, hat anek, an hetaiken hunik motok welagan a? ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Petrus nen, “I o, noe. An nen hat hebe nakmuat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Halok he, nako domba ena meke hanorogon therisik dogono o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43021016	Alebageik itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe inom itema waganhikhe, “Simon Yohanes a'but nagot o. Hat nen an hetaiken hunik motok welagan a? ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at nen, “I o. Noe. An nen hat hebe nakmuat welagei iti, hat hiluat o, noe, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo, at Yesus nen, “Halok he, an nako domba meke hagasik dogono o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43021017	Iki pere baga itema waganhikhesik nen yabokane ageikhe waganhikhe, “Simon Yohanes a’but nagot o. Hat nen an nebe hakmu a? ” iluk, Yesus nen itema iki pere baga waganhikhesik nen, yabokane dagakhogon ageikhe baga, “Hat an nebe hakmu welagan a? ” iluk yogokhikhe iti nen, akla korlo ageikhemo, at nen Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Hat he, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat hilu o. Halok he, an nen noe hebe nakmu welagei iti, hat hilu o, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo, at Yesus nen, men yogokhikhe, “Halok he, an nako domba hanorogon therisik dogono o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43021018	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, wene ageikhe men yogokhikhe, “Alebageik, hat hebe elege dogolik, An o etoma ligin, iluk therlok hekaerek nen a’bethogon ikhalok laga lagagin mekeat he, yabokane hat hebe yaman agan halok, hiki walokhogon la’isinem, it aperek nen hat hiki herle a’bethogon watdageiluk nen, hat o lausak ha’itmo wokharik lugun o, iluk eberogonat yokhikhi o, ”
43021019	iluk wene itithogon yogokhikhe iti, at Petrus yabokane itithogon hagarogo wasugun oba Allah hogorasugun meke hasik yogokhikhe iti. Itithogon arat yogokhikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogokhikhe, “An noporlik nekhe dogono o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
43021020	At Yesus nen wene itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Petrus elokhe hebenokhogon ileken apuke lakhasikhe meke, Yesus agot ageikhe etaiken hunik meke etnogo inoporlik wagunem lakhasikhe. At iti ebe alebat hipiri neke dogolik Yesus alilu horokhogon hurek dogolik, at nen, “Yesus noe. Tha nen noe Hetagapogot hasuagaluk yoko ligin, ” iluk oba hinok wokhasikhe meke etnogo.
43021021	At Petrus nen ap iti ileken lakhasikhesik nen, Yesus men yogokhikhe, “Noe. At ap ithi yabokane nikithogon hagasigin apegen, ” iluk yogokhe lageikhemo,
43021022	at Yesus nen, “An nakla nen, ap ithi, ebe ilugat werekma, an yabokane wisigin nakla apigi halok he, hat nen hagasusak meke 'buk. An noba dopok o. Itithogon mekeat, hat anek, an noporlik nekhe dogono o, ” iluk wene itithogon yogokhikhe meke iti,
43021023	it Yesus agarumi ane waganhe lagoukha meke nen, “Yesus nen, Nagot ithi ebe yabokane watlasigin motok dek o, ” iluk ekhe thalek, abok wiadisukha. Meke re, at Yesus nen he, “An nagot ithi yabokane watlasigin motok dek o, ” iluk igidek. At nen, “An nakla nen, ap ithi an yabokane wisigin iti bagaat ebe ilugat dogoak nakla apigi halok, hat nen hagasusak meke 'buk. An noba dopok o, ” iluk wene iti meke hasik isikhe mekeat, itithogon isukha iti.
43021024	Wene Yesus agot ageikhe hasik isikhe iti, nebe anat o. An nileken hasigi meke nenat pakhogon yokhisau hak, holal waganogo 'bigi yi o. Wene iti an nileken hasigi meke nenatpakhogon yokhisigi eberogonat, iluk, nit tha’bokhogonat ninilu.
43021025	At Yesus nen yi wene ti wene aperek hagakhe lageikhe meke doalegat werek mekeat, wene tha’bokhogonat opakitek-opakitek pilin-palinhogo holal waganogo 'bilema re, o agat oba yoma obolukmo koma 'bu heat kerlekhogon hagatlatlep apigi o.
44001001	Teofilus noe. An nen ebekeramat wene holalwaganogo hoba la'i agagi iti, at Yesus nen yi meke ti meke hagakhik, yi wene ti wene yakulisigik, hagakhe lageikhe wene erlo baga hurli nen
44001002	at opase nen ebe pogot oba wolok dageisikhe iti hurli, holal waganogo la'i agagi iti o. At ebe pogot oba aban dageigidek werek korlek, at agarumi wenago inebe inayoko 'biluk la'isagaluk hagakhikhe meke emenogo Allah Agoreke obatne baga inasuk wakhikhe.
44001003	Yesus ebe watlageikhesik nen iluk atluk, iki 40 hari inom dogolik, at ebe thekekhogon hutduagaluk yi meke ti meke elalin doalegat hagakhe lageikhe. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, at nen, “An nebe yi. Inileken hutukhogon neoak o, ” iluk eran-alep inelokhoma melatluk inugurisigik, Allah apma dogogun wene yogeisigik, hagakhe lageikhe.
44001004	-
44001005	Iniki ageikhe at agarumi inom opakimo natogorlek dogolik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Yohanes nen ima usa'inageikhe lageikhe mekeat, hit hiniki doalegat welageidekma, Allah nen ima usa'inagu hak, at Agoreke hinoba usa'isigin iti, hinebe o Yerusalem yoma nen dukhugup. An nopase nen, It wogeisagein, iluk wene yokhisasikhe meke iti, an nen alebageik abok yokhisasigiat iti. Halok he, therogo dogono, ” iluk wene warisasikhe.
44001006	At Yesus nen wene iti yogeisasikhesik, at agarumi inom natogorlek dogolik, at oba hinok men waganhukha, “Noe. Haganeat nit Yahudi meke ninoe kok apma welagoukha iti hak, yabokane itithogon dogogun meke, yogotak ya bagaat 'binanigin a? Aban a, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44001007	Yogokhukhama, at Yesus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Wene egep iti, an nopase iteerek nen akla apasikhe tak-tagat hagatlasigin iti nen, hit nen, Hurli iti hurli baga dogoluk hagatlasigin, iluk hinilurogon dogosak erlok dek o.
44001008	Itithogon mekeat he, Allah Agoreke hinoba usa'aga halok, hinobatne asigin. Hinobatne atluk nen, o kota Yerusalem nen, o propinsi Yudea nen, o Samaria nen, hurli o yi ai ti ai o ilugun ilugun elomaat laga dogolik, an yi meke ti meke hagarik nukhunem hinileken neegep meke etnogo, an nobasik yogeisilik laga dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44001009	Wene itithogon arat yogeisasikhemo nen, Allah nen at ebe pogot oba wolok dageisinem, inileken werek korlegat oisa nen thebelhikhemo, inileken yabokane higidek.
44001010	Higidek dogolik, at Yesus ebe wolok dageisi korlek inileken pogot oba mot-mot liageik werekma eranogoat, ap inebe pere inasu kut meke yilik meke inalilu melasi usa'agoukha.
44001011	Melasi usa'agoukhasik nen, men yogeisasukha, “Hit akhuni o Galilea meke yirani. Hinileken pogot oba liageik welagap iti nenaluk. At Yesus hit yoma 'binageiluk pogot oba wolok dageisinem hinileken werek korlegat, pogot oba dageikhe iti hak, yabokane ebe itithogonat usa'isigin o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44001012	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, tom Zaitun oba etoma nen usa'agoukhasik nen, o kota Yerusalem walegat dek. Horogat satu kilometer hakene uki agoukha.
44001013	Uki agoukhasik, uma etoma ukisukhasik nen, o henaipu welagoukhama etomaat dageisukhasik welagoukha. It iti inebe Petrus men, Yohanes men, Yakobus men, Andreas men, Filipus Tomas ipisak men, Bartolomeus Matius ipisak men, Alfeus a'but Yakobus iti men, Simon, “O yoma ninaierek meke anek dogogun, ” iluk ekhe lageikhe meke iti men, Yakobus a'but Yudas iti men, inom welagoukha.
44001014	It inebe eta inom, humi aperek inom, Yesus agosa Maria inom, Yesus agarumi oporlik meke inomat, inebe tha'bokhogonat inetaiken opakiat dogolik, sembayan isi motok welagoukha.
44001015	Itinem, Allah a'buri aperek inom inebe 120 hakene natogorlek dogolik, at Petrus inakla melageikhesik nen, wene men yogeisasikhe,
44001016	-
44001017	“Nagarlak lak nerugi. At Yudas etnogo, nit ninom yabu hano hagakhe dogoagaluk Yesus nen ayoko 'biluk meldisikhemo, nit ninom hano welagosik mekeat he, haganeat wene Allah Agoreke nen at Yudas hasik isikhemo, at Daud nen holal waganogo 'bisikhe meke werekma, at Yudas nen ap nen Yesus ebe hakhoagaluk wogosik waga iti, hagatlasusak obaat hagatlaga iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44001018	(At Yudas weak hagakhikhe iti hasik, isok oko wogokhukhama, agat oko palhe lageikhesik etoma lalok elokhe thogoum warekhe dogolik, elabut suphogon dukhisikhesik watlageikhe.
44001019	Itithogon watlageikhemo, akhuni o Yerusalem welagoukha meke inebe tha'bokhogonat inasuk holhukhasik inilu atluk, agat iti hasik, nit ninane baga amep usasikhe baga u hak, it inane baga etaga Akeldama thalhukha. )
44001020	Itithogonat, at Petrus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Etai holal waganek etaga Mazmur etnogo baga menisukha,
			at werekma aila tho bon asuak. Ap ageikhe at aila etoma inebe degat dogoak o,\rq (Mazmur 69:25-26)\rq* iluk holal waganhukha. Nen, ageikhe men isukhaat, At ebe iteerek welagarek meke iti ap ageikhe horloak o,\rq (Mazmur 109:8)\rq* iluk isukha.
44001021	-
44001022	Halok he, nit ninom nekhe dogoagaluk, ap ageikhe melduok. Ap meldusak iti, hurli at Yohanes ima usa’inakhe lageikhe iti hurli nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ninom hibiku-yogoku oporlik nekhe lagosik, hurli Yesus opase nen nit ninakla nen kigilogo pogot oba wolok dageisikhe iti hurli, nit ninom nekhe Iago meke halok, Yesus iluk aga iti eberogonat. Ninileken hogosik, iluk ninom yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk, melduok o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44001023	Yogeisasikhemo nen, it nen, “Ap yi melduok a? Ap yi melduok a, ” iluk inebe pere inetaga isukha. Ap ageikhe etaga henagan, Yusuf igik, Barsabas igik, Yustus thalogo igik, ekhe lagoukha meke. Nen, ap ageikhe Matias iti.
44001024	-
44001025	Inetaga isukhasik, Allah ayoko ’bekhe dogolik, “Ninopase. Yudas hat hane yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk ayoko ’bisigin mekeat he, at nen thogotdiluk watlasusak tak-tagat watlagama, obolukmo ap inebe pere yi, hat nen ap ki hak ayoko ’begen. Hat akhuni inebe tha’bokhogonat inetaiken hilu iti. Halok he, Ap ebe yi ayoko ’bigi, iluk, hat nen yakulnisan o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44001026	Itithogon yogokhukhasik, “Ap yi melduok a? Yi melduok a, ” iluk omatok tha oba mot-mot asigin inetaga thalogo walhasukhama, Matias etnogo baga mot-mot ageikhe. Mot-mot ageikhemo, it ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inebe 12 meke 11 ageikhemo nen, suguluk 12 asuagaluk Matias inom dogoagaluk meldisukha.
44002001	Akhuni Yahudi meke hari Pentakosta hagasusak mot-mot asi ageikhemo, it akhuni inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdiluk welagoukha meke inebe tha’bokhogonat opakimo natogorlogo werekma
44002002	eranogoat, o hisakne ane hubetha aga dogolik ekherek iti hak, Allah nen pogot oba nen usa’i ageikhemo, ane huak isinem, it akhuni uma hurek welagoukha meke emenogo tha’bokhogonat ane inasuk holhukha.
44002003	Inasuk holhukhasik inileken ’bikhasukha nen, hetu amulok negen melanethasinem inebe tomok inoba usa’i agunem, inileken hasukha.
44002004	Inileken itithogon hekhe korlek, Allah Agoreke it tha’bokhogonat inakla kerlekhogon ukisikhe. Ukiluk, Allah Agoreke nen, “At iti ane itithogon ekhe dogoak, ” iluk akla apasikhe tak-tagat, it akhuni ninat meke inane baga uagaluk yakulisekhe korlek elalinat ekhe lagoukha iti.
44002005	Itinem, akhuni Yahudi meke Allah ane hologo hagakhe lagoukha meke, o yi ai ti ai tha’bokhogonat nen Yerusalem natogosi agoukhasik welagoukha.
44002006	Werekma, ane wuwu isikhe etnogo inasuk holiluk akhuni inebe doalegat natogosi agoukha. Natogosi agoukhasik werekma, it Yesus agarumi emenogo nen it akhuni yi ai ti ai nen wagoukha meke emenogo inane baga tomok ugunem, inasuk holhukhasik nakmaken lageikhe.
44002007	Inakmaken lageikhesik hogorakhe dogolik, “It wene yoknisiliogei meke yoma inebe tha’bokhogonat, inai o Galilea meke dek nogo? Galilea mekeat o.
44002008	Meke re, nikithogon hagatlagama nen nit akhuni ninai eloma ninane baga tomok ugunem ninasuk holhe lago apegep.
44002009	Nit ninebe ninai o Partia meke men, Media meke men, Elam meke men, Mesopotamia meke men, Yudea meke men, Kapadokia meke men, Pontus meke men, Asia meke men,
44002010	Pergia meke men, Pamfilia meke men, Mesir meke men, o Libia Kirene mot-mot eloma meke inom men, o Roma eloma lagosik ninebe huso negenat welagosik wago meke men, ninom welago yi.
44002011	Nit ebetlake ebe Yahudi meke, nen it ebetlake werlek meke Yahudi meke ninoba ukitluk Allah ane waganhukhasik, Yahudi meke thalek ninom welagoat. Nen, akhuni o Kreta meke men, akhuni Arab meke men, ninom werekma, it ap yi nen Allah obatne baga elalinat hagakherek meke yoknisugunem, ninekaerek ninane baga tomok ninasuk holhe lago yi, ” iluk,
44002012	inobakha palatluk it-it hogorakhe dogolik, “Iti hagatlaga iti, ebe nikithogon meke he, ” iluk isukha.
44002013	Meke re, it aperek nen, “Dek o. It yoma anggur eken apusu nekasik nen hunu-hunu palhasik iliogei yi, ” iluk inobato aga lagoukha.
44002014	Inane itithogon ekhe korlek, at Petrus etnogo Yesus agarumi inebe 11 meke emenogo inomat dogolik, metokhogon melageikhe. Melageikhesik ane pakhogon men yogeisasikhe, “Hit Yahudi meke men, hit aperek yogotak ya o Yerusalem welagap meke tha’bokhogonat men, nagarlak lak nerugi. An wene igin yi hinilu asuak nen hinasuk holini o.
44002015	Yogotak o huben jam 9 agama welago yi. Jam iti hakene baga anggur eken apusu nalok hunu-hunu palharek dek iti nen, hit nen, It yi re, anggur eken apusu nekasik nen hunu-hunu palhasik iliogei, iluk apekhe lagap iti, dekmaat o.
44002016	Mekeat he, at Yoel nen Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke Allah nen yogokhikhemo isikhe hagat, arat hagatlaga o.
44002017	At nen, men isikhe, At Allah nen ekhe dogolik, O ilugun oba an Nagoreke iti, kokhogonat akhuni tha’bokhogonat inoba usa’isigin o. Usa’i agunem, hina’buri elege men, homagarlugi men, it nen an nane akhuni yogeisigik, hinagarumi elege thue negen nen ina’bikaka higik, hinopase lak yaman meke nen ina’bi higik, hagakhe dogogun o.
44002018	Itinem, an natuaneke meke, ap dek, humi dek, anNagoreke kokhogon inoba usa’isigin o. Usa’i agunem it nen an nane yogeisekhe dogogun o.
44002019	Nen, akhuni nen hogorakhe dogoagaluk, elalin meke pogot oba upu yi baga hagakhik, wene hutduagaluk agat oba wema yomahagakhik, hagakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke oba, mep inom, hetu inom, hetu thodekogat dageikherek hakene inom, hagasigin.
44002020	An hinopase Netagapogot nen kokhogonhagakhunem akhuni nen hogotnakhe korlek wisigin itinem aban wageidek werek korlek, o mulikin elokhoken ninat hi ageik, thut elokhoken mep ageik, iti tak hagatlasigin o.
44002021	Itithogon hagatlaga korlek, hit akhuni nenan hinopase Netagapogot netaga palogo nay oko ’bugun meke inebe tomok tilinabigin o,\rq (Yoel 2:28-32)\rq* iluk Yoel nen isikhe iti.
44002022	Meke re, hit akhuni Israel meke nagarlak lak nerugi. An nane igin yi holini. Yesus ai Nazaret meke etnogo Allah nen ayoko ’bisikhemo, ninom dogolik, wene hutduagaluk hagasusak dek meke Allah nen iki obatnerogon elalinat hagakhe lageikhe iti nen, ebe Yesus nenat hagakhe lageikhe. Halok he, Yesus Allah nen la’i ageikhemo, iluk thelekmaat hagatlageikhe iti hinilu.
44002023	Meke re, at Allah ilu dogolik, akla nen, Itithogon hagasuak o, iluk akla apasikhe bagaat, Yesus ebe hinikimo ’bisikhemo, hit nen ap inobabut weak meke iniki waganogo, at ebe o baga menogo ’biluk wakhepma iti.
44002024	Wakhepma, at ebe hinet wakhe dogolik watlaga mekeat, akhuni iniki herle warogo ’bisegarekma welageikharek iti hak, at itithogon warek motok dogosak dek iti nen, iniki herle hisalogo ula’isegarek iti hak, Allah nen ilugutdekhemo iti.
44002025	At Yesus hasik Daud nen men isikhe, An yi meke ti meke nen naborlogotneanogo iluk nopase Etagapogot ebe nalilu werekma, hibiku-yogoku nileken hasi motok welagarek.
44002026	Iti nen, nakla arleken akhigik, nane baga hogorakhik, hagakhe lagarek. An nasumo nebe warek yabokane hano asigin, iluk nakla nen wene munini sikiphogondogogin.
44002027	Itithogon dogogin iti, an nebe akhuni watlatluklageikharekma etoma motok dogoagaluk, hat nen here’anhik, An hat ha'but hekaerek meke nebe yi hirli asuagaluk kolelogo thogotdanhik, hagasigin dek iti nenat o.
44002028	Hat nen niniluk dogogun iti meke holakyakulnekhik, hat hebe nipisak motok welago iti nen inakla arleken akhegarek meke nakla motok kerlekhogon woknekhik, hagakhe lagan o,\rq (Mazmur 16:8-11)\rq* iluk Daud nen Yesus hasik isikhe iti.
44002029	Meke re, nagarlak lak nerugi. At ninopa Daud abokpakhogon yokhisak. At ebe watlageikhemo, nit welagoma yoma agat hulelogo thalhukha meke, obolukmo alep welageikhesik yogotak werek iti.
44002030	At Daud ebe Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo nen, Allah nen hupuk palogo abok yogokhikhe meke iluat welageikhe, Hat kok welagatek iti hak dogoagaluk, ap hat nen itago meke ageikhe hobolukmomeldigin o,\rq (Mazmur 132:11; 2 Samuel 7:12-13)\rq* iluk abok yogokhikhe.
44002031	Itithogon abok yogokhikhe meke iti ebe aban meldigidek werek korlek, at Daud Allah nen hagasigin meke ilu dogolik nen, Kristus watlasumo, Allah nen ilugutdigin o, iluk wene at nen men isikhe, Allah nen at ebe akhuni watlatluk lageikharekma etoma motok dogoagaluk thogotdigin dek o. Nen, at ebe hirli atluk, dek asuagaluk thogotdigin degat o,\rq (Mazmur 16:10)\rq* iluk isikhe iti.
44002032	Itithogon isikhe tak-tagat, at Yesus Allah nenat ilugutdekhemo, nit ya tha’bokhogonat ninileken hogosik niniluat welago iti.
44002033	At ebe Allah nen ilugutdekhesik, alilu kok dogoagaluk meldekhemo werek o. Dogolik, Allah nen, Nagoreke wokhisagein, iluk abok yoknisasikhe hagat Yesus wogokhemo, at nen kokhogonat nit ninoba usa’i agama nen, nit hagakhunem hinileken nisigik, hinasuk holhik, hagakhe lagap iti.
44002034	-
44002035	Meke re, at Daud ebe pogot oba dageigidek. Meke re, at nen men isikhe, Ninopase Etagapogot nen, an noe Etagapogot yogokhe dogolik, Hat hathili meke emenogo, hisok nen al debelogo ’bisanok nen, an nenhoba ’bisa ageidek werek korlek, hat hebe an nalilu niki ebeke kok hurekdogono, iluk at Allah nen yogokhikhe,\rq (Mazmur 110:1)\rq* iluk, at Daud ekaerek nen isikhe iti.
44002036	At Yesus ebe hit nen o baga meldiluk wakhepma, at Allah nen, Hinoe Etagapogot Kristus ebe yiat, iluk meldekhemo iti. Halok he, hit akhuni Israel meke tha’bokhogonat nen, Wene iti eberogonat, iluk hinilurogon dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44002037	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, inasuk holhukhasik, wene iti baga inetaiken warekhe dogolik, it nen Petrus men, it aperek Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo men, yogeisekhe dogolik, “Nagarlak lak. Nit ninobabut nikithogon hagasu heat, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44002038	Itithogon yogeisasukhama at Petrus nen, “Weak hagakhe lagap meke iti here’isalok hinobabut hebelatni o. Itithogon hinobabut hebelasumo nen, weak hagakhe lagap meke iti, Allah nen thagalogo degetduagaluk hinebe tomok Yesus Kristus etaga palogo ima usa’inaguak. Itithogon hagasumo nen, Allah Agoreke iti wokhisagein o.
44002039	At Allah nen itithogon wokhisagein iluk wene watnisasikhe iti, hit hinebe men, hina’buri men, it aperek inai walegat meke etoma men, hinebe ninopase Etagapogot Allah nen, Witni o, iluk wahisiliogo meke, tha’bokhogonat inobasik wene hit hinoba wathisasikhe, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44002040	Wene ebe itithogon uanat ekhe dogolik, “Akhuni inobabut korlo hagariogei meke yoma, Allah nen ukum inoba ’bigin meke iti, here’isalok hinekaerek nen tilano o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe.
44002041	Inasuk itithogon wakhikhemo, it wene waganhukha meke ima usa’isasukha. Itinem inebe 3. 000 hakene ima usa’isasukhasik nen, yabokane inom dapukhogon welagoukha.
44002042	Inom dapukhogon hanoat dogolik, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo nen wene yakulisugunem hunik-hunigat inasuk holhik, hipiri inom kusogo nikik, sembayan inom igik, hagakhe lagoukha.
44002043	Akhuni nen wene hutduagaluk, it ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo nen hagasusak dek meke elalinat doalegat hagakhunem, akhuni inebe tomok inayuk aga lagoukha.
44002044	It akhuni aperek wene eberogonat iluk waganhukha meke inom opakimo hano dogolik, inameke yi meke ti meke hasik, “Nit ninom opakiat ninameke meke, ” iluk dapukhogon hago welagoukha.
44002045	Itithogon dogolik, it aperek nen, inagat men, inameke men, oko uang waganiluk, uang iti it Allah a’buri meke emenogo inebe tomok supurisekhe dogolik, it aperek inameke dek meke erlok supurisekhe lagoukha.
44002046	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, iniki ageikhe huk ageidek hunik-hunigat Allah ai halekma natogokhik, inakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, inobabut thebekhogonat inaila hipiri inom kusogo nikik, hagakhe lagoukha.
44002047	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, it nen Allah hogorakho werekma, it akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen, “It hano, ” iluk hogorinakhe lagoukha. Hogorinakho werekma, ninoe Etagapogot nen, iki ageikhe huk ageidegat, akhuni aperek tilogo Allah a’buri inom opakiat dapukhogon ’bisekhe lageikhe.
44003001	Iniki ageikhe, jam 3 baga, mulikin korok i lagaluk hagakhe korlek, Petrus Yohanes ipisak, akhuni Allah ai halekma sembayan ekhe lagoukha hak uogoluk hagakhunem, inoba dageisukha.
44003002	Dageisinem, ap ageikhe agosa akla nen isok weak itaklageikhesik welageikhe meke, holagape palekma etaga Ilhapuk iluk ekhe lagoukha baga etoma ’bi agoukhama werekma hasukha. Akhuni nen ap iti iniki ageikhe huk ageidek hibiku-yogokuat akhuni aperek Allah ai halekma ukisinem, yi meke ti meke ape kino weak yogeisekhe dogoagaluk, holagape palekma etoma yerogo ’bi aga lagoukha.
44003003	O itinem ’bisukhama hurek werekma, Petrus Yohanes ipisak Allah ai halekma ukuogoluk hagakhunem, ileken hisalok nen, it nen yi meke ti meke ageikhe wogosuagaluk kino yogeisasikhe.
44003004	Kino yogeisasikhemo, it ipisak nen inileken tek-tek hekhe dogolik, ap Petrus nen, “Hileken laknisan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44003005	Yogokhikhemo, at ap iti akla nen, “It nen yi meke ti meke ageikhe woknesugun he a, ” iluk ileken inoba welageikhe.
44003006	Ileken inoba werekma, at Petrus nen men yogokhikhe, “Uang emas men, perak men, an nikimo motok dek o. Meke re, an werek meke ageikhe wokhesigin. Iti re, hebe melatluk nen holak laga dogonogoluk, Yesus Kristus ai Nazaret meke etaga palogo yokhikhi, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44003007	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, iki ebeke hago nen meldisikhe. Meldisinem, ap etnogo isok weak werekma, isok ukut inom, akulim oak inom, eranogoat obatne ageikhe.
44003008	Obatne ageikhesik, metokhogon melatluk nen, holak nekhe lageikhesik, Petrus Yohanes ipisak inom Allah ai halekma ukisukha. Ukisi dogolik, ap etnogo nen Allah hogorakhe dogolik, ya hologothigik, ta hologothigik, ukisikhe.
44003009	Itithogon ukisinem akhuni tha’bokhogonat inileken hasukha.
44003010	Inileken hasukhasik, at ebe ekagat hutdisukhasik nen, “Allah ai halekma holagape etaga Ilhapuk holagape palekma okutlu eta hurek dogolik, yi meke ti meke wogokhe dogoagaluk kino ekherek meke etnogo ebe yi. Eiye! Nikithogon nen hano aga. Nayuk o, ” iluk hogorakhukha.
44003011	Ap etnogo Petrus Yohanes ipisak iniki hak-hak Allah ai halekma nen dukhi agoukhasik, misohulak etaga Salomo thalekma iluk ekhe lagoukha baga iti dukhi agunem, akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen hogorarik pirlirli inoba natogokhukha.
44003012	Natogokhukhama nen, at Petrus ileken hisalok nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit akhuni Israel meke yirani! Ap yi holak liliogo yi, nit ninekaerek ninobatne baga hagakhik, ninobabut hano Allah ane hologo hagakhe Iago baga, hagakhik, hagakho thalek, hit hogorakhigik, hinileken tek-tek nisigik, hagakhe lagap yoma nenaluk.
44003013	Ninopase Allah iti, Abraham nen hogorakhik, Ishak nen hogorakhik, Yakub nen hogorakhik, ninopa lak aperek nen hogorakhik, hagakhe lagoukha meke etnogo nenat, a’but Yesus kogotdekhe iti. Meke re, hit nen, it aperek nen wasuagaluk inikimo ’begepma re, at Pilatus nen iki herle hisalogo ula’igiluk hagakhe mekeat he, hit nen, Ap iti nina’it o, iluk egep etnogo.
44003014	At he, Allah nen la’i ageikhemo obabut mothogon hagakhe laga mekeat he, hit nen Pilatus yogokhe dogolik, Ap iti ebe nina'it o. Ap ageikhe akhuni inakherek mekeat, hit nen ap ithiat iki herle hisalogo woknisan o, iluk kino yogokhep apigi.
44003015	Ninilugutninakherek meke erlo ebe at mekeat he, hit nen wakhepma Allah nen, ebe warek meke ilugutdekhemo, nit ninileken eberogonat hogosik nen yokhisekhe Iago.
44003016	Ap isok weak welaga meke yi nen, Yesus iti eberogonat, iluk etaga palogo, etaiken at oba hakotdekhe iti baga, ap yi hinileken hekhe lagap meke, ebe hinilu meke etnogoat obatne aga yi. Etaiken itithogon Yesus oba hakotdekhe iti baga, hit hinil obaat motok hanotdekhemo yi.
44003017	Meke re, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinougi ap koktek hinom Yesus hasik hagakhep iti, hinokodek dogolik hagakhepma iti, an nilu o.
44003018	Haganeat Allah nen, An nen tilhinabigin meke Kristus hinoba la'isigin iti, ebe yi aik ti aik oba 'biluk wasugunat o, iluk abok isikhe meke iti, ebe it ap at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo inebe tha'bokhogonat nen ekhe lagoukha iti hagat, hagatlasuagaluk hagatlaga iti.
44003019	-
44003020	Iti nen hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti, ninopase Etagapogot Allah nen thagalogo degetdiluk, hinetaiken hasik hinil ekathogon hagathinabi ageik, at nen, Kristus hinebe tilhinakherek meke hinoba la'isigin, iluk abok yogeisasikhe etnogo ebe Yesus itiat hinoba yabokane la'i ageik, hagasuak nen, hinobabut hebelatluk hinelokhe Allah wogotno o.
44003021	Yogotak ya re, Yesus ebe pogot oba dogosak obaat dogogin o. Dogoluk nen, hurli Allah nen yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat ket hagarogo hagasigin iti hurliat usa'isigin o, iluk haganeat it ap Allah hasik dogolik at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen isukha hagat, hagatlasigin o.
44003022	At Musa nen, men yogeisasikhe, Ninopase Etagapogot Allah ane yokhisekhe dogoagaluk, ap hit meke ageikhe an meldanhikhe iti hak, yabokane meldigin etnaga. Meldumo nen, at nen yi wene ti wene yokhisagein meke itiathinasuk motok hanorogo holhe dogosak o.
44003023	Tha nen wene at nen yokhisagein meke iti, asuk holhidek meke halok he, at Allah nen, at a’buri inakla nen hulogoula’isalok weagatdigin o,\rq (Ulangan 18:15,18-19)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe.
44003024	It ap alebat Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo, hurli at Samuel iti hurli nen, it yabokane Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inomat, inebe tha’bokhogonat nen, wene nit o yogotak welago ya dogolik hagakhe lago meke hasik ekhe lagoukha.
44003025	Allah nen wene abok yoknisasikhe meke it ap alep at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen yogeisekhe lagoukha iti, hit hinobasigat o. Nen, Allah nen nit ninopa lak wene warogo woginakhikhe iti, hit hinobasigat o. At Allah nen Abraham yogokhe dogolik, Hat nen itago meke iti baga akhuni agat obameke yoma yi akhuni ti akhuni inukul etaga tomok hanorinabigin o,\rq (Kejadian 22:18)\rq* iluk wene warikhikhe.
44003026	Allah nen, wene iti warikhikhe hak, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke hinebe tomok hinoporlike here’isoagaluk a’but ebe hanothinabigin meke hit tak hinoba usa’i ageikhe iti, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe.
44004001	It Petrus Yohanes ipisak nen wene itithogon akhuni emenogo aban yogeisugunem eranogoat, it ap Allah iteerek meke men, Allah ai halek therogo welagoukha meke inoe kok meke men, ap Saduki meke men, inoba wagoukha.
44004002	Wagoukhasikmo, it Petrus Yohanes ipisak nen wene akhuni yakulisekhe dogolik, “Yesus watlagasik iluk aga iti, akhuni watlageikharek meke inilugurinabiginat o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lagoukha iti nen, it ap emenogo inakla aga dageisikhe.
44004003	Inakla aga dageiluk, iniki herle warogo nen, o arat hi ageikhemo, hubuluke initema waganuogoluk, o akhuni herle warogo ’bisasukhama kola’isasukhasik hagasik noge isukha.
44004004	Itithogon meke re, it Petrus Yohanes ipisak itithogon aban kola’isigidek werek korlek, wene akhuni yogeisasukhama, it wene inasuk holhukha meke emenogo inebe doalegat nen, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk waganhukhama, it alep meke inom, yabokane meke inom, dapukhogon, ap anek inebe doalegat 5. 000 hakene hagatlageikhe iti.
44004005	-
44004006	Itithogon hagatlageikhesikmo, hubuluke it ap koktek emenogo men, inarluetek emenogo men, Allah ane holal waganek iteerek meke emenogo men, natogorlogo, it Allah iteerek meke inoe kok Hanas men, Kayafas men, Yohanes men, Aleksander men, Allah iteerek inoe kok meke agarumi aperek men inom, o Yerusalem natogokhukha.
44004007	Natogokhukhasik nen, Petrus Yohanes ipisak etnogo inoba wogosik wagoukhasik inebe turlem meldisasukhasik nen, initema waganhukha. Initema waganhe dogolik, “Hit nen ap isok weak meke hagakhep iti, nena meke obatne baga hagakhep. Nen, tha etaga palogo hagakhep, ” iluk ekhe lagoukhama nen,
44004008	at Petrus Allah Agoreke akla kerlekhogon welageikhe meke etnogo nen wene men yogeisasikhe, “Nopase lak nougi wa.
44004009	Hit yogotakne, Ap isok weak meke iti nena meke obatne baga hano hagakhepma, iluk ninitema waganhe lagap yi.
44004010	Halok he, iti hasik, hit tha’bokhogonat men, akhuni inukuloak etaga Israel meke inebe tha’bokhogonat men, hinilu asuagaluk wene erlo hutukhogon yokhisak. At Yesus Kristus ai Nazaret meke hit nen o baga meldiluk wakhepma Allah nen ilugutdekhe meke etnogo etaga baga ap yi hano agasik hinil oba metek hano werek yi.
44004011	Haganeat Allah ane baga holal men iluk waganogo 'bisukha, Hit o helekit meke halhe dogolik, Helekit yi weak o, iluk here'isegep mekeat, o herlaga hagatlaga yi,\rq (Mazmur 118:22)\rq* iluk Yesus hasigat, holal waganogo 'bisukha iti.
44004012	At Allah nen, nit akhuni agat oba yoma meke at ageikhe nen tilninabuagaluk etaga yakulnisigidek iti nen, ap werlek meke nen tilninabusak erlok dek o. At Yesus nen tilninabuagaluk, at arligat etaga yakulnisasikhe iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44004013	It Petrus Yohanes ipisak inayuk dek dogolik, wene pakhogon itithogon yogeisugunem, it ap emenogo nen hogorinakhe dogolik, “Ap yi sekolah yakulhidek. Inokodek uma mekeat he, Yesus inom nekhe lagoukha meke etnogo nen higi, ” iluk hutdisukha.
44004014	Hutdisukhasik, ap isok hano hagakhukha meke etnogo, it Petrus Yohanes ipisak inom metek werekma, inileken hisalok nen, it ap emenogo nen wene nikithogon yogeisau heat hagatlageikhemo nen, yogeisigidek huk agoukha.
44004015	-
44004016	Huk agoukhama nen, Petrus Yohanes ap etnogo inom, o wene erlo pilinekharekma nen ula'isasukhasik, it-it wene ekhe dogolik, “Ap inebe pere ithi inobasik nikithogon hagarinabuok apegep. It nen hagasusak dek meke iti elalinat hagakhama, akhuni o Yerusalem welageikharek meke tha'bokhogonat inilu ageikha iti nen, nit nen, Itithogon hagakhidek, ninokodek, iluk la'belusak erlok dek aga iti.
44004017	Itithogon meke re, wene iti wiak-wayakhogon akhuni doalegat inasuk holiluk launogo iluk, Yesus etaga palogo wene yabokane motok yogeisugup o, iluk inasuk warogo wene paluok o, ” iluk isukha.
44004018	Itithogon isukhasik nen, ipisagat waisasukhama, inapuke ukisukhama, men yogeisasukha, “Hit nen Yesus etaga palogo wene akhuni yogeisigik, yakulisigik, motok hagakhup o, ” iluk inasuk warogo wenageisasukha.
44004019	-
44004020	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, it Petrus Yohanes ipisak nen, “Allah il oba mothogon hagasusak he, ki. Hit nen, Itithogon hagasusak, iluk egep meke iti hologo hagasusak a? At he, Allah nen, Itithogon hagasusak, ekherek meke iti hologo hagasusak a. Hinakla ebetni. Nit nen, ninileken higik, ninasuk holhik, hagakho meke iti, akhuni aperek yogeisigidek huk asusak erlok dek iti nen yogeisekhe dogogunat o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44004021	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, ap etnogo elalin hagakhukha iti hasik, akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen Allah hogorakhe lagoukha iti nen, ukum nikithogon inoba ’bu heat hagatlageikhemo, inasuk anek yabokane warogo werlegat ula’isasukha.
44004022	Ap isok weak meke elalin hagakhukha iti, ebe umur 40 tahun welageikhesikmo nen, hano hagakhukha iti.
44004023	It Petrus Yohanes ipisak etnogo, it ap koktek emenogo nen iniki herle hisalogo ula’isasukhama nen, inagarlak lak inerugi Allah a’buri meke emenogo werekma inoba lagoukha. Lagoukhasik nen, men yogeisasukha, “It ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek emenogo men, inarluetek emenogo men, it nen wene yigithogon yoknisega, ” iluk pilinogo yogeisasukha.
44004024	Itithogon yogeisekhe lagoukhama inasuk holhukhasik nen, inom dapukhogon inetaiken opakiat dogolik, Allah ayoko ’bisukha. Ayoko ’bekhe dogolik, “Ninopase. Nit hat hapma welago yi. Pogot walhigik, agat walhigik, i laut kok yekelek walhigik, yi meke ti meke pogot oba, agat oba, ima welagarek meke tha’bokhogonat walhigik, hat nenat hagakhigin iti.
44004025	Nit ninopa Daud etnogo hat nen. at ayoko ’bisiginmo, Hagoreke akla dogolik, wene hat nen isigin meke, at nen men isikhe, Yi akhuni ti akhuni itikmanke meke inakla aga dageiluk, inane ua-ua werekma wene palha iti nenaluk. Nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga ya meke ta meke wene yugunat palha iti nenaluk.
44004026	It ap inetagapogot agat oba meke yoma melatluk, koktek aperek inom doalogo natogosi itluk, ninopase Etagapogot Allah iti, it nen he, Ebe nina'it. A’but Kristus ayoko ’biluk la’i ageikhe meke iti, nina’irat. Ninom yabuok, iluk iti hasigat hebelogo werek,\rq (Mazmur 2:1-2)\rq* iluk isiginmo ebe Daud nen isikhe iti.
44004027	Itithogon isigin hagat, at Herodes men, Pontius Pilatus men, akhuni itikmanke meke men, akhuni Israel meke men, Yesus, hat hekaerek hatuaneke meke, nit akhuni tilninabuagaluk meldisigin meke etnogo, wasuogoluk eberogonat o yoma doalogo natogosi ageikha iti hasik isigin iti.
44004028	Meke re, wene iti, hat hiki obatne werek meke nen, hakla nen, Itithogon hagasuak, iluk hakla apasigin obaat, itithogon hagakha iti.
44004029	Meke re, ninopase. Nit ninasuogoluk iliogei iti hileken hisan o. Nit hagarumi yoma wene hat nen isigin meke iti, ninayuk dekhogon yogeisekhe dogoagaluk hobatne woknisan o.
44004030	Hat hobatne woknisugunem, hekaerek hatuaneke meke Yesus etaga baga hat hiki bagaat akhuni u hano hagarinakhik, akhuni wene hutduagaluk hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagarinakhik, hagasigin iti, ebe nit nen hagarinakhe dogoagaluk hobatne woknisan o, ” iluk Allah ayoko ’bisukha.
44004031	Itithogon Allah ayoko ’bekhe lagoukhama, o it natogorlek welagoukhama iti aborlok isikhe. Aborlok isinem, Allah Agoreke inebe tha’bokhogonat inakla kerlekhogon ukisikhemo, wene Allah nen isikhe meke akhuni inayuk degat yogeisekhe lagoukha.
44004032	It wene eberogonat iluk waganhukha meke iti, inebe doalegat meke re, inetaiken opakiat welagoukha. Dogolik, inameke yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat, “Yi an meke, ” iluk igidegat he, “Ninebe tha’bokhogonat ninameke, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
44004033	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, it ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus iluk agama ninileken arat hogo o, ” iluk inane motok obatnerogonat yogeisekhe lagoukha. Yogeisekhe korlek, Allah obabut hano etnogo nen kokhogon yomageisekhe lageikhe.
44004034	-
44004035	Itithogon yomageisekhe korlek, inaagat iteerek welagoukha meke inom, inai halek iteerek welagoukha meke inom, akhuni werlek meke inoba oko uang waganhe lagoukha. Waganiluk nen, uang iti it nen wolok ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inikimo ’bi aga lagoukha. ’Bi agunem, it aperek inameke dek meke inebe tomok erlok supurogo wogeisekhe lagoukhama, it aperek inerlageik ageidegat welagoukha.
44004036	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ap ageikhe etaga Yusuf. Ukuloak etaga Lewi meke. Ai o etaga Siprus meke, it ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo nen, nit ninane baga etaga Inetaiken Thebelherek meke iluk u hak, it inane baga etaga Barnabas thalhukha.
44004037	Ap iti aagat werekma, it aperek inoba oko uangwaganhikhesik nen, uang iti wolok, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inikimo ’bi ageikhe.
44005001	At Barnabas nen itithogon ’bi ageikhe meke re, ap ageikhe etaga Ananias. Age Sapira ipisak nen inaagat ageikhe iteerekma it aperek inoba oko uang waganhukha.
44005002	Waganhukhasik nen, Ananias iti age ipisak nen, “Itithogon hagasuok o, ” iluk isukha meke age etnogo iluat werek korlek, agun nen uang emenogo ebetlake inekaerek hasik ’bakhalok, ebetlake anek it Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inikimo ’bi ageikhe.
44005003	’Bi ageikhemo, at Petrus nen, “Ananias. Iblis nen hakla kagalhemo Allah Agoreke nukhetdiluk agat oko ebetlake mikirlogo hekaerek hasik ’bakhalok wagan iti nenaluk.
44005004	Agat iti hat nen it aperek inoba oko waganhidek werlek korlek, hat haagat mekeat. Meke re, it aperek wogeisegenma oko ’bega meke iti hat mekeat o. Meke re, wene hakla nen itithogon kagalogo hagakhen iti nenaluk. Hane hekalat egen iti, nit akhuni yoknisegen ’buk. At Allah at yogokhen o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44005005	Itithogon yogokhunem, wene iti, at Ananias asuk holhikhesik nen, abusak tunhogo wilageikhesik nen ebe watlageikhe. Watlageikhemo, it akhuni inebe tha’bokhogonat wene hagatlageikhe meke iti, inasuk holhukhasik nen inayuk kogat agoukha.
44005006	Itithogon watlageikhemo, it elege thue meke ukisukhasik nen, ebe warek etnogo su yilogo nen wolok dukhisukhasik, agat hulelogo thali lagoukha.
44005007	Warek wolok dukhisukhama, 3 jam hakene herlekha’bugat welagoukhasik nen, Ananias age wene hagatlageikhe etnogo okodegat welageikhesik akhirak ukisikhe.
44005008	Ukisikhemo, at Petrus nen, “Agat hit meke etnogo oko re, yi bagaat wokhisega nogo a? Hanorogo yoknom, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at nen, “O. Iti bagaat woknisega, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44005009	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Petrus nen, “Wene hit hagun hipisagat, Yigithogon hagasuok, iluk egesip nen ninopase Etagapogot Allah Agoreke obabut paluogoluk hagakhep iti nenaluk. Hagun ebe warek agatma thali lageikhasik, hat itithogonat wokharek dukhuogoluk holagapema inisok ane wageikha ithi, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44005010	Itithogon yogokhe korlek eranogoat Sapira etnogo abusagat Petrus alilu tunhogo wilageikhesik nen ebe watlageikhe. Watlageikhesik werekma, it elege thue meke emenogo ukisukhasik, inileken halok nen, ebe warek wolok agun warek thaldi lagoukhama alilu thaldi lagoukha.
44005011	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo nen, it Allah a'buri meke tha’bokhogonat men, nen it akhuni aperek inasuk holhukha meke tha’bokhogonat men, inayuk agoukha.
44005012	Akhuni doalegat emenogo inom dogolik, it Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo nen wene akhuni nen hutduagaluk hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagarinakhe lagoukha. Hagarinakhe dogolik, it Allah a’buri inebe tha’bokhogonat Allah ai halekma misohulak etaga Salomo thalekma opakimo natogokhe lagoukha.
44005013	Natogokhunem, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen hogorinakhe lagoukha meke re, it akhuni werlek meke nen it inoba uku inayugat welagoukha.
44005014	Inayugat werek korlek, it Allah a’buri hagatlagoukha meke werekma nen, it ap dek, humi dek, inakla nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot eberogonat, ” iluk inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk, it inom dapukhogon inebe motok doalegat aga lagoukha.
44005015	Itithogon aga lagoukhama, it akhuni u warek meke aperek o perlago ’bisigik, aperek direka talogo ’bisigik, ’biluk nen, Petrus wagunem amukhak inoba mot aga halok the asuagaluk, holagarlem ’bisa aga lagoukha.
44005016	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, it akhuni aperek inai Yerusalem aliluke meke eloma nen waga dogolik, it aperek u warek meke inom, mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukiluk werekma thinuknuk aga lagoukha meke inom, wogosik inoba waga lagoukhaat. Wogosik wagunem inebe tha’bokhogonat hano hagarinakhe lagoukha.
44005017	-
44005018	Itithogon hagarinakhunem, ilugun oba, it ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok meke agarumi inebe tha’bokhogonat inom, it iti akhuni Saduki meke inane waganhe lagoukha meke nen, it Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo itithogon hagakhunem inoba ua palhe lagoukha. Itithogon ua palhe lagoukhasik, inebe ha’isalok nen, o akhuni iniki herle warogo ’bisegarekma ’bisasukha.
44005019	’Bisasukhama, werekma nen, malaikat ninoe Etagapogot nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe hibako usa’ageikhesik nen, o akhuni iniki herle warek ’bisegarekma, thu larek meke hualogo nen inebe wogosik dukhi ageikhe.
44005020	Wogosik dukhi ageikhesik, at nen wene yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit hinebe Allah ai halekma lano o. Lalok etoma ukiluk metek dogolik, wene hano wene hinebe hiniluk dogolik ket ninat hagakhe dogosak wene iti tha’bokhogonat yogeisa lano, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44005021	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, inasuk holiluk, o wi aga korlek, Allah ai halekma ukisukhasik wene yakulisekhe lagoukha. Itithogon yakulisekhe korlek, it ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo agarumi inom nen ap inarluetek Israel meke wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke tha’bokhogonat, inayoko ’bisukhasik inebe natogotdiluk, inagarumi aperek nen, it Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke iniki herle warek ’bisasukha meke etnogo wogosik wisuagaluk, o ’bisasukhama etnogo la’isasukha.
44005022	Itithogon la’isasukhama, it etnogo lagoukha meke, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke etnogo iniki herle warek 'bisegarekma inebe dekma. Inebe dek nen inapuke wagoukhasik, it ap emenogo men yogeisa agoukha,
44005023	“O akhuni iniki herle warek ’bisegarekma etnogo, thu a’bethogon larek werek korlek, herle warek meke inebe dukhunogo iluk, ap holagapema thuam welageikharek meke emenogo inebe werekma lago. Lagosik ninebe ukogo meke, o akla it ap emenogo inebe dekma, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44005024	Yogeisasukhama it ap Allah ai halek therogo welagoukha meke emenogo men, Allah iteerek inougi koktek emenogo inom nen, “It ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo nikithogon hagatlageikhama nen ega, ” iluk inobakha palageikhesik, “Yabokane nikithogon hagatlasigin he, ” iluk inayuk agoukha.
