44005025	Itithogon inayuk agoukhasik werekma, ap ageikhe wageikhesik nen, “Warligi. Hit ap iniki herle warogo ’bisegep emenogo, Allah ai halekma metek dogolik, akhuni wene yakulisiliogei, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44005026	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, at ap kok Allah ai halek therogo welageikhe meke etnogo agarumi inom lagoukhasik nen, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo wogosik wagoukha. Meke re, wogosik wisuogoluk inakla nen, “Akhuni doalegat nen Yesus agarumi inirlirli waganogo nit helekit oba ninasinogo, ” iluk iniki korlo lirisalok wogosik wisu inayuk nen erogat wogosik wagoukha.
44005027	Wogosik wagoukhasik nen, ap wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke emenogo inakla turlem meldisasukha. Itithogon turlem meldisasukhasik nen, at ap Allah iteerek inoe kok etnogo nen, wene men iluk yogeisasikhe,
44005028	“Hit nen ap iti etaga palogo nen wene yakulisugup o, iluk nit nen hinasuk hanorogon wakho etnogo mekeat he, hit nen wene iti wiakhogon yakulisekhe lagapma nen, akhuni o Yerusalem meke yoma tha’bokhogonat inilu aga iti, at ap iti wakha iti, wene nit ninoba ’buogoluk hagakhe lagap higi, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44005029	Itithogon yogeisekhe lagoukhama, it Petrus lak, Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo nen, “Nit he, akhuni inane hologo hagasusak dek o. Allah ane itiat hologo hagasusak o.
44005030	Hit nen Yesus ebe hiniki hakhegesip o baga meldiluk wakhepma etnogo, at Allah ninopa lak nen apma ukiluk hogorakhe lagoukha meke etnogo nenat apuke ilugutdekhemo werek o.
44005031	Ilugutdekhemo werek iti, akhuni Israel meke weak hagariogei meke iti here’isalok inobabut hebelasumo, Allah nen it weak hagakharek meke iti thagalogo degetdisagaluk, Yesus ebe ilugutdekhesik nen, at ebe ninoe Etagapogot dogolik tilninakhe dogoagaluk alilu meldisikhemo werek iti.
44005032	Itithogon hagakhe iluk nit ninileken hutukhogon hogosik nen, Eberogonat, iluk pakhogon yokhisekhe lago. Akhuni Allah ane hologo hagakhorek meke, at Agoreke woknisekherek iti ninom nenat wene iti yokhisekhe lago, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44005033	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it inakla aga dageiluk ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inasuogoluk hagakhukha.
44005034	Inasuogoluk hagakhukha mekeat he, ap ageikhe it Farisi meke inawene hago dogolik, it inom wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke etaga Gamaliel. Ap iti wene Allah nen inasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo yakulisugunem, akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen, “At hano, ” iluk inane hanorogon yogokhe lagoukha meke. At iti melageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap iniki herle warek meke yi, elanma hasik itikmanke dogoak nen ula’isani, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44005035	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo ula’isasukhama nen, at nen wene men yogeisasikhe, “Hit ap Israel meke nagarlak lak. Ap iti nikithogon hagarinabugun apegep. Hinakla hanorogon ebetdiluk nen hagasusak o.
44005036	Alebat, ap ageikhe etaga Teudas melageikhesik nen, Kok anat o, iluk isikhemo, ap inebe doalegat 400 hakene at apma ukiluk oporlik nekhe lagoukha. Itithogon ukisukha meke re, at ebe wakhukhama, agarumi at apma ukiluk oporlik nekhe lagoukha meke iti thirlik-pirlikhogon lo lagoukhama, at nen, Itithogon hagasuok, iluk ekhe lageikhe wene iti degat ageikhe.
44005037	Dek ageikhemo, yabokane koktek pemerintah meke nen akhuni inebe iniki wenageinabuogoluk hagakhunem, ap ageikhe ai Galilea meke, etaga Yudas melageikhe. Melageikhesik akhuni doalegat inakla kagalhikhemo, at apma ukiluk oporlik nekhe lagoukhaat. Meke re, at ebe wakhik, agarumi apma meke ukiluk oporlik nekhe lagoukha meke thirlik-pirlikhogon mugisigik, hagakhukha iti.
44005038	-
44005039	Halok he, wene yogotak yi hasik, an nen wene ageikhe hinasuk wasik. Hit nen ap iti yigithogon tigithogon ageikhe hagarinakhup. Wene it nen yakulisekhe dogolik hagarinabiogei iti, erlo akhuni nen halok he, wene iti dek asigin o. Meke re, wene iti erlo Allah at halok he, hit nen it inobatne degetdisausak erlok dek asigin o. Itithogon erlok dek agunem, hit nen Allah ebe hinom yabusak hakene hagatlasinogo nen, thogotdisani o, ” iluk inetaiken thebelhikhe.
44005040	Inetaiken thebelhikhemo, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo waisasukhama ukisukhama tugi inakhukhasik nen, “Yesus iti etaga palogo, wene yabokane itithogon yogeisekhe dogogup, ” iluk inasuk warogo ula’isasukha.
44005041	Ula’isugunem, it ap wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke emenogo here’isalok dukhisukhasik nen, Yesus agarumi emenogo it-it ekhe dogolik, “Allah nen, Hit Yesus etaga hasik akhuni nen, Hit weak, iluk wenakhisaumo erlok, iluk akla apekhe tak-tak wenaknisega iti hano, ” iluk inakla arleken akhalok dukhisukha.
44005042	Dukhisukhasik, it emenogo nen Allah ai halekma ukigik, akhuni inailake ukigik, hagakhe dogolik, “Allah nen, Ap ageikhe nen akhuni tilhinabuagaluk ayoko ’biluk la’isigin, isikhe etnogo, ebe Yesus Kristus itiat o, ” iluk Yesus nen hagakhikhe wene, hano wene etnogo thogotdigidek hunik-hunigat yakulisigik, yogeisigik, nekhe lagoukha.
44006001	Itinem, akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke inebe doalegat hagatlagoukhama, it akhuni inebe Yahudi mekeat he, inane Yunani meke nen, men isukha, “Akhuni yi meke ti meke hibiku-yogokuat supurisekhe dogolik, humi thoge nit meke halok kolelogo thogotdisiliogei iti nenaluk, ” iluk, it Yahudi inaierek meke inom wene yakhe lagoukha.
44006002	Wene itithogon yakhe lagoukhama, it ap inebe 12 Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo nen, akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke inebe tha’bokhogonat natogosuagaluk waisasukha. Waisasukhasik wagoukhama, inebe opakimo natogotdiluk dogolik, it nen men yogeisasukha, “Nit Allah ane yakulisekhe lago iti, here’isalok, yi meke ti meke supurisekhe dogosak weak o.
44006003	Halok he, hit nen he, ap ageikhe Allah Agoreke inakla kerlekhogon dogolik, inetaiken motok kagalek hagakhunem, inobabut ekagat hisekhe lagap meke halok, inebe 7 baga herageinabino. Herageinakhep halok, it nen yi meke ti meke itithogon supurisekhe dogoagaluk, nit nen meldisagun o.
44006004	Meldisaumo, it itithogon hagakhe korlek, nit nen sembayan igik, wene ebe wene itiat yogeisigik, hagakhe dogogun, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44006005	Wene itithogon ekhe lagoukhama, it akhuni Allah a’buri emenogo inebe tha’bokhogonat nen, “Itithogon egep iti hano, ” iluk isukhasik inebe heago’bisasukha. Itithogon ’bisasukha iti ageikhe Stefanus, etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk motok werekma Allah Agoreke akla kerlekhogon ukisikhesik welageikhe meke men, Filipus men, Prokhorus men, Nikanor men, Timon men, Parmenas men, Nikolaus o Antiokhia meke Allah ane waganhikhesik, Yahudi meke thalek hagatlageikhe meke iti men,
44006006	inebe 7 eta heago ’bisalok, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inoba ’bisa agoukha. ’Bisa agoukhama, it nen iniki inukuloak thebelogo sembayan isukha.
44006007	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukhama, Allah ane kok aga dogolik, akhuni o Yerusalem meke Yesus ane waganhukha meke inebe doalegat hagatlagoukha. Itithogon hagatlagunem, it ap Allah iteerek meke emenogo inebe motok doalegat nen, wene iti waganhukhasik inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukhaat.
44006008	At Allah obabut hano nen wogeisekherek meke etnogo, Stefanus kokhogon wogokhikhemo obatne kogat welageikhe. Dogolik akhuni nen wene hutduagaluk hagasusak dek meke kokhogon elalinat hagarinakhe lageikhe.
44006009	Hagarinakhe lageikhemo, it ap Yahudi meke o Kirene meke men, Aleksandria meke men, inebe akhuni aperek inatuaneke welagoukhasik yabokane inasokneat agoukhasik sembayan opakimo ekhe lagoukha meke men, it Yahudi meke aperek o propinsi Kilikia meke men, Asia meke men, inom nen, at Stefanus ane isinem, melagoukhasik nen, itema hithani-hathani waganhukhasik wenagakhukha.
44006010	Itithogon wenagakhukha mekeat, at Stefanus Allah Agoreke akla ukiluk dogolik, wene morat kagoukhogon isinem, it inane oko nikithogon yogosu heat hagatlageikhe.
44006011	Oko nikithogon yogosu heat hagatlageikhemo, it nen, ap aperek nen wene at oba ’buagaluk inakla kagalhukha. Itithogon inakla kagalhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen men ino. At yi nen Musa abok weak palhik, Allah abok weak palhik, isinem, nit ninasuk holho, ino, ” iluk inakla kagalhukha.
44006012	Itithogon inakla kagalhukhama, it nenakhuni aperek inakla kagalhik, ap inarluetek emenogo inakla kagalhik, ap Allah ane holal waganek inilu meke emenogo inakla kagalhik, hagakhukhama, it tha’bokhogonat melagoukhasik, at Stefanus ebe ha’iluk, it ap wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke emenogo inoba wolok lagoukha.
44006013	Wolok lagoukhasik nen, ap aperek nen inekalat wene Stefanus oba ’buagaluk meldisasukha. Meldisasukhama, it nen ekhe dogolik, “Ap yi nen Allah ekaerek ai halek yi abok weak palhik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo abok weak palhik, thogotdigidek isi motogat welagarek o.
44006014	Nen, at nen iliogo ageikhe, Yesus ai Nazaret meke etnogo nen, Allah ai halek yi misalogo ’biluk, wene at Musa nen ninopa lak yakulisasikhemo, nit hagakhe lago meke etnogo, yabokane nekalogat hagasigin o, iluk isinem ninasuk holho o, ” iluk isukha.
44006015	Itithogon ekhe lagoukhama, it ap wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke emenogo inebe tha’bokhogonat inom hurek dogolik, inileken at Stefanus oba tek-tek lakhugunem at elokhoken malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa wagarek meke emenogo inelokhoken hakene hagatlageikhemo inileken lakhasukha.
44007001	At Stefanus wene itithogon oba ’bisukhama, at ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etnogo nen, “Wene iti eberogonat iliogei a? Inekalat iliogei a, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44007002	Yogokhikhemo, at Stefanus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nougi, nagarumi, nopase lak. Wene igin yi, hinasuk hanorogo holini. Ninopa Abraham etnogo o Haran tekhogon wageidek, o Mesopotamia werekma, Allah, hogorakhorek meke etnogo elokhoma melageikhe.
44007003	Elokhoma melaga dogolik, O hat welaganma yoma men, hoe hagot ethoma men, here’isalok dukhi lano. Dukhi lagan halok he, o an nen yakulhisiginmo lano,\rq (Kejadian 12:1)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
44007004	Yogokhikhemo nen, o akhuni Kasdim meke inaila here’isalok, o Haran tekhogon wageikhe. Wageikhesik werekma, opase watlageikhemo nen, o etoma here’isalok Allah nen olirok waganogo hit yogotak welagapma yoma ’bi ageikhe.
44007005	Itithogon ’bi ageikhe meke re, at nen, O yoma iteerek hat meke o, iluk yakulikhidegat. Nen, agat herlekha’bugurlagat ageikhe yakulikhidegat dogolik, O yoma yabokane hat iteerek ageik, hat nen itago meke iteerek ageik, hagasugun o, iluk at a’but itakhidek werek korlegat abok yogokhikhe iti.
44007006	Wene itithogon warikhikhe mekeat, men yogokhikheat, Hat nen itago meke iti akhuni inaila lalok ap huso negen dogogun. Itithogon werekma akhuni etoma meke nen inatuaneke hakene ’bisalok, o mo dageigik usigik hagakhe korlek 400 tahun mep dageik-dagokhogon hagarinakhe dogogun.
44007007	Meke re, it akhuni inaierek nen inapma ’bisalok hagasik dogogun meke iti, an nen ukum inoba ’biluk weagarinabigin o. Weagarinabumo, hat nen itago meke iti o etomanen dukhitluk nen, o yoma dogolik, an hogotnakhe dogogun o,\rq (Kejadian 15:13-14)\rq* iluk Allah nenat yogokhikhe.
44007008	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, An wene warogo wokhinakhi iti, ekagat dogoagaluk inoadoaperlagap meke palinakhe dogono o, iluk yakulikhikhemo, Abraham nen a’but Ishak itakhasikhesik nen, iki 7 hari welageikhesik, iki ageikhe baga oado aperlagap meke itithogon palhikhe. Nen, yabokane Ishak nen a’but Yakub itakhasikhesik, itithogonat oado etnogo palhikheat. Nen, Yakub nen, it nit ninopa lak inebe 12 emenogo itaginabiluk, itithogonat inoado aperlagap meke palinakhikheat.
44007009	Ninopa lak emenogo inagot Yusuf oba ua palhe lagoukhasik nen, ebe o Mesir wolok lalok inatuaneke dogoagaluk, ap aperek oba oko waganhukha. Meke re, akhuni nen at ebe hibiku-yogoku weagatduogoluk hagakhunem, Allah ipisak dogolik yi wene ti wene oba wagunem tilho motok welageikhe.
44007010	Itithogon tilho werekma, ap kok Firaun o Mesir meke inoe etagapogot etnogo nen, Ap yi obabut hano. Akla motok kagalek, iluk oba hotok isikhemo, at nen he, men yogokhikhe, O Mesir yoma men, an nai men, na’buri men, hat nen hagasik dogolik, an meke yi meke ti meke yoma tha’bokhogonat hat hiki baga dogonok, iluk ebe gubernur dogoagaluk meldisikhe.
44007011	Meldisikhemo, werek korlek, o Mesir etoma men, o Kanaan yoma men, hipiri no kogat ageikhemo weagat welagoukha. Weagat dogolik, ninopa lak emenogo hipiri koma meke heasu heat, werlegat welagoukha.
44007012	Werlegat werekma, akhuni nen, O Mesir etoma anek he, hipiri gandum eken werek o, iluk isinem, at Yakub asuk holhikhesik nen, at a’buri nit ninopa lak emenogo aperek waganuagaluk la’isasikhe. Alebageik itithogon la’isasikhesik
44007013	yabokane la’isekhe lageikhemo nen, at Yusuf etnogo nen, An etnogo nebe yiat o, iluk ougi emenogo yakulisasikhe. Yakulisugunem Firaun etnogo nen, Yusuf agarlak lak inom opakiat itago meke yoma higi, iluk ilu ageikheat.
44007014	Itithogon yakulisasikhesik, at Yusuf nen, opase Yakub men, akhuni at a’buri meke tha’bokhogonat inebe 75 men, inom wisuagaluk wene warogo la’isa ageikhe.
44007015	Wene warogo la’isa ageikhemo it Yakub lak olirok o Mesir usasukha. Etoma usasukhasik dogolik, at ebe men, a’buri ninopa lak men, etomaat watlarik lagoukha.
44007016	Watlarik lagoukhama, alebat at Abraham o Sikhem dogolik, oila akhuni Hemor a’buri inoba oko palhikhemo inebe warek ’bisa agoukha.
44007017	Yabokane, Allah nen Abraham haganeat wene warikhikhe etnogo ebe hagatlasusak tak-tagat horogat aga korlek, akhuni nit meke inebe o Mesir etoma doalegat hagatlagoukha.
44007018	Itithogon doalegathagatlagoukhama nen, ap kok ageikhe nekalogat, Yusuf ebe okodek meke, o Mesir etoma kok ageikhesik hagasik welageikhe.
44007019	Kok dogolik, akhuni nit meke ninopa lak emenogo nukhetdisigik, yi aik ti aik hagarinakhik, hagakhe lageikhe. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik ina’buri ket itago meke iniluk dogunogo iluk, Watlakhoak nen itikman ula’isani, iluk ane obatnerogon yogeisekhe lageikhe.
44007020	Itithogon hagarinakhe lageikhe eta tak-tagat, at Musa ebe motok hanoat itaklageikhemo nen, thut henagan opase aila hago welagoukha.
44007021	Hago welagoukhasik, yabokane ula’isukhama, at kok Firaun a’but he nen ebe waganhikhesik, at ekaerek eak negenat kogotdisikhe.
44007022	Kogotdisikhemo, it akhuni o Mesir meke yi wene ti wene inilu welagoukha meke iti, at nen motogat yakulhikhe. Yakulhikhesik, at nen ane baga hano anek igik, iki baga yi meke ti meke hanoat hagakhik, hagakhe dogolik, ebe kogat ageikhe.
44007023	Kok ageikhesik, at Musa itaklageikhesik nen, mo dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek umur 40 tahun hagatlageikhe. Hagatlageikhemo, at nen, Akhuni Israel meke an nagarlak lak emenogo ’birisa lak, iluk akla apasikhe.
44007024	Akla apasikhesik, inoba ’birisa lageikhe hak, ap Mesir meke ageikhe nen ap Israel meke ageikhe tugi wakhunem ileken hasikhe. Ileken halok nen, at werekmake ageikhesik irlirli waganogo, ap Mesir meke etnogo ebe motogat wakhikhe.
44007025	Wakhe dogolik, at akla nen, It akhuni an nagarlak lak inakla nen, Allah nen at ayoko ’bekhemo, at iki baga tilninabigin, iluk hutdanugun, iluk apasikhe mekeat, it nen itithogon hutdigidek welagoukha.
44007026	Hutdigidegat dogolik, hubuluke ap inebe pere Israel meke ipisak tugi yakhunem, ileken hisasikhesik dapulogo ’bisagaluk, men yogeisasikhe, Nagarlak lak. Hit hagarlak hipisak mekeat, nenaluk tugi wat-wat yakhe lagap, iluk yogeisasikhe.
44007027	Meke re, at agarlak tugi wakhe dogolik, at Musa ebe la’ekhe dogolik men yogokhikhe, Hat nit ninoe kok dogolik, wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk, tha nen meldageikhemo ekhe lagan.
44007028	Ap Mesir meke hiamagane wakhen iti hak annasigiluk hagakhe lagan a,\rq (Keluaran 2:14)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
44007029	Itithogon yogokhe lageikhemo, wene iti asuk holhikhesik, lo dukhisikhesik olirok o Midian etoma lageikhesik welageikhe. Dogolik, a’buri inebe pere itaginakhikhe.
44007030	Etoma motok dogolik, yabokane 40 tahun welageikhe. Werekma, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe Musa nen ileken hoagaluk, tom Sinai apma o limo akhuni inebe dekma etoma usa’ageikhesik, o ’bugurlagat meke hetu amulok yibakhunem elokhoma melageikhemo ileken hasikhe.
44007031	Hasikhesik hogorarik, ileken hanorogo ’bikhagaluk ebe horokhogon lagunem, ninopase kok Etagapogot nen men isinem asuk holhikhe,
44007032	Hat hopa lak Abraham men, Ishak men, Yakub men, inopase Allah anat o,\rq (Keluaran 3:6)\rq* iluk yogokhikhemo, at Musa nen oageleke dik-dik iluk ileken hanorogon ’bikha lau ayuk ageikhe.
44007033	Ayuk ageikhemo, ninopase Etagapogot etnogo nen, ageikhe men yogokhikhe, Agat hat hebe metek welaganma etha, an nekaerek naagat o. Halok he, hisok sepatu ugu meke ethoma nokorlogo ’bin o.
44007034	An na’buri akhuni o Mesir meke nen yi aik ti aik hagarinakhunem nileken hisigik, inetaiken ane isinem nasuk holhik, hagakhe lagarik nen, an nen tilinabigiluk nebeusa’agei yi o. Halok he, an nen hat yogotak o Mesir la’ageik nen erne o,\rq (Keluaran 3:5,7-8,10)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
44007035	Haganeat it akhuni Israel meke nen, Hat nit ninoe kok dogolik wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, ’bekhe dogoagaluk, tha nen meldageikhemo hagakhe lagan. Nina’it o,\rq (Keluaran 2:14)\rq* iluk wenageikhukha etnogo, at Musa at o. Itithogon wenageikhukha mekeat he, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo, at Musa ileken hoagaluk ageikhe usa’i ageikhemo nen, o ’bugurlagat oba nen winam ageikhemo ileken hasikhe meke etnogoat, inoe kok dogoliktilinabuagaluk ayoko ’biluk la’isikhe iti.
44007036	Ayoko ’biluk la’isikhemo, akhuni Israel meke inebe wogosik dukhi ageikhe iti, at Musa nenat o. Wogosik dukhi aga dogolik, o Mesir etoma men, i yekelek etaga Laut Merah etoma men, o limo akhuni dekma etoma, o mo dageigik usigik hagakhe korlek 40 tahun dogolik men, it akhuni nen wene hutduagaluk ageikhe hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagarik wageikhe iti, at Musa nenat o.
44007037	Nen, akhuni Israel meke yogeisekhe dogolik, Allah nen ap at ane yokhisekhe dogoagaluk, ap hit meke ageikhe an meldanhikhe iti hak, yabokane meldigin etnaga o,\rq (Ulangan 18:15,18)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe iti, at Musa nenat o.
44007038	Nen, ninopa lak inom o limo akhuni dekma etoma natogorlek werekma, tom Sinai iti apma malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe oba usa’ageikhesik nen, ipisak wenekak isukha iti, at Musa at o. Ninopa lak emenogo inomat werekma, at Allah nen, wene niniluk dogogun wene iti, nit yoknisoagaluk yogokhikhe iti, at Musa at o.
44007039	Itithogon yogokhikhe mekeat, ninopa lak emenogo nen, at ane inasuk holhe dogosak ina’it welagoukha. Itithogon dogolik, ebe thogotdisukhasik nen, O Mesir etoma ninapuke lausak meke, iluk inetaiken la’iluk welagoukha.
44007040	Inetaiken o Mesir la’iluk dogolik, at Harun ayoko 'biluk men yogokhukha, At Musa o Mesir nen woknisik dukhi aga etnogo, nikithogon hagatlagama he. Nit ninokodek, iti nen, nit ninapuke woknisik o Mesir loak nen, Allah ebe hakene obolukmo kaneke ageikhe woknisano,\rq (Keluaran 32:1)\rq* iluk yogokhukha.
44007041	Itithogon yogokhukhasik, o itinem sapi eak hakene alino hagarogo kaneke hagakhukha. Hagatdiluk nen, ako warogo ’biluk, Niniki nen hagakho yi hano, iluk, inakla arleken akhekhe lagoukha.
44007042	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukhama, at Allah nen oporlik wogeisasikhesik, Pogot oba meke mo men, thut men, husagal doalegat iti men, hogorakhe dogonek, iluk inebe here’isasikhe. Itithogon hagakhikhe iti, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen men isukha hagat, hagakhikhe, Allah nen, Hit akhuni Israel meke yi thani. Mo dageigik usigik 40 tahun hagakhe korlek, o limo akhuni dekma etoma dogolik, sapi wakhik, hetu hunhik, hagakhe lagagip iti, an nobasik ’banhik, watnikhik, hagakhelagagip nogo? Dek o.
44007043	O su ai etnogo, hinopase Molokh ai men, husagal hakene etnogo, hinopase Refan ageisagal men, ya ’bigik, wolok nekhe lagagip iti. Itithogon wolok nekhe dogolik, hit at apma ukuogoluk alino hagakhigip iti nen, hinebe o Babel abel elomake la’inagagin o,\rq (Amos 5:25-27)\rq* iluk Allah nen isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bisukha iti hak hagakhikhe iti.
44007044	At Allah nen Musa yogokhe dogolik, An nebe ninom welago, iluk an nai o su ai yigithogonat haldanin o, iluk walegeke walhasikhemo, ileken hasikhesik, o ebe itithogonat halhikhe. Halhikhemo ninopa lak emenogo o su ai itiat hago dogolik o limo akhuni dekma nekhe dogolik ya haldigik, ta haldigik, halogo nekhe lagoukha.
44007045	Itithogon halogo nekhe lagoukhasik, it nen itago meke Yosua inom nen o su ai halek iti misalogo wolok akhuni nit ninai yoma werekma Allah nen mukhogo ula’isasikhemo inaagat thebeli ukitluk, o su ai iti hali uki agoukha. Hali uki agoukha itinem o su ai itiat halek welageikhesik, hurli Daud iluk welageikhe iti hurli halek welageikhe.
44007046	Nen, Daud obabut hagakhe lageikhe iti, Allah oba hotok isikhemo, at nen Allah men yogokhikhe, Yakub opase Allah harat o. Hai ageikhe halogo ’bagagin o, iluk yogokhikhe.
44007047	Itithogon yogokhikhe mekeat he, Allah ai ebe a’but Salomo nen halogo ’bisasikhe iti.
44007048	-
44007050	Itithogon mekeat he, at ap Allah ane yogeisekhe [ageikhe meke ageikhe nen wene men isikhe, Ninopase Allah Etagapogot nen, Kok anat dogolik, nebe naloke pogot obaat hurekwelagei. Nen, nisok legerogo agat oba 'biluk welagei. Halok he, hit nen o nikirlik meke haldanusak. An nebe thet walogo re, o koma dogosak apegep. Erlok dek o. Yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat ethoma, an nen walhasigi dek nogo?\rq (Yesaya 66:1-2)\rq* luk Allah nen isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bisikhe iti nen, at Allah Etagapogot kok iti, o akhuni iniki nen halharek neke baga dogosak erlok dek o.
44007051	Hit akhuni yoma linobabut motok weak hinasuk holu’buk, hinoado ninaperlagap meke itithogon palek dogoligat, hinetaiken karelek dek dogolik hinasuk warek dek hagakhe lagap yi re! Hinopa lak nen, Allah Agoreke ane iti nina’it, iluk ekhe lagoukha hagat, lit it inobabut waganogo hagakhe lagap yoma re!
44007052	It ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo, hinopa lak nen inebe weagarinakhidek aperek welagoukha nogo? iVeagarinakhe lagoukha anek apigi. It Allah ane yogeisekhe agoukha meke nen, Allah atuaneke obabut mothogon hagasigin meke iti Wabokane wisigin o, iluk ebe wageidek werek korlek, it abok tak ekhe lagoukha meke inebe hinopa lak nenat inakhe agoukha iti. Yabokane, it nen abok tak isukha meke iti ebe wageikhemo nen, hit nenat at ebe wasuagaluk yoko lageik, ebe wakhik, hagakhep iti.
44007053	Nen, it malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti, hirat wokhisasukha mekeat, hinasuk lologo hagasusak hina’irat welagap iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44007054	At Stefanus nen wene itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, it inasuk holhukhasik, inakla aga dageiluk, inaik hunetdiluk ebe wasuogoluk hagakhe lagoukha.
44007055	Wasuogoluk hagakhe korlek, at Stefanus Allah Agoreke akla kerlekhogon dogolik, ileken pogot oba liakhasikhe meke, at Yesus Allah ebe hogorakharek meke etnogo alilu metek ipisak werekma ileken liagisasikhe.
44007056	Ileken liagisalok, at nen he, “Lakhani! Pogot hialagama, at abat itaklasi ageikhe meke etnogo, Allah alilu ipisak metek werekma nileken liagisigi o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44007057	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it emenogo inane amitmit luk-luk, iniki inasuk tetnokhogon, pirlirliat opaki tak-tak oba hobotha ukisukha.
44007058	Oba hobotha ukiluk, o kota nen leget thikmanke hapokhogon ula'iluk nen, helekit oba wakhukha. Ebe wasuogoluk, it at ane isinem inasuk holhukhasik, ukum oba ’bisukha werek emenogo inasu itikmanke meke nokorlogo, elege thue meke etaga Saulus hago dogoagaluk apma ’bisukha.
44007059	’Biluk nen, ebe helekit oba wakhe korlek, at Stefanus etnogo Yesus etaga palhe dogolik, “Yesus noe. Nagoreke hat nen woknabi me o, ” iluk isikhe.
44007060	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, itibagal yukukhogo hurek lageikhe. Hurek lageikhesik nen, ane kokhogonat men isikhe, “Noe. Ap an weak hagatnakha meke yoma, wene inoba ’bugun o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik ebe arat watlageikhe.
44008001	At Stefanus ebe motogat wakhukha iti, at Saulus akla nen hano apasikhe. At Stefanus ebe wakhukha itinemat, it Allah a’buri o Yerusalem natogokhe lagoukha meke inebe yi aik ti aik weakhogon hagarinakhe korlek, it ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko 'biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo anek, o Yerusalem werek korlek, Allah a'buri aperek inebe doalegat meke emenogo tha'bokhogonat lo o propinsi Yudea Samaria ya ta etoma thirlik-pirlikhogon ula’isasukha.
44008002	Itithogon ula’isasukhama, it ap Allah ane hologo hagakhe lagoukha meke aperek nen, Stefanus etnogo ebe warek agat thalogo 'bisukhasik nen, uak de motok doalegat aga lagoukha.
44008003	Allah a'buri itithogon ula'isekhe dogolik, at Saulus etnogo Allah a'buri meke wuleleken tagalinabigiluk inailake lopok ya ukigik, ta ukigik, hagakhe dogolik, ap dek, humi lek, iniki korlo lisogo wogosik, o akhuni iniki herle warogo bisegarekma 'bisa laga lageikhe.
44008004	Itithogon hagarinakhe korlek, it thirlik-pirlikhogon lo agoukha meke emenogo o yi ai ti ai laga dogolik, hano wene etnogo yogeisilik lagoukha.
44008005	Itithogon yogeisilik laga dogolik, at Filipus o Samaria o kota kokma etoma wageikhesik nen, wene men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen, Ap ageikhe tilhinabuagaluk la'isigin, iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogo, ebe la'i agama wagasik itithogon lagakhe, ” iluk abok yogeisekhe lageikhe.
44008006	-
44008007	Wene yogeisekhe dogolik, it nen wene hutduagaluk mokat obabut weak meke akhuni inebe doalegat inakla ukiluk welagoukha neke inane kokhogonat ilik-ilik mukhogo ula'isigik, it aperek nebe doalegat inisok aborlok dek meke men, inisok la'belek neke men, hagarinakhik, elalinat hano hagarinakhe ageikhe. Itithogon hano hagarinakhe lageikhe iti nen, ikhuni emenogo inebe tha'bokhogonat natogorlek dogolik, nileken halok, inasuk motok hutukhogon holhe lagoukha.
44008008	Itithogon hano hagarinakhunem, it akhuni o Samaria meke etoma, inakla arleken motok kogat akhekhe lagoukha.
44008009	O Samaria etoma ap hathale ageikhe etaga Simon welageikhe. Haganeat nen at ebe hathale dogolik usa meke hagakhe dogolik, “Kok hathale nebe anat o, ” iluk isinem, it akhuni o Samaria meke emenogo nen, “Eiye! Nayuk e, ” iluk, at ebe hogorakhe lagoukha.
44008010	Hogorakhe dogolik, it akhuni koktek inom, keputek inom, tha'bokhogonat at ane hanorogon inasuk holhe lagoukha. Itithogon holhe dogolik, it nen, “Allah obatne motok kogat iluk iliogei etnogo, ebe yiat o, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
44008011	Ap iti haganeat etoma nen usa meke hagakhe dogolik, inayugutdisinem, at ane hutukhogon inasuk holhe lagoukha iti.
44008012	Itithogon mekeat he, at Filipus nen hano wene Allah nen apma 'bisekherek wene iti yogeisigik, Yesus Kristus etaga iti abok yogeisigik, hano wene iti ekhe lageikhemo, akhuni emenogo nen, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk waganhukha meke, ap dek, humi dek, ima usageinakhe lageikhe.
44008013	At Simon ebe meneke inomat, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk waganhikhemo nen, ima usa'isikheat. Itithogon usa'isikhesik nen, akhuni wene hutduagaluk, Allah obatne baga hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagakhunem, at Simon iti Filipus oporlik motok nekhe dogolik, ileken halok nen, ayuk aga lageikhe.
44008014	Itithogon hagakhukhama, akhuni nen, “Akhuni o Samaria meke Allah ane waganha o, ” iluk ekhe lagoukhama, it ap Yesus nen inayoko 'biluk la'isasikhe meke emenogo, o Yerusalem dogolik, inasuk holhukhasik nen, Petrus Yohanes ipisak akhuni Samaria meke inoba la'isa agoukha.
44008015	-
44008016	La'isa agoukhama wagoukhasik nen, akhuni o etoma meke nen, “Allah ane eberogonat, ” iluk waganhukha meke, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus etaga palogo ima anek kerat usa'inakhukhama, Allah Agoreke aban inoba usa'ageidek welageikhe iti nen, Allah nen Agoreke wogeisoagaluk ayoko ’bisukha.
44008017	Itithogon Allah ayoko ’bekhe dogolik, iniki inoba thebelisugunem nen, Allah nen Agoreke wogeisasikhemo horlasukha.
44008018	Itithogon horlasukhama, at Simon ileken hisasikhesik nen, akla nen, “Akhuni it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke nen, iniki inoba thebelisugunem anek, Allah Agoreke wogeisausak higi, ” iluk apasikhesik nen, Petrus Yohanes ipisak oko wogeisoagaluk, uang inoba wolok wageikhe.
44008019	Wolok wageikhesik, men yogeisasikhe, “An niki akhuni aperek inoba thebelisugunem, Allah nen Agoreke itithogonat wogeisugunem horlekhe dogoagaluk, an ninomat iteerek asuok nen, obatne iti woknitni, ” iluk kino yogeisasikhe.
44008020	Itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhemo, at Petrus nen, “Hat hakla nen, Allah obabut hano nen woknisekherek meke iti, hat nen oko ’biluk ite asusak apegen a? Erlok dek o. Itithogon apegen iti nen, hat hauang ithi horlalok nen, weakma etomaat motok nuk akha lano.
44008021	Allah il oba hakla motok weak ebekhe lagan iti nen, nit hagakhe lago iti, hat ninom ite asusak dek o.
44008022	-
44008023	Hat hobabut it aperek inoba ua palhe lagan iti, wam a’busal arle negen hakla kerlekhogon werek. Werekma, weak hagasigiluk hakla ebekhe lagan iti nen, herle negen warogo hakharek werek iti, hobabut hutdagagi. Weak hagasigiluk egen iti, thogotdiluk, hobabut hebelasin. Hebelasumo hat hakla weak apegen iti ninoe Etagapogot nen thagalogo degetduagaluk ayoko ’bino o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44008024	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Simon nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hit egep iti hak, an noba asinogo iluk, an nobasik ninoe Etagapogot ayoko ’bino o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44008025	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it Petrus Yohanes ipisak nen, wene inilu meke pakhogon yogeisekhe dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot ane yogeisekhe lagoukhasik, o etoma nen, hano wene iti, o Samaria ukul doalegat ya yogeisigik, ta yogeisigik, inapuke o kota Yerusalem lagoukha.
44008026	O kota Yerusalem lagoukhasikmo, malaikat ninoe Etagapogot nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke ageikhe usa’ageikhesik nen wene Filipus yogokhe dogolik, “Hebe metokhogon, holak o Yerusalem nen o Gaza i aputmo mot-mot usegarekmake, akhuni inebe dekmake itike usano, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, metokhogonat usasikhe.
44008027	Usasinem, ap ai Etiopia meke ageikhe, apuke aila usagaluk holagarlemke usa lageikhe. Ap iti he o Etiopia meke kok etaga Kandake iti nen, at meke yi meke ti meke hago dogoagaluk, ikimo ’bisikhemo nen, kok welageikhe meke. At ebe kogat dogolik, Allah apma ukiluk, sembayan o Yerusalem i dagei ageikhe. Dagei ageikhesik nen,
44008028	yabokane apukeat aila usasigiluk, kereta oto hakene kuda nen lisogo wolok lagarek etnogo meke baga hurek usekhe dogolik, wene Allah ane at Yesaya nen yogeisekhe lageikhesik, holal waganhikhe meke iti etaga thalik thalik usasikhe.
44008029	Itithogon etaga thalik usasi korlek, at Allah Agoreke nen Filipus yogokhe dogolik, “Kereta oto hakene iti usasinem ae hakha lalok oba horokhogon lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44008030	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Filipus pirlirli oba usasikhe hak, ap etnogo nen wene Allah ane Yesaya nen yogeisekhe lageikhesik, holal waganogo ’bisikhe meke etnogo etaga thalhunem nen, asuk holhikhe. Asuk holhikhesik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Etaga thalhe lagan iti, wene ebe hutdekhe lagan a? Dek a, ” iluk yogokhikhemo,
44008031	at nen he, “Wene iti ebe tha nen hutukhogon yoknisumo nen hutdusak, ” iluk yogokhikhesik, “Hat nipisak usauwok nen, ya hureklasi dagei me o, ” iluk ayoko ’bisikhe.
44008032	Ayoko ’bisikhemo, oba hureklasi lageisikhesik ileken ’bikhasikhe hak, ap etnogo holal men iluk waganekma etaga thalhunem hasikhe, “At he, domba wasuogoluk wolok lageikharek iti hak, wolok lageikha o. Wolok lalok, domba eak isi paluogoluk hagakhunem, ane degat huk welagarek iti hak, at iti ane ageikhe igidek ape dopolek huk aga.
44008033	At ekarli wakhik, irlirli waganhidek weakhogon hagarogo ’bigik, hagakhe lageikha iti. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, wakhunem watlatluk ebe agat oba yoma welageidek iti nen, akhuni aperek nen at nen itago meke hasik inabok ekhe dogosak dek aga o, ”\rq (Yesaya 53:7-8)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisikhemo werekma etaga thalhe lageikhe iti.
44008034	Itithogon etaga thalhe lageikhesik, ap etnogo nen Filipus men yogokhikhe, “Wene yi, at ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke iti nen isikhe iti, at ekaerek hasik isikhe a? At he, ap ageikhe hasik isikhe a. Hat nen wene hutukhogon yoknom, nagarlak, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44008035	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Filipus nen hano wene Yesus hagakhe lageikhe wene yakulisigiluk, wene erlo holal waganek iti baga nen pilinerogo yogorik usasikhe.
44008036	Yogorik motok holagarlem usekhe dogolik, i werekma usasukhasik, ap kok etnogo nen, “I werek yi ’bikhan. An ima usa’anusak apekhe lagei. E a? At he, ki meke aban welagei apegen, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, [
44008037	at Filipus nen, “Noe. Hetaiken opakiat dogolik, Yesus oba hakotdegetik welagan halok he, ima usa’agousagat o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at ap etnogo nen, “At Yesus Kristus iti, eberogonat Allah a’burat o, iluk nakla apigi, ” iluk yogokhikhe. ]
44008038	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, atuaneke meke nen kereta oto hakene kuda nen lisogo wolok usasikhe meke iti eranogo huk asuagaluk yogokhikhesik, Filipus ipisagat i aik oba usasukhasik, ima ukiluk usa’isikhe.
44008039	Ima usa’isikhesik, yipitla dukhi agunem, at Allah Agoreke nen, Filipus etnogo hapokhogon wolok o ninmo ’bi ageikhemo, at ap kok etnogo nen Filipus ebe yabokane ileken higidek. Itithogon higidek meke re, akla arleken akhilik holagarlemke usasigiluk usasikheke etnogo piokthek usasikhe.
44008040	Nen, at Filipus Allah Agoreke nen hapokhogon wolok o Asdod etoma ’bi ageikhemo dogolik, obabut hebelageikhesik, o etoma nen o ukul emenogo tha’bokhogonat umake ya ukigik, ta ukigik, wene hano wene yogeisilik, o kota Kaisarea dagei ageikhe.
44009001	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, at Saulus etnogo akla aga dageiluk nen, akhuni ninoe Etagapogot ane waganhukha meke emenogo inasigiluk inabok palhe lageikhesik, it ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok meke oba lageikhesik nen men yogokhikhe,
44009002	“Noe. An o Damsyik dageiluk nen, it akhuni aperekYesus ane waganhe dogolik oporlik liliogei meke aperek werek halok, humi dek, ap dek, heageinabiluk nen, iniki herle warogo wogosik Yerusalem yoma ’bisasik nen, it akhuni Yahudi meke o kota Damsyik etoma o sembayan egarekma tomok natogorliogei meke inobasik surat ageikhe waganogo woknom o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44009003	Itithogon yogokhikhemo wogokhikhemo nen, waga lageikhesik, o kota Damsyik etoma horokhogon ukigin hak, opaki hasigat pogot oba nen at aliluke a’bi’bal liarogo yasi usa’ageikhe.
44009004	Yasi usa’agunem, at Saulus etnogo agat oba elokhoken thogoumhogo wilasi usasikhe. Usasinem, ane ka nen heat yogokhe dogolik, “Saulus. Saulus. Anat yi aik ti aik hagatnabigiluk muknarik nekhe lagan iti nenaluk? ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44009005	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Saulus nen, “Noe. Hat hebe tha? ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at nen, “An Yesus. Hat nen yi aik ti aik hagatnabigiluk muknarik nekhe lagan meke etnogoat o.
44009006	Hebe melatluk nen, o kota ithi lalok ukino. Ukisinem ap ageikhe nen, Hat itithogon hagatno, iluk yokhesigin meke werek o, ” iluk yogokhunem,
44009007	it ap at inom wagoukha meke emenogo inasuk holhukhasik nen, “Ap ebe ki nen ane ekhe, ” iluk inileken hasukha meke, ebe dek nen inakmaken lageikhesik inane usak erlok dek ageikhemo huk agoukha.
44009008	Itithogon werek korlek, at Saulus etnogo melatluk, ileken ’bekelageikhe meke re, yi meke ti meke ileken lakhausak motok erlok dek ageikhe. Itithogon erlok dek ageikhemo, iki hak-hak o Damsyik wolok ukisukha.
44009009	Wolok ukisukhama, iki henagan dogolik, yi meke ti meke ileken higidegat, hipiri men, i men, nikidek motok welageikhe.
44009010	Werek korlek, o Damsyik etoma ap ageikhe ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ane waganhikhe meke etaga Ananias welageikhe. Werekma, ninoe Etagapogot nen, a’bikaka oba men yogokhikhe, “Ananias, ” iluk ane hakhasinem, at nen, “O? Noe. Nebe yi welagei, ” iluk isikhe.
44009011	Isikhemo, ninoe Etagapogot nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hebe metokhogon melatluk, holak etaga Mot holak iliogei itike lano. Lalok nen, o ap Yudas werekma uki lalok, hat nen, Ap etaga Saulus, ai Tarsus meke etnaga, yoma werek a? iluk hinok wogeisan o. At ebe sembayan iliogo etnaga.
44009012	Sembayan itithogon isinem, at a’bikaka men hekhemo. Hat Ananias hebe, at oba uki lalok nen, ileken ’bekelasuagaluk hiki oba thebelhunem a’bikaka hekhemo etnaga, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44009013	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Ananias nen, “I noe. Akhuni nen, Ap iti nen, hat ha’buri o Yerusalem meke yi aik ti aik hagarinabiogo, iluk inebe doalegat nen isinem abok nasuk holhirikmo nen,
44009014	yogotak o yoma witluk nen, akhuni hat hetaga palogo hayoko ’biliogei meke tha’bokhogonat, iniki herle wasuagaluk, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek emenogo nen yogokhama wagasik werek iti, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44009015	Itithogon yogokhikhe mekeat he, ninoe Etagapogot nen, “Lan o. At nen akhuni itikmanke meke men, inougi inetagapogot meke men, akhuni Israel meke men, an netaga yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk, an nen ap iti ebe wenago ayoko ’bigima o.
44009016	Itithogon ayoko ’bigirikmo at nen netaga itithogon yogeisilik nukhunem, at yi aik ti aik hekhe dogosak obaat hekhe dogogin meke, an nen yogosigin werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44009017	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Ananias etnogo lageikhesik nen, uma ukisikhesik, iki Saulus oba thebelhe dogolik nen, men yogokhikhe, “Saulus, nagarlak. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus, hat o yoma wisigiluk holagarlem oba wagunem, helokhoma melagama, hileken hegen meke etnaga nen, hat hileken ’bekelageik, Allah Agoreke hakla kerlekhogon uki ageik, hagasuagaluk la’ani agama wagei o, ”
44009018	iluk yogokhunem eranogoat, at ileken oba dekelek welageikhe meke etnogo eranogoat, ’bukakhogon usasikhesik nen, ileken hano ageikhe. Hano ageikhesik nen, ebe melageikhemo, ima usa’isikhe.
44009019	Ima usa’isikhemo nen, hipiri nalok obatne ageikhe. At Saulus etnogo o Damsyik dogolik, akhuni ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ane waganhukha meke inom iniki pererlagat welagoukha.
44009020	Itithogon welagoukha itinemat, o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukisikhesik, wene Yesus hasik yogeisekhe dogolik, “At Yesus iti, ebe Allah a’burat o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhe.
44009021	Yogeisugunem, it akhuni inasuk holhe lagoukha meke iti, inebe tha'bokhogonat inayuk ageikhesik nen, “Ap yi o Yerusalem dogolik, akhuni tha’bokhogonat at Yesus iti etaga palogo ayoko ’biliogei meke inebe motok wuleleken tagalogo degetdisagaluk hagakhe laga etnogo ebe yi dek nogo? Ebe yiat apigi. At yoma witluk nen, it Yesus etaga paliogei meke iti, iniki herle warogo, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek meke inoba wogosik lagaluk waga dek nogo? Nayuk e, ” iluk hogorakhe lagoukha.
44009022	Hogorakhe korlek, at Saulus nen, ane obatnerogonat inakla kagalhe dogolik, men yogeisekhe lageikhe, “Allah nen, Ap ageikhe tilhinabuagaluk la’isigin, iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogo ebe Yesus itiat o, ” iluk wene pakhogon yogeisugunem, eberogonat ageikhemo nen, it akhuni Yahudi meke o Damsyik welagoukha meke etoma nen oko nena u heat inobakha palaga lageikhe.
44009023	Itithogon dogolik, iniki doalegat welagoukhasik nen, Saulus ebe wasuogoluk abok limago palhukha.
44009024	Itithogon abok palhukhama mekeat, it akhuni aperek nen Saulus husupi yogokhukhama at ilu ageikhe. Itithogon ilu werek korlek, ap emenogo nen at ebe leget ’bakleget ape palekma dukhisinem, wasuogoluk hibakone dikagane akorlem kagalek motok welagoukha.
44009025	Kagalek werek korlek, it akhuni Saulus ane waganhe lagoukha meke nen, o hibako iniki ageikhe baga, at ebe mul yago meke akla ukhatdiluk nen, o leget ’bakleget isade uanat halek oba ape ageikhe upu baga herlelek werekma ula’iluk nen, kupi kilogo leget akhane usa’isukha.
44009026	Itithogon usa’isukhama, at Saulus o etoma nen o kota Yerusalem usalok nen, it akhuni aperek Yesus ane waganhe lagoukha meke inom opakimo dapukhogon dogouogoluk walhasikhe mekeat he, it tha’bokhogonat nen, “At eberogonat Yesus ane waganhikhesik nen iliogo, ” iluk hutdigidek nen, at ebe inayuk welagoukha.
44009027	Itithogon werek korlek, at Barnabas nen Saulus ebe waganhikhesik wolok nen, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inoba lageikhe. Wolok lageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Dek o. Ap yi, holagarlemke laga dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot ileken hekhemo, at nen wene itithogon yogokhemo nen, at ebe o Damsyik dogolik, Yesus etaga palogo wene ayuk degat pakhogon yogeisekhe laga meke wolok wagei o, ” iluk pilinogo yogeisasikhe.
44009028	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at it inom hano anek o Yerusalem ya ta nekhe dogolik, ayuk degat ninoe Etagapogot etaga palogo wene pakhogonat yogeisekhe lageikhe.
44009029	Yogeisekhe dogolik, it aperek inebe Yahudi mekeat he, inane Yunani inane ekhe lagoukha meke wene yogeisugunem, it nen hinok waganhunem, oko yogeisigik isinem, ebe wasuogoluk walhekhe lagoukha.
44009030	Wasuogoluk walhekhe korlek, it Allah a’buri it-it inagarlak lak inerugi inom opakiat meke aperek nen, Saulus ebe o Kaisarea wolok wagoukhasik nen, etoma nen o Tarsus dageisuagaluk la’i agoukha.
44009031	Itithogon hagakhukhama, yabokane nen, it akhuni Allah a’buri o propinsi Yudea meke men, o Galilea meke men, Samaria meke men, weagarinakhidek hogot walek motok welagoukha. Werekma, Allah Agoreke nen yomageisugunem, inetaiken horle ageik, ninoe Etagapogot inayukhogon welageik, hagakhe dogolik, inebe doalegat wiak-wayakhogon hagatlaga lagoukha.
44009032	Nen, at Petrus nen Allah a’buri meke o yi ai ti ai ileken hisilik laga lageikhe. Itithogon laga lageikhesik iki ageikhe baga, it Allah a’buri o Lida welagoukha meke ileken hisa usasikhe.
44009033	Usasikhesik nen, ap ageikhe etaga Eneas. O haganeat nen isok aborlok dek motok dogolik, mo dageigik usigik hagakhe korlek 8 tahun witik motogat welageikhe meke, itithogonat werekma, ileken hasikhe.
44009034	Ileken halok nen, men yogokhikhe, “Eneas nagarlak. Yesus Kristus nen hano hagathakhe o. Halok he, melatluk nen, hebe talogo noge ekhe lagan meke ethoma dikilogo ’bin o, ” iluk yogokhe korlek, eranogoat metokhogon melageikhe.
44009035	Melageikhemo nen, it akhuni o Lida meke men, o Saron meke men, welagoukha meke tha’bokhogonat inileken halok nen, “Eberogonat, ” iluk inobabut hebelatluk inelokhe dagakhogon ninoe Etagapogot wogokhukha.
44009036	O Yope etoma, he ageikhe etaga Tabita welageikhe.
44009037	Itithogon hagakho werekma, itinem ebe u warek welageikhesik nen ebe watlageikhemo ebema i thobalogo henaipu ’bi dageisukha.
44009038	Itithogon 'bi dageisukhasik werek korlek, o Yope etoma nen, o Lida iti horogatma, it akhuni aperek nen, “Petrus ebe o Lida wagasik werek o, ” iluk isinem, it akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke emenogo inasuk holhukhasik nen, it ap inebe pere Petrus ayoko loagaluk, men yogeisasukha, “Hit lalok Petrus men yogotno, Noe. Hebe erapigat welageidek ninom ibat luok o, iluk yogotno, ” iluk lia’isa agoukhama dagei agoukhasik, yogokhukhama, at Petrus nen,
44009039	“I o. Halok he, usauwok ta, ” iluk inom usasukha. Usasukhasik nen, Petrus ebe wolok henaipu inom dageisukha. Henaipu dageisukhasik werekma, it humi thoge meke at oba horokhogon natogosi agoukhasik, de aga dogolik, su akmanke meke dek, itikmanke uan meke dek, he Dorkas iluk oba inom dogolik, ikhogo ’bisasikhe meke inuguthasukha.
44009040	Inuguthasukhama, at Petrus nen inebe tha’bokhogonat ula’isalok, itibagal yukukhogon sembayan iluk nen, elokhe hebenokhogon warek etnogo wogokhikhesik nen, “Tabita. Melasin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe. Yogokhunem, eranogoat ileken ’bekelageikhesik nen, Petrus ebe ileken halok melageikhesik aloke tagakhogon hurek lageikhe.
44009041	Hurek lageikhemo, at Petrus nen iki hago meldiluk nen, itAllah a’buri aperek men, humi thoge meke emenogo men, waisasikhemo ukisukhama, “At ebe iluk aga yi, ” iluk wogeisasikhe.
44009042	Wogeisasikhemo nen, wene hagatlageikhe iti, it akhuni o Yope etoma meke inebe tha’bokhogonat inilu agoukhasik nen, inebe doalegat inetaiken ninoe Etagapogot Yesus oba hakotdisukha.
44009043	Itithogon hakotdisukhama, at Petrus etnogo o Yope etoma dogolik, ap Simon ’bagei oado sapi oado karogo pugutdekhe lageikhe meke iti aila ipisak iniki doalegat welagoukha.
44010001	O Kaisarea etoma ap opaki doalek tentara meke etaga ap Italia opaki doalek iluk ekhe lagoukha meke ap ageikhe inoe kok meke etaga Kornelius welageikhe.
44010002	At ebe men, a’buri men, Allah ayukhogon dogolik hogorakhe lagoukha. Hogorakhe dogolik it akhuni Yahudi meke emenogo aperek inameke dek meke kokhogon yomageisekhe dogolik, sembayan huk ageidek isi motok welageikhe.
44010003	Itithogon isi motok dogolik, iki ageikhe baga, o mo korok i laga korlek jam 3 hakene, a’bikaka men hasikhe. Malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe usa’ageikhesik Kornelius oba ukisikhesik nen, “Kornelius, ” iluk ane hakhasikhe.
44010004	Ane hakhasinem, at Kornelius ileken at oba tek-tek ’birogo dogolik, ayuk ageikhesik nen, “I, noe. Nenaluk, ” iluk isikhemo, at nen he, “Dek o. Hat sembayan igik, akhuni inameke dek meke yomageisigik, hagakhe lagan iti nen, Allah ilu agasik hoba eberek werek o.
44010005	O yogotak o Yope etoma ap ageikhe opakiat meke etaga pere. Ageikhe Simon igik, ageikhe Petrus igik, iliogei meke etnaga wisuagaluk, ap ageikhe at ayoko la’isano o.
44010006	At ebe ap huso wagasik nen, ap Simon ’bagei oado sapi oado karogo pugutdekherek meke etnaga aila i laut kok yekelekma alilu etoma werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44010007	Arat yogotluk nen, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke etnogo dukhisikhesik dageisikhemo, at Komelius nen, atuaneke uma welageikharek meke inebe pere men, ap ageikhe ebe tentara, ekeragun meke Allah ebe hogorakhe dogolik Komelius wolok nekhe lageikhe meke iti men, waisasikhe.
44010008	Waisasikhesik la’isagaluk hagakhe dogolik, wene a’bikaka hasikhe wene etnogo yogeisalok nen, o Yope la’isasikhe.
44010009	La’isasikhemo, it etnogo hubenke holagarlem lagoukhasik o Yope horogat ukuogoluk laga korlek, at Petrus etnogo dikene jam 12 sembayan igiluk o warleke thabia talekma dagegarekma dageisikhe.
44010010	Dageisikhesik sembayan isi dogolik, hipiri abu ageikhemo, akhuni aperek nen hipiri noagaluk uma aban werakhe korlek, a’bikaka men hasikhe.
44010011	Pogot hialogo, su kain hakene kok meke ukut 4 ugu meke kilogo agat oba usa’i agunem ileken hasikhe.
44010012	Su kain iti akla, agat oba welagarek meke, yi warn ti warn, yi warlo ti warlo inom, pogot obake hitluk nekherek meke, yi thue ti thue inom, tha’bokhogonat ukharlek welageikhe.
44010013	Werekma Allah nen tha ane heat yogokhe dogolik, “Petrus. Hebe melatluk nen ethoma warogo nan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44010014	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Petrus nen, “Dek o. Noe. An usa meke men, yoalhidek welagarek meke men, ’bugurlagat halok nikidegat welagarek, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44010015	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, ane etnogo nen yogokhikhesik, ageikhe yabokane yogokhe dogolik, “Allah nen, Hano nausak, iluk ekhe halok, hat nen, Usa, nausak dek, iluk hakla apugun o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44010016	Iki pere baga itithogon yogokhikhesik, ageikhe yogotluk nen, kain etnogo pogot oba nen lisogo waganhikhemo apuke dageisikhe.
44010017	Dageisikhemo at Petrus nen, “Na’bikaka higi iti ebe nena meke heat, ” iluk obakha palageikhesik akla ebekho werekma, it ap Kornelius nen la’isasikhe meke emenogo lagoukhasik, akhuni aperek yogeisekhe dogolik, “Simon aila ki, ” iluk hinok waganhukhama, it nen, “Aila ithi, ” iluk isukhama, holagape baga arat ukisukha.
44010018	Ukisukhasik inane uma kola’isukhama, inebedukhisukhama men yogeisasukha, “Ap huso meke etaga Simon Petrus etnaga ebe yoma wagasik hinom welagap a? Dek a, ” iluk hinok waganhukha.
44010019	Hinok waganhunem, at Petrus etnogo a’bikaka hasikhe meke etnogo, “Ebe nena meke higi, ” iluk akla ebekhoat werekma, Allah Agoreke nen, “Ap inebe henagan meke herakhabik wageikhasik werek o.
44010020	Halok he, hat hebe metokhogon usalok, it iti an nenat la’isa ageima wageikha iti nen, Ninom lausak erlok dek, iluk, hakla wene munini ebekhidek hinom lano, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44010021	Yogokhikhemo, at Petrus inoba usasikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nebe heraknabik wagap iti, an nebe yi o. Hit nikithogon nen wagap, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44010022	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Ap tentara meke opaki doalharek meke inoe kok etaga Kornelius, iti nen la’inani agama wago. At iti obabut mothogon hagakhik, Allah ebe ayukhogo welageik, hagakherek iluk, it akhuni Yahudi meke tha'bokhogonat nen obabut palharethek nen, itithogonat abok hano egarek. At iti itithogonat hagakhunem, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe nen, Petrus iti nen wene hat hasuk holusak meke yokhesigin werek o, iluk hat hayoko la’inani isuagaluk yogokhemo, at nen la’inani agama hoba wago o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44010023	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at nen, “Halok he, an ninom noge uok nen, ukitni, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Yogeisasikhemo noge iluk nen, hubuluke iniluk atluk nen, it Allah a’buri o Yope etoma meke inomat wagoukha.
44010024	Waga dogolik, holagarlem iniki opakiat noge iluk nen, o Kaisarea wagoukha. Waga korlek, at Kornelius inelokhoma dogolik, at ougi agarumi men, at agarlak lak erugi at inom ekayo meke men, inayoko ’bisikhemo, tha’bokhogonat natogokhukhasik werekma wagoukha.
44010025	Wagoukhasik nen, at Petrus ebe uma ukigiluk hagakhunem, at Kornelius nen at ebe waganhikhesik itibagal yukukhogon Petrus apma thoma iluk hogorakhikhe.
44010026	Itithogon hogorakhikhe mekeat he, at Petrus nen, “Dek o. Noe. Melasin. An nebe akhuni mekeatma, itithogon hogotnabusak dek o, ” iluk iki hago meldisikhe.
44010027	Meldisikhesik nen, ipisagat wenekak ilik-ilik uma ukisukhasik, akhuni doalegat natogosi agoukhasik werekma at Petrus ileken hisasikhe.
44010028	Ileken hisilik, men yogeisasikhe, “Nit akhuni Yahudi meke hit akhuni itikmanke meke ninom hunikhik, nit hinoba ukigik, hagasusak dek iluk, wene palek welagarek iti hinilu. Itithogon meke re, at Allah nen, Akhuni aperek meke iti, inom dogosak usa maga, iluk hagasusak dek o, iluk yakulnekhemo,
44010029	hit nen nayoko la’isegep na’it igidegat wagei o. Wagei meke re, wene ageikhe hinok wokhisak. Wene ebe nikithogon nen nayoko la’isegep, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44010030	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, at Kornelius nen, “Uahe mo korok i laga korlek, jam 3 baga o yigirlinemat an sembayan naila igi.
44010031	Sembayan itithogon isinem, ap ageikhe asu a’bi’bal weak ugu meke an nilhanemat melasi usa’aga. Melasi usa’agasik nen, “Kornelius. Hat sembayan egetek iti, Allah asuk holhemo. Nen, akhuni inameke dek meke yomageisekhethek iti, Allah nen hoba eberek weregat o.
44010032	O Yope etoma ap etaga Simon Petrus ayoko loak nen ap ageikhe la’isan o. At ebe, ap huso mekeat wagasik nen, ap etaga Simon, ’bagei oado sapi oado karogo pugurakherek meke etnaga aila i laut kok yekelekma aik oba etoma werek etnaga o, iluk yoknekhe.
44010033	Iti nenat, an niki ageikhe welageidegat, ap ageikhe hayoko hoba la’isigima, hat hobabut hano nen huk ageidek hano wagan, noe. Nit tha’bokhogonat yogotak Allah il oba welago yoma re, ninoe Etagapogot nen, Wene yogeisano, iluk yokhekhe meke, wene iti tha’bokhogonat ninasuk holuogoluk welago, noe, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44010034	At Petrus nen wene erlo baga nen yogeisekhe dogolik, “At Allah obabut, akhuni inoado baga anek ileken hisalok, aperek elokhoma ’bisigik, aperek oporlike ’bisigik, hagakherek dek, iluk yogotak nen hutdigi.
44010035	Akhuni inukuloak etaga ya meke ta meke at ebe inayuk dogolik inobabut mothogonhagakharek meke woginakherek anek higi o.
44010036	Meke re, nit akhuni tha’bokhogonat ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus nen dapukhogon ’binanuagaluk, wene hano wene iti, ebe nit akhuni Yahudi meke ninoba la’i ageikhe iti hinilu o.
44010037	-
44010038	Wene ebe hagatlageikhe iti, at Yohanes nen ima usa’inakhe dogolik, wene ima usa’inakharek wene iti yogeisekhe lageikhesikmo nen, at Yesus ai Nazaret meke iti, Allah nen Agoreke oba usa’i ageik, obatne wogokhik, hagakhikhesik, ipisak welageikhe iti nen, alebageik o Galilea eloke etoma nen, o akhuni Yahudi meke inai yi ai ti ai etoma laga dogolik, yi meke ti meke hanorogo hagakhik, it aperek Iblis nen a’bethogon hagasik welageikhe meke hano hagarinakhik, hagarik nekhe lageikhe iti hiniluat o.
44010039	Akhuni Yahudi meke inaila o yi ai ti ai etoma inom, o kota Yerusalem halekma etoma inom, nekhe dogolik, tha’bokhogonat hagakhe lageikhe meke iti, nit ninileken hasugu. Itithogon mekeat, at ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukha iti.
44010040	Itithogon wakhukha mekeat he, iki pere warek werekma, iki ageikhe baga, Allah nen ilugutdisikhesik nen, ebe akhuni nen inileken hoagaluk winametdisikhe iti.
44010041	Itithogon winametdisikhe mekeat he, akhuni tha’bokhogonat inileken higidek. Alebat at Allah nen, It inebe etaat inileken hoak o, iluk wenakninakhikhe meke anek, at Yesus ebe warek werekma Allah nen ilugutdisikhemo, nit at ebe ninom dogolik hipiri men, i men, ninomat nasugu.
44010042	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, nit nen akhuni wene yogeisilik laga dogolik, Akhuni tha’bokhogonat, watlagoukha meke men, iniluk werek meke men, ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasuagaluk, Allah nen Yesus at meldisikhe, iluk, hutukhogon yogeisilik laga dogoagaluk ninayoko ’bisikhe.
44010043	At Yesus hasik, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogotha’bokhogonat nen, abok ekhe dogolik, men isukha, At ebe wagunem he, it akhuni weak hagakharek meke inetaiken at oba hakotdugun meke inebe dopok, it weakhagariogei meke iti, at Allah nen at Yesus etaga baga thagalogo degetdisagein o, iluk yogeisekhe lagoukha, ” iluk at Petrus nen yogeisasikhe.
44010044	At Petrus nen wene iti aban yogeisekho werekma, Allah Agoreke it akhuni wene iti inasuk holhe lagoukha meke emenogo inebe tha’bokhogonat inoba duk usa’ageikhe.
44010045	-
44010046	Itithogon usa’ageikhemo, it akhuni Yahudi meke wene eberogonat iluk waganhukha meke Petrus inom o Yope nen wagoukhasik werekma, Allah nen Agoreke itithogon it inoba usa’i ageikhemo, horlasukhasik, wene it ninat meke inane inokodek meke baga elalinat igik, Allah hogorakhik, hagakhunem, inileken higik, inasuk holhik, hagakhukhasik nen, men isukha, “Allah nen Agoreke it akhuni itikmanke meke erlogat wogeisekhemo higi. Nayuk e, ” iluk hogorakhukha. Itithogon hogorakhukhama, at Petrus nen, men yogeisasikhe,
44010047	“Lakhani. It yi Allah Agoreke nit woknisasikhe iti hagat, it wogeisekhemo horlega iti. Halok he, tha nen, It ima usageinabusak dek, iluk wene palusak apegep. Erlok usageinabusagat o, ”
44010048	iluk yogeisasikhesik, Yesus Kristus etaga palogo ima usa’inabuagaluk, it aperek yogeisasikhemo usa’inakhukha. Itithogon usa’inakhukhama it inaierek meke nen, at Petrus yogokhe dogolik, “Noe. Hiki pererlagat ageikhe ninom dogoluk nen lanok o, ” iluk ayoko ’bisukhama inom welagoukha.
44011001	It akhuni aperek nen he, “It akhuni itikmanke meke Allah ane waganha o, ” iluk isukhama, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhemeke emenogo men, Allah a’buri o Yudea meke men, inasuk holhukha.
44011002	Itithogon holhukhasik werekma nen, at Petrus ebe yabokane Yerusalem usasinem, it akhuni inoado aperlagap palek dogolik inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha meke emenogo nen wenagakhukha.
44011003	Wenagakhe dogolik, “Hat hebe it akhuni inoado aperlagap palek dek meke inoba lagatik nen, hipiri hinom opakimo neke lagasip wagan iti nenaluk, ” iluk wenagakhukha.
44011004	Itithogonwenagakhukhama, at Petrus nen wene erloma nenat pilinerogo men yogeisasikhe,
44011005	“An o Yope etoma sembayan ekhe dogolik, na’bikaka oba men higi. Su kain kok ukut pere nen pere ugu meke herle kilogo pogot oba nen nalilu usa’i agunem na’bikaka hekhe dogolik nileken higi.
44011006	Itithogon higirik, nileken hanorogon kolakhigi hak, su kain iti akla agat oba welagarek meke yi wam ti wam, yi ’bagei ti ’bagei, yi warlo ti warlo, nen, pogot oba hitluk nekharek meke, yi thue ti thue tha’bokhogonat ukharlek werekma nileken higi.
44011007	Itithogon hasinem, at Allah nen, tha ane heat yoknekhe dogolik, Petrus. Hebe melatluk ethoma warogo nan o, iluk yoknekhe.
44011008	Itithogon yoknekhe mekeat, an nen he, Dek o. Noe. Usa meke men, yoalhidek welagarek meke men, ’bugurlagat halok an napema ageikhe motok kolakhidek o, iluk yogokhi.
44011009	Itithogon yogokhi meke re, at ane etnogo yabokane pogot oba nen men yoknekhe, Allah nen, Hano, nausak, iluk ekhe meke halok, hat nen, Usa, nausak dek, iluk hakla apugun o, iluk yoknekhe.
44011010	Itithogon iki pere baga yoknekhesik ageikhe yoknetluk nen, yabokane yi meke ti meke iti tha’bokhogonat pogot oba nen apuke lekhogo lia’ekhe.
44011011	Itinem, ap inebe henagan o Kaisarea nen la’isa ageikhama, o an ap huso werekma wageikha.
44011012	Wageikhama nen, Allah Agoreke nen an men yoknekhe, Ninom lausak erlok dek, iluk hakla wene munini ebekhidegat, hinom lano o, iluk yoknekhe. Itithogon yoknekhemo nen, it Allah a'buri o Yope meke inebe 6 oba wageikhasik yoma werek yi ninomat o Kaisarea lago. Lagosik, nit tha'bokhogonat ap Kornelius aila ukogo.
44011013	Ukogosikmo, at Kornelius nen he, An ya werekma nen, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe uma yoma usa'agasik metek werekma nileken higi. At yoma metek dogolik, wene men yoknekhe, Ap ageikhe etaga Simon Petrus o Yope etoma werek etnaga yoma wisuagaluk, ap ageikhe at ayoko la'isano.
44011014	At nen hat hebe men, hoe hagot men, ha'buri men, Allah nen tilhinabuagaluk, wene yokhisagein meke werek o, iluk yoknekhe, iluk ekhe.
44011015	Ekhemo nen, an wene yogeisoagaluk erlo baga aban isi werekma, Allah Agoreke ebekeram nit ninoba usa'ageikhe iti hak, it yabokane inoba usa'aga iti.
44011016	Inoba usa'agama nen, ninoe Etagapogot nen wene men iluk isikhe meke nakla ebekhi, Yohanes nen ima usa'inageikhe meke re, Allah nen Agoreke hinoba usa'isigin o, iluk isikhe meke iti oba ebekhi.
44011017	Ninetaiken ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus oba hakotdisinem, Agoreke it dek, nit dek, ninom tak-tagat woknisekherek iti. Halok he, Allah nenat itithogon woknisugunem, an nen, It wogeisekhe 'buk, iluk wene palusak nogo? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44011018	At Petrus nen itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen wenagakhe lagoukha etnogo, yabokane thogotdiluk men isukha, “Halok he, Allah obabut hano nen, nit hagatninakherek hagat, it akhuni itikmanke meke inobabut hebelagunem iniluk motok dogoagaluk erlok hagarinabusagat higi, ” iluk Allah hogorakhukha.
44011019	At Stefanus etnogo ebe wakhukhasik nen, Allah a'buri yi aik ti aik hagarinakhe dogolik, sigisik-mugisik hagakhe lagoukhama, lo o propinsi Fenisia men, Siprus men, kota Antiokhia men, wagoukhasik, wene it akhuni Yahudi meke anek yogeisekhe lagoukha.
44011020	It itithogon hagakhe lagoukha mekeat, it aperek inom lo lagoukha meke inai, o Siprus meke men, o Kirene meke men, o kota Antiokhia wagoukhasik, wene hano wene ninoe Etagapogot Yesus hagakhikhe wene iti, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Yunani meke yogeisasukhaat.
44011021	Itithogon yogeisugunem, ninoe Etagapogot inomat dogolik, obatnerogon yomageisugunem akhuni inebe doalegat nen, “Wene iti eberogonat higi, ” iluk waganiluk nen, inobabut hebelogo inelokhe at wogokhukha.
44011022	Itithogon hagakhukhama, it akhuni aperek nen, “It Yesus ane waganhasik, inobabut hebelha o, ” iluk inabok ekhe lagoukhama it Allah a'buri, o Yerusalem natogokhe lagoukha meke emenogo inasuk holhukhasik nen, at Barnabas ayoko 'biluk, ebe o Antiokhia la'i agoukha.
44011023	-
44011024	At Barnabas iti, obabut hano dogolik, etaiken Yesus oba hakotdiluk motok werekma, Allah Agoreke akla kerlekhogon welageikhe iti nen, la'i agoukhama, wageikhesik ileken hisalok, akla nen, “Allah obabut hano nen hano hagarinakhemo werek higi, ” iluk akla arleken akhasikhe. Akla arleken akhasikhesik, “Hit tha'bokhogonat hinetaiken ninoe Etagapogot oba hakotdiluk, at hinom hunigat motok dogono o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe. Inasuk wakhe lageikhemo, akhuni doalegat, ninoe Etagapogot werekma dapuldiluk inebe wiak-wayakhogon hagatlagoukha.
44011025	Inebe itithogon doalegat aga korlek, at Barnabas yabokane at Saulus ebe herarik, o Tarsus wageikhe.
44011026	Wageikhesik, ebe herago wolok nen, o Antiokhia lageikhe. O etoma lageikhesik, satu tahun dogolik, it ipisak at Allah a’buri inom natogotdiluk, akhuni doalegat wene yakulisekhe lagoukha. It akhuni Yesus ane waganhunem inukuloak etaga Kristen egarek iti, ebekeram o Antiokhia etoma nen inetaga thalinakhukha.
44011027	Itinem he, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke aperek o Yerusalem nen o Antiokhia dagei agoukha.
44011028	It wagoukha iti meke, ap ageikhe etaga Agabus iti, Allah Agoreke nen akla kagalhikhemo, melageikhesik nen men yogeisasikhe, “O yi ai ti ai tha’bokhogonat hipiri no kogat hugun o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Yogeisasikhe iti, ebe ap etaga Klaudius ebe kok dogolik hagasik werekma hagatlageikhe iti.
44011029	Iti hipiri no ebe aban hagatlageidek werek korlek, it akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke emenogo nen he, “Halok he, nit ninebe tomok uang ninikimo aga meke tak-tagat Allah a’buri ninagarlak lak ninerugi o propinsi Yudea etoma natogokharek meke yomageisauwok nen natogorlogo la’uok o, ” iluk wene palhukhasik uang natogokhukha.
44011030	Itithogon natogokhukhasik, Barnabas Saulus ipisak nen, inikimo wolok lalok, it ap Allah a’buri therisik welagoukha meke iniki baga ’bi loagaluk la’isasukha iti.
44012001	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukha itinem he, ap etagapogot Herodes nen Allah a’buri meke aperek weagarinabigiluk hagakhikhe.
44012002	Itithogon hagakhikhesik, at Yohanes oe Yakobus wasuagaluk agarumi yogeisasikhemo karok oba ebe motok wakhukha.
44012003	Itithogon wakhukhama, at Herodes akla nen, “An itithogon hagakhe lagei iti baga, it ap Yahudi meke inakla motok arleken akhega o, ” iluk, yabokane Petrus iki herlewasuagaluk agarumi yogeisasikhemo, pesta roti hikhidek meke nasi korlek, at iki herle wakhukhaat.
44012004	Itithogon wakhukhasik, o akhuni iniki herle warogo ’bisegarekma ’bi lagoukha. ’Bi lagoukhasik nen, ap tentara meke inebe 16 dogolik, alebat inebe 4 nen therogo welageik, yabokane inebe 4 nenat therogo welageik, hagakhe dogoagaluk inayoko ’bisikhesik nen, at Herodes akla nen men apasikhe, “Pesta etaga Paskah, nugun etnogo nalok nen, Petrus wolok akhuni inil oba ukum oba ’bigiluk nen, iki herle waregat dogoak o, ” iluk akla apasikhe.
44012005	At Petrus iki herle warogo kola’iluk werek korlek, it Allah a’buri nen sembayan at obasik huk ageidek hunik-hunigat inetaiken oba nenat motok isi lagoukha.
44012006	Sembayan itithogon isi korlek, at Herodes nen huben hak Petrus ebe waganogo akhuni iniki baga ’bigiluk akla apasikhesik, aban werek korlek, o itinem hibako, ap tentara meke emenogo, it inebe aperek holagapema therogo werek korlek, inebe pere Petrus iki ebelak ebelak herle warek noge isi korlek, it abel ebelak ebelak dogolik herle ilugun iniki baga herogo welagoukha.
44012007	Itithogon werekma, malaikat ninoe Etagapogot nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe koma nen wageikhe heat etoma melasi usa’agunem, o kakok agorekma etnogo motok lia ageikhe. Itithogon lia ageikhemo, at malaikat etnogo nen he, Petrus iluk asuagaluk aborlogotdekhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “Ibat hiluk asin, ” iluk yogokhikhemo melagunem, pisuemaken etnogo iki baga nen abusagat hiakhogon usasikhe.
44012008	Usasinem, at malaikat etnogo nen, men yogokhikhe, “Therlok ikhik, hisok agot ikhik, hagasin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe. Itithogon yogokhikhemo ikhikhemo, at malaikat etnogo nen, “Su itikmanke meke ikhogo nen, noporlik eme o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo
44012009	oporligat dukhisikhe. Dukhisi dogolik, at malaikat etnogo nen eberogonat hagakhikhe mekeat he, at Petrus obakha palek dogolik, “Na’bikaka hekhe lagei he a, ” iluk akla apasikhe.
44012010	Ap tentara meke inebe akman therogo welagoukha meke emenogo werek korlek, inaliluke dukhigik, aperek inom inaliluke dukhigik, lagoukhasik thu thikmanke o silimo dukhegarekma ebe pisuemaken oba hagarekmadukhuogoluk hagakhunem, thu abusagat hualageikhemo, dukhisukha. Dukhisukhasik nen, holagarlemke laga dogolik, at malaikat etnogo Petrus thogotdiluk koma lageikhe heat nalageikhe.
44012011	Nalageikhemo, at Petrus obabut hebelatluk nen, akla men apasikhe, “I. At Herodes obatne baga haknarek werekma, it akhuni Yahudi meke tha’bokhogonat nen, Itithogon hagasugun, iluk nabok palhe korlegat, malaikat ninoe Etagapogot nen eberogonat yoko usa’i agama herle hisalnakhe higi, ” iluk hutdisikhe.
44012012	Itithogon hutdisikhesik nen, he Maria ap etaga Yohanes Markus iti agosa aila etoma akhuni inebe doalegat natogokhukhasik nen, sembayan isinem lageikhe.
44012013	Lageikhesik nen, thu puputhasinem, it emenogo nen, “Tha nen puputhiliogo, ” iluk horlak inatuaneke meke etaga Rode iti ’bikha dukhi ageikhe.
44012014	Ileken ’bikha dukhi ageikhesik, Petrus ane ekagat hutdiluk, akla arleken nen, thu hualhigidegat here’isalok pirlirli ukisikhesik nen, “Petrus holagapema wagasik werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44012015	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Eiye. Horlak yi hunu-hunu aga higi, ” iluk yogokhukhama, at nen, “Dek o. Eberogonat o, ” iluk ane kikarogonat isikhe. Itithogon isikhemo, it nen, “Halok he, iti malaikat Allah nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo, ageikhe Petrus hasik usa’i aga meke he a, ” iluk isukha.
44012016	Itithogon isi korlek, at Petrus ebe holagapema dogolik, iki nen thu puputhasi motok welageikhe. Puputhasi motok welageikhemo nen, it emenogo nen thu hualogo inileken ulakhasukha nen, Petrus werekma hasukhasik, hogorakhukha.
44012017	Hogorakhunem, at nen, “Hinane ugup o, ” iluk iki lia’isikhe. Iki lia’isikhesik nen, “Niki herle warek werekma, ninoe Etagapogot nen hisalogo ula’ani agama wagei o, ” iluk wene pilinerogo yogeisasikhe. Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, “Yakobus men, ninagarlak lak nerugi Allah a’buri aperek men, wene yi yogeisa lano, ” iluk yogeisalok nen, at ebe o nekalokma lageikhe.
44012018	Itithogon dukhisikhemo, noge iluk hubenke o wi isikhemo nen, it ap tentara Petrus therogo welagoukha meke emenogo nen, “Petrus etnogo ebe ka laga, ” iluk inaneak kogat thagalhukha.
44012019	Inaneak itithogon thagalhukhama, at kok Herodes etnogo nen Petrus ebe herasuagaluk ap aperek yogeisasikhemo herakhukha meke, ebe degat nen he, it ap tentara therogo welagoukha meke emenogo initema waganiluk nen, inebe motok inasuagaluk agarumi aperek inayoko ’bisikhe. Inayoko ’bisikhemo inebe inakhukhama, at Herodes ebe o Yudea nen, kota Kaisarea dagei ageikhesik welageikhe.
44012020	O etoma dogolik, it akhuni o Tirus men, Sidon men, inobasik at Herodes etnogo akla aga apigat dageisikhe. Akla aga apigat dageisikhemo, it tha’bokhogonat inebe dapukhogon nen, “O nit werekma yoma, hipiri ap kok Herodes werekma nen oko palogo hano waganhorethekma, ” iluk ap etagaBlastus, Herodes atuaneke dogolik yi meke ti meke at ai meke iki baga welageikhe meke iti oba lagoukhasik, it werekmake asuagaluk, at tak akla kagalhukha. At tak akla kagalhukhasik nen, yabokane Herodes inom dapuluogoluk oba ukisukhasik yogokhukha.
44012021	Yogokhukhama, at Herodes nen, “Niniki iti baga nen dapulugun, ” iluk iki wenago wene warisasikhe. Wene warisasikhe baga tak-tak ageikhemo, at nen su ap koktek ikharek meke ikhikhesik, wene inasuk wakhe dogolik o talek oba hurek welageikhe baga hurek lageikhesik, inasuk wasigiluk wene erlo ula’isikhe.
44012022	-
44012023	Itithogon ula’isikhesik inasuk wakhunem, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, “Ap yi, ane akhuni inane hakene iliogo dek. At he, walhenak welagarek meke ane hakene iliogo, ” iluk hogorakhukha. Itithogon hogorakhukhama eranogoat malaikat ninoe Etagapogot nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe usa’ageikhesik, “At Allah at hogorakhidek ekaerek hogorakhasikhe iti, ” iluk Herodes ebe wakhikhemo, wako akla ukhatdisikhemo ebe motok watlageikhe.
44012024	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, Allah aneat wiak-wayakhogon hagatlageikhesik, kok ageikhe.
44012025	Itithogon kok aga korlek, it Barnabas Saulus ipisak nen, akhuni Yerusalem meke arat yomageisalok nen, inapuke wisuogoluk, ap etaga Yohanes Markus etnogo wolok wagoukha.
44013001	Allah a’buri o Antiokhia natogokhe lagoukha meke emenogo, it aperek nen Allah ane yogeisigik, it aperek nen yakulisigik, hagakhe lagoukha meke inebe ap ageikhe Barnabas iti, ageikhe Simeon etaga Ebe Mirli ekhe lagoukha meke iti, ageikhe Lukius o Kirene meke iti, ageikheMenahem, Herodes kok gubernur agarlak ipisakkogorinakhukha meke iti, ageikhe Saulus iti, welagoukha.
44013002	Dogolik he, iniki ageikhe baga Allah a’buri inom ninoe Etagapogot apma ukiluk, sembayan uogoluk hipiri nikidek, at hogorakho werekma, Allah Agoreke nen yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit nen, Barnabas Saulus ipisak nen an nobasik hagakhe dogoagaluk, inayoko ’bigima iti nen he, it inebe wenago an nobasik ’banino o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44013003	Yogeisasikhemo nen, hipiri nikidek sembayan ekhe lagoukhasik nen, iniki it Barnabas Saulus ipisak inukuloak thebelogo la’isa agoukha.
44013004	It Bamabas Saulus ipisak Allah Agoreke nen la’isasikhemo, o Seleukia usa’agoukha. Usa’agoukhasik nen, o Seleukia etoma nen, o Siprus i eken palekma imake ku baga wagoukha.
44013005	Wagoukhasik, o Salamis witluk nen, akhuni Yahudi meke o sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukiluk, Allah ane yogeisilik nekhe lagoukha. Yogeisilik nekhe korlek, at ap etaga Yohanes Markus etnogo nen yomageisekhe lageikhe.
44013006	O Siprus eken palekma etoma, o ukul tomok nekhe lagoukhasik nen, yabokane o etaga Papos wagoukha. Wagoukhasik nen, ap Yahudi meke ageikhe etaga Baryesus iti, ebe hathale dogolik, Allah ane thalek ekaerek ane mekeat yogeisekhe lageikhe meke werekma wagoukha.
44013007	O Siprus eken palekma etoma, ap kok gubernur etaiken kagalek meke etaga Sergius Paulus welageikheat. At gubernur iti, at hathale iti agarlak. Dogolik, Sergius nen he, “An Allah ane nasuk holusak warlok, ” iluk, Barnabas Saulus ipisagat inayoko ’bisikhe.
44013008	Itithogon inayoko ’bisikhe mekeat he, ap hathale Baryesus iti, it akhuni Yunani meke inane baga etaga Elimas ekhe lagoukha meke iti nen, ap kok gubernur iti wene waganiluk etaiken Yesus oba hakotdinogo iluk, Barnabas Saulus ipisak inane thagaligiluk hagakhikhe.
44013009	Itithogon thagaligiluk hagakhunem, at Saulus, etaga ageikhe Paulus etnogo nen, Allah Agoreke akla kerlekhogon dogolik ileken Baryesus oba tek-tek hekhe dogolik,
44013010	men yogokhikhe, “Hat hebe Iblis a’but yi re! Akhuni dalinakhik, nukhetdisigik, hagakho motok dogolik, yi meke ti meke mot hagasuogoluk hagakhunem, hat nen degetdigiluk hagakho motok welagan yi re! Ninoe Etagapogot nen, akhuni tilninabigiluk holak mothogon ya’inanhikhe meke, hat nen huk ageidegat korlotdigiluk hagakho motok welagan iti nenaluk.
44013011	Lakhan! Itithogon hagakhe lagan iti nen, ninoe Etagapogot nen ukum hoba ’bekhemo welagan o. Iti re, hat hebe yogotak elanma hasik ya hileken puk atluk nen, mo iti hileken lakhigidek dogogin o, ” iluk yogokhe korlek eranogoat, ileken oisa hakene thebekhogon puk ageikhe. Puk ageikhesik nen, “Tha nen niki hak-hak woknarik ligin he, ” iluk akhuni iki hak herageinabik lageikhe.
44013012	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, ap kok etnogo ileken hasikhesik nen, “Wene ninoe Etagapogot ane iti nayuk e, ” iluk hogoratluk wene iti eberogonat iluk waganhikhe.
44013013	At Paulus lak o Pafos etoma nen ku baga o propinsi Pamfilia kota etaga Perga etoma wagoukha. Wagoukhasik ap etaga Yohanes Markus etnogo, it etoma thogotdisalok yabokane apuke o Yerusalem lageikhe.
44013014	Lageikhemo, it emenogo o Perga etoma nen, o Pisidia eloke kota Antiokhia etoma dagei agoukha. Dagei agoukhasik nen, iniki Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukisukhasik hurek lagoukha.
44013015	Hurek lagoukhasik werekma, it akhuni etoma meke nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo etaga thalhik, wene it apAllah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen holal waganhukha meke etaga thalhik, isukhasik nen, inougi koktek nen Paulus lak yogeisekhe dogolik, “Nagarlak lak. Akhuni yoma inetaiken horle asuak nen, hit nen wene ageikhe werek halok he, yoknisobageik iluk hinayoko ’bogo o, ” iluk isukhama,
44013016	at Paulus ebe melatluk nen, wene yogeisagaluk iki pilin yogeisasikhe. Iki pilin yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit akhuni Israel meke men, hit itikmanke meke Allah ane hologo hagakhe lagap meke men, nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene igin iti hinasuk holini o.
44013017	Nit akhuni Israel meke yoma ninopase Allah nen, ninopa lak inebewenageinakhikhesik nen, inayoko ’bisikhe. Inayoko ’bisikhemo, it o Mesir etoma inebe ap huso negenat werekma, at nen inebe doalegat hagarinakhikhe. Itithogonhagarinakhikhesik nen, at iki obatne baga wogosik dukhi ageikhe iti.
44013018	Wogosik dukhi ageikhemo, it o limo akhuni inebe dekma etoma mo dageigik usigik hagakhe korlek, 40 tahun dogolik, at oba tiok-tha’bokhogonat hagakhe lagoukha mekeat he, at ane degat obakhanini hapugutdiluk hagasik welageikhe.
44013019	Hagasik welageikhesik nen, o Kanaan wogosik uki ageikhesik, akhuni inukuloak etaga 7 baga nen, inebe motogat inakhukhasik nen, it inaagat meke nit ninopa lak iteerek asuagaluk wogeisasikhe.
44013020	Itithogon hagarinabik waga korlek, mo dageigik usigik hagakhe korlek 450 tahun hakene welagoukhasik nen wogeisasikhe iti. Wogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane at Allah nen ap aperek nen initema waganhik, wene yogeisigik, hagakhe dogoagaluk, meldisilik waga lageikhesik hurli, ap Samuel Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo hurliat meldisikhemo welageikhe.
44013021	Hurli iti hurli nen, it akhuni emenogo nen, Ninoe kok etagapogot ageikhe meldusak warlok, iluk Allah kino yogokhukhama, at nen, ap Kis a’but Saul ukuloak etaga Benyamin meke meldiluk wogeisasikhe. Wogeisasikhemo, at ebe mo dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek 40 tahun ebe ap etagapogot welageikhe.
44013022	Werekma Allah nen at Saul usa'iluk nen, obulukmo at Daud etagapogot dogoagaluk, meldiluk wogeisasikhe. Wogeisasikhesik nen, wene at hasik abok ekhe dogolik, Isai a’but Daud yi re, an netaiken hunik meke, an nakla warlok apegerek meke hagasuagalukyogokhunem, tha’bokhogonat hagakhe dogosak higi iti nen wokhisigi o,\rq (1 Samuel 13:14; Mazmur 89:20-21)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe.
44013023	Nen ageikhe, alebat at Allah nen, Hit akhuni Israel meke tilhinabuagaluk, at Daud nen itago meke ageikhe wokhisagein, iluk abok yogeisasikhe iti hagat, ebe Yesus meldiluk wogeisasikhe iti.
44013024	At Yesus ebe yabokane witluk, yabu aban hagakhidek werek korlek, elokhoma Yohanes tak wageikhesik, akhuni Israel meke men yogeisekhe lageikhe, Hit weak hagakhe lagap meke ’bualogo here’isalok hinobabut hebelatni o. Hebelasumo, an nen ima usa’inagagin o, iluk inebe tha’bokhogonat yogeisekhe lageikhe.
44013025	Yogeisekhe lageikhesik, at nen hagasusak meke arat hagakhe lageikhesik, ilugun oba hagasigiluk, men yogeisasikhe, Hit nen an tha apekhe lagap. Hit nen therogo welagap iti, ebe an dek o. Meke re, hinakla eberek dogono. At ebe an noporlik wisigin o. Wagunem, an nebe yekerek. Kok he, arat o. At isok agot yilik meke iti, an nen hisalusak erlok dek o, luk yogeisasikhe.
44013026	Halok he, hit akhuni Abraham nen itago meke men, tikmanke meke Allah ane hologo hagakhe lagap meke yoma ninom welagap meke men, nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene tilninabusak wene iti Allah nen nit ninoba la’i agama yi.
44013027	Wene la’i aga meke iti, it akhuni o Yerusalem meke inougikoktek inom nenat, Yesus ebe hutdigidek. Hutdigidek dogolik, haganeat it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen wene holal waganogo ’bisukha meke waganek werekma, sembayan hibiku-yogoku hagakhe dogolik etaga thalhunem inasuk holharek mekeat he, wene ebe hutdigidek. Itithogon hutdigidek dogolik, ukum Yesus oba ’biluk ebe wakhukha iti baga, wene haganeat isukha meke iti ebeat ageikhe iti.
44013028	It nen, Ukum nikithogon oba ’biluk wasuok, iluk herakhukha meke, wene oba dek ageikhe mekeat, at Pilatus nen wasuagaluk wogokhukha iti.
44013029	At Yesus hasigat, Itithogon hagasugun, iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha meke iti tak-tagat tha’bokhogonat hagakhukhasik, ebe warek o baga nen usa’i agoukhasik nen, oila kola’isukha iti.
44013030	Warek itithogon kola’isukha mekeat, yabokane Allah nen ilugutdisikhe.
44013031	Ilugutdisikhemo, it Yesus inom o Galilea eloke nen o Yerusalem usasukha meke emenogo inileken hoagaluk inelokhoma iki doalegat melaga lageikhe. Itithogon inelokhoma melaga lageikhemo, inileken hasukhasik, it nen, Ebe eberogonat ninileken hogo, iluk yogotak akhuni Israel meke yogeisiliogei iti.
44013032	-
44013033	Yogotak nit nen wene hano wene iti, hit yokhisa ago yi. Allah nen, Itithogon wokhisagein, iluk ninopa lak abok yogeisasikhe iti ebe re, o yogotak nit it nen itago meke welago ya baga Yesus at woknisasikhemo wakhukhama watlageikhemo, Allah nen ilugutdisikhe iti. Itithogon hagasigiluk, etai Mazmur etai nomor 2 baga, Allah nen men isikhe, An na’but he, harat o. Yogotak itakhakhi o,\rq (Mazmur 2:7)\rq* iluk isikhemo nen, holal waganogo ’bisukha tak-tagat hagatlaga o.
44013034	Yesus ebe watlageikhesik werekma, Allah nen ilugutdisikhemo, yabokane watlatluk hirli asigin dek o, iluk wene ageikhe men isikhe, Itithogon hagathabigin, iluk, wene an nekaerek nen iluk nen, yabokane munenigin dek meke eberogonat Daud abok yogokhigi meke iti harat wokhesigin o,\rq (Yesaya 55:3)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe iti.
44013035	Nen, ageikhe at Daud nen Allah men yogokhikhe, Hat hekaerek ha'but hane hologo hagakherek meke iti, hirli atluk dek asuagaluk here’igin dek o,\rq (Mazmur 16:10)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
44013036	At Daud iti, agarlak lak inom tak-tak itaklagoukha meke inom dogolik, Allah nen, Itithogon hagasuak, iluk akla apasikhe meke mothogon hagakhe lageikhesik nen, ebe watlageikhe iti. Watlageikhemo nen, opa lak warek thalinakhukhama inalilu thaldisukhama nen, hirli atluk, dek ageikhe iti.
44013037	Itithogon meke re, at Yesus ebe watlageikhesikmo nen, Allah nen apuke ilugutdisikhe meke iti anek, hirli atluk, dek ageidek o.
44013038	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene yi hinilurogo dogono o. At Yesus Allah nen itithogon ilugutdisikhe iti baga, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti, at nen thagalogo degetdisoagaluk yokhisekhe Iago iti.
44013039	Yi weak ti weak hagakhunem he, wene Allah nen Musa ayoko 'biluk inasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga, korogo wokhausak erlok dek meke re, ninebe tomok ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotdumo anek, erlok korogo wokhausak werek o.
44013040	-
44013041	Meke re, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, men isukha, Hit o yogotak welagap ya baga, an nen yi meke ti meke hagakhunem, at ageikhe nen mothogon yakulhisugunem, hit nen eberogonat iluk hutdigidek dogolikhinakla meanetdekhe lagap meke yi lakhani! An nen itithogon hagakhunem hinileken halok hogorakhe dogolik, hinebe watlakhagun iti!\rq (Habakuk 1:5)\rq* iluk Allah nen isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha iti hak, hit hinoba asinogo iluk, wene hinasuk hanorogo holhe dogono o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44013042	Wene itithogon yogeisalok dukhisinem, it akhuni emenogo nen, “Sembayan yabokane ugun iti baga, wene iti ageikhe inom dagakhogon yoknisausak o, ” iluk Paulus Barnabas ipisak yogeisasukha.
44013043	Yogeisasukhama, it sembayan ekhe lagoukhama nen dukhisukhasik lagunem, it akhuni Yahudi meke men, itikmanke meke Allah ane waganhukhasik Yahudi meke negen welagoukha meke men, inebe doalegat inoporlik lagoukha. Lagoukhama, it Paulus Bamabas ipisak nen men yogeisasukha, “Allah obabut hano nen hagatninakherek meke iti, hinetaiken hunik dogolik hagakhe dogono o, ” iluk inasuk wakhukha.
44013044	Itithogon hagakhukhama, akhuni inasuk holiluk nen, iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik sembayan yabokane isinem, akhuni o ukul etoma welagoukha meke inebe opakitek anek huk aga korlek, inebe tha’bokhogonat ninoe Etagapogot ane inasuk holuogoluk natogokhukha.
44013045	Natogokhukhama, it ap Yahudi meke emenogo akhuni doalegat inileken hisasukhasik ua palogo nen, “Wene Paulus nen iliogo iti hinasuk holusak dek o, ” iluk wene palhik, Paulus lak inane pukhogon wenageisigik, hagakhukha.
44013046	-
44013047	Itithogon hagakhukha mekeat he, it Paulus Bamabas ipisagat inayuk dekhogonat dogolik, men isukha, “Allah ane iti hit tak yokhisausak obaat yokhisa ago mekeat, hit hina’it nen here’isegesip, hinekaerek nen, Nit naburlal-haburlal hagatninabusak erlok dek o, iluk u hagat, ekhe lagap iti nen, nit ninoe Etagapogot nen ninayoko ’bekhe dogolik yoknisasikhe hagat, hagasugun. At nen, An nen akhuni itikmanke meke liarinakhik, o ilugun oba werek meke tilinakhik, hagasigiluk, isagal yibarlek hakene, hit hinebe ’binagagi o,\rq (Yesaya 42:6; 49:6)\rq* iluk yoknisasikhe tak-tagat, it akhuni itikmanke meke yogeisa lugun o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44013048	Itithogon yogeisugunem, it akhuni itikmanke meke inasuk holhukhasik nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot nen wene iti hano motok isikhemo higi, ” iluk hogorakhukhasik inakla arleken akhasukha.
