Inakla arleken akhalok nen, Allah nen it naburlal-haburlal hagarinabigiluk wenageinakhikhe meke nen, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk hutdisukhasik waganhukha.
44013049	Itithogon waganhukhama nen, o etoma ninoe Etagapogot ane iti wialarik dukhisikhe.
44013050	Itithogon wialarik dukhisinem, it akhuni Yahudi meke nen, humi ap itikmanke meke inagugi koktek Allah ane waganhukha meke men, it ap o ukul kokma etoma inetaga werek koktek welagoukha meke men, inom nen Paulus Barnabas ipisak mugisoagaluk inakla kagalhukha. Itithogon inakla kagalhukhama, it nen, “Hit nit ninaila yoma dogosak dek o, ” iluk mukhogo ula’isasukha.
44013051	Ula’isasinem, it Paulus Barnabas ipisak nen, inakla eberek dogoagaluk, “Hinoba dopok, ” iluk inisok hola horogo la’isalok nen, o Ikonium uki lagoukha.
44013052	Uki lagoukhama, akhuni o Antiokhia etoma meke Yesus ane waganhukha meke Allah Agoreke inakla kerlekhogon ukisikhemo inakla arleken kogat akhasukha.
44014001	It Paulus Barnabas ipisak o Ikonium etoma dogolik, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukisukhasik nen, wene itithogonat yogeisasukhama, inebedoalegat, Yahudi meke dek, Yunani meke dek, wene iti eberogonat iluk waganhukha.
44014002	Waganhukhama, it akhuni Yahudi meke ebetlake nen, wene iti inasuk holiluk, eberogonat iluk inakla apigidek meke nen, it akhuni itikmanke meke Allah a’buri ina'it asuagaluk inakla kagalhe lagoukha.
44014003	Inakla itithogon kagalhe korlegat, at Paulus Barnabas ipisak iniki doalegat o etoma inayuk dekhogon dogolik, wene ninoe Etagapogot hagakhe lageikhe wene iti yogeisekhe lagoukha. Yogeisekhe dogolik, Allah obabut hano nen woknisekherek wene iti, “Eberogonat, ” iluk hutduagaluk yogeisugunem, it nen hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagarinakhe dogoagaluk, Allah nen inobatnerinakhe lageikhe.
44014004	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukha mekeat, it akhuni o kota etoma meke inebe doalegat mikirlogo, it ebetlake Yahudi meke werekmake ageik, it ebetlake it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo werekmake ageik, mikikhukha.
44014005	Itithogon inebe mikikhukhasik nen, it akhuni itikmanke meke dek, Yahudi meke inougi koktek dek, inom dapukhogon atluk, “Paulus lak yi aik ti aik hagarinabiluk, inebe helekit oba motok inasuok, ” iluk inabok palhukha.
44014006	Inabok palhukhama, it inilu agoukhasik nen, lo thirlik-pirlikhogon, o Likaonia eloke etoma o Listra inom, Derbe inom, o aliluke etoma aperek inom, usasukha.
44014007	Usasukhasik nen, wene hano wene yakulisekhe lagoukhaat.
44014008	O Listra etoma ap ageikhe agosa akla nen itaklaga dogolik isok weak itaklageikhesik isok obatne dek nen holak lageidek hurek motogat welageikhe.
44014009	Hurek dogolik Paulus nen wene yogeisugunem asuk holek werekma, at Paulus nen ileken oba tek-tek ’birogo dogolik, akla nen, “Ap ithi etaiken nenat, Eberogonat hagatnabigin, iluk apekhesik werek higi, ” iluk akla apasikhe.
44014010	Itithogon apasikhesik, ane kokhogonatyogokhe dogolik, “Hebe metokhogon melasin o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, metokhogon melageikhesik nen, holak lageik, wageik, hagakhikhe.
44014011	At Paulus nen itithogon hagakhikhemo, it akhuni doalegat emenogo inileken hasukhasik nen, it akhuni o Likaonia meke inane baga men isukha, “Ap yi inebe walhenak mekeat, inebe akhuni hakene hagatlageikhasik nen, ninoba usa’ageikha yi, ” iluk inane amitmit sup isukha.
44014012	Inane itithogon isukhasik nen, Barnabas etaga Zeus thalhik, nen, wene Paulus nen ekhe lageikhe iti nen, at etaga Hermes thalhik, isukha. Itithogon thalinakhukha iti, it nen, “Nit meke walhenak, ” iluk oba hakotdiluk dogolik nogorakhe lagoukha meke inetaga meke thalinakhukha iti.
44014013	Itithogon thalinakhukhasik nen, ap Zeus iteerek akaneke ai o kota etoma hurlakola halek welageikhe meke nen, sapi kulok meke men, oken elokhoken hano meke men, wolok, o kota etoma ukegarekma holagape palekma wageikhe. Wageikhesik akhuni doalegat emenogo inom nen, Paulus Barnabas ipisak warisauwogoluk hagakhukha.
44014014	Warisauwogoluk hagakhunem, it Paulus Barnabas ipisak Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inasuk lolhukhasik nen, huk asuagaluk, inekaerek nen inasu tikmanke meke li’bik-la’bakhogon la’isalok nen, akhuni ioalegat natogorlek werekma inakla pirlirli lagoukha. Lagoukhasik nen, inane kokhogonat yogeisekhe dogolik,
44014015	“Ap yirani. Hit nikithogon hagakhe lagap. Nagarlak ak nerugi. Nit ninebe hit hakene akhuni mekeat. Meke re, lit nen yi meke ti meke weat meke hagakhe lagap iti nere’isalok nen, hinobabut hebelatluk, hinelokhe Allah iluk notok welagarek meke iti wogosubageik nen iluk wene yokhisa ago meke o. At Allah iti, pogot men, agat men, i lautkok yekelek men, yi meke ti meke pogot oba, agat oba, ima welagarek meke men, walhasikhe meke o.
44014016	Haganeat ninopa lak nen logat ninopase lak itaklarik waga lagoukha etaat, Allah nen, Yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok hagakhe lagoukha meke hasik, Hagakhe dogonek o, iluk here’isekhe lageikhe.
44014017	Itithogon meke re, it akhuni nen, at ebe hutduagaluk, yi meke ti meke ageikhe walhigidek obarlikmatdisikhemo welagarek ’buk. At hano anek hagakhe dogolik, ninapiri nina’ithogon nikik, ninakla arleken akhigik, hagakhe dogoagaluk, at nen miso pogot oba nen usa’i ageik, nokorek meke iti nausak erlok asi agunem kokhogonat woknisigik, hagakherek iti, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhe.
44014018	Inasuk itithogon wakhikhe mekeat, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen sapi arat warisauwogoluk hagakhukhasikmo etnogo nen, inetaiken nikithogon thebelu heat hagatlageikhe mekeat, wene Paulus lak nen itithogon isukhama nen, warisigidek here’isasukha.
44014019	Itithogon hagakhukhama, it akhuni Yahudi meke o Antiokhia nen, Ikonium nen, lagoukhasik akhuni doalegat emenogo wene iti here’isalok it werekmake asuagaluk inakla kagalhukha. Inakla kagalhukhama, it werekmake agoukhasik, Paulus etnogo ebe helekit oba wakhukhasik nen, ebe motogat wakhe thalek, lisogo o kota leget abel thikmanke ula’isukha.
44014020	Itithogon ula’isukha mekeat, it akhuni aperek Yesus ane waganhukhasik welagoukha meke wagoukhasik nen, alilu dagakhogon melasi agoukhama, ebe melatluk nen, o kota ukisikhe. Ukisikhesik noge iluk, hubuluke Barnabas ipisak o Derbe usa lagoukha.
44014021	O Derbe etoma hano wene yakulisekhoat dogolik, akhuni inebe doalegat woginakhukhama Yesus anewaganhukha. Waganhukhama ’bisalok, it Paulus Barnabas ipisak yabokane inapuke o Listra nen, Ikonium nen, piokhogon o Pisidia eloke o kota Antiokhia dukhi agoukha.
44014022	Alep laga dogolik, akhuni Yesus ane yakulisilik lagoukhama waganhukha meke yabokane inoba haklarik dukhi aga dogolik, inetaiken ago warinakhik, inasuk wakhik, ilik dukhi aga dogolik, men yogeisasukha, “Wene eberogonat iluk hinetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisigip meke iti, hinobatnerogon hakotdiluk dogono. Nit yabokane Allah apma motok dogouogoluk ninoba yi aik ti aik hekhe dogoluk nenat ukugun o, ” iluk yogeisilik dukhi agoukha.
44014023	Itithogon yogeisilik dukhi aga dogolik, o yi ai ti ai, Allah a’buri natogokhe lagoukha dopok, inougi therisik dogoagaluk meldisilik iniki ageikhe sembayan uogoluk hipiri nikidek werlegat dogolik sembayan men ekhe lagoukha, “Yesus ninoe. Ha’buri inetaiken hoba hakotdiluk werek meke yi, hagasik dogonok nen iluk hat hikimo ’bogo o, ” iluk sembayan ilik dukhi agoukha.
44014024	Dukhi aga dogolik, o Pisidia eloke nen piokthek, o propinsi Pamfilia usagoukha.
44014025	Usagoukhasik, o Pamfilia etoma o kota Perga wene yogeisalok nen, o kota Atalia usa lagoukha.
44014026	O Atalia nen, imake ku warogo o Antiokhia inapuke lagoukha. Etoma nen, itithogon hagarik nekhe dogoagaluk haganeat it Allah a’buri nen la’isa aga dogolik, “Allah obabut hano etnogo nen wokhisik loak o, ” iluk la’isa agoukhama itithogon hagarik nekhe lagoukhasik nen, arat hagatluk inapuke yabokane lagoukha iti.
44014027	O Antiokhialalok, Allah a’buri natogorinakhikhesik nen, menyogeisasukha, “Nit Allah ninom nen yigithogon hagakho, tigithogon hagakho, ” iluk wene pilinogo yogeisekhe dogolik men yogeisasukha, “It akhuni itikmanke meke wene iti eberogonat iluk waganuagaluk, Allah nen thu hualdekhemo erlok waganusakwerek o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44014028	Itithogon yogeisasukhasik, akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke emenogo inom iniki doalegat welagoukha.
44015001	Ap aperek o Yudea nen o Antiokhia wagoukhasik nen, Allah a’buri etoma meke wene men iluk yakulisasukha, “It he, wene Musa nen, Yigithogon, tigithogon hagakhe dogosak iluk yoknisasikhe wene iti mothogon, hinoado aperlagap meke palhinakhidek halok he, hinebe Allah nen tilhinabusak dek o, ” iluk yakulisasukha.
44015002	Wene itithogon yakulisasukhama, at Paulus Barnabas ipisak nen, it ap iti men yogeisasukha, “Hit nen egep iti motok korlo egep o, ” iluk inom wene palhik, wene yakhik, kogat yakhe lagoukha. Wene itithogon yakhe lagoukhama, it etoma meke nen, Paulus Barnabas ipisak, it aperek inomat o Yerusalem lalok it ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo men, it ap Allah a’buri therisik welagoukha meke men, inom nen wene iti hasik morerasuagaluk la’isauwogoluk hagakhukha.
44015003	It Allah a’buri nen itithogon hagakhukhasik la’isasukhama, o etoma nen, Fenisia nen, Samaria nen, etoma laga dogolik, men yogeisilik lagoukha, “It akhuni itikmanke meke inobabut hebelogo inelokhe Allah wogokhama o, ” iluk yogeisilik lagunem, it Allah a’buri etoma meke inakla arleken kogat akhasukha.
44015004	It etnogo o Yerusalem lagoukhama, it ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo men, it ap Allah a’buri therisik welagoukha meke men, it Allah a’buri aperek etoma inebe natogokhe lagoukha meke men, heagei warogowoginakhukha. Woginakhukhama, it nen, “Nit Allah ninom nen yigithogon hagakho, tigithogon hagakho, ” iluk wene pilinogo yogeisasukha.
44015005	Yogeisugunem, it ap Farisi meke Yesus ane eberogonat iluk waganhukha meke inebe aperek melagoukhasik nen, men yogeisasukha, “Akhuni thikman meke Yesus ane waganha meke iti, inoado aperlagap itithogon palinakhik, wene Allah nen Musa ayoko 'biluk ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hago welageik, hagakhe dogosak o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44015006	Yogeisasukhama, it ap Yesus nen inebe inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo men, it ap Allah a’buri therisik welagoukha meke emenogo men, wene iti morerasuogoluk natogokhukha.
44015007	Itithogon natogokhukhasik, wene kogat ageikhe nen igik, ageikhe nen igik, ekhe lagoukhasik, at Petrus melageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yirani. Nagarlak lak. It akhuni itikmanke meke nen hano wene inasuk holhik, inakla nen eberogonat iluk waganhik, hagasuagaluk, an haganeat hit ninom werekma, it iti yogeisa loagaluk Allah nen wenaknakhikhesik nayoko ’bisikhe iti, hinilu o.
44015008	At Allah akhuni ninetaiken ilu meke etnogo nenat, Yi an na’buri o, iluk Agoreke nit woknisasikhe iti hagat, it iti wogeisasikheat.
44015009	It ninat hagarinakhik, nit ninat hagatninakhik, hagakhidek o. It nen Yesus ane eberogonat iluk waganhukhama, at nen inaklake horinakhikhe iti.
44015010	Allah nen itithogon hagakhe korlegat he, hit nen Allah obabut paluogoluk hagakhe lagap iti nenaluk. Wene iti akin weak nen, ninopa lak waganusak erlok dek welagoukha. Nen, nit nen waganusak erlok dek dogoligat, yabokane it Yesus ane waganha meke iti waganuagaluk ekhe lagap iti nenaluk.
44015011	At ninoe Etagapogot Yesus obabut hano nen, ninetaiken at oba hakotdisinem, nit tilninakhik, it tilinakhik, nit ninom tak-tagat tilninakherek iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44015012	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it akhuni doalegat emenogo inane igidegat huk agoukha. Itithogon huk agoukhama, Barnabas Paulus ipisak nen wene yogeisekhe dogolik, “It akhuni itikmanke meke wene yogeisugunem hutduagaluk, nit nen elalinat hagarinabik nekhe lagosikwago iti, ebe re, Allah nenat hagarinakhe laga o, ” iluk wene pilinogo yogeisekhe korlek, inasuk holek welagoukha.
44015013	Wene arat ’bogokhogon yogeisasukhama, at Yakobus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yirani. Nagarlak lak. An wene igin yi hinasuk holini.
44015014	Allah nen it akhuni itikmanke meke inoba ebetluk nen, men isikhe, It aperek an na’buri asuagaluk woginabigin o, iluk woginakhikhe meke hasik, at Simon nen yoknisekhe iti.
44015015	Itithogon yoknisekhe iti, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen isukha tak-tagat yoknisekhe o. It nen men iluk holal waganhukha,
44015016	-
44015017	Ninopase Etagapogot nen, Akhuni ato iti tha’bokhogonat men, it akhuni itikmanke meke, an na’buri iluk nekaerek netaga palogowenageinakhigi meke iti tha’bokhogonat men, inom dapukhogon inopase Netagapogot annebeat heraknabuagaluk, an nekaerek yabokane wisigin o. Witluk nen, o thagalagunem yabokane ket halharek iti hak, Daud lak inetaga dek aga iti, inetaga weregetdigin o. Misalaga meke iti, an nen yabokane aborlok dek motok halogo ’bigik, keretdigik, hagasigin o, iluk, at ninopase Etagapogot itithogontha’bokhogonat hagakherek meke nen
44015018	itithogon ninilu asuagaluk haganeat yoknisasikhemo,\rq (Amos 9:11-12)\rq* holal waganogo ’bisukha iti.
44015019	Iti nen, an nakla nen, it akhuni itikmanke meke inobabut hebelogo inelokhe Allahwogoriogei meke iti, inakla weagatdusak dek apekhe lagei.
44015020	Nit nen, wene men iluk holal waganogo inoba la’usak. Kaneke oba inetaiken hakotdiluk dogolik ako warekharek meke palek nukunem inebe weagarageikharek meke iti nausak dek. Param hagarinabusak dek. Nen, yi meke ti meke arlokop pethelogo warek meke nikik, mep nikik, nausak degat, iluk inasuk warogo inoba la’uok o.
44015021	Wene Allah nen at Musa yogokhikhemo, at nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo, hurli ninopa lak haganeat etoma nen o yi ai ti ai o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekmake, iniki Allah hasik werlegat dogolik hibiku-yogoku wene iti etaga thalogo yogeisegarek meke weregat o, ” iluk at Yakobus nen yogeisasikhe.
44015022	Wene itithogon isukhasik nen, it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo men, it ap Allah a’buri therisik welagoukha meke emenogo men, Allah a’buri tha’bokhogonat natogorlek welagoukha meke men, inom nen wene men iluk palhukha, “Ap nit meke aperek wenago inayoko ’biluk, Paulus Barnabas ipisak inom o Antiokhia loak nen, la’isauwok o, ” iluk isukha. Itithogon isukhasik nen, it Allah a’buri meke nen, at Yudas etaga ageikhe Barsabas iti inom, Silas iti inom, “Inobabut hano, ” iluk apekhe lagoukha meke nen, holal waganek iti inikimo wolok loagaluk inayoko ’bisukha.
44015023	Wene iti baga holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Nit hinagarlak lak Yesus nen ninayoko ’biluk la’inani ageikhe meke men, Allah a’buri therisik welagorek meke men, ninom nen, hit hinebe o Antiokhia meke, Siria meke, Kilikia meke, hinebe itikmanke mekeat, Allah a’buri meke ninagarlak lak ninerugi, iluk heagei wathinakho iti o.
44015024	Ap nit meke aperek hinoba wageikhasik nen, nit nen, “Wene itithogon yogeisa lani, iluk la'i ageidek mekeat he, it nen hit yokhisekhe dogolik, hinakla weagathinakhik, korlothinakhik, hagakha o, iluk akhuni nen egama ninasuk holho o.
44015025	-
44015027	Ninasuk holhosik nen, ninebe natogorlogo nen wene palho. Wene itithogon palhosik, Barnabas Paulus ipisak inebe ninakmu lak meke iti, inebe ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hasik 'bisalok, inasuogoluk hagakhe korlegat he, at hasik hagarik liliogei meke inom hinoba wisuagaluk ap aperek Yudas Silas ipisak inayoko 'bogoma wisugun iti. It witluk nen, wene holal waganogo 'bogo iti inape baga nen pilinogo yokhisoak.
44015028	Nit Allah Agoreke ninom dogolik, wene men iluk palho iti. Wene akin meke iti yokhisausak dek. Wene yiat hinasuk holusak ogo.
44015029	Kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik ako warekharek meke iti palek nausak dek o. Mep iti nausak degat. Yi meke ti meke arlokop pethelogo warek meke iti nausak degat. Param hagarinabusak degat o, iluk wene palho. Itithogon hagakhidek thogotdegep halok he, hit hano hagakhe lagap iluk ugun iti. Wene iti baga arat yokhisogo. Nagarlak lak nerugi, ” iluk holal waganogo la'isa agoukha.
44015030	Itithogon holal waganogo la'isa agoukhama, o Antiokhia arat wagoukhasik nen, Allah a'buri inebe tha'bokhogonat natogorinabiluk, wene holal waganek etnogo wogeisasukha.
44015031	Wogeisasukhama, etaga thalhukhasik nen, “Wene iti baga ninakla hano aga, ” iluk inakla arleken apik akhasukha.
44015032	Inakla arleken akhasukhama nen, at Yudas Silas ipisak Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nogo nen, Allah a'buri emenogo inetaiken thebelhik, ago warinakhik, hagasuogoluk, wene kogat yogeisekhe lagoukha.
44015033	Itithogon yogeisekho welagoukhasikmo nen, it Allah a'buri o Antiokhia meke nen, it Yudas Silas ipisakheagei warogo, it inebe la'isa agoukha meke emenogo inoba inapuke yabokane la'isasukha. [
44015034	Meke re, at Silas akla nen, “An huk asigin, ” iluk o Antiokhia huk ageikhe. ]
44015035	It Paulus Barnabas ipisak meneke, o Antiokhia etoma huk agoukhasik nen, it akhuni aperek doalegat inom etoma dogolik, wene ninoe Etagapogot ane hano wene iti yogeisigik, yakulisigik, hagakhe lagoukha.
44015036	O etoma iniki aperek inom welagoukhasik nenat, Paulus nen Barnabas yogokhe dogolik, “O yi ai ti ai ninoe Etagapogot ane yogeisilik lagoma emenogo yabokane luok o. Laga dogolik, Allah a'buri ninagarlak lak ninerugi emenogo nikithogon werek iluk, o ukul tomok ninileken 'birisilik luok o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44015037	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Barnabas nen, at ap etaga Yohanes Markus etnogo wolok lagaluk hagakhikhe.
44015038	Itithogon hagakhunem, at Paulus nen, “Dek o. Nit Allah hasik ninom hagarik luogoluk lagosik nen, o Pamfilia nen ninom lageidek suguluk waga etnogo, yabokane wolok lausak dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44015039	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, ipisak wene a'bereak yakhukhasik nen, inasokhotegat lagoukha. At Barnabas nen, Markus wolok imake ku warogo o Siprus wageikhe.
44015040	Wageikhemo, at Paulus nen Silas ayoko 'bisikhesik wisuogoluk hagakhunem, it Allah a'buri o Antiokhia meke nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot obabut hano etnogo nen wokhisik loak o, ” iluk heagei warogo la'isa agoukhama wagoukha.
44015041	It etnogo waga dogolik, o propinsi Siria etoma nen piokhogon o propinsi Kilikia Allah a'buri yi ai ti ai natogokhe lagoukha meke emenogo inetaiken ago warinakhik wagoukha.
44016001	Etoma nen Paulus lak o Derbe wagoukhasik nen, yabokane o Listra wagoukha. O Listra etoma ap ageikhe etaga Timotius, Yesus ane waganhikhe meke werekma wagoukha. Agosa he Yahudi meke Yesus ane eberogonat iluk waganhikhe mekeat, opase anek Yunani meke.
44016002	Allah a’buri o Listra meke men, o Ikonium meke men, tha’bokhogonat nen, “Timotius obabut hano, ” iluk abok hano ekhe lagoukha.
44016003	Itithogon werekma, at Paulus nen Timotius ebe wolok lagaluk nen, it akhuni Yahudi meke o ya ta etoma welagoukha meke tha’bokhogonat nen, “Timotius opase ebe Yunani meke, ” iluk inilu welagoukha iti nen, oado aperlagap meke palhikhe.
44016004	Oado aperlagap meke itithogon palhikhesik, ebe ipisagat o ya ta waga dogolik, wene it ap Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke men, Allah a’buri therisik welagoukha meke men, inom nen o Yerusalem dogolik wene palhukha meke etnogo, Allah a’buri nen hago dogolik mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk yogeisilik wagoukha.
44016005	Yogeisilik wagoukhama, it Allah a’buri Yesus ane eberogonat iluk waganhukha meke inetaiken horle aga korlek, akhuni aperek Yesus ane waganuogoluk hibiku-yogoku ukugunem, inebe doalegat aga lagoukha.
44016006	Itithogon hagatlaga korlek Allah Agoreke nen, “Wene o propinsi Asia etoma yogeisausak dek, ” iluk inakla kagalhikhemo, it o Frigia Galatia ke etoma turlem heisogo waga lagoukhasik,
44016007	o Misia witluk, etoma nen, o Bitinia luogoluk hagakhukha mekeat he, Allah Agoreke nen, “O etoma lausak dek o, ” iluk inakla kagalhikhe.
44016008	Itithogon inakla kagalhikhemo, o Misia eloke o kota Troaswagoukha.
44016009	Wagoukhasik dogolik, hibako Paulus a’bikaka men hasikhe. Ap o Makedonia meke ageikhe metek dogolik, “Hat nen nit akhuni Makedonia meke yoma yomaknisa itali me o, ” iluk akla kagalogo yogokhunem a’bikaka hasikhe.
44016010	A’bikaka itithogon hasikhemo, nit nen, men isugu, “Hano wene it akhuni etoma meke yogeisa loagaluk, Allah nen ninayoko ’bekhe higi, ” iluk isugusik nen, o Makedonia itali isuogoluk hagakhugu.
44016011	Itithogon hagakhugusik nen, o Troas etoma nen imake ku baga piokthegat i eken palekma o etaga Samotrake itali agagusik, hubenke i aik yi bagake o Neapolis itali agagu.
44016012	Itali agagusik o etoma nen, o kota Filipi wagagu. O propinsi kok Makedonia etoma ebe hurli palek werekma, alebageik iniki wenakhe lagoukha baga, o kota Filipi etoma it akhuni o Roma meke nen hagasik dogolik hali lagoukhasik welagoukha baga, wagagu iti. O etoma wagagusik nen, niniki pererlagat welagagusik,
44016013	niniki Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, sembayan uogoluk, o kota holagape palekma etoma nen dukhiluk nen, i aik oba etoma akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma obolukmo ageikhe dogosak iluk lagagusik herakhugu. Etoma humi natogorlek werekma ninebe hureklatluk nen, ninom wenekak ekhe dogolik wene yogeisasugu.
44016014	Humi wene yogeisasugu meke iti, he ageikhe ai o Tiatira meke. Su kain elokhoken yuayuken warek hakene meke it akhuni inoba oko kogat waganhe lageikhe meke, etaga Lidia iti nen Allah ane waganhikhesik Yahudi meke negen werekma, wene Paulus nen isinem hano waganuagaluk, ninoe Etagapogot nen akla kagalhikhemo, waganhikhe.
44016015	Wene itithogon waganhikhemo at ebe men, it akhuni at aila opakimo welagoukha meke men, ima usa’isasukha. Usa’isasukhama, at he Lidia nen, “An nobasik hit hinakla nen, At etaiken ninoe Etagapogot oba eberogonat hakotdekhe higi, iluk hinakla apegep halok he, an ninom dogouok nen, ninom luok o, ” iluk ane obatnerogon yoknisasikhemo ninom lagagu.
44016016	O etoma lagagusik dogolik, niniki ageikhe baga, o sembayan ekhe lagoukhama etnogo lagunem, horlak akhuni inatuaneke meke ageikhe mokat obabut weak meke oba dukthek werekma, inobagasiak oba ukekhe lagoukha meke werekma ninom abuk agagu. Horlak iti, akhuni nen hinok oba waganhunem, at nen wene yabokane hagatlasigin meke yogeisugunem, oko wogokhe lagoukha. Itithogon wogokhunem, at nen ougi oko doalegat thaburisekhe lageikhe.
44016017	Nit Paulus ninom lagunem, at horlak iti ninoporligat lageikhe. Laga dogolik, ane kokhogonat akhuni men yogeisasikhe, “It ap yi inebe Allah Etagapogot atuaneke welageikharek meke nen wene hinebe tilhinabusak wene yokhisuogoluk wageikha o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44016018	At horlak iti yabokane hibiku-yogoku ane itithogonat ekhe lageikhe. Itithogon ekhe dogolik, ane Paulus oba tiok-tha’bokhogon hagakhe lageikhemo nen, at elokhe hebenokhogon ’bikhekhe dogolik mokat obabut weak meke iti men yogokhikhe, “Mokat hobabut weak meke yi. Horlak ithi akla welagan iti, mukhogo dukhi lanogoluk, Yesus Kristus etaga palogo yokhekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo nen, eranogoat at akla nen dukhisikhe.
44016019	Itithogon dukhisikhemo, ougi emenogo nen inileken halok nen, “Nit oko thabutnisekherek etnogo dek aga iti nina’it o, ” iluk, at Paulus Silas ipisak inebe ha’isalok nen, iniki korlolisogo o silimo akhuni natogokhe lagoukhama ap koktek pemerintah meke inoba wogosik lagoukha.
44016020	Wogosik lagoukhasik nen, inebe it ap inougi pemerintah meke inikimo 'bisalok nen men isukha, “It ap Yahudi meke yi nen, o nit werekma yoma weagatdiliogei o.
44016021	Nit akhuni o Roma meke nen hagasusak dek meke hagakhe dogoagaluk yakulnisiliogei iti nen, wene iti waganusak motok dek o, ” iluk yogeisasukhama
44016022	it akhuni doalegat emenogo inebe melagoukhasik nen, Paulus lak inasuogoluk hagakhukha. Itithogon hagakhe korlek, it pemerintah meke nen, at Paulus Silas ipisak inasu li'bik-la'bakhogon nokokhukhasik nen, inagarumi nen tugi inasuagaluk yogeisasukha.
44016023	Itithogon yogeisasukhama tugi tamuk-tamakhogon inakhukhasik nen, o iniki herle warogo 'bisegarekma kola'isasukha. Kola'isekhe dogolik, ap ageikhe herle warek therisik welagarek meke iti thuam hanorogo hagasik dogoagaluk asuk wakhukha.
44016024	Itithogon asuk wakhukhama nen, inebe o kakok palekma turlem etoma kola'isalok inisok o akin meke baga herle pethekhogon warogo 'bisasikhe.
44016025	Itithogon ’bisasikhemo dogolik, o hibako eketurlem Paulus Silas ipisak nen sembayan igik, Allah hogorasuogoluk etai wakhik, hagakhunem, it akhuni aperek iniki herle warek welagoukha meke inasuk holek welagoukha.
44016026	Itithogon inasuk holek werekma, opaki hasigat dugul kok meke luk-lagathasinem, o kok halekma welagoukhama iti o tik oak usabek meke aborlok luk-lagathekhe dogolik, thu larek meke tha’bokhogonat huakhogon lageik, akhuni tha’bokhogonat iniki herle warek welagoukha meke emenogo hisalageik, hagakhikhe.
44016027	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, at ap herle warek therisik welageikhe meke etnogo iluk ageikhesik nen, o akhuni iniki herle warek ’bisegarekma etnogo thu motok hualek werekma ileken hasikhe. Ileken halok nen, it iniki herle warek meke emenogo inebe dukhega thalek, ayuk atluk ekaerek nen waragaluk akarok uakma meke kigikhogon waganhikhe.
44016028	Waganhikhesik ekaerek nen waragaluk hagakhunem, at Paulus ane kokhogonat men yogokhikhe, “Hebe hekaerek nen warugun o. Nit ninebe tha’bokhogonat welago, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44016029	Itithogon yogokhikhemo isagal kino iluk nen, pirlirliat oageleke dik-dik inoba ukisikhesik nen, it Paulus Silas ipisak inapma thoma isikhe.
44016030	Yabokane, at ap kok etnogo melageikhesik nen, inebe wogosik dukhi ageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nougi. An nebe Allah nen tilnabuagaluk, nobabut nikithogon hagasik, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo,
44016031	it nen he, “Hetaiken ninoe Etagapogot Yesus oba hakotdigin halok he, hat hebe men, ha’buri men, hinebe tha’bokhogonat tilhinabigin o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44016032	Itithogon yogokhukhasik nen, wene ninoe Etagapogot ane etnogo, at ebe men, a’buri inebe tha’bokhogonat men, yogeisasukha.
44016033	Yogeisasukhama o hibako jam iti bagaat, inebe woginabik nen, tugi inakhukha meke inagalumo emenogo thobalogo ’bisasikhemo, at kok ebe men, a’buri men, opaki hasigat ima usa’inakhukha.
44016034	Ima usa’inakhukhama, at Paulus Silas ipisak at kok etnogo nenaila wogosik lageikhesik nen, hipiri melageisasikhe. Melageisasikhesik, at a’buri inom tha’bokhogonat nen inetaiken Allah oba hakotdisukhasik nen, inakla arleken akhasukha.
44016035	O hubenke, it koktek pemerintah meke emenogo nen inagarumi polisi meke inayoko ’bekhe dogolik, men yogeisasukha, “Ap iniki herle warek hagasik werek meke etnogo nen it herle warek meke emenogo herle hisalogo ula’isoagaluk yogosi lani o, ” iluk la’isasukha.
44016036	Itithogon la’isasukhama lagoukhasik ap herle warek hagasik welageikhe meke etnogo yogokhukhama, at nen, Paulus men yogokhikhe, “It ap koktek emenogo nen, hit herle hisalogo ula’inaguagaluk yoko la’isa ageikhama yi o. Halok he, hinebe dukhiluk nen, hinakla hanorogon lani o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44016037	Itithogon yogokhikhe mekeat, at Paulus nen men yogeisasikhe, “Nit ninebe o Roma meke ninaierek meke re, wene ninoba dekmaat, tugi ninakhasik nen niniki herle warogo o iniki herle warek ’bisegarekma akhuni inil obaat kola’inani ageikhasigat he, yogotak limago ula’inanuagaluk ega iti nenaluk. It inekaerek inebe witluk nen ula’inanuak o, ” iluk isikhe.
44016038	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it yoko wagoukha meke emenogo nen, inougi koktek emenogo inoba lagoukhasik men yogeisasukha, “It Paulus lak inebe o Roma meke inaierek meke, ” iluk yogeisugunem inasuk holhukhasik nen, inayuk agoukha.
44016039	Inayuk agoukhasik, inebe wagoukhasik nen, “Nagarlak lak. Nit korlo hagakhoma, ” iluk Paulus Silas ipisak heagei warogo o iniki herle warek ’bisegarekma nen ula’isa aga dogolik, men yogeisasukha, “Hinebe o kota yoma dogogup o. O werlekma lani o, ” iluk inane erogat yogeisasukha.
44016040	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, o iniki herle warogo ’bisegarekma etoma nen, he Lidia ailalagoukha. Lagoukhasik, Allah a’buri meke inom abuk agoukhasik nen, inetaiken ago watdiluk wagoukha.
44017001	At Paulus Silas ipisak o etoma nen, o Amfipolis nen Apolonia nen horlokhogon o kota Tesalonika wagoukha. O Tesalonika etoma, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ageikhe halek welageikhe.
44017002	Itithogon halek werekma, at Paulus o sembayan egarekma halek werek halok ukekhe lageikhe hagat, inoba ukisikhe. Ukisikhesik nen, 3 minggu baga sembayan etoma ekhe dogolik, wene Allah ane holal waganek etnogo baga inakla kagalogo hinok wogeisugunem it nen oko yogokhik, hagakhe lagoukha.
44017003	Allah ane holal waganek etnogo baga thelekmarogo yogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisekhe lageikhe, “At Kristus Allah nen la’isigin iluk isukha etnogo, yi aik ti aik hilik hilik watlatluk nen, iluk asigin, iluk isukha. It isukha iti hagat, at Yesus hagakhikhe wene abok yokhisekhe lagei meke yi, hagasusak tak-tagat hagakhikhemo. Allah nen la’isigin iluk isukha iti, ebe Yesus itiat o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44017004	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it akhuni ebetlake nen, “Eberogonat, ” iluk wene iti waganhukhasik, it Paulus Silas werekmake asi lagoukha. Iti hagat, it akhuni Yunani meke Allah ane waganhukhasik inebe Yahudi meke negen welagoukha meke doalegat it werekmake asi lageik, humi koktek meke inebe doalegat it werekmake asi lageik, hagakhukha.
44017005	Inebe doalegat it Paulus Silas ipisak werekmake itithogon asi lagunem, it akhuni Yahudi meke ua palogo, it ap inobabut weak meke o silimo werlegat werekma inebe woginabiluk nen, inebe doalogo akhuni o kota Tesalonika etoma meke inakla kagalik laga lagoukhama, wene kogat woklageikhe. Itithogon hagatlageikhemo, at Paulus Silas ipisak iniki korlo lisogo akhuni doalegat inoba wogosik luogoluk, herageinabik, doaldiluk o ap Yasonwerekma o lasi lagoukha.
44017006	O lakhe dogolik, Paulus lak inebe dek nen, Yason men, Allah a’buri ebetlake men, iniki korlo lisogo ap koktek pemerintah meke inoba wogosik wagoukha. Wogosik wagoukhasik nen, inane kokhogonat men yogeisasukha, “Ap o yi ai ti ai elokhoken weagatdilik liliogei meke emenogo yoma wageikhasikmo,
44017007	at Yason yi nen woginakhemo. It ap iti nen, Ninoe Kok Etagapogot ninat Yesus werek o, iluk, ninoe kok Kaisar ane thogotdisiliogei o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44017008	Itithogon yogeisasukhama, it ap koktek pemerintah meke men, akhuni inebe doalegat emenogo men, inakla aga dageisikhe.
44017009	Inakla aga dageisikhemo, it ap koktek pemerintah meke emenogo nen Yason lak nen oko wogeisoagaluk yogeisasukhama wogeisasukha. Wogeisasukhama inebe iniki herle hisalogo ula’isasukha.
44017010	Itithogon ula’isasukhama, o hi ageikhemo, it Allah a’buri nen Paulus Silas ipisak o Berea la’isa agoukha. La’isa agoukhama wagoukhasik nen, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukisukha.
44017011	It akhuni Yahudi o Berea meke inobabut, akhuni o Tesalonika meke inakla puk welagoukha iti hak dek. At he, it wene inakla arlekenhogo waganhe dogolik, “Wene ekhe iti eberogonat a? Men a, ” iluk, Allah ane holal waganogo ’bisukha meke etnogo hibiku-yogokuat etaga thalogo hutukhogon ’bikhekhe lagoukha.
44017012	Itithogon ’bikhekhe dogolik, akhuni Yunani meke, humi koktek men, ap doalegat men, inebe doalegat inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha.
44017013	Itithogon hakotdisukhama, akhuni nen inabok ekhe dogolik, “Paulus nen, Allah ane o Berea yogeisiliogo, ” iluk isinem, it akhuni Yahudi meke o Tesalonika welagoukha mekeemenogo inasuk holhukhasik wagoukha. Wagoukhasik nen, akhuni doalegat emenogo weak hagasuagaluk inakla kagalhe lagoukha.
44017014	Itithogon hagakhunem, Silas Timotius ipisak, o etoma huk aga korlek, it Allah a'buri emenogo nen, Paulus anek, “Ibat lano, ” iluk wolok i laut kok yekelek aliluke wagoukha.
44017015	Itithogon wagoukhasik imake wolok o kota Atena wagoukha. Wagoukhasik inapuke o Berea luogoluk hagakhunem, at Paulus nen, “Silas Timotius ipisak noba ibat wisuak, ” iluk wene warogo la’isasikhemo lagoukha.
44017016	At Paulus, Silas Timotius ipisak therisik o kota Atena etoma dogolik, o etoma kaneke ai halek motok doalegat hagarek werekma ileken halok, akla motok weak ageikhe.
44017017	Akla weak ageikhesik nen, hibiku-yogoku o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukisikhesik, it Yahudi meke men, werlek meke Allah ane waganhukhasik Yahudi meke negen welagoukha meke men, at nen wene inakla kagalogo yogeisugunem, it nen at oko yogokhe lagoukha. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, akhuni pasar oko waganharekma lalok, akhuni inom abuk atluk, at nen wene inakla kagalhunem, it nen oko yogokhe lagoukhaat.
44017018	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, at nen it akhuni wene Epikuros wene hago dogolik it aperek yakulisekhe lagoukha meke men, wene Stoa wene hago dogolik, it aperek yakulisekhe lagoukha meke men, wene inakla kagalogo yogeisugunem, it nen oko yogokhik, it nen at yogokhunem, at nen oko yogeisigik, ekhe lagoukha. Itithogon ekhe lagoukha meke aperek nen, at Paulus hasik men isukha, “At he, wene ilu nogo? At okodek. Hemurlugat ilu dogoligat, ane anek motok doalegat yoknisiliogo, ” iluk isukha. Itithogon isukhama, it aperek nen, at Paulus nenhano wene yogeisekhe dogolik, Yesus nen hagakhikhe wene yogeisigik, akhuni watlatlukmo nen Allah nen inilugurinakherek wene yogeisigik, ekhe lageikhe iti nen, men isukha, “Akhuni ninat meke inausa wene hasik yoknisiliogo he a, ” iluk isukha.
44017019	-
44017021	Itithogon isukhasik, it akhuni o Atena etoma inaierek meke tha’bokhogonat men, ap huso meke etoma welagoukha meke men, inobabut he, ninat meke hagakhidek, wene kerat wolok wagunem inasuk holhik, wene ebe pilinikhik, isi motok dogou warlok welageikharek iti nen, Paulus ebe wolok, akhuni o Areopagus wene ’bogokhogon palharekma etoma natogokhunem inoba wolok lagoukhasik, men yogokhukha, “Hat wene ket wolok wagatik yakulnisekhe lagan iti, nit ninasuk holhe dogolik, ninat meke apekhe lago iti nen, nit wene iti ebe nikithogon meke, iluk hutukhogon ninilu asusak warlogat, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44017022	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Paulus ebe ap koktek o Areopagus etoma natogokhukha emenogo, inakla turlem melageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Ap Atena meke yirani. Nougi nagarlak lak. Hit he, yi meke ti meke hasik hagasuogoluk, kaneke hinausa meke itiat hinetaiken hunik hinobabut palhe lagei.
44017023	An o hit hinai ukul yoma nekhe dogolik, o usa hagakhe lagapmake nileken hilik nekhe dogolik, kaneke ageikhe ai halekma ako warogo ’bisegethepma etoma holal men iluk oba waganek werekma nileken higi, Yi walhenak ninokodek meke hasik o, iluk holal waganek werekma higi. Hit hinokodek dogolik hogorakhe lagap iti ebe re, an nen hanorogo yakulhisak.
44017024	Allah nen, o agat yoma walhigik, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat walhigik, hagakhikhesik nen, pogot agat iteerek kok welagarek iti. Itithogon halok, at ai akhuni iniki nen halharek meke etoma akla at Allah dogosak erlok dek o.
44017025	Nit akhunitha'bokhogonat, at nenat ninebe ninilugutninakhik, thet woknisigik, yi meke ti meke woknisigik, hagakherek iti nen, yi meke ti meke at erlageik iluk nit akhuni nen wogosusak erlok dek o.
44017026	At Allah nenat, yi akhuni ti akhuni o inaila tomok dogoagaluk, o hurli 'bigik, “Tahun iti baga dogoluk, iti baga dek asuak, ” iluk hurli 'bigik, akla tak apasikhesik nen, yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok tha'bokhogonat wialarik loagaluk, erlo baga, ap opakiat walhasikhe.
44017027	Itithogon walninakhikhe iti, akhuni inileken puk meke nen yi meke ti meke iniki hak herakharek hak, akhuni ninukuloak etaga tomok nen at Allah ebe herakhik, ninilu ageik, hagasuagaluk walninakhikhe iti. Meke re, at ebe walegat welagarek 'buk. Ninebe tomok ninalilu horok yaat welagarek o.
44017028	It aperek nen itithogonat iluk men isukha, At Allah obatne baga ebe ninom hunik niniluk dogolik, holak oba lageik, yi meke ti meke hagakhik, hagakhoat welago, iluk isukha. Itithogonat etai ap hit meke nen men iluk isukhaat, Nit tha'bokhogonat, at a’buri welago, iluk isukha iti.
44017029	Nit itithogon at a’buri welago halok he, at ebe hakene nit akhuni nen ninakla apalok, niniki nen kaneke emas meke, perak meke, helekit meke, hagarogo hagasusak dek higi, iluk hutdusak o.
44017030	-
44017031	It alebat Allah ebe inokodek dogolik, inobabut weak hagakhe korlegat, at nen obakhanini hapugutdiluk here'isekhe lageikhe. Itithogon mekeat, yogotak yaat nen, Yi akhuni ti akhuni tha'bokhogonat o itinem initema waganogo wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, mothogonat hagasuak, iluk ap ageikhe wenago 'biluk ayoko 'bekhemo werek iti nen, nit akhuni weak hagakhe Iago meke here’isalok ninobabut hebelasuagaluk yoknisiliogo iti. Halok he, nit nen, “Wene itithogon hagasigin iti, eberogonat, iluk nit tha'bokhogonat hutduagaluk, ap iti ebe watlageikhesikmonen, opase nen apuke ilugutdisikhemo werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44017032	“At watlageikhesikmo nen, ilugutdisikhemo werek o, ” iluk yogeisugunem, inasuk holhukhasik, it aperek nen, Paulus obato agoukha. Nen, it aperek nen, “Wene egen iti, nit ninasuk yabokane holuagaluk hibike halok yoknisausagat o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44017033	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Paulus it o etoma thogotdiluk dukhisikhe.
44017034	Itithogon thogotdiluk dukhisikhe mekeat, it akhuni aperek at oba lapeli lagoukhasik nen, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha. It iti ageikhe etaga Dionisius, it ap kok o Areopagus iti inom natogokhe lagoukha meke. Nen, he ageikhe etaga Damaris, nen, it aperek inomat itithogon inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha.
44018001	Itithogon hagatdiluk, at Paulus o kota Atena etoma thogotdiluk o kota Korintus wageikhe.
44018002	Ebe aban wageidek werek korlek, ap kok Klaudius nen, “Akhuni Yahudi meke inebe o kota Roma dogosak dek. Motogat horla dukhuak, ” iluk wene palhikhemo nen, ap Yahudi meke ageikhe etaga Akwila. Ebe o Pontus itaklageikhe meke. Age etaga Priskila ipisagat, o Italia nen it tak o Korintus kerat lagoukhasik werekma, at Paulus yabokane wageikhesik hisa ageikhe iti.
44018003	It Akwila Priskila ipisagat oko horlauwogoluk, o su ai meke ’bugukakhe lagoukha. At Paulus oko horlagaluk itithogonat ’bugukakhe lageikhe iti nen, it inoba wageikhesik dogolik, inomat ’bugukakhe lagoukha.
44018004	Itithogon inom ’bugukakhe dogolik, hibiku-yogoku iniki 7 baga Allah hasik werlegat dogolik sembayan uogoluk hagakhunem, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukiluk, it akhuni Yahudi mekedek, Yunani meke dek, Yesus ane waganuagaluk inakla kagalhe lageikhe.
44018005	Inakla kagalhunem, it Silas Timotius ipisak o Makedonia nen wagoukhama, at Paulus ninat meke ageikhe hagakhidek, wene itiat yogeisekho motok welageikhe. It akhuni Yahudi meke men yogeisasikhe, “Allah nen Kristus la'isigin iluk wene watnisasikhe etnogo, ebe Yesus wageikhe itiat o. An nilu, ” iluk pakhogon yogeisekhe lageikhe.
44018006	Itithogon yogeisugunem, it nen, “Dek o. Weak ekhe lagan o, ” iluk abok weak palhe lagoukhama, at Paulus etnogo nen, “An noba thelek o, ” iluk u hak, asu itikmanke meke amumul hisalogo usa'isikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinekaerek nen nuk akegep halok he, hinoba dopok o. An noba dek o. Hurli yogotak hurli nen, an akhuni itikmanke meke wene yogeisa ligin o, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik,
44018007	it o etoma here'isalok dukhisikhesik nen, ap itikmanke meke Allah ane waganhikhe meke etaga Titius Yustus iti aila lageikhe. At aila iti, o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama aliluat halek welageikhe.
44018008	Etoma werekma, ap Krispus, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama iti kok iteerek welageikhe meke ebe men, a'buri men, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk inetaiken ninoe Etagapogot oba hakotdisukha. Hakotdisukhama, it akhuni o kota Korintus meke aperek inebe doalegat wene holiluk nen, “Eberogonat, ” iluk inetaiken ninoe Etagapogot oba hakotdisukhama, inom ima usa'isasukha.
44018009	-
44018010	Itithogon hagakhukhama, iniki ageikhe o hibako ninoe Etagapogot nen Paulus a'bikaka baga wene men yogokhikhe, “Hayuk agun. An thekharik motogat welagei o. O yoma an na'buri inebe doalegat werekma, akhuni aperek nen weagathabuogoluk yigithogon tigithogon ageikhe hagathabugun dek o. Halok he, huk ageidek wene yogeisekho motok dogono, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44018011	Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, satu tahun welageikhesik nen, thut 6 ageikhe inom Paulus ebe o etoma huk dogolik, Allah ane yakulisekho welageikhe.
44018012	O propinsi Akhaya etoma ap kok Galio gubernur dogoagaluk meldisukhama werekma, it akhuni Yahudi meke inebe natogotdiluk, Paulus ebe iniki hakhasukhasik nen, itema waganuagaluk ap ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakharek meke inoba wolok lagoukha.
44018013	Ebe wolok lagoukhasik nen ukum oba ’bekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Ap yi nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo here’isalok, Allah ebe anek hogorakhe dogolik, ninat meke hagakhe dogoagaluk inakla kagaliogo meke wolok wago o, ” iluk yogeisasukha.
44018014	Itithogon isukhama, at Paulus nen wene oko igin hakma, at Galio nen akhuni Yahudi meke yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit akhuni Yahudi meke yirani. Ukum oba ’begesip wolok wagap yi, nit pemerintah Roma meke ninane thagalogo ’biluk weak kogat hagakhemo nen wolok wetlepma, Hanoat yoknesi agap iluk, hit nen ekhe korlek nasuk holile.
44018015	Meke re, wene yi hit hinane hasik, inetaga hasik, hit hagakhethep meke hasik, oba ’begesip wolok wagasipmo, hit hinoba dopok nen moretdusak o. Wene itigirlik meke, an nen moretdusak dek. Na’it, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44018016	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, o ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakharekma etoma nen mukhogo ula’isasikhe.
44018017	Ula’isugunem, it akhuni aperek tha’bokhogonat nen, ap etaga Sostenes, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma iteerek kok welageikhe meke iti, ebe hakhasukhasik nen, o ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe lagoukhama etoma ebe tugi wakhukha. Itithogon wakhe korlegat at Galio etnogo nen irlirli waganhidek obakhaniniat huk ageikhe.
44018018	At Paulus iki doalegat Allah a’buri o kota Korintus meke inom etoma welageikhesik nen, yabokane it o etomaheagei warogo ’bisalok, he Priskila agun Akwila ipisak inomat wogosik, imake ku warogo o Siria luogoluk hagakhukha. Hagakhukhasik, o kota Kengkrea etoma aban lageidek dogolik, “An Allah nipisak hunik welago, iluk nisi uanat hurli iti hurli dogoagaluk thogotdigin, ” iluk thogotdisikhesik welageikhe meke, “Hurli yi hurli arat, ” iluk tha’bokhogon palhikhe.
44018019	Isi itithogon palhikhesik, o etoma nen o Efesus lagoukha. Lagoukhasik nen, it Akwila Priskila ipisak etoma ’bisalok, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukisikhesik nen, it Yahudi meke etoma welagoukha meke, wene at nen inakla kagalogo yogeisugunem, it nen oko yogokhik, it nen at yogokhunem, at nen oko yogeisigik, hagakhe lagoukha.
44018020	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukhasik, it nen he, “Hat yoma ninom hiki doalegat dogoluk nen lanok o, ” iluk hakhauwogoluk hagakhukha meke re, at nen, “Dek o, ” isikhe.
44018021	Itithogon isikhesik lagaluk hagakhe dogolik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit egep iti Allah nen hano iluk apekhe halok he, an yabokane hinoba wisigin o, ” iluk o Efesus etoma nen imake ku warogo o Kaisarea lageikhe.
44018022	O Kaisarea lageikhesik nen, Allah a’buri o Yerusalem meke heagei warinabi lageikhesik nen, yabokane apuke o Antiokhia wageikhe.
44018023	O Antiokhia wageikhesik welageikhesik nen, yabokane o propinsi Galatia men, Frigia men, waga dogolik etoma it akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke inetaiken ago watdisilik nekhe lageikhe.
44018024	Ap Yahudi meke ageikhe etaga Apolos. Ebe o Aleksandria nen itaklageikhe meke, o Efesus wageikhesik welageikhe. Ane hano motok yogeisekhe dogolik, Allah aneholal waganek etnogo ilu motok welageikhe.
44018025	Werekma, it aperek nen, ninoe Etagapogot oporlik lageikharek wene iti yakulikhukhama waganhikhesik nen, ima usa’isegarek wene iti, Yohanes nen ima usa’isekhe lageikhe iti anek ilu welageikhe. Itithogon mekeat, Yesus ane obatnerogon yogeisigik, mothogon yakulisigik, hagakhe lageikhe.
44018026	Yesus ane waganhikhesik nen, o it akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukisikhesik, ayuk dek dogolik, wene pakhogon yogeisekhe lageikhe. Yogeisugunem, it he Priskila agun Akwila ipisak inasuk holhukhasik, ebe wolok inaila lagoukhasik nen, Allah nen at oporlik laga dogoagaluk akla apekherek wene iti hutukhogon yakulekhe lagoukha.
44018027	Yakulekhe lagoukhama, o Akhaya wisigiluk hagakhikhemo, Allah a’buri o Efesus meke nen, wene holal waganogo it akhuni o Akhaya meke Yesus ane waganhukha meke inoba la’ekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Apolos hinoba waga iti hanorogo waganino, ” iluk holal waganogo wogokhukhama wolok lageikhe. Lageikhesik, it akhuni o Akhaya meke Allah obabut hano nen wene eberogonat inakla apalok waganhukha meke doalegat yomageisekhe lageikhe.
44018028	Yomageisekhe dogolik, it Yahudi meke inom akhuni inil oba wene palhe dogolik, at ane hano iti nen, it inane obatne degetdiluk at ane obatne ageikhesik nen, Allah ane holal waganek etnogo baga yogeisekhe dogolik, “Allah nen, Kristus la’isigin iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogo, ebe Yesus la’i ageikhe itiat o, ” iluk pakhogon yogeisekhe lageikhe.
44019001	At Apolos o Korintus etomaat werek korlek, at Paulus etnogo holak upuke dagak-pagak waga lageikhesik, o kota Efesus wageikhe. Wageikhesik, akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke aperek werekma inoba ukisikhe.
44019002	Inoba ukisikhesik men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisigip iti, Allah Agoreke waganhigisip welagap a? Dek a, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. Yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Allah Agoreke werek iluk isinem, ninasuk holhidek nen waganhidek welago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44019003	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Paulus nen yogeisekhe dogolik, “Halok he, hit ima usa’inageisukha iti, wene ki wene yakulhigipmo usa’inageisukha, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Yohanes nen ima usa’isekhe lageikhe etnogo wene yakulhugumo ima usa’inanhukha, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44019004	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Paulus nen, “Yohanes nen ima usa’inakhe lageikhe iti, it akhuni nen, Weak hagakhe lago meke arat thogotdogosik ninobabut hebelago, iluk isi halok usa’inakhe lageikhe. Itithogon usa’inakhe dogolik, men yogeisekhe lageikhe, An noporlik ap ageikhe wisigin. Halok he, hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogono o, iluk ebe Yesus hasigat yogeisekhe lageikhe iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44019005	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo it inasuk holhukhama, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus etaga palogo yabokane ima usa’isasukhaat.
44019006	Usa’isasukhama, at Paulus nen iki inukuloak thebelhunem, Allah Agoreke inoba usa’ageikhemo, it nen, wene it akhuni ninat inane inokodek meke baga elalinat igik, Allah ane it yogeisigik, ekhe lagoukha.
44019007	It itithogon ekhe lagoukha iti, ap inebe 12 hakene nen ekhe lagoukha.
44019008	Itithogon isukhama, at Paulus o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan ekhe lagoukhama ukiluk ayuk dekhogon dogolik, wene Allah nen apma ’bisekherek wene etnogo hutdiluk waganuagaluk, inakla kagalogo, wene at nen yogeisigik, it nen oko at yogokhik, hagakhe dogolik, thut henagan welageikhe.
44019009	Dogolik, itithogon yogeisekhe lageikhe mekeat, it iti ebetlake inetaiken a’bet atluk, wene iti inakla meanetdiluk nen, akhuni aperek doalegat inil obaat, Yesus oporlik lageikharek wene iti abok weak palhukha. Abok weakpalhukhama, at Paulus, it thogotdisalok, it ebetlake Yesus ane waganhukha meke anek wogosik dukhisikhe. Wogosik dukhiluk, o kok halekma ap Tiranus nen yi wene ti wene yakulisekhe lageikhemo iti ukiluk, hibiku-yogoku iki ageikhe huk ageidek wene at nen yogeisigik, it nen oko yogokhik, hagakhe lageikhe.
44019010	Itithogon isi motok 2 tahun werekma nen, it akhuni o propinsi Asia etoma, Yahudi meke dek, Yunani meke dek, tha’bokhogonat wene ninoe Etagapogot ane etnogo inasuk holhukha.
44019011	At Paulus nen akhuni nen hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagarinakhe lageikhe iti, ebe Allah nenat hagarinakhe lageikhe.
44019012	Hagarinakhunem, su at Paulus dikak hokherek meke he a, asu ebe meke elokhoken weak asinogo iluk itikmanke ikhe lageikha meke he a, akhuni nen wolok, it u waganhe lagoukha meke inoba ’bi lagunem nen, u hano ageik, mokat inobabut weak meke inakla ukiluk welageikhe meke mukhogo dukhigik, hagakhe lageikhe.
44019013	Itithogon hagakhe korlek, it akhuni Yahudi meke aperek inebe hathale dogolik, mokat inobabut weak meke akhuni inakla ukiluk werekma mukhogo ula’isilik nekhe lagoukha meke nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus etaga palogo ula’isuogoluk walhasukhaat. Walhekhe dogolik, it nen, mokat obabut weak meke yogokhe dogolik, “At Yesus, Paulus nen yogeisilik liliogo meke iti etaga palogo, dukhi lan o, iluk yokhekhe lago, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44019014	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ap Yahudi meke ebe ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok etaga Skewa iti, a’buri ap inebe 7 nen welagoukha meke nen itithogonat walhasukha.
44019015	Walhasinem, at mokat obabut weak meke nen, “Yesus iti ebe, an nilu. Nen, Paulus iti ebe, abok nasukholhi mekeat. Meke re, hit yi hinebe thani he. An nokodek, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen,
44019016	ap mokat obabut weak mekeakla ukiluk welageikhe meke etnogo inoba pok hayokhogon thagali lageikhesik nen, obatne atluk it inobatne degetdisasikhe. Inobatne degetdisekhe dogolik, inasu li’bik-la’bakhogon tugi mep wulukhogonat inakhikhe. Inakhikhemo at aila nen inal wurlugat lo dukhisukha.
44019017	Lo dukhisukhama, akhuni nen, “It itithogon hagakha o, ” iluk isukhama, it akhuni Yahudi meke men, Yunani meke men, o kota Efesus welagoukha meke tha’bokhogonat inasuk holhukha. Holhukhasik, inayuk atluk, Yesus etaga ebenageik hogorakhe lagoukha.
44019018	Nen, it akhuni inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha meke inebe wagoukhasik nen, weak hagakhe lagoukha meke akhuni doalegat inil oba ’bualhe lagoukha.
44019019	Nen, it ap hathale dogolik usa hagakhe lagoukha meke inebe doalegat nen ina’buku usa meke uang perak kok meke 50. 000 hakene baga oko palhukhasik hago welagoukha meke natogorlogo akhuni tha’bokhogonat inil oba hetu hunhukha iti.
44019020	Itithogon hagakhukhama, ninoe Etagapogot ane iti kok ageik, obatne ageik, hagakhe lageikhe.
44019021	Itithogon hagakhukhama, at Paulus akla nen apekhe dogolik, “O propinsi Makedonia lalok nen, o propinsi Akhaya witluk nen piokhogon, o Yerusalem ligin, ” iluk akla apasikhesik, “Lalok, yabokane napuke witluk, o kota Roma nileken ’bikha liginat o, ” iluk isikhe.
44019022	Itithogon iluk nen, at yomakhiliogei meke inebe pere, Timotius men, Erastus men, ipisak o propinsi Makedonia la’isa itluk, at arligat anek o propinsi Asia welageikhe.
44019023	-
44019024	Itinem, o kota Efesus etoma tukang perak ageikhe etaga Demetrius. Yi meke ti meke perak meke hagakhe lageikhe. Hagakhe dogolik kaneke ebe he meke etagaArtemis. Ebe ai kok etoma halek werek korlek, o ’bugurlagat at ai halek tak-tagat perak meke doalegat alino hagarogo ’bekhe lageikhe. Itithogon hagarogo ’bisinem, akhuni nen oko palhe lagoukhama, it Demetrius agarumi tukang perak inikimo horleak hagakhe lagoukha meke inomat kokhogon oko thaburekhe lagoukha iti nen, akhuni Yesus ane waganiluk oporlik lageikharek wene iti hasik o Efesus etoma inane kogat thagalhukha.
44019025	Itithogon hagatlageikhe iti, at Demetrius nen, agarumi tukang perak men, it aperek perak meke itithogon inikimo horleak hagakhe lagoukha meke men, inayoko ’bisikhe. Inayoko ’bisikhemo natogokhukhama, at nen, “Nagarlak lak. Nit niniki nen hagakhe Iago iti baga hano oko thaburekhe Iago, iluk hinilu.
44019026	Meke re, yogotak at Paulus iti hagariogo meke, hinileken tomok higik, hinasuk holhik, hagakhe lagap. At nen, Akhuni iniki nen kaneke hagakharek iti, ebe walhenak meke dek o, iluk yogeisugunem, akhuni doalegat nen, Wene iti eberogonat, iluk waganha iti, horok o kota Efesus yoma meke anek ’buk. O propinsi Asia meke akhuni tha’bokhogonat waganhamaat o.
44019027	Iti nen, nit niniki nenitithogon hagakhe Iago meke yi ninabok weak palugun o. Meke re, nit ninabok anek weak palugun 'buk. Ninagona kok Artemis ai kok halek yi, hogorasusak dek iluk inakla apekhe dogolik, Artemis akhuni o propinsi Asia meke tha’bokhogonat men, o yi ai ti ai meke men, inomat at apma ukiluk dogolik hogorariogei meke thagalogo degetdugun iti! ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44019028	Yogeisasikhemo inakla aga dageiluk nen, “Nit akhuni o Efesus meke ninagona Artemis kok itiat o, ” iluk inane kokhogon isi motok welagoukha.
44019029	Itithogon isi dogolik, inane thagalhunem, akhuni o kota Efesus etoma meke pirlirli natogosi aga dogolik, ap o propinsi Makedonia meke inebe pere, Paulus inom nekhe lagoukha meke, inetaga Gayus men, Aristarkhus men, inebe hageinakhukhasik o silimo wene kok palharekma wogosik ukisukha.
44019030	Wogosik ukisukhama, Paulus ebe yabokane inoporlik akhuni inebe doalegat natogorlekma etoma ukigiluk hagakhikhe meke re, it akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke nen, “Hat ukugun o, ” iluk wene palhukha.
44019031	Nen, ap koktek o propinsi Asia meke ageikhe Paulus inom hunik welagoukha meke nen, “Etai sili kok waganekma etoma hilhaoak ’bi kugun o, ” iluk it aperek nen etaiken thebeluagaluk yoko oba la’isukhaat.
44019032	Nen, akhuni natogokhukha meke emenogo, inebe doalegat wene ebe inokodegat natogosi agoukha iti nen, “Nenaluk natogosi ago heat, ” iluk it aperek nen inane yigithogon igik, it aperek nen itithogon igik, inane kogat thagalhukha.
44019033	Inane itithogon thagalhe korlek, it ap Yahudi meke nen, ap Aleksander akhuni doalegat inil oba meldi agoukhama, it akhuni doalegat emenogo nen, “Wene erlo, at higi, ” iluk inakla apasukha. Itithogon inakla apugunem, at Aleksander nen, “An wene noba dekma o, ” iluk akhuni emenogo yogeisagaluk iki la’isikhe mekeat, it inakla nen,
44019034	“Ap yi Yahudi meke, ” iluk ebe hutdiluk nen, inane opakiat dapukhogon, kokhogonat men isukha, “Nit akhuni o Efesus meke yoma kogat he, ninagona Artemis itiat o, ” iluk inane hunik-hunigat 2 jam naik isi motogat welagoukha.
44019035	Itithogon isi lagoukhama nen, at ap wene palhunem holal waganhe lageikhe meke nen, it akhuni doalegat emenogo inane degetdisikhe. Degetdisikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit akhuni o Efesus meke yirani. Ninagona Artemis kok iti ai halek iti men, akhuni-akhuni at ekaerek ebe hakene alino hagarek pogot oba nen usageikhe meke iti men, nit akhuni o Efesus meke yoma hago welagorek iti tha okodek. Akhuni o yi ai ti ai tha’bokhogonat inilu anek.
44019036	Akhuni aperek nen, Wene iti dek mekeat o, iluk thagalusak dek. Halok he, hit yoma nen hinetaiken dek negen yigithogon tigithogon ageikhe hagakhidek, hinaborlok degat dogosak o.
44019037	It ap yi nen, yi meke ti meke ninagona kaneke aila meke aperek iniki abusak wagani ukigidegat, ninagona ebe iti abok palhidegat, werek korlegat, wogosik wagap yi re!
44019038	At ap Demetrius ebe men, agarumi tukang perak inikimo horleak meke hagakharek meke men, inom nen, wene ap ageikhe oba ’busak werek halok he, iniki itinem wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakharek oba nen, it gubernur lak inil oba wene inoba ’busak werek o. Halok he, at ageikhe nen wene at ageikhe oba ’bigik, at ageikhe nen wene at ageikhe oba ’bigik, etoma nenat usak werek o.
44019039	-
44019040	Hinebe natogosi agasip hinane kogat thagalhep yi, it aperek nen, Nena wene hasik natogosi agasip ekhe lagap, iluk wene hinoba ’bekhe halok he, hit nen nikithogon ugun. Wene erlo dekma yi re! It nen, Weak hagasuagaluk inakla kagalhe lagap, iluk wene hinoba ’busak o. Iti nen, hit nen ageikhe hagasuagalukhinakla apegep halok he, akhuni tha’bokhogonat inayoko ’biluk natogotdiluk, wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, iniki hagakharek hari iti baga wene moretdusak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44019041	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, akhuni natogokhukha meke emenogo kikil warogo la’isasikhe.
44020001	O kota Efesus inane kogat thagalhe lagoukha etnogo dek ageikhemo, at Paulus nen, it akhuniYesus ane waganhukha meke waisalok nen inasuk wakhikhe. Inasuk warogo heagei warinabiluk nen, ebe o propinsi Makedonia wageikhe.
44020002	O Makedonia etoma nekhe dogolik, wene kokhogon yogeisekhe dogolik, inetaiken ago watdisilik nekhe lageikhesik, o akhuni Yunani meke werekma wageikhe.
44020003	Wageikhesik, thut henagan etoma welageikhe. Etoma welageikhesik nen, yabokane imake ku baga o propinsi Siria lagaluk karelhunem akhuni nen, men yogokhukha, “It akhuni Yahudi meke nen hasuogoluk habok palhasik werek o, ” iluk yogokhukhama asuk holhikhesik, suguluk apuke o propinsi Makedonia ke nen lagaluk hagakhikhe.
44020004	Lagaluk hagakhunem, ap Sopater, Pirus a’but, ai o Berea meke inom, Aristarkhus, Sekundus ipisak inai o Tesalonika meke inom, Gayus ai Derbe meke inom, Timotius inom, Tikhikus Tropimus ipisak inai o propinsimeke inom, inom lagoukha.
44020005	It tak lagoukhasik nen, o Troas etoma thetnisik welagoukha.
44020006	Itithogon thetnisik werek korlek, akhuni Yahudi meke pesta roti hikhidek meke etnogo nasukhama nen, nit o Filipi nen imake ku baga o Troas laga dogolik, noge niniki 5 nen iluk, it o Troas werekma hisa lagagusik, etoma dogolik noge niniki 7 baga isugu.
44020007	Nit o etoma dogolik, Allah hasik werlegat welagagusik nen, hibako hipiri roti meke ninagarlak lak ninerugi ninom nuogoluk natogotdiluk, at Paulus nen wene yoknisekhe lageikhe. Huben arat luogoluk nogo nen, wene uanat yoknisekhe dogolik, hibako motok eketurlemat yoknisekho motok welageikhe.
44020008	O henaipu kok halekma natogokhugumo etoma, isagal lampu doalegat yibarlek welageikhe.
44020009	Itithogon natogokhugusik nen, elege thue meke ageikhe etaga Eutikhus, jendala ape palekma hurek welageikhe. Hurek dogolik, Paulus wene uanat isi welageikhe iti nen, noge il ageikhesik nen, kunuk noge isikhe. Noge isinem, o henaipu hurli henagan thep hun-hun halekma ebe upu etoma nenat tunhogo usa’ageikhe. Usa’ageikhemo, akhuni ’bikha usa’agoukha nen, motogat watlageikhesik werekma waganhukha.
44020010	Waganhukhama, Paulus ebe usa’ageikhesik nen, warek oba dekakhogon wilageikhesik nen iki obakha hurlukhogon hakhasikhesik nen, “Watlagama iluk, hinakla wene munini ebekhup. Ebe iluk werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44020011	Itithogon yogeisalok yabokane apuke dageisikhesik nen, hipiri roti meke kusogo nasukhasik wene uanat yogeisekhe lageikhesik nen, o wi isikhemo Paulus ebe o werlekma dukhisikhe.
44020012	Dukhisikhesikmo, elege thue meke etnogo ilugat aila ’bi lageik, iluk ageikhe meke iti hasik inakla arleken kogat akhigik, hagakhukha.
44020013	At Paulus nen, “Hit imake ku baga o Asos lani o. An holak oba wisigin, ” iluk wene watnisasikhemo, nit tak ku baga o Asos etoma lalok, o etoma nen at ebe witluk ninom luogoluk, nit tak o Asos lagagu.
44020014	Lagagusik nen, o etoma nen at ebe ninomabuk agagusik, ninom ku baga o Metilene lagagu.
44020015	O Metilene nen, imake ku baga lagagusik, huben hak, i eken palekma o Khios iti thogotdiluk, aheke hak, i eken palekma o Samos iti nomokhogon thogotdiluk, uaheke hak o Melitus lagagu.
44020016	At Paulus nen akla apekhe dogolik, “Pesta Pentakosta hasik hagakhunem an o Yerusalem erlok ligin halok he, an o propinsi Asia yi ai ti ai magakhe dogunogo iluk, o kota Efesus ukigidek piokhogonat ligin hano, ” iluk akla apalok, ibat lagaluk hagakhikhe.
44020017	At Paulus ebe o Melitus etoma dogolik, it ap Allah a'buri o Efesus meke therisik welagoukha meke inebe wisuagaluk wene la'isikhe.
44020018	Wene la'isikhemo inebe wagoukhama, at Paulus nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An ebekeram o propinsi Asia wagagi iti hurli nen, ninom motok dogolik hagakhe lagei meke hinilu o.
44020019	It akhuni Yahudi meke nen nebe nasuogoluk nabok palhe dogolik weak hagatnakhe korlek, nekaerek nen nobabut thebekhogon, hogorakhigidegat, de apik aga dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot apma dogolik at hasik hagakhe lagei hiniluat o.
44020020	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik nen, wene hit yokhisausak meke huk ageidek akhuni natogorlek werekma yakulhisigik, hinailake dopok yakulhisigik, hagakhe lagei etnogo hiniluat o.
44020021	An nen akhuni Yahudi meke men, Yunani meke men, hinasuk wakhe dogolik, Weak hagakhe lagap meke thogotdisalok, hinobabut hebelatluk hinelokhe Allah wogotni o. Wogotluk nen, hinetaiken ninoe Etagapogot Yesus oba hakotdiluk dogobageik iluk yokhisekhe lagei iti.
44020022	Meke re, yogotak Allah Agoreke nenat nakla kagalhemo, ane holiluk, o Yerusalem lagaluk hagakhe lagei yi. Etoma lalokma nen nikithogon hagatnabugun he. An nokodek o.
44020023	Itithogonnokodek mekeat he, an o kota ageikhe nen ageikhe lageik hagakherek etoma tha’bokhogonat at Allah Agoreke nen, Hiki herle wakhik, yi aik ti aik hoba ’bigik, hagasugun o, iluk yoknekherek iti anek nilu o.
44020024	Itithogon mekeat he, an nebe niluk dogosak itiat kok iluk iti meke kogotdekhe lagei dek. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus nen nayoko ’bekhe dogolik, at nen, Allah obabut hano nen hagarinakherek wene hano wene itiat yogeisilik lano o, iluk nayoko ’bisikhe itiat ilugun oba kobokhogon hagasigiluk kogotdekhe lagei o.
44020025	An hit nagarlak lak nerugi tha’bokhogonat wene Allah apma ukiluk dogogun iti wene yokhisilik nekhe lagei iti, hurli yogotak yi baga nen, hit nen yabokane nelokhoken hinileken neagun dek o, iluk an nilu.
44020026	-
44020027	Itithogon Allah akla apasikhe wene iti, an nakla thogotdigidek motogat pakhogon yokhisigi iti nen, hit aperek yabokane weak agap halok he, wene an noba dek o, iluk yokhisigi.
44020028	Domba therisik welageikharek iti hak, hit nen Allah a’buri therisik dogoagaluk, at Agoreke nen hinayoko ’bisikhemo, therisik dogolik, hinekaerek hinobabut hebelogo dogono o. Itithogon hinobabut hebelogo dogolik nen, Allah a’buri yoma, at ekaerek a’but amep oba woginakhikhemo inebe at ekaerek a’buri werek, iluk hanorogo therisik dogono o.
44020029	Meke re, yeke helo yeke anini weak meke nen domba here’isigidek motok nekerek iti hak, an nebe lalokma nen, it aperek nen Allah a’buri hit nen therisik welagap meke iti weagarinabi ukisugun meke werek o, iluk an nilu.
44020030	Itithogon weagarinakhe korlek, ap hit meke aperek melatluk nen, akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke lisogonatwoginabuogoluk, wene korlo wene yakulisekhe dogogunat o.
44020031	Hinobabut hebelogo dogono! An o mo dageigik usigik hagakhe korlek 3 tahun ninom dogolik, huk ageidek dikene nen, hibako nen, de aga dogolik, hinebe dopok hinasuk wakhe lagei etnogo, hinakla eberek dogono o.
44020032	Yogo. Wene Allah obabut hano nen wokninakherek iti wene hiniki a’bethogon hago dogobageik iluk, yokhisigi. Yogotak nen, at Allah obatne werek meke nen, wene iti baga hinetaiken horlethinakhik, yi meke ti meke at ekaerek a'buri wogeisagaluk ’bisasikhe meke wokhisigik, erlok hagasusak meke iki baga ’binagagi o.
44020033	An nakla nen, hit hinameke uang emas meke men, perak meke men, hinasu men, warlok iluk ageikhe nakla apigidek.
44020034	At he, an men, ap an nagarumi noporlik nekharek meke men, yi meke ti meke dek nen, an nekaerek niki nen her ago horlekhe lagei iti hinilu o.
44020035	Wene ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ekaerek nen men yoknisasikhe iti, It akhuni aperek nen wokhisugunem horlalok hinakla arleken akhausak erlok dek o. At he, hit hinekaerek nen it aperek wogeisekhe dogolik hinakla arleken akhausak o, iluk yoknisasikhe iti ninakla eberek dogolik, an nen it aperek inobatne dek meke yomageisekhe lagei iti, hit nen hutdaniluk an nobabut waganogo hiniki obatnerogon yomageisekhe dogobageik iluk yakulogo hagakhe lagei iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44020036	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, itibagal yukukhogon nen, it tha’bokhogonat inom dogolik sembayan isikhe.
44020037	Sembayan isikhemo nen, it tha’bokhogonat de aga dogolik, Paulus ebe obakha hurlukhogon ha’iluk nen, inape tharluk heagei wakhe dogolik, heagei warogo la’isukha.
44020038	Sembayan aban igidek dogolik, at Paulus nen, “Hit nen an yabokane nelokhoken hinileken neagun dek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe meke etnogo inakla ebekhukhasik, inakla motok weak ageikhesik, ebe heagei warogo wolok, ku etnogo werekma lagoukha.
44021001	Itithogon heagei wat-wat hagakhe lagoukhasik, it o etoma ’bisalok nen, nit imake ku baga, i eken palekma etaga Kos piokhogon lagagu. Lagagusik, hubenke o i eken palekma etaga Rodos lagagu. Etoma nen piokhogon o Pataralagagu.
44021002	Lagagusik, o etoma akhuni ku ageikhe warogo o Fenisia luogoluk werekma, ku iti akla ukiluk, ninom lagagu.
44021003	Laga dogolik, i eken palekma o etaga Siprus iti niniki paike ninileken lakhilik-hilik imake laga lagagusik, o propinsi Siria lagagusik, o kota Tirus dukhisugu. Dukhisugusik, etoma nen, suke ku akla wolok lagoukha meke ulabuogoluk hagakhunem nen, nit ku akla nen etoma dukhisugu.
44021004	Etoma dukhisugusik, akhuni Yesus ane waganhukha meke herageinakhikhesik nen, ninom niniki 7 baga ninom welagagu. Dogolik, it nen he, “Paulus. Hat o Yerusalem lagun o, ” iluk Allah Agoreke nen yogeisasikhemo asuk wakhukha.
44021005	Ninom welagagusik nen lausak oba arat hagatlageikhemo, it inebetha’bokhogonat, inagugi men, ina’buri men, inom nen, la’inanuogoluk, ninom o kota etoma thogotdiluk dukhisugu. Dukhisugusik nen, i aik oba etoma lagagusik ninebe tha’bokhogonat ninitibagal yukukhogon sembayan isugu.
44021006	Itithogon iluk, heagei wat-wat ekhe lagagusik, it inapuke inaila waga korlek, nit ku akla ukisugu.
44021007	Ukisugusik, o Tirus etoma nen imake ku baga, o Ptolemais lagagu. Lagagusik nen, Allah a’buri o etoma meke heagei warinakhugusik, niniki opakiat ninom welagagu.
44021008	Ninom welagagusik, hubuluke o Kaisarea lagagusik, it ap inebe 7 baga haganeat o Yerusalem nen wenago ’bisalok meldisasukha emenogo meke ageikhe hano wene yogeisilik nekhe lageikhe meke etaga Filipus werekma, aila ukiluk ninom welagagu.
44021009	At Filipus a’buri homagarlugi inebe 4 meke inebe tharlisigat dogolik, Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke welagoukha.
44021010	Nit o etoma niniki aperek inom werekma, ap ageikhe Allah ane yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etaga Agabus, o Yudea nen wageikhe.
44021011	Wageikhesik, nit ninoba ukisikhesik nen, Paulus therlok ugu welageikhe meke, at nen nokorlogo waganhikhesik nen, ekaerek nen iki herle watdigik, isok herle watdigik, hagakhikhesik nen, men isikhe, “Allah Agoreke nen, Ap therlok yi iteerek meke, ebe o Yerusalem lagunem, ap Yahudi meke nen yigithogon herle watdiluk, it ap itikmanke meke inikimo ’bugun o, iluk yoknekhemo, ” iluk isikhe.
44021012	Itithogon isikhemo nen, ninasuk holhugusik nen, it akhuni o etoma meke ninom nen, “Paulus noe. Hat o Yerusalem lagun o, ” iluk ebe ninakmu nen etaiken thebeluogoluk asuk wakhugu.
44021013	Asuk wakhunem, at Paulus nen, “Hit de aga dogolik, nakla motok weagatdekhe lagap iti nenaluk. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus hasik he, o Yerusalem etoma nen niki herle anek wasusak apekhe lagap a? Dek o. Niki herle wakhik, nebe nakhik, hagasumo hanoat o. Itithogon hagatnabusak erlogat apekhe lagei, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44021014	Itithogon yoknisasikhemo, nit nen etaiken thebelusak erlok dek ageikhemo, nit ninane alep isugu meke etnogo here’isalok, “Halok he, ninoe Etagapogot nen akla apekhe meke itiat hagatlasuak o, ” iluk yogokhugu.
44021015	Itithogon yogokhugusik, o etoma niniki doalegat welagagusik nen, yi meke ti meke karelogo ’biluk, wolok o Yerusalem lagagu.
44021016	Laga dogolik, it akhuni o Kaisarea meke Yesus ane waganhukha meke aperek ninomat lagagu. Ninom lagagusik it nen woknisik, ap ageikhe etaga Manason, ai erlo o Siprus meke, Yesus ane haganeat nen waganhikhesik o Yerusalem werekma, at nenwokninakhikhesik aila dogoagaluk, woknisik ukisukhama etoma ap husoat welagagu.
44021017	O Yerusalem arat lagunem, it Allah a’buri etoma meke nen inakla arlekenhogon wokninakhukha.
44021018	Itithogon wokninakhukhama, hubenke at Paulus ninomat, at Yakobus’bikhauwogoluk ukisugu hakene, it ap Allah a’buri therisik welagoukha meke inebe tha’bokhogonat inom werekma ukisugu.
44021019	Ukisugusik heagei warinakhugusik, at Paulus nen, “Akhuni itikmanke meke hasik yigithogon hagarinakhe lagei, itithogon hagarinakhe lagarik wagei, iti ebe re, Allah nenat hagarinakhe laga, ” iluk wene pilinerogo yogeisasikhe.
44021020	Yogeisasikhesikmo, Allah hagakhikhe meke itihogorakhukha. Hogorakhukhasik nen, Paulus yogokhe dogolik, “Paulus nagarlak. Akhuni Yahudi meke inebe 1. 000 hakene anek ’buk. Inebe motok doalek-harluadegat inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdegasik werek o. Dogolik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo it tha’bokhogonat nen hago dogouogoluk inobatnerogon hagariogei iti hat hilu apigi.
44021021	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hat habok inasuk holha. Hat nen, akhuni Yahudi meke it itikmanke meke inaklake welageikharek meke iti yogeisekhe dogolik, Wene Musa nen yakulnisasikhe meke etnogo here’isalok nen, hina’buri inoado aperlagap meke palhidek thogotdisigik, akhuni Yahudi meke hagakharek meke etnogo hagakhidegat, thogotdisigik, hagakhe dogono o, iluk yakulisiliogo, iluk habok inasuk holha o.
44021022	Holhasikmo nen, yogotak hat hebe wagatik welagan yi, inasuk holugunat o. Halok he, nikithogon hagasusak apegen.
44021023	Nit nen hasuk wasugun meke iti, mothogon hagasumo hano. Ap inebe 4 oba nen Allah etaga palogo, Nit itithogon hagasugun, iluk, ega meke yoma ninom welago.
44021024	Halok he, hat nen it inebe woginabiluk nen, it hinomat hinoba horogo, it inisi tha’bokhogon paluagaluk, oko hat nen ’bino. Itithogon hagasumo, it ap Yahudi meke nen, At Paulus abok holhe lago etnogo dekmaat higi. At ekaerek nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo hago dogoligat itithogon hagakhe lagama o, iluk, ittha’bokhogonat inilu asugun iti.
44021025	Meke re, it akhuni itikmanke meke inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdegasik werek iti hasik, wene alebat palhugusik holal waganogo la’isugu apigi. Holal itithogon waganogo la’ekhe dogolik, Kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik ako warekharek meke iti palek nausak dek o. Mep nausak degat. Yi meke ti meke arlokop pethelogo warek meke iti nausak degat. Param hagarinabusak degat, iluk wene palhugusik holal waganogo la’isugu apigi, iluk yogokhukha.
44021026	Yogokhukhama, at Paulus nen ap inebe 4 eranogo woginakhikhesik nen, hubenke inoba horogo, inomat Allah ai halekma ukisukha. Ukisukhasik, at nen he, “Niniki yi baga ninoba horogo Allah hasik dogoluk nen, hurli iti baga nen it yoma inebe tomok inobasik Allah ako waresugun, ” iluk iki wenago yogeisasikhe.
44021027	Iki wenago yogeisasikhe etnogo 6 nen arat welagoukhasik nen, ageikhe dogoluk iniki 7 wenasusak arat aga korlek, it ap Yahudi meke aperek o propinsi Asia nen wagoukhasik, Paulus ebe Allah ai halekma werekma inileken hasukha. Inileken halok nen, Paulus hakhoagaluk akhuni doalegat inakla kagalhukhasik, inom nen ebe hakhasukha.
44021028	Hakhasukhasik nen, “Ap Israel meke a! Nit werekmake atni o! Ap yi nen akhuni o yi ai ti ai yakulisilik nekhe dogolik nen, nit akhuni Israel meke nen hagakhorek meke iti weak iluk, ninat meke yakulisigik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo weak iluk ninat meke yakulisigik, o Allah ai halek yi abok weak igik, ilik liliogo meke etnogo ebe yiat a! Yogotak ap Yunani meke wogosik Allah ai halekma uki agasik, o Allah ekaerek ai halek weagatdekhemo yi a! ” iluk inane kokhogon isukha.
44021029	Wene itithogon isukha iti, at Paulus alebat ap Tropimus, o Efesus meke iti, ipisagat o kota Yerusalem etomanukhunem inileken hisasukhasikmo etnogo nen, at ebe wolok Allah ai halekma uki agasik thalek apasukhasik isukha iti.
44021030	Inane itithogon kokhogon isinem, o kota etoma inane doalegat thagalik lagoukhama, akhuni pirlirliat natogosi agoukhasik, Paulus ebe ha’iluk, Allah ai halekma nen iki korlo lisogo itikmanke ula’isukhasik nen, Allah ai halekma thu tha’bokhogonat lakhukha.
44021031	Itithogon wolok dukhisukhasik, Paulus ebe wasuogoluk hagakhe korlek, it aperek nen ap tentara Roma meke doalhe lagoukha meke inoe kok meke iti oba lalok nen, “O Yerusalem yoma wene ageikhe woklagama. Akhuni inebe tha’bokhogonat inane kogat thagaliogei o, ” iluk yoko lagoukha.
44021032	Yoko lagoukhama, at nen agarumi tentara meke koktek men, inagarumi men, wogosik akhuni inane thagalhe lagoukhama etoma pirlirliat lageikhe. Lageikhemo, inileken hasukhasik, “Tentara inoe kok etnogo agarumi wogosik waga, ” iluk inayuk nen, Paulus tugi wakhe lagoukha meke etnogo here’isukha.
44021033	Here’isukhama ap tentara inoe kok etnogo ebe Paulus oba horokhogon lageikhesik, ebe ha’iluk nen, agarumi nen pisue omaken pere baga iki herle wasuagaluk yogeisasikhe. Yogeisasikhesik nen, “Ap yi tha nogo. Nikithogon hagakhemo, ” iluk hinok waganhikhe.
44021034	Hinok waganhunem, inane asokhotegat ilik lagoukha. Itithogon ekhe dogolik inane yugunat thagalhunem, wene erlo thekekhogon nikithogon dopolu heat hagatlageikhemo, ap tentara inaila obatneak halekma wolok loagaluk yogeisasikhe.
44021035	Yogeisasikhemo, lel perlarekma wolok lagoukhasik, akhuni doalegat emenogo inakla aga nen wasinogo iluk, it tentara nen ebe hapokhogon waganusak ageikhemo, waganhukha.
44021036	Itithogon wolok lagunem, akhuni doalegat emenogo inoporlik laga dogolik nen, “Ap ithi wasuok o, ” iluk inane kokhogon ilik ilik lagoukha.
44021037	Paulus o obatneak halekma etnogo wolok ukuogoluk hagakhunem, at nen ap tentara inoe kok etnogo yogokhe dogolik, “An wene ageikhe yokhesusak erlok a? Erlok dek a, ” iluk isinem, at nen he, “Eiye! Hat nit akhuni Yunani meke ninane hilu higi.
44021038	An nakla nen, hat ap Mesir meke ageikhe haganeat melatluk, ap akhuni inakharek meke inebe motok doalegat 4. 000 meke wogosik o limo akhuni dekma dukhisikhe etnogo hat he a, apigi meke re, hat dek higi, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44021039	Itithogon yogokhunem at Paulus nen he, “Dek o. An nebe ap Yahudi meke. Nai erlo o propinsi Kilikia o kota kok negen etaga Tarsus itiat o. An yogotak akhuni yoma wene ageikhe yogeisausak a? Dek a, ” iluk kino yogokhikhe.
44021040	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at nen, “I o. Ageikhe yogeisan, ” iluk isikhemo at Paulus ebe holak lel perlago baga metek dogolik, “Hinane, ” iluk iki lia’isikhemo nen, inane dek agoukhama, it akhuni Yahudi meke inane baga wene yogeisasikhe.
44022001	At nen yogeisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Nougi nagarumi. Wene yi an noba dekma o, iluknekaerek nebe nirlirlirogo yokhisagein yi hinasuk hanorogon holino, ” iluk isinem,
44022002	it nen he, “Nit akhuni Ibrani meke ninane baga yoknisiliogo, ” iluk inane motok dik-dek agoukha. Inane dik-dek agoukhama, at nen men yogeisasikhe,
44022003	“An he, ap Yahudi meke, nebe o propinsi Kilikia o kota Tarsus itaklagagi meke re, o Yerusalem yoma nen kogotnakhukhama narlue agagi. Narlue agagimo, ap kok Gamaliel nen wene Allah nen ninopa lak inasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo hutukhogon yakulnekhe lageikhe. Yakulnukhunem, an nen hit yogotak Allah hasikhinobatnerogon hagakhe lagap iti hagat, hagakhe lagagi.
44022004	Hagakhe dogolik, akhuni Yesus ane waganhukhasik oporlik yigithogon laga lagoukha meke inasigiluk mugusik laga dogolik aperek inakhigiat. It aperek humi dek, ap dek, iniki herle warogo wogosik, o iniki herle warek ’bisegarekma ’bisekhe lagagiat.
44022005	Itithogon hagakhe lagagi iti, ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok ebe men, inarluetek men, inom tha’bokhogonat nen surat waganogo ninagarlak lak Yahudi meke o Damsyik meke inoba wolok loagaluk woknikhukha. Woknikhukhama, it akhuni Yesus ane waganhukhasik oporlik laga lagoukha meke o etoma werekma iniki herle warogo wogosik, o Yerusalem yoma ’bisa agunem, wene inoba ’bigik, inebe inakhik, hagasuagaluk la’anhukhasikmo nogo nen, it inilu. Halok he, it nenat yokhisausak werek o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe. At Paulus nen, “Yesus nen itithogon wanikhikhemo nobabut hebelagagi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe wene
44022006	“An o Damsyik horogat dikene ligin apasigi, opaki hasigat pogot oba nen a’bi’bal weak meke an naliluke liarogon yasi usageikhe.
44022007	Lia motok yasi usa’agunem, an nebe agat oba tunhogo wara usasigi. Wara usasigimo, at ageikhe nen ane yoknekhe dogolik, Saulus. Saulus. Anat yi aik ti aik hagatnabigiluk muknarik nekhe lagan iti nenaluk, iluk yoknikhikhe.
44022008	Itithogon yoknikhikhemo, an nen, Eiye. Noe. Hat tha, iluk yogokhigimo, at nen, An Yesus, nai Nazaret meke, yi aik ti aik hagatnabigiluk muknarik nekhe lagan meke etnogoat o, iluk yoknikhikhe.
44022009	Yoknikhunem, it ap an ninom lagagu meke nen, lia iti inileken hasukha meke re, ane an yoknikhikhe iti, inasuk holhidek.
44022010	Inasuk itithogon holhidek werek korlek, an nen, Noe. An nikithogon hagasik, iluk yogokhunem, at nen, Hebe melatluk nen, o Damsyik ukino. Ukiluk werekma, hat nen Allah warlok meke tha'bokhogonat hagasigin meke hasik ap ageikhe nen yokhesigin etnaga o, iluk yoknikhikhe.
44022011	Itithogon yoknikhikhemo, o lia etnogo nen nileken sirluk-pabuk iluk puk ageikhe. Puk ageikhemo, it ap ninom lagagu meke emenogo nen niki hak-hak o Damsyik woknarek ukisukha.
44022012	Ukisukhama, o Damsyik etoma ap ageikhe etaga Ananias. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hago dogolik mothogon hagakhunem, it akhuni Yahudi meke o Damsyik meke tha'bokhogonat nen alon halhe lagoukha.
44022013	At ebe an noba wageikhesik, nalilu metek dogolik, Saulus nagarlak. Hileken 'bekelasin o, iluk yoknekhunem, eranogoat an nileken 'bekelatluk, at ebe hutukhogon hasigi.
44022014	Hasinem, at nen, At Allah ninopa lak nen ebe hogorakhe lagoukha meke etnogo nen, at akla apekherek meke hilu ageik, at a'but obabut mot meke Yesus iti hileken higik, at ane ape baga nen isinem hasuk holhik, hagatnok nen iluk, hebe wenakhekhesik hayoko 'bekhe iti.
44022015	Halok, hileken higik, hasuk holhik, hagakhen meke iti, akhuni tha'bokhogonat pakhogon yogeisekhe dogono.
44022016	Meke re, hat yogotak ya ageikhe inom therogo dogosak dek. Hebe melatluk nen, hat weak hagakhe lagan meke Allah nen thobalhakhik, it aperek nen ima usa'agagik, hagasuak nen, Yesus etaga palogo Allah ayoko 'bino, iluk yoknikhikhe, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44022017	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, ageikhe men yogeisasikhe, “Itithogon yoknikhikhemo, an yabokane o Yerusalem wagagisik nen, Allah ai halekma sembayan isinem, Allah Agoreke nakla ukisikhemo na'bikaka hasigi.
44022018	Na'bikaka oba, ninoe Etagapogot nen, Hat nen, hileken an neegen meke iti men, hasuk holhen meke iti men, akhuni o yoma meke pakhogon yogeisugunem, hane inasuk holugun motok dek o. Halok he, o Yerusalem yoma nen ibat dukhino, iluk yoknikhikhemo, na'bikaka oba hasigi.
44022019	Itithogon yoknikhikhemo, an nen, Noe. An o sembayan egarekmake ya ukigik, ta ukigik, laga dogolik, akhuni inetaiken hat hoba hakotdiluk welagoukha meke, iniki herle wakhik, tugi inakhik, hagarik nekhe lagagi etnogo, it motok inilu o.
44022020	At Stefanus, wene hat hasik pakhogon akhuni yogeisekhe lageikhe meke etnogo ebe wakhunem, an nebe etoma metek dogolik, Hein! Hano wakha, iluk, it ap wakhukha meke inasu nokorlek therogo welagagi iti, it iniluat o, iluk yogokhigi.
44022021	Itithogon yogokhunem, ninoe Etagapogot nen, It akhuni itikmanke meke walegat etoma inoba la'agagin iti nen, lan o, iluk yoknikhikhe, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44022022	Paulus nen itithogon yogeisilik wagunem, it emenogo inasuk hano holek welagoukhasigat, hurli eta hurli baga isinem inane kokhogonat men isukha, “Ap obabut yigirlik, agat oba iluk dogosak dek. Wasuok o! Iluk
44022023	inekaerek inasu nokorlogo la'isigik, agat abubuleke yalelogo lia'igik, hagakhukha.
44022024	Itithogon hagakhunem ap tentara doalhe lagoukha meke inoe kok etnogo nen, agarumi yogeisekhe dogolik, “Paulus ebe o obatneak halekma ithi wolok ukiluk, akhuni Yahudi meke nen inane kokhogon wene oba ’biliogei iti, wene erlo nikithogon hagakhemo nen iluk tugi warogo wene erlo heratno, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44022025	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen ebe tugi wasuogoluk herle warogo ’bisukhama, at Paulus nen, ap tentara meke kok ageikhe etoma metek werekma men yogokhikhe, “Hit nen, ap ageikhe o Roma aierek mekeat, ukum oba ’bigidekma tugi tak wasusak nogo? ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44022026	Yogokhunem, kok etnogo nen yoko ap tentara doalhe lagoukha meke inoe kok etnogo oba lageikhesik nen, “Hat nikithogon hagasigiluk egen meke nogo. Ap yi ebe o Roma aierek mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44022027	Yogokhikhemo, ap tentara kok etnogo Paulus oba wageikhesik nen, “Hat hebe o Roma haierek meke a? Yoknom, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at nen, “Nen, an naierek mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44022028	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo nen, “An oko kogat palogo nen naierek agagisik welagei, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Paulus nen, “An o Roma naieregat itaklagagi mekeat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44022029	Itithogon yogokhikhemo it at tugi wasuogoluk hagakhukha meke emenogo nen ibat hekhogon here’isasukha. Itithogon here’isasukhama, ap kok etnogo akla nen, “Paulus ebe o Roma aierek meke werek korlegat, iki herle wakhima yi nayuk e, ” iluk ayuk weak ageikhe.
44022030	Hubenke, it ap tentara opaki doalhe lagoukha meke inoe kok etnogo nen, “It akhuni Yahudi meke nen ap yi ukum nikithogon meke oba ’biliogei. Wene hutukhogon nilu asusak meke, ” iluk wene erlo herasuogoluk, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek emenogo men, ap Yahudi Allah hasik wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke emenogo men, natogosuagaluk inayoko ’bisikhemo natogokhukhama nen, Paulus iki herle hisalogo ’biluk it inoba wolok lageikhesik nen, inelokhoma meldisikhe.
