44023001	Itithogon meldisikhemo, at Paulus it ap Yahudi Allah hasik wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke inebe natogokhukha emenogo, ileken tek-tek inoba ’bisekhe dogolik, “Nougi nagarumi. An Allah il oba, haganeat nen hurli yogotak hurli hagakhe lagei iti, Weak hagakhe lagei, iluk nakla wene munini ebekhe lagei dek. At he, wene nakla thelek, hano hagakhe lagei, iluk apekhe lagei, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik nen ageikhe igin hak,
44023002	ap Allah iteerek inoe kok meke etaga Ananias nen, it ap aperek Paulus alilu welagoukha meke nen ape thaukhogon wasuagaluk yogeisasikhe.
44023003	Yogeisasinem, at Paulus nen, ap Allah iteerek kok etnogo yogokhe dogolik, “O he’bet weak mekeat, hano thalek apusu kut wakharek iti hak, hoado oba anek hano thalek hetaiken pere welagan iti nen, Allah nen hat hasiginat o. Hat nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hago dogolik, wene iti mothogon hagakhidek, ukum an noba ’biluk hagarumi nen an nasuagaluk yogeisegen iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44023004	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, it ap etoma welagoukha meke nen, “Ap Allah iteerek meke inoe kok yi hakla meanetdiluk wenagakhen iti motok weak, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44023005	Itithogon yogokhukhama, at Paulus nen, “I. Nagarlak lak. Allah ane holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, Hinougi koktek thekhisik welageikharek meke itihinakla meanetdisalok wenageisugup o,\rq (Keluaran 22:28)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek mekeat, at ebe Allah iteerek inoe kok werek iluk an nokodekma igima o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44023006	Yabokane at Paulus nen, it ap Allah hasik wene erlo pilinekhe lagoukha meke emenogo inebe ebetlake Saduki meke inane waganhe lagoukha meke, nen, ebetlake Farisi meke inane waganhe lagoukha meke, werekma ileken ekagat hutdisalok nen, ane kokhogonat men yogeisasikhe, “Ap yirani. Nougi nagarumi. An nebe Farisi meke. Nopase lak Farisi meke nenat itago meke welagei. Dogolik, akhuni watlageikharek meke yabokane Allah nen eberogonatinilugurinabigin iluk hutdekhe lagei iti nen ukum noba 'begama yi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44023007	-
44023008	It Saduki meke nen, “It akhuni watlageikharek meke Allah nen inilugurinabigin degat. Malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke inebe degat. Mokat degat, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha. Nen, it Farisi inane waganhe lagoukha meke nen, “Tha'bokhogonat iti werek anek o, ” iluk pakhogon ekhe lagoukha. Itithogon ekhe lagoukha iti nen, at Paulus nen wene itithogon yogeisugunem, it Farisi inane waganhe lagoukha meke men, Saduki inane waganhe lagoukha meke men, inom it-it inane thagaldiluk, inebe agorogo hagatlagoukha.
44023009	Inane itithogon kogat thagalhe dogolik, it ap Farisi meke Allah ane holal waganek inilu meke emenogo ebetlake melatluk inane puk weak, it Saduki meke emenogo wenageisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasukha, “Nit ninakla nen, ap yi wene oba dekmaat apekhe lago. At amokareke nen yogokhemo iliogo a? At he, malaikat Allahnen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo ageikhe nen yogokhemo iliogo a. Itithogon eberogonat yogokhunem iliogo mekeat dogosak, ” iluk,
44023010	inane kogat thagalhe dogolik, Paulus ebe ebelake nen likhigik, ebelake nen likhigik, wasunogo iluk, it ap tentara opaki doalhe lagoukha meke inoe kok etnogo nen, agarumi it ap emenogo inoba usatluk, Paulus ebe inakla nen tilogo o obatneak halekma etnogo wolok ukuagaluk yogeisasikhe.
44023011	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo wolok ukisukhama, o itinem hibako, ninoe Etagapogot Paulus alilu melasi ukiluk nen, men yogokhikhe, “Hat nen, wene an nobasik o Yerusalem yoma pakhogon yogeisegen iti hak, yabokane o Roma etoma itithogon pakhogon yogeisa liginat iti nen, hetaiken hapukhogon dogono o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44023012	Hubenke ap Yahudi meke inebe aperek natogotdiluk nen, Paulus ebe wasuogoluk abok palhe dogolik men isukha, “Nit nen Paulus ebe wakhidek dogolik, i men, hipiri men, nikidek dogoluk nen, arat wakho halok nen nuok o, ” iluk hupuk palogo wene palhukha.
44023013	Wim abok itithogon palhukha iti, ap inebe 40 nen, aperek inomat dogolik nen palhukha.
44023014	Itithogon palhukhasik, ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek emenogo men, inarluetek emenogo men, inoba lagoukhasik nen, men yogeisasukha, “At Paulus ebe aban wakhidek dogolik, yi meke ti meke nugun dek, iluk, hupuk palogo nen iluk wago.
44023015	Halok he, hit ap Allah hasik wene erlo pilinekharek meke hinom nen, at tentara inoe kok etnogo nen, Paulus ebe hinoba wolok wisuagaluk surat men iluk waganogo la’ino, Nit nen Paulus itema thekekhogon waganuagaluk ebe ninoba wolok wetnogoluk kino yokhekho, iluk la’ino. Itithogon la’umo, at nen eberogonat thalek hinoba wolok wisigiluk wagunem, nit Paulus ebe wasuogoluk holagarlem thaldiluk dogogun o, ” iluk
44023016	abok itithogon palhunem, at Paulus eak meke ageikhe etoma dogolik asuk holhikhe. Asuk holiluk, o obatneak halekma etnogo lageikhesik nen, Paulus husupi yogosi ukisikhe.
44023017	Husupi yogosi ukisikhemo, at Paulus nen ap tentara meke kok ageikhe ebe waikhikhesik, men yogokhikhe, “Noe. Ap elege yi nen, hinoe kok etnogo wene ageikhe yogosusak werek o. Halok he, hat nen at oba wolok lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44023018	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at nen elege etnogo wolok nen, ap tentara inoe kok etnogo oba lageikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Paulus iki herle warek werek etnogo nen wanekhesik nen, Elege yi nen wene at ageikhe yogosusak meke werek o, iluk hoba wolok wisuagaluk nayoko ’bekhemo wolok wageiyi, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44023019	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, ap tentara inoe kok etnogo nen elege etnogo iki hak-hak wolok inasokne lagoukhasik men yogokhikhe, “Wene nena wene yoknesigiluk wagan. Yoknom, ” iluk hinok waganhikhe.
44023020	Hinok waganhunem, at nen, “It ap Yahudi meke inane dapukhogon ekhe dogolik, Paulus itema thekekhogon waganuogoluk thalek, hat nen huben ebe wolok, it ap Allah hasik wene erlo pilinekharek meke natogorlek werekma inoba lanok nen iluk kino yokhesugun ega.
44023021	Meke re, hat nen wene it ega iti, hologo hagakhun. Ap inebe 40 nen, aperek inomat, dogolik nen Paulus ebe wasuogoluk abok palhasik elokhoma thalek dogogun ega o. It nen, Paulus ebe wakhidek dogolik, hipiri men, i men, nikidek dogoluk, arat wakho halok nen nugun o, iluk hupuk palhasik werek. Itithogon dogolik, yogotak it nen, Wene at nen oko nikithogon yoknisagein, iluk thekharek werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44023022	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, ap tentara inoe kok etnogo nen elege etnogo men yogokhikhe, “Hat nen, wene etnogo arat ’bualogo at yogokhi, iluk, it aperek yogeisugun o, ” iluk asuk warogo apuke la’isikhe.
44023023	Itithogon hagakhikhesik, ap tentara opaki doalhe lagoukha meke inoe kok etnogo nen, ap koktek at apma welagoukha meke inebe pere waisasukhasik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Hit nen ap tentara meke inebe 200 men, kuda oba inebe yasukhogo dogolik wim yakharek meke inebe 70 men, sikhe thege baga inakharek meke inebe 200 men, inom doalegat natogorinabiluk nen, yogotak hibako jam 9 o Kaisarea lobageik nen iluk wenago ’bisano.
44023024	Wenago ’bisalok, at Paulus ebe tilogo kuda oba yasutdiluk, ap kok Feliks gubernur etnogo oba wolok lobageik nen, kuda at hasik ageikhe ’bisano, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44023025	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, surat men iluk palogo ’bisikhe,
44023026	“Kok gubernur Feliks noe. An Klaudius Lisias nen surat yi palogo hoba la’i agei iti.
44023027	Ap iti ap Yahudi meke nen ha’iluk wasugun hakma, akhuni nen, At ebe o Roma aierek meke, iluk yoknekhama, an nen nagarumi tentara meke inayoko ’bigirik wogosik lagarik ebe tilhi o.
44023028	Ebe tilhirik, Nikithogon hagakhemo nen wene oba ’biliogei, iluk nilu asik nen iluk, ap it meke Allah hasik wene erlo pilineriogei meke inoba wolok lagei.
44023029	Wolok lagarik, erlo herakho meke re, at ebe wasusak hakene hagakhidegat. Nen, iki herle wasusak hakene, hagakhidegat higi. Ukum it nen oba ’bega iti, it Yahudi meke hagakharek meke hasigat oba ’begama o.
44023030	Meke re, akhuni nen, Ap Yahudi meke nen Paulus ebe wasuogoluk abok palhama o, iluk husupi yoknesi ageikhama nen, ebe hat hoba la’i agei iti. La’i agarik nen, yabokane it ap ukum oba ’biliogei werek, hat hilhanem isuagaluk inasuk warogo la’isa ageiat iti o, ” iluk at Feliks nen surat palhikhe.
44023031	Palhikhemo nen, agarumi tentara meke emenogo nen Paulus ebe wolok wisuagaluk inayoko ’bisikhe hagat, wolok wagoukha. O itinem hibakoat, Paulus wolok, o Antipatris wagoukha.
44023032	Wolok wagoukhasik nen, it kuda oba wageidek meke nen, “Hit kuda baga yasukhogo wagap meke halok, Paulus ebe wolok lani, ” iluk la’isalok nen, it suguluk inapuke o kota Yerusalem o obatneak halekma etnogo lagoukha.
44023033	Lagoukhama, it wolok wagoukha meke emenogo o Kaisarea wagoukhasik nen, surat waganek etnogo ap kok gubernur wogokhukhasik nen, Paulus ebe inom wogokhukha.
44023034	Wogokhukhama, surat waganek etaga thalhikhesik nen, Paulus oba hinok waganhe dogolik, “Hat hai o koma nogo, ” iluk hinok waganhikhesikmo, at nen, “An nai o propinsi Kilikia meke, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44023035	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at nen, “Halok he, ap ukum hoba ’biliogei werek iti inebe yabokane wageikha halok nen hitema waganigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhesik, at agarumi nen, Paulus ebe o kok at Herodes halhikhemo iti kola’iluk therogo dogoagaluk yogeisasikhe.
44024001	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, iniki 4 hari nenwelagoukhasik ageikhe werekma, it ap Allah iteerekmeke inoe kok Ananias men, inarluetek emenogo aperek men, ap ageikhe wene hano anek ekhe lageikhe meke etaga Tertulus men, inom o Kaisarea wagoukha. Wagoukhasik nen, ap kok gubernur Feliks etnogo baga ukisukhasik, ukum Paulus oba ’buogoluk yogokhukha.
44024002	Itithogonyogokhukhasik, Paulus ebe wakhukhasik nen, Tertulus nen ukum oba ’buagaluk, yogokhukhama, at nen Feliks men yogokhikhe, “Gubernur Feliks noe. Hat nen haknisik werek korlek, nit yoma haganeat nen wim dek hano dapukhogon welago. Akhuni nit meke hasik hakla kagalek mothogon hagakhe lagan iti baga yi meke ti meke hano ariogo.
44024003	Hat nen o yi ai ti ai hibiku-yogoku hanorogon hagakhe lagan iti, nit nen, Hano, iluk, heagei motok wathakhe lago. Noe.
44024004	Itithogon meke re, an nen wene uanat yokhekhunem ha’it asinogo iluk, wene ’beroat yokhesigin yi, hobabut hano etnogo nen, hasuk holinok nen, wene ebe yokhesik.
44024005	Ap yi nen, akhuni weagarinabik nukhunem, obabut palho. It akhuni ap Nazaret meke etnogo oporlik liliogei meke inoe kok dogolik, akhuni Yahudi meke o yi ai ti ai welageikharek meke tha’bokhogonat inakla kagalik liliogo.
44024006	Itithogon inakla kagalik nekhe lagasik nen, o Allah ai halek weagatdigiluk hagakhunem ebehakhogo. [Hakhogosik nen, wene nit akhuni Yahudi meke hagakhorek meke baga itema waganuogoluk hagakho.
44024007	Itithogon mekeat, at Lisias ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo wagasik nen, ebe ninikimo nen tilogo wolok lagasik yoma la’i aga iti.
44024008	Itithogon la’i agasik, ukum ap yi oba ’bogo meke ninebe hat hoba wisuagaluk yoknisekhemo wago yi. ] Nit nen wene oba ’bogo meke iti, hat nen itema waganhe dogolik, hilu asiginat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44024009	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, it ap Yahudi meke ebetlake emenogo nen meneke, ukum at oba ’bekhe dogolik, “At Tertulus nen ekhe iti, eberogonat ekhe o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44024010	It nen wene itithogon isukhama at kok gubernur etnogo nen wene Paulus nen ageikhe uagaluk iki pilin yogokhikhe. Yogokhikhemo, at nen, “Noe. Akhuni nit meke, yi ukum ti ukum inoba ’bisinem, haganeat nen yi tahun ti tahun hat nen initema waganogo ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhetek iti an nilu o. Iti nen, wene an noba ’bega iti, dekmaat, iluk, nebe nirlirlirogo harat yokhesigin yi nen, nakla arleken akhekhe lagei.
44024011	An Allah hogorasigiluk o Yerusalem kerat dagagirik oba nen, niniki 12 hari anek welago, meke re, hat nen, Eberogonat a? dek a, iluk it hinok wogeisaumo hilu asiginat o.
44024012	An o Allah ai halekma ukiluk men, o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma ukiluk men, o ukul werlekma dukhi lalok men, akhuni aperek ninom ninane thagalhik, nen, it aperek inane kogat thagaluagaluk inakla kagalhik, hagakhidek. Itithogon hagakhunem it ap Yahudi meke nen inileken niigidegat o.
44024013	It ap yi nen ukum noba ’biliogei iti, Eberogonat hagakhemo, iluk nena meke inugutheagun. Inugutheasak degat asigin o.
44024014	Meke re, wene eberogonat hagakhe lagei meke ebe yi pakhogon yokhesik. It nen, Akhuni Yesus oporlik liliogei iti weak, iluk egarek. Meke re, an anek, it nen, weak egarek meke iti ane holiluk, Allah nit ninopa lak apma ukiluk welagoukha meke itiat ebe hogorakhe lagei iti anek, eberogonat hagakhe lageiat o. Hogorakhe dogolik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti men, ap at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inane men, tha'bokhogonat holal waganogo 'bisukha meke werek iti, eberogonat iluk hago welagei.
44024015	It ap yi nen, Akhuni hano hagariogei meke men, weak hagariogei meke men, inebe watlatluk werekma eberogonat Allah nen inilugurinabigin, iluk, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk werek iti hak, an itithogonat welagei o.
44024016	Itithogon dogolik, nakla nen, Weak ageikhe hagakhi, iluk nakla weak dogunogo iluk, Allah hasik men, akhuni inobasik men, hano hagakhe lagei iluk, nakla thelek dogeigiluk, nobatnerogon hagakhe lagei o.
44024017	An mo dageigik, usigik, tahun doalegat o Yerusalem lageidek welagarik nen, nagarlak lak nerugi ninebe opakiat meke iluk, uang ageikhe yomageisigik, Allah hasik ageikhe 'bisigik, hagasigiluk lagei.
44024018	Lagarik nen, itithogon hagakhe dogolik, o Allah ai halekma ukuogoluk inoba horegarek iti hagat, itithogon hotdiluk nen ukigi. Itithogon hagakhi iti, akhuni doalegat ninom ukigidek. It aperek ninom ninane thagalhidegat werekma it Yahudi meke nen inileken neegaat.
44024019	Meke re, it ap Yahudi meke aperek o propinsi Asia nen lageikhasik etoma welageikhha. Itithogon welageikha nileken hisigirikmo nen, it nenat wene noba 'busak halok he, hat hoba ya witluk nen ukum noba 'busak meke.
44024020	It inebe dek halok he, it ap yoma werek meke nen uak. Akhuni nen it ap Yahudi Allah hasik wene erlo pilinekharek meke inoba 'bani lageikhasik, etoma metek werek korlek wene erlo herakha. Itithogon herakhunem, an weak hagakhi meke ageikhe eberogonat inasuk holha meke nenat uak o.
44024021	An etoma metek dogolik, wene opakiat yi anek nane kokhogon yogeisigi iti, Akhuni watlageikharek meke Allah nen eberogonat inilugurinabigin, iluk hutdekhe lagei iti nen, ukum noba ’bekhe lagap yi, iluk yogeisugunem anek inasuk holha iti, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44024022	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Feliks akhuni Yesus oporlik lageikharek wene iti ilu etnogo nen, Paulus men yogokhikhe, “Yogotak wene arat ogo. Yabokane ap tentara inoe kok Lisias etnogo ebe waga halok nen, ukum hoba ’bega meke iti, an nen wene erlo herago ilokon wasigin o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44024023	Itithogon yogokhikhesik, at agarumi tentara kok ageikhe nen Paulus ebe therogo dogoagaluk men yogokhikhe, “Hat nen Paulus hago dogolik, yugunat nekhe dogoagaluk here’in o. Nen, akhuni at meke nen yi meke ti meke at warlok meke yomakhuogoluk hagakho halok he, wenageisagun o. Here’isekhe dogono, ” iluk asuk wakhikhe.
44024024	At Feliks nen, “Therogo dogono, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, iniki pererlagat welagoukhasik nen, at Feliks age etaga Drusila, he ebe Yahudi meke. Wolok wageikhesik nen, agarumi nen Paulus wagani loagaluk yogeisasikhemo lagoukhasik ebe wolok wagoukhama nen, at Paulus nen akhuni inetaiken Kristus Yesus oba hakotdiluk welageikharek wene iti yogeisugunem, Feliks asuk holek welageikhe.
44024025	Itithogon holek werek korlek, mothogon hagakhe dogosak wene iti men, inetaiken thebekhogon dogosak wene iti men, yabokane Allah nen akhuni ninitema waganiluk ukum ninoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasigin wene iti men, yogeisugunem, Feliks ayuk ageikhe. Ayuk atluk nen, “Yogotak wene arat egen o. Yabokane usak mot aga halok he, wahesigin o, ” iluk apuke la’isikhe.
44024026	Itithogon la’isikhesik, at akla nen, “Paulus nen uang ageikhe woknesigin he a, ” iluk apekhe dogolik, hibiku-yogokuat wakhikhesik nen, wenekak ipisak ekhe lagoukha.
44024027	Itithogon isi korlek, mo dageigik usigik 2 tahun welagoukhasik nen, yabokane Feliks obolukmo ap ageikhe etaga Perkius Festus gubernur asuagaluk meldisukha. Melduogoluk hagakhunem, at Feliks nen, “It akhuni Yahudi meke inakla hanorogo, ” iluk Paulus iki herle waregat here'isikhe.
44025001	Ap Festus etnogo meldisukhama, o Kaisarea etoma wageikhesik nen, iki henagan welageikhesik nen, o Yerusalem lageikhe.
44025002	Lageikhesik werekma, it ap Allah iteerek meke inougi koktek emenogo men, akhuni Yahudi meke inougi koktek inetaga werek aperek men, inom oba ukisukhasik nen, ukum Paulus oba 'bekhe lagoukha meke etnogo yogokhukha. Yogokhe dogolik, aklakageik-kagoukhogon hagakhukha.
44025003	Itithogon hagakhukha iti, at kok agarumi nen Paulus ebe wolok o Yerusalem wisuogoluk wagunem, holagarlem wasuogoluk abok inane opakiat dapukhogon isukhasik nen, at yogokhe dogolik, “Hat hobabut hano nen, nit ninakla hanorogon Paulus ebe o Yerusalem yoma la'itno, ” iluk inane liokhogon kino yogokhukha iti.
44025004	Itithogon yogokhukha mekeat, at Festus nen, “At Paulus iki herle warek o Kaisarea etomaat dogoak o. Werekma, an yoma welageidek ibat ligin o.
44025005	At nen hagasusak dek meke ageikhe hagakhemo halok, hit ap koktek yoma nen ukum oba 'bubageik nen iluk ninomat luok o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44025006	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, iki 8 hari nen a? 10 hari nen a. Inom o Yerusalem welagoukhasik nen, o Kaisareawageikhe. Wageikhesik, hubenke, o akhuni ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe lagoukhama hureklasi ukiluk, agarumi nen Paulus ebe wolok wisuagaluk yogeisasikhe.
44025007	Yogeisasukhama lagoukhasik ebe wolok wagoukhama nen, it ap Yahudi meke o Yerusalem nen wagoukha meke emenogo Paulus ebe dagakhogon metek dogolik, yi ukum ti ukum akin meke doalegat oba ’bisukha. Itithogon mekeat, at weak ageikhe hagakhidek etnogo nen, “Eberogonat weak yigithogon hagakhunem ninileken hogo, ” iluk yogosusak dek ageikhe.
44025008	Itithogon dek ageikhemo, at Paulus nen ebe irlirlirogo men yogokhikhe, “Wene Allah nen nit akhuni Yahudi meke ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo ageikhe thagalogo thogotdilik weak hagakhik, o Allah ai halek etnogo weagatdigik, ninoe kok Kaisar o Roma meke etnogo ane thagalogo thogotdiluk ageikhe weak hagakhik, motok hagakhidek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44025009	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Festus nen, akhuni Yahudi meke inakla hanorogo iluk, Paulus men yogokhikhe, “O Yerusalem etoma nen wene yi hasik an nil oba erlo herakhunem, eberogonat halok an nen ilokon wasik nen, ninom luok a? Ha’it a, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44025010	Yogokhikhemo, at Paulus nen, “An yogotak wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakharekma yoma, ninoe kok Kaisar Roma meke ikimo welagei. Halok he, ukum noba ’bega meke yi, at werekma etoma nenat erlo herago ilokon wasuak. An nen it Yahudi meke weak ageikhe hagarinakhidek iti, hat hiluat o.
44025011	An nen ageikhe hagasusak dek meke hagakhik, weak hagakhunem inebe motok inakharek meke hagakhik, eberogonat hagatlema, Nasusak morat o. Natni, iluk ile. Meke re, it ap yoma nen wene noba dekmaat ’biliogei iti nen, it aperek nen, it ap yi inakla hanorogo iluk, an nebe it inikimo ’banusak erlok dek o. Noe Kaisar nenat wene iti erlo herago ilokon wasuak o, ”iluk yogokhikhe.
44025012	Yogokhikhemo, ap aperek at Festus inom dogolik, “Yigithogon hagasuok, tigithogon hagasuok, ” iluk inom ekhe lagoukha meke inom nen, “Itithogon hagasuok, ” isukhasik nen Paulus men yogokhikhe, “Hat nen, Wene yi, ap Kaisar nen erlo herago ilokon wasuak o, iluk egen iti nen, Kaisar oba la'agaginat o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44025013	Itithogon isukhasik nen, iniki pererlagat werekma nen, ap kok etagapogot Agripa eru Bernike ipisagat, ap Festus heagei wasuogoluk oba o Kaisarea wagoukha.
44025014	Wagoukhasik iniki aperek inom etoma werekma, at Festus etnogo nen, wene Paulus hasik Agripa men yogokhikhe, “Ap Feliks nen ap ageikhe iki herle warek here'isikhe meke yoma werek.
44025015	Werek korlek, an o Yerusalem lageima, it ap Yahudi meke Allah iteerek inougi koktek men, inarluetek men, inom noba wageikhasik nen, an nen ap iti ukum oba 'biluk ebe wasuagaluk yoknekha.
44025016	Yoknekha meke re, an nen oko men yogeisigi, Nit akhuni Roma meke hagakhorek he, ap ageikhe wene oba 'bisinem, it wene oba 'bugun werek nen ap iti ebe yogokhunem, at nen oko it yogeisigidekma, inebe inasuagaluk wogeisausak dek, iluk yogeisigi.
44025017	Itithogon yogeisigirik, inebe ninom yoma wagosik, niniki welageidegat, hubenke nagarumi nen ap iti o akhuni ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakharekma wolok wisuagaluk yogeisigi.
44025018	Itithogon yogeisigima, lageikhasik ebe wolok wageikhama, at ebe turlem meldiluk, it ap emenogo melatluk nen, motok weak hagakhe meke ukum oba 'bugun apigi meke, itithogon oba 'bigidek.
44025019	'Bigidek meke re, it nen inopase Allah obainetaiken hakotdiluk dogolik inane inasokhotek egarek meke hasik ukum ageikhe oba ’bigik, ap ageikhe etaga Yesus iti, ebe watlageikhe mekeat, at Paulus nen, Yabokane apuke iluk ageikhesik werek o, iluk ane obatnerogon iliogo iti nen ukum oba ’bigik, hagakha o.
44025020	Ukum itithogon oba ’bega meke iti, an wene iti hasik hutdigidek. Nobakha palagama nen, an nen Paulus men yogokhi, O Yerusalem lalok nen, wene yi erlo herago, an nen ilokon wasik nen, luok a? Ha’it a, iluk yogokhi.
44025021	Yogokhima, at Paulus nen, Wene yi at Kaisar nen erlo herago ilokon wasuak nen niki herle waregat here’aninok o, iluk ekhemo, an nen nagarumi men yogeisigi, At Kaisar oba la’usak aga halok, la’iginmo, iki herle waregat hago dogono, iluk yogeisigima werek, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44025022	Yogokhikhemo, at Agripa nen, “Ap iti ane an nasuk dopokhogon holusak warlok o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Festus nen, “Halok he, huben halok at ane hasuk holinok o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44025023	Yogokhikhemo, hubenke ap Agripa he Bernike ipisak hogorinakhe korlek, it ap tentara inougi koktek men, ap o etoma meke inetaga werek meke men, inom o ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, ’begarekma etnogo ukisukha. Ukisukhama, at Festus nen agarumi nen Paulus ebe wolok wisuagaluk yogeisasikhe.
44025024	Yogeisasikhemo lagoukhasik ebe wolok wagoukhama, at Festus nen, “Agripa noe. Nen, hit ap aperek ninoba uki agap meke yoma hinom, nagarlak lak nerugi. Ap yi hinileken hegep yi, it akhuni Yahudi meke o Yerusalem nen, yoma nen, inebe tha’bokhogonat nen, an yoknekhe dogolik, Ap yi iluk dogosak dek. Wasusak o, iluk inane kokhogonat iliogei.
44025025	It nen itithogon iliogei mekeat, an nen wene itierlo herakhi meke re, at nen weak ageikhe eberogonat hagakhunem, ukum inoba ’biluk inebe inakharek tak-tagat ageikhe hagakhe dekma higi. Mekeat, at ekaerek nen, Ukum yi ap Kaisar nen erlo herago ilokon wasuak, iluk ekhemo, Kaisar oba la’igiluk igi iti.
44025026	Meke re, wene at oba ’bega meke iti erlo herakhunem, an nen hutdigidek nobakha palagama wene iti hasik holal waganogo ninoe kok Kaisar oba nikithogon la’usak heat agama nen, nagarlak lak. Hit tha’bokhogonat men, ebe kok hak noe Agripa men, hinom nen ukum Paulus oba ’bega meke iti, erlo herakhunem, an hutdiluk holal thekekhogon waganogo la’igin iluk nakla apigirik nen at ebe hinoba wolok wagei yi.
44025027	Itithogon hagakhi iti, wene erlo herago nen, Itigithogon hagakhemo, iluk holal thekekhogon waganhidekma, at iki herle warogo la’usak nen, erlok dek apigirik nen at ebe wolok wagei iti, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44026001	At Agripa nen, Paulus men yogokhikhe, “Wene hat hekaerek hasik yoknetnogoluk yokhikhi, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Paulus iki baga heagei wakhikhesik men yogokhikhe,
44026002	“Agripa noe. Wene it ap Yahudi meke nen ukum noba ’biliogei iti, noba dekmaat o, iluk nebe nirlirlirogo wene hat hil obaat yogotak igin yi, nakla arleken akhekhe lagei.
44026003	Nit akhuni Yahudi meke hagakhorek meke iti men, wene ninane ninasokhotek ogorek meke iti men, tha’bokhogonat hat hilu iti nen, nane harat yokhesigiluk nakla arleken akhekhe lagei o. Halok he, yokhekhe korlek, hakla puk ageidek hasuk holek dogono, noe.
44026004	An nebe elege baga nen akhuni ninukuloak opakiat meke ninom o kota Yerusalem dogolik nobabut erlo baga nen hagakhe lagagi meke iti, it akhuni Yahudi meke tha’bokhogonat inilu o.
44026005	Nit Allah apma ukiluk dogolik hagakhe lago wene iti, it akhuni aperek Farisi meke inawenehago dogolik, yugunat hakene hagakhe korlek, an anek, motok a’bethogon hago dogolik hagakhe lagagi iti, it ap yoma haganeat nen inilu motok o. Halok it nen, Iti eberogonat hagakhe lageikhe mekeat ekhe, iluk yokhesusak he a? Ina’it he a.
44026006	Yogotak ukum noba ’bega meke erlo herasuogoluk metek welagei yi, at Allah nen, Itithogon hanothinabigin, iluk ninopa lak wene warisasikhe wene iti, an nen, Eberogonat hanotninabigin o, iluk netaiken at oba eberek welagei iti hasik, ukum noba ’bega meke erlo herasuogoluk welago yi.
44026007	Alebat nen, nit akhuni Yahudi meke ninukuloak etaga dopok 12 yoma tha’bokhogonat nen, Allah nen, Itithogon hanothinabigin, iluk wene warisasikhe iti, ebe hagarinabuagaluk, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik, dikene hibako, at hogorakho motok welageikharek. An meneke, wene warisasikhe iti eberogonat hagatninabiginat o, iluk eberek welagei iti nenat, it ap Yahudi meke yi nen ukum noba ’biliogei yi, noe, ” iluk at Agripa yogokhikhesik,
44026008	yabokane it ap Yahudi meke yogeisekhe dogolik, “Nagarlak lak. Hit nen, Allah nen akhuni watlageikharek meke eberogonat inilugurinabigin, iluk, hutdu’buk iti nenaluk, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik, Agripa men yogokhikhe,
44026009	“An alep nen, Yesus ai Nazaret meke etaga iti dek asuagaluk yi meke hagakhik, ti meke hagakhik, hagakhe dogoginat o, iluk nakla apasigi.
44026010	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, alebat o Yerusalem dogolik, Allah a’buri iniki herle wasigiluk hagakhigimo nen, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek nen, I o. Hano, iluk surat woknikhukhama, Allah a’buri inebe doalegat iniki herle warogo ’bisigik, inebe inasuogoluk isinem, I o. Inasuogat, iluk igik, ekhe lagagi.
44026011	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, an o akhuni Yahudi meke sembayan egarekma dopok ukiluk, it inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdiluk welagoukha meke here’isoagaluk nane obatnerogon yogeisigik, yi aik ti aikhagarinakhik, hagakhe dogolik, nakla aga apik dageikhe dogolik, it aperek o walegat ilugun-ilugun etoma meke mugusik laga lagagiat, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44026012	“Itithogon inasigiluk hagakhigimo, it ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek nen, Hano, iluk surat waganogo woknikhukhama, o kota Damsyik lagagi iti.
44026013	Agripa noe. Itithogon o dikene holagarlem lagunem, mo a'bi'bal hakene re, erlok dek. A'bi'bal weak meke, an men, ap ninom lagagu meke men, pogot oba nen lia ninaliluke yasi usa'ageikhe.
44026014	Itithogon yasi usa'agunem, nit tha'bokhogonat agat oba ninelokhe thogoumhogo usasugumo, at ageikhe nen ane yoknekhe dogolik, akhuni Ibrani meke ninane baga men isinem nasuk holhigi, Saulus. Saulus. Anat yi aik ti aik hagatnabigiluk muknarek nekhe lagan iti nenaluk. Sapi thegerluk ekat ka'belek meke baga ebe thakhugunem, Na'it, iluk ekaerek nen karlukhogon warekherek iti hak, hat hekaerek nen hebe itithogonat weagarakhekhe lagan o, iluk yoknikhikhe.
44026015	Itithogon yoknikhikhemo, an nen, Eiye. Noe. Hat tha, iluk yogokhigi. Yogokhunem ninoe Etagapogot iti nen, An Yesus. Yi aik ti aik hagatnabigiluk muknarek nekhe lagan meke etnogoat o.
44026016	Meke re, hebe melasin. An nebe helokhoma melasi agei yi. Hat hebe an natuaneke atluk dogolik, yogotak hileken neegen meke men, yabokane nebe helokhoma melagunem neagein meke men, akhuni aperek yogeisekhe dogonogoluk, hayoko 'bigi iti.
44026017	-
44026018	Akhuni Yahudi meke men, it itikmanke meke men, hasuogoluk hagakhunem, an nen tilhakhe dogogin o. It itikmanke meke inileken puk werek iti 'bekelogo hagarinakhik, inebe omummo werek iti inelokhe hebenogo lia baga ’bisa ageik, Iblis iki baga werek iti, Allah iki baga ’bisa ageik, hagatnok nen iluk inoba la’agagin o. La’agumo, it inetaiken an noba hakotdumo, it weak hagariogei meke iti, at Allah nen thagalogo degetdisigik, An na’buri iluk, inebe woginakhik, hagasigin o, iluk yoknikhikhe, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44026019	Itithogon yogokhikhesik, ageikhe men yogokhikhe, “Iti nen, Agripa noe. Allah nen Yesus nelokhoma melasuagaluk la’i ageikhe meke iti, ane hologo hagakhe dogeigiluk nobatnerogo hagakho motok welagei.
44026020	Wene iti, ebekeram it akhuni Yahudi meke o Damsyik etoma welagoukha meke yogeisasigi. Yabokane o Yerusalem lalok dogolik, it etoma meke yogeisigik, o propinsi Yudea meke tha’bokhogonat yogeisigik, hagakhigisik, it itikmanke meke yogeisilik nekhe lagei. Itithogon yogeisilik nekhe dogolik, Weak hagakhe lagap meke here’isalok hinobabut hebelogo hinelokhe Allah wogotno o. Hinelokhe Allah wogotluk nen, hinobabut akhuni inobabut hebelatluk hagakharek hagat, hagakhe dogono o, iluk yogeisekhe lagei iti.
44026021	Yogeisekhe lagei iti nenat, an Allah ai halekma ukiluk werekma, it ap Yahudi meke nen nebe ha’aniluk nasuogoluk hagakhukha.
44026022	Nasuogoluk hagakhukha mekeat, Allah nen haknarek motok werekma, an yogotak yoma metek dogolik hit ap koktek men, hinagarumi men, wene an nen yokhisekhe lagei yi. Wene yi haganeat nen, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen men, at Musa nen men, Yabokane itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk isukha mekeat yokhisekhe lagei o.
44026023	It nen, Kristus ebe watlatluk nen, at tak iluk atluk, wene liarinabigin wene iti, akhuni Yahudi meke yogeisigik, itikmanke meke yogeisigik, igin o, iluk isukhasik holal waganogo ’bisukha iti hagat, an nen ekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44026024	At Paulus ebe irlirlirogo wene itithogon isikhesik ageikhe igin hak, at Festus nen ane kokhogonat, “Paulus! Hunu-hunu agan higi. Hat nen yi wene ti wene doalegat yakulhe lagan iti nen hunu-hunu asuagaluk hagathakhemo higi, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44026025	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Paulus nen, “Festus noe. An hunu-hunu agarik ekhe lagei dek o. Hano dogolik wene eberogonat yokhisekhe lagei o, ” iluk isikhesik,
44026026	“Agripa noe. Wene yi tha’bokhogonat hat hilu iti nen, an hat hil oba nayuk dekhogon ekhe lagei. Wene iti, o limagoma hagatlageidek. Ekagat hagatlageikhe iti nen, wene iti ageikhe hat hokodek welagan, iluk nakla apekhe lagei dek o.
44026027	Agripa noe. Wene it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen isukha iti, eberogonat iluk apekhe lagan dek nogo? Eberogonat iluk apekhe laganat o. An nilu, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44026028	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Agripa nen, “An nebe yogotak ya ibat Kristen meke asuagaluk, hat nen hagatnabigin iluk apekhe lagan a? Erlok dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44026029	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at Paulus nen, “Yogotak ya a? Dogoluk nen a. Hat men, hit aperek nane yogotak holhe lagap meke hinebe tha’bokhogonat men, an niki herle warek welagei yi hakene anek hinoba ageidek, an welagarek hak hagatlasubageik iluk Allah ayoko ’bekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44026030	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, at etagapogot Agripa etnogo men, at kok gubernur Festus etnogo men, he Bernike etnogo men, it aperek inom hurek welagoukha meke tha’bokhogonat men, inebe melatluk
44026031	dukhisukhasik nen, it-it ekhe dogolik, “Ap iti iki herle wakhik, ebe wakhik, hagasusak hakene weak ageikhe hagakhidekmaat o, ” iluk isukha.
44026032	Itithogon isukhasik, at Agripa nen Festus yogokhe dogolik, “Paulus nen, Wene noba ’bega meke yi, at Kaisar nen erlo herago ilokon wasuak o, iluk igidek dogolepma, nit nen iki herle hisalilo, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
44027001	It nen nit imake ku baga o Italia la’inanisuogoluk, wene arat palhukhasik nen, ap tentara doalegat Kaisar agarumi opaki doalhe lagoukha meke inoe kok etaga Yulius nen Paulus men, akhuni iniki herle warek meke aperek men, wogosik wisuagaluk iki baga ’bisukha.
44027002	Itithogon inebe at iki baga ’bisukhama, ku ebe o Adramitium nen wolok wagoukhasik werekma, akhuni o propinsi Asia ku ukekherek obake dopok usa’isilik wisuogoluk hagakhunem, ap Aristarkhus, ai o propinsi Makedonia o kota etaga Tesalonika meke ninom, ku iti akla ukisugusik wagagu.
44027003	Ukisugusik waga dogolik, hubenke o Sidon wagagu. Wagagusik, at Yulius etnogo nen, Paulus ebe akmutdisikhesik men yogokhikhe, “Hat yi meke ti meke aperek dek halok he, hagarlak lak nen wokhesuagaluk inoba ukilik lan o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo lageikhe.
44027004	Lageikhesik wageikhesik nen, o etoma nen, imake ku baga waga dogolik, hisakne ninelokhomake nen laga lageikhemo, i eken palekma etaga Siprus iti abel ebelake nen, hisakne laberogo iluk itike wagagu.
44027005	Etoma nen wagagusik nen, o propinsi Kilikia nen piokhogon propinsi Pamfilia mot etoma i uan iti aik yi baga italitluk nen, o propinsi Likia kota etaga Mira iti wagagu.
44027006	Etoma nen ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo nen ku ageikhe o Aleksandria meke o Italia wisuogoluk hagakhunem, herakhikhesik nen, ku nit wagagu etnogo baga nen, ku iti baga woknisik ukisikhe.
44027007	Woknisik ukisikhesik, niniki ageikhe noge igik, ageikhe noge igik, erogat waga lagagusik, wisusak erlok dek hakene hagatlageikhe mekeat, o etaga Knidus mot-mot wagagu. Wagagusik, hisakne nen mothogon wisusak dek ageikhemo nen, nomokhogon, i eken palekma etaga Kreta iti abel ebelake hisakne laberogo iluk, Salmone agouwakma iti thogotdiluk piokthek wagagu.
44027008	Ninoba wiik-weakhogon waga lagagusik, o kota Lasea nen horogat etoma o ageikhe etaga, “Ku hano hol kilogo hagarekma, ” iluk egarek oba etoma wagagu.
44027009	Etoma wagagusik, niniki doalegat welagagu. Dogolik, akhuni Yahudi meke nen, “Nit weak hagakhorek meke Allah nen thagalogo degetdisalok yabokane ninom hano ago, ” iluk inakla eberogo hipiri nikidek werlegat welageikharek oba tak-tagat welagagusik nenat, imake ku baga hanorogo wisusak degat, i lausak hakene hagatlageikhemo, at Paulus nen,
44027010	“Nagarlak lak. An nakla nen, Nit ku baga piokhogon lugun halok, motogat alomatlasugun o. Iti re, yi meke ti meke ku akla ukharlek meke anek weak ageik, ku ebe weak ageik, hagasigin ’buk. At he, akhuni ninebe inomat i lageik, hagasugun apekhe lagei o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44027011	Itithogon yogeisasikhe mekeat he, ap tentara inoe kok etnogo nen Paulus ane thagalogo thogotdisalok, it ap yabu ku baga hagakhe lagoukha meke inoe kok iti men, ku ilu meke wolok nekherek meke iti men, ipisak inane holhikhe.
44027012	O weak oba ku hol etoma kilogo ’biluk motok dogosak erlok dek iti nen, it ap yabu ku baga hagakhe lagoukha meke inebe doalegat hak nen, “O kota etaga Feniks lausak halok he, lalok, o weak oba o etoma hano dogosak, ” iluk wene palhukha. Wene itithogon palhukha iti, i eken palekma etaga Kreta etoma, o Feniks i alukutla etoma o mo korokhogon ukekherek mot abel upuke ape palegat, wemake ape palegat werekma, ku hol kilogo ’biluk hano welageikharek iti nen isukha.
44027013	Nit etoma werekma, hisakne i laut mot-mot nen erogat hubetha ageikhemo, it ap yabu ku baga hagakhe lagoukha meke nen, “Nit luogoluk ogo etnogo arat lausak hagatlaga, ” iluk ku hol kilik meke hisalogo wolok nen, i eken palekma etaga Kreta aliluke horokhogon wagagu.
44027014	Meke re, horogat wagagu hakene, hisakne etaga werek meke o mo dagei agarek mot abel upuke i aik oba mothogon nen aninirogo motok hubetha ageikhe.
44027015	Hubetha ageikhemo nen, ku ukul hisakne aninirogo wageikhemoke mothogon wolok wisusak erlok dek ageikhemo nen, itike mothogon wolok wageidek thogotdisalok werekma, hisakne nen nomokhogon woknisik wageikhe.
44027016	Woknisik wageikhemo nen, ku eagarlak meke ku kok meke nen lisogo wolok lagarek meke iti a’bethogonnikithogon herle thomasusak heat hagatlageikhemo nen, i eken palekma ’bugurlagat meke etaga Kauda iti hisakne laberogo negen abel wemake nomokhogon waga dogolik, ku eagarlak meke etnogo herle lisogo erlok thomakhukha.
44027017	Itithogon thomakhukhasik, ku kok meke oba ’bisukha. Oba ’biluk nen, ku kok meke etnogo ebe a’bethogon iluk kupi ku abel akmanke legerogo herle thomakhukha. Thomakhukhasik, o Libia mot-mot etoma i etoatma hisakne nen i al etaga Sirtis oba kekethogon ’binani launogo iluk, inayuk nen, su hisakne nen wogosik loagaluk liakharek meke iti usa’i agoukhama nen, hisakne nen yugunat woknisik wageikhe.
44027018	Itithogon wagunem, hisakne nen motok hulalek-dekalek woknisik wagunem, hubenke ku ebe alhe asuagaluk yi meke ti meke akla ukharlek welageikhe meke aperek hiselogo ima ula’isekhe lagoukha.
44027019	Ula’isekhe lagoukhasik, hubenke, it ap yabu ku baga hagakhe lagoukha meke nen, ku hol men, yi meke ti meke aperek men, inekaerek iniki nen hiselogo ula’isasukhaat.
44027020	Itithogon ula’isasukhasik, niniki doalegat hisakne aninirogo hulalek-dekalek hubetha ago motogat hagakhe lageikhemo, mo men, husagal men, ninileken liakhigidegat dogolik, nit ninakla nen, “Nit alebat hano woknisik lugun apekhe lago etnogo, yogotak i lugun higi, ” iluk ninakla weak atluk huk agagu.
44027021	Itithogon ninakla weak atluk hipiri haganeat nen nikidek werlegat werekma, at Paulus ebe inakerlekla melageikhesik nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarlak lak. O eken palekma Kreta nen, Luok dek, iluk hinasuk wakhi etnogo, an nane holilepma, yi meke ti meke weak ageik, nuk ageik, hagakho iti, hagatlo dek o.
44027022	-
44027024	Meke re, nagarlak lak. An nebe iteerek Allah atma, an nen at hogorakherek meke nen, malaikat ageikhe yogotak hibako noba la’i agama nen, nalilu melasi aga. Melasi agasik, men yoknekhe, Paulus. Hayuk dekhogon dogono o. Hat yabokane Kaisar elokhoma melasi lausak iti nen, akhuni ethoma tha’bokhogonat hinom ku baga laga lagap meke, at Allah obabut hano nen hat akmurogo hinomat tilhinabigin o, iluk yoknekhe iti nen, nagarlak lak. Hinetaiken hapukhogon dogobageik iluk, wene yi yokhisak. Ninebe ageikhe i lugun motok dek o. Meke re, ku ebe anek alomatlasigin o.
44027025	Halok he, nagarlak lak. Allah nen yoknekhe iti hagat, eberogonat hagatlasigin iluk, netaiken at oba hakotdiluk welagei iti nen, hit hinetaiken hapukhogon dogono o.
44027026	Meke re, i eken palekma ageikhe aik oba kekethogon ’binani ligin o, ” iluk yoknisasikhe.
44027027	I Adria yekelek agoum obake hisakne nen woknisik waga korlek, niniki 13 hari nen noge isugusik, hari ageikhe baga o eketurlem hakene it ap yabu ku baga hagakhe lagoukha meke emenogo inakla nen, “I aik oba horogat asi ago higi, ” iluk apasukha.
44027028	Itithogon apasukhasik nen, “I agouk werek a? Eto a, ” iluk walegeke helekit kilogo usa’isukhama nen, 40 meter uanat welageikhe. Itithogon usa’isukhama, horok etoma wagagusik nen, walegeke yabokane usa’isukha meke re, 30 meter herlekha’bugat etoat hakene welageikhe.
44027029	Itithogon welageikhe iti nen, it nen, “Ku helekit oba dikhogon hagatlasinogo, ” iluk, hol kilogo dogoagaluk, ku hago akin meke 4 oba ku agamake nen herle kilogo i akla i al oba tunhogo usa’isukha. Usa’iluk nen, “O ibat wi atnek e, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
44027030	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, it ap yabu ku baga hagakhe lagoukha meke emenogo ku here’isalok lo dukhuogoluk he, it akhuni aperek yogeisasukha, “Nit nen ku akin meke ku ukulmoke nen herle kilogo usa’i lugun, ” iluk inekalat isukhasik, ku eagarlak meke etnogo herle kilogo ima usa’isukha.
44027031	Ima usa’isukhama, at Paulus nen, ap tentara meke inoe kok etnogo men, agarumi emenogo men, yogeisekhe dogolik, “It ap yoma ku kok yi baga dogogun dek halok he, hit hinebe tha’bokhogonat tilagun dek higi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44027032	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen, ku eagarlak etnogo hol kilogo welageikhe meke ’bogokhogon la’isukhama i lageikhe.
44027033	O wi asigiluk hagakhe korlek, Paulus nen it tha’bokhogonat hipiri noagaluk men yogeisasikhe, “Hit hinakla nen, Nit nikithogon hagatlasugun, iluk hinakla munini ebekhe dogolik hiniki 14 hari oba hipiri nikidek welagap iti.
44027034	Meke re, hit hinebe opakiat i lageik, hinoba hemurlugat halok ageikhe weak ageik, hagatlasigin motok dek o. Halok he, hano tilobageik nen, hipiri ageikhe nobageik iluk yokhisigi, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44027035	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, roti ageikhe ikimo waganhikhesik nen, it tha’bokhogonat inil oba Allah heagei warogo, at tak kusogo nasikhe.
44027036	At tak nasikhemo, it inetaiken hapuk iluk nen, inebe tha’bokhogonat hipiri nilik lagoukha.
44027037	Ku iti baga, ninebe doalegat 276 wagagu.
44027038	Ninelabut nina’ithogon nasugusik, ku ebe alhe asuagaluk gandum eken ku akla ukharlek welageikhe meke hiselogo ima usa’isukha.
44027039	O wi ageikhemo nen, it ap yabu ku baga hagakhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, i aik oba inileken lakhasukha mekeat, o koma heat inobakha palageikhe. Inobakha palageikhesik inileken lakhasukha nen, i alukutla lelaga talek werekma lakhasukhasik, men isukha, “Ku ebe ethoma thekekhogon warik lausak erlok a? Erlok dek a. Walhauwok, ” iluk isukha.
44027040	Itithogon isukhasik, ku ebe eta huk dogoagaluk ku akin meke usakhukha meke etnogo, kupi tirliphogon ima usa’isukha. Usa’isukhasik ku thoat ageikhe, ku ukul hebelhe lagoukha meke iti kupi hisalogo nen, hisakne nen ku ukulmoke mothogon i aik obake wolok loagaluk, su ku ukulmoke meke lia’isukha.
44027041	Lia’isukhama, hisakne nen wolok i etoat lelagama etoma ku dikhogon hagatlageikhe. Dikhogon hagatlageikhemo, ku ukulmoke obatnerogon wakhe lageikhemo nen, agamake, i hoklabu nen wakhe dogolik hemurlugat weagatdigik, hemurlugat weagatdigik, motok weagatdisikhe.
44027042	Itithogon hagatlageikhemo nen, it ap tentara emenogo nen, it iniki herle warek meke emenogo lo kume dukhinogo iluk nen, inebe inasuogoluk hagakhukha.
44027043	Itithogon inasuogoluk hagakhukha mekeat, it inoe kok etnogo nen Paulus tiligiluk nen, “Itithogon hagasusak dek o, ” iluk wene palhikhe. Wene palhikhesik nen, “Kume hinilu meke tak pok hayokhogon ima usalok i aik oba dukhi lani o.
44027044	Nen, hit ato o kagalek yoma men, ku misalek meke yoma men, hiniki hakhigik, wolok, inoporlik dukhi lani o, ” iluk yoknisasikhe. Yoknisasikhemo, itithogonat ninebe tha’bokhogonat tilogo i aik obake hano dukhisugu.
44028001	Ninebe tilogo i aik obake dukhisugusik werekma, itakhuni etoma meke nen, “O i eken palekma yi etaga Malta, ” iluk yoknisasukha.
44028002	Yoknisasukhasik, inakla arlekenhogo wokninakhukhasik o miso wageikhemo nen, ayike nen thogei isakhoagaluk hetu mokalogo ’binanhukha.
44028003	Hetu mokalogo ’binanhukhama dogolik, at Paulus nen hali therle kokhogon natogotdiluk nen, hetumo hunhunem, warlo pelal ageikhe hetu aik nen dukhi ageikhesik, Paulus iki aik paldisikhesik, hunik motok huk ageikhe.
44028004	Iki baga hunik werekma, akhuni inaierek meke emenogo inileken halok, it-it ekhe dogolik, “Ap yi akhuni inakherek meke o. Ima nen tilogo dukhi aga mekeat he, su inamokareke etaga Ukum, akhuni inebe inakherek meke etnogo nen, At ebe iluk dogosak dek, iluk, wakhe yi, ” iluk isukha.
44028005	Itithogon ekhe korlek Paulus ebe weak ageik, watlageik, ageidek dogolik, warlo pelal etnogo iki nen hisakhogon hetumo kola'isikhe.
44028006	Itithogon hagakhikhemo, it akhuni emenogo nen, “Ebe hisigin a? At he, opaki hasigat tunhogo watlasigin a, ” iluk apasukhasik, inileken welagoukha welagoukha, ebe itithogon hagatlageidek nen, “Ap yi akhuni hakene dek. Elalin meke higi, ” iluk isukha.
44028007	Itithogon hagakhugu baga nen, o horogat etoma, ap kok etaga Publius agat iteerek meke, nit ap huso oba lagagumo, at nen ninebe hanorogo wokninakhikhemo, niniki henagan at ninom welagagu.
44028008	O at werekma etoma, at opase oba agaken ageikhesik, al pirlak mep inom laga dogolik, witik motok welageikhe. Witigat werekma, at Paulus oba ukisikhesik iki ha'iluk, Allah ayoko 'bisikhemo, oba hano ageikhe.
44028009	Itithogon hano ageikhemo, it akhuni o i eken palekma etoma meke u waganhe lagoukha meke aperek Paulus oba wagoukhama, hagarinakhunem inoba hano agoukhaat.
44028010	Itithogon hano hagarinakhe lageikhemo, it akhuni emenogo nen, heagei warogo yi meke ti meke doalegat woknisasukhasik nen, yabokane nit o etoma thogotdiluk imake wisuogoluk hagakhunem, yi meke ti meke holagarlem amene woknisasukhaat.
44028011	O etoma dogolik, tugi henagan welagagusik nen, ku ageikhe ukulmo kaneke hulupmio pere meke inalino hagarogo 'bisukha meke, o Aleksandria nen haganeat wolok wagoukhasik, o weak werek nen i eken palekma etoma welagoukhasik, yoma wisuogoluk hagakhunem akla ukisugu.
44028012	Ukisugusik o etoma nen o Sirakusa wagagusik nen, niniki henagan welagagu.
44028013	Welagagusik, o etoma nen, ku baga i yoarlemake nen o kota etaga Regiumwagagu. Wagagusik werekma, hubenke hisakne i laut mothogon waga lageikhemo, o aheke hak, o kota etaga Putioli wagagusik agat oba dukhisugu.
44028014	O Putioli etoma Allah a’buri meke aperek werekma ninom abuk agagusik, it nen he, “Ninom dogouok o, ” iluk ninayoko ’bisukhama, niniki 7 hari nen ninom welagagu iti. Welagagusik o etoma nen o kota Roma wisuogoluk wagagu.
44028015	Wagunem, it akhuni aperek nen, “It wiriogei, ” iluk isukhama, Allah a’buri o Roma meke nen inasuk holhukhasik, ninakorlem it aperek Pasar Apius, laga korlek, aperek o hotel ap huso witluk, noge egarekma o ebe henagan halekma etoma lagoukhama, at Paulus ileken hisalok nen, Allah heagei wakhikhesik nen akla hano ageikhe.
44028016	Etoma nen o kota Roma arat wagagumo, it ap koktek nen, “Paulus asokneat dogoak. Werek korlek, ap tentara meke opakiat nen therogo dogoak, ” iluk isukha.
44028017	Itithogon isukhama, niniki henagan welagagusik nen, at Paulus nen, it akhuni Yahudi meke inougi koktek natogosi isuagaluk inayoko ’bisikhe. Inayoko ’bisikhemo, inebe arat natogosi agoukhama, at nen, men yogeisasikhe, “Nagarlak lak. An nen, akhuni nit meke weak ageikhe hagarinakhidek. Nen, nit nen ninopa lak hagakhe lagoukha iti hak hagakhorek iti meke thogotdiluk weak hagakhidegat. Itithogon mekeat he, o Yerusalem etoma nen nebe ha’anhukhasik, niki herle warogo, akhuni Roma meke iniki baga ’banhukha.
44028018	Itithogon ’banhukhama, it ap koktek nen wene erlo herakhe dogolik, Ap yi, ebe wasusak hakene ageikhe hagakhidek higi, iluk herle hisalnabuogoluk hagakhukha.
44028019	Itithogon hagakhukha mekeat, it ap Yahudi meke nen, Dek o, iluk inane obatnerogon isukha iti nen, an nen, Ukum noba ’bega meke yi, Kaisar nen erlo herago ilokon wasuak o, iluk yogeisasigi o. Itithogon isigi iti an nen ukum ageikhe it nagarlak lak inoba 'bigiluk isigi dek o.
44028020	Nit akhuni Israel meke nen, Ap ageikhe wisigin o, iluk ninetaiken at oba welagorek etnogo hasigat, niki herle warogo ’banhukhama welagei yi. Iti nenat, hit hinebe noba wagunem wene yokhisagaluk hinayoko ’bigi iti o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44028021	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it nen, “Akhuni o Yudea etoma nen surat hat hobasik ninoba la’i ageidek. Nen, nit ninagarlak lak aperek o etoma nen wageikhasik, wene hat hobasik yoknisigik, habok weak igik, i ageidegat o.
44028022	Meke re, wene hat waganhetik hagakhe lagan iti hasik, akhuni o yi ai ti ai meke nen, Wene iti weak, ugunem anek, ninasuk holhe lago iti nen, wene hat nen eberogonat apekhe lagan meke iti hekaerek nen nit yoknisugunem ninasuk holusak warlok o, ” iluk yogokhukha.
44028023	Itithogon yogokhukhasik, “Nit niniki iti baga nen yabokane hoba wisugun o, ” iluk wene warikhukha. Wene warikhukhasik nen, iniki iti baga inebe doalekma, o Paulus welageikhemo oba wagoukha. Wagoukhama, o huben nen logat hibako wene Allah apma ’bisekherek wene etnogo yogeisekhoat welageikhe. Yogeisekho dogolik, it nen Yesus hagakhikhe wene iti eberogonat iluk hutduagaluk, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene Musa nen holal waganogo ’bisikhe etnogo baga men, ap aperek Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen holal waganogo ’bisukha etnogo baga men, inasuk wakhe lageikhe.
44028024	Itithogon yogeisugunem nen, it ebetlake wene iti eberogonat iluk waganhukha. Mekeat, it ebetlake nen waganhidek.
44028025	Itithogon hagakhukhasik, it-it inane inasokhotek tomok thagalik-thagalik kikil wasuogolukhagakhunem nen, at Paulus nen wene opakiat ageikhe yi yogeisasikhe, “Wene Allah Agoreke nen ninopa lak Yesaya nen yogeisoagaluk yogokhikhemo, yogeisekhe lageikhe iti, mothogon yogeisasikhemo higi.
44028026	Allah nen, Akhuni ethoma inoba lalok nen, wene yi yogeisano. Hinasuk holek dogogun mekeat, hutukhogon hutdekhe dogogun dek o. Nen, hinileken 'birogo dogogun mekeat, hutukhogon hekhe dogogun degat o.
44028027	It akhuni yi, inileken higik, inasuk holhik, inakla ebekhik, hagatluk nen, yabokane inobabut hebelumo an nen hanorinabunogo iluk nen, it nen inakla puk ageik, inasuk dogou-dogou hagakhik, inileken puk uagaluk ineram nenat puk-puk hagakhik, hagakhukha o,\rq (Yesaya 6:9-10)\rq* iluk Allah Agoreke nen isikhemo, Yesaya nen holalwaganhikhe, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
44028028	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik, wene ilokon warogo men yogeisasikhe, “Itithogon isikhe iti nen, wene yi hinilu asubageik iluk yokhisak, Allah nen akhuni aperek nen, at nen tilinakherek wene iti, it akhuni itikmanke meke yogeisa loagaluk inayoko 'bekhemo yogeisiliogei. It itithogon yogeisugunem, inasuk hologo hagasugun o, iluk hinilu asubageik iluk yokhisigi iti o, ” iluk Paulus nen yogeisasikhe. [
44028029	Itithogon yogeisasikhemo, it ap Yahudi meke emenogo kikil wakhe dogolik, it-it inane kogat thagalik thagalik kikil wakhukha. ]
44028030	At Paulus o Roma etoma dogolik, o halek ageikhe elanma hasik dogeigiluk oko 'bisikhesik, 2 tahun etomawerekma, akhuni doalegat at 'bikhauwogoluk oba waga lagoukha. Wagunem, at nen inebe tha'bokhogonat hano woginakhe lageikhe.
44028031	Itithogon woginakhunem, it aperek nen wenagakhidek werek korlek, at ayuk dek pakhogonat wene Allah nen apma 'bisekherek wene etnogo yogeisigik, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hagakhe lageikhe wene etnogo yakulisigik, ekhe lageikhe.
45001001	Hit Allah a’buri o Roma welagap meke nagarlak lak nerugi. At Allah hinebe akmu meke tha’bokhogonat an Paulus Kristus Yesus atuaneke meke etnogo nen wene holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei iti o. An nen hano wene etnogo akhuni yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk Allah nen wenago meldanhikhesik la’ani ageikhe o.
45001002	Muk haganeat Allah nen, “Wene hano wene iti, yabokane winam asigin o, ” iluk abok it ap at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo yogeisugunem, it nen Allah ane waganek etnogo baga holal waganogo ’bekhe lagoukha.
45001003	-
45001004	Wene holal waganogo ’bisukha iti, ebe re, Allah a’but ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hasigat o. Akhuni itaklageikharek hak, ebe Daud nen itago meke nen itaklageikhe. Mekeat he, ebewatlageikhesikmo nen, Allah Agoreke obatne baga ilugutdisikhe iti baga, Allah a’burat o, iluk ekagat ageikhe iti.
45001005	At watlageikhesikmo nen Allah Agoreke nen ilugutdisikhe iti baga, an nen yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok inetaiken at Yesus oba hakotdiluk ane hologo hagakhe dogosak meke yakulisugunem, at etaga kok asuagaluk Allah obabut hano nen nayoko ’biluk la’ani ageikhe o.
45001006	Akhuni yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok iti, hit akhuni o Roma meke hinom hasigat o. Hit hinebe Yesus Kristus agarumi asuagaluk hinayoko ’bisikheat o.
45001007	Hinebe at ekaerek ’binageiluk hinayoko 'bisikhemo welagap o. Iti nen, an nen wene holal waganogo hinoba la’i aga dogolik, Ninopase Allah men, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus men, ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, hagakhe dogoak o iluk, igi o.
45001008	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ebe yokhisak nen, alebageik yi tak yokhisak. Akhuni o yi ai ti ai eloma nen, hit tha’bokhogonat hinabok hano ekhe dogolik, “It akhuni o Roma meke inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdiluk welageikharek o, ” iluk egarek iti nen, Yesus Kristus oba, “Nopase Allah, ” iluk heagei wakhe lagei.
45001009	Itithogon heagei wakhe dogolik, hit hinobasik kamotdigidek sembayan isi motok welagei meke, at Allah ilu o. An Allah apma dogolik, hano wene at a’but hagakhe lageikhe wene iti akhuni yogeisilik nekherek iti, netaiken oba nen, at Allah hasik hagatdisekhe lagei o.
45001010	Sembayan itithogon ekhe dogolik, at Allah nen hano apalok, “It inoba lano, ” iluk yoknetluk woknarik wisuagaluk kino yogokho motok welagei o.
45001011	Hit hinetaiken horle asuagaluk, Allah Agoreke nen wogeisekherek meke iti, hit ageikhe wokhisagaluk ’bithisa etle, apekhe lagei o.
45001012	An wokhisa etle apekhe lagei iti, hit men, an men, ninetaiken Yesus Kristus oba hakotdisugu meke iti baga, ninetaiken ago wat-wat hagasuogoluk wisigiluk apekhe lagei o.
45001013	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An nen, akhuni itikmanke meke aperek o yi ai ti ai eloma wene yogeisekhe lagagimo waganhukha hak, hit meneke, itithogonat waganubageik iluk niki doalegat oba hinoba wisigiluk apekhe lagei mekeat he, nagolak palek nen huk aga lagei iti hinilu asubageik nen iluk yokhisigi o.
45001014	Akhuni wene hutdega meke men, hutdigidek meke men, sekolah yakulha meke men, yakulhidek meke men, tha'bokhogonat hano wene yogeisausak iluk an noba palegeke hakene welagei o.
45001015	Iti nenat, hano wene iti hit akhuni o Roma welagathep meke etoma yokhisa isusak warlok apekhe lagei o.
45001016	Hano wene iti Allah obatneatma, ebekeram akhuni Yahudi meke, nen yabokane, akhuni itikmanke meke, inetaiken Yesus Kristus oba hakotdegarek meke tha’bokhogonat tilinakherek iti nen, an nekarli degat hano wene iti yogeisilik nekherek iti.
45001017	Allah nen men isikhemo holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, “Akhuni inetaiken an noba hakotdisinem nen, an nen wene inoba meke korogo wokhalokyabokane inapuke an ninom hunetlatluk iniluk motok dogogun o, ”\rq (Habakuk 2:4)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha hagat, Allah ninom yabokane ninapuke itithogon hunetlasusak, iluk, hano wene iti baga thelekmatdisikhe. Allah ninom yabokane ninapukehunetlasusak wene iti ebe re, ninat ageikhe hagasugun oba nen 'buk. Ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk erlo baga nen piokhogon hurli ekapul oba dogogun iti baga, Allah ninom yabokane ninapuke hunetlatluk dogogun o.
45001018	Akhuni nen, Allah ebe inobakhanini here’isalok, inobabut korloat hagakhe dogolik, ebe wene akhuni inilu asinogo iluk thebeliogei iti nen, Allah akla aga dageiluk pogot oba nen thelekmatdisikhe.
45001019	At Allah akla aga dageiluk thelekmatdisikhe iti, at ekaerek nen, “An nobabut itigirlik, ” iluk abok thelekmatdisikhemo hutdusak meke werek korlegat hagakharek iti nen akla aga dageisikhe iti.
45001020	Allah ebe ninileken hogorek dek mekeat he, at nen pogot agat walhasikhemo inileken hekhe dogolik, at ebe walhasikhe mekeatma, obatne ikhok motok welagarek, iluk, obabut thekekhogon hutdusak mekeat welageikharek iti. Welageikharek iti hasik, it nen, “Allah ninokodek dogolik weak hagakhorek, ” iluk usak dek asigin o.
45001021	Allah ebe itithogon inilu dogoligat, it nen, “Allah ebe walhasikhe mekeat o, ” iluk, ebe hogorakhidek, heagei wakhidek, welagoukha. Itithogon dogolik, ninat meke ebeat meke dek mekeat he, wene munini we yugunat inakla ebekhe lagoukha iti nen, inetaiken abit ageikhe.
45001022	It inetaiken itithogon motok abit hagatlatluk dogoligat, “Nit ninetaiken motok kagalek o, ” iluk egarek iti.
45001023	Inetaiken abit ageikhesik nen, Allah ebe hirli agarek dek meke, hogorasusak meke iti here’isalok nen, obolukmo hirli agarek meke iniki nen akhuni-akhuni inalino hagarogo 'bigik, thue-thue inalino hagarogo 'bigik, wam-wam, 'bagei-'bagei, yeke-yeke, inalino hagarogo 'bigik, warlo-warlo inalino hagarogo 'bigik, hagatluk nen, hogorakharek.
45001024	Hogorakharek iti nen, Allah nen, “It inekaerek inetaiken nen nukunem, it-it inekarli dek inebe weagararekhe dogoak, ” iluk inebe here’isasikhe iti.
45001025	At Allah walhasikhe meke hogorakho motok dogosak, iluk isinem, Eberogonat, iluk u hak, “Amin, ” iluk ekhe dogosak mekeat he, it nen Allah ane ebeat wene iti here'isalok, akhuni inekalat nukhetdisasukha wene iti waganhukha. Itithogon waganhukhasik, Allah nen yi meke ti meke walhasikhe meke iti ebe hogorakhidek nen, yi meke ti meke walhasikhe meke iti iniki nen inalino hagarogo ’biluk, hogorakhik, at hasik hagakhik, hagakharek iti.
45001026	It itithogon hagakharek iti nen, at Allah nen, it inetaiken nen nukunem inekarli dek hagakhe dogoagaluk, “Inoba dopok, ” iluk here’isasikhe. It humi nen, ap inom noge egarek hagat, noge usak mekeat he, it humi-humi noge usak dek mekeat noge egarek iti.
45001027	Iti hak, it ap nen meneke, ap nen humi inom noge egarek hagat, noge igidek mekeat he, ap-ap noge egarek. It ap-ap inoba agaken dageisinem inekarli dek korloat hagakharethek nen, wene inekaerek nen ukum inoba ’bakhegarethek nen, inebe weak ageikharek.
45001028	It nen, “Allah ebe ninilu dogosak nina’it o, ” iluk at ebe it inakla meanetdisukhama, at nen, “It inakla apiliogei iti korlo o. Na’it. It nen weak mekeat he, hano iluk apegarek iti, itithogon inoba tomok apekhe dogolik hagasusak dek meke hagarekhe dogonek, ” iluk inebe here’isekherek.
45001029	Itithogon hagarekhe dogolik, it inakla nen, yi weak ti weak, yi korlo ti korlo, kerlekhogon dogolik, inamikmak weak hagakhik, akhuni weagarinakhik, hagakharek. Hagakhe dogolik, akhuni inoba ua palhik, inebe inakhik, wene tauk ageik, akhuni dalinakhik, wene eken ’biluk welageik, hagakharek iti mekeat inakla motok kerlek welageikharek. Inabok limago nabok-habok igik,
45001030	thelekmaigik, Allah ebe ina’it motok welageik, inayuk dek negen welageik, inekaerek nen hogorakhigik, inakeke ’bakhigik, weak meke aperek hagasuogoluk inekaerek inakla kagalhik, inagosa inopase inane holhidek hagakhik, hagakharek iti.
45001031	Inetaiken dek weak hagakhik, wene warisegarethek nen thogotdigik, akhuni ina’it anek welageik, inakmu dek welageik, hagakharek.
45001032	Itithogon hagakharek iti nen, at Allah nen, “Akhuni inobabut itithogon hagakharek meke halok he, an nen ukum inoba ’biluk inebe motok inasusak mothogonat inasigin o, ” iluk isikhe meke inilu dogoligat, it inekaerek nen itithogon hagakhoat welageikharek iti. It itithogon hagakhe dogolik, it akhuni aperek nen itithogonat hagakhunem nen, “Erlok hagakhe lagap, ” iluk yogeisegaregat
45002001	Iti halok he, hit nagarlak lak nerugi yi. Wene it aperek anek inoba ’bekhe dogolik, hit hinekaerek hinoba korasak erlok dek o. Itithogon wene it aperek inoba ’bekhe dogoligat, hit nen it hinom ipisak tak-tagat hagakhe lagap yoma re! Hinekaerek nen wene hinoba motok ’bakhekhe lagap o.
45002002	Akhuni inobabut itithogon hagakharek meke, Allah nen wene inoba mothogonat ’bekherek, iluk ninilu o.
45002003	Hit nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit nen, it aperek weak hagakhunem wene inoba ’bekhe dogolik, hit hinekaerek meneke, it hagariogei hagat, hinom ipisak tak-tagat hagakhe lagap yi re! Hit hinakla nen, “Allah nen wene ninoba ’bigidek here’inanigin, ” iluk apekhe lagap a? Dek o. Wene hinoba ’biginat o.
45002004	“At Allah obabut hano motok, enago, ” iluk, hinakla meanetdekhe lagap a? Hit hinakla nen, “Allah obabut hano nen nit weak hagakhe lago meke here’isalok ninobabut hebelasuagaluk, ninakla kagalherek, ”iluk hinokodek a? Hiniluat o.
45002005	-
45002006	Inane holiluk hinobabut hebelu’buk yi re! O ilugun oba Allah akla aga dageiluk nen, akhuni inebe tomok inobabut hagakharek tak-tagat, thelekmaat wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem, hit wene hinoba ’buagaluk hinekaerek nen wene hinoba ’bakhasi motok welagap yi re!
45002007	At Allah nen, it akhuni aperek nen inebe hogorinakharek meke men, inalon halinakharek meke men, hirli agarek dek meke men, ite asuogoluk ina’it ageidek dogolik inobabut mot hagakharek meke, inebe iniluk motok dogoagaluk hagarinabigin.
45002008	Itithogon mekeat, it akhuni aperek nen inekaerek hasik anek hagakhe dogolik, ebe wene isinem inasuk hologo hagakhidek here’isalok, weak wene anek inasuk hologo hagakharek meke iti, Allah akla aga hetpet dageilik wene kokhogon inoba ’bigin o.
45002009	-
45002011	At Allah re, akhuni inoado baga anek ileken hisalok, aperek elokhoma ’bisigik, aperek oporlike ’bisigik, hagakherek dek iti nen, it akhuni aperek inobabut weak hagakho motok welageikharek meke inebe tomok nen, hinet warogo yi aik ti aik hoagaluk hagarinabigin. Mekeat, it akhuni aperek inobabut hano hagakho welageikharek meke, inebe tomok nen, inebe hogorinakharek meke men, inalon halinakharek meke men, inetaiken hapukhogon welageikharek meke men, wogeisagein o. Itithogon hagarinabigin iti, it alebageik meke hakene Yahudi meke men, yabokane meke hakene, akhuni itikmanke meke, inukuloak etaga tomok aperek men, inomat, ipisak tak-tagat anek hagarinabigin o.
45002012	It akhuni itikmanke meke wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo inokodek dogolik weak hagakharethekma nogo nen, wene iti inokodek dogoligat nuk asugun o. Mekeat he, it akhuni Yahudi meke wene iti inilu dogolik weak hagakharethekma nogo nen, wene iti baga initema waganogo wene inoba ’bigin o.
45002013	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo iniluiti baga, wene inoba meke korogo wokhekherek ’buk. Wene ebe ninasuk wakhikhemeke mothogon hagakharek meke halok, wene inoba meke korogo wokhekherek o.
45002014	It akhuni itikmanke meke wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo inokodek mekeat he, wene ebe isikhe meke mothogon hagakharek iti nen, inekaerek inakla wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hakeneat werek o.
45002015	-
45002016	Wene iti inetaiken oba holal waganek hakene werek iluk, it inobabut hagakharek meke baga ekagat werek. Itithogon werekma nogo nen, yabokane o ilugun hurli baga Allah nen Yesus Kristus ayoko ’bisinem, at nen akhuni inakla yi wene ti wene limago welagarek meke iti tha'bokhogonat ’bualogo wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhunem, it inekaerek inakla wene munini ebekhe dogolik, “An eberogonat weak hagakhima, ” iluk wene inoba ’bakhigik, “Dek, an hano hagakhima, ” iluk wene inoba korigik, hagasugun o, iluk wene hano wene baga isikhemo, an nen yokhisasigi apigi.
45002017	Itithogon mekeat he, hit nen, “Nit ninebe Yahudi ebe Yahudi meke, ” iluk ekhe dogolik, hinetaiken wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga hakotdiluk dogolik, "Allah iti nit ninopase o, ” iluk hogorakhekhe lagap yoma re!
45002018	Hit nen, "Allah akla nen he, Yigithogon hagasuak, itithogon hagasuak, iluk akla apekherek iti ninilumo nen, Iti hano, iti weak, iluk Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene hutdiluk nen mothogon hagasusak, ” iluk hutdegethep iti.
45002019	Hit nen, "Akhuni inileken puk meke nit nen niniki hago erlok wogosik lausak. Nen, ninebe isagal yibarlek hakenema, akhuni o mummo welageikharek meke iti erlok liarinabusak.
45002020	Nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo nit nen hago welagorethekma re, yi wene ti wene ninilu dogolik wene eberogonat meke anek yakulisogorek iti nen, akhuni inetaiken abit meke yakulisigik, yekerugi meke wene yakulisigik, erlok usak o, ” iluk ekhe lagap iti.
45002021	Itithogon it akhuni aperek yakulisekhe dogoligat, hinekaerek yakulekhe lagap dek yoma re! Hit nen ekhe dogolik, “Hiniki abusak waganhup o, ” iluk it aperek yogeisekhe dogoligat, hit hinekaerek hiniki abusak waganhe lagap yoma re!
45002022	“Param hagakhup o, ” iluk yogeisekhe dogoligat, hit hinekaerek param hagakhe lagap yoma re! “Kaneke alino hagarek iti na'it motok, ” iluk ekhe dogoligat, yi meke ti meke usama werekma hiniki abusak waganhe lagap yoma re!
45002023	“Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene at Musa nen yoknisasikhe wene etnogo an nilu o, ” iluk ekhe dogoligat wene iti here’isalok weak hagakhunem, it aperek nen Allah etaga ekhe dogolik abok weak iliogei iti hit nen Allah etaga weagatdekhe lagap yoma re!
45002024	Hit hagakhe lagap iti hasik, Allah ane holal yigithogon waganek werek, “Hit hinobabut itithogon hagasugun oba it akhuni itikmanke meke nen, Allah etaga ekhe dogolik, abok weak ekhe dogogun o, ”\rq (Yesaya 52:5)\rq* iluk isikhemo wene holal waganogo ’bisukha hagat, hagakhe lagap o.
45002025	Hit he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hologo hagakhe lagap halok he, hinoado aperlagap meke palhethep iti, hano motok usak. Meke re, wene iti hologo hagakhidek halok he, hinoado aperlagap meke palhethep iti alomarogo palhethep iti nen, palek dek meke negen welagapo.
45002026	Nen, it akhuni itikmanke meke inoado aperlagap palek dek dogolik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo hologo hagakho halok he, at Allah nen, inoado aperlagap meke palek dek mekeat he, palek meke hakene igin dek a? Palek meke hakene igin o.
45002027	Nen, hit Yahudi meke, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hit ite dogolik, hinoado aperlagap palhethep mekeat he, wene iti hologo hagakhidek, thagalogo here’isalok weak hagakhe lagap iti nen, akhuni aperek inoado aperlagap palek dek mekeat he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti mothogon hagariogei iti nen, it nen wene hit hinoba 'bugun o.
45002028	Akhuni Yahudi ebe Yahudi meke iti ebe re, thelekma meke iti 'buk. Nen, inoado aperlagap palharek iti ebe re, inoado aperlagap palek iti 'bugat o.
45002029	Akhuni Yahudi ebe Yahudi meke re, “An nebe Yahudi meke inoado aperlagap palek welagei, ” iluk thuesika baga holal palogo 'begarek iti hasik 'buk. Dek o Mekeat, inoado aperlagap palek ebe meke re, inoado aperlagap meke palu hak, Allah Agoreke nen inetaikenma meke karelogo ulakherek itiat o. Akhuni inetaikenma itithogon karelek werek halok he, akhuni aperek nen hogorinakharek 'buk. Meke re, at Allah nenathogorinakherek o.
45003001	Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni aperek nen, “It Yahudi meke hano, ” iluk iliogei iti, nenaluk iliogei apegep. Nen, inoado aperlagap iti nenaluk palharek apegep.
45003002	Iti re, yi hasik ti hasik tha'bokhogonat hano anek. Wene iti ebe thekekhogon yokhisak. Ageikhe Allah nen, “An nane it erlok hago dogogun, ” iluk, irat yogeisekhe lageikhe.
45003003	Meke re, it akhuni Yahudi meke aperek wene iti hologo dogolik inobabut hupukhogon hagakharek dek iti nen nikithogon hagatlasigin apegep. It inobabut Allah ane hologo dogolik hupukhogon dogou'buk iti nen, Allah obabut hupukhogon hagakherek meke iti dek atluk obakhaninihagasigin apegep?
45003004	Motok dek o. Akhuni inebe dopok inane inekalat isi halok he, Allah ane eberogonat anek ekherek, iluk wene holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Hat Allah hane eberogonat anek isinem eberogonat anek agarek. Akhuni nen erlok degetdagouogoluk hagakhunem, hat erlok dek agatek dek o. Hobatne anek agatek, ”\rq (Mazmur 51:4-6)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha iti.
45003005	Meke re, nit akhuni nen ninobabut korlo hagakhorek iti baga nen, Allah obabut mothogon hagakherek iluk ekagat hagatlagarek halok, nikithogon usak. Akhuni nen egarek hak an ik. At Allah akla aga dageiluk weagarinakherek iti korlo nogo?
45003006	Motok dek o. At Allah obabut korlo dogolepma re, yi akhuni ti akhuni agat oba meke yoma, inobabut palogo nen wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, nikithogon hagatlep?
45003007	Meke re, hat ageikhe nen ekhe dogolik, “An nane nekalat egerek oba, Allah ane eberogonat, iluk ekagat motok ariogo iti. Itithogon ekagat agunem nen, it akhuni aperek nen, Allah ebe hogorariogei iti. Halok he, an nobabut palogo, at Allah nen, At weak hagariogo, iluk wene nenaluk noba ’busak? ” iluk erlok usak nogo?
45003008	It akhuni aperek nen, “Paulus lak nen men iliogei, Nit weak hagakhunem ilugun oba Allah hogorasuagaluk, weak hagakhe dogouok, ” iluk, inekalat ninabok paliogei iti. Akhuni itithogon egarek meke iti, Allah nen ukum inoba ’busak mekeat ’bigin o.
45003009	Halok he, nit Yahudi meke anek, hano aga korlek, it itikmanke meke nuk asugun usak nogo? Motok dek o. AkhuniYahudi meke dek, itikmanke meke dek, tha'bokhogonat dapukhogon weak meke apma dogolik weak hagakharek anek iluk alebat yokhisigi iti.
45003010	Allah nen itithogonat isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Akhuni inobabut mot hagakharek meke ageikhe dek o. Opakiat ageikhe motok degat o.
45003011	Nen, akhuni wene hutdiliogei meke ageikhedegat o. An Allah nebe hutukhogon inilu asuogoluk heraknabiogei meke ageikhe degat o.
45003012	Inebe tha’bokhogonat an noba mothogonwageidek, holak mirlokhogon arat nuk atlukalomatlageikha. Inobabut hano hagariogei meke ageikhe motok degat. Opakiat ageikhe degat o.\rq (Mazmur 14:1-3; 53:1-4)\rq*
45003013	Akhuni inebe warek ’bisegarekma, obasidukhekherek hak, it inane obasi weak dukhigik, ina’bi baga nen, akhuni dalinakhik, warlo aik nen li’bilinakhunem watlageikharek hak, it inape baga weagarinakhik, iliogei iti.\rq (Mazmur 5:9; 140:3-4)\rq*
45003014	Inane puk weak inalon ’bisiliogei meke inaklakerlekhogon dogolik isi motok werek.\rq (Mazmur 10:7)\rq*
45003015	Akhuni inamep ulageinabuogoluk halok he, inae a’busuk weak liliogei.
45003016	Akhuni o yi ai ti ai inebe weagarinakhik, inakla korlotdisigik, hagarik liliogei iti.
45003017	Akhuni aperek inom hano dapukhogon dogou re, it inokodek o.\rq (Yesaya 59:7-8)\rq*
45003018	It inakla nen, Allah inayuk motok degat o, ”\rq (Mazmur 36:1-2)\rq* iluk isikhemo wene holal waganogo 'bisukha.
45003019	It akhuni aperek wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti, holek welageikharek meke anek yogeisasikhe, iluk nit ninilu. Allah arligat nen akhuni o yi ai ti ai tha’bokhogonat wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhunem, at ageikhe nen wene oba korogo wokhausak erlok dek asuagaluk ninasuk wakhikhe iti.
45003020	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga, nit akhuni weak hagakhorek meke ekagat ninilu agorek iti nen, nit tha’bokhogonat wene at nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti holek dogolik, at il oba mothogon hagasusak erlok dek o. Hologo hagakhe dogoumo, at nen ninom yabokane hunogo ’binanusak mekeat he, erlok dek o.
45003021	-
45003022	Itithogon mekeat he, yogotak Allah nen, at ninom hunogo ’binanusak wene thelekmatdekhemo werek. Iti re, ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhe lago nen, yabokane hunogo ’binageiluk isikhe ’buk. At he, nit ninetaiken Yesus Kristus oba hakotdisinem hunogo ’binageiluk isikhe o. Itithogon hunogo ’bisagein iluk abok, wene at nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga igik, at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen igik, isukha tak-tagat hunogo ’binageiluk isikhe. Iti re, nit akhuni tha’bokhogonat ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotdogorek meke hunogo tomok dek. Ninom tak-tagat hunogo ’binageiluk isikhe iti o.
45003023	Nit akhuni tha’bokhogonat haganeat nen weak hagakhorek iti baga, Allah ebe hogorakho motok welageikharek meke iti thogotdisalok ninasokneat walegat asi lagagusik welago.
45003024	Itithogon werekma, at weak meke nen herle warogo haknisik werekma, at Allah obabut hano nen Kristus Yesus nen werlegat oko dek herle hisalogo tilninabuagaluk la’i ageikhe. Itithogon tilninakhe dogolik, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhasikhesik Allah ninom ninapuke hunogo ’binanhikhe iti.
45003025	-
45003026	Alebageik, at Allah nen, nit akhuni weak hagakho korlek, ninakhidek obakhanini hapugutdiluk welageikhesik nen, yogotak at obabut mothogon hagakherek etnogo ekagat hagatlasuagaluk, Yesus la’i ageikhe. Wageikhemo ebe wakhunem amep usageikhe iti baga, nit akhuni ninetaiken at oba hakotdogo meke, at ninom ninapuke hunogo ’binanuagaluk la’i ageikhe. Allah nen nit akhuni ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotdogo meke, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok at ninom ninapuke hunogo ’binanhe dogolik, at mothogonat hagakherek iluk yogotak obabut ekagat hagatlaga iti.
45003027	Itithogon hagatninakherek halok he, ninekaerek nen hogorakhekhe dogosak a? Hogorakhausak motok dek aga o. Nikithogon nen hogorakhausak dek aga? Nit ninekaerek nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene mothogon hagarekhe Iago nen ninapuke hunogo ’binanhikhe a? Dek o. Ninetaiken at oba hakotdisinem, at nenat hunogo ’binanherek iti nen, hogorakhausak erlok dek.
45003028	Wene iti hasik nit hutdusak yigithogon. Nit nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hago dogolik mothogon hagakhunem, nit weak hagakhorek meke degetdiluk, at ninom ninapuke hunogo ’binanherek ’buk. Ninetaiken at Yesus oba hakotdisinem, ninom hunogo ’binanherek o.
45003029	At Allah nit akhuni Yahudi meke anek ninopase nogo? It itikmanke meke ninomat ninopase dek nogo? Eberogonat akhuni itikmanke meke ninomat ninopase o.
45003030	At Allah ebe opakiat iti nen, nit akhuni Yahudi meke ninetaiken at oba hakotdisinem nen, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok at ninom ninapuke hunogo ’binanhik, nen, it itikmanke meke inetaiken at obahakotdisinem nen, itithogonat 'bisigik, hagakherek o.
45003031	Halok he, ninetaiken at oba hakotdekhe dogolik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo thebelhe lago a? Dek o. At ane itiat obatnetdekhe lago.
45004001	Halok he, nit akhuni Yahudi meke nen ninopaAbraham obabut hagakhe lageikhe meke hasik abok nikithogon ugun?
45004002	At ekaerek nen hano hagakhikhe baga, Allah nen, “Wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik, hapuke nipisak hunogo ’bagagi o, ” iluk yogotlepma re, ekaerek nen hogorakhelep o. Meke re, Allah il oba hogorakhausak erlok dek welageikhe iti.
45004003	Allah ane holal waganogo ’bisukha iti baga nikithogon isukha nogo? Men isukha dek nogo? Abraham etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhemo re, at Allah nen, “Hat hobabut mothogon hagakhe dogou hak, hetaiken noba hakotdegenma, wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik, hapuke nipisak hunogo ’bagagi itiat o, ”\rq (Kejadian 15:6)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45004004	Akhuni nen yi yabu ti yabu hagakhunem, iniki oko wogeisegarek iti re, ap yoko ’begarek meke nen inobabut hano nen werlegat wogeisegarek ’buk. Iti iniki oko wogeisausak mekeat wogeisegarek iti.
45004005	Meke re, akhuni aperek nen Allah akla hanorogo yi meke ti meke hagakhidek dogoligat, inakla nen, “It akhuni aperek nen Allah ebe inakla meanetdekhe lageikha mekeat he, at nen, it wene inoba meke erlok korogo degetdisalok yabokane inapuke at inom hunogo ’bisekherek, ” iluk inetaiken at oba hakotdisinem nen, at nen, “Hinobabut mothogon hagakhe dogou hak, hinetaiken an noba hakotdegepma wene hinoba meke korogo wokhigirik, hinapuke ninom hunogo ’bagagi itiat o, ” ilukyogeisekheregat.
45004006	At Allah nen itithogon hagarinakherek iluk, at Daud nen men isikhe, “Akhuni nen, Allah akla hanorogo ageikhe hagakhidekmaat nen, wene inoba meke korogo wokhalok, inom inapuke hunogo ’bisekherek, iluk, inakla arleken akhoak o, ” iluk isikhesik holal men waganogo 'bisikhe,
45004007	“It akhuni inasuk warek dek korlo hagakharekmeke, Allah nen thagalogo here’isigik, weak hagakharek meke, thebelogo here’isigik, hagakhe meke inakla arleken akhoak o.
45004008	Nen, it akhuni aperek weak hagakharek mekehasik, ninopase Allah Etagapogot nen eken ’biluk inoba wene ’bigidek mekeinakla arleken akhoak o, ”\rq (Mazmur 32:1-2)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisikhemo werek.
45004009	“Inakla arleken akhoak o, ” iluk isikhe iti nen, it akhuni inoado aperlagap meke palek meke inobasik anek isikhe a? At he, it inoado aperlagap palek dek meke hasik inomat isikhe a. Alebageik wene men ogo apigi, Abraham etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhemo re, at nen, “Hat hobabut mothogon hagakhe dogou hak, hetaiken noba hakotdegenma, wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik, hapukenipisak hunogo ’bagagi itiat o, ”\rq (Kejadian 15:6)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
45004010	Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, at Abraham ebe nikithogon werekma. At oado aperlagap meke palek oba a? Palek dek oba a. Iti re, oado aperlagap meke palek oba ’buk. Aban palek dek obaat o.
45004011	Oado aperlagap meke itithogonaban palek dek dogolik etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhemo re, at Allah nen, “Wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik, hapuke nipisak hunogo 'bagagi, ”\rq (Kejadian 17:10)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe. Itithogon hagakhikhemo yogokhikhe iti, inetaiken ekerlogo dogoagaluk, “Hoado aperlagap meke palan, ” iluk yogokhikhemo nen palikhikhemo re, ekagat ageikhe iti. Iti nen, akhuni inoado aperlagap meke itithogon palek dek dogolik, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdegarek meke tha'bokhogonat nen, inopase Abraham at o. It itithogon inetaiken Allah oba hakotdisinem nen, at nen, “Hinobabut mothogon hagakhe dogou hak hinetaiken noba hakotdegepma, wene hinoba meke korogo wokhigirik hinapuke ninom hunogo 'binagagi iti arat o, ” iluk yogeisekheregat.
45004012	Ninopa Abraham iti oado aperlagap meke itithogon palek dek dogolik, etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhe hak, nit ninoado meke itithogon anek palek halok, Abraham ninopa usak erlok dek o. At he, Abraham obabut waganogo ninetaiken itithogon Allah oba hakotdogo meke halok, Abraham ninopa usagat o.
45004013	At Allah nen, Abraham men yogokhikhe, “Agat oba o yi ai ti ai tha'bokhogonat nen, hat men, hat nen itago meke men, hinom iteerek asugun o, ” iluk abok yogeisasikhe. Itithogon yogeisasikhe iti, wene at nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hologo mothogon hagakhe lagoukha baga yogeisasikhe 'buk. Dek o. At etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhemo, at Allah nen, “Wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik, hapuke nipisak hunogo 'bagagi, ” iluk yogokhikhe iti baga agat abokyogeisasikhe iti.
45004014	Akhuni wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti inasuk hologo mothogon hagakharek meke anek Allah nen abok isikhe meke iti iteerek aga dogolepma re, ninetaiken Allah baga we turlemat hakotdekhe dogolo. Nen, abok yogeisasikhe meke iti dek atlebat o.
45004015	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga, Allah akla aga ninoba 'bekherek. Wene ninasuk wakhikhe iti wakhidek dogolepma re, wene thagalogo weak hagariogei, iluk ilep degat o.
45004016	Halok he, Allah obabut hano nen werlegat woknisekherek, iluk uagaluk nen, ninetaiken at oba hakotdisinem abok isikhe meke iti, woknisekherek iti. Nit at nen itago meke wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhe dogolik, ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdogorek meke anek woknisekherek 'buk. Abraham it aperek ninom tha’bokhogonat ninopasema re, it iti at Abraham etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhe iti hak, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdegarek meke wogeisegaregat o.
45004017	Wene iti hasik Allah nen Abraham men yogokhikhe, “Yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga doalegat inopase re, hat meldagagi o, ”\rq (Kejadian 17:5)\rq* iluk yogokhikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha. Itithogon yogokhikhemo at Abraham akla nen, “At Allah akhuni warek meke inilugurinakhik, nen, yi meke ti meke dek meke ane baga weregetdigik, hagakherek meke nen abok yoknekhe iti eberogonat yoknekhe o, ” iluk etaiken oba hakotdisikhe iti.
45004018	At Abraham nen, “An nen itago meke itithogon hagatlasugun, ” iluk akla apausak motok dekmaat nen, “Eberogonat hagatlasigin, ” iluk etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk motok hagakhe lageikhe iti baga, Allah nen, “Hat nen itago meke motok doalegat yigithogon asugun o, ”\rq (Kejadian 15:5)\rq* iluk abok yogokhikhe tak-tagat, yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga doalegat inopase Abraham at ageikhe iti.
45004019	Ap Abraham ekaerek nen, “An nebe 100 tahun hakene welagarikmo, nobatne dek agasik, na'buri itaginabusak motok erlok dek agei. Nen, nage Sara ebe re, motok abirliat, ” iluk ilu welageikhe mekeat he, etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhe meke iti, akla puk ageidek hakokthek motogat welageikhe.
45004020	Abraham etaiken Allah oba itithogon hakokthek motok dogolik, “Allah nen abok yoknikhikhe etnogo, ebeat asigin a? Dek asigin a, ” iluk wene munini ebekhidek welageikhe. Itithogon etaiken Allah baga hakotdiluk welageikhe iti baga obatnetdisinem Allah hogorakhe lageikhe.
45004021	Itithogon hogorakhe dogolik, “Allah yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok anek etnogo nen abok yoknikhikhe iti, ebe asiginat o, ” iluk wene munini ’bogokhogonat welageikhe.
45004022	Itithogon hagakhe lageikhe iti baga, Allah nen, “Hobabut mothogon hagakhe dogou hak, hetaiken noba hakotdegenma, wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik hapuke nipisak hunogo ’bagagi itiat o, ”\rq (Kejadian 15:6)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe iti.
45004023	At Allah nen, “Wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik hapuke nipisak hunogo ’bagagi o, ” iluk yogokhikhemo re, holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek iti, at Abraham hasik anek ’buk.
45004024	Nit ninobasik inomat yoknisasikhe o. Halok he, nit meneke, ninetaiken ninopase Allah ninoe Etagapogot Yesus watlageikhesikmo nen ilugutdisikhe meke etnogo baga hakotdogorek iti nen, at nen, “Hinobabut mothogon hagakhe dogou hak, hinetaiken noba hakotdegepma, wene hinoba meke korogo wokhigirik hinapuke ninom hunogo ’binagagi itiat o, ” ilukyoknisekheregat.
45004025	At Allah nen, nit at ane thagalogo thogotdisalok weak hagakhe lago iti nen, Yesus ebe akhuni nen wasuagaluk usa'i ageikhemo ebe wakhukhama, yabokane, “Wene hit hinoba meke korogo wokhigi, ” iluk, at ninom ninapuke hunogo 'binageiluk ilugutdisikhe iti.
45005001	Yogotak nit ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdisugu iti nen, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok ninom ninapuke hunogo 'binanhikhemo, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe iti baga Allah ninom dapukhogon hano welago.
45005002	Nit ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisugu iti bagaat, at nen Allah obabut hano nen hanotninakherek iti apma 'binanhikhemo iti baga hakotdiluk welago. Dogolik, Allah hogorakho motok welageikharek iti hak, nit itithogonat hogotninabigin o, iluk ninakla arleken akhekhe lago.
45005003	Iti hasik anek ninakla arleken akhekhe lago 'buk. Yi aik ti aik hogorek iti baga, ninetaiken horle agarek iti nen, itithogon weagatninakhe korlek, ninakla arleken akhekhe lagoat o.
