45005004	Ninetaiken horle agarethek nen ilugun oba, Allah nen ninobabut palogo nen, hano ekherek. Itithogon ekherek oba, yabokane eberogonat hano asigin, iluk ninakla arleken akhekhe lago.
45005005	Hano asigin iluk ninakla arleken akhekhe lago iti baga, Allah nen Agoreke woknisasikhemo ninakla dogolik, i henakharek hak, Allah nen akmutninakherek meke iti ninakla kokhogon 'binanherek iti baga ninayuk dek welago.
45005006	Nit Allah ebe thogotdiluk walegat asi lagagusik, ninebe erlok dek werekma, at Allah nen, “It itithogon werek iti hasik, Kristus itinem watlasuak, ” iluk apasikhe bagaat ebe wakhukhama ninobolukmo watlageikhe iti.
45005007	Ap ageikhe nen, “An nebe at obabut mot meke iti hasik, obolukmo watlasigin, ” iluk usak akinat o. Itithogon mekeat, ap ageikhe ayuk dek meke nen, “An nebe ap obabut hano meke iti hasik obolukmo watlasigin, ” iluk apausagat he a.
45005008	Itithogon mekeat he, at Allah ninebe akmu nen hagakherek iti ekagat asuagaluk, nit weak hagakho werekma, Kristus ebe woknisasikhemo ninobolukmo watlageikhe iti.
45005009	At Kristus amep ulabogo watlageikhe iti baga, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok Allah ninom yabokane ninapuke ’binanhikhesik nogo nen, yabokane Allah akla aga ninoba 'bisinem tilninabigin dek nogo? Tilninabiginat o.
45005010	Nit alebageik he, Allah ninom wim palek werekma, yabokane at a’but watlaga dogolik, Allah ninom dapukhogon ’binanhikhemo welago. Itithogon werekma, at ebe iluk dogolik, tilninabigin dek nogo? Alebageik tilninabusak dekma tilninakhikhesik nen, yogotak ninom hunik dogolik tilninabiginat o.
45005011	Meke re, iti anek ’buk. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe iti baga, Allah ninom yabokane ninapuke hunogo ’binanhikhemo ninom dapukhogon hano welago iti nen, ninakla arleken akhekhe Iago.
45005012	Wene iti men hakene. Ap opakiat meke weak hagakhikhemo, weak erlo at oba nen akhuni tha’bokhogonat weak ninoba ageikhe. Itithogon ninoba ageikhemo, ninebe tha’bokhogonat weak hagarik wagunem, ilugun oba, ninebe tha’bokhogonat watlarik wagorek iti.
45005013	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo aban ninasuk wakhidek werek korlek, akhuni weak hagakhe lagoukha. Meke re, inasuk aban wakhidekma, Allah nen, "It weak hagakha, ” iluk wene inoba ’bigidek welageikhe.
45005014	Wene inoba ’bigidek mekeat, ap Adam welageikhe hurlinen, lok-lok Musa welageikhe eta hurli, watlariogei erlo akhuni tha'bokhogonat inoba obatneat ageikhesik nen, watlarik wagoukha iti. Akhuni aperek at Adam Allah nen asuk wakhikhe wene thagalogo weak hagakhikhe hak, itithogon hagakhidekmaat, watlariogei erlo iti inoba atluk nen, watlarik wagoukhaat. Nen, at Adam hagakhikhe iti, at yabokane wageikhe meke iti witluk ebe hagasigin meke hasik iti tak-tagat hagakhikhe.
45005015	Itithogon mekeat, ipisak inobabut opakiat ’buk. Ebe Allah obabut hano nen werlegat woknisasikhe meke iti motok kokma re, at Adam Allah ane thagalogo weak hagakhikhe iti ipisak walhaumo re, ipisak tak-tagat dek o. At opakiat nen weak hagakhikhe baga, ilugun oba inebe doalegat watlarik wageikharek. Mekeat he, Allah obabut hano nen Yesus Kristus werlegat woknisasikhemo, ap ebe opakiat meke nen hano hagakhikhe baga, hano erlo akhuni doalegat ninoba wialageikhemo welago.
45005016	Ap opakiat nen Allah ane thagalogo weak hagakhikhe baga, Allah nen, wene oba ’biluk weagatdisikhe iti. Itithogon weagatdisikhemo, yabokane akhuni weak motok hagarik wagoukha mekeat he, at Allah obabut hano nen werlegat okorlek yoknisekhe dogolik, “Wene hinoba dek o, ” iluk korogo wokhasikhe.
45005017	Ap opakiat nen Allah ane thagalogo weak hagakhikhesik, watlageikhesikmo, watlariogei erlo at oba nen obatne ageikhesik nen, wialageikhe iti o. Itithogon mekeat, Allah obabut hano nen, Yesus Kristus werlegat woknisasikhemo, at ebe opakiat nen, hano hagakhikhe iti anek, kok motok. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, wene ninoba meke werlegat korogo wokhalok Allah ninom ninapuke hunogo ’binanhikhemo, at ninom hunik niniluk dogolik ninobatnerogo hano dogogun.
45005018	Wene igi iti, men igi apigi. Ap ageikhe nen Allah ane thagalogo weak opaki hasik hagakhikhe baga, ilugun oba akhuni tha’bokhogonat wene inoba ’bilukweagatdisasikhe iti hak, ap ageikhe nen Allah ane hologo mot opaki hasik hagakhikhe baga, wene akhuni tha'bokhogonat inoba meke korogo wokhigik, inilugurinakhik, hagakhikhe.
45005019	Ap opakiat nen Allah ane hologo hagakhidek weak hagakhikhe iti baga, akhuni inebe doalegat weak hagarik wageikharek iti hak, ap opakiat nen, Allah ane hologo hagakhikhe iti baga, akhuni ninebe doalegat wene ninoba meke korogo wokhasikhemo Allah akla warlok meke hagakhe dogogun iti.
45005020	Meke re, at ageikhe weak hagakhikhesik oba Allah ane thagalogo weak hagakharek meke akin asuagaluk, Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene yabokane woknisasikhe. Weak hagakharek iti wialarik laga korlegat, Allah obabut hano nen akmutninakherek iti, ebenageik motok kogat ageikhe.
45005021	Weak hagakharethek watlageikharek iti baga, weak hagakharek meke obatne ageikhe iti hak, ninoe Etagapogot nen wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok, Allah ninom hunogo ’binanhikhe iti baga, Allah obabut hano nen akmutninakherek meke iti obatne ageikhemo, niniluk motok dogogun iti.
45006001	Iti halok he, nit nen nikithogon ugun. Allah obabut hano iti nen, kokhogon akmutninakhe dogoagaluk, nit nen weak hagakho motok dogosak nogo?
45006002	Motok erlok dek o. Nit weak hagakhe lagagu iti hasik he, arat watlagagusigat nen, yabokane weak hagakhe dogosak nogo? Erlok dek o.
45006003	Nit Kristus Yesus ninom hunisuogoluk ima usasugu meke yi re, at ebe watlageikhe hagat, ima usa’inanhunem ninom hunigat watlagagu, iluk hinokodek nogo?
45006004	Ima usa’inanhe dogolik, at ebe warek thalhukha hak, nit at ninom hunigat werekma warogo ’binanhukha. Nen, at Kristus watlageikhesikmo nen, opase obatneak hogorakharek meke etnogo nen ilugutdisikhe hak, nit yogotakninihigutninakhikhemo ninobabut ket ninat hagakhe dogouok o.
45006005	At watlageikhe hak, nit ninom hunigat dogolik watlagagu halok he, at iluk ageikhe hak, nit itithogonat niniluk dogogun.
45006006	Nit ninobabut ninikhogat dogolik weak hagakhe lagagu meke iti erlok degetdisoagaluk, Yesus o baga meldiluk ninomat ninakhukha iti nen, nit ninobabut alep meke iti, atuaneke dogosak dek o, iluk ninilu.
45006007	Akhuni weak hagatluk watlagunem nen, wene inoba meke dek agarek iti.
45006008	“Nit he, Kristus ninom hunigat watlagagu halok, ninom hunigat niniluk dogogun o, ” iluk ninetaiken at oba hakokthek welago.
45006009	At Kristus arat watlageikhesikmo nen Allah nen ilugutdisikhemo nogo nen, yabokane watlasigin dek, iluk ninilu o. Halok he, watlariogei erlo iti nen Yesus ebe yabokane apma ukusak motok dek o.
45006010	At Kristus watlageikhe iti, weak hagakharek iti hasik opaki hasigat watlageikhe iti arat o. Yabokane iluk ageikhesik iluk welagarek iti, Allah hasigat iluk welagarek o.
45006011	Iti hagat, hit hinakla nen, “Weak hagakhe dogosak hasik waregat dogolik, Kristus Yesus ninom hunik dogolik, Allah hasigat niniluk dogogun, ” iluk hinakla apekhe dogono o.
45006012	Ninebe watlagorek meke yi werekma, weak hagakharek meke iti obatne asinogo nen, apma ukiluk dogogup o. Weak hagasuagaluk hinakla kagali aga halok he, weak meke iti ane hinasuk holhup o.
45006013	Hiniki hinisok hinebe baga welagarek meke aperek inom tha'bokhogonat, weak meke asikhe arege negen atluk nen, weak hagakhe dogoagaluk, at wogokhe dogogup. Hinebe warek hakene werekma Allah nen hiniluguthinakhemo hiniluk dogolik hagasusak mothogonat, hinebe a’birat Allah wogotni o. Hiniki hinisok hinebe baga welagarek meke inom aperek tha’bokhogonat nen, at asikhe arege negen atluk nen, mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk Allah wogotni o.
45006014	Hit nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo obahakokthek welagap dek. At he, Allah obabut hano nen akmutninakherek iti oba hakokthek welagap iti nen, weak meke apma dogosak dek o.
45006015	Halok he, wene iti ilugun oba, nikithogon usak? Nit ninebe wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga hakokthek welago dek. At he, Allah obabut hano nen akmutninakherek iti baga hakokthek welago iti nen, weak hagakhe dogosak nogo? Motok dek o.
45006016	Hit nen, ap ageikhe atuaneke atluk nen, ane holek dogouogoluk, apma ukiluk dogolik, at ane holhe lagap halok he, at atuaneke mekeat welago iluk hinokodek nogo? Weak hagakharek meke iti apma ukiluk nen, ilugun oba watlageikharek iti. Mekeat he, at Allah ane holek dogolik, at apma ukilukmo, ilugun oba at nen wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok at ninom yabokane ninapuke hunogo ’binanherek iti.
45006017	Hit alebageik nen, weak hagakharek iti apma ukiluk werekma, yabokane, wene yakulhisugunem, wene iti hinetaikenma waganhigip iti nen, Allah heagei wasuok o.
45006018	Hit nen, weak hagakharek iti nen hakhisik werekma, Allah nen herle hisalogo ’binageisikhesik nen, at hasik mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, apma ’binageisikhemo welagap.
45006019	Hit hinobabut wene yokhisigi iti hutdusak erlok dek hakene nen, hutdubageik nen iluk, akhuni inatuaneke dogolik hagakharek meke inoba lisogo yokhisekhe lagei iti. Hit alebageik, hiniki hinisok hinebe baga welagarek meke aperek inom tha'bokhogonat nen, weak meke atuaneke thalek wogokhik, yugunat hagakhik, hinasuk warek dek yi weak ti weak hagakhik, hagakhe lagagip iti. Iti hagat, yogotak hit hiniki hinisok hinebe baga welagarek meke aperek inom tha’bokhogonat nen, Allah ekaerek hasik ’bisalok mothogon hagakhe dogouogoluk, at wogokhe dogono o.
45006020	Hit alep weak hagakhe lagagip meke apma dogolik, Allah akla warlok apekherek meke mothogon hagasusak erlok dek welagagip.
45006021	Meke re, itithogon hagakhe lagagip iti hasik, nena meke thaburasigip nogo? Alebat hagakhe lagagip meke iti hasik, yogotak hinekarli ariogo iti. Itithogon hagakhe dogoluk nen, ilugun oba inebe motokwatlageikharek itiat o.
45006022	Meke re, hit weak hagakho korlek, weak meke nen hakhisik werekma, Allah nen herle hisalogo ula'inageikhemo nen, yogotakne at apma ukiluk welagap iti o. Dogolik hinebe at hasik 'binageiluk welagap iti thaburegep o. Itithogon dogoluk, ilugun oba hiniluk motok dogogunat o.
45006023	Weak hagakharek iti oko re, watlageikharek iti. Nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ninom hunik werekma, Allah obabut hano nen oko degat niniluk motok dogoagaluk hagatninakherek iti.
45007001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah nen, “Yigithogon hagatno, tigithogon hagatno, ” iluk ninasuk wakhikhe iti, akhuni inebe iniluk dogolik wene iti hago dogolik mothogon hagakhidek halok wene inoba agarek. Meke re, inebe watlago halok, wene inoba agarek dek iluk hinokodek nogo? Dek o. Hinilu meke anek yokhisekhe lagei o
45007002	It humi inaguni waganek meke, inaguni inebe iniluk werek korlek, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga, inom herle warek negen hano welageidek halok, wene inoba asusak. Meke re, inaguni watlagunem anek nen, herle warek hakene iti hisalaga halok, wene inoba asusak dek.
45007003	He ageikhe nen, agun iluk werek korlegat ap ageikhe waganhe halok, akhuni nen, “Paramat hagariogo o, ” iluk abok weak usagat o. Meke re, agun ebe watlaga halok he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga herle warek negen welageikha iti, arat hisalaga iluk, ap ageikhe erlok waganusagat o. Waganhunem, “Param hagariogo, ” usak dek o.
45007004	Iti hak, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit alebat, humi inaguni inom herle warek hakene welageikharek ogo iti hak, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga herle warek werekma, at Kristus ebe wakhukhama watlageikhe iti, hinomat watlaga dogolik, herle warek hakene welagagip meke iti arat hisalageikhe iti. Iti nen he, humi inaguni watlagunem ageikhe erlok woginabusak iti hak, hit Allah hasik hano hagakhe dogoagaluk, at Yesus watlageikhemo Allah nen ilugutdisikhe meke etnogo nen wokhinakhikhemo welagap o.
45007005	Alebat, nit ninobabut akhuni inobabut ninikhogat welagagu. Itithogon dogolik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo werek nen, ninoba agaken dageisinem nen, niniki ninisok ninebe a'birat nen weak hagakhunem ilugun oba, motok watlaga lagagu iti.
45007006	Alebat wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga herle warek negen welagagu meke, Kristus watlaga dogolik nit ninomat watlagagu iti baga, Allah nen herle hisalninakhikhemo welago. Yogotak he, Allah atuaneke dogolik, wene at nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene holal waganek meke ninileken anek 'bikhekhe dogolik, hagakhe lagagu iti hak, hagakhe lago dek mekeat he, Allah Agoreke nen ninobabut ket meke hagatninakho korlek, hagakhe lago.
45007007	Iti halok he, nit nen nikithogon ugun. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti weak usak nogo? Motok dek o. Meke re, wene itithogon ninasuk wakhidek dogolepma re, weak hagakharek iti nikithogon nokodegat dogole o. Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe iti wakhe dogolik, “Akhuni inameke, Warlok e, iluk hinakla apugup o, ”\rq (Keluaran 20:17; Ulangan 5:21)\rq* iluk igidek dogolepma re, akhuni inameke meke, Warlok e, apegerek iti nokodegat dogole o.
45007008	Iti nenat, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga, weak meke nen he, an weak hagasuagaluk, “Yi meke ti meke akhuni inameke, hakla nen, warlok akhan o, iluk nakla kagalhe lageikhe. Wene Allah nen ninasuk iti wakhidekma, weak hagasusak he, ninokodegat welagagu.
45007009	An alep he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti nokodek dogolik, niluk hano welagei thalek welagagi. Meke re, wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo nilu agagisik oba nen, weak hagakharek iti meke obatne ageikhemo,
45007010	an he, warek hakene hagatlagagi. Allah nen niluk dogoagaluk nasuk wakhikhe mekeat he, wene iti baga watlagagi hakene iti.
45007011	Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga, weak hagakharek iti nakla kagalogo nen, nukhetdanhikhesik nen, nebe nakhikhe iti.
45007012	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti, Allah aneat o. “Yigithogon hagasusak dek, tigithogon hagasusak dek, ” iluk ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti ebe tomok at aneat o. Wene iti mot hano motok isikhe o.
45007013	Halok he, wene iti hano motok isikhe meke iti nen an nebe watlagagi nogo? Motok dek o. Weak hagakharek iti nenat o. Weak hagakharek iti nen, hano meke iti baga warogo 'banhikhemo, ekagat ageikhe. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe iti bagaat, inobabut weak hagakharek iti motok weak, iluk ekagat hagatlageikhe iti.
45007014	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti, at Agoreke nen yoknisasikhemo nogo nen, hano motok, iluk ninilu. Meke re, an nobabut akhuni inobabut inikhok mekeat welagei. Weak hagakharek iti meke nen apma 'banigiluk oko palogo negen woknakhikhemo welagei.
45007015	Iti nen an nakla nen, neke ti meke hano meke hagatle, iluk warlok egetek meke iti, ebe hagakherek dek. Mekeat he, na'itapegerek meke itiat hagakherek iti nen he, an hagakhe lagei meke iti hutdigidek welagei o.
45007016	An nakla nen warlok apegerek meke dek. Na’it apegerek meke hagakhe lagei iti, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene itiat hano, ” iluk u hagat hagakhe lagei o.
45007017	An nobabut itithogon hagakhe lagei iti, an nen hagakhe lagei 'buk. Weak hagakharek meke nakla dogolik hagariogo.
45007018	Mothogon hagasigiluk warlok apegerek mekeat he, ebe an nen hagasusak erlok dek o. Iti re, an nobabut nen, hano meke ageikhe hagakherek 'buk. Nobabut akhuni inobabut meke inikhogat dogolik hagakhe lagei, iluk nilu o.
45007019	Hano meke hagasigiluk apegerek mekeat he, ebe hagakhe lagei dek. Weak meke hagasigiluk apigidek mekeat he, iti mekeat hagakhe lagei.
45007020	Nakla nen warlok apigidek. Na'it apegerek meke hagakhe lagei halok he, an nebe nen hagakhe lagei dek higi. Weak hagakharek meke nakla welagarek meke iti nenat hagariogo.
45007021	An nobabut hagakherek igi iti re, men hekhe lagei. Hano hagasigiluk isinem nen, weak hagasusak anek hagatnakherek o.
45007022	An nakla nen, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hano, ” iluk apegerek mekeat he,
45007023	niki nisok nebe a'birat, ninat meke hagakhe dogolik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo nakla nen hano apegerek meke iti thebeligiluk hagakherek. Niki nisok nebe a’birat yoma weak anek hagakherek iti nen, nebe weak hagasuagaluk herle warogo negen ’banherek iti.
45007024	-
45007025	An nekaerek nakla re, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti holek dogogin apegerek mekeat he, nobabut akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek iti nen yoknekhunem ane holek welagarek iti. Itithogon welagarek iti nen, nebe motok nasigin iti, eiye, nakla weak. Tha nen tilnabigin? Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe iti baga tilnabigin iti nen, “Nopase Allah, ” iluk heagei wakhe lagei o.
45008001	Yogotak nit Kristus Yesus ninom hunik welago mekeAllah nen wene ninoba ’biluk weagatninabigin dek o.
45008002	An alep he, weak hagakharethek ilugun oba inebe motok watlageikharek iti meke nen herle warogo negen haknarek welageikhe. Itithogon werekma, yabokane Allah Agoreke nen Kristus Yesus ninom hunogo ’binanhe dogolik ninilugutninakherek etnogo nen herle hisalogo ’banhikhemo welagei.
45008003	Alep he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo, nit akhuni ninobabut ninobatne dek iti nen, hano hagatninabusak erlok dek ageikhe. Erlok dek ageikhemo, nit akhuni ninobabut weak hagakho werekma, Allah ekaerek a’but nit hakene hagatlatluk, nit weak hagakhorek meke iti wene oba ’biluk obatne degetdisoagaluk la’i ageikhemo obatne degetdisikhe iti.
45008004	Alep he, nit mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe mekeat he, weak hagakhe lagagu iti. Weak hagakhe lagagusikmo, yabokane nit akhuni inobabut waganhidek dogolik Allah Agoreke obabut waganogo mot hagakhe lago meke at isikhe hak hagakhe dogoagaluk, weak hagakharek iti arat obatne degetdisikhe iti.
45008005	It aperek nen akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek meke inobabut waganiogei meke iti, inakla wene akhuni mekeat oba ebekharek o. Nen, it aperek nen Allah Agoreke obabut waganiogei meke re, inakla wene at mekeat oba ebekharek.
45008006	Akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek meke oba ebekhe dogogun halok, ilugun oba inebe motok watlasugun iti. Mekeat he, Allah Agoreke inakla kagalhunem hagakharek meke oba ebekhe dogogun halok, inetaiken hapukhogon iniluk motok dogogun iti.
45008007	Akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek meke etnogo oba ebekhe dogolik, Allah apma ukiluk ane holek dogosak erlok dek nen holek welageikharek dek iti nen, at inom weakwerek o.
45008008	Akhuni inobabut inikhok dogolik hagakharek meke iti hagakhoat dogolik, Allah akla hanorogo hagasusak erlok dek welageikharek iti.
45008009	Itithogon mekeat he, hit anek Allah Agoreke eberogonat hinakla werek halok he, hinobabut akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek hak hagakhidek. Allah Agoreke obabut waganogo hagakhethep iti. Nen, tha nen Kristus Agoreke akla dek halok he, at iti ebe Kristus meke dek o.
45008010	Itithogon mekeat he, hit Kristus hinakla werek halok he, hinobabut weak hagakhethep iti nen, hinebe itikmanke yi watlasugun mekeat he, Allah nen wene hinoba meke korogo wokhalok yabokane hinapuke hinom hunogo ’binageikhe iti nen, at Agoreke nen hiniluguthinabigin iti.
45008011	At Allah nen, Kristus Yesus watlageikhesikmo ilugutdisikhemo, at Agoreke hinakla dogolik, hinebe itikmanke watlagathep meke yi hiniluguthinabiginat. Iti re, at Agoreke nen Kristus ebe watlageikhesikmo ilugutdisikhe etnogo hinakla welagarek iti nen hiniluguthinabigin o.
45008012	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit nen hagakhe dogosak meke werek o. Iti re, ninobabut akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek hak hagakhe dogosak iluk igi ’buk. Dek o.
45008013	Hit hinobabut akhuni hinobabut hinikhogat dogolik hagakhe dogogun halok, hinebe motok watlasugun iti. Meke re, hinobabut itithogon hagasusak hagathinakhunem, Allah Agoreke ayoko 'biluk, at obatne baga watdisekhe dogogun halok he, hiniluk motok dogogun o.
45008014	-
45008015	Allah nen Agoreke wokhisekherek iti, akhuni inebe it aperek inatuaneke dogolik inobabut inayukhogo hagakharek iti hak, hagathinakhe dogoagaluk wokhisekherek ’buk. Meke re, at Allah ekaerek a’buri hagathinabiluk, erlathinabuagaluk wokhisekherek. Iti nen, it akhuni Allah Agoreke nen wogosik nekherek meke, inebe dopok nen, inebe Allah a’buriat werek o. Itithogon dogolik ninebe Allah Agoreke baga hakotdiluk dogolik, men ekhe lago, “Nopase Allah, nopase Allah, ” iluk ninane pakhogon ekhe lago iti.
45008016	Itithogon ekhe lago iti, at Allah Agoreke nen, “Hinebe Allah a’buri o, ” iluk yoknisugunem, nit ninetaiken oba nen ogorek iti.
45008017	Nit ninebe Allah a’buri halok he, at Kristus yi aik ti aik hasikhe hak, hugun halok, Allah nen nit Kristus ninomat hogotninabigin iti nen, Allah nen yi meke ti meke at a’buri wogeisagaluk abok yogeisasikhe meke iti, at Kristus ninomat woknisaumo, iteerek dogogun o.
45008018	Nit o yogotak welago ya baga re, yi aik ti aik hekhe lago iti, herlekha’bugat negen. Meke re, yabokane, Allah nen ninebe ninat meke hagatninakhunem hogotninabugun iti anek he, kogat o. Halok he, ipisak walhaumo ipisak tak-tak dek, nakla apekhe lagei o.
45008019	Pogot agat yi meke ti meke Allah nen walhasikhe meke yoma nen, “Allah a’buri inebe ninat hagarinakhunem thelekma hogorinabugun iti mera hagatlasigin, ” iluk, arlik haliogei.
45008020	Pogot agat yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat abusak alomarogo dogeigiluk apalok nen, alomatlageikhesik welagarek ’buk. At Allah nen, “Yabokane hanotdigin nen, elanma hasik itithogon dogoak o, ” iluk akla apasikhe baga werek o.
45008021	Itithogon werek mekeat he, yabokane Allah nen hanotdigin oba weregat o. Itinem nen, akhuni herle warek weak werekma, herle hisalogo tilinakharek hak, pogot agat yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonatalomatdekherek meke nen obatne baga hagasik werekma, Allah nen herle hisalogo tilogo ’bisagein o. Itithogon ’bisagein iti, at a’buri inebe ninat hagarogo ’bisugunem hogorinabugun iti hak, pogot agat yi meke ti meke itithogonat ninat hagarogo ’bisugunem hogorasugunat o.
45008022	Humi nen, ineagei itaginakhe dogolik, ineagei hinet weak wakhe dogolik inetaiken ane egarek hak, pogot agat yi meke timeke Allah nen walhasikhe meke yoma tha’bokhogonat o haganeat nen hinet wakhe dogolik inetaiken ane iliogeiat o.
45008023	Pogot agat yi meke ti meke iti anek hinet wakhe dogolik, inetaiken ane iliogei ’buk. Allah nen, “Hinebe an na’buri. Arat wokhinakhi o, ” iluk ninebe ninetaiken ninoado tha'bokhogonat hanotninabigin meke aban dogolik, hipiri yukuk alebageik meke itakharek hak, at Agoreke alebageik woknisasikhe mekeat, ebe yabokane hagatninabigin meke iti therogo dogolik, hinet wakhe dogolik ninetaiken ane ekhe lago.
45008024	Itithogon hagatninabigin o, iluk ninakla apasinem, Allah nen tilninakhikhemo welago. Meke re, tha hak nen, “Yabokane itithogon hagatlasigin, ” iluk akla apasi werekma, ebe arat hagatlagunem ileken halok nen, yabokane akla apasiat dogosak nogo? Itithogon aperek welageikharek dek iti nen, nit nen, “Yabokane itithogon hagatlasigin, ” iluk apekhe lago meke iti, ebe arat hagatlagunem nen, ninileken hogo halok he, ninakla apasi motogat dogosak dek o.
45008025	Meke re, ninakla nen, “Yabokane eberogonat itithogon hagatlasigin o, ” iluk apekhe lago meke ninileken higidek dogolik ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk therogo welago.
45008026	Itithogon therogo dogolik, nit ninebe ninobatne dek werekma, Allah Agoreke nen yomaknisiliogo. Nit Allah ayoko ’buogoluk ninane nikithogon u heat ninobakha palek werekma, Allah Agoreke nen akhuni inane baga usak erlok dek meke, etaiken ane baga Allah ayoko ’biliogo.
45008027	Itithogon ayoko ’bisinem nen, at Allah nen ninetaikenma motok penakherethekma nen, at ekaerek akla apekherek meke tak-tagat, at Agoreke nen at a’buri inobasik ayoko ’bisinem hutdekherek.
45008028	At Allah akla apalok nit ninayoko ’bisikhemo, nit at ebe ninakmu welago meke, at ninom dogolik, yi meke ti mekehano asuagaluk, hagatnisiliogo nit ninilu.
45008029	Haganeat, at Allah nen nit ninebe ilu dogolik, at a'but hakene asuagaluk wenakninakhikhe. At Yesus ebe makusa meke, agarumi doalegat at inom dogoagaluk wenakninakhikhe iti.
45008030	Alebat Allah nen ninebe wenakninakhikhe meke, ninayoko 'bisikhe. Itithogon ninayoko 'bisikhe meke, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhasikhesik nen, yabokane ninom ninapuke hunogo 'binanhikhemo welago. Ninebe itithogon hunogo 'binanhikhe meke at ebe hogorakho motok welageikharek meke iti hakene asuagaluk wokninakhikhe.
45008031	Wene tha'bokhogonat iti hasik, nit nen nikithogon ugun. Allah nit werekmake aga halok, tha nen erlok degetdinanusak nogo. Erlok dek o.
45008032	At ekaerek a'but akmu nen hakhigidek nit tha'bokhogonat hasik watlasuagaluk la'i ageikhe. At obabut hano nen itithogon woknisasikhesik nen, yi meke ti meke oba duk-duk woknisagein dek nogo? Woknisageinat o.
45008033	Allah nen ninebe wenago wokninakhikhe meke, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhekherethek nen, at ane pakhogon, “It inoba wene motok dek, ” iluk ekherethekma, yabokane wene tha nen ninoba 'busak nogo. Erlok dek o.
45008034	Nen, wene ninoba 'biluk nen, tha nen weagatninabusak nogo. At Kristus Yesus watlageikhesikmo Allah nen ilugutdisikhemo, pogot oba dageiluk, at alilu iki ebeke ebe kok dogolik, nit hasik Allah ayoko 'biliogo.
45008035	At Kristus ninebe akmu nen ninom hunik werekma, tha nen agotninabusak. Yi weak ti weak ninoba hagatlageik, akin meke ninoba ageik, hagasumo iti nen agotninabusak a? Erlok dek o. Akhuni nen, “Hinebe Allah a'buri, ” iluk weagatninabumo iti nen agotninabusak a? Hipiri no ageik, ninasu yi meke ti meke dek ageik, hagatlasumo iti nen agotninabusak a? Yuk ageik, ninebe ninakhik, hagatlasumo, iti nen agotninabusak a? Erlok dek o.
45008036	Wene iti mothogon Allah ane baga holal waganhe dogolik, men isukha, “Hat hasigat, akhuni nen dikene hunik, hibako hunik, ninasuogoluk hagatninakho motogatwerek o. Akhuni nen domba wasuogoluk abok palharek iti hak, ninabok palhoat werek o, ”\rq (Mazmur 44:22-23)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek.
45008037	-
45008039	Itithogon mekeat he, Allah ninebe akmu nen ninoe Etagapogot Kristus Yesus woknisasikhemo ebe watlageikhe iti baga ninom hunik werekma ninebe watlasumo inom, niniluk dogoumo inom, iti nen agotninabusak erlok dek o. Malaikat pogot oba yoko nekharek meke iti inom, pogot oba inobatne werek meke aperek iti inom nen, agotninabusak erlok dek o. Yi meke ti meke yogotak hagatlagarek meke inom, yabokane hagatlasigin meke inom, iti nen agotninabusak erlok dek o. Nen, obatne werek meke aperek nen agotninabusak erlok dek o. Nen, yi meke ti meke pogot oba welagarek meke men, wema baga welagarek meke men, agotninabusak erlok dek o. Nen, Allah nen walhasikhe meke ninat meke aperek nen agotninabusak erlok dek o. At Allah nen ninebeakmutninakhikhemo, Kristus Yesus hagakhikhe iti baga, tha’bokhogonat itithogon weak hagatninakhunem nit agotninabusak erlok dek o. Mekeat he, akhuni wuleleken tiologo inatluk inobatne ageikharek hak, nit ninobatne agorek iluk hutdekhe lagei o.
45009001	-
45009003	An nagarlak lak nerugi ninukuloak etaga opakiat meke weak werek iti nen, nakla weagat welageik, korloat welageik, hagakhe lagei. “Allah nen, an Kristus nipisak hunik welago meke iti kolelogo heredaniluk, it inobolukmo homan ’banilep e, apekhe lagei iti baga, it woginabilep e, ” iluk Kristus nipisak hunik dogolik igi iti, eberogonat igi. Nekalat igi dek o. Allah Agoreke nen nakla dogolik, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk yoknekhik, nekaerek nakla nen meneke, “Eberogonat igi, ” iluk apigik, egerek.
45009004	It akhuni Israel meke ebe Israel Allah nen wenageinakhikhe meke iti nen, at a’buri asuagaluk woginakhik, at Ebe hogorakharek meke iti irat yakulisigik, wene warogo irat woginakhik, wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo irat wogeisigik, “An yigithogon hogotnakhe dogono, ” iluk irat yakulisigik, “Yabokane itithogon hagathinabigin, ” iluk abok irat yogeisigik, hagakhikhe iti.
45009005	Nit ninopa lak nen, it nen itago meke. At Kristus ebe nit akhuni itaklagorek hak itaklageikhe iti, it meke nen itakhukha meke re, ebe Allah mekeat o. Yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat nen, wema baga negen mekeat he, at anek, upu baga siakhogon welagarek iti nen, at anek hogorakhe dogogun iti, ebeat asuak, iluk u hak, “Amin, ” ekhe dogouok.
45009006	Allah nen it abok yogeisasikhe iti, “Ebe dek aga, ” iluk igi ’buk. It Israel nen itago meke iti tha’bokhogonat he, inebe Israel Allah nen wenageinakhikhe meke ’buk.
45009007	At Allah nen wene Abraham men yogokhikhe, “An nen Ishak nen itago meke anek hat ha’buri iluk ekhe dogogin o, ”\rq (Kejadian 21:12)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe iti nen, Abraham nen itago meke tha’bokhogonat nen, Allah a’buri usak ’buk. Dek o.
45009008	Itithogon isikhe iti ebe men iluk isikhe. Inebe nen itago meke iti, Allah a’buri usak ’buk. Allah nen abok yogeisasikhe meke halok, at a’buri usak o.
45009009	At Allah nen Abraham wene warikhikhe iti warekhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “An yabokane hoba wisusak tak-tagat wisigin o. Wagunem nen, he Sara eak abat itasigin o, ”\rq (Kejadian 18:10)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
45009010	Meke re, wene iti anek ’buk. At he Ribka eagei inopase Ishak ninopa opakiat iti nen ap inebe pere itaginakhikhe.
45009011	It ap inebe pere iti, inebe itaklageidek inobabut hano hagakhik, weak hagakhik, hagakhidek werek korlek, at Allah akla nen apalok witaberogo ’bisasikhe iti ebeat atluk dogoagaluk,
45009012	inagosa Ribka wene men yogokhikhe, “Hat heagei itaginabigin iti, alebageik itaklasigin meke iti, ebe yabokane itaklasigin meke apma dogogin o, ”\rq (Kejadian 25:23)\rq* iluk itithogon abok yogokhikhe. Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, it nen yi meke ti meke hagakhukha baga witaberinakhikhe ’buk. At Allah akla apalok witaberinakhikhe iti.
45009013	Wene iti hakene ageikhe men isikheat, “At Yakub iti nakmu. Mekeat he, at Esau iti na’it o, ”\rq (Maleakhi 1:2-3)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45009014	Halok he, nit nen nikithogon ugun. At Allah obabut korlo hagakhikhe usak nogo? Motok dek o. Allah obabut mot.
45009015	At nen Musa men yogokhikhe, “An nenat nakmu meke halok nakmurinakhik, netaiken meke halok netaiken ageik, hagasigin o, ”\rq (Keluaran 33:19)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
45009016	Allah nen itithogon ekherek iti, akhuni inakla nen hano iluk apalok, it nen inobatnerogon hagatluk nen, akmurinakherek dek. At Allah obabut hano nenat akmurinabiluk inebe woginakharek iti.
45009017	At Allah nen kok Firaun men yogokhikhe, “An nen yi hasigat meldagagi o. Akhuni nen an nobatne inilu ageik, netaga o yi ai ti ai yogeisilik lageik, hagasuagaluk meldagagi o, ”\rq (Keluaran 9:16)\rq* iluk yogokhikhemo Allah ane holal waganek etnogo baga holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45009018	At Allah nen, “At yi nakmu, ” iluk akla apekherek meke halogat, akmurakhik, nen, “At iti etaiken a’beretdisigin, ” iluk akla apekherek meke halogat etaiken a’beretdisigik, hagakherek iti.
45009019	Itithogon hagakherek iti nen, hat ageikhe nen an men yoknesusak apekhe lagei, “At Allah akla apalok hagakherek meke iti, tha nen, Na’it, iluk degetdusak nogo. Itithogon degetdusak erlokdek mekeat he, nenaluk wene ninoba ’biliogo, ” iluk usak apekhe lagei.
45009020	Eiye! Nagot yi. At Allah ane isinem, hathane oko dagakhogon yogosusak nogo? Erlok dek o. Akhuni nen isoak agat ka’bok meke hagakhunem he, agat ka’bok iti nen, at hagakhe werek iti yogokhe dogolik, “Hat nen an yigithogon nenaluk hagatnakhen, ” iluk yogosusak nogo? Erlok dek o.
45009021	Agat ka’bok iti opakiat mekeat he, at hagakhe werek iti iteeregatma, ageikhe hanorogo hagarogo ’bigik, ageikhe yugunat hagarogo ’bigik, hagasusak dek nogo? Hagasusagat o.
45009022	Iti hak, at Allah akla apekhe dogolik, “Akhuni an nen walinakhigi mekeat he, it aperek nakla aga liabiogei iti nen, weagarinabigiluk, nakla aga dageisikhe meke iti, it nen nobabut palhik, nobatne werek iti, inilu ageik, hagasuak o, ” iluk obakhanini hapugutdiluk welagarek.
45009023	It iti hasik itithogon obakhanini hapugutdiluk dogolik, nit ninobasik men apiliogo, “It nakmu meke hanorinabigiluk ebekeram walinakhigi iti, hano motok hagarinabigin meke inilu asuak o, ” iluk apekherek.
45009024	Itithogon apekherek meke iti, nit akhuni Yahudi meke anek wenakninakhikhesik ninayoko ’bisikhe ’buk. It itikmanke meke ninomat wenakninakhikhesik inayoko ’bisikheat o.
45009025	Itithogon iluk at Allah nen wene ageikhe men isikhe, “Akhuni werlek meke an na’buri dek welagoukha meke re, an na’buriat o, iluk igik, inebe nakmurinakhidek meke, nakmuat o, iluk igik, igin o,\rq (Hosea 2:22-23)\rq*
45009026	An nen akhuni o ageikhe meke hasik, Hit he, an na’buri dek o, iluk isigi mekeat, yabokane it o etoma meke hasigat, O yoma an niluk welagarek meke na’buri o, ilukigin,\rq (Hosea 1:10)\rq* iluk isikhemo at Hosea nen holal waganogo ’bisikhe.
45009027	-
45009028	Nen wene ageikhe Allah nen men isikhe, “Akhuni agat oba meke yoma wene ibat inobamotok 'bigin iti nen, akhuni Israel nen itago meke inebe lelaga i laut kok yekelek yipitlake welagarek iti hakene werek. Mekeat he, inebe herlekha’bugat anek tilinabigin o, ”\rq (Yesaya 10:22-23)\rq* iluk isikhemo Yesaya nen holal waganogo ’bisikhe.
45009029	Itithogon iluk Yesaya nenat wene ageikhe alebat men isikhe, “Ninopase Etagapogot obatneak etnogo nen, nit nen itago meke aperek here’isigidekmotogat inakhe dogolepma, Sodom hakene ageik, Gomora tak-tak ageik, hagatlo o, ”\rq (Yesaya 1:9)\rq* iluk Yesaya nen holal waganogo ’bisikhe.
45009030	Iti halok he, nit nen nikithogon ugun? Men usak. It akhuni itikmanke meke nen wene inoba meke Allah nen korogo wokhalok, inapuke inom hunogo ’bisoagaluk hagasusak meke inobatnerogon hagakhidek. Mekeat he, inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukhama, Allah nen wene inoba meke korogo wokhasikhesik, yabokane inapuke inom hunogo ’bisasikhe.
45009031	Itithogon mekeat he, it Israel meke nen, Allah nen wene inoba meke korogo wokhasikhesik, yabokane inapuke at inom hunogo ’bisausak wene holek dogouogoluk walhasukha mekeat he, erlok dek ageikhe.
45009032	Nenaluk nen itithogon erlok dek ageikhe. Iti inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdigidek, inekaerek inakla apalok hagakhe lagoukha iti nenat o. Akhuni holagarlem lagadogolik helekit oba inisok a’bit dikhogon waregarek hak, nuk agoukha iti.
45009033	Wene iti hasik Allah nen men isikhe, “Lakhani! An o Sion etoma helekit hakene ageikhe 'bigin o. ’Bumo helekit iti baga akhuni inisok a’bit dikhogon waralok wara laga dogogun o. Mekeat he, inetaiken at oba hakotdugun meke inekarli asugun motok dek o, ”\rq (Yesaya 28:16)\rq*
45010001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah nen it nagarlak lak nerugi ninukuloak etaga opakiat meke iti, tilinabilep e, iluk nakla nen wene munini ebekhik, Allah ayoko ’bigik, hagakhe lagei.
45010002	It nen Allah hasik inobatnerogon hagariogei mekeat he, inobabut nilu. Eberogonat hagasusak meke inilu dogolik hagariogei ’buk.
45010003	It he, Allah nen wene inoba meke korogo wokhalok yabokane inapuke inom hunogo ’bisoagaluk, at apma ukiluk dogolik hagasusak meke inokodek nen hagakhidek welagoukha. Inekaerek inakla nen apalok inobatnerogon hagakhe lagoukha iti.
45010004	At Kristus ebe agat oba usageikhe iti baga, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo tha’bokhogonat mothogon anek hagakhikhe. Akhuni inetaiken at Kristus oba hakotdegarek meke inebe dopok, wene inoba meke korogo wokhalok, yabokane inapuke Allah inom hunogo ’bisekherek.
45010005	At Musa nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga, Allah nen wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok yabokane ninapuke at ninom hunogo ’binanherek iti hasik men isikhe, “Akhuni wene iti holek dogolik, mothogon hagakhe dogogun meke inebe dopok, wene iti baga iniluk motok dogogun o, ”\rq (Imamat 18:5)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisikhe.
45010006	Itithogon mekeat he, akhuni inetaiken Allah oba hakotdisinem nen, at nen wene inoba meke korogo wokhalok yabokane inapuke at inom hunogo ’bisekherek iti hasik, Allah ane baga holal yigithogon waganogo ’bisukha, “Hakla nen, Pogot oba tha dageigin, iluk apugun o, ” iluk isikhe iti ebe re, Kristus ebe wolok usa’isuagaluk usak dek iluk isikhe iti.
45010007	Nen, “Wema baga tha usasigin, iluk apugun o, ” iluk isikhe iti ebe re, Kristus watlageikhesikmo nit nen ilugutdiluk wolok dagei isuagaluk usak dek iluk isikhe iti.
45010008	Halok he, wene iti men apalok isikhe, “Allah ane iti ebe horogat werek o. Iti hape baga men, hetaikenma men, werek o, ”\rq (Ulangan 30:12-14)\rq* iluk isikhe iti, akhuni nen inetaiken Allah oba hakotdusak wene nit nen yokhisekhe lago iti hasigat isikhe o.
45010009	Hape baga nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus at o, ” iluk pakhogon igik, nen, hakla nen, “Yesus ebe watlageikhesikmo, Allah nen ilugutdisikhemo werek o, ” iluk eberogonat apigik, hagasumo, tilhabiginat o.
45010010	Akhuni inetaiken Allah oba hakotdisinem nen, at nen wene inoba meke korogo wokhalok, yabokane inapuke at inom hunogo ’bisekherek. Nen, inape baga nen, at abok pakhogon isinem nen, tilinakherek iti.
45010011	Allah ane baga holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik men isukha, “Akhuni inetaiken at oba hakotdiliogei meke inekarli asugun motok dek o, ”\rq (Yesaya 28:16)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45010012	It akhuni Yahudi meke ninat, nen, akhuni itikmanke meke ninat, usak dek. Nittha'bokhogonat ninopase Etagapogot, Allah opakiat o. Nen, at nen wogeisoagaluk ayoko ’begarek meke inebe tha’bokhogonat kokhogonat wogeisekherek o.
45010013	At nen ekhe dogolik, “It aperek nen an hinopase Netagapogot Allah netaga palharek meke, tha’bokhogonat tilinabigin anek o, ”\rq (Yoel 2:32)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45010014	-
45010015	Allah nen wene ageikhe men isikhe, “Akhuni hano wene wolok yogeisa lageikharekmeke iti, hano motok o, ”\rq (Yesaya 52:7)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek mekeat he, hano wene iti wolok loagaluk inayoko ’biluk la’isigidek halok, nikithogon nen yogeisa lausak. Nen, it aperek nen wene ebe yogeisa lageidek werek korlek, at abok nikithogon nen inasuk holusak. Nen, at abok holhidek dogolik, nikithogon nen inetaiken at oba hakotdusak. Akhuni inetaiken at oba hakotdigidek dogolik, etaga nikithogon palusak.
45010016	Meke re, akhuni inebe tha’bokhogonat hano wene itiat waganusak meke re, it aperek waganhidek werek o. At Yesaya nen, Allah men yogokhikhe, “Ninopase. Nit wene yogeisugunem nen, tha nen wene iti hutdekhe. Hutdigidek anek werek o, ”\rq (Yesaya 53:1)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
45010017	Meke re, hano wene iti, Kristus abok yogeisa lagunemat inasuk holharek o. Nen, wene inasuk holilugat, inetaiken at oba hakotdegarek o.
45010018	Meke re, an nen hinok ageikhe waganusak. It he, hano wene iti inasuk holhidek werek a? Dek o. Inasuk arat holha. Allah ane baga, “It inane iti o yi ai ti ai tha’bokhogonat wialageikhesikmo re, o ilugun ilugun eloma tha’bokhogonat inasuk holhukha o, ”\rq (Mazmur 19:4-5)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek iti nen igi o.
45010019	Hinok ageikhe waganik. It akhuni Israel meke hano wene iti inokodek a? Iniluat o. Keramat, at Allah nen ane isikhemo, at Musa nen men yogeisasikhe, “An nen, it akhuni an na’buri meke ’buk. Akhuni werlek meke an nen inayoko ’bumo, hit nen ua palubageik nen iluk hagathinakhik, nen it inetaiken dek meke inayoko ’bumo, hit hinakla aga dagouak nen iluk hagathinakhik, hagasigin o, ”\rq (Ulangan 32:21)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe.
45010020	Nen, yabokane Allah nen, wene ageikhe men isikhe, “Akhuni an nebe heraknabiogei dek meke nen, heraknakha o. Nen, akhuni an noba nitema waganhidek meke nen, nebe neoagaluk nekaerek nen inelokhoma winam agei o, ”\rq (Yesaya 65:1)\rq* iluk isikhemo, Yesaya nen ayuk motok degatyogeisasikhe.
45010021	Nen, Allah nen akhuni Israel meke men yogeisasikhe, “An hubenke nen, dikene nen, hiamaganekeke nen, akhuni yoma woginabigiluk niki lanhek motogat welagei mekeat he, inasuk holu’buk inasikanok weak werek o, ”iluk yogeisasikhemo, Yesaya nen yogeisasikheat.\rq (Yesaya 65:2)\rq*
45011001	An nen wene ageikhe hinok waganik. An nebe re, Israel meke Abraham nen itago meke nukuloak etaga Benyamin meke welagei iti nen, at Allah nen a'buri Israel meke iti motok here’isasikhe apegep? Motok dek o.
45011002	Allah nen a'buri haganeat nen wenageinakhikhe meke iti here’isasikhe dek o. Wene at Elia nen hagakhikhe wene holal waganek werek etnogo hinokodek nogo? At nen Allah nen it wene inoba ’bekhe dogoagaluk, men ekhe lageikhe,
45011003	“Allah Hetagapogot nopase. Ap hat haneyogeisilik nekharek meke emenogo, inakhik, o hat hadomba hunhekharekma etnogo misalhik, hagakhasik nen, an narligat anek here’anhasik, yabokane nasuogoluk heraknabiogeiat o, ”\rq (1 Rajah 19:10,14)\rq* iluk isikhemo,
45011004	at Allah nen, Elia oko nikithogonyogokhikhe. Men isikhe apigi, “Ap inebe 7. 000 nen kaneke etaga Baal apma ukiluk hogorakhidek meke an hasik wenageinakhigimo werek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
45011005	Iti hak, Allah obabut hano nen, wenageinakhikhe meke o yogotak ya inebe ato pererlagat weregat o.
45011006	It akhuni nen hano hagakhukha baga, Allah nen inobabut palogo wenageinabilepma re, at obabut hano nen wenageinakhikhe iluk usak dek iti nen, it nen hano hagakhukha baga Allah nen inobabut palogo wenageinakhikhe ’buk. At obabut hano nen wenageinakhikhe iti.
45011007	Halok he, nit nen wene nikithogon ugun? It akhuniIsrael meke hano meke iteerek asuogoluk inobatnerogon hagakhe lagoukha mekeat he, ebe ite ageidek. It aperek inebe pererlagat Allah nen wenageinakhikhe meke hano mekeiteerek aga korlegat, inebe kokmake inetaiken a’beretdisikhe.
45011008	Itithogon meke hasik Allah nen, men isikhe, “Inileken higik, inasuk holhik, hagasunogo iluk, inetaiken abisake negen hagarinakhigimo, yogotak itithogon werek o, ”\rq (Ulangan 29:4; Yesaya 29:10)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45011009	Wene iti ipisak tak-tak, at Daud nen men isikhe, “Akhuni nen thue men, ’bagei men herle ’bilukmo wakharek hak, it iti thini kok isariogei iti baga inekaerek inebe hageinabuak o. Inebe nuk ageik, tunhogo horla usigik, hagasuak o.
45011010	Inileken haunogo iluk, puk asuak o. Akin meke inapot oak thomarek motok dogoak o, ”\rq (Mazmur 69:22-24)\rq* iluk Daud nen isikhe. Allah nen akhuni itikmanke meke tilinakhikhe wene
45011011	An nen hinok ageikhe wokhinabik. Akhuni holak lagunem inisok a’bit dikhogon waregarek hak, it akhuni Israel meke weak agoukha iti, motok-motogat alomatlagoukha nogo? Motok dek o. It weak hagakhukha iti nen, Allah nen it akhuni itikmanke meke tilinakhikhe iti. Itithogon tilinakhunem nen, it Israel meke nen, “Nit tilninabuem, ” iluk inoba ua palogo inobabut hebelasuagaluk hagakhikhe iti.
45011012	It akhuni Israel meke weak hagakhukha iti nen, yi akhuni ti akhuni tha’bokhogonat eloma Allah nen hanorinakhikhe. It nuk agoukha iti nen, akhuni itikmanke meke iti kogat thaburakhukha. Halok he, yabokane it Israel meke inebe tha’bokhogonat Allah nen hanorinakhe dogolik, yi akhuni ti akhuni itikmanke meke eloma kokhogon hanorinabigin dek a? Hanorinabiginat o.
45011013	Wene yi hit akhuni itikmanke meke yokhisak. Allah nen, an nayoko ’biluk hit itikmanke meke hinoba la'ani ageikhemo wagagisik hagakhe lagei iti nen, kok motok iluk hogorakhekhe lagei o.
45011014	An nagarlak lak nerugi ninukuloak etaga opakiat meke, Allah nen aperek tilinabuagaluk, an nen itithogon hagakhe lagei iti baga, inakla aga dageiluk ua paluagaluk hagakhe lagei.
45011015	Allah nen, it akhuni Israel meke inebe here’isasikhe iti baga, yi akhuni ti akhuni tha’bokhogonat eloma Allah inom dapulinakhikhe iti. Yabokane it woginakhunem nen nikitlasigin. Akhuni warek meke inilugurinabu hak woginabigin iti.
45011016	Roti alebageik meke Allah ake ’bisagun halok he, ebe tha’bokhogonat Allah mekeat o. Nen, o erlo Allah ake ’bisagun halok he, ikilo’bak at mekeat o.
45011017	O zaitun erlo hano meke werekma, ikilo’bak aperek palogo la’isalok nen, obolukmo o zaitun okama meke ikilo’bak palogo hunisisumo, erlo hunik dogolik apusu werek dogou hakene, hit iti, hinebe itikmanke meke Allah nen it Yahudi meke emenogo inoba hunogo ’binageikhemo hano welagap o.
45011018	Itithogon dogolik, hit nen, it inebe ikilo’bak palek meke hakene iti hasik, “It weak. Nit hano o, ” iluk hogorakhekhe dogogup. O erlo nen, ikilo’bak kererakherek iti. Nen, ikilo’bak nen, erlo kererakherek dek iti hakene, it erlo meke nen, hit ikilo’bak meke kerethinakharek o.
45011019	Meke re, hit nen, “Allah nen, nit o erlo baga hunogo ’binanisigiluk nen, it palogo la’isasikhe iti, ” iluk ekhe lagap iti.
45011020	Itithogon mothogon apekhe lagap mekeat he, hinakla ebetni. It inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek nen palogo la’isasikhe. Meke re, hit anek he, hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdisigip iti nen wokhinakhikhemo welagap iti. Halok he, hinekaerek nen hogorakhigidek, hinayukhogon dogono.
45011021	It nen, o ikilo’bak erlo ebe baga hunik meke akmurinakhidek palogo la’isasikhe iti. Halok he, hit akmuthinabiluk here’inagusak a? Dek o.
45011022	Allah obabut he, obabut enago inom, anini weak inom, welagarek iti 'bikhani! It alomatlagoukha meke hasik, obabut anini weak iti. Nen, hit at oba enago meke hinom hunik dogogun halok he, oba enago iti. Meke re, itithogon hunik dogogun dek halok he, hit itithogonat palogo la’inagagin o.
45011023	It nen, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek werek iti, yabokane hakotdugun halok, at Allah nen hunogo ’bisausak erlok welagarek iti nen, yabokane hunogo ’bisasiginat o.
45011024	O zaitun okama meke ikilo’bak palogo nen, uma meke baga hunisusak erlok dek mekeat he, hunisisu hak, hit nen, hunogo ’bisa ageikhemo welagap iti. Nen, o zaitun ikilo’bak ebe baga hunik meke palogo la’isalok, yabokane obolukmo hunogo ’bisu hagat, it hunogo ’bisa wisumo erlok o.
45011025	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene Allah akla wene yi hinokodek dogosak iti, an na’it. Hit hinekaerek nen, “Nit wene ninilu o, ” iluk hogorakhaunogo iluk, wene yi yokhisak. It akhuni Israel meke inetaiken a’bet iti, we elanma hasigat werek o. Nen, yabokane it akhuni itikmanke meke ukisugun meke hurli erlok uki ageikha halok he,
45011026	Allah nen akhuni Israel meke tha’bokhogonat hanorinabigin o. Wene itithogon iluk nen, at Allah nen men isikhemo ane baga holal waganek werek, “Tilinakherek meke ebe re, o Sion nen wisigin o. Witluk nen, it Yakub nen itago meke nen aninayuk dek dogolik weak hagariogei meke iti, korogo degetdigin o.\rq (Yesaya 59:20-21)\rq*
45011027	Nen, weak hagariogei meke iti thagalogo degetdisekhe dogolik, wene yigithogon warogo woginabigin o, ”\rq (Yeremia 31:33-34)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45011028	It Israel meke hano wene waganusak ina'it nen Allah inom weak agoukha iti, hit itikmanke meke hanothinabuagaluk inom weak agoukha. Meke re, Allah nen wenageinakhikhesikmo nen, inopa lak Allah inom hunik iti nen inebe akmu o.
45011029	At Allah obabut hano nen yi meke ti meke woknisigik, ninebe wenakninakhik, hagatluk nen, yabokane ane ninat ageikhe ekherek dek.
45011030	Hit alep Allah ane hologo hagakhidek welagagip. Mekeat he, yogotak it Israel meke Allah ane hologo hagakhidek oba, hit hinebe akmuthinakhikhe iti o.
45011031	Itithogonat yogotak it hinomat akmuthinabuagaluk, hit hinebe akmuthinakhikhe iti baga, yogotak it Allah ane hologo hagakhidek welageikharek iti.
45011032	At Allah nenat, akhuni weak hagakhunem iniki herle yabokane hisaluogoluk warogo ’bisegarek iti hak, akhuni inebe tha’bokhogonat akmurinabigiluk nen, inebe tha’bokhogonat at nen at ane hologo hagakhidek nen ’bisasikhe iti.
45011033	At Allah meke kokhogon woknisigik, akla motok kagalek welageik, wene motok ilu welageik, hagakherek iti nayuk o. At nen wene ilukun wakherek meke, nit akhuni ninilu asusak a? At nen yi meke ti meke hagakherek meke, nit nen hutdusak a?
45011034	Wene iti hasik holal yigithogon waganogo ’bisukhama werek, “Ninopase Etagapogot akla tha ilu. At he, tha nen asuk wasusak nogo.\rq (Yesaya 40:13)\rq*
45011035	Nen, tha nen yi meke ti meke at wogotluk, Oko woknom, iluk yogosusak nogo, ”\rq (Ayub 41:11-12)\rq* iluk isukhama holal waganek werek iti.
45011036	Erlo baga, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat, at Allah nenat walhasikhemo, at iki baga welagarek. Dogoluk nen, ilugun oba, at nenat hagasigin. Halok he, at anek hogorakho motok dogouok o, iluk igi iti, ebeat asuak u hak, Amin, igi iti.
45012001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. At Allah ninebe akmu iluk wene ageikhe hinakla kagalik. Allah ako warekhe lagoukha hak, hinebe hiniluk mekeat, at ekaerek hasik ’bisalok, at akla hanorogo wogokhe dogono o. At apma dogolik, at hasik hagasusak meke itithogonat hagakhe dogono o.
45012002	Akhuni yoma hagariogei meke iti inobabut waganhup o. Hinobabut ket ninat hagatlasuagaluk, at Allah nenat hinakla ket meke hagathinakhe dogoak o. Itithogon hagathinakhe dogoumo, at akla nen, “Yigithogon hagasuak, itithogon hagasuak, ” iluk apekherek iti ebe hinilu asigin o. Hano meke ebe itiat o. At Allah akla hanorogo hagakhik, inetaiken horle ageik, hagakherek iti nenat o.
45012003	At Allah obabut hano nen, yigithogon hagakhe dogoagaluk nayoko 'bisikhe iti nen, wene ageikhe yi hinebe tomok hinasuk wasik. Hit he, it aperek inapma dogosak werek korlek, hinakla nen, “An nebe kok, ” iluk hinetaiken siatdakhausak dek. At he, Allah nen hinebe tomok hinetaiken at oba hakotdekhe dogoagaluk hinobabut tomok wokhisasikhe tak-tagat, hinetaiken thebekhogon dogolik hinobabut palekhe dogono.
45012004	Ninebe yi, niniki, ninisok, ninebe baga hunik meke doalegat werek iti. Itithogon werek mekeat he, ninebe baga hunik meke iti, inayabu tomok hagakhe dogoagaluk hunogo ’binanhikhe.
45012005	Iti hak, ninebe doalegat welago mekeat he, Kristus ninom opakiat hunogo ’binanhikhemo welago yi. Ninebe opakiat meke re, niniki ninisok ninebe hunik welagarek iti hak, ninagarlak lak ninerugi ninom itithogon welago.
45012006	At Allah obabut hano nen, nit tha’bokhogonat ninobabut tomok woknisasikhe iti nen, at nen woknisasikhetak-tagat hagakhe dogosak o. It aperek nen Allah ane yogeisekhe dogoagaluk inobabut wogeisasikhe meke, inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welageikharek tak-tagat yogeisekhe dogosak.
45012007	Nen, it aperek nen, akhuni yomageisekhe dogoagaluk inobabut wogeisasikhe meke iti, hanorogon yomageisekhe dogosak. Nen, it aperek nen, wene yakulisekhe dogoagaluk inobabut wogeisasikhe meke iti, hanorogo yakulisekhe dogosak.
45012008	Nen, it aperek nen, akhuni inetaiken ago wakhe dogoagaluk inobabut wogeisasikhe meke iti, itithogon hanorogo hagakhe dogosak o. Nen, it aperek nen, inameke it akhuni inameke dek meke supurisekhe dogoagaluk inobabut wogeisasikhe meke iti, ina'it ageidek iniki debekhogon wogeisekhe dogosak. Nen, it aperek inoe kok dogoagaluk inobabut wogeisasikhe meke iti, inobatnerogon hagakhe dogosak. Nen, it aperek nen akhuni inakmurogon hagarinakhe dogoagaluk inobabut wogeisasikhe meke iti, inakla arleken akhekhe dogolik inakmurogon hagarinakhe dogosak o.
45012009	Hit hinetaiken oba nenat akhuni hinakmurogo dogono o. Weak meke hina’it motok dogolik, hano meke hiniki a’bethogon hago dogono o.
45012010	Hinagarlak lak hinerugi Allah a’buri meke iti hinebe ap opakiat nen itago meke negen, hinetaiken hunik hinakmurogon dogolik, hit-hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi inalon halhe dogono o.
45012011	Allah Agoreke nen hinakla kagalhe korlek, ninoe Etagapogot hasik hina’it ageidek, hinobatnerogonat hagakhe dogono o.
45012012	Hit nen, "Yabokane at Allah nen hano hagasigin werek o, ” iluk, hinakla arleken akhalok, yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk sembayan thogotdigidek isi motok dogono o.
45012013	Allah a’buri meke yi meke ti meke dekma werek halok supurisigik, ap huso inebe hinokodek meke wagunem hinaila hanorogon woginakhik, hagakhe dogono o.
45012014	It akhuni aperek nen weagathinakhunem nen, Allah nen it hanorinabuagaluk ayoko 'bekhe dogono. Weagarinabuagaluk homan ’bisigidegat, hanorinabuagaluk ayoko ’bekhe dogono o.
45012015	It akhuni aperek inakla arleken akhekhe halok he, hit hinomat hinakla arleken akhigik, it aperek de ago halok he, hit hinomat de ageik, hagakhe dogono o.
45012016	Akhuni aperek hinelokhoma ’bisigik, aperek hinoporlike ’bisigik, hagakhidek nen, hinakmurogo ipisak tak-tagat anek hagarinakhe dogono o. Ap koktek inobabut hagakharek meke iti, hagakhidek he, inapma dogolik hagakharek meke itiat hagakhe dogono o. Hinakla nen, “An wene motok nilu o, ” iluk hinekaerek nen hogorakhugup o.
45012017	It akhuni aperek nen weak hagathinakhunem he, hit nen oko dagakhogon weak hagarinakhe dogogup o. Akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen inileken hisalok nen, “It hano hagariogei o, ” iluk hinabok hano ekhe dogoagaluk, hinakla apalok nen hanorogo hagakhe dogono o.
45012018	Akhuni tha’bokhogonat hinom hano dapukhogon dogouogoluk, hit hinobabut hano hagasusak meke mothogonat hagakhe dogono o.
45012019	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu o. Akhuni nen hit weagathinakho halok, hinekaerek nen ukum waganhup o. Allah akla aga dageiluk, at nen hagasuak nen, at iki baga ’bekhe dogono. Wene itithogon hagakhe dogosak, iluk holal yigithogon waganek werek, “Ukum an nen inakhik, oko an nen ’bigik, hagasigin o, ilukninopase Etagapogot nen ekherek, ”\rq (Ulangan 32:35)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45012020	Iti halok, hit nen, men hagasusak, “Akhuni hinom weak meke iti hipiri abu werek halok he, melagisigik, i abu werek halok he, wogeisigik, hagakhe dogono o. Itithogon hagasugun iti baga, hetu ekeninukuloak oba 'bisinem hinet wasu hak, inekarli asugun o. ”\rq (Amsal 25:21-22)\rq*
45012021	Weak hagakharek meke iti obatne atluk hit erlok degetdinageinogo iluk, hit hano hagakhe dogolik, hinobatne atluk nen, weak hagakharek meke iti erlok degetdisekhe dogono o.
45013001	Hinougi koktek pemerintah meke iti, erlo werlek meke ’buk o. Erlo at Allah at o. At nenat meldisasikhemo kok welageikharek iti nen, hit hinebe tomok it inane hologo dogono o.
45013002	Iti nenat, tha nen it koktek pemerintah meke iti inane holhidek hagariogo halok he, at Allah meldisasikhe meke itiat ane holhidek hagariogo o. Halok he, it akhuni itithogon hagakharek meke iti, inekaerek nen ukum inoba ’bakhagun werek o.
45013003	It akhuni hano hagakhe dogolik, koktek pemerintah meke iti, inayuk dekhogon welageikharek. Meke re, it weak hagakhe dogoligat, inayukhogon welageikharegat. Hit nen it pemerintah meke hinayuk dekhogon dogouogoluk, hinobabut hanorogon anek hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogogun halok he, it nen hogothinabugunat o.
45013004	It pemerintah Allah nen meldisasikhemo, at atuaneke dogolik, hit hanorogo dogoagaluk hagariogei o. Meke re, weak hagakhep halok he, hinayukhogon dogono. It tugi wolok hagariogei iti, yugunat wolok liliogei ’buk. Akhuni weak hagakhunem nen, Allah nen akla aga dageiluk ukum inoba ’bu hak, it meldisasikhemo, it nen ukum inoba ’begarek o.
45013005	Halok he, it inane hologo hagasusak o. Thogotdusak erlok dek o. Allah akla aga dageinogo iluk, inane hologo hagasusagat meke re, iti bagaanek inane hologo hagasusak 'buk. Hinakla akin dek the dogouogoluk, it inane holek hagasusagat o.
45013006	Iti nenat, uang pemerintah hasik kino isinem wogeisegethep iti. It he, Allah apma dogolik, at hasik itithogon obatnerogon hagakharek iti.
45013007	Halok he, it wogeisausak mekeat wogeisekhe dogono o. Uang pemerintah nen yi hasik ti hasik kino isinem wogeisausak tak-tagat wogeisigik, it inebe hinayukhogon dogosak mothogonat hinayukhogon welageik, inalon halusak tak-tagat inalon halinakhik, hagakhe dogono o.
45013008	Hit he, akhuni hinoba palegeke dogosak dek. Hinoba palegeke dogou hak, hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon hinetaiken hunik dogosak itiat o. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo tha’bokhogonat tak-tagat hagasu hak, inebe nakmu-hakmurogo inetaiken hunik dogosak itiat o.
45013009	Wene iti ninasuk wakhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Param hagasusak dek o. Akhuni inebe inasusak dek o. Hiniki abusak waganusak dek o. It aperek inameke hinakla nen, Warlok o, ilukapausak dek o, ”\rq (Keluaran 20:13-15,17; Ulangan 5:17-19,21)\rq* iluk wene ninasuk wakhikhe iti inom, aperek ninasuk wakhikhe meke inomat, opakiat dapukhogon wene kok hakene, men isikhe, “Hit nen, akhuni hinom welagap meke iti, hinekaerek hinebe hakene hinakmurogondogono o, ”\rq (Imamat 19:18)\rq* iluk isikhe iti.
45013010	Akhuni inebe hinakmurogon dogolik, inebe weagarinakharek dek. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhewene etnogo tha'bokhogon tak-tak hagasu hak, akhuni inom nakmu-hakmurogon inetaiken hunik dogosak itiat o.
45013011	Itithogon hagakhe dogosak iti nenaluk. Iti re, nit ebekeram ninetaiken Allah baga hakotdisugu itinem he, o hanotninabigin hurli walegat welageikhe. Meke re, yogotak horogat asi iriogo iti nen, hit noge ekhe lagap iti, hiniluk asusak mot aga iti hutdekhe lagap o.
45013012	O hibako welagosik yi, horok yaat o wi asigin. Akhuni o mummo dogolik hagakharek meke iti here’isauwok. Sikhe thege waganharethek hebelogo welageikharek hak, nit o lia meke waganiluk ninobabut hebelogo dogouok.
45013013	O lia baga dogolik hagakharek hak, ninobabut mothogon hagakhe dogouok. Pesta nalok weak hagakhik, anggur apusu nalok hunu-hunu ageik, hagakharek iti hak hagasusak dek o. Yugunat param hagarinakhik, inekarli dek hagakhik, hagakharek iti hak hagasusak degat o. Wene palhik, ua palhik, hagakharek iti hak hagasusak degat o.
45013014	Hit hinobabut he, akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik, Yi waganile, ti waganile, iluk egarek iti hak hinakla kagalhidek nen, sikhe thege waganharek hak, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut itiat waganino o.
45014001	Hinagarlak lak hinerugi inetaiken Allah obahutukhogon hakotdigidek inetaiken aban werek mekeiti, it inobabut he, “Yigithogon hagasusak, itithogon hagasusak, ” iluk egarek meke iti hasik wenageisigidegat woginakhe dogono o.
45014002	It inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik, yi meke ti meke yugunat neke dogosak, iluk apalok nekarek. Mekeat he, itaperek inetaiken aban meke, hipiri hipirika anek nekarek.
45014003	It yugunat nekarek meke iti inebe Allah nenat woginakhemo. Halok he, it nekarek dek meke iti inakla nen, “It weak o, ” iluk wene inoba 'busak dek. Nen, it nekarek meke iti nen, it nekarek dek meke iti inakla erlok degetdisausak degat o.
45014004	Ap ageikhe inatuaneke mekeat he, hit nen, wene inoba ’busak a? “At yi weak hagakhe. Hureklatnek, ” nen, “At iti hano hagakhe. Metek dogonek, ” iluk it inoe kok iti nenat usak o. Meke re, metek dogoagaluk, ninoe Etagapogot nen yogeisausak erlok meke nenat yogeisaumo metek dogogun o.
45014005	It aperek nen, “O yinem itinem yi meke ti meke hagasusak anek mekeat he, o yogotak yi dikene anek he, hagasusak dek, ” iluk apasi korlek, it aperek nen, “O yinem itinem ipisak tak-tagat anek, ” apegarek iti, inebe tomok inakla itithogon apekhe dogosak anek o.
45014006	It nen“O yogotak yinem anek he, yi meke ti meke hagasusak dek, ” iluk egarek meke iti, ninoe Etagapogot hasigat apegarek o. Nen, it aperek yi meke ti meke yugunat nekarek meke iti, ninoe Etagapogot hasigat neke dogolik, Allah heagei wakharek iti. Nen, it nekarek dek meke iti, ninoe Etagapogot hasigat nikidek thogotdekhe dogolik, Allah heagei wakharegat iti.
45014007	Ninebe tomok ninekaerek hasik anek niniluk welageik, watlageik, hagakhe Iago ’buk.
45014008	Nit niniluk welago halok, ninoe Etagapogot hasigat welago. Nen, watlasugun halok, at hasigat watlasugun o. Halok he, niniluk dogosak inom, watlasusak inom, at mekeat welago.
45014009	Watlagoukha meke dek, niniluk meke dek, dapukhogon hasik, at Kristus ninoe Etagapogot dogeigiluk, watlageikhesik iluk ageikhe iti.
45014010	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit ninebe tha’bokhogonat Allah nen ninitema waganiginmo lugun mekeat, hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinom hinetaiken Allah baga hakotdekhe lagap meke iti, nenaluk wene inoba ’bigik, hinakla meanetdisigik, hagakhe lagap?
45014011	Allah nen men yogeisasikhe, “An hinopase Netagapogot niluk motok welagarek meke nen nane eberogonat yokhisak. Akhuni inebe dopok he, an napma ukitluk, it nen, Allah harat o, iluk inape baga dopok pakhogonyoknesugun o, ”\rq (Yesaya 45:23)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha.
45014012	Yabokane, ninebe dopok nen, “An yigithogon hagakhi, tigithogon hagakhi, ” iluk, wene pilinerogo at Allah at yogosugun o.
45014013	Iti nen, nit-nit nen, ageikhe wene oba ’bigik, ageikhe nen, ageikhe wene oba ’bigik, ’bekhe dogosak dek o. Nit nen, ninagarlak lak ninerugi ninom ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdekhe lago meke, weagarinakhik, inakla korlotdisigik, hagasunogo iluk, hinobabut hanorogo hagakhe dogono o.
45014014	Yi meke ti meke nekarek meke iti ebe re, usa dek, iluk, an ninoe Etagapogot Yesus nipisak hunik dogolik nilu. Hutdigi. Meke re, at ageikhe akla nen, “Iti meke usa. Nausak dek o, ” iluk apasi halok he, at hasik, nausak degat o.
45014015	Nen, hat neketek meke iti nen hagarlak akla korlo aga halok he, ebe hakmurogo hagakhe lagan dek o. Hagarlak iti hasik Kristus watlageikhesikmo, hat nigin iti baga at ebe weagatdugun o.
45014016	-
45014017	Allah apma dogolik, yi meke ti meke nikik, here’isigik, hagakharek iti ebe kok ’buk. Ebe kok he, Allah Agoreke inakla dogolik, Allah akla warlok meke mothogon hagakhik, inetaiken hapukhogon welageik, inakla arleken akhigik, hagakharek iti nen, hat hakla nen, “An hano hagakhe lagei, ” iluk apekhe lagan meke, it akhuni aperek nen habok weak unogo iluk nen, itithogonhagakhe dogogun o.
45014018	Hit Kristus atuaneke dogolik, itithogon hagakhe dogoumo, Allah akla hano ageik, akhuni inakla nen, “At hano, ” iluk inakla apigik, ugunat o.
45014019	Halok he, ninetaiken hapukhogon dogouogoluk, nit-nit ageikhe nen ageikhe etaiken horletdigik, ageikhe nen, ageikhe etaiken horletdigik, ninobatnerogon hagakhe dogouok o.
45014020	Hat neketek iti baga nen, Allah a'buri at nen hano hagarogo ’bisasikhe meke weagatdisagun o. Yi meke ti meke hano nausagat meke re, neke dogolik at ageikhe weagatdegen halok he, hat weagat hagakhen o.
45014021	Hat nen, warn palek nikik, oken apusu nikik, yi meke ti meke hagakhik, hagakhunem nen, hagarlak heru ageikhe weak asigin iti nen, nikidek here’isekhe dogoumo hano.
45014022	Hat ageikhe hetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik, “Yugunat erlok hagasusak o, ” iluk, hakla kagalek iti, Allah il oba hekaerek hasik anek hagakhe dogono. Tha nen, “An hano hagakhe lagei, ” iluk apekhe dogolik, wene ekaerek oba ’bakhigidek halok he, akla arleken akhagein o.
45014023	Itithogon mekeat he, tha nen etaiken Allah oba hutukhogon hakotdigidek dogolik, “Yi meke erlok nausak a? Nausak dek a, ” iluk wene munini akla nen ebekhe dogolik nigin halok he, Allah nen wene oba ’bigin o. Inetaiken Allah oba hutukhogon hakotdigidek dogolik, yi meke ti meke hagasugun halok, weagat hagasugun o.
45015001	Nit aperek, ninetaiken Allah oba horlerogon hakotdiluk welago meke nen, ninekaerek hasik anek ninakla hanorogon hagakhidek, it aperek inetaiken abanma aborlok werek meke iti, yomageisekhe dogosak o.
45015002	-
45015003	Allah ane baga wene men iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha, “Hat Allah wene aik dagok paik dagok yokhekha meke re, an noba hagatlaga o, ”\rq (Mazmur 69:9-10)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisukha iti hagat, at Kristus nen ekaerek hasik akla arleken akhekhe dogeigiluk hagakhe lageikhe dek. Iti nen, nit ninebe dopok nen, ninagarlak lak ninerugi inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk inetaiken horle atluk hano asuagaluk, inakla hanorogo hagakhe dogouok o.
45015004	Allah ane holal waganek iti baga, ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageik, ninakla hano ageik, hagakhorek iti nen, “Hano asigin, ” iluk Allah oba eberek dogoagaluk, nirat ninasuk warogo Allah ane baga haganeat holal waganogo 'bisukha iti.
45015005	-
45015006	Hit hinetaiken, hinane, opakiat dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus opase Allah itiat hogorakhe dogobageik nen, at Allah akhuni inobabut inobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogoagaluk hagarinakhik, inakla hanorinakhik, hagakherek meke iti nenat, hit tha'bokhogonat hinetaiken opakiat, at Kristus Yesus obabut hakene hagathinabuak o.
45015007	Akhuni nen at Allah hogorakhe dogoagaluk, at Kristus nen hit hinebe wokhinakhikhe hak, hit aperek nen it aperek woginakhik, it aperek nen hit aperek wokhinakhik, hit-hit wok-wok hagakhe dogono o.
45015008	Wene iti hasik ageikhe yokhisak. At Kristus wageikhesik nen, it Yahudi meke emenogo inapma ukisikhe iti. Itithogon ukisikhe iti, Allah nen, “An nen itithogon hagarinabigin o, ” iluk ninopa lak abok yogeisekhe lageikhe etnogo eberogonat ebeat ageik,
45015009	nen, it akhuni itikmanke meke nen Allah nen akmurinakhikhe iti nen hogorakhik, hagasuagaluk, Yahudi meke inapma ukisikhe iti. Wene iti hasik Allah ane baga holal men iluk waganogo 'bisukhama werek, “Iti nen, an it akhuni itikmanke meke inaklake inaklake dogolik hat hogothakhik, etai wakhe dogolik hetaga kogotdigik, hagakhe dogogin o, ”\rq (Mazmur 18:49-50; 2 Samuel 22:50)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha.
45015010	Ageikhe men iluk holal waganek weregat, “Hit akhuni itikmanke meke it Allah a'buri at nen wenageinakhikhe meke hinom hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o, ”\rq (Ulangan 32:43)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukhaat.
45015011	Nen, ageikhe wene men isikhe, “Hit akhuni itikmanke meke tha'bokhogonat ninoe Etagapogot hogorakhik, hinukuloak etaga dopok nen at hogorakhik, hagakhe dogono o, ”\rq (Mazmur 117:1)\rq* iluk isukhama holal waganogo 'bisukhaat.
45015012	Nen ageikhe, at Yesaya nen men iluk holal waganogo 'bisikheat, “O mukharethekma nen erlo baga asi'batdukhekherek hak, at Isai nen itago meke ageikhe winam asigin. Winam agunem nen, it akhuni itikmanke meke at apma dogolik, at nen hanotninabigin, iluk at oba eberek dogogun o, ”\rq (Yesaya 11:10)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisikhe.
45015013	“Yabokane hano asigin, ” iluk ninakla arlekenakhogorek iti, erlo at Allah nenat hagatninakherek. Hit itithogon hinakla arleken kokhogon akhekhe dogoagaluk Allah Agoreke obatne baga hagathinabuak. Itithogon hagathinabuak nen, hinetaiken at oba hakotdisigip iti bagahakotdiluk werekma, at nen hinakla arleken motok akhekhe dogoagaluk hagathinakhik, hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, hagasuak o.
45015014	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinobabut hano motok dogolik, yi wene ti wene hinilu motogatma, hit-hit hinasuk wat-wat usak erlok welagap iti, an nilu o.
45015015	Itithogon mekeat he, at Allah obabut hano nen an nayoko 'bisikhe iti nen, wene ageikhe iti thuesika yi baga nayuk dekhogon ebethisigi iti.
45015016	An nebe at Kristus Yesus apma dogolik akhuni itikmanke meke woginabuagaluk nayoko ’bisikhemo, at Allah akla hanorogo Agoreke iti baga it inebe Allah hasik ’bisagaluk, at ane hano wene iti yogeisilik nekhe lagei o.
45015017	Kristus Yesus nipisak hunik dogolik, Allah hasik hano hagakhe lagei o, iluk hogorakhausak erlok o.
45015018	An nen wene ninat wene u nayuk. It akhuni itikmanke meke Allah nen apma ’bisoagaluk, at Kristus nen nayoko ’biluk wene igik, iki nen hagakhik, hagarik wageikhe iti nayuk degat igin.
45015019	At ebe hutduagaluk yi meke ti meke hagakhik, hogorasuagaluk yi meke ti meke elalinat hagakhik, obatnerogon hagakhikhe. Allah Agoreke etnogo obatne bagaat hagakhikhe iti. Hagakhe korlek, an he, o Yerusalem eloma nen dagak-pagak piokthek o Ilirikum eloma, at Kristus wene hano wene iti hutukhogon yogeisilik wagei.
45015020	-
45015021	Wene itithogon iluk holal yigithogon waganogo ’bisukhama werek, “It akhuni aperek, at abok holhidek meke inileken higik, nen, it wene holhidek meke nen hutdigik, hagasugun o, ”\rq (Yesaya 52:15)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha tak-tagat yogeisilik waga dogolik, it akhuni aperek nen, o herlaga ’bilukmo an nen oebe halu hak halunogo iluk, an nakla warlok nen, akhuni Kristus etaga inasuk aban holhidekma eloma hano wene yogeisilik wisigiluk apasigi.
45015022	Wene itithogon yogeisilik nekhe lagei iti nen, hibiku-yogokuat hit nileken hisilik hinoba wisigiluk hagakhunem he, erlok dek ariogo.
45015023	Meke re, an o yoma dogolik hagasusak meke arat hagakhi o. Halok he, o haganeat eloma nenat hit nileken hisilik hinoba wisigiluk nakla apasigisikmo re, yogotak arat wisigin o.
45015024	Yogotak o Spanyol laga dogolik, hit hinobake haklarik wisigiluk nakla apekhe lagei o. Hit ’bithisa agei halok he, ninom niki herlekha'bugat nakla hanorogon dogoluk nen, hit nen o Spanyol eloma la’anumo lausak apekhe lagei o.
45015025	-
45015026	It akhuni o Makedonia meke men, Akhaya meke men, inakla eberogo it meke natogorlogo it akhuni Allah a’buri inameke dek meke o Yerusalem welageikharek meke iti ’bisega meke werek iti nen, yogotak an nen wolok yomageisagaluk o Yerusalem ligin o.
45015027	It akhuni Yahudi meke nen it itikmanke meke inebe hano asuagaluk Allah ane wogeisasukhasikmo nen, it nen yabokane dagakhogon yi meke ti meke agat oba meke yomageisausak tak-tagat itithogon inakla kagalogo ’bisega o.
45015028	Itithogon arat ’bisega meke iti, an nen it Yerusalem meke arat wogeisa lagei halok he, o Spanyol lagaluk waga dogolik, hinoba haklarik wisigin o.
45015029	An arat ’bithisa agei halok he, at Kristus nen hit hinobasik woknikhikhe meke tha’bokhogonat wokhisa isigin apigi.
45015030	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus itiat iluk, nit-nit nakmu-hakmu dogoagaluk Allah Agoreke nen hagatninakherek etnogo baga, an hasik ninom sembayan Allah ayoko ninobatnerogon ’bekhe dogouogoluk yokhisigi o.
45015031	It akhuni o Yudea meke inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdigidekmeke nen nebe iniki hakneaunogo iluk, Allah nentilnabuagaluk inom, nen, akhuni Allah a'buri o Yerusalem meke hasik natogorlogo ’bisega meke iti, wolok yomageisa lagunem nen, hano waganuagaluk inom, sembayan hanorogon ekhe dogono o.
45015032	O Yerusalem lalok nen, at Allah akla nen hano apekhe halok he, an nakla arleken akhilik akhilik hinoba wisigin o. Witluk ninom dogolik, thet walagein iti o.
45015033	Allah nen akhuni inetaiken hapugutdekherek meke etnogo, hit tha’bokhogonat hakhisik dogoagaluk, hagakhe dogolik, “Ebeat asuak, ” u hak, “Amin, ” iluk igi iti.
45016001	He nineru Febe iti ebe hinilurogo yakulhisak. At obabut hanoma Allah a’buri o Kengkrea meke yomageisekherek meke hinoba waga iti,
45016002	hit ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik, Allah a’buri nen waganusak tak-tagat, at ebe waganubageik nen iluk yokhisigi o. At ameke yi meke ti meke dek halok he, hit meke aperek wogokhe dogono o. At nen akhuni doalegat yomageisigik, an nebe men yomakniigik, hagakhe lageikhesikmo, hit nen at ebe waganino o.
45016003	Nen, ageikhe re, he Priskila agun Akwila ipisak ninom Kristus Yesus hasik hagakhe lagosik wageikha meke iti Paulus nen heagei wathinakhe iluk yogeisano o.
45016004	It an tilnabuogoluk lagunem, inatlep iti nen, “Nakmu lak o, ” iluk an anek heagei warinakhe lagei ’buk. [t Allah a’buri itikmanke meke natogorliogei meke men, nebe tha’bokhogonat ninom nenat heagei warinakhe lago o.
45016005	Allah a’buri it Priskila Akwila ipisak inaila natogorliogei neke inomat, “Paulus lak nen heagei wathinakha, ” iluk yogeisanoat o. Nen, ageikhe re, ap Epenetus nakmu meke iti, “At nen heagei wathakhe, ” iluk yogotnoat o. O Asia eloma, at iti tak etaiken Kristus oba hakotdisikhemo nen, it aperek yabokane hakotdisukha.
45016006	He Maria hit hinobasik thet weak hagakhe lageikhe etnogo, “At nen heagei wathakhe, ” iluk yogotnoat o.
45016007	At Andronikus, Yunias ipisak, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisanoat o. It he, an ninom ninukuloak opakiat meke niniki herle ninom warek welagagusik. Akhuni doalegat negen Kristus nen inayoko 'biluk la’isa ageikhe mekeat he, inetagawerek irat o. It tak inetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisukhasikmo nen, an yabokane hakotdisigi iti.
45016008	Nen, ageikhe, an nagarlak Ampliatus nipisak ninoe Etagapogot ninom hunik welago iti nen, ebe nakmu o. “At nen heagei wathakhe, ” iluk yogotnoat o.
45016009	At Urbanus iti ninomat Kristus hasik hagakhe lagagu meke iti men, Stakhis nakmu meke iti men, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisanoat o.
45016010	At Apeles Kristus ipisak hunik dogolik obabut hupulik hagakhunem obabut hano paliogei meke iti, “At nen heagei wathakhe, ” iluk yogokhik, Aristobulus a’buri iti, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisigik, inoat o.
45016011	At Herodion ap ninukuloak etaga opakiat meke iti, “At nen heagei wathakhe, ” iluk yogotnoat. Nen, Narkisus a’buri ninoe Etagapogot inom hunik meke iti, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisanat o.
45016012	Nen, ageikhe re, humi Trifena Trifosa ipisak ninoe Etagapogot hasik yabu inobatnerogon hagariogei meke, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisigik, he Persis haganeat nen ninoe Etagapogot hasik ayabu motok kogat hagariogo meke iti nakmu o. “At nen heagei wathakhe, ” iluk yogokhik, inoat o.
45016013	At Rufus iti ninoe Etagapogot nen ayoko ’bisikhemohogorakharek iti. At agosa iti, an nagosa hakeneat o. Eak ipisagat, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisanoat o.
45016014	At Asinkritus men, Flegon men, Hermes men, Patrobas men, Hermas men, ninagarlak lak ninerugi Allah a'buri aperek it inom welageikharek meke tha’bokhogonat inomat men, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisanoat o.
45016015	At Filologus, he Yulia ipisak, Nereus eru ipisak, Olimpas inomat, Allah a’buri it inom welageikharek meke tha’bokhogonat inomat, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisanoat o.
45016016	Nen, ageikhe re, hinebe Allah a’buri welagap iti, heagei hinape tharluk wat-wat ilik lano. Allah a’buri Kristus agarumi o yi ai ti ai natogorliogei meke nen, “Heagei wathinakho, ” iluk yoknekhama nen yokhisigiat o.
45016017	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinakla kagalogo wene ageikhe yi nane nobatnerogon yokhisak o. It akhuni aperek yabokane witluk nen, wene alebageik yakulhisasukhama waganhigip meke here’isalok nen, hinebe mikirlogo ’binagagik, hinakla weagathinakhik, hagakho halok he, hinobabut hebelogo dogolik, inane hinasuk holhidek, mirlokhogon here’isekhe dogono o.
45016018	It iti, ninoe Etagapogot Kristus apma dogolik, at hasik hagariogei ’buk. We, inekaerek inakla warlok meke hagariogei o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, inane hano igik, enago igik, ekhe dogolik, it akhuni aperek inobabut, “I o, ” anek egarek meke iti nukhetdisiliogei iti.
45016019	Meke re, hit Allah ane hologo hagakhe lagap meke iti, it akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen hinobabut ekagat paliogei iti nen, an nakla arleken akhekhe lagei o. Hit hano wene hasik hinakla kagalek welageik, weak meke hasik hinokodek welageik, hagasumo hano. An nakla warlok.
45016020	At Allah akhuni inetaiken hapugutdekherek meke etnogo nen, at Iblis iti hinisok nen al debelogo here'isoagaluk ibat hinapma 'bisigin werek o. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus obabut hano etnogo nen thethisik dogoak o.
45016021	At Timotius an nagarlak nipisak Allah hasik hagakhe lago meke etnogo nen, “Heagei warinakhi o, ” iluk yoknekhemo nen yokhisigi o. Ap nit meke Lukius men, Yason men, Sosipater men, yoma nen, “It heagei warinakho, ” iluk yoknekhama nen yokhisigiat o
45016022	An Tertius Paulus ane isi korlek holal yi waganhi meke nen, ninoe Etagapogot ninom hunik dogolik heagei wathinakhiat o.
45016023	At Gayus nen an nebe woknakhik, Allah a'buri tha'bokhogonat woginakhik, hagakhe meke iti nen heagei wathinakheat o. At Erastus o ukul kok yoma hasik uang 'bisinem hago welagarek meke iti nen heagei wathinakheat o. Nen, ninagarlak Kwartus nen heagei wathinakheat o. [
45016024	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut hano etnogo nen, hakhisik dogoak, iluk, “Ebeat asuak, ” u hak, “Amin, igi iti. ”]
45016025	Allah hogorakhe dogouok o! An nen hano wene Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe wene yokhisasigi hak, at Allah obatneak etnogo nen hinetaiken horlethinakhe dogosak erlok o. Wene Allah akla wene iti, muk haganeat nen limago welageikhe meke re, yogotak Allah nen thelekmatdisikhemo werek o.
45016026	Iti re, it ap at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen holal waganogo, thelekmatdisukhama werekma an nen yokhisasigi iti. Yi ap ti ap inukuloak etaga dopok tha'bokhogonat wene iti inasuk holiluk inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdiluk ane hologohagakhe dogoagaluk, at Allah ikhok motok welagarek meke etnogo nenat, “Wene yi akhuni inilu asuak o, ” iluk isikhe.
45016027	At Allah arligat akla motok kagalek welagarek o. At Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe hasik Allah hogorakho motok dogouok o, iluk, “Ebeat asuak, ” iluk u hak, “Amin, ” igi iti.
46001001	-
46001002	Hit Allah a'buri o Korintus natogokhe lagap meke, nagarlak lak nerugi. An Paulus Allah akla apasikhe baga, Kristus Yesus nen nayoko 'biluk la’ani ageikhe meke etnogo, ninagarlak Sostenes nipisak nen, wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la'i aga iti o. Hit o Korintus meke Allah nen hinayoko 'bisikhemo ninoe Kristus Yesus hinom hunik werekma, Allah nen, “It yi an na'buri o, ” iluk hinebe at ekaerek'bakhasikhemo welagap o. Itithogon dogolik, akhuni o yi ai ti ai etoma nen, it inom, nit ninom, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus etaga paliogei meke hinom tha'bokhogonat wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la'i ago iti o.
46001003	Ninopase Allah, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen, hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinageigik, hagakhe dogoak o.
46001004	Allah obabut hano nen, Kristus Yesus alisikhogon, hano meke woknisekherek iti nen, hibiku-yogoku heagei wakho motok welagarek o.
46001005	Hit Kristus hinom hunik werekma Allah nen hinebe hano meke wokhisekhemo welagap. Itithogon dogolik, yi wene ti wene Allah ane iti erlo hinilu motok agasip nen, wene hano motok yakulisekhe lagap o.
46001006	Wene iti Kristus hagakhikhe wene yokhisasigimo hinakla nen waganhigisip hinetaiken horletdisigip o.
46001007	Hinetaiken itithogon horletdiluk, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus thelekmaat wisigin iluk, therogo dogolik Allah nen woknisekherek meke iti, ageikhe aban waganhidek welagap ’buk. Tha'bokhogonat waganhigisip welagap o.
46001008	Yabokane ilugun oba ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus wisigin itinem, hit weak werekma ’bithisa wisunogo iluk, at Kristus nenat hinetaiken horlethinakhe dogogin o.
46001009	At Allah nen a’but ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hinom hunik dogobageik iluk hinayoko ’bisikhe iti. Itithogon, at obabut hupulik meke nen hinayoko ’bisikhe iti nen, ebeat asigin iluk hinetaiken wene munini tirliphogon dogosak o.
46001010	Itithogon mekeat he, nagarlak nerugi. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus etaga baga, wene ageikhe hinasuk wasik. Hit tha’bokhogonat hinebe mikikhidek hinom hunik dogolik nen, hinane opakiat meke igik, hinetaiken opakiat welageik, hinakla nen wene opakiat meke ebekhik, hagakhe dogono.
46001011	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene itithogon igi iti, akhuni he Kloe werekma nen wageikhasik, men ega, “It-irat wene yabiogei o, ” iluk pakhogon yoknisi ageikhama nen yokhisigi o.
46001012	Wene ebe, men ekhe lagap iti hasik igi. Hat ageikhe nen, “An Paulus meke, ” isinem, hat ageikhe nen, “An Apolos meke, ” igik, hat ageikhe nen, “An Kepas meke, ” igik, hat ageikhe nen, “An Kristus meke, ” igik, hinane asokhotek tomok ekhe tagap iti nen igi o.
46001013	At Kristus iti ebe mikirlogo asokhotek hagatlagama nen a? E a, at he, hit hasik an Paulus nebe o daga meldaniluk nakhukhama nen a? E a, at he, an Paulusnetaga palogo nen ima usa’inagasukhama nen a?
46001014	Dek o. An nen hit aperek ima usa’inagagidek apigi. Ap Krispus inom, Gayus inom, eta anek ima usa’isasigi iluk Allah heagei wakhe lagei o.
46001015	Akhuni nen, “Paulus ekaerek etaga palogo ima usageinakhikhe, ” iluk inogo iluk, inebe eta anek usageinakhigi iti o.
46001016	I! An nen Stepanus a'buri inom ima usa’isasigimoat apigi. Itithogon mekeat he, it aperek inom usa’isasigi a? Dek a. An nokodek.
46001017	At Kristus nen, an nen akhuni ima usageinakhe dogoagaluk la’ani ageikhe ’buk. Dek o. Allah ane hano wene iti yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk la’ani ageikhe o. At ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukha etnogo alomatlasunogo iluk, an akhuni inawene meke kagoukhogon egarek iti hakene ekhe dogoagaluk la’ani ageikhe dek o.
46001018	-
46001019	It akhuni nuk asugun meke nen, men egarek, “Yesus o harokhogon wakhukha wene iti, akhuni kepu meke nen egarek hakene iliogei o, ” iluk egarek iti. Itithogon mekeat he, at Allah nen, “Akhuni inakla kagalek meke nen wene kagoukhogon egarek iti, an nen nonhonetdisagein o. Nen akhuni yi wene ti wene erlo iniluhagakharek meke iti, an nen degetdisagein o, ”\rq (Yesaya 29:14)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek iti nen, nit tilninabiogo meke nen, “Wene iti, Allah obatne itiat o, ” iluk ogorek.
46001020	Akhuni agat oba yoma inakla kagalek meke iti inom, akhuni yi wene ti wene erlo inilu meke iti inom, akhuni wene oko-oko ekhe dogolik inane obatne ageikharek meke iti inom, we yugunat werek o. At Allah nen, “Akhuni inawene inakla kagoukhogon egarek meke iti, akhuni inetaiken abisake meke nen egarek hak iliogei o, ” iluk isikhe dek nogo?
46001021	At Allah akla motok kagalek iti nen, men isikhe, “Akhuni agat oba meke nen, inekaerek inawene kagoukhogon egarek iti nen, an nebe inilu asusak erlok dek o.
