It aperek nen wene ebe wene yogeisilik lagunem, it akhuni agat oba meke nen apekhe dogolik, Wene iti akhuni kepu meke nen egarek hakene iliogei, iluk isi korlegat, it aperek nen, Wene iti eberogonat, iluk apagun meke halok, an nen tilinabiginat o, ” iluk oba la’buk iluk ekaerek nenat isikhe.
46001022	It akhuni Yahudi meke nen ekhe dogolik, “Wene hutdusak he, elalin meke ageikhe hagatni o, ” igik, it akhuni Yunani meke nen, “Wene hinakla kagoukhogon ageikhe yoknisani o, ” igik, iluk egarek mekeat
46001023	nit anek he, Kristus o harokhogon oba meldiluk wakhukha wene etnogoat yogeisekhe lago. Yogeisugunem, it akhuni Yahudi meke nen, “Wene iti weak, ” iluk kolelogo here’isigik, nen, it akhuni itikmanke meke nen, “Wene iti, akhuni kepu meke nen egarek hakene iliogei, ” iluk here’isigik, iliogei o.
46001024	Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni Yahudi meke dek, Yunani meke dek, Allah nen inayoko 'bisikhe meke nen, “Allah obatne Kristus ebe itiat o. Nen, Allah awene kagalek wene, Kristus ebe itiat o, ” iluk hutdiliogei.
46001025	At Allah awene mekeat, it akhuni agat oba meke nen, “Wene iti, akhuni kepu meke nen egarek hakene, ” iluk egarek mekeat, at Allah akla motok kagalek o. Nit akhuni ninawene meke ninakla kagoukhogon ogorek iti, ninakla abisake meke nen ogorek o. It akhuni agat oba meke nen, “At Allah erlok dek, ” apegarek mekeat, at obatne horleak o. Nen, nit akhuni nen, “Ninobatne horleak, ” apogorek mekeat, erlok dek o.
46001026	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nikithogon werekmaAllah nen hinayoko 'bisikhe. Hinakla ebetni. Akhuni hit meke inakla kagalek meke inom, inobatne horleak meke inom, koktek inetaga werek meke inom, inebe doalegat inayoko ’bisikhe ’buk. Dek o.
46001027	At Allah akla nenat, it akhuni agat oba meke inakla kagalek meke iti, inekarli wasigiluk akhuni nil-hilhek mekeat wenago inayoko ’bisikhe. Akhuni inobatne werek meke iti, inekarli wasigiluk, it erlok dek meke wenago ’bisalok inayoko ’bisikhe iti o.
46001028	At Allah akla nenat, akhuni agat oba meke nen hogorakhe dogolik kogotdegarek meke iti, degetdisagaluk, it akhuni agat oba meke inakla nen, “It iti inebe kepu meke, motok ina’it meke, inetaga dek meke, ” iluk apegarek meke iti, Allah nen wenago ’bisalok inayoko ’bisikhe.
46001029	Iti nen, nit akhuni ninekaerek nen Allah il oba hogorakhausak erlok dek o.
46001030	At Allah nenat hit Kristus Yesus hinom hunik dogobageik iluk ’binageikhemo welagap iti. Wene ninakla kagalek dogou hak, Yesus ebeat woknisasikhe. Itithogon woknisasikhemo, at nen Allah ninom yabokane ninapuke dapulogo ’binanhik, ninebe Allah hasik ’binanhik, tilninakhik, hagakherek.
46001031	Iti nenat, Allah ane holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, “At ageikhe hogorakhagaluk halok, ninoe Etagapogot itiat hogorasuak o, ”\rq (Yeremia 9:24)\rq* iluk isukhama holal waganogo ’bisukha.
46002001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah ane iti akla limagowerekma, akhuni agat oba meke nen inokodek meke iti, an nen pakhogon yokhisa agagi iti, an nane apusu tik-tik egerek oba, nakla kagalek oba, yokhisa agagi dek.
46002002	An hit ninom dogolik, nakla nen wene werlek meke ebekhidek, at Yesus Kristus hasik ebekhe dogolik, kok hak he, at ebe o harokhogon meldiluk wakhukha wene itiat anek ebesigin o, iluk nakla apasigi.
46002003	Nakla itithogon apasigisik nen ebekhe dogolik, an nekaerek nebe erlok degatma nayuk nen noageleke dik-digat hinoba wagagisik welagagi apigi.
46002004	Itithogon dogolik, akhuni inawene an nakla kagalek oba, nane hano baga, nobatnerogon yokhisasigi dek o. At Allah Agoreke obatne baga, yokhisasigimo, ebeat ageikhemo, hinileken hasigip.
46002005	Itithogon yokhisasigi iti, hit hinetaiken akhuni inakla kagalek meke iti inoba hakotdiluk welageidek mekeat he, Allah obatne werek iluk, hinetaiken at oba hakotdubageik iluk yokhisasigi iti o.
46002006	It akhuni inetaiken horle meke halogat, wene horle meke iti inakla kagoukhogon yogeisogorek o. Itithogon yogeisogorek iti, it akhuni agat oba meke yoma, inawene meke dek. Inougi koktek inebe yabokane dek asugun meke o yogotak ya inapma werek yoma, inawene kagalek wene meke degat o.
46002007	Wene iti Allah akla kagalek wene limago welageikhe meke pakhogon yogeisogorek. Wene iti akhuni agat oba meke inokodek mekeat he, ebekeram Allah nen yi meke ti meke winametdigidek dogolik, at nenat nit hanotninakhunem ninakla arleken akoagaluk akla apasikhe meke limagoat welageikhe.
46002008	Akhuni agat oba meke inougi koktek o yogotak ya inapma werek yoma, wene iti inilu ageidek inokodegat werek o. Inilu dogolepma, ninoe Etagapogot hogorakhorek etnogo, ebe o harokhogon meldiluk watlep degat o.
46002009	Wene iti hasik, Allah ane yigithogon holal waganek werek, “At Allah nen yi meke ti meke akhuni nen inileken higidek. Inasuk holhidek. Inakla nen kagalhidek. Meke re, tha’bokhogonat nit akhuni at ebe ninakmu welagorek meke karelogo ’binanhemo werek o, ”\rq (Yesaya 64:4)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek.
46002010	’Binanhe meke iti, at Allah Agoreke nen yi meke ti meke penakherek iti nen, Allah akla limago welagarek meke iti inomat penakhe dogolik, pakhogon yoknisasikhe o.
46002011	Nit akhuni ninakla tha ilu. Ninekaerek ninakla tomok ninilu welagorek apigi. Iti hagat, Allah akla it aperek inokodek anek. Ekaerek Agoreke arligat ilu welagarek o.
46002012	Nit he, akhuni agat oba meke yoma inagoreke waganhugu ’buk. At Allah obabut hano nen woknisasikhe meke ninilu asuagaluk, at Agoreke usa’i ageikhemo horlasugu o.
46002013	At Agoreke horlasugusik Allah obabut hano nen woknisekherek wene iti, akhuni Allah Agoreke inakla werek meke yogeisauwogoluk, akhuni agat oba meke inakla kagalek meke nen yakulnisugunem yogeisekhe lago ’buk. Allah Agoreke nen yakulnisugunem yogeisogorek o.
46002014	Wene Allah Agoreke nen woknisekherek wene iti, it akhuni Allah Agoreke inakla werek meke anek hutdegarek iti nen, it akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik, hutdegarek dek. Itithogon hutdegarek dek iti re, it nen he, “Wene iti akhuni kepu meke nen egarek hakene iliogei, ” iluk egarek iti nen, wene iti hutdigidek werek o.
46002015	Itithogon mekeat, nit Allah Agoreke ninakla werek meke, yi wene ti wene hutdekhe lago. Hutdisinem, it aperek nen he, nit ninobabut hutdinaniogei dek o.
46002016	Wene iti hasik, Allah ane baga holal men iluk waganogo ’bisukha, “Ninoe Etagapogot akla ebekherek iti, tha hak ilu. Nen, tha hak nen, at asuk wasusak, ”\rq (Yesaya 40:13)\rq* iluk it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen, holal waganogo ’bisukha. Itithogon mekeat he, Kristus akla ebekherek wene iti nit ninakla itithogonat ebekhe lago.
46003001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An nen alebageigat, weneakhuni Allah Agoreke inakla werek meke yogeisegarek hak, yokhisigidek o. Itithogon yokhisasigi dek iti, hit Kristus hinom hunekhigisibat, hinobabut hinikhogat dogolik, elege ket itago meke hakene welagagip iti nen, akhuni inobabut itithogon werekma yogeisegarek hak yokhisasigi iti o.
46003002	An nen akhuni inarluetek hipiri a’bet meke wogeisegarek hak, hit wene horle meke waganusak erlok dek iti nen he, wene horle meke yakulhisigidek. Elege ket itago meke inirlak apusu wogeisegarek hak, wene akut meke yokhisasigi iti o. Meke re, yogotakne, itithogonat wene horle meke yokhisausak he, erlok degat welagap iti o.
46003003	Hit-hirat ua palhik, wene palhik, hagakhe lagap halok he, hinobabut akhuni inobaburat welagap o. Akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek hak, hagakhe lagap iti nen yokhisigi o.
46003004	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hit aperek nen he, “Nit Paulus meke, ” igik nen, hit aperek nen, “Nit Apolos meke, ” igik, ekhe lagap halok he, hinobabuthe, akhuni inobaburat welagap o.
46003005	At Apolos iti tha nogo? Nen, an Paulus tha nogo? Nit iti ninoe Etagapogot nenat akla apalok ninayabu tomok hagakhe dogoagaluk ninayoko ’bisikhemo nen, at atuaneke welago. At atuaneke dogolik, wene yakulhisasugumo, hinetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisigip iti o.
46003006	Wene iti, hipiri ai yakharek hak, an nen yakhigi. Nen, at Apolos nen, i tialik lageikhe. Nen, ebe, at Allah nenat kogotdisikhe.
46003007	Ebe kok etaga werek he, ai yakharek meke iti ’buk. I tialik lagarek meke iti ’bugat. Kok etaga werek he, Allah nen ebe kogotdekherek itiat anek etaga werek o.
46003008	Ai yakharek meke iti, i tialharek meke iti, nipisak tak-tak mekeat, niniki oko, ninebe tomok yabu hagakhe dogogun meke tak-takhogonatwoknisagein o.
46003009	Hit hinebe iti Allah ayabu hak werekma, nit nipisak nen Allah ayabu wo’isekhe lago. Ageikhe hinebe Allah ai halek hak werekma, nipisak nen Allah ai halogo ’bisekhe lago.
46003010	At Allah obabut hano nen nayoko 'bisikhemo, o iti herlaga re, an netai ekerlek meke nen ’bisigimo, it aperek nen oba dukhogon haliogei iti o. Meke re, akhuni inebe tomok, o herlaga iti baga dukhogon haluogoluk halok he, hutdiluk nen inetai ekerlogo halusak o.
46003011	At Allah nen, “O iti herlaga, Yesus Kristus itiat dogoak, ” iluk ’bisikhe iti nen he, at ageikhe nen, o herlaga ninat meke usabusak motok dek o.
46003012	O herlaga iti usabek werekma, oba dukhogon it aperek nen oko kok palogo, emas meke halhik, perak meke halhik, helekit eken permata meke halhik, haliogei. Itithogon halhe korlek it aperek nen o meke halhik, o ket eka meke halhik, puk eka meke halhik, haliogei iti.
46003013	Itithogon halho werekma, at Kristus yabokane wisigin itinem, akhuni nen o halha meke tomok hano a? Weak a, iluk, hetumo walhasinem, ekagat thelekma agunem hugun o.
46003014	Itithogon walhugunem, at ageikhe nen o herlaga iti baga halhe meke hetu nikidek dogogin halok he, oko wogosigin o.
46003015	Itithogon mekeat he, at ageikhe nen o halhe meke, hetu neke halok, o hali nasinem inebe karelogo ’bisa lageikharek hak, at o halhe meke iti ebe anek he, karelogo ’bi ligin mekeat he, oko nuk asigin dek o.
46003016	Nit ninebe Allah ai halegat, iluk hinokodek nogo a? Allah Agoreke ninakla ai halogo welagarek, iluk hinokodek nogo a?
46003017	Hit hinebe, at Allah ai halek welagap iti, at mekeat welagap o. Halok he, hit nen Allah ai halek iti weagatdumo, at nen hit weagathinabiginat o.
46003018	Hinekaerek nen hinebe dalugup o. Hat ageikhe nen, “An akhuni yoma inawene meke nakla kagalek o, ” iluk apekhe lagan halok he, hakla ebe wene iti kagalasuak nen, akhuni inawene iti hakla abit asuak o.
46003019	Akhuni agat oba meke nen, “Nit akhuni ninawene ninakla motok kagalek, ” iluk apiliogei halok he, Allah nen, “Inakla abit werek o, ” iluk apekherek. It ap Allah ane holal waganogo 'bekhe lagoukha meke nen, “’Bagei herle ’bilukmo ukisinem kerokhogon wakherek hak, it akhuni agat oba meke yoma inakla kagalek thalek dogolik nukhetdisiliogei iti baga, kerelagunem, Allah nen weagarinabigin werek o, ”\rq (Ayub 5:13)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha.
46003020	Nen, wene ageikhe yi, “It akhuni inakla kagalek meke nen inaklaeberiogei iti, we yugunat alomarogo eberiogei o, iluk ninopase Etagapogot ilu, ”\rq (Mazmur 94:11)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukhama weregat.
46003021	-
46003022	Halok he, an Paulus nebe inom, at Apolos ebe inom, Kepas ebe inom, o agat oba yoma tha’bokhogonat inom, iniluk welageikharek iti inom, watlageikharek iti inom, o yogotak ya welageikharek meke inom, yabokane hagatlasigin meke inom, etoma tha’bokhogonat, hit iteerek iti nen, hit nen he, “An noe iti o, ” iluk akhuni meke hasik hogorakhugup o.
46003023	Hit hinebe iti, iteerek, Kristus at o. Nen, Kristus ebe iteerek he, Allah at o.
46004001	Hit nen nit hasik, “It inebe Kristus atuaneke meke, wene Allah akla apekherek wene akhuni agat oba meke inokodek meke yogeisilik nekharek meke, ” iluk hutdinanhe dogoni o.
46004002	It ap koktek inameke yi meke ti meke it inatuaneke meke inikibaga dogoagaluk inobabut palogo nen, inobabut hupulik meke halogat 'bisegarek.
46004003	Meke re, an nen itithogon hagakhunem, hit nen a? It aperek nen a, ekhe dogolik, “At mot hagariogo a? Korlo hagariogo a, ” iluk nitema wokneausak, erlok dek apekhe lagei. Nen, an nekaerek nen usak meneke, erlok degat o.
46004004	An nekaerek nen, “Weak ageikhe hagakhidek, ” iluk apekhe lagei iti baga, wene noba koragein degat o. At ninoe Etagapogot nen wene noba 'bigik kokhik hagasusak o.
46004005	Iti nen he, wene akhuni inoba 'bigik kokhik hagasigin itinem aban asi ageidek werek korlek, hit wene inoba 'bigik kokhik hagasusak motok dek o. At ninoe Etagapogot ebe witluk nen, hibakone limago hagariogei meke thelekmatdigik, itithogon hagasugun iluk apalok inakla thebelek werek meke iti 'bualogo 'bigik, hagasisigin iti therogo dogosak o. Itithogon 'bualogo 'bisinem, Allah nen hano hagakha meke inebe tomok hogorinabusak mekeat hogorinabigin o.
46004006	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An wene yokhisigi iti, hit apereknen, “Hit hinoe iti erlok dek meke re, nit ninoe iti anek he, kok, ” iluk hogorakhaunogo iluk yokhisigi. Itithogon hogorakhausak dek iluk, men egarek etnogo, “Wene Allah ane holal waganek werek korlek oba dukhogon ageikhe usak dek, ” iluk egarek etnogo hutdubageik iluk, nit Apolos nipisak ninoba lisogon yokhisigi iti o.
46004007	“It aperek iti erlok dek meke re, ageikhe iti anek he, kok motok, iluk ekhe dogono, ” iluk tha nen yakulhisasikhemo. Hit hinameke yi meke ti meke horlekhe lagap iti, Allah nenat wokhisekherek dek nogo a? At nenat wokhisekherek o. Itithogon wokhisugunem horlekhe lagap mekeat he, hit nen winametdegep meke thalek hinekaerek nen hogorakhekhe lagap iti nenaluk.
46004008	Hit yi meke ti meke arat horlegep higi. Arat kok akhegep higi. Nit kepu werek korlek, hit anek he, hinetagapogot arat akhegep higi. Hit itithogon hinetagapogot atlepma, nit ninomat ninetagapogot dogolo o. Mekeat he, dek o.
46004009	Nit iti, akhuni motok ina'it meke thelekma akhuni inil oba thebeldisalok inekarli warogo inakharek iti hak, nit Allah nen ninayoko ’biluk la’inani ageikhemo wagagu meke iti, akhuni inom, malaikat inom, inil oba itithogonathagatninabiogei o.
46004010	Nit Kristus hasik ninebe kepu werek korlek, hit anek he, Kristus hinom hunik dogolik hinakla kagalek welagap higi. Nit erlok dek werek korlek, hit anek he, hinobatne werek welagap higi. Nit inakla erlok degetdinanhe korlek, hit anek, hogothinabiogei higi.
46004011	Nit o haganeat eloma nen yogotak hurli, hipiri inom, i inom, abuat welagorek. Itithogon dogolik, ninasu degat werekma tugi ninakhe korlek, ninaila dekma, o yi ai ti ai lagorek.
46004012	Itithogon nekhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke horlauwogoluk, yabu niniki baga nen, ninobatnerogon waganogo horlogorek. Akhuni nen homan ’binanhunem, nit nen inalonerinakhik, yi aik ti aik hagatninakhunem, ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageik,
46004013	ninabok weak palhunem, ninane erogat yogeisigik, hagakhorek. Itithogon hagakho korlek, o haganeat nen yogotak hurli akhuni yoma tha’bokhogonat nen, amumuleke horogo ula’isegarek hak, nit itithogonat hagatninakhoat werek o.
46004014	An nen holal waganhe lagei yi, hit hinekarli wasigiluk waganhe lagei ’buk. Hit hinebe an ebeat na’buri meke negen nakmu dogolik hinasuk wakhe lagei o.
46004015	Hit Kristus hinom hunik werekma, ap wene yakulhisiliogei meke inebe 10. 000 doalegat werek mekeat he, hinopase re, doalegat ’buk. Ina’buri itaginakharek hak, an nenat wene hano wene iti yokhisa agagisik Kristus Yesus hinom hunogo ’binagasigimo welagap iti baga, hinopase narligat agagisik welagei o.
46004016	Iti nenat, “An nobabut waganini o, ” iluk nane obatnerogon hinasuk wakhe lagei o.
46004017	Hit an nobabut waganubageik nen iluk, na'but Timotius nekaerek nen itakhi meke hakene ebe nakmu meke hinoba la’i agei iti o. At ninoe Etagapogot ipisak hunik dogolik, at hasik obabut hupulik hagakherek meke hinoba witluk nen, men yakulhisagein, “At Paulus Kristus ipisak hunik dogolik, it Allah a’buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke, at ekaerek hagakherek meke obabut waganuagaluk, yigithogon yakulisekherek, ” iluk hinakla eberogo yokhisasigin o.
46004018	An hit hinoba wisigin dek thalek, hit aperek hinekaerek nen hogorakhegep iti o.
46004019	Itithogon mekeat he, ninoe Etagapogot akla apalok nen, “Hano, lan, ” iluk yoknekhe halok he, an hinoba ibat wisigin o. Witluk nen, it aperek hogorakhiliogei meke iti, inane ugun meke nasuk holigin ’buk. Inobatne werek a? Dek a, iluk inobabut paligin o.
46004020	Iti, “Allah apma welago, ” iluk inane baga ugun halok, ekagat agarek ’buk. Inobatnerogon hagakhe dogogun halok, ekagat agarek o.
46004021	Meke re, an hit hinoba tugi wolok wisu hak, witluk, nane obatnerogon yokhisa isusak warlok a? At he, nane erogat hinebe nakmurogo yokhisa isusak warlok a. Hit nen ki hak warlok apegep.
46005001	Akhuni nen, ap hit meke ageikhe he waganusak dek meke waganhesik werek iluk abok ekhe dogolik yoknekhama nasuk holhi o. It akhuni Allah ane inokodek meke nen itithogon hagakharek dek meke, ap iti opase age meke waganhesik werek iti.
46005002	Itithogon hagakhe korlegat, hit hogorakhekhe lagap iti. Hit hagasusak he, hinakla weak atluk, ap weak hagakhe werek iti, ula’isausak meke hinom dapukhogon welagap iti.
46005003	-
46005004	An nebe walegat welagei meke re, netaiken hit ninom welago hakene o. Iti nen, nebe ninom dogolik u hak, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus etaga palogo, at ap weak hagakhe werek iti wene oba ’bigima werek o. Halok he, hit opakimo natogokhunem, an netaiken ninom welago hakene iti nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus obatne baga, men hagatno.
46005005	Ap iti etaiken ninoe Etagapogotwisigin itinem waga dogolik tiluak nen, yogotak ebe Iblis nen weagatduagaluk, at Iblis at wogotno.
46005006	Akhuni nen inane dagakhogon ekhe dogolik, “Hipiri roti meke hisuagaluk eken hikherek Hieke herlekha'bugat akla ’bilukmo nen, roti ebe tha’bokhogonat hikherek o, ” iluk egarek etnogo hinokodek nogo a? Hinilu dogolik hogorakhekhe lagap iti hano ’buk. Weak o.
46005007	Akhuni Yahudi meke pesta Paskah neke dogolik, domba warogo, eken roti hikherek meke ula’isalok, hikhidek meke anek nekarek hak hagatno. Ninadomba wasu hak, Kristus ninobasik arat wakhukha iti nen, hinebe roti ket hikhidek meke agasip welagap hak eberogonat asubageik nen, eken roti hikherek meke alep meke ula’isegarek hak, weak hagakhe lagap meke iti horogo here’isani o.
46005008	Halok he, pesta Paskah neke dogolik, roti eken hikherek meke akla kolakhidek meke nekarek hak, nit weak hagakhik, param hagakhik, hagakhe dogosak dek o. Ninetaiken opakiat dogolik, eberogonat meke anek hagakhe dogouok o.
46005009	An nen alebageik wene holal waganogo hinoba la’i aga dogolik, men isigi apigi, “Hit he, it akhuni param hagarinabiogei meke hinom dapukhogon dogogup o, ” iluk yokhisasigi o.
46005010	Itithogon yokhisasigi iti, it akhuni Allah ane inokodek dogolik param hagakharek meke inom, inamikmak weak hagakharek meke inom, nukhetdisegarek meke inom, inetaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hogorakharek meke inom, it iti hasik isigi dek o. It itithogon hagakharek meke hinom dogosak dek, iluk ilema, it akhuni agat oba meke yoma motok here’isalok dukhitlep o.
46005011	Itithogon yokhisasigi iti, wene ebe yigithogon. At ageikhe nen ekhe dogolik, “An hinagarlak Allah a’burat o, ” iluk ekhe dogoligat, humi yugunat ha’isigik, amikmak weak hagakhik, etaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hogorakhik, inabok weak wene inekalat inoba 'bisigik, apusu hunu-hunu asuagaluk nekarek etnogo meke nasi motok welageik, iniki abusak waganhik, hagakherek meke iti hakene meke hinebe hinom dapukhogon dogosak degat, hipiri hinom neke dogosak degat, iluk yokhisasigi apigi.
46005012	-
46005013	It akhuni Allah ane inokodek meke wene an nen inoba ’busak nogo a? Dek o. Allah nen inoba ’bigin werek o. Allah ane holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, men isukha, “At ageikhe hinakla dogolik weak hagariogo meke iti, ula’isano, ”\rq (Ulangan 13:5; 17:7; 19:19; 22:21,24; 24:7)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek iti nen, ap ageikhe hit Allah a’buri hinom natogokhe lagap meke nen weak hagakhe halok, hit nen wene oba ’busak dek a? ’Busagat o.
46006001	Hit Allah a’buri meke, hit-hit hat ageikhe nen atageikhe wene oba ’begen halok he, Allah a’buri meke nen pilinetdiluk wene iti oba ’bigik kokhik hagasuagaluk inayoko ’bigidek, it akhuni weak hagariogei meke inayoko ’bekhe lagap iti nenaluk. Hinekarli dek a?
46006002	Yabokane Allah a’buri nen akhuni agat oba meke yoma wene inoba ’bigik kokhik hagasugun iti hinokodek nogo a? Itithogon hagasugun halok, wene herlekha’bugat meke iti, hit nen pilinetdiluk nen wene inoba ’bigik kokhik hagasusak dek nogo?
46006003	Nit nenat, it malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo, wene inoba ’bigik kokhik hagasugun iti hinokodek nogo a? Halok he, nit agat oba yoma dogolik, akhuni wene yi meke ti meke hasik inoba agunem, nit nen pilinetdiluk wene inoba ’bigik kokhik hagasusak dek nogo a? Hagasusagat o.
46006004	Wene itithogon meke hinoba aga halok, pilinetdiluk wene hinoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasuagaluk thani inayoko ’bekhe lagap. Nit Allah a'buri nen, “It iti inobabut weak, ” iluk ogorek meke iti inayoko ’bekhe lagap a?
46006005	Hinekarli wakhe lagei o. Hit hinagarlak lak hinom, hat ageikhe nen at ageikhe wene oba ’begen halok, ap Allah a’but akla motok kagalek dogolik wene pilinerogo degetdusak meke opakiat ageikhe dek nogo? Werek apekhe lagei.
46006006	Mekeat he, hat ageikhe nen hagarlak ageikhe wene oba ’biluk, akhuni inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke nen pilinerogo wene oba ’bigik kokhik hagasuak nen iluk inayoko ’bekhe lagan iti.
46006007	Hit-hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinom mekeat he, hinom wenemuk-wenemuk motok welagap iti nen erlok degetdakhekhe lagap o. Hit he, weak hagathinakhunem hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogoumo weak a? Alomathinakha halok here’isaumo weak a? Hano o.
46006008	Hit he, hinagarlak lak hinom mekeat he, weagarinakhik, alomarinakhik, hagakhe lagap iti o.
46006009	Akhuni weak hagariogei meke Allah apma ’bisekherekma iti iteerek asugun dek o, iluk, hinokodek nogo? Hinekaerek nen dalugup. Humi yugunat ha’isegarek meke inom, inetaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hogorakharek meke inom, ap inagugi meke param ha’isegarek meke inom, ap nen humi ha’isegarek hak it ap-ap ha’isegarek meke inom,
46006010	iniki abusak waganharek meke inom, inamikmak weak hagakharek meke inom, apusu hunu-hunu asuogoluk nekarek meke etnogo nasi motok welageikharek meke inom, inabok weak wene inekalat inoba ’bisegarek meke inom, nukhetdisegarek meke inom, it akhuni itithogon hagakharek meke iti tha’bokhogonat Allah apma ’bisekherekma iti iteerek asugun motok dek o.
46006011	Alebageik hit aperek itithogon hagakhe lagagip mekeat he, yogotak Allah nen hinakla hano thobalogo ’binageisikhesik, hinebe at ekaerek hasik ’bakhasikhemo welagap o. Wene hinoba welageikhe meke iti, ninopase Allah Agoreke nen ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus etaga baga, korogo wokhasikhesik Allah hinom dapulogo 'binageisikhemo welagap o.
46006012	Hit meke ageikhe nen ekhe dogolik, “An yi meke ti meke yugunat hagasusak anek, ” iluk iliogo mekeat he, an nakla nen, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat iti nen hanorinabusak anek ’buk. Yi meke ti meke iti obatne atluk, iti meke nen an nebe apma ’banusak na’it o.
46006013	It aperek nen yigithogon egaregat, “Nekarek meke iti ninelabut hasik. Nen, ninelabut iti nekarek meke hasik, ” iluk egarek. Itithogon egarek mekeat he, pereat, at Allah nen yabokane degetdigin werek o. Allah nen, ninebe yi, param ha’isekhe dogoagalukwinametdinanhikhe ’buk. At he, ninoe Etagapogot hasigat winametdinanhikhe iti o. Ninebe yi iteerek he, ninoe Etagapogot werek o.
46006014	Allah nen he, ninoe Etagapogot watlageikhesikmo nen ilugutdisikhe hak, at obatne baga, nit ninilugutninabiginat o.
46006015	Nit ninebe yi Kristus iki isok hakene welago, iluk hinokodek nogo? Halok he, ninebe Kristus iki isok welago iti meke waganogo, humi inobabut yugunisake meke iti inom hunesusak nogo? Motok dek o.
46006016	It ap humi inobabut yugunisake meke iti inom hundiluk nen, inebe opakiat ageikharek, iluk hinokodek nogo a? Allah nen ekhe dogolik, “It inebe pere meke yabokane opakiat hagatlatluk dogogun o, ”\rq (Kejadian 2:24)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek iti.
46006017	Nit ninebe hasik itithogon hagatlagorek mekeat he, ninoe Etagapogot ninom hundiluk nen, at ninom ninetaiken opakiat agorek iti o.
46006018	Humi yugunat ha’isegarek iti meke ha’isekhe dogunogo iluk, lo laga dogono o. Yi weak ti weak hagakharek iti inebe itikmanke yiat hagakharek. Mekeat he, humi yugunat ha’isegarek iti, inekaerek inebeat weagatdakhegarek iti o.
46006019	Hit nen he, “Allah nen Agoreke woknisasikhemo, ninebe at ai halek welago, ” iluk hinokodek nogo a? Hinebe hinekaerek iteerek ’buk. At iteerek o.
46006020	Allah nen he, hinebe oko arat ’bogokhogon palogo wokhinakhikhemo welagap iti nen, akhuni nen at hogorasuagaluk, hinebe at hasik hano hagakhe dogono o.
46007001	Hit nen wene holal waganogo noba la’i agap etnogo, oko yokhisak o. Ap nen, humi waganhidek elege werlegat dogosak hano.
46007002	Mekeat he, param hagakhe dogunogo iluk, ap inagugi tomok waganek welageik, humi inaguni tomok waganek welageik, dogosak o.
46007003	Inaguni nen, inagugi tomok, nen, inagugi nen inaguni tomok, inom noge ekhe dogosak mekeat noge ekhe dogosak o.
46007004	Nen, humi inebe inekaerek iteerek ’buk. Inaguniat iteerek o. Ap inebe itithogonat, inekaerek iteerek ’buk. Inagugiat iteerek o.
46007005	Halok he, humi ap hinom noge ekhe dogosak iti, pauwakhogon dogogup o. Sembayan ekhe dogouogoluk halok he, men usak, “Elanma hasik wer legat dogouok, ” iluk wenekak hinom iluk nen, sembayan ekhe dogoluk nen, yabokane hinom dapukhogon dogono. Hinetaiken thebelusak erlok dek iti nen, Iblis nen hinakla kagalunogo iluk, hinom dapukhogon dogosak iti o.
46007006	Wene yokhisigi iti, nane obatnerogon yokhisigi ’buk. Weat hinasuk wakhi o.
46007007	Akhuni tha’bokhogonat, an he dek werlegat welagarek hak dogoumo, hano, iluk apegerek mekeat he, at Allah nen ninobabut tomok, at ageikhe obabut ninat, at ageikhe obabut ninat, woknisasikhe iti nenat he, itithogon erlok dek o.
46007008	Hit ap aperek, hinagugi dek meke inom, hit homagarlugi meke inom, humi thoge meke inom, an welagarek hagat dogoumo, hano, iluk yokhisigi iti o.
46007009	Hinetaiken thebelusak erlok dek aga halok he, hinagugi tomok, hinaguni tomok, woginakhe dogono. Hinoba agaken dageisinem yugunat hagasumo weak o. Hinaguni tomok, hinagugi tomok, waganek dogoumo hano.
46007010	Nen, hit ap aperek, hinagugi werek meke inom, hit humi aperek hinaguni werek meke inom, an nen hinasuk wasigin o. Meke re, an nen ’buk. Ninoe Etagapogot nen hinasuk wasigin o. Hit humi hinaguni here'isalok nen, dukhugup o.
46007011	Hat he ageikhe hagun here’isalok dukhegen halok he, ap ageikhe waganhidek werlegat dogono. Werlegat dogosak erlok dek aga halok he, hagun alep meke itiat waganin o. Nen, hit ap meneke, hinagugi lologo here’isugubat o.
46007012	Hit aperek hasik, wene ninoe Etagapogot nen igidek meke, an nenat yokhisak o. Hat ap Allah a’but meke nen, hage etaiken Kristus oba hakotdigidek meke waganek welagan meke, at nen he, “Nagun nipisak dapukhogon dogosak, ” iluk apekherek halok, hano. Hat nen, hage iti here’isausak motok dek o.
46007013	Hat he Allah a’but meke nen, hagun etaiken Kristus oba hakotdigidek meke waganek welagan meke, at ap iti nen, “Nage nipisak dapukhogon dogosak, ” iluk apekherek halok he, hagun iti here’isalok dukhusak motok dek o.
46007014	At he Allah a’but meke nen, agun etaiken Kristus oba hakotdigidek meke, waganek ipisak hano dapukhogon welageikharek iti baga, age nen agun ebe Allah hasik ’bisiliogo. Nen, iti hak at ap Allah a’but meke nen, age etaiken Kristus oba hakotdigidek meke waganek ipisak hano dapukhogon welageikharek iti baga, agun nen age ebe Allah hasik ’bisiliogoat. Itithogon inebe Allah hasik ’bisigidek dogolepma re, hina’buri inebe Allah mekeat, itikmanke meke dogolep o.
46007015	At ap etaiken Kristus oba hakotdigidek meke iti age here’isekhe halok he, here’isoagat o. Nen, at he etaiken Kristus oba hakotdigidek meke iti agun here’isalok dukhekhe halok he, dukhuagat o. Allah nen he, ninetaiken hapukhogon hano dogoagaluk ninayoko ’bisikhe iti nen he, itithogon hagasugun halok, wene hinoba ’busak dek o.
46007016	Hat he yi, hakla nen, “Yabokane nagun tilusak erlok dek asigin, ” iluk apekhe lagan a? Nikithogon nen hilu. Hat ap yi hakla nen, “Yabokane nage tilusak erlok dek asigin, ” iluk apekhe lagan a? Nikithogon nen hilu.
46007017	Hit he, Allah nen hinebe tomok hinayoko ’bisinem, ninoe Etagapogot nen, “Hat ageikhe yigithogon dogono. Nen, hat ageikhe itithogon dogono, ” iluk yokhisasikhe hagat dogono. Itithogon dogoagaluk an nen Allah a’buri o ya ta natogokharek meke tha’bokhogonat inasuk wakherek o.
46007018	At ageikhe oado aperlagap meke arat palek werekma, Allah nen ayoko ’bisikhesik oba nen, yabokane oado palek dek meke negen asigiluk ageikhe hagasusak erlok dek o. Nen, at ageikhe nen, oado aperlagap meke etnogo palek dek werekma Allah nen ayoko ’bisikhesik oba nen, yabokane oado itithogon palusak degat o.
46007019	Inoado aperlagap meke itithogon palek dogosak inom, palek dek dogosak inom, iti kok ’buk. Dek o. Ebe kok he, Allah ane hologo hagakhe dogosak itiat o.
46007020	Akhuni inebe tomok Allah nen inayoko ’bisinem welagoukha hagat dogosak o.
46007021	Hat ageikhe, akhuni inatuaneke werekma Allah nen hayoko ’bisikhe halok, “An itithogon welagei meke, ” iluk, iti hasik wene munini ebekhun o. Yabokane, hasokne ’baguogoluk halok he, “Na’it, ” ugun. “Iti hano, ” iluk hasokneat atno.
46007022	At ageikhe akhuni inatuaneke werekma, ninoe Etagapogot nen ayoko 'bisikhemo ipisak hunik dogolik nen, at agot asokneat agasik werek. Nen, at ageikhe, asokne werekma ayoko 'bisikhemo, ninoe Etagapogot atuanekeat agasik werek o.
46007023	Hit hinebe Allah nen oko motok 'bogokhogon palogo wokhinakhikhe iti nen he, akhuni inatuaneke agup o.
46007024	Halok he, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinebe tomok Allah nen hinayoko 'bisinem welagagip hagat, Allah hinom hunik dogolik itithogonat dogono o.
46007025	Wene homagarlugi tharlisik meke hasik, “Itithogon hagakhe dogono, ” iluk ninoe Etagapogot nen ninasuk wakhidek mekeat he, wene an nakla apekhe lagei meke yi yokhisak. Nane yokhisagein yi, hit hinakla nen, “Allah nen Paulus ebe akmu nen waganhikhemo obabut hupulik meke nen yoknisekhe iti eberogonat, ” iluk hinakla apano o.
46007026	Nit o yogotak weak welago ya baga dogolik, ninebe tomok welago hagat dogosak o, iluk apekhe lagei.
46007027	Hit ap aperek nen hinagugi werek meke halok, lologo here'isauwogoluk hagakhup o. Nen, hit aperek hinagugi dek meke halok, humi woginabuogoluk herageinakhup o.
46007028	Meke re, hit ap nen hinagugi horlegep halok he, iti weak hagakhep iluk usak dek o. Nen, hit homagarlugi tharlisik meke nen hinaguni horlegep halok he, iti weak hagakhep usak degat o. Meke re, woginabiluk nen yi akin ti akin hugun iti nen, itithogon haunogo iluk igi o.
46007029	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Yogotakne, o ilugun oba asi lagosik welago ya baga dogolik ap inagugi waganek meke iti, waganek dek meke negen dogoak, iluk apigirik nen yokhisigi o.
46007030	Akhuni aperek de ariogei meke halok, de ariogei dek meke negen dogoak. Nen, it aperek inakla arleken akhiliogei meke halok he, inakla arleken akhiliogei dek meke hakene negen dogoak. Nen, it aperek yi meke ti meke oko palogo horliliogei meke iti, ite ageidek meke negen dogoak.
46007031	Nen, it aperek agat oba yi meke ti meke horlegarek meke iti, horligidek meke negen dogoak. Itithogon igi iti, yi meke ti meke agat oba welagarek meke tha'bokhogonat arat dek ariogo iti nen igi o.
46007032	Hit he, humi hasik, ap hasik, hinakla wene munini ebekhidek dogobageik nen iluk yokhisigi o. Itithogon igi iti, ap inagugi dek meke nen, ninoe Etagapogot akla hano asuagaluk at kogotdiluk inakla ebekharek o.
46007033	Itithogon mekeat he, ap inagugi waganek meke iti, inagugi inakla hano asuagaluk, yi meke ti meke agat oba meke kogotdiluk inakla ebekharek o.
46007034	Itithogon ebekhe dogolik, inetaiken pere agarek iti. Homagarlugi inaguni dek tharlisik meke iti, inebe inom, inetaiken inom, ninoe Etagapogot hasik dogouogoluk, at kogotdiluk inakla ebekharek iti o. Meke re, it humi inaguni werek meke iti, inaguni inakla hano asuagaluk, it inobasik yi meke ti meke agat oba meke kogotdiluk inakla ebekharek iti o.
46007035	Wene itithogon yokhisigi iti, wam kupi irlelogo 'begarek hak, “Yi hagasusak dek. Ti hagasusak dek, ” iluk wene palhi 'buk. Hit hano asuagaluk yokhisigi o. Halok, hit nen, hinetaiken weat meke oba ebekhidegat, ninoe Etagapogot hasik mothogon hanorogon hagakho motok dogobageik iluk igi.
46007036	Ap ageikhe nen horlak tharlisik meke ipisak wene warek dogolik, akla nen, “An yigithogon weak welagei. Horlak iti ebe waganigin o, ” iluk oba agaken dageikhe halok he, at akla itithogon apekhesikmo, he ebe waganusak o. Waganigin iti weak 'buk. Hano o.
46007037	Meke re, at ageikhe, akhuni aperek nen akla kagalhunem, ekaerek etaiken opakiat dogolik, ekaerek etaiken nenat thebeldiluk nen, “Dek o. An horlak nipisak wene warek meke iti, itithogon asokneat dogoak, ” iluk akla apekhe halok, iti hano motok.
46007038	Ap nen horlak tharlisik meke ipisak wene warek meke waganhe halok, iti hano mekeat he, waganhidek thogotdekhe halok he, iti hano motok o.
46007039	It humi inaguni inebe iniluk werek korlek, ap ninat meke ageikhe woginabusak dek o. Inaguni inebe watlago halogat, inakla warlok apiliogei meke woginabusak. Meke re, yugunat meke woginabusak dek. Ninoe Etagapogot inom hunik meke anek woginabusak o.
46007040	Itithogon woginabusak mekeat he, waganhidek werlegat dogoumo, inakla hano motok dogosak apekhe lagei o. Itithogon apekhe lagei iti, Allah Agoreke nakla dogolik apekhe lagei.
46008001	Hit nen he, “Kaneke ako wakharek iti, wene erlo yigithogon iluk ninilu anek, ” egethep iti, nit hutdogo. Meke re, wene itithogon inilu dogolik, inekaerek nen hogorakhegarek mekeat he, akhuni inebe inakmu dogolik hagakharek anek he, inetaiken horlerinakharek iti.
46008002	At ageikhe nen apekhe dogolik, “An wene arat nilu, ” iluk apiliogo mekeat, at hutukhogon ilu asusak mekeat he, aban okodek dogolik iliogo o.
46008003	Itithogon mekeat he, at ageikhe nen, Allah ebe etaiken hunik halok he, Allah nen ap iti ebe ilu o.
46008004	Kaneke ako wakharek iti re, kaneke agat oba meke yoma ebe dek mekeat, iluk ninilu. Ninopase Allah ebe opakiat. Ageikhe motok dek o.
46008005	It akhuni yoma nen ekhe dogolik, “Nit he, ninopase oba ninetaiken hakotdiluk welagorek ninausa meke yiat o, ” iluk pogot oba meke hasik inom, agat oba meke hasik inom, iliogei iti. Itithogon egarek iti, inausa meke doalegat werekma, etaga werek doalegat werek o.
46008006	Itithogon mekeat, nit ninopase Allah ebe opakiat. Ageikhe dek. Yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat at nen walhasikhemo ninebe at hasigat welago. Itithogonat, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ebe opakiat o. Yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat Allah nen walhasikhe iti, ebe at Yesus nen walhasikhesik, ninebe at oba nenat niniluk welago.
46008007	Meke re, wene iti akhuni tha’bokhogonat inilu ’buk. It aperek alebat inetaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hogorakhe lagoukhasikmo nogo nen, yabokane wam kaneke ako warek meke karlelek neke dogolik, oba eberiogei. Inetaiken akut dogolik nasinem, inakla weak agarek.
46008008	Yi meke ti meke nekarek meke iti nen Allah oba woknisik ligin dek o. Nit nikidek kamotdugun halok, nuk asugun dek. Nen, nugun halok he, ageikhe thaburagun degat.
46008009	Hit yugunat nausagat mekeat he, nukunem nen, it akhuni aperek inetaiken akut meke weak asunogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono.
46008010	Hat ageikhe nen, wene iti hilu dogolik o wam kaneke ako wakharekma ukiluk hebe hurek latluk nigin halok he, at ageikhe etaiken akut meke nen ileken healok akla nen, “An ageikhe niginat o, ” iluk akla kagalasigin dek nogo a? Akla kagalatluk niginat o.
46008011	Hat nen, “An wene nilu o, ” iluk itithogon hagasigin iti baga, hagarlak ageikhe etaiken aban meke hasik Kristus watlageikhe mekeat he, hat nen weagatdigin iti o.
46008012	Hinagarlak lak hinerugi inetaiken aban meke inil damelogo weagarinakhik, inakla kagalhik, hagakhe lagap iti, Kristus ebeat il damelogo hagakhe lagap o.
46008013	Halok he, nekarek meke iti baga nen an nagarlak ebe weagatdinogo iluk, at hasik an warn kaneke ako warek meke karlelek nikidek motok here’isekhe dogogin o.
46009001	An nasokneat welagei dek nogo? At Allah nen nayoko'biluk la'ani ageikhe dek nogo a? Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ebe an nileken higidek nogo a? Ninoe Etagapogot nipisak hunik dogoligat ayabu hagakhi meke, hinebe welagap iti dek?
46009002	It akhuni aperek nen an hasik ekhe dogolik, “At Paulus Kristus nen ayoko 'bigidek o, ” iluk isi halok he, hit nen, itithogon usak dek. An nayoko 'biluk la'ani ageikhemo wagagi iluk, hit hinebe ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik welagap iti baga ekagat hutdanusak o.
46009003	Akhuni nen nabok weak isi korlek, an nen oko yigithogon yogeisekhe lagei,
46009004	“An Allah ayabu hagakherek iti hasik, niki oko hipiri woknikhik, i woknikhik, hagakhunem, horlausak dek nogo a? Horlausagat o.
46009005	Nen, it ap aperek Allah nen inayoko 'biluk la'isa ageikhe meke inom, ninoe Etagapogot agarumi oporlik meke inom, at Kepas inom, inagugi wogosik liliogei iti hak, an anek he, nage Allah a'but meke wolok nekhe dogosak dek nogo a?
46009006	E a, at he, it iti yabu waganhidek werlegat werek korlek, an Barnabas nipisak ninarligat anek yi meke ti meke niniki baga nen thet walogo here'isausak apegep?
46009007	Ap tentara inougi koktek nen inagarumi wim yabuogoluk inayoko 'bisinem, it inekaerek nen iniki oko heago yakharek nogo a? Dek o. Nen, it aperek nen anggur ai ya'iluk nen, eken ikhunem aperek inekaerek nekarek dek nogo a? E a, at he, it aperek inako domba doalegat herogo dogolik irlak apusu aperek inekaerek nekarek dek nogo a? Nekaregat o.
46009008	An wene igi iti, nit akhuni nen hagakhorek meke oba lisogon igi mekeat he, ebe Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo baga iti ipisak tak-tagat igidek nogo. Isikhemo nenat igi o.
46009009	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga, at Musa nen yogeisekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Gandum eken meke sapi kulok isok nenwuleleken warogo eken yibiluagaluk 'biluk nen, eken aperek at noak nen ape herle tetnokhogon wakhup o, ”\rq (Ulangan 25:4)\rq* iluk isikhe iti, at Allah nen sapi iti etaiken hunik nen isikhe nogo? Dek o.
46009010	Nit akhuni nen yabu waganhik, eken palhik, hagakhe dogolik, “An ageikhe nigin o, ” iluk ninakla arleken akhekhe dogolik yabu waganhik, eken palhik, hagakhorek iti nen, wene iti nit ninobasigat isikhemo holal waganek werek o.
46009011	Ai yakharek hak, wene hinetaikenma yakhugu iti o. Nen, ebe itasu hak, hit nen yi meke ti meke agat oba meke woknisaumo, iti doalegat a? Dek o. Erlogat woknisausak mekeat o.
46009012	Hit nen, it aperek meke itithogon wogeisausak erlogat halok he, nit ebe iteerek meke aperek woknisausak dek nogo a? “Woknisausak erlogat o, ” iluk yogeisekhe lagei. Itithogon mekeat he, nit aperek woknisoagaluk ekhe lago dek. Hano wene Kristus hagakhikhe wene iti, nit nen yogeisilik lagunem agolak palunogo iluk, yi meke ti meke aperek woknisausak iluk igidek ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk here'isekhe lago.
46009013	It ap Allah ai halek iteerek dogolik yabu etoma hagakhe dogolik, inapiri re, Allah aila meke nekarek iluk, hinokodek nogo? Nen, Allah ako waritluk hetu hunekharekma oba hunekhe dogolik itithogonat ebelake palogo it nekarek iluk, hinokodek nogo?
46009014	Iti hagat, at ninoe Etagapogot nen ninasuk wakhe dogolik, “Tt akhuni nen hano wene yogeisilik lagunem, it aperek nen hano wene iti alisikhogon inapiri melageisausagat o, ” iluk isikhe iti o.
46009015	Itithogon isikhe mekeat, an nen hano wene alisikhogon itithogon waganhidek welagarek. An hasik itithogon woknisuagaluk wene yi holal waganogo la'i agei 'buk. An itithogon woknisuagaluk hagakhidek welagei iluk hogorakhekhe lagei meke yi, at ageikhe nen nane degetdusak he, na'it. An nebe watlasumo, hano.
46009016	Hano wene yogeisilik nekherek iti, yogeisausak mekeat yogeisilik nekherek iti nen hogorakhausak motok dek o. Yogeisigidek kamotdumo, eiye. An nebe weak hagatnabusakma o.
46009017	An itithogon yogeisilik nekhe lagei iti, an nakla nen kagalogo yogeisilik nekhe dogolema, niki oko woknikhunem, waganhe dogole o. Meke re, an nakla nen kagalhidek werekma, Allah nen nayoko 'biluk iteerek 'banhikhe iti nen oko dek yogeisilik lagarek iti.
46009018	Halok he, an niki oko nena meke woknisusak? Iti ebe yi. Oko woknisu hak, hano wene iti oko dek werlegat yokhisilik nekhe dogolik, nakla hano welagei iti o. Itithogon yogeisugunem, oko woknisusak tak-tak mekeat, itithogon aperek woknikhunem waganhidek welagarek iti hano.
46009019	An he, akhuni inatuaneke welagei 'buk. Nasokneat welagei mekeat he, akhuni inebe doalegat Kristus hasik woginabigiluk, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inatuaneke atluk nekherek o.
46009020	Akhuni Yahudi meke Kristus hasik woginabigiluk an nobabut Yahudi meke inobabut waganogo hagakhe lagei. Nen, akhuni wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene at Musa nen yogeisasikhe meke etnogo, an nen holek dogosak dek mekeat he, it aperek holek welageikharek meke Kristus hasik woginabigiluk, an nobabut wene iti nasuk holek welagarek meke thalek hagakhe lagei o.
46009021	Nen, it aperek wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene at Musa nen yogeisasikhe meke iti, inasuk holharek dek meke aperek Kristus hasik woginabigiluk, an nobabut wene iti holhidek thalek welageiat o. Iti an wene Kristus nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti holek motok dogolik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti an holhidek welagarek 'buk. Holek welagaregat o.
46009022	It akhuni inetaiken aban meke Kristus hasik woginabigiluk an nobabut netaiken aban meke thalek welagei. It akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobabut hagakharek tomok hagakhe lagei iti, it meke aperek tilinabigiluk itithogon hagakhe lagei o.
46009023	An it akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobabut itithogon waganogo hagakhe lagei iti, it ninom hano meke iteerek asuogoluk hano wene iti hasigat hagakhe lagei o.
46009024	Tha ae 'busuk werek tha ae 'busuk werek luogoluk, inebe lugun meke iti inebe tha'bokhogonat lageikharek mekeat he, opakiat anek tak lalokma oko hano meke wogokharek iluk hinokodek nogo? Iti hagat, oko hano meke wokhisoagaluk, pirlirli hinobatnerogon laga dogono o.
46009025	Inae dek asunogo iluk, yi meke ti meke here'isalok inekaerek nen inebe karelegarek iti. It nen, kare-kare ibat weak asigin mekeat wogeisoagaluk karelegarek iti. Meke re, nit nen weak asigin dek meke woknisoagaluk yi meke ti meke hasik karelekhe lago.
46009026	Iti nenat, an laga lagei iti, koma ligin iluk, yugunat laga lagei 'buk. Nelokhe morat hurli bagaat laga lagei o. Iti hagat, akhuni iniki dikilogo at ageikhe nen ageikhe wakhik, ageikhe nen ageikhe wakhik, hagakhe dogolik alomarogo werlekma inakharek dek iti hak, an we yugunat hagakhe lagei ’buk.
46009027	It akhuni aperek hano asuagaluk hano wene yogeisilik nekhe lagei mekeat he, nekaerek here’anumo nuk asunogo iluk, nekaerek nen nebe warau hak, netaiken nobatnerogon thebeligik, akhuni inapma dogolik inane holek welageikharek hak, an nebe nane apma dogeigiluk nasuk warigik, hagakhe lagei o.
46010001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene yi hinokodek dogosak iti na'it. Ninopa lak tha’bokhogonat, at Musa nen wogosik oisa iti akla ukiluk, i Laut Merah yekelek iti obakha thekekhogon hano itali agoukha.
46010002	It nen, Musa oporlik nekhe dogogun o, iluk ima usau hak he, oisa iti akla ukigik, i Laut Merah yekelek iti obakha thekekhik, hagakhukha iti.
46010003	Itithogon hagakhukhasik nen, hipiri nekarek hak, at Allah nen opakiat meke elalinat wogeisekhe korlek, inebe tha’bokhogonat nikik,
46010004	i nekarek hak, opakiat meke elalinat wogeisekhe korlek, inebe tha’bokhogonat nikik, hagakhe lagoukha. I iti helekit Allah nen ’bisikhe meke, inom motok nekhe dogolik, akla nen dukhisinem neke lagoukha iti. Helekit iti ebe, Kristus at o.
46010005	Itithogon mekeat he, it aperek inebe doalegat Allah oba hotokthek welagoukha dek iti nen, o limo akhuni dekma etoma inakhikhemo ya warek ta warek lin isukha.
46010006	-
46010007	Itithogon hagatlageikhe iti, it weak meke warlokhogon hagakhik, ap it meke aperek inetaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hogorakhik, hagakhe lagoukha iti nen hagatlageikhe iti. It itithogon hagakhe lagoukha iti hak, nit nen itithogon hagakhe dogunogo iluk, hutdekhe dogolik ninasuk warekhe dogoagaluk wene tha’bokhogonat itithogon hagatlageikhe iti o. It itithogon hagakhe lagoukha iluk, Allah ane holal yigithogon waganek werek, “It akhuni inukuloak etaga iti meke nen, hipiri inom, anggur apusu inom, nuogolukhurek lagoukhasik, yabokane etai wakhik, param ha’isigik, hagasuogoluk melagoukha, ”\rq (Keluaran 32:6)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha.
46010008	Nen, akhuni it meke aperek nen param ha’isekhe lagoukhama, inebe 23. 000 motok doalegat opaki dikene tha’bokhogonat watlarik lagoukha iti hak, nit itithogonat ninasinogo iluk, itithogon hagakhe dogosak motok dek o.
46010009	Nen, akhuni it meke aperek nen, “Ninopase Etagapogot akla aga werek nogo a? ” iluk daluogoluk hagakhe lagoukhama, warlo aik nen palinakhe lageikhemo, watlarik lagoukha iti hak, nit ninasinogo iluk itithogon hagasusak motok dek o.
46010010	Nen, akhuni it meke aperek nen inane kukum hok-hok ekhe lagoukhama, malaikat akhuni inakherek meke Allah nen la’i ageikhemo, akhuni inebe doalegat inakhikhe iti hak, nit ninasinogo iluk, ninane kukum hok-hok usak motok dek o.
46010011	It itithogon hagarinakhikhemo inoba hagatlageikhe iti tha’bokhogonat nen, it akhuni aperek hutdekhe dogoagalugat hagatlageikhe. Itithogon hagarinakhikhe iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha iti, nit yogotak o ilugun hurli baga asi ago meke yi, ninasuk warekhe dogoagalugat holal waganogo ’bisukha.
46010012	Iti nen, hat ageikhe hakla nen, “An netaiken horle, metek welagei o, ” iluk apegen halok he, tunhogo launogo iluk hobabut hebelogo dogono.
46010013	Hit weak hagasuagaluk hinakla kagaligiluk wagunem hegethep iti, nit akhuni tha’bokhogonat ninakla kagaligiluk wagunem obabut hogorek hagat, hekhe lagap o. Mekeat he, Allah nen abok yoknisasikhe tak-tagat hagakherethekma, weak hagasuagaluk hinakla kagaligiluk wagunem, hit nen hinetaiken thebelusak erlok dek meke, Allah nen here’inagagidek hakhisik dogogin o. Hinakla itithogon kagalhe korlek, hinetaiken thebelogo hinobatne asubageik nen iluk, Allah nen wene, “Holak yike lani o, ” iluk u hak mothogon yakulhisagein werek o.
46010014	Iti nen, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. Kaneke iti hagatdiluk nen inetaiken oba hakotdiluk hogorakharek iti meke, here'isalok lo dukhitni o.
46010015	Wene igi iti, hit hinetaiken werek meke iluk yokhisekhe lagei. Halok he, an wene igin yi hinekaerek hinakla nen hutdini o.
46010016	Apusu neke dogolik, Allah heagei warogo neke lago iti, Kristus amep ulabogo wakhukha iti ninom hunik welago iluk neke lago dek a? Nen, hipiri kusogo neke lago iti, Kristus ebe ninom hunik dogolik ninebe opakiat welago, iluk, kusogo neke lago dek a?
46010017	Nit ninebe tha’bokhogonat nen, hipiri opakiat meke kusogo nokorek iti hakene ninebe doalegat meke re, opakiat o.
46010018	Hit nen he, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Yahudi meke nen hagakharek meke, hutdini o. It nen, Allah ako waritluk ebelake it neke dogolik, ebelake hetu hunekharekma hunekhe dogolik, Allah inom hunik welageikharek iluk, hinokodek nogo?
46010019	Halok he, nena igin. Kaneke iti ebeat meke igin a? At ako warekharek meke karlelek iti ebeat meke igin a? Dek o.
46010020	Wene iti, ebe yi hasik igi. It iti Allah hasik warekharek ’buk. Mokat obabut weak meke hasik warekharek. Halok he, hit mokat obabut weak meke iti hinom hunik dogosak, an na’it.
46010021	Hit he, ninoe Etagapogot agei apusu henago nikik, mokat obabut weak meke agei henago nikik, hagasusak motok dek o. Nen, ninoe Etagapogot apiri nekarekma nikik, mokat obabut weak meke apiri nekarekma nikik, hagasusak motok degat o.
46010022	Ninoe Etagapogot akla aga dagouagaluk hagakhe lago iti nayuk. At ninom walhaumo nit ninobatne werek a? Erlok dek o.
46010023	Hit aperek nen, “Yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat usa dek. Hano anek, ” iluk egep iti, eberogonat meke re, yi meke ti meke iti tha’bokhogonat nen ninebe hanotninabigin dek. “Yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat usa dek. Hano anek, ” iluk erlok usak meke re, tha’bokhogonat iti nen ninetaiken horle asigin ’buk.
46010024	Yi meke ti meke hinekaerek hasik kogotdekhe dogogup. At he, it akhuni aperek inobasik kogotdekhe dogono.
46010025	-
46010026	Allah ane holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, “Agat yi inom, yi meke ti meke agat oba welagarek meke inom, iteerek ninoe Etagapogot at o, ”\rq (Mazmur 24:1)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha iti nen, yi warn ti warn palek oko palharekma werekma, “Nikithogon hagakha meke, ” iluk hinok waganiluk hinetaiken akin asunogo iluk hinok waganhidek erlok oko palogo nausak o.
46010027	Nen, it akhuni aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke nen hipiri isago nuogoluk hinayoko ’bisinem, hit hinakla nen lausak iluk lagap halok he, yi meke ti meke isago ’bugun meke wokhisekho halok, hinetaiken akin asunogo nen, “Yi an nausak meke a? Dek meke a, ” iluk hinok inoba waganhidek nausagat o.
46010028	Itithogon mekeat he, it aperek nen, “Yi kaneke ako wakha meke karlelek, ” iluk yokhisekho halok, at yokhisekhe meke iti ebe hasik, etaiken hasik, nukup o.
46010029	Itithogon igi iti, hit hinekaerek hinetaiken akin asusak meke hasik igi ’buk. At ageikhe yokhisagein meke iti etaiken akin asusak meke hasik igi o. Meke re, hit aperek nen, “An yugunat nausak werek korlegat, at iti etaiken akin asunogo iluk an nikidek kamotdusak iti nenaluk.
46010030	An Allah heagei warogo nukunem, iti hasik nabok nenaluk palusak, ” iluk ekhe lagap iti,
46010031	an men yokhisak. Hipiri inom, i inom, nikik, yi meke ti meke hagakhik, itithogon tha'bokhogonat hagakhe dogolik, akhuni nen Allah hogorasuagalugat hagakhe dogono o.
46010032	Akhuni Allah a’buri meke inom, nen, it Yahudi meke inom, Yunani meke inom, weak asunogo iluk hinobabut mothogon hagakhe dogono o.
46010033	Hit hinobabut an hagakherek hak hagakhe dogono o. An he, yi meke ti meke hagakhe dogolik, nekaerek hanorakhagaluk hagakherek dek. Akhuni inebe doalegat Allah nen tilinakhunem hano asuagaluk hagakherek o.
46011001	An Kristus obabut waganogo hagakhe lagei hak, hit nen he, an nobabut waganogo hagakhe dogono.
46011002	Wene yi meke ti meke hasik an noba ebekhe dogolik, an yakulnikhukhama hit yakulhisasigi meke herogoat welagap iti nen hogothinakhe lagei o.
46011003	Itithogon mekeat he, wene opakiat ageikhe yi hinilu asusak meke apekhe lagei. Nit ap ninebe tomok, ninoe Etagapogot Kristus metek werekma apma dogosak. Nen, humi inebe tomok inaguni kok metek werekma inapma dogosak. At Kristus iti opase kok Allah metek werekma apma welagarek o.
46011004	Ap inebe tomok inukulasu thalogo nen akhuni natogorlekma sembayan igik, wene yogeisigik, hagariogei halok he, Ninoe Etagapogot ekarli wasu hagat hagariogei.
46011005	Nen, humi inebe tomok nen, inasu inukuloak oba dakulhidek dogolik akhuni natogorlekma sembayan igik, wene yogeisigik, hagariogei halok he, inekaerek nen inaguni tomok inekarli wasu hagat, hagariogei. Itithogon hagariogei iti re, inisi tha’bokhogon palekma hagasu hagat, hagariogei itiat o.
46011006	At he ageikhe nen asu ukuloak oba dakulusak a’it halok he, isi palumo re. Humi inisi inukuloak oba ’berorogon palhik, hotnokhogon palhik, hagakhunem inekarli halok nen, inasu inukuloak oba thalumo hano.
46011007	-
46011008	Erlo baga nen, ap inebe erloat, humi 'buk. Humi erlo ap iti nen, ap inebe Allah hogorakharek meke ebe hakene, amukhak hakene, iluk, inukulasu thalusak dek. Meke re, humi inagunihogorinakharek meke inamukhak hakene.
46011009	Allah nen humi hasik, ap winametdisikhe ’buk. Ap hasik he, he winametdisikhe o.
46011010	Iti nen, it humi it malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo inil oba dogolik inaguni tomok inane holek welago u hak, inasu inukuloak oba dakulogo dogosak o.
46011011	Itithogon mekeat he, ninoe Etagapogot ninom hunik dogolik, humi ap dekma inasokne welageik, ap nen, humi dekma inasokne welageik, dogosak dek.
46011012	Erlo baga, Allah nen he, humi ap meke waganogo winametdisikhe iti hak, ap inebe humi nen itaginakharek. Meke re, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat, erlo Allah at o.
46011013	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene yi hinekaerek hinakla ebetni. Humi su inukuloak oba dakulhidek dogolik, akhuni inebe natogorlekma sembayan usak nogo?
46011014	-
46011015	Ap he, inisi uatek werekma, inekarli agarek meke re, it humi re, inukuloak laberogo dogoagaluk Allah nen inisi uatek wogeisasikhemo werekma, “Inisi hano, ” iluk akhuni nen hogorinakharek, iluk he, hinekaerek hinakla nen apegethep dek nogo?
46011016	Meke re, it aperek nen, iti hasik wene palusak werek halok he, nit inom, Allah a’buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke inom, ninat hagakhidek, itithogonat hagakhorek anek.
46011017	An nen, wene yi hinasuk wakhe dogolik, hogothinabusak dek meke ageikhe werek o. Hit hinebe natogokhe lagap iti baga, hano ariogo 'buk. Weak ariogo o.
46011018	Hit wene alebageik yokhisagein apigi yi. Akhuni nen, “It Allah a’buri Allah ai halekma natogotdiluk, it-it inebe hurli wariogei o, ” iluk yoknekhama wene iti nasuk holhirik, aperek eberogonat hagariogeima iluk apigi o.
46011019	Itithogon hagakhe lagap iti, at Allah nen, “It iti an na’buri, ” iluk apiliogo meke, ekagat asuak nen, hinebe hurli wasusagat apigi.
46011020	-
46011021	Meke re, hit ninoe Etagapogot oba eberek dogolik, eken apusu nuogoluk opakimo natogotdiluk, hinapiri tomok, hinagei tomok, horlalok, “An tak nigin, ” iluk nilik lagunem, it aperek dek meke abuat huk ageik, it aperek apusu doalegat nalok hunu-hunu ageik, hagakhe lagap iti, ninoe Etagapogot apiri nikik, agei henago nikik, neke lagap ’buk.
46011022	Hit itithogon hagakhe lagap iti nenaluk. Hipiri nikik, apusu nikik, hagasusak he, hinai halek dekma? E a, Allah a’buri hinom natogokhe lagap meke hinakla nen erlok degetdisigik, inameke dek meke inekarli asuagaluk hagakhik, hagakhe lagap a? An wene nikithogon meke yokhisagein. Hogothinabigin a? Dek o. An wene yi hasik hogothinabigin dek o.
46011023	Wene itithogon hagakhe dogosak hasik, ninoe Etagapogot nen yakulnikhikhemo, an nen hit yakulhisasigi iti o.
46011024	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ap inobabut weak meke nen wasuagaluk, ap ageikhe nen hibako yoko lageikhe itinem, at Yesus nen hipiri roti meke ikimo waganhikhesik, Allah heagei warogo, kutdiluk nen men isikhe, “Hipiri yi an nebeat o. An hit hinobasigat nasugun iti, noba eberek dogobageik nen, yigithogonat hagakhe dogono, ” iluk agarumi wogeisasikhe.
46011025	Itithogon wogeisasikhemo arat nasukhama nen, isoak eken apusu henago itithogonat ikimo waganhikhesik nen, men isikhe, “Namep ulabogo watlasigin iti baga Allah nen wene ket warogo wokhinabigin iluk isikhe etnogo, namep henago ebe yi o. Halok he, yigithogon neke dogolik, yabokane an noba eberek dogobageik nen, yigithogonat neke dogono.
46011026	Hipiri roti meke yigithogon nikik, eken apusu henago yigithogonat nikik, hagakhe dogolik, hit nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot itithogon wakhukha o, iluk wene iti it aperek yogeisau hak, yigithogonat neke dogono. Itithogon nasi werekma, hurli, an wisigin iti hurli nen dek asigin o, ” iluk isikhe.
46011027	Tha nen ninoe Etagapogot oba eberek dogolik, apiri nikik, agei henago nikik, nausak dek meke dogolik neke halok he, ninoe Etagapogot ebe hasik, amep hasik, wene oba 'bigin werek o.
46011028	-
46011029	It aperek nen, at Ebe hutdigidek dogolik hipiri iti meke nikik, eken apusu iti meke nikik, neke dogolik, inekaerek nen wene inoba ’bakhiliogei iti nen, hit hinebe tomok hinekaerek nen hinobabut palano. Itithogon hinobabut palalok nen, hipiri iti meke nikik, eken apusu iti meke nikik, hagasusak o.
46011030	Itithogon inobabut paligidek niliogei iti nen, inebe doalegat u hunhik, inobatne dek ageik, hagakhe korlek, it aperek watlariogei iti o.
46011031	Meke re, ninekaerek nen ninobabut palogo nasi halok he, Allah nen wene ninoba ’bigin dek o.
46011032	Itithogon mekeat he, at Allah nen, ‘Tt iti akhuni itikmanke meke inom dapukhogon wene inoba ’biluk weagarinabusak iti erlok dek o, ” iluk, at nen ninobabut palogo nen ninasuk wakherek.
46011033	Iti nenat, nagarlak lak nerugi. Eken apusu itithogon nuogoluk halok he, akhuni hit meke aperek inebe aban wageidek halok he, therisik dogono.
46011034	Hit hinebe natogorlek werekma, wene hinoba asunogo nen, hit aperek nen hipiri abu halok he, hinaila nalok nen wisusak o. Nen, wene ageikhe an nebe wagei halok nen moretdigin o.
46012001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah Agoreke nenwoknisekherek wene iti hinokodek dogosak iti na’it.
46012002	Hit alebat ninoe Etagapogot hinokodek werekma, obabut weak meke nen kaneke ane dek meke oba hakotdiluk dogoagaluk, komake heat wokhisik lalok nen, nonetdinagekhe lageikhe iti hinilu.
46012003	Wene yi hinilurogo yokhisak. Akhuni Allah Agoreke inakla werekma, “At Yesus Allah nen weagatduak o, ” iluk homan ’busak erlok dek o. Nen, Allah Agoreke inakla dek halok he, “Yesus an noe Etagapogot, ” iluk usak erlok degat o.
46012004	Ninobabut dopok asokhotek tomogat woknisekherek iti, Allah Agoreke opakiat meke nenat woknisekherek o.
46012005	At ninoe Etagapogot ayabu asokhotek tomok hagatdisogorek iti, at ebe opakiat meke, ayabu hagatdisogorek o.
46012006	Ayabu itithogon hagatdisekhe dogolik, niniki asokhotek tomok hagakhorek meke iti, ebe tha'bokhogonat hagasuagaluk, ninopase Allah opakiat meke nen ninebe tomok obatne woknisekherek o.
46012007	Akhuni nen he, “It Allah Agoreke inakla werek, ” iluk ekagat hutdinanuagaluk, at nen he, ninebe tha’bokhogon hanotninabuagaluk ninakla tomok kagalherek.
46012008	At Allah Agoreke nen, at ageikhe wene kagoukhogon ekhe dogoagaluk wogokherek. Nen, at Agoreke iti nenat, at ageikhe yi wene ti wene ilu motok atluk yogeisoagaluk wogokheregat.
46012009	Nen, at Agoreke opakiat iti nenat, at ageikhe etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk motok dogoagaluk ninat wogokheregat. Nen, at Agoreke opakiat iti nenat, at ageikhe nen u hano hagarinakhe dogoagaluk obatne wogokheregat.
46012010	Nen, at ageikhe yi meke ti meke elalinat hagakhe dogoagaluk wogokhik, at ageikhe nen Allah ane yogeisekhe dogoagaluk wogokhik, at ageikhe nen ekhe dogolik, “At iti Allah Agoreke akla dogolik hagariogo, igik, weak meke agoreke akla dogolik hagariogo, igik, ” ekagat penakhe dogoagaluk wogokhik, at ageikhe nen inane okodek meke elalinat ekhe dogoagaluk wogokhik, at ageikhe inane inokodek meke isinem, at asuk holiluk nen, “Ebe yigithogon meke hasik ekhe, ” iluk it inane baga mothogon yogeisekhe dogoagaluk wogokhik, inebe tomok wogeisekherek iti o.
46012011	Itithogon wogeisekherek iti, Allah Agoreke opakiat iti nenat akla apalok, yi hagakhik, ti hagakhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk inebe tomok mikirlogo wogeisekherek iti.
46012012	Nit akhuni ninebe opakiat mekeat, niniki, ninisok, ninoba doalegat werek. Niniki ninisok ninoba yi meke ti meke doalegat werek meke re, dapukhogon ninebe opakiat iti hakene, at Kristus ebe itithogonat o.
46012013	Nit ninebe tha'bokhogonat Yahudi meke inom, Yunani meke inom, inatuaneke meke inom, inasokneat welageikharek meke inom, at Kristus ebe opakiat meke ninom hunesuagaluk, at Agoreke nen ima usa’inanhikhe iti o. Nen, i elesi opakiat meke nokorek hak, at Agoreke opakiat meke ninakla ’bisikhe.
46012014	Nit akhuni ninebe niniki opakiat iti anek ’buk. Niniki ninisok ninebe baga yi meke ti meke doalegat ninoba hunik werek o.
46012015	Ninisok yi ane werek dogolepma re, at nen ekhe dogolik, “An nebe iniki ’buk. Ninat iti nen, inebe baga hunik welagei dek o, ” iluk umo ane itithogon igin iti baga, ninebe baga hunik meke iti, asokneat dogosak apegep a? Erlok dek o.
46012016	Ninasuk yi ane werek dogolepma, at nen ekhe dogolik, “An nebe inileken ’buk. Ninat iti nen inebe baga hunik welageidek o, ” iluk umo ane itithogon igin iti baga ninebe hunik meke iti asokneat dogosak apegep a? Erlok dek o.
46012017	Ninebe yi ninileken anek dogolepma, ninasuk nikithogon holhe dogolo. Nen, ninasuk anek dogolepma, obasi nikithogon palhe dogolo.
46012018	Meke re, at Allah nen akla apalok nenat niniki ninisok ninebe yi meke ti meke ninebe baga werek yoma obolukmo tomok hunogo ’binanhikhemo ninebe opakiat meke welago yi.
46012019	Ninebe yi, niniki iti anek dogolepma, ninebe nikithogon dogolo.
46012020	Meke re, niniki ninisok yi meke ti meke ninoba doalegat werek mekeat, ninebe opakiat o.
46012021	Iti nenat, ninileken nen, niniki yogokhe dogolik, “An he, hat dekma hano dogole, ” iluk usak erlok dek o. Itithogonat, ninukuloak nen ninisok yogokhe dogolik, “An he, hat dekma hano dogole, ” iluk usak erlok degat o.
46012022	Ninebe opakiat meke, niniki ninisok yi meke ti meke ninoba welagarek iti, ageikhe obatne dek hakene apogorek mekeat, iti hano motogat o. Dekma nikithogon hagakhe dogolo. Erlok dek o.
46012023	-
46012025	Nit niniki ninisok ninebe baga hunik welagarek meke iti, ageikhe elokhoken hano halok he, agouwak hagasusak dek. Meke re, ageikhe elokhoken weak halok, agouwak hagarogo 'bigik, ageikhe ninekarli asusak halok, limago 'biluk agouwak hanorogo hagarogo 'bigik, hagakhorek. Niniki ninisok yi meke ti meke ninebe baga hunik welagarek meke tha'bokhogonat ageikhe nen ageikhe akmurakhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk, at Allah nen ninebe agouwak hagarogo winametdinanhikhe. Winametdinanhe dogolik, niniki ninisok ninebe baga hunik welagarek meke tha'bokhogonat, agot lasunogo iluk, elokhoken weak halok, agouwak hagarogo hagakhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk, obolukmo tomok hunhigik 'binanhikhe iti o.
46012026	Niniki ninisok yi meke ti meke ninebe baga hunik welagarek meke, ageikhe u nen hinet wakho halok he, ninebe abisakeat hinet wakhorek o. Nen, niniki ninisok yi meke ti meke ninebe baga hunik welagarek meke, ageikhe akhuni nen hogorakho halok he, ninebe abirat ninakla arleken akhogorek o.
46012027	Hit hinebe dapukhogon Kristus ebe hakeneat dogolik, hinebe tomok, at iki isok negen oba hunik welagap o.
46012028	At Allah nenat, a'buri ninobolukmo tomok 'binanhe dogolik, alebageik nit at ane yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk ninayoko 'bigik, ninoporlik at ane yogeisekhe dogoagaluk it aperek inayoko 'bigik, it inoporlik wene yakulisekhe dogoagaluk it aperek inayoko ’bigik, it inoporlik elalin meke hagakhe dogoagaluk it aperek inayoko 'bigik, it inoporlik akhuni aperek u warek meke hano hagarinakhe dogoagaluk it aperek inayoko ’bigik, nen, yi meke ti meke yomageisekhe dogoagaluk it aperek inayoko ’bigik, inougi koktek metek dogoagaluk it aperek inayoko ’bigik, akhuni o ya meke ta meke inane inokodek meke baga wene ekhe dogoagaluk it aperek inayoko ’bigik, ninebe tomok itithogon ninayoko ’bisikhe.
46012029	Nit tha’bokhogonat iti ninebe tomok, at ane wolok loagaluk ninayoko ’bisikhe meke welagorek nogo? Nit tha’bokhogonat Allah ane yogeisogorek meke nogo a? Nit tha’bokhogonat wene yakulisogorek meke nogo? Nit tha’bokhogonat elalin meke hagakhorek meke nogo?
46012030	Nit tha’bokhogonat akhuni aperek u hano hagarinakhorek meke nogo? Nit tha’bokhogonat akhuni o ya meke ta meke inane ninokodek meke baga wene elalinat yogeisogorek meke nogo? Nit tha’bokhogonat inane ninokodek meke isinem ninane baga mothogon ekhe lago meke nogo? Dek o.
46012031	Iti nen, nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah Agoreke nen ninobabut tomok woknisekherek iti meke, ebe hano meke wokhisoagaluk hinobatnerogon hagakhe dogono. Wene yokhisigi iti erlok dek negen mekeat, hano motok hagakhe dogosak meke yakulhisak.
46013001	An nen akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok aperek inane baga igik, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo inane baga igik, ekhe dogolik mekeat he, akhuni inebe nakmurogon dogogin dek halok he, an mo ane pukhasinem ane dirlok-dirlok igik, detan-detan igik, ekherek hak ekhe dogosak o.
46013002	Nen, Allah ane hano motok yogeisigik, wene akhuni inakla limago welagarek meke iti tha’bokhogonat nilu ageik, yi wene ti wene tha’bokhogonat niluat welageik, netaiken Allah oba motok hakotdiluk torn ageikhe obolukmo nen higikhogon werlekmake loagaluk yogosusak erlogat welageik, hagakhe dogolik mekeat he, akhuni aperek inebe nakmurogon dogogin dek halok he, we yugunat hagakhe dogosak o.
46013003	Yi meke ti meke an nikimo meke tha’bokhogonat akhuni inameke dek meke supurisigik, nebe motok warogo hali noagaluk neram nenat hagakhik, hagakhe dogolik mekeat he, akhuni aperek inebe nakmurogon dogogin dek halok he, we yugunat alomarogo hagakhe dogosak o.
46013004	Akhuni aperek inebe inakmurogon dogolik, inobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageikharek iti. Itithogon inakmurogon dogolik, inobabut hano ua palek dek dogolik, inekaerek nen higirakhigik-hogorakhigik, hagakharek dek.
46013005	Itithogon dogolik, inobabut hakolek welageik, yi meke ti meke inekaerek anek hasik kogotdigik, inakla aga horok welageik, it aperek nen weak hagarinakhunem wene inakla eberek motok welageik, hagakharek dek.
46013006	Itithogon inakmurogon dogolik, it aperek nen mothogon hagakhidek korlo hagakhunem inakla arleken akhigidek dogolik, mot hagakhunem anek inakla arleken akhegarek.
46013007	Inakmurogon dogolik, yi wene ti wene inoba agunem, inobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageik, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageik, hano asigin iluk inakla arleken akhigik, inetaiken hapukhogon welageik, hagakharek iti.
46013008	Itithogon hagakhe dogoluk nen, iniki ageikhe baga, Allah ane yogeisegarek iti meke yabokane yogeisausak dek ageik, akhuni inane inokodek meke elalinat egarek iti meke yabokane usak dek ageik, yi wene ti wene inilu welageikharek meke iti yabokane inilu asusak dek ageik, hagasugun mekeat he, akhuni inebe inakmurogon welageikharek iti meke anek, dek ageidek motok dogogin o.
46013009	Iti, o yogotak nen wene ato aperek anek ninilu welageik, Allah ane ato aperek anek yogeisigik, hagakhe lago iti.
46013010	Meke re, yabokane ebe abit meke hagatlagunem nen, yogotak aperek anek werek meke iti dek asigin o.
46013011	An nebe yekerek oba, nane yekerugi inane meke igik, netaiken yekerugi inetaiken meke welageik, nakla yekerugi inakla ebekharek meke ebekhik, hagakhe lagagi mekeat he, yogotak nebe narlue agagisik nen, nobabut yekerugi inobabut meke iti arat herehsasigi o.
46013012	Yogotak ya, inamukhak ileken weak werek korlek inileken lakhegarek hak, ninamukhak weak meke lakhekhe lago. Meke re, yabokane ebeat meke hutukhogon lakhagun o. Yogotakne, wene ato aperek anek ninilu welago. Mekeat he, yabokane at Allah nen an nebe hutukhogon ilu iti hak, an nen at Ebe hutukhogon nilu asigin o.
46013013	Motok dogogin he, ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagorek iti inom, hano asigin iluk ninakla arleken akhogorek iti inom, akhuni inebe ninakmurogon welagorek iti inom, wene ebe henagan etaat motok dogogin. Meke re, ebe kogat hakene re, akhuni inebe ninakmurogon dogosak itiat o.
46014001	Hinobabut akhuni inebe inakmu welageikharek iti meke hinobatnerogon yakulhe dogono. Yakulhe dogolik, Allah Agoreke nen inobabut tomok wogeisekherek wene iti iteerek asubageik nen, hinobatnerogon hagakhe dogono. Hagakhe dogolik, Allah ane pakhogon yogeisegarek meke iti meke wokhisoagaluk, kogotdino o.
46014002	Tha nen inane inokodek meke elalinat ekherek iti, Allah Agoreke akla dogolik wene limago meke ekherek iti nen, akhuni yogeisiliogo dek mekeat he, at Allah yogokhunem, akhuni aperek nen hutdegarek dek o.
46014003	Itithogonat meke re, at tha nen Allah ane akhuniat pakhogon yogeisugunem, inetaiken ago wakhik, inasuk wakhik, inetaiken thebelhik, hagakherek iti o.
46014004	Meke re, at inane inokodek meke elalinat ekherek meke iti, at ekaerek etaiken ago warekherek o. Meke re, at ageikhe Allah ane akhuni pakhogon yogeisekherek meke iti anek Allah a’buri natogokharek meke tha’bokhogonat inetaiken ago watdisekherek o.
46014005	Akhuni inane inokodek meke elalinat egarek iti ’bugurlagat erlok dek negen meke re, Allah ane akhuni pakhogon yogeisegarek iti anek, kok motok negen. Iti nen hit hinebe tha’bokhogonat akhuni inane hinokodek meke elalinat umo, an warlok mekeat he, ebe hano motok, hit nen Allah ane pakhogon yogeisekhe dogosak itiat warlok o. Meke re, inane hinokodek meke elalinat ugun halok he, yabokane Allah a’buri aperek inetaiken ago warinabuogoluk, hit hinane baga mothogon umo anek he, hano.
46014006	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An yabokane inane ninokodek meke elalinat yokhisa agei halok he, iti baga hanothinabusak nogo? Wene Allah akla meke pakhogon igidegat, wene nilu meke yokhisigidegat, Allah ane yokhisigidegat, wene hutukhogon yakulhisigidegat, halok he, hanothinabusak nogo?
46014007	Yi pikon ti pikon witabo inom gitar hakene meke inom, aborlok dek meke ane anegethasinem, ane ekherek mekeat, ane kut asokhotek tomok igidek halok he, “I, ane iti meke ekhe, ” iluk nikithogon hutdusak nogo. Erlok dek o.
46014008	Akhuni wim luogoluk amitmit egarek hak, pikon ageikhe ane kok ekherek meke iti, ane kut nil-hilhogon ekhe halok he, “Yogo, yogotak wim yabuogoluk higi, ” iluk hutukhogon hutdigidek tha nen obabut hibil-hebelhogo hagasusak nogo. Erlok dek o.
46014009	Iti hagat, hit nen inane hinokodek meke elalinat ekhe dogolik, hinape baga nen wene thekekhogon igidekma, wene iti nikithogon hutukhogon inilu asusak. Erlok dek o. Oka herleka yogokhe dogosak o.
46014010	Agat oba yi akhuni ti akhuni inane tomok doalegat werek apigi. Meke re, inane iti yugunat egarek ’buk. Thekekhogon isinem hutdusak anek o.
46014011	Itithogon mekeat he, it inane kut palekma an nokodek halok he, at ageikhe nen isinem, an nen nasuk nikithogon holusak. Nen, an nane isinem, nane kut palekma, at nen nane nikithogon asuk holusak. Erlok dek o.
46014012	Halok he, Allah Agoreke nen inobabut tomok wogeisekherek meke iti wokhisoagaluk hinakla warlokhogon hagakhe lagap mekeat he, Allah a'buri inetaiken ago watdisausak meke halok kokhogon wokhisoak nen, itiat kogotdino.
46014013	-
46014014	It aperek inane an nokodek meke baga elalinat sembayan ekhe dogolik, netaiken oba nen ekhe lagei mekeat, ebe hutdekhe lagei motok dek iti nen, at ageikhe nen it aperek inane okodek meke baga elalinat ekherek meke iti nen ekhe dogolik, “Allah nopase. Inane inokodek meke iti an nekaerek nane baga mothogon yogeisekhe dogeik nen, hat Hagoreke nen inobabut wogeisekherek etnogo meke ageikhe woknisuak o, ” iluk sembayan ekhe dogoak o.
46014015	Halok he, an nikithogon hagasik. Yigithogon hagasigin. Sembayan iti, Allah Agoreke nen yoknekhe korlek inane nokodek meke baga elalinat igik, ninekaerek ninane baga ninetaiken hutdiluk nen igik, igin o. Nen, etai iti Allah Agoreke nen yoknekhe korlek inane nokodek meke baga elalinat wakhik, ninekaerek ninane baga netaiken hutdiluk nen wakhik, hagasiginat o.
46014016	Iti hagat, hat ageikhe nen Allah Agoreke nen yokhekhe korlek inane hokodek meke elalinat ekhe dogolik, “Allah nopase, ” iluk heagei wasigin halok he, at ageikhe okodek meke nen hutdigidek dogolik, “Wene ekhe iti ebeat asuak, ” iluk u hak, “Amin, ” iluk usak nogo? Wene hat igin iti, at okodek nen, itithogon usak erlok dek iti o.
46014017	Halok he, hat nen itithogon Allah heagei hanorogo wasigin meke re, at iti etaiken ago watdigin nogo? Dek o.
46014018	Inane inokodek meke elalinat egarek iti, hit nen herlekha'bugat egethep. An anek he, doalegat egerek iluk, “Allah nopase, ” iluk heagei wakherek o.
46014019	Meke re, an Allah a'buri ninom natogorlek dogolik wene yakulisagaluk, inane nokodek meke elalinat doalekhogon 10. 000 hakeneigidek, hutdusak meke nane herlekha'bugat 5 baga a; hano iluk yogeisegerek.
46014020	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene hinakla ebekhe lagap iti, yekerugi inakla ebekharek hak ebekhe dogogup. Keritago meke nen weak hagakho inokodek welageikharek hak dogolik, hinetaiken inarlue inetaiken hakene horlerogon dogono.
46014021	At ninopase Allah Etagapogot nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene baga wene ageikhe men isikhemo holal waganek werek, “An nen akhuni yoma, wene it aperek inane kut palek meke inane baga yogeisigik, it aperek huso meke inape baga yogeisigik, igin o. Itithogon yogeisagein meke re, inasuk holugun dek o, ”\rq (Yesaya 28:11-12; Ulangan 28:49)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha.
46014022	Wene Allah Agoreke nen yogeisugunem inane inokodek meke baga elalinat egarek iti, akhuni inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiliogei meke iti hutduagaluk egarek 'buk. It aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke iti nen hutduagaluk itithogonat egarek o. Meke re, Allah Agoreke nen wogeisugunem, Allah ane pakhogon yogeisegarek iti, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke hasik 'buk. It inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiliogei meke nen hutduagaluk yogeisegarek o.
46014023	Hit Allah a'buri opakimo natogorlek dogolik, hinebe tha'bokhogonat nen inane hinokodek meke baga elalinat isinem, it wene inokodek meke inom, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke inom, hinoba ukitluk, it nen, “Yoma hunu-hunu ageikhasik iliogei o, ” iluk yokhisagun dek nogo? Yokhisagunat o.
46014024	Itithogon mekeat he, hit hinebe tha'bokhogonat nen, Allah ane pakhogon isinem, at ageikhe etaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke inom, wene okodek meke inom, hinoba ukitluk, at nen men usak, “Eiye. An weak hagakhima wene noba werek higi o, ” iluk akla apasinem,
46014025	at akla limago meke ’bualasigin. ’Bualagunem obabut isonhogo at ebe thoma iluk Allah hogorakhe dogolik, men igin, “Eberogonat Allah hinom welagap o, ” iluk yokhisagein o.
46014026	Halok he, nagarlak lak nerugi. Nikithogon hagakhe dogosak. Yigithogon hagakhe dogosak o. Hit hinebe natogotdiluk, at ageikhe nen Allah aetai isa igik, at ageikhe nen wene thekekhogon yakulhisigik, at ageikhe nen Allah akla wene yokhisigik, at ageikhe nen wene inane hinokodek meke baga elalinat isinem, at ageikhe nen hit hinane baga mothogon yokhisigik, hagakhe dogolik, Allah a’buri inetaiken ago warogo yi wene ti wene tha’bokhogonat erlogat itithogon ekhe dogosak o.
46014027	It aperek nen, inane inokodek meke baga elalinat uogoluk halok he, inebe pere a? Henagan a, umo hano. Pere nen pere dek. Meke re, eran-alep isinem, at ageikhe nen hit hinane baga mothogon yokhisekhe dogosak hano.
46014028	Meke re, at ageikhe hit hinane baga mothogon yokhisausak meke ebe dek halok he, it inane inokodek meke elalinat egarek meke iti, Allah a’buri natogorlek werekma etoma inane degat dogosak. Inane degat dogolik, inakla nen Allah at yogokhe dogoak o.
46014029	Nen, Allah ane yogeisegarek meke iti inebe pere nen a? Henagan nen a, yokhisausak. Itithogon yokhisekhe korlek, hit aperek nen, wene mot iliogo igik, korlo iliogo igik, obabut palhe dogosak o.
46014030	Itithogonat meke re, Allah nen at ageikhe hurek welaga meke wene akla kagalhe halok he, yokhisoak nen at alep yokhisekhe laga meke iti, ane dek huk asusak o.
46014031	Iti hagat hinebe tha’bokhogonat nen wene yakulogo hinilu ageik, hinetaiken kagouk igik, hagasuogoluk hinebe tha’bokhogonat opakitek opakitek eran-alep Allah ane pakhogon yogeisekhe dogosak o.
46014032	-
46014034	At Allah yugunat-yaganat hagakherek meke ’buk. At he, mothogon anek hagakherek iti nen, it ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke iti, wene yogeisekhe dogoagaluk at Agoreke nen inobabut wogeisekherek meke iti ite atluk dogolik, inekaerek nenat, “An yigithogon yogeisak, tigithogon yogeisak, ” iluk ekhe dogosak o. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, “Humi inane degat inapma dogosak, ” iluk isikhe iti nen, Allah a’buri o yi ai ti ai natogotdiluk welageikharek hak, hit hinebe natogorlek dogolik, humi inane degat dogosak o. Inaneak walhe dogosak dek o.
46014035	Meke re, it humi nen wene ageikhe yakuluogoluk halok he, Allah a’buri natogorlek werekma, inaneak walusak dek iti nen, inaila lalok inekaerek inaguni inoba hinok waganusak o.
46014036	Allah ane o yi ai ti ai liliogo iti erlo hit nogo? E a, at he, hit hasik anek hinoba yokhisa agoukha nogo a.
46014037	At ageikhe nen, “An nen Allah ane yokhisoagaluk, Allah Agoreke nen nobabut iti woknekhemo, ” igik, e a, at he, “Ninat meke hagasuagaluk woknekhemo, ” igik, ekhe halok, at nen, “Wene Paulus nen ekhe iti, ninoe Etagapogot nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke, holal waganogo ninoba la’i aga iti, ” iluk at hutdiluk waganuak o.
46014038	Meke re, wene iti waganhidek here’isekhe halok he, hit nen ap iti ebe waganhidek here’isekhe dogono.
46014039	Yogo. Nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah ane pakhogon yogeisekhe dogouogoluk kogotdiluk hinobatnerogo hagakhe dogono. Meke re, it aperek nen inane inokodek meke elalinat uogoluk ega halok he, wene palusak dek o.
46014040	Meke re, yi wene ti wene mothogon igik, hanorogo igik, ekhe dogono.
46015001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Yogotak an nen wene ageikhe hinakla ebethisak. An nen hano wene yokhisa agagimo, waganhigisip nen, hinetaiken hano wene iti baga horle agagisip welagap.
46015002	Hano wene yokhisa agagi wene itiat hiniki a'bethogon hago dogogun halok he, iti bagaat tilhinabiogo. Itithogon meke re, hit we yugunat alomarogo hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdisigisip welagap halok he, erlok dek o.
46015003	Wene alebageik an yakulnikhukhama, waganhigi mekeat hit yabokane yakulhisasigi iti, ebe men apigi. Nit weak hagakhe lagagu meke hasik, at Kristus niniki ukum oba wasugun iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha tak-tagat ebe wakhukha iti o.
46015004	Wakhukhama ebe warek oila ’bi lagoukha. ’Bi lagoukhama iki pere warek welageikhesik nen iki ageikhe baga Allah nen ilugutdisikhe. Ilugutdisikhe iti haganeat Allah ane holal waganogo ’bisukha tak-tagat ilugutdisikhe iti o.
46015005	Ilugutdisikhemo, at Kepas ileken hoagaluk elokhoma wisam ageikhe. Oporlik he, it inebe 12 emenogo inileken hoagaluk inelokhoma wisam ageikheat.
46015006	Yabokane it at oporlik neke lagoukha meke inebe 500 aperek inomat, opaki hasik inileken hoagaluk inelokhoma wisam ageikheat. It inileken hasukha meke iti, inebe doalek hak yogotak iniluk werek mekeat he, aperek pererlagat inebe watlagoukha.
46015007	Arat wisam atluk nen yabokane Yakobus ileken hoagaluk elokhoma wisam ageikheat. Yabokane, at nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inebe tha’bokhogonat nen inileken hoagaluk inelokhoma wisam ageikheat.
46015008	Itithogon inelokhoma wisam arik waga lageikhesik, yabokane ebe yabokane, an elege abanma itago meke hakene mekeat, nelokhoma wisam ageikhemo nileken hasigiat.
46015009	Nit Yesus nen ninayoko ’biluk la’inanhikhe meke aperek inetaga werek mekeat he, an anek he, netaga dek o. An nenAllah a'buri natogokharek meke yi aik ti aik hagarinakhe lagagi iti nen, an nen, “Nebe Yesus nen nayoko ’biluk la’ani ageikhe meke, ” iluk usak he, erlok dek o.
46015010	Itithogon usak erlok dek mekeat, Allah obabut hano nen nayoko ’bisikhemo yigithogon agagisik welagei o. Nayoko ’bisikhe iti we yugunat ’bisikhe dek iti nen, it aperek tha’bokhogonat yabu herlekha’bugat hakene waganhe korlek, an anek he, doalegat hakene waganhe lagei o. Meke re, itithogon waganhe lagei iti, an nen waganhe lagei ’buk. Allah obabut hano nen, nipisagat dogolik waganiogo o.
46015011	Yabu iti ebe an men, it aperek men, hano wene yogeisilik nekhe lago itiat o. Wene itiat yokhisugunem, hit nen eberogonat iluk waganhigip iti o.
46015012	At Kristus watlageikhesikmo nen, yabokane Allah nen ilugutdisikhe, iluk yokhisekhe lago mekeat he, hit aperek nen“Akhuni watlatlukmo nen Allah nen inilugurinabigin dek o, ” iluk ekhe lagap iti nenaluk.
46015013	Akhuni watlatlukmo Allah nen inilugurinabigin dek dogolepma, at Kristuswatlageikhesikmo nen ilugutdilep degat o.
46015014	At Kristus watlageikhesikmo Allah nen ilugutdilep dekma, nit nen wene we yugunat yogeisekhe dogolo. Nen, hit meneke, wene eberogonat iluk waganhigip iti, we yugunat waganilep o.
46015015	Nit nen Allah abok ekhe dogolik, “At nen Kristus ilugutdisikhemo ninileken hasugu, ” iluk yogeisogorek. Meke re, akhuni watlatlukmo Allah nen inilugurinabigin dek dogolepma, at Kristus ilugutdilep degat o. Nen, at ilugutdilep dekma, it aperek nen, “Hit nen ekhe dogolik, Allah nen itithogon hagakhikhemo ninileken hasugu, iluk ekhe lagap iti, hinekalat ekhe lagap, ” iluk morat yokniselep o.
46015016	Akhuni watlatlukmo Allah nen inilugurinabigin dek dogolepma, at Kristus ebe ilugutdilep degat o.
46015017	At Kristus Allah nen ilugutdilep dekma, hit nen, “Wene iti eberogonat, iluk waganhigip iti, we yugunat waganilepma, hit weak hagakhe lagagip meke iti, wene hinoba dogolep o.
46015018	Iti hak, it aperek Kristus inom hunik dogolik watlagoukha meke iti nuk atlebat o.
46015019	Nit nen, “Hanotninabigin, ” iluk ninetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisugusik ninakla arleken akhekhe lago iti. Meke re, yogotak ya niniluk dogolik anek itithogon apekhe dogoluk nen, yabokane ninilugutninabigin dek dogolepma, it akhuni aperek nen, “Eiye. Nakmu lak o, ” iluk it aperek yogeisigidek nirat yoknisekhe dogolep o.
