46015020	Itithogon mekeat, at Kristus watlageikhesikmo, Allah nen eberogonat ilugutdisikhemo werek o. Itithogon ilugutdisikhe iti, hipiri ebekeram yukuk meke tak itakharek iti hak, it watlagoukha meke, at Kristus tak ilugutdisikhe iti o.
46015021	At ap ageikhe nen watlariogei erlo yakulhikhe iti hak, at ap ageikhe nen iniluk ariogei meke erlo yakulhikhe iti.
46015022	At Adam ninom hunik dogolik, ninebe tha'bokhogonat watlagorek iti hak, nit Kristus ninom hunik werekma, Allah nen ninebe tha’bokhogonat ninilugutninabiginat o.
46015023	Itithogon mekeat he, Allah nen ninobolukmo tomok mot-mot ninilugutninabigin. Hipiri ebekeram yukuk meke tak itakharek hak, at Kristus tak ilugutdisikhemo nogo nen, at ebe wisigin itinem, nit Kristus agarumi meke ninilugutninabigin o.
46015024	Ninilugutninabiluk nen, o ilugun hurli baga arat hagatlasigin. Itinem at Kristus nen inebe kok welageikharek iti inom, iteerek welageikharek iti inom, inobatneak welageikharek iti inom, motogat degetdisalok, yi meke ti meke, at apma werek meke tha’bokhogonat ninopase Allah apma dogoagaluk iki baga ’bigin o.
46015025	Itithogon ’bigin iti, at Allah nen Kristus athili meke tha’bokhogonat isok nen al debelogo ’bisoak nen iluk apma ’bisa isigin iti aban werek korlek, at Kristus ebe kogat motok dogogin.
46015026	Athili meke ebe yabokane isok nen al debelogo degetdigin iti, ebe, watlageikharek erlo itiat o.
46015027	Allah ane holal yigithogon waganek werek, “Yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat, at apma arat ’bisa aga o, ”\rq (Mazmur 8:6-7)\rq* iluk isukhama holal waganek werek. “Tha’bokhogonat apma ’bisa aga o, ” iluk isukhama werek meke re, at Allah nen ’bisa aga werek ekaerek ebe Kristus apma ukigidek, iluk ekagat werek o.
46015028	Yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat Allah nen a’but apma ’bisa agunem, at Kok Allah arligat etaga kok dogolik yi ai ti ai apma dogoagaluk, at a’but ekaerek nen, “Nopase. Hat nen yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat an napma arat ’banhen iti, an yogotak hat hapma thebe iluk dogogin o, ” iluk yogosigin.
46015029	Wene ageikhe, it akhuni watlagoukha meke yabokane inilugurinabigin motok dek dogolepma, it inobasik it aperek ima usageinabiogei iti, nikithogon hagariogei apegep. Nenaluk ima usageinakhe dogosak.
46015030	Nen, nit meneke, dikene hibakone yukmoke motok nekhe lago iti, nenaluk nekhe dogosak apegep. Itithogon nekhe dogosak degat o.
46015031	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinetaiken ninoe Etagapogot Kristus Yesus oba hakotdiluk ninom hunik welago iti nen, an hit hinobasik hogorakhekhe dogolik men yokhisak. An hibiku-yogoku nebe nasuogoluk hagakhe korlek nobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagei o.
46015032	An o Efesus yoma dogolik, akhuni warn helo obabut weak meke inom yakharek hak ninom yakhe lagosik iti, akhuni agat oba meke hasik yakharek hak yabilema, nena meke thaburele apegep. Akhuni watlagoukha meke inilugurinabigin dek dogolepma, it aperek nen isukha hak, men ilo, “Nit o huben ninebe watlasugunmo, yogotak ya elanma hasik niniluk dogolik, hipiri inom, warn inom, eken apusu inom, ninakla arleken akhekhe dogolik dirlu elanma neke dogouok, ”\rq (Yesaya 22:13)\rq* iluk isukha hagat ilo o.
46015033	Akhuni nen ekhe dogolik, ‘Tt aperek inobabut weak meke hinom hunisugun halok he, hit hinobabut hano meke weak asigin o, ” iluk egarek iti eberogonat iluk hinekaerek nen hinebe dalugup o.
46015034	Weak hagakhe lagap meke iti here’isalok, yogotak hinobabut hebelatni o. Hit aperek Allah ebe hinokodek welagap iti nen, hinekarli wasigiluk yokhisigi iti o.
46015035	Itithogon mekeat he, hat ageikhe nen wene hinok wokneekhe dogolik, “Akhuni watlagoukha meke iti Allah nen nikithogon inilugurinabigin. Inilugurinabiluk nen, inebe nikirlik meke inilugurinabigin, ” iluk egen iti,
46015036	hetaiken dek nen egen o. Yi meke ti meke ai hilogo agat oba la’egetek meke iti, akhuni watlageikharek hak, ai iti oado hirli ageidek halok he, ebe aku dukhusak erlok dek o.
46015037	Ai hilogo agat oba la’egetek iti, ebe yabokane aku dukhiluk hagatlasigin meke la’egetek 'buk. Gandum eken a? At he, yi meke ti meke eken a, eken anek hilogo la’egetek.
46015038	Hilogo la’isinem, at Allah akla apalok nenat ebe agouwak hagakherek. Yi meke ai, ti meke ai ebe asokhotek tomok agouwak hagakheregat.
46015039	Yi meke ti meke iluk meke tha’bokhogonat ebe opakiat meke ’buk. Akhuni ninebe ninat, warn ebe ninat, thue ebe ninat, ikan ebe ninat.
46015040	Nen, yi meke ti meke pogot oba meke weregat, agat oba meke weregat. Meke re, pogot oba meke iti elokhoken tomok hano iluk egarek iti ninat. Nen, agat oba meke elokhoken tomok hano iluk egarek iti ninat o.
46015041	Mo hano yakherek iti ninat, thut hano yakherek iti ninat, husagal hano yakherek iti ninat. Itithogon mekeat, husagal iti ebe tomok asokhotek tomogat yibakherek o.
46015042	Iti hak, Allah nen akhuni warek meke itithogonat inilugurinabigin o. Ninebe warek hirli agorek meke iti, ai agat oba hilogo la’egarek hak, agatma thaldinanilukmo yabokane ninebe hirli asigin dek meke ninilugutninabigin o.
46015043	Ninebe warek ninobatne dek ina'it hegarek meke iti, agatma thaldinanilukmo yabokane ninebe ninobatne werek hogotninabusak meke ninilugutninabigin o.
46015044	Ninebe watlagunem ninaburlal agat mekeat agatma thaldinakharek. Meke re, yabokane Allah Agoreke nen ninebe niniluk motok dogogun meke ninilugutninabigin o. Ninaburlal meke welago yi, Allah Agoreke nen ninilugutninakhunem ninebe mekeat dogogun o.
46015045	Wene itithogon iluk, Allah ane holal waganhe dogolik, “Ap Adam alebageik meke iti, ebe iluk meke winametdisikhe, ”\rq (Kejadian 2:7)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha. Mekeat he, ap Adam yabokane meke iti, Agoreke nen inilugurinakherek meke wageikhe.
46015046	Allah nen, ap ebekeram winametdisikhe iti, at yabokane ageikhe meke iti Agoreke nen ninilugutninabigin iti meke winametdisikhe ’buk. Ninaburlal agat meke tak winametdisikhesikmo nen, Agoreke nen ninilugutninabigin iti yabokane wageikhe.
46015047	Allah nen ebekeram ap Adam iti ebe agat abubuleke meke baga winametdisikhesikmo, obabut agat mekeat o. Meke re, ap Adam yabokane meke iti pogot oba nenat wageikhe.
46015048	It akhuni aperek inebe agat oba meke ageikha meke inebe, at Allah nen ebekeram Adam ebe agat abubuleke meke baga winametdisikhe meke iti hakeneat werek o. Meke re, it aperek inebe pogot oba meke ageikha meke inebe, at yabokane pogot oba nen wageikhe meke iti hakeneat werek o.
46015049	Nit yogotak at Allah nen Adam ebe agat abubuleke meke baga winametdisikhe meke iti ninom tak-tak welago hak, yabokane at pogot oba meke iti ninom tak-tagat dogogun o.
46015050	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene yi yokhisak. Ninebe ninaburlal watlagorek meke yi inom, Allah apma ’binaniginmo etoma iteerek asugun motok dek o. Nen, ninebe hirli agorek meke yi inom yabokane ninebe ikhok motok dogogun meke iteerek asugun motok degat o.
46015051	Meke re, wene Allah akla meke yi yokhisak. Nit ninebe tha'bokhogonat watlasugun dek mekeat he, ninebe tomok ninat hagatninabigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi.
46015052	Opaki hasik, inilaga dapok iluk ’bekelageikharek hak, pikon ane o ilugun kobokhogon hukhagein o. Itithogon hukhasinem, akhuni watlagoukha meke inebe hirli ageidek ikhok motok dogogin meke agouwak hagarogo inilugurinabiluk nen, nit tha’bokhogonat ninebe ninat hagatninabigin o.
46015053	Ninebe hirli agorek meke yi, hirli asugun dek meke su ikharek hak ikhik, ninebe watlagorek meke yi, watlasugun dek meke ikhik, hagasugun o.
46015054	Ninebe hirli agorek meke yi hirli asigin dek meke ikhik, nen watlagorek meke yi, watlasugun dek meke ikhik, hagasugun. Itithogon isugun iti baga, wene men iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha meke iti ebeat asigin, “Yi meke ti meke haumhogon nekarek hak, at Allah obatne atluk nen, watlageikharek erlo iti, degetdisagein o. ”\rq (Yesaya 25:8)\rq*
46015055	Itithogon degetdisalok, ane sagun yogokhe dogolik, “Watlageikharek meke erlo yi, hobatne ki. Haik nen li’bilinakhe lagan etnogo haik anini ki, ”\rq (Hosea 13:14)\rq* iluk isikhemo wene holal waganogo ’bisukha meke iti ebeat asigin o.
46015056	Watlageikharek meke erlo aik nen li’bilninakherek iti ebe, nit weak hagakhorek iti baga aik nen li’bilninakhunem watlagorek itiat o. Nen, weak hagakhorek meke obatne ageikhe iti ebe, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe iti baga obatne ageikhe o.
46015057	Meke re, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe iti baga, Allah nen ninobatnetninakhunem ninobatne agorek iluk, ninopase Allah heagei wakhe dogouok o.
46015058	Iti nenat, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak. Hinetaiken horlerogon, hapukhogon dogono. Ninoe Etagapogot ninom hunik dogolik, at hasik yi meke ti meke hagakhunem alomatlasigin dek o, iluk kokhogon hagakho motok dogono o.
46016001	Yogotak hit nen uang natogorlogo hinagarlak lak hinerugi Allah a'buri aperek 'bisauwogoluk egep iti, wene it Allah a'buri o Galatia meke yakulisigi iti hagat hagatno o.
46016002	An nebe wagunem nen natogosusak dek o. Ya bagaat hari Minggu baga hibiku-yogoku hagakhe dogolik, hinebe tomok hinikimo aga halok, natogorlogo 'bisalok herogo dogono o.
46016003	'Bisalok nen, ap wolok lugun meke hit nen, “It erlok, ” iluk apegep meke halok inayoko 'bino. Itithogon inayoko 'biluk werekma, an nebe witluk nen, hit nen 'bisegep meke iti wolok loak nen, surat holal o Yerusalem la'isagein o.
46016004	Meke re, an nebe lausak hano ago halok he, an ninomat lugun o.
46016005	An o Makedonia ligin iluk nakla apigirikmo, etoma lalok ya haklageik arat lagei halok nen, hit hinoba wisigin o.
46016006	Hinoba witluk nen, an hit ninom niki herlekha'bugat dogoluk nen a? O weak werek korlek niki ageikhe inomat dogoluk nen a, hit nen o an ligin apigima etoma la'anubageik nen iluk yokhisigi o.
46016007	An itithogon o werlekmake lagaluk laga dogolik niki opaki hasik ninom dogosak na'it. Ninoe Etagapogot nen hano ekhe halok he, an niki pererlagat ageikhe inom ninom dogogun o, iluk nakla apekhe lagei.
46016008	-
46016009	Wisik nen, o Efesus yoma akhuni, “Wene nina’it, ” iluk wene paliogei meke inebe doalegat werek meke re, an nen it aperek yogeisugunem wene waganusak meke doalegat werek iti nen, yoma dogoluk Hari Pentakosta arat hagatdiluk nen wisigin o.
46016010	At Timotius etnogo, an nen ninoe Etagapogot hasik hagakhe lagei hak hagariogo meke hit hinoba wisigin iti, ebe waga halok he, hit hinom ayuk dekhogon dogoak nen he, ebe hanorogo waganino o.
46016011	At wagunem it akhuni aperek nen, “At ebe erlok dek, ” iluk inakla erlok degetdusak motok dek o. At apuke noba waga dogolik, ninagarlak lak ninerugi aperek emenogo inom ’bitneasuagaluk therisik welagei iti nen, at holak oba hanorogo yomakhekhe dogono o.
46016012	Ninagarlak Apolos etnogo nen, it ninagarlak lak aperek emenogo wogosik hinoba wisuagaluk, eran-alep akla kagalhe lagei mekeat he, at yogotak ya wisusak iluk akla apiliogo dek o. Meke re, yabokane wisusak apekhe halok wisiginat o.
46016013	Hinobabut hebelogo dogolik, hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, metegat dogono o. Hinobabut abat dogolik, hinobatnerogo dogono o.
46016014	Hit yi meke ti meke hagasuogoluk, akhuni inebe hinakmurogon hagakhe dogono o.
46016015	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ageikhe yi hinakla kagalik. At Stefanus a’buri inom emenogo inebe hinilu o. O propinsi Akhaya etoma it tak Allah a’buri agoukhasik nen, it Allah a’buri aperek yomageisekhe dogouogoluk inetaiken oba nenat isukhasik nen yomageisiliogei iti o.
46016016	It inobabut hakene halok he, it aperek it inom inobatnerogon hagakho halok he, tha'bokhogonat inapma ukiluk inane holek dogono o.
46016017	Stefanus inom, Fortunatus inom, Akhaikus inom, noba wageikhasik, hit nen an hasik hagakhe dogou hak, it nen hano hagariogei iti nen, nakla arleken akhekhe lagei o.
46016018	It wageikhama, an nakla hano aga hak, hit hinakla hano asigin o. Halok he, it akhuni aperek inobabut it hakene meke halok he, inalonhogo halhe dogono.
46016019	Allah a’buri o propinsi Asia etoma ya ta natogorliogei meke yoma nen hit heagei wathinakha o. Ap Akwila age Priskila ipisak, nen, Allah a’buri it inaila natogorliogei meke inomat nen, ninoe Etagapogot inom hunik dogolik heagei motok doalegat wathinakha o.
46016020	Nen, ninagarlak ninerugi o yoma meke tha’bokhogonat nen heagei wathinakhaat o. “Nit tha’bokhogonat ninebe Allah a’buri, ” iluk nen, hit-hit heagei hinape tharluk wat-wat ilik lano.
46016021	An Paulus nekaerek niki nen holal waganogo heagei wathinakhi iti.
46016022	At ageikhe nen, ninoe Etagapogot akmu dek halok he, Allah nen at iti ebe homan ’buak o. Meke re, ninoe Etagapogot ibat eme o, u hak, Marariata, iluk igi iti o.
46016023	Ninoe Etagapogot Kristus obabut hano etnogo nen thethisik motok dogoak o.
46016024	Kristus Yesus ninom hunik dogolik, hinebe tha’bokhogonat nakmu iluk heagei wathinakhi iti o.
47001001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An Paulus Allah akla apasikhe baga, Yesus Kristus nen nayoko 'biluk la’ani ageikhe meke etnogo, ninagarlak Timotius etnogo nipisak nen hit Allah a’buri o Korintus natogokhethep meke inom, o propinsi Akhaya etoma ya ta welagathep meke tha’bokhogonat inom, wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago iti o.
47001002	Ninopase Allah ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen, hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinageigik, hagakhe dogoak o.
47001003	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus opase Allah iti hogorakhe dogouok o. At ninopase Allah obabut hanoma, a’buri yi meke ti meke hasik inakla weak werekma akmurinabiluk inetaiken thebelinakherek.
47001004	Akhuni aperek yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik inakla weak werekma, nit nen it inakla hano asuak nen iluk inetaiken thebeluagaluk, at Allah nen nit itithogon yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik ninakla weak agunem, ninetaiken thebeliogo.
47001005	At Kristus yi aik ti aik hilik-hilik yabokane ebeluk kogat hasikhe iti hak, nit itithogonat hekhe lagoat o. Itithogon hasinem at Kristus nen nit ninakla hano atluk yabokane ebelugat hano asuagaluk ninetaiken thebelho motok welagarek.
47001006	Nit yi aik ti aik hekhe lago iti baga, Allah nen hit hinakla hano asuagaluk hinetaiken thebelhik, hinebe tilhinakhik, hagasiginat o. Nen, nit yi aik ti aik hasinem Allah nen ninetaiken thebelherek iti baga, hit itithogonat yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik hinetaiken thebekhogon hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogun halok, Allah nen hinakla hano asuagaluk hinetaiken thebeliginat o.
47001007	Yi aik ti aik ninom tak-tagat hogorek iti hak, ninakla hano asuagaluk Allah nen ninom tak-tagat ninetaiken thebeligin o, iluk nilu iti nen, hit hano asugun, iluk ninetaiken sikiphogon welago.
47001008	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit o propinsi Asia eloma nen yi aik ti aik hagatninakhe lagoukha iti hinokodek dogosak na'it nen yokhisak. Itithogon hagatninakhe dogolik, akin motok weak nit nen hagasusak erlok dek meke ninoba ’bisukhama, “Nit niniluk dogogun dek higi, ” iluk ninetaiken weak ageikhe.
47001009	Inebe motok inasuogoluk inabok palhunem, “Nit arat watlasugun higi, ” iluk apegarek hak hagatlageikhe iti. Itithogon hagatlagunem, ninetaiken ninekaerek ninoba hakotdiluk welageidek, meke re, at Allah nen akhuni watlatlukmo inilugurinakherek meke etnogo oba hakotdiluk dogoagaluk itithogon hagatlageikhe iti.
47001010	-
47001011	Nit ninebe motogat ninasugun, iluk apasugusikmo nen, at Allah nenat tilninakhikhesik, yabokane tilninabiginat o. Nit ninobasik hit ninomat sembayan ekhe lago etnogo baga, yabokane tilninakhe dogoginat o, iluk, ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welago. Hit nen, nit ninobasik sembayan isi motok dogogun iti baga, at Allah obabut hano nen nit tilninakhunem, it akhuni aperek doalegat nen inileken nisilik Allah heagei wasugunat o.
47001012	Nit hogorakhekhe lago iti, ebe yigithogon nen. Nit it akhuni agat oba meke aperek inaklake inaklake dogolik, it inobasik hagakhe lago, herlekha'bugat negen. Meke re, hit hinobasik anek kokhogon hagakhe lago. Iti akhuni agat oba meke inakla kagalek meke hagakharek hak hagakhidek. At Allah obabut hano etnogo nen, ninetaiken hano opakiat dogolik hagakhe dogoagaluk ninobabut woknisasikhemo hagakhorek meke iti ninakla ebekhe dogolik, “Nit hano hagakhe lagoma, ” iluk hogorakhekhe lago iti o.
47001013	-
47001014	An nen, wene hit nen etaga erlok thalhik, hutdigik, hagasusak meke anek holal waganogo hinoba la'i agarek o. Alebageik he, an nen la’i agagi meke iti herlekha’bugat anek hutdisigip. Meke re, yabokane anek he, tha’bokhogonat hutdugun apekhe lagei. Itithogon hutdiluk nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus wisigin itinem, nit nen, hit hinobasik ninakla arleken akhagun iti hak, hit nen he, nit ninobasik hinakla arleken akhagunat o.
47001015	-
47001016	Itithogon hutdugunat o, iluk apigi iti nen, hit hinakla arleken hiniki pere baga akhobageik nen iluk, an alebageik nen o Makedonia yoma waga dogolik hit hinoba haklarik witluk nen, yabokane napuke laga dogolik hinoba haklarigat, o Yudea lagaluk lagunem, hit nen yomakneobageik iluk apasigi.
47001017	Itithogonat wisigiluk apasigi mekeat he, yabokane huk agagi iti, nane pere nen apegep? An nakla nen, “Itithogon hagasigin, ” iluk wene munini ebekhe dogolik, nekaerek nakla warlok nen, “I o, ” iluk obatnerogon iluk nen, yabokane, “Dek o, ” iluk egerek apegep?
47001018	Dek o. At Allah ane eberogonat anek yoknisekherek iti hak, nit nen, “I o, ” iluk nen, “Dek o, ” igik, yokhisogorek dek.
47001019	At Allah a'butYesus Kristus, an nebe nen yakulhisigik, Silas nen yakulhisigik, Timotius nen yakulhisigik, hagakhugu meke iti, obabut he, “I o, ” iluk nen, “Dek o, ” iluk ekherek dek. Allah nen, “I o. Wokhisagein, ” iluk abok yoknisau hak, Yesus ebewoknisasikhemo werek iti.
47001020	At Allah nen yi meke ti meke abok yoknisasikhe iti tha’bokhogonat, “I o, wokhisagein, ” iluk u hak, Yesus ebe woknisasikhemo werek iti nen, nit at ninom hunik dogolik Allah hogorakhe dogolik, “Ebeat asuak, ” iluk u hak, “Amin, ” iluk ekhe lago iti.
47001021	-
47001022	At Allah nenat, hit inom, nit inom, Kristus oba hipikhogon ’binanhemo welago. Ninebe at ekaerek hasik hagakhe dogoagaluk ninayoko ’bigik, sirlo negen ’binanhik, hagakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke yabokane kokhogon nuogoluk, ebekeram hipiri yukuk meke nekarek hak, Allah nen nit ninobasik tha’bokhogonat ’binanhikhe meke yabokane woknisagaluk, alebageik Agoreke tak ninetaikenma ’binanhikhemo welago.
47001023	An o Korintus hinoba wageidek huk agagi iti, hit hinakla weak asunogo iluk huk agagi meke iti, at Allah nen nakla ileken neekherek meke nen ilu o.
47001024	Hit hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdisigip meke iti, eberogonat iluk hinetaiken hapukhogon welagap iti nen, nit nen, “Hinetaiken iti meke oba hakotdusak, ” iluk ninane obatnerogon yokhisagun dek o. At he, hit hinakla arleken akhobageik iluk yomakhisekhe lago iti.
47002001	Iti nen he, an hit hinoba witluk, hinaklaweagatdusak werek halok, huk asigin iluk, nakla arat apigi o.
47002002	An nen hit hinakla weagathinabumo, hit hinakla weak werek korlek, an nakla yabokane tha nenhanotnabusak? Erlok dek iti o.
47002003	Hit nenat an nakla hanotnabusak iti. Hit an nakla hanotnabumo an nakla arleken akhigi halok he, hit tha'bokhogonat hinakla arleken akhausagat apekhe lagei. Iti nen, an hit hinoba wagunem hit nen an nakla weagatnabinogo iluk, hinoba wisu na’it nen, wene arat holal waganogo hinoba la’i agagi iti o.
47002004	Wene holal waganogo alebageik la’i agagi iti, nakla weagat, netaiken akinatma, de kogat aga dogolik la’i agagi o. Hinakla weak asuagaluk la’i agagi ’buk. Dek o. An hit nakmu motok welagei iti hinilu asuagaluk hinoba la’i agagi iti.
47002005	-
47002006	Ap ageikhe etnogo nen ninakla weagatdisikhe iti, an anek nakla weagatdisikhe ’buk. Iti hit tha’bokhogonat hinakla weagatdisikhe usak mekeat he, ap inobabut itigirlik meke halok, hinebe doalegat nen ap iti asuk warogo ukum oba ’bisigip iti arat. Halok he, an yabokane nane obatnerogon ukum oba ’busak he, na’it.
47002007	Yabokane, at weak hagakhikhe meke iti, akla motok weak atluk, ebe weak asinogo iluk, akla hano asuagaluk weak hagakhikhe meke hit nen thagalogo here’isalok, etaiken thebelino.
47002008	At ap iti ebe hinakmurogo apuke waganubageik nen iluk, hinasuk warogo yokhisigi iti.
47002009	An nen, “Hit itithogon hagatno, ” iluk, yakulhisasigi etnogo, nane hologo hagariogei a? Dek a, iluk hinobabut paligiluk wene iti holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei iti o.
47002010	-
47002011	At nen hit weagathinakhe meke iti, hit nen thagalogo here’isegep halok he, an nen thagalogo here’isageinat o. An nen thagalogo here’isausak meke werek halok he, at Iblis, obabut kauk hagakherek ninilu iti nen, erlok degetdinaninogo iluk, hit hinobasik at Kristus il obaat thagalogo here’isagein o.
47002012	An o Troas etoma wagagi hak, hano wene Kristus hagakhikhe etnogo wene, akhuni etoma meke hano asuak nen iluk wene yogeisoagaluk ninoe Etagapogot nen holak yaknikhikhemo yogeisekho welagagi.
47002013	Meke re, nagarlak Titus etnogo nipisak abuk ageidek nen he, nelabut hisik welagagisik nen, akhuni etoma meke heagei warinabiluk nen o Makedonia wagagi.
47002014	Itithogon mekeat he, at Kristus obatne ageikhesik elokhe waganhe korlek nukhunem, nit at ninom hunik meke Allah nen Kristus oporlik woknisik nekherek, iluk hogorasuok o. Itithogon woknisik nekhe dogolik, obasi hano meke thak-pakhogon lagarek hak, at Kristus hagakhikhe wene etnogo nit nen wialogo o yi ai ti ai wolok loagaluk woknisik nekherek.
47002015	-
47002016	Iti, at Kristus nen, obasi hano meke Allah hasik hetu hunisu hak, nit ninebe Allah wogokherek iti. Wogokhunem, it akhuni alomatlariogei meke nen, “Obasi weak. Akhuni inebe inakharek meke obasi hakene, ” palharek. Meke re, it akhuni tilinabiogo meke nen, “Obasi hano, inebe inilugurinakherek meke hakene, ” palharek. Itithogon palharek iti nen, wene iti tha hak nen erlok wolok lausak apegep.
47002017	It akhuni aperek inebe doalegat nen, yi meke ti meke oko hau wolok lageikharek hak, Allah ane itithogonat wolok lageikharek. Meke re, nit anek he, itithogon dek. Allah nen, at ane wolok loagaluk ninayoko 'bisikhe iti nen, at il obaat ninetaiken opakiat Kristus ninom hunigat dogolik, yogeisilik laga lago o.
47003001	Itithogon igi iti, nit ninekaerek nen yabokane ninakeke’bakhekhe lago nogo a? Motok dek o. E a, at he, it akhuni aperek nen hagakharek iti hak, nit wokninabuagaluk surat hit wokhisigik, it aperek nen wokninabuagaluk surat hit nen wogeisigik, hagakhe lago a? Dek o.
47003002	Nit wokninabuagaluk, hit hinebeat holal hakene waganek nit ninetaikenma werekma, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen etaga thalhik, hutdinanhik, hagasusak werek o.
47003003	Hit hinebe, wene Kristus nen holal waganogo ’bisikhemo nit nen la’isugu meke hakene welagap o. Holal iti, disu apusu baga waganhidek mekeat he, Allah iluk motok welagarek etnogo Agoreke baga waganhikhe o. Nen, helekit thabia meke baga waganhidegat. Akhuni inetaiken obaat waganhikhe o.
47003004	At Kristus nen nit ninetaiken wene munini uan ’bero ebekhidegat, Allah oba hakotdiluk dogoagaluk hagatninakhikhe iti nen, wene itithogon igi o.
47003005	Nit ninekaerek ninobatne baga yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok, iluk, ninakla apekhe lago dek o. At Allah nenat ninobatnetninakhikhemo hagasusak erlogat welago.
47003006	Allah nen wene ket wene nit ninoba watnisasikhe iti, nit nen wolok loagaluk, at nenat ninobatnetninakhikhemo erlok wolok lausak welago. Wene alep inasuk wakhikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha meke tak-tagat hagakhidek halok, iti baga inebe inakherek. Meke re, Allah Agoreke nen inilugurinakherek iti nen, nit wene alep holal waganek meke wolok lageidek, at Agoreke nen yoknisiliogo meke wolok laga lago iti.
47003007	-
47003008	Allah nen wene helekit oba holal waganhikhe iti here’isogorek iti baga wene ninoba ’bakhalok ninebe watlagorek o. Meke re, ebekeram wene iti wogeisugunem, hogorakhukha. Helekit iti at Musa nen wolok usa’agunem, at elokhoken a'bi'bal weak meke dek aga korlegat, it akhuni Israel meke inileken lakhau sirluk-pabuk isikhe. Wene holal waganek iti wogeisugunem, hogorakhukha iti hak, at Allah Agoreke woknisugunem, ebeluk kogat hogorasusak o.
47003009	Wene holal waganek iti tak-tagat hagakhidek oba nen wene ninoba ’bakhasugu iti. Meke re, wene iti wogeisugunem hogorakhukha mekeat he, iti herlekha’bugat o. At Yesus nen wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok nen Allah baga ninapuke hunogo ’binanhikhe iti wene woknisasikhe iti hasik anek, ebeluk motok kogat hogorasusak o.
47003010	Wene yabokane meke motok kogat hogorasusak iti nen, alep meke hogorakhukha iti hak, yabokane hogorasusak dek aga o.
47003011	Wene alep meke iti dek asigin werek korlegat, hogorakhukha halok he, motok dogogin meke iti ebeluk motok kogat hogorasusak o.
47003012	Yabokane itithogonat hano asigin iluk, ninakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, wene etnogo ninayuk motok degat yogeisekhe lago o.
47003013	Nit he, at Musa elokhoken a’bi’bal weak etnogo motok dek asigiluk dek aga korlegat he, it akhuni Israel meke nen inileken neaunogo iluk, elokhoken su baga labekhikhe iti hak, nit itithogon hagasusak dek o.
47003014	Meke re, it iti inetaiken abiretdisikhemo welagoukha. Yogotak meneke Allah nen, “Itithogon hagathinabigin, ” iluk wene inom wakhukha meke holal waganek meke iti, it nen etaga thalhunem, inetaiken kagalasusak dek abisake ageikhesik sapumeke laberek werek. Itithogon laberek meke iti, at Kristus inom hunekhunem anek he, inetaiken sapumeke laberek meke iti erlok ’bukalagarek iti.
47003015	Yogotak meneke wene at Musa nen holal waganhikhe meke iti, it nen etaga thalhunem, inetaiken kagalasusak dek sapumeke laberegat werek.
47003016	Itithogon mekeat, akhuni it meke aperek inetaiken ninoe Etagapogot oba hebenokhogon la’isinem, inetaiken sapumeke laberek meke iti wokhekherek.
47003017	“Ninoe Etagapogot, ” iluk igi iti, Allah Agoreke hasigat o. Akhuni ninoe Etagapogot Agoreke inakla werekma, herle hialek inasokne welageikharek iti.
47003018	Inileken inamukhak oba it akhuni aperek inebe ekagat lageisegarek iti hak, nit tha'bokhogonat ninelokhoken sapumeke laberek dekma, akhuni nen ninoe Etagapogot hogorakharek meke iti amukhak negen inileken laknisiliogei. Nit ninebe at ninoe hakene asuagaluk, eran-alep hagatninakho motok werekma, hogotninabusak negen aga lago. At Allah Agoreke iti ebe Etagapogot atma, at nenat hagatninabiogo.
47004001	At Allah ninebe akmu nen, at hasik yigithogon hagakhe dogoagaluk ninayoko ’bisikhe iti nen, ninakla puk atluk here’isigidek hagakhoat welago.
47004002	Nit he, akhuni nen yi meke ti meke limago weak hagakharethek inekarli agarek iti meke here’isasugu. Itithogon here’isalok, akhuni nukhetdisigik, Allah ane wene ageikhe meke oba lapelogo yogeisigik, hagakhorek dek. Akhuni yoma inakla tomok nen hutdinoagaluk, wene ebe wene Allah iloba thelekmaat yogeisilik nekhe lago.
47004003	Hano wene yogeisilik nekhe lago iti, akhuni aperek nen hutdiliogei mekeat he, it akhuni nuk ariogei meke anek he, wene iti hasik inetaiken amukhak laberek werek o.
47004004	Itithogon werek iti, it akhuni agat oba meke inopase Iblis etnogo nen inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke iti, inetaiken mumerinakhikhemo werek o. At Kristus Allah hakene atma, ebe hogorakharek wene, hano wene iti nen liarinabusak mekeat he, liarinabinogo iluk, inetaiken mumerinakhikhemo werek iti o.
47004005	Wene yogeisilik nekhe lago iti, ninekaerek hagakhorek wene ’buk. Dek o. At Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe mekeat o. At Yesus ebe ninoe Etagapogot iluk, nit at hasik hit hinatuaneke welago, iluk yogeisogorek iti.
47004006	At Allah nen ekhe dogolik, “O mum iti akla nen lia atnek, ”\rq (Kejadian 1:3)\rq* iluk isikhe iti hak, at nenat nit ninakla mum meke iti liatninakhikhemo welago. Itithogon dogolik, at Kristus elokhoken a'bi’bal yakhunem ninileken lakhalok nen, at Allah hogorakharek meke etnogo ebe itigirlik iluk hutdekhe dogoagaluk itithogon liatninakhikhe.
47004007	Nit wene yigithogon yogeisilik nukhunem, akhuni inileken nisekhe dogolik, inakla nen, “It inobatne dek. At Allah obatne werek higi, ” iluk ekagat hutdekhe dogoagaluk, isoak agat meke hagarogo henakharek hak, hano meke iti nit erlok dek meke ninakla 'binanhemo werek o.
47004008	Akhuni nen yi aik ti aik hagatninabiogei meke, ninebe motok weagatninakhidek welago. Itithogon hagatninakhunem, nikithogon hagasu he, ninobakha palariogo meke re, ninakla puk ariogo dek.
47004009	It akhuni aperek nen, weagatninabuogoluk hagariogei meke re, at Allah nen ninarligat here’inanhidek o. Tugi ninakhunem thogoumhogo laga lago meke re, ninebe motok watlaga lago dek o.
47004010	Itithogon watlageidek welago iti baga, at Yesus ebe watlageikhesik iluk ageikhesik nen, nit ninakla iluk welagarek iti, ekagat asuagaluk, at wakhukha hak, nit hibiku-yogoku ninasuogoluk hagakhunem tilninakherek iti.
47004011	At Yesus watlageikhesik iluk ageikhesik nit ninebe watlagorek meke yi ninakla iluk welagarek iti ekagat asuagaluk, nit yogotak niniluk werek korlek, at Yesus hasik hibiku-yogoku ninasuogoluk hagakhunem tilninakherek iti.
47004012	Akhuni nen nit ninebe watlasuagaluk hagatninabiogei iti baga, Allah nen hit hinebe hiniluguthinabiogo iti o.
47004013	At Allah ane baga holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Netaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogolik nane igi o, ”\rq (Mazmur 116:10)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha tak-tagat, nit nen ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk wene yogeisekhe lago iti o.
47004014	Itithogon yogeisekhe dogolik, ninakla men apekhe lago. At Allah nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus apuke ilugutdisikhe iti hak, nit meneke at ninom tak-tagat ninilugutninabiluk nen, hit ninomat Yesus oba ’binani ligin iluk ninilu.
47004015	Nit yi aik ti aik tha’bokhogonat hekhe lago iti, hit hinobasigat o. Itithogon hekhe lago baga, at Allah obabut hano motok nen akhuni aperek akmurinakhik, aperek akmurinakhik, inebe doalegat akmurinabiluk tilinakhunem, inebe doalegat nen, Allah heagei wariogei iti baga, it aperek nen Allah hogorariogei o.
47004016	Iti nenat, ninakla puk atluk here’isigidek ninobatnerogo hagakhe lago. Ninoado itikmanke yi re, weak aga korlegat, ninakla akmanke, hibiku-yogoku ket hagatninakho motok werek.
47004017	Nit yogotak, yi aik ti aik hagatninabiogei iti, elanma hasik herlekha’bugat negen o. Meke re, itithogonat hagatninabiogei iti baga, yabokane hogorakharek meke ikhok motok dogogin meke motok kogat ite asugun o.
47004018	Nit he, yi meke ti meke ninileken hogorek meke iti dek asigin meke re, ninileken hogorek dek meke iti ikhok motok dogogin iti nen, ninileken hogorek meke iti hasik ninaporoak thebe iluk hagakhidek, ninileken hogorek dek meke iti hasik ninaporoak thebe iluk yabu hagakhe lago o.
47005001	Akhuni inai halek misalagunem yabokane ket halharek hak, nit ninoado agat oba elanma hasik welago yi, watlago halok he, pogot oba ninebe ninikhok motok dogogin meke akhuni nen agouwak hagakhidek meke Allah nen hagarogo ’binanigin meke werek o, iluk hutdekhe lago.
47005002	-
47005003	Su nokokhunem inalpalek ageikharek hak, ninebe yabokanedogogun meke iti aban werek korlek, ninoado yi dek agunem, werlegat dogunogo iluk, su akmanke ugu werek korlek, itikmanke ikharek hak, ninoado yi werek korlek, ninebe pogot oba dogogun meke iti i’binanusak meke iluk, oba ebet-ebet welago iti nen, weak dogolik, “Eiye, ” iluk apekhe lago.
47005004	Ninebe elanma hasik yi dogolik, “Eiye, ” iluk ninoba akin-pakin weak welago. Iti, ninoado yi meke nokorlogo here'isalok, werlegat dogou warlok nen ekhe lago 'buk. Yi werek korlek, yabokane ninebe niniluk motok dogogun meke iti i’binanumo, ninoado watlagorek meke yi naburlal-haburlal hagatninabuagaluk ekhe lago.
47005005	At Allah nenat yabokane itithogon hagatninabigiluk tilogo ’binanhikhesik, “Eberogonat hagatninabigin, ” iluk, yi meke ti meke dirlu tak nekarek hak, Agoreke woknisasikhemo ninakla werek.
47005006	Itithogon dogolik, yabokane hano asigin, iluk ninakla thabok welago. Akhuni o yabokane halekma dogouogoluk alep halekma welageikharek hak, ninoado yi meke baga dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot aila ninom dogogun oba iti werlegat welago, iluk ninilu.
47005007	Nit he, ninileken hekhe lago meke yoma oba hakotdiluk welago ’buk. Ninetaiken at Yesus oba hakotdiluk welago.
47005008	Iti nenat ninakla the welago. Ninoado yi nokorlogo here’isalok, ninoe Etagapogot werekma ukiluk ninom dogou warlok o, apekhe lago.
47005009	-
47005010	At Kristus nen nit tha’bokhogonat ninoado yi baga dogolik hagakhe dogogun meke tomok ninitema waganogo ukum ninoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe dogolik, hano hagakho meke halok, “Hano, ” igik, nen weak hagakho meke halok, “Weak, ” igik, mothogonat yoknisagein o. Itithogon yoknisagein iti nen, nit o yoma huso dogolik inom, yabokane at aila ukiluk inom, ninetaiken tumo, at akla hanorogo anek hagakhe dogou warlok nen hagakhe lago iti.
47005011	Iti nen, ninoe Etagapogorat ninayukhogon dogosak iluk hutdekhe dogolik, akhuni nen wene iti hutduagaluk inakla kagalogo yogeisilik nekhe lago. Nit ninobabut hagakhe lago iti, at Allah il oba winam iti hak, hit hinakla nen nit hutdinanhe dogosak apekhe lago o.
47005012	Iti, hit nen nit hagatninabubageik iluk ninekaerek nen ninakeke 'bakhekhe lago dek o. It akhuni aperek inetaiken hasik ninakeke 'bakhekhe lago dek, inoado itikmanke hasik inakeke 'bakhugunem, hit nen oko nit ninabok hano ekhe dogolik hogotninabubageik nen iluk yokhisigi o.
47005013	It akhuni nen inileken nisugunem, hunu-hunu hakene welago halok he, iti Allah hasigat o. Meke re, ninelokhe hebelogo hakene welago halok he, hit hasigat o.
47005014	At Kristus nit ninebe akmutninakherek iti nen haknisik welagarek. At arligat nit tha'bokhogonat hasik watlageikhe iti. Halok he, nit tha'bokhogonat watlagaguat o, iluk hutdekhe lago.
47005015	Nit tha'bokhogonat hasik watlageikhe iti nit ninebe ninekaerek hasik niniluk dogoagaluk watlageikhe 'buk. Nit ninebe at hasik dogoagaluk, at ebe nit ninobasik watlageikhesik nen apuke iluk ageikhe iti o.
47005016	Itithogon nit nen hurli yogotak ya hurli nen, akhuni nen inobabut palharek hak, it akhuni aperek inobabut itithogon palhe lago dek o. Nen, alebageik Kristus obabut itithogon palhugu hak, yabokane itithogon palhe lago dek o.
47005017	Akhuni inebe Kristus inom hunik werek halok he, inobabut ket meke hagarinakhemo werek o. Alep meke dek aga. Yabokane ket meke hagatlaga.
47005018	Meke re, yi meke ti meke iti tha'bokhogonat at Allah nenat hagakherek o. At nenat Kristus hagakhikhe iti baga, Allah ekaerek ninom dapukhogon 'binanhikhe. Itithogon 'binanhikhesik nen, akhuni aperek at inom inapuke dapukhogon 'bisagaluk weneiti nit nen yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk nit ninoba 'bisikhe.
47005019	Wene ninoba 'bisikhe iti ebe, men. At Kristus ebe hurli baga dogolik hagakhikhe iti baga, Allah nen yi akhuni ti akhuni tha'bokhogonat at ekaerek inom dapukhogon 'binanhikhe. At nen itithogon 'binanhe dogolik, nit akhuni nen weak hagakhorek meke ukum ninoba 'bigidek thagalogo here'isasikhe iti o. At nen itithogon hagakhikhe ukum iti nit nen yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk ninoba 'bisikhe.
47005020	Nit he, Kristus nen at, ninayoko 'biluk la'inani ageikhemo wagagusik nen, Allah nen wene yokhisau hak, hinasuk wakhe lago iti o. Itithogon wakhe dogolik, “At Allah nen yabokane hinapuke dapukhogon 'binagouak nen he, at hinom dapulini o, ” iluk Kristus etaga palogo ninane erogat yokhisekhe lago.
47005021	Nit Kristus ninom hunekho halok, at Allah nen ekaerek ninom hano ninapuke dapukhogon 'binanigiluk, nit ninobasigat nit ninobabut weak hagakhorek meke iti, at Kristus weak hagakhidek meke oba 'bisikhe iti o.
47006001	-
47006002	At Allah nen, men isikhemo holal waganogo'bisukhama werek, “An nen he, hit hinane nasuk holusak apigi bagaat holhi o. Hinebe tilhinabusak tak-tak obaat yomakhisa agei o, ”\rq (Yesaya 49:8)\rq* iluk isikhe iti, Allah nen ninane asuk holusak he, o yogotak yaat o. Nen, ninebe tilninabusak he, o yogotak yaat o, iluk hinakla ebetni o. Halok he, nit Allah ninom at hasik hagakhe dogolik, at obabut hano nen akmuthinakhikhemo, at ebe waganhigip etnogo, we yugunat alomakhup o, iluk hinasuk wakhe lago iti o.
47006003	Akhuni aperek nen he, “Hit Allah hasik hagakhe lagap iti korlo hagakhe lagap, ” iluk ninabok weak palunogo iluk, akhuni aperek weakhagasuagaluk inakla kagalogo yi meke ti meke korlo’ba hagakhe lago dek.
47006004	Akhuni nen he, “It Allah nen inayoko 'bisikhemo, at hasik hagakhe dogosak mekeat hagariogei, ” iluk hutdinanuagaluk, yi aik ti aik hagatninakhik, wiik-weakhogon hagatninakhik, umunetnisigik, hagakhe korlek, ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogolik yi meke ti meke ekagat hagakhe lago.
47006005	Tugi ninakhik, niniki herle warogo o herle warek ’bisegarekma ’binanhik, akhuni doalegat nen ninoba wiik-weakhogon ninasusak hagatlageik, hagakhe korlek welago. Yabu thet weak hagakhik, noge usak degat ageik, hipiri abu ageik, hekhe dogolik hagakhe lago.
47006006	Itithogon hekhe dogoligat, ninobabut weak hagakhidek karelek dogolik, hano wene ninilu welageik, ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageik, ninobabut enago welageik, hagakhe lago. At Allah Agoreke ninakla dogolik akhuni inebe eberogonat ninakmurogon welago.
47006007	Itithogon dogolik, Allah obatne baga ebe wene yogeisilik nekhe lago. Itithogon yogeisilik nekhe dogolik, akhuni nen he, “Sikhe thege niniki ebelak-ebelak hago welago, ” iluk egarek hak, nit Allah akla warlok meke hagakhe lago iti, niniki ebelak-ebelak hago welago.
47006008	It aperek nen hogotninakhik, ninabok hano igik, hagakhe korlek, it aperek nen wenaknisigik, ninabok weak palhik, hagariogei. Wene eberogonat yogeisekhe korlek mekeat he, “Inekalat nukhetninabiogei, ” iluk wenaknisiliogeiat.
47006009	Akhuni nen ninebe inokodek meke thalek, tha’bokhogonat nen inilu mekeat welageik, ninebe watlasuagaluk hagatninabiogei mekeat he, niniluk welageik, yi aik ti aik hagatninakho korlegat he, ninebe motok watlageidek welageik, hagakhe lago iti ’bikhani!
47006010	Ninakla weak dogoligat he, ninakla arleken akhekho motok welago. Yi meke ti meke ninikimo dek mekeat he, akhuni doalegat hano meke inilmo horleak asuagaluk hagatdisekhe lago. Ninamekemotok dek mekeat he, ebe meke tha’bokhogonat ite agosik welago.
47006011	Itithogon dogolik, hit akhuni Korintus meke, nagarlak lak nerugi. An nakla wene ageikhe thebeldigidek motok tha’bokhogon yokhisigi iti. Hit hinobasik an nakla wene arat lia’agei.
47006012	Nit nen hit hinobasik, ninakla wene itithogon lia’agosik welago mekeat he, hit anek he, nit ninobasik hinakla akin welagap o.
47006013	Halok he, hit nen dagakhogon nit ninobasik hinakla lia’atni o, iluk an nekaerek na'buri yogeisau hak yokhisigi iti.
47006014	Hit akhuni inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke iti, hinom agarle hunekhup o. Akhuni mothogon hagariogei meke inom, inasuk warek dek hagariogei meke inom, inom hunik dogosak nogo a? O lia iti inom, o mum iti inom, opakimo dogosak nogo a? Motok erlok dek o.
47006015	At Kristus Iblis ipisak, inetaiken opakiat dogosak nogo a? Nen, akhuni inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiliogei meke, it aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiliogei dek meke inom hunik dogosak nogo a? Motok erlok dek o.
47006016	At Allah ai halek iti inom, kaneke iti inom, opakimo dapulusak nogo a? At Allah iluk motok welagarek meke ai halek he, nit ninebe yiat o. At nen he, men isikhe, "It inakla an nai halogo dogogin o. Inaklake etoma nekhe dogogin o. It inopase Allah anat dogogin o. Nen, an na’buriirat dogogun, ”\rq (Imamat 26:12; Yeremia 32:38; Yehezkiel 37:27)\rq* iluk isikhe iti nen,
47006017	ninopase Etagapogot etnogo nenat, ageikhe men isikhe, "Hit hinebe it akhuni aperek inaklake, inaklake, welagap iti here’isalok, nomokhogon dukhitni o. Dukhi agunem, an nen wokhinabik nen, weak meke iti yabokane hiniki hakha ukugup o.\rq (Yesaya 52:11)\rq*
47006018	An hit hinopaseat dogogin o. Nen, hit an na’buriat dogogun o, iluk ninopase Etagapogot yi meke ti meke hagasusak anek etnogo nen isikhemo, ”\rq (2 Samuel 7:14; 1 Tawarikh 17:13; Yeremia 31:9)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha.
47007001	Halok he, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. At Allah nen itithogon dogogun iluk abok yoknisasikhe iti nen, ninebe inom, ninetaiken inom, weak hagakhorek meke iti, hanorogo horogo here’isauwok o. Itithogon here’isalok, Allah ebe ninayuk dogolik, ninebe at hasik ’bisalok dogouok nen, ninetaiken ’bogokhogon horletdekhe dogouok o.
47007002	Nit ninobasik he, ninebe wokninabu hak hinetaiken hunik dogono. Nit nen he, ap ageikhe weagathinakhik, alomathinakhik, nukhetdinagagik, hagakho dek o.
47007003	An nen alebageik yokhisekhe dogolik, “Hit he, hinebe ninetaiken oba hunik motok welagap o. Halok he, ninom watlasumo watlasusagat o. Nen, ninom niniluk dogoumo, dogosagat o, ” iluk itithogon alebageik isigi iti nen, yogotak, wene yokhisigi iti, wene hinoba ’bigiluk igi dek o.
47007004	An nakla nen, hit hano hagasugun, iluk netaiken hapukhogonat dogolik hogothinakho motok welagarek o. Itithogon dogolik, it akhuni aperek nen weagatninabuogoluk yi aik ti aik hagatninakhe korlegat, an nakla motok hano ageik, kogat nakla arleken akhigik, hagakhe lagei o.
47007005	Nit o Makedonia yoma wagagusik werekma, ninoba hapugutdakhigidekmaat, weagatninabuogoluk yi aik ti aikhagatninakhukhaat iti o. Akhuni aperek nen ninasuogoluk hagakhunem, nit ninetaiken ninayuk aga korlek welagosik.
47007006	Werekma, at Allah obabut he, akhuni nen, “Nikithogon hagasugun, ” iluk inakla weak atlukmo inakla hanorinakherek etnogo nen, at Titus la’i agama wagasik nen nakla hanotninabi aga.
47007007	At Titus ebe waga iti baga anek nakla hano aga 'buk. Hit nen hagakhunem at akla hano aga meke iti, yoknisi aga iti baga, nakla hanotdekheat o. Hit nen he, “At Paulus ninom abuk atlo e, ” iluk noba ebekhik, “Ninobabut nen weak hagakhugu e, ” iluk hinakla apigik, it aperek nen an nabok isinem, hinetaiken oba nenat an werekmake ageik, hagakhep meke iti pilinerogo yoknisi agama nakla arleken motok akhigiat o.
47007008	Itithogon nakla arleken akhigi mekeat he, an nen alebageik holal waganogo hinoba la’i agagi etnogo nen, “Inakla weagarinakhigi iti, thogotdusak meke napik nen la’isigi o, ” iluk nakla ebekhe lagei dek o. “Napik nen opaki hasik inakla weagarinakhi, ” iluk nakla apekhe lagarigat,
47007009	yogotak nakla arleken akhekhe lagei o. Hit hinakla weak aga iti nen nakla arleken akhekhe lagei ’buk. Hit hinakla weak aga iti baga, hit weak hagakhigip meke here’isalok hinobabut hebelagap iti nen, nakla arleken akhigi o. Hit hinakla weak agap iti, at Allah akla warlok apekhe bagaat weak aga. Halok, nit nen nukhetdinagago usak dek o.
47007010	Akhuni agat oba meke nen inakla kagalhunem, inakla weak atluk nen, inebe watlageikharek mekeat he, at Allah akla warlok apekherek oba inakla weak agarethek, weak hagakharek meke here’isalok inobabut hebelagunem, Allah nen hanorinakherek iti. Hanorinakhunem, “An nakla weak aga baga, napik nen nobabut hebelhi, ” iluk yabokane wene munini ebekharek dek.
47007011	At Allah akla warlok apekherek oba hinakla weak atluk nen, “Napik nen weak hagakhima, ” iluk hinobabut hebelatluk nen, hano meke obatnerogo hagakhik, wene hinoba dek mothogon hagakhik, hinakla aga dageigik, hinayuk ageik, “Paulus ninom abuk atlo o, ” iluk noba ebekhik, hinakla agaken thok-thok hagakhik, at weak hagakhikhe werek iti ikirluk oba ula’isigik, hagakhep iti lakhani! Itithogon hagakhe dogolik hit weak ageikhe hagakhidek wene hinoba meke korogo motok la’isegep o.
47007012	An nen holal waganogo hinoba la'i agagi mekeat, at ap ageikhe weak hagakhikhe iti hasik la’i agagi 'buk. Nen, at weak hagakhikhe iti baga it aperek nuk agoukha meke iti hasik la’i agagi ’bugat o. Iti re, hit hinekaerek hinakla nen, “Nit Paulus lak ninakmurogo it hasik obatnerogo hagasusak welago higi, ” iluk Allah il obaat, hinekaerek hinobabut palubageik nen iluk la’i agagi o.
47007013	Itithogon la’i agagimo hagakhep iti nen nit ninakla hano aga. Iti hasik ninakla hano agaat. Nen, at Titus hit tha’bokhogonat nen ebe waganhisip hano hagakhunem, akla hano aga meke pilinerogo yoknisugunem, ninakla arleken motok akhogoat o.
47007014	An nen alebageik Titus yogokhe dogolik, “It yabokane hano hagasugun, ” iluk hogothinakhe lagagi hak hagakhepma, an nekarli ageidek o. Nit nen yi wene ti wene eberogonat anek yokhisasugu hak, at Titus yogokhe dogolik hit hogothinakhugu iti, eberogonat o.
47007015	At nen hit hinebe akmu welaga mekeat he, ebe hinoba wagama, hinayuk ageik, hinoageleke dik-dik igik, hagakhe dogoligat at ebe waganhesip, at nen yokhisugunem, ane hologo hagakhep meke iti, hinoba ebethinakhe dogolik, hit tha’bokhogonat hinebe motok akmuthinabiogo o.
47007016	Nen, an nen he, “It yi meke ti meke hano anek hagakhe dogogun meke, ” iluk netaiken hapukhogon dogolik nakla arleken akhekhe lagei o.
47008001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. At Allah obabut hano etnogo nen a'buri o Makedonia meke yoma inobabut hano hagarinakhemo hagakha meke hinilurogo yokhisak.
47008002	It akhuni aperek nen yi aik ti aik doalegat weagarinakho korlegat, it inakla arleken motok akhiliogei iti baga inobabut ekagat aga. It inameke motok dek inerlageik dogoligat, it meke doalegat, debekhogon it akhuni aperek wogeisiliogei iti.
47008003	Wogeisausak tak-tagat wogeisekhe dogolik aperek inom oba dukhogon wogeisiliogei. An inobabut nilu. Nileken hisigirik nen yokhisekhe lagei o. It akhuni aperek nen inakla kagalhidekmaat, inekaerek inakla nen kagalogo,
47008004	men yoknisekhe lageikha, “Nit nen meneke, Allah a’buri o Yudea meke aperek yomageisauwok nen iluk yokhogo o, ” iluk nit yoknisekho motok welageikha.
47008005	Nit ninakla nen, “It itithogon hugun, ” iluk apogo meke werek korlek, inebe tak ninoe Etagapogot wogokhasik nen, at Allah akla apasikhe hak, inebe nit woknisegaat o.
47008006	Woknisegama nen, at Titus hit hinom dogolik, hit nen Allah a’buri aperek hinakmu nen yomageisauwogoluk hagakhigip meke iti hasik yokhisekhe laga hagat, ilugun aban werekma arat natogosuagaluk akla kagalho.
47008007	Hit he, yi meke ti meke hasik hano motok hagakhe lagap. Iti, hinetaiken Allah oba hinobatnerogon hakotdigik, hano wene hano motok yakulisigik, ebe wene hano motok hinilu ageik, akhuni aperek yomageisauwogoluk akilukhogon hagakhik, nit hinakmurogon motok welageik, hagakhethep iti hak, hit meke it Allah a’buri aperek iti hano motok ’bisobageik iluk yokhisigi o.
47008008	An nen, “Hit itithogon hagatno, ” iluk, nane obatnerogon yokhisigi dek o. It Allah a’buri o Makedonia yoma meke nen inaklanen kagalogo it meke natogorlogo Allah a'buri itiakilukhogon yomageisiliogei iti hak, hit meneke, iti hinakmurogon yomageisugunem, “Eberogonat it inakmu werek, ” iluk ekagat asuagaluk yokhisigi iti o.
47008009	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut hano nen akmutninakhikhe etnogo hit hinilu motok apigi. At ilmo horleak welageikhe mekeat he, at erlageik motok ageikhe iti baga, hit ebe meke hinilmo horleak asubageik iluk, at erlageik motok ageikhe iti o.
47008010	Yomageisausak iti hasik, an nakla apekhe lagei meke yokhisak. Tahun alep iti baga, akhuni aperek aban werek korlek, hit nen tak, “Tt iti yomageisauwok, ” iluk wene palhigisip akilukhogon hinetaikenma nen yomageisauwogoluk aperek ’bisasigip iti hak, yogotak ilugun arat ’bogokhogon yomageisobageik iluk igi o.
47008011	Hit nen alep hinakla arlekenhogo, “Itithogon yomageisauwogoluk, ” isigip iti hak, yogotak itithogonat hinikimo asigin meke tomok arlekenhogo ilugun oba arat ’bogokhogon natogosubageik iluk yokhisigi o.
47008012	Hit meke dek meke ’buk. At he, werek meke hinetaiken oba nenat, it iti ’bisagun halok he, at Allah nen, “Hano ’bega, ” iluk apagein o.
47008013	Hit anek akinhogo yomageisugunem, it nen inakla therogon werlegat waganuagaluk yokhisigi dek o. Hinom tak-tagat yomak-yomak hagakhe dogosak iluk yokhisigi o.
47008014	Hit meke yogotak doalegat werek iti. Halok he, it dek werek meke iti ’bisausak o. It meke yabokane doalegat atluk nen, hit dek atluk werek halok aperek ’binagusak iti o. Itithogon hagasugun halok, hit nen yomageisigik, it nen yomakhisigik, hinom tak-tagat hagakhe dogogun iti.
47008015	Itithogon hagakhe dogosak iti hasik, Allah nen, men isikhe, “At ageikhe ameke doalegat natogorlogo’bakhagein meke iti titurogo ’bigin dek o. Nen, at ageikhe ameke pererlagat natogorlogo 'bakhagein meke iti dek asigin dek o, ”\rq (Keluaran 16:18)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha.
47008016	Nit nen hit hinobasik obatnerogon hagasuogoluk hagakhe lago hak, at Titus itithogonat hagakhe dogoagaluk Allah nen akla kagalhemo hagariogo iti nen, Allah heagei wakhe dogouok o.
47008017	Iti re, nit nen at akla kagalho mekeathe, nit nen, “Hat lan, ” iluk ninane obatnerogon yogokhoma waga 'buk. At ekaerek akla kagalagasik nen, motok obatnerogon etaiken hinoba dogolik, “It inoba ligin, ” iluk hinoba waga iti o.
47008018	Ninagarlak ageikhe hano wene yogeisilik nukhunem, it Allah a'buri o yi ai ti ai nen, “At obabut hano, ” iluk hogorariogei meke, at Titus ipisak la'isa agei iti o.
47008019	Iti anek 'buk. It Allah a'buri nen it iti yomageisauwogoluk 'bisega meke iti, at iti ninom nen natogorlogo 'biluk wogeisa loagaluk meldegaat o. Itithogon wogeisa lagunem, ninoe Etagapogot hogorakhe dogolik, “It Paulus lak inobabut he, it aperek yomageisausak erlok werek, ” iluk ekagat asigin iti.
47008020	Doalegat 'bisiliogei meke iti, nit nen natogorlogo waganik lagunem, it akhuni aperek nen ninabok weak palinogo iluk, ninetai ekerlogo motok hagakhe lago.
47008021	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot il oba anek ninobabut mothogon hagakhe dogouogoluk hagakhe lago dek. At he, ninoe Etagapogot inom, akhuni inom, inil oba ninobabut mothogon hagakhe dogouogoluk apekhe lago.
47008022	It eta inomat, ninagarlak ageikhe la'i ageiat o. At iti, yi meke ti meke hasik hibiku-yogoku akla arlekenhogon akhuniaperek yomageisugunem obabut ekagat palhorethek nen, hinoba la'i agei iti o. At nen he, “It hano hagasugun, ” iluk etaiken hinoba la'isikhesikmo nogo nen, yogotak hit yomakhisagaluk akla arleken motok waga iti o.
47008023	Nen, at Titus iti, an nagarlak hit yomakhisauwogoluk nipisak yabu hagakhorek meke. Nen, nagarlak lak aperek at inom wageikha iti, hano hagakhunem it akhuni aperek nen inobabut palharethek nen Kristus hogorariogei meke, Allah a'buri natogorliogei meke nen inayoko 'biluk la'isa ageikhama wageikha iti o.
47008024	Allah a'buri natogorliogei meke aperek nen, “Tt o Korintus meke nen it Titus lak inebe eberogonat inakmu werek, ” iluk igik, nen, “It Paulus lak nen it Korintus meke hano hagasugun iluk hogorinakharek etnogo eberogonat, ” iluk igik, uagaluk, it iti hinakmurogon woginabino o.
47009001	An nen he, hit nen it Allah a'buri o Yudea meke yomageisauwogoluk natogokhe lagap meke iti hasik, wene holal waganogo hinoba la'isusak dek meke la'i agei iti.
47009002	Hit nen it iti yomageisauwogoluk hinakla arlekenhogon hagakhe lagap iti, hinobabut an nilu. An nen hit hogothinakhe dogolik, it akhuni o Makedonia yoma men yogeisekhe lagei, “Tahun alep iti baga nen, it akhuni o Akhaya etoma meke nen it iti itithogon yomageisauwogoluk it meke natogorlogo 'bisukhasik werek, ” iluk hogothinakhe lagei. Hit hinakla arlekenhogon hagakhe lagap iti baga nen, it akhuni yoma aperek inebe doalegat nen it iti 'bisauwogoluk inetaiken aborlok iliogeiat.
47009003	Hit hinobabut hagakhe lagap iti hasik, nit nen hogothinakhe lago meke iti, “We yugunat hogorinakhe lagoma, ” iluk unogo iluk, hit nen an igi hagat, hulogo 'bisalok dogobageik nen iluk, ninagarlak lak hinoba la’isa ago iti o.
47009004	Itithogon la’isa agei iti, hit nen aban natogorlogo ’bisigidek werekma an akhuni Makedonia meke ninom hinoba wisusak erlok dek o. Alebat an nen ekhe dogolik, “It itithogon eberogonat hano hagasugun werek o, ” iluk isigisikmo, an nekarli ageik, hit hinekarli ageik, asunogo iluk, it tak la’isa agei iti o. Hit nen wene iti hasik hutdisigisipmo, hit hinekarli asunogo iluk yokhisausak dek meke igi iti.
47009005	Itithogon aban natogorlogo ’bigidek dogogun halok erlok dek iti nen, an aban wageidek dogolik ninagarlak lak iti tak la’isasigiluk igi iti o. It hinoba witluk nen, hit nen iti ’bisauwogoluk abok isigip meke etnogo, it nen arat ilugun natogosi isuagaluk inakla kagalogo yogeisekhe lagei. An itithogon hagakhe lagei iti, hit nen hinameke warlok werek korlek it inane obatnerogon hinakla kagalumo ’bisausak erlok dek o. Hit hinetaiken nenat ’bisalok werekma hano, iluk hagakhe lagei iti o.
47009006	Wene iti hasik igin yi hinakla hutdini. It akhuni aperek nen ai herlekha’bugat yariogei meke re, eken herlekha’bugat palugun o. Nen, it aperek ai kokhogon yariogei meke ebe kokhogonat palugun o.
47009007	Akhuni inakla arleken motok akhekhe dogolik it aperek ’bisegarek meke iti, Allah nen inebe akmu welagarek iti nen, hit hinebe tomok hinameke warlok werek korlek, it aperek nen hinakla obatnerogon kagalhunem ’bisausak erlok dek o. Hit hinakla hano dogolik, hinekaerek hinakla nenat kagalogo ’bisausak o.
47009008	-
47009009	Akhuni inobabut hano hagakharek meke hasik, Allah ane baga holal men iluk waganek werek, “It nen hano meke akhuni ya wogeisigik, ta wogeisigik, supurisekhe dogolik, it aperek inerlageik meke supurisegarek. Inobabut hano nen wogeisegarek iti, Allah nen akla eberek motok dogogin o, ”\rq (Mazmur 112:9)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha hak, at Allah obabut hano nen, yi meke ti meke oba dukhogon wokhisugunem, hit nen hibiku-yogoku hinekaerek hasik erlogat dogolik, oba dukhogon it aperek hanorogon yomageisekhe dogobageik iluk, Allah nen erlogat wokhisausak werek o.
47009010	At Allah nen it ai yakharek meke ai wogeisigik, hipiri ebe noagaluk wogeisigik, hagakherek iti. Itithogonat, at nenat, ai yasuagaluk palisegarek hak, hinobabut it aperek yomageisekhe dogosak iti meke wokhisigik, nen ai yakhunem eken kokhogon isu hak, it aperek hinakmu nen yomageisugunem kogotdigik, hagasigin o.
47009011	Itithogon wokhisaumo, hit nen, yi meke ti meke oba dukhogon dogolik, hiniki kogat it aperek yomageisekhe dogogun o. Itithogon yomageisagun meke iti, nit nen supusogo wogeisugunem, Allah heagei wasugunat o.
47009012	Hit akhuni hinakmu nen yomageisagun iti baga, Allah a’buri inikimo dek meke anek erlogat waganhe dogogun ’buk. Titu asu hak, akhuni doalegat nen Allah heagei kokhogon wakhe dogogunat o.
47009013	Itithogon yomageisekhe dogogun iti baga, it Allah a’buri o Yudea meke nen, “It akhuni Korintus meke Kristus hagakhikhe wene hano wene etnogo waganhukhasik, Ninobabut mothogon hagakhe dogogun o, iluk isukha tak-tagat hagariogei. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik it meke aperek warlok ageidek nit yomaknisigik, it aperek tha’bokhogonat yomageisigik, hagakha o, ” iluk hinobabut ekagat paldiluk Allah hogorasugunat o.
47009014	Itithogon hogorakhe dogolik, it nen he, “Allah obabut hano etnogo nen, it nen akhuni kokhogon yomageisekhe dogoagaluk inobabut iti meke wogeisekhemo hagariogei, ” iluk hinebe inakmu dogolik Allah ayoko kokhogon ’bekhe dogogun iti o.
47009015	At Allah nen hano motok nit nen pilinerogo usak erlok dek meke woknisasikhe iti hasik hogorakhe dogouok o.
47010001	-
47010002	An Paulus Kristus obabut enago hano etnogo obabut waganogo, nekaerek nen wene ageikhe hinasuk wasik. It aperek nen he, “At ebe horokhogon ninom dogolik, obabut liokhogon wene yoknisekherek. Meke re, ebe walegat dogolik, obabut ayuk dek obatnerogon yoknisekherek, ” iluk egarek meke etnogo yabokane hinoba witluk nen nobabut nayuk dek dogolik nane obatnerogon yokhisaunogo iluk, hutdubageik iluk nane liokhogon yokhisigi. It iti nen he, “Paulus lak iti, akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik inobabut waganogo hagariogei, ” iluk ninabok weak paliogei meke iti, nobabut nayuk dek nane obatnerogon wenageisasigin iluk wene munini ebekhe lagei.
47010003	Nit ninebe agat oba dogolik, akhuni sikhe thege baga wim yakharek hak yakhe lago dek o.
47010004	Nit wim yakhe lago iti ebe, akhuni inasikhe inarege baga yakhe lago ’buk. Allah obatneak welagarek meke etnogo asikhe arege baga, wim ilugunmo o obatnerogon halek meke iti, erlok misalusak iti baga yakhe lago.
47010005	It akhuni aperek inakla nen, “Allah iti ebe nina'it o. It akhuni aperek at ebe inilu asusak degat o, ” iluk inekaerek nen hogorakhegarek meke iti, nit nen sikhe thege iti baga erlok thebeldisausagat o. Nen, akhuni inetaiken weat meke baga eberiogei meke iti, nit nen sikhe thege iti baga Kristus ane hologo hagasuagaluk apma erlok ’bisasusagat o.
47010006	Nit nen, hit Allah ane ’bogokhogon hologo motok hagakhe lagap halok he, karelogo ’binageikhe dogolik it aperek at ane inasuk holu’buk meke ukum inoba ’buogoluk welago.
47010007	An nen wene thelekma meke igin yi hutdini o. At ageikhe akla nen, “An nebe Kristus meke welagei, ” iluk hutdekhe halok he, ekaerek nen obabut palekhe dogolik, “An nebe Kristus meke hakene, it Paulus lak itithogonat, ” iluk hutduak o.
47010008	Ninoe Etagapogot nen he, an nen weagathinabuagaluk iteerek 'banhemo 'buk. Hinetaiken horlethinabuagaluk, iteerek 'banhemo welagei iti hasik kogat hogorakhekhe lagei halok he, nekarli asigin dek o.
47010009	-
47010010	Akhuni hit meke aperek nen he, “Paulus iti ebe walegat dogolik holal waganogo la'i agunem, ane magasusak erlok dek. Obatnerogon yoknisiliogo. Meke re, ebe witluk ninom dogolik ebe kepu hakene. Nen, ane isinem, inasuk holusak ina'it negen, ” iluk iliogei iti nen he, wene holal waganogo hinoba la'i aga lagei iti, hit hinakla nen, “Ninayuk motok asuagaluk la'iriogo, ” iluk apaunogo iluk yokhisigi iti o.
47010011	Nit yabokane witluk nen, it itithogon iliogei meke iti, ninebe walegat dogolik wene holal waganogo la'i ago meke tak-tagat hagasisugun iti nen, hutdiluk dogoak o.
47010012	Nit nen he, it aperek inekaerek nen, “An hano, ” iluk inetaiken nen hogorakhiliogei meke iti, ninom wenakninabusak he, nayuk. An nekaerek nobabut palogo nen nebe it ninom tak-tak u nayugat o. Iti, it nen he, “Inobabut hano waganusak he, nirat, ” iluk igik, akhuni isi it meke motok it-it inobabut paligik, hagariogei iti, inebe kepu nen hagariogei o.
47010013	Nit ninobabut he, iti hakene dek o. Nit ninobabut ninayabu Allah nen hurli palogo woknisasikhe iti baga hagakhe dogolik, itikmanke meke hasik hogorakhigidek, hurli palogo woknisasikhe meke hasigat hogorakhekhe lago o. Hit hinebe meneke, ninayabu hurli palogo woknisasikhe iti mekeat welagap o.
47010014	Hit hinebe Allah nen yabu hurli palogo woknisasikhe baga welagap iti nen, hano wene Kristus nen hagakhikhe wene etnogo wolok, yogeisilik lalok hurli hit hinoba wagagu iti, hurli palek mekethebelogo wagagu dek o.
47010015	Allah nen itithogon ninayabu hurli palogo woknisasikhe meke thebelogo 'biluk akhane pok lalok, it aperek hagakha meke, an hagakhi thalek hogorakhekhe lago dek o. Hit hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdekhe lagap meke iti aperek inom obarlukhagatlagunem, o hit werekmake Allah nen hurli palogo nit woknisasikhe baga, yabu kokhogon hagakhe dogogun apekhe lago.
47010016	Itithogon hagakhe dogoluk, Allah nen it aperek inayabu hurli palogo wogeisasikhemo hagakha mekeat, nit hagakho thalek hogorakhaunogo iluk, hit hinaila abel ilike, etoma wene hano wene yogeisilik nekhe dogogun apekhe lago.
47010017	Allah ane holal men iluk waganek werek, “Akhuni nen yi meke ti meke hasik hogorakhauwogoluk halok he, ninoe Etagapogot hagakhikhe iti hasik anek hogorasusak o, ”\rq (Yeremia 9:24)\rq* iluk isikhe.
47010018	Akhuni inekaerek nen hogorakhegarek meke iti Allah nen hano iluk woginakherek ’buk. At ninoe Etagapogot nen hogorinakherek meke halok hano iluk woginakherek o.
47011001	An nen wene herlekha’bugat akhuni kepu meke nen egarek hak igin yi re, wenaknikhidek, hinasuk holek dogobageik iluk yokhisigi. Hinasuk holek dogoni o.
47011002	Homagarlugi inobabut ap inom noge igidek meke, inaguni inoba dopokhogon ’bisegarek hak, an nen he, hit Kristus oba dopokhogon ’binagagi mekeat he, hit nen ap ninat meke ageikhe dopolek halok he, Allah akla aga dagou hak, an nakla aga dagousagat o.
47011003	Itithogon meke re, alebat at Warlo etnogo obabut kaukmo, he Hawa nukhetdisikhe hak, hit hinetaiken opakiat Kristus oba hakotdiluk at hasik karelekwelagap meke nukhetdinagousak iti, nayuk ariogo.
47011004	It aperek hinoba witluk nen, nit nen hano wene Yesus hagakhikhe wene yokhisasugumo waganhigip hak, yokhisigidek. Ninat meke yokhisugunem, Allah Agoreke waganhigisibat, yabokane ageikhe meke agoreke waganhik, hano wene waganhigisibat, yabokane wene ninat meke waganhik, hinakla arlekenhogon waganhe lagap hisekhe lagei nayuk o.
47011005	It aperek iti, Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la'isa ageikhe meke negen hagatlatluk wagunem, hit nen, “It iti koktek negen, ” iluk woginakhe korlegat he, an nakla nen he, “It koktek, nen, an erlok dek, ” iluk apekhe lagei motok dek o.
47011006	An wene isinem inoba horlagaperek mekeat, wene ebe nokodek ’buk o. Nilu. An nen hibiku-yogoku yi meke ti meke hasik isinem, hit nen, “At wene ilu o, ” iluk ekagat hutdanhe lagabat o.
47011007	An nen Allah ane hano wene iti yokhisekhe dogolik, “Oko ageikhe woknitni, ” iluk igidek. Hit kogothinabigiluk an nekaerek nebe kepu negen atluk, itithogon hagakhe lagei iti, hit korlo hagathinakhe lagei iluk usak a? Motok dek o.
47011008	An nen hit yomakhisekhe lagei iti hasik, niki oko negen, it Allah a’buri o nekalokma nen woknikhunem waganhe lagei o. Itithogon waganhe lagei iti baga it akhuni aperek nen, “At Paulus nen it akhuni o Korintus meke yomageisagaluk, oko it aperek meke iki abusak negen waganiogo, ” iluk yoknisusagat o.
47011009	An hit ninom dogolik uang dek nen, hit nen aperek woknesuagaluk kino hinoba tiolhe lageidek o. Itithogon werekma, it ap nagarlak lak o Makedonia meke wageikhasik erlogat woknesi ageikha iti nen, yi meke ti meke hasik hit hinoba akinetdinogo iluk, apasigisikmo, kino yokhisigidek welagagisik yabokane tithogonat motok hagakhe dogogin o.
47011010	Itithogon hagakhe dogogin iluk, nakla arleken akhekhe dogolik hogorakhekhe agei meke iti, akhuni o Akhaya etoma meke aperek nennane magasusak erlok dek, iluk Kristus ane ebe wene nakla dogolik eberogonat igi o.
47011011	Nenaluk an itithogon igi apegep. Hit hinebe nakmu dek nen igi apegep? Dek o. An hit hinebe nakmu welagei iti Allah iluat o.
47011012	It aperek Kristus nen inayoko 'biluk la'isa ageikhe meke thalek wageikhasik hagariogei meke iti nen, “Nit Paulus ninom tak-tak o, ” iluk ekhe dogolik hogorakhiliogei meke iti, inane tokok uagaluk an yogotak hagakhe lagei meke yi re, hagakho motogat dogogin o.
47011013	It iti, Kristus nen inayoko 'biluk la'isa ageikhe meke 'buk. At nen la'isa agarek meke negen hagatlatluk witluk akhuni nukhetdisiliogei mekeat o.
47011014	It hagariogei iti elalinat hagariogei 'buk. Inopase Iblis ekaerek ekalat nen, malaikat lia wene wolok wageikharek hak hagarogo wagarek hak hagariogei o.
47011015	At Iblis atuaneke dogolik, at hasik hagakharek mekeat he, at Allah atuaneke dogolik tak-tagat hagakharek meke negen hagatlatluk wiriogei iti inobabut inikhokmaat o. Itithogon hagakharek iti nen, o ilugun oba, Allah nen oko it yi meke ti meke hasik hagakharek tak-tagat hagarinabigin o.
47011016	Akhuni hit meke aperek nen, “At Paulus ebe kepu negen, ” iluk apaunogo iluk, yabokane nane dagakhogon yokhisigi iti. Itithogon mekeat he, hit nen itithogonat apekhe lagap halok he, an nebe kepu negen dogolik herlekha'bugat ageikhe hogorakhagein yi, hinasuk holini o.
47011017	An nen hogorakhagein yi, ninoe Etagapogot nen, “Hat itithogon in, ” iluk yoknekhemo hogorakhagein 'buk. Akhuni kepu meke nen hogorakhekhe dogolik egarek hak igin o.
47011018	It akhuni inebe doalegat nen yi meke ti meke agat oba meke hasik hogorakhiliogei iti, an herlekha'bugatageikhe hogorakhageinat o.
47011019	Hit hinakla kagalek meke hakene yoma re! It aperek kepu meke inane isinem, hit hinakla arlekenhogon holhethep iti.
47011020	Itithogon hagakhethep iti baga, hit hinebe it nen inapma 'binagaluk, hinapiri motok tha’bokhogon nikik, hinameke iniki abusak horligik, “Hit erlok dek meke re, nit anek he, kok, ” iluk inekaerek nen inakeke ’bakhigik, hinelokhoken dapukhogon hinakhik, hagakhe korlek hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagap yoma re!
47011021	Nit meneke, itithogon hagasusak, ninobabut ninayuk nen huk agagu iluk usak, nekarli kogat hausak nogo a? Dek o. It akhuni kepu meke nen egarek hak ageikhe yokhisak. At ageikhe ekarli dek hogorakhekhe halok he, an meneke, nekarli dek hogorakhausagat o.
47011022	It iti inebe Ibrani meke hak, an meneke, nebe Ibrani mekeat o. It inebe Israel meke hak, an meneke, nebe Israel mekeat o. It inebe inopase Abraham nen itago meke hak, an meneke, nebe nopase Abraham nen itago mekeat o.
47011023	It iti Kristus atuaneke dogolik, at hasik herlekha’bugat hagakharek mekeat he, an anek he, kogat hagakherek o, iluk, akhuni thinuknuk meke nen egarek hak ageikhe yokhisigi iti o. It he, thet herlekha’bugat negen hegarek mekeat, an he, thet doalegat hegerek o. It he, opaki hasik hakene iniki herle wakhik, tugi inakhik, inebe watlasusak negen motok inakhik hegarek mekeat he, an anek he, hibiku-yogoku niki herle wakhik, tugi nakhik, nebe watlasusak negen motok nakhik, hegerek o.
47011024	It akhuni Yahudi meke nen tugi la’bisoko tugi opaki hasik iniki 39 oba nen nakhe lagoukha meke niki wenago, niki 5 baga nakhukhasik.
47011025	Nen, akhuni o Roma meke nen tugi payuk oba iniki henagan oba nakhukhasigat. Nen, helekit oba tamukhogon nakhukhasigat. Nen, i laut yekelekma etoma ku warogo italhunem, niki henagan oba ku weak atluk tamukhogon ima usasigiat. Nen, niki opaki hasik i lautyekelekma etoma agoum oba thakhogon noge isigisigat.
47011026	Hibiku-yogoku yukmoke laga lagagisik, iti i ugu nen thebelnakhunem nasusak ageik, akhuni inobabut weak iniki abusak waganharek meke nen nasuogoluk hagakhunem yuk igik, akhuni an nukuloak meke nen nasuogoluk hagakhunem yuk igik, it itikmanke meke nen nasuogoluk hagakhunem yuk igik, o ukul kok halekma nen nasuogoluk hagakhunem yuk igik, leget itikmanke nen nasuogoluk hagakhunem yuk igik, i laut yekelekma nen nasuogoluk hagakhunem yuk igik, akhuni ninat mekeat he, Allah a’buri nagarlak lak meke thalek ninom dogolik nasuogoluk hagakhunem yuk igik, hagakhe lagagisigat.
47011027	Yi yabu ti yabu hasik thet wiik-weakhogon hagakhik, hibiku-yogoku noge niluk noge igik, hipiri inom, i inom, dek nen abuat welageik, hibiku-yogokuat hipiri nikidek hapugutdigik, nasu dek nen thogei nakhik, o koma noge u heat ageik, hagakhe lagagisigat.
47011028	Itithogon hagatnakhe korlegat, Allah a’buri yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke tha’bokhogonat inobasik hibiku-yogoku hunik hunik motogat noba akin dogolik wene munini ebekherek o.
47011029	At ageikhe erlok dek aga halok he, an erlok dek asu hak, nakla weak agaregat. Nen, at ageikhe weak meke nen akla kagalhunem weak aga halok, an nakla aga dageikheregat.
47011030	Meke re, hogorakhausak halok he, an nebe erlok dek iluk hogorakhausak o.
47011031	An wene igi iti, nekalat igi dek o. At ninoe Etagapogot Yesus opase Allah etaga waganogo hogorakho motok motok dogogun meke etnogo ilu.
47011032	An o Damsyik werekma, inoe etagapogot Aretas apma meke gubernur iti nen agarumi holagapema thuam werekma an haknabuagaluk inayoko ’bisikhe.
47011033	Itithogon inayoko ’bisikhemo kagalek welagoukha mekeat, it akhuni aperek nen an nebe mul yago akla ukhatdaniluk nen, leget ’bakleget elo herlelekmake ula’aniluk herle kilogo usa’anhukhama, it inikimo nen lo lagagi.
47012001	An hogorakhilik waga lagei meke iti, usak dek mekeat he, hogorakhageinat o. Ninoe Etagapogot nen an nileken hoagaluk yoknekhemo na'bi baga higik, na'bikaka baga higik, hasigi meke igin o.
47012002	Empat belas tahun alebat ap an nilu meke ageikhe Kristus ipisak hunik welageikhe meke Allah nen pogot oba hurli pere agorek thogotdiluk hurli ageikhe upu etoma baga lia'isikhe iti nilu. At iti ebeat lia'isikhe a? Agoreke lia'isikhe a. An nokodek. Nopase Allah at ilu o.
47012003	-
47012004	Ap iti Allah nen pogot oba hanoma eloma lia'isikhemo wene akhuni nen egarek degat, nen usak erlok degat, meke asuk holhikhe nilu o. Itithogon mekeat he, ebeat lia'isikhe a? Agoreke a. An nokodek meke re, Allah at ilu igi iti.
47012005	Ap iti hasik anek hogorakhe dogolik, an nekaerek hasik hogorakhigidek meke re, nebe erlok dek iti hasik anek hogorakhageinat o.
47012006	An hogorakhagein halok he, nane eberogonat igin iti nen, akhuni kepu meke nen egarek hak igin dek o. Itithogonat meke re, akhuni aperek nen an hegerek iti meke hasik hogotnabunogo iluk, nebe inileken niigik, nane inasuk holhik, hagakharek iti bagahutdanuagaluk, ageikhe iti meke igidek thogotdigin iti o.
47012007	-
47012008	An nen, “Na'bikaka baga elalinat nileken higi iti nayuk o, ” iluk nekaerek nen hogorakhaunogo iluk, akhuni inebe bagake arlok ukisinem hinet wakharek hak, u noba agunem hinet wakhe dogoagaluk, noba 'banhikhemo, Iblis nen ayoko 'bisikhe meke hakene noba werekma, ninoe Etagapogot nen henogo ula'isoagaluk niki henagan oba ayoko 'bigi mekeat,
47012009	at nen he, “Hat erlok dek halok he, an nobatne horleagatma hebe nakmuthakherek etnogo nen, erlok hano dogogin o, ” iluk yoknikhikhe. Itithogonat yoknikhikhe iti nen, at Kristusobatne an nakla ’banhikhe meke itiat dogoagaluk, an yi meke ti meke hasik erlok degat dogolik, nakla arlekenhogo hogorakhekhe dogogin o.
47012010	Iti nen, an Kristus hasik, nebe erlok dek agei halok, akhuni nen nabok weak palho halok, wiik-weakhogon hagatnakho halok, yi aik ti aik hagatnakho halok, wim yakhe dogolik inasuogoluk hoborisegarek hak hobotneekho halok, an erlok degat werekma, iti baga nen nobatne agarek iti nen nakla arleken akhegerek.
47012011	It ap Kristus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isa agarek meke negen hagatlatluk witluk, “At Paulus etaga dek, ” iluk egarek iti, an eberogonat netaga dek. It koktek inetagapogot higi! Itithogon dek o. Hit nen hutdaniluk nalon halogo yoknisusak mekeat he, itithogon egethep dek iti nen he, eberogonat ap kepu nen egarek hak, yokhisigi iti o.
47012012	Hit nen he, “Paulus he, Kristus nen ayoko ’biluk la’i ageikhemo, ” iluk ekagat hutdanuagaluk, an ninom dogolik yi meke ti meke hasik nobakhanini hapugutdiluk hagakho werekma, akhuni nen hutduagaluk, Allah nen obatnerogon yi meke ti meke elalinat hagakhe lageikhe.
47012013	Hit hinobasik hagakherek iti, it Allah a’buri yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke hasik hagakherek meke iti ipisak walhaumo, ki meke hasik erlok dek hagathinakhi. An yabu hagakhe lagei hasik, “Niki oko ageikhe woknitni, ” iluk hinoba tiolhidek welagagi iti erlok dek hagathinakhi he a. Halok he, weagathinakhi iti hasik thagalogo degetdisalok hinakla hano atni o!
47012014	An alep niki pere baga wagagisik, yabokane ageikhe wisigiluk karelogo ’bigirik welagei o. An hinoba wisigin iti, yi meke ti meke ina’buri nen inagosa inopase lak heagowogeisegarek ’buk. Dek o. Inagosa inopase lak nen, ina'buri inobasik heago wogeisegarek iti nen, hit meke yi meke ti meke kino hinoba tiologo yokhisasigin ’buk. Dek o. Hinebeat herakhinabik wisigin o.
47012015	Iti hagat he, hit hinetaiken hasik an nameke yi meke ti meke ’binagagik, nebe inom ’binagagik, netaiken oba nen nakla arleken akhekhe dogolik ’binagusagat ’binagagi o. An hit hinebe netaiken hunik werek korlegat he, hit anek he, an nebe hinakmu dek negen dogosak a?
47012016	An nen he, hit hinoba akinetdigiluk hit meke kino yokhisigidek iti ekagat werek iti. Meke re, hit aperek nen ekhe dogolik, “At Paulus obabut kauk nogo nen, yi meke ti meke thaburagaluk, ane ’bitokhogon yoknisekherek, ” iluk ekhe lagap iti,
47012017	an nagarumi hit hinoba la’isa agagi emenogo nen, hit meke aperek thaburogo an woknesi agoukha nogo a? Motok dek o.
47012018	At Titus hinoba wisuagaluk akla kagalhigisik nen, ninagarlak Allah a’but ageikhe at ipisak la’isa agagimo wagoukha etnogo, wagoukhasik, at Titus nen hit nen ’bisigip meke aperek munenogo horlasikhe nogo a? Motok degat o. An Titus nipisak he, ninobabut opakiat hagakhe lagagu dek nogo? It aperek alep inisok ’bilik lageikharekma, it aperek yabokane oba dukhogon ’bilik lageikharek hak, at Titus an nipisak yabu tak-tagat hagakhe lagagu dek nogo a?
47012019	Hit hinakla nen he, “At Paulus wene ekaerek oba degerogo iliogo, ” iluk haganeat nen ekhe lagap mekeat he, an itithogon apekhe lagei dek o. Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu. At Allah il oba, an Kristus nipisak hunik dogoligat ekhe lagei iti. Yi meke ti meke hagakhe lagei iti, hit hinetaiken horle asuagalugat hagakhe lagei o.
47012020	An yabokane hinoba wisigin iti witluk nen, an nen, “It inobabut hano werekma ligin, ” iluk apekhe lagei hak, dek. Weak werekma ’bithisa ageik, nen, hit nen, “At Paulus obabut hano, ” iluk egethep hak, dek. Weak dogolik 'bithisa ageik, hagasunogo iluk, nelabut hiriogo. Hit-hit hinom wene yakhik, ua palhik, hinakla aga dageigik, hinekaerek hasik anek hagakhik, inabok weak thelekma palhik, limago palhik, hinekaerek nen hogorakhigik, yugunat-yaganat hagakhik, hagakhunem an wisusak iti, nayuk.
47012021	Itithogon hagakhunem, an wagunem, nopase Allah nen hit hinobabut hagakhe lagap iti hasik hit hinil oba nekarli warogo thebetdanusak iti nayuk. It akhuni hit meke aperek doalegat nen humi inaguni werek meke, ap inagugi werek meke nen param ha'isigik, horlak tharlisik meke, elege nen ha'isigik, inekarli dek weak motok hagakhik, o haganeat nen hagakharek meke here'isalok inobabut hebelageidek motok welageikharek iti hasik, de asisunogo iluk nelabut hisik welagei o.
47013001	An alep niki pere baga hinoba wagagisik nen, yabokane ageikhe wisigin iti o. Allah ane baga holal men iluk waganek werek, “Akhuni nen it aperek yi wene ti wene inoba 'buogoluk halok he, akhuni inebe pere a? Henagan a, weak hagakhunem inileken hega meke nen, Eberogonat ninileken hogo, isi halok he, eberogonat apausak, ”\rq (Ulangan 19:15)\rq* iluk isikhe iti nen he, an witluk, iti itithogonat hagasisigin iti o.
47013002	An alep niki ageikhe wagagisik oba nen yabokane wagagi iti baga, it akhuni hit meke aperek alebat weak hagakhukha meke inom, nen it aperek o etoma meke inebetha'bokhogonat inom, inasuk wakhigi meke yogotak an nebe walegat dogolik inakla eberogo yogeisageinat o. An yabokanewitluk nen, it iti thebelogo ’bisasigin dek. Ukum inoba ’bisigin o.
47013003	Hit nen he, “Paulus iti, Kristus akla dogolik iliogo a? Dek a, ” iluk nobabut paluogoluk egep iti, nebe wagunem ekagat hutdanugunat o. At Kristus hit hagakhethep iti hasik ebe erlok dek nen obakhanini huk agarek ’buk. At hit hinom dogolik obatneat werek o.
47013004	At Kristus ebe erlok dek werekma o baga meldiluk wakhukha mekeat he, at Allah obatne baga ilugutdisikhemo ilugat welagarek. Iti hakeneat, nit at ninom hunik dogolik erlok dek welago mekeat he, at Kristus ninom hunik niniluk dogolik nen, Allah obatne baga hit hinobasik hagasisugun o.
47013005	Hit nen he, “Nit ninetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisugu etnogo hakokthegat welago a? Dek a, ” iluk hinekaerek nen hinobabut hutukhogon palano. Itithogon palekhe dogolik, erlok hagatlageidek halok he, “Yesus Kristus ninakla werek, ” iluk ekagat hugun o.
47013006	Nen, hit nen, nit ninobabut palhe dogolik, “Paulus lak inobabut palho meke erlok dek ageidek. Kristus nen eberogonat inayoko ’bisikhemo, ” iluk ekagat nisekhe lagap apigi.
47013007	Nit nen he, hit weak ageikhe hagasunogo iluk, Allah ayoko ’bekhe lago. Iti, hit nen hinileken nisekhe dogolik nen, “Paulus lak hano hagariogei, ” iluk ninobabut palogo nen ekhe dogobageik iluk ekhe lago dek o. Nit ninobabut palhunem, hit nen, “It erlok dek hakene hagatlageikha, ” apegep halok he, yugunat. Here’isani o. Hirat hano hagakhe dogobageik iluk hit hinobasik Allah ayoko ’bekhe lago o.
47013008	Iti, nit nen ebe wene thagalusak erlok dek. Legesusak anek welago.
47013009	Nit erlok dek werek korlek he, hit hinobatne werek dogosak halok he, hano iluk, ninakla arleken akhekhe lago. Iti hasigat, hit hinetaiken ’bogokhogon horle asuagaluk, Allahayoko 'bekhe lago.
47013010	Iti nenat, nebe walegat dogolik wene yi holal waganogo 'bekhe lagei. Nebe yabokane wagei halok he, ninom dogolik, nane puk weak wenakhisaunogo iluk, holal itithogon waganogo 'bekhe lagei iti o. Ninoe Etagapogot nen obatne woknikhikhemo iteerek welagei iti, hit hinebe weagathinabuogoluk 'buk. Hinetaiken horlethinabuogoluk iteerek welagei o.
47013011	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ilugun oba arat men yokhisak. Hinakla arleken akhigik, hinetaiken 'bogokhogon horletdakhigik hagakhe dogono. Wene hinasuk warik wagei iti, hinasuk hanorogo holino. Hinetaiken opakiat dogolik, hinom dapukhogon dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogogun halok, Allah akhuni akmurinakhik, inom dapukhogon hano 'bisigik, hagakherek meke etnogo thethisik dogogin o.
47013012	-
47013014	Hit-hit nen, Allah hasik heagei hinape tharluk wat-wat hagarik lano. Allah a'buri yoma meke tha'bokhogonat nen, heagei wathinakhaat o. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut hano etnogo nen hanothinakhik, ninopase Allah nen akmuthinakhik, Agoreke nen hano dapukhogon 'binageigik, hagakhe dogoak o
48001001	-
48001002	Hit Allah a'buri o Galatia yi ai ti ai natogokhe lagap meke nagarlak lak nerugi. An Paulus nagarlak lak nerugi Allah a’buri aperek o yoma ninom welago meke inebe tha’bokhogonat ninom nen wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago iti. An nayoko ’biluk la’ani ageikhemo wagagi iti, erlo akhuni nen ’buk. Nen, ap ageikhe wene oba warogo ’biluk la’ani ageikhe ’bugat o. Meke re, at Yesus Kristus ebe watlageikhemo opase Allah nen ilugutdisikhe meke etnogo ipisak nenat nayoko ’biluk la’ani agoukhama wagagi iti.
48001003	Ninopase Allah men, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus men, ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapukhogon thethisik welageik, hagakhe dogoak o.
48001004	Nit weak hagakhorek iti nen ninopase Allah akla nen, “Itithogon hagasuak, ” iluk akla apasikhe baga, at YesusKristus nen nit akhuni agat oba meke yoma tilninabigiluk, etaiken nenat nit ninobabut weak motok hagakhorek meke iti ukum at ekaerek nen oba ’bakhalok watlageikhe iti.
48001005	Iti nen, at Allah at hogorakho motok dogouok. Itithogon igi iti, “Ebeat asuak, ” u hak, “Amin, ” igi iti.
48001006	At Allah nen, hit Kristus obabut hano meke etnogo hinom hunik dogobageik iluk hinayoko 'bisikhe mekeat he, thogotdisalok ibat nomokhogon hano wene thalek ninat meke oba ebesi laga lagap iti, an nayuk.
48001007	Ebe re, wene hano wene ninat ageikhe welagarek dekmaat o. Mekeat he, it akhuni aperek nen hano wene Kristus nen hagakhikhe wene iti meke ninat hagarogo nukhethinabuogoluk yokhisiliogei iti nenat igi o.
48001008	Meke re, tha nen, it ap iti nen a, nit nen a, malaikat pogot oba meke nen a, hano wene nit nen yokhisasugu meke iti, thogotdisalok ninat meke, yokhisagun halok he, Allah nen homan 'bisoagat o.
48001009	Iti nen, wene haganeat yokhisasigi hak, yabokane dagakhogon yokhisak. Ap thani nen wene hit waganhigip meke etnogo thogotdisalok ninat meke yokhisa ago halok he, Allah nen homan 'bisoagat o.
48001010	An nane igi iti, akhuni nen, “Hat hano egen, ” iluk yoknesuagaluk ekhe lagei a? At he, Allah nen, “Hat hano egen, ” iluk, yoknesuagaluk ekhe lagei a. Akhuni inakla hanorogo ekhe lagei halok he, an nebe Kristus atuaneke usak degat o. Meke re, an Allah akla hanorogo ekhe lagei o.
48001011	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An nen hano wene yogeisilik nekhe lagei iti, akhuni inane meke yogeisilik nekhe lagei dek iti hit hinilu asusagat o.
48001012	Wene iti, akhuni nen woknekhik, yakulnekhik, isukhama waganhigi 'buk. Wene iti, at Yesus Kristus akla limago welageikhe meke, at nenat thelekmaat yakulnikhikhemo waganhigi o.
48001013	An alebat nit Yahudi meke ninawene a'bethogon hago dogolik, akhuni Allah a’buri meke yi aik ti aik hagarinakhik, inebe motok degetdisoagaluk nobatnerogon hagakhik, hagakhe lagagi meke iti, nabok hit hinasuk holhe lagagibat o.
48001014	Wene nit Yahudi meke ninopa lak nen yakulnisasukha meke etnogo hago dogolik, it an nagarlak lak ninom higit meke nen inakla puk negen hagakhe korlek, an anek, nobatnerogon hagakhe lagagi iti.
48001015	Itithogon mekeat he, at Allah obabut hano etnogo nen haganeat nagosa akla nen aban itaknakhidek werek korlegat, nebe wenaknakhikhe.
48001016	Wenaknakhikhesik nen, hano wene a'but Yesus hagakhikhe wene etnogo akhuni itikmanke meke yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk a’but ebe thelekma inugutneasikhemo, wene akhuni aperek inoba hinok waganhidegat o.
48001017	Nen, it aperek Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo, o Yerusalem werekma inoba dageigidegat o. Meke re, o akhuni Arab meke inaila eloma lagagisik nen, yabokane napuke o Damsyik wagagi.
48001018	Wagagisik, 3 tahun welagagisik nen, yabokane Petrus etnogo ebe nilurogo iluk, oba o Yerusalem dageisigi. Dageisigisik nen, at aila niki 15 hari nen nipisak etoma welagagu.
48001019	Dogolik, it Yesus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isasikhe meke emenogo inebe aperek ninom abuk ageidek. Ninoe Etagapogot agot Yakobus etnogo anek nipisak abuk agagu.
48001020	Wene an nen holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei iti, Allah il obaat eberogonat igi o. Nekalat igi dek o.
