48001021	Etoma welagagisik nen, yabokane o Siria men, Kilikia men, wagagi iti.
48001022	Itinem, it Allah a’buri Kristus inom hunik dogolik, o Yudea natogosi lagoukha meke nen an nebe inokodegat welagoukha.
48001023	Itithogon nebe inokodegat dogolik, it akhuni aperek nen nabok anek men isinem inasuk holhe lagoukha, “Ap alep nit yi aik ti aik hagatninakhik, hano wene degetdisoagaluk hagakhik, hagakhe lageikhe meke etnogo, yogotak akhuni hano wene etnogo eberogonat iluk waganuagaluk yogeisilik liliogo, ” iluk isinem nabok inasuk holhe lagoukha.
48001024	Itithogon holhe dogolik, an nobasik Allah hogorakhe lagoukha.
48002001	Itithogon isukhama, an 14 tahun welagagisik nen yabokane Barnabas nipisak nen at Titus ebe wolok, o Yerusalem lagagu.
48002002	Itithogon lagagu iti, Allah nen, “Hat o Yerusalem at dagousagat o, ” iluk yoknikhikhe iti nen dageisigisik nen, hano wene iti it akhuni itikmanke meke yogeisilik nekherek iti, “Wene ebe itithogon, ” iluk thekekhogon yogeisagaluk an haganeat nen, yogotak ya nen, nobatnerogon hagakhe lagei meke iti, alomarogo hagatlasunogo iluk, it inougi meke inebe inasokneat ’bisalok yogeisasigi.
48002003	At Titus iti ebe Yunani meke ninom lagagu mekeat he, it inougi koktek emenogo nen, “Hoado haperlagap etnogo palusak, ” iluk inane obatnerogon yogokhidek.
48002004	Itithogon mekeat he, it aperek nen he, ninagarlak lak Allah a'buri meke negen hagatlatluk lelokhogon limago ukitluk nen, oado aperlagap paluagaluk isukhaat. Itithogon limago ukitluk nen, nit Kristus ninom opakiat atluk ninasokneat dogolik ninobabut hagakhorek meke iti, it nen, “Erlo nikithogon nen hagatlageikhasik hagariogei, ” iluk erlo herasuogoluk uki agoukha iti. Itithogon herakhukhasik inapma ’binaniluk, it hagakharek meke iti hagakhe dogoagaluk inileken ’bitnisa uki agoukha iti.
48002005	Meke re, wene hano wene iti hit hinobasik hanorogo irlirli waganogo hakhisik dogouogoluk, it nen itithogon isinem, nit nen it inane hologo niniki opakiat oba ageikhe, “I o, ” iluk, igidegat.
48002006	It aperek inakla nen, “Inetaga koktek werek he, irat, ” egarek meke iti nen wene an yogeisilik nekherek meke etnogo yabokane ninat yogeisilik nekhe dogoak nen iluk yoknikhidegat. Allah nen akhuni inoado itikmanke anek ileken hisalok nen, “Yi weak. Yi hano, ” iluk ekherek dek iti nen, an it iti inobasik alebat inetaga koktek welageikha meke a? Dek meke a, iluk, wene munini ebekhe lagagi dek iti.
48002007	-
48002008	At Allah nen, at Petrus akhuni Yahudi meke inoba erlok loagaluk ayoko 'biluk la’igik, nen an he, akhuni itikmanke meke inoba erlok loagaluk nayoko ’biluk la’anhik, hagakhikhe iti nen, it ap inetaga koktek iti inakla nen, “Petrus nen hano wene nit akhuni Yahudi meke yakulnisoagaluk ayoko ’bisikhe hak, at Paulus nen hano wene it akhuni itikmanke meke itithogon yakulisoagaluk ayoko ’bisikhemo hogo, ” iluk ekagat hutdinanhukha.
48002009	Itithogon hutdinanhukhasik nen, it Yakobus men, Petrus men, Yohanes men, Allah a’buri nen, “Nit ninougi it werek, ” iluk egarek meke nen, “Hit nen, wene akhuni itikmanke meke yogeisilik lano. Nen, nit nen akhuni Yahudi meke inobasik yogeisilik lugun. Ninom tak-tak hagakhe dogouok, ” iluk nen, Barnabas nipisak niniki hak-hak heagei watninakhukha.
48002010	Heagei watninakhukhasik nen, ninasuk warogo negen wene men anek yoknisasukha, “Akhuni nit meke aperek inameke dek meke yoma inoba eberek dogolik, yomageisekhe dogono, ” iluk, yoknisasukha iti, an nen itithogon nakla arleken akhekhe dogoliknobatnerogon hagakherek mekeat yoknisasukha.
48002011	Meke re, at Petrus o Antiokhia wageikhesik korlo hagakhe lageikhemo, an nen, “Hat hagakhe lagan iti weak o, ” iluk, pakhogonat wenagakhigi.
48002012	Iti men hagakhe lageikhe baga wenagakhigi. Alebat, at Yakobus nen agarumi la’isa ageikhe meke aban wageidek werek korlek, at Petrus etnogo it akhuni itikmanke meke inom hipiri dapukhogon neke lagoukha. Meke re, it wagoukhasik oba nen, at Petrus akla nen, “Nit ninoado aperlagap palek meke aperek nen nena yoknesugun, ” iluk, ayuk nen, it inom hipiri nikidek thogotdiluk hekhogon dukhisikhe iti.
48002013	At ane pere dogolik hekhogon dukhisikhe hak, it akhuni Yahudi meke aperek inebe tha’bokhogonat inom dukhekhe dogolik, at Barnabas etnogo akla kagalogo yabokane it inane pere meke iti lapeldiluk dukhisikheat.
48002014	Itithogon dukhisukhama nen, an nakla nen, “Wene eberogonat, hano wene yi mekeat he, it inobabut he, hano wene yakulisekhe dogolik hagasusak meke hagariogei dek higi, ” iluk, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inil oba Petrus wene men iluk yogokhigi, “Hat hebe Yahudi mekeat he, akhuni Yahudi meke hagakharek hak hagakhidek, akhuni itikmanke meke nen hagakharek hak hagakhe dogoligat, it itikmanke meke yogeisekhe dogolik, Hit hinobabut akhuni Yahudi meke hagakharek hak, inobabut waganogo hagakhe dogono, iluk obatnerogon yakulisekhe lagan iti nenaluk, ” iluk pakhogon wenagakhigi.
48002015	Nit ninebe Yahudi mekeat itaklagagu. It itikmanke weak hagakharek meke iti hakene itaklagagu 'buk.
48002016	Meke re, akhuni wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo mothogon hagakhunem nen, Allah nen wene inoba meke korogo wokhalok inom yabokane inapuke hunogo ’bisekherek dek. Meke re, inetaiken Yesus Kristus oba hakotdisinem anek, hunogo ’bisekherek iluk hiniluat o. Wene iti akhuni aperek nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo mothogon hagakhunem, wene inoba meke korogo wokhalok, inom yabokane inapuke hunogo ’bisekherek dek. Iti nen, nit nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo mothogon hagakhunem ’buk. Ninetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisinem weneninoba meke korogo wokhalok, at ninom ninapuke hunogo 'binanoagaluk, ninetaiken Kristus Yesus oba hakotdisugu iti.
48002017	Nit Kristus ninom hunhunem, Allah nen wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok, ninom yabokane ninapuke hunogo 'binanoagaluk, ninobatnerogo walhekhe dogoligat, ninobabut akhuni itikmanke inobabut hagakharek hak, ninom tak-tagat welago, iluk ekagat ariogo iti nen, nit weak hagakhorek meke iti, erlo at Kristus iluk usak a? Motok dek o.
48002018	O misaldiluk yabokane halharek hak, an nen nit akhuni Yahudi hagakhorek meke arat thogotdisasigi meke yabokane hagakhe dogolema, Allah ane thogotdiluk thagalogo hagakherek meke iluk ekagat atlep.
48002019	Meke re, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti nen nebe warek meke hakene hagatnakhemo, an nebe niluk dogolik Allah hasik hagakhe dogeigiluk, wene iti hasik warek negen welagei. Iti Kristus ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukha iti nipisagat ninakhukha iti.
48002020	Nen, yogotak nebe niluk welagei yi, nekaerek nobatne baga welagei 'buk. At Kristus at nakla dogolik iluk welagarek o. At ebe Allah a'burat dogolik, nebe akmu nen an hasigat, “Nasuak, ” iluk akla apasikhe baga ebe wakhukha iti. Nen, an netaiken at oba hakotdiluk werekma, at ebe nakla werekma, niluk welagarek iti.
48002021	Allah obabut hano nen hanotninakherek wene iti an nen thagalogo here'isegerek dek. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok ninom ninapuke hunogo 'binanilepma re, Kristus watlageikhe iti yugunat alomarogo watlatlep o.
48003001	Hit akhuni o Galatia meke hinetaiken dek hagakhe lagap etoma re! Yesus Kristus ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukha wene etnogo hinil obaat thekekhogon yakulhisasugu mekeat he, wene yabokane tha nen hinaklakagalhemo itithogon hagakhe lagap.
48003002	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo mothogon hagakhe lagagip iti baga Allah Agoreke wokhisasikhe a? At he, nit nen hano wene yakulhisasugumo holhigisip nen, “Eberogonat, ” iluk hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisigip iti baga wokhisasikhe a. Wene opakiat itiat yoknetni ta.
48003003	Yabu ebekeram hakhegarek hak, Allah Agoreke oba hakhasigisip mekeat he, yogotak ya hinetaiken motok dek atluk hinekaerek hinobatne baga 'bogokhogon hagatlasi lugun a? Erlok dek o.
48003004	Allah nen tha'bokhogonat itithogon hagathinakhunem hagakhigip meke iti, we yugunat alomatlasusak a? Erlok dek o.
48003005	Halok he, nikithogon ugun. Hit nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo mothogon hagakhe lagagip oba, at Agoreke kokhogon wokhisigik, hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagathinakhik, hagariogo a? At he, nit nen hano wene yakulhisasugumo holhigisip, eberogonat iluk, hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisigisip iti baga wokhisiliogo a.
48003006	Wene iti hakene, at Abraham etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhemo at Allah nen, “Hat hobabut mothogon hagakhe dogou hak, hetaiken noba hakotdegenma, wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik hapuke nipisak hunogo 'bagagi itiat o, ”\rq (Kejadian 15:6)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
48003007	Iti nenat, hit hinakla nen, Abraham a'buri ebeat meke, it akhuni inetaiken Allah baga hakotdiluk welageikharek meke itiat o, iluk hutdusak.
48003008	Haganeat wene ebe itithogon aban hagatlageidek werek korlegat, it akhuni itikmanke meke inetaiken Allah oba hakotdisinem, at nen, “Wene hinoba meke korogo wokhalok ninom yabokane hinapuke hunogo 'binagagin o, ” iluk, wene hano wene aban yogeisigidek dogolik, Abraham tak wene abok men iluk yogokhikhe, “Yi akhuni ti akhuni tha'bokhogonat an nen hanorinabigin iti, erlo harat o, ”\rq (Kejadian 12:3)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bisukha.
48003009	Abraham etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhemo, at nen hanotdisikhe hak, it akhuni aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdegarek meke inom tak-tagat hanorinakheregat o.
48003010	Nen, Allah ane baga holal men waganogo ’bisukha, “Wene an nen inasuk wakhigimo holal waganek werek iti tha’bokhogonat akhuni inasuk holiluk nen, mothogon hagakharek dek halok, inebe dopok homan ’bisagein werek o, ”\rq (Ulangan 27:26)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bisukha hak, it akhuni aperek nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo mothogon hagasuogoluk, inetaiken iti baga hakotdiluk welageikharek meke, Allah nen homan ’bisagein weregat o.
48003011	Allah nen, “Hinetaiken an noba hakotdiluk dogogun iti baga, an nen wene hinoba meke korogo wokhalokninom yabokane hinapuke hunogo ’binagagin meke hiniluk motok dogogun o, ”\rq (Habakuk 2:4)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha iti nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga nit tha’bokhogonat wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok yabokane ninom hunogo ’binanusak degat o, iluk, ekagat ageikhe.
48003012	Akhuni nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hago welageikharek iti, erlo hasik, holal men waganek werek, “Wene iti tha’bokhogonat mothogon hagakhe dogogun halok, iti baga hiniluk dogogun o, ”\rq (Imamat 18:5)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo 'bisukha iti. Meke re, inetaiken Allah baga hakotdegarek iti, ninat o.
48003013	Allah ane baga holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, menisukha, “Inebe o baga meldisalok inasumo, it inebe watlasugun meke iti, Allah nen homan 'bisagein werek o, ”\rq (Ulangan 21:23)\rq* iluk, holal waganogo 'bisukha hagat, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga, homan 'binanusak mot werekma, at Kristus nen ninoko palogo tilninabigiluk wene nit ninoba meke korogo at oba 'bakhasikhe iti.
48003014	At Allah nen Abraham hanotdisikhe hak, yi akhuni ti akhuni tha'bokhogonat Kristus Yesus inom hunekhunem hanorinabuagaluk, Yesus watlageikhe iti. At itithogon watlageikhesik oba nen, Allah Agoreke wokhisagein iluk abok tak yoknisasikhe etnogo, ninetaiken at oba hakotdisinem woknisekherek iti.
48003015	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit akhuni hagakhorek meke ageikhe oba lisogon yokhisak. Akhuni inebe pere nen, “Itithogon hagasuok, ” iluk hupuk palogo isi halok, it aperek nen munenhik, wene ninat meke ageikhe oba lapelhik, hagakharek motok dek o.
48003016	Wene iti hakene, at Allah nen Abraham yogokhe dogolik, “Hat itithogon wokhikhik, nen, hat nen itago meke ageikhe itithogon wogokhik, hagasigin o, ” iluk abok yogokhikhe iti. Inebe doalegat inobasik u hakene, “Hat nen itago meke aperek itithogon wogeisagein, ” iluk igidek. Ap ebe opakiat meke hasik, “Hat nen itago meke ageikhe itithogon wogosigin, ”\rq (Kejadian 12:7; 13:15; 17:7; 24:7)\rq* iluk, abok yogokhikhe iti ebe re, Kristus meke hasik isikhe.
48003017	Wene iti men hasik igi. Allah nen, “Itithogon wokhesigin, ” iluk, abok kasukhogon isikhesik, 430 tahun weiageikhesik nen, wene ninasuk yabokane nen wakhikhe iti baga, wene alep meke iti munenogo degetdigidek.
48003018	“Itithogon wokhesigin, ” iluk, Abraham abok tak yogokhikhe meke iti, at nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo mothogon hagakhe lageikhe baga wogotlepma, abok yogokhikhe etnogo, we oko degat wogokhikhe iluk ilep ’buk. Meke re, Allah obabut hano nen Abraham abok yogokhikhe iti nenat, ebe we oko degat wogokhikhe iti.
48003019	Halok he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe iti nenaluk. Iti, nit akhuni weagat hagakho welagagu meke iti ’bualasuagaluk, ninasuk yabokane wakhikhe iti. Meke re, wene iti Abraham nen itago meke ageikhe wogosigin iluk, abok yogokhikhe etnogo, ebe aban itaklageidek werek korlek elanma hasik wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo, malaikat nen Musa yogokhunem at ebe turlem heisogo dogolik, akhuni yakulisoagaluk malaikat inayoko ’biluk la’isa ageikhe iti.
48003020	Akhuni pere mikirlogo hurli warek werekma, ap ageikhe turlem heisogo dogosagat o. Itithogon mekeat he, at Allah ekaerek nen wene abok yoknisekherek iti nen, at nen wene oko dek ebelake anegat yoknisekherek iti.
48003021	Halok he, wene Allah nen Abraham, “Wokhesigin, ” iluk, abok yogokhikhesik nen, yabokaneninasuk wakhikhe wene iti, akhuni aperek inom agorek welageikharek iti palharek hak hagatlasigin usak a? Motok dek o. Wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga ninilugutninabigiluk wokniselepma re, wene iti bagaat weneninoba meke korogo wokhalok, Allah ninom yabokane ninapuke hunogo ’binanilep iti.
48003022	Allah ane baga holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, “Akhuni hinebe tha’bokhogonat weak hagakhe lagap meke iti baga, hiniki herle warogo hakene welagap, ” iluk, yoknisasikhe iti, nit ninetaiken Yesus Kristus oba hakotdumo, Allah nen abok isikhe meke etnogo nit ninetaiken at oba hakotdugun meke woknisagaluk isikhe iti.
48003023	Ninetaiken Kristus oba hakotdusak hakok asi lageidek werek korlek, yabokane wene iti winametdigin iti mothogon ninetaiken at oba hakotduagaluk, akhuni herle warogo hagasik welageikharek hak, wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo nen herle warogo haknisik welageikhe.
48003024	Nit ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisinem, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok, Allah ninom yabokane ninapuke hunogo ’binagaluk, Kristus aban itaklageidek werek korlek, wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo nen haknisik dogoagaluk isikhe iti.
48003025	Meke re, yogotak ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotdusak arat hakok asi ageikhesikmo etnogo nen, wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti nen yabokane haknisik werek dek.
48003026	Hit hinetaiken Kristus Yesus oba hakotdiluk welagap iti nen hinebe tha’bokhogonat Allah a’buri welagap iti.
48003027	Nen, Kristus hinom hunesuogoluk ima usasigip meke hinebe tha’bokhogonat, su ikhegarek hak Kristus obabut waganhigip iti.
48003028	Waganiluk, yabokane hit tha’bokhogonat, Kristus Yesus hinom hunik dogolik hinebe opakiat meke welagap iti nen, hit ebetlake Yahudi meke, ebetlake akhuni itikmanke igik, ebetlake inatuan meke, ebetlake inasokne meke igik, ebetlake humi, ebetlake ap igik, ekhe dogosak dek.
48003029	Hit hinebe Kristus meke halok he, hinebe Abraham nen itago meke welagap. Halok he, Allah nen Abraham abok yogokhikhe meke etnogo, hit wokhisausak morat o.
48004001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ageikhe yi yokhisak. Inopase lak watlagunem iniki 'biluk yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat ina'buri iteerek mekeat, yekerugi inebe aban inarlue ageidek halok he, ap ageikhe nen ekhe dogolik, “Yekerugi inebe inarlue agunem yabokane wogeisagun, ” iluk inatuaneke meke thalek it inatuaneke welageikharek hak welageikharek iti.
48004002	Itithogon werekma, inopase lak inebe iniluk dogolik, “Iti hurli asi laga halok, wogotno, ” iluk nenoane egarek oba morat asi lageidek werek korlek, iniki 'biluk emenogo it aperek nen hagasik dogolik, inebe inom hagasik welageikharek iti.
48004003	Iti hak, nit ninetaiken aban horle ageidek werekma, mokat obabut weak meke agat oba yoma iki baga welagarek meke nen apma 'binaniluk welageikhe iti.
48004004	Werekma, at Allah nen a'but ayoko 'biluk agat oba la'isusak arat asi ageikhemo, la'i ageikhemo, he agat oba meke nenat itakhikhe. Itithogon itakhikhemo, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo apma dogolik asuk hologo hagakhe lageikhe.
48004005	Itithogon la'i ageikhe iti, nit Allah a'buri hagatlasuagaluk, wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo nen apma haknisik werekma, herle hisalninabi wisuagaluk la'i ageikhe iti.
48004006	Itithogon herle hisalogo 'binanhikhemo, ninebe Allah a'buri welago iti nen, at a'but Agoreke ninetaikenma 'binani ageikhemo dogolik, at Allah hasik, nit nen, “Nopase, nopase o, ” ekhe dogoagaluk ekherek iti.
48004007	Halok he, it aperek inatuaneke welagagip iti hak, welagap 'buk. At Allah a'buriat agagisip welagap o. Itithogon agagisip welagap iti nen, Allah nen, “Hit an nebe na'buri agap iti nen, an na'buri wogeisagaluk 'bisigi meke hit iteerek asugun o, ” iluk ekherek iti.
48004008	Hit alebat nen, Allah ebe hinokodek welagagip iti nen, ninat meke ebe Allah hakene dekmaat apma welagagip iti.
48004009	Meke re, an nen, “At Allah hinebe ilu welagarek, ” iluk uem, “Hit yogotak nen Allah ebe hinilu agap, ” iluk igi iti. Halok he, hit hinekaerek nen mokat obabut weak obatne dek meke, ikimo dek meke, iti oba yabokane suguluk hinapuke apma ukuogoluk hagakhe lagap iti, nenaluk.
48004010	Hit nen ekhe dogolik, “Niniki iti baga itithogon hagasuok. Thut iti baga itithogon hagasuok. Mo iti baga dageikhe halok, iti baga usekhe halok, itithogon hagasuok. Tahun iti baga itithogon hagasuok, ” iluk, iti meke kogotdiluk hagakhe lagap iti.
48004011	An hit hinobasik nobatnerogo mep dageik-dagokhogon hagarik nekhe lagei etnogo we yugunat hagatlasigin a, iluk nayuk ariogo nen igi.
48004012	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An nebe alebat, hit hakeneat hagatlagagisik welagarek yi hak, hit meneke an hakeneat atluk nobabut waganino. Alebat hit nen ageikhe weagatnakhidegat.
48004013	Ebekeram an noba u waganhigi iti nen hano wene yakulhisasigi etnogo hiniluat o.
48004014	Yakulhisasinem an noba u hekhe lagagi iti baga hina’it neausak morat mekeat he, hina'it niigidek, kolelogo here’anhidek, malaikat Allah nen la’isu meke waganu hak he a? At he, Kristus Yesus ebe waganu hak he a, woknakhigip iti.
48004015	Hit alebat hinobabut akilukhogon hagakhe lagagip etnogo, yogotak hinobabut nikithogon hagatlagasip welagap. Inileken hemelogo wogeisegarek dogolepma, hit hinobabut hinileken hemelogo woknetlebat iluk, hinabok pakhogonat usak welagei.
48004016	Yogotak wene eberogonat yokhisigi iti nen, ninom wim palek meke negen neegep he a.
48004017	It akhuni aperek ethoma hinebe wokhinabuogoluk hinakla obatnerogon kagaliogei iti, inetaiken mot dogolik hagariogei 'buk. An ninom hano welagorek meke here’aniluk lisogo wokhisik dukhiluk, it werekmake obatnerogon hagakhe dogoagaluk hinakla kagaliogei iti.
48004018	Itithogon hagariogei iti, an nebe ninom werekma, dekma, hit hano hagakhe dogoagaluk hinakla obatnerogon kagalhe dogoumo, hano anek.
48004019	Meke re, na’buri hinebe nakmu lak o. Humi nen ineagei itaginabuogoluk hinet wakharek hak, an nen yabokane itakhinabumo, hit hinobabut Kristus obabut hakene hagatlatlep o! iluk, hit hinobasik an noba u hinet weak wakhe lagei.
48004020	An hit hinobasik nikithogon hagasu he, nobakha palariogo iti nen, an nakla nen, yogotak ya hinoba witluk ninom dogolik wene ninat negen ageikhe yokhisele o, iluk, nakla apekhe lagei iti.
48004021	Hit nen, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo apma ukiluk holek hagakhe dogogun, ” iluk ekhe lagap meke yi, an nen wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga holal waganek werek meke yokhisagein yi, hinasuk hanorogo holini o.
48004022	Wene holal waganogo ’bisukha iti baga men waganek werek. At Abraham nen a’buri pere itaginakhikhe iti. Ageikhe he atuaneke meke waganhikhesik itakhikhe. Nen, ageikhe age ebe meke nen itakhikhe.
48004023	Meke re, he atuaneke meke nen itakhikhe meke iti, akhuni nen itaginakharek hak itakhikhe iti. Nen, age ebe meke nen itakhikhe iti, Allah nen abok yogokhikhe etnogo tak-tagat itakhikhe iti.
48004024	Wene Allah nen nit akhuni ninom alep ageikhe wakhikhesik nen, yabokane wene ageikhe wakhikhe iti, humi inebe pere, Hagar men, Sara men, eta inoba lisogonyokhisak. Wene Allah nen tom Sinai etoma nen wakhikhe iti ebe re, he Hagar eagei inatuaneke meke itaginakhikhe iluk, oba lisogon igi iti.
48004025	He Hagar iti, tom Sinai akhuni Arab meke inaila welagarek meke iti hasik igi iti. At Hagar ebe inom, eagei inom, inatuaneke welagoukha iti hak, yogotak akhuni o Yerusalem meke itithogonat welageikharek iti.
48004026	Meke re, he ekaerek age ebe meke hakene, o Yerusalem pogot oba meke iti, nit ninagosaat o.
48004027	Iti hasik, Allah ane baga wene men iluk holal waganek werek, “He agun werek meke nen eagei inebe pererlagat itaginakho korlegat, ageikhe agun nen lologo here'isikhe meke nen, eagei doalegat itaginakherek iti nen, hat hebe abirli heak itakhigidegat welagan meke iti, hakla arleken akhano. Eak itakhagaluk hinet wakhidek welagan meke iti, hakla arleken akhalok hane akilukhogon ino, ”\rq (Yesaya 54:1)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti.
48004028	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit he, Allah nen Abraham abokyogokhikhe meke, ebe at Ishak itakhikhe hak, hititakhinakhikhemo welagap o.
48004029	Meke re, at Abraham a'but ageikhe akhuni nen itaginakharek hak itakhikhe meke iti nen, a'but ageikhe Allah Agoreke baga itakhikhe meke iti oba yi aik ti aik hekhe lageikhe hak, nit yogotak itithogonat hagatninabiogei iti.
48004030	Meke re, Allah ane holal waganek iti baga wene nena isikhe nogo. Men isikhe apigi, “He hage ebe meke eak iti nen hat hiki 'biluk ite asigin hak, at he hatuaneke meke eak iti nen, hiki 'biluk ite asigin dek o. Halok he, he hatuaneke meke iti eak ipisagat mukhogo ula'isano! ”\rq (Kejadian 21:10)\rq* iluk yogokhikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha.
48004031	Meke re, nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit he, he atuaneke meke iti eagei welago 'buk. Dek o. Age ebe meke iti eagei welago o.
48005001	Nit Kristus nen ninasokneat ’binanhikhemo yogotak ninasokneat welago. Iti nen, yi meke ti meke akin weak meke it akhuni inatuaneke meke nen o perlago wolok loagaluk inomorlo baga ’begarek hak, akin meke iti yabokane hinoba ’binogo iluk, hinobatnerogon metek dogono.
48005002	An Paulus nekaerek nen wene eberogonat yokhisak. Hit hinekaerek nen hinoado aperlagap it aperek nen palhinabuagaluk inayoko ’bekhe lagap halok he, at Kristus nen hanothinabigin dek o. Alomarogoat hagatlakhagun iti.
48005003	Hit aperek hinoado aperlagap palhinabuagaluk, it aperek inayoko ’bugun halok he, hinebe dopok hinasuk yabokane wasik. Itithogon palhinakho halok, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo here’isigidek tha’bokhogonat mothogon hagakhe dogosak o.
48005004	Hit aperek nen, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga hakotdiluk, at nen, wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok, ninom yabokane ninapuke hunogo ’binanuak, ” iluk hagakhe lagap halok he, Kristus hinom hek egesip nen, at Allah obabut hano nen woknisekherek meke etnogo here’isalok dukhegep iti.
48005005	Meke re, nit nen, ninetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisugusik, “Allah Agoreke nen itithogon yomaknisekhe korlek, Allah nen wene ninoba meke korogo wokhalok, at ninom yabokane ninapuke hunogo ’binanigin werek, ” iluk oba eberek welago iti.
48005006	Iti nen, nit Kristus Yesus ninom hunik dogolik, ninoado aperlagap palek meke dek, it aperek palek dek meke dek, ipisak tak-tak welago. Halok he, iti hasik penasusak dek. Kok he, ninetaiken Kristus oba hakotdiluk dogolik, akhuni ninakmurinakhorek iti baga ekagat ariogo.
48005007	Akhuni tha ae 'busuk werek tha ae ’busuk werek pirlirli lageikharek hak, hit haganeat nen, ebe wene iti hasik hinobabut akilukhogo hagakhe lagagip mekeat he, yabokane tha nen hinakla kagalhe lagama ebe wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhidek, hinakla puk welagap nogo.
48005008	Iti ninoe Etagapogot hinayoko ’bisikhe meke etnogo nen, “Inakla itithogon kagalino, ” iluk ekhemo nen hinakla kagaliogei ’buk. Dek o.
48005009	Roti hisuagaluk eken hikherek meke hemurlugat akla ’bisinem tha’bokhogonat hisik dukhekherek hak, wene korlo meke iti nen hinebe tha’bokhogonat weagathinabik launogo iluk igi.
48005010	Itithogon mekeat he, ninoe Etagapogot ninom opakiat agosik hunik welago iti nen, an nakla nen, “It inobabut wene ninat meke ageikhe oba ebesugun degat, ” iluk, hutdinagakhe lageiat o. Tha nen hit weagathinabigiluk hinakla kagaliogo meke iti, Allah nen ukum oba ’bigin werek o.
48005011	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An nen, inoado aperlagap palharek wene iti hano iluk yakulisekhe dogolema, noba yi aik ti aik hagatnabiogei iti hagatnakhe dogolep apegep? Motok dek o. An wene iti wene yakulisekhe dogolema, wene Kristus ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukha wene iti yakulisugunem akhuni inasuk holiluk nen, inisok helekit oba dikhogon waregarek hak, inakla puk atluk wene here’iselep degat o.
48005012	Hit weagathinabuogoluk hinoado aperlagap palhinabuogoluk hinakla obatnerogon kagaliogei meke iti, hit Allah a’buri hinakla nen tekhogon motok horla dukhuak o!
48005013	-
48005014	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinasokneat dogoagaluk Allah nen hinayoko ’bisikhemo welagap. Itithogon mekeat, hinakla nen, “An nasokneat welagei, ” iluk, akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek meke inobabut waganogo yugunat hagakhe dogogup. At he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo tha’bokhogonat dapukhogon wene opakiat yi anek kok hakene isikhe iti, “Hit hinekaerek hinebe hinetaiken hunik welagathep iti hak, it akhuni aperek hinom welagathep meke hinetaiken hunik dogono o, ”\rq (Imamat 19:18)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti nen, akhuni aperek inebe hinakmurogo dogolik hit-hit yomak-yomak hagakhe dogono o.
48005015	Itithogon mekeat he, warn ekaerek nen warn ageikhe aik nen li’bilhik, warogo haumhogo nikik, hagakherek hak, hit-hit hinekaerek nen itithogon hagakhe dogogun halok he, hinebe alomatlarik lasunogo iluk hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
48005016	-
48005017	An nakla yigithogon apigirik nen igin. Ninobabut ninikhogat dogolik hagakhorek meke iti nen, Allah Agoreke akla warlok apekherek meke iti warogo ula'igiluk hagakhik, nen, at Allah Agoreke nen, nit ninobabut iti meke warogo ula’igiluk hagakhik, hagakhe dogolik, ipisak wim palek motok hagakharek. Ipisak itithogon hagakharethek, hit nen, “Itithogon hagatlo, ” iluk, hibiku-yogoku, apegethep mekeat, ebe hagakhethep dek iti. Iti nen, Allah Agoreke hinom hunik dogolik hano hagakhe dogono o. Itithogon hagakhe dogogun halok, hinobabut hinikhogat dogolik, yi warlok ti warlok nen hagakhethep meke iti, yabokane itithogon hagakhe dogogun dek o.
48005018	Allah Agoreke nen, “Itithogon hagatno, ” iluk, yakulhisugunem hagakhe dogogun halok, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga yabokane wene hinoba ’bigin dek o.
48005019	Akhuni agat oba yoma inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek meke ebe ekagat yi. Param hagarinakhik, inalilomeke hagakhik, inoba agaken hagakhik,
48005020	inetaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hagakhik, akhuni inebe weak asuagaluk usarogo hagakhik, akhuni inom wim palek hagakhik, wene yakhik, ua palhik, inakla aga dageigik, inekaerek hasik anek kokhogon hagarigik, akhuni inebe opakiat meke inom hurli-hurli hagakhik, hek-hek hagakhik,
48005021	inakla nen, it ninat meke inameke, “Warlok e, ” apigik, apusu 'bit negen nalok hunu-hunu palhik, pesta weak hagakhik, hagakharek iti inom, aperek itithogon hagakharek meke tha'bokhogonat inom, hasik igi iti. It akhuni itithogon hagariogei meke, Allah apma 'bisekherekma etoma iteerek asugun motok dek o, iluk, wene iti hasik alep yokhisasigi hak, yabokane hinasuk warogo yokhisigiat iti.
48005022	O eken ikherek hak, Allah Agoreke akhuni inakla dogolik inobabut hagakharek ebe yi. Akhuni aperek inebe inetaiken hunik welageik, inakla arleken akhigik, inetaiken hapukhogon welageik, inobabut inobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageik, inobabut enago welageik, inobabut hano welageik, inobabut dopokhogon welageik,
48005023	inetaiken thebekhogon welageik, inekaerek nen inasuk warek welageik, hagakharek itiat o. Inobabut itithogon hagakhunem, wene ageikhe inoba 'begarek nogo? Motok dek o.
48005024	Ninebe Kristus Yesus agarumi meke, ninobabut ninikhogat dogolik, yi warlok ti warlok apekhe lagagu meke iti, Kristus Yesus ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukha iti baga warogo 'bisugu.
48005025	Iti halok yogotak Allah Agoreke nenat ninobabut ket meke hagarogo 'binanhikhemo niniluk dogolik, at nen yoknisekherek meke anek mothogon hagakhe dogosak o.
48005026	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ninekaerek nen hogorakhigidegat, nit-nit ageikhe nen ageikhe inakla weak asuagaluk hagakhidegat, nit-nit ua palogo ageikhe nen ageikhe nina'it disigidegat, hagakhe dogouok o.
48006001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. At ageikhe weak hagakhunem hinileken hegep halok he, at iti apuke obabut hebelasuagaluk, hit Allah Agoreke eberogonat hinakla werek meke nen hinane erogat asuk watno. Asuk itithogon wakhunem, hit itithogonat hinoba asunogo iluk, hinekaerek hinobabut hebelogo dogono.
48006002	Hit-hit hinoba akin meke werek halok, hinebe dopok ageikhe nen ageikhe yomak-yomak hagakhe dogono o. Itithogon hagakhe dogogun iti baga nen, wene Kristus nen ninasuk warogo yakulnisasikhe wene etnogoat mothogon hagakhe dogogun iti.
48006003	Meke re, hat ageikhe hetaga dek dogoligat, “An kok, ” iluk, hakla nen apekhe lagan halok he, hekaerek nen nukhetdakhekhe lagan iti.
48006004	-
48006005	Hinebe dopok hinekaerek nenat, “An hano hagakhe lagei a? Weak hagakhe lagei a, ” iluk, hinobabut palalok nen, “Hano hagakhe lagei, ” iluk apegep halok he, erlok hogorakhausagat o. Itithogon mekeat he, nit hagakhe lago meke iti, ninekaerek ninoba dopok nenat usak iti nen, “It aperek hagariogei iti weak. Nen, an hagakhe lagei anek he, hano, ” iluk usak dek o.
48006006	Nen, at ageikhe nen hano wene yakulhisugunem, hit hinasuk holhe lagap meke nen hinameke hano meke iti yomakhekhe dogono.
48006007	At Allah dal-kalhogo yogosusak nogo? Motok dek o. Meke re, “Itithogon yogosusak erlogat, ” iluk apagun halok, hinekaerek nen nukhetdakhagagun o. Akhuni nen yi meke ti meke ai yakharek meke, eken iti mekeat horle agunem, ebe palharek iti hak,
48006008	at tha nen obabut ikhogat dogolik hagariogo halok, obabut iti bagaat alomatdakhagein iti, Meke re, at ageikhe tha nen, Allah Agoreke ipisak hunik dogolik, atmeke hagariogo meke halok, Allah Agoreke iti nenat, iluk motok dogoagaluk hanotdigin iti.
48006009	Halok he, ninobatne dek ageidek hano meke hagakhe dogogun halok he, yi meke ti meke ya'iluk morat asi lagunem, ebe palharek hak, yabokane ilugun oba ebe hano meke horlagun iti nen, nina'it ageidegat hagakhe dogouok o.
48006010	Halok he, nit o yogotak hano meke hagasusak erlok welago ya baga, akhuni inebetha'bokhogonat yomageisekhe dogoligat, kok hakene, ninagarlak lak ninerugi inetaiken Kristus oba hakokthek werek meke hanorogo yomageisekhe dogouok o.
48006011	Yogotak an nekaerek niki nenat holal kok meke waganogo hinoba la'i agei iti, hinileken ekagat 'bikhano!
48006012	It akhuni aperek nen, “Hinaperlagap palini o, ” iluk, inobatnerogon yokhisiliogei meke iti, it akhuni aperek nen inileken hisalok, “Hano hagariogei, ” iluk apoagaluk hagariogei iti. Yesus ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukha wene etnogo yogeisugunem nen, akhuni Yahudi meke nen weagarinabunogo iluk, wene ninat meke inobatnerogon yokhisiliogei iti.
48006013	It iti wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hanorogo holek welageidegat, inekaerek inaperlagap palekhe dogolik, “Hit itithogonat palani o, ” iluk inekaerek nen hogorakhekhe dogouogoluk iliogei iti.
48006014	Meke re, an yi meke hasik ti meke hasik hogorakhausak motok na'it o. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus o baga meldiluk wakhukha meke etnogo hasik anek hogorakhaumo, erlok. At ebe wakhukha iti nen, akhuni agat oba inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek meke iti arat obatnetdegetdisasikhe apigi. Halok he, akhuni watlatluk, yi meke ti meke hagasusak obarlikma agarek hak, akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek meke etnogo obarlikmatdisasigi iti.
48006015	Ninoado aperlagap palek halokinom, palhidek halok inom, ebe iti meke kok 'buk. At he, Allah nen ninebe ket ninat hagatninabiogo itiat kogat o.
48006016	An wene hinasuk warogo yokhisigi meke yi, mothogon hagakhe dogogun meke, Allah nen, “An na'buri Israel mekeat o, ” iluk, at nenat hinetaiken hapukhogon 'binagagik, hinebe akmuthinakhik, hagakhe dogoak o.
48006017	Yabokane an Yesus atuaneke iluk, an noba nagalumo no'ban ekagat werek iti nen, it aperek nen an nakla murluk-marlakhogon hagatnabusak dek o. Motok na'it.
48006018	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut hano etnogo nen hinetaikenma dogolik eberogonat thethisik dogoak u hak, “Amin, ” igi iti.
49001001	Hit Allah a’buri o Efesus natogokhe lagap meke hinetaiken Kristus Yesus oba hakotdiluk hinom hunik welagap meke, nagarlak lak nerugi. An Paulus, Allah akla apasikhe baga, at Kristus Yesus nen nayoko ’biluk la’ani ageikhe meke etnogo nen wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei iti o.
49001002	Ninopase Allah ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen, hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, hagakhe dogoak o.
49001003	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus opase Allah itiat hogorakhe dogouok o. Nit Kristus ninom hunik werekma, at Allah nenat hano meke tha’bokhogonat ninetaiken hasik pogot oba nen woknisasikhemo welago.
49001004	At Allah nenat ninebe at ekaerek hasik ’bakhalok, at il oba karelek motok dogoagaluk, pogot agat aban walhigidek dogolik, wenakninakhikhe iti ebe at Kristus oba nenat wenakninakhikhe o.
49001005	At Allah ninebe akmu nen, ekaerek akla nenat, “Yesus Kristus nen, it woginakhunem an na’buri asuak, ” iluk, haganeat nen ninebe wenago wokninakhikhe iti o.
49001006	At obabut hano nen a'but etaiken hunik meke akmu ageidegat woknisasikhe iti hasik, nit nen, “Eiye. Allah nayuk o, ” iluk, hogorakhe dogouok o.
49001007	-
49001008	Itithogon woknisasikhemo, ebe amep ulabogo wakhukha iti baga, ninoko palogo tilninakhik, nit weak hagakhe lagagu meke degetdisigik, hagakhikhe iti o. At Allah akla kagalek dogolik ninebe hutdinanhikhesik, obabut motok hano etnogo nen, ninebe kokhogon akmutninakhikhe iti o.
49001009	At ekaerek itithogon hagatninabu warlok nen, “Itithogon hagarinabigin iti ebe at Kristus nen hagarinabuak, ” iluk, wene at akla apasikhe meke limago welageikhesik thelekmaat yoknisasikhe iti o.
49001010	Wene at akla limago welageikhe iti ebe, yabokane hagatlasusak oba hagatlasi agunem, at nen yi meke ti meke pogot oba welagarek meke inom, agat oba welagarek meke inom, tha’bokhogonat dapukhogon Kristus arligat apma ’bisagein meke hasik abok yoknisasikhe itiat o.
49001011	At Allah nen, “Yigithogon hagatlasuak, tigithogon hagatlasuak, ” iluk akla apekherek tak-tagat yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat hagakhunem hagatlagarek iti nen, “It inebe an nekaerek na’buri asuak, ” iluk wenago ’binanhikhemo, iteerek agagu iti o.
49001012	At ebe hogorakho motok welageikharek meke etnogo, nit nen hogorakhe dogoagaluk, ninetaiken ebekeram Kristus oba hakotdisugu meke wenago ’binanhikhemo iti o.
49001013	Iti hakeneat, hit nen wene ebe wene, hanotninakherek wene etnogo hinasuk holhigisip, hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisigipmo, Allah nen, “Nagoreke wokhisagein, ” iluk, abok yoknisasikhe tak-tagat, “It an nekaerek na’buri o, ” iluk ilekerlogo Agoreke wokhisasikhe iti o.
49001014	Allah nen he, “An nen itithogon wokhisagein, iluk abok yokhisasigi meke iti, yabokane wokhisagaluk, Nagoreke alebageik hipiriyukuk meke hakene wokhisasigisik hinebe tilogowokhinabiginat o, ” iluk yoknisasikhe. Itithogon yoknisasikhe iti nen, Allah hogorakho motok welageikharek meke itiat hogorakhe dogouok o.
49001015	Iti nen he, hit hinetaiken ninoe Etagapogot Yesus oba hakotdiluk, Allah a’buri aperek tha’bokhogonat hinakmurogon hagakhe lagap meke iti, akhuni aperek nen hinabok isinem nasuk holhi o.
49001016	Itithogon holhirik nen, hit hinobabut hagakhethep iti hasik, hibiku-yogokuat kamotdigidek hinetaga ilik nen Allah heagei wakho motogat welagarek o.
49001017	Hit hinobasik he, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus opase Allah hogorakho motok welageikharek meke etnogo nen, hinakla motok kagalek meke wokhisigik, at ebe hutukhogon hutdubageik nen yakulhisigik, hagakhe dogoak nen iluk, Agoreke wokhisoagaluk ayoko ’bekhe lagei.
49001018	At nenat hinakla liathinakhunem, hit nen he, “Ninayoko ’bisikhe meke etnogo nen yabokane hanotninabigin, ” iluk, hinakla arlekenhogon oba eberek welagap meke etnogo hinilu ageik, yi meke ti meke hano meke hogorakho motok dogogun meke at a’buri woknisagaluk kokhogon hulogo ’binanhikhe meke iti, hinilu ageik,
49001019	-
49001020	at obatneak meke etnogo nen, nit ninetaiken at oba hakotdisugu meke, obatnerogon kogat yomaknisiliogo meke hinilu ageik, hagasubageik iluk ayoko ’bekhe lagei o. At obatne iti baga, Kristus ebe watlageikhesikmo ilugutdiluk pogot oba lia’iluk, at alilu iki ebeke kok Etagapogot dogoagaluk meldisikhe hagat, obatnerogon yomaknisiliogo iti o.
49001021	Itithogon meldisikhe iti re, it pemerintah kok meke aperek tha’bokhogonat inom, inetagapogot meke aperek tha’bokhogonat inom, inougi koktek aperek tha’bokhogonat inom, koktek it aperek inapma hagasik welageikharek meketha'bokhogonat inom, inetagapogot yogotakne werek meke inom, yabokane dogogun meke inom, tha’bokhogonat, inetaga dek mekeat he, at Kristus anek he, Etagapogot kogat siakthek dogoagaluk, meldisikhe iti o.
49001022	Allah nen yi meke ti meke pogot oba agat oba welagarek meke tha’bokhogonat waganogo at Kristus arligat apma ’bisalok Allah a’buri natogokhe lago meke yi meke ti meke hasik kok he, Kristus at woknisasikhe iti.
49001023	Nit Allah a’buri ninebe at Kristus ebeat o. Nen, yi meke ti meke, pogot oba agat oba welagarek meke tha’bokhogonat akla Kristus ebe kerlekhogonat dogolik, nit Allah a’buri at ebe hakene werekma, ninaklakerlekhogonat welagarek iti o.
49002001	Hit alebageik he, Allah ane thagalogo weak hagakhe lagagip iti nen, hinetaiken hasik hinebe warek hakene welagagip.
49002002	Etanem he, akhuni yoma inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek hagat, mutluk laga lagagip. Itithogon mutluk laga dogolik, mokat inobabut weak meke inoe kok pogot abel wemake yoma iteerek dogolik, akhuni Allah ane ina’it nen inasuk holu’buk meke inakla ukisikhesik yogotak inakla kagalhoat welagarek meke etnogo ane holek welagagip iti o.
49002003	Alebageik nit tha’bokhogonat nen it hagariogei hakeneat hagakhe lagagu. Ninobabut akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek hagat, hagakhe dogolik, ninoba agaken dageisinem weak hagakhik, ninakla apalok weak hagakhik, hagakhe lagagu. Etanem he, akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek meke ninom tak-tagat werekma, Allah akla aga dageiluk, weagatninabigiluk welageikhe.
49002004	Itithogon weagatninabigiluk welageikhe mekeat he, yabokane at obabut hano motok nen, kokhogonat akmutninakhikhe.
49002005	Nit weak hagakhe lagagu iti baga, ninetaiken hasik ninebe warek hakene werekma, Allah nenakmutninakhikhesik, Kristus ninom hunogo 'binaniluk ninomat ninilugutdinanhikhe. Nen, hit at obabut hano nenat tilninakhikhe iti o.
49002006	Ninilugutdinanhikhemo, nit Kristus Yesus ninom hunik werekma, yabokane at ninom pogot oba kok dogolik it aperek ninapma hagasik dogoagaluk ninom meldinanhikhe iti.
49002007	At Allah itithogon hagakhikhe iti, o yabokane dogogun iti baga dogolik akhuni nen, “Allah obabut hano motok nen akmutninakhikhe, ” iluk ekagat hutdekhe dogoagaluk tilninakhikhe iti, ebe Kristus Yesus oba nenat tilninakhikhe.
49002008	Hit hinetaiken at oba hakotdisinem, at obabut hano etnogo nen tilhinakliikhemo welagap iti, erlo hinekaerek nen tilegep 'buk. Yi meke ti meke oko degat wogeisegarek hak, at Allah nenat tilhinakhikhemo welagap iti o.
49002009	Hit nen, “Nit hano hagakhe lagagu baga tilninakhikhe, ” iluk, hit aperek hinekaerek nen hogorakhausak motok dek o.
49002010	At nenat hano hagarogo 'binanhikhemo welago. Iti nit Kristus ninom hunik dogolik, yi meke ti meke hanorogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, ninobabut ket ninat winametdinanhikhe iti, ebe Kristus Yesus oba nenat winametdinanhikhemo welago.
49002011	Hit alebageik he, hinebe itikmanke meke welagagip iti, hinakla ebetni. It ap Yahudi meke akhuni ineram nen inoado aperlagap etnogo palinakhukha meke iti nen, hit hinobasik, “Inoado aperlagap etnogo palek dek meke, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha.
49002012	Etanem, Kristus ebe hinom hunik degat walegat dogolik, hinebe Allah nen wenakhinakhikhe meke dek. Ninat mekeat welagagip. Itithogon werekma, at Allah nen, wene it inom wakhe dogolik, “Itithogon hagathinabigin, ” iluk abok yogeisasikhe meke etnogo, hit hinokodegat dogolik, “Hano asigin, ” iluk hinakla apigidegat, Allah apma ukigidek, agat oba yoma dogolik, Allah ebe hinokodegat welagagip.
49002013	Alebageik he, hinebe walegat welagagip mekeat he, yogotak, Kristus Yesus hinom hunikhigipmo, at amep ulabogo watlageikhe iti baga, horok ya ’binageikhemo welagap o.
49002014	Akhuni Yahudi meke inom, itikmanke meke inom, inom palek werekma, tumo holak palek leget negen kok halek welageikhe meke, at Yesus nen dapulogo 'binanherek meke etnogo ebe watlaga dogolik hurli palek etnogo misalogo degetdiluk nen, ninebe opakimo dapukhogon ’binanhikhemo welago iti o.
49002015	At Kristus nen, ninukuloak etaga Yahudi meke inom, itikmanke meke inom, pere eta welageikhe meke, at ninom hunogo opakiat ’binaniluk ninukuloak etaga opakiat ket meke dapulogo ’binanigiluk wene Allah nen ninasuk warogo, “Yigithogon hagasusak, tigithogon hagasusak, ” iluk yoknisasikhemo wene palek werek meke iti degetdisekhe dogolik, ninom hunogo ’binanhikhe iti o.
49002016	At Kristus ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukhama watlaga dogolik, Allah ninom weak wim palek negen welagagu meke iti, degetdisalok, ninebe ebelake meke, ebelake meke inom, opakiat dapukhogon ’binaniluk, Allah oba woknisik wageikhe iti o.
49002017	-
49002018	At Yesus nen itithogon woknisik wageikhemo, ebelake meke, ebelake meke ninom, at Allah Agoreke opakiat iti baga ninopase Allah oba ukusak erlogat hagatlageikhe, iluk, Yesus ebe alebageik wageikhesik, “Hinom dapukhogon ’binagagi o, ” iluk, wene hano wene hit itikmanke meke walegat werekma yokhisigik, nit akhuni Yahudi meke horogat werekma yoknisigik, i wageikhe iti o.
49002019	Itithogon wageikhe iti baga, hit hinebe itikmanke ninat meke, ap huso meke hakene welagagip etnogo, yogotak itithogon dek ageikhemo, hinebe Allah a’buri agagisip, it hinom, at Allah aila etoma hinaieregat agagisip welagap o.
49002020	At Kristus Yesus ebe o herlaga kok hakene la'iluk werekma, it ap at nen inayoko 'biluk la'isasikhe meke emenogo inom, it ap Allah ane yogeisiliogei meke emenogo inom nen, oba dukhogon halhe lagoukhama, hit hinebe nit nen oba dukhogon halogo 'binagasugumo welagap o.
49002021	Nit tha'bokhogonat ninebe tomok, at Yesus ninom hunogo 'binaniluk nen, o thep hun-hun halharek hak, o iti abisakeat ninopase Allah ekaerek hasik ai halogo 'binaniogo iti o.
49002022	Iti hakene, hit Kristus hinom hunik werekma, it aperek hinom o opakiat Allah ai halekma Agoreke dogoagaluk, halogo 'binagaliogo iti o.
49003001	Iti nen, an Paulus hit akhuni itikmanke meke KristusYesus nen tilhinabuagaluk, at hasik niki herle warogo 'banhama welagei o.
49003002	Akhuni nen he, “Allah obabut hano etnogo nen, it akhuni o Efesus meke hano asuagaluk, at Paulus ayoko 'bisikhemo hano wene yogeisilik liliogo, ” iluk isinem hinasuk arat holhigip apigi.
49003003	Wene at Allah akla limago welageikhe meke iti, an pakhogon yakulnikhikhe, iluk, holal 'beroat waganogo yakulhisasigi apigi o.
49003004	Hit nen wene iti etaga thalhe dogolik, “Wene Kristus hasik limago welageikhe meke iti, at Paulus ilu agasik werek o, ” iluk, ekagat hutdugun iti o.
49003005	Haganeat nen he, wene iti akhuni aperek pakhogon yogeisigidekma, inokodegat welagoukhama, yogotak Allah Agoreke nen, it ap Allah a'buri Yesus nen inayoko 'biluk la'isasikhe meke emenogo inom, Allah ane yogeisiliogei meke emenogo inom, pakhogon yakulisasikhemo inilu agoukha iti, wene ebe yigithogon.
49003006	Hano wene iti baga, it akhuni itikmanke meke inom, Yahudi meke inom, inom tak-tagat iteerek hagatlageik, Kristus ebe opakiat meke ninomtak-tagat hunogo 'binanhik, hagakhemo welago. Wene haganeat Allah nen, “Itithogon hagathinabigin, ” iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogo baga, “Akhuni itikmanke meke Kristus Yesus inom hunik werekma, hano wene iti baga ninom tak-tagat hagatninabigin, ” iluk, ninilu aga iti o.
49003007	An akhuni inatuaneke negen dogolik, wene iti supurisekhe dogoagaluk, Allah obabut hano nen obatnerogon hagatninakherek tak-tagat nayoko ’bisikhe iti o.
49003008	Allah a’buri meke tha’bokhogonat inetaga werek hak werek korlegat, an netaga dek, erlok dek meke, at Allah obabut hano nen, hano wene pilinerogo usak erlok dek meke, Kristus nen wogeisekherek etnogo akhuni itikmanke meke yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk nayoko ’biluk nayabu iti woknikhikhemo welagei.
49003009	-
49003010	At Allah yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat winametdisikhe meke etnogo nen apekhe dogolik, Ebe itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk, wene akla limago welageikhe meke, akhuni tha’bokhogonat thelekmaat yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk nayoko ’bisikhe iti o. Nen, it ap malaikat pogot obake yoko nekharek meke emenogo inougi koktek inom, inane hologo welageikharek meke inom, nit Allah a’buri nen, “At Allah yi meke ti meke hasik akla motok kagalek, ” iluk yogeisugunem yogotak ya inilu asuagaluk, haganeat nen wene iti Allah akla limago motok welageikhe.
49003011	Erloma, at Allah nen yigithogon hagatninabigiluk akla apasikhe meke iti, at ninoe Etagapogot Kristus Yesus nen hagasuagaluk la’i ageikhemo, ebe hagakhikhe iti o.
49003012	Nit ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk, at ninom hunik dogolik, ninayuk dekhogon ninetaiken hapukhogon Allah oba ukusak iti o.
49003013	Iti nen he, an yogotak ya hit hinobasik weagatnabiogei iti nen hinakla puk ageidek dogogun halok, hogothinabugun iti nen, hinasuk warogo yokhisigi iti o.
49003014	Iti nenat, an ninopase elokhoma nitibagal yukukhogon ayoko 'bekhe lagei o.
49003015	It pogot oba welageikharek meke inom, nit agat oba yoma welagorek meke inom, ninopase lak tomok yogeisekhe dogolik, “Ninopase, ” iluk, ogorekiti, ninopase erlo Allah meke oba lisogon ogorek iti o.
49003016	At Allah yi meke ti meke ilmo motok horleak iluk u hak, hogorakho welageikharek etnogo nen, Agoreke oba hinobatnerogon hinetaiken horlethinabuagaluk ayoko 'bekhe lageiat o.
49003017	Hinetaiken at Kristus oba hakotdumo, at ebe hinakla ai halogo werekma, yi meke ti meke ai yakhunem omaken yakhik, o herlaga obatnerogon 'bigik, hagakharek hak, hinobabut akhuni aperek inebe inakmurogon welageikharek iti meke baga hinomaken ya'iluk a'bethogon dogobageik iluk, Allah ayoko 'bekhe lageiat o.
49003018	-
49003019	Akhuni nen o haluogoluk, hurli uanat meke iti baga, 'beroat meke iti baga, uroak liabugun iti baga, herlaga 'bugun iti baga, iluk walhegarek mekeat he, ninebe Kristus nen akmurogon welagarek iti meke, “Hurli iti baga, ” iluk walhausak erlok dek. Kogat o. Walhausak erlok dek mekeat he, Allah a'buri tha'bokhogonat hinom mothogon hutdubageik nen, Allah nen hinetaiken horletdisinem, at ebe abit motok 'bogokhogon hinakla kerlekhogon dogoagaluk ayoko 'bekhe lageiat o.
49003020	At Allah at hogorakhe dogouok o. At ebe ninakla dogolik obatnerogon hagatninakherek iti motok kogat iti nen, nit nen ninakla ebekhik, kino yogokhik, ogorek meke tak-takhogon hagakhidek, ageikhe inom kokhogon hagatninakherek iti.
49003021	Nit Allah a'buri natogokhorek meke tha'bokhogonat Kristus Yesus ninom hunik dogolik inebe aperek yabokane meke ket itaklarik laga korlek, Allah eberogonat hogorakho motok dogouok, iluk, “Amin, ” igi iti o.
49004001	An ninoe Etagapogot hasik niki herle warogo 'banhama dogolik, hit wene ageikhe hinasuk wasik. Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinobabut he, at Allah nen hinayoko 'bisikhe tak-tagat hagakhe dogono o.
49004002	Hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon yomageisigik, hibiku-yogoku hinetaiken thebekhogon hagakhik, hinobabut enago welageik, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageik, hagakhe dogono o.
49004003	Allah Agoreke nen ninebe opakiat meke hunogo 'binanhemo dogolik, inebe hano dapukhogon welageikharek iti meke kogotdekhe dogono o.
49004004	Allah nen hinayoko 'bekhe dogolik, “An nen hanothinabigin o, ” iluk, abok opakiat meke yokhisasikhe hak, at ebe opakiat meke hinom hunikhik, Agoreke opakiat meke waganhik, hagakhigip iti o.
49004005	Ninoe Etagapogot ebe opakiat o. Ninetaiken at oba hakotdogorek meke iti opakiat. Ninebe ima usa'inanharek meke opakiat.
49004006	Ninebe tha'bokhogonat ninopase Allah opakiat. At arligat ebe kok Etagapogot upu yaat welagarek. Nit tha'bokhogonat nen yi meke ti meke hagakhorek iti, ebe at nenat hagakherek o. Hagakhe dogolik, ebe nit tha'bokhogonat ninakla welagarek iti o.
49004007	Meke re, at Kristus nen suputnisekherek tak-tagat, Allah obabut hano nen, yabu asokhotegat hagakhe dogoagaluk ninobabut dopok woknisasikhe.
49004008	Iti nenat, Allah nen men iluk isikhe, “At ebe pogot oba upu walek eloma dageigiluk, at athilimeke iniki herle warogo 'bisalokwogosik dageisikhesik nen, hano meke ageikhe akhuni oko dek supusogo usa'isa ageikhe, ”\rq (Mazmur 68:18-19)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti o.
49004009	“At ebe dageisikhe, ” iluk isikhe iti ebe re, at ebe agat wema baga usasikhesik nen dageisikhe, iluk u hak isikhe iti o.
49004010	At ebe agat oba inom, pogot oba inom, yi ai ti ai tha'bokhogonat inom, dogeigiluk he, agat oba usa’ageikhesik nen, yabokane apuke pogot oba upu walek eloma dageisikhe iti o.
49004011	-
49004012	Nen, supusogo usa’isa ageikhe iti ebe, nit Allah a’buri ninebe tha’bokhogonat Kristus ebe hakene werekma, o halharek hak halogo ’binanhunem, ninebe tha’bokhogonat Allah hasik hagakhe dogoagaluk, ninebe tomok ninayoko ’biluk meldinanik lageikhe iti o. It aperek Allah ane wolok loagaluk inayoko ’bigik, it aperek Allah ane yogeisekhe dogoagaluk inayoko ’bigik, it aperek hano wene akhuni itikmanke hasik yogeisilik loagaluk inayoko ’bigik, it aperek Allah a’buri therisik dogolik wene yakulisekhe dogoagaluk inayoko ’bigik, ninebe tomogat itithogon ninayoko ’bisikhe iti o.
49004013	Itithogon hagakhe dogoluk, ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogolik nen, ninebe opakiat meke hakene hagatlageik, Allah a’but iti ebe hutukhogon ninilu ageik, at Kristus yi meke ti meke hasik etaiken ’bogokhogon horle motok welagarek hak, nit ninetaiken itithogonat horle ageik, hagasugun iti o.
49004014	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ninobabut yekerugi inobabut hisakne nen i hoklabu sabulogo lageik-wageik hagakherek iti hagat, nit itithogon hagakhe dogoak nen iluk, it akhuni aperek inobabut mirlok-marlokthek meke nen inekalat mekeat he, eberogonat thaleknukhetdinanuogoluk, wene ninat wene eran-alep yoknisariogei iti inane holusak dek o.
49004015	Meke re, ninobabut inarluetek inobabut hakeneat waganhe dogosak. Akhuni inebe ninakmurogo dogolik, wene eberogonat anek igik, yi meke ti meke hasik hagakhe dogolik, ninululoak ebe Kristus etaiken ’bogokhogon horle dogolik hagakhe lageikhe hak hagakhik, hagakhe dogolik, at obabut waganhe dogosak o.
49004016	Ninebe niniki ninisok ninoba hunikwelagarek meke aperek tha'bokhogonat ninomaken oba hunik hano dogolik, asokhotek tomok hagasusak meke hagakhunem, ninebe hano welagorek iti hak, nit ninoe Etagapogot Kristus ebe baga ninom hunik dogolik, ninobabut tomok hagakhe dogosak meke mothogon hagakhe dogogun halok, akhuni inarlue aga dogolik inetaiken horle agarek hak, akhuni aperek inebe ninakmurogon hagakhe dogolik, ninebe Kristus ebe hakene ninobatne atluk dogogun iti.
49004017	An ninoe Etagapogot nipisak hunik dogolik, at nen yokhisau hak wene yi hinasuk warogo yokhisak. It akhuni itikmanke meke inobabut hagariogei iti hak, hit hinobabut itithogon hagakhe dogogup o. It iti, we yugunat alomarogo meke oba ebekhe dogolik,
49004018	inakla mumat werek. Inetaiken helekit hakene abisake nen, hano wene inokodegat dogolik, Allah akhuni inilugurinakherek meke etnogo inom hunik dek nekalogat meke welageikharek iti o.
49004019	It inobabut he, “Weak hagakhe lago, ” iluk, inayukhogon welageikharek dek. It nen ekhe dogolik, “Nit he, weak hagarekhe dogogun o” iluk, yi weak ti weak inekarli degat warlokhogon hagariliogei iti o.
49004020	Mekeat he, at Kristus nen, “Hit weak itithogon hagakhe dogono, ” iluk, yakulhisigidek o.
49004021	Hit at abok holhigisip hinom hunik dogolik, ebe wene Yesus hagakhikhe wene iti, yakulhisasukhama waganhigip apigi.
49004022	Alebageik he, hinakla yi warlok ti warlok apekhe lagagip iti nen nukhetdinageisinem, hinebe alomatlarik lagagip iti nen he, hinobabut alep meke iti su nokorlogo here’isegarek hak, here’isano o.
49004023	Iti here’isalok, hinetaiken inom, hinakla ebekhe lagap meke iti inom, Allah nen hinobabut ket mekehagathinakhe dogoak o.
49004024	Hinebe eberogonat, at Allah nen ekaerek hasik 'bakhalok, at nen, hinobabut mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, at obabut hakene ket meke hagathinakhe meke iti, su ket ikhegarek hagat ikhekhe dogono o.
49004025	Nit tha’bokhogonat ninebe at Kristus iki isok hakene ninom hunik welago iti nen, inekalat egarek meke iti here’isalok, hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinom hinane eberogonat meke anek ekhe dogono o.
49004026	-
49004027	Hinakla aga dageikhe halok, weak hagakhup.\rq (Mazmur 4:4)\rq* Hinakla aga apik werekma, Iblis nen hinakla kagalinogo iluk, o mulikin korokhogon ukigidek werek korlek, thagalogo hanoratno o.
49004028	Hit aperek nen hiniki abusak waganhe lagap meke halok, yabokane itithogon waganhidek dogolik, it inerlageik meke yomageisekhe dogouogoluk, hinekaerek nen yabu hano meke anek hiniki obatnerogon waganhe dogono o.
49004029	Wenekak uogoluk halok he, weak meke ekhe dogogup o. Wene hano meke isinem it aperek inetaiken aban meke inasuk holugun meke iti Allah nen hanorinakhunem, inetaiken horle asuagaluk, wene hano meke anek ekhe dogono o.
49004030	Allah nen yabokane hinebe hanothinabigiluk ilekerlogo, at Agoreke wokhisasikhemo hinakla werek iti, akla korlotdugup o.
49004031	Inane puk weak igik, inakla aga hetperigik, inakla aga dageigik, wene oko-oko yakhik, inekalat inabok weak palhik, egarek meke iti here’isekhe dogolik, weagarinakharek meke inom tha’bokhogonat here’isekhe dogono o.
49004032	Here’isalok nen, hit-hit hinobabut enago hinakmurogo hagarinakhe dogolik, hit weak hagakhe lagagip meke at Kristus nen thagalogo degetdisikhe meke, Allah nen degetdisasikhe iti hagat, hinagarlak lak hinerugi aperek nen weagathinakho halok he, wene iti degetdisekhe dogono o.
49005001	Hinebe Allah a'buri at akmu meke welagap iti nen, at obabut waganino.
49005002	Akhuni nen yi meke ti meke Allah hasik 'bisalok, ebe warogo hetu hunekhunem, Allah akla hanorogo obasi hano meke liagakhe lagoukha iti hak, at Kristus nit ninebe akmutninakhikhesik nen, “It inobasik an nebe nasuak o, ” iluk apasikhe baga ebe wakhukha iti baga Allah akla hano ageikhe iti hak, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogo hagakhe dogouok o.
49005003	Hinebe Allah a'buri dogolik hinobabut hagakhe dogosak mekeat hagakhe dogosak. Halok he, param ha'isigik, inekarli dek weak hagakhik, “Yi meke ti meke an anek woknetlep, ” iluk inakla nen apigik, hagakharek iti meke, akhuni aperek nen, “It aperek itithogon weak hagariogei, ” iluk hinabok weak thakhogon asunogo iluk, weak ageikhe hagakhup o.
49005004	Param ha'isegarek meke abok igik, wene inetaiken dek egarek meke igik, inekarlimo meke hasik asagun abok igik, usak dek meke iti igidegat he, Allah at heagei wakhe dogono o.
49005005	It akhuni param ha'isegarek meke inom, inekarli dek weak hagakharek meke inom, “Yi meke ti meke an meke anek dogolep e, ” iluk inakla nen apalok hagakharek iti, inetaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hagakharek hagat, hagakharek halok, Kristus Allah ipisak inapma 'bisugunem welageikharekma etoma iteerek asugun motok dek o, iluk, hanorogon hinakla apano.
49005006	It akhuni Allah ane mothogon hagasu'buk meke nen, wene igi itithogon hagakharekma, Allah akla aga dageiluk weagarinabigin iti nen, it aperek nen inane we yugunat ekhe dogolik, “Weak meke itithogon hagasumo hanoat, ” iluk, nukhetdinagunogo.
49005007	Halok he, hit it iti hinom dapukhogon iti meke hagakhe dogosak dek o.
49005008	Hit alebageik he, o mummo welagagip meke re, yogotak ninoe Etagapogot hinom hundiluk, o lia baga welagap iti nen, hinobabut o lia baga dogolik hagakhe dogosak mekeat mothogon hagakhe dogono o.
49005009	O erlo hano meke nen eken hano mekeat ikherek hak, akhuni o lia baga dogolik yi meke ti meke hanorogo mothogonat inetaiken oba nen eberogonat hagakharek iti o.
49005010	Hinakla nen, “Ninobabut nikithogon hagakhe dogogun oba ninoe Etagapogot akla hotok igin, ” iluk, hinakla hutdiluk, hinobabut iti mekeat yakulino o.
49005011	It o mummo dogolik, hanorinabigin dek meke weak hagariogei meke iti, hinom dapukhogon hagakhe dogosak dek. At he, itithogon hagakhunem 'bualogo wenageisekhe dogono.
49005012	It akhuni aperek limago hagariogei meke iti inabok ekhe dogou re, inekarli asusak iti nen, inabok ekhe dogosak dek o.
49005013	Yi meke ti meke 'bualogo o lia baga 'bisinem, ekagat agarek iti o.
49005014	Itithogon lia baga 'bisinem ekagat atluk, lia agarek iti nen he, men egarek iti, “Hat noge ekhe lagan iti, hebe hiluk asin o. Nen, warek hakene welagan iti, hiluk asin o. At Kristus nen liathabigin o, ”iluk egarek iti o.
49005015	Iti nenat, hinobabut hebelogo hagakhe dogono o! Akhuni inetaiken abit meke nen hagakharek hak hagakhidek, inetaiken kagalek meke nen hagakharek hak, hagakhe dogono o.
49005016	Yogotak ya akhuni inebe doalekmake inobabut weak hagariogei iti nen, hit hinobabut we yugunat alomarogo hagakhe dogunogo iluk, ebekena hano asuak nen iluk hinobabut hano meke itiat hagakhe dogono o.
49005017	Hinetaiken abit dogosak dek o. At ninoe Etagapogot akla warlok apekherek meke itiat erlo hera'iluk mothogon hagakhe dogono.
49005018	Anggur eken apusu kokhogon nasinem iti nen hinebe hunu-hunu atluk weagathinabunogo nen, neke dogogup o. At he, Allah Agoreke itiat hinakla kerlekhogonwaganino.
49005019	Hit-hit wenekak ekhe dogolik, etai Mazmur meke igik, etai Allah meke igik, etai Allah hogorakharek meke igik, wakharek meke itiat waganiluk ekhe dogono. Hinetaiken oba nen etai isa igik, ekaka igik, wakhe dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot ebe hogorakhe dogono.
49005020	Hibiku-yogokuat yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat hasik, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus etaga palogo, ninopase Allah heagei wakhe dogono o.
49005021	Allah itithogon heagei wakhe dogolik, Kristus alon halhe dogolik, hit-hit ageikhe nenat ageikhe apma dogolik inane hologo hagakhe dogono.
49005022	-
49005023	Nit Allah a'buri ninebe Kristus ebe hakene werekma, at nentilninakhikhesik, ebe ninoe kok welagarek hak, humi inougi koktek, inaguniat iti nen, hit humi ninoe Etagapogot apma dogolik ane hologo hagakhethep hagat, hinaguni tomok inapma dogolik, inane hologo hagakhe dogono o.
49005024	Nen, nit Allah a'buri Kristus apma dogolik ane hologo hagakhorek hak, hit humi, yi meke ti meke hasik tha'bokhogonat hagasuogoluk, hinaguniat inapma dogolik inane hologo hagakhe dogono o.
49005025	At Kristus nen nit Allah a’buri ninebe akmutninakhikhesik nen, “It inobasik nasuak, ” iluk apasikhe baga ebe wakhukhama watlageikhe hak, hit ap he, hinagugi itithogonat hinakmurogon hagakhe dogono o.
49005026	-
49005027	At Kristus nen itithogon hagakhikhe iti, nit Allah a’buri tha'bokhogonat ninebe ninoba nino'ban dek, ninoado hurarlo dek, hano dogou hak, at il oba ukum ninoba dek, hano motok karelek dogoagaluk, ninebe ima usa’inanhunem, at ane etnogo baga, thobalogo 'binaniluk, at ekaerek hasik 'bakhagaluk ebe watlageikhe iti o.
49005028	Iti hak, hit ap nen he, hinekaerek hinebe hinakmu welagathep iti hak, hinagugi tomok inebe, “An nekaerek nebe hakeneat, ” iluk, hinakmurogon dogono. Ap he, inagugi inakmurogon welageikharek meke iti, inekaerek inebeat inakmurogon welageikharek o.
49005029	-
49005030	Akhuni aperek nen inekaerek inebe ina'it aperek welageikharek nogo a? Dek o. Ninekaerek ninapiri hano meke nikik, ninebe aleligik, hagakhorek hak, at Kristus nen, “Allah a'buri an nekaerek nebe meke niki nisok hakene, ” iluk itithogon alelogo haknisik welagarek.
49005031	Iti hasik, Allah ane men isikhe, “Iti nen he, ap nen agosa opase here'isalok, age inom dapulik dogolik nen, inebe pere meke, opakiat hagatlatluk dogoak o, ”\rq (Kejadian 2:24)\rq* iluk, isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti o.
49005032	Wene isikhe iti akla limago wene kok meke ageikhe werek. Wene iti an nakla nen he, at Kristus nit Allah a'buri ninom hano dapulik dogosak meke hasik isikhe apigi.
49005033	Meke re, hit hinebe hasik inomat isikhe. Hit ap he, hinekaerek hinebe hinakmurogo welagathep hak, hinagugi tomok hinakmurogon welageik, hit humi hinaguni tomok inalonerinakhik, hagakhe dogono o.
49006001	Hit yekerugi hinobabut he, ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik, hinagosa hinopase lak, inane hologo hagakhe dogosak iti nen, itithogonat hagakhe dogono o.
49006002	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe etnogo baga, wene alebageik ninasuk wakhe dogolik, “Hit nen yigithogon hagasusak, tigithogon hagasusak, ” iluk ekhe dogolik, “Yabokane hanothinabigin, ” iluk, alebageik abok ageikhe inom igidek. We, “Hinagosa hinopase lak inalonerinakhe dogono, ”\rq (Keluaran 20:12; Ulangan 5:16)\rq* iluk isikhesik nen,
49006003	abok men yogeisasikhe, “Itithogon hagakhe dogoumo, hinebe hanowelageik, agat oba yoma hiniluk ageikhe inomhogo welageik, dogogun o, ”\rq (Keluaran 20:12; Ulangan 5:16)\rq* iluk, yogeisasikhe itiat o.
49006004	Nen, hit inopase lak nen meneke, yi meke ti meke hina'buri inakla aga dagousak meke hagakhup o. At he, ninoe Etagapogot nen ninasuk wakhik, ninetaiken thebelhik, hagakherek hak, hit nen hina'buri itithogonat hagarogo inebe kogorinakhe dogono o.
49006005	Hit akhuni inatuaneke meke nen he, Kristus ane hologo hinetaiken opakiat hinayukhogon dogolik hagakhethep hak, hinopase lak koktek inane hologo inalonhogo hagarinakhe dogono.
49006006	It nen thethisik werek korlek anek akhuni meke inakla hanorogon hagakhe dogogup. Hinakla nen he, “Kristus atuaneke dogolik, Allah akla warlok apekherek meke itiat hagakhe dogouok, ” iluk, hinakla ebetdiluk nen hagakhe dogono.
49006007	Hinakla nen, “An akhuni meke anek inapma welagei 'buk. Ninoe Etagapogot apma welagei, ” iluk, hinakla arlekenhogo hagakhe dogono o.
49006008	Hinobabut hano hagakhe dogogun halok, ninoe Etagapogot nen, hit inatuaneke meke, hinasokneat welagap meke hinomat, hinebe tomok oko wokhisagein o.
49006009	Nen, hit inopase lak koktek meneke, hinatuan meke hasik, itithogonat hagakhe dogono. “Hasigin, ” iluk papagathekhe dogogup. Hinakla nen he, “An natuaneke meke ninomat, ninoe Etagapogot pogot oba werek meke etnogo nen, nit ninobasik, At iti kok. Nen, at iti kepu, iluk, ekherek dek. Ninom tak-tagat hagatninakherek, ” iluk, hinakla eberek dogono o.
49006010	Ilugun oba wene yi yokhisak. Ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik, at obatne motok horleak etnogo baga, hinobatne hagatlarik dogono o.
49006011	At Iblis obabut kauk meke etnogo nen weagathinabigiluk wagunem, wim yabuogoluk thin ikharek hak, hit hinebe metegat dogouogoluk, at Allah nen yi meke ti meke woknisekherek meke iti tha'bokhogonat hinoado laberogo dogono o.
49006012	Nit wim negen yakhe lago iti, akhuni meke ninom yakhe lago 'buk. Dek o. At he, kok meke, inane werek meke, o mummo agat oba yoma hagasik welageikharek meke, mokat inobabut weak meke pogot oba hogolkerlek agat oba hogolkerlek werekma ninom yakhe lago.
49006013	Halok he, weak meke nen weagathinabi agunem wim hinilhaoak a'bet weak metegat dogoluk, arat yabiluk nen metek dogouogoluk, thin ikharek hak, Allah nen yi meke ti meke woknisekherek iti meke itno.
49006014	Wim hinom yabubageik nen i'biluk metek dogosak he, ebe yi. Therlok isu hak, wene ebe wene itiat ikhik, hinamik oak oba isu hak, Allah akla warlok meke anek mothogon hagakharek iti meke ikhik,
49006015	hinisok sepatu isu hak, Allah nen ninebe dapukhogon 'binanherek iluk, hano wene iti wolok luogoluk, inobabut, “I o. An ligin, ” iluk egarek iti meke ikhik, itno.
49006016	Marle pisinerisugunem piokhogon loagaluk, o tha'belek inikimo wolok lageikharek hak, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdilukwelageikharek iti meke hibiku-yogokuat wolok nekhe dogono. Wolok lagunem, Iblis obabut weak meke etnogo nen hetu marle ilugun oba hunogo pisinethisugunem, hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogogun iti baga erlok nagulhe dogosagat o.
49006017	Inukuloakma inasunogo iluk, inukulasu a’bet meke thalharek hak, Allah nen tilninakherek iti mekeat waganiluk thalino. Itithogon thaldiluk nen, wim yabuogoluk karok inikimo wolok lageikharek hak, Allah ane, Agoreke nen woknisekherek iti meke wolok laga dogono o.
49006018	Itithogon tha’bokhogonat hagakhe dogolik, Allah nen yomakhisoagaluk sembayan ekhe dogono. At Agoreke hinakla dogolik hinakla kagaligin hagat, hibiku-yogoku sembayan Allah ayoko ’bigik, kino yogokhik, isi motogat dogono. Itithogon ekhe dogolik, hinakla puk ageidek, hinobabut hebelek motok dogono. Itithogon dogolik, Allah a’buri tha’bokhogonat inobasik sembayan Allah ayoko ’bekhe dogonoat o.
49006019	Itithogon ayoko ’bekhe dogolik, an nen hano wene Allah akla limago welageikhe meke iti, at nen yakulnekho korlek, nane pakhogon yogeisekhe dogeik nen he, hit nen Allah ayoko ’bekhe dogonoat o.
49006020	Wene iti yogeisekhe dogoagaluk at Kristus nen nayoko ’biluk la’ani ageikhemo an witluk yogeisekhe lagei iti hasikniki herle warogo ’banhama welagei. Itithogon dogolik, an nayuk dekhogon hano wene iti yogeisekhe dogosak tak-tagat yogeisekhe dogeik nen, sembayan an nobasik ekhe dogonoat o
49006021	Wene an nebe yoma welagei meke inom, hagakhe lagei meke inom, hit hinilurogon, ninagarlak Tikhikus nakmu meke, ninoe Etagapogot hasik etaiken hupukhogon hagakho welagarek meke etnogo nen wene tha'bokhogonat yokhisa isigin iti o.
49006022	Nit ya dogolik hagakhe lago meke hinilu atluk nen, hinetaiken thebelogo dogobageik iluk hinoba la’i agei iti o.
49006023	Ninopase Allah inom, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus inom, ipisak nenat, hit nagarlak lak nerugi Allah a’buri tha’bokhogonat hano dapukhogon ’binageigik, akhuni inakmurogon welageikharek meke iti wokhisigik, inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welageikharek meke iti inomat wokhisigik, hagasuak o.
49006024	Hit ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus kolelogo here’igidek, hinakmu motok dogogun meke tha’bokhogonat, Allah obabut hano etnogo nen hakhisik dogoak o.
50001001	Hit Allah a’buri Kristus Yesus hinom hunik dogolik, oFilipi welagathep meke, hinebe tha’bokhogonat inom, hinougi Allah a’buri hakhisik welageikharek meke inom, Allah a’buri yomageisegarek meke inom, nagarlak lak nerugi. An Paulus Timotius nipisak nen Kristus atuaneke dogolik wene holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago iti o.
50001002	Ninopase Allah, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinageigik, hagakhe dogoak o.
50001003	An he, hibiku-yogoku hit hinoba eberek motok dogolik, nopase Allah at heagei wakhe lagei.
50001004	-
50001005	Hit ebekeram wene waganhigip iti hurli nen, yogotak hurli, an nen hano wene akhuni aperek yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk yomakneekho motok welagathep iti nen, an hibiku-yogoku nakla arlekenhogon hit tha’bokhogonat hinobasik sembayan ekhe dogolik, Allah ayoko ’bigik, heagei wakhik, hagakhe lagei.
50001006	At Allah nen hit hano hagathinabigiluk, alebageik iki hakhinakhikhesik hano hagathinakhe motok dogoluk nen, hurli at Yesus Kristus wisigin itinemat, o arat halharek hak, hano hagathinabi isigin iti eberogonat iluk, netaiken hapukhogon welagei.
50001007	Allah obabut hano nen nayoko 'bisikhemo, an niki herle warek welageik, niki herle aban wakhidekma hano wene irlirli waganhik, obatnetdigik, hagakhe lagei hak, hit tha'bokhogonat itithogonat ninom hagakhe dogoagaluk hinayoko 'bisikheat iti nen, hit hinebe netaiken hunik welagei o. Iti nen he, an nen hit tha'bokhogonat hasik, “Yesus eberogonat hagathinabi isigin, ” iluk apausak meke mothogonat apekhe lagei.
50001008	Yesus Kristus nen hit hinebe tha'bokhogonat akmu welagarek hak, an nen hit nakmuat dogolik, “Ninom dogolo e, ” iluk, nakla eberogonat apekhe lagei meke iti, at Allah ilu o.
50001009	An nen sembayan hit hinobasik ekhe dogolik, men ekhe lagei, “Yi meke ti meke ai yakhunem erlo kok atluk dukhekherek hak, hit ebe wene hutukhogon hinilu ageik, hutdigik, hagakhe dogolik, akhuni inebe hinakmurogon welagap iti meke kokhogonat hinakmurinakhe dogobageik nen, ” iluk, sembayan ekhe lageiat o.
50001010	Hit itithogon hutdiluk hagakhe dogogun halok, hinakla nen he, “Yi hano. Hagasusak meke, ” igik, “Iti weak. Hagasusak dek meke, ” igik, hutdekhe dogogun iti. Itithogon hagasugun halok, Kristus wisigin itinem, wene hinoba degat, hano karelek motok werekma wisigin iti o.
50001011	Yi meke ti meke ai yakhunem erlo kok atluk eken ikherek hak, at Yesus Kristus nen hagathinakhe dogogin oba, hinobabut mothogon hagakho motok aperek inomat obarluk hagakhe dogogun halok, at ebe wagunem, akhuni aperek nen Allah heagei wakhik, hogorakhik, hagasugun o.
50001012	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene yi hinilurogon yokhisak. An yigithogon hagatnakha yi baga, hano wene dek ageidek kogat arik liliogo.
50001013	An Paulus Kristus hasigat niki herle wakhama welagei yi baga, it ap at Kaisar etagapogot aila ukinogo iluk, holagapema thuam welageikharek meke tha'bokhogonat inom, it akhuni aperek yoma meke tha'bokhogonat inom nen, ekagat hutdaniogei.
50001014	An niki herle warogo 'banhama welagei yi nen, Allah a'buri aperek inebe kokmake inetaiken ninoe Etagapogot oba hakotdiluk horle atluk nen, wene Kristus hasik inane baga pakhogon yogeisekhe dogosak inayuk dek ariogo iti o.
50001015	It iti aperek nen inakla korlo atluk, an noba ua palhe dogoligat, yogeisiliogei iti o. Meke re, it aperek nen inakla hano dogolik,
50001016	“At Allah nen Paulus ayoko 'bekhe dogolik, Akhuni nen hano wene iti eberogonat iluk apoagalukpakhogon yogeisekhe dogono, iluk ayoko 'bisikhemo hekhe lago, ” iluk, ekagat hutdaniluk nebe inakmu nen wene at Kristus hasik yogeisiliogei iti.
50001017	Meke re, it aperek ua paliogei meke iti nen, wene Kristus hasik yogeisiliogei iti, inetaiken opakiat dogolik yogeisiliogei 'buk. Inakla nen, “Paulus iki herle warek werek iti, ebe weak asuak, ” iluk, inekaerek inetaga kok asuagalugat yogeisiliogei iti o.
50001018	-
50001019	Meke re, it aperek nen inetaiken pere dogolik yogeisigik, it aperek nen inetaiken opakiat dogolik yogeisigik, hagariogei mekeat he, wene Kristus hasigat yogeisiliogei halok, yugunat. Nakla arleken akhekhe lagei. Yigithogon hagatnakho werekma, hit nen sembayan an hasik ekhe dogoumo, Yesus Kristus Agoreke nen an yomakneekhe korlek, Allah nen tilnabigin iluk an niludogoligat, nakla arleken akhekhe dogoginat o.
50001020	An nakla nen, wene Kristus hasik u nekarli ageidek yogeisekhe dogosak warlok motok. Halok he, nekarli ageidek yogeisekhe dogogin o, iluk, hutdiluk nakla hano welagei. Hibiku-yogokuat pakhogon yogeisegerek hak, yogotak itithogonat yogeisagalugat welagei. Nebe niluk dogoumo hanoat. Nen, watlasumo hanoat. An itithogon hagatnakho korlek, nebe abirat Kristus hasik hagakhe lagei iti baga, akhuni nen Kristus hogorasuagalugat welagei.
50001021	Itithogon welagei iti nakla nen he, nebe niluk welagarek iti, Kristus hasigat. Nen, watlagunem he, hano meke thaburagein iti o.
50001022	Nebe agat oba yoma niluk dogolik Allah ayabu yabokane kokhogon hagasusak werek iti nen, niluk dogosak a? Watlasusak a. Ki meke ite asik he, nokodek ariogo.
50001023	An hagasusak meke wene pere werek iti nen, netaiken pere ariogo. An watlatluk nen, Kristus nipisak dogoumo hano. Ebe hano motok itiat o.
50001024	Meke re, an hit hinobasik agat oba yoma dogosak hanoat o.
50001025	An wene iti hasik hutdiluk, dogogin, iluk nilu o. Hit hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik, horle ageik, hinakla arleken akhigik, hagakhe dogobageik nen he, hit hinebe tha'bokhogonat ninom dogogunat o.
50001026	Dogouogoluk, an yabokane hinoba wisumo hit Kristus Yesus hinom hunik dogolik hinakla nen, “Paulus ninom welago, ” iluk, an nobasik hinalon atluk hinakla arleken doalegat akhagun iti.
50001027	Wene hano wene Kristus nen hagakhikhe wene etnogo baga, “Yigithogon hagakhe dogono, tigithogon hagakhe dogono, ” iluk yokhisegarek mekeat hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhedogolik, hinebe opakiat dapukhogon hagakhe dogoumo, it akhuni aperek nen hinabok ekhe dogolik, “It inobabut hano wene yogeisugunem holiogei tak-tagat inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk obatnerogon metek werek o, ” iluk, an nebe walegat werekma yoknisugun a? Hinoba witluk nileken hisagein a. Wene hano wene yokhisogorek hak, hinetaiken opakiat hinom dapukhogon dogolik, wim yakhe dogolik obatnerogon yakharek hak, wene iti hasik hinobatnerogon hagakhe dogono.
50001028	It aperek nen, “Wene iti nina'it, ” iluk, ekhe korlegat, hit anek he, hinayuk ageidek a’bethogon motok herogo dogono. Itithogon herogo dogogun iti baga, it iti nuk asugun iluk ekagat hagatlageik, hit tilhinabigin iluk ekagat hagatlageik, Allah nenat hagathinabiginat werek o.
50001029	At Allah obabut hano nen, hit hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotduagaluk anek hinayoko 'bisikhe 'buk. Dek o. At hasik yi aik ti aik hekhe dogoagaluk hinayoko 'bisikheat o.
50001030	An alebat he, wim yakhe dogolik inobatnerogon yakharek hak, hano wene hasik nobatnerogon hagakhunem hinileken neasigibat. Nen, yogotak nabok holhe lagabat. Iti meke, hit ninom dapukhogon hagakhe lagoat iti o.
50002001	Nit Kristus ninom hunik dogolik, at nen ninetaiken ago watdinanhik, ninebe akmurogon ninetaiken thebelhik, Agoreke ninom hunik dogolik, yomaknisigik, hagakhe korlek nit-nit hanorogon nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhorek iti nen,
50002002	an nakla arleken kokhogon akhekhe dogeik nen, hinetaiken opakiat dogono. Itithogon dogolik hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon opakiat meke hagakhik, hinobabut hinetaiken opakiat welageik, hagakhe dogono o.
50002003	Yi meke ti meke hagasuogoluk, hinakla nen he, “An anek hanorogon hagakhe dogogin, ” iluk, hinekaerek nen hinalonhogon hagakhe dogogup o. Hinakla nen hogorakhigidegat, “It aperek hano. An he, erlok dek, ” iluk, apekhe dogono.
50002004	Itithogon apekhe dogolik, hinebe tomok hinekaerek hasik anek oba ebekhe dogogup. It akhuni aperek inobasik inomat inoba ebekhe dogono.
50002005	Hinobabut he, at Kristus Yesus nen akla ebekhe lageikhe hagat, ebekhe dogono o.
50002006	At ebe, Allah mekeat dogolik, akla nen, “An Allah nipisak tak-tagat welagei yi, yi hagat motok dogogin, ” iluk apigidek,
50002007	ekaerek eram nenat here'isalok, nit akhuni ninom tak-tak ageikhesik nen, ebe ninatuaneke negenat ageikhe iti o.
50002008	At ekaerek nen etaga degetdakhalok, “An nobabut he, nopase nen, Watlasuak, iluk, apekhe tak-tagat ane hologodogogin, ”iluk ebe o baga meldiluk wasuagalugat apasikhe iti o.
50002009	Itithogon apasikhe iti nen, ebe Allah nenatkogotdisikhe. Kogotdisikhesik nen, it aperek inetaga wema baga negen werek korlek, at anek he, Etagapogot iluk kok mekeat thalhikhe iti o.
50002010	It pogot oba meke inom, agat oba meke inom, wema baga meke inom, tha'bokhogonat at Yesus hogorakhe dogolik, initibagal yukukhogon inebe tomok, at apma ukugun iti o.
50002011	Itithogon ukiluk nen, inape baga tomok, ninopaseAllah hogorakhe dogolik, “Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus itiat o, ” iluk, pakhogon ugunat iti o.
50002012	-
50002013	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu o. An ninom dogolik, nane hibiku-yogoku isinem hologo hagakhe lagagip iti hagat, an yogotak nebe walegat werek korlek, nane itiat kogotdiluk nen, hologo motok hagakhe dogono. At Allah nen, hit nen hagakhe dogobageik iluk, hinakla kagalogo hagathinakhunem, hit hinakla nen, “I, nit itithogon hagakhe dogou warlok, ” iluk apalok, Allah akla warlok meke hagakhe lagap iti nen, at ebe hinayukhogon hinoageleke dik-dik hagakhe dogolik, “At nen tilninabigin, ” iluk iti hasigat hagakho motok dogono.
50002014	-
50002015	Hit he, at Allah il oba wene hinoba degat, nen, weak meke hinakla degat dogouogoluk halok, hinebe Allah a'buri weak hagakhidek karelek motok dogolik, o mum werekma husagal nen liatdekherek hak, akhuni yoma inobabut korlo weak hagakharek meke inaklake liarogon dogolik, yi meke ti meke hagakhe dogolik, “Nina’it, ” iluk ua-ua hagakhidegat, wene muk palhidegat, hagakhe dogono.
50002016	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke supusogo wogeisuogoluk inugurisegarek hak, wene akhuni inebe inilugurinakherek wene iti yogeisilik nekhe dogono. Itithogon yogeisekhe dogogun halok, at Kristus wisigin itinem, an nen, “Mep dageik-dagokhogon nobatnerogonat hagakhe lagagi meke etnogo we yugunat alomarogo hagakhidek. Kristus hasik erlok hagarogo ’bisigima, ” iluk nalonat asigin iti o.
50002017	Meke re, akhuni nen domba Allah ’bisalok, warogo hetu hunesuogoluk, oba eken apusu usakharek hak, hit hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk wogokhunem, akhuni nen annebe warogo namep usakha halok, an nakla arleken akhugunem hit tha'bokhogonat hinakla arleken akhausagat o.
50002018	Itithogonat, hit hinakla arleken akhugunem, an nakla arleken akhausagat o.
50002019	Hit ethoma hagakhe lagap meke hasik, hinabok an nilu atluk nakla hano asuagaluk, netaiken ninoe Etagapogot Yesus oba hakotdiluk werekma, at nen yomakneekherek iti baga, at Timotius etnogo ibat hinoba la’isigiluk apekhe lagei o.
50002020	It akhuni aperek yoma inobabut ninat hakene werek korlek, at Timotius arligat obabut an nobabut hakene dogolik, hit hinebe akmurogon hinoba eberogonat eberek welagarek o.
50002021	At itithogon werek korlek, it akhuni iti inebe tha’bokhogonat anek he, Yesus Kristus hasik hagakhidek dogolik, inekaerek hasik kogotdiluk hagariogei o.
50002022	Meke re, at Timotius obabut ekagat hagakherek etnogo hinilu o. Ina’buri nen inopase lak yomageisegarek hak, at ebe, Allah apma dogolik an yomakneagaluk hano wene etnogo nipisak nen yogeisilik nekhe lagosik.
50002023	An hagatnabugun meke wene ebe hutukhogon nilu agei halok, at ebe ibat hit hinoba la’isigin, iluk apekhe lagei o.
50002024	At ebe la’itluk nen, an netaiken ninoe Etagapogot oba hakotdiluk welagei iti baga, at nen yomakneasinem, nebeat ibat wisigin iluk apekhe lagei o.
50002025	At ninagarlak Epafroditus an Allah hasik narligat nen hagasusak erlok dek werekma, yomakneoagaluk noba la’i agagipmo, wim yakhe dogolik inobatnerogon yakharek hak, nipisak Allah hasik ninobatnerogon hagakhe lagosik nen, yabokane apuke hinoba la’isigin apekhe lageiat o.
50002026	At akla apekhe dogolik, “An noba u warogo 'banhikhe etnogo, nabok it inasuk holhukhasik nen, nikithogon hagariogei, ” iluk, wene munini uan ’bero ebekhe dogolik, “It tha'bokhogonat inoba ligin, ” iluk apiliogo.
50002027	Ebe re, u warek dogolik watlatlep meke re, an nakla weak werek korlek watlatlepma, yabokane nakla motok weagat asunogo iluk, Allah nen at akmuat, nen, an nebe akmuat, dogolik, hanotdisikhemo ebe u dek agasik werek iti o.
50002028	At ebe yabokane hinoba wagunem hinileken halok nen, hit hinakla arleken akhigik, an nakla weak welagei meke hano ageik, asuok nen iluk, ibat hinoba la'i agei iti o.
50002029	-
50002030	At ebe wagunem, ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogolik at ebe waganino. Hit nen nikithogon yomakneau heat iti nen, hinobolukmo at nen yomakneagaluk, “Nebe watlagei halok hanoat o, ” iluk, Kristus hasik hagakhe dogolik watlatlep meke iti o. It akhuni aperek inobabut at hagakherek hak hagariogei meke halok inalonhogon woginakhe dogono o.
50003001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ilugun oba yokhisak nen ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono, iluk igi iti o. It aperek nenweagathinakhidek hinebe hano dogobageik iluk, wene alep holal waganogo la'i agei mekeat, nape ale ageidegat yabokane nane dagakhogon yokhisageinat o.
50003002	It akhuni aperek inobabut yeke helo yeke obabut hakene iti nen, yi meke ti meke hasik weak hagakhe dogolik, “Hinoado aperlagap meke palogo la'isano, ” iluk hinakla kagalisunogo nen hinobabut hebelogo dogono.
50003003	Nit he, ninoado aperlagap meke arat palek dogou hak, ebe meke hagakhe lago. Allah Agoreke nen ninakla kagalho korlek, Allah ebe hogorakhik, Kristus Yesus ninom hunik welago, iluk, hogorakhigik, hagakhe dogolik, yi wene ti wene ninoado itikmanke yi hasik hagakhorek iti baga hanotninabigin iluk apekhe lago dek o.
50003004	Ninoado itikmanke yi hasik hagakhorekiti baga hanotninabigin iluk apausak erlok dogolepma, it akhuni aperek nen erlok dek negen apekhe korlek, an anek he, kok negen apekhe dogole.
