50003005	An nebe itaklagagimo iniki 7 hari welagoukhasik nen, iniki ageikhe baga noado aperlagap meke palnakhukha iti o. Nebe Israel meke, nukuloak etaga Benyamin mekeat, nagosa nopase Israel meke nogo nen, nebe Ibrani ebe Ibrani mekeat itaklagagi iti o. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo hasik, ap Farisi meke nen herogo welageikharek hak, nobatnerogonat herogo welagagi meke.
50003006	Allah hasik akilukhogon hagakharek meke iti, an itithogonat hano hagakhe lagei thalek, Allah a'buri inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisukha meke yi aik ti aik hagarinabik nekhe lagagi iti o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo mothogon hagakharek iti, an motok mothogonat hagakhunem, akhuni aperek nen wene noba 'busak degat karelek motok welagagi.
50003007	An alep itithogon hagakhe dogolik, “Thaburekhe lagei, ” iluk apasigi mekeat he, yogotak Kristus ebe waganhirik oba nen, “Alep hagakhe lagagi iti, weat alomarogo hagakhe lagagimo higi, ” iluk hutdekhe lagei o.
50003008	-
50003009	Itithogon hutdekhe lagei iti anek 'buk. Noe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus nilu agagi iti hano motogat o. Yi meke ti meke ninat meke hagakhe lagagi iti, weat alomarogo hagakhe lagagimo iluk, hutdekhe lageiat o. At ebe horlalok nen, nipisak hunik motok dogouogoluk, yabu aleke karelogo ulakharek hak, yi meke ti meke alep hagakhe lagagi meke iti, “Weat meke, ” iluk here'isasigi iti o. Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti baga, nekaerek nen mot hagakhe lagei 'buk. It akhuni aperek inetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisinem, wene inoba meke korogo wokhalok yabokane Allah inom hunogo 'bisekherek hak, an itithogonat netaiken at oba hakotdisigimo, wene noba welageikhe meke korogo wokhasikhe iti o.
50003010	-
50003011	At Kristus yi aik ti aik hilik-hilikwatlageikhe hak, nipisak tak-tagat, an itithogonat aik hilik-hilik, watlasusagat apekhe lagei. Itithogonatma re, at watlageikhesikmo, Allah obatne baga ilugutdisikhe hak, an itithogonat watlatlukmo, niligutnabigin, iluk, oba eberegat welagei o.
50003012	Meke re, an yogotak ya, netaiken motok hanoat ageik, ebe hano meke iti arat horligik, igi ’buk. Aban o. Hano meke iti an horloagaluk, Yesus Kristus nen nebe woknakhikhe iti nen, ebe horla lagaluk, nobatnerogon hagakhe lagei o.
50003013	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An iti ebe arat horligi iluk nakla apekhe lagei degat. Iti horla lagaluk wene opakiat meke yiat hagakhe lagei. Iti ebe, alep hagakhe lagagi meke, nobabut hebelatluk, noporlik kamotdisalok, yabokane ket meke nelokhoma werek meke iti horla lagaluk nobatnerogo mutluk laga lagei.
50003014	Kristus Yesus nipisak hunik werekma, at Allah nen nayoko 'bekhe dogolik, “Hano meke pogot oba meke wokhesigin, ” iluk abok yoknikhikhemo, ebe horla lagaluk, tha ae ’busak tha ae ’busuk pirlirli lageikharek hak, nobatnerogon mutluk laga lagei.
50003015	Halok he, nit ninetaiken arat horle aga meke yi, wene iti hasik hutdekhe dogouok. Itithogonat meke re, hit hinetaiken wene werlek meke oba ebekhe lagap halok he, hutduagaluk at Allah nen hutukhogon yokhisageinat o.
50003016	Mekeat he, yogotak ninobabut wene iti hutdiluk hagarik waga lago hagat, itithogonat hagarik laga dogouok o.
50003017	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinobabut an hagakhe lagei hak, nobabut waganogo, itithogonat hagakhe dogolik, it akhuni aperek nen nit ninobabut waganogo hagariogei meke iti, hinileken woginakhe dogono.
50003018	An alebageik he, niki eran-alep yokhisasigi hagat, yogotak nane yabokane dagakhogon yokhisagat o. Akhuni inebe doalegat nen, “Kristus nit ninobasik o baga meldiluk wakhukha etnogo, nina'it, ” iluk inom wim palek negen dogolik inobabut korlo hagariogei meke iti hasik inuak de aga dogolik yokhisekhe lagei o.
50003019	It iti inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogosak mekeat he, inoba agaken dageiluk hagakharek iti meke baga hakotdiluk dogolik, inekarli asusak mekeat he, hano thalek iti hasigat inekarli dek hogorakhiliogei iti o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, inetaiken yi warlok ti warlok, wene agat oba meke oba eberiogei iti, ilugun oba arat nuk asugun o.
50003020	Itithogon meke re, nit ninai erlo pogot oba werek o. Ninai erloma etoma nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus yabokane tilninabisigin iti therogo welago.
50003021	At ebe witluk nen, ninebe ninekarli negen welago yi, at obatne baga yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat, at apma 'bisagein iti nen, at ebe hogorakharek hagat, nit ninebe hogotninabusak mekeat hagarogo 'binanigin o.
50004001	Iti nenat, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu o. NinoeEtagapogot hinom hunik hinobatnerogon dogono. Hit hinobabut hagakhe lagap oba an nakla arleken akhigik, hogorakhigik, hagakhe dogolik, hinoba witluk nebe ninom dogolo o, iluk, apekhe lagei.
50004002	Euodia, Sintike, nerugi o. Hipisagat ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik, hinetaiken opakiat meke ebekhe dogobageik iluk nane nobatnerogon yokhisigi iti o.
50004003	Nen, hat nagarlak ageikhe Allah ayabu nipisak hunik motok hagakhe lago etnogo, it humi inebe pere iti yomageisanogoluk yokhikhi iti o. It humi iti inom, ap Klemen etnogo inom, it ato an ninom Allah ayabu opakiat hagakhe lago meke emenogo inom, hano wene ninobatnerogon ninom yogeisilik nekhe lago meke ninetaga tomok, at Allah aruesika baga naburlal-haburlal hagarinabigin meke inetaga holal waganogo 'bekherek etnogo baga, waganek werek.
50004004	Halok he, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik, hibiku-yogokuat hinakla arleken akhasi motok dogono. Yabokane nane ageikhe dagakhogon yokhisagat, “Hinakla arleken akhasi motogat dogono.
50004005	Ninoe Etagapogot etnogo ibat wisigin iti, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen hit hutdinagouagaluk, hinobabut yamukhogon hagakhe dogono.
50004006	Yi meke ti meke hasik wene munini uan 'bero ebekhidek, tha'bokhogonat hasik Allah ayoko 'bekhe dogolik heagei warogo kino yogokhe dogono.
50004007	Itithogon yogokhe dogogun halok, Kristus Yesus hinom hunik welagathep iti nen, at Allah nen akhuni nen hutdusak dek meke elalinat hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, wene munini ebekhe lagap meke iti, at nenat thebelogo hakhisik dogogin o.
50004008	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ilugun oba yi ageikhe yokhisak. Hinakla ebekhe dogolik, hanorogon hagakhik, hogorinabusak meke hagakhik, hagariogei meke oba ebekhe dogono. Iti ebe re, wene eberogonat meke oba ebekhik, hogorasusak meke oba ebekhik, mothogon hagakharek meke oba ebekhik, weak meke thogotdiluk hano anek hagakharek meke oba ebekhik, inobabut heanerogon hagakharek meke oba ebekhik, inoba la'buk usak meke oba ebekhik, ebekho motogat dogono.
50004009	Wene an nen yokhisugunem hinasuk holhik, an hagakhunem hinileken niigik, hagakhe dogolik, wene waganhigisip nen yakulhigip meke etnogo mothogonat hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhunem, Allah ninetaiken hapugutdinanherek meke etnogo nen hakhisik dogogin o.
50004010	Hit alebageik, an noba ebetdiluk yomakneasigisip nen, yabokane noba eberek welagap mekeat he, nikithogon yomakneau heat welagagisip nen yogotak yomakneegep iti nen ninoe Etagapogot nipisak hunik dogolik nakla arlekenmotok akhekhe lagei.
50004011	An yi meke ti meke dek halok, werek halok, nakla hano anek dogosak iluk arat yakulasigi iti nen, yi meke ti meke warlok nen kino yokhisigi ’buk.
50004012	An he, inerlageik welageikharek iti niluat, inameke doalegat welageikharek iti niluat. Hipiri abu baga inom, na’itmo inom, yi meke ti meke doalegat werekma, dekma, iti an walhasigisikmo nogo nen tha'bokhogonat hano anek apegerek o.
50004013	At Kristus nobatnetnakhe korlek nogo nen, yi meke ti meke weak agunem inom, hano agunem inom, erlok hagakhe dogosak anek.
50004014	Erlok hagakhe dogosak meke re, an nerlageik werekma, hit nen yomakneegethep iti hano motok o.
50004015	Hit Allah a’buri o Filipi meke nagarlak lak nerugi. Ebekeram, an hano wene yogeisilik nekhe dogeigiluk, o Makedonia nen wagunem, Allah a’buri o hetlake nen yomakneekhe lagoukha degat meke re, hit anek ninom hunik dogolik, yomakneugunem horlekhe lagagi iti hiniluat o.
50004016	An o Tesalonika eloma yi meke ti meke degat werekma, alebageik ageikhe laknisi agagisip nen, yabokane ageikhe laknisi agagip iti.
50004017	Meke re, itithogon yomakneekhe lagap mekeat he, laknisi agunem waganhe dogosak iti hasik kogotdekhe lagei ’buk. Hit oko horlau hak, Allah nen ebe hano meke wokhisugunem hit ite asubageik iluk kogotdekhe lagei o.
50004018	Yogotakne, hit nen yomakneegepma, horligirik, an tha’bokhogonat warlok apekhe lagei meke erlok agasik ato titu agaat. Ap Epafroditus oba ’begepma woknisi agama nen, nameke werek aga o. Hit nen an yomakneegep iti, domba Allah hasik warogo hetu hunekhe dogolik obasi hano meke liakhunem, at akla hano agarek hak, itithogon yomakneegepma, at Allah akla hano aga o.
50004019	Nen, hit yi meke ti meke hinerlageik werekma, an nopase Allah hogorakherek meke Kristus Yesus ipisak hunik dogolik inilmo horleak nen hogorakharek meke etnogo nen, wokhisugunem hinilmo horleak asugunat o.
50004020	Halok he, ninopase Allah hogorakho motok dogouok o, iluk“Amin, ” igi iti.
50004021	Hit Allah a'buri Kristus Yesus hinom hunik welagathep meke hinebe tomok tha'bokhogonat heagei wathinakhi o. Halok he, it aperek yogeisano. Iti hak, an nagarlak lak nerugi Allah a'buri ninom welago meke yoma aperek nen heagei wathinakhaat o.
50004022	It Allah a'buri o yoma welago meke tha'bokhogonat dapukhogon nen heagei wathinakhaat o. Heagei itithogon wathinakhe dogolik, ebe kok hakene, it at kok Kaisar inom welageikharek meke nen heagei wathinakhaat o.
50004023	Halok he, nagarlak lak nerugi. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut hano meke etnogo nen hinetaikenma dogolik thethisik dogoak o.
51001001	-
51001002	Hit Allah a’buri o Kolose natogokhethep mekeKristus hinom hunik dogolik, at hasik hinobabut hupukhogon hagakhe lagap meke, nagarlak lak nerugi. An Paulus Allah akla apasikhe baga, Kristus Yesus nen nayoko ’biluk la’ani ageikhemo wagagi meke etnogo, ninagot Timotius nipisak nen wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago iti o. Ninopase Allah obabut hano etnogo nen, hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, hagakhe dogoak o.
51001003	-
51001006	It aperek nen hit yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit meke hano meke Allah nen wokhisagein meke pogot oba ’binageikhemo werek o, ” iluk yokhisasukhama, hinetaiken Kristus Yesus oba hakotdiluk, hagakhunem, it aperek nen, “It inetaiken Kristus oba hakotdiluk Allah a’buri aperek tha’bokhogonat inakmurogon hagariogei, ” iluk, hinabok isinem ninasuk holhosik nen, hibiku-yogokuat sembayan hit hinobasik ekhe dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus opase Allah itiat heagei wakhe lago o. Hit wene hano wene, Allah obabut hano nen hagarinakherek wene etnogo ebekeram yokhisa agoukhama, hinasuk holhigisip nen, eberogonat iluk hutdisigip iti hurli, Allah nen hanothinabiogo hak, hano wene iti o yi ai ti ai wialarik laga dogolik, Allah nen akhuni itithogonat hano hagarinabiogoat.
51001007	Hano wene iti, at Epafras ninagarlak ninakmu meke nen yakulhisugunem yakulhigip iti o. At ebe Allah atuaneke nit ninom tak-tagat dogolik, Kristus nen ayoko ’biluk la'i ageikhemo, nit nen yokhisau hak ninobolukmo obabut hupukhogon yokhisiliogo iti.
51001008	At ebe ninoba wagasik nen, men isikhe, “It inobabut, akhuni aperek inakmurinakharek iti meke, Allah Agoreke nen wogeisugunem, akhuni aperek inakmurogo hagariogei o, ” iluk, hinabok hutukhogon yoknisa aga iti o.
51001009	Hinabok itithogon isinem ninasuk holhosik, nit nen hit hinobasik sembayan igik, Allah ayoko 'bigik, thogotdigidek isi motogat welago. Itithogon isinem Allah Agoreke nen hinakla kagalhunem, hinakla motok kagalogo wene hutdiluk nen, at Allah akla warlok apekherek meke iti hit nen, hutukhogon hinilurogon dogobageik iluk ayoko 'bekhe lagoat o.
51001010	Itithogon hinilu atluk nen, ninoe Etagapogot akla hanorogo, at warlok apekherek meke mothogon anek hagakhe dogosagat. Yi meke ti meke ai yakhunem erlo kok atluk nen eken hano ikherek hak, hit Allah obabut hinilu aga dogolik, yi meke ti meke hano meke hagakhe dogosak iti.
51001011	Ninopase Allah obatneak hogorakharek meke etnogo hinobatnethinakhunem, hit hinobatnerogo motok dogobageik iluk ayoko 'bekhe lageiat. Itithogon hinobatnethinakhunem, yi meke ti meke akin hinoba aga korlek, hinakla puk ageidek, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogolik, hinakla arleken akhigik,
51001012	ninopase Allah heagei wakhik, hagakhe dogosak iti. At ninopase nen, at a'buri aperek hinomat lia baga hinaierek erlokdogoagaluk hagathinakhikhemo welagap iti nen, arat heagei wakhe dogosak iti.
51001013	Nit alep o mummo weak meke nen apma herle warogo haknisik werekma, Allah nen herle hisalogo wokninakhikhesik nen, a'but etaiken hunik meke etnogo haknisik dogoagaluk apma 'binanhemo welago.
51001014	Allah nen herle hisalogo tilninakhikhe iti, ebe re, at a'but nenat herle hisalogo tilninakhikhesik, yi weak ti weak hagakhe lagagu meke iti, arat horogo degetdisasikhe.
51001015	-
51001016	Allah ebe ninileken hogorek dek mekeat, ebe alino hakene, Yesus ebe itiat o. At Allah nen, yi meke ti meke, pogot oba meke inom, agat oba meke inom, ninileken hogorek meke inom, hogorek dek meke inom, winametdisasikhe iti. Ninileken hogorek dek meke ageikhe, malaikat inobatneak dogolik inapma hagasik werekma inane hologo welageikharek meke itiat. Allah nen itithogon tha'bokhogonat winametdisasikhe iti, ebe re, at Kristus nenat, ekaerek hasigat winametdisasikhe iti nen, yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat iti, yoarlemake negen werek korlek, kok he, Allah a'but makusa meke Kristus itiat.
51001017	At ebe yi meke ti meke aban walhigidek werek korlek welageikhesik nen, yogotak yi meke ti meke obolukmo tomok werek iti, at nenat herogo werekma hano werek o.
51001018	Nit Allah a'buri ninoe kok at Kristus dogolik, ninebe ninilugutninakherek iti nen, at ebe iki isok negen welagorek. Yi meke ti meke yoarlemake negen werek korlek, at Allah nen, “Kok he, an na'but makusa mekeat dogoak, ” iluk, at ebe watlageikhesikmo nen, ilugutdisikhe iti.
51001019	At Allah nen, “An nakla warlok nen, an nobabut nikhok motok welagarek iti hak, an na'but itithogonat nipisak tak-tak motogat dogoak o, ” iluk, akla apasikhe tak-tagat welagarek o.
51001020	Yi meke ti meke agat oba meke inom, pogot oba meke inom, tha'bokhogonat Allah inom weak agoukhasik, wim palek hakene werekma, at Allah ekaerek inom dapulogo 'bisasikhe iti ebe, Yesus o baga meldiluk wakhukhama amep ulabogo watlageikhe iti baga dapulogo 'bisasikhe iti o.
51001021	Alebageik, hit hinakla weak wene ebekhe dogolik, hinobabut weak hagakhe lagagip iti baga, Allah hinom hekhogon dogolik wim palek negen welagagip.
51001022	Itithogon mekeat he, hit hinebe at Allah ekaerek hasik 'bakhalok, at il oba wene hinoba dekhogon hano karelek dogoagaluk, a'but ebe watlageikhe iti baga, ekaerek hinom dapulogo 'binageisikhemo welagap iti o.
51001023	Halok he, hano wene hinasuk holhigisip hinakla nen, “Yabokane hano asigin, ” iluk, apasigip meke iti, hinetaiken aborlok iluk kolelogo here'igidek hinobatnerogonat hago dogono. Hano wene iti, at nen yi ai ti ai akhuni inebe tha'bokhogonat yogeisasikhe wene iti yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk, an Paulus nayoko 'bisikhe iti.
51001024	An yogotak ya, at Kristus nen, “Allah a'buri tha'bokhogonat an nebeat o, ” iluk nit ninobasik yi aik ti aik hekhe lageikhesik watlageikhe iti, ageikhe higidek meke obolukmo, an nebe hit hinobasik yi aik ti aik hagatnabiogei iti nen nakla arleken akhekhe lagei.
51001025	An he, Allah nen, hit hinobasik, at a'buri meke tha'bokhogonat inatuaneke dogoagaluk nayoko 'bisikhemo, wene Allah nen isikhe wene iti tha'bokhogonat yogeisilik nekhe dogosak mekeat, yogeisilik nekhe lagei iti o.
51001026	Wene iti, o muk haganeat erloma nen yi tahun ti tahun hagatlaga dogolik, akhuni itaklarik waga korlek, Allah nen akhuni yogeisigidek inilomasirogon at akla limago welageikhe. Meke re, yogotak nit at a'buri meke halok, thelekma pakhogon yoknisasikhe iti o.
51001027	At Allah akla nen he, it akhuniitikmanke meke tha'bokhogonat hano motok hagarinabigin wene iti kokhogon hogorasusak mekeat apasikhesik nen akla limago welageikhe meke, at a'buri halok thelekma pakhogon yogeisagaluk isikhe. Wene iti ebe re, Kristus hit hinakla werek halok, yabokane hanothinakhunem hogothinabugun itiat o.
51001028	Iti nen, nit nen he, wene Kristus abok iti pakhogon akhuni tha'bokhogonat inebe dopok yogeisilik laga lago. Itithogon yogeisekhe lago iti baga, inebe dopok Kristus inom hunik dogolik, inetaiken horle atlukmo, Allah oba wogosik wisuogoluk, ninakla kagalek motok dogolik, inasuk wakhik, wene yakulisigik, hagarik laga lago iti o.
51001029	An wene iti hasik 'bogokhogon hagasigiluk, at Kristus obatne etnogo an nakla dogolik nobatnetnakho korlek, nobatnerogonat hagakho motok welagei iti o.
51002001	An nen he, hit men, it akhuni o Laodikia meke men, it aperek doalegat men, an nebe hinokodek meke hasik nobatnerogon hagakhe lagei meke iti, hit hinilurogon dogosak, iluk yokhisigi iti o.
51002002	Hit hinetaiken ago warek dogolik, hit-hit hinom hunik nakmu-hakmurogon dogobageik iluk itithogon hagakhe lagei o. Hit itithogon dogolik he, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk, hutdiluk nen, wene munini hinakla ebekhidek motok 'bogokhogon dogolik, wene Allah akla limago welageikhe wene iti hutukhogon hinilu asugun o. Wene iti, Kristus ebeat o.
51002003	Allah akla kagalek dogolik, yi wene ti wene motok ilu iti, at akla limago welageikhe mekeat he, Kristus arligat nen pakhogon yoknisekherek.
51002004	It aperek inekalat mekeat he, inane hano eberogonat thalek nukhetdinaginogo iluk yokhisigi iti o.
51002005	An nebe walegat welagei mekeat he, netaiken hit hinoba la'i agarik, ninom etoma welago hakene. Dogolik, hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotdiluk hinetaiken opakiat hinobatnerogon mothogon hagakhunem nileken hisekhe lageiatma, nakla arleken akhekhe lagei o.
51002006	Hit nen he, “Kristus Yesus ninoe Etagapogot o, ” iluk ebe horlasigip iti nen, hinom hunik motok dogono o. Itithogon dogolik, hinobabut wene yakulhisasukha tak-tagat,
51002007	hinomaken Yesus oba a'bethogon ya’iluk, hinetaiken at oba ’bogokhogon hakotdiluk, hinom hunik dogolik nen, hinetaiken horle ago motok dogolik, Allah heagei wakho motok dogono o.
51002008	Itithogon isi werekma, akhuni aperek inakla kagalek meke thalek, wene we meke inekalat yokhisekhe dogolik, nukhetdinaginogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono. Wene iti, Kristus nen isikhe meke tak-tak iliogei ’buk. Weat, akhuni itaklarik waga korlek, inopa lak nen, “O yoma yi meke ti meke herlaga, mokat inobabut weak meke itiat o, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha meke tak-tagat nukhetdinagaliogei iti.
51002009	Meke re, Allah ebe abisake motogat Kristus akla werekma, akhuniat itaklasi ageikhesik welageikhe iti.
51002010	Malaikat pogot oba meke inom, mokat obabut weak meke inom, inapma hagasik werekma inane holharek meke, at Kristus kok arligat ane holusak iti nen, hit meneke, at hinom hunik dogolik, hinetaiken ’bogokhogon horle agasip welagap iti.
51002011	Hit, at hinom itithogon hunik welagap iti nen, akhuni iniki nen inoado aperlagap palinakharek hak palhinakhukhama palek welagap ’buk. Dek o. At Kristus nenat hinobabut hinikhogat dogolik weak hagakhe lagagip meke iti palogo la’isasikhemo, hinoado etnogo palek dogou hak welagap iti.
51002012	At Kristus watlageikhemo ebe warek thaldisukha hak, hit ima usa’inagekhe dogolik, hinom hunigat thaldinageisukha o. Nen, at hinom hunik warek werekma, Allah obatne baga ilugutdisikhe, iluk, hinetaiken at obatne baga hakotdisigipiti nen, ima nen ’buakhogon lia’inageisinem, at hinom hunigat hiniluguthinakhikhe o.
51002013	Hit alebageik nen, hinoado itikmanke hasik hinoado aperlagap etnogo palek dek, weak hagakho motok dogolik, hinebe warek hakene werekma, at Allah nen nit weak hagakhe lagagu meke thagalogo degetdisalok nen, Kristus hinom hunigat werekma hiniluguthinakhikhe iti o.
51002014	Wene at Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo, nit nen here'isalok weak hagakho motok welagagu meke iti, holal negen waganek wene kok ninoba werekma, Yesus ebe o baga meldiluk wakhe dogolik, nit wene ninoba welageikhe meke iti inom pisuemaken oba warogo ’bisukha iti baga, Allah nen wene iti arat degetdisikhe iti o.
51002015	At Kristus ebe o iti baga watlaga dogolik, Iblis agarumi koktek inobatne werek meke inom erlok degetdisalok, akhuni nen thili meke inom wim yakhe dogolik inobatne atluk, inebe iniluk herle warogo akhuni inil oba wogosik wageikherek hak, at Kristus nen thelekma inekarli wakhikhe iti.
51002016	Iti nenat, it akhuni aperek nen, “Hipiri, i, iti meke nausak meke. Nen iti meke nausak dek meke, ” igik, “Mulikin iti baga usekhe halok, iti baga dageikhe halok, itithogon hagasusak meke, ” igik, "Thut holelhe halok, itithogon hagasusak meke, ” igik, "Iniki ageikhe Allah hasik werlegat dogolik, itithogon hagasusak meke, ” igik, isi korlek, hit yugunat hagakhunem, wene iti meke hasik, wene hinoba ’busak dek o.
51002017	Akhuni inebe aban waga korlek inamukhak tak inelokhoma wagarek hak, Kristus ebe aban wageidek werek korlek, wisigin iluk wene tha’bokhogonat iti meke tak hagakhe lagoukha. Meke re, ebe re, Kristus at o.
51002018	Nen, it aperek nen, inobabut inikhogat dogolik wirlidikhogonat hogorakhekhe dogolik men egarek iti, “Nit akhuni ninebe kepu o. Koktek he, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke itiat. Halok he, inapma dogolik hogorinakhe dogosak, iluk an na’bikaka hegerek meke nen yokhisekhe lagei iti, ” iluk inekalat Kristus hinom hunik meke ula’inaguogoluk yokhisiliogei iti. “Eberogonat, ” iluk hinakla apugup o.
51002019	Ninebe yi ninukuloak inom hunik werekma, niniki ninisok ekarlim ninomaken oba hunogo ’binanhikhemo, ninapiri nasinem apusu ninoak elolake lagunem, ninebe kok agorek hak, nit Allah a’buri Kristus ninom hunik werekma, at Allah nenat, kogotninakherek iti. Meke re, it iti itithogon ninoe kok Kristus inom hunik welagoukhasik nenat, yabokane kobologo la’isasukha iti nen, inane holhup o.
51002020	-
51002021	Hit Kristus hinom hunik dogolik watlagagip iti nen, mokat obabut weak meke agat oba yoma iki hago welagarek meke etnogo nen hinebe herle warogo hakhisik werekma, Allah nen herle hisalhinakhikhe iti. Meke re, hit hinobabut it aperek agat oba meke inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagakharek hagat, hagakhe lagap iti nenaluk. It iti nen, “Yi meke ti meke aperek hiniki a’bethogon hakhigik, thelonhogon hakhigik, ageikhe ituk walhigik, hagakhup o, ” iluk inasuk wakhunem nenaluk holiluk hagakhe lagap.
51002022	Wene iti, akhuni nenat, yi meke ti meke nasinem dek agarek meke hasigat, “Yigithogon hagakhe dogouok, ” iluk akhuni nen wene palharek hagat, inasuk wakhik, yakulisigik, iliogei iti.
51002023	It iti ineram nenat akhuni yogeisekhe dogolik, “Malaikat inapma dogolik hogorinakhik, hinakla nen, Nebe kepu, iluk igik, inetaiken hano asuagaluk, iniki inasuk inilhaoak palegarek hak, inoado baga wiik-weakhogon hagakhik, hagakhe dogosak o, ” iluk wene inakla kagalek hanothalek yogeisiliogei iti. Meke re, inoba agaken dageisinem, wene iti baga nen inetaiken thebelusak erlok dek o.
51003001	At Allah nen he, Kristus ilugutdekhe dogolik, hithinomat hiniluguthinakhikhemo welagap iti nen, yi meke ti meke Kristus ebe pogot oba Allah alilu iki ebeke kogat welagarek oba etoma meke horla luok nen, hinobatnerogo hagakhe dogono o.
51003002	-
51003003	Hinebe watlagagisip nen, yabokane Kristus hinomat hiniluk dogogun meke Allah nen aban thelekmatdigidek aburarek werek iti nen, hinakla nen, yi meke ti meke agat oba meke oba ebekhidek dogolik, pogot oba meke oba ebekhe dogono.
51003004	Ebekho werekma, at Kristus ninebe yabokane niniluk motok dogoagaluk hagatninakherek meke etnogo thelegat wagunem, hit at hinomat thelekma atlukmo hogothinabugun iti o.
51003005	Iti nen he, hinobabut hinikhogat dogolik, hinakla nen yi warlok ti warlok apegethep meke iti warogo here'isekhe dogono. Hinobabut iti, param ha'isegarek iti inom, inakla nen, warlok iluk wosi nekarek iti inom, inetaiken nen nekerethek inoba agaken dageikherek iti inom, inileken lageisalok inakla nen warlok apegarek iti inom, kaneke oba hakokthek dogou hak, inakla nen, “Yi meke ti meke, an meke anek dogolep, ” iluk apegarek iti inom, hinobabut iti meke tha'bokhogonat warogo here'isekhe dogono.
51003006	It akhuni Allah ane inasuk holu'buk meke nen inobabut itithogonat hagakhunem, Allah akla aga dageiluk, weagarinabigin werek o.
51003007	Hit alebageik, iti meke hasigat hagakhe dogolik, hinobabut itithogonat hagakho welagagip.
51003008	Itithogon mekeat he, yogotak hit hinobabut ageikhe yi meke tha'bokhogonat here'isausagat. Inakla aga dageikherek iti inom, inakla hetpet ekherek iti inom, it aperek weagarinakharek itiinom, inape baga, inabok weak palhik, weak hagakharek meke asagan tha’bok igik, egarek iti inom, here'isekhe dogono.
51003009	-
51003010	Su alep meke nokorlogo la’isalok nen, yabokane ket meke ikharek hak, hit hinobabut alep hagakhe lagagip meke here’isalok, yabokane hinobabut ket meke waganhigip iti nen, hinekalat ekhe dogogup o. Hinobabut ket meke iti, Allah nenatwinametdinageisikhesikmo nogo nen, at ekaerek obabut hakene hagatlatluk nen, ebe motok hutukhogon hinilu asuagaluk, eran-alebat hagathinabiogo iti o.
51003011	Itithogon hagathinakhunem, ninebe tha’bokhogonat ninoe Etagapogot Kristus arligatma, ninebe tha’bokhogon at ninom hunik welago iti nen, inukuloak etaga Yunani meke igik, Yahudi meke igik, egarek iti inom, inoado aperlagap palek meke igik, palek dek meke igik, egarek iti inom, inane kut palek meke igik, walegat okamake meke igik, egarek iti meke inom, inatuaneke meke igik, inasokne meke igik, egarek iti inom, ekhe dogosak dek welagap iti.
51003012	Hit hinebe, Allah nen wenago ekaerek hasik ’bakhasikhesik nen, “An nekaerek na’buri o, ” iluk, akmurogon welagarek iti. Halok he, su ket meke ikharek hak, hinobabut men meke waganino. Inebe inakmurinakharek meke iti inom, inobabut enago welageikharek meke iti inom, inekaerek nen hogorakhigidek inetaiken thebekhogon welageikharek meke iti inom, inobabut liokhogon hagakharek meke iti inom, inobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageikharek meke iti inom, hinobabut iti meke waganino.
51003013	Hit-hit aperek nen aperek weak hagathinakhunem, ua ’bigidek hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk hagakhe dogolik, thagalogo here’isekhe dogono. Hit weak hagakhe lagagip meke, ninoe Etagapogot nen thagalogo here’isasikhe hak, hit-hit itithogonat thagalogo here’isekhe dogono o.
51003014	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ebe kok hakene re, akhuni inebe hinakmurogon dogono. Inakmurogonwelageikharek meke iti baga, hinebe opakiat motok dapukhogon dogou hagat dogogun iti.
51003015	At Allah nen Kristus ebe opakiat meke hinom dapukhogon hunik dogobageik iluk hinayoko 'bisikhe iti nen, yi meke ti meke hagasuogoluk, hinakla nen, “Kristus nen ninom dapukhogon 'binanhikhemo welago, ” iluk, wene itiat kogotdekhe dogolik, mothogon hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, Allah ebe heagei wakhe dogono.
51003016	Akhuni inameke doalegat meke inikierek welageikharek hak, hit nen, Kristus ane itiat hinetaikenma obatnerogon 'biluk dogolik, hinakla kagalogoat, hit-hit wene hinasuk wat-wat hagakhe dogolik, wene hit nen yakulisigik, it nen yakulhisigik, hagakhe dogono. Yakulisekhe dogolik, Allah hasik etai Mazmur meke wakhik, etai Allah hogorakharek meke wakhik, Allah Agoreke nen hinakla kagalhunem, etai ket kagalogo wakhik, hagakhe dogolik, hinetaikenma nen Allah heagei wakhe dogono.
51003017	“Ninopase Allah nen woknisekherek iti, ebe Yesus nenat woknisekherek o, ” iluk, Allah heagei wakhe dogolik, “Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus apma dogolik hagakhe lago, ” iluk, yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat hagasuogoluk, hinane yi meke ti meke hasik uogoluk, at Yesus etaga palogo hagakhe dogono o.
51003018	Hit humi nerugi. Ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik hinobabut hagasusak tak-tagat, hinaguni inapma dogolik inane hologo hagakhe dogono o.
51003019	Nen, hit ap nagarlak lak. Hinagugi mep dageik-dagokhogon hagarinakhidegat, hinakmurogon dogono o.
51003020	Nen, hit yekerugi, nagarumi. Hinagosa, hinopase lak nen, yi meke ti meke hasik yokhisugunem, inane hologohagakhe dogoumo, ninoe Etagapogot oba hotok igin iti nen, itithogonat hagakhe dogono o.
51003021	Nen, hit inopase lak, nagarlak lak. Hina'buri inakla korlo asunogo iluk inakla aga liakhe dogogup o.
51003022	Hit inatuaneke meke nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinougi agat oba meke nen, yi meke ti meke hagasuagaluk isinem, inebe inil oba halok inakla hanorogon hagakhik, dekma halok huk ageik, hagakhe dogogup o. At he, ninoe Etagapogot hinayukhogon hinetaiken opakiat dogolik, hinougi iti inane hologo hagarisekhe dogono.
51003023	Yi meke ti meke hagakhe dogolik, hinakla nen he, “Akhuni hasik hagakhe lago dek o. Ninoe Etagapogot obasigat o, ” iluk, hinetaiken oba nenat hagakhe dogono o.
51003024	Hinebe ninoe Etagapogot Kristus at apma dogolik, at obasigat hagakhe lagap iti nen, hinakla nen, “Nit hagakhe lago iti hasik, oko at ninoe Etagapogot Kristus nen itetdinanigin werek o, ” iluk, hinakla hutdiluk dogono.
51003025	Meke re, at ninoe Etagapogot nen, akhuni inelokhoken oba anek hisalok, aperek elokhoma 'bisigik, aperek oporlike 'bisigik, hagakherek dek iti nen, tha nen weak hagakhe meke hasik, oko wogosu hak, weak hagakhe iti tak-tagat ukum oba 'bigin werek o.
51004001	Nen, hit it iti inougi koktek meke, hinakla nen he, “Ninoe Etagapogot pogot oba werek o, ” iluk hutdiluk hinagarumi hinatuaneke meke iti, yi meke ti meke wogeisausak tak-tagat wogeisekhe dogono.
51004002	Sembayan Allah heagei wakhe dogoligat, hina'it ageidek hunik-hunigat ekhe dogolik, hinobabut hebelogo dogono.
51004003	Sembayan ekhe dogolik, nit ninobasik, men ekhe dogono, “Allah ninopase. Wene Kristus nen hagakhikhe wene, alep hakla limago welageikhe meke etnogo, it Paulus lak nenyogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk, thu hualisano, ” iluk, sembayan nit ninobasik ekhe dogono. Wene iti hasigat niki herle warogo 'banhama yoma welagei.
51004004	Wene iti, an nen yogeisausak tak-tagat, hutukhogon yogeisekhe dogeik nen he, sembayan ekhe dogono.
51004005	It akhuni Allah ane inokodek meke hasik he, hit hinakla motok kagalek dogolik, “Nit Allah a'buri hagasusak meke hano asuak nen ya bagaat hagakhe dogouok, ” iluk iti mekeat hagakhe dogono.
51004006	Hinane yi meke ti meke hasik it aperek yogeisekhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke mayu hilhunem ituk hano egarek hak, “Wene iti hano, ” iluk, waganuagaluk, hinane eanerogon yogeisekhe dogono. Itithogon yogeisugunem, it hinoba hinok waganhunem, wene oko inebe dopok yogeisobageik nen, hinilurogon dogono.
51004007	At Tikhikus ninagot ninakmu meke, nit ninomat ninoe Etagapogot atuaneke dogolik, at hasik obabut hupukhogon hagakherek meke nen wene an nabok yabokane yokhisasiginetnaga o.
51004008	Hit nen, “It inebe itithogon werek higi, ” iluk, wene hinilu atluk nen, hinetaiken hapuk uagaluk, iti hasigat hinoba la'isigin iti.
51004009	At ipisak wisuagaluk, ninagot Onesimus, ebe ap hit meke obabut hupunhek ninakmu meke etnogo, ipisagat la'isasigin iti o. It witluk nen he, wene nit yoma hagakhe lago meke tha'bokhogonat yokhisasugun o.
51004010	Aristarkhus an nipisak niniki herle warek welago meke nen heagei wathinakhik, Barnabas agarlak Markus etnogo nen heagei wathinakhik, ega o. At Markus hasik wene alep yokhisasigi etnogo hagat, at ebe hinoba waga halok, hanorogo waganino.
51004011	At Yustus, etaga ageikhe Yesus etnogo nen, heagei wathinakheat o. Inoado aperlagap palek meke, inebe henagan eta anek Allah apma dogogun wene etnogo ninomnen yogeisekhe dogolik yomakneasinem nakla hano ariogo.
51004012	At Epafras, Kristus Yesus atuaneke, ebe hit mekeat etnogo nen, heagei wathinakheat o. At nen he, hit hinakla nen, “Allah ane iti eberogonat, ” iluk hutdiluk nen, hinetaiken horle atluk hinebe metegat dogolik, yi meke ti meke Allah akla apekherek hak hagakhe dogobageik iluk sembayan hit hinobasik obatnerogonat isi motogat welagarek.
51004013	Itithogon isi dogolik, hit hinobasik inom, akhuni o Laodikia meke inobasik inom, Hierapolis meke inobasik inom, obatnerogon hagariogo iluk, an nen obabut palhirik nen yokhisigi iti o.
51004014	At Lukas, ebe dokter dogolik u hagarinakherek meke ninakmu meke etnogo nen heagei wathinakhik, at Demas nen heagei wathinakhik, egaat o.
51004015	It ninagarlak lak ninerugi Allah a'buri o Laodikia welageikharek meke etoma inom, he Nimfa etnogo inom, Allah a’buri aperek at aila natogorliogei meke inom, “Paulus lak nen heagei wathinakha, ” iluk yogeisano.
51004016	Wene holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago meke iti, arat etaga thalhep halok he, it Allah a’buri o Laodikia natogorliogei meke inasuk holuak nen etaga thaluagaluk la’ino. Nen, it Laodikia meke inoba la’isigi etnaga, hit hinoba la’i agunem, etaga thalinoat.
51004017	At Arkhipus etnogo wene men iluk yogotno, “Ninoe Etagapogot nen hayoko ’bekhe dogolik, Yabu an nobasik itithogon hagatno, iluk yokhekhe meke iti, ilugun oba arat kobokhogon hagatno, ” iluk yogotno.
51004018	Yi anek he, an Paulus nekaerek niki nen holal waganogo heagei wathinakhi. Hit nen he, “Paulus iki herle warek werek, ” iluk noba eberek dogono o. Allah obabut hano etnogo nen hakhisik dogoak o.
52001001	Hit Allah a'buri o Tesalonika natogokhe dogolik, ninopase Allah inom, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus inom, hinom hunik welagap meke, nagarlak lak nerugi. An Paulus, Silas Timotius ipisak ninom nen, wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la'i ago iti o. Ninopase Allah obabut hano etnogo nen hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, hagakhe dogoak o.
52001002	Nit nen sembayan hit tha'bokhogonat hinobasik hinetaga hunogo ekhe dogolik, Allah heagei wakho motogat welago.
52001003	Ninopase Allah il oba sembayan itithogon ekhe dogolik, hit hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik hagakhe lagap meke inom, akhuni aperek hinakmurogo dogolik, hinobatnerogo yomageisekhe lagap meke inom, hinakla nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus nen hano hagatninabigin, ” iluk hinebe hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagap meke inom, nit nen hit hagakhe lagap meke iti hasik obarlikmatdigidek, eberek motok welago. 934
52001004	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinebe Allah akmurogo dogolik wenakhinakhikhemo welagap iti ninilu o.
52001005	Nit hano wene wolok yokhisa agagu etnogo, ninane baga anek yokhisekhe lagagu 'buk. Allah Agoreke etnogo ninakla dogolik, obatnerogo yomaknisekho korlek, ninakla nen, “Wene yi eberogonat, ” iluk ninetaikenma hutdisugusik nenat yokhisekhe lagagu iti o. Nit o etoma ninom dogolik, hit hinobasigat hagakhe lagagu etnogo hit hiniluat o.
52001006	Hit yi aik ti aik hagathinakho korlegat, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogoagaluk Allah Agoreke nen hinakla kagalhikhemo, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, hano wene waganhigisip nen, nit ninobabut waganhik, ninoe Etagapogot obabut waganhik, hagakhigip iti o.
52001007	-
52001008	Ninoe Etagapogot nen hagakhikhe wene etnogo hit werekma nen wikalarik wikalarik o Makedonia, Akhaya, lageikhe iti. Meke re, iti anek 'buk. Hit hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdisigip meke iti, hinabok o yi ai ti ai tha'bokhogonat lageikhemo inilumo, nit nen yabokane hinabok yogeisausak dek aga. Iti nen he, akhuni o Makedonia meke inom, o Akhaya meke inom, hano wene eberogonat iluk waganhukha meke tha'bokhogonat nen, “It hano hagariogei, ” iluk, hinobabut waganogo hagariogei iti.
52001009	-
52001010	It nen wene men iliogeiat, “It akhuni o Tesalonika meke nen, Paulus lak inebe woginabiluk nen, Eberogonat, Allah iluk motok welagarek meke itiat o, iluk apma dogolik, at hasik hagakhik, at a'but pogot oba nen usasigin iti ebe therogo welageik, hagasuogoluk kaneke here'isalok, inelokhe dagakhogon Allah wogokhukhasik werek o. Allah nen a'but watlageikhesikmo ilugutdisikhe meke, ebe Yesus itiat o. Nen, Allah akla aga dageiluk ukum akhuni inoba 'bekhe dogolik, nit Yesus iti nenat tilninabigin o, ” iluk, hinabok hano iliogeiat o.
52002001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinakla nen, “It Paulus lak ninoba wagoukha iti, we yugunat alomarogo wageidek, ” iluk, hinekaerek hiniluat o.
52002002	Hit hinoba aban wageidek o Filipi etoma werekma, akhuni etoma meke nen inakla erlok degetdinaniluk yi aik ti aik hagatninakhe lagoukha. Itithogon mekeat, ninopase Allah nen ane hano wene etnogo ninayuk dekhogon yokhisasuagaluk hagatninakhikhemo wagagusik yokhisasi werekma akhuni doalegat nen, “Wene iti nina'it o, ” iluk, ekhe korlegat, ninobatnerogo yokhisekhe lagagu etnogo, hiniluat o.
52002003	Wene yokhisekhe dogolik hinasuk wakhe lagagu iti, hit nuk asuagaluk korlo wene yokhisigik, ninetaiken pere dogolik yokhisigik, ninane 'bitokhogon yokhisigik, ekhe lagagu dek o.
52002004	At he, at Allah nenat ninobabut palogo nen, “Hano wene iti, hirat wolok nekhe dogobageik, ” iluk, ninayoko 'bisikhe tak-tagat yokhisekhe dogolik, akhuni inakla hanorogo iluk yokhisogorek 'buk. Dek o. Allah ninobabut paliogo meke etnogo akla hanorogo iluk yogeisogorek o.
52002005	Nit ninakla nen, yi meke ti meke ninameke dogolep e, iluk apekhe dogolik, ninane baga nen agugurogo yogeisekhe lago dek iti, hit hiniluat o. Nen, Allah iluatma, at nenat, “Iti eberogonat, ” iluk pakhogon uak.
52002006	Hit nen nit hogotninakhik, it aperek nen hogotninakhik, akhuni meke nen itithogon hogotninabuagaluk ekhe lago dek o. At Kristus nen ninayoko 'biluk la'inani ageikhemo wene iteerek dogolik, ninane ninobatnerogon yokhisausak erlok welago.
52002007	Itithogon mekeat, inagosa lak nen ineagei alelogo woginabiluk nen hagasik welageikharek hak, nit hit ninomlogolik alelogo hakhisik dogolik hagakhe lagagu iti o.
52002008	Nit len hit hinebe ninakmurogo welago iti nen, Allah ane iti mek suputhisasugu 'buk. Dek o. Hinebe ninakmu motok nen, linakla arleken akhekhe dogolik, ninebe inomat wokhisasuguat iti o.
52002009	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit Allah ane lano wene iti yokhisugunem, yi meke ti meke hasik, hit aperek hinoba tiolhinabunogo iluk, nit ninekaerek nen dikene libakone ninobatnerogon hagakhik, mep dageik-dagokhogon nagakhik, hagakhe lagagu etnogo, hiniluat o.
52002010	Nit hit wene eberogonat iluk waganhigip meke ninom logolik, akhuni nen, “It weak hagakha, ” iluk, wene ninoba 'busak degat karelek dogolik, mothogon anek hagakhe lagagu etnogo, hit Allah hinomat hinilumo re, “Iti eberogonat, ” iluk usak iti.
52002011	-
52002012	Hit Allah apma ikiluk hogorakharekma etoma ukiluk dogobageik iluk ninayoko 'bisikhe meke etnogo akla warlok apekherek meke nothogonat hagakhe dogobageik nen iluk, nit nen inopase ak nen ina'buri inasuk wakharek hak, hinebe tomok hinasuk wakhik, hinetaiken thebelhik, hinakla kagalhik, hagakhe agagu etnogo, hit hiniluat o.
52002013	Nit nen wene Allah ane etnogo yokhisasugumo, hit nen, “Wene iti akhuni inane meke dek o. Allah aneat o, ” ilukwaganhigip iti, eberogonat Allah aneat waganhigip o. Iti nen lit huk ageidek Allah heagei wakho motok welago. At Allah nen hit hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisigip meke hinakla kagalho motok welagarek o.
52002014	Nagarlak lak nerugi. It Allah a'buri aperek Kristus Fesus inom hunik dogolik, o Yudea etoma natogorliogei neke, inekaerek inagarlak lak Yahudi meke nenat, yi aik ti aik hagarinakhe lagoukha hagat, hit hinagarlak lak meke nenat yi aik ti aik hagathinabiogei o.
52002015	It ap Yahudi meke menat, it ap haganeat Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inebe inakhik, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ebe wakhik, hagakhukha hagat, nit yi aik ti aik hagatninabiogei iti, Allah nen hano iluk apekherek dek. Akhuni inom weak anek hagakhe dogolik,
52002016	Allah nen it akhuni itikman meke tilinabuagaluk nit nen hano wene yogeisilik lagunem, akhuni inagolak palharek hak, it nen, “Wene hano wene iti yogeisausak dek, ” iluk wene paliogei iti o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hibiku-yogoku weak hagakharek mekeat obarluk hagariogei iti nen, Allah akla aga dageiluk, ukum kok meke inoba 'bekhe iti o.
52002017	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit nen hit hinasokne 'binageiluk wagagusik, yogotak ya elanma hasik ninebe walegat welago mekeat he, ninetaiken hit ninom opakimo welago hakene iti o. Itithogon dogolik, “Inelokhoken ninileken hisa lelo e, ” iluk, haganeat nen ninakla warlok motok apekhe dogolik hinoba wisuogoluk walhekhe lagosik.
52002018	Walhekhe dogolik, an Paulus nekaerek niki alep ageikhe wisigiluk walhigik, yabokane ageikhe wisigiluk walhigik, hagakhigi mekeat he, Iblis nen nagolak palhikhemo huk agagi iti o.
52002019	Nit nen he, “Hano asigin, ” iluk ninakla arleken akhekhe lago iti, thani inobasik nogo. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ebe witluk, “Hano hagakhep, ” iluk, at il oba ekagat 'binanumo hogorakhagun iti, erlo ki baga nen nogo. Erlo ninat meke hasik 'buk. Hit hinebe hasigat hogorakhagun o.
52002020	Ninakla arleken akhigik, hogorakhigik, hagakhe lago iti hit hinebe hinobasigat o.
52003001	Nit hit hinobasigat ninetaiken thebelusak erlok dek agama nen, men apogo. Nit o Atena yoma ninar ligat dogogun o.
52003002	-
52003003	Werek korlek, at ninagot Timotius, hano wene Kristus hagakhikhe wene etnogo ninomat, Allah hasik yogeisilik nekhe lago meke etnogo, akhuni nen yi aik ti aiklagathinabiogei iti nen, hit hinetaiken Kristus oba lakotdisigip meke aborlok unogo iluk, hinetaiken ago wathinakhik, hinasuk wakhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk hinoba la'i ago iti o. Yi aik ti aik hagatninabiogei iti, Allah nen nit ninobasik akla apekhe dogolik, “Itithogon hagathinakhe dogogun, ” iluk isikhe hagat lagathinabiogei iti, hiniluat o.
52003004	Nit alebageik hit ninom logolik, “Yabokane yi aik ti aik hagatninakhe dogogunat o, ” iluk, yokhisasugu etnogo tak-tagat hagatninabiogei iti hinilu o.
52003005	Iti nenat, at Iblis ninakla kagalherek meke etnogo nen hinakla kagali isumo, nit nen hit hinobasik thereak-moreak hagakhe lagagu etnogo we yugunat alomatlasusak iti na'it o, iluk nelabut hisik dogolik, netaiken thebelusak erlok dek agama nen, “Inetaiken Kristus oba hakokthegat werek a? Dek a, ” iluk at Timotius nen hinobabut paliluk nen, yoknisi isuagaluk, hinoba la'i agei iti o.
52003006	Nen, at Timotius hinoba la'i ageima wagasik etnaga, yogotak apuke ninoba wagasik nen, hit hinetaiken Kristus oba hakokthek dogolik, akhuni aperek hinakmurogon hagakhe lagap meke iti yoknisigik, nit nen, “It inelokhoken ninileken hiselo e, ” iluk warlok apekhe lago hak, hit nen itithogonat ninoba eberek motok dogolik, “It inobabut hano etnogo ninileken hiselo e, ” iluk, apekhe lagap meke iti, yoknisa agama nen, ninakla arleken akhekhe lago.
52003007	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit yi aik ti aik wiik-weakhogon hagatninakho korlegat, hit hinetaiken Kristus oba hakokthegat welagap iti nen, hit hinobasik ninakla hano agama welago.
52003008	Itithogon dogolik, hit ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogolik, hapukhogon metek welagap iti nen, nit meneke yogotak ninetaiken yamuk ekhemo welago o.
52003009	Nit ninopase Allah il obaat dogolik, hit hinobasik ninakla arleken akhekho motok welago iti hasik, Allah heagei motok wakhedogolikmo yabokane heagei nikithogon wasu heathagatlariogo.
52003010	Hit hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisigip mekeat he, aban hakene iti nen, nit ninebe hinoba witluk nen hinetaiken yabokane ago watdinagei isuogoluk, sembayan hit hinobasik dikene hibakone isi motok welago.
52003011	Nit yabokane hinoba wisuogoluk meke re, ninopaseAllah ekaerek inom, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus inom, ipisak nenat holak mothogon yaknisoak.
52003012	Nit nen hit hinebe ninakmurogon welago hak, hit nen itithogonat hit-hit hinakmurogon hagakhik, akhuni tha'bokhogonat hinakmurinakhik, kokhogonat hinakmurinakhe dogobageik nen, ninoe Etagapogot nen hinobabut inakmurinakharek iti meke oba dukhogon ageikhe inomat wokhisekhe dogoak.
52003013	Itithogon hagathinakhe dogoluk nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ekaerek agarumi inomat wagunem, hinebe ninopase Allah ekaerek hasik 'bisalok, at il oba wene hinoba dek hano karelek werekma 'bithisa isuak nen, hinetaiken horlethinakhe dogoak o.
52004001	-
52004002	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ilugun oba ageikhe yi yokhisak. Nit ninoe Etagapogot Yesus nen, “Hinobabut Allah akla hanorogon, yigithogon hagakhe dogono, tigithogon hagakhe dogono, ” iluk, isikhemo yakulhisa agagu etnogo hinilu. Itithogon yakulhisasugumo, hit nen itithogon hagakhe lagap mekeat he, yabokane ageikhe inom kokhogon hagakhe dogobageik iluk, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ninom hunik dogolik hinasuk warogo yokhisigi iti o.
52004003	Allah akla nen he, men apekherek iti, “Hit hinebe an nobasik 'baniluk karelek motok dogolik, param ha'isegarek iti meke ha'isigidek motogat dogono.
52004004	Itithogon dogolik, hinagugi dopok woginabiluk nen, hinom hano dogolik, hinebe an nobasik 'baniluk karelek dogolik, hinobabut inalon halogo hagakharek tak-tagat hagakhedogono.
52004005	It akhuni itikmanke meke, an nebe inokodek dogolik inoba agaken dageisinem yugunat ha'isiliogei iti, tithogon hagakhe dogosak dek o.
52004006	Iti meke hasik mothogon lagakhe dogolik, hinagarlak lak hinerugi inilomarogo naguni inagugi meke param ha'isausak dek o, ” iluk, Allah akla nen itithogon apalok yoknisekherek iti. Itithogon ekherek iti nen, alebageigat nit nen ekhe dogolik, “It akhuni param itithogon ha’isegarek meke, ninoe Etagapogot nen ukum inoba 'bigin werek o, ” iluk, Hinobatnerogon hinasuk warogo yokhisasugu o.
52004007	Allah nen, mit weak hagakhe dogoagaluk ninayoko 'bisikhe dek o. Ninebe at ekaerek hasik 'bisalok, karelek dogolik, mothogon nagakhe dogoagaluk ninayoko 'bisikhe iti o.
52004008	Wene iti hit iperek nen here'isekhe lagap halok he, nit akhuni ninane meke here'isekhe lagap 'buk. Dek o. Allah nen Agoreke hit wokhisekherek meke etnogo ane mekeat here'isekhe lagap o.
52004009	Nen, hit-hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinom ninakmurogon dogobageik iluk, Allah nen erlogat yakulhisiliogo iti nen, yabokane an nen nikithogon halok, “Hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinom hinakmurogon nagakhe dogono, ” iluk, holal waganogo hinoba la'isusak. Degat o.
52004010	Hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi o Makedonia etoma meke tha'bokhogonat itithogon hinakmurinakhe lagap mekeat he, nagarlak lak nerugi o. Yabokane kokhogonat hinakmurinakhe dogobageik iluk, hinasuk warogo yokhisigi iti o.
52004011	Nit nen alebageik yokhisasugu hagat, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogolik it aperek inawene meke thogotdisalok hiniki nen hinekaerek hinobaga meke dopok waganhe lagap meke itiat kogotdekhe dogono.
52004012	Itiat kogotdiluk nen, it aperek nen waganekmake nilik nekharek iti hak hagakhidek dogolik, akhuni itikmanke meke nen, “It hano, ” iluk uagaluk inil oba hinobabut mothogon hagakhe dogono.
52004013	Nagarlak lak nerugi. It akhuni aperek nen, “Hano hagatlasigin, ” iluk inakla nen hutdigidek dogolik he, akhuni watlagunem inakla weak ariogo iti hak, hit itithogon hinakla weak aga dogunogo iluk, wene akhuni watlariogei meke iti hasik hinokodek dogosak iti na'it. Hinilu asubageik iluk hutukhogon yokhisak o.
52004014	At Yesus ebe watlageikhesik nen iluk ageikhe iti eberogonat iluk hutdekhe lago. Iti nen, akhuni at inom hunik dogolik watlariogei meke yabokane Allah nen inilugurinabiluk, Yesus inom motok iniluk dogoagaluk eberogonat woginabigin iluk hutdekhe dogouogat o.
52004015	Wene ninoe Etagapogot nen isikhe meke yi yokhisak. At ebe wagunem, it watlagoukha meke here’isalok nit niniluk meke tak alebageik oba dagagun dek o.
52004016	Ninoe Etagapogot pogot oba nen usa’agunem, it malaikat meke inoe kok meke ane kokhogon igik, Allah apikon ane huthasinem ane kokhogon igik, isinem, akhuni Kristus inom hunik dogolik watlagoukha meke tak inilugurinabigin o.
52004017	Yabokane nit niniluk dogogun meke ninomat oisa akla hotnokhogon woknisik dageiluk nen, ninoe Etagapogot ninom turlem upu etoma abuk asi dageiluk nen, at ninom motogat dogogun o.
52004018	Iti nenat, wene iti baga hit-hit hinakla hanorogon, hinetaiken ago wat-wat ekhe dogono o.
52005001	-
52005002	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Akhuni aperek iniki abusak waganuogoluk hibako inokodegat werekma wageikharek hak, ninoe Etagapogot wisigin itinem itithogonat werekma wisigin iluk, hit hutukhogon hiniluat welagap iti. Halok he, an nen, “Itinem hagatlasigin, yinem hagatlasigin, ” iluk holal waganogo hinoba la’isusak dek o.
52005003	Akhuni nen he, “Nit hano la’bukhogon welago, ” iluk, isi korlegat, humi neagei inakla meke inokodegat werekma inebe itaginabusak ak-takma ineak hinet weak wakharek hak, itithogonat it nokodegat werekma weagarinakhunem lo dukhusak degat isigin o.
52005004	Meke re, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit o mummo dogolepma, akhuni inokodegat werekma iniki abusak waganuogoluk wagunem inakmaken lageikharek hak, itinem hit hinokodegat werekma hinakmaken lelep iti o. Meke re, hit o mummo welagap dek iti nen, hinakmaken lausak dek o.
52005005	Akhuni o dikene lia baga welageikharek hak, hit tha'bokhogonat lia iti teerek mekeat welagap o. Nit he, o hibako mummo velageikharek hak, iti meke iteerek welago ’buk. Dek o.
52005006	Halok he, it aperek noge negen iliogei iti, nit itithogon ekhe logosak erlok dek o. Ninobabut hebelogo dogolik, ninetaiken ekerlogoat dogouok o.
52005007	Akhuni noge egarek iti, hibakoneat noge egarek o. Nen, anggur eken apusu nalok hunu-hunu makene palharek iti, hibakoneat nalok hunu-hunu palharek o.
52005008	Meke re, nit o ha baga welagorek meke yi, ninobabut hebelogo logosak. Ninobabut hebelogo dogolik akhuni aperek nen nasunogo iluk thin inobakha baga ikharek hak, ninetaiken Mlah oba hakokthek dogolik, akhuni inebe ninakmurogon welagorek iti mekeat ikhigik, inukuloakma inasunogo iluk nukulasu a’bet meke dakulharek hak, Allah nen tilogo lanotninabigin iluk, ninakla hano welago iti mekeat dakuligik, magakhe dogouok o.
52005009	Allah akla aga nit ninoba ’biluk veagatninabigiluk wenakninakhikhe dek. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus nen tilogo hanotninabuagaluk wenakninakhikhe o.
52005010	At Yesus ebe nit ninobasik ninom niniluk motok dogouogoluk watlageikhesik nen, yabokane wisigin iti, ninebe watlatlukmo wisigin a? Niniluk werekma wisigin a. Hano anek. At ebe witluk, ninom niniluk motok dogogun iti o.
52005011	Iti nen, lit yogotak ya hagakhe lagap hagat, hit-hit hinasuk wat-wat gik, hinetaiken ago wat-wat igik, hagakhe dogono o.
52005012	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinougi hakhisik werek iti, ninoe Etagapogot nen meldisasikhemo dogolik, hit hinobasik inobatnerogo hagakhik, hinasuk wakhik, hagariogei iti nen, irat inapma dogolik, hinane inalon halogo yogeisekhe dogono o.
52005013	It itithogon hagakharek iti nen, hinakla nen he, “Irat ninougi inalon halogo dogouok o, ” iluk apekhe dogolik, inebe hinakmurogon dogono. Itithogon hinakmurogon dogolik, hit-hit hinetaiken hapukhogon hagakhe dogono.
52005014	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit nen he, it aperek yabu waganu'buk iniki waganu weak meke iti inasuk wakhik, inayuk weak meke iti inakla kagalhik, inobatne dek meke iti yomageisigik, hagakhe dogolik, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobasik erogat hagakhe dogono.
52005015	Akhuni nen hit aperek weagathinakhunem, oko-oko weagarinakhidek dogolik, hit-hit hinobasik inom, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobasik inom, inobabut hanorogo hagakharek iti mekeat kogotdekhe dogono.
52005016	Hinakla arleken akhasi motok dogono.
52005017	Sembayan hunik-hunik isi motok dogono.
52005018	Allah akla nen he, “Hit Kristus Yesus hinom hunik dogolik, yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat hasik an heagei watnakhe dogosak o, ” iluk apekherek iti nen, itithogonat hagakhe dogono.
52005019	Allah Agoreke ane thebelogo 'bigik,
52005020	Allah ane at Agoreke nen inakla kagalogo yogeisekherek meke iti, hinakla meanetdigik, hagakhe dogogup o.
52005021	Yi meke ti meke waganuogoluk, “Yi hano, yi weak, ” iluk hinakla nen walhalok, hano meke halogat, hiniki a’bethogon herogo dogolik,
52005022	weak meke yi weak ti weak hagariogei halok, tha'bokhogonat hagakhidek walekhogonat dogono.
52005023	Itithogon werekma, at Allah ninetaiken hapugutdinanherek meke etnogo nen, hinebe abisakeatekaerek hasik ’bakhalok dogoak o. Werekma, ninoe Etagapogot ebe wagunem, hinetaiken inom, hinebe inom, hinobabut inom, wene hinoba ’busak motok dek karelek werekma wisuak nen, at nenat hakhisik dogoak o.
52005024	At ninopase Etagapogot Allah ninayoko ’bisikhe meke etnogo nen, “Itithogon hagathinabigin, ” iluk abok yoknisekherek tak-tagat hagakherek etnogo nen hakhisik dogoluk, eberogonat hagathinabiginat o.
52005025	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit ninobasik sembayan ekhe dogono o.
52005026	Hit nen he, “Paulus lak nen heagei itithogon wathinakha o, ” iluk, Allah a’buri dogolik inobabut hagakharek hagat, hinagarlak lak hinerugi Allah a’buri meke aperek tha’bokhogonat heagei hanorogon warinabik lano o.
52005027	Wene holal waganogo la’i ago meke iti, hinagarlak lak hinerugi Allah a’buri meke aperek tha’bokhogonat inil oba etaga thalubageik iluk nobatnerogon ninoe Etagapogot etaga baga yokhisigi iti o.
52005028	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut hano etnogo nen hanorogon hakhisik dogoak o.
53001001	Hit Allah a'buri ninopase Allah ninoe Etagapogot YesusKristus ipisak hinom hunik dogolik, o Tesalonika natogokhe lagap meke nagarlak lak nerugi. An Paulus, Silas Timotius ipisak ninom nen wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago iti o.
53001002	Ninopase Allah, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen, hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinageigik, hagakhe dogoak o.
53001003	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotdiluk welagathep meke iti, ageikhe inom kokhogon hakotdigik, hit-hit hinebe dopok nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhethep meke iti, ageikhe inom kokhogonat hinakmurinakhik, hagakhe lagap iti nen, nit nen hit hinobasik Allah hogorasusak mekeat hogorakho motok welago.
53001004	Akhuni nen yi aik ti aik hagathinakho korlegat, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogolik, hinetaiken Kristus oba itithogon hakotdiluk welagathep iti nen, nit nen Allah a’buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke hinabok yogeisekhe dogolik hogothinakhe lago.
53001005	Allah nen akhuni ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, mothogon ’bekherek iluk ekagat asigin. Hit yogotak Allah apma ukiluk ane hologo welagap iti hasik, akhuni nen yi aik ti aik hagathinakho korlek itithogon welagap iti nen, at nen yabokane, “Hit erlok an napma ukiluk hinaierek motok dogono o, ” iluk, yokhisagein iti o.
53001006	-
53001008	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus agarumi malaikat yoko lageikharek meke inom pogot oba nen inobatnerogon thelekmaat, hetu amulok inom usa'agunem, Allah nen ukum akhuni inoba mothogonat ’bekhe dogolik, it nen hit yi aik ti aik hagathinabiogei meke, oko tak-tagat weagarinakhik, nen, hit yi aik ti aik hekhe lagap meke iti, nit ninomat ninakla hanotninakhik, hagasigin o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, it akhuni Allah ebe inilu asusak ina’it dogolik, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus hagakhikhe wene hano wene etnogo waganhidek here’isiliogei meke ukum inoba ’bisagein o.
53001009	It itithogon ukum inoba ’biluk, ninoe Etagapogot obatneak nen hogorakho motok welageikharekma il oba etoma nenat weakma etoma motogat dogoagaluk la’isagein o.
53001010	At wisigin itinem ebe wagunem, ekaerek a’buri inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welageikharek meke nen, at ebe hogorakhik, agugerakhik, hagasuagaluk wisigin iti o. Nen, nit nen wene iti ninilu meke pakhogon yokhisa agagumo, hit nen, “Eberogonat o, ” iluk waganhigip iti nen, hit ninom nenat, at hogorasugun o.
53001011	At Allah nen, “Hit itithogon hagakhe dogono o, ” iluk, hinayoko ’bisikhe hagat, erlok hagakhe dogobageik iluk, nit nen hit hinobasik sembayan isi motok welago. Hit hinakla nen, “Nit hano hagakhe dogolo e, ” iluk, apekhe lagap meke iti, Allah nen itithogon hagathinakhik, nen, hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogolik hagakhe lagap meke iti, at nenat hinetaiken horletdinagagik, at obatne iti baga hagathinakhe dogoak o.
53001012	N inopase Allah, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen hagathinakhunem itithogon hagakhe dogogun iti nen, hit nen he, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus etaga palogo agugerakhik, at nen he, hit agugethinakhik, hagasugun o.
53002001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ebe witluk nen, at ninom opakimo dogouogoluk natogotninabi isigin iti hasik, hinasuk tetnokhogon wasik.
53002002	Ninoe Etagapogot wisigin itinem arat hagatlagama thalek, it akhuni aperek nen, “Allah Agoreke nen yigithogon yoknekhe mekeat, ” iluk yokhisigik, it aperek nen, “Wene ebe yigithogon mekeat, ” iluk yokhisigik, it aperek nen, wene nit nen holal waganho meke hasik, “Ebe yigithogon mekeat, ” iluk yokhisigik, iliogei iti baga, hinetaiken ibat narlok-karlok iluk dil wasunogo iluk yokhisigi iti o.
53002003	Akhuni aperek nen, “Allah nina'it, ” iluk, here’isalok dukhigik, at obabut motok weak meke yabokane Allah nen hetu aik weakma la'isagein meke etnogo thelekma ageik, itithogon tak hagasugun iti nen, it aperek nen yigithogon igik, tigithogon igik, ekhe dogolik, nukhetdinagunogo. Na'it.
53002004	At iti ebe thelekma atluk nen, Allah ai halekma melasi ukiluk, ekaerek nen hogorakeke dogolik, “Akhuni nen, yi meke ti meke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hogorakharek meke inom, Ninopase ebe yi, iluk egarek meke iti tha'bokhogonat inom, erlok dek anek mekeat he, kok Allah nebe anat o, ” iluk ekhe dogogin iti o.
53002005	Tha'bokhogonat itithogon hagatlasigin iti hasik, an hit ninom dogolik yokhisekhe lagagi etnogo hinakla eberek dek welagap a? Eberegat welagap apekhe lagei.
53002006	At obabut weak meke ebe wageidek werek iti, ageikhe meke nen ha'iluk werek, iluk, hiniluat o. Ha'iluk werekma, at Allah nenat, “Thelekma asuak, ” iluk igin tak-tagat thelekma asiginat o.
53002007	Meke re, akhuni aperek nen, “Allah nina'it o, ” iluk, here’isalok dukhiluk inobabut weak hagasugun meke, yogotak limago hagariogeiat o. Meke re, at ageikhe nen ha'iluk werek meke iti Allah nen wokhaumo,
53002008	at obabut motok weak meke iti thelekmaat wisigin. Witluk nen, weak hagakho werekma, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus hogorakho korlek yabokane waga dogolik apelaga nen huphogon ebe warogo motok degetdisigin.
53002009	Itithogon warogo degetdisigin meke aban werek korlek, at obabut motok weak meke etnogo, Iblis nen obatne wogosumo akhuni nen hogorakhik, at oba ebekhik, hagasuagaluk, yi meke ti meke hagasusak dek meke eberogonat thalek elalinat hagakhe dogogin.
53002010	Itithogon elalinat hagakhe dogolik, ebe wene iti akhuni warlok nen waganumo Allah nen tilinabusak mekeat he, at obabut weak meke iti nen dal-kalhogon hagarinakhunem, it nen, “Ebe wene iti nina'it o, ” iluk, ekhe dogogun iti baga weagarinabigin o.
53002011	-
53002012	It, akhuni iti nen ebe wene eberogonat iluk waganhidek dogolik, “Weak meke itiat warlok, ” iluk hagakhe dogogun meke iti, inebe tha'bokhogonat Allah nen ukum inoba 'biluk weagarinabigiluk, nukherinakherek meke obatne werek meke ageikhe la'isigin. La'isumo, ekalat igin mekeat he, eberogonat thalek waganugun iti.
53002013	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe ninoe Etagapogot nen akmu werek o. Erlo baga Allah nen hinebe tilhinabigiluk wenakhinakhikhemo, hit nen ebe wene iti eberogonat iluk waganhik, nen, hinebe Allah Agoreke nen Allah ekaerek hasik 'bakhalok karelogo 'bisigik, hagakhe dogogun iti baga tilhinabigin iti nen, nit Allah heagei wasusak tak-tagat, hit hinobasik heagei wakho motok welago o.
53002014	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hogorakho motokwelageikharek hak, hit itithogonat hinomhogothinabuagaluk, Allah warlok nen hano wene nit nen yokhisa agagu iti baga, hinayoko 'bisekhemo welagap.
53002015	Iti nen, nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene nit nen yakulhisekhe dogolik ninane baga nen yakulhisigik, holal waganogo hinoba la'i ageik, hagakhugu meke iti, hiniki a’bethogon herogo dogolik, hinobatnerogon metegat dogono.
53002016	At ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus, ninopase Allah ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen, inakmutninakhukhasik, ninetaiken aborlok dek motok dogoagaluk ago watdinanhik, hano asigin iluk oba eberek dogoagaluk ninakla kagalhik, hagakharek o.
53002017	Itithogon hagakharek meke iti nenat, hit hiniki nen hano meke hagakhik, hinane baga hano meke yogeisigik, hagakhe dogobageik nen iluk, hinakla hanothinakhik, hinetaiken horlethinakhik, hagakhe dogoak o.
53003001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ilugun oba ageikhe yi yokhisak. Ninoe Etagapogot ane ibat wialatluk hit werekma etoma wageikhemo hano waganhigip hak, itithogonat wialarik lagunem it aperek nen hano waganuagaluk, nit ninobasik sembayan ekhe dogono.
53003002	It akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk waganhasik anek werek 'buk. It aperek waganhidek meke inobabut korlo hagakhik, weak hagakhik, hagariogei meke nen, weagatninabuogoluk hagakhunem, Allah nen tilninakhe dogoak nen he, nit ninobasik sembayan isi dogonoat o.
53003003	Meke re, ninetaiken ninoe Etagapogot oba hakotdisinem, ninane hologo hagakherek meke iti nen hinetaiken horlethinakhe dogolik, at obabut motok weak meke iti nen weagathinabigiluk hagakhunem hakhisik dogogin iti nen, hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogono.
53003004	Hakhisik werekma, nit ninakla nen he, “It nen, nit nen it inasuk wakhe lagagu meke etnogo, yogotak mothogon hagakhik, yabokane itithogon hagakhik, hagakhe dogogun o, ” iluk ninoe Etagapogot ninom hunik dogolik eberogonat apekhe lago.
53003005	Hit hinakla nen he, “Ninebe Allah akmu o, ” iluk hutdigik, hinobabut Kristus obakhanini hapugutdiluk hagakhe lageikhe hagat, obabut waganhik, kokhogon hagakhe dogobageik nen, ninoe Etagapogot ebe hinetaikenma dogolik, hinakla kagalhe dogoak o.
53003006	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi aperek Allah a'buri mekeat, wene nit nen hinasuk wakhugu etnogo hologo hagakhidek here'isalok, iniki waganhidek kupli hagariogei meke iti, hinom hunik dogogup o.
53003007	Nit he, hit ninom dogolik niniki nen waganhidek nina'it werlegat nekhe lagagu dek etnogo, hit nen nit ninobabut waganogo hagasusak hiniluat o.
53003008	Nit nen he, hipiri hit hinoba ageikhe oko palhidek werlegat neke lagagu degat o. Hit aperek hinameke degerogo neke dogunogo iluk, nit dikene nen hibakone nen motok thereak-moreak ninekaerek nenat ninobatnerogon hagatdiluk oko palogo neke lagagu iti.
53003009	Nit nen he, hit hinoba kino yokhisausak erlok mekeat he, hit nen nit ninobabut waganubageik nen iluk, kino yokhisigidek ninekaerek nen itithogon hagakhe lagagu iti.
53003010	Nit alebageik ninom dogolik yokhisekhe dogolik, “Hit aperek yabu waganhidek hinobabut kupli meke iti, hipiri nikidek werlegat dogoak, ” iluk, yokhisekhe lagaguat apigi.
53003011	Wene itithogon yokhisasugu mekeat he, it aperek nen he, “Akhuni it meke aperek inekaerek inayabu mekeat horligidek dogolik, it aperek inawene mekeat anhapok ilikliliogei, ” iluk yoknisegama ninasuk holhosik nen yokhisogo iti.
53003012	Nit nen he, akhuni hit meke inobabut itithogon hagariogei meke iti, inilaga isonhogo dogolik, inekaerek iniki nenat yabu waganogo inapiri mekeat neke dogoagaluk, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ninom hunik dogolik, at nen ekherek meke inakla kagalogo inasuk wakho iti o.
53003013	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hano meke hagakhe dogolik, hina'it ageidek hagakhe dogono o.
53003014	Wene holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago meke iti, it aperek nen inasuk hologo hagasusak ina’it meke iti, inekarli asuagaluk it inobabut itithogon hagariogei meke iti hutdisalok nen, hinom hundiluk dogogup o.
53003015	Itithogon mekeat he, hinom wim palek negen hagakhe dogogup o. We, “Ninagarlak lak ninerugi Allah a’buri mekeat, ” iluk, inasuk hanorogon wakhe dogono o.
53003016	Ninoe Etagapogot ninetaiken hapugutdekherek meke etnogo ekaerek nen yi meke ti meke hasik hinetaiken hapugutdekho motok dogolik, hinebe tha’bokhogonat hakhisik dogoak o.
53003017	An nen wene tha’bokhogonat holal waganhe dogolik, “At Paulus nen waganhemo higi, ” iluk ekagat hutduagaluk, wene ilugun oba arat heagei wathinakhe dogolik nen, nekaerek niki nenat holal waganherek etnogo hak, yogotak yi heagei wathinakhe dogolik holal waganhi meke niki ekagat iti o.
53003018	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut hano etnogo nen, hit tha’bokhogonat hanorogon hakhisik dogoak o.
54001001	-
54001002	Timotius na’but o. Hetaiken Kristus oba hakotdisigin iti nen, an na’but eberogonat agaginmo, wene yi an Paulus nen holal waganogo hoba la’i agei iti o. At Allah tilninakherek meke inom, Kristus Yesus nen hanotninabigin iluk ninakla apekhe lago meke etnogo inom, ipisak nenat nayoko ’biluk, at Kristus Yesus hasik hagakhe dogoagaluk la’ani agoukhama wagagi iti o. Ninopase Allah inom, ninoe Etagapogot Kristus Yesus inom, ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen, hano meke wokhikhik, inakmuthakhik, hetaiken hapugutdageigik, hagakhe dogoak o.
54001003	An o Efesus nen o Makedonia yoma wisigiluk, hat hakla kagalogo wene men iluk yokhikhigi apigi, “Hat hebe o yoma dogono. Dogolik it aperek nen wene ebeat meke dek. Ninat meke yakulisiliogei meke iti igidek huk asuagaluk inasuk wakhe dogono.
54001004	It iti nen he, wene suakane inekalat pilinekhik, Ninebe itithogon itaklarik wagagu, iluk wene erloma nen paldigidegat pilinerik hunik-hunik motok lageik, iliogei iti meke baga inetaiken eberek motok dogunogo nen, igidek here'isoagaluk inasuk watnoat, ” iluk yokhikhigi apigi. Wene iti meke isinem, ebe wene ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk werekma, at nen hanotninabigin iti meke kok agarek dek o. Ilugun oba inane kogat thagalharek iti o.
54001005	Inetaiken Allah nen horinakhunem inekaerek inakla nen he, “An wene noba dek, nakla thiok welagei, ” iluk apekhe dogolik, inetaiken eberogonat Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikharek iti nen, akhuni inakmurogon welageikharek o. Halok he, it itithogonat dogoagaluk inasuk wakhe dogono, iluk yokhikhigi iti o.
54001006	Meke re, it aperek nen inobabut hano hagakharek iti meke hagakhe lageikharethek nen here’isalok mirlokhogon yugunat dek asigin meke itiat ekhe dogolik, inekaerek nenat nuk akhiliogei iti o.
54001007	It iti nen he, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo, nit nen yakulisekhe dogogun, ” iluk warlok nen yakulisekhe dogoligat he, wene ebe hutdigidek inokodek dogoligat, “Wene ebe yigithogon o. Eberogonat hutukhogon yakulisogo, ” iluk iliogei mekeat he, hutdigidegat iliogei iti o.
54001008	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti, nit nen hutdiluk, hagasusak tak-tagat hagakhe dogogun halok, hano o, iluk ninilu.
54001009	Eberogonat he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti, akhuni mothogon hagakharek meke hasik isikhe ’buk. Akhuni inasuk warek dek holu’buk hagakharek meke inom, Allah ina’it dogolik weak hagakharek meke inom, inebe Allah hasik ’bisigidek Allah ane thagalogo hagakharek meke inom, inopase inagosa lak inebe motok inakharek meke inom, akhuni aperek yugunat inebe debekhogon motok inakharek meke inom,
54001010	ap nen humi param ha’isigik, ap-ap ha’isigik, hagakharek meke inom, akhuni aperek ina’buri meke iniki abusak limaginakharek meke inom, inekalat egarek meke inom, “Wene eberogonat igin, ” iluk Allah etaga paliluk nen, nukhetdisegarek meke inom, it tha’bokhogonat itithogon hagakharek meke hasik isikhe. Nen, it aperek inobabut ebewene hanotninakherek meke wene iti thagalogo here'isalok korlo hagakharek meke tha’bokhogonat aperek hasik inomat isikhe.
54001011	Nen, wene iti mothogon, hano wene etnogo an nen yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk noba ’bisikhe. Hano wene iti, Allah hogorakhik, heagei wakhik, hagakhorek meke etnogo aneat o.
54001012	-
54001013	An alebageik he, Yesus abok weak palhik, ebe nakla nen meanetdiluk Allah a’buri meke yi aik ti aik hagarinakhik, hagakhe lagagi mekeat he, ninoe Etagapogot Kristus Yesus akmutnakhikhesik, “Hat nen yabokane an nobasik hobabut erlok hagakhe dogogin, ” iluk, wene yi an noba ’biluk nayoko ’bigik, obatne woknikhik, hagakhikhe iti o. Itithogon weak hagakhe lagagi etanem he, an netaiken ninoe Etagapogot Kristus Yesus oba hakotdigidek dogolik, itithogon hagasusak dek mekeat he, nokodek nen hagakhe lagagi iti nen, at nen nebe akmutnakhikhe iti nen, heagei wakhe lagei o.
54001014	Iti, at ninoe Etagapogot Kristus Yesus obabut hano nen kokhogon akmutnakhikhesik, nobabut at inom hunik dogolik hagakharek hagat, netaiken at oba hakotdigik, akhuni aperek nakmurinakhik, kokhogonat hagakhe dogoagaluk, nebe woknakhikhe iti o.
54001015	Akhuni weak hagakho werekma Kristus Yesus nen ninebe tilninabigiluk agat oba yoma usa’ageikhe iluk igi iti, akhuni nen he, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk hutukhogon waganusak meke. Akhuni aperek weak herlekha’bugat negen hagakharek mekeat he, an anek he, weak kok motok hagakhe lagagi iti o.
54001016	Meke re, it akhuni aperek yabokane inetaiken Yesus oba hakotdisinem iniluk motok dogoagaluk, hagarinabigin meke inakla nen apekhe dogolik, “Paulus weak hagakho korlegat he, Kristus Yesus akla puk ageidek obakhanini hapugutdiluk motok welageikhesiknen, akmuratluk ebe waganhikhe iti, at nen akhuni weak hagakharek meke itithogon woginakherekma higi, ” iluk, Allah obabut ekagat hutduagaluk, an tak itithogon woknakhikhe iti o.
54001017	Ninopase kok Etagapogot Allah iti arligat o. At ebe ninileken hogorek dek. Kok ikhok motok welagarek meke itiat o, iluk, hogorakhik, heagei wakhik, hagakho motok dogouok o, iluk, “Amin, ” igi iti o.
54001018	Timotius na’but o. An wene yi hasuk warogo yokhisik. It aperek nen wene alebat hat hekaerek hasik ekhe dogolik, “At itithogon hagakhe dogogin, ” iluk isukha hak, hanowene yi hasik, wim inobatnerogon yakharek hak, hobatnerogon yogeisekhe dogono o.
54001019	It aperek nen, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk waganharethek nen, inaklathiokhogon dogosak mekeat he, yabokane weak hagariogei iti nen, ku ima mak-makhogon usekherek hak, horla usega iti. Hat iti hakene hagakhidek, hakla nen, “An weak ageikhe hagakhidek, nakla thiokhogon welagei, ” iluk hetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk hobatnerogon hagakhe dogono.
54001020	It weak itithogon hagakharek iti, inebe aperek he, Himeneus Aleksander ipisak nen Allah abok weak palhe lagoukhama, yabokane inobabut hebelatluk weak hagakhidek thogotduagaluk inebe Iblis wogokhima werek iti o.
54002001	-
54002002	An nen wene ageikhe kok meke yi Allah a’buri inasuk watnogoluk yokhisik o. Nit akhuni ninom hano liokhogon dogolik nen, Allah hogorakhe dogolik, akhuni inobasik mothogon hagakhe dogosak meke hagakhe dogouok nen he, akhuni tha’bokhogonat hasik inom, koktek inetagapogot inobasik inom, it aperek inetaga werek dogolik haknisik welageikharek meke iti, inebe tha’bokhogonat inobasik inom, sembayan ekhe dogolik, Allah ayoko ’bigik, kino yogokhik, heagei wakhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk inasuk wakhe dogono o.
54002003	-
54002004	At Allah tilninakherek meke etnogo akla apekhe dogolik, “Yi akhuni ti akhuni tha'bokhogonat tilinakhik, ebe wene hutukhogon inilu asuagaluk yakulisigik, hagasusak meke, ” iluk akla warlok apekherek iti nen he, hit itithogon ekhe dogogun halok he, hano.
54002005	Allah ebe opakiat anek o. Nen, Allah ninom nit akhuni ninom turlem heisogo dogolik dapulninabiogo meke ap ebe Yesus Kristus iti opakiat anek o.
54002006	At Kristus akhuni tha’bokhogonat weak hagakhorek iti baga herle warogo haknisik werekma herle hisalogo tilninabigiluk ekaerek eram nen, “Nebe nasuak, ” iluk wageikhe iti baga, Allah akla nen, “Akhuni tha’bokhogonat tilinabusak, ” iluk apekherek meke iti, ekagat asusak tak-tagat ekagat ageikhe iti o.
54002007	Itithogon apekherek iti nen, at nen he, “Hat nen ebe wene iti akhuni itikmanke meke nen eberogonat iluk inakla apalok waganuagaluk, yakulisilik nekhe dogono, ” iluk, an nayoko ’biluk la’ani ageikhemo, yogeisilik nekherek iti o. Itithogon igi iti eberogonat igi. Nekalat igi dek o.
54002008	Nen, o yi ai ti ai sembayan ekhe dogolik, it ap nen he, iniki nen ageikhe weak hagakhidek, inakla aga dageigidek, wene muk yakhidek, karelek dogolik, sembayan ekhe dogoagaluk, yakulisausak iluk nakla warlok apigirik nen yokhigi iti o.
54002009	Iti hak, it humi re, inisi dalhik, mikhak ikharek hak emas meke ikhik, ilepali ikharek hak mutiara meke ikhik, su oko kok meke ikhik, hagasusak motok dek. Inilaga isonhogon dogolik, inobake thiokhogon waganusak mekeat waganhe dogoagaluk yakulisanogoluk yokhigi iti o.
54002010	Inobake waganuhak he, inobabut Allah a'buri dogolik hagasu hagat, it aperek hanorogon yomageisekhe dogoak.
54002011	It inane degat dogolik, wene yakulisugunem, inasuk hologoat dogoak o.
54002012	It humi nen he, ap inapma negen 'bisalok, “Yigithogon hagasin, tigithogon hagasin, ” iluk yogeisigik, wene yakulisigik, hagakhe dogunogo iluk an nen wene palherek iti o. It he, inane degat dogosak o.
54002013	Allah nen he, Adam tak winametdisikhesik nen, yabokane he Hawa winametdisikhe iti nen, inane degat dogosak igi itiat o.
54002014	Iti hagat, Iblis nen he, Adam tak nukhetdisikhe 'buk. He iti tak nukhetdisikhemo, Allah ane thagalogo weak hagakhikhe iti o.
54002015	Itithogonat meke re, it humi inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk nen, inebe Allah hasik 'bisalok karelek dogolik, akhuni aperek inakmurinakhik, inilaga isonhogon hagakhik, hagakhe dogogun halok he, ineagei itaginakhunem, Allah nen tilinabiginat o.
54003001	Wene yi, eberogonat meke igin o. It aperek inakla nen apekhe dogolik he, “An Allah a'buri therisik dogole, ” iluk, inakla apega halok he, iti hano motok mekeat warlok nen apega iti.
54003002	Iti nen, ap Allah a'buri therisik dogoagaluk, inobabut he, yi hakene meke meldisausak. Akhuni aperek nen, “At weak, ” iluk wene oba 'bigidek meke halok, age opakiat meke halok, weak hagasuagaluk akla kagalhunem etaiken ekaerek therogo welagarek meke halok, etaiken kagalek meke halok, hagasusak meke tak-tagat hano hagakherek meke halok, ap huso wagunem woginakhik, hipiri inobasik hanorogon isakhik, werakhik, hagakherek meke halok, obabut wene hanorogon yakulisekherek meke halok,
54003003	anggur eken apusu oba pirlakthek nekerek dek meke halok, akla aga weak hagakhidek, oba enago yamukhogonwelagarek meke halok, akla nen uang motok warlok nen heakherek dek meke halok,
54003004	ekaerek nen a'buri meke hano karelogo hagasik werekma, at a’buri nen inopase apma dogolik alon halogo hagakhik, ane isinem hologo hagakhik, hagakharek meke halok, inobabut itigirlik meke halok Allah a’buri therisik dogosak o.
54003005	At ap ageikhe nen ekaerek a’buri hanorogon karelogo hagasik dogou okodek halok he, Allah a’buri nikithogon therisik dogosak apegep. Erlok dek o.
54003006	Ap ageikhe Allah ane aban kerat waganhe meke meldisinem, Allah a’buri therisik dogolik, ekaerek nen hogorakhaumo, Allah nen Iblis ukum wogokhikhe hak, itithogonat ukum oba ’busak iti nen, Allah a’buri therisik dogoagaluk meldusak dek o.
54003007	Nen, ap Allah a’buri therisik dogosak meke iti, it akhuni itikmanke meke nen abok weak paliogei meke meldugun halok, at ebe inakla nen meanetdiluk ina’it motok lakhigik, ’bagei herle ’bilukmo kerlelagarek hak, Iblis nen akla kagaliluk ebe hakhigik hagasunogo iluk, abok hano iliogei meke halok, meldisausak o.
54003008	Iti hagat he, Allah a’buri meke yomageisekhe dogoagaluk, inobabut yi hakene meke meldisausak. Inilaga yamukthek meke halok, inane pere egarek dek meke halok, anggur eken apusu nasi motok dek meke halok, uang, yi meke ti meke, hano meke, “An meke anek dogolep, ” apegarek dek meke halok, meldisausak o.
54003009	Ageikhe, wene, Allah akla limagoat welageikhesik nen thelekmatdisikhe wene etnogo, inetaikenma ’biluk, “An wene noba dek nakla thiokhogon welagei, ” iluk wene iti obatnerogon herogo welageikharek meke halok meldisausak o.
54003010	It ap iti aban meldisigidek dogolik inobabut tak palhe dogoumo, akhuni aperek nen, “At weak, ” iluk, wene inoba ’bigidekma karelek welageikharek meke halok, ekagat hutdisalok nen, Allah a’buri meke aperek yomageisekhe dogoagaluk, meldisekhe dogosak o.
54003011	Iti hagat he, it iti inagugi inilaga isonhogo hagakhe dogolik inahusupi weak ilik nekharek dek meke halok, weak hagasuagaluk inakla kagalhunem inetaiken inekaerek nen therogo welageikharek meke halok, inobabut mothogon hagakharek meke halok, inobabut iti hakene halok, inaguni yomageisegarek meke dogoagaluk meldisausak o.
54003012	It ap Allah a’buri aperek yomageisegarek meke dogosak iti, inagugi opakiat waganek dogolik, ina’buri inom, inagarumi inom, hanorogon karelogo hagasik welageikharek meke halok, meldisausak o.
54003013	It nen Allah a’buri aperek hanorogon yomageisugunem, Allah a’buri nen inabok hano ekhe dogolik inane inalonhogon yogeisekhe dogogun. Itithogon isinem, it nen he, wene ninetaiken Kristus Yesus oba hakotdogorek wene iti hasik, inayuk dek pakhogonat yogeisekhe dogogun o.
54003014	-
54003015	An ibat ’bikheasigiluk nakla apekhe dogoligat he, aban wageidek dogogin halok, nit Allah a’buri ninom dogolik ninobabut hagakhe dogosak meke hilu asuagaluk wene yi tha’bokhogonat holal waganogo hoba la’i agei iti o. O oak tilik oba nen o herlaga a’bethogon welagarek iti hak, nit Allah iluk motok welagarek meke a’buri natogokhorek iti baga nen, Allah ane ebe wene a’bethogon hago welagorek iti o.
54003016	Wene iti, nit Allah apma dogolik eberogonat iluk apogorek wene limago welageikhe meke Allah nenat thelekmatdisikhemo, “Wene iti kok, ” iluk pakhogon ekhe lago. Wene iti re, At Kristus ebe akhuniat winam ageikhe o. At Allah Agoreke nen, “At Kristus iti eberogonat, ” ilukthelekmatdisikhe o. It malaikat Allah nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke inileken hasukhaat o. Agarumi nen at hagakhe lageikhe wene etnogo yi akhuni ti akhuni itikmanke meke yogeisilik lagoukha o. Akhuni o yi ai ti ai agat oba meke aperek doalegat nen, “At ebe eberogonat, ” iluk inetaiken at oba hakotdisukha o. Allah nen pogot oba hogorakho motokwelageikharekma lia’isikhemo welagarek o. Wene iti re, at Allah nenat thelekmatdisikhemo pakhogon ekhe lago o.
54004001	Allah Agoreke nen wene pakhogonat yoknisekhe dogolik, “O ilugun oba, akhuni aperek Allah ane eberogonat iluk apiliogei meke nen, wene iti, Nina’it, iluk here’isalok nen, Iblis agarumi mokat inobabut weak nukhetdisegarek meke inapma ukiluk, wene it nen yakulisegarek wene iti ha’iluk hagakhe dogogun.
54004002	Hagakhe dogolik, akhuni iniki thenap atlukmo, ki meke hakhogo heat iluk egarek iti hak, it iti inakla ko’bot atluk nen, Yi weak hagakhoma higi. Yi hano hagakhoma higi, iluk apigidek yugunat hagakhe dogogun. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, inekalat dal-kalhogon hagarinakhe dogogun iti o.
54004003	It nen wene ekhe dogolik, Humi woginabusak motok dek, igik, Yi meke ti meke nekarek meke iti, ageikhe yi meke usa. Neke dogosak dek, igik, ekhe dogogun, ” iluk, Allah Agoreke nen yoknisasikhe tak-tagat iliogei iti o. Meke re, nekarek meke iti, Allah nen nit ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogolik, ebe wene iti hutdogo halok he, heagei warogo neke dogoagaluk winametdisikhe meke hasigat iliogei iti o.
54004004	-
54004005	Yi meke ti meke Allah nen winametdisikhe meke iti hano anek o. Sembayan isinem Allah ane iti baga hanotdekherek iluk, “Yi weak meke, ” iluk here’isigidegat, Allah heagei warogo neke dogosak anek.
54004006	Wene hano wene ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdogorek meke etnogo yakulhekhe lagagumo, hat nen waganhigitik mothogon hagakhe lagan iti baga hebe kok aga dogolik, wene yogotak yokhigi iti ninagarlak lak ninerugi Allah a'buri meke aperek yakulisekhe dogono. Itithogon yakulisekhe dogogin halok he, hat Kristus Yesus atuaneke dogolik, at hasik hanorogo hagakhe dogogin iti o.
54004007	Akhuni nen wene suakane ebe wene dek mekeat he, yugunat inekalat pilinekharek meke iti here’isekhe dogono. Here’isalok, Allah apma dogolik hagakharek meke itiat hobatnerogon yakulekhe dogono.
54004008	Akhuni inebe hasik mep aborlokhogon asuagaluk hagakharek iti, yogotak ya elanma hasik herlekha’bugat hano negen hagakharek. Meke re, ninetaiken hasik Allah apma dogolik, at ayabu hagakhe dogoumo, at Allah nen he, “Yogotak hiniluk welagap meke hasik inom, yabokane hiniluk motok dogogun meke hasik inom, hano motok hagatlasigin iti o, ” iluk, abok yoknisasikhe iti eberogonat.
54004009	Halok he, wene iti eberogonat ninetaikenma hutukhogon waganusak o.
54004010	Allah ebe, yi akhuni ti akhuni tha’bokhogonat tilninakherek meke welagarek mekeat he, kok hakene re, nit ninetaiken at oba hakotdekhe lago meke tilninakherek iti nen, ninetaiken at iluk motok welagarek meke oba hakotdiluk, at hasik nina'it ageidegat, ninobatnerogon hagakhe lago.
54004011	Wene iti tha’bokhogonat akhuni mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, yogeisigik, inasuk wakhik, hagakhe dogono.
54004012	Hat hebe elege aban welagan iti nen, it akhuni aperek nen inakla meanetdagousak dek o. Meke re, hebe elegeat dogolik, akhuni aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk werek meke nen, hat hobabut waganuagaluk, hane mothogon yogeisigik, hobabut mothogon hagakhik, akhuni hakmurinakhik, hetaiken Kristus oba hakotdiluk welageik, weak hagakhidek hilaga isonhogo welageik, hagakhe dogono.
54004013	An nebe aban wageidek werek korlek, Allah ane holal waganek itiat it aperek inasuk holuak nen, etaga thalhik, inasuk wakhik, yakulisigik, hagakhe dogono.
