54004014	Hat hobasik haganeat it ap Allah a’buri therisik welageikharek meke nen iniki hukuloak thebelho korlek, it ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke nen men isukha iti, “Hat yabokane itithogon hagakhe dogono, ” iluk, yokhikhukha tak-tagat, Allah Agoreke obabut hano nen ayabu hagakhe dogoagaluk ninobabut dopok woknisekherek etnogo hat wokhikhikhe meke iti baga hagakhidek hobakhanini here’isagun o.
54004015	It akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen hat hobabut palhe dogolik, “At Timotius alebageik hano hagakhe lagasik nen yogotak hano motogat hagariogo, ” iluk ekagat hutdaguagaluk, wene yokhigi meke iti tha’bokhogonat hetaikenma ’biluk hagakho motok dogono.
54004016	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hekaerek hasik inom, it akhuni aperek yakulisekhe lagan meke inobasik inom, hobabut hebelogo dogono. Hobabut hebelogo dogolik, hakla puk ageidek, iti mekeat hagakho motok dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogogin halok, hekaerek nen hebe tiligik, akhuni aperek hano holiogei meke inebe tilinakhik, hagasigin o.
54005001	Hat nen, ap inarluetek halok he, hane obatnerogo negen yogeisigidek, hopase lak negen hane liokhogonat inasuk wakhe dogono. Nen, ap elege iti re, hagarlak lak negen hinom welageik,
54005002	humi inarluetek iti, hagosa lak negen hinom welageik, humi tugum meke inom homagarlugi tharlisik meke inom, herugi negenat, hakla weak meke ebekhidek hilaga isonhogon hinom welageik, hagakhe dogolik, inasuk hanorogon wakhe dogono.
54005003	Nen, humi thoge akhuni it meke nen yomageisausak meke dekma inarligat werek meke halogat, inalon halhe dogono.
54005004	Itithogon mekeat he, it thoge meke iti ineagei, inagonai itago meke aperek werek halok, it iti nenat, “Nit ninebe erlo opakiat nen itago meke, ” iluk, it nen hagasusak meke yakuluak o. Iti at Allah akla nen he, “An napma dogolik, inopase lak nen kogorinakhe lagoukha hak, oko it tak hanorogon yomageisekhe dogosak o, ” iluk akla warlok apekherek iti nen, itithogonat yomageisekhe dogoak o.
54005005	Meke re, humi thoge eberogonat akhuni erlo it meke dekma inarligat dogolik, “Allah nenat yomaknisagein, ” iluk, inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk, dikene hibakone ayoko ’bigik, kino yogokhik, hagakho motok welageikharek.
54005006	Meke re, it humi thoge aperek it warlok meke, yugunat hagariogei meke iti, inebe iniluk werek mekeat he, warek hakene werek o.
54005007	Humi thoge iti hasik, it aperek nen wene inoba ’bigidek hano dogoagaluk, wene itiat inasuk hanorogon wakhe dogono.
54005008	It ap aperek nen Allah ane eberogonat iluk waganhukhasik dogoligat he, inekaerek ina’buri itiat kogotdilukyomageisigik, akhuni erlo it meke halok aperek inomat yomageisigik, hagakhidek halok he, Allah ane here’isalok dukhisukhasik hakeneat werek o. It akhuni itikmanke meke nen wene waganhidek dogolik, weak herlekha’bugat negen hagariogei mekeat he, it iti wene waganhukhasik nen akhuni it meke yomageisigidek iti nen, weak kok negen hagariogei o.
54005009	It humi thoge meke Allah a’buri nen yomageisekhe dogoagaluk inetaga holal waganugun halok he, inebe itaklagoukhasik oba nen umur 60 tahun aban hagatlageidek meke inetaga waganusak dek o. Umur 60 tahun arat hagatlaga meke halok inetaga holal waganusak. Meke re, inaguni opakiat motok waganek werekma thoge ’bisega meke halok he, inetaga waganusak.
54005010	It akhuni aperek nen it humi thoge meke iti inabok ekhe dogolik, “It inobabut hano hagariogei, ” iluk egarek meke halok, inetaga holal waganusak. Hano hagakharek iti, inekaerek ineagei hanorogon kogorinakhik, ap huso wagunem inebe hanorogon woginakhik, Allah a’buri aperek inisok obake thobalinakhik, it aperek weak werekma yomageisigik, iniki ageikhe huk ageidek yi meke ti meke hasik yomageisekho motok welageik, hagakharek meke halok, inetaga holal waganusak o.
54005011	It humi thoge tugum aban meke iti, Kristus inom hunik werek mekeat he, here’isalok, inoba agaken nen inetaiken thebelusak dek asumo, ap ageikhe waganusak iti nen inetaga holal waganhun o.
54005012	It iti thoge ’bisugunem, it nen he, Nit ninobabut Kristus hasik anek ninilaga isonhogo hagakhe dogogun o, ” iluk nen, yabokane itithogon hagakhidek here’isega halok, inekaerek nen wene inoba ’bakhagun iti o.
54005013	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, inobabut iniki waganu’buk o kuluk ya haklageik nekharek. Itithogon nekhe dogolik, aperek weak motok men hagariogei. Inahusupi weak ekhe dogolik it aperek inawene mekeat lapogoke igik, wene aperek usak dek meke ninat meke igik, ilik liliogei iti o.
54005014	-
54005015	Halok he, it humi thoge aperek Iblis oporlikmirlokhogon horla lageikha iti nen, it aperek nit Allah a'buri ninom wim palek hakene meke nen ninabok weak palunogo iluk, it humi thoge tugum meke iti, inaguni tomok woginabiluk nen, ineagei itago hanorogon karelogo hagasik dogoagaluk igi iti o.
54005016	Meke re, he ageikhe etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagarek meke agosa ageikhe thoge meke werek halok, Allah a’buri tha’bokhogonat inoba akin asunogo iluk, at nenat yomakhekhe dogosak o. Itithogon yomakhekho korlek, it Allah a’buri tha’bokhogonat nen, humi thoge meke aperek akhuni it meke nen yomageisausak dek meke halok, yomageisekhe dogosak o.
54005017	-
54005018	Allah nen men isikhemo holal waganogo ’bekhe dogolik, “Sapi isok nen gandum oado wulel tagalogo eken yibilhe dogolik aperek naunogo iluk ape herle wasusak dek o. Aperek noagaluk here’isekhe dogono, ”\rq (Ulangan 25:4)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganogo ’bisukha iti o. Nen, ageikhe, “Akhuni yabu yi meke ti meke hasik hagakhunem, iniki oko wogeisekhe dogosak o, ”iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukhaat. Iti nen he, ap Allah a’buri hanorogon hagasik welageikharek meke iti, it Allah a’buri tha’bokhogonat nen, “Iniki oko arat yomakhogo, ” iluk apigidek, aperek inomat oba dukhogon yomakhekhe dogosak o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, kok hakene re, it aperek Allah ane inobatnerogon yogeisigik, yakulisigik, hagariogei meke iti, inalonhogon yomageisekhe dogosak o.
54005019	Akhuni aperek nen he, “At Allah a'buri therisik werek meke etnogo weak hagakhemo, ” iluk, wene oba 'buogoluk hagakhunem, inebe pere a, henagan a, inileken hutukhogon hega meke nen, “Eberogonat, ” iluk ega halogat, wene oba 'busak o. Nen, itithogon igidek halok, wene oba 'busak dek o.
54005020	It aperek inayuk asuagaluk, it eberogonat weak hagakha meke akhuni inil obaat inekarli warogo inasuk hanorogon wakhe dogono.
54005021	Wene yokhigi meke iti, hat nen he, akhuni aperek helokhoma 'bisigik, aperek hoporlike 'bisigik, hagakhidek inom tak-tagat yogeisekhe dogono, iluk Allah inom, Kristus Yesus inom, inil obaat, malaikat Allah nenwenageinakhikhesik yoko usa'isa agarek meke inom, inil obaat yokhigi iti o.
54005022	Akhuni aperek Allah hasik hagakhe dogoagaluk, inukuloak ibat-ibat thebelinakhe dogogun o. Nen, it aperek weak hagakhunem hinom hagakhidek hilaga isonhogo dogono.
54005023	U nen hibiku-yogokuat hobatne dek agarek etnogo nen helabut hasik i anek neke dogogun. Anggur eken apusu aperek herlekha'bugat inom neke dogono.
54005024	It akhuni aperek weak hagakharek meke iti wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakharekma aban lageidekma, thelekma agarek iti o. Nen, it aperek weak hagakharek meke thebelek dogoluk nen yabokane thelekma asigin meke werek o.
54005025	Iti hagat, it aperek hano hagakharek meke ibat thelekma agarek iti o. It aperek itithogon hano hagakhunem limago motok dogogin dek o. Thelekma asiginat o.
54006001	Akhuni aperek nen Allah etaga weak igik, at ane nit nen yakulisekhe lago meke hasik, “Wene iti weak, ” igik, unogo iluk, Allah a'buri meke it aperek inatuaneke atluk hagariogei meke iti, inekaerek inougi meke iti inapma dogolik, inakla nen, “Noe iti alon halhe dogosak, ” iluk, inalon halhe dogoak o.
54006002	Itithogon inalon halhe dogolik, it inatuaneke meke iti inakla nen, “An noe iti etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagarek iti nen nipisak Allah a’buri opakiat meke nagarlak nipisak, ” iluk inougi inebe inakla nen meanetdisigidegat, “An noe yomakhekhe lagei yi, etaiken Allah oba hakotdekhesik werek mekeatma nakmu o, ” iluk, yabokane ageikhe inom kokhogonat yomageisekhe dogosak o. Wene igin yi tha’bokhogonat hat nen yakulisigik, inasuk wakhik, hagakhe dogono.
54006003	It akhuni aperek nen hano wene ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus nen hagakhikhe wene etnogo inom, “Allah apma ukiluk, itithogon hagakhe dogosak, ” iluk wene yakulisekhe lago meke iti inom, here’isalok, ninat wene yakulisiliogei meke aperek werek.
54006004	-
54006005	It iti nen he, wene ebe inokodek mekeat he, inekaerek hogorakeke dogolik akhuni aperek inom inane meke hasik wene palhik, inom weak ageik, hagakhe dogouogoluk, ina’it dogosak mekekogotdiliogei iti nen, ilugun oba, akhuni aperek inetaiken dek atluk, ebe wene inokodek atluk, it-it inom ua palhik, wenemuk palhik, inekalat inabok weak palhik, inakla nen yugunat wene weak meke it aperek inoba ’bigik, tugi-tugi wene-wene paldigidek hagakho motok welageikharek iti. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik inakla nen he, “Nit Allah apma ukiluk hagakhe lago iti baga, ninikierek hagatlasugun, ” iluk, eberogonat thalek apiliogei iti o.
54006006	-
54006007	Meke re, ninagosa lak inakla nen itaklaga dogolik, yi meke ti meke ninikimo wolok wagorek dek iti hak, ninebe watlaga dogolik, yi meke ti meke aperek wolok lugun degat iti nen, ninikierek dogou hak, nit Allah apma ukiluk dogolik ninakla nen, “Erlogat welago, ” iluk, ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogoumo, ebeat meke thaburagun iti o.
54006008	Nen, neke dogosakmeke inom, ninoado baga ugu dogosak meke inom, werek halok he, “Iti erlogat werek, ” iluk apausak o.
54006009	-
54006010	Itithogonat meke re, akhuni nen he, “Kok he, uang itiat, ” iluk inetaiken hunik dogolik nen, ilugun oba yi weak ti weak hagariogei erlo itiat o. It aperek nen uang iti meke herasuogoluk, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikharethek nenat he, here’isalok yabokane o baga tharlukhogon waregarek hak, it inekaerek inakla wiik-weakhogon hagariliogei iti o. Iti nen he, akhuni aperek nen, “Yi meke ti meke doalekhogon horlalok, ninebe kok dogolo e, ” iluk apiliogei iti 'bagei herle 'bilukmo ukiluk wakharek hak, Iblis nen inakla kagalhunem, yi meke ti meke warlok apausak dek mekeat he, weagarinabigin meke warlok iluk apiliogei iti nen, inebe weak akhigik, nuk akhigik, hagakharek iti o.
54006011	It itithogon hagakharek mekeat he, hat he, hebe Allah a'but welagan iti nen, iti meke hagakhidek lo here’isalok dogono. Itithogon dogolik, Allah akla apekherek tak-tagat hagakhik, apma ukiluk, at hasik hagakhik, hetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welageik, akhuni hakmurinakhik, hobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageik, hobabut enago welageik, hagakhe dogeigiluk, iti mekeat kogotdekhe dogono.
54006012	Akhuni inae walhauwogoluk tha ae 'busuk tha ae 'busuk walhegarek hak, niniluk motok dogogun iti meke horla lagaluk, hetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik, at hasik hobatnerogon hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogoluk, iti meke horla lanogoluk, Allah nen hayoko 'bisikhemo, hat nen he, “Netaiken Kristus oba hakotdiluk itithogon hagakhe dogogin, ” iluk akhuni doalegat inil oba pakhogon isigin ititak-tagat hobatnerogon hagakhe dogono.
54006013	Allah akhuni ninebe inom, yi meke ti meke inom, tha'bokhogonat ninilugutninakherek meke etnogo il obaat, Kristus Yesus akhuni nen ap Pontius Pilatus oba wolok lagoukhama, ane eberogonat pakhogon yogokhikhe etnogo il obaat, wene yi hasuk warogo yokhisigin.
54006014	Hat nen wene at nen yoknisasikhe wene iti tha’bokhogonat mothogon hagakhe dogolik, weak meke hagakhidek karelek werekma, akhuni aperek nen wene hoba ’busak degat dogoluk, hurli ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ebe thelekmaat wisigin iti hurli hagatlasuagaluk yokhigi iti o.
54006015	At Allah nen, “Iti hurli thelekmatdigin, ” iluk apasikhe bagaat thelekmatdisinem wisigin o. At Allah hogorakho motok welageikharek meke, arligat obatne werek o. Iti nen, inetagapogot welageikharek iti tha’bokhogonat hasik he, inoe Etagapogot at arligat o. Nen, yi akhuni ti akhuni inougi koktek welageikharek meke iti, tha’bokhogonat inoe kok he, arligarat o.
54006016	Nen, at ebe watlageidek ikhok motok welagarek he, at arligat o. At ebe o lia baga motok werekma, inileken sirluk-pabuk iluk, oba horokhogon lausak erlok dek o. At ebe akhuni ageikhe nen inileken higidegat. Itithogon hausak erlok dek. Obatne motok dogogin meke iti, hogorakho motok dogouok o, iluk, “Amin, ” igi iti.
54006017	Yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat dek asigin mekeat he, it ap koktek inetaga werek meke iti inakla nen hogorakeke dogolik, “Nameke agat oba meke yoma motok doalegat yi nen nebe hano dogogin, ” iluk, apekhe dogunogo. At he, at Allah yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat ninakla arlekenhogon horlekhe dogoagaluk kokhogon woknisekherek etnogo nenat hanotninabigin iluk hutdekhe dogoak nen inasuk wakhe dogono.
54006018	It iti hanorogon hagakhe dogolik, inameke doalegat dogou hak, akhuni aperek hanorogon yomageisekhedogolik, inameke dek meke wogeisigik, supurisigik, hagakhe dogoagaluk inasuk wakhe dogono.
54006019	Itithogon hagakhe dogogun halok he, yi meke ti meke yabokane meke hasik natogorlogo 'begarek hak, hano hagakhe dogolik, yabokane motok dogogin meke hasigat ’bakhekhe dogoluk nen, ninebe eberogonat ninilugutninabumo dogogun iti mekeat horloagaluk inasuk wakhe dogono o.
54006020	-
54006021	Timotius na'but o. Allah nen hayoko 'bekhe dogolik, “Yi meke hagakhe dogono, ” iluk, hoba 'bisikhe meke itiat hanorogon herogo dogolik, hobatnerogon hagakhe dogono. It aperek nen Allah ane usak meke iti igidegat dogolik, we yugunat, dek asigin meke hasigat wenemuk yakhe dogolik, “Wene ninilu, ” iluk iliogei iti inokodek dogolik iliogei o. It iti nen, “Wene ebeat meke arat hutdogo, ” iluk ekhe dogolik, Allah ane eberogonat meke here’isalok nuk asi dukhega iti nen, wene iti meke waganhidek here’isalok dogono. Allah obabut hano etnogo nenat hakharik dogoak o.
55001001	-
55001002	Timotius na’but nakmu o. Allah nen he, “Hit Kristus Yesus hinom hunik werekma hiniluguthinakherek, ” iluk, abok yoknisasikhe meke iti, an Paulus nen yogeisilik nekhe dogoagaluk, akla apasikhe baga Kristus Yesus nen nayoko ’biluk la’ani ageikhemo, yoma dogolik wene yi holal waganogo hoba la’i agei iti o. Ninopase Allah inom, ninoe Etagapogot Kristus Yesus inom, ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen, hano meke wokhikhik, inakmuthakhik, hetaiken hapugutdageigik, hagakhe dogoak o.
55001003	An nopa lak Allah apma dogolik, inekaerek inetaiken opakiat hano motok dogolik, at hasik hagakhik, hogorakhik, hagakhe lagoukha hak, an itithogonat hagakhe dogolik, hat hoba motok eberegat, hat hobasik dikene hibakone sembayan isi motogat dogolik, Allah heagei wakhe lagei o.
55001004	Hat de agagin etnogo nen, nipisak abuk atluk, hakla hano agunem, nakla arleken kokhogon akhagaluk, “Nipisak abuk atlo e, ” iluk, hoba eberek welagei o.
55001005	Dogolik, hetaiken Allah oba eberogonat hakotdiluk welagan iluk nakla eberegat welagei. Alebageik hagona Lois inom, hagosa Eunike inom, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagoukha hak, hat hetaiken itithogonat welagan iluk hutdagakhe lageiat o.
55001006	Itithogonat hakotdiluk welagan iti nen, an nen niki hukuloak oba thebelhunem, Allah obabut hano nen, “Hat itithogonat Allah ayabu hagakhe dogono, ” iluk hobabut wokhikhikhe meke iti, hetu herelharek hak, hakla agakenhogon atluk dogonogoluk hakla kagalogo yokhigi o.
55001007	Allah nen ninobabut woknisekherek iti, ninayuk werek dogoagaluk woknisekherek ’buk. Ninobatnerogon welageik, akhuni aperek ninakmurogon welageik, ninetaiken thebekhogon welageik, hagakhe dogoagaluk woknisekherek iti o.
55001008	Itithogon wokhisekherek iti, ninoe Etagapogot abok akhuni aperek yogeisausak hekarli dekhogon pakhogonat yogeisigik, nen, an at hasigat niki herle warogo ’banhama welagei yi hasik, hekarli dek halonhogo welageik, hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, akhuni aperek nen hano wene iti hasik, yi aik ti aik hagatninakho korlegat, an Allah obatne baga welagarek hagat, hobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogono.
55001009	At Allah nen ninebe tilninakhik, at ekaerek a’buri asuagaluk ninayoko ’bigik, hagakhikhe iti, nit nen ageikhe hagakhugu baga ninayoko ’bisikhe ’buk. At he, Allah obabut hano nen, ebekeram yi meke ti meke aban winametdigidek dogolik, yabokane Kristus Yesus hagasigin oba hanotninabigiluk, ekaerek akla apalok ninayoko ’bisikhe iti.
55001010	Itithogon apasikhe meke limago werekma, yabokane Kristus Yesus tilninakherek meke ebe thelekma ageikhe iti baga ekagat ageikhe iti. At ane hano wene iti baga, watlariogei erlo iti erlok degetdigik, watlageidek niniluk motok dogogun meke iti, winametdigik, hagakhikhe.
55001011	Itithogon hagakhikhesik nen, an hano wene itiat yogeisigik, yakulisigik, yogeisilik nekhedogoagaluk nayoko 'biluk la'ani ageikhemo nekhe lagei iti o.
55001012	Itithogon la'ani ageikhemo nekhe lagei iti nen, it akhuni nen yi aik ti aik hagatnakho korlegat, netaiken ebe nilu meke oba hakokthek welagei, iluk nekarli ageidek, nakla pugat welagei. At nen he, “An meke yi haknarik dogono. Haknarik werekma, hurli an nebeat wisigin o, ” iluk, noba 'biluk nayoko 'bisikhe meke iti, ekaerek obatne baga erlok haknarik dogogin o, iluk nakla nen hutdekhe lagei.
55001013	Wene an nen yakulhikhigimo waganhigin etnogo, an nobabut waganiluk, nit Kristus Yesus ninom hunik dogolik, ninetaiken at oba hakotdigik, akhuni aperekninakmurinakhik, hagakhorek hak hagakhe dogolik, hakla nen he, “Hanotninakherek meke wene ebe yiat o, ” iluk, a’bethogon ha'iluk yakulisekhe dogono.
55001014	Allah nen he, “Wene hano meke iti akhuni aperek nen weagatdinogo iluk, hanorogo haknarik dogono, ” iluk, ninoba 'bisikhe meke iti, at Agoreke ninakla 'bisikhemo werek iti obatne baga hanorogon herogo dogono.
55001015	It akhuni o propinsi Asia yi ai ti ai meke emenogo inebe tha'bokhogonat an here'aniluk lo dukhisi dogolik, at Figelus inom, Hermogenes inom, inomat dukhi lageikha iti, hat hiiuat welagan o.
55001016	Itithogonat meke re, at Onesiforus a'buri inom anek he, hibiku-yogoku nakla hanorogo netaiken thebeli iriogei iti, ninoe Etagapogot nen akmurogon hagasik dogoak o. An niki herle warek werekma noba wisu ekarli degat,
55001017	o Roma wagasik nen, ibat hinok woknakhe lagasik, nebe heraknabi aga iti o.
55001018	Ninoe Etagapogot obabut hano nen mothogonat hagasigin itinem, at Onesiforus iti ebe akmurasuak o. At haganeat nen, o Efesus dogolik, an kokhogon yomakneekhe lageikhe etnogo, hat hutukhogon hiluat o.
55002001	Timotius na'but o. Nit Kristus Yesus ninom hunikwerekma, Allah obabut hano nen woknisekherek meke iti baga hetaiken horlerogon dogono.
55002002	An nen wene akhuni doalegat inil oba yakulhikhigimo waganhigin meke etnogo, hat nen it akhuni aperek inobabut hupunhek meke nen it aperek yakulisekhe dogoagaluk, inoba ’bin o.
55002003	Ap ekeraguntek meke inougi inane hologo wim yakhe dogolik, yi aik ti aik hilik-hilik yakharek hak, hat nen Yesus Kristus ane hologo, yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik, hobakhanini hapugutdiluk hagakhe dogono.
55002004	It ap ekeraguntek iti, inougi koktek inakla arleken akhoagaluk, wim yakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke uma werek meke oba ebekhidegat yakharek iti o.
55002005	Nen ageikhe, tha ae ’busuk tha ae ’busuk werek laga dogolik, ap inayoko ’bekherek meke nen, “Yigithogon hagasusak, ” iluk ekherek meke ane hologo lageidek halok, “Ae ’busuk aga meke, ap yiat, ” iluk, oko kare-kare negen i’bisegarek meke iti i’bisausak erlok dek o. Ane hologo lago halogat i’bisausak o.
55002006	Nen, ageikhe, akhuni aperek inayabu horlalok nen, ai yago thereak-moreak hagariogei meke iti, ebe horle agunem, inekaerek nenat tak nekarek iti o.
55002007	Wene an nen yokhigi meke iti, hakla ebekhe dogoumo, ninoe Etagapogot nen tha’bokhogonat hutukhogon yokhisusak werek iti nen, oba ebekhe dogono o.
55002008	An hano wene yogeisilik nekherek iti, Yesus Kristus, at Daud opa itago mekeat ebe wakhukhama, Allah nen ilugutdisikhe wene iti, hakla eberek motok dogono.
55002009	An hano wene itithogon yogeisilik nukhunem, it akhuni aperek nen, it aperek weak hagariogei meke hagarinabu hak, an yi aik ti aik hagatnakhik, niki herle wakhik, hagariogei mekeat he, Allah ane iti herle wasusak erlok dek o. Herle hisalegatwerek o.
55002010	Iti nen he, it akhuni aperek Allah nen wenageinakhikhe meke Kristus Yesus inom hunisumo, inebe tilinakhik, iniluk hano motok dogoagaluk, hanorinakhik, hagasuagaluk, an itithogon weagatnakho korlegat, nobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagarek iti o.
55002011	Wene men iluk egarek yi eberogonat o, Nit at ninom watlago meke halok, at ninom niniluk motok dogogunat o.
55002012	Nit ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogun halokhe, akhuni at apma ukiluk dogogun meke iti, nit ninom nenat hagasik dogogun o. Nit nen he, “Yesus ninoe dek o, ” iluk, at ebe motok here'isogo halok, at nen he, “It an nagarumi degat o, ” iluk, heredinaniginat o.
55002013	Meke re, at ekaerek nen, “An nobabut alep welagei meke iti dek o, iluk ninat hagatlagarek dek iti nen, nit at oba dopokhogon dogogun dek halok, at nen nit ninoba dopokhogon motogatwelagarek o, ”iluk, egarek iti eberogonat o.
55002014	Wene yokhigi meke iti tha'bokhogonat it aperek inakla eberogo yogeisekhe dogono. Yogeisekhe dogolik, weat, inane meke hasigat wenemuk yabiogei iti Allah il oba inasuk hanorogon wakhe dogono. Itithogon wenemuk yabiogei iti baga, hano hagatlasigin dek o. It aperek inasuk holiluk, weak asugunat o.
55002015	Allah nen he, “Hat an nobasik hano hagakhe lagan, ” iluk, yokhisuak nen he, hobatnerogonat hagakhe dogono. It aperek yi meke timeke hagasuagaluk inayoko 'bisinem nen, hanorogon hagakhe dogolik, inekarli dekhogonat hagakharek iti hak, hat nen ebe wene itiat mothogon yakulisekhe dogono.
55002016	Meke re, it akhuni aperek nen ebe wene iti dekma, yugunat, dek asigin meke iliogei iti, here’isalok mirlokhogon laga dogono. It iti itithogonat ekhe dogolik, Allah ebe here’isalok hikhogon-hekhogon horla dukhiliogei iti o.
55002017	Wene ebe wene dekmaat yakulisiliogei meke iti, akhuni inagalumo aikharlu palinakhunem, ibikakal-ebekakalat kok agarek hak, it iti inane itithogonat iliogei iti baga it aperek kogatweagarinabiogei iti o. Ap Himeneus Filetus ipisak itithogon hagakhe dogolik,
55002018	ebe wene here’isalok mirlokhogon dukhisukhasik, it nen he, “Allah nen akhuni warek meke inilugurinabigin iluk abok isikhe etnogo arat hagatlagama yi, ” iluk, it aperek yogeisugunem, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk werek meke weagarinabiogei iti o.
55002019	Meke re, Allah nen o herlaga negen ’bisikhe meke obatneak motogat dogogin iti baga holal men iluk waganek werek iti o, “Ninoe Etagapogot ekaerek a’buriwenageinakhikhe meke iti inebe ilu o, ”iluk isikhe. Nen, wene ageikhe, “It aperek nen, An nebe ninoe Etagapogot a’burato, iluk, iliogei meke, Weak hagasusak nina’it o, iluk here’isalok mirlokhogon lo laga dogoak o, ”iluk, isikhemo holal waganek werek iti o.
55002020	O kok halekma akla, yi meke ti meke emas meke inom, perak meke inom, hagarek meke oko kok iti meke anek welagarek ’buk o. O meke inom, agat meke inom, hagarek meke welagaregat iti o. Hano meke hagasuogoluk halok, hano mekeat waganhik, yugunat meke hagasuogoluk halok, yugunat meke waganhik, hagakharek iti o.
55002021	Iti hagat, tha nen ekaerek nen weak hagakherek meke iti horogohere'isalok, ebe Allah hasik ’bisalok werekma, at nenat yi meke ti meke hano meke hagasigiluk, “Arat hano, ” iluk, ayoko ’bigin iti.
55002022	Iti nen hat he, it ap elege meke nen inoba agakendageiluk weak hagariogei meke iti here’isalok, lo laga dogono. It akhuni aperek inetaiken hano opakiat dogolik ninoe Etagapogot nen yomageisoagaluk ayoko ’biliogei meke iti hinom dapukhogon dogono. Hinomat mothogon hagakhik, Allah oba dopokhogon welageik, akhuni inebe inakmurogon welageik, akhuni inom hanorogon welageik, hagakharek iti mekeat mutluk laga dogono.
55002023	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, it akhuni aperek inetaiken abisake meke nen wene inokodek dogoligat, wenemuk yabiogei iti ilugun oba, it-it inom wim negen yabiogei iti, hinom hagakhidek here'isekhe dogono.
55002024	At tha nen ninoe Etagapogot atuaneke hagakhe dogolik, itithogon hagasusak dek. Akhuni tha’bokhogonat inobabut liokhogon hanorogon inom dogosak o. Obabut obakhanini hapugutdiluk dogolik, akhuni wene hanorogon yakulisekhe dogosak o.
55002025	Itithogon yakulisugunem, it akhuni aperek nen at ane thagaluogoluk hagakhunem, at nen ane liokhogonat inasuk wakhe dogosak o. Itithogonat inasuk wakhunem, it weak hagakharek meke here’isalok, ebe wene iti waganuagaluk, Allah nen inakla kagaliginat a? iluk inasuk wakhe dogosak.
55002026	Itithogon inasuk wakhunem, it inobabut hebelatluk, at Iblis akla apekherek meke hagakhe dogoagaluk inebe ’bagei herle nen hageinakherek hak hageinakhe mekeat he, Allah nen herle etnogo hisalogo ’biluk ula’isageinat o.
55003001	Wene yi hakla eberek dogono o. O ilugun oba weak motogat asigin meke werek o.
55003002	Akhuni inetaiken hunik inekaerek inebe hasik inom, uang hasik inom, kogotdigik, inekaerek nen hogorakhigik, siatdakhigik, inane puk weakwenageisigik, inagosa inopase lak inane holhidek here’isigik, heagei warinakhidek inobabut weak hagakhik, Allah hasik hagakhidek ina'it motok welageik,
55003003	akhuni inebe inakmurogo welageidek ina'irat welageik, it aperek inom korlo hagatdiluk thagalogo here'isalok dogou ina'it welageik, inabok weak palhik, inobabut akla aga apik awulagamhogon hagakhik, hano meke hagasu ina'it dogolik,
55003004	inebe opakiat meke it aperek nen inasuagaluk yoko lageik, inobabut al hathokhogon hagakhik, inekaerek inalonetdakhalok hogorakhigik, Allah ebe inakmurakhidek, akhuni inakla arlekenhogon hagakharek iti mekeat warlok welageik,
55003005	akhuni inil oba, Allah a'buri thalek dogolik, inakla nen Allah obatne iti meke here’isigik, hagakhe dogogun o. Yogotak akhuni inobabut iti hakene aperek hagariogei meke halok, hinom hunik dogogup o.
55003006	-
55003007	Humi ato yi meke ti meke inakla nen warlok apalok, weak hagatluk inetaiken akin dogoligat, wene yakulho motok welageikharek mekeat he, ebe wene hutukhogon waganu 'bugat werekma, it ap inobabut itithogon hagariogei meke iti nen, humi iti inailake inabusagat ukiluk, inane baga nukhetdisalok nen, inebe herle warogo negen hageisiliogei iti o.
55003008	Muk haganeat, it ap Yanes inom, Yambres inom, Musa ane thagalogo here'isalok hagakhukha hak, it iti ebe wene thagalogo here'isalok, weak hagakhe dogolik, inakla nen wene ebeat meke ebesusak dek, korlo meke eberiogei iti o. Itithogon hagariogei iti baga, inetaiken Allah oba hakokthek meke kobologo here'isega iluk, ekagat asigin iti o.
55003009	It Yanes inom, Yambres inom, korlo hagakhukhama, it aperek nen, “Inetaiken dek, ” iluk ekagat hutdisasukha hagat, it iti itithogonat inetaiken dek hagariogei iluk, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen inobabut ekagat palumo, it inane iti kok asigin dek o.
55003010	It iti inobabut itithogon ekagat asigin mekeat he, hat he, an nen wene yakulisegerek meke inom, nobabut hagakherek meke inom, “Itithogon hagasigin, ” iluk nakla apegerek meke inom, netaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagarek meke inom, nakla hapukhogon welagarek meke inom, akhuni tha'bokhogonat nakmurogon welagarek meke inom, nobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagarek meke inom, haganeat nen hutdanhe laganat o.
55003011	Akhuni nen yi aik ti aik hagatnakhunem, nobaaik weak hegerek etnogo hiluat o. Akhuni o Antiokhia nen, Ikonium nen, Listra nen, weagatnakho korlegat werekma, ninoe Etagapogot nen iki ageikhe thogotdanhidek tilnakhe lageikhe iti o.
55003012	Nit Kristus Yesus ninom hunik dogolik, Allah hasik hanorogon hagakhe dogouogoluk ninakla apekhe lago meke ninebe tomok tha'bokhogonat yi aik ti aik hagatninakhe dogogunat o.
55003013	Weagatninakhe korlegat, it aperek weak hagakhe dogolik nukhetdisiliogei meke iti, it aperek nen nukhetdisugunem, it nen oko-oko nukhetdisigigat hagakhe dogolik, weak arik-arigat kokhogon weak akhagun iti o.
55003014	It nen itithogon hagakharek mekeat he, hat anek he, nit ninebe hilu meke nen ebe wene yakulhikhugumo hat nen, “Eberogonat, ” iluk waganhigin meke itiat a'bethogon herogo dogono.
55003015	Hat hebe elege baga nenat Allah ane holal waganek iti hilu motok welagatek iti, hakla eberek motok dogosak o. Itithogon dogolik, hetaiken Kristus Yesus oba hakotdiluk werekma, Allah nen tilhabusak meke hutdinogoluk, at ane holal waganek iti bagaat hakla erlogat kagalusak werek o.
55003016	Allah ane holal waganek iti tha'bokhogonat, at nenat inakla kagalhikhemo, holal waganogo 'bisukha meke iti baga, akhuni aperek wene ebe wene yakulisigik, korlo hagakhunem inasuk wakhik, inobabut hebelinakhik, Allah akla warlok apekherek meke mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk inasuk wakhik, hagakhe dogosagat o.
55003017	Akhuni inebe tomok inebe Allah hasik 'bisalok dogolik, yi meke ti meke at obasik hano hagakharek meke iti erlokhogonat inetaiken horlerogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, Allah ane holal waganogo woknisasikhe iti o.
55004001	-
55004002	At Kristus Yesus ebe yabokane agat oba thelekmaatwitluk nen, akhuni ninebe niniluk welago meke inom, watlagoukha meke inom, tha'bokhogonat wene ninoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin o. Hagakhe dogoluk, yi akhuni ti akhuni tha'bokhogonat apma 'bisalok at ebe kok dogogin iti nen, an nen, ninopase Allah inom, Yesus inom, ipisak inil oba, hatnen ebe wene akhuni yogeisekhe dogonogoluk hasuk nobatnerogo warogo yokhisik. Akhuni hano wene yogeisugunem holusak werek korlegat inom, ina'it werek korlegat inom, holuagaluk wene iti hobatnerogon yogeisekhe dogono. Hakla puk ageidek yakulisekhe dogolik, weak hagakhunem hane pakhogon yogeisigik, inasuk wakhik, inetaiken ago warogo yogeisigik, hagakhe dogono.
55004003	Yabokane, it akhuni nen ebe wene inasuk hanorogon holhidek dogolik, we wene inasuk holu warlok nen, yakulisekhe dogoagaluk it aperek inebe doalegat inayoko ’biluk, natogorinabugun iti.
55004004	It iti ebe wene iti isinem inasuk labetdiluk, wene suakane pilinekharek wene iti pilinekhunem anek he, inasuk lanhogon holhe dogogun iti.
55004005	It itithogon hagakho korlegat, hat yi meke ti meke hasik, hobabut hebelek dogolik, hoba yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik, hobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogono o. Hano wene yakulisilik nekharek iti mekeat kogotdiluk Allah nen, “Itithogon yomageisekhe dogono, ” iluk, hayoko ’bisikhe meke iti ageikhe here’isigidegat mothogon hagakhe dogono.
55004006	Akhuni nen an nebe Allah hasik namep ulabogo nasugun oba arat hakok i aga o. Itithogon nasugunmo, an nebe nopase oba lausak tak-tagat agama welagei o.
55004007	Tha ae ’busuk, tha ae ’busuk lageikharek hak, an netaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk motok dogolik, at hasik nobatnerogonat hano hagarik waga lagarik nen, hurli baga arat hagatlasi aga o.
55004008	Akhuni inae walhugunem, inae ’busuk asugun meke oko hano meke wogeisegarek hak, an nebe arat lagunem, ninoe Etagapogot nen ukum ninoba ’bigik, kokhik, tak-tagat hagasigin itinem, at nen he, “Hat morat hano hagakhe laganma, ” iluk, oko kare-kare mitago negen ageikhe woknisigin werek o. Meke re, an anek woknisigin ’buk. It aperek inakla nen, “Yesus wetnek o, ” iluk, warlok nen therogo welageikharek meke tha’bokhogonat ninom woknisageinat o.
55004009	-
55004011	At Demas etnogo agat oba meke yoma akla warlok nen, an thogotdaniluk o Tesalonika lagama o. Nen, at Kreskes, o Galatia lageik, Titus o Dalmatia lageik, hagakhama at Lukas anek nipisak welago iti nen, hat ibat noba wetnok nen he, hobatnerogon walhekhe dogono. Itithogon walhekhe dogoluk nen wisigiluk halok he, Markus etnogo obabut an Allah hasik hagakhunem hano yomakneasusak meke werek iti nen, ebe waganik-waganik noba wetno o.
55004012	Nen, at Tikhikus etnogo, o Efesus loagaluk la’igima o.
55004013	Hat waga dogolik nen, su thogei meke itikmanke ikherek meke etnaga inom, wene holal waganek ato emenaga, waganhe dogolik, ebe kok hak he, wene domba oado karek meke baga holal waganek etnaga inom, o Troas at Karpus aila etoma ’biluk wageima emenaga tha’bokhogonat wolok wetno.
55004014	Nen, at Aleksander tembaga meke pisue negen hagakherek meke etnogo nen, an kokhogonat weagatnakhemo welagei. Meke re, at ninoe Etagapogot nen at hagakhe iti tak-tagat ukum oba ’bigin werek o.
55004015	At iti ebe wene nit nen yakulisekhe lago meke ninane thagalogo here’isalok hagakhe lagama iti nen, hat hobabut hebelogo dogono.
55004016	Akhuni nen wene noba ’biluk, nitema alebageik waganhunem, an nen, “An noba ’bukmoat o, ” iluk wene noba korugunem, it tha’bokhogonat an nalilu ageikhe yomakneau degat here’aniluk dukhega iti hasik, Allah nen ukum inoba ’bigidek dogoak o, iluk sembayan ekhe lagei.
55004017	Itithogonat meke re, an nen ebe wene hutukhogon yogeisugunem, it itikmanke meke inebe tha’bokhogonat inasuk holuagaluk, ninoe Etagapogot an nalilu dogolik, nobatnetnakhesik, singa heloyeke hakene anini weak meke etnogo apema werekma tilnabu hak, nasusak meke tilnakhe iti o.
55004018	Itithogon tilnakhesik nen, yabokane akhuni nen yi weak ti weak hagatnabuogoluk hagakhunem, at nenat tilnakhe dogoluk nen, karelogo woknarik pogot oba, at apma dogogunmo etoma ukigin iti hasik, at hogorakho motok dogouok, iluk, “Amin, ” igi iti o.
55004019	He Priskila inom, agun Akwila inom, at Onesiforus a’buri inebe tha’bokhogonat inom, “Paulus nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisano.
55004020	At Erastus etnogo o Korintus huk aga iti o. Nen, at Trofimus etnogo oba uat werek nen, o Miletus 'biluk wagei iti.
55004021	Hat he, o miso nasinem thogei weak agarek etnogo aban ageidek werek korlek, ya bagaat ibat wisigiluk hobatnerogon walhekhe dogono. At Ebulus inom, Pudes inom, Linus inom, he Klaudia inom, ninagarlak lak ninerugi Allah a’buri meke tha’bokhogonat nen heagei wathakha o.
55004022	Ninoe Etagapogot hetaikenma thekharik dogolik he, at obabut hano etnogo nen, hinebe tha’bokhogonat hakhisik dogoak o.
56001001	Titus na’but o. An Paulus nen, Allah atuaneke dogolik, akhuni at nen wenageinakhikhe meke inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk werekma ago watdisigik, nen, nit at apma dogolik ebe wene yakulisekhe lago wene etnogo hutukhogon inilu asuagaluk yakulisigik, hagasuagaluk Yesus Kristus nen nayoko 'biluk la’ani ageikhe meke etnogo nen, wene yi holal waganogo hoba la’i agei iti o.
56001002	At Allah nen, yi meke ti meke aban winametdigidek dogolik, nit akhuni ninobasik men isikhe, “Akhuni an nen winametdisalok nen, inebe iniluk motok dogoagaluk, hano hagarinabigin, ” iluk abok isikhe iti, “Ekalat ekherek dek o, ” iluk ninakla eberek dogolik, ebe wene yakulisekhe lago iti o.
56001003	Yogotak wene iti winam asusak tak-tagat winam asuagaluk, at Allah tilninakherek meke etnogo nen, “Hat nen wene iti akhuni yogeisekhe dogono, ” iluk nayoko ’biluk, noba ’bisikhe iti baga ebe winam ariogo iti o.
56001004	Titus na’but o. Hetaiken nit ninom tak-tagat Allah oba hakotdiluk welagan iti baga, an nekaerek na’but harat agagin iti o. Ninopase Allah inom, ninoe Kristus Yesus tilninakherek meke inom, ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen, hano meke wokhigik, hetaiken hapugutdageigik, hagakhe dogoak o.
56001005	An nen hat o Kreta etoma 'bageiluk, wisigiluk hagakhe dogolik, wene itithogon hagakhe dogosak iluk, hoba 'bisigi iti o, “Yi meke ti meke aban morerakhidek meke, moretdigik, o yi ukul ti ukul etoma akhuni Allah a'buri aperek therisik dogoagaluk inougi tomok meldisigik, hagakhe dogono, ” iluk, yokhitluk wagagi iti o.
56001006	Akhuni Allah a'buri aperek therisik dogoagaluk meldisausak iti, inobabut yi hakene meke meldisausak o. Akhuni aperek nen, “At weak, ” iluk wene oba 'biliogei dek meke halok, age opakiat waganek meke halok, a'buri inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikharek meke halok, it aperek nen ekhe dogolik, “Ap yi a'buri inasuk warek dek yugunat hagariogei iti nina'it, ” iluk, abok paliogei dek meke halok, meldusak o.
56001007	Ap Allah a'buri aperek therisik dogolik, Allah hasigat hagakhe dogogin iti nen, it aperek nen wene oba 'biliogei dek meke halok, meldusak o. At nen he, “It aperek isinem weak. An igi anek he, hano, ” iluk, ekherek dek meke halok, akla aga horok hakokthek dek meke halok, i anggur eken apusu oba labu'buk nekerek dek meke halok, akla aga horogot awulagam hagakherek dek meke halok, “Uang, yi meke ti meke an anek noba dogolep, ” iluk, apekherek dek meke halok,
56001008	ap huso wagunem aila hanorogo woginakherek meke halok, hano hagakharek iti meke anek warlok apekherek meke halok, etaiken ekaerek nen therogo welagarek meke halok, obabut mothogon hagakherek meke halok, ebe Allah hasik karelek welagarek meke halok, ekaerek nen asuk warek welagarek meke halok, meldusak o.
56001009	Wene akhuni hanorinakherek wene yakulisekhe dogolik inasuk hanorogon wakhik, at nen ebe wene isinem, it aperek nen, at ane thagalogo hagakhunem, at nen inane erlok thagalogo 'bisigik, erlogat hagakhe dogoagaluk, wene nit nen yakulikhugumo, eberogonat iluk waganhikhesik, at obabut mothogon obatnerogon herogo welagarek meke halok meldusak o.
56001010	It akhuni aperek doalegat ebe wene hologo mothogon hagakhidek hagariogei iti. Itithogon hagariogei iti, inebe doalekmake, it Yahudi inoado aperlagap itithogon palek meke, hano wene waganhukhasik nen, yabokane wene ebe wene dekmaat, yugunat akhuni inawene meke ekhe dogolik, it aperek nukhetdisiliogei iti o.
56001011	Itithogon nukhetdisekhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke inekaerek nen thaburausak dek meke thaburauwogoluk, yakulisausak dek mekeat yakulisekhe dogolik, akhuni doalegat ina'buri inomat nukhetdisiliogei iti, it inane iti thebelogo usa’isano.
56001012	Akhuni o Kreta meke inekaerek meke ageikhe wene akla kagalek yakulisekhe lageikhe meke ageikhe nen, wene men isikhe, “It akhuni o Kreta meke yoma inobabut inekalat isi motok dogolik, warn helo meke obabut hakene. Wen waganu’buk dogolik, yi meke ti mekethiokhogon na’buk inamorlo muluk yi re! ”
56001013	iluk, at ane eberogonat isikhe. Iti nen, it iti inetaiken Allah oba hanorogon hakotdiluk dogou hagat dogoagaluk inasuk obatnerogon wakhe dogono.
56001014	It akhuni Yahudi meke ineram nen wene suakane wene pilineriogei meke inom, akhuni aperek nen, ebe wene here’isalok inakla nen kagalogo, “Itithogon hagakhe dogosak, ” iluk inasuk wariogei meke iti inom, wene iti herogo dogunogo iluk, inasuk obatnerogonat wakhe dogono.
56001015	Allah nen akhuni aperek at hasik ’bakhalok hanorinakhe meke halok, it inobasik yi meketi meke hano anek 'bisalok werek o. Itithogonat meke re, it aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek dogolik, inakla apiliogei meke inom, eberiogei meke inom, weagat werek iti nen, it inobasik yi meke ti meke hano dek. Weak anek werek o.
56001016	It iti nen he, inape baga nen, “An Allah ebe nilu o, ” iluk, inane pakhogon ekhe dogoligat, “Ebe ninokodek, ” iluk u hak, inasuk warek degat, Allah alilo meke hagakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke hanorogon hagasusak it motok erlok dek werek iti.
56002001	It itithogon werek meke re, hat he, wenehanotninabiogo wene itiat yakulisekhe dogosak tak-tagat yakulisekhe dogono.
56002002	Ap inarluetek meke iti, it inetaikenma hanorogo apigik, it inetaiken werek welageik, it inetaiken inekaerek nen therogo welageik, it inetaiken Allah ane ebeat apalok aborlok dek welageik, akhuni inakmurogo welageik, yi meke ti meke hasik inoba aik hekhe dogolik, inobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageik, hagakhe dogoagaluk inasuk wakhe dogono.
56002003	Iti hagat, it humi inarluetek meke iti, akhuni Allah apma dogolik, inobabut mothogon hagakharek hak, hagakhe dogolik, akhuni aperek nen inabok weak palhidegat, inougi koktek inapma welageikharek hak, i anggur eken apusu apma negen dogolik, inoba la'buk nekarek itithogon nikidegat dogolik, it nen it aperek hanorogon hagakhe dogosak hasik, yakulisekhe dogoagaluk inasuk wakhe dogonoat o.
56002004	-
56002005	Itithogon yakulisugunem, it akhuni aperek nen, wene Allah nen yoknisasikhe wene etnogo abok weak ekhe dogunogo iluk, it nen he, humi tugumtek iti nen inaguni inom, ineagei inom, inakmurogon dogolik, inetaikeninekaerek nen therogo welageik, inilaga isonhogo welageik, uma meke yi meke ti meke hanorogon karelogo hagakhik, inaguni inane hologo welageik, hagakhe dogoagaluk, yakulisekhe dogoak nen he, inasuk wakhe dogonoat o.
56002006	Iti hagat, it ap elege iti nen, yi meke ti meke hasik inetaiken inekaerek nen therogo dogoagaluk inasuk wakhe dogonoat o.
56002007	Inasuk itithogon wakhunem, it nen, hat hobabut waganhe dogoak nen, yi meke ti meke hasik hagakhe dogolik hobabut mothogon hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, “Wene yi kogat, ” iluk mothogon yakulisekhe dogono.
56002008	Itithogon yakulisugunem, it aperek wene iti ina'it meke nen, “It weak hagakha, ” iluk, wene nit ninoba 'bukmoat isinem, inekarli asuagaluk, ebe weneat, hanotninakherek wene, weak usak dek meke etnogo, yakulisekhe dogono.
56002009	It inatuaneke meke iti, inougi koktek nen yi meke ti meke hasik isinem, inakla hanorogon, inane oko igidek inane hologo hagakhe dogolik
56002010	inameke meke iniki abusak waganhe dogosak dek. Inobabut ekagat hutdisoagaluk, yi meke ti meke hasik hupukhogon mothogon hagakhunem, it akhuni aperek nen Allah tilninakherek meke etnogo abok ekhe dogolik, “At ane yakulnisiliogei iti hano, ” iluk, ekhe dogoagaluk, inobabut itithogon hagakhe dogosak o.
56002011	It tha'bokhogonat nen itithogon hagakhe dogosak iti, Allah obabut hano nen yi akhuni ti akhuni tha'bokhogonat tilinabigiluk iliogo meke iti obabut ekagatthelekmatdisikhemo werek iti nenat o.
56002012	Nit ninobabut alep Allah ebe ninobakhanini here'isekhe dogolik, ninakla nen yi meke ti meke agat oba meke warlok anek apekhe lagagu iti here’isalok nen, yogotak ya ninobabut ninetaiken therogo dogolik Allah hasik mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, at obabut hano iti baga yakulnisiliogo iti o.
56002013	Nit yogotak he, Yesus Kristus ebe Allah Etagapogot mekeat, tilninakhikhe mekeetnogo akhuni nen hogorakhe korlek, thelekma hanotninabi isigin iti hasik, ninakla arleken akhekhe dogolik ebe therogo welago.
56002014	Nit alep Allah ane here'isalok yi weak ti weak hagakhe lagagu iti nen niniki herle warogo negen haknisik werekma, at Yesus Kristus nen he, “It inebe an nekaerek na'buri atluk nen, inobabut hano meke akilukhogon hagakhe dogoak nen, inebe herle hisalogo inoko paligiluk, an nebe watlasigin, ” iluk isikhe.
56002015	Hat nen wene itiat yakulisugunem, it aperek inakla nen erlok dek dageinogo, hane obatnerogonat inakla kagalogo inasuk wakhe dogono.
56003001	Allah a'buri hat nen hagasik welagan meke etoma nen, inougi pemerintah meke koktek inapma werekma, it nen yi meke ti meke mothogon hagasuagaluk isinem, “I o, ” iluk inane hologo hagakhe dogoagaluk inasuk wakhe dogono.
56003002	It Allah a'buri iti nen, akhuni aperek inabok weak palhidegat, inane puk weak wenageisigidegat, it aperek nen inobabut ekagat hutdisoagaluk akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobasik inobabut enago hanorogonat hagakhe dogoagaluk inasuk wakhe dogonoat.
56003003	It itithogon hagakhe dogosak iti, nit alep ninetaiken dek ninobabut kepu negen, ninasuk warek degat, nil-hilhogon hagakhe dogolik, akhuni inougi koktek inapma welageikharek hak, inoba agaken dageigik, inakla nen yi meke ti meke warlok apigik, hagakharek iti meke apma negen welagagu. Itithogon dogolik, it aperek weagarinakhik, ua palhik, it aperek nit motok ina'it hisigik, nit nen it nina'it isigik, hagakhe lagagu.
56003004	Itithogon hagakhe lagagu mekeat he, at Allah ninebe tilninakherek meke etnogo obabut hano nen, nit akhuni akmutninakhikhe meke iti ekagat thelekma ageikhemo ebe hutdisugu iti.
56003005	Itithogon thelekmaageikhesik, Allah Agoreke nen ninakla thobalogo ninebe ket meke itakninakhik, ninobabut ninat hagatninakhik, hagakhikhe iti, nit ninekaerek nen ninobabut mothogon hagakhe lagagu baga hagatninakhikhe ’buk. Ninebe at nenat akmutninakhikhesik tilninakhikhe iti o.
56003006	Allah nen Agoreke woknisasikhe iti ebe, Yesus Kristus ninebe tilninakherek meke etnogo nenat kokhogon ninoba usa'i ageikhe.
56003007	At Yesus obabut hano nen wene ninoba meke korogo wokhasikhesik, Allah ninom ninapuke hunogo ’binanikhemo, nit ninakla nen, “Niniluk motok dogogun o, ” iluk apekhe lago iti mothogon iteerek asuagaluk Allah Agoreke woknisasikhe iluk,
56003008	igi iti eberogonat o. Hat nen it aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk werek meke halok, akhuni aperek inobasik hanorogon yomageisegarek iti meke kogotdiluk akilukhogon hagakhe dogoumo, akhuni tha’bokhogonat inobasik hano motok, iluk, itithogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, inasuk hobatnerogon wakhe dogonogoluk, an nakla apigi meke yokhigi iti o.
56003009	Meke re, akhuni inetaiken dek nen wenemuk yakharek iti inom, inebe itaklarik wagoukha meke erloma nen pilinekharek iti inom, Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo hasik, wene yakharethek nen akhuni inom weak ageikharek iti inom, tha’bokhogonat iti baga hano asigin dekma yugunat alomarogo iliogei iluk, hat nen here’isekhe dogono.
56003010	It aperek nen, Allah a’buri meke it-it inom weak asuagaluk, hagariogei meke iti; inasuk alebageik watluk nen yabokane watnoat o. Itithogonat wasigin meke, inasuk holhidek halok, hinom hunik dogogup o.
56003011	It akhuni inobabut itithogon hagariogei meke iti, akhuni holak nuk ageikharek hak, nuk akhalok, inobabut weak hagariogei iti baga, hat nen, “Inekaerek nen wene inoba ’bakhiliogei, ” iluk inobabut ekagat palhe lagan iti o.
56003012	An o weak werek korlek, o Nikopolis etoma witluk dogogin iluk, nakla apigi iti nen, at Artemas a, Tikhikus a, hoba la'i agei halok, hat hebe ibat noba wisigiluk hobatnerogon walhekhe dogono.
56003013	Nen, at Senas wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo motok ilu meke etnogo inom, Apolos inom, ipisak yi meke ti meke dek ageidek erlogat wolok loak nen, hat nen yomageisalok la’isano.
56003014	Akhuni nit Allah a’buri meke aperek, o eken hano meke ikhidek welagarek hak, it iti hano meke ite ageidek yugunat alomarogo dogunogo iluk, it aperek yi meke ti meke dek nen nuk atluk werekma, it inekaerek hano hagakhe dogolik yomageisekhe dogoagaluk, iti meke kogotdiluk yakulhe dogoak o.
56003015	It Allah a’buri an ninom yoma welagorek meke inebe tha’bokhogonat nen heagei wathinakha o. Nen, hat nen, Allah a’buri inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk, ninebe inakmu meke etoma, “Paulus nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk, yogeisanoat o. Allah obabut hano etnogo nen hit tha’bokhogonat hakhisik dogoak o.
57001001	-
57001002	Filemon nagarlak o. Nagarlak nipisak Kristus obasik hagakhorek meke hebe nakmu o. An Paulus, Kristus Yesus obasik niki herle warogo ’banhama welagei meke etnogo, ninagot Timotius nipisak nen, hat hebe inom, Allah a'buri aperek hat haila natogokharek meke inom, nineru Apia inom, ninagot Arkhipus, wim yakherek hak, Allah hasik ninom ninobatnerogon hagakhe lago meke etnogo inom, wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago iti o.
57001003	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Ninopase Allah inom, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus inom, ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, hagakhe dogoak o.
57001004	-
57001005	Hat hetaiken ninoe Etagapogot Yesus oba hakotdiluk, Allah a’buri aperek tha’bokhogonat hakmurinakhetek iti habok nasuk holhirik nen, sembayan hibiku-yogoku ekhe dogolik, hat hetaga iluk nopase Allah heagei wakhe lagei o.
57001006	Nit ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, ninagarlak lak ninerugi Allah a’buri aperek inom, Kristus ninom hunik werekma, at nen yi meke ti meke hano meke woknisugunemhutdogorek meke iti, yabokane kokhogon hutduogoluk Allah ayoko 'bekhe lagei.
57001007	Filemon nagarlak o. Hat nen akhuni Allah a'buri meke aperek tha'bokhogonat hakmurinakhe dogolik, inakla hanorinakhetek iti nen, an Allah hasik hagakhe dogoagaluk netaiken ago watdanhe laganma nakla arleken motok akhekhe lagei o.
57001008	Hat itithogon hagakhetek iti nen, nipisak Kristus ninom hunik dogolik, at hasik hagakhorethekma, an nen he, “At nagarlak nipisak, ” iluk nekarli degat, “Itithogon hagatno, ” iluk, an nen nane nobatnerogon yokhisusak erlok mekeat he,
57001009	an Paulus yogotak nebe arat yaman agarik werekma, Kristus Yesus hasik niki herle warogo 'banhama welagei. Itithogon dogolik, hat nakmurogo welagarek iti nen, nane erogat hoba ageikhe kino yokhisik o.
57001010	Iti, an niki herle warek dogolik, at Onesimus etaiken Kristus oba hakotdekhe iti nen, ebe na'but hakene hagatlageik, an nebe at opase hakene hagatlageik, hagatlagosik nen, at ebe waganinogoluk yokhigi o.
57001011	At alebageik, hat hasik hanorogon hagasusak meke erlok dek negen welageikhe meke re, yogotak hat hasik anek 'buk. An nipisagat hasik hanorogon hagatnisekhe dogogin meke erlogat werek o.
57001012	Iti nen, at ebe an netaiken hunik nen at apuke hoba la'i agei iti o.
57001013	An hano wene yogeisilik nekherek iti hasik niki herle warogo 'banhama werek korlek, hat nen yomakneekhe dogou hak, hobolukmo at nen yomakneekhe dogoagaluk ebe hakhausak mekeat he,
57001014	hat nen, “I o, hano. Hipisak dogono, ” iluk yoknikhidekma, an nen nabusagat wene ageikhe usak erlok dek o. An nakla warlok he, hat ebe iteerek meke hetaiken nenat inogoluk, la'i agei iti o. Meke re, hat hakla nen, “Na’it, ” apekhe korlegat, an nen nane obatnerogon yokhisusak he, na’it o.
57001015	At Onesimus hat here’ageiluk dukhisikhe iti, hiki elanma dogoluk nen, yabokane hipisak motok dogouogoluk waganiginmo, at Allah akla apasikhe baga hagatlariogo apigi.
57001016	At yabokane hat hipisak dogogun iti, ebe hatuaneke dogolik, hat hasik hagakhe dogogin mekeat he, iti anek ’buk. At he, at ebe Allah a’but agasik ninagarlak ninakmu mekeat dogogin iti. At nen he, an nakmu mekeat dogolik, an hasik hano motok hagariogo iti, herlekha’bugat o. Hat hasik anek he, an ebe agat oba hatuaneke dogolik, hagarlak hipisak ninoe Etagapogot hinom hunik dogogun iti nen, ebeluk hetaiken motok hunik dogono.
57001017	Iti nen he, hat nen, “Paulus ebe an nagarlak nipisak hunik welago meke, ” iluk, apekhe lagan iti, Onesimus apuke hoba la’i agei iti, an nebe hoba wagunem woknabu hak, at ebe itithogonat apuke waganino.
57001018	At nen korlo ageikhe hagathakhemo, nomat oba ’begenma palegeke werek halok he, nomattha’bokhogonat an noba ’bino.
57001019	An Paulus itithogon nomat noba welagei, iluk tha’bokhogonat iti oko paligin meke nekaerek niki nen holal waganhi iti o. An nen, hat hano wene yakulhikhigimo hekaerek hebe hasik hano meke ite agatik welagan iti, nomat hoba ’bigima palegeke hoba werek iluk yokhisusak mekeat he, an itithogon usak dek. Hekaerek hiluat o.
57001020	Iti halok nagarlak o. Ninoe Etagapogot ninom hunik dogolik nakla arleken akhoagaluk an yomakneau hak, at ebe iti hanorogon waganino.
57001021	Wene an nen yokhikhi meke iti hat nen hasuk hologo hagasiginat higi, iluk, nakla apigirik nen holal yi waganogo hoba la’i agei iti o. An nen, “Ebe waganino, ” iluk yokhigi meke iti, hat nen itithogon hagakhe dogolik hano meke aperek inom hagasiginat higi, iluk, an niluat o.
57001022	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik hit tha’bokhogonat nen an hasik sembayan Allah ayoko ’bekhe lagap iti nen, at nenyabokane niki herle hisalogo ula'aniluk hinoba woknarik wisigin apekhe lagei. Halok he, an yabokane hinoba witluk noge usak hasik, hat nen haila etoma o kamar ageikhe karelogo 'baniluk dogono.
57001023	At Epafras nipisak Kristus Yesus obasik hagakhe lago iti nen, niniki herle warogo 'binanhama welago meke etnogo nen heagei wathakhe o.
57001024	Nen, an nagarlak lak Kristus obasik hagakhe lago meke, Markus inom, Aristarkhus inom, Demas inom, Lukas inom, inebe tha'bokhogonat nen heagei wathakhaat o.
57001025	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obabut hano etnogo nen hit tha'bokhogonat hinetaikenma dogolik thethisik dogoak o.
58001001	O muk haganeat, at Allah nen it ap at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo iki hibiku-yogoku, wene at ageikhe yogokhik, at ageikhe yogokhik, nekalok-nekalogatyogosugunem, it nen nit ninopa lak yakulisekhe lagoukha.
58001002	Meke re, o ilugun oba, nit yogotak welago ya baga, Allah nen a'but yogokhikhemo, at nen nit yakulnisa ageikhe. At a'but iti, erloma Allah nen yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat winametdisikhe iti, ebe at a'but nenat winametdisikhemo, iteerek dogoagaluk meldisikhemo dogogin iti o.
58001003	Mulikin terlelek-werlelekhogon la'i agarek hak, Allah ebe hogorakharek meke iti nen, Yesus ebe la'i ageikhemo agat oba liarogo dogolik, opase alino hakene at welagarek iti. Itithogon dogolik, yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat welagarek iti, at ane obatne baga welagarek. Werekma, nit weak hagakhe lagagu meke arat horogo degetdisikhesik nen, Allah Etagapogot kok meke etnogo baga dageisikhesik alilu iki ebeke kogat welagarek iti o.
58001004	At Allah nen, it malaikat emenogo inetaga wema baga negen werek korlek, at Yesus anek etaga siakthek kok dogoagaluk thalinakhikhe hagat, it malaikat inebe wema baga negen werek korlek, Yesus ebe siakthek kok welagarek iti.
58001005	Allah nen at yogokhe dogolik, “Hat an na’burat o. Hebe yogotak itakhakhi, ”\rq (Mazmur 2:7; 1 Tawarikh 17:13)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe iti hak, it malaikat meke ageikhe wene yigithogon yogeisasikhe nogo? Dek o. Nen ageikhe, “An he, at opase asigin. Nen, at he, an na'but asuak o, ”\rq (2 Samuel 7:14)\rq* iluk, it malaikat aperek yogeisasikhe nogo? Degat o.
58001006	Iti nen, at Allah nen a’but opakiat itago agat oba yoma usa’i ageikhe itinem, it malaikat yigithogon yogeisasikhe, “Hit an nagarumi malaikat tha’bokhogonat, at anek oba hakokthek dogolik hogorakhedogono o, ”\rq (Ulangan 32:43; Mazmur 97:7)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe.
58001007	Nen ageikhe, it malaikat inobasik men isikhe, “An nen it malaikat inebe o hisakne hakene hagarogo ’bisigik, it yoko la’isegerek meke inebe hetu amulok hakene hagarogo ’bisigik, hagakherek, ”\rq (Mazmur 104:4)\rq* iluk isikhe.
58001008	Meke re, a’but yogokhe dogolik, “Hat hebe Allah at dogolik, yi akhuni ti akhunihagasik motok dogogin o. Hat kok itithogonat dogolik, wene mothogon anek moretdisekhe dogogin o.
58001009	Nen, hat hobabut, mothogon anek hagakhetek iti meke hagakhe dogolik, korlo hagakhe dogosak ha’it motok iti nen, hagarlak lak hinom welagathep meke inapma negen werek korlek, hat anek, hukuloak oba apusu tialogo an hopase nen meldagasigi iti nen, hakla arleken motok akhekhe dogono o, ”\rq (Mazmur 45:6-8)\rq* iluk yogokhikhesik
58001010	wene ageikhe yigithogonyogokhikheat, “Hat Hetagapogoratma ebekeram nen, agat yi erlo walhigik, pogot hiki baga walhigik, hagakhiginat o.
58001011	Tha'bokhogonat winametdisigin meke iti, suhakene momok atluk yabokane dek asigin mekeat, hat anek hikhok motok dogogin o.
58001012	Pogot agat iti, su dikilogo 'begarek iti hak, hat nen dikilogo 'biluk, yabokane ket meke 'bigin mekeat he, hat hebe anek yi tahun ti tahun hagatlagakorlek, hebe yaman ageidek hikhok motok dogogin o, ”\rq (Mazmur 102:25-27)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
58001013	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, ageikhe men yogokhikheat, “Akhuni hat hathili meke emenogo hisok nen al debelogo 'bisanok nen iluk, an nen aban 'bisa ageidek werek korlek, hat hebe an nalilu niki ebeke kok dogono, ”
58001014	Allah agarumi malaikat iti inebe, nikithogon hagakharek meke nogo? It inebe, nit Allah nen tilninabigin meke yomaknisekhe dogoagaluk, at nen inayoko 'biluk la'isa agarek mekeat o.
58002001	Iti nenat, akhuni ku baga lagunem i nen wogosik lagarek iti hak, nit nen ebe wene iti here’umo werlekmake woknisik launogo iluk, wene ninasuk holhugu meke iti ninobatnerogon herogo dogouok o.
58002002	Wene iti, nit ninopa lak yogeisoagaluk, Allah nen it malaikat inayoko 'biluk la’isa ageikhemo yogeisasukha meke eberogonat hagatlageikhe. Nen, it aperek wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhidek meke, inebe tomok wene mothogonat inoba ’biluk weagarinakhe lageikhe iti.
58002003	Iti hak, nit yogotak tilninabusak wene kok iti ninobakhanini here’isagun halok, weagatninabiginat o. Ebekeram he, wene at ninoe Etagapogot ebe nenat akhuni aperek yogeisasikhemo inasuk holhukha meke nen hutukhogon yoknisasukha meke eberogonat hagatlageikhe.
58002004	Wene iti pakhogon yogeisilik nukhunem, it akhuni aperek nen, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk hutduagaluk, Allah nen inane legerogo yi meke ti meke hagasusak dek meke elalin obatnerogon hagakhik, at akla warlok meke tak-tagat inobabut tomok Agoreke supusogo wogeisigik, hagakhikhe meke iti, nit nen ninobakhanini here’isagun halok he, here’inanigin apegep a? Weagatninabiginat o.
58002005	Nit nen, “Yabokane agat ket meke baga dogogun, ” iluk ekhe lago iti dogolik, Allah nen it malaikat meke inane hologo dogoagaluk kok meldisasikhe ’buk. Dek o.
58002006	Wene akhuni inobasik Allah ane baga ap ageikhe nen holal yigithogon waganhikhemo werek, “Eiye! Allah nopase. Nit ninebe akhuni meke itaklagagu mekeat, hat nen ninoba eberek welageik, helokhoma ’binanhik, hagakhetek iti nikithogon nen.
58002007	Iniki pererlagat oba elanma hasik it malaikatmeke inetagawerek koktek hakene werek korlek, nit ninetaga dek erlok dek negen hagarogo ’binanhigin mekeat he,
58002008	yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat nit ninanehologo dogolik, hogotninakhik, ninalonetninakhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk meldinanhigin iti, ”\rq (Mazmur 8:4-7)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha. Yi meke ti meke aperek usa’isigidek tha’bokhogonat nit ninane hologo dogoagaluk isikhe mekeat, yogotak yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat ninane holhidek aban werek hekhe lago.
58002009	Mekeat he, at Yesus anek he, arat kok meldisikhemo werek hekhe lago. Allah obabut hano nen, Yesus akhuni tha’bokhogonat inobasik watlasuagaluk malaikat inetagawerek kok negen werek korlek, at etaga dek erlok dek negen hagarogo ’bisikhemo, ebe yi aik ti aik hilik hilik watlageikhe iti baga, Allah nen at etagawerek kok meldisikhemo werek iti.
58002010	At Allah iti, yi meke ti meke at ekaerek hasik, ekaerek nenat walhasikhe meke nen, akhuni at a’buri doalegat hogorinakhe dogogunmo wogosik loagaluk, holak waganherek meke Yesus at o. At nenat akhuni erlok inebe tilinabiluk wogosik laga dogoagaluk, yi aik ti aik hilik hilik watlasuagaluk apasikhe iti, erlok apausak meke iti tak-tagat apasikhe.
58002011	Yesus ebe, it akhuni weak hagakharek meke horinakherek meke iti inom, it akhuni arat horinakhikhe meke inom, inom dapukhogon inopase opakiat. Iti nen, at Yesus ekarli degat, “It akhuni iti an nagarlak lak nerugi, ” iluk ekherek iti.
58002012	At Yesus nen Allah yogokhe dogolik, “An nen, hat hebe nagarlak lak nerugi yakulisigik, ha’buri natogokharek meke emenogo inakladogolik, hogothakhik, hagakhe dogogin o, ”\rq (Mazmur 22:22-23)\rq* iluk yogokhikhesik nen,
58002013	ageikhe inom ap ageikhe yogokhe dogolik, “An netaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogogin o, ”\rq (Yesaya 8:17)\rq* iluk yogokhikhesik nen, “Allah nen na'buri woknikhikhe meke emenogo ninom welago yi ’bikhan, ”\rq (Yesaya 8:18)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
58002014	At nen, “Akhuni iti an na’buri, ” iluk isikhe iti, nit akhuni watlagorek meke ninobasik isikhe iti nen, at ebe watlaga dogolik, nit akhuni watlagorek meke erlo at Iblis iki baga welagarek meke iti, at Yesus nen at Iblis ebe obatne degetdisigik,
58002015	nit akhuni ninebe itaklagorethek niniluk dogolik, watlasusak ninayuk nen niniki herle warek negen welagagu meke hisalogo ’binanhik, hagasigiluk, nit watlagorek meke ninobabut waganogo watlageikhe iti.
58002016	Itithogon hagakhikhe iti, eberogonat malaikat meke elokhoma ’bisalok akmurinakhikhe ’buk. Dek o. Allah ane baga holal waganek werek tak-tagat, nit ap Abraham nen itago meke yi elokhoma ’binaniluk, ninebe akmutninakhikhe iti.
58002017	Itithogon hagakhikhe iti, yigithogon iluk. Nit akhuni weak hagakhorek meke, at nen degetdisagaluk, at ebe Allah iteerek kok dogolik, obabut Allah hasik hupukhogon hagakhik, nit akhuni akmutninakhik, erlogat hagakhe dogeigiluk, at ebe nit akhuni agarlak lak erugi hakeneat atluk, nit hagakhorek meke tha’bokhogonat ninobabutwaganusak mekeat waganhikhe iti.
58002018	Itithogonwaganhikhesikmo, at weak hagasuagaluk akla kagalhunem, yi aik ti aik arat hasikhesikmo nogo nen, nit akhuni weak hagasuagaluk ninakla kagaligiluk wagunem, at nen erlogat yomaknisausak werek o.
58003001	Iti nen, Allah a'buri ekaerek hasik wenago’binageikhemo welagap meke nagarlak lak nerugi. At Allah pogot oba nenat hit ninomat ninayoko ’bisikhemo wene waganhugusik pakhogon ekhe lago iti hasik, at Yesus ebe Allah iteerek ninoe kok dogoagaluk, Allah nenat la’i ageikhemo werek iti halok, hit hinetaiken oba nenat hutdekhe dogono o.
58003002	At Musa nen Allah a’buri inebe re, Allah ai halekma negen, iluk it inobasik obabut hupukhogon hagakhe lageikhe iti hak, Allah nen Yesus itithogonat hagasuagaluk meldisikhemo obabut hupukhogon hagakherek iti o.
58003003	It akhuni nen o halek meke herlekha’bugat negen hogorakhe dogolik, it ap o halharek meke iti anek he, kokhogon hogorinakharek iti hak, at Musa ’bugurlagat negen hogorakhe dogolik, at Yesus anek he, kokhogon hogorakhe dogosak o.
58003004	O halek ebe tomok, it ap o halharek meke inebe werek mekeat he, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat, Allah arligat nen o halu hak walhasikhe o.
58003005	At Musa ebe Allah atuaneke dogolik, at Allah a’buri inebe tha’bokhogonat at ai halek negen iluk, it inobasik obabut hupukhogon hagakhe dogolik, men ekhe lageikhe, “Allah nen yi wene ti wene yabokane yigithogon yoknisagein meke werek, ” iluk abok yogeisekhe lageikhe.
58003006	Mekeat he, at Yesus anek he, Allah ebe a’but nogo nen, at iteerek nenat hagakherek. Nit hanotninabigin wene iti hasik ninetaiken ninobatnerogon oba hakotdiluk motok dogogun halok he, Allah ai halek iti, nit ninebeat o.
58003007	Iti nen he, Allah Agoreke nen men yoknisekherek, “O yogotak ya baga Allah ane hinasuk holhephalok he,
58003008	hinopa lak o limo akhuni dekma nekhe dogolik, inetaiken obatne atluk, it nenAllah nina'it, iluk, Obatne werek a? Dek a, iluk obabut palik nekhe lagoukha iti hak, hit itithogonat hagakhup o.
58003009	-
58003010	Allah nen ekhe dogolik, O etoma 40 tahun dogolik, an nen hit hinopa lakhagarinakhunem inileken tomok nen hekhe lagoukha mekeat he, At obatne werek a? Dek a, iluk dalnakhik, nobabut palhik, hagakhe lagoukha. Itithogon hagakhe lagoukha iti nen, an nakla aga inoba 'bekhe dogolik, menyogeisasigi, Hinobabut dapi-daparek dogolik nane dopokhogon waganusak hina'it iti nen,
58003011	an nakla aga dageiluk hupuk palogo wenageisekhe dogolik, An nen, Hit thet walagun, iluk abok yokhisasigi hak, hit thet walagun motok dek o, iluk yogeisasigi, ”\rq (Mazmur 95:7-11)\rq* iluk isikhemo Allah Agoreke nen yogeisasikhemo holalwaganogo 'bisukha.
58003012	Halok he, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit aperek hinobabut weak atluk, hinetaiken Allah iluk motok welagarek meke oba hakotdigidek dogolik, at ebe here'isalok hinapuke dukhilaunogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
58003013	Hit aperek weak hagakhe dogolik hinekaerek nukhetdakhalok hinetaiken a’bereak asunogo iluk Allah ane baga, “O yogotak ya baga, ” iluk isikhe iti dek ageidek werek korlek, hit-hit hibiku-yogoku hinetaiken ago wat-wat hagakhe dogono o.
58003014	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ebekeram ninetaiken at oba hakotdisugu meke itiat, niniki nomokhogon herogo werekma, hurli ilugun oba hago dogogun halok he, nit Kristus agarlak lak erugi agosik welago o.
58003015	Allah ane baga holal yigithogon waganek werek, “O yogotak ya baga, hit Allah ane hinasuk holhep halok he, hinopa lak nen, Allah ebe nina'it, iluk ekhe lagoukha hak, hit nen, At nina’it, iluk hinetaiken a’bereak agup o, ”\rq (Mazmur 95:7-8)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha.
58003016	Akhuni Allah ane inasuk holhe lagoukhasik nenat, “At ebe nina’it, ” iluk ekhe lagoukha iti ap thani nogo? It iti, at Musa nen o Mesir nen wogosik dukhi ageikhe meke inebe tha’bokhogonat emenogo apigi.
58003017	Nen, 40 tahun oba dogolik, Allah akla aga thani inoba ’bekhe lageikhe nogo? It iti weak hagakhe lagoukhama, o limo akhuni dekma motok watlarik wagoukha emenogo apigi.
58003018	Allah nen wenageisekhe dogolik wene hupuk yigithogon palhikhe, “An nen, Hit thet walagun, iluk abok yokhisasigi etnogo, thet walagun motok dek o, ”\rq (Bilangan 14:23)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe iti thani nogo? Iti it akhuni Allah ane hologo mothogon hagakhidek here’isekhe lagoukha meke emenogo apigi.
58003019	It iti inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek hagakhe lagoukha iti nen, thet wala ukusak motok erlok dek ageikhe, iluk nit yogotak hutdekhe lago o.
58004001	Iti halok he, Allah nen a’buri thet waloagaluk abok yogeisasikhe meke iti dek ageidek werek meke iti, nit yabokane thet waloagaluk woknisageinmo etoma hit aperek ukigidek hagasunogo iluk hinayukhogon dogolik mothogon hagakhe dogono o.
58004002	Wene hano wene iti it alep yogeisasikhe iti hagat, nit itithogonat yoknisasikheat. Meke re, wene yogeisasikhe meke iti, it inasuk holhukhasik nenat, inetaiken oba hakotdigidek hagakhe lagoukha iti baga, wene iti it inobasik erlok dek ageikhe iti.
58004003	It inobasik itithogon erlok dek ageikhe mekeat he, nit ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdekhe lago meke, at nen, “Hit thet walagun, ” iluk abok isikhe etnogo nirat thet walagun o. Wene iti hasik, Allah nen yigithogon isikhe apigi, “An nakla aga dageiluk hupuk palogo wenageisekhe dogolik, An thet walogo welagarek iti hak, it thet walagun motok dek o, ”\rq (Mazmur 95:11)\rq* iluk isikhe iti, pogot agat at nen walhasikhesik nen thet walekhe dogolik isikhe.
58004004	O iniki 7 baga welageikharek etnogo meke hasik, Allah ane baga yigithogon holal waganek werek, “Allah nen yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat walhekhe lageikhesik, iki 7 baga thet walasikhe, ”\rq (Kejadian 2:2)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek.
58004005	Wene iti hasik, Allah ane ageikhe yigithogon holal waganek weregat, “An thet walogo welagarek iti hak, it thet walagun motok dek o, ”\rq (Mazmur 95:11)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek.
58004006	Ebekeram, it nen hano wene iti inasuk holhukhasik nenat, inasuk hologo mothogon hagakhidek iti nen, at Allah nen, "It thet walagun, ” iluk abok isikhe etnogo, thet ebe waligidek. Iti halok he, it akhuni ninat meke aperek erlok thet walagun, iluk hutdusak o.
58004007	Wene iti abok yogeisasikhesik oba nen, yi tahun ti tahun doalegat welageikhesik nen, yabokane, "Iti baga, ” dogogun iluk at Daud yogokhe dogolik, “Yogotak ya baga, ” iluk yogokhikhe meke alebageik igi hagat holal yigithogon waganek werek, “Yogotak ya baga Allah ane hinasuk holhep halok he, hinetaiken a’bet dogogup o, ”\rq (Mazmur 95:7-8)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha iti.
58004008	Allah nen, “Hit thet walagun, ” iluk abok yogeisasikhe iti, at Yosua nen wogosik uki ageikhe iti baga, arat ebeat atlepma re, it uki agoukhasik oba nen yabokane Allah nen, “Iti baga thet walagun, ” iluk abok isikhe iti, ilep degat o.
58004009	-
58004010	Allah nen yi meke ti meke walhekhe lageikhesik nen, yabokane ilugun kobokhogon iki 7 baga thet walasikhe iti hak, nit at a’buri thet walagun meke iluk abok isikhe meke etnogo ukugun halok, ninebe dopok yi meke ti meke yabu ninekaerek hasik hagakhe lago meke ilugun kobokhogon thet walagun meke weregat o.
58004011	It alep Allah ane hologo mothogon hagakhidek nen, thet waligidek iti hak, nit aperek it inomanem thet waligidek hagasunogo iluk, ninobatnerogon hagakhe dogouok o.
58004012	At Allah ane ekherek iti, karok elak abel ebelak-ebelak motok mago iti hakene dek o. Meke re, at ane iti, iluk meke obatneak elaklak weak motok dogolik, inoak elekenma ukigik, inamukok elola ukigik, hagasu hak, inakla inetaiken oba hakha lagarethek nen, inakla apegarek meke inom, inetaiken nen warlok apegarek meke inom, ileken erlok penakherek.
58004013	Allah il oba, yi meke ti meke at nenwalhasikhe meke ageikhe limago welagarek motok dek o. Meke re, at il oba, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat, thelekma motok welagarek iti nen, nit hagakhe lago meke, at ilumo ninoba dopogat ninom ugun o.
58004014	Nit ninoe kok Allah iteerek Allah a’but Yesus etnogo pogot abel upuke Allah werekma dageisikhesik nit ninobasik werek iti nen he, nit ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk ninane pakhogon ekhe lago meke iti, niniki a’bethogon hago dogouok o.
58004015	Nit ninoe kok Allah iteerek welagarek iti, nit ninobatne dek erlok dek iti, at okodek ’buk. At nit ninobabut waganhikhesik werekma, nit weak hagasuagaluk weak meke etnogo nen ninakla kagalherek hak, at itithogonat yi meke ti meke hasik akla kagali aga lageikhe mekeat he, at weak ageikhe hagakhidek dogolik ninobabut ilu o.
58004016	Iti nen he, nit weak asusak werekma, hano asuagaluk, ninopase Allah obabut hano nen akmutninakhik, yomaknisigik, hagasuagaluk, at Allah kok welagarekma dogolik obabut hano enagorogon hagakherek iti nen, ninayuk dekhogonat horokhogon ukuok o.
58005001	It ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek inebe tomok iti, akhuni Allah a’buri nen, ap it meke ageikhe Allah hasik hagakhe dogolik, it meke yi meke ti meke ’bisinem, Allah wogokhik, weak hagakharek meke hasik inako wolok wagunem, warikhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk wenago meldisegarek.
58005002	Itithogon meldisugunem, it inobatne dek erlok dek mekeat emenogo nen, it akhuni aperek itithogonat wene inokodek dogolik nil-hilhogon hagakharek iti, hutdiluk nen, inebe inakmurinabiluk it inobasik inoba enagorogon erlogat hagakharek iti.
58005003	It inekaerek nen weakhagakharethek nogo nen, it akhuni aperek weak hagakharek meke hasik inako horlalok wagunem, it nen Allahwarekharek iti hak, itithogonat it inekaerek hasik inako Allah warisusak tak-tagat warekharek iti.
58005004	It itithogon hagakhe dogouogoluk, “An nebe Allah iteerek kok dogogin, ” iluk inekaerek nen meldakhegarek dek. At Allah nenat, ap Harun ayoko 'bisikhemo meldisukha iti hagat, Allah nen inayoko ’bisi halogat meldisegarek.
58005005	At Kristus itithogonat, “An Allah iteerek kok dogogin, ” iluk ekaerek nen wenago meldakhigidek. At Allah nenat wenago meldisikhesik wene men yogokhikhe, “Hat an na’but o. Hebe yogotak itakhakhi o, ”\rq (Mazmur 2:7)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe iti.
58005006	Nen, ageikhe re, Allah ane holal waganek ageikhe baga yigithogon isikhemo weregat, “Ap Melkisedek an Allah iteerek kok welageikhe iti hak, hat an iteerek kok motok-motok dogonogoluk meldagagi o, ”\rq (Mazmur 110:4)\rq* iluk yogokhikhemo holal waganek werek.
58005007	At Yesus ebe agat oba yoma werekma watlasunogo iluk, Allah nen erlogat tilusak iti nen, de aga dogolik, ane kogat Allah etaga palogo ayoko ’bigik, kino yogokhik, hagakhe dogolik, opase ane ayukhogon hologo welageikhe iti nen, Allah nen ane asuk holhikhe.
58005008	Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, at Yesus Allah ebe a’but mekeat he, Allah ane hologo hagasusak meke hasik yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik yakulhikhe iti.
58005009	Itithogon yakulhe dogolik, ilugun arat kobokhogon hagakhikhemo, nit at ane hologo dogogun meke ninebe tha’bokhogonat niniluk motok-motok dogoagaluk at ebe tilninakhikhe meke erlo arat hagarogo ’bisikhe iti.
58005010	Itithogon hagarogo ’bisikhesik, at nen, “At Melkisedek hagakhe lageikhe iti hak, hat hebe an iteerek kok dogono, ” iluk meldisikhe iti.
58005011	Wene iti hasik, nit nen hit yokhisausak meke doalegat werek mekeat he, hit hinobabut, wene ibat hutdusak erlok dek iti nen, nit nen hutukhogon yakulhisausak erlok dek negen o.
58005012	Hit he, Allah ane alebat yakulhigisipmo, hit nen it akhuni aperek yakulisausak erlok mekeat he, erlok dek iti nen, wene ebekeram yakulharek meke iti, it akhuni apurukhugi inoba yakulusak o. It yekerugi hipiri a’bet meke nausak erlok dek nen, inagosa lak irlak apusu anek nasi welageikharek iti hak, hit he, wene horle meke yakulusak erlok dek nen, wene alep meke yakulisegarek meke iti meke anek yakulhe dogosak hinobabut hisekhe lagei o.
58005013	Yekerugi inagosa lak irlak apusu anek nekarek iti, inebe yekerugiatma, wene yi hano, yi weak, iluk penasusak inokodek welageikharek iti.
58005014	Meke re, it inarluetek anek he, inetaiken horle atlukmo nogo nen, wene yi weak, yi hano, iluk penasusak inilu nogo nen, hipiri a’bet meke it inapiri o.
58006001	Iti nen he, Kristus agarumi atluk hagakhe dogosak meke wene alebageik yakulharek iti meke yakulhugu meke iti werek korlek, inarlue atluk hagakhe dogosak meke yakulhe dogouok o. O herlaga hano ’biluk iniki abel dagalharek dek iti hak, nit alep weak hagakhe lagagu meke ’bualogo here’isalok ninobabut hebelatluk ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdisugu meke iti yabokane abel dagaluok dek o.
58006002	Ima usegarek wene iti yakulhik, inukuloak thebelharek wene iti yakulhik, watlatlukmo Allah nen ninilugutninabigin wene iti yakulhik, ilugun oba ukum ninoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhunem motok-motok dogogun wene iti yakulhik, hagakhugu meke iti ninane abel dagakhogon yabokane yakuluok degat o.
58006003	Allah nen hano apekhe halok, yabokane yakulusak meke itiat yakulik laga dogouok o.
58006004	-
58006006	It akhuni aperek, Allah nen inakla liarinakho korlek, yi meke ti meke ituk walhalok hano meke waganharek iti hak, Allah pogot oba nen oko dek werlegat woknisekherek meke iti waganhik, Agoreke suputnisekherek meke iti aperek waganhik, Allah ane iti hano motok iluk iniluat welageik, Allah obabut hano nen yabokane obatnerogon hano motok hagatninabigin iti aban hagatninakhidek werek korlek, yogotak ya yi meke ti meke hipiri dirlu nekarek hak, wogeisasinem horligik, hagakharethek nenat he, yabokane it nen, “Allah nina'it, ” iluk ane here'isalok inapuke dukhi lalok dogolik, Yesus Allah a'but ebe o baga meldiluk wakhe dogolik inane sagun yogokhukha iti hagat, yabokane hagariogei iti o. Itithogon motok hagarik laga korlek, yabokane, it nen, “Nit weak hagakho, ” iluk inobabut hebeluagaluk, inapuke nikithogon wogosik wisu heat. Motok erlok dek o.
58006007	Allah nen hibiku-yogoku o miso agat oba usa'i agunem, agat hano hotelagunem akhuni nen yabu waganogo yi meke ti meke ai yakharek meke ebe hano nasinem, Allah nen, “Agat iti hano, ” iluk hanotdekheregat o.
58006008	Itithogon mekeat he, agat iti yi oka ti oka weak meke inom, pati arlok meke inom, dukhekherek halok he, “Agat yi we yugunat alomarogo werek iti weak na'it, ” iluk Allah nen homan 'biluk nen, yabokane hetu hundumo tha'bokhogonat nigin o.
58006009	Itithogon igi mekeat he, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu. Allah nen weagathinabigin, iluk ninakla apekhe lago dek. At he, hit alebat tilhinakhikhesikmo Allah nen hanothinabigin iluk hutdekhe lago.
58006010	At Allah obabut he, korlo hagakherek meke 'buk. At mothogon anek hagakherek iti nen, hit nen at obasik hagakhe dogolik hinagarlak lak hinerugi Allah a'buri meke aperek hinakmu nen alebageik yomageisigik, yabokane yomageisigik, hagakhe lagap mekeiti, at nen hit hinobarlikmatdigin dek o.
58006011	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit ninakla warlok he, hit hinakla nen, “Allah nen nit hanotninabigin, ” iluk hinakla arleken akhekhe lagap meke itiat akhekhe dogoluk, hurli ilugun oba iteerek asubageik nen, hagakhe lagap iti hagat, hinebe tomok hinobatnerogon hagakho motok dogosak warlok apekhe lago o.
58006012	Hit hina'it weak hagakhe dogosak he, nina'it o. It akhuni alep inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk ina'it ageidek, it nen, “Eberogonat waganugun, ” iluk apekhe lagoukha baga, Allah nen, “Wokhisagein, ” iluk abok yogeisasikhe meke ebe waganhukha iti hagat, hit itithogonat it inobabut waganogo hagakhe dogono o.
58006013	-
58006014	At Allah nen he, Abraham yogokhe dogolik, “Hat yabokane yigithogon hagathabigin, ” iluk abokyogokhe dogolik, “Hat hebe hani-hanorogonat hagathakhik, hat ha'buri nen itago meke motok doalegatwiak-wayakhogon wokhikhik, hagasigin o, ”\rq (Kejadian 22:16-17)\rq* iluk, ap ninat meke etagapogot degatma, Allah ekaerek etaga baga hupuk palogo yogokhikhe.
58006015	Itithogon yogokhikhemo nen, Abraham akla puk ageidek therogo motok welageikhe iti baga, wene abok yogokhikhe meke iti, arat ebeat ageikhe iti.
58006016	Meke re, it akhuni nen inetaga hupuk paluogoluk halok he, inekaerek inetaga erlok dek negen nen, inekaerek inetaga baga hupuk palhidek. It aperek inetagawerek kok meke inetaga baga hupuk palharek iti. Itithogon palhunem, it apurukhugi nen wene palhe dogogun meke emenogo inane dek agarek iti o.
58006017	Itithogon hagatlagarek iti hak, Allah nen, “Akhuni an nakla apalok abok yogeisegerek meke, nane dagakhogon yabokane ninat meke ageikhe yogeisegerek dek o, ” iluk, it wene abok yogeisasikhe meke eberogonat apoagaluk, hupuk palogo yogeisasikhe iti.
58006018	Wene hupuk palogo yogeisasikhe iti, nit Allah apma uki ago meke ninakla nen, “Hanotninabigin, ” iluk eberek welago meke ninetaiken hapukhogon dogoagaluk nirat abok yoknisasikhe. Abok yoknisigik, hupuk palhik, wene pere isikhe iti, nit nen, Allah ekalat ekherek motok dek, iluk ninetaiken hapukhogon dogoagaluk yoknisasikhe iti.
58006019	At nen he, “Hanothinabigin, ” iluk isikhe iti dek asigin dek o. “Ebeat asigin, ” iluk apekhe lago meke iti, ku thoat agatma a’bethogon usa'iluk welageikharek iti hak, ninetaiken pogot oba o akla itikmoke kakok palek Allah werekma etoma hunetdiluk hapukhogon dogouok o.
58006020	At Yesus nit ninobasik holak yarik, o etoma ukisikhesik, ap Melkisedek Allah iteerek dogolik hagakhe lageikhe iti hak, motok-motok hagakhe dogogin meke Allah iteerek kok ageikhesik welagarek iti.
58007001	Ap Melkisedek iti ebe, akhuni o Salem meke inoe kok dogolik, Allah Etagapogot iteerek welageikhe. Werekma at ap Abraham ap inebe koktek meke inatluk apuke wagunem, at Melkisedek iti nen 'bikha dukhisikhesik, “Allah nen hebe hanothabuak, ” iluk ane hanorogon heagei wakhikhe.
58007002	Itithogon yogokhikhemo, Abraham nen, wim yakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke hugul waganhikhe meke tha'bokhogonat iki wenago 10 baga ageikhe meke aperek mikirlogo Allah hasik 'bisalok, ap Melkisedek etnogo wogokhikhe. Ap Melkisedek iti etaga nit ninane baga, “Kok etagapogot obabut mothogon anek hagakherek meke, ” iluk u hak, etaga Melkisedek thalekma ekhe lagoukhaat. Nen ageikhe, “Kok etagapogot hogot walherek meke, ” iluk u hak, akhuni o Salem meke inoe kok etagapogot iluk ekhe lagoukhaat.
58007003	Ap Melkisedek iti hasik, at agosa opase iti nen itago meke igik, ap iti opa lak iti nen itago meke igik, at iti hurli baga itaklageikhe igik, iti hurli baga watlageikhe igik, abok hutukhogon ageikhe igidegat. Iti nen he, at ebe Allah ekaerek a'but ipisak tak-tagat dogolik, at ebe Allah iteerek motok welagarek hakeneat o.
58007004	Nit akhuni Israel meke ninopa Abraham nen wim iti yakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke hugul waganhikhe meke emenogo iki wenago 10 baga hagatlasi ageikhe meke aperek mikirlogo Allah hasik 'bisalok, ap Melkisedek wogokhikhe iti nen he, nit ninakla nen, “At Melkisedek iti ebe kok motok, ” iluk apausak iti 'bikhani!
58007005	Nit akhuni Israel meke wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo baga yoknisekhe dogolik, ageikhe men isikhe, “Yi meke ti meke iniki wenago 10 baga hagatlagarek meke aperek mikirlogo an nobasik 'banhunem, ap an iteerek it ap Lewi nen itago meke anek waganhe dogoak o, ” iluk inasuk wakhikhemo holal waganek werek o. It inebe opakiat meke ap Abraham nen itago meke inagarlak lak inerugi nenat 'bisinem waganhe dogoak o, iluk isikhe iti.
58007006	Itithogon isikhe meke re, ap Melkisedek iti, ebe ap Lewi nen itago meke 'buk. At ebe werlek meke dogoligat, at Abraham Allah nen, “Hanothabigin o, ” iluk abok yogokhikhe meke etnogo nen, yi meke ti meke iki wenago 10 baga hagatlasi ageikhe meke aperek mikirlogo Allah hasik 'bisalok Melkisedek wogokhikhemo waganhikhesik nen, “Allah nen hanothabuak o, ” iluk ane hanorogon yogokhikhe iti.
58007007	Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, it akhuni inebe koktek nenatinagarumi inapma meke inane hanorogon yogeisegarek iti, nit tha'bokhogonat itithogon hagakharek ninilu nogo nen, wene iti hasik inane thagalusak dek o.
58007008	It ap Allah iteerek dogolik, it akhuni aperek nen yi meke ti meke iniki wenago 10 baga hagatlasi agarek meke aperek mikirlogo Allah hasik ’bisinem, inebe akhuni watlageikharek meke nen waganhe lagoukha mekeat he, ap Melkisedek iti anek he, iluk welagarek meke nen itithogon waganhikhe, iluk Allah ane baga holal waganek werek o.
58007009	-
58007010	At waganhikhe iti hasik, it akhuni Israel meke nen yi meke ti meke iniki wenago 10 baga hagatlasi agarek meke aperek Allah hasik mikirlogo ’bisinem, ap Lewi nen itago meke waganhe dogoagaluk isikhe etnogo mekeat he, at Abraham ap Melkisedek ipisak abuk agoukhasik, yi meke ti meke iki wenago 10 baga hagatlasi agarek meke aperek Allah hasik mikirlogo ’bisikhe meke iti, at Lewi aban itaklageidek werek korlek Melkisedek wogokhikhe iti. At Abraham nen wogokhikhe mekeat he, it ap inukuloak etaga Lewi meke Abraham nen itago meke nogo nen, it nen wogokhukha umo re, erlogat o.
58007011	It ap inukuloak etaga Lewi nen itago meke Allah iteerek kok werekma, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke etnogo baga it Israel meke ’bogokhogon hanorinakhe dogolepma, Allah nen he, “Ap Harun nen itago meke dek. An iteerek Melkisedek hagakhe lageikhe iti hak, ap ninat meke ageikhe meldigin, ” iluk ilep degat o.
