58007012	It ap Allah iteerek alep meke here’isalok, ket ninat meke meldisagaluk halok he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti obolukmo wene ilugun ninat meke iluk nen meldisausak o.
58007013	-
58007014	Wene yi ninoe Etagapogot Yesus ukuloak etaga Yehuda meke hasigat o. At ukuloak etaga Yehuda meke iluk akhuni tha’bokhogonat inilu meke re, at Musa nen it apAllah iteerek hasik ekhe dogolik, it ap Yehuda meke inabok ekhe lageikhe motok dek. Iti nen he, it ap inukuloak etaga Yehuda meke ageikhe Allah iteerek dogolik Allah ako warekhe dogoagaluk meldisekhe lagoukha motok degat o.
58007015	Ap Allah iteerek at Melkisedek hakene ageikhe winam ageikhesik werek iti hasik, wene thelekma motok werek o.
58007016	-
58007017	At iti, Allah iteerek melageikhesik werek iti, akhuni nen, “Ap inukuloak etaga iti meke meldisegarethekma, iti mekeat hano dogoak, ” iluk meldisegarek iti hak, meldisikhemo werek 'buk. Dek o. At hasik wene yigithogon holal waganek werek. Allah nen he, “Ap Melkisedek an iteerek welageikhe iti hak, hat an iteerek motok-motok dogonogolukmeldagagi o, ”\rq (Mazmur 110:4)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti hak, at Yesus yabokane watlageidek iluk motok obatneak welagarek iti baga meldisikhemo werek.
58007018	-
58007019	Itithogon werekma, Allah nen wene alep ninasuk wakhikhe iti erlok dek nen 'bogokhogon hano hagathinakhidek, wirlidikhogon dogunogo iluk, degetdisalok nen, yabokane wene ilugun ket meke ulakhikhemo nen, ninebe 'bogokhogon hano hagatninabigin iluk Allah oba horokhogon uki aga lago.
58007020	Nen, wene iti Allah nen etaga hupuk palogo ulakhikhe o. It akhuni aperek nen he, it ap Allah iteerek dogoagaluk etaga hupuk palhidek meldisegarek mekeat,
58007021	at Yesus anek he, Allah nen etaga hupuk palogo meldekhe dogolik, men yogokhikhe, “An Netagapogot nen, hat an iteerekmotok-motok dogonogoluk netaga hupuk palogo meldagagi iti, yabokane nane dagakhogon wene ninat meke ageikhe nekalat igin dek o, ”\rq (Mazmur 110:4)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
58007022	At Allah nen, “Yigithogon 'bogokhogon hano hagathinabigin, ” iluk wene ket meke warogo wokninakhikhe iti, ebe asigin iluk at Yesus ebeat meldiluk woknisasikhe itiat o.
58007023	Nen, wene opakiat ageikhe weregat o. It ap Allah iteerek dogolik hagakharek meke hunik-hunigat motok hagakhidekma inebe obakha baga nen watlagunem he, inobolukmo meldisigik, hagarik wagunem inebe doalegat watlageikharek iti o.
58007024	Itithogonat meke re, at Yesus anek he, Allah iteerek iluk motok dogogin iti nen he, Allah nen, it akhuni aperek at obolukmo meldisagein dek o. At arligat motok dogogin o.
58007025	Itithogon iluk motok dogolik, nit akhuni ninobasik Allah ayoko 'bisi motok welagarek iti nen he, nit akhuni Allah werekma ukuogoluk at oba haklarik ukisinem erlok tilninabiluk nen ’bogokhogon motok hano hagatninabigin iti.
58007026	Nit ninakla nen, “Ap ageikhe Allah iteerek nit ninobasik hano ’bogokhogon yigithogon kok dogolik hagakhe dogolep e, ” iluk apogorek mekeat he, Allah nen ninoe Yesus itiat meldisikhemo werek o. At obabut weak korlo ageikhe hagakhidek, hano karelek motok werekma, akhuni weak hagakharek meke inakla nen karelogo pogot abel upuke upu eloma lia’isikhemo nit ninobasik werek o.
58007027	It ap Allah iteerek koktek iti hibiku-yogoku inekaerek weak hagakharek meke hasik tak, inako Allah warekharethek nen yabokane akhuni aperek weak hagakharek hasik inako Allah warogo wogokharek mekeat he, at Yesus anek he, nit weak hagakhorek meke hasik ninako Allah waresu hak, at ebe opaki hasik watlaga iogolik, ebe Allah wogokhikhe iti.
58007028	Alep wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke iti baga, ap erlok dek meke, Allah iteerek meldisekhe lagoukha mekeat he, yabokane Allah nen etaga hupuk palhikhe iti baga, at ebe a’but nit tilninakherek neke hano ’bogokhogon meldisikhemo at iteerek kok motok werek iti o.
58008001	Nit wene ekhe lago iti, kok he, yi o. Nit ninoe kok Allah iteerek ogo iti hagat werek o. At ebe, ninopase Etagapogot Allah welagarekma iki ebeke kogat werek o.
58008002	Itithogon werek iti, Allah ai su meke akhuni nen elanma hasik halhukha baga werek 'buk. Dek o. Allah ekaerek ai ebe meke halhikhe baga etoma dogolik nit ninobasik hagakherek o.
58008003	It ap Allah iteerek inougi koktek inebe tomok meldisegarek iti, yi meke ti meke Allah wogokhik, inako warikhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk meldisegarek iti hak, nit ninoe Allah iteerek kok iti, yi meke ti meke aperek nit ninobasik Allah wogosusak werek o.
58008004	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe meke iti tak-tagat, yi meke ti meke Allah hasik wogokhe dogosak meke, it ap Allah iteerek meke inebe werek iti nen he, at Yesus ebe agat oba yoma dogolepma, Allah iteerek dogolep dek o.
58008005	Allah nen, “Nai su meke elanma hasik haldanino, ” iluk Musa yogokhikhemo, ebe haligiluk hagakhunem he, yabokane men yogokhikhe, “An nipisak torn oba dogolik, an nai yigithogon haldanino, iluk walegeke walhalok inuguthiigi etnogo tak-takhogon haldaninok nen, hakla eberek motok dogono o, ”\rq (Keluaran 25:40)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe iti hagat, it ap Allah iteerek agat oba yoma dogolik, ebe pogot oba werek meke oba likhik, alino hagakhik, hagakharek iti.
58008006	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, it he, erlok dek alino hagarek meke hagakharek mekeat he, Allah nen, "Hit hano hagathinabigin, ” iluk abok yoknisasikhe meke oba dukhogon, at Yesus ebe Allah inom, nit akhuni ninom, turlem heisogo dogolik, wene Allah nen ket meke warogowokninakhikhe tak-tagat ebe mekeat kok motok hagakherek iti o.
58008007	Wene alep Allah nen, “Hano hagathinabigin, ” iluk wene warogo wokninakhikhe iti baga erlok dek ageidek hano hagatninabilepma, wene iti obolukmo, “Hanothinabigin, ” iluk yabokane ilep degat o.
58008008	Meke re, Allah a'buri wene alep meke iti hago dogolik, erlok degat hagakhe lagoukhama men yogeisasikhe, “Akhuni Israel meke inom, Yehuda meke inom, an nen wene ket meke warogo woginabigin obaweregat o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o.
58008009	An nen hit hinopa lak o Mesir nen wogosikdukhisigiluk niki hagasik dogolik, Itithogon hagathinabigin, iluk wene alebageikwarogo yogeisasigi iti hak ’buk. Ninat o. An nen it wene warogo yogeisasigi meke itihologo mothogon hagakhidek iti nen, it inebe na’it, iluk kolelogo here’isasigi iti o.
58008010	Yabokane akhuni Israel wene ket meke warogowoginabigin iluk igi iti, ebe yiat. An nen wene inasuk wakherek meke iti inaklaeberek motok dogoagaluk, wogeisigik, inetaikenma holal waganogo ’bisigik, hagatluknen, an it inopase dogogin. Nen, it an na’buriat dogogun o.
58008011	It inarluetek inom, yekerugi inom, tha’bokhogonat inopase an nebe inilu dogogun iti nen he, it inougi inageikhugi inom, inagarlak lak inerugi inom, yogeisekhe dogolik, Hinopase Allah at hinilu atni o, iluk yakulisausak dek o. Inekaerek inabusagat, nebe inilu aga dogogun o.
58008012	It weak hagakharek meke iti, an nen thagalogo degetdisalok, yabokane nakla eberek dogogin dek o, ”\rq (Yeremia 31:31-34)\rq* iluk Allah nen yogeisasikhemo holal waganek werek.
58008013	At nen he, “Wene ket meke warogo woginabigin, ” iluk isikhe iti, wene haganeat meke degetdigiluk isikhe. Yi meke ti meke haganeat meke il momok agunem ibat thogotdisegarek iti hak, wene alep meke degetdigiluk isikhe iti.
58009001	Alebageik Allah nen wene warogo a'buri woginakhikhe wene iti tak-tak, it nen at akla hanorogo hagakhe dogoagaluk yakulisasikhemo, “Yigithogon hagakhe dogosak, tigithogon hagakhe dogosak, ” iluk wene inilu welagoukha. Nen, o su ai meke elanma hasik hagakhe dogosak oba akhuni nen halhukhama welageikheat.
58009002	O iti kakok palek thukhamke etaga, o kakok palek usama u hak, Allah ai halek ekhe lagoukha. Etoma isagal yibakharek meke inom, o meja perlago hipiri Allah hasik ’bisegarekma inom, welageikhe.
58009003	Nen, o kakok palek itikmoke su baga hurli palek iti etaga, o kakok palek motok ebe usama u hak, Allah ekaerek ai ekhe lagoukha.
58009004	O etoma apusu obasi hano meke Allah hunekhe lagoukhama emas meke hagarek inom, peti Allah ninom hunik welago iluk oado tha’bokhogonat emas meke laberek inom, welageikhe. Peti iti akla, manna neke lagoukha meke isoak emas meke akla ukharlek iti inom, ap Harun athegerluk aku dukhisi lageikhe meke iti inom, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene holal helekit oba waganek itiinom, welageikhe.
58009005	Peti iti apot oba it malaikat hakene inebe pere, ina’bikha werek meke Allah ebe werek iluk alino hagarogo 'bisukha meke welagoukha. It iti, akhuni weak hagakharek meke Allah nen thagalogo degetdisalok, at inom hano dapulogo ’bisekhe lageikhe baga, ina’bikha nen thebelogo ’biluk welagoukha. Itithogon welagoukha mekeat he, wene iti tha’bokhogonat hasik yogotak ya opakitek-opakitek pilin-palinhogon usak erlok dek o.
58009006	Yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat iti obolukmo tomok karelek werekma, it ap Allah iteerek meke inebe tha’bokhogonat hibiku-yogoku Allah akla hanorogo hagasuogoluk o kakok palek thukhamke iti ukekhe lagoukha.
58009007	Itithogon ukekhe lagoukha mekeat he, o kakok palekitikmoke meke iti anek, ap Allah iteerek inoe kok meke iti anek ekaerek weak hagakhe lageikhe meke hasik inom, a'buri akhuni Israel meke inobabut hebelek dek nil-hilhek oba weak hagakhe lagoukha meke hasik inom, inako warogo amep wolok, Allah wogosigiluk tahun ebe wago tomok iki opaki hasik ukekhe lageikhe.
58009008	Itithogon hagakhe dogosak iluk wene inasuk warek welageikhe iti oba lisogon, nit hutukhogon hutduagaluk Allah Agoreke nen, men yakulnisekherek, “O kakok thukhamke iti werek korlek, Allah ekaerek ai ebe meke thu hualhidek larek welageikhe, ” iluk yakulnisiliogo.
58009009	-
58009010	Wene iti, ebe o yogotak hagatlariogo meke hasik alino hagarek welageikhe. Wene alino hagarek meke iti tak-tagat hagakhe dogoagaluk, hipiri inom, i inom, yigithogon neke dogolik, yi meke ti meke oba yigithogon horekhe dogosak, iluk Allah nen yakulisasikhe meke tak-tagat hagakhe dogolik, inako Allah warekhe lagoukha iti, Allah nen wene ket ebe meke aban hagakhidek werek korlek, agat oba yoma elanma hasik dogolik, alino waganogo hagakhe lagoukha iti nen, wene inoba dek iluk inakla 'bogokhogon thelegetdusak erlok dek welageikhe.
58009011	-
58009012	It itithogon hagakhe lagoukha meke Allah nen he, “Yi meke ti meke yabokane itithogon hano hagatlasigin, ” iluk abok isikhe iti hasik, at Yesus Allah iteerek inoe kok ebe wageikhe iti. Itithogon wageikhesik, it alep yi meke ti meke Allah nen walhasikhe meke kigilogo o halhukhama iti ukisikhe 'buk. Dek o. At he, o ebe meke kok hano halekma iki opaki hasik ukisikhesik, o hurli palek thukhamke thogotdiluk piokhogon o kakok palek itikmoke motok ebe usama iluk u hak, Allah ekaerek ai etoma ukisikhe. Itithogon ukisikhe iti, kambing inom, sapi inom, amep wolok ukisikhe 'buk. Dek o. Nit herle warek hakene werekma hisalek motok dogoagaluk, ninoko motok-motok palogo watlageikhesik, ekaerek amep wolok etoma ukisikhesik, nit ninobasik wereko.
58009013	Nen, it akhuni alebageik hagakhe lagoukha iti baga hagakhe dogolik, akhuni nen usa meke iniki hakhalok, inoba thuesi baga korinakharek iti hak, it ap Yahudi meke nen usa meke iniki hakhausak dek meke hakhasi halok, hano asuagaluk kambing amep inom, sapi amep inom, sapi ebe warogo Allah hasik hetu hunekharek meke oak hetu nalok, wul agarek meke inom, waganogo inoado itikmanke meke hasik horinakhe lagoukha iti.
58009014	It inoado itikmanke meke hasik sapi amep erlok dek meke baga erlok hano horinakhe lagoukha. Halok he, nit Kristus amep kok meke baga, “Wene hinoba dek, ” iluk ninakla thelekhogon erlok motok 'binanherek o. Nit Allah iluk welagarek meke akla hanorogo hagakhe dogoagaluk, domba isi hano meke Allah warekhe lagoukha iti hak, at Kristus Allah Agoreke ikhok motok welagarek meke obatne baga, watlaga dogolik, ebe Allah wogokhikhe iti baga, nit alebat dek asigin meke we yugunat hagakhe lagagu meke, at nen, “Wene hinoba dek, ” iluk, at amep oba ninakla thelekhogon ’binanhikhemo welago.
58009015	Iti halok he, wene warogo alebageik wokninakhikhe meke iti baga dogolik, nit ninasuk warek dek weak hagakhe lagagu iti baga ninebe herle warek hakene welagagu meke. Itithogon werekma, at Allah nen Kristus watlageikhe iti baga herle hialninakhikhesik, nit at nen wanisasikhe meke ninom hundiluk, hano ikhok motok dogogin meke woknisagaluk, wene ket meke warogo wokninabiluk, Kristus ebe turlem heisogo meldisikhe.
58009016	-
58009017	Ap ageikhe nen, “An niki ’biluk itithogon supusogo wogeisano, ” iluk ekherek meke ebe iluk werek korlek, iki ’biluk horlegarek dek. Meke re, at ebe watlaga halogat, “At arat watlaga, ” iluk thelekma isi halok, iki ’biluk horlegarek o.
58009018	Itithogon hagakho halok, iniki ’biluk horlegarek iti hak, Allah nen wene alebageik mekewoginakhikhe iti, mep warogo nenat aik obaat tetnokhogon isikhe.
58009019	Allah nen, “Yigithogon hagasusak, tigithogon hagasusak, ” iluk ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti tha’bokhogonat, at Musa nen it akhuni Israel meke yogeisasikhesik nen, yabokane sapi amep inom, kambing amep inom, i inom dapukhogon ’biluk nen, domba isi elokhoken mep hakene meke thukat ilugun oba horlokhogon ’biluk, musan eka mep wakharek iti hak, mep warogo Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene holal waganek iti baga watdigik, akhuni Israel meke inobake hisathigik, watdisigik, hagakhikhe.
58009020	Itithogon watdisekhe dogolik, men yogeisasikhe, “Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhe meketak-takhogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, at nen, Hit wene arat warogo wokhinakhi, iluk mep watdinageikhe yi o, ”\rq (Keluaran 24:6-8)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe.
58009021	Itithogon yogeisasikhesik nen, Allah ai su meke halek iti inom, yi meke ti meke Allah aila etoma at hasik hagakhe lagoukha meke tha’bokhogonat inom, obake mep warik lageikhe.
58009022	Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe meke iti tak-tagat hagakhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat hakene mep oba anek hokharethekma nogo nen, mep ulakhidek halok he, nit akhuni weak hagakhorek meke thagalogo degetdisausak erlok dek iti nen, mep wakhikhe iti o.
58009023	Agat oba yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat hosusak meke hokhe lagoukha iti, ebe pogot oba werek meke oba lisogon hagakhe lagoukha. Mekeat he, ebe meke pogot oba meke iti, kambing sapi iti meke warogo amep oba hosusak erlok dek iti nen,
58009024	at Kristus o Allah ekaerek ai ilukakhuni nen oba lisogon halhukhama iti ukisikhe ’buk. Dek o. At he, pogot ebe baga ukisikhesik Allah werekma etoma nit ninobasik werek o.
58009025	It ap Yahudi meke Allah iteerek inoe kok Allah aila iti ukekhe dogolik, ekaerek amep wolok ukisi lageikhe 'buk. Dek o. Sapi inom, kambing inom, amep wolok yi tahun ti tahun hagakhe korlek tahun ebe tomok iki opaki hasik anek ukisi lageikhe mekeat, at Kristus anek he, ekaerek amep wolok iki eran-alep ukigidek. Iki opaki hasigat ukisikhe iti.
58009026	At nen he, it alep hagakhe lagoukha iti hak hagatlepma re, agat walhasikhe hurli nen lok-logat nit yogotak ya hurli, yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik iki eran-alebat watlaga dogolep. Itithogon mekeat he, o ilugun oba nit weak hagakhorek meke degetdisagaluk iki opaki hasigat kambing sapi Allah waresu hak, ekaerek ebe watlasi ageikhe iti.
58009027	Nit akhuni opaki hasigat watlatlukmo nen, yabokane wene ninoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasigin iluk, at Allah nenat isikhe iti hak,
58009028	at Kristus meneke nit akhuni weak hagakhorek meke degetdisagaluk iki opaki hasigat kambing sapi Allah warekhe lagoukha iti hak, at ebe watlageikhesik, yabokane wisigin iti, nit weak hagakhorek meke degetdisagaluk wisigin ’buk. Dek o. Nit akhuni, at wagunem elokhoma therogo welagorek meke hanotninabigiluk wisigin o.
58010001	It akhuni Yahudi meke wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti tak-tagat hagakhe dogolik, ebe meke hagakhe lagoukha ’buk. Ebe yabokane hanotninabigin meke werek korlek, oba lisogon hagakhik, alino hagarogo hagakhik, hagakhe lagoukha. It itithogon hagakhe dogolik, yi tahun ti tahun kambing sapi Allah warekhe lagoukha meke iti meke anek warekho motok welagoukha iti nen, it akhuni kambing sapi Allah warisi aga lagoukha meke iti baga nen ’bogokhogon hanorinabusak erlok dek aga lageikhe iti.
58010002	It ’bogokhogon horinabilepma, “Nit weak hagakho, ” iluk inakla akin dogolik, wene munini ebekhe lagoukha meke iti, dek atluk nen, inakowarogo Allah wogosi aga dogolep dek o.
58010003	-
58010004	Akhuni weak hagakharek meke iti sapi inom, kambing inom, amep oba horinabusak erlok dek iti nen, yi tahun ti tahun kambing sapi warogo Allah wogokhe lagoukha iti baga, akhuni weak hagakhe lagoukha meke inakla eberisekhe lageikhe iti.
58010005	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukha iti nen, at Kristus agat oba usa’aga dogolik, Allah men yogokhikhe, “Hat he, akhuni nen kambing sapi wathikhik, yi meke ti meke wokhikhik, hagakharek iti meke wokhekhe dogosak, ha'it iti nen, an nebe akhuni hakene hagarogo 'banhigin yi o.
58010006	Hat hobasik kambing sapi warogo hetuhunhekharek iti inom, weak hagakharek meke horinabinogolukkambing sapi warogo wokhekharek iti inom, hat ha'irat o.
58010007	Iti nen he, Allah nopase. An nen wene yokhisik. Hat hane baga, wene an nen yokhesu hak, An nen hat hakla warlok meke hagasigiluk wisigin, iluk wene an nobasik holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek iti, ebe hagasigiluk nebe wagarik welagei yi o, ”\rq (Mazmur 40:6-9)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe.
58010008	At Kristus nen wene alebageik yogokhikhe iti, “Akhuni nen hat kambing sapi wathikhik, yi meke ti meke wokhikhik, hetu hunhikhik, weak hagakharek meke horinabinogolukkambing sapi wathikhik, hagakharek iti, hat ha'irat o, ”\rq (Mazmur 40:6)\rq* isikhe iti, Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti tak-tagat hagakhe lagoukha meke hasik isikhe.
58010009	Wene itithogon arat yogokhikhesik nen, yabokane men yogokhikhe, “Allah nopase. An nen hat hakla warlok meke itiat hagasigiluk nebe wagarik welagei o, ”\rq (Mazmur 40:8)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe. Itithogon yogokhikhe iti, Allah nen it alebageik hagakhe lagoukha wene iti degetdisalok, yabokane Kristus watlasigin itiat dogoak isikhe iti nen itithogon yogokhikhe.
58010010	Nen, at Yesus Kristus Allah akla warlok meke iti hagakhe dogolik, at ebe opaki hasigat watlaga dogolik, Allah wogokhikhe iti baga, nit ninebe Allah hasik motok karelogo 'binanhikhemo welago.
58010011	It ap Allah iteerek inebe tomok nen akhuni inobasik hagakhe dogolik, hibiku-yogoku eran-alep kambing sapi warekhe lagoukha meke iti meke anek warogo Allah wogokhe lagoukha iti nen, Allah nen it weak hagakhe lagoukha meke korogo wokhausak, motok erlok dek ageikhe iti o.
58010012	Itithogon mekeat he, at Kristus anek he, nit akhuni nen weak hagakhorek meke hasik iki opaki hasigat watlaga dogolik, ebe motok-motok Allah wogokhikhesik, alilu iki ebeke asi lageikhesik kok werek iti.
58010013	Itithogon ebe kogat dogolik, at athili meke Allah nen apma nomologo 'bisa agunem isok nen al debelinabigin iti anek aban nen, therogo werek o.
58010014	At Kristus opaki hasigat watlaga dogolik, ebe Allah wogokhikhe iti baga, nit akhuni ninebe Allah hasik 'binanherek meke 'bogokhogon motok hotninakhikhe.
58010015	At Allah Agoreke nen, wene iti hasik abok yoknisekhe dogolik, wene alebageik men isikhe,
58010016	“At Allah nen, Yabokane an nen it wene ket meke warogo woginabigin iti, wene ebe yiat warogo woginabigin. Inasuk wakherek wene iti inakla 'bisigik, inetaikenma holal waganhik, hagasigin o, ”iluk isikhesik nen,\rq (Yeremia 31:33)\rq*
58010017	“An nen it weak hagakhik, inasuk warek dek korlo hagakhik, hagakharek meke iti arat obarlikmatdisalok, nakla eberek dogogin motok dek o, ”\rq (Yeremia 31:34)\rq* iluk yabokane isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti.
58010018	Iti nen he, nit akhuni ninasuk warek dek ninobabut weak hagakhorek meke, at Allah nen arat thagalogo degetdisikhe iti nen, nit weak hagakhorek meke hotninabuagaluk yabokane Allah hasik ninako kambing sapi warogo 'bisausak motok dek o.
58010019	Nagarlak lak nerugi. At Yesus amep ulabogo watlageikhe iti baga, nit o kakok palekma Allah ekaerek aila etoma ninayuk dekhogonat ukuok o.
58010020	Nit itithogon ukusak iti, o kakok palek su laberek hurli warek iti, at Yesus ebeatma, nit akhuni ninilugutninabiginmo ukuagaluk, holak at Yesus ebe watlageikhe iti baga, holak ket meke nit ninobasik ya'inanhikhe.
58010021	Ya'inanhikhesik, at ebe Allah aila etomaat iteerek nit ninobasik kok welagarek o.
58010022	At ebe etoma werekma, nit ninakla nen, “Nit weak hagakho, ” iluk ninakla wene munini ebekhorek meke hano hotninakhik, ninoado baga i elokhoken hano meke baga thobalninakhik, hagakhikhe iti nen, ninetaiken opakiat at oba hakotdiluk ninayuk dekhogon, at oba horokhogon ukekhe dogouok o.
58010023	At obabut he, “Wokhisagein, ” iluk abok yoknisekherethek, ebe woknisekherek iti, nit nen, “Eberogonat hutukhogon woknisagein, ” iluk akhuni inil oba ninane pakhogon ogorek meke iti isi motok dogolik, a'bethogon hago dogouok o.
58010024	Itithogon hago dogolik, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogolik, yomak-yomak hagakhedogouogoluk, ninetaiken ago wat-wat hagakhe dogouok o.
58010025	Nit ninoe iki dogoluk degat wisigin iluk ninilu iti nen, it aperek nit natogokhunem huk ageikharek iti hak, nit huk ageidek, oba eberek-eberek nit-nit ninetaiken ago warogo ninasuk wat-wat hagakhe dogouok o.
58010026	Ebe wene Allah ane yoknisasukha meke ninilu dogoligat, nineram nenat, wene iti thagalogo here’isalok weak motogat hagakhe dogogun halok he, nit yabokane ninako kambing sapi Allah warisumo hotninabigin motok degat o.
58010027	Allah akla aga dageiluk o ilugun oba wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin iti baga, at athili meke inebe hetu aik oba inakhe dogolik, nit at ane here’isalok weak hagakhe dogogun halok, ninomat ninasinogo iluk, nit nen hutdiluk ninayukhogonat dogouok o.
58010028	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhemo, at Musa nen yoknisasikhe wene iti, it akhuni nen hologo mothogon hagakhidek thagalogo here'isekho halok, akhuni inebe pere a, henagan a, “Nit ninil oba it nen eberogonat wene iti thagalogo here’isalok hagakha o, ” iluk pakhogon isi halok, inakmurinakhidek inebe motogat inakhe lagoukha apigi.
58010029	Iti hak, it akhuni nen Allah a'but mekeat he, inisok nen thagalogo here'isigik, Allah nen nit ninom hunisuogoluk Kristus watlageikhe iti baga, amep oba hano horinakhikhe mekeat he, yabokane inakla meanetdisigik, Allah obabut hano meke Agoreke etnogo inane sagun yogokhik, hagakho halok he, wene motok akin meke inoba 'biluk weagarinabigin o.
58010030	“Ukum an nen wogeisigik, oko an nen 'bigik, hagasigin o, ”\rq (Ulangan 32:35)\rq* iluk isikhe iti, tha nen isikhe nogo. Allah nenat isikhe ninilu. Nen, wene ageikhe men isikhe, “An inopase noba dopok nen na'buri wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin o, ”\rq (Ulangan 32:36)\rq* iluk isikheat.
58010031	Wene itithogon inoba 'bigin iti, nit weak hagakhunem ninebe Allah iluk motok welagarek meke ikimo 'binanhe halok, ninayuk motok asigin iti o.
58010032	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit alep Allah nen hinebe liatdinageikhemo werekma yi aik ti aik wiik-weakhogon hagathinakho korlek, hinaik hundiluk hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk hinobatnerogon welagagip iti hinakla ebetni o.
58010033	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hit aperek akhuni doalekma hinetaga wiik-weakhogon weak hagathinakhunem, hit aperek nen, “Nit ninomat weagatninabuak, ” iluk inoba ukisinem hinomat weak hagathinakhik,
58010034	it aperek herle warogo kola'isugunem hinakmurinakhik, hagakhe lagagip iti o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik hinakla nen, “Nit meke hano motok dogogin meke werek o, ” iluk apekhe dogolik, hit meke yi meke ti meke horlugunem hinakla weak ageidek hinakla arleken akhekhe lagagip iti.
58010035	Halok he, alep weak hagathinakho korlek hinakla pugat welagagip meke iti kobokhogon thogotdigidek, yogotak ya itithogonat dogogun halok, oko kok meke wokhisagein iti nen, hinobatnerogon hago dogono o.
58010036	Hit nen Allah akla warlok apekherek meke hagakhunem, at nen, “Hit wokhisagein, ” iluk abok yokhisasikhe meke iti waganubageik nen, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk hagakhe dogosak o.
58010037	Allah ane baga yigithogon holal waganek werek, “At wisigin meke iti il opaki dogoluk nen wisigin. Erapigat dogoluk nen wisigin dek o. Ibat-ibaratwisigin o.
58010038	At wisigin iti, aban wageidek werek korlek, it an na'buri wene inoba korogo an ninom hunogo 'bisigi meke inebe tomok, inetaiken noba hakotdiluk dogogun oba iniluk dogogun. Meke re, akhuni aperek inapuke dukhugun meke inebe tomok, it an noba hotokthek dek. Na’irat o, ”\rq (Habakuk 2:3-4)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha.
58010039	Itithogonat meke re, nit he, it akhuni aperek alomatlasuogoluk inapuke dukhugun meke iti hakene welago ’buk. Dek o. Nit he, ninebe tilninabuagaluk ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welago meke welago o.
58011001	Inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikharek iti ebe yigithogon. “Hano asigin, ” iluk eberogonat apigik, “Yi meke ti meke ninileken nen higidek mekeat he, eberogonat weregat o, ” iluk hutdigik, hagakharek itiat o.
58011002	It akhuni alebageik inetaiken Allah oba itithogonat hakotdiluk welagoukha iti baga, Allah nen, “It hano, ” iluk inebe oba hotokthek welageikhe.
58011003	Allah ane baga nen pogot agat yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat ninileken hekhe lago yoma re, nit nen, “Ninileken hogorek dek meke baga walhasikhemo werek, ” iluk, ninetaiken at oba hakotdiluk hutdusak o.
58011004	At ap etaga Kain nen, motok erlok dek meke Allah wogokhikhe mekeat he, at Habel iti anek he, etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk hano meke Allah wogokhikhemo, at Allah nen, “Habel anek, obabut mot hano higi, ” iluk isikhe. Itithogon isikhesikmo nen, at Habel ebe watlageikhe mekeat he, etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik hagakhikhe iti baga, at nen, “An itithogon hagakhi, ” iluk yoknisekho negen motok werek o.
58011005	At ap Henokh etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikhe iti baga, ebe watlageidek. Allah nen ilugat waganhikhemo, itakhuni aperek nen ebe herakhukha mekeat he, at ebe inileken higidek. At ebe Allah nen aban waganhidek werek korlek, “At Henokh Allah akla hanorogon anek hagakhe lageikhe, ” iluk Allah ane baga holal waganek werek o.
58011006	Akhuni inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek halok he, at akla hanorogo hagasusak motok erlok dek o. Nen, at oba wisuogoluk halok, it nen, “Allah eberogonat werek, ” iluk apigik, “At ebe inilu asuogoluk hagasugun halok, at nen oko ebe meke wogeisekheregat, ” iluk apigik, hagasusak iti.
58011007	At ap Nuh meneke, etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, yi wene ti wene yabokane hagatlasigin meke Allah nen husupi yogokhikhemo ebe ileken higidek mekeat he, “Eberogonat hagatlasigin meke yoknekhe higi, ” iluk Allah ane holek dogolik, ku ageikhe at a’buri inom tilinabusak meke halhikhe. Itithogon halhikhemo, Allah nen akhuni ukum inoba ’biluk inebe inakhikhe mekeat he, at Nuh arligat anek he, etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhe iti baga, Allah nen, “At hano, ” iluk tilhikhe.
58011008	Ap Abraham meneke, Allah nen ayoko ’biluk, “Hat o ageikhe ite dogonogoluk wokhisik nen, lano, ” iluk abok yogokhikhemo, at nen he, “Wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk o koma ligin heat okodek dogoligat wageikhe.
58011009	-
58011010	Wageikhesik, o abok yogokhikhe meke iti arat wageikhesik dogolik, “O yi dek o. O ninat ageikhe Allah nen walegeke walhalok o herlaga obatneak meke baga halhikhe meke ageikhe werek o, ” iluk therogo motok dogolik, o su ai meke ya halogo noge igik, ta halogo noge igik, ap huso negen nekhe lageikhe. Iti hagat, ap Ishak inom, Yakub inom, inakla nen he, “Allah nen, Itithogon wokhisagein, iluk abok isikhe iti, nit ninomat yoknisasikhemo ite asugun, ” iluk itithogonat nekhe lagoukha.
58011011	Nen, at Abraham ebe yaman ageikhesik age Sara ebe abirli welageikhe mekeat he, at Abraham akla nen he, “Allah nen abok yoknisasikhe etnogo eberogonat woknisageinat o, iluk etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikhe iti baga, a'but Sara eak akla itasusak erlok ageikhemo itakhasikhe.
58011012	Itithogon itakhasikhe iti nen, agun Abraham ebe yaman ageikhesik watlasusak negen welageikhe mekeat he, at ebe opakiat meke nen itago meke inebe husagal pogot oba doalegat welagarek iti hak inom, lelaga i laut yekelek yipitla welagarek iti hakene inom, doalegat iniki wenesusak motok erlok dek wialagoukha iti.
58011013	It akhuni inetaga ilik waga lagei iti tha’bokhogonat nen, “At Allah eberogonat, ” iluk inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welagoukha iti baga, Allah nen abok yogeisasikhe iti ebe waganhidek meke re, akhuni nen yi meke ti meke walegat werekma inileken lakhalok, inakla arleken akhegarek iti hak, it inetaiken oba nen, “Eberogonat waganugun meke werek o, iluk apekhe lago iti nen, o agat oba yoma it aperek inaila olirok lalok ap huso negen welageikharek hak welago, ” iluk pakhogon ekhe dogolik inebe watlarik lagoukha.
58011014	It itithogon ekhe lagoukha iti baga, nit ninakla nen he, “It inai ebe hano meke herakhe lagoukha, ” iluk ekagat hekhe lago iti.
58011015	It inai alep welagoukhama here’isalok dukhisukhama etoma hasik oba ebekhe dogolepma, inapuke erlok wetlep iti nen, o it welagoukhama iti hasik oba ebekhe lagoukha dek o.
58011016	It ebekhe lagoukha iti, inai ebe hano motok pogot oba meke hasik warlok apekhe lagoukha iti nen, Allah nen it inobasik inai arat karelogo ’bisasikhemo nogo nen he, at nen, “An it inopase, ” iluk ekarli degat ekherek iti o.
58011017	-
58011019	Alebageik Allah nen Abraham yogokhe dogolik, “Hat nen itago meke wialasugun iluk yokhikhigi etnogo ebe, ha'but Ishak yi nen itago meke nen wialasugun meke hasik yokhikhigi o, ”\rq (Kejadian 21:12)\rq* iluk yogokhikhe mekeat he, yabokane obabut paligiluk, “Ha'but ebe yi an nobasik watnom, ” iluk yogokhikhe. “Watnom, ” iluk yogokhikhemo, at Abraham etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikhe iti baga, “Ishak watlasumo Allah nen yabokane erlogat ilugutdigin, ” iluk ebe warogo Allah wogeisigiluk hagakhikhe iti nen, inane dagakhogon, Ishak warek meke iluk agama Abraham waganhe iluk usagat o.
58011020	Nen, at Ishak iti etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikhe iti baga, a'buri Yakub inom, Esau inom, yogeisekhe dogolik, akhuni nen it aperek inakla arleken inoba 'begarek iti hak, “Yabokane Allah nen hanotdinageikhe dogoak o, ” iluk yogeisasikhe.
58011021	At Yakub etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikhe iti baga, ebe watlasigiluk hagakhe dogolik, ebe athegerluk ilugun oba hipitdiluk Allah heagei wakhe dogolik, akhuni nen it aperek inakla arleken inoba 'begarek iti hak, ap inebe pere Yusuf a'buri emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, “Allah nen hanotdinageikhe dogoak o, ” iluk. yogeisasikheat.
58011022	At Yusuf meneke, etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welageikhe iti baga, ebe horogat watlasigiluk hagakhe dogolik, a'buri Israel meke o Mesir nen dukhugun meke hasik yogeisigik, nen, “An noak lolek yigithogon hagatno, ” iluk yogeisigik, hagakhikhe.
58011023	At Musa meneke, agosa opase inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagoukha iti baga, Musa ebe itakhukhasik 'bikhasukha meke, elege ebe hano motok nen, at ap kok etoma meke nen wene ulakhikhe meke inayuk degat elege itago iti lima'iluk werek korlek, thut henagan holelhikhe.
58011024	Nen, at Musa iti ebe arat kok ageikhesik nen, etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, men apasikhe, “An ap kok Firaun a'but eak hakene dogosak motok na'it o.
58011025	An nebe hano dogolik, elanma hasik mekeat he, akilukhogon weak hagakhe dogosak iti na'it. It Allah a'buri ninom yi aik ti aik hagatninakhe dogosak hano o, ” iluk akla apasikhesik,
58011026	“Yabokane Allah nen oko woknisigin meke werek o, ” iluk apasikhesik nen, “Yi meke ti meke hano meke akhuni o Mesir inikimo meke yi kok dek o, ” iluk, here’isalok nen, “Kristus hasik ninebe wiik-weakhogon hagatninakhe dogosak itiat kok o, ” iluk apasikhe.
58011027	Itithogon apasikhesik nen dukhisikhesik, etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, “Ap kok Firaun akla aga dagousak iti nayuk o, ” iluk akla apigidegat, Allah ebe ninileken hogorek dek meke iti ileken hekhe dogolik negen, “Netaiken at oba hakotdigirikmo iti, dukhiginat o, ” iluk o Mesir here’isalok dukhi ageikhe iti.
58011028	Dukhi ageikhesik nen, etaiken itithogonat Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik, at malaikat ageikhe akhuni inebe inakherek meke nen, akhuni o Mesir meke ina'buri makusa itago meke inakhe dogolik, akhuni Israel meke inasinogo iluk, domba warogo etaga Paskah neke dogolik, amep holagapemake tomok warik loagaluk yogeisasikhe.
58011029	Akhuni Israel meke inetaiken itithogonat Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik, akhuni agat werlelekmake lageikharek iti hak, i yekelek etaga Merah iti hialekmake itali agoukha iti. Itithogon itali agoukhama, it akhuni Mesir meke nen, “Nit itithogonat italuogat o, ” iluk isukhasik itali agunem, i nen thebelinakhikhe iti.
58011030	It akhuni Israel meke inetaiken Allah oba itithogon hakotdiluk dogolik, o Yeriko ukul iniki 6 hari oba nen walinethekhe lagoukhasik, iniki ageikhe nen walinethasinem, leget ’bakleget halek meke misak dapuk isikhe.
58011031	Itithogon hagatlagunem, at he Rahab yugunisake hagakhe lageikhe meke iti meneke, etaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, it ap Israel meke wim il waganhe wagoukha meke emenogo inebe hano woginakhikhe iti nen he, it akhuni aperek Allah ane waganusak ina'it meke inebe motok inakhe dogolik, at he iti anek he, wakhidek thogotdisukha iti.
58011032	An nen ap Gideon meneke, Barak meneke, Simson meneke, Yefta meneke, Daud meneke, Samuel meneke, it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke inom, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik hagakhe lagoukha meke pilinerogo yokhisausak mekeat he, o erlok dek agasikmo, erlok dek o.
58011033	It iti tha'bokhogonat inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagoukha iti baga, it o ninat meke inom wim yakhe dogolik, inougi koktek inetagapogot meke inobatne degetdisalok inai thebelhe lagoukha. Inobabut mothogon hagakhe lagoukhama, Allah nen, “Hit yabokane hano meke wokhisagein, ” iluk abok yogeisasikhe meke iti, ebe waganhe lagoukhaat. Yeke helo hakene singa obabut weak meke iti ape thebelhik,
58011034	hetu amulok inayuk hakene meke nagulogo 'bigik, karok oba inasusak meke inekaerek nen inebe tiligik, inobatne dek mekeat, inobatne ageik, wim yakhe dogolik inobatne atluk, thilimeke inebe doalegat mugisigik,
58011035	it humi aperek ineagei warek meke yabokane inilugurinakhunem woginakhik, hagarik aga lagoukha. Itithogon hagarik laga korlek, it aperek, “Ninebe yabokane hano dogogun meke Allah nen ninilugutninabigin meke werek o, ” iluk akhuni aperek neninebe wiik-weakhogon hagarinakhe korlek, inoado inirlirli horligidek welagoukhaat.
58011036	Nen, ageikhe, akhuni inane sagun yogeisigik, tugi inakhik, iniki herle warogo kola'isigik,
58011037	helekit oba tamukhogon motok pikeat inakhik, gergaji baga inobakha 'bogokhigik, karok oba inakhik, yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik, inasu re, domba inom, kambing inom, oado nokorlogo ikhik, yi meke ti meke dek nen inerlageik welageik, it akhuni aperek nen wiik-weakhogon hagarinakhik, hagakhe lagoukha.
58011038	It iti tha'bokhogonat inobabut hano itithogon hagakhe lagoukha iti nen, akhuni inom agat oba yoma dogosak erlok dek o. It iti inai halek dekma, lo o limo akhuni dekma inom, tom obake inom, nekhe dogolik, oilake inom, agat elo herlelekmake inom, welagoukha.
58011039	-
58011040	Allah nen, “Hanothinabigin, ” iluk abok yoknisasikhe meke iti, it inebe tha'bokhogonat iti ebe waganhidek mekeat he, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogolik hano hagarik laga lagoukha iti nen, at Allah nen, “It hano, ” iluk inebe oba hotok isikhe. Itithogon ebe waganhidek iti, Allah nen haganeat nit ninobasik hano meke wenago 'binanhe dogolik, nit dek werek korlek it inarligat, hano 'bogokhogon hagarinakhidek. Nit ninobasik, “It inom opaki hasik 'bogokhogon hagarinabigin, ” iluk abok isikhemo nogo nen, it nen ebe waganhidek welagoukha iti.
58012001	It akhuni alebageik hagarik wagoukha meke inabok ilik wago iti, inebe doalegat ninaliluke dagakhogon inileken laknisik werek iti nen he, tha ae 'busuk tha ae 'busuk luogoluk yi meke ti meke inoba akin meke nokorlogo here'isalok lageikharek iti hak, nit ninoba akin weak irluk-marlukhogon welagarek meke iti inom, ninobabut weakhagakhorek meke ninoba dekelek motok welagarek meke iti inom, tha'bokhogonat nokorlogo here'isalok, Allah nen, “Hurli iti hurli lano, ” iluk yoknisasikhe iti, ninakla nen, “Ninelokhoma piokhogon hurli iti bagaat luok, ” iluk, ninobatnerogon laga dogouok o.
58012002	Itithogon laga dogolik, ebekeram ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotduagaluk, at nenat ninakla kagalhik, hurli ilugun oba hano 'bogokhogon motok asi loagaluk, at nenat thetnisik welageik, hagakherek iti nen, arat nit ninileken nen wolok mutluk laga dogouok o. At akla nen he, “Inebe o baga meldisalok inekarli warogo inakharek iti hak, an itithogon watlasu nekarli, ” iluk apigidek dogolik, “An yabokane nakla arleken akhagein, ” iluk at ebe wakhe korlek obakhanini hapugutdiluk welageikhesik nen, yabokane iluk ageikhesik yogotak Allah kok welagarekma etoma alilu iki ebeke kogat werek o.
58012003	Hit hinakla puk atluk hinobatne dek asunogo iluk, it akhuni weak hagakharek meke nen at Yesus inakla nen meanetdiluk, ebe weagatdisi korlek kamotdisalok obakhanini hapugutdiluk welageikhe iti, hit nen, “At nikithogon hagakhikhe nogo, ” iluk hinakla nen hutdekhe dogono o.
58012004	Hit anek he, weak hagasu hina'it nen, wim inobatnerogon yakharek iti hak hagakhunem, aban hinamep ulabogo hinakhidek meke welagap o.
58012005	-
58012006	Inopase lak nen ina'buri yekerugi inasuk wakharek iti hak, hit Allah a'buri meke, at nen hinasuk wakherek meke itiobarlikmatdegesip oba welagap a? At nen ekhe dogolik, “Akhuni an netaiken hunik meke inebe tomokinasuk wakhik, it an na'buri meke iluk, pakhogon egerek meke inebe tomok tugi inakhik, an nen hagakherek iti nen, na'but o. Hat nen, Nopase nen nasuk wakhe, iluk hakla nen, An na'it, iluk here'isugun o. An nen, Weak hagakhen, iluk yokhekhe halok, hakla puk ageidek dogono, ”\rq (Amsal 3:11-12; Ayub 5:17)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha.
58012007	It yekerugi inopase lak nen inasuk wakhidek aperek welageikharek nogo? Inasuk wakharek anek iti nen, Allah nen hinasuk wakhunem, hit nen, “Nit at a’buri welago iti nen ninasuk wakhe, ” iluk hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogono o.
58012008	Yekerugi inebe tha’bokhogonat inasuk wakharek anek iti hak, hit aperek hinasuk wakhidek halok he, hit at a’buri ebeat meke ’buk o. We, yugunat nen itago meke o.
58012009	Nen, nit ninopase lak ninebe itakninakhukha meke nen ninasuk wakhunem, inane hologo inalon halogo hagakhorek iti hak, niniluk dogoagaluk ninopase nen ninobabut ket itakninabiogo meke ane hologo hagasusak dek nogo? At ane holek dogosagat o.
58012010	It nen he, “Hano hagasusak meke yi higi, ” iluk elanma hasik we herlekha’bugat inasuk wakharek mekeat he, ninopase Allah anek he, at weak hagakhidek karelek welagarek iti hak, nit ninom itithogonat karelek dogoagaluk ninasuk wakherek.
58012011	Ninasuk wakhe korlek etaat ninakla hano agarek dek. Ninakla weak agarek mekeat he, yabokane ninasuk wakharek iti baga, ninasuk warek welagorek meke, yi meke ti meke eken ikherek iti hak, ninobabut hano enago dogolik mothogon anek hagakhe dogogun iti.
58012012	Iti nen he, hiniki obatne dek meke obatnetdigik, hinitibagal dik-dik iliogo meke hapugutdigik, hagatno o.
58012013	Itithogon hanotdiluk, hinisok abel mirlalek meke yabokane weak ageidek hano asuagaluk, holak mot enago hano yagoma laga dogono o.\rq (Amsal 4:26; Yesaya 35:3)\rq*
58012014	Hit hinebe karelogo Allah meke ’bisigidek dogogun halok he, at ebe hinileken hugun motok dek iti nen, akhuni tha'bokhogonat hinom hano dapulik dogolik, hinebe at hasik ’bisalok weak hagakhidek hano karelek motok dogouogoluk hinobatnerogon hagakhe dogono o.
58012015	Akhuni hit meke aperek Allah obabut hano nen woknisekherek meke iti here’isalok dukhisinem, arle-arleka dabulatluk nen, hano meke arletdekherek hak, ap iti nen akhuni tha’bokhogonat weagarinabinogo iluk hinileken hanorogon dogono o.
58012016	At Esau hipiri abu nen, men isikhe, “Makusa itago an atma, an ite asigin meke iti kok he, dek. Nagot ite asuak, ” iluk hipiri piring opakiat temerek meke hasik, at agot oba oko waganhikhe iti hak, hit aperek param hagakhik, wene ebeat meke kogotdigidek hinakla puk ageik, hagakhe dogogup o.
58012017	At Esau hagakhikhe iti, hit hinilu o. At akla nen, “Nopase nen yoknekhe dogolik, Allah nen hanothakhe dogoak o, iluk yoknesuak, ” iluk yabokane yogosuagaluk de aga dogolik kino yogokhikhe mekeat he, agot arat yogokhikhesikmo nogo nen, yabokane apuke waganusak erlok dek ageikhe iti.
58012018	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Alebat it akhuni Israel meke torn Sinai iniki erlok hakhausak meke baga wagoukha iti hak, hit torn iti hakene meke baga wageidek. Tom Sinai iti baga ebe yigithogon hagakhunem wagoukha. Hetu amulok dageigik, o thebe iluk hi ageik, hisakne obatnerogon hubetha ageik,
58012019	-
58012020	ane pikon ane hakene kokhogon igik, isinem Allah ane kokhogon ekhe dogolik, wene yigithogon isikhe, “Akhuni inom, domba sapi inom, torn yi iniki hakha ago halok he, inebe helekit oba pike motok inatno o, ”\rq (Keluaran 19:12-13)\rq* iluk inasuk wakhunem holhukhasik, inasuk holek dogosak motok erlok dek ageikhemo, it nen, “At ane iti yabokane ageikhe inom yoknisausak dek o, ” iluk inane obatnerogon kino isukha.
58012021	Motok inayuk meke inileken hasukhasik inane obatnerogon itithogon kino isukhama, at Musa nen, men yogeisasikhe, “An meneke, nayuk nen noageleke dik-dik hagakhe lagei o, ”\rq (Ulangan 9:19)\rq* iluk yogeisasikhe.
58012022	It iti hakene meke baga wagoukha mekeat, hit anek he, tom Sion Allah iluk welagarek meke ai o kota Yerusalem pogot oba meke baga wagap iti. Etoma malaikat motok doalegat inom
58012023	Allah a'buri makusa meke inetagapogot oba holal waganek werek meke natogorlek inakla arleken akhekho werekma inom, it akhuni hano hagakhe lagoukhama Allah nen ’bogokhogon hanorinakhikhe meke inagoreke inom, Allah ebe, akhuni tha’bokhogonat wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakherek meke etnogo inom, inom werekma oba wagap o.
58012024	Yogotak Allah nen nit ninom hunisuogoluk wene ket meke warogo wokninakhikhesik, Yesus ebe woknisasikhemo turlem heisogo werek iti inom werekma wagap o. Iti at Habel oe nen wakhikhemo amep wene weak meke hagatlageikhe meke iti oba wagap ’buk. Yesus ebe wakhukhama amep oba hisathigik warogo hano wene hagatlageikhe meke oba wagap o.
58012025	It akhuni Allah ane agat oba yogeisugunem inasuk holusak ina’it welagoukha meke, inebe iniluk here’isigidek inakhe lageikhe iti. Halok he, nit yigithogon, wene pogot oba nen yoknisugunem ninasuk holusak nina’it dogogun halok he, ninakhidek here’inanigin apegep a? Dek o. Motok ninasigin iti nen, at ane isi korlek hinasuk holhidek, “Nina’it, ” iluk here’isaunogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
58012026	Itinem, at Allah ane isikhe iti baga agat aborlogothasikhe mekeat he, yogotak, at nen, “An yabokane itithogon hagasigin, ” iluk abok isikhe mekeyigithogon holal waganek werek, “An yabokane opaki hasigat agat yi anekaborlogothagein 'buk. Dek o. Pogot inomat aborlogothagein o, ”\rq (Hagai 2:6-7)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganek werek.
58012027	Itithogon“Opaki hasigat aborlogothagein, ” iluk isikhe iti, aborlok usak dek a’bet meke dogoagaluk thogotdiluk, pogot agat at nen winametdisikhe meke tha’bokhogonat aborlogothagein iluk isikhe iti.
58012028	-
58012029	Itithogon aborlogothagein mekeat he, nit anek he, Allah apma ’binanherekma aborlok igin motok dek meke woknisasikhemo ite agosik welago iti nen, “Allah nopase, ” iluk heagei wakhe dogouok o. Nen, at Allah ebe, yi meke ti meke hetu nen nekerek iti hagatma, nit itithogon weagatninabinogo iluk, at ebe ninayukhogon hagakhik, alon halogo hagakhik, hagakhe dogolik, at ane hologo akla warlok meke hagakhe dogolik, hogorakhe dogouok o.
58013001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah a’buri hinebe opakiat meke negen nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhethep meke iti, itithogon hinom hunigat hagakhe dogono o.
58013002	It akhuni aperek nen, malaikat meke inebe ap huso thalek inobakha palek woginakhukhasik inarini isakhukha iti nen, ap huso hinoba wago halok, hinobakhanini here’isigidek woginakhe dogono o.
58013003	It aperek herle warek werekma, hinakla nen, “Nit meneke, ninomat herle warek hakene welago, ” iluk it inoba ebekhik, it aperek yi weak ti weak hagarinakhunem, hit hinakla nen, “Nit meneke, agat oba yoma aban werekma itithogonat hagatninabusagat o, ” iluk, it inoba ebekhik, hagakhe dogono o.
58013004	Ap dek, humi dek, inobabut yugunat hagarinabik lageikharek meke inom, ap inagugi meke param hagakharek meke inom, it yabokane Allah nen wene inoba 'biluk weagarinabigin iti nen, ap nen humi iginakharek iti, akhuni tha’bokhogonat nen kogotdiluk, yugunat hageinakhidek humi ap waganek meke dopok inom hano noge ekhe dogosak o.
58013005	Allah nen ninebe tomok hasigat ekhe dogolik, “An nen hat niki hetokhogon here’agagik, hebe hasokneat ’bageigik, hagasigin dek o, ”\rq (Ulangan 31:6,8; Yosua 1:5)\rq* iluk isikhe iti nen, hit uang hinetaiken hundiluk dogogup o. Herlekha’bugat werek iti, hit hinakla nen, “Yi erlok werek, ” iluk apausak o.
58013006	Itithogon apekhe dogolik, hinakla nen, Allah nen, “Niki hetokhogon here’agagin dek o, ” isikhe iti nen, ninetaiken hapukhogon dogolik men ekhe dogosak, “Nopase Etagapogot, an yomaknekherek meke. Halok he, akhuni nen an nikithogonhagatnabusak. An nayuk dek o, ”\rq (Mazmur 118:6)\rq* iluk ekhe dogosak iti.
58013007	Hinougi alebat thethisik welagoukha meke nen, Allah ane yokhisasukha meke iti, inoba eberek dogono o. It inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, inebe iniluk dogolik inom, watlasuogoluk inom, hagakhe lagoukha meke hutdiluk, hit it inobabut waganogo hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk dogono o.
58013008	At Yesus Kristus ebe o haganeat nen, yogotak ya nen, ikhok motok welagarek iti hak, yabokane itithogonat ikhok motok dogogin o.
58013009	Itithogonat dogogin iti nen, it akhuni aperek nen yi wene ti wene ninat meke baga nukhetdinageinogo. Nen, it akhuni alebat nekarek meke hasik kogotdiluk hagakhe lagoukha iti baga hano ageidekma, ninetaiken iti baga horle asusak erlok dek o. Allah obabut hano nen woknisekherek iti baga ninetaiken hano horle asusak o.
58013010	Allah ai su ai meke halekma it ap Allah iteerek Yahudi meke nen kambing sapi Allah hasik warogo helekit halek oba 'bekhe lagoukha iti hak, nit nen Allah hasik 'bisekhe lago meke iti, it ap iti nen nasusak erlok dek o.
58013011	O etoma it ap Allah iteerek inoe kok nen it tha'bokhogonat weak hagakhe lagoukha meke Allah nen thagalogo degetduagaluk, kambing sapi warogo amep wolok o kakok palek Allah ekaerek aila hakene iti ukisi lageikhe mekeat he, kambing sapi ebe anek he, leget itikmanke hetu huni dukhekhe lagoukha.
58013012	Itithogon hagakhe lagoukha iti nen, at Yesus ekaerek amep oba a'buri weak hagakharek meke horogo, inebe Allah hasik 'bisagaluk leget 'bakleget ape palek abel itikmanke watlageikhe iti.
58013013	-
58013014	Itithogon watlageikhe iti nen, nit agat oba yoma motok dogosak dek. Nit yabokane o motok dogogun meke herakhe lago iti nen he, at Yesus akhuni nen inane aik dagok paik dagok dalhe lagoukha hak, nit itithogonat yoknisekho korlek, at oba leget abel itikmanke dukhisi dogouok o.
58013015	Iti nen he, at Yesus ninom hunik dogolik, nit nen, “Allah nopase, ” iluk kambing sapi warogo at hasik wogokhe dogou hak, hibiku-yogoku ninape baga nen Allah etaga kokhogon hogorakho motok dogouok o.
58013016	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, akhuni aperek hano hagarinakhik, yomageisigik, hagakhe dogouok. Itithogon hagakhe dogosak iti, Allah akla hanorogo kambing sapi warekhe dogou hagatma, obarlikmatdusak motok dek o.
58013017	Hit hinougi inakla nen, “Yabokane Allah nen, It inebe hasik nikithogon hagakhe lagasip, iluk yoknisugunem, nit nen ninoba dopogat oko yogosugun higi, ” iluk, hanorogo thethisik motok welageikharek iti nen, it inapma thoma iluk inane hologo hagakhe dogono o. Itithogonhagakhe dogogun halok he, it inakla arleken, hit hinobasik hagakhe dogogun iti. Meke re, hit nen it inane hologo dogogun dek halok he, it inakla weak dogolik, hit hinobasik alomarogoat hagakhe dogosak o.
58013018	Nit yi meke ti meke hasik hano anek hagakhe dogouogoluk, apekhe dogolik, ninakla nen, “Nit wene ninoba dek. Ninakla thelek, ” iluk apekhe lago iti nen, nit ninobasik sembayan ekhe dogono o.
58013019	Ekhe dogolik, ebe kok he, an nebe Allah nen ibat-ibat hit hinoba napuke la'ani isuagaluk sembayan ekhe dogobageik nen iluk kino yokhisigi iti o.
58013020	Ninopase Allah dapulogo ’binanherek meke etnogo nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus watlageikhesikmo nen ebe ilugutdisikhe. At ebe amep ulabogo wakhukha iti baga, Allah nen nit ninom hunisuogoluk wene motok dogogin meke warogo wokninakhikhesik, nit tha’bokhogonat Yesus nen ako domba negen thetnisik dogoagaluk ebe kogat meldisikhe iti.
58013021	Hit Allah akla warlok apekherek meke anek hano hagasubageik nen, yi meke ti meke hano meke tha’bokhogonat wokhisoak. Itithogon wokhisugunem, nit ninom tha’bokhogonat nen Allah akla hanorogo hagakhe dogoagaluk, ninobabut at nen woknisagein iti, ebe, Yesus Kristus nen woknisoak o. At Kristus itiat hogorakho motok dogouok o. Ebeat asuak u hak, “Amin, ” igi iti.
58013022	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene hemurlugat hinasuk warogo holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei iti, hina’it ageidek hinasuk hologo dogono o.
58013023	Nen, ninagot Timotius etnogo, ebe arat herle hisalogo ula’egama nen hinilurogo dogobageik iluk yokhisigi o. At ebe ibat-ibat an noba waga halok he, anyabokane hit hinoba 'bithisa aga dogolik nipisak wisugun o.
58013024	Hit nen, it ap hinougi hit thethisik welageikharek meke inom, Allah a'buri inom, inebe tha'bokhogonat, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk yogeisano o. Nen, ninagarlak lak ninerugi o Italia welageikharek meke nen heagei wathinakhaat o.
58013025	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah obabut hano etnogo nen hit tha'bokhogonat thethisik dogoak o.
59001001	An Yakobus ninopase Allah ninoe Etagapogot YesusKristus ipisak inatuaneke etnogo nen, wene yi hit hinukuloak etaga 12 oba nen yi ai ti ai thirlik-pirlikhogon lalok welagathep meke tha'bokhogonat hinoba la’i agei. Nagarlak lak nerugi. Inetaiken horlerogon dogoagaluk yogeisasikhe wene
59001002	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Yi akin ti akin hinoba agunem hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o.
59001003	Itithogonat hinoba agunem, Allah nen he, “Inetaiken an noba hakotdiluk werek a? Dek a, ” iluk, hinobabut paliogo iti baga hinetaiken thebekhogon hinobakhanini hapukhogon dogosak meke hagathinabiogo iti hinilu o.
59001004	Hinetaiken aban negen ageikhe welageidek tha’bokhogonat erlogat horle asuagaluk hinakla puk ageidek hinetaiken hapukhogon dogono o.
59001005	Meke re, at Allah obabut hano nen akhuni tha’bokhogonat akmu dogolik wenageisigidek wogeisekherek iti nen, hit aperek hinakla kagalek dek halok, at kino yogosumo hinakla kagaliginat o.
59001006	Akhuni aperek nen he, “Allah nen woknisigin a? Dek a, ” iluk, wene munini ebekhe dogolik kino yogokharek meke iti, hisakne nen ihoklabu thabulik-pabulikhogon hagakherek iti hak yogokharek iti nen, hit itithogon kino yogosugun halok he, “Woknisigin a? Dek a, ” iluk, wene munini ebekhidek hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk nen kino yogokhe dogono o.
59001007	-
59001008	Akhuni itithogon kino yogokharek meke iti, inetaiken pere dogolik yi meke ti meke hagasuogoluk, “An itithogon hagasigin, ” iluk dopokhogon usak erlok dek iti nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot nen ageikhe woknisiginat, ” iluk apausak erlok dek o.
59001009	Hit Allah a’buri hinameke dek meke aperek inapma dogolik, “An Allah nen kogotdanhemo welagei o, ” iluk hinakla arleken akhausak o.
59001010	-
59001011	Meke re, mo aninirogon yakhe dogolik, o eka tha’bet ageik, eken lologo usalok elokhoken weak ageik, hagatlagarek hak, itithogonat, it koktek inameke doalegat meke iti, yi meke ti meke aban hagakho werekma inebe dek asugun meke werek iti nen he, hit aperek hinameke doalegat hinebe kogat dogolik, o eken lologo usekherek iti hak, “An nameke doalegat yi dek asiginat o. Allah nen netaga thebelogo ’banhemo welagei, ” iluk, hinakla arleken akhausagat o.
59001012	Hit aperek yi akin ti akin hinoba aga korlek, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogun halok, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o. Itithogon hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogun halok, Allah nen he, “An nebe hinakmu meke hiniluk motok dogogun meke wokhisagein o, ” iluk, abok yoknisasikhe etnogo hit hinobabut palogo nenat wokhisagein o.
59001013	At Allah weak hagasuagaluk akhuni nen akla kagalharek dek. Nen, at nen meneke, akhuni aperek weak hagasuagaluk inakla kagalherek degat iti nen he, hit aperek hinakla nen, “An weak hagasuagaluk Allah nenat nakla kagaliogo, ” iluk apausak erlok dek o.
59001014	Itithogon mekeat he, ninebe tomok ninekaerek ninakla nen, yi meke ti meke warlok weak apogorek iti nenat ninebe wokninakhik, litnisigik, hagakhe dogolik, ninakla kagalherek iti o.
59001015	Yabokane ninakla nen yi meke ti meke warlok weak apogorek meke iti, humi nen ineagei itaginakharek hak, ninakla aga halok, eak itago weak hagakhorek iti. Nen, weak hagakhorek meke iti horle aga halok he, eak itago ninebe watlagorek iti.
59001016	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu o. Hinekaerek nen nukhetdakhaunogo iluk yokhisigi iti o.
59001017	Ninopase Allah pogot oba meke etnogo nenat yi meke ti meke hano meke woknisigik, hano motok meke woknisigik, usaknisa agarek iti. At nenat pogot obake lia welagarek meke iti winametdisikhesik nen, at ebe ninat hagatlageik, abel dagakhogon mum ageik, lia ageik, hagakherek dek.
59001018	Yi meke ti meke winametdisikhe meke tha'bokhogonat makusa negen nirat dogoagaluk, at ekaerek akla apalok ane ebe wene iti bagaat itakninakhikhemo welago.
59001019	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. Wene yi hinakla eberek dogono o. Hinebe tomok wene hinasuk ibat ibat holiluk nen, hinane baga nen erogat igik, hinakla aga dagei agunem hinetaiken thebelogo dogoluk nen erogat igik, hagakhe dogono o.
59001020	Akhuni inakla aga weak hagakharek meke iti, Allah akla warlok apekherek meke hagakharek dek.
59001021	Iti nenat, yi weak ti weak hinekarli dek hagarik nekhethep meke iti here'isigik, weak kogathagarik nekhe lagap meke iti here'isigik, hagakhe dogono o. Wene hano wene Allah nen hinakla ai yago ’bisikhe meke iti baga erlok tilhinabusak iti nen, hinetaiken thebekhogon at apma ukiluk, at nen wene hinakla kagaliogo meke iti waganhe dogono o.
59001022	Wene Allah ane iti hinasuk anek holiluk huk asumo nen, hinekaerek nen nukhetdakhagun iti nen, hinasuk holiluk, hutukhogon hagakhe dogono o.
59001023	-
59001024	Akhuni aperek wene Allah ane iti inasuk anek holiluk, wene iti mothogon hagakhidek halok, akhuni inelokhoken inamukhak oba lakhalok inebe werlekmake lalok, “Nebe itigirlik higi, ” iluk eberek welageidek ibat ibat obarlikma agarek iti hakeneat o.
59001025	Nit akhuni herle warek negen werekma, wene hano wene Allah nen ninasuk warogo ’bogokhogon yoknisekherek iti baga hialninakherek. Halok he, tha nen wene iti asuk anek holiluk nen, obarlikmatdekherek ’buk. Hutukhogon hutdiluk, oba eberek motok dogolik, wene iti mothogon hagakhe halok, yi meke ti meke hagakhunem, Allah nen akla arlekenhogon yomakhekhe dogogin o.
59001026	Nen, tha nen, “An Allah apma dogolik mothogon hagakhe lagei, ” iluk apekhe dogoligat, ane ilugun oba yugunat ekherek halok kuda ape herle wakherek iti hak, at itithogonat ape hanorogo therogo welageidek halok ekaerek nen nukhetdakhekhe dogolik, “Allah akla hanorogon hagakhe lagei, ” iluk ekherek thalek, we wirlidikhogonat hagariogo o.
59001027	Ninopase Allah nen, “Akhuni nen an nakla hanorogo mot hano motok hagakhe dogosak he, yigithogon. Yekerugi irlagakot meke inom, humi thoge meke inom, nuk atluk werekma yomageisigik, akhuni agat oba weak hagariogei meke iti inobabut waganhidek inekaerek nen kareligik, hagakhe dogosak o, ” iluk akla apekherek iti o.
59002001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinetaiken ninoe EtagapogotYesus Kristus hogorakharek meke etnogo oba hakotdiluk dogolik, akhuni inoado itikmanke anek hinileken hisalok nen, aperek hinelokhoma ’bisigik, aperek hinoporlike ’bisigik, hagakhe dogogup o.
59002002	Hinebe sembayan uogoluk natogorlek werekma, ap ageikhe iki ekaka baga emas meke ikhik, asu hano meke ikhik, hagatdiluk nen hinoba uki ageik, nen, ap ageikhe ameke dek meke asu weak meke ikhogo uki ageik, hagakha halok he,
59002003	hit nen at asu hano ugu ukisigin meke iti yogokhe dogolik, “Noe. Hebe o perlagoma hanoma ya hurek lasi me o, ” iluk yogokhik, nen, at ameke dek meke etnogo yogokhe dogolik, “Nagot o. Hat eta metek dogogin a? Nisok ’bigima agat oba yoma hurek lasisigin a, ” iluk yogokhik, hagakhe lagap halok he,
59002004	hit hinobabut motok weak hagakhe dogolik, hit-hit, “At iti kok. Nen, at iti erlok dek, ” iluk penago ’bisekhe lagap iti.
59002005	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. An wene igin meke yi hinasuk holini. It akhuni agat oba inameke dek meke iti, Allah nenat wenageinakhe dogolik, “Inameke doalegat dogou hak, inetaiken an noba hakotdiluk dogoak o. Nen, it an nebe inakmu meke, o an nen napma ’bisugunem dogogunmo etoma iteerek asugun iluk abok yogeisasigi meke iti, irat iteerek asugun o, ” iluk wenageinakhikhe.
59002006	Itithogon wenageinakhikhe mekeat he, hit nen it inameke dek meke hinakla meanetdisekhe lagap iti. Meke re, thani nen hit hinebe weagathinakhik, pemerintah meke nen hinitema waganuagaluk wokhisiklageik, hagariogei nogo. It akhuni inameke doalegat meke iti nenat itithogon hagathinabiogei apigi.
59002007	Nen, ninoe Etagapogot etaga hano liliogo meke etnogo etaga palogo ebe iteerek agagip meke iti, it inameke doalegat meke iti nenat, at etaga weagatdiliogei apigi o.
59002008	Meke re, hit nen mothogon hagakhe dogosak meke yi. Allah nen ninasuk wakhe dogolik wene kok, men isikhe, “Hit hinekaerek hinebe hinakmurogon welagathep iti hak, it akhuni aperek hinom welagap meke iti hinakmurogon dogono, ”\rq (Imamat 19:18)\rq* iluk isikhemo, holal waganhukha meke werek iti tak-tagat hagakhe dogogun halok, mothogon hano hagakhe dogogun o.
59002009	Itithogon mekeat he, hit nen akhuni inoado itikmanke anek hinileken hisalok aperek hinelokhoma 'bisigik, aperek hinoporlike 'bisigik, hagakhe lagap iti weagat hagakhe lagap o. Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo thebelogo here’isalok weak hagakhe lagap iluk, wene iti bagaat ukum hinoba werek o.
59002010	Hit aperek wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo tha'bokhogonat herogo dogoligat, opakiat ageikhe thagalogo usa'egep halok he, “Wene iti tha'bokhogonat thagalogo usa'egebat o, ” iluk eberogonat ukum hinoba agama werek o.
59002011	Allah nenat, “Humi param ha'isugup, ”\rq (Keluaran 20:14; Ulangan 5:18)\rq* iluk isikhe. Nen ageikhe, “Akhuni inakhup, ”\rq (Keluaran 20:13; Ulangan 5:17)\rq* iluk, at nenat isikhe. Halok he, hat ageikhe nen, humi param ha'isigidek dogoligat he, akhuni inebe inakhen halok he, Allah ane thagalogo usa'egenat o.
59002012	Ninebe niniki herle warek negen werekma, Allah ane iti bagaat hisalogo 'binanherek iti. Wene iti bagaat ninitemawaganigin o, iluk, hinane mothogon igik, hiniki nen mothogon hagakhik, hagakhe dogono o.
59002013	Hit nen he, akhuni hinakmurinakhidek halok he, Allah nen akmuthinakhidek, wene hinoba ’biginat o. Meke re, akhuni aperek inakmurogon welageikharek meke iti Allah nen initema waganhe dogolik wene inoba 'bisagein dek o.
59002014	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hat ageikhe tha nen, “Netaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagei o, ” iluk ekhe dogoligat he, hiki baga nen akhuni aperek yomageisigidek halok he, hane anek, “Netaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagei, ” iluk ekhe lagan iti baga ageikhe hagatlasigin nogo a? We yugunat ekhe lagan o. Nen, hetaiken anek itithogon hakotdiluk dogoumo, iti baga erlok tilhabigin nogo a? Erlok dek o.
59002015	Hagarlak a? Heru a, Allah a’buri meke aperek inasu ugu dogosak meke inom, inapiri neke dogosak meke inom, dek nen werekma,
59002016	hat nen at ebe hasik yomakhigidek dogoligat he, hane baga nen anek, “Nagarlak o. Hoba agaken thok-thok hipiri ha’ithogonat hakla arleken akhilik lan o, ” iluk egen halok he, ageikhe hagatlasusak nogo? We yugunat o.
59002017	Iti hagat, nit niniki baga nen yomageisigidek dogolik, “Ninetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welago, ” iluk, iti anek ogorek halok, warek hakene dogolik we yugunat ogorek o.
59002018	It aperek nen itithogon isinem men usak, “Hat nen he, Netaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagei ekhe lagan iti. Nen, an nen niki baga nen yomageisekhe lagei iti. Halok he, hat hiki nen yomageisigidek dogolik, hetaiken anek Allah oba hakotdiluk welagei iluk ekhe lagan iti, ebe ki? Inugutnean ta. An anek he, Netaiken Allah oba hakotdigirik welagei, iluk, niki baga nen yomageisekhe lagei meke ekagat werek iti, inugutheageinat o, ” iluk yogeisausak o.
59002019	Hat ageikhe nen he, “At Allah ebe opakiat, ” iluk eberogonat apekhe lagan iti hanoat mekeat he, Iblis agarumi inobabut weak meke inom nen, iti hagat eberogonat apekhe dogolik, ebe inayuk nen arlik halharegat o.
59002020	Hat hebe kepu negen ekhe lagan iti re! Allah eberogonat iluk iti meke anek apekhe dogolik, hiki baga yomageisigidek halok, we yugunat apekhe lagan iluk ekagat hutdinogoluk wene yi yokhisik.
59002021	Ninopase Abraham nen ekaerek a'but Ishak ebe wolok lageikhesik nen, helekit perlago ’biluk Allah ako warekhe lagoukha hak, warisigiluk hagakhikhe iti nenat, at Allah nen he, “Wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik hapuke nipisak hunogo ’bagagi o, ” iluk yogokhikhe apigi.
59002022	At etaiken Allah oba hakotdigik, iki baga nen hagakhik, ipisak dapukhogonat hagakhikhe iti o. Iki baga nen hagakhikhe iti baga etaiken Allah oba ’bogokhogon hakotdisikhe iluk, hat nen hutdusagat o.
59002023	Itithogon hagakhikhe iti baga nen wene men iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha meke iti ebeat hagatlageikhe, “Abraham etaiken Allah oba hakotdisikhemo, at Allah nen he, Hat hobabut mot hagakhe dogou hak, hetaiken noba hakotdegenma, wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik hapuke nipisak hunogo ’bagagi itiat o, ”\rq (Kejadian 15:6)\rq* iluk yogokhikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha. Iti nen he, Allah nen, “Abraham nipisak hunigat welago, ” iluk isikhe iti o.
59002024	Iti hakene, Allah eberogonat iluk iti anek apaumo re, Allah nen, “Wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik hapuke nipisak hunogo ’bagagi o, ” iluk yogeisekherek dek higi. Itithogonapekhe dogolik, niniki baga nen inomat hagakhunem iti baga nen anek he, itithogon yogeisekherek iti ’bikhani!
59002025	Iti hakeneat he, he Rahab yugunisake hagakhe lageikhe meke iti nen, akhuni Israel meke nen inileken waganuagaluk la’isa agoukha meke emenogo wagoukhama limago woginakhikhesik nen, yabokane holak werlekmake oalogo ula’isasikhe iti. Itithogon hagakhikhe iti baga nen, Allah nen, “Wene hoba meke korogo wokhigirik hapuke nipisak hunogo ’bagagi o, ” iluk yogokhikheat iti.
59002026	Ninebe ninagoreke dukhisinem watlagorek iti hak, ninakla nen, “Allah eberogonat, ” iluk apekhe dogoligat, niniki baga nen ageikhe hagakhidek halok he, warek hakene dogolik, we yugunat apekhe lago o.
59003001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit akhuni yakulisogorek meke weak hagakho halok he, Allah nen yabokane akhuni aperek initema waganogo inoba wene herlekha’bugat negen ’bigin mekeat he, nit anek he, wene kogat ninoba ’bigin o, hinilu iti nen, hinebe doalegat akhuni yakulisegarek meke asuogoluk apugup o.
59003002	Nit akhuni tha’bokhogonat hano hagakhe lago thalek yi meke ti meke hasik, weagat hagakhorek iti. Mekeat he, tha nen ane baga nen wene weak meke ageikhe igidek hanorogo anek ekherek halok he, iki isok ebe tha’bokhogonat dopokhogon herogo dogolik etaiken ’bogokhogon horleat werek o.
59003003	Iti hakene, nit nen kuda ape kutmo herle kildiluk, nit nen holak itike lausak iluk, apogo halok, herle etnogo likhugunem, ebe itike lagarek iti.
59003004	Nen, ku i yekelekma lagarek meke, iti ebe kok meke, hisakne nen obatnerogon wolok lagarek mekeat he, ap ku wolok lagarek meke iti akla nen, “Holak itike ligin, ” iluk akla apalok, ukul morerakherek meke 'bugurlagat iti nomothekhe halok, itikeat mot wolok lagarek iti hutdini o.
59003005	Iti hakene, nina’bi ebe ’bugurlagat mekeat he, akhuni inekaerek nen hogorakhegarek hak, nina’bi iti nen wene husupi anek kogotdakhekherek iti. Nen, hetu eken herlekha’bugat mekethelokhogon usa’isinem hutdiniat o.
59003006	Nina’bi iti, ebe hetu hakeneat o. Nit akhuni agat oba yoma yi weak ti weak hagakhorek iti hak, niniki ninisok yi werek korlegat, nina’bi yi nen ninebe abisake weagatninakherek iti o. Itithogon weagatninakherek iti, hetu iti erlo, weakma hetu aikmo dogogunmo iti mekeatma, nina’bi baga mokalatluk, ninebe welagorek yi abisakeat hali nasi welagarek iti.
59003007	Akhuni nen, yi ’bagei ti ’bagei, yi thue ti thue, yi warlo ti warlo, yi ikan ti ikan, ilhige weak meke erlok il wasumo il watlagarek iti.
59003008	Itithogon mekeat he, nina’bi iti tha nen il wasusak apegep. Motok erlok dek o. Nina’bi iti asuk warek degat o. Warlo aik nen akhuni li’bilinakhunem watlageikharek hak, nina’bi iti baga weak meke kerlekhogon dogolik, inebe inakherek iti.
59003009	Nina’bi iti baga ninopase Etagapogot Allah hogorakhik, akhuni at ebe hakene winametdinanhikhe meke homan ’bisigik, hagakhorek iti o.
59003010	Erlo ninape opakiat iti nenat, Allah hogorakhik, akhuni homan 'bisigik, hagakhorek iti. Nagarlak lak nerugi. Itithogon hagasusak dek mekeat hagakhorek o.
59003011	I elesi opakiat meke nen hano meke inom, arle meke inom, dapukhogon dukhusak nogo? Erlok dek o.
59003012	Nagarlak lak nerugi. O ara meke nen o zaitun eken isusak a? Nen, o anggur meke nen o ara eken isusak a? Iti hakeneat, i ilueagei elesimo nen, i werlek agei meke ageikhe dukhusak a? Motok erlok degat o.
59003013	Hit aperek hinakla kagalek dogolik, yi wene ti wene hutdekhe lagap halok he, akhuni nen ekagat hutdinagouagaluk hinobabut thebekhogo dogolik, hinakla kagalogo hanorogon hagakhe dogono o.
59003014	Meke re, hinakla korlo atluk ua palhik, hinekaerek hasik anek ebekhik, hagakhe dogolik, hinekaerek nen, “An hano, ” iluk hogorakhekhe dogogup o. Itithogon hagasugun halok, Allah ane ebe wene iti meke thagalogo hinekalat nen ugun iti usak degat o.
59003015	Itithogon hagakharek iti Allah nen inakla kagalhunem hagakharek 'buk. Erlo at Iblis nenat inakla kagalhunem akhuni agat oba meke inobabut inikhogat dogolik, warlok apegarek meke hagakharek o.
59003016	Inakla korlo atluk ua palhik, inekaerek hasik anek oba ebekhik, hagakhunem inaneak kogat thagalhik, yi weak ti weak hagakhik, hagakharek iti o.
59003017	Itithogon mekeat he, Allah nen akhuni inakla kagalhunem, inobabut kok hagakharek he, weak ageikhe hagakhidek inilaga isonhogo welageikharek iti. Itithogon dogolik, akhuni inom hanorogo welageik, inobabut enago welageik, inane hologo hagakhik, akhuni inakmurogon motok welageik, o eken hano meke ikherek iti hak, hanorogon hagakhik, akhuni aperek inelokhomake ’bisigik, aperek inoporlike ’bisigik, hagakhidegat inetaiken pere welageidegat, hanorogo hagakharek iti.
59003018	O hano meke ai yakhunem, eken hano ikherek iti hak, akhuni inobabut hanorogo dogolik, it akhuni aperek inom hanorogon dogoagaluk dapulinakhunem inobabut mothogon hano hagakharek iti.
59004001	Hit wene palhik, tugi yakhik, hagakhe lagap iti, erlo nena baga nen yakhe lagap nogo. Wim yabusak warlok inetaikenma dogolik, inakla aga dageikherek iti hak, hinakla nen yi warlok ti warlok apegethep iti nenat yakhe lagap apigi.
59004002	Yi meke ti meke hinakla nen warlok apegethep meke ebe horligidek nen, akhuni inebe inakhe lagap iti. Hinakla nen it akhuni aperek inameke warlok apegethep mekeat he, ebe horligidek nen ua palherethep nen tugi yakhik, wim yakhik, hagakhe lagap iti o. Itithogon, yi meke ti meke waganhidek hinerlageik welagap iti, Allah kino yogokhe lagap dek iti nenat o.
59004003	Nen, ageikhe Allah kino yogokhe lagap mekeat he, hinekaerek hasik anek hinetaiken nen nukunem horlauwogoluk kino usak dek mekeat korlo yogokhe lagap iti nen, wokhisiliogo dek o.
59004004	Humi nen inaguni inil la'belharek iti hak, Allah il la'belogo hagakhe lagap iti re! Akhuni agat oba meke yoma inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagariogei meke iti hinom hunik welagap halok, Allah hinom wim palek hakeneat welagap iti, hinokodek a? Hit aperek nen akhuni agat oba meke yoma meke inobabut inikhogat dogolik hagariogei meke iti hinom hunesuogoluk hagakhe lagap halok he, hinekaerek nen at Allah hinom wim kagalhe lagap o.
59004005	Haganeat wene Allah ane ageikhe holal waganogo 'bekhe dogolik, men isukha, “Humi inakmurogon dogolik irlirli waganek motok welageikharek iti hak, Allah nen Agoreke ninakla 'binanhikhemo ninebe akmurogon dogolik, ninirlirliwaganogo haknisik welagarek, ” iluk holal waganogo 'bisukha iti, hit hinakla nen he, “We yugunat isukha, ” iluk apekhe lagap a? Yugunat isukha dek o.
59004006	Itithogon mekeat he, ninebe akmurogon dogolik, kokhogon yomaknisekherek iti o. Itithogon hagakherek iti nen men isukha, “Akhuni inekaerek nen hogorakhugunem Allah nen a’it hisekherek. Meke re, inekaerek inetaiken thebekhogon dogogun halok akmurinakherek, ”\rq (Amsal 3:34)\rq* iluk Allah ane baga holal waganogo ’bisukha.
59004007	Iti nen he, Allah apma hinetaiken thebekhogon ukiluk ane holek dogolik, Iblis ane iti thagalogo here’isekhe dogono. Here’isaumo, at nen here’inageiluk lo liginat o.
59004008	Hit Allah oba dopokhogon welagap halok he, at meneke hit hinoba dopokhogon wisiginat o. Hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti, hiniki bagake horogo here’isekhe dogono o. Hinetaiken pere meke yi re! Hinakla weak meke horogo la’isekhe dogono o.
59004009	Hinakla weak atluk, di ago, de ago, hagakhe dogono o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, eto aga lagap meke iti, de aga dogono o. Nen, hinakla arleken akhekhe lagap meke iti, hinakla weak atluk dogono o.
59004010	Ninoe Etagapogot apma ukiluk hinetaiken thebekhogon dogogun halok he, at nen siatdinagaginat o.
59004011	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hit-hit hinabok pal-pal ekhe dogosak dek o. Hinagarlak lak hinerugi aperek inabok palhik, wene inoba ’bigik, hagakhep halok he, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogoat weak iluk u hagat, ekhe lagap iti o. Nen, wene iti weak iluk ekhe lagap halok, wene iti hinasuk hologo hagakhe lagap ’buk. Hit nen he, “Wene iti weak. Ebe hano itithogon usak meke isikhemo, ” iluk u hak ekhe lagap iti o.
59004012	Meke re, Allah arligat nen wene ninoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakherek o. At nenat tilninakhik, weagatninakhik hagasusak erlok mekeat he, hit aperek nen hinagarlak lak hinerugi meke wene inoba 'bekhe lagap iti nenaluk. Hit nen itithogon hagasusak meke hagakhe lagap? Erlok dek o.
59004013	Hit aperek nen he, “Yogotak a? Hubuluk a. O werlekmake lalok nen, tahun opakiat hakene dogolik, yi meke ti meke okokhik, thaburigik, hagakhe dogogin, ” iluk ekhe lagap iti re!
59004014	Hubuluke nit wene ninoba itithogon hagatlasigin, iluk hinokodegat dogolik ekhe lagap iti re! Nit ninebe iti nena meke hakene welagorek nogo. O isa il opaki welagarethek nen ibat dek agarek iti hak, ninebe itithogonat welagorek iti o.
59004015	Hit nen mot usak he, men apigi, “Ninoe Etagapogot akla nen yigithogon tigithogon apekhe halok he, ninilugat dogolik, yi meke ti meke hagakhe dogogun, ” iluk ekhe dogosak mekeat he,
59004016	hinekaerek nen hogorakhigik, siatdakhigik, hagarik nekhe lagap iti re! Itithogon hogorakhekhe lagap iti korloat o.
59004017	Hit hinakla nen he, “Mot hagasusak he, itithogon, ” iluk hinilu dogoligat he, ebe hagakhidek halok he, hit weak hagatluk wene hinoba 'bakhekhe lagap o.
59005001	Hit ap koktek meke nagarlak lak. Yabokane Allah nen weagathinakhunem yi aik ti aik hekhe dogogun iti nen, di ago de ago dogobageik iluk yokhisigi iti hinasuk holino o.
59005002	Hinameke yi meke ti meke doalegat iti hirli ageik, hinasudoalegat etoma warlo nen dobak nikik,
59005003	hit meke emas inom, perak inom, ikuru hakhigik, hagatlagasik holik werek iti re! Hinebe o ilugun oba dogoligat he, yi meke ti meke hinekaerek hasik hulogo ’bakhalok welagap iti nen, yabokane Allah nen wene hinoba ’bisinem, ikuru hago iti nenat, "It inobabut itigirlik, ” iluk ekagat thelekmatdisinem yi meke ti meke hetu nen nekerek iti hak, hinebe ikuru hago iti nenat weagathinabigin o.
59005004	Hinagarumi hineram nenat gandum eken palhisoagaluk inayoko ’begepma paliogei mekeat he, oko wogeisigidegat munenekhe lagap iti nen, it nen he, "Oko woknisauem! ” iluk inane kokhogon iliogei iti la’isani o! Itithogon hagakhe lagapma it inane iti ninopase Etagapogot obatneak etnogo asuk holhesik werek o.
59005005	Agat oba yoma hinameke yi meke ti meke hinikierek dogolik, hinakla arlekenhogo hagakhe lagap iti re! Warn wasugun tak-tak asi agunem ebe kok asuagaluk hipiri kokhogon wogokharek iti hak, hit hinebe weagathinabigin meke horok asi aga korlek, hinekaerek nen hinebe erlakhekhe lagap iti re!
59005006	It aperek mothogon hagariogei meke iti, it nen oko hit hinasusak dekmaat wene inoba ’biluk inebe inakhe lagap iti re!
59005007	Iti nenat, nagarlak lak nerugi. Ninoe Etagapogot ebe aban wageidek werek korlek, hinakla puk ageidek hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk therogo dogono o. Akhuni nen wen waganekma hipiri ai ya’iluk therogo welageikharek iti hinakla hutdini o. Itithogon ai ya’iluk werek korlek miso o mo dageisi korlek nikik, usekhe korlek nikik, eran-alep nasi korlek inakla puk ageidegat, "Yabokane isarlo agunem ebe kok meke itakhagein, ” iluk inobakhanini hapugutdiluk therogo welageikharek iti hak,
59005008	ninoe Etagapogot ebe horogat wisigin iluk hinetaiken horlerogon dogolik, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk therogo dogono o.
59005009	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Itithogon therogo dogolik, Allah nen wene hinoba 'binogo iluk, hit-hit ekhe dogolik, “Nagarlak iti hagariogo na'it o, ” iluk inabok palhidek dogono o. At Allah nenat wene akhuni inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin iti holagapema horok asi aga iti 'bikhani!
59005010	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Haganeat it ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen, “Ninopase Etagapogot nen ekhe mekeat yokhisekhe lago, ” iluk yogeisugunem, it akhuni aperek nen inebe weagarinakhe korlegat, inakla puk ageidek inobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagoukha meke emenogo inobabut waganini o!
59005011	Weagarinakhe korlek, inobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagoukha iti nen, nit nen inabok hano ekhe dogolik, “It hano ageikhasik inakla arleken akhiliogei, ” iluk ogorek iti. At Ayub akla puk ageidek obakhanini hapugutdiluk welageikhe baga, ninopase Etagapogot obabut hano dogolik kokhogon akmurinakherek meke etnogo nen, ilugun oba hanotdisikhe iti abok hinasuk holhethebat o.
59005012	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Wene ageikhe kok meke yi yokhisak. Allah nen wene hinoba 'binogo iluk, hit nen pogot oba meke ageikhe etaga palhik, agat oba meke ageikhe etaga palhik, ninat meke ageikhe etaga palhik, inetaga hupuk palhe dogogup. “I o, ” uogoluk halok he, 'bogokhogon, “I o, ” usak. Nen, “Dek o, ” uogoluk halok he, 'bogokhogonat, “Dek o, ” usak.
59005013	Hit aperek hinakla weagat welagap halok he, sembayan ekhe dogono o. Nen, hit aperek hinakla arleken akhekhe lagap halok he, etai Allah aetai wakhe dogono o.
59005014	Hit aperek hinoba u aga halok he, sembayan igik, ninoe Etagapogot etaga palogo minyak hinoba tialhik, hagasuagaluk it ap Allah a'buri therisik welageikharek meke inayoko ’bekhe dogono o.
59005015	It nen inetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, sembayan ugun iti baga, ninoe Etagapogot nen hinoba u meke iti dek asuagaluk hano hagathinakhik, hit aperek weak hagakhep meke werek halok, thagalogo degetdisigik, hagasigin o.
59005016	Itithogon hagasigin iti nen, hit aperek hinoba u meke dek asubageik nen, weak hagakhep meke hit-hit ’bual-’bual ekhe dogolik sembayan ekhe dogono o. It akhuni Allah akla warlok apekherek meke, mothogon hagakharek meke nen sembayan eberogonat obatnerogon ugun iti, obatneak werekma Allah nen hagarinabiginat o.
59005017	At Elia iti, ebe nit hakene akhuni meke nenat, miso wageidek dogoagaluk sembayan isikhemo, mo dageigik usigik hagakhe korlek 3 tahun welageikhesik, yabokane thut 6 oba inomat miso agat oba usa’ageidek motok hugat welageikhe.
59005018	Itithogon huk werekma sembayan yabokane isikhemo, miso usa’ageikhemo yi meke ti meke yabokane agat oba nen aku dukhisikhesik eken ikhikhe iti.
59005019	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinagarlak lak hinerugi meke ageikhe ebe wene here’isalok mirlokhogon nuk asi laga halok, hit aperek nen yabokane apuke suguluk Allah oba wolok wisugun iti hasik,
59005020	wene yi hinakla ebetni o. Tha nen weak hagakhe dogolik, ekaerek nen mirlokhogon nuk asi lagunem, at ageikhe nen apuke suguluk Allah oba wolok waga halok he, ebe watlasusak tak-tak mekeat tilhik, weak kogat hagakhe meke iti thagalogo degetdigik, hagasigin o iluk, werek iti hinakla nen hutdekhe dogono o.
60001001	-
60001002	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An Petrus, Yesus Kristus nen nayoko ’biluk la'ani ageikhe meke etnogo nen, wene yi holal waganogo hit ninopase Allah nen, hinebe alebat wenakhinakhikhe meke, yogotak ya elanma hasik yi ai ti ai thirlik-pirlikhogon lo lagagisip, o propinsi Pontus men, Galatia men, Kapadokia men, Asia men, Bitinia men, akhuni inaklake inaklake dopok welagathep meke etnogo, hinoba la’i agei o. Hinebe Allah nenat akla apalok wenakhinakhikhesik, Yesus Kristus ane hologo hagakhe dogoagaluk apma ’binagagik, amep oba hothinakhik, hagasigiluk nen, “An nekaerek na’buri asubageik iluk wokhinakhi o, ” iluk at Agoreke nen wokhinakhikhe iti o. Allah obabut hano etnogo nen hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken eran-alep hapugutdinagagik, kokhogonat hagakhe dogoak o.
60001003	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus opase Allah etnogoat hogorakhe dogouok. At Allah ninebe akmu motok nen, Yesus Kristus watlageikhesikmo nen ilugutdisikhe iti baga nit ninilugutninakhikhe iti. Ninilugutninakhikhemo dogolik, ninakla nen he, "At nen, yabokane hanothinabigin, isikhe iti tagan-hagan asigin dek, ” iluk ninakla arleken akhekhe lago.
60001004	Itithogon hanotninakhunem iteerek asugun meke iti, hirli ageidek, weak ageidek, dek ageidek, ikhok motok dogogin meke pogot oba ageikhe hit 'binageikhemo werek o.
60001005	Hinetaiken at Allah oba hakotdiluk welagap iti nen, at obatne baga hakhisik dogoluk nen, yabokane hinebe hanothinabigin meke ilugun hurli baga winametdigin iti.
60001006	Iti nenat, yogotak ya, Allah nen hinobabut paligiluk hagakhe korlek, hinoba akin-pakinhogon hekhe dogolik, elanma hasik hinakla weak ariogo mekeat he, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o.
60001007	Emas oko kogat palharek meke iti hano a? Weak a, iluk hetu aik oba walhegarek iti hak, Allah nen, “It inetaiken an noba eberogonat hakotdiluk werek a? Dek a, ” iluk, ekagat asuagaluk apasinem, hinoba yi akin-pakinhogo hekhe lagap iti o. Emas iti, we yugunat dek asigin mekeat he, ebe wene kok he, hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk welagap itiat o. Hit hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogogun halok he, at nen hinobabut palhe dogoluk nen, Yesus Kristus thelekmaat la’isigin itinem, hogothinakhik hinalonethinakhik, kogotdinagagik, hagasigin o.
60001008	Hit nen alebat, at ebe hinileken higidek mekeat he, ebe hinakmu welagap iti o. Itithogon dogolik, yogotak ya hinileken higidek mekeat he, hinakla nen, “Yabokane hano motok hagatninabigin, ” iluk hinane baga nikithogon pilinogo usak heat dogolik, hinakla arleken motok akhekhe lagap iti o.
60001009	Hinakla nen he, “O ilugun hurli baga tilninabuak, ” iluk hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogolik, yogotak iteerek aga lagabat o.
60001010	Ninebe tilninabigin wene iti, it alebat ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen wene iti hasigatherakhik, hinok waganhik, hagakhe lagoukha. Itithogon herakhe dogolik, Allah obabut hano etnogo nen, “Hano hagarinakhe dogogin, ” iluk ebe hit hano hagathinabiogo iti hasigat aban werek korlek yogeisekhe lagoukha iti.
60001011	Itithogon yogeisekhe lagoukha iti, at Kristus Agoreke inakla dogolik yogeisekhe dogolik, men isikhe, “Kristus aik hilik hilik watlasigin. Watlatluk nen yabokane iluk agunem hogorakhe dogogun, ” iluk yogeisasikhemo it nen ekhe dogoligat, “Nikithogon hagatlasigin. Meranem nen hagatlasigin, ” iluk hinok hutukhogon waganhe lagoukha.
60001012	Hinok waganhunem, at Allah nen he, “Wene iti, hit hinekaerek hasik, dek o. It yabokane aban meke inobasik hagakhe lagap o, ” iluk hit hinobasigat isikhe. Itithogon yogeisasikhesik welageikhesik nen, yabokane Allah Agoreke pogot oba nen usa'i ageikhemo, it ap hano wene Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe wene etnogo yokhisoagaluk inakla dogolik yogotak pakhogon yokhisiliogei ebe iti hasik ekhe lagoukha iti. Wene iti, it malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke emenogo nen, “Eiye. Nit wene iti hutukhogon ninilu atlo e, ” iluk apegarek.
60001013	Iti nen, wene iti hutdiluk nen, holak pirlirli luogoluk inobakha herle a’bethogon wakharek iti hak, hinobabut hebelogo, hinetaiken ekerlogo dogono. Itithogon dogolik, hinakla nen, “Allah nen Yesus Kristus ebe thelekmaat la’i agunem hano meke woknisasigin o, ” iluk hinetaiken at oba la’iluk oba eberek motok dogono o.
