60001014	Hit alebat wene iti hinokodek dogolik, yi meke ti meke warlok nen hinetaiken oba nen nukunem hagakhe lagagip iti, yabokane hinobabut iti mekewaganhup o. Yekerugi nen inopase lak inane holek dogolik mothogon hagakharek iti hak, hit Allah ane hinasuk hologo mothogon hagakhe dogono.
60001015	-
60001016	At Allah nen he, “An nobabut weak hagakhidek karelek motok welagarek iti nen, hit meneke an nobasik hinobabut karelek motok dogono o, ”\rq (Imamat 11:44-45; 19:2; 20:7)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo 'bisukha iti nen, hit nen yi meke ti meke hagakhe dogolik, hinobabut at Allah hinayoko ’bisikhe meke obabut hakeneat karelek motok dogolik hagakhe dogono.
60001017	At Allah obabut akhuni inoado baga anek ileken hisalok, aperek elokhoma ’bisigik, aperek oporlike ’bisigik, hagakherek dek o. Inobabut hagakharek dopok mothogonat wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakherek iti nen, hit nen he, “Allah ninopase o, ” iluk ayoko ’bekhe dogolik, agat oba yoma elanma hasik hinebe ap huso negen dogolik, at ebe hinayukhogon hagakhe dogono o.
60001018	Alebageigat hinopa lak hagakhe lagoukha iti hak, it inobabut waganogo dek asigin meke hasik yugunat alomarogo hagakhe lagagip iti nen, hiniki herle warek negen werekma, Allah nen hinebe hinoko palogo tilhinakhikhe iti hiniluat o. Oko iti dek asigin meke emas oba, perak oba hinoko palhinakhikhe ’buk.
60001019	At he, oko kok meke baga palogo tilhinakhikhe o. Domba eak weak dek hano utholik meke Allah hasik amep ulabogo warisu hak, at Kristus amep ulabogo watlageikhe iti baga, hinoko palogo tilhinakhikhe iti.
60001020	Kristus, Allah nen pogot agat yoma aban walhigidek dogolik, akla apalok ayoko ’bisikhesik welageikhesik nen, ebe yogotak o ilugun hurli baga hit hinobasik thelekmaat la’i ageikhemo hinebe tilhinakhikhe iti.
60001021	Ebe watlageikhesikmo Allah nen ilugutdiluk hogorakhe dogoagaluk meldisikhemo, hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk, “Yabokane at nen hanotninabigin, ” iluk oba eberek welagap iti.
60001022	Ebe wene iti hinasuk holhe dogolik, hinakla nen weak meke horogo la'isalok, hinagarlak lak hinerugi Allah a’buri meke aperek eberogonat hinakmurogon hagakhe lagap iti, hinom hunik motok dogolik nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhe dogono.
60001023	Allah nen yabokane itakhinakhikhe iti, akhuni watlageikharek meke nen itaginakharek iti hak itakhinakhikhe ’buk. Allah iluk ikhok motok dogolik ane dek asigin dek motok dogogin meke baga itakhinakhikhe o.
60001024	Iti, Allah ane men iluk holal waganek werek hak, “Akhuni tha’bokhogonat he, inebe oka hakeneat o. Hano iluk hogorinakharek iti, o ekenhogorakharek iti hak hogorinakharek iti. Eka puk ageik, eken lologo usasigik, hagakherek iti.
60001025	Meke re, Ninoe Etagapogot ane iti motok dogogin o, ”\rq (Yesaya 40:6-8)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha iti. At ane iti ebe re, nit nen hano wene yokhisogorek itiat o
60002001	Iti nen, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti motok here’isalok dogono o. Akhuni aperek nukhetdisigik, hinetaiken pere hagakhik, ua palhik, hinekalat nen akhuni aperek inabok weak palhik, hagakhe lagap iti, here’isekhe dogono o.
60002002	-
60002003	Yi meke ti meke ituk walhalok, hano egarek iti hak, ninoe Etagapogot obabut hano hegep iti nen, elege ket itago meke irlak abu nen nasi motok welageikharek iti hak, wene hano wene hinetaiken iti baga horle asumohanothinabuagaluk, wene itiat hit warlokhogon waganhomotok dogono o.
60002004	At ebe helekit hakene iluk welagarek meke iluk he, oba wetno. Akhuni nen, “Helekit iti weak, ” iluk here'isasukha mekeat he, Allah nen, “Helekit yi motok hano mekeat, ” iluk wenago ’bisikhe.
60002005	Itithogon ’bisikhemo, hit hinebe helekit iluk welagarek iti meke hakene dogolik, at oba wetno o. At oba wagunem, Allah nen at ekaerek ai halogo ’binaguak. At ai halekma, hinebe Allah iteerek Yesus Kristus hinom hunik dogolik, Allah akla hanorogo ako warekhe dogou hak, hinetaiken wogokhe dogono o.
60002006	Iti meke hasik Allah nen men isikhe, “An nen, helekit hano motok meke wenago o Sion etoma o herlaga ageikhe warogo ’bigi yi ’bikhani. Hit akhuni hinebe dopok hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogogun halok he, hinekarli hugun dek o, ”\rq (Yesaya 28:16)\rq* iluk isikhemo holal waganogo ’bisukha iti.
60002007	Hit hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welagap meke nen, “At hano motok, ” iluk hutdekhe lagap iti. Mekeat he, it aperek inetaiken at oba hakotdigidek meke inobasik anek he, men isikhe, “It ap tukang o helekit meke halharek meke nen, o ebe halhe dogolik, Helekit yi weak, iluk here’isega meke iti herlaga hagatlaga yi, ”\rq (Mazmur 118:22)\rq* iluk isikhe.
60002008	Nen, ageikhe men isikhe, “Akhuni helekit iti baga inisok a’bit ’baukhogonwaralok wilasi laga dogogun o, ”\rq (Yesaya 8:14-15)\rq* iluk isikhe. Itithogon wilasi laga dogogun iti re, it nen hano wene iti, “Eberogonat, ” iluk hutdugun dek iti nen, Allah nen akla apasikhe hagat, warisiliogei iti.
60002009	Meke re, hit anek he, “At Allah nen hano hagatninabiogo, ” iluk abok yogeisilik loagaluk, hinebe o mummo werekma, at ebe elalinat lia motok welagarek oba wisuagaluk hinayoko 'bisikhesik, hit at a'buri asuagaluk wenakhinakhik, at ebe iteerek koktek dogoagaluk meldinagagik, hinukuloak etaga at ekaerek ukuloak etaga meke thalogo 'binagagik, “Nekaerek na'buri, ” iluk hinebe wokhinakhik, hagakhikhe iti.\rq (Keluaran 19:5-6; Yesaya 43:20-21; Ulangan 4:20; 7:6; 14:2)\rq*
60002010	Hit alebat, Allah hinom hunik welageidek mekeathe, yogotak hinebe Allah a'buri agap o. Nen, alebat, hit nen, “Allah ninebe akmu werek, ” iluk hinokodek welagagip mekeat he, yogotak, “Ninebe Allah akmu nen wokninakhikhemo welago, ”\rq (Hosea 2:22-23)\rq* iluk hinilu agap o.
60002011	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak e. Hit hinebe ap huso akhuni inaila la'inagoumo lalok, etoma dogolik, yi meke ti meke hinakla nen kagalogo dageitluk, hinetaiken nen nukunem warlok apegethep meke iti re, thili meke nen inakharek iti hak hinebe weagathinabigiluk, hinakla nen kagalogo dagei agarek meke iti here'isekhe dogobageik iluk yokhisekhe lagei iti o.
60002012	It akhuni itikmanke meke Allah inokodek meke hinom dogolik, it nen, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke thalek, “It weak hagariogei o, ” iluk hinabok weak ekhe dogoligat, hit hinobabut hano hagakhunem inileken hisekhe dogoluk nen, akhuni nen at Allah ebe yabokane wagunem hogorasuagaluk hit hinobabut mothogon hagakhe dogono o.
60002013	-
60002015	At Allah nen, hit men hagakhe dogoagaluk akla apasikhe. Akhuni inetaiken dek meke nen wene inokodek dogolik iliogei iti, inekarli atluk inane dek asuagaluk, hit hinobabut hano hagakhe dogoagaluk akla apasikhe iti nen, ninoe Etagapogot hasik, akhuni nen pemerintah meke kok dogoagaluk meldisasukha meke iti, inebe tha'bokhogonat inapma ukiluk inane hologo hagakhe dogono o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, Kaisar etagapogot pemerintah meke kok hakene iti men, at nen it gubernur lak akhuni weak hagakhunem ukum inoba ’bigik, hano hagakhunem hogorinakhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk inayoko ’biluk la’isa agarek meke iti men, inane hologo hagakhe dogono o.
60002016	Itithogon dogolik, hit nen, “Nit weak meke apma werekma, Allah nen herle hisalogo ninasokneat ’binanhikhemo welago, ” iluk, weak ageikhe limago hagakhe dogogup. Hinobabut Allah atuaneke dogolik hagasusak meke mothogonat hagakhe dogono o.
60002017	Akhuni tha’bokhogonat inalon halhe dogono. Itithogon yogeisekhe dogolik, hinagarlak lak hinerugi Allah a’buri meke hinakmurogo dogono o. Dogolik, Allah ebe hinayukhogon welageik, nen, Kaisar etagapogot pemerintah meke inoe kok iti alon halhik hagakhe dogono o.
60002018	Hit aperek, hinougi inatuaneke welagap meke iti, it inapma dogolik, inobabut hano enago meke inobasik anek hinayukhogon inane hologo hagakhe dogosak ’buk. At he, inobabut korlo meke inomat hinayukhogon inane hologo hagakhe dogono.
60002019	Hit nen weak ageikhe hagakhidekmaathe, hinougi nen yi aik ti aik hagathinakho korlek, hinakla nen, “Allah akla warlok meke hagasusak, ” iluk hutdiluk, hinetaiken thebekhogon hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogun halok he, at nen hanothinabigin o.
60002020	Mekeat he, hit nen weak hagasugun oba, oko tugi hinakho korlek, hinetaiken thebekhogon hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogun halok, hogothinabusak nogo? Dek o. Hinobabut obaat usak o. Mekeat he, hano hagakhunem, yi aik ti aik hagathinakhe korlegat, hinetaiken thebekhogon hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogogun halok he, Allah obabut hano nen hanothinabiginat o.
60002021	At Kristus ebe hit hinobasik yi aik ti aik hilik hilik watlageikhe iti nen, hit meneke, at obabut waganogo yi aik ti aik hinoba ’binagouagaluk Allah nen hinayoko 'bisikhe iti.
60002022	At nen, “Weak ageikhe hagakhidegat. Nen, ekalat isinem, akhuni aperek inasukholhidegat o. ”\rq (Yesaya 53:9)\rq*
60002023	Akhuni nen inane sagun weak yogokhe korlegat, at nen oko ane sagun yogeisigidegat. It nen yi aik ti aik hagakho korlegat, at nen, “An yabokane oko ageikhe hinasigin, ” iluk yogeisekhe lageikhe degat. At he, “Allah nen wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, mothogon hagasigin meke werek o, ” iluk, at iki baga ’biluk, ane oko igidek huk aga lageikhe.
60002024	Nit ninobabut weak hagakhe lagagu meke iti, akhuni watlatluk yi meke ti meke hagakharek dek iti hak, nit weak meke here’isalok, niniluk dogolik Allah akla warlok meke hagakhe dogoagaluk, nit weak hagakhe lagagu meke korogo, at Kristus oba ’bakhasikhemo, ebe o baga meldiluk wakhukha iti. At ebe li’bik-la’bakhogon wakhukha iti baga, hit hanothinakhikhe iti.
60002025	Hit alebat, domba holak nuk asi lagarek iti hak, nukasi laga lagagip mekeat he, yogotak at Allah nen, ap hinebe hakhisik dogolik thethisik welagarek meke oba hinapuke wokhisik ’binagei agama welagap o.
60003001	-
60003002	Iti hak, hit humi hinaguni Allah ane waganhidek meke hinane yogeisagun oba 'buk. Hinobabut hinilaga isonhogo hinaguni inane hologo hagakhunem, it nen inileken hisalok Allah werekmake witluk ane waganuagaluk, hinekaerek hinaguni dopok inapma ukiluk inane hologo hagakhe dogono o.
60003003	Hinoba hanorogo, hinoado itikmanke meke hasik waganhe dogogup. Iti re, hinisi dalhik, hinobake emas meke waganhik, su hano oko kogat meke ikhik, hagakhe dogogup o.
60003004	At he, hinoba hanorogo iti, hinetaiken hasik limago meke iti waganhe dogono. Iti re, hinobabut motok dogogin meke enago welageik, hapukhogon welageik, hagakhe dogono o. Hinobabut Allah il oba itithogon hagakhunem, at akla nen hano motok apekherek itiat o.
60003005	Haganeat it humi Allah a’buri meke inetaiken Allah baga hakotdiluk dogolik, inoba hanorogon itithogonat inaguni dopok inapma dogolik inane hologo hagakhe lagoukha.
60003006	At he Sara itithogonat agun Abraham apma dogolik ane hologo hagakhe dogolik, heagei, “I, nopase, ” iluk wakhe lageikhe. Hit yogotak meneke, akhuni nen hinayuk asuagaluk hagakhunem hinayuk ageidek hano hagakhe lagap halok he, at Sara eageiat welagap o.
60003007	Nen, hit ap meneke, Allah obabut hano nen hinagugi hinom tak-tagat hiniluk motok dogoagaluk iteerek ’binagakhemo welagap iti nen, hit sembayan isinem Allah nen hinane asuk holhidek thogotdinogo iluk, hinagugi hinom hano dogolik, hinakla nen, “Humi inobatne dek, ” iluk hutdiluk, inalon halogo hinakmurinakhe dogono o.
60003008	Wene iti ilukun warogo men yokhisak. Hit hinebe tha'bokhogonat hinakla nen, “Ninebe Allah a’buri ninagarlak lak ninerugi ninom, ” iluk, hinetaiken hunik dogolik, hinakla opakiat meke apigik, hinetaiken opakiat meke ebekhik, hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hinekaerek nen hogorakhigidek, hinetaiken thebekhogon dogolik, hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogo hagakhe dogono.
60003009	Akhuni aperek nen hit weak hagathinakhunem, hit nen oko weagarinakhup o. Nen, inane sagun weak yokhisugunem, hit nen oko hinane sagun yogeisugubat o. Oko re, Allah nen inebe hanorinabuagaluk, ayoko ’bekhe dogono. Yabokane at nen hano meke wokhisagaluk hinayoko ’bisikhe iti nen, hit nen oko hano meke wogeisekhe dogono.
60003010	-
60003012	Wene iti hasik men isukha, “Akhuni inobabut ninopase Etagapogot akla warlok apekherek meke mothogon hagariogei meke, at ileken inoba dogolik, sembayan ayoko ’bisinem inane asuk holherek o. Mekeat he, it weak hagariogei meke, elokhoken ageage dageikherek o. Iti nen, tha nen, An niluk ageikhe inom dogole, hibiku-yogokuat hano meke anek hagatlagunem hekhe dogole, iluk dogou warlok halok he, a’bi baga weak wene igidek welageik, ape baga nen ekalat akhuni apereknukherinakhidek welageik, weak meke oporlike here’isalok hano mekeanek hagakhik, obabut akhuni aperek inom dapukhogon hano welageikharek iti meke kogotdilukobatnerogon mutluk lageik, hagakhe dogosak o, ”\rq (Mazmur 34:12-17)\rq* iluk Allah ane baga holal waganogo 'bisukha.
60003013	Hit he, hano hagakhe dogouogoluk akilukhogo hagakhe lagap halok he, tha nen weagathinabusak nogo. Weagathinabusak dek o.
60003014	Mekeat he, mothogon hagakhunem weagathinakha halok, yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik, hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono. Hinayuk asuagaluk hagathinakhunem, hinayuk atluk hinakla wene munini uan 'bero ebekhup o.
60003015	Hit nen Kristus hinayukhogon hogorakhe dogolik, “Ninoe Etagapogot at o, ” iluk hinetaiken oba nen hogorakhe dogono. Hogorakhunem, it aperek nen hinok hinoba waganhe dogolik, “Hano asigin, iluk oba eberek welagap iti nenaluk, ” iluk yokhisugunem nen, oko wene hutukhogon yogeisagun meke hinakla eberek motok dogolik,
60003016	hinane enago heagei warogo yogeisekhe dogono. Itithogon yogeisekhe dogolik, hinakla nen, “An wene noba thelek o, ” iluk apekhe dogolik, Kristus hinom hunik dogolik, hano hagakhunem, akhuni nen hinabok weak palugun meke iti inileken hisalok inekarli asugun o.
60003017	Hit weak hagakhunem hinoba yi aik ti aik hinobabut oba hekhe dogogun halok weak. Mekeat he, hit nen hano hagakhunem, Allah nen, “It yi aik ti aik hoak, ” iluk apekhe halok anek, hano o.
60003018	Nit akhuni weak hagakhorek iti hasik niniki ilugun oba, at Kristus yabokane watlageidek dogeigiluk opaki hasigat watlageikhe. Ninebe Allah oba woknisik lagaluk, at obabut mothogon hagakherek meke nen, nit ninobabut korlo hagakhorek meke hasik watlageikhe iti. Ebe nit akhuni meke iti wakhukhama watlageikhe mekeat he, agoreke meke itiAllah nen ilugutdisikhe iti.
60003019	Ilugutdisikhemo it aperek inagoreke herle warek werekma wene yogeisa lageikhe.
60003020	Inagoreke iti inebe re, haganeat at Nuh nen ku kok meke halhe korlek, Allah obabut hano nen therisik werek korlegat, wene waganhidek here’isalok weak hagakho motok werekma i thalukhogon waga dogolik inakhukhama watlagoukha meke iti. Itithogon inakhe korlegat, it aperek ku kok meke akla ukiluk welagoukha meke, inebe 8 nen pererlagat i thalukhogon wageikhe iti baga tilinakhikhe iti.
60003021	It i baga tilinakhikhe iti tak-tak nit yogotak ima usogorek iti baga tilninakherek o. I baga tilninakherek iti, ima usa'inanhunem, ninoado i iti baga thobalagarek iti baga tilninakherek 'buk. At he, ninetaiken oba nen wene ninoba thelek asuagaluk Allah ayoko 'bisinem, Yesus Kristus watlageikhesik iluk ageikhe iti baga tilninakherek o.
60003022	At ebe iluk ageikhesik nen, pogot oba dageisikhesik, Allah iki ebeke kok dogolik, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke emenogo men, inougi koktek meke men, inobatneak meke men, hagasik welagarek o.
60004001	Akhuni yi aik ti aik halok, inebe watlatluk, yabokane weak hagakhe dogosak dek iti nen, at Kristus yi aik ti aik hilik hilik ebe watlageikhe iti hak, hit meneke, akhuni thin ikhalok inobabut hebelogo welageikharek iti hak, at Kristus obabut waganogo, yi aik ti aik hekhe dogolik hinobatnerogo dogono.
60004002	Iti nen, hit nen akhuni yi meke ti meke warlok nen inetaiken nen nekerek iti meke here’isalok, hurli yogotak hurli nen, agat oba yoma hiniluk dogolik Allah akla warlok apekherek meke iti anek hagakhe dogono o.
60004003	Hit alebat hinobabut it akhuni Allah ane inokodek meke nen inakla apalok hagakharek iti hak, hiniki doalegat arat hagakhe dogolik, weak hinekarli degat hagakhik, hinetaikennen nukunem param hagarinakhik, eken apusu 'bit hakene doalegat nalok hunu-hunu palhik, pesta weak hagakharek meke nalok yugunat-yaganat hagakhik, apusu weak meke iti nikik, kaneke akla korlo asunogo iluk, hogorasusak dek meke hogorakhik, hagakhe lagagip iti.
60004004	Itithogon hagakhe lagagip mekeat he, yogotak hit hinobabut it weak warlokhogon motok yugunat-yaganat hagarik lageikharek iti hak hinom hagakhidek thogotdekhe lagap iti nen, hit hinabok weak paliogei iti.
60004005	Mekeat he, at Allah nen, akhuni iniluk meke men, watlagoukha meke men, initema waganogo wene inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigiluk akla apekhesik werek. Itithogon wene inoba 'bisinem, it nen, wene inoba korauwogoluk, “Nit yigithogon hagakhe lagagu, tigithogon hagakhe lagagu, ” iluk yogosugun weregat o.
60004006	Iti nenat, it akhuni watlagoukha meke iti, Allah nen nit akhuni tha'bokhogonat wene ninoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakherek iti hak inoba 'bisikhemo, inebe watlagoukha mekeat he, at Allah akla apasikhe baga inagoreke iluk welagarek iti hak iniluk dogoagaluk, at Kristus nen hano wene yogeisa lageikhe iti.
60004007	Yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat ilugun oba hagatlasigin meke horogat asi aga iluk, sembayan ekhe dogouogoluk, hinetaiken thebekhogon dogolik, hinobabut hebelogo dogono.
60004008	Wene kok hakene yi. Hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhe dogolik, ageikhe nen ageikhe weagatdugun meke thagalogo motok degetdugun iti nen, hit-hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinom nakmu-hakmurogo motok hagakhe dogono.
60004009	Hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinom, hit aperek nen it aperek inaila lageik, it nen hit hinaila wageik, hagakhe dogolik, inebe woginakhik, hinakla nen, “Na'it o, ” iluk apigidek woginakhe dogono.
60004010	At Allah obabut hano nen, ninebe dopok ninobabut tomokwoknisasikhe tak-tagat, hinebe dopok nen iti meke hano ite dogolik, hit-hit yomak-yomak hagakhe dogono.
60004011	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, Yesus Kristus hinom hunik dogolik hagakhunem, it akhuni aperek nen Allah hogorakhe dogoagaluk, hit aperek nen wene yogeisekhe dogolik, Allah aneat yogeisigik, hit aperek nen it aperek yomageisekhe dogolik, Allah obatne woknisekherek iti bagaat yomageisigik, hagakhe dogono o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, Yesus obatneak ikhok motok welagarek etnogo hogorakho motok dogoak iluk, “Amin, ” igi iti.
60004012	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. Hetu aik hegarek iti hak, Allah nen, hinobabut paligiluk yi aik ti aik hinoba agunem, hinakla nen, “Yi ninat hogorek dek meke ninoba ariogo, ” iluk apugup o.
60004013	At Allah nen Kristus ebe thelekmaat la’i agunem, hogorasugun itinem, hinakla arleken akhauwogoluk, hinakla nen, “At Kristus oba yi aik ti aik hilik hilik watlageikhe hak, nit at ninom hunik dogolik itithogonat hekhe lago, ” iluk hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono.
60004014	Akhuni aperek nen at Kristus hasik wenakhisekhe halok, hinakla nen, “Allah Agoreke hogorakharek meke etnogo ninoba duk ekhemo welago, ” iluk hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o.
60004015	Mekeat he, it aperek nen akhuni inakhik, iniki abusak waganhik, weak hagakhik, it aperek inayabu meke thebelogo hagakhik, hagakhunem, yi aik ti aik inoba agarek iti hak, hit itithogon hagakhunem hinoba asunogo.
60004016	Mekeat he, akhuni aperek nen, “Hat Kristus agot, hebe Kristen meke, ” iluk yi aik ti aik hagathinakha halok, hinekarli agup o. “An Kristus agot halogat at etaga meke an netaga thalogo yokniriogei iti hanoat o, ” iluk Allah hogorakhe dogono.
60004017	Allah nen ninitema waganogo wene ninoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin iti arat horogat asi aga. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, nit Allah a’buri meke tak ninitema waganogo wene ninoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagasigin halok, yabokane it akhuni aperek Allah ane hano wene waganhidek meke nikithogon hagarinabigin apegep?
60004018	Akhuni nen Allah ane baga men isukha, “Akhuni mothogon hagariogei meke, Allah nen tilinabusak dek hakene werekma, tilinabigin iti halok, it Allah ebe inakla meanetdiluk weakhagariogei meke iti nikithogon hagarinabigin apegep? ”\rq (Amsal 11:31)\rq* iluk holal waganogo ’bisukha.
60004019	Hit Allah akla apasikhe bagaat hinoba yi aik ti aik itithogon hekhe lagap halok he, hinakla nen, “At ninebe walninakhikhe meke iti at oba hakotdiluk dogosak, hano, ” iluk hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogolik hinobabut hano hagakhe dogono.
60005001	Hit Allah a’buri therisik welagathep iti hak, anitithogonat therisik welagarek meke nen hinasuk ageikhe wasik. At Kristus oba yi aik ti aik hilik hilik watlageikhe iti, an nileken hasigi. Nen, yabokane Allah nen ebe winamhogo la’isigin iti wagunem, akhuni nen hogorasugun iti, an ninom hogotninabugunat o. An nane liokhogon hinasuk wasik.
60005002	Allah nen, “An na’buri domba nomolek hakene itithogon therisik dogono, ” iluk hinayoko ’bisikhe hagat, therisik dogono. Therisik dogolik, hinekaerek hina'it werek korlegat, akhuni aperek nen, inane inobatnerogon yokhisugunem therisik welageik, nen, hinakla nen, “Oko ageikhe woknisoak, ” iluk apekhe dogolik therisik welageik, hagakhe dogogup o. At he, hinakla warlokhogon therisik dogono.
60005003	Allah a’buri therisik dogoagaluk supusogo wokhisasikhe iti therisik dogolik, hinebe kok negen dogolik, hinane hithani-hathani negen hagarinakhe dogogup. Hit hano hagakhunem inileken hisalok hinobabut waganogo hagakhe dogoagaluk, hano hagakhe dogono.
60005004	Itithogon hagakho werekma, ninoe kok adomba iteerek etnogo witluk nen, “Hano motok hagakhe lagapma, ” iluk oko kare-kare mitago a’bi’baleak dek asigin dek meke wokhisagein o.
60005005	Nen iti hagat, hit ap elege nagarumi. It aperek nen Allah ane baga men isukha, “Akhuni inekaerek nen hogorakhugunem, Allah nen a’it hisekherek o. Mekeat he, inekaerek inetaiken thebekhogon dogogun halok, at obabut hano nen akmurinakherek o, ”\rq (Amsal 3:34)\rq* iluk holal waganogo 'bisukhama werek iti nen, hit nen inarluetek inapma ukiluk inane hologo hagakhe dogono o. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hit tha'bokhogonat nen, hinekaerek nen hogorakhigidek inapma dogolik, hit aperek nen it aperek inatuaneke welageik, it nen hit hinatuaneke welageik, hagakhe dogolik yomak-yomak hagakhe dogono o.
60005006	Itithogonat, Allah nen yabokane meldinaguagaluk, yogotak ya hinekaerek nen hogorakhigidek, at iki obatne werek meke apma ukiluk hinetaiken thebekhogon hagakhe dogono o.
60005007	Allah hinebe akmu iti nen, hit yi meke ti meke hasik hinakla wene munini uan 'bero ebekhe lagap iti here'isalok, hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogono o.
60005008	At Iblis, hinathili meke etnogo nen, singa yeke helo anini weak meke yi meke ti meke haumhogo nagaluk ane ke agan herarik nekherek iti hak, “Tha hak weagatdigin, ” iluk herakhinabik liliogo iti, hinobabut hebelogo hinileken hanorogon dogono o.
60005009	Itithogon dogolik, hinakla nen, “Ninagarlak lak ninerugi o yi ai ti ai agat oba yoma inebe tha'bokhogonat yi aik ti aik hiliogei hagat, hekhe lago, ” iluk, at Iblis wagunem, ane holhidek here'isalok hinetaiken Allah oba hakotdiluk hinobatnerogon metek dogono o.
60005010	Werekma, at Allah ebe hogorakho motok dogogun iti hak, hit Kristus hinom hunik werekma hinomat hogothinakho dogoagaluk hinayoko 'bisikhemo, yogotak ya herlekha'bugat anek hinoba yi aik ti aik hekhe dogoluk, yabokane, at obabut hano motok etnogo nen, hinetaiken aban meke thirliphogon hagathinakhik, hinetaiken horlethinakhik, hinobatnethinakhik, hapuguthinakhik, hagasigin o.
60005011	Yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat at arligat ite dogolik hago motok dogoak, iluk, “Amin, ” igi iti o.
60005012	An nen wene 'beroat iti hinasuk warogo hinoba la'isigiluk nen, holal waganuagaluk an nagot Allah a'but Silas obabut hupulik higirik nen, ayoko 'bigima waganhemo hinoba la'i agei iti. Allah obabut hano nen hagatninabiogo meke ebe yiat iluk, an nilu dogolik eberogonat yokhisigi o. Halok he, hinetaiken iti bagaat hakotdiluk dogolik, hinobatnerogon metek dogono, iluk wene holal waganogo hinoba la'i agei iti.
60005013	Hinagarlak lak hinerugi Allah a'buri at nen wenageinakhikhe meke o Babilon yoma welageikharek meke nen heagei wathinakhik, na'but Markus nen heagei wathinakhik, ega o.
60005014	Nen, hit-hit, nakmu-hakmurogo heagei hinape tharluk wat-wat ilik lano o. Allah nen hit Kristus hinom hunik meke hinebe tha'bokhogonat hinetaiken hapukhogon hakhisik dogoak o.
61001001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. An Simon Petrus Yesus Kristus nen, at atuaneke dogoagaluk nayoko ’biluk la'ani ageikhemo wagagi. Iti, at ebe Allah at dogolik, obabut mothogon anek hagakherek etnogo nen, hit ninom tak-tagat ninetaiken at oba hakotdugunem tilninabiogo meke, wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei iti.
61001002	Hit nen Allah inom, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus inom, ipisak inebe thekekhogon hiniluat welagap iti nen, it inobabut hano etnogo nen hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, kokhogon hagakho motogat dogoak o.
61001003	At Allah ikhok motogat dogolik, yi meke ti meke elalinat hagakhunem hogorakho motok welageikharek meke etnogo nen ninayoko ’bisikhe iti. Halok he, nit nen at ebe thekekhogon ninilu atluk, nit ninebe niniluk dogolik, at hasik mothogon hagakhe dogoagaluk, at ekaerek obatne baga yi meke ti meke woknisasikhemo ite agosik welago.
61001004	It akhuni agat oba yoma yi meke ti meke warlok nen, inetaiken nen nukunem inobabut weak hagatlatluk weak apegarek meke iti here’isalok lo dukhitluk, Allah obabut waganuagaluk, hano meke woknisiliogo iti. At nen elalinat hagakhunem hogorakho motok welageikharek meke etnogo nen, “Yi meke ti meke oko baga waganusak erlok dek. Hano motok kok meke, wokhisagein werek o, ” iluk abok yoknisasikhe iti, ebe woknisiliogo.
61001005	Iti nen, hit iti meke ite asubageik nen, akilukhogon hagakhe dogono. Hinetaiken Kristus oba hakotdiluk welagap meke iti oba dukhogon, inobabut mothogon hagakharek iti meke ite atluk hagakhe dogono. Mothogon hagakhe dogolik, iti meke oba. dukhogon, Allah ebe inilu ageikharek iti meke ite atno.
61001006	Allah ebe hinilu dogolik, iti meke oba dukhogon, inetaiken thebekhogon welageikharek meke iti, ite atno. Hinetaiken thebekhogon dogolik, iti meke oba dukhogon, yi hasik ti hasik hagakhe dogolik, inobakhanini hapugutdiluk welageikharek iti meke, ite atno. Hinobakhaninihapugutdiluk dogolik, iti meke oba dukhogon, Allah apma dogolik, at akla warlok apekherek mothogon hagakharek meke, ite atno.
61001007	Allah akla warlok apekherek mothogon hagakhe dogolik, iti meke oba dukhogon, inagarlak lak inerugi inakmurogo welageikharek iti meke, ite atno. Hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinakmurogo dogolik, iti meke oba dukhogon, akhuni inebe tha'bokhogonat inetaiken hunik welageikharek iti meke, ite atno.
61001008	Hit he, hinobabut iti meke tha'bokhogonat ite atluk, eran-alep kokhogon ite atluk dogogun iti nen, we yugunat alomarogo welageidek, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus thekekhogon hinilu asugun o.
61001009	Itithogon mekeat he, it hit meke aperek nen inobabut iti meke ite ageidek dogogun halok he, inileken agot atluk thalek werek. Itithogon dogolik, it nen, “Weak hagakhe lagagu meke, Allah nen thobalninakhikhe, ” iluk usak mekeat he, at obarlikmatdiluk werek iti.
61001010	Iti nen, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe Allah nen wenakhinakhikhesik hinayoko 'bisikhe iti, eberogonat hagatlasuagaluk, hit nen hinobatnerogo hagakhe dogono. Itithogon hagakhe dogogun halok, hinetaiken Allah baga hakotdiluk welagap meke here'isalok dukhugun dek o.
61001011	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus tilninabiogo meke etnogo, kok motogat dogoginmo etoma ’binagei ukekhe dogolik, at nen, “Hit hinebe iteerek o, ” iluk, heagei warogo hanorogo wokhisik ukigin o.
61001012	Iti nen, wene ebe wene hinilu agagisip hinetaiken horlerogon hago welagathep mekeat he, an nen wene igi iti hasik hibiku-yogoku hinakla ebetdisekho motok dogogin o.
61001013	-
61001014	At ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus nen yoknikhikhe hagat, an nebe naburlal meke elanma hasik welagei yi, nokorlogo here’isalok ibat ligin horogat welagei, iluk an nilu welagei iti nen, yogotak nebe niluk welagei ya baga, wene iti hasik hinakla eberogo yokhisekho motok dogosak apekhe lagei o.
61001015	Yabokane nebe watlagei halok, wene iti hit hinakla eberek motok dogobageik nen iluk, hanorogon yokhisekhe dogogin o.
61001016	Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obatneak etnogo ebe wageikhe meke hasik hinilurogo yokhisekhe lago iti, wene suakane akhuni inakla kagalogo pilinekharek meke iti baga lisogon yokhisekhe lago dek o. At ebe Etagapogot meke wageikhemo, ninekaerek ninileken tomok hasugu meke nen yokhisekhe lago o.
61001017	Nit o etoma werekma, ninopase Allah nen, at Yesus ebe hogorakhik, heagei wakhik, hagakhunem nit ninasuk holhugu. At Allah ebe kogat hogorakho motok welageikharek meke etnogo nen, “An na’but netaiken hunik meke noba hotok egerek ebe itiat, ”\rq (Matius 17:5; Markus 9:7; Lukas 9:35)\rq*
61001018	iluk, ane pogot oba nen usa'i agunem, nit Yesus ninom tom Allah ekaerek atom ukul iti baga dogolik ninasuk tomok holhugu.
61001019	Itithogon holhugu iti nenat, ninakla nen, “It ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen isukha meke iti eberogonat, ” iluk alebat hemurlugat negen apekhe lagagu meke, yabokane ninasuk holhugu iti baga nen, motok hutukhogon hutdisugu iti. Halok he, o mum abirat werekma, akhuni nen isagal yibarlogo 'bugunem, liarogo motok welageikharek iti hak, wene iti hinetaikenma eberogo motok waganhe dogono. Itithogon waganho werekma, yabokane o mum meke wi ekhe korlek, husagal wap dukhi agarek iti hak, at Kristus hinetaikenma liathinabisigin o.
61001020	-
61001021	Wene Allah ane iti, it akhuni inakla kagalogo ageikhe isukha dek o. Inebe akhuni mekeat he, Allah Agoreke nen inakla kagalogo yakulisekhe korlek, Allah nen isikhe wene iti yogeisekhe lagoukha iti nen, wene Allah ane holal waganogo 'bisukha meke werek iti, Allah Agoreke nen ninakla kagalhidekma, ninekaerek ninarligat nen thekekhogon hutdusak erlok dek o.
61002001	Alebat etoma, ap Allah ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke thalek wagoukhasik, inekalat ekhe lagoukha meke, Allah a'buri inaklake melarik wagoukha. Iti hakene, yabokane ap ebe wene yakulhisiliogei meke thalek hagarogo witluk, inekalat ekhe dogogun meke hinaklake aperek winam atluk wisugunat o. Winam atluk nen, wene akhuni inebe weagarinakherek wene yokhisa ukisugun. Ukitluk nen, ninoe Etagapogot nen it ninomat tilninabigiluk ninoko palhikhe mekeat he, it nen, “At he, nit ninoe dek o. Ninokodek, ” iluk la'belhe dogogun iti. La'belumo, inekaerek nen ukum ibat inoba 'bakhalok weak akhagun o.
61002002	Itithogon mekeat he, it nen inetaiken nen nukunem inekarli degat yi weak ti weak hagakhunem, akhuni doalegat nen it inobabut waganogo hagakhe dogogun iti baga, it akhuni aperek nen, Yesus oporlik lageikharek wene, ebe wene iti, abok weak ugun o.
61002003	It ap Allah ane yakulisegarek meke thalek winam asugun iti inobabut he, “Nit anek woknisanek, ” iluk egarek meke iti nen, hit nen oko wogeisoagaluk, wene inekaerek inakla nen kagalogo inekalat yokhisekhe dogogun iti. Itithogon mekeat he, it inobabut hagakhe dogogun iti baga, at Allah nen, “It iti ukum inoba ’biluk inebe weagarinabigin, ” iluk haganeat dik-dukhogon hagatdiluk welageikhe. “Huk huk, maga maga, ” iluk welageidek weagarinabigin meke werek o.
61002004	It malaikat Allah nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke aperek weak hagakhukhama, Allah nen here’isigidek, ukum yabokane inoba ’bigiluk nen, o mummo weakma iniki herle warek dogoagaluk usa’isasikhe iti.
61002005	Iti tak-tak, akhuni haganeat welagoukha eta oba dogolik, Allah ina’it meke nen inobabut weak hagakhe lagoukhama Allah nen here’isigidek. I thalukhogon inasisuagaluk inoba usa’i ageikhemo inakhe dogolik, Nuh, akhuni inobabut Allah akla warlok meke hagakhe dogoagaluk wene yogeisekhe lageikhe meke inom, inebe 7 baga aperek inom, tilinakhikhe iti.
61002006	Nen, iti tak-tagat, akhuni yabokane Allah ina’it atluk weak hagakhe dogogun meke, inakla nen, “Nit ninobabut itithogon hagakhe dogogun halok, Allah nen here’inanhidek, itithogonat ninasigin higi, ” iluk hutdekhe dogoagaluk, akhuni o Sodom meke, Gomora meke inom, Allah nen ukum inoba ’biluk motok tha’bokhogonat hetu baga inakhikhe iti.
61002007	Itithogon inakhe dogolik, at Lot anek, obabut mothogon Allah warlok meke hagakhunem, it akhuni etoma meke inekarli dek weak hagakhe lagoukha baga, at akla korlo ago motok werekma Allah nen tilhikhe iti.
61002008	It iti inobabut hagasusak dek meke weagat hagakho werek nen, at Lot obabut mot meke inakla dogolik, ileken hisigik, asuk holhik, hagakhe dogolik, hibiku-yogokuat akla korlo ago motok welageikhe.
61002009	Itithogonat, akhuni aperek Allah warlok meke hagakhunem inakla kagaligiluk wagunem, ninopase Allah Etagapogot nen tilinakhik, nen it aperek weak hagariogei meke halok, ukum yabokane inoba 'bigiluk, hagasik welageik, itithogon hagasusak ilu dogoligat erlok hagasigin o.
61002010	It iti kok hakene, Allah inakla meanetdiluk, yi meke ti meke inetaiken nen nukunem motok weak hagarik liliogei iti, Allah nen ukum inoba 'bigin o. Inayuk dek inawulagam weak hagakhe dogolik, pogot oba meke hogorinakho welageikharek meke etoma, it inayuk degat inabok weak palhe dogogun iti.
61002011	It malaikat Allah nen yoko usa'isa agarek meke iti, inobatneak. Yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlogat mekeat he, it pogot oba hogorinakharek meke iti, wene inoba 'buagaluk, ninoe Etagapogot oba wogosik lalok nen, it nen inabok weak palharek dek. Mekeat he, it ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke thalek inekalat ekhe dogogun meke iti, inobatne motok dek. It nen yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok dek dogoligat, it pogot obahogorinakharek meke iti inabok weak palhe dogogun iti.
61002012	It ap Allah ane yogeisegarek meke thalek inekalat yogeisekhe dogogun meke iti, warn etaiken dek meke ebe ha'iluk wasuagaluk ebe itaklagarek iti hak, it ap iti nen wene hutdigidek dogolik inabok weak palhe dogogun iti baga, inekaerek inebe warn wakharek iti hagat, Allah nen inasigin iti.
61002013	It nen it aperek weak hagarinakhe dogogun iti baga, Allah nen oko weak hagarinabigin iti. It he, inetaiken thebelu'buk dikeneat weak hagasu warlok nen hagakhe dogogun iti. Su hano werek korlek, mirli meke oba dabulageik, huriagap hagatlageik, hagakherek iti hak, hit pesta isago nukunem, it iti inetaiken thebelu 'buk, yi meke ti meke inetaiken nen nukunem yi weak ti weak hagakhedogoligat, hinoba ukitluk, hinom opakimo neke dogogun iti.
61002014	It ap iti inilekenma, humi param hagarinabusak iti anek wogosik ina'it ageidek weak hagakho motok dogogun iti. Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, akhuni inetaiken obatne dek werek meke nukherinakhe dogogun iti. Inobabut he, “Yi meke ti meke nit anek woknisanek, ” iluk ekhe dogouogoluk haganeat nen yakulhukhasik nen, iti mekeat inilu dogolik hagakhe dogogun iti. Itithogon hagakhe dogogun iti nen, Allah nen homan 'bisalok weagarinabigin werek o!
61002015	It iti holak mothogon lageikharek holak iti here'isalok nen, haganeat at Bileam Beor a'but holak nomokhogon lageikhe itike mutluk laga dogogun iti. At Bileam akla nen, “An weak hagakhunem oko woknesuak, ” iluk akla warlok apasikhemo,
61002016	Allah nen, “Hat weak hagakhun o, ” iluk asuk wakhikhe. Wam keledai apot oba yasuklatuk lagunem, wam keledai ane dek mekeat he, at nen Bileam yogokhe dogolik, “Hat Allah ane yogeisekhe lagan meke yi re, motok weak hagakhen o, ” iluk akhuni inane bagaat wenagakhikhe iti.
61002017	It ap iti inobabut, o hibi baga i elesi 'berelagarek iti hak, 'berelageik, oisa hisakne nen wolok lagarek iti hak, yugunat wogosik lageik, hagakhe dogogun o. Allah nen it iti o mum hikhakthek etoma dogoagaluk, inoboluk hagarogo 'bisasikhemo werek o.
61002018	Akhuni aperek inagarlak lak inerugi korloat hagakho korlek nen, here'isalok dukhisuogoluk hagakhunem, inetaiken nen nukunem yabokane weak hagasuagaluk, it ap iti inekaerek hogorakhekhe dogolik we yugunat inekalat inakla kagalhe dogogun.
61002019	Akhuni tha'bokhogonat nen, yi meke ti meke obatne atluk obatne degetdisinem, obatne asigin meke iti atuaneke welageikharek iti nen, it iti, inekaerek inebe weagarinakherek meke iti atuaneke dogolik, it akhuni aperek yogeisekhe dogolik, “Hit nit ninobabut waganugun halok he, yabokane hinasokneat asugun o, ” iluk we yugunat yogeisekhe dogogun iti.
61002020	Akhuni agat oba weak hagakharek meke yoma here'isalok, lo dukhitluk nen, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus tilninakhikhe meke ebe inilu atlugat, yabokane inapuke weak hagakharek meke iti oba ukugunem nen, mul erloma ukugunem inebe ha’isalok hagakherek hak, hageinabumo erlok degat asugun iti. Erlok degat atluk, alep weak welagoukha iti, hemurlugat hano negen. Meke re, yabokane weak asugun iti, motok kok negen weak atluk dogogun o.
61002021	It iti ebe wene mothogon mutluk lageikharek iti inilu ageidek dogolepma, hano negen dogolep. Mekeat he, inilu atluk nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti here’isalok, nomokhogon lageikharek iti nen, motok weak asugun o.
61002022	It iti, akhuni nen inane dagakhogon men iluk egarek iti hak hagakhe dogogun, “Yeke nen ’be’bak u’biluk, yabokane apuke na lagarek iti. ”\rq (Amsal 26:11)\rq* Nen, “Wam oado hano kume warek meke yabokane ’bisi hile wasi lagarek iti, ”iluk egarek iti hagat, it itithogon eberogonat hagakhe dogogun iti.
61003001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. Surat alep ageikhe holal waganogo hinoba la’i agagi iti men, yabokane la’i agei iti men, hit wene ebe hinilu mekeat, hinakla mothogon ebesubageik nen iluk la’i aga lagei iti.
61003002	Wene iti, it ap haganeat Allah nen inayoko ’bisikhemo at ane yogeisekhe lagoukha meke nen isukhaat. Nen, ninoeEtagapogot ninebe tilninakherek meke etnogo nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe meke, nit ninayoko 'biluk hinoba la’inani ageikhemo yokhisasuguat.
61003003	Wene ebe yi tak hutdusak. O ilugun hurli baga, akhuni aperek inane sagun weak meke inetaiken oba nen nukunem inakla nen kagalogo weak hagakhe dogolik, hinoba witluk, inane sagun yokhisekhe dogolik,
61003004	“Hinoe Etagapogot nen, An yabokane wisigin, iluk wene wathisasikhe etnogo ebe ki waga. Wageidek werek korlek ninopase lak arat watlagoukha mekeat, yi meke ti meke Allah nen ebekeram walhasikhemo welageikhe hagat, ikhok motok werek yi, ” iluk inane sagun yokhisasugun o.
61003005	Itithogon isi dogolik, wene yi obarlikmatdiliogei. Ebekeram Allah ane bagaat pogot walhasikhesik nen, agat i inom dapukhogon werekma, i upuke wemake la’isikhe iti baga agat walhasikhe, iluk wene iti inilu dogoligat, inokodek-inokodek iliogei iti.
61003006	Itithogon walhasikhesik nen, yabokane nen i thaluk-palukhogon hagatlasuagaluk isikhemo, agat iti i iti bagaat weagatdisikhe iti.
61003007	Meke re, pogot iti men, agat iti men, yabokane hetu baga weagatdigiluk Allah ane iti bagaat elanma hasik hago dogoluk nen, akhuni Allah ebe ina’it dogolik inobabut weak hagariogei meke iti, ukum inoba ’biluk weagarinakhik, pogot agat weagatdigik, opaki hasigat hagasigiluk eram nenat iki hago werek o.
61003008	Meke re, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. Wene opakiat yi obarlikmatdugup. Ninoe Etagapogot akla apekhe dogolik, niniki opakiat welagorek iti, 1. 000 tahun hakene apekherek. Nen, 1. 000 tahun iti, niniki opakiat welagorek iti hakeneat apekherek. Ipisak tak-tagat anek apekherek o.
61003009	It akhuni aperek nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot nen wene watnisasikhe wene etnogo, ebe ibat wageidek erapigat werek, ” iluk apiliogei iti, erapigat welageidek. Hit hinebe akmu nen, at akla nen, “It aperek nuk asunogo, ” iluk akhuni tha'bokhogonat inobabut weak hagariogei meke here'isalok inobabut hebelasuagaluk, eram nenat akla apalok huk werek iti.
61003010	Itithogon werek mekeat he, akhuni akhirak werek korlek yi meke ti meke inilarlurlu wagani ukegarek iti hak, ninoe Etagapogot wisigin iti, itithogonat wisigin o. Itinem, pogot ebe opaki hasigat hisakne ane hakene ilik-ilik dek ageik, yi meke ti meke pogot oba welagarek meke erlo inomat hetu nikik, agat ebe men, yi meke ti meke agat oba welagarek meke men, tha'bokhogonat dek ageik, hagasigin o.
61003011	-
61003012	Yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat itithogon dek asigin iti nen, hit hinobabut nikithogon hagakhe dogosak apegep. Allah nen hagasigin itinem pogot hetu 'bumo re, amulok nen tha'bokhogonat nikik, yi meke ti meke erlo inom herlenhogo nikik, hagasigin iti nen, weak hagakhidek hinobabut karelogo dogolik, hinebe Allah hasik 'bisalok, at ebe therogo dogolik, ebe ibat wisuagaluk hinobatnerogon hagakhe dogono.
61003013	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ninakla nen, “Allah nen wene watnisekhe dogolik, Pogot ket meke hagakhik, agat ket meke hagakhik, hagasiginmo etoma ukiluk mothogon anek hagakhe dogogun, ” iluk, wene watnisasikhe etnogo therogo welago.
61003014	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak e. Itithogon wisigin iluk, therogo dogolik, wene hinoba 'bakhigidegat, weak ageidegat, Allah hinom hano werekma at ebe 'bithisasuak nen, at hasik obatnerogon hagakhe dogono.
61003015	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, hinakla nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot etaiken thebekhogon dogolik, ibat wageidek aban werek iti, tilninabigiluk eram nenat aban thetnisik werek, ” iluk hinakla apano. At ninoe Paulus ebe ninakmu meke etnogo Allah nen akla kagalhikhemo wene itithogon iluk holal waganogo hinoba la'i ageikhe iti.
61003016	At nen wene surat oba hibiku-yogoku holal waganogo hinoba la'i aga dogolik, wene iti meke hasik isiat welagarek o. Meke re, wene at nen holal waganogo hinoba la'i agarek meke iti, wene aperek hutdusak erlok dek negen werek o. Werekma re, it aperek inetaiken pere aborlok werek meke nen, wene iti inokodek dogolik, wene Allah nen isikhemo Paulus nen holal waganherek meke iti men, it aperek nen holal waganhukha meke iti men, wene mot werek mekeat he, mirlokhogon korlotdiliogei iti. Wene mirlokhogon korlotdekhe dogolik, inekaerek nenat inebe weagat dakhiliogei iti.
61003017	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. Wene iti aban hagatlageidek werek korlek he, hinilurogo dogobageik iluk dopokhogon yokhisigi iti. Hinilu dogolik, hinekaerek hinetaiken horlerogonat dogono. It akhuni aperek inasuk warek dek hagakharek meke iti nen, wene korlo wene yokhisekhe dogolik, hit nen, “Eberogonat, ” iluk hinakla apalok hinetaiken horle welagap meke iti kolelogo here’isalok hinebe nuk asunogo iluk, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o!
61003018	Ninoe Etagapogot tilninakherek meke obabut hano etnogo nen woknisekherek meke iti waganhik, ebe hinilu ageik, hagakhe dogolik, hinetaiken horle atluk dogono. Yogotak ya men, yabokane men, at Yesus Kristus arligat hogorakho motok dogouok o, iluk, “Amin, ” igi iti.
62001001	Wene holal waganogo hinoba la'i ago iti ebe re, ebe wene ninilugutninakherek meke ebekeram erloma nen welagarek etnogo meke. Wene iti, nit arat ninasuk holhik, ninileken tomok higik, 'birogo welageik, niniki hakhigik, hagakhugu meke etnogoat o.
62001002	Nen, at iluk motok welagarek meke iti, ebe opase ipisak iluk motok welageikhesik nen, opase nen nit ninileken hoagaluk thelekmatdisikhemo ninileken hasugusik nenat abok yokhisekhe lago o.
62001003	Ebe nit ninileken higik, ninasuk holhik, hagakhugu meke iti, ninopase Allah a’but Yesus Kristus ipisak ninom hunik welagorek iti hak, hit nit ninom hano hunik dogouogoluk yokhisekhe lago o.
62001004	Nen, wene yi hasik ninakla arleken akhekhe lago meke iti, yabokane ninakla kokhogon eberogonat arleken akhauwogoluk holal waganogo hinoba la’i ago iti.
62001005	Allah a’but nen yoknisekhe dogolik, “Allah ebe, lia itiatma, o mum at oba welagarek motokdek o, ” iluk yoknisasikhe meke, nit ninasuk arat holhugu meke yokhisekhe lago itiat o.
62001006	Nen, nit he, ninane baga nen“At ninom hunik welago, ” iluk ekhe dogoligat he, o mummo dogolik inobabut hagakharek meke iti hagakhe lago halok he, ebeat meke hagakhidek ninekalat ekhe lago o.
62001007	Itithogon mekeat he, Allah ebe lia baga welagarek iti hak, nit meneke, lia baga dogolik, hano hagakhe lago halok he, nit-nit nagarlak-hagarlak ninom hunik werekma, nit weak hagakhunem at a'but Yesus amep oba hotninakho motok welagarek o.
62001008	Itithogonat meke re, nit nen ekhe dogolik, “Nit weak ageikhe hagakhidek, ” iluk ekhe lago halok he, ninekalat ninekaerek nukhetdakhekhe lago iti nen, ebe wene ninakla motok dek o.
62001009	Meke re, nit weak hagakho meke thelekma ’bualogon ugun halok, at Allah obabut mothogon motok dogolik, wene abok yoknisekherek hagat, hagakherethekma, nit weak hagakhorek meke thagalogo here’isalok, weak hagasuogoluk ninakla ebekhorek meke thobalninakherek.
62001010	Itithogonat meke re, nit nen he, “Weak ageikhe hagakhidek welago, ” iluk ogorek halok he, nit nen, “Allah ekalat ekherek, ” iluk u hagat ogorek iti nen, Allah ane nit ninakla motok dek o.
62002001	Nen, na’buri o. Hit weak hagakhe dogunogo iluk, wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei o. Itithogonat mekeat he, tha nen weak hagakhe halok, ninopase Allah werekma nit yomaknisekherek meke ap ageikhe turlem heisogo werek. At iti ebe Yesus Kristus obabut mot hagakherek meke etnogoat o.
62002002	At ebe itithogon turlem heisogo dogolik, nit yi weak ti weak hagakhorek meke thagalogo degetdisalok hotninakherek. Itithogon hotninakherek iti nit weak hagakhorek meke ninobasik anek ’buk. At he, yi akhuni ti akhuni agat oba meke tha'bokhogonat weak hagakharek meke inobasik ninomat hotninakherek o.
62002003	Wene Allah nen ninasuk wakherek wene iti, hologo mothogon hagakhe lago halok he, at ebe ninilu o, iluk iti baga nen ninetai ekerlogo hutdekhe lago.
62002004	Meke re, tha nen, “An he, Allah ebe nilu, ” iluk ekhe dogoligat he, at nen wene ninasuk wakherek wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhidek halok he, at ekalat ekherek iti. Halok he, ebe wene iti akla motok dek o.
62002005	Itithogon mekeat he, tha nen Allah ane hologo mothogon hagakherek halok he, yi meke ti meke ’bogokhogon hagakharek iti hak, at iti Allah motok akmurogo welagarek o. Nen, nit itithogonat welago halok, nit Allah ninom hunik welago, iluk iti bagaat ninetai ekerlogo hutdekhe lago.
62002006	Nen tha nen, “An Allah nipisak hunik welagei, ” iluk ekherek halok he, obabut at Kristus hagakhe lageikhe iti hagat, hagakhe dogosak o.
62002007	Nagarlak lak nerugi nakmu lak o. Wene ket wene hinasuk warogo holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei ’buk. O haganeat Allah nen hinasuk warogo yokhisasikhemo erloma nenat herogo welagathep mekeat o. Wene iti, at Allah nen hinasuk haganeat wakhikhemo holhigip meke etnogoat o.
62002008	Itithogon mekeat he, o mum werekma lia arik lagarek iti hak, lia ebeat meke yaknisa ageikhemo yariogo iti nen he, wene ket wene hinasuk warogo hinoba la’i agei iti o. At Kristus nen wene iti mothogon hagakhunem ebeat ageikhe iti hak, hit meneke itithogonat, wene iti mothogon hagakhunem ebeat ariogo iti.
62002009	Nen, ap tha nen, “An nebe lia baga welagei, ” iluk ekhe dogoligat he, agarlak lak erugi motok a’it halok he, o haganeat nen logat yogotak ya, at ebe mum obaat werek o.
62002010	Itithogon mekeat he, tha nen agarlak lak erugi akmurogon welagarek halok he, at ebe lia baga motok dogolik, akhuni nen it aperek waroagaluk ineram nen holak palharek iti hak, it aperek weak hagasuagaluk nukhetdisekherek dek o.
62002011	Itithogon mekeat he, tha nen agarlak lak erugi motok a'it welagarek halok he, at ebe o mum oba werek o. Itithogon werekma, mum nen ileken mumetdekhemo ebe o mum oba nekhe dogolik, “Koma laga lagei heat, ” okodek obakha palek werek o.
62002012	Na'buri o. Weak hagakhe lagagip meke Allah nen a'but Yesus hagakhikhe iti baga thagalogo here'isekhe iti nen, an nen holal waganogo hinoba la'i agei o.
62002013	Nopase lak o. At alebageik erlo baga nen welagarek meke etnogo ebe hinilu agagisip welagap iti nen, holal waganogo hinoba la'i agei. Nen, elege nagarumi o. Hit nen at obabut weak meke etnogo arat obatne degetdisigip welagap iti nen, holal waganogo hinoba la'i agei o.
62002014	Yekerugi na'buri o. Ninopase Allah hinilu agagisip welagap iti nen, holal waganogo hinoba la'i ageik, hit nopase lak, at alebageik erloma nen welagarek meke etnogo ebe hinilu agagisip welagap iti nen holal waganogo hinoba la'i ageik, hit elege nagarumi, hit hinobatne werekma Allah ane hinakla werekmaat, at obabut weak meke arat obatne degetdisigip iti nen, holal waganogo hinoba la'i ageik, hagakhi iti o.
62002015	Meke re, akhuni agat oba meke inobabut inikhok hagakharek meke iti inom, yi meke ti meke agat oba welagarek meke iti inom, hinetaiken hunik dogosak motok dek o. Tha nen it akhuni agat oba meke inobabut inikhok hagakharek meke iti, etaiken hunik welagarek halok he, ninopase Allah etaiken hunik welagarek motok dek o.
62002016	Nen, akhuni agat oba meke inobabut inikhok hagakharek he, inoba agaken dageigik, yi meke ti meke inileken nen halok warlok apigik, agat oba meke hasik hogorakhigik, hagakharek iti tha'bokhogonat, erlo ninopase Allah 'buk. Erlo re, agat oba mekeat o.
62002017	Akhuni agat oba meke inobabut inikhok hagakharek iti inom, yi meke ti meke warlok iluk hagakharek iti inom, dek arik wiriogo mekeat he, akhuni Allah akla warlok apekherek meke hagakharek meke iti anek he, iniluk motok dogogun o.
62002018	Na'buri o. O yogotak he, o ilugun oba welago o. Akhuni aperek nen, “Yabokane ap ageikhe Kristus inom motok weak meke wisigin, ” iluk yokhisasukhama, hinasuk holhigip iti hak, o yogotak he, Kristus inom weak meke inebe doalegat arat thelekma asi ageikhasik werek iti nen he, nit nen, “O yogotak eberogonat o ilugun oba welago, ” iluk ninetai eketlatluk hutdekhe lago.
62002019	It akhuni iti inebe re, nit meke palek mekeat he, it inebe eberogonat nit werekmake meke dek o. It inebe eberogonat nit werekmake meke dogolepma re, inebe nit ninom motogat dogolo. Meke re, it iti inebe tha’bokhogonat nit meke dek, ninat meke ekagat hagatlasuagaluk dukhisukha iti o.
62002020	Itithogon meke re, hit anek he, Yesus Kristus Allah nen ekaerek ’bakhasikhe meke etnogo nen Allah Agoreke wokhisasikhemo ebeat wene hinebe tha’bokhogonat hinilu agagisip welagap o.
62002021	An nen wene holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei iti, ebeat wene hinokodek nen ’buk. Hinilu welagap iti nenat la’i agei o. Nen, inekalat egarek iti erlo, Allah ebeat meke nen ’buk. Erlo ninat, iluk hiniluat o.
62002022	At ekalat ekherek meke iti ebe tha apegep. At iti nen, “Yesus ebe Kristus dek o, ” iluk kolelogo la’isekherek meke iti dek nogo? Itiat o. At Kristus inom motok weak meke ebe re, ninopase Allah a’but Yesus inom inebe kolelogo la’isekherek meke itiat o.
62002023	Tha nen, “Allah a'but iti, ebe na'it, ” iluk kolelogo la'ekhe halok, opase Allah ebe waganhidegat o. Nen, tha nen, “Allah a'but ebe itiat o, ” iluk ane pakhogon ekhe halok, opase Allah ebe waganheat o.
62002024	Nen, hit he, wene alebat hinasuk holhigip meke iti, hinakla waganiluk nen, eberek motogat dogono. Itithogon eberek dogogun halok he, hinebe ninopase Allah a'but Yesus ipisak hinom hunik dogogun o.
62002025	Nen, at ekaerek nen, “Wokhisagein, ” iluk abok yoknisasikhe etnogo, ninebe naburlal-haburlal hagatninabigiluk isikhe o.
62002026	Wene yi tha'bokhogonat it akhuni hit nukhetdinagouogoluk walhiliogei meke hasik holal waganogo hinoba la'i agei o.
62002027	At Kristus nen Allah Agoreke wokhisasikhemo hinakla dogolik, yi meke ti meke hasik, ekalat yakulhisigidek, eberogonat anek yakulhisiliogo iti nen, akhuni aperek nen wene hit yakulhisausak erlok dek o. Wene at nen yakulhisiliogo meke iti mothogonat hagakhe dogolik, Kristus hinom hunik motogat dogono o.
62002028	Na'buri o. Kristus wisigin itinem ebe wagunem, nit ninekarli ageidek, ninayuk degat, at elokhoma apma ukuok nen, hit at hinom hunik motok dogono o.
62002029	At Kristus Allah a'but obabut hano mothogon anek hagakherek etnogo hinilu halok he, hit hinakla nen he, “It akhuni aperek inobabut hano mothogon hagakharek meke inebe tomok Allah a'buri yabokane itaginakhemo werek, ” iluk hinilu asusagat o.
62003001	At Allah nen he, “It yi an na'buri, ” iluk itakninakhikhemo eberogonat nit ninebe at a'buri welago. Itithogon welagorek iti nen, ninebe at akmu motok welagarek iti 'bikhani! Itithogonat mekeat he, it akhuni agat oba meke inobabut inikhok meke emenogo nenAllah ebe inokodek iti nen he, nit ninebe inokodegat o.
62003002	Nagarlak lak nerugi, nakmu lak o. Yogotak nit ninebe Allah a'buri welago meke re, yabokane ninebe dogogun meke thelekma ageidek aban limago werek o. Itithogonat meke re, nit ninilu re, Yesus ebe yogotak werek meke ninileken hutukhogon hugun iti nen, at wisigin itinem ebe wagunem, nit ninebe at ebe werek iti hagat, hagatlasugun o.
62003003	Nit ninakla nen, “Itithogon hagatlasugun, ” iluk oba eberek welagorek meke ninebe tomok nen, at Kristus ekaerek ebe karelek welagarek iti hak, nit itithogonat karelekhe dogosak o.
62003004	Nen, akhuni nen weak hagakharek iti Allah aneat thagalharek iti nen, tha nen weak hagariogo halok, Allah aneat thagalogo hagariogo.
62003005	At Kristus ekaerek weak hagakhidek dogolik, nit weak hagakhorek meke thagalogo degetdisagaluk ebe thelekmaat wageikhe iti hinilu o.
62003006	Iti nenat, nit at ninom hunik motok welago meke, ninebe tomok weak hagakho motok welagorek dek. Meke re, it akhuni aperek weak anek hagakho motok welageikharek meke inebe tomok, at ebe inileken higidek inokodegat werek o.
62003007	Na'buri o. It akhuni aperek nen nukhetdinagunogo iluk hinobabut hebelogo dogono o. Tha nen obabut mothogon hagakherek halok he, at Kristus obabut mothogon hagakherek iti hagat, hagakho werek o.
62003008	Nen, at ageikhe nen obabut weak hagakho motok welagarek halok he, at Iblis obabut erlo baga nenat weak hagakherethekma nogo nen, at iti ebe Iblis a'but werek o. Meke re, at Allah a'but thelekmaat wageikhe iti, at Iblis obabut hagakherek meke iti, motok degetdisagaluk wageikhe o.
62003009	Nen, akhuni Allah nen itaginakherek meke inebe tomok, at obabut waganiluk hagakharek iti nen, weak hagakho motok dogosak dek. Inebe Allah a'buriat dogolik weak hagakho motok welageikharek dek o.
62003010	Allah a'buri inom, Iblis a'buri inom, ninetai ekerlogo inobabut ekagat hagatlariogo yi. Tha nen obabut mothogon hagakhidegat, agarlak lak erugi akmurinakhidegat, hagariogo halok, at iti ebe Allah a'but dek o.
62003011	Wene Allah nen he, “Hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon dogono o, ” iluk yoknisasikhe meke, akhuni aperek nen yokhisasukhama erloma nen hinasuk holhigip itiat o.
62003012	Nit nen he, at Kain ebe Iblis obabut weak meke iti a'but ageikhesik ekaerek agot meke wakhikhe iti hagat, hagasusak dek o. At nen agot wakhikhe iti, nenaluk wakhikhe. At hagakhe lageikhe meke korlo motok nen, agot hagakhe lageikhe meke mot motok, iti nenat wakhikhe o.
62003013	Halok he, nagarlak lak nerugi o. Akhuni agat oba meke nen, hit ina'it motok hagathinakho halok he, “Nayuk o, ” iluk hinelabut hikhup o.
62003014	Allah nen ninebe watlageikharekma nen wokninabiluk iniluk welageikharekma 'binanhemo welago iluk, nit-nit ninagarlak lak ninerugi ninom nakmu-hakmurogon welago iti nen hutdekhe lago o. Halok he, tha nen akhuni aperek akmurogon dek, a'it welagarek meke iti ebewatlageikharekma etomaat werek o.
62003015	Inagarlak lak inerugi motok ina'it welageikharek meke iti, it inebe tomok akhuni inakharek mekeat o. Nen, it akhuni inakharek meke iti, inebe tomok naburlal-haburlal iteerek ageidek motok werek o, iluk ninilu o.
62003016	At Kristus nen tak nit akmutninakhikhesigat, ebe nit ninobasik eram nenat watlageikhe iti nen, nit nen it akhuni aperek inakmurinakharek wene iti, hutdekhe lago. Hutdekhe dogolik, at hagakhikhe iti hagat, nit ninagarlak lak ninerugi inebe ninakmu nen, ninebe it inobasik watlasusak hanoat o.
62003017	Meke re, tha nen at ameke yi meke ti meke agat oba meke 'biluk dogolik, agarlak ageikhe yi meke ti meke erlageik werekma ileken halogat he, ageikhe wogokhidek etaiken a'bet aga halok, at iti obabut he, Allah nen akmutninakherek iti hakene werek apegep? Motok dek o.
62003018	Halok he, na’buri o. Nit nen akhuni aperek ninakmurinakhidek dogoligat he, ninape baga anek he, “Ninakmurinakhe dogouok o, ” iluk ekhe dogosak erlok dek o. At he, inebe ninakmurinabiluk, niniki baga nen eberogonat yomageisekhe dogouok o.
62003019	-
62003020	Nit nen ninobabut itithogon hagakhe dogolik, ninakla nen he, “Nit ninebe Allah eberogonat meke a’buri welago, ” iluk hutdusak. Itithogon hutdekhe dogolik, nit weak hagakho, iluk ninakla akin welago halok, nit ninebe erlok dek meke re, at Allah anek he, ebe kok dogolik, yi wene ti wenetha’bokhogonat ilu anek welagarek, iluk, at ilhanem ninakla the ninayuk dekhogonat dogosak o.
62003021	Halok he, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu o. Nit ninakla nen, “An weak ageikhe hagakhi, ” iluk wene munini ebekhidek, ninakla the welago halok he, at elokhoma ninayuk dekhogon dogolik
62003022	at nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene mothogon hagakhik, at ilhanem akla hanorogon anek hagakhik, hagakhe lago iti nen, nit yi meke ti meke kino yogokhunem, at nen woknisiliogo.
62003023	At nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe iti, ebe re, “Hit hinetaiken an na’but Yesus Kristus oba hakotdiluk, at nen yokhisekhe iti hagat, hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon dogono o, ” iluk ninasuk wakhikhe itiat o.
62003024	Nit Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhe lago halok he, at Agoreke woknisasikhemo ninakla werek, iti baga, nit at ninom hunik, nen, at nit ninom hunik welago, iluk hutdekhe lago.
62004001	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nakmu lak o. Akhuni inebe doalegat nen, “Nit nen Allah ane yokhisekhe lago, ” iluk inekalat iliogei meke inebe arat thelekma ageikhasik, o yi ai ti ai liliogei iti nen he, aperek hinoba witluk, wene yokhisugunem, hit nen he, “Allah Agoreke akla dogolik yoknisiliogo, ” iluk hinetaiken inoba ebekhup o. At he, “Eberogonat Allah Agoreke akla dogolik iliogo a? Ninat meke akla dogolik yoknisiliogo a, ” iluk inobabut tak paliluk nen, inebe hutdisekhe dogono o.
62004002	Hit nen he, “At iti Allah Agoreke meke akla werek a? Ninat meke a, ” iluk inobabut tak palhe dogosak iti yigithogon. It aperek witluk nen, “At Yesus Kristus iti, Allah nen la'i ageikhemo eberogonat abat itaklasi ageikhe, ” iluk pakhogon egarek meke nen isi halok he, hit nen he, “It iti Allah Agoreke inakla dogolik iliogei, ” iluk hutdisekhe dogosak o.
62004003	Itithogon mekeat he, it aperek nen Yesus hasik wene itithogon pakhogon egarek dek meke nen isi halok he, hit nen he, “It iti inakla Allah Agoreke ’buk. Ninat meke werek o, ” iluk hutdisekhe dogosagat o. It iti hasik wene Allah nen haganeat yoknisekhe dogolik, “At ageikhe Kristus inom motok weak meke wisigin etnaga o, ” iluk yoknisasikhe meke, hinasuk holhigip etnaga, yogotak agat oba yoma inebe arat thelekma ageikhasik werek itiat o.
62004004	Meke re, na’buri o. It akhuni agat oba meke inakla welagarek meke iti obatne dek mekeat he, hit anek he, hinebe Allah a’buriatma, at Agoreke obatne motok horleak meke hinakla werek iti nen he, it ap iti inobatne degetdisalokwelagap iti o.
62004005	It iti inebe akhuni agat oba meke a’buri nogo nen he, it nen wene agat oba wene isinem, inane it akhuni agat oba meke nen inasuk holharek iti.
62004006	Meke re, nit he, ninebe Allah a’buri meke dogolik ninane isinem, it aperek Allah ebe inilu meke halok, inasuk holhik, nen, it aperek inebe Allah a’buri meke ’buk, ninat halok he, inasuk holhidek here’isigik, hagakharek o. Itithogon hagakhunem nit nen he, “Allah ebeat meke Agoreke it iti inakla werek, nen it aperek iti mokat nukhetdinanherek meke inakla werek, ” iluk ekagat hutdisogorek iti o.
62004007	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nakmu lak o. Akhuni aperek inakmurinakharek iti erlo, at Allah at iti nenat, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogouok o. Akhuni nakmu-hakmurogon dogogun meke, inebe dopok Allah nen itaginakhikhemo, at a’buri dogolik, at ebe iniluat werek o.
62004008	Nen, at Allah obabut he, nit akmutninakho welagarek iti nen, tha nen nakmu-hakmurogon dogogin dek halok, at iti nen Allah ebe okodek werek o.
62004009	Meke re, Allah nen, “Hit hinebe nakmu welagei, ” iluk thelekmatdigiluk, a’but opakiat itago etnogo nen, ninilugutninabuagaluk agat oba usa’i ageikhe iti o.
62004010	It aperek inakmurinakharek iti ebe re, nit nen Allah ninakmurakhugu ’buk. Dek o. At Allah nen nit akmutninakhikhesik, at nen nit weak hagakhorek meke thagalogo degetdisalok hotninabuagaluk, a’but ninoba usa’i ageikhe iti o.
62004011	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Nakmu lak o. At Allah nen nit itithogon akmutninakhikhe iti nen, nit meneke, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogouok o.
62004012	Nen, Allah ebe iti, akhuni ageikhe nen inileken motok higidek o. Mekeat he, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogogun halok he, Allah ninom hunik motok dogogun o. Itithogon werekma, ebekeram Allah nen akmutninakhe dogolik, akla apasikhe iti hagat, yi meke ti meke hano 'bogokhogon hagakharek iti hak, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogoagaluk 'bogokhogon hagatninabiogo iti.
62004013	Allah nen Agoreke woknisasikhe iti baga, nit nen apekhe dogolik, “At nit ninom hunik werek. Nen, nit at ninom hunik welago, ” iluk hutdekhe lago o.
62004014	Nit nen he, “Allah nen a'but ninileken hekhe lagagu meke iti nen, nit akhuni agat oba meke tilninabuagaluk la'i ageikhemo, ” iluk abok pakhogon yokhisekhe lago.
62004015	Tha nen, “Yesus iti Allah a'but, ” iluk pakhogon yogeisekherek meke halok, at Allah nen at ipisak hunik motok, nen, at nen Allah ipisak hunik motok, welageikharek o.
62004016	Nit nen, “Allah nen akmutninakherek iti hutdogosik eberogonat, ” iluk apekhe lago. At obabut akmutninakho motok welagarek iti nen, tha nen obabut akhuni akmurinakho motogat welagarek halok he, Allah nen at ipisak hunik motok, nen, at nen Allah ipisak hunik motok, welageikharek.
62004017	At Kristus welagarek iti hak, nit agat oba itithogonat welago iti nen, yabokane Allah nen nit ninitema waganogo ukum ninoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin itinem ninekarli dek dogogun. Ninekarli dekhogon dogoagaluk ebekeram Allah nen akmutninakhe dogolik, akla apasikhe iti hagat, yi meke ti meke hano 'bogokhogon hagakharek iti hak, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogoagaluk 'bogokhogon hagatninabiogo iti o.
62004018	Akhuni aperek nen it aperek inomnakmu-hakmurogon dogolik, inayuk dek welageikharek iti nen, yi meke ti meke 'bogokhogon hagakharek iti hak, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhe lago meke iti 'bogokhogon motok hagatlaga dogolik he, ninobabut ninayuk meke iti dek agarek. Meke re, it akhuni aperek inobabut inayuk meke iti, inakla nen he, “Eiye! Allah nen yabokane ukum ninoba 'bigin a? Dek a, ” iluk inobabut yukthek welageikharek o. Itithogon welageikharek iti nen, nakmu-hakmurogon hagakharek meke iti inakla hano 'bogokhogon hagatlagarek motok dek o.
62004019	Ebekeram Allah nen tak akmutninakhikhesikmo re, nit meneke, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogouok o.
62004020	Itithogon mekeat he, akhuni nen inagarlak lak inerugi inileken hisegarek meke inakmu dek dogoligat he, Allah inileken hegarek dek meke inakmu dogosak apegep? Erlok dek o. Halok he, at ageikhe agarlak lak erugi motok a’it welagarek meke nen, “An Allah nakmu, ” iluk iliogo halok he, ekalat iliogo o.
62004021	Iti nen, at Kristus nen ninasuk wakhe dogolik, “Allah hinakmurogon dogolik, hinagarlak lak hinerugi hinakmurogonat dogono o, ” iluk yoknisasikhe iti.
62005001	Akhuni nen he, “Yesus iti Allah nen ayoko ’biluk la’i ageikhe meke eberogonat Kristus etnogoat o, ” iluk inetaiken at oba hakotdegarek meke inebe tomok he, Allah nen itaginakhemo, at a’buri werek o. Nen, nit ninopase Allah ninakmurogon dogolik halok he, at a’buri itago meke iti ninakmurogon dogosagat o.
62005002	Itithogon ninakmurogo dogosak iluk hutdiluk, Allah ebe ninakmurogo dogolik, wene at nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhe dogolik, at a’buri itaginakhe meke iti ninakmurogo dogosagat o.
62005003	-
62005004	Nit Allah nen itakninakhe meke ninebe tomok nen, “Allah ane iti eberogonat, ” iluk ninetaiken at oba hakotdogorek iti baga, it akhuni agat oba meke inobabut inikhogat dogolik weak hagakharek meke iti obatne degetdisalok ninobatne agorek o. Itithogon obatne degetdisalok ninobatne agorek iti nen, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti akin dek, alhe motok o. Iti nen he, nit nen, “Allah ebe ninakmu welago, ” iluk u hak he, at nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhe dogouok o.
62005005	Akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik weak hagakharek meke obatne degetdisalok inobatne ageikharek iti thani nen nogo? Iti nit nen, “Yesus iti Allah a'but, ” iluk ninetaiken at oba hakotdogorek meke anegat o.
62005006	At Yesus Kristus agat oba usa’ageikhesik werekma ima anek usakhukha ’buk. Ima usa’igik, amep ulabogo wakhik, hagakhukha. Itithogon hagakhukha iluk, at Allah Agoreke wene eberogonat anek yoknisekherek meke etnogo nen pakhogon yoknisekho welagarek o.
62005007	-
62005008	Yesus iti Kristus at o, iluk, akhuni inebe 3 nen inane opakiat meke pakhogon u hakene, Allah Agoreke nen igik, Yesus ebe ima usakhukha iti baga igik, amep ulabogo wakhukha iti baga igik, thelekma ageikhe iti o.
62005009	Wene akhuni nen pakhogon yoknisugunem, “Eberogonat, ” iluk hutdogorek iti erlok dek. Itithogon mekeat he, at Allah ebe a’but abok pakhogon yoknisasikhe iti anek he, “Motok eberogonat, ” iluk hutdusagat o.
62005010	Akhuni inetaiken Allah a’but oba hakotdiliogei meke nen he, “Wene iti eberogonat o, ” iluk inakla nen hutdiliogei. Itithogon mekeat he, akhuni aperek inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke nen he, “Wene Allah ekaerek nen a’but hasik abok isikhe wene iti eberogonat, ” iluk apigidek dogolik, Allah ekalat ekherek meke negen hagarogo ’biliogei o.
62005011	At Allah nen a’but hasik wene pakhogon yoknisekhe dogolik, “Inebe iniluk motok welageikharek iti, erlo re, an na’buratma, an nen Yesus ebe wokhisekhe dogolik, naburlal-haburlal ebeat meke wokhisasigi iti, ” iluk yoknisasikhe.
62005012	Akhuni nen Allah a’but ebe waganha halok he, naburlal-haburlalat waganhasik iteerek ageikhasik werek o. Meke re, it aperek nen Allah a'but ebe waganhidek halok he, naburlal-haburlal waganiluk iteerek ageidegat werek o.
62005013	Hit hinetaiken Allah a'but oba hakotdiluk welagap meke hinakla nen he, “Naburlal-haburlal iteerek agosik welago, ” iluk hinilu asubageik iluk, wene tha'bokhogonat yi holal waganogo hinoba la'i agei o.
62005014	Nen, nit yi meke iti meke Allah akla warlok apekherek meke tak-tagat, at nen woknisoagaluk kino yogokhunem ninane asuk holheregat iti iluk hutdiluk, at ilhanem ninayuk dekhogonat kino yogokhe dogosak o.
62005015	Iti nen he, nit nen, “Nena meke Allah kino yogokhunem, at nen ninane asuk holherek iti, ” ninilu halok he, “Nit yi meke ti meke kino yogokho etnogo arat woknisekhemo iteerek agosik welago, ” iluk ninilu o.
62005016	-
62005017	It akhuni aperek weak motok hagakharethek nen, inobabut oba inebe motok-motok watlasugun meke werek iti hasik, hit nen Allah ayoko 'busak, iluk yokhisigi dek o. At he, inobabut mot hagasusak meke werek korlegat he, korlo palogo weak hagakharek iti tha'bokhogonat etaga weak mekeat he, it aperek nen weak hagakhunem inobabut oba inebe motok-motok watlasusak dek meke hagakharek meke weregat o. Meke re, hit Allah a'buri meke hinagarlak lak hinerugi aperek weak hagakhunem obabut oba ebe motok-motok watlasusak dek meke hagakhe halok, at hasik Allah ayoko 'bumo, at nen naburlal-haburlal ebeat meke wogosigin werek o.
62005018	Nit Allah a'buri itakninakhe meke at a'but alebageik itakhikhe meke etnogo nen thetnisik werekma, at obabut weak meke etnogo nen iki haknisagein dek o. Halok he, nit weak hunik motok hagakhe dogosak dek, iluk ninilu o.
62005019	It akhuni agat oba meke inobabut inikhok meke iti tha'bokhogonat he, at obabut weak meke etnogo iki baga welageikharek. Itithogon welageikharek mekeat he, nit anek he, Allah ebeat a'buri meke welago, iluk ninilu o.
62005020	At Allah a'but ninoba usa'ageikhesik, Allah ebeat meke ninilu asuagaluk ninetaiken kagalogo yoknisasikhe. Itithogon yoknisasikhemo, nit he, Allah ebeat meke a'but Yesus Kristus ipisak ninom hunik motok welago. Nen, at Yesus ebe Allah ebeat meke dogolik naburlal-haburlal erlo arat welagarek o.
62005021	Halok he, na'buri o. At ebeat meke welagarek iti here'isalok, kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik weak hagakharek iti hak, hagasunogo iluk, agorlerakhe dogolik, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o.
63001001	-
63001002	An nen, Allah a'buri therisik dogoagaluk, at nen meldanhikhe meke hinoe etnogo nen, hit Allah a’buri itakhinakhikhe meke hinebe re, he opakiat meke ebe Allah nen wenakhikhe meke eagei inom hakenema, wene yi heagei warogo holal waganogo hinoba la’i agei o. Hinebe eberogonat nakmu o. An narligat anek hinebe nakmu welagei ’buk. It inebe tha’bokhogonat ninom ebeat wene yogotak ninakla dogoluk yabokane motok-motogat dogogin meke iti waganhukhasik inilu agoukha meke nen inakmuthinakhaat o.
63001003	Iti nen, nagarlak lak nerugi. Nit ebe wene waganiluk, nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon werekma, ninopase Allah a’but Yesus Kristus ipisak inobabut hano etnogo nen hano meke woknisigik, inakmutdinanhik, ninetaiken hapugutdinanhik, hagakhe dogoak o.
63001004	Hit hinebe re, he opakiat meke eagei hakene dogolik, hinebe aperek ninopase Allah nen ebeat wene ninasuk wakhikhe etnogo mothogon hagakhe lagap meke hinobabut palhirik, nakla arleken motok akhekhe lagei o.
63001005	Iti nen he, neru o. Wene ket meke holal waganogo heagei hinomat werekma hinoba la’i agei ’buk. Dek o. Nit ebeat wene iti hutdisugumo, at Allah nen nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogoagaluk erlo baga nenat ninasuk wakhikhemo ninilu meke holal waganogo hinoba la'i agei iti o.
63001006	Nit-nit nakmu-hakmurogon dogosak iti ebe re, wene Allah nen ninasuk wakhikhe wene etnogo mothogon hagakhe dogosak itiat o. Wene ninasuk wakhikhe iti re, ebe yi, “Hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhe dogono, ” iluk erlo baga nen ninasuk wakhikhemo holhugu iti hagat hagakhe dogosagat o.
63001007	Itithogon hagakhe dogosak iti, it akhuni inebe doalegat nen, “Yesus Kristus iti abat itaklasi ageidek, ” iluk, nukhetdisegarek meke inebe thelekma ageikhasik agat oba yi ai ti ai tha’bokhogonat liliogei iti nen, nakmu-hakmurogon hagakhe dogosak igi iti o. It iti inebe re, Kristus inom motok weak dogolik akhuni nukhetdisegarek meke etnogoat o.
63001008	Nen, nit nen hit hagatdinagakhe lagagu etnogo hasik, hit aperek oko waganhidek nuk asunogo iluk, tha’bokhogonat waganubageik nen he, hinobabut hebelogo dogono o. Dogolik Allah nen, “Hit oko wokhisagein, ” iluk wene abok yoknisasikhe etnogo, hit aperek nuk ageidek tha’bokhogonat horlobageik nen, hinobatnerogon hagakhe dogono o.
63001009	Tha nen wene Kristus nen yakulnisasikhe wene iti baga dukhogon hagakho welageidek, ninat meke hagakherek halok he, Allah ebe iteerek ageidek werek o. Itithogon mekeat he, tha nen wene Kristus nen yakulnisasikhe wene iti baga dukhogon hagakho dogogin halok he, ninopase Allah inom, a’but Yesus inom, ipisak iteerek agasik werek o.
63001010	-
63001011	Akhuni aperek nen wene Kristus nen yakulnisasikhe wene dek, ninat wene yakulhisa agunem, tha nen akhuni inobabut itigirlik meke heagei warogo aila waganhunem, at obabut weak hagakherek meke iti obabut horlekherek iti nen he, hit nen akhuni inobabut itigirlik meke heagei warogo hinaila woginabusak motok dek o.
63001012	Wene doalegat hinoba la'isusak werek mekeat he, disu apusu thuesika baga holal waganusak, na'it o. Ninakla arleken akhekhe lago meke iti ebenageikmo arleken akhauwogoluk, opakimo wenekak ninom ninilhaoak hut-hut uogoluk, an nebe hinoba wisigin apekhe lagei o.
63001013	He ageikhe Allah nen wenakhikhe meke, eagei nen inagosa he ebe heagei wasu hak, it Allah a'buri yoma meke nen, hit heagei wathinakha o.
64001001	Gayus nagarlak o. An nen Allah a'buri therisik dogoagaluk meldanhikhe meke hinoe etnogo netaiken oba nen hebe eberogonat nakmu welagei, iluk, wene yi holal waganogo hoba la'i agei o.
64001002	Nagarlak o. Hat hetaiken Allah baga hakotdiluk dogolik hano welagan iti hagat, hoba u dek hano dogolik yi hasik ti hasik hano hagakhe dogonogoluk, sembayan hat hobasik ekhe lagei o.
64001003	Hat nen ebe wene hasuk hologo hano hagakhetek iti nen, it Allah a'buri nagarlak lak aperek noba wageikhesik, men yoknekha, “At nen ebeat wene herogo dogolik hano mothogon hagakherek, ” iluk habok yoknekhama nasuk holhirik nen, nakla arleken motok akhekhe lagei o.
64001004	Itithogon isinem an nen yi hasik ti hasik nakla arleken herlekha'bugat negen akhegerek mekeat he, hit hinebe an na'buri nen ebe wene herogo dogolik, hano mothogon hagakhunem nasuk holherethek nen, nakla arleken motok kogat akhegerek iti o. Gayus hogorakhikhe wene
64001005	-
64001007	Nagarlak hebe nakmu o. Hat ha'it ageidek Allah a’buri nagarlak lak nerugi inebe hilu meke hokodek meke tha’bokhogonat yomageisekhe lagan meke nen he, “At nen nit akmutninabiluk itithogon woknisekhe, ” iluk Allah a’buri yoma meke yogeisa ageikhama nasuk holhi o. Itithogon hagakhen iti hak, it iti nen Kristus obasik akhuni aperek wene inokodek meke yogeisa lagunem, it nen yi meke ti meke ageikhe wogeisigidek meke re, hat nen Allah akla hanorogon yomageisalok la’isekhe dogoumo, hano o.
64001008	It iti ebe wene Allah ane etnogo hasik hagariogei iti, nit ninom nenat hagasu hak hagakhe dogoak nen, yomageisekhe dogosagat o. Diotrefes Demetrius ipisak inobasik yogokhikhe wene
64001009	An nen hit Allah a’buri inobasik holal ’berorlagat waganogo hinoba la’i agagi mekeat he, at Diotrefes akla nen he, “An Allah a’buri inoe kok hagatlasu warlok, ” iluk apiliogo meke iti anek he, an nane hologo hagariogo dek iti o.
64001010	Itithogon hagariogo iti, ageikhe, ekalat nit ninabok weak iliogo. Itithogon ekhe dogolik, akla nen he, “An hagakhe lagei iti, herlekha’bugat. Nakla nen erlok dek. Yabokane ageikhe inomat hagasiginat o, ” iluk apekhe dogolik, it Allah a’buri aperek wagunem, at ekaerek nen woginakhidek dogolik, it aperek nen woginabuogoluk hagakhunem wenageisalok, inebe Allah a’burinatogokharekma nen mukhogo ula’isekheregat iti nen, an nebe witluk nen, at hagariogo meke iti hutduagaluk ekarli wasigin o.
64001011	Nagarlak o. Hebe nakmu. Hat nen he, it akhuni inobabut weak hagakharek meke iti, inobabut waganhun o. It inobabut hano hagakharek meke halok, inobabut waganhe dogono o. Tha nen obabut hano anek hagakherek meke iti ebe Allah a'but mekeat he, tha nen obabut weak anek hagakherek meke halok, at nen Allah ebe ileken hekerek dek okodek o.
64001012	Itithogon mekeat he, at Demetrius hasik anek he, akhuni tha’bokhogonat men, at Allah eberogonat anek ekherek etnogo men, an men, “At hano hagariogo, ” iluk abok hano ogorek. At abok ogorek iti, eberogonat hano ogorek iti hit hinilu o. Wene ilugun oba arat heagei warinakhikhe wene
64001013	An nen wene doalegat hoba la’i isusak werek mekeat he, disu apusu baga holal waganogo hoba la’i isusak na’it aga o.
64001014	An nebe ibat-ibat hoba witluk wenekak ninom ninilhaoak oba hut-hut ugun o, iluk apekhe lagei.
64001015	At Allah obabut hano etnogo nen hetaiken hapugutdagakhe dogoak o. Nagarlak. Nen, it ninagarlak lak ninerugi yoma meke ninom hunik meke nen heagei wathakhaat o. Nen, nit ninagarlak lak nerugi ninom hunik meke o etoma werek meke, “At nen heagei wathinakhe, ” iluk inebe tomok inetaga ’bikhigik yogeisano o. Nagarlak.
65001001	An Yudas, Yakobus agot, Yesus Kristus atuaneke etnogo nen, hit wene yi holal waganogo hinoba la'i agei iti. Nagarlak lak nerugi. Allah nenat hinayoko 'bisikhesik hinebe akmu dogolik, Yesus Kristus hasik thethisik werek iti.
65001002	At Allah nen hinebe akmuthinakhik, hinetaiken hapugutdinagagik, hit-hit nakmu-hakmurogo dogoagaluk hagathinakhik, kokhogon hagathinakhe dogoak o.
65001003	-
65001004	Nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. Wene Allah nen hit ninomat tilninakhikhe etnogo hasik wene holal waganogo hinoba la'isigiluk nakla eberek motok welagarik nen, yabokane netaiken thebelusak erlok dek agama re, wene men hasik la'i agei iti. Iti, it akhuni aperek Allah ebe ina'it meke nit ninobakha palek werek korlek ninakla ukitluk nen, Allah obabut hano nen wokninakherek meke iti, it nen dagakhogon wene ninat meke yokhisekhe dogolik, “Weak meke yugunat hagakhe dogosak, ” iluk, ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus obatneak etnogo ebe here’isalok, hagariogei iti. Itithogon hagariogei iti nen, Allah nen, “Ukum itithogon inoba ’bigin, ” iluk isikhemo haganeat nen holal waganogo ’bisukhama werek. Wene Allah nen opaki hasigat nit a’buri woknisasikhemo ninetaiken oba hakotdiluk welago iti meke, it iti nen degetduogoluk hagakhunem, hit nen irlirli waganogo hinobatnerogo hago dogobageik iluk hinakla kagalogo la’i agei iti.
65001005	Wene yokhisagein yi, haganeat nen hinilu mekeat he, yabokane hinakla ebetdinagagin iti. Ninoe Etagapogot nen a’buri Israel meke o Mesir werekma tilinakhikhe mekeat he, yabokane it meke aperek inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk welagoukha dek meke inakhikhe.
65001006	Nen, at Allah nen it malaikat yoko usa’isa agarek meke hagasusak meke supurogo wogeisasikhe mekeat he, it ninat meke inagarlak lak hagasusak meke inakhane pok lalok inekaerek inaila here’isukhama, Allah nen herle motok dogogin meke baga iniki herle warogo o motok mummo agat abel wemake ’bisasikhemo werek iti. Itithogon motok dogoluk nen, yabokane akhuni ukum kokhogon inoba ’bigin itinem, it inomat inoba ’bigiluk nen, iniki herle hisalinabigin iti hinakla ebetni.
65001007	It hagakhukha tak-tagat, it akhuni o Sodom meke men, Gomora meke men, o ukul inaliluke meke inomat nen, param hagarinakhik, ap-ap, humi-humi hagasusak dek meke hagakhik, hagakhukha baga, ukum he, hetu nasi motok welagarekma motok dogoagaluk, la’isasikhemo etoma werek, iluk, nit akhuni tha’bokhogonat hutdekhe dogosak.
65001008	Itithogonat, it akhuni iti ina’bi hiliogei thalek inetaiken dek dogolik, inekaerek inebe weagatdakhigik, ninopase Etagapogot inakla meanetdigik, pogot oba hogorinakharek meke iti inabok weak igik, hagariogei.
65001009	At Mikhael, malaikat Allah nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke inoe kok iti nen, it ap iti hagariogei iti hak, hagasu ayuk welageikhe. At he, Musa ebe warek hasik, Iblis ipisak wene palhe dogolik, ane pukhogon wenagatluk wene oba ’busak erlok mekeat he, ayukhogon, men yogokhikhe, “Ninoe Etagapogot nen wenakhesuak o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
65001010	Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni iti yi wene ti wene inokodek dogoligat, abok weak paliogei iti. Itithogon palhe dogolik, wam etaiken dek meke nen hagakherek iti hak, inabusak inilu atluk hagariogei iti baga inobabut oba inebe weagatdakhiliogei iti.
65001011	It iti Allah nen weagarinabigin o! Alebat at Kain hagakhikhe iti hak oporlik liliogei iti. At Bileam korlo hagakhikhe iti hak, inekaerek nen uang thaburogo horlauwogoluk, itithogonat hagariogei. At Korah nen Allah hasik, “Anat hagakhe dogogin, ” iluk it aperek usa’isagaluk hagakhikhe iti hak hagariogei iti baga, inebe nuk akhiliogei iti.
65001012	Hit hinagarlak lak hinerugi inebe hinakmu nen hipiri hinom opakimo natogorlogo isago nukunem, it ap iti inekarli degat hinoba ukitluk nen, akhuni aperek therisik welageidek inekaerek hasik anek oba ebekhe dogolik hinom neke lagap iti, weak o. Su hano morla werekma mirli meke oba dabulagarek iti hak, hinom weak neke lagap iti o. Inebe re, oisa miso nigin dek mekeat hisakne nen obatneak wolok lagarek iti hak lageikharek o. Nen, ageikhe, o eken ikhidek, eka motok dek atlukmo, omaken inom henukhunem motok puk agarek iti hak werek o.
65001013	Nen, ageikhe re, i laut kok yekelekma hoklabu hulalek-dekalekhogon aninirogo motok hagakhe dogolik, wosirlagap hagarogo lia'i agarek iti hak, it iti yugunat hagakhe dogolik, inekarli dek weak hagariogei. Husagal ’bitok-’batok lagarek hak, Allah nen it iti motok o mum hikhakthekma dogoagaluk inobolukmo 'bisagein werek o.
65001014	Alebat Adam nen itaklarik waga lagoukhasik, hurli 7 baga hurli, at Henokh itaklageikhe meke nen, it akhuni iti ukum inoba ’bisagein meke hasik men isikhe, “Lakhani. Ninoe Etagapogot etnogo nen agarumi at ekaerek nen yoko usa’isa agarek meke inebe motok doalegat wogosik usasigin o.
65001015	Usatluk akhuni tha’bokhogonat wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe dogolik, it akhuni Allah ebe ina'it meke inebe tha’bokhogonat wene inoba ’bigin o. It Allah ebe ina’it dogolik, yi weak ti weak hagariogei meke dopok wene inoba ’bigik, Allah ina’it nen weak hagakhe dogolik inane puk weak at abok weak paliogei meke iti inebe dopok ukum inoba ’bigik, hagasigin o, ” iluk isikhe.
65001016	It iti akhuni inabok weak palhik, wenageisigik, isi motogat welageikharek meke. Yi meke ti meke inetaiken nen nukunem, “Warlok o, ” inakla apekhe dogolik, iti mekeat hagakhik, inekaerek nen hogorakhekhe dogolik, yi meke ti meke thaburogo horlauwogoluk, it akhuni aperek inane agugurogo hogorinakhik, egarek meke.
65001017	Meke re, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. It ap ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus nen inayoko ’biluk la’isa ageikhe meke nen wene haganeat yokhisasukha meke iti hinakla ebetno o!
