65001018	It nen he, wene men iluk yokhisasukha iti, “O ilugun kobokhogon oba dogolik, it akhuni aperek Allah ebe ina’it dogolik inakla nen, yi meke ti meke inetaiken nen nukunem, Warlok, iluk iti mekeat weak motok hagakhe dogolik, inane sagun yokhisasugun o, ” iluk yokhisasukha iti.
65001019	It iti Allah Agoreke inakla dek dogolik, inobabut akhuni inobabut inikhogat dogolik, it aperek hano dapulik werekma, mikirlogo hurli-hurli ’bisiliogei meke itiat o.
65001020	Meke re, nagarlak lak nerugi. Hinebe nakmu lak o. Wene Allah ekaerek nen woknisasikhemo hinetaiken Yesus Kristus oba hakotdiluk, hinetaiken horlerogonat dogono o. Itithogon dogolik, Allah Agoreke hinakla kagalhunem sembayan ekhe dogono o.
65001021	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, hinakla nen, “Ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus ninebe akmu nen, nit yabokane naburlal-haburlal hagatninabigin, ” iluk, therogo dogolik, at Allah nen ninebe akmu iti, hit nen at hinom hunigat dogono o.
65001022	-
65001023	Akhuni inebe o hali inom nausak meke, tilogo ula’isegarek iti hak, it aperek inetaiken pere meke, hinakmurogo tilinakhe dogono. Nen, it akhuni aperek yi meke ti meke inetaiken nen nukunem weak hagariogei iti, su morla hano werekma, mirli weak meke oba dabulagunem elokhoken ina'it agarek iti hak, it inobabut weak hagariogei iti, hina’it motok nen hinayukhogon dogolik, inebe anek he, hinakmurogon dogono o.
65001024	Hit ninopase Allah obatne werek erlok hakhisik dogosak meke oba lagunem, hinisok a’bit dikhogon warigidek hanorogo hakhisik dogoluk nen, at ebe hogorariogeima etoma, wene hinoba ’bigidegat, hinakla arleken akhekhe korlek menogo erlok ’binagei ligin meke iti, heagei wakhe dogouok o.
65001025	Ninopase Allah arligat nen ninoe Etagapogot Yesus Kristus hagakhikhe iti baga tilninakhikhe meke etnogo iteerek obatneak o, iluk, at hogorakhik, kogotdigik, hagakhe dogouok nen, erlo baga yi meke ti meke walhigidekma Allah arligat welageikhe iti baga nen, yogotak ya nen, yabokane motok dogolik nen, itithogon hogorakho motok dogoak, iluk, “Amin, ” igi iti.
66001001	Wene ebe yigithogon. Yi wene ti wene limagowelageikhe meke yabokane ibat-ibat hagatlasigin meke iti, Allah atuaneke meke hutukhogon yogeisoagaluk Allah nen at Yesus Kristus pakhogon yogokhikhemo, at Kristus nen malaikat la’i ageikhemo, wene iti at Allah atuaneke meke an Yohanes yoknekhe.
66001002	Itithogon yoknekhemo, at Allah ane iti Yesus Kristus nen abok yoknikhunem wene tha'bokhogonat an nileken higi meke iti abok pakhogon holal waganogo ’bigi iti o.
66001003	Wene iti tha’bokhogonat, ibat-ibat hagatlasigin iti nen he, it akhuni aperek wene holal waganek meke yi etaga thalugun meke inom, it aperek inasuk holiluk, wene iti hologo mothogon hagakhe dogogun meke inom, Allah nen hanorinakhunem inakla arleken akhagun o.
66001004	-
66001005	An Yohanes nen hit o propinsi Asia meke gerejabaga nen natogokhe lagap meke, nagarlak lak nerugi. Ninopase Allah ebe ikhok motok dogolik, haganeat welageikhe, yogotak weregat, yabokane motok dogogin meke wisigin etnogo men, Allah ebe kok welagarekma obolukmo werek korlek, Allah Agoreke ebe opakiat meke re, 7 thalek elokhoma welageikharek iti men, at Yesus Kristus obabut hupukhogon dogolik, Allah abok pakhogon yoknisekherek meke etnogo men, inobabut hano etnogo nen thethisik dogolik hano meke wokhisigik, hinetaiken hapugutdinageigik, hagakhe dogoak o, iluk heagei wathinakhi iti o. At Yesus ebe watlageikhesikmo nen opase Allah nen a’but makusa itaginakharek iti hak, at tak apuke ilugutdisikhemo, akhuni koktek inetagapogot agat oba meke yoma inebe erlok dek mekeat he, at anek he, kok welagarek. Itithogon dogeigiluk, nit nen weak hagakhe lagagu iti nen, ninebe herle warek hakene haknisik werekma, at nen nit akmutninakhikhesik, amep ulabogo watlageikhe iti baga herle hisalninakhikhe iti o.
66001006	Itithogon hisalninakhikhesik nen, nit at opase hasik hagakhe dogoagaluk, ninebe koktek Allah iteerekmeldinanhikhemo welago. Itithogon meldinanhikhemo dogolik, ninakla nen he, “At Yesus Kristus iti, obatne apik werek, ” iluk nit at ebe hogorakho motok motok dogouok o, iluk, u hak, “Amin, ” igi iti o.
66001007	Lakhani! At ebe oisa baga wagunem, akhuni tha’bokhogonat inebe dopok men, it at thege karluk wakhukha meke men, inomat nen inileken lakhekhe dogolik, inukuloak etaga tomok tha’bokhogonat deasugun o, iluk yokhisigi iti, “Ebeat asuak o, ” u hak, “Amin, ” igi iti o.
66001008	Ninopase Allah Etagapogot obatne horleak iti, ikhok motok dogolik, haganeat welageikhe, yogotak weregat, yabokane motok dogogin meke wisigin etnogo nen ekhe dogolik, “Erlo inom, ekapul inom, anat o, ” iluk iliogo o.
66001009	An hinagarlak hineru Yohanes ninom ninebe Yesus a’buri opakiat meke, yi aik ti aik hagatninakho korlek, ninakla nen, “Yabokane at Allah nen apma ’binanigin, ” iluk ninobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagorek iti. Werekma, Allah ane Yesus nen pakhogon yoknisasikhe wene etnogo an nen yogeisilik nekherek iti nen, niki herle warogo i eken palekma o etaga Patmos ’bani ageikhama welagei o.
66001010	Itithogon ’bani ageikhama werekma, o ninoe Etagapogot ai wi ekhemo nen, Allah Agoreke noba duk ekhemo, noporlike nen at ageikhe ane pikon witabo kok meke ane hakene baga nen, men yoknikhunem nasuk holhi,
66001011	“Hat hileken hegen meke iti, holal waganin o. Holal waganogo nen, it Allah a’buri gereja 7 baga nen natogokharek meke, o etaga Efesus inom, Smirna inom, Pergamus inom, Tiatira inom, Sardis inom, Filadelfia inom, Laodikia inom, inoba la’in o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66001012	Itithogon yoknekhemo, “Ane iti tha nen yokniriogo, ” iluk napuke nileken lakhigi meke, lampu yibakharek meke ebe 7 baga nen isok tilik emas meke hagarek meke werekma nileken higi o.
66001013	Nen, lampu iti akla turlem abat itaklageikhe meke etnogo elokhoken hakene meke, asu, uanat itikmanke meke hurli isok oba thalek ugu, nen amik oak oba therlok emas meke ugu werek.
66001014	Nen, isi domba isi kut meke oisa kut hakene. Nen, ileken hetu amulok hakene.
66001015	Nen, isok tembaga hetu baga hunhunem a’bi’bal here-here hagakherek hakene. Nen, ane re, i tutunmo kok meke ane hakene.
66001016	Nen, iki ebeke, husagal ebe 7 meke hago welaga. Nen, apema nen karok elak ebelak-ebelak mago meke dukhi aga laga. Elokhoken a’bi’bal he, o dikene eketurlem mo tirlelek-werlelekhogon yakherek iti hakene werekma nileken higi o.
66001017	Itithogon werekma higirik, nayuk nen warek inelokhethogoum agat oba tun egarek hakene, nelokhe thogoumhogon agat oba elokhoma isokma mot-mot tun i agunem, at iki ebeke nen hakneekhesik nen men yoknekhe, “Hayuk dek. An nebe erloma nen logat ekapul oba nikhok motok dogolik,
66001018	niluk motok welagarek, anat o. An nebe arat watlagagi mekeat he, lakhan! Niluk agagisik, niluk motogat dogogin o. Watlageikharek iti inom, watlatluk lageikharekma iti inom, thu kunci an nikimo werek o.
66001019	An itithogon motok welagei iti nen he, yi wene ti wene yogotak ya hagatlariogo meke inom, yabokane hagatlasigin meke inom, hileken higin meke iti tha’bokhogonat holal waganin o.
66001020	Nen, husagal ebe 7 meke niki ebeke hago werekma hegen etnogo inom, lampu yibakharek meke isok tilik ebe 7 meke emas meke hagarek inom, hileken hegen etnogo, wene limago wene meke iti, pakhogon yokhisik o. Husagal ebe 7 meke hegen iti ebe re, it malaikat Allah a’buri gereja 7 meke natogokharek meke therisik welageikharek iti hisegen o. Nen, lampu yibakharek meke ebe 7 meke iti ebe, it Allah a’buri gereja 7 meke natogokharek meke itiat hisegen o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66002001	Itithogon yoknekhesik nen yabokane men yoknekhe, “An niki ebeke husagal ebe 7 meke hago dogolik, lampu yibakharek meke ebe 7 meke isok tilik emas meke hagarek etnogo aklake nekherek meke etnogo nen wene yi yokhisik, At malaikat Allah a’buri o Efesus natogokharek meke therisik welagarek meke etnogo wene an nen yogosigin meke yi, hat nen holal waganogo oba la’in o,
66002002	Hit nen an nobasik hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk hinobatnerogonat hagakhe dogolik, it aperek weak hagakhunem he, Inoba dopok, iluk, inasuk wakhidek here’isegep dek. Nen, it aperek Yesus nen la’isa agama negen hagarogo witluk ugunem, hit nen, Inekalat iliogei, iluk inobabut ekagat palhethebat. Hinobabut itithogon hagakhethep iti an nilu o.
66002003	Nen, akhuni nen an nobasik yi aik ti aik hagathinakho korlegat, hit nen, At nina’it, iluk, here’anhidek hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk hagakhethep iti an nilu o.
66002004	Itithogon mekeat he, ebekeram hinetaiken an noba hunik welagagip tak-tagat, yogotak itithogon welagap dek iti anek he, Weak hagakhe lagap, iluk hinobabut palhe lagei o.
66002005	Iti halok he, hit ’bogokhogon motogat usa’agasip welagap iti, hinakla ebetdiluk, hinobabut hebelatluk nen, alebageik hagakhe lagagip meke iti hagat, hagakhe dogono o. Itithogon hagakhidek halok he, an nebe witluk nen, hinalampu yibarlek iti obolukmo nen kigilogo wokhagein o.
66002006	Itithogon mekeat he, it aperek ap Nikolaus obabut waganogo hagakhunem, an na’it motok hisegerek hagat, hit hina’it motok hisekhe lagap iti anek he, hano o.
66002007	Nen, wene igi meke iti, at Allah Agoreke nen Allah a'buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke yogeisiliogo iti, hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogo holino o. At tha nen obatne asigin halok he, Allah ayabumo o eken inilugurinakherek meke iti noagaluk melageisigin o, iluk wene tha’bokhogonat yogeisigi meke iti, holal waganogo inoba la’ino, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66002008	Itithogon yoknekhesik nen, yabokane yoknekhe dogolik, “An he, erloma nen logat ekapul oba motogat dogoginmeke etnogo arat watlagagisik nen yabokane niluk agagisik welagarek meke etnogo nen, wene yi yokhisik, At malaikat Allah a’buri o Smirna natogokharek meke therisik welagarek meke etnogo, wene an nen yogosigin meke yi, hat nen holal waganogo oba la’in o,
66002009	Hit ebe meke hasik hinebe kok hinikierek mekeat he, it akhuni Iblis a’buri mekeat he, inekalat, Nit ninebe Yahudi meke, iluk ekhe dogolik, hit hinetaga weak hagarogo weak hagathinakhunem, hinebe hinerlageik weak welagap iti, an niluat o.
66002010	At Iblis nen hit hinakla kagaluagaluk, ap hit meke ebetlake iniki herle warogo ’bisamo, iniki 10 baga nen yi aik ti aik hekhe dogogun iti re, hinayuk agup o. Yi aik ti aik itithogon hagathinakho korlek, hinetaiken an noba hakotdiluk, an ninom hunik werekma watlasugun halok he, tha nen ae a’busuk weak tha nen ae a’busuk weak lagunem, it inobatne ageikharek meke oko kare-kare mitago wogeisegarek iti hak, oko naburlal-haburlal hagathinabigin o.
66002011	Nen, wene yogeisigi iti Allah Agoreke nen, Allah a’buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke yakulisiliogoat iti, hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogo holino o. Tha nen obatne asigin meke halok he, it aperek watlatluk yabokane motok-motok watlasugun iti, inom weagarinabigin dek o, iluk wene tha’bokhogonat yogeisigi meke iti holal waganogo inoba la’ino, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66002012	Wene itithogon yoknekhesik nen, yabokane yoknekhe dogolik, “An karok elak ebelak-ebelak mago meke nikimo hago welagei meke etnogo nen wene yi yokhisik, At malaikat Allah a’buri o Pergamus natogokharek meke emenogo therisik welagarek meke etnogo, wene an nen yogosigin meke yi, hat holal waganogo oba la’in o,
66002013	Hit he, Iblis ebe kok dogolik, akhuni aperek apma hagasik welagarekma welagathep meke iti an nilu o. Itithogonat Iblis ailaat dogolik, an na’but Antipas nen nabok a’it ageidek, obabut hupukhogon dogolik yogeisilik nukhunem, it aperek nen ebe hinakla nen wakhunem, hit nen, Nit ninetaiken Yesus oba hakotdiluk welagorek iti dek, nina’it, iluk kolelogo here’anhidek, ninom hunik motok welagathep iti, hinobabut an nilu o.
66002014	Itithogonat meke re, wene ’bugurlagat ageikhe an na’it meke hagakhe lagap meke iti yokhisak o. Haganeat akhuni Israel meke inebe weak asuagaluk, wam kaneke ako warek meke karlelek nikik, param hagakhik, hagasuagaluk, ap Bileam nen ap Balak yakulikhikhemo, at nen inakla kagalhe lageikhe meke iti, hit aperek nen at awene iti hago welagap hisigi o.
66002015	Nen, hit aperek nen, wene ap Nikolaus nen yakulisasikhe meke awene iti waganogo hago welagathebat iti. Itithogon hagakhethep iti, an na’it motok apekhe lagei o.
66002016	Na’it apekhe lagei iti nen, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti here’isalok hinobabut hebelatni o. Itithogon hinobabut hebelageidek halok he, hit an karok napema meke baga hinasigiluk ibat-ibat wisigin o.
66002017	Nen, wene yogeisigi iti, Allah Agoreke nen it Allah a’buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke yogeisiliogo iti, hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogon holino o. Tha nen obatne asigin meke halok he, hipiri etaga manna aburarek meke melagakhik, etaga ket meke thalogo helekit kut meke baga holal waganogo wogokhik, hagasigin o. Etaga waganek iti it aperek inokodek. At etaga holal waganek horlagein meke iti anek ilu asigin meke wogosigin, iluk tha'bokhogonat yogeisigi meke iti, holal waganogo inobala’ino, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66002018	Itithogon yoknekhesik nen, yabokane men yoknekhe, “An Allah a’but nileken hetu amulok hakene, nen, nisoktembaga hetu weraklatluk a’bi’bal here-here hagakherek iti hak etnogo nen wene yi yokhisik, At malaikat Allah a’buri o Tiatira natogokharek meke therisik welagarek etnogo, wene an nen yogosigin meke yi, hat holal waganogo oba la’in o,
66002019	Hit hinobabut hagakhethep meke iti an nilu o. It akhuni aperek hinakmurogon welagathep iti inom, hina’it ageidek hinobabut hupukhogon welagathep iti inom, it aperek yomageisegethep iti inom, it aperek nen yi aik ti aik hinoba ’bisi korlegat, hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk welagathep iti inom, tha’bokhogonat an nilu o. Nen, alebageik pererlagat negen hagakhe lagagip mekeat he, yogotak motok doalegat hagakhe lagap iti, an niluat o.
66002020	Itithogon mekeat he, at he Izebel etnogo nen ekalat, An nebe Allah ane yogeisegerek mekeat o, iluk akhuni an natuaneke meke inebe doalegat param hagakhe dogoagaluk yakulisigik, warn kaneke ako wakharek meke karlelek neke dogoagaluk yakulisigik, yakulisekho korlek, hit nen wenagakhidek, At oba dopok, iluk, here’isekhe lagap iti anek, Hit weak hagakhe lagap, iluk hinobabut palhe lagei o.
66002021	At he iti, param ha’uagaluk hagariogo meke iti here’isalok obabut hebelasuagaluk therogo welagei meke re, at param hagariogo meke iti, here’isalok obabut hebelasusak a’it o.
66002022	Wene yi hinakla eberek dogono, It ap he iti inom param hagakharek meke here'isalok, inobabut hebelageidek halok he, it hinet wasuagaluk, he iti noge ekherekma po hilogo la'igin o.
66002023	Itithogon hagakhunem, it Allah a'buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke tha'bokhogonat inileken halok nen, it nen, At Allah akhuni inakla ebekharek meke iti inom, inetaiken nen kagalharek meke iti inom, ilumo, akhuni ninebe tomok ninobabut hagakhorek meke tak-tagat wene ninoba 'bigik, oko woknisigik, hagasigin o, iluk, an hutdanuagaluk, it akhuni at he iti ane waganharek meke inebe inasiginat o.
66002024	Itithogon mekeat he, akhuni aperek nen, He iti awene, Iblis awene akla meke yakulisekherek, iluk egarek meke iti, hit akhuni o Tiatira meke ebetlake nen, wene iti yakulhik, hinilu ageik, waganhidek iti nen he, hit nen wene akin meke ageikhe hagasubageik nen iluk yokhisagein dek o.
66002025	Meke re, an wisigin iti aban wageidek werek korlek, wene waganhigip meke itiat hiniki a'bethogon hago dogono o, iluk yokhisigi iti o.
66002026	-
66002027	Tha nen an warlok meke hagakho motogat hurli o ilugun oba obatne asi ligin halok' he, an nopase nen akhuni inukuloak etaga dopok, an nen hagasik dogoagaluk meldaniluk ite danhikhe iti hak, at obatne asi ligin meke iti itithogonat hagasik dogoagaluk meldiluk iteerek 'bumo, akhuni nen thegerluk pisue omaken meke baga isoak agat a'bet weak meke tamuk-tamakhogon hagakharek iti hak, at ane obatne baga yogeisekhe dogolik, hagasik dogogin o.\rq (Mazmur 2:9)\rq*
66002028	Nen, husagal wap mulikin dagei agarekma mot-mot lia'i agarek meke etnogo wogeisiginat o, iluk yokhisigi iti,
66002029	Allah Agoreke nen it Allah a'buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke yogeisiliogo meke iti, hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogon holino o, iluk yogeisigi meke iti, holal waganogo inoba la'ino, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66003001	Itithogon yoknekhesik yabokane yoknekhe dogolik, “Allah Agoreke ebe opakiat meke re, 7 thalek etnogo ite welageik, husagal ebe 7 nenat etnogo nikimo herogo welageik, hagakherek meke etnogo nen wene yi yokhisik, At malaikat Allah a'buri o Sardis natogokharek meke therisik welagarek meke etnogo, wene an nen yogosigin meke yi, hat holal waganogo oba la'in o, Hit o Sardis meke akhuni nen hinabok ekhe dogolik, It iniluk werek, iluk iliogei meke re, hinebe warek hakene dogolik hinobabut hagakhe lagap meke iti an nilu o.
66003002	An nen hit hinobabut palhe lagei, nopase Allah iloba hano motok 'bogokhogon hagakhe lagap dek. Meke re, watlasusak horogat hinetaiken pasarluk welagap eta bagaat, metokhogon melatluk hiniki hinisok hapugutdakhalok, hinobatne atni o.
66003003	Hit itithogon metokhogon melatluk hinobatne ageidek halok he, akhuni inilarlurlu waganuogoluk limago wageikharek iti hak, an itithogonat, hit nen, At itinem wisigin, iluk hinokodek werekma wisunogo nen, wene ebekeram yakulhisasukhama hinasuk holhigip meke hinakla ebetdiluk nen, weak hagakhe lagap meke 'bualogo thogotdisalok hinobabut hebelatluk, wene itiat hiniki a'bethogon hago dogono o.
66003004	Itithogon mekeat he, hit akhuni o Sardis meke hinebe pererlagat aperek, akhuni nen inasu thobalek meke mirli meke oba dabulasunogo iluk karelogo welageikharek iti hak, weak ageikhe hagakhidek werek iti, inasu kut meke isusak obaat ikhogo nen an ninom nekhe dogogun o.
66003005	Tha nen obatne asigin halok he, su kut meke i'bigin o. Nen, an it akhuni inilugurinakherek meke inetaga thuesika baga holal waganek meke horogo la’isagein dek o. An nopase inom, malaikat yoko la’isa agarek meke inom, inil oba, Yi an na’buri o, iluk inetaga pakhogon yogeisagein o,
66003006	iluk, igi meke iti, Allah Agoreke nen Allah a’buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke yogeisiliogo meke iti, hinasuk holusak halok, hanorogon holino o, iluk yogeisigi meke iti, wene holal waganogo inoba la’ino, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66003007	Itithogon yoknekhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe yoknekhe dogolik, “An weak hagakhidek nobabut karelogo dogolik, nane eberogonat anek egerek meke nen thu kunci Daud meke wolok thu hualhi halok, akhuni aperek nen lasusak erlok dek o. Nen, thu ladigi halok, akhuni aperek nen hualusak erlok degat meke etnogo nen wene yi yokhesik, At malaikat Allah a’buri o Filadelfia natogokharek meke therisik welagarek meke etnogo wene an nen yogosigin meke yi, hat holal waganogo oba la’in o,
66003008	Lakhani! Hit hinobabut hagakhethep he, hinobatne motok herlekha’bugat mekeat he, an nane hologo mothogon hagakhik, nabok la’belhidek pakhogon yogeisigik, hagakhethep iti an nilumo, hit hinobasik, thu arat hualogo ’binagagi meke akhuni aperek nen lasusak motok erlok dek o.
66003009	Lakhani! It akhuni Iblis a’buri natogokharek meke inebe Yahudi meke dek mekeat he, inekalat, Nit ninebe Yahudi meke, iluk egarek meke iti, hit hinapma ukitluk nen, an hit netaiken hunik welagei iti inilu asuagaluk, it inebe hit hinoba ’bisasigin o, iluk eberogonat yokhisigi o.
66003010	Itithogon ’bisasigin iti, an nen, Hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogono, iluk yokhisasigi meke iti, nane hologo mothogon hagakhe lagap iti nen, o yabokane akhuni agat oba yoma welageikharek meke tha'bokhogonat inabut paligiluk, yi aik ti aik inoba 'bisagein iti hekhe korlek, hit anek he, an nen napma hano hakhisik dogogin o.
66003011	An ibat-ibarat wisigin o. Itithogon witluk nen, tha ae a’busuk tha ae a’busuk lagunem, inobatne asugun meke oko kare-kare mitago i'bisegarek iti hak, oko hit wokhisausak meke, it akhuni aperek nen tilogo horlaunogo iluk, hit ebe waganhigip meke iti, hiniki a'bethogon hago dogono o.
66003012	Nen, tha nen obatne asigin meke halok, o hiseke usakharek iti hak, at itithogonat Allah ekaerek ai halekma meldiluk, nopase Allah etaga inom, ai kota Yerusalem ket meke at nenat pogot oba nen usa'isigin iti etaga inom, an netaga ket meke inom, an nen, at iti oba holal waganogo 'bumo, at ebe o etoma nen dukhisigin motok dek o,
66003013	iluk igi meke iti, Allah Agoreke nen Allah a'buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke yogeisiliogo meke iti, hit hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogon holino o, iluk yogeisigi meke iti, wene holal waganogo inoba la'ino, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66003014	Itithogon yoknekhesik nen, yabokane ageikhe yoknekhe dogolik, “Erloma yi meke ti meke erlo anat werekma, Allah nen walhasikhe meke iti, at abok nobabut hupukhogon eberogonat anek pakhogon egerek meke, netaga ebeat asuak u hak, Amin etnogo nen wene yi yokhesik, At malaikat Allah a'buri o Laodikia natogokharek meke therisik welagarek meke etnogo wene an nen yogosigin meke yi, hat holal waganogo oba la'in o.
66003015	Hit hagakhe lagap meke iti tha'bokhogonat hinobabut an nilu o. Hit hinetaiken ko'bot welagap degat, nen agaken akilukhogon hagakhe lagap degat, hinetaiken ko'borat hinobakhanini dogosak halok, itithogonat dogosak o. Nen agaken akilukhogon hagakhe dogosak halok, itithogonat hagakhe dogosak o.
66003016	Mekeat he, hinetaiken ko’bot degat, agaken degat, ko’bot a, agaken a, agaken hemurlugat anek welagap iti nen, i theram agunem inapema nen hirlelogo ula’isegarek hak, an nen hinebe ula’inagagin o.
66003017	Hit he, hinerlageigat hinileken pugat, hinalpalegat dogolik, Nit ninebe inakmu negen motok weagat welago, iluk hutdigidek, hit nen ekhe dogolik, Nit he, ninebe ninekaerek nen kogorakhogosik, yi meke ti meke ninerlageik ageidek, ninikieregat welago, iluk ekhe lagap iti.
66003018	Itithogon welagap iti nen, hit koktek hinikierek asubageik nen, emas hetu werago hano hagakharek meke noba oko paligik, hinalpalegat welagap meke iti, hinekarli asunogo nen, ikhauwogoluk su kut meke noba oko paligik, hinileken puk meke iti, hano agunem yi meke ti meke lakhekhe dogouogoluk, apusu hinileken obake wasubageik nen noba oko paligik, hagasubageik nen iluk hinasuk wakhe lagei o.
66003019	Itithogon hinasuk wakhe lagei iti, it akhuni an netaiken hunik meke, inebe dopok inasuk warogo tugi inakherek anek iti nen, hit weak hagakhe lagap meke iti thogotdisalok hinobabut hebelatluk nen, akilukhogon hagakhe dogono o.
66003020	Lakhani! An nebe holagapema metek dogolik, thu ane puputhekhe lagei o. Itithogon puputhasinem, tha nen nane asuk holiluk nen, thu hualneagein halok, an at oba ’bikha ukiluk nen, nipisak hipiri nasinagarlak-hagarlagat dogogun o.
66003021	An arat nobatne agagimo, nopase kok welagarekma obolukmo nipisak welago yi hak, tha nen obatne asigin halok, an kok welagarekma nobolukmo nipisak dogouogoluk meldigin o,
66003022	iluk wene igi meke iti Allah Agoreke nen Allah a’buri o yi ai ti ai natogokharek meke yogeisiliogo meke iti, hinasuk holusak halok he, hanorogon holino o, iluk yogeisigi meke iti, wene holal waganogo inoba la’ino, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66004001	Itithogon yoknikhunem higirik oba nen oporlik, na’bikaka baga ageikhe yigithogon lakhigi. Pogot oba thu holagape ageikhe hualek werekma, at alep pikon ane kok meke hakene baga yoknikhunem nasuk holhi meke etnogo nen yabokane men yoknekhe, “Wene ya dogoluk nen yabokane hagatlasigin meke hileken lakhanok nen iluk, yakulhisik nen, dagei me o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66004002	Itithogon yoknekhe korlek eranogoat, Allah Agoreke noba duk i agama nileken lakhigi hak, pogot oba at kok welagarekma obolukmo werekma lakhigi. Itithogon werekma, at ebe obolukmo iti baga hurek werekma lakhigi.
66004003	At iti elokhoken helekit a’bi’bal weak oko kok palharek meke etaga baiduri pandan inom, delima inom, hakene meke werekma, warlopaik elokhoken kereka palek hakene meke at kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo baga dagak-pagakhogon werekma lakhigi.
66004004	At kok welagarekma obolukmo turlem werek korlek, it aperek koktek welageikharekma inobolukmo 24 oba werekma, ap inarluetek inebe 24 oba nenat inasu kut meke ugu, nen, kare-kare emas meke mitago ap inetagapogot ugu welageikharek iti hak ugu meke, inebe inobolukmo iti baga hurek welageikha.
66004005	Itithogon werekma, at kok welagarekma obolukmo iti baga nen oyabok eran-alep yegethigik, pogot ane kok sup iluk nen ane luk-luk lageik, hagakhe korlek, at kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo elokhoma lampu yibarlek ebe 7 baga isok tilik welaga. Iti ebe, Allah Agoreke opakiat meke, 7 thalek etnogoat o.
66004006	Nen, at kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo elokhoma, ageikhe inamukhak elokhoken mirliak i laut yekelek hakene welaga. Itithogon werekma, at kok welagarekma obolukmo turlem werekma, abel ebelak-ebelak, it Allahnen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke aperek inebe 4 oba inelokhomake inoporlike inileken doalegat meke welageikha.
66004007	Itithogon welageikha iti, ageikhe helo yeke hakene etaga singa iti hakene, nen, ageikhe sapi kulok hakene, nen, ageikhe elokhoken akhuni inelokhoken hakene, nen, ageikhe thue kok ko’balusa hitluk nekhe korlek lakhegarek hakene, werekma lakhigi.
66004008	It iti inebe 4 meke re, inebe tomok ina’bikha 6 oba werekma, inomak abel itikmanke inom, akmanke inom, inileken motok doalegat meke inane huk welageidek, dikene motok, hibakone motok, Allahhogorakho motok dogolik, “Ninopase Allah Etagapogot obatneakma, u a e, Haganeat karelek motok welageikhe, u a e, Yogotak karelek motok werek, u a e, Yabokane karelek motogat dogogin, u a e, ”iluk hogorakho motok welageikha.
66004009	Itithogon ekhe dogolik, hibiku-yogoku at kok iluk motokwelagarek meke etnogo ebe obolukmo werekma hogorakhe dogolik, “Ninopase kok welagatek meke harat heagei wathakhik, hogothakhik, kogotdageigik, hagakhe dogogun o, ” isinem nen,
66004010	-
66004011	it ap inarluetek inebe 24 emenogo nen, at kok iluk motok welagarek etnogo elokhoma initibagal yukukhogon hogorakhe dogolik, kare-kare inukuloakma ugu meke kirik-korokhogon, at kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo elokhoma la’ekhe dogolik, men ekhe lageikha, “Ninopase Allah Hetagapogot, u a e, Yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat, u a e, Hat hakla apasigitik nen walhasiginmo, u a e, Walhasiginmo werek iti, u a e, Harat kok hobatneak halok, u a e, Hogothakhik, halon halhik, ekhe dogosak, u a e, ”iluk Allah hogorakhe lageikha hisigi.
66005001	Itithogon hagakhunem nileken hisigirikmo nen, oporlik at kok etnogo ebe welagarekma obolukmo dogolik, thuesika uanat meke baga holal abel itikmanke akmanke waganek meke dikilik werekma, “It aperek inileken 'bikhausak dek, ” iluk sirlo 'begarek hak, apusu 7 baga tetnekhogon 'bisukha meke ikimo hago werekma nileken higi.
66005002	Higirik werekma, at malaikat obatneak meke ageikhe nen ane kokhogon ekhe dogolik, “Thuesika uanat meke baga holal waganek dikilik yi, 'Bukalusak dek, iluk sirlo 'begarek hak, apusu dekelogo 'bisukha meke yi, tha iteerek dogolik erlok wokhalok 'bukalusak apegep? ” iluk itema waganhe.
66005003	Itithogonatma, itaperek pogot oba meke a? Agat oba meke a? At he, wema baga meke a, thuesika uanat meke baga holal waganek dikilik iti, erlok ’bukaldiluk, akla ’bikhausak iteerek ageikhe herageinakha meke re, inebe degat.
66005004	Itithogonat ap ageikhe iteerek dogolik nen, thuesika uanat meke baga holal waganek iti, erlok ’bukaldiluk ileken akla ’bikhausak meke motok dek iti nen, nakla korlo agasik, de kogat agei o.
66005005	Itithogon de agunem he, ap inarluetek emenogo meke ageikhe nen, “De aga ’buk o. O asi’bat dukhekherek hak, ap Daud nen itago meke ap inukuloak etaga Yehuda meke itaklageikhesik nen, ebe helo yeke hakene etaga singa etnogo arat obatne agasik iteerek agasikmo, thuesika uanat meke baga holal waganek dikilik iti, it aperek inileken ’bikhaunogo iluk sirlo hakene 7 baga werek etnogo erlok ’bukalusak o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66005006	Itithogon iluk yoknekhesik oba nen, oporlik it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke aperek inebe 4 emenogo inom, ap inarluetek inebe 24 emenogo inom, at kok welagarekma obolukmo aliluke werek korlek, inakla turlem Domba Eak arat wakhukha meke ukuloakma aik 7 baga ulabek, nen, ileken 7 baga nenat meke metek welaga. Ileken 7 baga iti ebe, Allah nen Agoreke o yi ai ti ai la’ekherek meke emenogoat o.
66005007	Yabokane Domba Eak etnogo waga lagasik nen, thuesika uanat meke baga holal waganek dikilik meke, at Allah kok welagarekma obolukmo dogolik, iki ebeke hago werekma waganhunem nileken higi o.
66005008	Itithogon ikimo waganhunem, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke inebe 4 oba emenogo inom, ap inarluetek inebe 24 emenogo inom, Domba Eak etnogo apma ukiluk initibagal yukukhogon hogorakhe lageikha. Itithogon hogorakhe dogolik, it ap inarluetek emenogo inebe tomok gitar hakene meke inom, kemenyan apusu isoak emas meke hagarek meke baga henago meke inom, inikimo hago dogolik etai wakhe lageikha. Kemenyan iti ebe re, Allah a’buri sembayan egarek itiat o.
66005009	-
66005010	Itithogon etai ket meke yakulogo wakhe dogolik, “Hat anek he, arat hakhukhama watlagagitik, u a e, Akhuni tha'bokhogonat inukuloak etaga tomok, inane tomok, u a e, Inoado tomok, inaila tomok, u a e, Hat hamep oba Allah hasik oko palogo 'bisalok, u a e, Iteerek agatik, u a e, Thuesika uanat meke baga holal waganek dikilik iti, u a e, Waganiluk nen, sirlo 'begarek iti hak, u a e, Iki apusu tetnekhogon 'bisukha meke iti, u a e, Erlogat 'bukalusak, u a e. It iti inoko palogo 'bisasigitik, u a e, Ninopase Allah hasik hagakhe dogoagaluk, u a e, Inukuloak etaga, Allah iteerek, thaligin, u a e, Inebe kogat meldisasiginmo, u a e, It nen akhuni agat oba meke, u a e, Inapma 'bisalok hagasik dogogun, u a e, ”iluk etai wakhunem hisigi.
66005011	-
66005012	Etai itithogon wakhasikmo nen, yabokane ageikhe yigithogon lakhigiat. At Allah kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo inom, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke emenogo inom, ap inarluetek emenogo inom, inom tumo werek korlek, inaliluke dagak-pagak, it malaikat yi agot doalek ti agot doalek iniki wenasusak motok erlok dek meke dogolik, inanekokhogon men etai wakhe lageikha, “Domba Eak wakhukha meke iti anek, u a e, Yi meke ti meke apma 'bisigik, u a e, Ikierek welageik, u a e, Wene akla kagalek anek welageik, u a e, Obatneak welageik, hagakherek, u a e. Halok he, at anek erlok alon halhik, u a e, Hogorakhik, heagei wakhik, hagakhe dogosak o, u a e, ”iluk hogorakhe lageikha.
66005013	Iti hak, it Allah nen winametdisasikhe meke pogot oba meke inom, agat oba meke inom, wema baga meke inom, ilaut yekelekma welagarek meke inom, tha'bokhogonat nenetai wakhe dogolik, “At kok welagarekma obolukmo werek iti, u a e, Domba Eak etnogo ipisagat, u a e, Irat inobatne werek o, u a e, Iluk heagei warinakhik, inalon halinakhik, u a e, Hogorinakhik, hagakho motok dogouok, u a e, ”iluk etai wakhunem holhi o.
66005014	It itithogon isinem, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke aperek inebe 4 oba emenogo nen men ekhe lageikha, “Ebeat asuak, ” u hak, “Amin, ” ekhe lageikha. Nen, it inarluetek inebe 24 emenogo meneke, at apma ukiluk initibagal yukukhogon hogorakhunem hisigiat o.
66006001	Itithogon higirik oba nen yabokane, sirlo 'begarek iti hak, thuesika uanat meke iki apusu ebe 7 baga tetnekhogon 'bisukha meke etnogo, Domba Eak etnogo nen ageikhe alebageik 'bukalhunem, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke inebe 4 oba emenogo meke ageikhe nen, “Eme o, ” iluk ane pogot ane hakene isinem nasuk holhi o.
66006002	Itithogon isinem, nileken lakhigi meke, ap ageikhe sikhe wolok kare-kare ap inetagapogot ikharek meke ukuloakma i'begama, kuda isi kut meke apot oba yasukhogo dogolik, o thebeligiluk thebelik lagunem lakhigi o.
66006003	Nen, sirlo 'begarek iti hak, thuesika uanat meke iki apusu tetnekhogon 'bisukha meke etnogo meke, at Domba Eak etnogo nen ageikhe alebageik 'bukalhesik oba nen, oporlik ageikhe 'bukalhunem, it Allah nenwinametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke emenogoageikhe alebageik ane ekhesik oba nen oporlik ageikhe nen ekhe dogolik, “Eme o, ” iluk isinem holhi o.
66006004	Itithogon isinem, kuda isi morla meke lagunem lakhigi. Ap ageikhe kuda iti apot oba yasukhogon lagunem men yogokhama holhi, “Akhuni agat oba meke inoba dapukhogon dogosak dek. At he, akhuni ageikhe nen ageikhe wakhik, wat-wat hagakhe dogoagaluk, hat iteerek ’bagago, ” iluk karok kok mekewogokhama kuda etnogo apot oba yasukhogon lagunem lakhigi o.
66006005	Nen, sirlo 'begarek iti hak, thuesika uanat meke iki apusu tetnekhogon ’bisukha meke etnogo, Domba Eak etnogo nen pere ’bukalhesik oba nen ageikhe ’bukalhunem, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke emenogo, inebe pere arat inane egasikmo nen, ageikhe ane ekhe dogolik, “Eme o, ” iluk isinem holhirik, lakhigi meke, kuda isi mirli meke ageikhe lagunem lakhigi. Nen, ap ageikhe akin walhegarek meke ikimo wolok kuda iti apot oba yasukhogon lagunem lakhigi o.
66006006	Itithogon lagunem lakhigirik nen, nasuk holhi meke, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke inebe 4 emenogo inakla nen akhuni inane hakene meke men ekhe, “Beras hakene gandum eken iti meke akin walhegarek meke isoak opakiat 1 liter anek ukharlogo, oko yabu iniki opaki hasik hagakhunem iniki oko wogeisegarek iti hak, tha’bokhogonat ’busagat o. Nen, hupak eken hakene etaga jelai iti meke akin walhegarek meke isoak 3 liter anek ukharlogo, oko yabu iniki opaki hasik hagakhunem oko wogeisegarek iti hak tha’bokhogonat ’busagat o. Itithogon mekeat he, minyak zaitun apusu inom, anggur apusu inom, iti anek he, weagatdusak dek o, ” iluk isinem holhi.
66006007	Nen, sirlo ’begarek iti hak, thuesika uanat meke baga iki apusu tetnekhogon ’bisukha meke etnogo, Domba Eak etnogo nen, 3 baga arat ’bukaldekhesik oba nen, ageikhe ’bukalhunem, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke emenogo inebe 3 baga inane arat egasik oba nen, ageikhe nen, “Eme o, ” iluk isinem nasuk holhi o.
66006008	Holhirik, lakhigi meke, kuda isi akhuni watlasuogoluk inelokhoken kut atluk abel dageikherek iti hak meke lagunem lakhigi o. Nen, inebe watlageikharek iti, akhuni hakene atluk nen, kuda iti apot oba yasukhogon nekhe laga. Itithogon nukhunem, at oporlik, akhuni wema baga usegarek iti, akhuni hakene atluk nen, ipisak nukhunem lageisigi. Itithogon nekhe dogolik, akhuni agat oba meke tha’bokhogonat inebe 4 oba mikirlogo ’bisalok, 3 baga inakhidek here’isalok, ageikhe anek akhuni aperek nen karok oba inakhunem watlageik, hipiri abu nen watlageik, u erlo kok meke baga watlageik, warn helo inom, yeke helo inom nen, aik nen li’bilinakhunem watlageik, hagakhe dogoagaluk iteerek ’bisegama nukhunem lageisigi o.
66006009	Itithogon hisigirik oba nen, oporlik sirlo ’begarek iti hak, thuesika uanat meke baga iki apusu baga tetnekhogon ’bisukha meke etnogo meke, Domba Eak etnogo nen 4 oba arat ’bukalhesik oba nen, ageikhe ’bukalhunem, akhuni Allah ane a’bethogon waganhukhasik, it aperek yogeisekhe lagoukha iti hasik inakhukha meke inagoreke Allah ako warogo hetu hunekharek oba apma werekma lageisigi o.
66006010	It itithogon dogolik, inane kokhogon men isinem holhi, “Ninopase Allah hobatneak karelek motok dogolik, mothogon anek hagakhetek meke ninopase. Hiki meren dogoluk nen akhuni agat oba meke nen nit ninakhukha etnogo ninokoma inoba ’biluk inasigin nogo? ” iluk yogokhe lageikhama,
66006011	at nen he, “Hinagarlak lak hinerugi ebetlake hinom an nobasik hagakhe lagagip meke, hit hinakhukha iti hak, inasugun meke aban werek iti, it therisik thet walogo il opakiat dogono, ” iluk yogeisasikhesik, inebe dopok inasu kut meke i’bisugunem lageisigi o.
66006012	Itithogon lageisigirik oba nen, oporlik lakhigi meke, thuesika uanat meke baga sirlo ’begarek iti hak, apusu tetnekhogon ’bisukha meke etnogo meke Domba Eak etnogo nen 5 baga arat ’bukalhesik oba nen, ageikhe ’bukalhunem, dugul kokhogonat aborlok luk-lagathigik, o mulikin elokhoken karung mirli hakene hagatlageik, thut elokhoken morla mep akhuni inamep hakene ageik,
66006013	o ara eken akutmo hisakne aninirogon hubetha agunem, ikilo’bak oba nen agat obake lologo usa’agarek hak, itithogonat husagal pogot oba nen kilelogo agat oba usa’ageik,
66006014	pogot iti, holal waganek meke dikilogo ’begarek iti hak, dikilogo dek ageik, torn ukul inom, i eken palekmake inom, welagarekmake dopok nen werlekmake la’igik, hagakhunem lakhigi o.
66006015	Itithogon hagakhunem akhuni agat oba meke, ap inetagapogot meke inom, ap koktek meke inom, ap inougi wim tugure meke inom, ap inikierek meke inom, ap inetaga werek meke inom, akhuni tha’bokhogon inebetek inom, inatuaneke inebe tha’bokhogonat inom, oilake limaklageik, torn obake helekit pun elolake limaklageik, hagakhe lageikha lageisigi o.
66006016	-
66006017	Itithogon limago dogolik, torn inom, helekit inom, men yogeisekhe lageikha, “Allah anini ninoba ’bigin etnogo arat asi aga yoma, tha hak nen akla puk hapugutdiluk huk asigin apegep? Erlok dek o. Iti nen he, hit nen, at kok welagarekma obolukmo werek iti nen elokhoken aga ninakhik, Domba Eak iti akla aga ninoba ’biluk ninakhik, hagasugun yi, thogoumhogon ninebe thebeldinaniluk nen, hinakma lima’inanini o, ” iluk kino yogeisugunem nasuk holhi o.
66007001	Itithogon nileken hisigirik oba nen, oporlik he, ap malaikat inebe 4 oba pogot erlomake-erlomake upuke-wemake ilike-yike hisakne hubetha wagarekmake, ilugun thebelek metek dogolik, hisakne 4 nenat agat obake hubetha waga dogolik oka aborlogotdigik, i laut yekelekmake hubetha ageik, hagasunogo iluk iniki hago werekma lageisigi o.
66007002	It itithogon werek korlek, malaikat ninat ageikhe o mulikin dagei agarekma eloma nen Allah iluk motok welagarek meke asirlo wolok dukhi agasik, Allah nen it malaikat inebe 4 oba agat inom, i laut yekelek inom, weagatduagaluk iteerek ’bisasikhe meke emenogo men yogeisugunem holhi,
66007003	“Nit nen, it ninopase Allah atuaneke meke ninetai ekerlogo Allah asirlo negen inilhaoak oba aban ’bisigidek welago iti, agat inom, i laut yekelek inom, o koktek inom, weagatdusak dek o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
66007004	Itithogon yogokhikhesik nen, akhuni Israel nen itago meke inukuloak etaga dopok tha’bokhogonat inetai ekerlogo Allah asirlo negen inilhaoak oba ’bisilik lageikhesik, “Inebe hurli 144. 000 oba nen sirlo negen ’bisilik lagoma, ” iluk isinem holhi o.
66007005	-
66007008	Nen, it inilhaoak oba sirlo negen ’bisega iti inebe, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Yehuda meke 12. 000 oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Ruben meke 12. 000 oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Gad meke 12. 000 oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Asyer meke 12. 000 oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Naftali meke 12. 000oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Manasye meke 12. 000oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Simeon meke 12. 000oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Lewi meke 12. 000 oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Isakhar meke 12. 000 oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Zebulon meke 12. 000 oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Yusuf meke 12. 000 oba, nen, it akhuni inukuloak etaga Benyamin meke 12. 000 oba, nen, Allah asirlo negen inebe dopok itithogon inilhaoak oba 'bisegasik nen, “Hurli iti hurli nen 'bisogoma werek, ” iluk isinem holhi o.
66007009	-
66007010	Itithogon higirik oba nen, oporlik nileken hisigirik nen, yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok, inoado tomok, inai tomok, inane tomok, inasu kut uatek ugu meke, akhuni nen etai wakhe dogolik, ya'beka thoporlogo inikimoke waganharek iti hak, oka meke inikimoke wolok, Allah kok welagarekma obolukmo etoma Domba Eak ipisak welageikharekma iniloba natogorlek inebe hurli yi baga iluk, iniki wenasusak motok erlok dek dogolik, inane kokhogon men ekhe lageikha, “Ninopase Allah kok hobolukmo welagatek meke, u a e, Domba Eak hipisak, u a e, Tilninakherek erlo, u a e, Hirat welagathep, u a e, ” iluk etai wakhe lageikha hisigi o.
66007011	Iti hagat, Allah kok welagarekma obolukmo ebe turlem werek korlek, it ap inarluetek emenogo inom, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharek meke aperek inebe 4 emenogo inom, aliluke dagakhogon werek korlek, it malaikat inebe tha'bokhogonat inabel itikmanke dagakhogon dogolik, inelokhe thogoum Allah apma ukiluk hogorakhe lageikha. “Ebeat asuak u hak, Amin, u a e, Ninopase Allah harligat kok, u a e, Yi wene ti wene hilu motok dogolik, u a e, Hat hobatne baga haknisik welaganma, u a e, Heagei wathakhik, hogothakhik, u a e, Halon halhik, kogotdageigik, u a e, Hagakho motok dogogun iti, u a e, Ebeat asuak u hak, Amin, u a e, ”
66007012	Itithogon hogorakhe dogolik, men ekhe lageikha, iluk ekhe lageikha hisigi.
66007013	Itithogon ekhe korlek, it ap inarluetek emenogo meke ageikhe nen nitema waganhe dogolik, “It akhuni inasu kut uatek meke ugu yoma thani? Nen, o koma nen wageikha? ” iluk nitema waganhe.
66007014	Nitema itithogon waganhunem nen, an nen he, “Noe, an nokodek. Hat anek hilu welagan o, ” iluk yogokhunem, at nen he, men yoknekhe, “It akhuni yoma agat oba werekma akhuni aperek nen yi aik ti aik doalegat hagarinakhunem, Allah nen tilinakhikhemo, inasu Domba Eak amep oba arat kut motok thobalega meke o.
66007015	It itithogon hagakhasikmo nogo nen, Allah kok welagarekma obolukmo ebe werekma il oba metek dogolik, at ai halekma at hasik dikene hibakone hagakho motok werekma, at kok welagarekma obolukmo werek etnogo nen, akhuni mo aik nen inasunogo iluk, o halharek iti hak, at ebe nen it thalogo hagasik dogogin o.
66007016	-
66007017	Itithogon ’bisamo werekma, Domba Eak etnogo Allah kok welagarekma obolukmo ebe tumo dogolik, akhuni nen warn konharek iti hak, it therisik motok dogolik, i akhuni inebe inilugurinakherek meke noagaluk, i elesimo wogosik lageik, Allah nen inil apusu hokhik, hagakhe dogogin iti nen, hipiri inom, i inom, abu aga dogogun motok dek o. Nen, mo inom, hetu inom, aik nen yagalinakhe dogogin motok degat o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66008001	Itithogon yoknekhesik oba nen oporlik he, thuesika uanat meke sirlo ’begarek iti hak apusu ebe 7 baga tetnekhogon ’bisukha meke etnogo, at Domba Eak etnogo nen iki 6 oba arat ’bukalhesik oba nen ageikhe ’bukalhunem, pogot oba setengah jam o aren tirlin-terlonhogo welaga higi.
66008002	Itithogon welagama nen, yabokane nileken lakhigi meke, malaikat inebe 7 baga Allah nen pikon ane kok meke hakene ebe 7 baga nenat wogeisasikhemo, at elokhoma metek werekma lageisigi.
66008003	Itithogon werekma, malaikat ninat ageikhe nen, hetuken temekharek meke emas meke hagarek wolok, yi meke ti meke Allah ake hetu hunekharekma emas meke hagarek iti baga wagasik metek welaga. Itithogon werekma, Allah nen, at a’buri tha’bokhogonat sembayan egarek meke inane inom, kemenyan inom, inom-inom hetu hunisuagaluk, kemenyan doalegat wogokhemo, yi meke ti meke Allah hetu hunekharekma emas meke hagarek iti, ebe at kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo elokhoma werekma oba ’bi lagunem lakhigi.
66008004	Itithogon 'bi lagunem nen, Allah a'buri sembayan egarek meke inane inom, kemenyan obasi inom, malaikat etnogo ikimo nen Allah elokhoma dageikhe laga higi o.
66008005	Itithogon hagakhesik nen, yabokane at malaikat etnogo nen hetu yi meke ti meke Allah ako warogo hunekharek etnogo meke waganhesik, hetuken temekharek meke etnogo akla ukharlogo, agat oba wukhogon usa'isa aga laga. Itithogon usa’isa agunem, o yabok eran-alep yibarlabethekhe dogolik, pogot ane kogat luk-luk igik, dugul kogat luk-lagathigik, hagakhunem higi o.
66008006	Itithogon higirik oba nen, oporlik malaikat inebe 7 baga emenogo pikon kok meke hakene ebe 7 baga ane huthauwogoluk tiktuk-taktuk hagakhe lageikha hisigi o.
66008007	Itithogon hagatdegasik nen, alebageik malaikat ageikhe apikon ane huthasinem miso digiken inom, hetu inom, mep inom, dapukhogon hagarogo agat oba po usabi agunem, agat inom, o koktek inom, inebe 3 baga mikirlogo 'biluk pere here'ekhe dogolik, ageikhe hali dukhogon nikik, o ket meke inom, oka herleka ket meke tha'bokhogonat inom nikik, hagakhunem lakhigi.
66008008	-
66008009	Iti hak, at malaikat ageikhe alebageik apikon ane huthekhesik oba nen, yabokane at ageikhe apikon huthasinem tom hakene kok meke ageikhe hetu amulok dukhisinem, po i laut yekelekma usa'i agunem, i laut inom, Allah nen winametdisikhe meke i laut akla welagarek meke inom, ku kok meke etaga kapal inom, ebe 3 baga mikirlogo 'biluk, pere here'ekhe dogolik, ageikhe weagatdisinem he, i elokhoken mep ageik, yi meke ti meke ima meke aperek watlageik, kapal weagat lageik, hagakhunem lakhigi o.
66008010	-
66008011	Itithogon it malaikat pere inapikon ane huthegasik oba nen ageikhe apikon ane huthasinem, husagal kok meke pogot oba nen isagal yibarlek negen amulok yibarlek hakene usa'agasik, i elesimoke inom, i ebe kok asi agarekmake inom, 3 baga mikirlogo 'biluk, pere here'ekhe dogolik, ageikhe arle weak meke hagarogo 'bekhe laga higi. Husagal iti etaga, Arle Weak eka. At nen i arle hagarogo 'bekhesikmo nen, akhuni i nasinem inebe doalegat watlaga lageikha lageisigi.
66008012	Itithogon malaikat inebe henagan inapikon ane huthegasik oba nen, ageikhe apikon huthasinem mulikin inom, tugi inom, husagal inom, akhuni tugi inakhunem inobatne dek ageikharek iti hak, ina'bi'bal 3 oba mikirlogo 'biluk, pere here'isekhe dogolik, ageikhe mum atluk yakhidek huk aga dogolik, o dikene opakiat meke, kokmake mo yakhe dogoluk nen, 'bugurlakmake yakhidek huk ageik, o hibakone opakiat meke, kokmake lia negen dogoluk nen, herlekha'bukmoke mum motok ageik, aga laga lakhigi.
66008013	Itithogon aga lagasik oba nen, yabokane lakhigi meke, thue kok ko'balusa hakene meke pogot oba walegat upukeat a'bikha lalan hitluk nekhe dogolik, ane kogat men ekhe laga, “Malaikat inebe 4 inapikon ane huthegasik oba nen, yabokane malaikat inebe 3 oba inapikon ane huthasinem, akhuni tha'bokhogonat agat oba welageikharek meke, motok weagathinabigin iti, Eiye! Eiye! Nakmu lak o! ” iluk ilik nekhe laga nasuk holhi o.
66009001	Itithogon malaikat inebe 4 emenogo nen inapikon ane huthegasik oba nen, ageikhe apikon ane huthasinem, husagal ageikhe nen wema baga kilinmo wema eloma usegarekma, thu hualuagaluk kunci wogokhemo pogot oba nen agat oba usa'agunem lakhigi o.
66009002	Usa'agasik nen, wema baga kilinmo wema eloma thu hualhunem, hetu thode thakne 'bisinem doalegat dageikherek iti hak, thu hualekma iti nen, thode dageikhe dogolik, mulikin inom, pogot inom, mumerogo 'bekhe laga lakhigi.
66009003	Thode iti akla nen, yi yibirla ti yibirla eken'buka isa aik nen palinakherek iti hak, inaik nen akhuni palinakhe dogoagaluk, iteerek 'bisegama, thode aklake nen dagei aga laga.
66009004	It yibirla iti yogeisekhe dogolik, “O ebe inom, oka herleka inom, yi meke ti meke ai yago ninat meke aperek inom, tha’bokhogonat weagatdusak motok dek o. Akhuni Allah asirlo inilhaoak oba holal waganek dek meke halok weagarinabino, ” iluk lia’isa agama lageisigi.
66009005	Itithogon lia’isa aga dogolik, “Akhuni inebe motok pikeat inasusak dek. Weat, warlo eken’buka isa aik nen palinakhunem hinet weak wakharek iti hak, thut 5 baga dogolik, hinet yitlago-watlago dogoak o, ” iluk yogeisegama hisigi o.
66009006	Itithogon hagarinakhunem u nen inoak hinet yitlago-watlago dogolik, “Ninebe tirliphogon watlatlo e, ” iluk watlasuogoluk, inekaerek nen yi walhigik, ti walhigik, hagasugun meke re, inebe tirliphogon watlasusak dek, iluk ilukmo nogo nen, watlageidek hinet anek wakho motok dogogun o.
66009007	Nen, it yibirla iti inebe, kuda, akhuni nen apot oba yasuklatluk wim yakhe luogoluk doalharek iti hakeneat welageikha. It iti inelokhoken he, akhuni inelokhoken hakene meke re, inukuloakma kare-kare hakene emas meke ugu.
66009008	Nen, inisi humi inisi hakene. Nen, inaik, helo yeke hakene etaga singa iti meke aik hakene.
66009009	Nen, inamigoak oba, thin ikharek iti hak, pisue omaken meke ugu. Nen, ina’bikha ane, ap wim yabi luogoluk kuda doalegat nen oto hakene aga hun-hun meke etaga kereta nen lisogo wogosik lagunem, inisok amitmit ane kogat ekherek iti hakene.
66009010	Nen, inaga therle, warlo eken’buka isa aga therle aik werek meke hakene werekma, thut 5 baga dogolik inaik nen akhuni palinakhe dogoagaluk iteerek ’bisegama palinakhe lageikha lageisigi.
66009011	Nen, it iti inoe kok etagapogot hagasik welagarek meke, at malaikat Allah nen wema baga kilinmo usa’i ageikhemo welagarek meke etnogoat. At iti etaga, nit ninane baga, weagarinakherek meke u hak, it akhuni Ibrani meke inane baga etaga Abadon igik, nen, it akhuni Yunani meke inane baga, Apolion igik, egarek meke lakhigi.
66009012	Itithogon hagatlagunem higirik nen, weagarinabigin meke ageikhe weagarinakhesik, yabokane iki pere baga ageikhe weagarinabigin meke aban werek o.
66009013	Malaikat inebe 5 inapikon ane itithogon huthegasik oba nen, malaikat ageikhe apikon ane huthasinem, Allah hasik obasi hano meke elokhoma hetu hunekharekma, ebe emas meke hagarek meke, nen, ukut ebelak-ebelak 4 oba sapi aik hakene hagarek meke, Allah elokhoma werekma etoma nen akhuni inane hakene isinem holhi.
66009014	At ane iti nen, at malaikat ageikhe apikon ane huthekhe meke etnogo, itithogon ane huthekhesik ikimo herogo werekma men yogokhe, “Malaikat inebe 4 oba i kok etaga Efrat alilu herle warek werek emenaga herle hisalinabi lan o, ” iluk yogokhe.
66009015	Itithogon yogokhe iti, it malaikat iti nen akhuni inebe 3 oba mikirlogo ’bisalok, pere here’isekhe dogolik, ageikhe tahun iti baga, thut iti baga, iniki iti baga, jam iti baga, inebe motok inarik lausak, iluk haganeat Allah nen inayoko ’bisikhemo kagalek werekma, herle hisaldisugunem nileken lageisigi o.
66009016	Itithogon lageisigirik werekma, yabokane yoknekhe dogolik, “Ap tentara agot dopok doalek inakuda tomok apot obayasukhogon werekma hisegen iti, inebe doalegat, 200 juta baga nen werek, ” iluk yakulnikhunem nasuk holhi.
66009017	Itithogon holhirik oba nen, yabokane kuda inom, akhuni apot oba yasukhogon meke inom, na’bikaka baga lakhigi. It iti su inamigoak oba thin ikharek iti hak ugu werekma hisigi. Itithogon hisigi iti, it aperek inasu elokhoken hetu amulok hakene meke ugu, nen, it aperek, inasu pogot elokhoken mirli hakene meke ugu, nen, it aperek inasu elokhoken wei aberok hakene meke ugu, nen inakuda emenogo inukuloak yeke helo yeke etaga singa iti meke ukuloak hakene. Nen, inapema nen, hetu inom, thode inom, hotali al hakene obasi weak meke etaga belerang iti meke inom, dukhi aga laga.
66009018	Itithogon hetu inom thode inom, belerang obasi weak meke iti inom, ebe 3 weagarinakherek meke iti, inapema nen dukhi aga dogolik, akhuni inebe 3 oba mikirlogo ’bisalok, pere here’isekhe dogolik, aperek inebe pike motok inarik lageikha hisigi.
66009019	It inapema nen itithogon inakhik, nen, inaga therle warlo ukuloak werek meke hakene itithogonat inakhik, hagakhe lageikha hisigi. It kuda iti inobatne, inape inom, inaga therle inom, itiatma, akhuni inebe itithogon yi aik ti aik inoba ’bilik inakhe lageikha iti.
66009020	Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni ebetlake inakhidek meke iti nen, mokat obabut weak meke oba hakotdiluk dogolik, iniki nen kaneke emas meke inom, perak meke inom, tembaga meke inom, helekit meke inom, o meke inom, hagarogo ’begarek iti. Itithogon hagarogo ’begarek iti, it kaneke iti nen, inileken hisegarek degat, inasuk holharek degat, holak lageikharek degat, mekeat he, itithogon hagarogo ’biluk,
66009021	akhuni inebe inakhik, elo degat inakhik, param ha’isigik, iniki abusak waganhik, hagakhe lageikha meke here’isalok inobabut hebelageidek dogolik, weak hunik motok hagakhe lageikha hisigi o.
66010001	Itithogon arat hisigirik oba nen yabokane, atmalaikat obatneak meke ageikhe asu negen oisa meke ugu. Nen, ukuloak oba warlopaik dagakthek. Nen, elokhoken mulikin hakene. Nen, isok hetu amulok mot dageikherek hakene.
66010002	Nen, holal waganek dikilik ’bugurlagat meke ’bukalek ikimo wolok pogot oba nen usa’agasik, isok ebeke i laut yekelek oba ’bigik, nen, isok paike agat oba ’bigik, ’bekhe dogolik,
66010003	yeke helo yeke hakene etaga singa iti meke ane ke ekherek iti hak pogot ane kokhogon isinem, wene oko pogot ane 7 baga nen yogokhe lageikha.
66010004	Pogot ane itithogon isinem, an holal waganigiluk hagakhi mekeat he, pogot oba nen men yoknekha, “Pogot ane 7 baga nen isinem hasuk holhen meke iti, holal waganusak dek o. Hakla asusak o, ” iluk yoknekhemo holhirik nen, huk agei.
66010005	Itithogon yoknekhemo thogotdigirik, lakhigi meke, malaikat isok ebelake i laut yekelek oba, nen, ebelake agat oba, ’biluk, metek werekma lakhigi etnogo iki ebeke pogot oba mot-mot lia’ekhesik nen he,
66010006	Allah nen pogot ebe inom, oba welagarek meke inom, agat ebe inom, oba welagarek meke inom, i laut yekelek inom, akla welagarek meke inom, tha’bokhogonat winametdisasikhesik iluk motok welagarek meke etaga baga men iluk hupuk palhunem holhi, “Allah nen hagasigin iti, itinem igik, itinem igik, dogogun dek o.
66010007	Malaikat inebe 6 oba inapikon ane arat huthegasik oba nen, ageikhe apikon ane huthagein iti ane huthasinem, at Allah nen wene akla wene it ap at atuaneke meke, ane akhuni yogeisekhe lagoukha meke emenogo yogeisekhe dogolik, Yabokane an itithogon hagasigin, iluk abok yogeisasikhe hagat, arat hagatlasigin o, ” iluk hupuk palhe.
66010008	Itithogon hupuk palhesik oba nen yabokane, pogot oba nen, ane yoknekhe meke etnogo nen yabokane men yoknekhe, “Holal waganek dikilik ’bukalek meke etnogoat, malaikat isok ebelake i laut yekelek oba, nen ebelake, agat oba ’biluk metek werek etnogo, ikimo herogo werek ili wagani lan o, ”
66010009	iluk yoknekhemo, woknisuagaluk kino oba lagunem at nen men yoknekhe, “Waganiluk nen, nano o. Itithogon nasinem hapema kin apusu hakene ituk hano nigin mekeat he, hakla usakhunem, ituk arle weak hagatlasigin etnaga o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66010010	Yoknekhemo, holal ’bugurlagat waganek iti ikimo nen waganhirik, ebe nasinem, napema kin apusu hakene ituk hano mekeat he, nakla usakhunem, arle motok weak hagatlagunem higi o.
66010011	Itithogon higirikmo nen, yabokane pogot oba nen, wene men yoknekhe, “Hat nen wene Allah nen akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok, inai erlo tomok, inane tomok, inougi koktek inetagapogot doalegat yabokane hagarinabigin wene iti, yogeisekhe dogono o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66011001	Itithogon yoknekhesik nen yabokane, o walegeke thegerluk hakene meke woknekhesik nen, men yoknekhe, “Allah ai halek inom, at ako warogo hetu hunekharek meke obolukmo etnogo inom, o walegeke baga walhigik, akhuni Allah ai halekma at ebe hogorasi ukiliogei meke tha’bokhogonat hiki wenageinakhik, hagasi lan o.
66011002	-
66011003	Itithogon hiki wenasi ligin mekeat he, o silimo Allah ai halekma abel itikmanke anek, Allah nen it akhuni at ebe inokodek meke wogeisekhemo, it nen o silimo ethoma inom, Allah ekaerek ai o kota ithi inom, inisok nen al debelhe korlek thut 42 oba, iniki 1260 oba, dogogun iti nen, hat nen walhasusak motok dek o. It itithogon werek korlek, ap inebe pere su pelabi su ikharek iti hak ugu dogolik, an nane pakhogon yogeisekhe dogoagaluk an nen la’isasigin o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66011004	It ap inebe pere iti, o zaitun pere inom, lampu yibakharek meke isok tilik pere meke inom, ninopase Etagapogot yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat iteerek welagarek meke etnogo elokhoma welageikharek meke emenogo, it ap inebe pere itiat o.
66011005	Nen, it akhuni nen, “It ap pere iti weagarinabuok, ” iluk ugun halok he, hetu it ap pere iti inapema nen dukhi aga dogolik, it inathili meke iti inebe hali niginat o. Halok he, tha nen, it weagarinabigiluk hagasigin halok he, wasusak obaat itithogon inasugun o.
66011006	Nen, it nen Allah ane yogeisekhe dogolik, "Pogot oba nen miso usasusak dek o, ” iluk erlogat tha’bit wakhik, i tha'bokhogonat mep asuagaluk erlogat hagakhik, nen inakla warlok apagun oba, "Akhuni agat oba meke yi u ti u inoba ’buok, ” iluk erlogat u erlo inoba ’bisigik, hagakhe dogoagaluk, Allah nen iteerek ’bisekhemo itithogonat hagasugun hisigi o.
66011007	Wene itithogon arat yogeisega halok, helo yeke hakene kok meke ageikhe kilinmo wema eloma nen inoba dageitluk, inom yakhe dogolik, obatne degetdisalok inebe inasigin o.
66011008	Itithogon warogo ’bisalok, inebe warek, o kota holagarlemke ninoe o meldiluk wakhukhama etoma ’bisagun o. O kota iti, o Sodom inom, Mesir inom, oba likharek etnogoat o.
66011009	Itithogon ’bisaumo werekma, akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok, inane tomok, inoado tomok, inai tomok, inebe tha’bokhogonat, "Warek thalinabusak dek o, ” iluk here’isalok inileken wurisalok-perisalok hagakho korlek, iniki 3 hari oba dogoluk nen ageikhe baga hurli dikene inom hisekhe dogogun o.
66011010	Itithogon werek korlek, akhuni agat oba meke inebe tha’bokhogonat nen ekhe dogolik he, "It ap pere wene yoknisekhe lageikha meke yi nen, yi aik ti aik doalegat ninoba ’bekhe lageikha meke etnogo inebe hanoat inakha, ” iluk inakla arleken motok akhekhe dogolik, pesta hagakhik, yi meke ti meke oko dek werlegat it nen it aperek wogeisigik, wok-wok hagakhe dogogun o.
66011011	Iniki 3 hari itithogon hagakhe dogoluk, iniki ageikhe dikene nen itithogon hagakho werekma, Allah Agoreke inilugurinakherek meke etnogo it ap pere iti inakla ukiluk, inilugurinabiluk nen meldisasinem, akhuni tha’bokhogonat inileken hisalok, inayuk motok asugun o.
66011012	Itithogon inayuk atluk werek korlek, pogot oba nen ane kokhogonat it ap pere wene yogeisekhe dogogun meke emenogo men yogeisagein, "Dageitni o, ” iluk yogeisugunem, it ap etnogo it inathili meke emenogo inileken lageisik werek korlek pogot oba oisa akla dageisinem lageisigi o.
66011013	Etanem, dugul kok inayuk meke ageikhe luk-lagathekhe dogolik, o kota iti ebe 10 baga mikirlogo 'biluk, kokmake here'ekhe dogolik, opakiat ageikhe motok misak dapukhogon 'bekhe dogolik, akhuni inebe 7. 000 baga inakhunem, it ebetlake inakhidek meke inayuk motok kogat atluk, it nen, “Allah pogot oba meke nayuk, ” iluk hogorakhunem hisigi o.
66011014	Itithogon hagakhunem hisigi iti, lakhani! Weagarinabigin meke etnogo, iniki pere baga arat weagarinakhasik, oporlik ageikhe ibat weagarinabigin meke weregat o.
66011015	Itithogon hisigirik oba nen, it malaikat inebe 7 baga emenogo, inebe 6 oba inapikon arat ane huthegasik oba nen, ageikhe apikon ane huthasinem, pogot oba nen inane kogat yigithogon isinem holhi, “Alep akhuni agat oba meke nen inapma 'bisalok hagasik welagoukha meke, yogotak ninopase Etagapogot Allah nen ninoe Kristus nen tilninabuagaluk meldisikhe meke etnogo ipisak nen inapma arat 'binagasik, at Kristus nen haknisik motok-motok dogogin o, ” iluk ekhe lageikha.
66011016	-
66011018	Nen, it inarluetek inebe 24 oba nen Allah alilu koktek inobolukmo welageikharek meke emenogo nen inelokhe thogoum Allah apma ukegasik nen hogorakhe dogolik men ekhe lageikha, “Allah ninopase, u a e, Hat hobatne horleak, u a e, Alep welagagitik nen yogotak motogat welagatek itibaga, u a e, Yogotak hat hebe kok Hetagapogot dogolik, u a e, Akhuni tha'bokhogonat hapma arat 'bisegetik, u a e, Hagasik dogogin iti nen, u a e, Heagei wathekhe lago o, u a e. Akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok tha'bokhogonat nen, u a e, Inanini hoba ’bekhe lageikha meke, u a e, Hat nen hanini inoba arat ’bigin iti, u a e. Itithogon inoba ’bekhe dogolik, u a e, Akhuni watlagoukha meke aperek, u a e, Ukum inoba ’bekhe dogolik, u a e, It aperek ukum inoba kosigin meke, u a e, Hat hane yogeisegarek meke inom, u a e, Ha’buri kok inetagawerek meke inom, u a e, Inetaga dek meke inom tha’bokhogonat, u a e, Hat inayukhogon dogolik, u a e, Hane waganho welageikharek meke hasik, u a e, Oko arat wogeisagein iti, u a e, It aperek o agat oba weagatdisukha meke, u a e, Hat nen it arat weagarinabigin iti, u a e, Itithogon hagasigin iti nen he, u a e, Heagei wathakhe lago o, u a e, ”iluk etai wakhunem holhi.
66011019	Itithogon wakhunem hisigirik lakhigi meke, pogot oba Allah ai halekma thu hualagunem, Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene holal waganek peti akla ukharlek welageikhe etnogo winam aga. Itithogon winam agunem, eran-alep o yabok yibarlabethigik, pogot ane sup iluk nen ane luk-luk lageik, dugul luk-lagathigik, miso digiken kok meke debekhogon nikik, hagakhunem lakhigi o.
66012001	Itithogon higirik oba nen, yabokane lakhigi meke, akhuni nen hutduagaluk pogot oba elalinat hagasusak dek meke kokhogon hagakhunem yigithogon lakhigi. He meke ageikhe thut oba isok ’biluk asu negen mulikin meke ugu, nen husagal 12 meke ukuloak oba kare-kare negen ugu meke lakhigi.
66012002	He iti eak akma meke arat itasigiluk hinet wakhe dogolik, u nen ane ke ekhe laga.
66012003	Itithogon hinet wakhe korlek, akhuni nen hutduagaluk pogot oba elalinat hagasusak dek meke kokhogon hagakhunem ageikhe lakhigiat. Warlo ebe oado morla mep hakene kogat meke ukuloak 7 meke, nen, aik ukuloak oba, 10 meke ulabek, nen, kare-kare 7 meke ap koktek ikharek iti hak, ukuloak oba tomok ugu meke welaga.
66012004	Itithogon ugu dogolik, aga therle oba husagal pogot oba meke 3 mikirlogo 'biluk, pere here'iluk, ageikhe lisogo agat oba usa'isa agasik, he etnogo eak itakhasinem haumhogon nagaluk elokhoma kagalek welaga o.
66012005	Itithogon elokhoma werek korlek, ap thegerluk wolok warn hago welageikharek iti hak, at, he etnogo eak thegerluk pisuemaken meke wolok akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok tha'bokhogonat, apma 'bisalok obatnerogo hagasik dogogin meke itakhekhe. Itithogon itakhe korlek eranogoat, elege itago etnogo tilogo wolok Allah kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo elokhoma 'bi lagunem lakhigi o.
66012006	Itithogon wolok laga korlek, at he etnogo o limo akhuni dekma dogosak oba, Allah nen obolukmo ageikhe karelogo 'bisasikhe baga etoma lo lagasik werekma therogo werek korlek, iki 1. 260 baga welaga lakhigi o.
66012007	Itithogon lagasik werek korlek, pogot oba wim kagalagunem lakhigi. Malaikat Mikhael agarumi inom nen warlo etnogo wasuogoluk hagakhunem, at etnogo agarumi malaikat at werekmake meke inom ageikhasik wim yakhe lageikha.
66012008	-
66012009	Itithogon yakhe dogolik he, at warlo kok etnogo obatne degetdisegasik, at ebe inom, malaikat at agarumi meke inom, “O pogot oba yoma dogosak motok dek o, ” iluk agat oba po hilogo usa'isa agunem hisigi. Warlo kok iti etaga, Iblis igik, Setan igik, egarek meke, muk haganeat nen akhuni tha'bokhogonat nukhetdisekherek meke etnogoat o.
66012010	Itithogon obatne degetdisegasik usa'isa agama, pogot oba nen inane kokhogon men isinem nasuk holhi, “At iti nen Allah il oba ekalat it ninagarlak lak ninerugi dikene hibako wene inoba 'bisi motok welagarek meke etnogo arat obatne degetdisalok ebe ula’isega iti hano! Ninopase Allah Etagapogot kok dogolik, tilninabuagaluk Kristus meldisikhe etnogo, yi meke ti meke tha’bokhogonat iteerek dogolik, ipisak inobatne ageikhasik nen tilninakhasik, inapma arat ’binanha yi o.
66012011	It ninagarlak lak ninerugi iti inekaerek inebe inakmu ageidek, Ninakha halok he, hanoat o, iluk nukhunem inakha. It iti, Domba Eak amep ulabogo wakhukha iti baga inom, it nen Allah ane ebe wene iti pakhogon yogeisilik nekhe lageikha iti baga inom, Iblis etnogo arat obatne degetdisega iti o.
66012012	Iti nen he, hit pogot oba welagathep meke tha’bokhogonat yirani! Hinakla arleken akhekhe dogono o. Hinakla arleken akhekhe korlek, hit agat oba meke inom, i laut yekelekma meke inom, anek he, Iblis etnogo hinoba usa’i agama, at iki dogogin meke hutdekhesik, at nen, Niki pererlagat anek dogogin iti nenaluk, iluk akla aga dageikhesik weagathinabigin iti nen, eiye! Nakmu lak o, ” iluk isinem holhi o.
66012013	Itithogon usa’i ageikhemo dogolik, “An yigithogon agat oba usa’ani agama welagei, ” iluk hutdekhesik nogo nen, he eak ap itakhekhe meke etnogo wasigiluk mutluk laga.
66012014	Itithogon mutluk laga iti nen, at agorlerogon o akhuni dekmaat dogoagaluk, Allah nen obolukmo karelogo ’bisasikhe baga iti hitluk loagaluk, thue ko’balusa kok meke a’bikha meke wogokhemo hitluk etoma lagasik, Allah nen therogo werek korlek, o mo dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek, 3 tahun setengah welaga higi.
66012015	Itithogon werekma, at warlo etnogo nen, at he etnogo i iduk waga dogolik nen wolok loagaluk, i apema nen elesi kok motok hirlelogo ulabogo, he etnogo ebe werekmake mot-mot la’ekhe laga.
66012016	Itithogon la’ekhe mekeat he, akhuni nen, he etnogo ebe tilu hak, agat ape kagoukhogon nen i etnogo akla kolakhunem, dek aga laga higi.
66012017	Itithogon usa’isinem, warlo etnogo akla aga he etnogo oba ’biluk, akhuni he etnogo nen itago meke ebetlake Allah nen wene ninasuk wakhikhe wene hologo mothogon hagakhik, Yesus nen hagakhikhe wene pakhogon yogeisigik, hagakharek meke inasigiluk inawim ka’beldekhesik,
66012018	ebe i laut yekelek aik oba etoma lagasik metek werekma lakhigi o.
66013001	Itithogon lakhigirik oba nen, yabokane yeke helo hakene kok meke ageikhe aik ukuloak oba 10 ulabek, nen ukuloak 7 meke, i laut yekelekma nen dukhi agunem lakhigi. Aik 10 baga iti inebe tomok oba, kare-kare ap koktek ikharek iti hak ugu, nen ukuloak 7 baga iti, inebe tomogat oba Allah etaga weagarogo hagakharek meke holal waganek welaga lakhigi.
66013002	At yeke helo meke kok etnogo dukhi agunem higi iti ebe, yeke negen etaga harimau hakene. Nen, isok ’bagei inum hakene kok etaga beruang iti meke isok hakene. Nen, ape, yeke helo yeke hakene etaga singa ape hakene meke itithogon winam agasikmo, at warlo kok etnogo nen, yeke helo hakene iti yogokhe dogolik, “An kok nobatneak dogolik, yi meke ti meke iteerek welagarek etnogo hak, hat an nobolukmo kok dogonogoluk meldagagi o, ” iluk yogokhunem holhi.
66013003	Holhirik nen lakhigi meke, at helo yeke hakene kok etnogo ukuloak emenogo meke ageikhe wakhukhama, ebe watlasusak mekeat, hano dek ageikhesik o’ban anek werekma, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inileken hegasik nen hogorarik, at oporlik motok lagunem hisigi.
66013004	At warlo etnogo nen, at helo yeke hakene kok etnogo yogokhe dogolik, “Hat kok hobatne werek dogonok, ” iluk meldekhe iti nen, it akhuni inetaiken warlo etnogo inom, helo yeke hakene kok etnogo inom, inoba hakotdiluk hogorinakhe dogolik men ekhe lagoukha, “Warlo kok yi inom tak-tak, tha apegep? Ipisak tak-tak ageikhe dek o. Nen, tha hak nen at ipisak wim yabusak apegep? Erlok dek o, ” iluk ekhe lageikha hisigi o.
66013005	Itithogon ekhe korlek, thut 42 bulan holelik laga korlek, at helo yeke hakene kok etnogo ekaerek nen hogorakhigik, Allah etaga weagarogo ’bigik, hagakhe dogolik, akhuni apma ’bisalok hagasik dogoagaluk warlo kok meke etnogo nen iteerek 'bisekhemo lakhigi.
66013006	At itithogon dogolik, at nen Allah ebe inom, etaga inom, at aila pogot oba inom, it o pogot oba welageikharek meke inom, tha’bokhogonat inetaga weagatdekhe laga higi.
66013007	Iti hakeneat, akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok, inane tomok, inoado tomok, inai tomok, tha’bokhogonat at nen apma ’bisalok hagasik dogoagaluk meldekhemo iteerek atluk, Allah a’buri inom wim yakhe dogolik, obatne degetdisekhe laga higi.
66013008	At Allah nen pogot agat aban walhigidek dogolik, “It eta iniluk motok dogoagaluk hagarinabigin, ” iluk inetaga at Adomba Eak, it inobasik wakhukha meke etnogo aruesika baga holal waganogo ’bisikhe. It inetaga itithogon holal waganogo ’bisikhe meke, helo yeke hakene kok etnogo hogorakhidek werek korlek, akhuni agat oba welageikharek meke aperek tha’bokhogonat helo yeke hakene kok etnogo inetaiken oba hakotdiluk hogorakhe lageikha hisigi.
66013009	-
66013010	Iti nen he, wene yokhisagein yi, hit hinasuk werek halok he, hanorogo holini o. At ageikhe ebe herle warogo ’busak obaat, herle warogo ’bi lugun o. Nen, at ageikhe karok oba wasusak obaat, karok oba wasugunat o. Itithogon hagasugun iti nen, ebe kok he, Allah a’buri meke halok, inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk hinetaiken thebekhogon inobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogosak itiat o.
66013011	Itithogon higirik nen, oporlik lakhigi meke, helo yeke hakene kok ninat meke ageikhe ukuloak oba domba aik hakene pere ulabek, nen ane isinem, warlo ane hakene meke, agatla nen winam agunem lakhigi o.
66013012	Winam agasik, helo yeke hakene alep meke etnogo iteerek dogolik hagakhe laga meke, at helo yeke hakene yabokane meke iti iteerek agasik, at nen akhuni yogeisekhe dogolik, “Akhuni agat oba welagathep meke tha'bokhogonat, at helo yeke hakene alep meke etnogo wakhukhama ebe watlasusak meke the ageikhe meke itiat hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk hogorasusak o, ” iluk ane obatnerogon yogeisasinem holhi o.
66013013	At helo yeke hakene kok yabokane winam aga meke etnogo, akhuni nen at ebe hutduagaluk, it iniloba elalin meke hagakhe dogolik, pogot oba nen hetu usabi agunem lakhigi.
66013014	Itithogon ageikhe hagakhe laga iti, at helo yeke hakene kok alep meke etnogo nen, elalin meke at il oba hagakhe dogoagaluk iteerek ’bekhe meke etnogo ebe hagakhe dogolik, akhuni agat oba welageikharek meke ekalat nukhetdisekhe laga. Itithogon nukhetdisekhe dogolik, it akhuni emenogo nen, helo yeke hakene kok meke karok oba palekma ebe watlasusak meke apuke the ageikhe meke etnogo ebe hakene alino hagarogo kaneke ageikhe hagasuagaluk yogeisekhemo ebe hagakha lakhigi.
66013015	Itithogon hagakhama, at helo yeke hakene yabokane meke etnogo nen kaneke alino hagarek meke etnogo ilugutdekhemo ane isinem, it akhuni inetaiken kaneke etnogo oba hakotdigidek meke inebe motok inasigiluk wim yoko ’bekhemo inarik laga lageikha hisigi.
66013016	Itithogon inakhe korlek, at helo yeke hakene yabokane meke etnogo nen he, akhuni koktek meke inom, akhuni inetaga dek meke inom, inikierek meke inom, inerlageik meke inom, inatuan meke inom, it werlek meke inom, it tha’bokhogonat inebe tomok men yogeisekhe laga, “Helo yeke hakene kok meke etaga hinoba waganek meke yi, akhuni nen inil ekerlogo asirlo negen hinilhaoak oba a? Hiniki ebeke baga a, waganini o.
66013017	Hit nen, at etaga holal waganek meke a? Etaga hasik iniki wenago meke a, waganhep meke halok, yi meke ti meke oko paligik, it aperek inoba oko waganhik, hagakhe dogosak o. Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni aperek netaga waganhidek meke halok, itithogon waganhe dogosak motok dek o, ” iluk ane obatnerogon yogeisekhe laga lakhigi o.
66013018	Iti nen he, wene iti hasik, hinakla kagalek dek dogosak motok dek o. At he, tha nen akla kagalek halok he, helo yeke hakene iti etaga hasik, iniki 666 oba wenakha iti, ebe re, ap ageikhe etaga meke wenakhama iti nen he, hutdusak o.
66014001	Itithogon lakhigirik oba nen, yabokane lakhigi meke, at Domba Eak etnogo torn Sion oba metek werekma lakhigi. Iti re, at ebe men, it akhuni inebe 144. 000 nen, at Domba Eak inom, opase inom, ipisak inetaga it iti inebe tomok inilhaoak oba holal waganek meke men, inom werekma lageisigi.
66014002	Itithogon dogolik, inane i tutunmo usekhe dogolik ane hakene igik, pogot ane kokhogon ekherek hakene igik, it akhuni gitar wakharek meke nen ebe wakhunem ane ekherek hak igik, pogot oba nen inane doalegat isinem nasuk holhi.
66014003	Itithogon inane doalegat ekhe dogolik, Allah ebe kok welagarekma obolukmo werek korlek, it Allah nen winametdisasikhe meke aperek inebe 4 oba emenogo inom, ap inarluetek emenogo inom, inil oba etai ket meke yakulogo it akhuni ebetlake yakulu’buk inokodek meke, it akhuni inebe 144. 000 agat oba nen arat tilinakhe meke emenogo anek inilumo etai wakhe lageikha inane holhi.
66014004	-
66014005	It akhuni iti inebe, karelek dogouogoluk, humi inom noge igidek dogolik, inape baga nen inekalat ageikhe egarek degat, nen, akhuni aperek nen, “It iti weak ageikhe hagakhama, ” iluk wene inoba ’busak degat meke werekma, yi akhuni ti akhuni inakla nen kigilogo inoko palinakhikhemo, hipiri yukuk meke alebageik itakharek iti hak, it inebe Allah inom, Domba Eak inom, 'bisalok, Domba Eak etnogo holak komake laga halok oporlik lageikharek meke hisigi o.
66014006	Itithogon higirik oba nen, yabokane at malaikat ageikhe wene hano wene motok dogogin meke akhuni agat oba meke inukuloak etaga tomok, inane tomok, inoado tomok, inaila tomok, yogeisilik pogot obake hitluk lagunem lakhigi.
66014007	Itithogon hitluk nekhe dogolik, ane kokhogon men ekhe laga, “Ninopase Allah nen ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagasigin etnogo, arat hakok i aga iti nen he, Allah pogot inom, agat inom, i laut yekelek inom, i elesi agei tha’bokhogonat inom, walhasikhe meke etnogo hinayukhogon dogolik, hinetaiken at oba hakotdiluk hogorakhe dogono o, ” iluk ekhe laga lakhigi.
66014008	Itithogon ekhesikmo nen yabokane, at malaikat ageikhe wagasik, ane men isinem nasuk holhi, “Akhuni aperek nen it aperek thinuknuk atluk, inoba agaken nen param ha’isekhe dogoagaluk, anggur apusu wogeisegarek iti hak, it akhuni o kota Babel meke inoba agaken nen akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok param hagakhe dogoagaluk, inakla kagalharek meke etnogo, inebe arat wulel warogo thebelinakha, yi hein! ” iluk isinem holhi.
66014009	It malaikat inebe pere etnogo egasik oba nen, inoporlik malaikat ageikhe wagasik, nen, ane kokhogon men isinem holhi, “Hit aperek helo yeke hakene kok iti inom, ebe hakene alino hagarek iti inom, hinetaiken inoba hakotdiluk hogorinakhesip, hinebe sirlorogo at etaga waganek hinilhaoak oba a? Hiniki baga a, waganhep meke,
66014010	akhuni nen, i inom dapukhogon dek, anggur eken apusu anek arle weak henakharek iti hak, Allah akla aga hit akmuthinakhidek, ukum obatnerogon hinoba ’bigin o. Itithogon hinoba ’biluk, nit malaikat Allah hasik welagorek meke inom, Domba Eak etnogo inom, ninil oba hinebe, hetu men, hotali al hakene obasi weak meke etaga belerang men, inom-inom nekerekma etoma la’inagoumo, hinet wakho motok dogogun o.
66014011	Iti re, hit hinetaiken helo yeke hakene iti inom, kaneke at ebe hakene alino hagarek iti inom, inoba hakotdiluk hogorinakhesip, hinebe sirlorogo etaga waganek waganhep meke itithogon la’inagoumo, dikene hibakone motok, thet walogo hano ageikhe welageidek, hinoba hetu aik nen hinet wakho korlek, hinoado baga thode dageisi motok dogogin o, ” iluk isinem holhi.
66014012	Wene yi hasik kogat hagasusak he, Allah a’buri at ane hologo mothogon hagakhe dogolik, hinetaiken Yesus oba hakotdiluk welagathep meke iti, hinetaiken thebekhogon hinobakhanini hapugutdiluk dogosak o.
66014013	Wene itithogon isinem holhirik oba nen, yabokane, pogot oba nen ane men yoknikhunem nasuk holhi, "Yogotak akhuni ninoe Etagapogot inom hunik dogolik, at hasik hano hagakhunem inasugun meke, inakla motok arleken akhagun o, iluk holal waganogo ’bino o, ” iluk yoknikhunem Allah Agoreke pogot oba nen ane kokhogon men yoknekhe, "Iti eberogonat o. It akhuni iti Yesus obasik thet wiik-weakhogon yabu hagakhe lageikha meke iti, ebe hagakhukha meke wolok lugun iti nen he, thet hano walugun o, ” iluk yoknikhunem nasuk holhi.
66014014	Itithogon yoknekhesik oba nen, yabokane, oisa kut meke werekma, at ebe abat itaklasi ageikhe meke etnogo hakene meke kare-kare emas meke ukuloak oba ugu, nen, karok korlo meke elaklak weak meke ikimo wolok ebe oisa etnogo baga hurek werekma lakhigi.
66014015	Iti oporlik, at malaikat ageikhe Allah ai halekma nen dukhi agasik, ane kokhogon, at oisa baga hurek welaga meke etnogo men yogokhe, “Agat oba eken arat horle agama ebe palusak oba arat asi agama iti nen he, hakarok iti wolok nen, yogotak eken pali usan o, ” iluk yogokhemo,
66014016	at oisa baga hurek welaga meke etnogo nen akarok etnogo wolok agat oba eken pali usa'aga lakhigi.
66014017	Itithogon higirikmo nen, yabokane, at malaikat ageikhe pogot oba Allah ai halekma nen, akarok korlo meke elaklak weak meke wolok dukhi agunem lakhigi.
66014018	Itithogon lakhigirikmo nen yabokane, at malaikat ageikhe hetu iteerek meke Allah ake hetu hunekharekma nen wagasik, at malaikat akarok korlo meke elaklak weak meke wolok usa’aga meke etnogo ane kokhogon men yogokhunem nasuk holhi, “Agat oba anggur eken arat horle agama palusak werek iti, hakarok iti wolok, eken pali usan o, ” iluk yogokhe.
66014019	Itithogon yogokhemo, at etnogo akarok agat oba wolok usa’agasik, anggur eken agat oba meke eken oak oba nen palogo eken thagalharek meke oboluk kokma akla po la’isinem higi. Eken thagalharekma iti ebe, Allah nen akla aga kokhogon inoba ’bekherek itiat o.
66014020	Nen, anggur eken palek iti ukharlek, o sili abel itikmanke thagalhunem, eken thagalharek meke iti akla nen, mep i elesi negen hunalogo hurli 2 meter kuda ape herle warek oba yekelogo dageikhesik hualogo, hurli 300 kilometer walegat lagunem lakhigi o.
66015001	Nileken itithogon lakhigirik oba nen, yabokane, akhuni nen hutduagaluk, elalin meke ageikhe kok meke inayuk meke hakene yigithogon pogot oba winam agunem lakhigi. Ilugun kobokhogon Allah akla aga inoba ’biluk weagarinabigin iti nen, iniki 7 baga weagarinabiginmeke, malaikat inebe 7 bagaat winam agunem lageisigi.
66015002	Itithogon higirik oba nen, yabokane, i laut elokhoken mirli inamukhak hakene hetu inom dapuk-hapukhogon yekelek meke lakhigi. Itithogon lakhigirik lakhigi meke, akhuni aperek inetaiken helo yeke hakene etnogo inom, kaneke at ebe hakene alino hagarek etnogo inom, inetaiken inoba hakotdiluk hogorinakhidegat, nen etaga iniki wenago holal waganek meke etnogo waganhidegat, hagakhe lageikha baga inobatne ageikhesik, pikon gitar hakene Allah nen wogeisekhemo inikimo wolok, i laut yekelek iti yipitla metek werekma lageisigi o.
66015003	-
66015004	Itithogon dogolik, etai at Musa Allah atuaneke etnogo inom, Domba Eak etnogo inom, ipisakinaetai wakhe dogolik men ekhe lageikha, “Allah ninopase, u a e, Hat hobatne horleakma re, u a e, Yi meke ti meke hagasusak anekma, u a e, Elalin kokhogon inayuk meke anek hagakhetek o, u a e, Hat yi akhuni ti akhuni inopase Hetagapogotdogolik, u a e, Mothogon anek hagarinakhetek, u a e, Hano anek hagarinakhetek, u a e, Ninopase, u a e. Ninopase Hetagapogot hat harligat karelogo dogolik, u a e, Akhuni ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe dogolik, u a e, Akhuni tha’bokhogonat inil oba, u a e, Eberogonat motok hagakhen o, u a e, Akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok tha’bokhogonat, u a e, Hapma ukitluk, u a e, Initibagal yukukhogon, u a e, Hogothakhik, heagei wathakhik, hagakhunem, u a e, It akhuni thani hak nen hat inayuk dek dogolik, u a e, Hogothakhidek huk asusak, u a e, Dek, u a e, ”iluk etai wakhe lageikha nasuk holhi.
66015005	Itithogon hisigirik oba nen yabokane pogot oba Allah ai halekma thu hualagunem akla, at Allah ebe welagarek iluk, o su ai meke halek etnogo werekma lakhigi o.
66015006	Itithogon thu hualek werekma, it malaikat inebe 7 baga inasu kut thobalek a’bi’bal weak motok etaga lenan ugu, nen, thin ikharek hak, emas meke inamigoak oba ugu meke, Allah nen iki 7 baga akhuni weagarinabigin meke wolok dukhi ageikha lageisigi.
66015007	Itithogon dukhi ageikhasikmo, it Allah nenwinametdisasikhe meke iniluk welageikharek meke inebe 4 emenogo meke ageikhe nen, isoak ebe 7 emas meke hagarek oba Allah iluk motok welagarek meke akla aga i negen henago meke, Allah nen it malaikat inebe 7 baga emenogo wogeisekhe laga lakhigi.
66015008	Wogeisugunem, Allah ai halekma etnogo Allah obatne horleak hogorakharek meke inayuk negen etnogo hetu thode negen kerlek agama, it malaikat inebe 7 emenogo nen Allah nen akhuni weagarinabigin etnogo ilugun hurli baga weagarinakhidek werek korlek, akhuni aperek Allah ai halekma iti ukekhe lageikha hisigi motok dek o.
66016001	Itithogon lakhigirik oba nen, yabokane, Allah ai halekma etnogo nen, at ane kokhogon it malaikat inebe 7 baga emenogo men yogeisugunem nasuk holhi, “An Allah nakla aga i henago negen isoak ebe 7 baga henago meke ithi tialogo akhuni agat oba meke inoba usa’i lani o, ” iluk yogeisekhe.
66016002	Yogeisekhemo, it malaikat inebe 7 emenogo meke ageikhe alebageik Allah akla aga i henago negen etnogo meke ageikhe tialogo akhuni agat oba meke inoba arat usa’i agunem, it akhuni ebetlake aperek tha’bokhogonat inetai ekerlogo, helo yeke kok etnogo etaga holal waganek etnogo waganhik, inetaiken akaneke ebe at hakene alino hagarek etnogo oba hakotdigik, hagakha meke, pot weak meke inobake dukhi aga laga lakhigi.
66016003	Itithogon higirikmo nen, yabokane it malaikat inebe 7 emenogo meke opakiat nen itithogon arat usa’i agasik oba nen, ageikhe nen Allah akla aga i henago negen etnogo meke ageikhe tialogo i laut yekelek oba usa’i agunem, i elokhoken akhuni inakhunem inamep hakene hagatlaga dogolik, yi meke ti meke i laut yekelek akla iluk welagarek meke tha’bokhogonat watlarik laga laga lakhigi.
66016004	Itithogon higirik oba nen, yabokane, it malaikat emenogo meke inebe pere nen itithogon usabi ageikhasik oba nen, ageikhe nen Allah akla aga i henago negen etnogo meke ageikhe tialogo i elesimoke inom, nen i ebe kok asi agarekmake inom, obake usabi agunem, i tha’bokhogonat elokhoken mep aga laga lakhigi.
66016005	Itithogon hagatlagunem, at malaikat i iteerek meke nen Allah men yogokhe, “Allah hebe alebat welagagitik, yogotak hikhok motogat dogolik, karelek motok welagatek meke nen, wene mothogonat inoba ’begen o.
