66016006	Nen, it ap iti nen, hat ha’buri inom, hat hane yogeisegarek meke inom, inamep ulabogo inakhukhasikmo, mep noagaluk wogeisegen iti, inobabut oba mothogonat wogeisegen o, nopase, ” iluk yogokhe laga nasuk holhi.
66016007	Itithogon yogokhesik oba nen yabokane, Allah ake hetu hunekharekma nen ane ageikhe men isinem holhi, “Allah hobatne horleak, yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok motok anek dogolik, ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, eberogonat mothogonat egetek etnogo nen, itithogon hagakhen o, nopase, ” iluk ekhe laga holhi.
66016008	It malaikat emenogo meke inebe henagan oba nen arat itithogon usabi ageikhasik oba nen, ageikhe nen Allah akla aga i henago negen etnogo meke ageikhe tialogo mulikin oba usakhunem, mulikin aik nen akhuni inoba hali yagalinakhe dogoagaluk, mulikin aik weak hagarogo ’bekhemo, akhuni inoba hali yagalinakhe laga lakhigi.
66016009	Itithogon aik nen hali yagalinakhemo inoba kokhogon nasinem hinet wakhe dogolik, Allah akla aga inoba ’biluk weagarinabusak tak-tagat weagarinakhe laga mekeat he, at ebe hogorasuogoluk weak hagakhe lageikha meke thogotdisalok, inobabut hebelageidek dogolik, it nen, “Allah ebe nikitlatlep e, ” iluk Allah etaga motok weagatdekhe lageikha hisigi.
66016010	It malaikat emenogo meke inebe 4 nen arat itithogon usabi ageikhasik oba nen, ageikhe nen Allah akla aga i henago negen etnogo meke ageikhe tialogo helo yeke hakene kok etnogo kok meke welagarekma obolukmo usabi agunem, o at kok dogolik hagasik welagarekma tha’bokhogonat mum aga laga. Itithogon mum agunem, it akhuni hinet wakhe dogolik, ina’bi inaik nen hundiluk, men ekhe lageikha, “Ninagalumo u weak yoma nina’it o, ” iluk
66016011	inobabut inikhogat dogolik weak hagakhe lageikha meke here’isalok, inobabut hebelageidek dogolik, it nen he, “Allah ebe nikitlatlep e, ” iluk Allah kok pogot oba meke etaga motok weagatdekhoat welageikha hisigi.
66016012	Itithogon werek korlek, it malaikat emenogo meke inebe 5 nen itithogon arat hagakhasikmo nen, malaikat ageikhe nen, Allah akla aga i henago negen etnogo meke ageikhe tialogo, it ap inetagapogot o mulikin dagei agarekma timur meke wisuagaluk, i kok etaga Efrat oba usabi agunem, it wisugunke i ebe ’berok ekhe laga.
66016013	Itithogon ’berok ekhesikmo nen, yabokane, warlo etnogo inom, helo yeke hakene kok etnogo inom, Allah ane yogeisekherek meke thalek ekalat ekherek meke etnogo inom, inapema nen mokat inobabut weak meke inebe 3 oba nen hurlukhak hakene meke dukhi aga laga.
66016014	Mokat iti inebe Iblis agarumi meke akhuni inoba duk i agunem hagasusak dek meke elalinat hagakharek meke etnogoat o. It itithogon dukhi ageikhasik nen, Allah obatne horleakma yi meke ti meke hagasusak erlok anek etnogo ai wi asigin iti baga wim inom yabuogoluk, apinetagapogot o yi ai ti ai natogorinabuogoluk, wim yoko laga lageikha hisigi.
66016015	Itithogon lageikhasikmo nen, at Yesus nen men yoknekhe, “Hasuk holin o. Akhuni inilarlurlu waganuogoluk limago wageikharek iti hak, an itithogonat wisigin o. Itithogonat wagunem, akhuni inal palek werekma inekarli agarek iti hak, hit itithogonat hinekarli asunogo iluk hinasu ibat ikhauwogoluk karelogo ’biluk dogogun halok he, Allah nen hanothinakhunem hinakla arleken asugun o, ” iluk yoknikhunem holhi.
66016016	Nen, it Iblis agarumi inobabut weak meke emenogo nen, it ap koktek emenogo o it akhuni Ibrani meke inane baga etaga Harmagedon egarek oba iti natogorlogo ’bisugunem lageisigi.
66016017	Itithogon higirik oba nen, yabokane, it malaikat emenogo meke inebe 6 oba itithogon arat hagakhasik oba nen, at ageikhe nen, Allah akla aga i henago negen etnogo meke ageikhe tialogo pogot abelmake oisa werekmake usabi agunem, Allah ai halekma at kok welagarekma obolukmo nen ane ageikhe kokhogon men ekhe, “Arat ilugun warogo hagatlaga o, ” iluk ekhe.
66016018	Itithogon isinem, o yabok eran-alep yegethigik, pogot ane sup iluk nen ane luk-luk lageik, dugul kok inayuk meke akhuni Allah nen winametdisasikhe nen hurli yogotak hurli, dugul iti hakene ageikhe aborlok luk-lagat higidek meke itiat aborlok luk-lagathigik, hagakhe laga lakhigi.
66016019	Itithogon hagakhunem, o ukul kok etnogo agat pakhogon henagan mogoulogo hagatlageik, akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok Allah ebe inokodek meke inai ukul tomok tha’bokhogonat tuguk-tagakhogon wuleleken tagalageik, hagatlagunem, Allah nen, “An nakla aga apik anggur apusu henago negen etnogo, at o Babel kok etnogo wogosigin, ” iluk abok yogokhikhe meke iti Allah akla ebekhesik nen, wogokhe laga higi.
66016020	Nen, i eken palekmake tha’bokhogonat inom, tom tha’bokhogonat inom, dek ageik,
66016021	pogot oba nen miso digiken kok meke ebe tomok akin he, 50 kilo meke usa'aga dogolik, akhuni inebe inakhik, hagakhe laga. Itithogon inakhunem, it nen ekhe dogolik, “Miso digiken weak ninariogo yi, Allah ebe nikitlatlep e, ” iluk etaga weagatdekhe lageikha lageisigi.
66017001	-
66017002	Itithogon higirik nen yabokane, it malaikat inebe 7 baga nen Allah akla aga i henago negen wolok tialha emenogo meke ageikhe wagasik nen, men yoknekhe, “It akhuni o kota Babel meke, he kok yugunisake ya hagakhik nekherek meke hakene iti, i kok meke aik oba dogolik, ap koktek inetagapogot agat oba meke nen at inom param hagakhik, akhuni aperek nen anggur apusu nasi motok dogolik, hunu-hunu ageikharek iti hak, akhuni agat oba meke nen at inom param hagakho motok welageik, hagakherek meke iti, Allah nen he iti ukum oba ’biluk ebe weagatdigiluk awim ka’belhe meke yokhisik nen eme o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66017003	Itithogon yoknikhunem, Allah Agoreke noba duk i agama, at malaikat etnogo nen woknarik, o akhuni dekma limo laga. Itithogon woknarik lagama eloma dogolik, lakhigi meke, he etnogo helo yeke hakene kok isi morla pimut hakene meke apot oba yasukhogon lagunem lakhigi. Helo yeke hakene iti ukuloak, 7 baga, nen, aik ukuloak oba, 10 nen ulabek, nen, ebe obake, Allah etaga wiik-weakhogon hagasusak meke holal kirlik-kerlekhogon waganek meke lakhigi.
66017004	Nen, he iti asu ageikhe elokhoken morla pimut hakene, nen, ageikhe elokhoken ki’bi-ki’bi warek hakene, meke ugu. Nen obake, emas meke inom, helekit eken hupurlekentek oko doalegat palharek meke etaga permata inom, mutiara inom, obake waganek dogolik, obabut weak hagakhik, param ha'uagaluk hagakhik, itithogon yugunat ya hagakhik nekherek meke iti, isoak emas meke baga henago ikimo hago welaga lakhigi.
66017005	Nen, wene ebe limago meke ilhaoak oba yigithogon holal waganek, “Akhuni agat oba meke yugunat ya hagakhik nekharek meke inom, inobabut korlo motok weak hagakharek meke inom, tha'bokhogonat inagosa etaga Babel kok yi, ” iluk holal waganek welaga lakhigi.
66017006	Nen, he iti nen, Allah a’buri meke inom, Yesus ane yogeisilik nekharek meke inom, inakhikhe meke inamep nekesik, akhuni nen anggur eken apusu nalok hunu-hunu ageikharek hak, hunu-hunu agasikmo lakhigi. Itithogon lakhigirik nen motok hogorakhi.
66017007	Itithogon higirik, hogorakhe lageima, malaikat etnogo nen men yoknekhe, “Nenaluk hogorakhe lagan? An nen, he iti inom, helo yeke hakene ukuloak 7 baga, nen, aik ukuloak oba 10 baga nen ulabek meke, he iti apot oba yasukhogon werekma wolok lagarek meke iti inom, ipisak inobasik wene limago werek meke pilinerogo yokhisik o.
66017008	Helo yeke hakene hegen iti, alep iluk welageikhe mekeat he, yogotak elokhe dek hegen iti, wema baga kilinmo nen dageisigin o. Dagei aga halok, Allah nen alomatdigin o. Nen, Allah nen agat aban winametdigidek dogolik, thuesika it akhuni iniluk motok dogoagaluk hanorinabigin meke, inetaga holal waganek iti baga, it aperek inetaga holal waganek dek meke nen helo yeke hakene iti inileken halok, it nen he, Helo yeke hakene yi, alep weiageikhesik nen, elokhe dek ageikhe mekeat, yabokane winam aga yi, ninayuk o, iluk hogorasugun o.
66017009	Nen, wene yokhisigin yi hasik, inakla kagalek werek meke anek hutdusak o. At helo yeke hakene iti ukuloak ebe 7 baga nen hegen iti ebe, torn ebe 7 baga nen, at he iti kok welagarek oba werek meke hegen o. Nen, ageikhe ap koktek inetagapogot inebe 7 baga nen werek meke hasik hegen o.
66017010	Nen, it koktek inebe 7 baga nen iti meke, inebe 5 arat kobokhogon usegama, inebe pere werek meke iti, ageikhe arat kok dogolik, akhuni apma 'bisalok hagasik werek. Nen, ageikhe aban wageidekma, yabokane kok atluk akhuni apma 'bisalok hagasik motok dogogin dek o. Iki pererlagat dogogin o.
66017011	Helo yeke hakene alep welageikhe mekeat, elokhe dek iti ebe koktek inebe 7 baga nen emenogo’ arat kobokhogon usilik usilik waga lageikhasik, it 7 iti meke ageikhe yabokane apuke kok atluk, iniki wenago 8 hakene hagatlatluk, yabokane Allah nen alomatdigin meke hegen o.
66017012	Nen, aik ukuloakma 10 baga nen ulabek hegen iti ebe re, ap inebe 10 baga nen kok asugun meke aban werek meke hegen mekeat he, it koktek meldisaumo, at helo yeke hakene etnogo inom, o mo il opakiat, satu jam, hakene anek kok dogolik akhuni hagasik dogogun meke hegen o.
66017013	It iti inetaiken opakiat dogolik, at helo yeke hakene etnogo yogokhe dogolik, Nit koktek dogoagaluk meldinanhama ninetagapogot welago meke iti, harat hetagapogot dogonogoluk iteerek 'bagago o, iluk yogokha.
66017014	Itithogon iteerek 'biluk, Domba Eak etnogo wim inom yabuogoluk hagasugun mekeat he, at Domba Eak ebe akhuni koktek meke inom, motok inetagapogot meke inom, tha'bokhogonat inoe etagapogot siakthek aratma re, a'buri wenageinabiluk inayoko 'bisekhemo inobabut at hasik hupukhogon hagakharek meke emenogo, at werekmake atluk, inom. nen, at helo yeke hakene etnogo agarumi inom inobatne degetdisagun o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66017015	At malaikat etnogo nen itithogon yoknekhesik, ageikhe men yoknekhe, “At he yugunisake hagarik nekherek meke hakene iti, ebe kok welagarekma i hegen iti ebe, akhuni tha'bokhogonat inukuloak etaga tomok, inoado tomok, inaila o etaga tomok, inane tomok meke hileken hisegen o.
66017016	Nen, aik ukuloakma 10 baga ulabek hegen etnogo inom, helo yeke hakene ebe etnogo inom, ipisak nen, he yugunisake hagarik nekherek meke iti, ina’iretdiluk, at meke yi meke ti meke horligik, ebe alwurlugat here’isalok, ebe warogo abel ebelake neke dogolik, abel ebelake hetu hundugun o.
66017017	Itithogon hagasugun iti, Allah nen isikhe meke tak-tagat hagatlasuagaluk, at akla apekherek meke iti, it ap koktek iti inakla kagalhemo, it inetaiken opakiat dogolik, it nen, at helo yeke hakene etnogo yogokhe dogolik, Nit kok ninetagapogot welago meke iti, hat kok hetagapogot werek dogonok o, iluk iteerek ’biluk, inom nen he yugunisake hagarik nekherek meke etnogo ebe wasugun iti.
66017018	Nen, he meke hileken hegen iti ebe ap koktek inetagapogot agat oba meke tha’bokhogonat apma ’bisalok hagasik welagarek meke, o kota kok meke egarek etnogoat hileken hegen o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66018001	Itithogon yoknekhesik oba nen yabokane, at malaikat ninat meke ageikhe pogot oba nen usagunem lakhigi. At iti obatne horleak dogolik, isagal yago lagarek hak, a’bi’bal yago akhuni agat oba meke tha’bokhogonat inoba yibarlogo ’bekhe laga higi.
66018002	-
66018003	Itithogon usa’agasik oba nen ane kokhogonat men ekhe, “Akhuni ageikhe nen anggur apusu wogeisugunem nalok hunu-hunu ageikharek iti hak, he kok yugunisake hagarik nekherek meke etnogo oba agaken dageisinem, Hagatnabini, iluk, akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok tha’bokhogonat inom, ap koktek inetagapogot agat oba meke inom, yogeisugunem, inom param hagakhe lageikha iti. Nen, at he iti oba hiakhogon dogolik, oba agaken dageisinem ha’uagaluk obabut hagakherek iti baga, akhuni agat oba meke yi meke ti meke oko hunekharek palegarek meke inikierek hagarekhe lageikhaat. Itithogon hagakhe lageikha mekeat, yogotak arat wuleleken tagalinakha yi, hein! Itithogon wuleleken tagalinakhama, Iblis agarumi inom men, mokat obabut weak meke men, Thue nausak dek iluk agorlerakharek meke tha'bokhogonat inom, it inaila hagatlaga o, ” iluk yogokhikhe.
66018004	-
66018005	Itithogon yogokhikhesik oba nen yabokane, pogot oba nen ageikhe ane men ekhe, “Akhuni nen, yi meke ti meke upu wema oba duk helakhogon 'bilik dagegarek hak, it akhuni nen, at he iti inom weak hagakho motok welageikharek meke iti pogot oba mot-mot dageikhemo, an Allah nakla eberek motok welagei iti nen, an nen it wene inoba 'biluk weagarinabigin. It weagarinakhe dogolik, hit an na'buri meke it hinom dogolik, it inobabut waganogo weak hagasumo hinom weagathinabunogo nen, it here'isalok lo dukhitni o.
66018006	Nen, hit nen, at he iti ukum oba 'bugun meke nen, at nen it hagarinakhe laga hagat, ukum ebe oba 'bekhe dogolik, ageikhe inomat oba dukhogon 'bino o. Nen, at nen i melageisegarek iti hak, anini inoba 'bekhe laga meke iti, oko ukum oba 'bekhe dogolik, ageikhe inom oba dukhogon 'bino o.
66018007	At he iti, ekaerek nen ekhe dogolik, An nebe he kok dogolik, akhuni napma 'bisalok hagasik welagei ha yoma re! Thoge 'banhama nen nakla weak atluk de aga dogogin nogo? Dek o, iluk yi meke ti meke oba hiakhogon dogolik ekaerek nen kokhogon hogorakhekho motok werek iti hagat, hinet kokhogon wakhe dogolik, akla weak atluk de aga dogoagaluk ukum wogotno o.
66018008	Itithogon apekherek iti nen, an Allah nobatne horleakma re, opaki hasigat hipiri no inom, u kok inom, wogotluk nen, ebe o hali 'bumo nukunem akla weak atluk de ago motok dogogin iti o, ” iluk pogot oba nen isinem nasuk holhi.
66018009	At he iti itithogon ebe hali neke dogolik, isi thode dageisinem, it ap koktek inetagapogot agat oba welageikharek meke, at he iti oba agaken dageisinem, thebelu'buk param ha'uagaluk hagakhunem, hagakhe lagoukha meke emenogo nen inileken lakhalok, uak di ago de ago hagakhe lageikha.
66018010	Uak de itithogon aga dogolik, “At weagatdekhemo hinet wariogo iti, nit ninom weagatninakhunem hinet wasunogo, ” iluk inayuk nen inebe walegat hekhogon metek dogolik, de yigithogon aga lageikha, “At Allah nen, hit akhuni o Babel meke hinobatne horleak etnogo, il opaki hasigat satu jam hakene, ukum hinoba 'biluk weagathinakhe iti, eiye, eiye, ” iluk de aga lageikha hisigi.
66018011	It itithogon de aga korlek, it akhuni yi meke ti meke oko hunekharek meke nen, men ekhe lagoukha, “Ninameke yi meke ti meke wolok lalok, it akhuni o Babel meke inoba oko palhorek meke etnogo, yabokane thani inoba oko waganhe dogogun, ” iluk inuak di ago de ago hagakhe lageikhaat.
66018012	Itithogon de aga dogolik, “Yi meke ti meke iti ebe oko kogat palharek meke emas inom, perak inom, helekit eken oko kogat palharek meke etaga permata inom, mutiara inom, su kain sutera inom, lenan su inom, elokhoken he, morla pimut hakene inom, ki’bi-ki’bi warek hakene inom, o obasi hano meke inom, warn hakene etaga gajah aik werek meke yi meke ti meke hagakharek meke inom, o yi meke ti meke oko kok palharek meke hagakhik, tembaga meke hagakhik, pisue meke hagakhik, helekit etaga pualam meke hagakhik, hagakharek meke inom,
66018013	obasi hano meke kami inom, hite hakene meke inom, diboka hakene meke inom, o mur apusu inom, kemenyan apusu inom, anggur eken apusu inom, o zaitun eken apusu inom, tepung wul hakene etnogo meke inom, gandum inom, sapi inom, kuda inom, domba inom, oto hakene etaga kereta inom, akhuni inebe inatuaneke dogoagaluk inom, tha'bokhogonat wolok lalok, thani inoba oko palhe dogogun, ” iluk de aga lageikha.
66018014	Itithogon de aga dogolik, it Babel meke men yogeisega, “Yi meke ti meke hit hinetaiken warlok meke dek ageik, yi meke ti meke oba hiakhogon dogolik, hinakla arlekenhogon welagathep meke dek ageik, hagakhemo, hit nen yabokane heago waganusak motok erlok dek aga o, ” iluk ekhe lageikha.
66018015	Itithogon egasik, it akhuni yi meke ti meke oko thabusogo it Babel meke inoba thaburekhe lageikha meke emenogo nen, “It akhuni o Babel meke weagarinakhe iti hak, nit itithogonat weagatninabunogo, ” iluk inayuk nen inebe walegat hekhogon metek dogolik, inuak de aga dogolik, men ekhe lageikha,
66018016	-
66018017	“Hit Babel meke hinasu kain lenan su meke elokhoken morla pimut hakene meke inom, ki’bi-ki’bi warek hakene meke inom, i’biluk, hinobake emas meke inom, helekit eken oko kogat palharek meke etaga permata meke inom, mutiara meke inom, waganhethep etnogo, il opaki hasigat satu jam hakene arat alomatlageikha yi eiye, eiye, ” iluk inuak di ago de ago hagakhe lageikha. It itithogon ekhe korlek, it akhuni ku kok meke etaga kapal wolok nekharek meke inougi ap koktek inom, inagarumi ku wakharek meke inom, it akhuni aperek wogosik lageikharek meke inom, it aperek i laut yekelekmake yi meke ti meke herarik nekharek meke inom, tha’bokhogonat, it akhuni Babel meke inebe hali nukunem inisi thode inileken lageik walegat hekhogon metek dogolik, men ekhe lageikha,
66018018	-
66018019	“Eiye, nayuk o. O kota akhuni Babel meke inai ukul yi hakene, o yi ai ti ai aperek werek nogo? Motok dek o, ” iluk wul meke ’bisi negen inukuloak oba yugulogo inuak de aga dogolik men ekhe lageikha, “Ihi, nakmu lak o. It akhuni o Babel meke inameke yi meke ti meke doalegatma, nit ninaku oko palogo inikierek hagatninakharek etnogo mekeat he, il opaki hasigat satu jam hakeneat alomatlageikhe yi nakmu lak o, ” iluk ekhe lageikha.
66018020	Itithogon ekhe korlek, at ageikhe nen, it Allah a’buri meke men yogeisekhe, “Allah nen he, hit hinokoma it o Babel meke ukum inoba ’biluk weagarinakhe iti nen, hit pogot oba meke tha’bokhogonat hinakla arleken akhigik, hit Yesus nen hinayoko ’biluk la’inageisikhe meke inom, hit at ane yogeisegethep meke inom, hit Allah a’buri hinom, hit tha’bokhogonat hinakla arleken akhigik, hagatni o, ” iluk isinem holhi.
66018021	Itithogon isinem holhirik oba nen yabokane, at malaikat obatne horleak meke ageikhe wagasik helekit kok yi meke ti meke tamelharek meke hakene meke po wukhogon i laut yekelekma usa’i aga dogolik men ekhe, “At Allah nen hit akhuni o kota Babel meke, yigithogonat obatnerogon po usa’inagagin o. Itithogon usa’inagumo yabokane akhuni nen inileken hisagun motok dek o.
66018022	-
66018023	Akhuni o yi ai ti ai oko hunekharek meke, inetaga dek hakene mekeat he, ap hit meke anek he, inetagawerek welageikha o. Nen, hit nen hinausa meke baga akhuni yi ai ti ai inukuloak etaga dopok, hinekalat nukherinakhe lagabat. Itithogon hagakhe lagap mekeat he, it gitar wakharek meke inom, akhuni etai wakharek meke inom, dokop elo horlelogo huthegarek iti hak huthegarek meke inom, pikon kok meke ane huthegarek meke inom, yabokane wakhunem ane holugun degat. Nen, ap ageikhe yi meke ti meke ikimo horleak hagakherek meke hagakhunem inileken hugun degat. Nen, inapiri gandum eken meke thagalhunem helekit ane ekherek meke iti, yabokane ane isinem inasuk holugun degat. Nen, hinageisagal amulok inileken hugun degat. Nen, ap nen humi woginakhunem inakla arlekenhogon inane egarek meke inasuk holugun degat o, ” iluk isinem holhi.
66018024	It akhuni o kota Babel meke nen, akhuni Allah ane yogeisegarek meke inom, Allah a’buri aperek inom, inamep ulabogo inakhik, it akhuni aperek agat oba inakha meketha’bokhogonat, it nenat inakhik, inakhukhasikmo nogo nen he, inamep iniki agot oba werek iti nen, Allah nen ukuminoba ’biluk, weagarinakhe iti.
66019001	-
66019002	Itithogon isinem holhirikmo nen yabokane, akhuni motok doalegat pogot oba dogolik inane kokhogonmen isinem nasuk holhi, “Ninopase Allah kok hobatne horleak, u a e, Ninebe tilninakhetek, u a e, Harat hogothabusak, u a e, Hogothakhe lago u hak, u a e, Haleluya ekhe lago, u a e. Hat nen ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, u a e, Eberogonat anek hagakhetek, u a e, Mothogon anek hagakhetek etnogo nen, u a e, Akhuni o Babel meke inobabut, u a e, He yugunisake hagarik nekherek meke hakeneemenogo nen, u a e, Akhuni o yi ai ti ai welageikharek meke, u a e, Weak hagarinakharek iti nen, u a e, Ukum inoba ’begetik weagarinakhen, u a e, It nen hatuaneke meke inamep ulabogo inakhukhahasik, u a e, Inokoma inakhen iti nen, u a e, Hogothakhe lago, u a e, ”iluk etai wakhe lageikha.
66019003	Itithogon wakhasik nen, yabokane ageikhe wakhe dogolik, “Allah ninopase, u a e, Hogothakhe lago, u hak, u a e, Haleluya ekhe lago, u a e, Akhuni o Babel meke inisi thode, u a e, Dek ageidek dageisi motok werek, u a e, ”iluk wakhe lageikha.
66019004	Itithogon ekhe korlek, it ap inarluetek inebe 24 emenogo inom, it Allah nen winametdisasikhemo iniluk welageikharekmeke inebe 4 oba eranogo inom, at Allah ebe kokwelagarekma obolukmo werekma apma ukiluk, initibagal yukukhogon hogorakhe dogolik men ekhe lageikha, “Ebeat asuak, ” u hak, “Amin, ” igik, “Hogothakhe lago, ” u hak, “Haleluya” igik, ekhe lageikha.
66019005	Nen, Allah kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo nen men ekhe lageikha holhi, “Hit Allah atuaneke inetagawerek meke inom, inetaga dek meke inom, tha’bokhogonat Allah hinayukhogon welagathep meke ninopase Allah hogorakhe dogono o, ” iluk ekhe lageikha holhi.
66019006	Itithogon ugunem nasuk holhirikmo nen yabokane, akhuni doalegat doalogo dogolik, inane i kok meke ane ekherek hak inom, pogot ane kok sup iluk ane luk-luk lagarek ane hakene inom, men ekhe lageikha, “Ninopase Allah hogothakhe lago, u hak, Haleluya, ekhe lago. Hat hobatne motok horleakma, yi meke ti meke hagasusak anek etnogo nen, yogotak arat hapma ’binanhetik haknisik welagan o.
66019007	Itithogon dogolik, Domba Eak age negen ikhagaluk ai arat wi agama, at age negen etnogo arat ekaerek nen tomorogo ’bakhekhesikmo nogo nen, ebe arat isigin iti nen ninakla arlekenhogon, akilukhogon, at hogorakhe dogouok o.
66019008	Age itithogon ikhagaluk, asu lenan elokhoken kut motok hano thobalek mekeat ugu dogoagaluk wogokhemo higi. Su hano iti ebe, akhuni Allah a’buri inobabut mothogon hagakharek meke itiat o, ” iluk ekhe lageikha.
66019009	Itithogon isinem holhirikmo nen, at malaikat etnogo nen men yoknekhe, “It akhuni Domba Eak age negen ikhekhe dogolik, pesta isago nasuagaluk inayoko ’bega meke inakla arleken hakhoak o, iluk holal waganin o, ” iluk yoknekhesik, yabokane yoknekhe dogolik, “Wene yi re, eberogonat Allah nen ekhe meke o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66019010	Itithogon yoknekhe lagama, an nen at malaikat etnogo apma ukiluk nitibagal yukukhogon hogorasigiluk hagakhi mekeat he, at nen yoknekhe dogolik, “Dek. Dek. Itithogon hogotnabusak dek o. An nebe hat inom, hagarlak lak inom, ninom tak-tagat o. Wene Yesus nen yoknisasikhe meke yogeisilik nekharek meke iti, at Allah Agoreke nen inakla kagalogo yogeisugunem yogeisegarek iti, wene erlo at Yesus nen yoknisasikhe itiat o. Halok he, at Allah at hogorasusak o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66019011	Wene itithogon yoknekhesik oba nen yabokane, pogot kagoukhogon hagatlagunem kuda isi kut meke ap ageikhe etaga, “Hupukhogon Hagakherek, ” igik, “Eberogonat Ekherek, ” igik, egarek meke, kuda iti apot oba yasukhogon dogolik, wim mothogon anek yakhik, ukum mothogon inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagarik lagunem lakhigi o.
66019012	Ap iti ileken hetu amulok hakene, nen ukuloak oba, kare-kare doalegat ap koktek inetagapogot i’bisegarek iti hak ugu. Nen, at etaga thalek ageikhe ninat meke ebe at obake holal waganek werekma akhuni tha’bokhogonat inokodek, at ekaerek anek ilu meke holal waganek welaga higi.
66019013	Nen, at iti asu uanat mep dabulik meke ugu, nen, etaga inilumo ekhe lageikha, “Allah Ane”.
66019014	Itithogon ugu nukhunem, ap ekeraguntek pogot oba meke tha’bokhogonat doalek inasu kain lenan su kut thobalek meke ugu, nen, inebe tomok inakuda isi kut meke apot oba yasukhogon dogolik, at oporlik nukhunem lageisigi.
66019015	At itithogon laga dogolik, akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok tha’bokhogonat inobatne degetdisagein meke, karok elaklak weak meke apema nen dukhi aga laga higi o. Itithogon inobatne degetdisilik thegerluk pisue omaken obatneak iti hak, at ane obatne baga akhuni ha’isalokma nen, opase Allah obatne motok horleakma, yi meke ti meke hagasusak anek iti nen akla aga dageiluk, ukum inoba ’bisinem anggur eken apusu keleluogoluk obolukmo thagalharek iti hak, at isok nen al debelinabigin meke higi.
66019016	Nen, at etaga thalek ageikhe yigithogon, “Ap koktek inetagapogot tha’bokhogonat inom, inougi koktek tha’bokhogonat inom, inoe kok Netagapogot he, anat o, ” iluk asu uanat at oba inom, arlisu oba inom, holal waganek werekma higi o.
66019017	-
66019018	Itithogon higirik oba nen yabokane, at malaikat ageikhe mulikin oba metek dogolik, ane kokhogon it yi thue ti thue tha’bokhogonat pogot obake turlem hitluk lagunem, men yogeisekhe laga, “Ap koktek inetagapogot inom, wim tugure inom, inagarumi wim yakharek meke inom, kuda inom, ap apot oba yasukhogon nekharek meke inom, akhuni inebe inetagawerek meke inom, inebe inetaga dek meke inom, inatuaneke meke inom, inasokneat welageikharek meke inom, tha’bokhogonat Allah nen inakhesik inino doalegat ’bisekhe meke nobageik nen hinebe natogositni o, ” iluk isinem holhi o.
66019019	Itithogon holhirik lakhigi meke, helo yeke hakene kok etnogo agarumi koktek inetagapogot agat oba meke inom, inagarumi tentara meke inom, inom nen, at kuda apot oba yasukhogon iti inom, agarumi tentara meke inom, inom wim yabuogoluk inebe doalek werekma hisigi.
66019020	Itithogon werekma, at ageikhe haganeat wageikhesik, “An Allah ane yokhisekhe lagei, ” iluk ekalat at helo yeke hakene etnogo il oba elalin meke hagakhe lageikhe etnogo nen, nukhetdisasinem eberogonat thalek, it akhuni aperek nen he, “Nit at helo yeke hakene kok meke yi agarumi, ” iluk apusu sirlo hakene inobake waganhik, inetaiken kaneke at helo yeke hakene kok etnogo ebe hakene alino hagarek etnogo oba hakotdigik, hagakhe lageikha mekeat he, yogotak at helo yeke hakene etnogo ebe inom, ekalat nukhetdisekhe laga meke etnogo inom, ipisak ha’isegasik, herle warogo i laut hetu meke yekelekma hotali al hakene obasi weak meke etaga belerang inom-inom amulok nasi motok welagarekma etoma inebe inilukeke la’isekhe laga higi.
66019021	Itithogon la’isekhe dogolik, akhuni it inagarumi tha’bokhogonat here’isalok lageikha meke, at kuda apot oba yasukhogon nekhe laga etnogo apema nen karok dukhi aga dogolik inakhe laga. Itithogon inebe warogo ’bisekhemo yi thue ti thue tha’bokhogonat wageikhasik, it akhuni inino inelabut urogonat neke lageikha hisigi.
66020001	Itithogon hisigirik oba nen, yabokane, at malaikat ageikhe pogot oba nen thu kunci wema baga kilinmo eloma meke inom, herle kupi pisue omaken akineak meke inom, ikimo wolok usa’agunem lakhigi.
66020002	-
66020003	Itithogon wolok usa’agasik, at warlo hakene kok muk haganeat nen welageikhe meke etaga Iblis igik, Setan igik, egarek meke etnogo, ebe iki herle warogo yi akhuni ti akhuni nukhetdisekherek iti hak nukhetdisigidek 1. 000 tahun iki herle warek wema baga kilinmo eloma dogoagaluk usakhesik, thu kunci larogo ’bisinem higi o. Etoma dogoluk nen, hisalogo lia’isusak obaat il opaki hasik hisalek dogoagaluk hisalogo lia’isigin.
66020004	Itithogon higirik oba nen yabokane, ap koktek inobolukmo doalegat werekma etoma inebe doalegat kok dogolik, akhuni aperek inapma ’bisalok hagasik dogolik ukum inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe dogoagaluk iteerek ’bisegama hisigi. Nen, ageikhe higiat. It akhuni helo yeke hakene kok meke etnogo inom, akaneke at ebe hakene alino hagarek etnogo inom, hogorinakhidek etaga thalek holal waganek etnogo inetai ekerlogo inilhaoak oba a? Iniki baga a, waganhidek here’isalok, Yesus hagakhe lageikhe meke yogeisilik nekharek hasik inom, Allah ane hasik inom, inarlokop ade ’bogokhogon palogo inakhukha meke emenogo arat inapuke inilugurinabiluk, meldisekhesik nen welageikha hisigi. Nen, it at Kristus inom akhuni aperek inapma ’bisalok hagasik, mulikin dageigik usigik hagakhe korlek, 1. 000 tahun welageikha hisigi.
66020005	It akhuni watlagoukha meke alebageik itiat inilugurinakhesik meldisekhe hisigi. Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni watlagoukha meke ebetlake anek he, o mulikin dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek, inapuke inilugurinakhidek 1. 000 tahun hagasuagaluk ’bisekhemo werekma hisigi.
66020006	It akhuni alebageik watlagoukha meke yabokane warek motok dogoagaluk ukum inoba ’biluk inasumo watlasugun. Mekeat he, it aperek alebageik inapuke inilugurinabiluk nen, inebe Allah hasik ’bisagein meke iti anek he, inakla arleken motok akhagun o. It iti yabokane watlageidek dogolik, inebe Allah inom, Kristus inom, ipisak iteerek atluk, o mo dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek, 1. 000 tahun oba, it Kristus inom akhuni inapma ’bisalok hagasik dogogun hisigi.
66020007	Itithogon hisigirik oba nen, yabokane, o mulikin dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek, 1. 000 tahun arat dogoluk nen, ilugun kobokhogon Iblis iki herle warek etnogo herle hisalogo lia’isigin.
66020008	Itithogon lia’i agunem, wim yabuogoluk, akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok pogot erlomake-erlomake 4 oba upuke, wemake, ilike, yike welageikharek meke nukherinabigiluk inakla kagalik laga laga higi. Iti, o etaga Gog meke inom, Magog meke inom, inoba wim yoko lagasik, inebe motok doalegat lelaga i laut yekelek yipitlake welagarek iti hakene doalogo ’bisekhemo welageikha hisigi.
66020009	Itithogon doaldiluk, akhuni Allah a’buri o kota Allah ai ukul etaiken hunik meke etnogo doaldiluk werekma, o tan thebelogo inasuogoluk kerlekhogon uki ageikha meke re, hetu pogot oba nen usa'aga dogolik, inebe tha'bokhogonat hali neke laga hisigi.
66020010	Itithogon hali nasi korlek, at helo yeke hakene etnogo inom, at ageikhe nen, “An Allah ane yogeisekhe lagei, ” iluk ekalat nukhetdisekherek meke etnogo inom, i laut hetu meke yekelekma hotali al hakene obasi weak meke etaga belerang inom-inom amulok nasi motok welagarekma etoma po wukhogon usa'isekhe. Usa'isekhemo etoma werekma, Iblis etnogo yabokane inoba po wukhogon usa'isekhemo inom etoma dogolik, dikene hibakone hinet wakho motok-motok dogogun hisigi.
66020011	Itithogon higirik oba nen, yabokane, ap koktek welagarekma inobolukmo kok kut meke werekma, at ebe etoma kok welaga higi. Itithogon werekma pogot, agat, tha'bokhogonat, at agorlerogon dek atlukmo nogo nen he, yabokane inileken hausak degat aga laga higi.
66020012	Itithogon dek aga korlek, akhuni watlagoukha meke inetagawerek meke inom, inetaga dek meke inom, at kok obolukmo werek etnogo elokhoma metek werekma hisigi. Itithogon werek korlek, thuesika tha'bokhogonat 'bukalhigik, thuesika ageikhe akhuni iniluk motok dogoagaluk hanorinabigin meke inetaga holal waganek meke 'bukalhigik, hagakhe laga. Itithogon 'bukaldiluk, it akhuni watlagoukha meke inobabut hagakhe lagoukha meke thuesika etoma baga holal waganek meke tak-tagat ukum inoba 'bigik, kokhik, hagakhe laga higi.
66020013	Iti hagat, akhuni ebetlake watlagoukhasik, i laut yekelekma welageikharek meke, i laut nen hokologo ula'isa ageik, akhuni watlatluk wema baga usagoukha meke, at watlariogei erlo inom, wema baga inom, iteerek welagarek meke etnogo nen lia'isa ageik, hagakhunem, at Allah nen it inebe tomok inobabut hagakhe lagoukha tak-tagat wene inoba ’bigik, kokhik, hagakhe laga higi.
66020014	-
66020015	Ukum itithogon inoba ’bigin iti, thuesika it akhuni inebe tomok iniluk motok dogoagaluk hanorinabigin meke, inetaga holal waganek etnogo baga waganhidek meke halok, itithogon i laut hetu meke yekelek iti baga po wukhogon usa’isekhe dogolik, wema baga inom, watlariogei erlo inom, inomat po wukhogon etomaat usa’isekhe laga higi. Itithogon usa’isekhe laga iti, alebageik elanma hasik watlatlukmo nen, yabokane motok-motok watlasugun meke i hetu meke yekelekma usa’isagein itiat o.
66021001	Itithogon higirik oba nen yabokane, Allah nen pogot inom, agat inom, alep meke degetdigik, i laut yekelek degetdigik, hagakhesik nen, obolukmo, pogot inom, agat inom, ket meke hagarogo ’bekhemo werekma higi.
66021002	Itithogon hagarogo ’bekhesik, at Allah ekaerek ai o kota Yerusalem ket meke, humi inaguni horlauwogoluk inobake dik-duk waganharek iti hak, at werekma pogot oba nen usa’i agunem higi.
66021003	Itithogon higirik oba nen, yabokane nasuk holhi meke, at kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo nen, at ageikhe ane kokhogon ekhe dogolik, “Lakhani! Allah akhuni inom motok dogogin meke, ai ili lakhani! Itithogon dogolik, it at a’buriat dogogun, nen, at Allah it inopase inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogogun mekeat dogolik, inom motok dogogun o.
66021004	Itithogon dogolik, yi wene ti wene alep meke degetdisalok, at nen it inil apusu arat horogo ’bilukmo nogo nen he, inebe watlaga dogogun degat, inakla weak aga dogogun degat, de aga dogogun degat, hinet wakhe dogogun degat o, ” iluk isinem holhi.
66021005	Nen, at kok welagarekma obolukmo etnogo baga dogolik, men ekhe, “Yi meke ti meke tha'bokhogonat ket meke winamerogo 'bigi yoma lakhani, ” iluk ekhesik nen, an men yoknekhe, “Wene iti eberogonat meke, iluk hetaiken hakotdusak meke iti nen, holal waganin o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66021006	Itithogon yoknekhesik yabokane ageikhe men yoknekhe, “Arat. Erlo men, ekapul men, anatma, an nebe erlo baga nen logat, ekapul oba nikhok motok dogogin meke nen, akhuni i abu meke i inilugurinakherek meke elesimo nen henago oko dek werlegat wogeisekhe dogogin o.
66021007	At tha nen obatne asigin meke halok, wene tha'bokhogonat igi iti, at iteerek dogogin o. Itithogon iteerek dogolik, an Allah at opase noba hakotdiluk dogogin mekeat dogogin, nen, at an na'burat dogogin o.
66021008	Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni aperek inayuk holik meke inom, inetaiken Allah oba hakotdigidek meke inom, Allah alilo meke hagakharek meke inom, akhuni inakharek meke inom, param ha'isigik, ha'isoagaluk hagakhik, hagarek meke inom, elo dek elalinat inakharek meke inom, inetaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik, hogorakharek meke inom, inekalat egarek meke tha'bokhogonat inom, i laut hetu meke yekelek werekma, hotali al hakene obasi weak meke etaga belerang inom-inom amulok nasi motok welagarekma etoma inobolukmo la’isagein. La’isagein iti, inebe alebageik elanma hasik watlatlukmo nen, yabokane watlasugun meke itiat o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66021009	Itithogon yoknekhesik oba nen yabokane, Allah nen ilugun kobokhogon akhuni weagarinabuagaluk, it malaikat inebe 7 baga Allah nen akla aga i henago negen wolok tiali ageikha meke emenogo meke ageikhe wagasik nen men yoknekhe, “Domba Eak nen age negen horlekhe meke iti ebe yakulhisumo hileken lakhanok nen erne o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66021010	Itithogon yoknekhe korlek, Allah Agoreke noba duk i agama, at malaikat etnogo nen woknarik tom kok uanat oba dageikhesik, at Allah ekaerek ai o kota ukul kok Yerusalem pogot oba Allah nen usa'i aga meke etnogo yakulnekhemo lakhigi.
66021011	O kota iti, Allah ebe a'bi'bal hogorakharek hagatma, a'bi'bal helekit a'bi'bal horleak oko kogat palharek meke etaga baiduri pandan elokhoken mirliak hano inamukhak hakene meke higi.
66021012	Nen, leget horlako leget kok uanat halekma, holagape 12 oba palek. Nen, holagape palek ebe tomok oba, akhuni Israel meke inukuloak etaga 12 obaat holal waganekma, it malaikat inebe 12 oba nenat holagape tomok thuam welageikha.
66021013	Nen, o kota iti, abel mulikin yegelogo dagei agarekmake mot-mot, holagape 3 baga palek welaga. Nen, abel upuke mot-mot, holagape 3 baga palek welagaat. Nen abel wemake mot-mot, holagape 3 baga palek welagaat. Nen, abel mulikin korokhogon ukekherekmake tak-tak, holagape 3 baga palek welagaat o.
66021014	Nen, leget horlakoma leget halek iti, herlaga helekit ebe 12 obaatma, at Domba Eak nen inebe 12 obaat wenago inayoko 'biluk la'isasikhe meke emenogo inetaga holal waganek welaga higi.
66021015	Nen, at malaikat an wene yoknekhe laga meke etnogo nen, o kota etnogo inom, holagape palek emenogo inom, horlako leget halek etnogo inom, walegeke emas meke baga walhagaluk hago werekma lakhigi.
66021016	Itithogon ebe walhekhe dogolik, o kota etnogo ukut 4 oba hagarekma, aleget ebelak-ebelak uanmake dek, 'beromake dek, ipisak tak-tagatma, walegeke etnogo baga walhekhe laga. Itithogon walhugunem, leget aleget ebelak-ebelak inom, ilugun-ilugun inom, hurli it iniki wenakharek tak-tak, 12. 000 oba, nen, nit yoma wenakharek tak-tak, 2. 400 kilometer hagatlagunem higi.
66021017	At malaikat etnogo nen akhuni nen walhegarek hakene horlako leget etnogo walhekhe meke, hurli it iniki wenakhorek tak-tak, 144 oba, nen, nit yoma wenakhorek tak-tagat he, 60 meter hakene agunem higi.
66021018	Leget horlako leget iti, helekit a’bi’bal horleak oko kok palharek meke etaga baiduri pandan iti meke hagarek. Nen, o kota iti ebe emas elokhoken mirliak hano inamukhak hakene meke hagarek higi.
66021019	O kota iti, horlako leget herlaga halek etnogo, yi helekit ti helekit oko kok meke etaga permata meke elokhoken hanorogo halek. Helekit herlaga nomor satu etaga baiduri pandan iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik, helekit herlaga nomor 2 helekit etaga nilam iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik helekit herlaga nomor 3 etaga yakut iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik helekit herlaga nomor 4 etaga samrud iti meke halek.
66021020	Nen, oporlik, helekit herlaga nomor 5 etaga baiduri sepah iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik helekit herlaga nomor 6 etaga delima iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik, helekit herlaga nomor 7 etaga ratna cempaka iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik helekit herlaga nomor 8 etaga pirus iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik, helekit herlaga nomor 9 etaga topas iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik, helekit herlaga nomor 10 etaga krisopras iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik, helekit herlaga nomor 11 etaga lazuardi iti meke halek. Nen, oporlik, helekit herlaga 12 ebe ilugunmo, helekit etaga kecubung iti meke halekma higi.
66021021	Nen, holagape palek ebe 12 oba emenogo holagape thu tomok helekit eken oko kok meke etaga mutiara iti meke hagarek. Nen, o kota iti holak lageikharekmake tha’bokhogonat, emas meke elokhoken mirliak hano inamukhak hakene meke talek werekma higi.
66021022	Itithogon higi mekeat he, o kota etoma Allah obatne horleakma yi meke ti meke hagasusak anek etnogo inom, Domba Eak etnogo inom, ipisak inebe Allah ai halek negen werek korlek nogo nen, Allah ai halek ageikhe werekma higi dek o.
66021023	Nen, o kota etoma Allah a’bi’bal yakhik, Domba Eak etnogo ebe a’bi’bal isagal hakene yakhik, liarogo yakho korlek nogo nen, o mulikin inom, thut inom, yakhe dogosak degat welaga higi.
66021024	Itithogon a’bi’bal horleak lia werek korlek nogo nen, yi akhuni ti akhuni agat oba meke inukuloak etaga tomok a’bi’bal iti baga nekhe dogogun o. Nen, it ap koktek inetagapogot agat oba meke inameke yi meke ti meke oko kogat meke werekma hogorinakharek meke iti wolok o kota etnogo ’bi ukekhe dogogunat.
66021025	Nen, o kota etoma o hi ageidek dikene motok dogogin iti nen, horlako leget halekma holagape palek ebe tomok, thu lakhidek hualek motok dogogin higi o.
66021026	Nen, akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok tha’bokhogonat inameke yi meke ti meke hogorinakhik, agugurogo hagarinakhik, hagakharek meke iti wolok o kota etoma ’bi ukekhe dogogun.
66021027	Itithogon ukekhe dogogun mekeat he, akhuni weak inalilo meke hagakhik, inekalat igik, hagakhe dogolik inoba horinakhidek meke o etoma ukekhe dogogun motok dek higi. Itithogonat mekeat he, it aperek iniluk motok dogoagaluk hanorinabigin meke inetaga Domba Eak aruesika baga holal waganek meke anek o etoma ukekhe dogogun higi o.
66022001	Itithogon yakulnekhemo higirik oba nen yabokane, Allah inom, Domba Eak inom, ipisak kok motokwelageikharekma inobolukmo nen, i inilugurinakherek meke elokhoken mirliak hano inamukhak hakene meke elesi hunalogo dukhitluk nen,
66022002	o kota etoma holagarlem abel ebelak-ebelak lageikharekmake werekma, i etnogo tumo lagarekma higi. Itithogon laga korlek, i aik ilibagan yibagan, o ai yago werekma higi. O iti eken nasinem inilugurinakherek meke etnogo, thut opakiat oba eken ageikhe ikhik, thut ageikhe baga eken ageikhe ikhik, ikhe korlek o mulikin dageigik, usigik, hagakhe korlek tahun opakiat oba eken hurli 12 oba nen ikherek meke welaga iti. Nen, eka baga, yi akhuni ti akhuni inukuloak etaga tomok hanorinakherek meke higi.
66022003	Nen, alep Allah nen akhuni inom, yi meke ti meke inom, homan ’bisasikhe meke etnogo korogo ’bisalokma nogo nen he, yabokane o iti oba homan korek welaga higi. Allah inom, Domba Eak inom, ipisak kok motok welageikharekma inobolukmo etnogo, o kota etoma tumo werek korlek, it akhuni Allah atuaneke meke inetaiken at oba hakotdiluk dogolik, at hasik hagakhe dogogun hisigi.
66022004	Itithogon hagakhe dogolik, Allah etaga it inilhaoak oba holal waganekma, it nen at elokhoken inileken hekhe dogogun o.
66022005	Nen, Allah ebe a’bi’bal it inebe liarinakhe korlek nogo nen, o hibako degat, nen isagal inom, mulikin inom, yakhe dogosak degat, werek korlek, it koktek inetagapogot dogolik, akhuni aperek inapma ’bisalok hagasik motok-motok dogogun hisigi o.
66022006	Itithogon hisigirik werekma, at malaikat etnogo nen yabokane yoknekhe dogolik, “Yi wene ti wene hagatlagunem lakhalok wagan iti, wene iti eberogonat, iluk hetaiken hakotdusak meke o. Wene iti il opakiat dogoluk dek ibat-ibat hagatlasigin meke o. At ninopase Etagapogot Allah Agoreke it ap at ane yogeisegarek meke wogeisekherek meke etnogo nen, at atuaneke meke yogeisoagaluk an malaikat la’ani agama wagei o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66022007	Itithogon yoknikhunem, at Yesus nen men yoknekhe, “Lakhan! An ibat-ibat wisigin o. Itithogon wagunem tha nen yi wene ti wene holal waganek meke yi asuk hologo mothogon hagakhe dogogin halok, Allah nen hanotdisinem akla arleken akhagein o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66022008	Itithogon yoknekhemo, yi wene ti wene tha’bokhogonat yi, an Yohanes yoknikhunem nasuk holhik, nileken higik, hagakhi o. Itithogon nasuk holhik, nileken higik, hagakhirik nen, at malaikat wene iti an nileken lakhoagaluk yakulnekhe laga meke etnogo, nitibagal yukukhogon hogorasigiluk hagakhi.
66022009	Itithogon mekeat he, at nen men yoknekhe, “A! An itithogon hogotnabusak dek o. An nebe, hat men, hagarlak lak aperek at Allah ane yogeisegarek meke men, it aperek inebe tha’bokhogonat wene holal waganek yi inasuk hologo mothogon hagakhe dogogun meke men, ninom tak-tak, ninebe at Allah atuaneke anekma, hetaiken at Allah oba hakotdiluk, at anek hogorasusak o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66022010	Itithogon yoknekhesik oba nen, yabokane yoknekhe dogolik, “Yi wene ti wene Allah nen ekhe meke yi ibat hagatlasigin iti nen, sirlo ’begarek iti hak, Akhuni yogeisausak dek, iluk wene hakla atluk thogotdigidegat yogeisekhe dogono o.
66022011	Yogeisugunem, tha nen, obabut weak anek hagarekhe dogogin apekhe halok he, weak anek hagarekhe dogoak o. Nen, tha nen weak inalilo meke anek hagarekhe dogogin apekhe halok he, iti mekeat hagarekhe dogoak o. Nen, tha nen Allah akla apekherek meke anek hagakhe dogogin apekhe halok he, itiat hagakhe dogoak o. Nen, tha nen ebe Allah hasik ’bisalok dogogin apekhe halok he, ebe Allah hasigat ’bisalok dogoak o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66022012	-
66022013	Itithogon yoknekhemo, at Yesus nen yoknekhe dogolik, “Erlo inom, ekapul inom, anatma, ebekeram erloma nen logat yabokane ilugun oba nikhok motok dogogin meke nen, akhuni inebe tomok inobabut hagakharek meke tak-tagat oko wogeisagaluk wolok ibat-ibat wisigin o.
66022014	Nen, it aperek inasu hanorogon thobalogo ’bakhalok dogogun meke anek he, Allah nen hanorinakhunem inakla arleken akhalok, o eken nasinem inilugurinakherek meke etnogo eken nikik, nen o kota etoma holagapema ukekhe dogouogoluk iteerek atluk dogogun.
66022015	Itithogon mekeat he, it akhuni aperek weak inalilo meke yeke hagakharek hak hagakharek meke inom, it elo dek elalin inakharek meke inom, it param ha’isigik, ha’isoagaluk hagakhik, hagakharek meke inom, it akhuni inakharek meke inom, it inetaiken kaneke oba hakotdiluk dogolik hogorakharek meke inom, it inape baga nen nukhetdisigik, yi meke ti meke hagakhe dogolik, nukhetdisigik, hagakharek meke inebe tomok inom, tha’bokhogonat o kota iti abel itikmanke dogogun o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66022016	Itithogon yoknekhesik, at Yesus nenat, yabokane yoknekhe dogolik he, “Yi wene ti wene yi abok, an nagot malaikat nen hit na’buri o yi ai ti ai natogokhethep meke tha’bokhogonat yokhisoagaluk hinoba la’i agei iti, an Yesus nenat o. Nen, o aku dukhekherek iti hak, ap Daud nen itago meke etnogo, an nebeat o. Nen, husagal wap o mulikin yegelogo dagei agarekma tak-tak, lia’i agarek meke a’bi’bal weak etnogo anat o, ” iluk yoknekhe.
66022017	Itithogon yoknekhesikmo nen, yabokane, men yoknekhe, “Tha nen i abu nen nausak warlok halok he, i inilugurinakherek meke okorlek werlegat horlalok noagaluk, Allah Agoreke inom, Domba Eak age negen waganhe meke etnogo inom, ipisak nen ekhe dogolik, Naetni o, iluk yogeisugunem, it aperek inebe tomok it ipisak inane inasuk holiogei meke nen, Naetni o, iluk ekhe dogosagat o, ” iluk isinem holhi.
66022018	An Yohanes nen hit aperek wene yabokane hagatlasigin wene an yoknekhe meke iti hinasuk holugun meke hinebe tomok, wene ageikhe yi yokhisak, “Tha nen wene holal waganhi meke yi werek korlegat, wene ninat meke oba lapelogo ’bekhe halok he, Allah nen akhuni ukum inoba ’biluk weagarinabigin iluk ekhe meke holal waganogo ’bigi meke yi tak-tagat, Allah nen at iti ukum ageikhe inom lapelogo oba ’biluk ebe weagatdiginat o.
66022019	Nen, tha nen yi wene ti wene yabokane hagatlasigin meke yoknekhe meke holal waganhi meke yi werek korlegat he, wene iti meke ageikhe thebelogo usakho halok he, o eken nukunem inilugurinakherek meke iti eken ageikhe at noagaluk werek mekeat he, Allah nen he, Hat nausak dek, iluk yogokhik, nen, o Allah ekaerek ai o kota etnogo at iti iteerek atluk dukhigik-ukigik, hagakhe dogoagaluk werek mekeat he, Allah nen, Hat ukusak dek, iluk yogokhik, igin, ” iluk yokhisigi iti o.
66022020	Nen, wene iti tha'bokhogonat, eberogonat iluk ekherek meke, at Yesus etnogo nenat, “An ibat-ibat wisigin o, ” iluk iliogo. Itithogon isinem, an nen he, “Yesus noe. Hat ibat-ibat wisigin iti, ebeat asuak u hak, Amin, wetno, ” iluk ekhe lagei.
66022021	Nen, hit Allah a'buri o yi ai ti ai natogokhethep meke tha'bokhogonat, nagarlak lak nerugi. Ninoe Yesus obabut hano etnogo nen thethisik dogoak o.
